
=== vardhamanaoutput-1-to-1.json ==========================
siri- siricaṁdasūri- viraiyaṁ
sirimuṇisuvvayajiṇiṁdacariyaṁ
-
maragaya-maṇi - samavannaṁ namāmi
1
.
paramapurisō aṇāīvihū aṇaṁtō anaṁga-niḍuhaṇō । caurāṇaṇō tamaharō sirī nivāsō jiṇō jayai ॥1॥
payaḍiya-samagga-naya-dhamma-maggamōsappiṇīē ēyāē । rāyāṇa ya jēṇa jiṇēsarāṇa paḍhamattamumbūḍhaṁ ||2॥
tamahaṁ namāmi usahaṁ sahati jassaṁsa-ghōlirā kēsā । siva-pāsāyā rōhya bhaviyajaṇālaṁba - rajjusamā ||3||
surasēla-calaṇa-uggōvasagga-saṁghāya -
surasēla-calaṇa- uggōvasagga- saṁghāya sahaṇa - līlāē । bahiraṁga aṁtaraṁgō parakkamō jassa nivvaḍiō || 4 ||
bhavajalahi-majjha-majjaṁta-jaṁtu saṁtāṇa - tāraṇa-samatthaṁ । titthaṁ jēṇa pavattiyamēyaṁ paṇamāmi taṁ vīraṁ ॥ 5 ॥
sōsiyaasēsa- saṁsāra- sāyarē sāyaraṁ jiṇē vaṁdē । sēsē viya nīsēsē nissēyasa sōkkha- dāyārē ॥6॥
micchatta mahāvisa-mucchiyāṇa nimmala- vivēyacēyannaṁ । jīvāṇa jēṇa dinaṁ suha- dēsaṇa - amaya sēēṇa || 7 ||
muttālayaṁtaraṭṭhāṇa - pattamāhappamuttamaṁ tamahaṁ ।
muṇisuvvaya - jiṇidaṁ ॥ 8 ॥
siriiṁdabhūipabhiīṇa vaṁdimō gaṇaharāṇa varacaraṇē । jiṇa bhaṇiyapayattaya-savaṇaō vi apayattaō caiva ॥9॥
antamuhuttēṇaṁ ciya payattha-paramattha- payaḍaṇa - samatthō । nīsēsa - aīsaya - juō suya - jalahī jēhi nimmaviō || 10 |
jassannayammi ajjavi dhamma - payāsa karēṁti āyariyā । iha bhārahammi tamahaṁ suhammasāmi nama̭sāmi ॥। 11॥
jaṁbū muṇidaṁ vaṁdāmi tamahamēyammi bhārahē vāsē । jēṇa samaṁ ciya pattō nivvāṇaṁ kēvala-paīvō ॥ 12 ॥
jī aṇuhiyā su-sāgara - pāragāmiṇō huti । muṇiṇō maṇappasāyaṁ sā amhaṁ kuṇau suyadēvī ॥13॥
kuṁdēṁdujjala-vannā jiṇida-vayaṇāraviṁda- saṁbhūyā । vasau vayaṇē iyāṇi amhāṇa
jā vimala - daṁsaṇadharā sudaṁsaṇā daṁsaṇijjavaradēhā । sā amha samīhiya - kajja - sāhaṇē
tāṇa gurūṇaṁ paya-paṁkayāiṁ paṇamāmi parama bhattīē । garuyattaṁ ditēhi vi jēhi kaō kammalahuō haṁ ॥16॥
iya vitthāriyaryavva sattha - vitthinna - saṁthuī ahayaṁ । patthuya - vatthummi karēmi saṁpayaṁ kiṁpi āraṁbhaṁ ||17||
saṁtēsu vi iyara kaīsarēsu saṁghēṇa bhagavayā kaha vi । dinō maha āēsō muṇisuvvaya cariya rayaṇammi ।। 18 ।।।
jai vi jaḍappā jai vihu aṇahigayā sēsa sattha- paramatyō । saharisahiyaō taha vi hu ēttha ahaṁ saṁpayaṭṭissaṁ । । 19 ।
āēsa- kayapasāō jēṇa ahaṁ nigguṇō vi saṁghēṇa । jāō uttaddhisiyamaṇō aviyāriyaniyayasāmatthō ||20||
satti - viṇō vi ahaṁ haṁsaṇijjō buhyaṇassa na havissaṁ । harisijjissaṁti visēsaō vi tē majjha viṇaēṇa ॥ 21 ॥
jaha piyarēhiṁ bhaṇiō kamma vi kajjē asakkaṇijjē vi । kōūhalēṇa bālō turiyaṁ ciya tō payaṭṭēi ॥ 22॥
tattha asakkaviyārā karaṇavarāhaṁ buhā na giṇhaṁti । kiṁtu viṇīyattaṇaō havaṁti guṇa - gāhiṇō tassa ॥23॥
sattī vi ullasaṁtī saṁbhāvijjai avijjamāṇā vi । saṁghassa pahāvēṇaṁ mahappaṇō saṁpayaṁ majjha ॥ 24 ॥
sāhāē sāhaṁtara-gamaṇēnciya vānarō khamō hōi । suvvaiya tēṇa tariō jalahī vi pahuppahāvēṇa || 25 ||
sarassaī dēvī ॥14॥
haṇau duriyāī ।। 15 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-2-to-2.json ==========================
2

vimala - guṇasya - niraṁtaraṁ
sirimaṇisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
titthayara-pūryāṇijjō saṁghō āisai jaṁ kaya-pasāō । taṁ maṁ kimaṇusarissaidavī na sarassaī inhi ? || 26॥
rannā jō āṇai kammi vi kajjē gurummi raṁkō vi । sāmaṁta maṁti-maṁḍaliya-māṇaṇijjō havai sō vi ॥ 27॥
kuṇai ya mahiḍḍhiyāṇaṁ jō āēsaṁ jayammi rōrō vi । atthō saddō ya tahā tassa jahicchaṁ samucchalai ||28||
tā ēyamavaṭṭa bhaṁ niya- hiyaē ṭhāviūṇa ahamihi । saṁgha - viinnāēsassa sāhaṇē ujjamissāmi ||29||
dujjaṇa- suyaṇa-sarūvōvavannaṇaṁ nāhamihakarissāmi । jaṁ vivarīya sarūvā dō vi imē tēṇa kiṁ bhaṇimō ? ||30||
sukai - raiyammi kavvē avijjamāṇē vi pēcchaē dōsē । dōsēhi bhāviyamaī khuddappagaī khalō jēṇa ||31||
guṇalēsēṇa vimukkaṁ parassa kavvaṁ muṇaṁti saguṇaṁ ti । suyaṇā sarala - sahāvā kēvala-guṇa- pūriyappāṇā ||32||
jō jassa hōi atthī taṁ ciya pēcchēi sō asataṁ pi । marumaṁḍalammi māinhiyāsu jaha pāṇiyaṁ hariṇā ||33||
vāvārijjai vāṇī vikkhaṇēhiṁ paramma phala - hēuṁ । jattha na tassa'tthi lavō vi tattha tē hōṁti tunhikkā ||34||
dhaṁtaṁ pi uvāladdhā niyapagaiṁ dujjaṇē vi suyaṇāvi । na pariccayaṁti kahamavi tā tattha na jujjaē vōttuṁ ॥ 35 ॥
siri munisuvvaya - titthaṁkarassa cariyammi patthuē ēttha । nava bhava-saṁgaha- saṁgaya- gāhā - juyalaṁ imaṁ hōi ||36||
sivakēū. 1 sōhammē2 kubēradattō3 saṇakumārammi 4 aha vajjakuṁḍalō5 baṁbhalōya - kappammi6 sirivammō7 |37|
pāṇayakappē 9 muṇisuvvaōya tityāhivō bhavē navamē । iya saṁkhēvō bhaṇiō vittharaminhi tu vōcchāmi ॥ 38 ॥
atthi iha jaṁbudīvō dīvāṇaṁ āimō samaggāṇa | jagaīē parikkhittō sahāniviṭṭhō nariṁdō vva ॥ 39 ॥
tatthuttara - disibhāē ēravayaṁ nāma atthi varavāsaṁ । jaṁ sahai
pavaravāsaṁ va ॥ 40 ॥
tassuttaraddha-majjhima- khaṁḍammi akhaṁḍagāma -pura- kaliē । dēsē āsi pasiddhā māyaṁdī nāma varanayarī ॥ 41 ॥
tassuttaraddha-majjhima- khaṁḍammi akhaṁḍagāma pura - kaliē । dēsē āsi pasiddhā māyaṁdī nāma varanayarī ॥ 42 ॥
jī kubēragārā bahuviha vattaṁ vahati purisā vi । taha vi suralōya - sōhaṁ hasaṁti tē niyaya-sōhāē ॥ 43 ॥
taṁ pālai bhaṇimālī rāyā vi pathāva-pasara - parikaliō । akalaṁkō ya akhaṁḍijjamāṇa niyamaṁḍalābhōō ||44 ||
maṇikaṁtā nāmē kaṁtā tassatthi kaṁta guṇakaliyā । sacchambhi jīē hiyaē piya- hiyayaṁ bibiyaṁ vasa ।। 45 ।।
tassa vasuhāhivaiṇō purōhiō vissabhūi nāmēṇa । jō vissabhūikammassa karaṇaō avitahabhihāṇōṁ ॥ 46 ॥
tassāsi vissadattā nāmēṇaṁ bhāriyā guṇāyayaṇaṁ । jā duiyaṁ pivaṁ hiyayaṁ niyapaiṇō savvakālaṁ pi ॥ 47॥
tāṇa suō sivakēū samēkkakulamaṁdiraṁ samuppaṇṇō । paṇṇavaṇijō vijjujjamī ya pannāē saṁpannō ।। 48 ।।
viṇayaparō vi hu piyarāṇa kāraṇaṁ sō paōsabhāvassa । puvvabhavajjiyatārisarūva kammassa dōsēṇa ॥। 49||
uvvēyamuvvahaṁtō aigaruyaṁ māṇasammi sō tattō । ajjhāvayassa kassa vi pāsammi ahijjaē vēē ॥ 50 ॥
bahiṁ samaṁ bahuhi aṇṇayā nayaribāhirūjjāṇē । pattō paribbhamaṁtō iō taō kōuya-vasēṇa ॥ 51 ॥
tattha bahupāyavāṇaṁ majjhē ghaṇa - bahala - sīyalacchāō । nivasai asōya - sāhī sāhāsaya-sōhiya- diyaṁtō ।। 52 ।।
hēṭṭhā tassa nisannō pasanna - vayaṇō silāyalē viulē । cāraṇamuṇī kuṇatō sajjhāyaṁ vēṇu-mahura-jhuṇī ।। 53 ।।
sahasa tti samōinnō nayaṇapahē tassa māhaṇa- suyassa । sivakēḍamī jāṇatō amaya - rasāsāra-sarisasuhaṁ ॥ 54 ॥
tayabhimuhaṁ saṁcaliō sivakēū jāva tāva tē vaḍuyā । kaḍuyāī payaṁpaṁtā pahāviyā taṁ muṇi haṁtuṁ ॥ 55 ॥ |
sahasa cciya pasisiddhā puraō hōūṇa tēṇa tē savvē । māi-piujjhāyāṇaṁ savahē dāūṇa aibahuē ॥ 56 ॥
nayā yagihābhimuhaṁ sayaṁ tu tē vaṁciūṁṇa viṇiyattō । citēi jai mahappā sō na gaō hōjja tā laṭṭha ।।57।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-3-to-3.json ==========================
sivakēūcariyaṁ
।।
jaṁ majjha niraṁtara duha sahassa - pūrijjamāṇahiyayassa । ēyaṁ ciya ajja suhaṁ jāyaṁ jaṁ sō muṇī diṭṭhō || 58 ।।
pēkkhissāmi puṇō taṁ muṇi ti khaṇamullasaṁtamaṇaharisō । kō jāṇai jai na gaō hōhi tti viyaṁbhiyavisāō । 59 ।
ēvaṁ khaṇē khaṇē cciya harisa visāēhiṁ vāulijjatō । pattō tammi paēsē ciṭṭhai sō jattha muṇisīṁhō ||60॥
daṇa taṁ muṇidaṁ tahaṭṭiyaṁ cēva tōsamuppaṇṇō । paḍhamilla daṁsaṇāō aigaruō tassa pariōsō ॥ 61 ॥
citaiya niyayacittē puvva-bhavē pāvamuvaciṇaṁtēṇa । punnaṁ pi kiṁci vi kathaṁ maē muṇī jamiha puṇa diṭṭhō ॥ 62 ॥
nijjhāyai savisēsaṁ pāēhitō muṇi muhaṁ jāva | abbhahiya- dēha - sōhāē saṁjuyaṁ vimhaijjatō ।। 63 ।
kiṁ vannijai rūvaṁ accabbhuyamērisaṁ muṇidarasa ? । ēyassa jaṁ na dīsai kassa vi annassa bhuvaṇammi || 64 ||
kiṁ vā vi pasaṁsijjai uvasama - lacchī aṇannasāricchā ? । tā savvahāvi ēsō na gōyarē amha vayaṇāṇa ॥ 65 ॥
tē nūṇa māhaṇa-suyā majjha sahajjhāiṇō mahāpāvā । jāṇa na jāō harisō daddū ṇa imaṁ pi muṇi-vasahaṁ ।। 66 ।।
iya ciṁtaṁtō pāēsu nivaḍiō tassa sō muṇidassa । savvaṁgamuvvahaṁtō pulayaṁ punnakurāyāraṁ ॥ 67॥
muṇiṇā vi dhammalābhō tassa viiṇṇō maṇuṇṇa-vayaṇēṇa । sura-nara- siva- sōkkhāṇaṁ saṁcakkārō vva sō paḍhamō । 68 ।
dharaṇiyalammi nisannō pasanna -hiyaō purō muṇivarassa । tattō sō sivakēū jōḍiya-kara- saṁpuḍō bhaṇai ।। 69 ।।
bahu atha pucchviṁ bhavaṁ ! tuha nāṇa- jalahiṇō pāsē । kāūṇa maha pasāyaṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya kahaha tāva imaṁ ॥ 70 ॥
tumhēhiṁ kiṁ paḍhijjai ēyaṁ laliyakkharaṁ suṇaṁtāṇaṁ । pasupāyāṇa vi savaṇaṁtarēsu jaṁ jaṇai parama suhaṁ ॥ 71 ॥
tō bhai muṇirvāriṁdō bhadda ! bhaṇijjaṁti amha samayammi । puvvāī mahatthāī imāī aṁgammi bārasamē ॥72॥
paḍhiyāī saṁpai maē visumaraṇabhaēṇa tāṇa ēgaṁtē । pariyattaṇaṁ kuṇaṁtō ciṭṭhāmi ahaṁ taō ēttha ।।73||
bhaṇai puṇō sikkēū bhayavaṁ ēēhiṁ iṁdiyāīyaṁ । jāṇijjaē sarūvaṁ kiṁci vi bhūyaṁ bhavissaṁ vā ।।74 ।।
āha muṇī vi muṇijjai tīya- paḍuppaṇṇaṇāgaya-sarūvaṁ । savvaṁ puvvēhitō na ēttha vatthummi saṁdēhō ||75 ||
tō āha māhaṇa-suō jai ēvaṁ kuṇaha tā maha pasāyaṁ । sāhēha majjha vaiyaramaṇṇabhavē kiṁ maē vihiyaṁ ? ॥76॥
avarāha- vajjiyassa vi viṇaya- parassa vi ya jēṇa majjharvāriṁ । piyarāī pi paōsaṁ vahati niccaṁ aimahaṁtaṁ ॥77॥
pabhaṇē taō sāhū sivakēu bhadda ! suṇēsu ēgamaṇō । sāhippaṁtaṁ niya-puvva - jamma- cariyaṁ maē inhi ॥ 78 ॥
ētthēva ya nayarīē sivasammō nāma baṁbhaṇō atthi । ājammaṁ pi daridō sivasōmā bhāriyā tassa | ।। 79 ।।
tāṇa suō āsi tumaṁ pagatīē bhaddaō viṇīō ya । nāmēṇa ruddasammō saṁjāō aṭṭha vārisiō ॥ 80 ॥
muṁjīvaṁdhāī kammi diyajāiuciyasakkā rē | saṁjjhā-vaṁdaṇamēttaṁ kiṁ pi ahīyaṁ taō tumaē ॥ 81 ॥
annōya tujjha bhāyā kaṇīyasō aggisammanāmō tti । tuha sō vi nivvisēsō dēhasahāvēhiṁ saṁjāō ॥ 82 ॥
jēttikāravijjasi tumaṁ sayā jaṁ pitaṁ pi hi kajjaṁ । iyarō lahuyattaṇaō saryapi jaṁ kuṇai taṁ kuṇai ॥ 63 ॥
taṁ asatēṇa taē aliyaṁ ubbhāviūṇa avarāhaṁ । kāraviyāī paōsaṁ piyarāiṁ tammi khaṇamēkkaṁ ॥ 84 ॥
ṭūṇa paṭṭāī piyarāiṁ tammitaṁ gaō tuṭṭhi । tappaccaiyaṁ kammaṁ tivvaṁ nivvattiyaṁ tumaē ॥ 85 ॥ |
annō u saṁkilēsō tahāvihō tujjha kattha vina jāō । ēvamaikkatāī kaivayasaṁvaccharāī taō ॥ 86॥
aha annayā kayāi vi saṁjāē ūsavammi tujjha piyā । kassa vidiyassa bhavaṇē nimaṁtiō saha kuṭuṁbē ||87||
tattha ainiddha-mahurāhārō bhuttō cirāu ākaṁṭhaṁ । tumaē tō saṁjāyā visūiyā rayaṇi- viramammiṁ ॥ 88 ॥
kai paḍiyārō vi taō sahasa cciya kāladhammamaṇupattō । rāya - purōhiya- puttō saṁpattō sō tumaṁ ihaī || 69 ॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-4-to-4.json ==========================
1
sirimuṇisubvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
taṁ puvva-bhava - samajjiyamihi tuha kammamudayamaṇupattaṁ । piyarāṇa vi tēṇa tumaṁ jāōsi paōsā - ṭhaṇammi' ||90 ||
ēvaṁ kahiūṇa muṇimmi uvaraē tassa takkhaṇā cēva । jāyaṁ jāī - saraṇaṁ paccakkhaṁ taṁ va niyacariyaṁ ॥ 91 ॥
tō bhīō sivakēū saṁvēgamuvāgaō bhaṇai ēvaṁ । kiṁ ēttiyamēttaṁ pi hu pahu ! kammaṁ iya phalaṁ dēi ॥ 92 ॥
aha jaṁpai muṇi-pavarō kammāṇamuvajjaṇammi jīvāṇa । paramatthaō nimittaṁ kōhāikasāya - pariṇāmō ॥ 93॥
ēkkāē vi kiriyā pariṇāmavasēṇa kēi kammāī । jīvā taha kaha vi samajjiṇaṁti ai- sarasa-giddhāī || 14 ||
jaha bahubhava kōḍīsu vi tāṇa phalaṁ aṇuhavijjamāṇaṁ pi । na uvēi kaha vi pēratamicchamāṇāṇa vi jiyāṇa । 95 ।।
annē puṇa kē tahāvihāī baṁdhati tāī jaha dāuṁ । tucchaṁ ci ya kiṁ pi phalaṁ tammi bhavē cēva phiṭṭēti ॥ 96॥
kammaṁ tu jaṁ nibaddhaṁ sutivva-pariṇāma saṁgaēṇa taē । tā taṁ daṁsissainiyavivāgamannēsu vi bhavēsu ।। 97 ।।
tō diyavarassa taṇaō bhayabhīō bhaṇai muṇivaraṁ ēvaṁ । bhayavaṁ ! nāṇadivāyara ! jāṇasi savvamēyaṁpi ॥ 98 ॥
tā kāūṇa pasāyaṁ maha garuyaṁ saṁpayaṁ kahasu ēvaṁ । ēyāō kammāō kēṇa uvāēṇa muccissaṁ ॥99॥
kahara muṇī bāhīṇaṁ jaha hōi rasāyaṇaṁ viṇāsayaraṁ । taha savvakamma-vāhīṇa ghāiṇī hōi pavvajjā ॥ 100 ॥
jā amhēhi vi gahiyā paccakkhaṁ taṁ palōyasi iyāṇi । taṁ pi imaṁ paḍivajjasu jaha muccasi savva dukkhēhiṁ ।। 101 ।।
aha muṇi-vayaṇaṁ sōuṁ sivakē ū bhaṇai harisa- paḍihacchō । bhayavaṁ ! mahāpasāō ēsa kaō majjha tumhē hi । । 102॥
pavvajjāē sarūvaṁ sāhēha paraṁ visēsaō savvaṁ । sāmantrēṇaṁ diṭṭha vēsaggahaṇaṁ maē tumha ॥ 103॥
aha kahai muṇī karuṇārasēṇa nīsēsamēva tassa purō । pavvajjā karaṇijjaṁ su-dukkaraṁ kāyara - jaṇassa ।। 104 ।।
āyanniya muṇivayaṇō vikēūṇa bhaṇai vimhayapavannō । bhayavaṁ ! sammamuvāō tumbhēhi imō mahakkhāō || 105 ।।
kiṁtu maha pucchaṇijjē annamma vi atthi kōuyaṁ garuyaṁ । pucchāmi taṁ pi jai hōi tattha tumhāṇamā sō ॥106॥
aha bhaṇiō sō muṇiṇō jaṁ kici vi ruccaē tuha maṇassa । taṁ puccha, jahicchaṁ savvamēva mā kuṇasu abhisaṁkaṁ ॥ 107 ॥
tō paṇa maūṇa vippassa naṁdaṇō mauliyagga-kara-kamalō । bahumāṇamuvvahaṁtō payaṁpiuṁ ēvamāraddhō ॥ 108 ॥
puvva-bhavāō ārambha tāva jāō ahaṁ mahādukkhī । tēṇērisa pi dukkara-tavō visēsaṁ ahilasāmi ।। 109 ॥
tumha puṇa dēha-sōhā vi sāhaē asarisaṁ suha-samūhaṁ । taṁ ujjhiūṇa tumhēhiṁ jhatti ajjhavasiya kimimaṁ ॥ 110 ॥
paḍhamō cciya ubbhēō tārunnabharassa vaṭṭaē tumha । lāyannaṁ pihu aṁgāī pūramāṇaṁ na viramēi ।। 111 ॥
pāṇitalāi suha-laṁchaṇāiṁ nivalacchi - saṁgama-samiddhi । sūyaṁti rūvamai vi siddhī ya dullahā suravarāṇaṁ pi । । 112 । ।
iya acchariyanibaṁdhaṇamēkkēkkaṁ kēṇa kāraṇēṇēyaṁ । aṇavēkkhiūṇa savvaṁ mahavvayāī samuvvahasi ॥113॥
aha īsi vihasiūṇaṁ sāhū dasaṇōha - kiraṇa-jālēhiṁ । saṁdēha - timira - pa bhāramavaharaṁtō payaṁpēi ।। 114।।
sāmanēṇaṁ kāraṇamēyaṁ ciya bhava - sarūvama visamaṁ । bhadda ! visēsēṇa puṇō sāhippaṁ taṁ nisā mēha ।। 115 ।। ।। cha । ।
iha asthi kōsalapuraṁ taṁ pālai saccadhammanaranāhō । saccavaī tabbhajjā sahōyarō tassa juvarāyā ॥ 116॥
nāmēṇa vijayadhammō sō bhujai vijayakhēḍa - pura-dēsaṁ । saṁvaccharassa majjhē kayāvi āmaṁtiō ēi ।। 117॥
kōsalapuramma pāsē naravaiṇō saccadhammanāmassa । kajjammi samuppanē ēi aṇāmaṁtiō visayaṁ ।। 118 ।।
kālakkamēṇa tattō saccāī kucchi - kuhara - saṁbhūyā । jāyāya satta puttā naravaiṇō saccadhammassa ।। 119 ॥
paḍhamō ya bhavaṇapālō bīō puṇa tassa vijayapālō tti । taiō ya vijayarāō cautthaō mayaṇavālō tti ॥ 120 ॥ !
1 mittaṭhāṇammi pā. 2 vi vēsu pā ।

sivakēūcariyaṁ
jayasīha- vijayasīhā paṁcama chaṭṭā ya sattamō sūrō । gahiyakalā pariṇīyā savvē vi nariṁda - kannāō ।। 121 ॥
rannā dinnā gāmā tēsi savvēsimēva jaha jōggaṁ । ciṭṭhēti rāya-pāsē taṁ sēvaṁtā ya viṇaṇa ।।122।।
savvē vi bhāyarō tē parōpparaṁ ghaṇa - siṇēha-saṁbaddhā । kubvaṁti parama viṇayaṁ kaṇiṭṭha-baṁdhū jahā jēṭṭaṁ ।। 123 ।।
culō vitta kuṇaṁti tē savvā bhāyarō sayayaṁ । sō vi niyaputtatullē pēcchai pīīē tē savvē ।। 124।।
bhattijjayassa jēṭussa tēṇa diṣṇō ya vijayadhammēṇa । niyamaṁḍalassa majjhē ēkkō gāmō dhaṇa samiddhō ।। 125 ।।
mittōya bhuvaṇapālassa atthi sumaissa maṁtiṇō puttō । maisāgarō tti nāmaṁ bālattāō vi sahacārī ॥ 126 ॥
taṁ bhaṇai bhuvaṇapālō iha vva gāmāṇa kuṇasi jaha tatti । cullapiō dinnagāmassa vasuhanāmassa vi tahēva ॥। 127 ।।
taṁ ciya karēha tatti vīsāsa - dvāṇamappaṇō purisaṁ । paṭṭhavaha kaṁ pi tattha vi paṭṭaviō tēṇa tō purisō ॥128॥
vallaharāō nāmaṁ samappiraṁ bhuvaṇapāla - vinnati । pāsamma vijayadhammassa vijayakhēḍammi juvarannō ।। 129 ।।
tē visō sapasāyaṁ visajjiō vasuhagāmamajjhammi । vallaharāō tatti karēi tō tassa nīīē ।। 130 ।।
kēṇa vipaṇēṇaṁ samaē annami bhuvaṇapālēṇa । maisāgarō niuttō juvarannō sannihāṇammi ।।131।।
juvarannā garuēṇaṁ diṭṭhō maisāgarō pasāēṇa । tatthēva ṭhiō ciṭṭhai kajja-samata avēkkhatō ।। 132 ।।
avasara - samaē vaccai niccaṁ juvarāya - sannihāṇammi । maisāgarō avāriyapasarō rāō diyā vā vi ।। 133 ।।
dhammō nāma atsuiō vijayadhamma- juvarannō । jōvvaṇa - pattō visayāsattō viyarai jahicchāē ॥134॥
nāmēṇa mayaṇarēhā gaṇiyāē । cittalēha nāmāē । dhūyā ahiṇava- jōvvaṇa- lacchīē āvarijjatī ॥135॥
ahiṇava- sikkhiya-naṭṭā vinnāyā vijayadhamma- juvarannā । naṭṭāvaya- pāsāō laliyāē taha ya gōṭṭhīē ।। 136 ।।
tō juvarannā purisaṁ pēsēuṁ cittalēha - vara - gaṇiyā । āṇattā niyadhūyā nahaṁ amhāṇa daṁsēhi ॥ 137॥
paḍivajjiya āēsaṁ siṁgāraṁ kāriyā mayaṇarēhā । aipavaraṁ niya dhūyā gaṇiyāē cittalēhāē ||138 ।।
aha sā niggaṁtūṇaṁ niyabhavaṇāō rahammi āruhai । jāva kira mayaṇarēhā tā diṭṭhā maṁti- puttēṇa ।। 139 ।।
maisāgaranāmēṇaṁ tīsē cēva ya nivāsadārassa । puraō vaccaṁtēṇaṁ ārūḍhēṇaṁ varahayammi || 140 ||
sira-dhariyacchattē bahujaṇa - parivēḍhiēṇa tēṇa taō । uttāriḍaṁ sahatthāō aṁgulīyaṁ samappēuṁ ||141॥
sikkhaviḍaṁ niyapurisō tappāsē pēsiō sa gaṁtūṇa । pucchēi mayaṇa rēhaṁ tumamakkhaṇiyāsi khaṇiyā vā ।। 142 ।।
aha tīē khaṇiyā haṁ iya bhaṇiē maṁti- putta - purisēṇa । maisāgara - nāmaṁ kiyamappiyamaṁguliyamēīē || 143 ||
hatthammi iya bhaṇatēṇa givha ēyaṁ tumaṁ gahaṇayammi । jēttiyamēttaṁ gēṇhasi davvaṁ ēgāē rayaṇīē । 144 । ।
tēttiyamēttēṇa imaṁ chuṭṭai dinnēṇa bīya diyahammi । iya tassa bhaṇatassa vi samāgayā cittalēhā vi ।। 145 ।।
taṁ maṁti- purisa- vayaṇaṁ tīsē kahiūṇa mayaṇarēhāē । hatthammi samappiyamaṁgulīyamēsā vi jaṁpēi ।। 146 ||
vīsuttarēṇa ṭaṁkaya-saēṇa dinēṇa chuṭṭai imaṁ ti । sō maṁti- putta - purisō paḍivajjai tīē vayaṇamiṇaṁ ॥ 147॥
। ।।
maisāgarassa puraō kahēi gaṁtūṇa sō vi savvamimaṁ । maisāgarō vi vaccai juvarannō sannihāṇammi ।। 148 ।।
atthāṇa nisannas ya paṇamiya ēgattha tō nisīēi । pattā khaṇaṁtarēṇaṁ tatthēva ya mayaṇarēhā vi ।। 149 ॥
āujjiyagāyaṇēhi saha jaṇaṇīē ya cittalēhāē । pāraddhō naṭṭa-vihī taha tīē tattha atthāṇē || 150 ॥
nāṇāvihapāḍēhi visamēhiṁ vi vivihakaraṇa- dāṇēhiṁ । pēcchai jaṇō jahadviō savvō vi hu cittalihiō vva ॥ 151 ॥
aha juvarāyā raṁjiya-hiyaō tīsē payacchai pasāyaṁ । vatthāharaṇāīyaṁ aivahuyaṁ lōyamaṇaharaṇaṁ ।। 152 ॥

ētyaṁtarambhi jāō atyaṁgamaṇassa bhāṇuṇō samaō । juvaraṇṇō aṇunāyā taō gayā sā niyanivāsaṁ ।। 153 ।।
jubaranō puttēṇa vijayadhammēṇaṁ imā paṇaccatī । avasaragaēṇa diṭṭhā tō jāō tassa aṇurāō । 154 ।।
tīsē uvari gaṇiyādhūyāē mayaṇarēhanāmāē | tō pēsai niyapurisaṁ samappiraṁ muddiyārayaṇaṁ ।। 155 ।।
sō jāi tīē pāsē sīhaduvārammi nikkhamaṁtīē । kahai jayadhammavayaṇaṁ appara taha muddiyaṁ hatthē ।। 156 ।।
sā bhai maē gahaṇaṁ ciṭṭhai maisāgarassa saṁgahiyaṁ । tā ajja tumha na khaṇō kallē jaṁ bhaṇasi taṁ kāhaṁ ।। 157 ।।
tō sō niyattiūṇaṁ jayadhammakumārasannihāṇammi । gaṁtūṇa kahai tīē jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ taṁ samaggaṁ pi ।। 158 ।।
vammaha, paravvasō sō puṇō vi pēsēi sikkhavēūṇaṁ । taṁ niyapurisaṁ tīsē pāsammi bhaṇēi sō gaṁtuṁ ॥। 159 ।।
jayadhammō tuha dēhī duguṇaṁ bhāḍi taō tayaṁ maṁtra । maisāgarassa gahaṇaṁ vālēūṇaṁ samappēha ॥ 160॥
tō bhai cittalēhā ēvaṁ na hu saṁgayaṁ havai ajja | bīē diyahammi puṇō jayadhammō kiṁ pi jaṁ bhaṇihī ।। 161 । ।
taṁpi karissai ēsā āyattā tassa cēva jēṇa imā । ētthaṁtarammi pattō maisāgarasaṁtiō purisō || 162॥
taṁbōla- kusumamāī gahiūṇa karammi cittalēhāē । appai sā vi samappai niyadāsīē samīvammi ॥ 163॥
jayadhamma- kumara-purisō tēṇa vi tatthāgaēṇa jaṁpatō । gaṇiyāhiṁ samaṁ nisuō tō pucchai sō vi taṁ purisaṁ ॥ 164 ॥
tō gaṇiyāhi kahiyaṁ jahaṭṭhiyaṁ savvamēva tassa purō । tō maisāgara- purisō jayadhamma- naraṁ imaṁ bhaṇai ।। 165 ।।
dhammakumārō vihu tō sirivijayadhamma- juvarannō । jai ērisaṁ karissai nīi - viruddhaṁ tayā annō ॥
kō vārisa lōyaṁ anīi - maggammi saṁpayaṭṭaṁ taṁ । iyarassa vi sikkhagarā tumhē cciya sāmiṇō jēṇa
gaṁtūṇa tēṇa kahiyaṁ puraō jayadhamma - nāma - kumarassa । savvaṁ jahaṭṭhiyaṁ taṁ sarūvamēsō vi mayaṇa- vasō
giha- pattāṇaṁ tāsi gaṇiyāṇa gihammi jāi sayamēva jayadhammanāma - kumarō gaṁtuṁ sējjāē uvavisai ।। 169 ।।
maisāgara - purisēṇaṁ vāruyanāmēṇa saha viṇikkhatā । gaṇiyā vi mayaṇa rēhā pacchima-dārēṇa pacchannā ।। 170 ।।
jā sō kurēi sāraṁ gaṇiyāē tattha mayaṇarēhāē । tā tassa purō kahiyaṁ jaṇaṇiē u cittalēhāē ॥ 171 ॥
jaha sā āgayamēttā gihammi maisāgarassa purisēhiṁ । nīyā tassa samīvē tā tubbhē vayaha āvāsaṁ ।। 172 ।।
ajja pasāyaṁ kāuṁ tō pacchā tumha cēva āyattā । kalladiṇāō pabhidaṁ maha dhūyā mayaṇarēhā sā ।। 173 ।।
maha dhūyā punnavaī jaṁ tubbhē kuha ēttiyapasāyaṁ । jai tā tumaṁ pi bhattā pāvijjasi tā kimantrēṇa ? || 174।।
jai hatthiṇī vidhēṇū labbhai tō kō vi chagaliyaṁ nēya ? । niyamaṁdirammi dhārai mā rūsaha ajja tā tubbhē ।। 175।।
iya cittalēha - gaṇiyā bhaṇiyaṁ savvaṁ sujatti - juttaṁ pi । jayadhammakumara- kannāṇa vāhirēṇēva vōlīṇaṁ ।। 176 ।।
mayaṇāurā maṇussā suhōvaēsaṁ gaṇiti visa-sarisaṁ । mannēi liṁba - kaḍuyaṁ pitta- jarī sakkaraṁ pi narō ।। 177 ।।
visama-sara-bāṇa-dhōraṇi tāḍiya hiyaēṇa gaya-vivēēṇa । kajja -pariṇāmamaṇavēkkhiūṇa jayadhamma- kumarēṇa ॥ 178 ॥
paṭṭhīē paṭṭaviyā niyapurisā sikkhamērisaṁ dāraṁ । tubhēhi mayaṇarēhā maisāgarapāsasuttā vi ।। 179 ।।
kaḍḍhēūṇa haḍhēṇa vi āṇēyavvā na kō vi saṁdēhō । iha aṭṭhē kāyavvō tattha gaēhiṁ maṇaṁ pi maṇē ॥ 180 ॥
tō tē āuha- hatthā pahāviyā kumara - pēsiyā purisā । bahavē aṇumaggēṇaṁ gaṇiyāē mayaṇarēhāē । 181 ॥
maisāgarō vi ēttō pāsāō vijayadhamma- juvarannō । niyamaṁdirammi pattō tammi khaṇē mayaṇarēhā vi ।। 182 ।।
tatthēva ya saṁpattā vāruya nāmassa bāhusaṁlaggā । maisāgarassa kannē hōūṇaṁ vāruō kahai || 183 ||
taṁ savvaṁ vr̥ttaṁtaṁ jayadhammakumāra - saṁtiyaṁ jhatti । maisāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sāhukayaṁ
।

jaṁ taē ēsā ।। 184 ॥

āṇīyā pacchannā ihāgayā ēya sō vi kiṁ kāhī । amhāṇaṁ lajjāē juvarannō vābhisaṁkāē ।। 185 ।।

bhaṇiyā jaha kē tubbhē kēṇa va saṁpēsiyā ihāyāyā ? । kēṇa va paōyaṇēṇaṁ ? kahiṁti tō tē imaṁ tēsiṁ ॥ 187॥
jayadhammakumāra - purisā amhē tēṇēva pēsiyā pattā । ēttha samāṇayaṇatthaṁ gaṇiyāē mayaṇarēhāē ।। 188 ।।
maṁtisuyassa narēhi bhaṇiyaṁ jaṁ mayaṇarēha-gaṇiyāē । maisāgarassa gahaṇaṁ saṁciṭṭhai ajja saṁgahiyaṁ ॥ 189 ॥
tā ēttō na gamissai katthai ēsā imāē rayaṇīē । jāyammi pabhāyammi u ēyaṁ nīhāraissāma ।।190 ।।

nēyavvā amhēhiṁ jayadhammakumāra - sannihāṇammi । maisāgara - purisēhi bhaṇiyaṁ kaha nijjihī ēsā ।।192 ॥
tō tē jayadhammanarā sāhaṁkāraṁ imaṁ payaṁpaṁti । jaha tumbhē pēcchissaha taha inhi nijjihī ēsā ।। 193 ॥
iya uttara-paccuttara- dāṇaṁ kuvaṁtathā parōpparayaṁ । ubhaō pakkhē vi narā jāyā rōsāruṇā sahasā ||194।।
khaggāipaharaṇāī pauṇīkāūṇa saṁpayaṭṭēti । jāva jayadhamma- purisā pavisiuṁ aṁtō haḍhēṇāvi ।। 195 ।।
ēkkēṇa tāva tēsi majjhāō jāṇaēṇa purisēṇa । saṁruddhā hakkēuṁ tē pavisaṁtā purō savvē ॥ 196॥
uvasamaūṇaṁ kōvaṁ dōsu vi pakkhēsu iya bhaṇatēṇa । duvihattaṁ kiṁ paḍiyaṁ tumhāṇaṁ aṁtarē ēyaṁ ? ।।197॥
ēgō sāmī ēgō ya sēvagō dō parōpparaṁ ēē । jayadhammō taha maisāgarō ya tā kiṁ kuṇaha bhēyaṁ ? ॥ 198 ॥
ēyāṇaṁ dōnhaṁ pi hu tubbhē inhi bhavēha tunhikkā । maisāgarassa pāsē ahamēva sayaṁ gamissāmi ।। 999 ।।
maisārēṇa vi suyaṁ savvaṁ majjhaṭṭhiēṇa taṁ tēsi । jaṁpijjataṁ tēṇa vi tō āhūō kumara- purisō ॥ 200 ॥
sō guṇapālō nāma āsaṇa - dāṇēṇa vihiya- sammāṇō । maṁti-suēṇaṁ puṭṭhō kō tumha imō visaṁvāō ? ॥ 201 ॥
tatthēva mayā vitammi samaē nisanniyā āsi । maisāgarassa pāsē sā guṇapālēṇa sannēuṁ ॥ 202 ॥
uṭṭhāviyā niviṭṭhā bāhiṁ gaṁtūṇa ēgadēsammi । tō tēṇa juttijuttaṁ bhaṇiō maisāgarō ēvaṁ ॥ 203 ॥
sirisaccadhamma- rannō maṁtissa suō tumaṁ si sumaissa । rāyakumārassa tahā vayaṁsaō bhuvaṇapālassa ।। 204 |
।
tā jayadhamma-kumārāō vi tumaṁ amha māṇaṇijjōsi । tō juttaṁ pi vayaṁtassa majjha tumaē na rusiyavvaṁ ॥ 205 ॥
ēyamajuttaṁ jaṁ kira raṁkassa viakkhaṇē ṭhiyā vēssā | kaḍḍhijjai rannā vi hu kāraṇamēttha tthi paramēyaṁ ॥ 206॥
juvarannō ēkkōcci puttō jayadhammanāmaō ēsō । vallahadēvīē kucchi - saṁbhavō vijayasēṇā ॥207॥
tā ēyassa na sammuhamēsō jaṁpēi kiṁ pi avaraddhē । annō vi kō vi vattaṁ juvarannō nēya sāhēi ॥ 208 ॥
tā juvarannō saṁkā ēyassa na tāva 'ppaṇō lajjā । kō kuvvatamajuttaṁ ēyaṁ sakkō nivārēu? ॥209॥
juttamajuttaṁ ēsō annamma vi tāva kammi vi na kajjē । citai kiṁ puṇa saṁpai airattō mayaṇarēhāē ॥ 290 ॥
tā sāmikajjamēva ya cittē dhariūṇa kiṁ pi na vayāmi । kiṁtu tuha bhuvaṇapālassa parama - suhiṇō hiyaṁ bēmi ॥ 211 ॥
purisa- rayaṇaṁ tuha samaṁ ēmēva muhāē mā viṇassēu । taha bhuvaṇapāla - kumarassa māṇasē mā vahau khēō ।।212 ॥

tā kālapattamēyaṁ saṁpai pēsijjaē sayaṁ jamimā । sigdhaṁpi mayaṇarēhā pāsē jayadhammakumarassa ।। 214 ॥
juttamajuttaṁ ca imaṁ samaīē jaṁpiyaṁ maē tāva । uṭṭaṁ tu citiūṇaṁ saṁyaṁpi juttaṁ kuṇaha tumbhē ।। 215 ।।
sikkhāvagā jayassa vi tumbhē cciya jēṇa iya bhaṇēūṇa । puṇa takkhōhaṇa hēuṁ kēyagaṁ sō jaṁpaē ēvaṁ ॥ 216 ॥

tumhaṁ jayadhammassa ya purisāṇa parōpparaṁ vayaṁtāṇaṁ । sāhaṁkāraṁ kēṇai siṭṭha gaṁtūṇa kumarassa ।। 217।।
tō tēṇa puṇō bahuyā suhaḍā saṁpēsiyā ihāyāyā । ciṭṭhēti paḍikkhatā dārammi tumāu maṁ cē vi ।।218 ।।
bāhimminīharaṁtaṁ siddhē kajjammi tē pasaṁtamaṇā । iharā jhatti aṇatthaṁ kāhiṁti na ēttha saṁdēhō ॥ 219 ॥
ēkkaṁ jīviya - nāsō bīyaṁ puṇa hōi garuya - apasiddhī । avivēi-jaṇō ēvaṁ jāṇissai nicchiyaṁ cittē ॥ 220 ॥
nūṇaṁ maṁtisuṇaṁ viṇāsiyaṁ kiṁpi tō imaṁ jāyaṁ । annaha kiṁ na nivārai niyaputtaṁ vijayadhammō vi ॥ 221 ॥
jō vihu sammaṁ ēvaṁ jāṇissai vaiyaraṁ vivēijaṇō। tumhaṁ ci ya sō vi dhuvaṁ dōsaṁ dēhī na ēyassa ॥ 222॥
jaha tāva ēsa najjai paccakkhaṁ caiva savvalōēṇa । asamaṁjasassakārī tā kiṁ maisāgarō bhullō ।। 223॥
jaṁgaṇiyāvisamma biiya appā pāḍiō aṇatthammi । puhaī vi pariharijjai attaṭṭhē ēsa nayamaggō ॥ 224 ॥
tā citiūṇa sammaṁ niyacittē kō vi saṁpayaṁ majjha । dijjau duyamā ēsō jahā ahaṁ jāmi saṭṭā ।। 225 ।।
tō citai maṁti-suō pēccha kahaṁ ēsa buddhimaṁ purisō । nīrāgēṇa samaggaṁ jahaṭṭhiyaṁ cēva ullaviyaṁ ॥ 226 ॥
maha hiyayaryaṁ ci savvamēva ēēṇa bhāsiyaṁ ēyaṁ । ēyaṁ ciya karaṇijjaṁ saṁpai annaṁ na maṁtaṇayaṁ ॥ 227 ॥
ēsō parābhavō mē aigaruō jai vi tēṇa nimmaviō । jayadhammēṇa suēṇaṁ juvarannō vijayadhammassa ।। 228 ||
maṇadukkhaṁ pi hu garuyaṁ saṁjāyaṁ jai vi vaṭṭaē inhi । taha vi maṇaṁ pi na bhāvō payāsiyavvō niō bāhiṁ ॥ 229 ॥
jēṇa niyavērasiddhī sāhēyavvā mamatthi ēyammi । tēṇa alakkhiya-bhāvēṇēva maē ṭhāiyavvaṁ ti ।। 230 ॥
sōcci purisō sāhai kajjaṁ garuyaṁ pi jassa maṇa- kōvō । bāhiṁ hōi na payaḍō thēvō vi suraṁga-rēṇu vva ।। 231 ।।
guṇavālassa vi hiya- bhāsiṇō vi puraō maē karēyavvaṁ । niyayāgāra - nigūhaṇamēsa jaō sēvaō tassa ।।232||
iya citiūṇa jaṁpara maṁti-suō suppasanna - muha-kamalō । guṇavāla ! taē saṁgayamēyaṁ savvaṁ pi vajjariyaṁ ॥ 233 ॥
ēyaṁ maē na nāyaṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya saṁpayaṁ kalayalaṁtē । āyantriūṇa purisē parōpparaṁ pucchiyaṁ tattō ॥ 234 ॥
kassa vi pāsamma maē tō kahiyaṁ vāruēṇa majjha imaṁ । sōūṇa jhatti pacchā inhi saddāviō si tumaṁ ।। 235 ।।
taṁ ciya taē vi kahiyaṁ puraō vi maē tumaṁ payaṁpatō । jaṁ nisuō taṁ kōūhalēṇa tuha jatti bhaṇiyāṇa || 236 ||
inhi tu mayaṇarēhaṁ gahiūṇaṁ sigghamēva vaccāhi । jayadhammakumara - pāsē bhaṇiyavvō sō taē ēvaṁ ||237 ॥
maisāgarēṇa tumhaṁ atthittaṁ mayaṇarēha-gaṇiyāē । na parinnāyaṁ paḍhamaṁ saṁpai kōlāhalē jāē । ।।238 ।।
maisāgara - bhiccāṇaṁ tumhē cciya sēvaēhi saha tattō । nāē tēṇa lahu imā tuha pāsē pēsiyā mayaṇā ।। 239 ।।
āmaṁtiūṇa bhaṇiyā maṁti-suēṇaṁ taō mayaṇarēhā । jaha vacca tumaṁ inhi jayadhammakumāra pāsamma || 240 ||
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ ēsō amha kamō asthi vēsa - vilayāṇa । jassa gahaṇaṁ gihīyaṁ raṁkassa vi hōi taṁ mōttuṁ ॥ 241 ॥
tassa'kkhaṇaē annō paribhōgijjai na cakkavaṭṭī vi tamhā ajja tumhaṁ ciya maha bhattā jāmi nannattha ।। 242 ।।
maisāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ahaṁ pi jāṇāmi ērisaṁ kiṁtu । tattha tuha hōi dōsō jattha tumaṁ daviṇa-lōbhēṇa ।। 243 ।।
ahavā niya nēhēṇa ya sayaṁ pi akkhaṇaya - kārayaṁ purisaṁ । parivaṁciūṇa vaccasi kassai annassa pāsammi ।। 244 ।।
jattha puṇa sō cciya sayaṁ pēsai akkhaṇaya - kāraō purisō । anna purisassa pāsē tattha tumaṁ hōsi niddōsā ॥ 245 ॥
niya akkhaṇaē vi ahaṁ pēsēmi tumaṁ parassa pāsammi । jaṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ puṇa tumaṁ pi' ciṭṭhasi viyāṇaṁtī ॥ 246 ॥
jai pēsijjasi na tumaṁ ajja samīvammi tassa kumarassa । tō hōi aṇatthō ai mahaṁtaō majjha tujjha viya ॥ 247 ॥ |
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ na bhayaṁ majjha aṇatthassa atthi thēvaṁ pi । nīimalaṁghaṁtīē maraṇaṁ pi salāhaṇijjaṁ mē ॥ 248 ॥ |
1 taṁ ciṭṭhasi muṇaṁtī pā. ।
।

aha
।
|
maisāgarō vi citai vēsāṇa vi uttamāṇa āyārō । hōi aiuttamō cciya jāṇai imō nicchaō sudaḍhō ॥ 249 ॥
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyā hatthē gahiuṁ taō mayaṇarēhā । maisāgarēṇa ēvaṁ jai vi bhayaṁ tujjha nō atthi ।। 250 ।।
niyajīviyassa suṁdari ! tahā vi maha atthi ai mahaṁtabhayaṁ । tā jāhi majjha atthaṁ kuṇamāṇī tattha tumaminhi । 251 ।
paḍivannaṁ tīē vayaṇaṁ maisāgarassa tēṇāvi । tīē saha paṭṭaviō vāruyanāmō niō purisō ।। 252।।
guṇapālō vi samaṁ ciya tīē saṁpaṭṭiō ō tēhiṁ । dōhiṁ pi mayaṇarēhā gaṇiyā kumarassa uvaṇiyā ।। 253 ।।
maisāgaravinnatti kahiyā gaṇiyā giṭṭiyassēva । tassa taō taṁ sōuṁ puṭṭhō jayadhammakumarō vi ।। 254 ॥
maisāgarassa purisō vāsyanāmō visajjiō tēṇa । saṁbhūsēūṇa taō samappiyaṁ cittalēhāē ।। 255।।
muddārayaṇaṁ ruya karammi jaṁ āsi gahaṇaē dhariyaṁ । sō taṁ gahiūṇa gaō samappaē maṁti- puttassa || 256 ||
jayadhamkayaṁ kahaē saṁbhūsaṇa māiattaṇō savvaṁ । maisāgarassa puraō pasaṁsaē mayaṇarēhaṁ ca ।।257।।
kaha maṁtiputta ! ēsā hōuṁ gaṇiyā vi davva-niravēkkhā । saccapainnā ya tahā aha taṁ maisāgarō bhagai ।। 258 ।।
vēsāsaṁgō uciōna silōssa kāumaha kuṇai । tō uttabhavēsāṇaṁ sarisāṇaṁ mayaṇarēhāē ।। 259 ॥
ēttō cciya ēyāō lahaṁti lōyāō daviṇamaivahuyaṁ । jaṁ ēgadiṇa - pavannaṁ pi nēya vaṁcati bhattāraṁ ॥ 260 ॥
suvvai satthēsu purā nayarammi kusatthalābhihāṇammi । āsi bahumullavēsā vasaṁtasēṇa tti nāmēṇa || 261 ॥
tattha nivasēvaṇaṁ kēṇai vaṁṭhēṇa jīva-lōyammiṁ । paṁca- suvanna-sayāī chaṇhaṁ māsāṇa laḍhāī ॥262॥
tassa nivamaṁdirāō vaccaṁtassa ya niyammi bhavaṇammi । maggē samāvayaṁtī vasaṁtasēṇā gayā diṭṭhi ॥ 263 ॥
taṁ daṇaṁ jāō aṇurāō tassa tīē uvarimmi । tō tēṇa tīē dāsī diṭṭhīē
sā āgayā samīcē puṭṭhā tēṇērisaṁ jahā ēsā । ēgāē jābhiṇīē ki ginhai sāmiṇī tujjha ॥ 265 ॥
hamma tī kahiyaṁ kaṇayassa sayāī paṁca ginhēṁi । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kimēsā akkhaṇiyā ajja khaṇiyā vā ? | 266 ।
dāsīē tassa kahiō vi mōiō ajja cēva akkhaṇaō । sāmaṁta vīrasēṇassa saṁtiō saṁpayamimīē ॥ 267 ॥
dāsī pāsāō taō vasaṁtasēṇā bhaṇāviyā tēṇa । gahaṇayadāṇasta kaē paḍivannaṁ tīē tō ēvaṁ ॥ 268 ॥
dāsī - pāsammi samappiūṇa sō paṁca kaṁcaṇa-sayāī । kajjaṁtarēṇa gaō tō sā vi gayā rāyabhavarṇām ॥ 269 ॥
atthaṁgayammi sūrē rāyagihāō samāgayā sa - gihē । gaṇiyā vasaṁtasēṇā baṁṭhō vi gaō gihē tīsē ||270॥
nhāṇa - vilēvaṇamāī kāraviō savvamēva tō tīē । dāsīṇaṁ pāsāō pacchā sējjāē uvaviṭṭhō ॥271 ॥
sā vi ha vasaṁtasēṇā sammāṇayaṁ tāiṁ dō vi taṁbōlaṁ । ahiṇavakahāpabaṁdhaṁ gēyaṁ ca mihō kuṇaṁti taō ॥ 272 ॥
hu
kāūṇa suraya- kēli parōpparaṁ vaḍḍhiya ṇurāyāiṁ । tattō muhutta puraō jā tāī tahēva ciṭṭhati ॥ 273 ॥
suraya-kēli

vaḍḍhamāṇaṁ karēi taṁ vigayajīyaṁ va ।।274॥

varavējjē taṁ daṁsai aggaō

paḍhamaō thēvaṁ । pacchā vi
aīvasaṁjāyā । āṇāvaha
sanniyā ēgā || 264 ॥

parihariō vējjēhiṁ amha asajjhō imō tti bhaṇiūṇaṁ । tō sā vasaṁtasēṇā savisēsaṁ āulā jāyā ।। 277 ॥
jō kō vikipi jāṇai maṁtaṁ taṁtaṁ va jōisaṁ vāvi । taṁ taṁ sā saddāvai bahuyaṁ va karēi uvayāraṁ ॥ 278 ॥
taṁbōla - payāṇāī tē vihu daṭṭhūṇa taṁ nivattaṁti । ēkkēṇa tēsu dōsō tassa asēsō vi vinnāō ।।279।।
kāūṇa dēha - phaṁsaṁ nāḍi ca kalāiyāē dhariūṇa । bhaṇiyā vasaṁtasēṇā karēmi ēvaṁ ahaṁ sajjaṁ ।। 280 ॥

sirimuṇisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ turiyaṁ karēhi ēvaṁ jahā payacchāmi । tujjha jahicchiya davvaṁ tēṇa taō jaṁpiyaṁ ēvaṁ ॥ 281 ॥
dēhi suvanna - sahassaṁ inhi pi karēmi jēṇa sajjamiṇaṁ । tō sā vasaṁtasēṇā samappaē tassa taṁ jhatti ॥ 282 ॥
tēṇāvi tahēva kaō khaṇēṇa pauṇō imō taō tassa । tuṭṭhā vasaṁtasēṇā vatthāī puṇō payacchēi ॥ 283॥
tattō visajja imaṁ jāō vaṁṭhō vi laṭṭha-puṭṭhēgō । gaṇiyaṁ vasaṁtasēṇaṁ bhaṇēi jaha tujjha saṁjāyā ।। 284॥
hāṇī daviṇassa mahaṁtiyā sarīrassa majjha kajjēṇa । tīē bhaṇiyaṁ hāṇī na hōi ēsā imō lāhō । 285 ।।
jai ēttiyaṁ kuṇaṁtī nāhaṁ tō majjha hōṁti yā garuyā । hāṇī daviṇassa vi jīviyassa tai kāla- muha pattē ।। 286 ।।
jamhā tuha akkhaṇa tujha cciya rōhiṇī ahaṁ ajja । tō paiṇā saha gihiṇī marai maratēṇa niyamēṇa ।। 287 ||
tumhā tujjha sarīrē ēttiya davvēṇa rakkhiē saṁtē । sēsaṁ daviṇaṁ taha jīviyaṁ ca maha akkhayaṁ jāyaṁ ॥ 288 ॥
vaṁṭhēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ diṭṭhā puhaī maē vi aibahuyā । sēvatthiṇā bhamaṁtēṇa patthivēsuṁ aṇēgēsu ॥ 289 ॥
paramēsō āyārō diṭṭhō katthai na vēsa - vilayāṇa । pāsammi maē jō tuha palōiō suyaṇu ! iha ajja ।। 290 ।।
tāmajha imē pāṇāta vinnā aō tuhāyattā । davvaṁ pi jai bhavissara kahaṁ pitā taṁ pi taha cēva ।। 299 ।।
ēvaṁ kahā- pabaṁdhaṁ dōṇhaṁ pi parōpparaṁ karēṁtāṇa | tāṇa vihāyā rayaṇī vasaṁtasēṇā taō tēṇa ।। 292 ।।
vaṁṭhēṇa imaṁ bhaṇiyā jaha amhē saṁpayaṁ niyaṭṭhāṇē । vaccāmō jaṁ kajjaṁ taṁ majjha taē kahēyavvaṁ ।। 293 ।।
aha dāsī pāsāō tīē āṇāviūṇa vatthāī । parihāviō taō sō uvavēsēuṁ caukkammi ।। 294 ॥ ।
kārēuṁ caṁdaṇa-ṭikkayāiṁ sīsamma akkhayā khittā । tassa na vō tuha jammō jāō ēsō tti bhaṇirīē ।। 295॥
tīē visajjiō sō gaō sa-ṭhāṇammi uṭṭiuṁ tattō । vaṁṭhō paṭṭi - hiyaō iyarā viṭhiyā sa - gēhammi ।। 296॥
tā vāruya! vēsāō vasaṁtasēṇāsamāō kāō vi । ajja vihōṁti mahīē ki cōjjaṁ mavaṇarē hāē ।। 297 ।।
iya vāruyassa puraō kahiūṇa kaha । ṇayaṁ saciva puttō । suttō rayaṇīviramē paḍibuddhō vayaṇa sōyāī ।। 298 ।।
kāuṁ pabhāya - kiccaṁ āruhiūṇaṁ turaṁgamē pavarē । paḍhamaṁ ciya tāva gaō jayadhammakumāra pāsammi ।। 299 ।।
taṁ paṇa maūṇa dinnāsamma uvavisai sō tayāsannō । vinnavai viṇayajuttō jayadhammakumāramēvaṁ sō || 300।
taṁ bhuvaṇapālakumarō vva amha ārāhaṇijjapaya-kamalō । sayamā ēsō dijjai tā maha kajjē samuppannē ।। 301 ।।
amhāṇa jīviyaṁ pi hu āyattaṁ tumha cēva sāmīṇaṁ । sēsakuḍuṁbassa dhaṇassa vāvi puṇa karisī vattā ॥ 302 ॥
maisāgara-vinnattaṁ āyannēuṁ maṇammi jayadhammō । ailajjiō visajjai sammāṇēūṇa taṁ jhatti ॥ 303 ॥
aha sō maṁtissa suō kaivaya diyahēhiṁ siddha-niya - kajjō । appāṇaṁ mōyā vai juvarannō vijayadhammāō ।। 304 ॥
aha sō sammāuṁ visajjiō vijayadhammajuvarannā । vaccai kōsalanayarē thēvēhiṁ cēva diyahēhiṁ | | 305 ।।
sāhēi kajja - siddhi gaṁtūṇaṁ bhuvaṇapāla - kumarassa । tō tēṇa dēsa-sutthaṁ puṭṭhō sō vijayadhammassa ।। 306 ।।
kahai samaggaṁ sutthaṁ mōttūṇaṁ vijayakhēḍanayarassa । pucchēi bhuvaṇapālō tattha ya kāraṇamasutthassa ।। 307 ।।
tō kahai maṁti- putta jayadhammakumārasaṁtiyaṁ dutthaṁ । jaṁ sō vivēya-viyalō jaha taha saṁtāvaē lōyaṁ ॥ 308 ||
tō bhaṇai bhuvaṇapālō kiṁ na nivārēi vijayadhammō vi । sō bhaṇai taṁ na vārai mahayā suya- nēha - mōhēṇa || 309।।
taṁ sōūna visajjai maṁti-suyaṁ niya-gihammi rāya -suō । aha annayā ya vāruya - māyā jāyā saruja - dēhā ॥ 310 ॥
tēṇāhūō vējjō taṁ tēṇa nirikkhiūṇa uvaiṭṭhē । nāsanimittaṁ mūlaṁ rigiṇiyāē asukkāē ।। 311 । ।
sō tassāṇayaṇatthaṁ sayaṁ gayō vāḍiyāē ēkkāē । taṁ gahiūṇa niyattai khiviūṇaṁ sallaharayammi ||312॥

featūcariyaṁ
11
jāvē sō tāvēkkō samāgaō tattha dūra-dēsāō । sāgārō taruṇa narō pōtthiya- hatthō taru-talammi ||313।।
ai uddhaliya-jaṁghō taṁ daṭhṭhē vāraō vicitēi । nūṇēsa ki pi jāṇai pucchāmi taō sa-jaṇaṇīē ।। 314।।
maṁda-sarūvaṁ kici vi iya citiya tassa namai niyasīsaṁ । jōḍēi pāṇi-juyalaṁ pucchai viṇaṇa taṁ purisaṁ ।। 315।।
kēttiyadrāō tuma ihāgaō bhadda ! sō taō āha । vīsa hiya- jōyaṇa - sayā hi puvva dēsē sulasagāmā ।।316।।
aha vāruēṇa dinaṁ taru - mūla - silāē āsaṇaṁ tassa । niyauttarīyamiha taṁ uvavisasu imaṁ bhaṇēūṇa ।। 317।।
tabviṇaya- raṁjiō sō uvaviṭṭhō tattha vāruēṇa puṇō । uvavisiuṁ sō puṭṭhō kimatthi ēyāē pōtthīē ? ।। 318 ।।
tē taō pucchāē uvari paribhāviyaṁ jahā ēttha । majjhakilēsamma kaē atthi phalaṁ ki pi ki nēya ? ।। 319 ।।
nāūṇa phalaṁ tattō paryāpayaṁ ēttha asthi kēvaliyā । puṇa vāruēṇa puṭṭhō sō najjai ki pi ēyāē ? ।।320 ।।
sō bhai nicchaēṇaṁ najjai jaṁ pucchaē parō kiṁpi । lāhālāha- suhāsuha-jīviya maraṇāī jayamajayaṁ ॥ 321 ॥
tō bhai vāruō taṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya kahaha tāva niyanāmaṁ । sō kahai tassa puraō maha nāmaṁ dēvaguttō tti ।। 322।।
puṭṭhō puṇō vi sō vāruēṇa jaha ēttha kēṇa kajjēṇa । ahabhāgaō tti pakahasu kāūṇa mahāpasātha mē ॥323॥
tō kaha dēvaguttō tuha māyā mōhiṇitti nāmēṇa । rōgagghatthā ciṭṭhai tassa kaē ōsahaṁ gahiraṁ । । 324।।
ēttha tumaṁ saṁpattō taṁ gahiyamasukka - riṁgiṇī - mūlaṁ । niyakhallaharē khittaṁ saṁciṭṭhai saṁpayaṁ tumaē ।। 325 ।।
iya vāruō suṇēuṁ hiyaē saṁjāyapaccaō hiṭṭhōṁ । pucchai puṇa jaṇaṇīē nīrōgattaṁ kayā hōhī ? || 326 ॥
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jayā taṁ ihāgaō niyagihāu tuha jaṇaṇī । āsi tayā paḍukaraṇā inhi jāō karaṇaghāō ।। 327॥
kaṭṭhē va ṭhiyā ciṭṭhas niccēṭṭhā vacca tā tumaṁ inhi । gēhammi dēhinassaṁ rigiṇi mūlassa jaṇaṇīē ॥328॥
tēṇa havissai ēsā sajjā sahasa tti vāruēṇa taō | abbhatthiūṇa nīō niyagēhē dēvaguttō vi ।। 329 ।।
gaṁtūṇa appaṇā puṇa himajhē jāva pēkkhaē jarṇāṇa । tāva imā taha ciṭṭhai jaha kahiyā dēvaguttēṇa ||330॥
tō vāruēṇa nassaṁ dāuṁ sajjīkayā niyā jaṇaṇī । aha nhāṇa - bhōyaṇāī kāraviraṁ dēvaguttassa । 331 ।।
dēi varavattha - juyalaṁ tōsōvai haṁsarōma - tūlīē । taṁ gaṁtuṁ kahai sayaṁ savvaṁ maisāgarassa tayaṁ ।। 332।।
taṁ sōuṁ jāya-kuūhalēṇa maisāgarēṇa paṭṭaviō । sō jhatti vāruō niyagihammi tassāhavaṇahēuṁ ॥ 333 ॥
aha vāruēṇa gaṁtuṁ niyagēhē sō sayapi paḍibuddhō । āmaṁtiūṇa nīō maisāgara - sannihāṇammi ॥ 334 ॥
tēṇa vi ka paḍivattī puṭṭhō sō dēvagutta kē valiō । kiṁ bhuvaṇapālakumarō karissaē ghaḍiya - duga-majjhē ? ।। 335।।
sō bhai tassa inhi sējjāē gayassa vēyaṇā sīsē । uppajjissai maṁtaṁ sumaraṁtassa ya samaṁ gamihī ॥ 336 ॥
pacchā tabbhajjāē jōṇī-sūlaṁ bhavissaē tivvaṁ । tappēsiya dāsīē vayaṇēṇaṁ tattha sō gamihī ॥ 337 ॥
ōsāriūṇa pariyaṇamēgaṁtē tassa kanna - kuharammi | pīḍaṁ niyaṁ kahissai phēḍissai sō tamuṁjēuṁ ॥ 338 ॥
kayabhōyaṇassa pacchā siliyāvasarammi dūradēsillō । bhaṭṭō samāgamissai turiyakaī caṁḍapālō tti ।। 339 ॥
iya kahiē maṁtisuō taṁbōlaṁ dāviūṇa kēvaliyaṁ । taṁ bhaṇai jahā gaṁtuṁ bāhi tubbhē paḍikkhēha || 340 ॥
jāva ih bhōyaṇamahaṁ karēmi nēmittiō taō bāhi । gaṁtūṇa nisīyai maṁti-naṁdaṇō vāruyaṁ tattō ।। 341 ।।
kumara - gihē pēsēu siliyāvasarassa jāṇaṇaṭṭāē । bhuṁjēi sayaṁ sō puṇa gaṁtūṇaṁ vāruō tattha ॥ 342 ॥
viṇiyattō bhuttuṭṭiyasacivaṁ garuhassa sāhaē ēvaṁ । jaha bhuvaṇapālakumarō bhōttūṇaṁ uṭṭhiō inhi ||343॥
cakamaṇaṁ kuṇamāṇō ciṭṭhai maisāgarō taō jhatti । kumara - nivāsābhimuō saṁcaliyō varahayārūḍhō ॥ 344॥
-

=== vardhamanaoutput-12-to-12.json ==========================
12
1
sirimuṇi suvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
nēmittiyaṁ bhaṇāvara vāruyapāsāu jaha tumamihēva । ciṭṭhējjaha khaṇamēgaṁ jāvaya hakkārayaṁ ēi ।। 345 ||
nēmittiō vi taṁ vāruyassa vayaṇaṁ taha tti mannē । aha vāruō vi vaccai maṁti-suyassāṇumaggēṇa || 346 ||
maisāgarō vigaṁtu kumaraṁ āsaṇagayaṁ paṇamiūṇa । dinnāsaṇē nisīyai aha kahai imaṁ kumārassa ।। 347।।
bhaṭṭō saṁtariō turiyakaī ajja tumha pāsammi । inhi samāgamissai tō kumarō bhaṇai kaha ēvaṁ ।। 348 ।।
maṁti-suya ! tumaṁ jāṇasi sō bhaṇai kahissamēyamēgaṁtē । tō maisāgara - vajjaṁ kumarō sēsaṁ visajjēi ।। 349 ।।
niyapāsāō tattō kahēi maisāgarō purō tassa । kumarassa jahā nisuyaṁ kēvaliya - samīvaō tēṇa ।। 350 ।।
kumarō vi dēi saddaṁ puraō maisāgarassa tatthaṭṭhē । bhaṇai jahā sira- pīḍā kassavi kahiyā maē nēya ।। 351 ।।
taha bhuvaṇasarī vihu maha bhajjāē na maṁ vi mōttūṇa । annassa purō kahiyaṁ piya-dāsīē vi niya-sūlaṁ ।। 352 ।।
ēyaṁ pi airahassaṁ vinnāyaṁ tēṇa jaṁ asaṁdiddhaṁ । tā annaṁpi annāyaṁ tassa'tthi na kiṁ vi iya bhaṇiuṁ ? ।। 353 ।।
tannā - vihiya-maṇō tō kumarō dhuṇai attaṇō sīsaṁ । pabhaṇai ya maṁti- puttaṁ taṁ kēvaliyaṁ ihāṇēhi || 354।।
maisāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tavvayaṇaṁ milau tāva taiyaṁ pi । bhaṭṭa - samāgama - visayaṁ pacchā sō āṇiyavvō tti ।। 355 ।।
ēvaṁ japatāṇa vi maisāgara - bhuvaṇapāla - kumarāṇaṁ । sō bhaṭṭa caṁḍapālō samāgaō dāra - dēsamma ।। 356।।
tō āgaṁtu kahiō niva-taṇayassa dāravālēṇa । nivayamaṁtisurahimihō muhaṁ pēkkhiyaṁ tattō ।। 357 ।।
kumarēṇa dāravālō tō bhaṇiō jhatti muyasu taṁ bhaṭṭaṁ । mukkō samāgaō sō kumaraṁ nabhiuṁ niviṭṭhō ya || 358 ||
kumarassa purō paḍhiyāī tēṇa puvvaṁ kayāī kavvāī | tō kumarō niddi atthē kārai navaṁ kavvaṁ ।। 359।।
tēṇēgammi vi atthē kayāiṁ nāṇāvihāraṁ kavvāiṁ । tō tuṭṭō rāyasuō dēi pasāyaṁ bahuṁ tassa || 360 ||
tō taṁ visajjiūṇaṁ kēvaliyaṁ dēvaguttamāṇēuṁ । maisāgaraṁ nirūvai kumarō maisāgarō ya puṇō ।। 361।।
tassāṇayaṇa- nimittaṁ nirūvaē vāruyaṁ niyaṁ purisaṁ । sō taṁ gahiūṇa khaṇēṇa ēi pāsē kumārassa ।। 362 ||
ka- samuciya- pavitta tattha taō dēvagutta- kēvaliō । uvaviṭṭhō paripuṭṭhō kumarēṇaṁ bhuvaṇapālēṇa ।। 363 ।।
jaha saccadhamma- rannō suhāsuhaṁ kahasu satta - diṇa- majjhē । tēṇa kahiyaṁ pabhāē taiē jāmammi divasassa || 364 ॥
kamalasirī nāmēṇaṁ rāya - kalattaṁ visūiyā vasaō । paralōgammi gabhissai parammi divasē puṇō āsō ।। 365 ।।
vāruyaturayavalatyō vicchuṭṭō karivarēṇa mattēṇa । daṁta - musalēhi viddhō pāvissai jīviryāviṇāsaṁ || 366 ॥
ēttō uttha- diyahē mattāṇaṁ karivarāṇa dōnhaṁ pi । hōhī jujjhaṁ tattha vi ēgō daṁtāṇa ghāēṇa । । 367 ।।
pīḍijjissai bahuyaṁ ghāyadiṇāō ya aṭṭhamē divasē । sō vi gamissara nihaṇaṁ iya bhaṇiuṁ uvaraē tammi ।। 368 ।।
sō kumarēṇa bhaṇiō iha kēṇa vi najjasē tumaṁ nāṇī । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ na kō vi hu anō purisattiyaṁ mōttuṁ ॥ 369॥
tō kumarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tinni narā kē tumaṁ viyāṇaṁti ? । sō bhaṇai tumaṁ ēkkō maṁti-suō vāruō taiō ।। 370 ॥
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ payāsiyavvō taē na kassavi ya । annassa purō appā jahā mahaṁ ki pi jāṇāmi ।। 371 ||
tō tēṇa dēvaguttēṇa citiya niyamaṇammi ērisayaṁ । jaha atrēṇa na kajjaṁ kiṁ ci vi jāṇāviēṇaṁ mē ।। 372 ।।
ēttō ciya jaṁ lābhō saṁpajjassai jahicchiō majjha । tō bhaṇiyaṁ kumarapurō tumhāēsō pamāṇaṁ mē || 373।।
maisāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ vāruyamavi vāraissamannassa । ēyaṁ kahēṁtamaṭṭha sayaṁ pi na kahissamavarassa ।। 374 ।।
kiṁ tu pasiūṇa amhaṁ kumāra ! pucchasu imassa pāsammi । rannō āupamāṇaṁ tō puṭṭhō sō kumārēṇa ।। 375।।
sāhēi dōni vari āukkhaṁ asthi saccadhammassa । maisāgarēṇa puṭṭhaṁ rāyā hōhī imō kumarō ? || 376।।
।

sivakēūcariyaṁ
1
13
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ karissara kēttiyamēttaṁ vi jai purisayāraṁ । tō nūṇa ēsa rāyā hōi cciya annā nēya । । 377 ।।
aha tassa dēi kumarō āharaṇaṁ pavara- vattha-saṁjuttaṁ । maisāgaraṁ ca pabhaṇai niyagēhāsannamāvāsaṁ ।। 378 ।।
dāvēha imassa tumaṁ annaṁ pi jamēsa maggaē kiṁpi । taṁ dāyavvaṁ tumaē majjha vi dāūṇa kahiyavvaṁ । । 379 ॥
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ kumarō visajjaē dēvaguttakēvaliyaṁ । maisāgarō vi saha tēṇa vāruyaṁ pēsaē sa-gihē ।। 380 ।।
kumarēṇa taō puṭṭhō maṁtisuō ki taē imaṁ puṭṭhō ? । kumarassa hōi rajjaṁ na vatti sō kēvaliya-purisō ।। 381 ।।
jaṁ majjha culla piuṇō ahigārō ēsa vijayadhammassa । maisāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ puvvaṁ pi bhaē kahiyamēyaṁ ॥ 382 ॥ |
tumhāṇa maggaō jaṁ dutthaṁ jayadhammasaṁbhavaṁ asthi । tassa nayarassa garuyaṁ niccaṁ pi hu vijayakhēḍassa || 383 ||
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ culla - piyā amha lōya-suhakārī । tō tammi vijayavaṁtē kō maha rajjammi ahigārō ? | 384 |
tō bhai maṁtiputtō dō vi hu tē vijayadhamma- jayadhammā। jōggā rajjassa na hōṁti kumara ! sammaṁ maē nāyā ।। 385 ।।
jayadhammō na hu jōggō rajjassa niēṇa cēva dōsēṇa । suya-dōsēṇa ajōggō juvarāyā vijayadhammō ya || 386 ॥
niyaputtaṁ pi na sakkai sikkhaviḍaṁ jō kahaṁ sa annassa । sikkhāvaṇaṁ karēhī avarāha-payaṁ kuṇaṁtassa || 387 ||
tō jai ēsō rāyā hōina dēsō tathā na tumhē vi । jēṇa jayadhammakumarō inhi pi na tumha sāvēkkhō || 388 ॥
jai puṇa ēyassa piyā rajjammi kahiṁ pi hōi tā nūṇaṁ । dēsē vā sō dūrē jīyassa vi tumha saṁdēhō ॥ 389 ॥
jai vōlēuṁ vaṁchasi niyavaṁsaṁ rajjaradrumairēṇa । tō hōhi rajja- vimuhō annaha rajjaṁ sayaṁ ginha ।। 390 ।।
tō kumarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jai vi hu ēvaṁ tahāvi amha piyā। saṁtammi vijayadhammē rajjammi na maṁ ṭhavēi tti ।। 391 ।।
aha maṁti-suō jaṁpai rajjaggahaṇammi jai maṇaṁ tujjha । hōhī baddhapannaṁ tō sēsamahaṁ karissāmi ॥ 392 ॥
savvaṁ pi suṁdarayaraṁ ēttha uvāyaṁ jahā na kassa vi ya । pāyammi kaṁṭaō vi hu bhajjai savvaṁ havai sutthaṁ ।। 393 ।।
cittē pavitra hu vayaṇēṇa na mannaē purō tassa । maṁtisuyasta kumārō salajja - vittī bhuvaṇapālō ।। 394॥
aha kumarāṇunnāō gaṁtu maisāgarō sagēhammi । kumarāēsaṁ savvaṁ aṇuṭṭaē dēvaguttammi ।। 395॥
tō bhai dēvaguttō maṁti- suryāniō ya pacchima - disāē । pannāsa- jōyaṇēhi pippalauramatthi vara-nayaraṁ ॥ 396 ॥
tammi maha gōtta- dēvī nivasai vaḍajakkhiṇi tti nāmēṇa । taddaṁsaṇakajjēṇaṁ saṁcaliō sulasagāmāō ।। 397 ।।
vīsahiyajōyaṇa-sayaṁ laṁghēūṇaṁ samāgaō hamihaṁ । tō tattha jāmi jaha sigdhamēva taha maṁ visajjēha || 328 ॥
aha bhaṇai dēvaguttaṁ maṁti-suō tumamiō gaō inhi । kēttiyadiyahēhiṁ puṇō iha ēhisi kahasu maha ēvaṁ ।। 399 ।।
tō bhai dēvaguttō suhaṁ suhēṇaṁ iō vayaṁtāṇaṁ । laggai pakkhō ēgō ēṁtāṇa vi ēttiō kālō ।।400 ||
tatyatthi yavagō sō vi ya dhārēṛa kaṛavaya diṇāṇi । maṁ tattha cirāō gayaṁ vi dūradēsāō tō ēvaṁ ॥। 401 ॥
laggati tini māsā puṇō vi ēṁtassa majjha iha nayarē । tō maṁti-suō dāum̐ bahusaṁbala - vāhaṇa - sahāē ।।402 ॥
taṁ pēi tammi gaē tinni vi puvvattapaccayā miliyā । gaṁtūṇa dēvaguttō puṇāgaō bhaṇiyadiyahi ||403॥
rāyasūya-maṁti puttēhi tattha sō gōravēṇa dīsaṁtō । ciṭṭhaḥ āṇāvēuṁ sakuḍu baṁ sulasagāmāō ||404 ॥
ēvaṁ ṭhiyassa kālō kō vi gaō bhuvaṇapālakumarassa । anammi diṇē purisō samāgaō vijayakhēḍāō ।।405॥
kēṇa vi niyakajjēṇaṁ sō miliō vāruyassa cauṭṭē । vattā vijjaṁtēṇaṁ kahiyaṁ tēṇērisaṁ tassa ||406 ||
jaha vijayakhēḍanayarassa saṁtiyaṁ savvamēva saṁvahiuṁ । niggayamāsi mahāyaṇaminhi annattha gamaṇatthaṁ ।।407।।
gaṁtūṇa vijayadhammēṇa vāliyaṁ taṁ sayaṁ khamāvēḍaṁ । tō vāruṇa bhaṇiyaṁ mahāyaṇaṁ kiṁ samuccaliyaṁ ? || 408 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-14-to-14.json ==========================
14
sirimuṇisuvvayajiṇidacariya
tēṇa purisēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ puvva'varāhē na tāva vi gaṇai । kō vijayadhammavihiē na vāvarāhā paraṁ tēṇa ॥। 409॥
dō tinni saṁpayaṁ pi hu kayā taō vāruō puṇō bhaṇai । tē kērisāvarāhā ? sō purisō bhaṇai tō ēvaṁ ।। 410॥
jayadhammasēvaēṇaṁ ēgēṇaṁ āsi ēgavaṇiyassa । dāyavvaṁ bahudavvaṁ tō tēṇa dharāviō ēsō ॥ 411 ॥
purisassa samīvāō niyassa sirivijayadhamma- juvarannō । dāvēūṇaṁ āṇāō sattacauhaṭṭamajjhami ||412 ||
āṇābhaṁga kāuṁ aha sō jayadhammasēvaō jaṁtō । ākhaṁciūṇa dhariō bāhāē varṇiya - purisēṇa ।।413 ॥
taṁ kuṭṭiūṇa naṭṭhō jayadhammanarō kahēi niyapahuṇō । haṭṭammi kuṭṭiō haṁ purisēṇaṁ amugavaṇiyassa || 414 ॥
tō jayadhammēṇa narā bahavē saṁpēsiyā vaṇiya- gēhē । vaṇiō bhaēṇa naṭṭhō taṁ daṭṭha āgaē purisē ॥। 415।।
tēhi purisēhi naṭṭhō vaṇiō jāṇāviō kumārassa । tō tēṇaṁ bhaṇiyā tē lhūsēha imassa savvadhaṇaṁ ॥ 416॥
hammiya gēhammiya tēhiṁ taō jhatti tārisaṁ vihiyaṁ । aivihavī sō vaṇiō āsi imaṁ dūsaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ ।। 417 ॥
bīyaṁ puṇa jayadhammassa vallahā atthi bhāriyā ēkkā । tīsē piyadāsīē suvanna- kaccōlayaṁ ēkkaṁ ।।418 ।।
avahariūṇaṁ nīyaṁ hr̥ṭṭē vaṇiyassa tassa jēṇa samaṁ । atthi purā vavahārō tīsē kumarassa bhajjāē ||419।।
kaccōlayassa uvari gahiyaṁ tīē vi samuciyaṁ davvaṁ । vaṇiō na imaṁ jāṇai cōrāhiyamēyamatthi tti ॥ 420॥
jamhā jayadhammakumāra bhāriyāē purā vi gahaṇāī । sā mucai ginhēi ya tassa na saṁkā taō jāyā ।। 421 ॥
kancōlaē adiṭṭhē gavēsaṇā tassa savvaō jāyā । kēṇāvi taō kahiyā kaccōlaya - cōriyā dāsī ||422 ॥
jayadhammassa kumārassa tēṇa sā pucchiyā vi akahaṁtī । baṁdhāviūṇa gāḍhaṁ haṇāviyā camma- laṭṭhīhi ||423 ||
tāḍijjatīē taō kahiyaṁ tīē jahaṭṭiyaṁ savvaṁ । kumarēṇa niyaṁ purisaṁ paṭṭaviḍaṁ bhāṇiō vaṇiō ||424॥
cōrāhiyamatthi tara gahiyaṁ kaccōlayaṁ kumārassa । dāsīpāsāō tayaṁ tuha pāsē maggaē kumarō || 425॥
afryṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ na maē cōrāhiyaṁ ti taṁ nāyaṁ । taduvari mamāhidavvaṁ bahu gahiyaṁ asthi dāsī || 426 ॥
davvaṁ dāūṇa taō ginhaha kaccōlayaṁ viṇā davvaṁ । puṇa appēmina ēyaṁ gaṁtu āṇēha tō davvaṁ ॥ 427।।
gaṁtūṇa tēṇa purisēṇa sāhiyaṁ vaṇiyajaṁpiyaṁ ēyaṁ । kumarassa purō tēṇa vi sikkhaviḍaṁ sō puṇō purisō || 428 ॥
paṭṭaviō taṁ paṇa jaha taṁ cōrāhiyāiṁ ginhēuṁ । maggasi puṇō vi davvaṁ ēyaṁ pi na mannasē bahuyaṁ ।। 429॥
jaṁ daṁḍē viṇā vihu maha pāsāō muhāē chuṭṭihisi । vaṇiēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ viyāriuṁ ginhau kumarō ।।430 ।
annaha puṇa nīīē viṇā vi jai ginhaē kumārō maṁ । tō lhūsiuṁ pi ginhau kimēgakaccōlagagahēṇa ।।431।।
gaṁtūṇa tēṇa purisēṇa ērisēṁ vaṇiyajaṁpiē kahiē । pēsittu bahunarē taṁ vaṇiyaṁ lhūsāvaē kumarō || 432।।
taiō vi kō vi dōsō kaō kumārēṇa tammi samayammi ? । tō samudāō jāō savvēsi cēva vaṇiyāṇaṁ ।। 433 ॥
saṁvahiuṁ nīhariyā tō tē savvē vi nayarabāhimmi । nāūṇa vijayadhammō juvarāyā jāi sayamēva ॥ 434 ॥
tēsa pāsē vaṇiyāṇa tē khamāvēi jōḍiyakaraggō । jayadhammassa'varāhō tumbhēhiṁ mamēsa khamiyavvō ।। 435 ।।
tumhāṇa vibhavaṇēsu ṁ ēkkēkkō hōi kō vi aviṇīō । puttō tassa vi tubbhē dō tinni vi sahaha avarāhē ।। 436 ।।
taha tubhēhi imassa vi mahāvarāhō vi ēsa khamiyavvō । tō tē bhāṁti vaṇiyā jē khamiyā puvvamavarāhā ॥437॥
tuha puttassamhahiṁ tēsiṁ saṁkhā vi najjaē nēya । dōnha diṇāṇaṁ majjhē tinni viṇāsā imē jāyā || 438॥
tō jaṁpai juvarāyā amhāṇaṁ ēsa cēva avarāhō । tumhēhi tāva kahiō jayadhammakumāranimmaviō || 439॥
iccāi bahuṁ saṁbhāsiūṇa tē vāliyā taō vaṇiyā । juvarannā savvē vihu na nivvuyā taha vi cittammi ||440 ॥

sivakēūcariyaṁ
hu
15
iya kahiē sō purisō nēuṁ maisāgarassa pāsammi । puvvattaṁ savvaṁ pi hu kahāviō vāruēṇa taō ।।441 ||
maisāgarēṇa nīō sigdhaṁ sō bhuvaṇapāla - pāsammi । akkhāviō ya savvaṁ taṁ ēgaṁtē purō tassa ।। 442 ।।
tō taṁ visajjiūṇaṁ purisaṁ maisāgarēṇa vinnattaṁ । majjha vayaṇassa kō vi hu tumhāṇaṁ paccaō milai ||443 ||
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ puvvaṁ pi apaccaō maha na kōvi । tuha jaṁpiyammi hōṁtō saṁpai jāō puṇa visēsō || 444 ||
puṇa kaivayadivasāṇaṁ pajjaṁtē vasuhagāmaō purisō । saṁpattō maisāgara pāsammi kahē vattamimaṁ || 445 ।।
jayadhamma kumārēṇaṁ niyavallaha - bhajjasaṁtiyā dāsī । rūvavaī - navajōvvaṇajuttā bhuttā haḍhēṇa taō ||446 ||
bhajjāē nāūṇaṁ paṭṭaviyā jhatti vasuhagāmammi । kira bhuvaṇapālakumarassa saṁtiō vanna tattha ||447 ||
i buddhīē vallaharāō vi bhaṇāviō imaṁ tīē । maggaṁ tassa vi ēyaṁ mā jayadhammassa appējjā ।।448॥
guttagi rakkhējjaha saha jayadhammēṇa iha bhalissamahaṁ । tēṇa vi ujjuttaṇaō taṁ taha paḍivannamavi appaṁ ।। 449॥
jayadhammakumārēṇaṁ nāūṇaṁ tattha pēsiyā purisā । maggāviyā ya dāsī tēṇa kayaṁ uttaraṁ ēyaṁ ॥। 450 ।।
sā natthi ēttha gāmē katthai annattha taṁ gavēsēha । taṁ purisēhiṁ gaṁtuṁ kahiyaṁ jayadhammakumarassa ।।451 ।।
jayadhammēṇaṁ tattō pariggahō tattha pēsiō vahuō । iya sikkhaviuṁ jaha sā gavēsiyavvā paihiṁ pi ।।452।।
tammi samaggē gāmē tumbhēhiṁ taō havējja jai ēsā । tō vallaharāyajuyaṁ baṁdhēuṁ taṁ samāṇējjā ।। 453 ।।
tō gaṁtu vasuhagāmē pariggahō paigihaṁ gavēsēi । taṁ dāsi daṭṭhaṇaṁ baṁdhēuṁ ginhaē tattō ॥ 454।।
ēvaṁ kuvvaṁtāṇaṁ vi jayadhammanarāṇa kiṁ pi na hu bhaṇiyaṁ । vallaharāēṇa ṭhiō mōṇaṁ kāūṇa sō tattha ॥ 455 ॥
tō tē purisā laggā vallaharāyassa baṁdhiuṁ tattō । sō niyasamudāyajuō āuha hatthō ṭhiō samūhō || 456 ॥
tēsi purisāṇa taō jāē jujjhammi tēhi saha tattha । aṭṭhahi jāṇēhiṁ juttō vallaharāō maō tattō ॥ 457 ॥
gāmō vi tēhi savvō lhūsēuṁ dhaṇakaṇēhiṁ parimukkō । ēkkakhaṇaddhēṇa kaō tō vallaharāyagihiṇīē ॥। 458 ॥
ēttha ahaṁ pēsaviō tumha samīvammi vatta- kahaṇatthaṁ । tō tīsē āēsō dijjau jō kō vi dāyavva ॥ 459॥
sō vi maisāgarēṇaṁ nēūṇaṁ bhuvaṇapāla - pāsammi । akkhāviō samaggaṁ vasuhaggāmammi jaṁ vittaṁ ॥ 460॥
tō kumaraṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ vallaharāyassa gēhiṇī ēttha । pēsēūṇaṁ vāhaṇamāṇā vijjaō duyaṁ tāva ॥। 461 ॥
maisāgarēṇa ēyaṁ sahasa tti kayaṁ kumāra vayaṇēṇa । kumarēṇa vi rajja-gahē niyacittē nicchaō baddhō ||462 ॥
maisāgarēṇa saddhi maṁtaūṇaṁ taō uvāēhiṁ । savvō vi rāya- lōō aṇuratō attaṇō vihiō ||463 ||
rajjē pamāṇapurisā jē kē vi hu tāṇa kannakuharammi । jayadhammāisarūvaṁ pavēsiyaṁ buddhi- jōēṇa ||464॥
tē vihu vachaṁti maṇē rajjaṁ kumarassa bhuvaṇapālassa । accaṁta virattamaṇā jayadhammē vijayadhammē ya || 465।।
nahu vijayakhēḍanayarē tappabhiī bhuvaṇapālakumarō vi । pēsēi niyaṁ purisaṁ pāsammi u vijayadhammassa || 466 ॥
vasuhaggāmammi vilhūsiyammi bhaṇiō na kiṁ pi jayadhammō । tēṇa parinnāyammi vi juvarannā vijayadhammēṇa । 467।
iya vaccatē kālē duijjasaṁvaccharassa pajjatē । sirisaccadhammarannō dēhē rōgō sappannō ॥ 468 ॥
laggā ya pavaravējjā ranō dēhē kuṇaṁti tēgicchaṁ । na havai kō vivisēsō vijjēhiṁ taō samaggēhi ||469 ||
annōnaṁ maṁtē pahāṇa - purisāṇa aggaō kahiyaṁ । amha asajjhō rāyā tō tēhi nivāriyā vējjā ॥ 470 ॥
tumhēhiṁ na kahiyavvaṁ kassa vi puraō sarūvamēyaṁ ti । ēyaṁ ciya vattavvaṁ jaha rāyā su darō hōhī ||471॥
paḍivannaṁ vējjēhi pahāṇa - purisāṇa ērisaṁ vayaṇaṁ । sakuḍubē vi na kassa vi puraō ēvaṁ kahēṁti imē || 472 ।।
tō vijayadhammapurisā sayā vi jē ēṁti rāya - pāsammi । kajjammi samuppannē tē tattha samāgayā taiyā || 473॥

sirimuṇisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
tasi maggaṁtāṇa virannā saha daṁsaṇaṁ na saṁjāyaṁ । pucchati tē sarūvaṁ rāyasarīrassa niccaṁ pi ॥ 474॥
pāsē pahāṇa - purisāṇa tē vi jaṁpati su darō hōhī । kaivayadiṇāṇa majjhē rāyā sirisaccadhammō tti ॥ 475 ॥
vējjā. ya ēṁti jaṁti ya majjhē pavisaṁti rāya - pāsambhi । tēgicchaṁ akuṇaṁtā vi lōya - saṁtōsajaṇaṇatthaṁ ॥ 476।।
purisāṇa pahāṇāṇaṁ vayaṇēṇaṁ rāya sannihāṇammi । cattāri paṁca va jaṇā ciṭṭhēti ṭhiyā ahōrataṁ ॥ 477॥
maisāgarēṇa puṭṭhō puṇō vi sō dēvagutta - kēvaliō । saṁpai kēttiyamāuṁ rannō sirisaccadhammassa || 478॥
dasamammi diṇē kahiyā tēṇa samattī narēsarāussa । maisāgarēṇa kahiyaṁ ēvaṁ tō bhuvaṇapālassa || 479 ।।
rāya - purisāṇa cittaṁ nāuṁ sō appayammi aṇurataṁ । ciṭṭhēi gahiya garimō suhāsuhaṁ kiṁ pi nō vēi || 480 ।।
maisāgarō vi ēvaṁ jāṇaṁtō ciṭṭhaē vihiyamōṇō । antammi dinē vējjā rāya samīvammi gaṁtūṇa ||481 ॥
daṭṭhūṇa dēha- cēṭṭha tassa taō niggayā bahiṁ ēē vahu- maṇussāṇa purō rahammi ēvaṁ nivēti ॥ 482 ॥
jaha mahayā kaṭṭhēṇaṁ jai aṭṭhadiṇāī jīvaē rāyā । riṭṭhēhi jēṇa nāyaṁ amhēhi na calaē ēyaṁ ॥ 483॥
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ nivēṇa vimmi khaṇē cēva niyasarīrassa । nāūṇa aharabhāvaṁ āhūyā tē mahāpurisā ||484 ॥
bhaṇiyā ya jahā sigdhaṁ āṇāvaha vijayadhammajuvarāyaṁ । jaha taṁ sayamēva ahaṁ ṭhavēmi niyayammi ṭhāṇammi ||485॥
aha matthaya - viṇivēsiya- hatthēhi imēhiṁ kaya-paṇāmēhiṁ । paḍivannaṁ taṁ vayaṇaṁ rannō sirisaccadhammassa ।। 486 ॥
aha tē gaṁtūṇa bahiṁ rāyāēsaṁ lihāvayaṁti imaṁ । sirikōsala - nayarāō sirimaṁtō saccadhamma - nivō ||487 ॥
sirivijayakhēḍanāmē nayarē sirivijayadhammajuvarāyaṁ । āisai jahā amhaṁ sarīra kāraṇamai mahaṁtaṁ ॥1488||
tā sigdhaṁ ciya tumaē rāyāēsassa daṁsaṇāō vi । mōttūṇa vijayakhēḍaṁ bhōktavvaṁ aha vasaiyavvaṁ ।।489 ।।
jaha jīvaṁtēṇa maē saha jāyai tujjha daṁsaṇa- vaṇijjaṁ । annaha puṇa aigaruyaṁ kāhisi avarattayaṁ pacchā ||490॥
ēsō rāyāēsō nēūṇaṁ daṁsiō naravaissa । vahu-maṇussēhiṁ taō pasaṁsiuṁ saccadhammēṇa ।। 499 ॥
bhaṇiyaṁ jaha inhiciya saṁpēsaha siggha saṁḍhimārūḍhaṁ । purisaṁkaṁ pi ihaṭṭhē khaṇaṁ pi kajjō na hu vilaṁbō ।।492 ।।
āēsō ttiṁ bhaṇittā pahāṇapurisā taō viṇikkhatā । miliūṇa ēgaṭhāṇē pāradvā maṁtitaṁ ēvaṁ ।। 493 ॥
ēyammi rāya vaṁsē ciu ārambha jai vi ēsa kamō । jaṁ kira kaṇiṭṭa bhāyā ahigārī hōi rajjassa ||494 ॥
rāyā vi saccadhammō baddhapannō imammi aṭṭhammi । jai vi hu tahā vi vīmaṁsiūṇa ēvaṁ vivvaṁ ।। 495 ।।
ēvaṁ pahāṇa - purisāṇa vayaṇamāyanniūṇa vara - sacivō । sumaī mammi ciṁta pūrijjatō paharisēṇaṁ ।। 496॥
jō cēva majjha bhāvō maṇammi sō cēva sē sayāṇaṁ vi । ēyāṇa mahāpurisāṇa nūṇa jaṁpati tēṇēvaṁ ।। 497।।
dinnāsā visayaṁ nivēṇa sirisaccadhammanā mēṇa । tamhā majjha samīhiyamiha sijjhissa asaṁdiddhaṁ ॥ 498 ॥
iya citiūṇa jaṁpai sumaī nīsēsamatiyaṇa - tilaō । sirisaccadhammarannō āēsō matthayassuvari ।। 499 ॥
amhāṇa māṇaṇijjō guṇavaṁ juvarāya - vijayadhammō vi । taha vi jahaṭṭhiya attha bhaṇiyavvō maṁtaṇa ṭhiēhiṁ ॥ 500 ॥
jai vihususāu annaṁ iṁdiya - palhāyaṇaṁ balakaraṁ ca । savisamuvajīviyaṁ taṁ taha vi bhavē jī viyaṁtakaraṁ ॥ 501 ॥
surahī vi sīyalō vi hu caṁdaṇa-tāhī bhuyaṁga-kaya-vēḍhō । jaṇai aṇatthaṁ viyanā sēvijjatō suhatthīhiṁ ॥ 502 ॥
jai vi sirivijayadhammō sayaṁ guṇāṇaṁ bahuṇa āvāsō । taha vi suya-nēha mūḍhō tassa uvēkkhēi sō dōsē || 503 ॥
kēttiyamēttē kahimō tumha purō tassa saṁtiē dōsē । ēkkāē jīhāē savvē sakkā na tē kahiuṁ ॥ 504 ॥
rahar tō kahijmāṇammi matthaē kēsā । uḍḍhī havaṁti sahasā mōṇaṁ ci ya tattha tā juttaṁ ।। 505 ।।
kiṁ ca kahijjai taṁ vatthu kassaī jaṁ na jāṇaē kō vi। sayala - jaya - vissuyāṇaṁ kiṁ taddōsāṇa kahaṇēṇa ||506॥

dūrambhitāva ciṭṭhaha tubbhē jē muṇaha savvamiyaraṁ pi । annaṁ pi kiṁ pi pucchaha jō kira jāṇai na taddōsē || 507 ||
tō tēhi vaḍa-purisēhiṁ jaṁpiyaṁ saciva ! ēvamēvēyaṁ । tuha vayaṇaṁ thēvaṁ pihu na annā jāyaē nūṇaṁ ॥ 508 ||
aha saciva tē najjai majvarōhēṇa kiṁ pi mā tubbhē । paḍivajjissaha vayaṇaṁ vivahaṁ pitaha tti bhāvēṇa ॥। 509॥
tō tē vayaṁti sacivaṁ karaṇijjō cēva tumha uvarōhō । kiṁ tu samayaṁtarē na uṇa ēttha samayammi kāyavvō ।। 510 ।।
inhi jahaṭṭiyaṁ ciya vattavaṁ maṁtaṇaṁ kuṇatēhi । juvarāya taṇaya - dōsā sayamaṇuhūyā ya amhēhiṁ ॥ 511 ।।
ah bhaṇai sumaimaṁtī ēvaṁ suya - dōsasiō saṁtō । guṇavaṁ pi vijayadhammō kaha jōgō hōi rajjassa ||512 ॥
jai rāyā niravaccō hōi taō taṁ pi ṭhāvimō rajjē । na uṇō saṁtammi vibhuvaṇapāla - kumarē guṇanihimmi ।। 513 ।।
- massēhi ta bhaṇiyaṁ jaha bhuvaṇapāla-varakumarō । hakkāriūṇa inhiṁ jāṇāvijjai imaṁ aṭhṭhē ।। 514 ।।
sumaisacivēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ saṁjāō saṁpayaṁ diṇaddha khaṇō । bhuttāṇaṁtaramētthā gaṁtuṇaṁ iya karissāmō || 515 ।।
kāū maṁta- nicchyamiya tē savvē vi niyagihēsu gayā । cira- gūḍha- parōppara payaḍiyamabhāvā suhī jāyā ।। 516 ।।
aha tēsiṁ vapurisāṇa majjhaō turaya- sāhaṇāhivaī | sāhaṇiō nāmēṇaṁ sāhai taṁ maṁtaṇaṁ savvaṁ ।।517।।
niyanaṁdaṇassa puraō ēgaṁtē harisarāyanāmassa । sō bhuvaṇapālakumarassa sēvaō ahiṇavō taiyā । । 518 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tēṇa kahiyaṁ puraō kumarassa takkhaṇē cēva । kumarō vi harisarāyaṁ visajjiūṇaṁ niyāvāsē ।। 519 ॥
hakkārāvara sigdhaṁ paisāgaramappaṇō samīvammiṁ । taṁ harisarāya -sāhiya- vr̥ttaṁtaṁ sāhaē tassa ।। 520 ।।
bhai ya tahā jahēyaṁ saṁbhāvijjatamēva saṁjāyaṁ । kiṁtu iha pucchaṇijjaṁ imaṁ maē tumha pāsammi ।। 521 ।।
jaṁ vamassēhi sumaimahāmaṁtiṇō imaṁ kahiyaṁ । jayadhammakaō dōsō amhēhi vi asthi aṇuhūō ।।522||
tāki kēṇaṇubhūyaṁ jayadhammakayaṁ ti muṇasi kiṁ pi tumaṁ ? । maisāgarō payaṁpai jāṇatō ki pi ciṭṭhāmi ।। 523॥
tō āha bhuvaṇapālō majjha vi sāhēha kiṁ pi jaṁ muṇasi । sō kahai jahā paḍhamaṁ sēṇāhiva sūranāmassa ।। 524 ।।
jō āsi samara-kālē ārōhaṇa samuciō vara-turaṁgō । nīō harāviūṇaṁ tēṇa taō paumanābhassa ।। 525 ।।
nāmēṇa paumanābhassa saṁtiyā rōhiṇī samavaruddhā । nīyā harāviūṇaṁ siriyādēvi tti nāmēṇa ।। 526 ॥
sāhaṇiyabhujjamāṇaggāmāō viṇiggayā ya janattā । nāūṇa sadēsagayā gahiyā jayadhamma - purisēhiṁ ।। 527 ।।
taha saṁdhi- viggahāhiva - sirihara - gihiṇī gayā vijayakhēḍē । niya dhūyā sā suraē vōllāvaṇayammi mayamaṇuē । 528 ।
sā viṇiyattā tattō ēṁtī maggē samaggamavisāraṁ । hariūṇa suddhasaṁkhā kāūṇa samujjhiyā tēhiṁ ।। 529 ।।
ēvaṁ ciya paḍihāraṁgarakkhamāiṇa sēsapāṇaṁ pi । kāraṇapurisāṇa maṇē asamāhī atthi tēhiṁ kaō ।। 530 ।।
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiō maṁti-suō ērisaṁ tara majjha । jāṇatēṇa vi kamhā kayā vi jāṇāviyaṁ nēya ।। 531 ।।
aha maṁti-suō jaṁpai imaṁ na jayadhammadūsaṇaṁ sa kayaṁ । kiṁ tu maē sa-maīē tammi imē ṭhāviyā dōsā ||532 ।।
tō āha bhuvaṇapālī kaha ēvaṁ tō kahēi maṁti-suō । jīsē kajjammi haō vallaharāō vasuhagāmē ।। 533 ।।
sā niyamajjā dāsī tēṇa kayā appaṇō piyā bhajjā । tīsē bhāyā nāmēṇa bhadda ō tassa aidaiō ।। 534 ।।
āsārūḍhō bhaṛa-caḍagarēṇa garuēṇa paribhamai ēsō । jayadhammakumārāō avibhinnaṁ pāsai jaṇō taṁ ।।535||
sō lahai jai vi davvaṁ bahuyaṁ jayadhammakumara- pāsāō । tassa na taha vi pahuppai kiṁci vi vēsāpasattassa ।। 536।।
nivvāsiyaaari kāūṇaṁ pēsiō maē ēkkō । purisō tassa samōvē vīsaṁbhaṭṭhāṇamaigaruyaṁ ।। 537 ।।
jā kā vimaē sikkhā tassa viinnā iō vayaṁtassa । tīē tēṇēsō vippalōbhiuṁ kāriō ēvaṁ ।। 538 ।।

।।
sō amhē cci purisō viṇāsakālē sayaṁ na paccakkhō । jāō katthai niyā buddhī vā vāriyā tēṇa ।। 539 ।।
jayadhammakumaranāmaṁ payāsiyaṁ dōsakaraṇa - visayammi । savvattha vi tēṇa sayaṁ alakkhiēṇaṁ jaṇāṇa purō ।। 540 ।।
tō āha bhuvaṇapālō dōsa - pasiddhī sayaṁ pi tassa'tthi । aigasyā tumaē puṇa visēsaō rāya - lōssa || 541 ॥
iha narē savvarefa aṇammi vīsāmiyā uvāēṇa । tā kiṁ puṇō vi ēsō kaō kilēsō taē ēttha ।। 542 ।।
tō pabhaṇai maṁti-suō tassavarāhā niyammi dēsammi । jē saṁjāyā tē cciya iha nāyā rāya - lōēṇa ।। 543 ।।
tēhita vahuēhiṁ vināēhiṁ na tāṇa hōi cittēsu । kō vi tahābhinivēsō jāva na jāō niyaṁgē vi ।। 544 ।।
kō vi avayāralēsō tajjaṇiō tēṇa kāraṇēṇēyaṁ । niva suyakayaṁ maē jaha samadukkhā hōṁti tē savvē ।। 545 ।।
samadukhāṇaṁ cittaṁ hōi samaṁ patthuē jahā kajjē । samasīlavvasaṇāṇaṁ satthēsu kahijjaē pīī || 546॥
īhējja kiṁpi kāuṁ jaṁ kajjaṁ palahuyaṁ va garuyaṁ vā । taṁ savvāraṁbhēṇaṁ kāyavvaṁ sīha-nāēṇa ।। 547 ।।
imasāgara - vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ raṁjiō maṇē kumarō । ēyaṁ gihē visajjai kuṇai sayaṁ bhōyaṇāiyaṁ । । 548 ||
kaya-bhōyaṇāi - kiccō maṁti-suō kumara - maṁdirē pattō avasara nisanna mēyaṁ namiūṇa nisīyai saṭhāṇē । । 549 ।।
vinnavai ya taṁ jaha rāyamaṁdirē kinna gammaē inhi । āha kumarō iyāṇi tai saṁpattē gamissāmō || 550 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇa kahaṁtaramāra bhuvaṇapālakumarēṇa । taṁ harisarāya -kahiyaṁ niya-cittē dhārayaṁtēṇa ।। 551 ।।
kaya bhōyaṇamāyā samayammi gayā narida - gēhammi । sabvē pahāṇa - purisā nāūṇa aṇāgayaṁ kumaraṁ ।। 552 ।।
sigdhaṁ ciya taggēhē purisaṁ pēsaṁti āhahvaṇahēuṁ । kumarō vi takkhaṇē cciya samāgaō tāṇa pāsammi ।। 553 ||
viṭṭhō tē pucchara mauliya-muha-kamala-kaṁti-saṁbhaṁtō । rāya - sarīra-sarūvaṁ sāhēti tahēva tē tassa ।। 554॥
jai paṁca satta va diṇē mahayā kicchēṇa amha sāmittaṁ । pālēi saccadhammō jahattha nāmō mahārāyā ।। 555 ।।
uḍḍhaṁ tu maṁda-unnē amhē ēsō caissaē nūṇaṁ । dēhaṁ ca rōga-saṁgama - dōsēṇa va dūsiyaṁ dēvō ।। 556 ।।
iya aṁsu-jala-kaṇōlliya- nayaṇāṇaṁ tāṇa nisuṇiuṁ vayaṇaṁ । kumarō vi kuṇai niviḍaṁta - jala-lavē lōyaṇē niyaē 557
vatthaṁcalēṇa paramajjiūṇa niyalōyaṇāiṁ tē savvē । jā kiṁ pi vattukāmā kumarassa muhaṁ palōyaṁti ।। 558 ||
tā bhuvaṇapālakumarō karaṁgulī - phusiya nayaṇa-sayavattō । jaṁpai jahā nariṁdō dūra - ṭhiēṇaṁ maē paṇaō ।। 559॥
dōna va vārāō majjhammi sarīra kāraṇassa paraṁ । tassa suhāsuhabhāvō na jāṇiuṁ sakkiō kō vi ? ।। 560 ।।
vējjā pucchijjatā puṇa ēvaṁ ciya sayā vi maha puraō । sāhēṁtā jaha sigdhaṁ hōhī rāyā vigayarōgō । । 561 ।।
aha sumai-maṁti-muhēhiṁ jaṁpiyaṁ ajja cēva vējjēhiṁ । mukkā narida jīvitha paccāsā amha puraō vi ।। 562 ।।
tō bhai bhuvaṇapālō kō vi gaō rāya-pēsiō purisō। ēttō āhavaṇatthaṁ juvarannō vijayadhammassa ।। 563 ।।
tō vayai sumai sacivō ajjaṁ viya amha paḍhamadivasamuhē । rannā sayamā sō dinnō tassāhavaṇahēu ।। 564 ||
aha taṁ vayai kumārō taha kuṇaha jahā uvēi sigdhaṁ pi । iha amhaṁ cullapiyā aha taṁ sacivō puṇō bhaṇai ।। 565 ।।
ētō cciya āhūyā ciṭṭhaha amhēhiṁ kumara ! iha tumbhē । jaha maṁtiūṇa tumhēhi saha imaṁ kīraē kajjaṁ ।। 566 ।।
tō vēi kumārō saṁpayaṁ pi maṁtēha matiyavvaṁ jaṁ । amhēhi samaṁ jamhā na vilaṁba khamaṁ imaṁ kajjaṁ ॥ 567।।
tō sumaimahāmaṁtī pahāṇa - purisāṇa pāsai muhāī । tē bēṁti taṁ tumaṁ ciya kumarassa kahēha amha mayaṁ ।। 568 ।।
aha bhai sumaimaṁtī kumāra-sammayamimaṁ samaggāṇa । ēyāṇa mahāpurisāṇa jaṛa tumaṁ hōsi naranāhō । । 569 ।।
paḍisēhai taṁ vayaṇaṁ kumarō paḍhamaṁ guṇē pasaṁsaṁtō । cullapiuṇō taō sō sumaippamuhēhiṁ savvēhiṁ ।। 570 ।।

sivakēū cariyaṁ
rāyā
1
19
aha puvr̥ttasujuttīhi paḍibōhēūṇa kāriō rajjē । abbhuvagamaṁ taō tē samuṭṭiyā pamuiyā sabvē ।। 571 ।।
rāyāēsō lihiō jō āsī vijayadhammajuvarannō । sō tēhi na paṭṭaviō tahēva dhariō diṇē paṁca ।। 572 ।।
rāyā pucchai pāsē pahāṇapurisāṇa vijayadhammassa । āgamaṇaṁ tē vi taō bēti jahā ēi sigghaṁ pi ।। 573।।
annamma dinē miliuṁ pahāṇapurisēhi maṁtiyaṁ ēvaṁ paṁcāsajōyaṇēhi ēttō cihna vijayavammō ।। 574 ||
sigghō vihu saṁḍhiyaō ētō taiē diṇammi vaccihai । nayarammi vijayakhēḍē ētassa vi tēttiyā divasā ।। 575 ।।
yā puṇa dō divasē jai jīvai kaha vi garuyapunnēhi । tō vijayadhammapuriyā āmaṁtēuṁ bhaṇijjaṁti || 576 ।।
rannā ajja ēsō dinnō iha vijayadhammamāṇē । rāyāēsaṁ gahiuṁ tō tumbhē vayaha sigdhaṁ pi ।। 577 ||
nayarammi vijayakhēḍē juvarāyaṁ vijayadhammamāṇēhā । iya maṁtiūṇa takkhaṇamēva kayaṁta taha ccēva ||578 ।।
ranō purisēhitō tē purisā vijayadhammajuvarannō । gahiuṁ rāyāēsaṁ pēsaṁti taō purisamannaṁ ।। 579 ।।
sirivijayadhammapāsē ciṭṭhati sayaṁtu tatya sayayaṁ pi । nivasuddhi pucchaṁtā rāyaulabbhaṁtarammi ṭhiyā ।। 580 ।।
tē vijayadhammapurisācitaṁti sasaṁkiyā niē cittē । jaha kō vi rāyapurisō mahallaō vijayadhammassa ।। 581 ॥
pāsamma na pēsaviō rāyāēsō samappiō amha । kiṁ pinna samuttamēyaṁ paḍihāsai amha cittammi ।। 582 |
rannō vi vapurisā amhēhi samaṁ na vēti sambhāvaṁ । pāsāgaē vi amhē udāsadiṭṭhīē pēcchati । 583 ॥
kumarō vibhuvaṇapālō amhē daṭṭu sasaṁbhramō puvvaṁ । jaha āsi taha na inhi udāsacittō ṭhiō vayai || 584 ॥
bhattō vi culla piuṇa jaṁ inhi annahā bhuvaṇapālō । saṁjāō sō dōsō jayadhammassē va nīsēsō ।। 585 ॥
tōsēṇaṁ jāō rajjatthī ēsa saṁpayaṁ nūṇaṁ । jōggō cciya rajjassa vinā ēvaṁ hōhihī ēvaṁ ।। 586 ।।
jaṁ puṇa rāyāēsō samappiō amha va purisēhiṁ । taṁ sacvadhambhavayaṇaṁ aṇuvattaṁ tēhi kayamēvaṁ ॥ 587।।
tāki ēttha kathāē citāē? asthi kiṁ pi bhaviyavvaṁ ? । jaṁ taṁ nūṇa bhavissai iya citēuṁ ṭhiyā tē vi ।। 588 ।।
aṁta samayammi ratnā āmaṁtēūṇa niyamahāpurisē । kumaraṁ ca bhuvaṇapālaṁ tēsi sikkhā imā dinā ।। 589 ।।
rajjammi vijayadhammō ṭaviyanvō ēttha āgaō saṁtō। ahamiva daṭuvvō sō tumhēhiṁ taha ya kumarēhiṁ । 590॥
iya bhaṇiūṇa pasuttō dōhara - nihāē sacvadhamma-nivō। aha tēhi vibhūīē taṇu-sakkārō kaō tassa ।। 591 ।।
rajjami bhuvaṇapālō mahāvibhūīē tēhi ahisittō | atthāṇammi nisannō paṇaō sanvēṇa lōēṇa ।। 592 ।।
dinō ya sāsaṇēṇaṁ ratnā kēvaliya- dēvaguttassa । ēkkō pavaraggāmō chattālaṁkāra-vattha - juō ।। 593 ।।
nōhariō nayara - bahiṁ haya-gaya-raha- jōha - nivaha bahulāē। cauraṁgiṇīē sēṇāē parigaō bhuvaṇapāla -niyō । । 594 । ।
tē vijayadhammapurisā taṁ taha daṭṭhūṇa vijayakhēḍapurē । caliyā vattaṁ ahaṁ tayā vi rāyāilōyassa ।। 595 ।।
tēhiṁ purā jō purisō paṭṭaviō sumaipamuhavayaṇēṇa । appiya rāyāēsō sō pattō vijayakhēḍammi ।। 596।।
daṁsēi rāyalēhaṁ puraō juvarāyavijayadhammassa । sō tadaṁsaṇaō jhatti uṭṭiuṁ āsaṇavarāō ।। 597 ।।
āṇāviūṇa duiyaṁ varāsaṇaṁ tattha taṁ ṭhavāvēuṁ । paṁcagaṁ paṇivāyaṁ kāūṇaṁ ginhai karammi || 598 ।।
uvavisi puṇaravi nivāsaṇē tammi cēva taṁ lēhaṁ | vitthāriūṇa vāyai sayaṁ taōvagayalē tyō ।। 599 ।।
Greas savvassa viniyaparivārassa jaha nivāēsō । kōsalanayarē sigdhaṁ gamaṇatthaṁ āgaō majjha ।। 600 ।।
aha tattō uṭṭhēuṁ viyaṇē gaṁtūṇa niyamahāpurisē । jayadhammaṁ ca kumāraṁ hakkārēuṁ purō tēsiṁ ॥। 601॥
sāi sarīrakāraṇamaigāḍhaṁ saccadhammanaravaiṇō । taha nayaradēsarakkhāvisaē sikkhaṁ ca dāūṇa || 602 ||
dāvēūṇa pāṇayabhari turayammi ārūhēūṇa । nayarāō niggaṁtu bāhitō bhōṣaṇaṁ kuṇai ||603 ।।
|

sirimunisuvvayajiṇiṁdacariyaṁ
bhōttūṇa takkhaṇē cciya pabhūyaca uraṁga sēnnasaṁjuttō । kōsalanayarābhimuhō payāi akhaliyapayāhi ||604 ।।
vacca̭tassa ya maggē samā gayā tassa sammuhā purisā । tē kōsalanayarāō ōyariūṇaṁ haēhitō ||605 ||
namiūṇa vijayadhammaṁ kahaṁti viyaṇammi tassa vr̥ttaṁtaṁ । rannō maraṇaṁ rajjē ṭhavaṇaṁ taha bhuvaṇapālassa ||606 ||
taṁ niyapurisēhitō vayaṇaṁ sōūṇa vijayadhammō vi । sōyāūriyahiyaō ōyariūṇaṁ turaṁgāō ||607।।
gaṁtūṇa rukkhamūlē mahayā saddēṇa kuṇai akkaṁdaṁ । tō pariyaṇēṇa dinnō āvāsō tassa tatthēva || 608 ।।
sō viguṇē ginhaṁtō jēssa sahōyarassa naravaiṇō । akkaṁdiūṇa suiraṁ niyaparivārēṇa paḍisiddhō ||609 ॥
tunhikkō hōūṇaṁ mahiyala viṇihittasatthara nivannō । ṭhāūṇa khaṇaṁ pariyaṇavinnattō udviraṁ tattō ॥ 610 ॥
gaṁtūṇa jalaṭṭhāṇē kāūṇaṁ majjaṇāimayakiccaṁ । āgaṁtuṁ āvāsē cattāhārō saparivārō ॥611 ॥
tamahōrattaṁ gamiuṁ baṁdhusiṇēhāṇusaraṇajāya hō । parivāra - patthaṇāē bīyadiṇē kiṁ pi kāū ||612 ॥
dēhassa uvaṭṭhabhaṁ dāūṇa payāṇayaṁ saparivārō । viṇiyattiūṇa tattō pattō vijayakhēḍammi ।।613।।
tattha vi jaṁ karaṇijjaṁ nāyarajaṇadaṁsaṇāiyaṁ kiṁ pi । taṁ kāūṇa samaggaṁ tattō hōūṇa ēgaṁtē ।। 614 ||
citēi kiṁ iyāṇi karaṇijjaṁ mē parābhavagayassa ? | ahavā majjha paribhavō na ēsa antrēṇa kēṇāvi ।। 615 ।।
parivihiō ki tuma sayamēva ya appaṇī kaō'bhibhavō । jāṇatēṇa vi niccaṁ uvēkkhamāṇēṇa suyadō sē ।। 616।।
tā ēttha rūsiyavvaṁ nēya maē hōi kassa vijayammi । aha kaha vi rūsiyavvaṁ tō nūṇaṁ appaṇō cēva ।। 617 ।।
ahavā na appaṇō vi hu rusiyavvaṁ kiṁ pi jujjaē ēttha । bhaviyavvayā gurūvā savvassa vi jāyaē buddhī ।। 618 ।।
tā ēttha samāhāṇaṁ ēmēvayamāṇasamma kīrataṁ । suṁdarayaramuvajāyai kaēhiṁ ki vahu viyappēhiṁ ? ।। 619।।
ahavā niuṇamaīē citijjataṁ imapi pariṇāmē । suṁdarayaraṁ na hōhi tti majjha paḍihāsaē cittē ॥ 620 ॥
jaha saccadhammarannō majjha vi taha cēva āsi aibhattō । jō bhuvaṇapālakumarō sathāvi nīsēsaguṇanilaō ।। 621 ।।
tēṇa jayadhammadōsē maisāgaraparihavāīē cittē । dhariḍaṁ niyapiuṇō vi hu āṇābhaṁga karēūṇa ।। 622 ।।
majjha vi dakkhinnaṁ ujjhiūṇa jaha rajjamappaṇā gahiyaṁ । taha sō saṁbhāvijjai jayadhammassa vi mahāasuhaṁ । 623 ।
inhi kiṁ pi kutō nūṇaṁ saṁpattagaruyasāmatthō । tammi samayammi kāuṁ ki juttaṁ majjha havaī ti ? ।। 624 ।।
jai samarasamāraṁbhaṁ karōmi saha bhuvaṇapālanaravaiṇā । taha vi na juttaṁ ahavā jai jayadhammō haṇijjaṁtō ।। 625 ।।
kavi ya uvēhijjai tō hōi visēsaō ajuttayayaraṁ । tā kīraṁtaṁ ubhayaṁ pi nivvuiṁ na jaṇai maṇammi || 626 |
tamhā imammi samaē vayagahaṇaṁ kēvalaṁ vi mōttūṇa । annaṁ na kiṁ pi juttaṁ pasihāsai majjha buddhīē ।। 627 ।।
iha lōgassa vidōsā paricattā hōṁti dikkhagahaṇēṇa । paralōyassa vi kajjaṁ pasāhiyaṁ hōi ēvaṁ ti ।। 628 ।।
iya nicchiūṇa hiyaē hakkārēūṇa kumarajayadhammaṁ । tassa kahēuṁ savvaṁ kōsalapurajāyavr̥ttaṁtaṁ ।। 629 ।।
niyahiyayābhippāyaṁ sāhai jaha saccadhammavirahammi । tassāṇācukkassa ya vaya - gahaṇaṁ cēva maha juttaṁ ॥ 630॥
tō tujjha hiyaṭṭhāē sikkhavaṇaṁ kaṁpi saṁpayaṁ dēmi । avahāriūṇa sammaṁ aṇuṭṭhiyavvā imā tuma ।। 631 ।।
ēttiya dihāī tumaṁ jaha tahava ṭhiō''si kumarabhāvēṇa । inhi amha parōkkhē taē viṇīēṇa hōyavvaṁ ।। 632 ।।
niyaparivāraṁ nayaraṁ dē ca jahā sunīimaggēṇa । parivālasi kāyavvaṁ tahā taē savvakālaṁpi ।। 633||
gaṁtūṇa kōsalapurē puvvakaē khābhiūṇa niyadō sē । sēvēyavvō sayayaṁ mahānariṁdō bhuvaṇapālō ।।634 ।।
iyadinnasayalasikkhaṁ jayadhammaṁ ṭhāviūṇa niyaṭhāṇē । lōiyadikkhāgrahaṇaṁ pakarēi sayaṁ vijayadhamma ।। 635 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-21-to-21.json ==========================
sivakēū cariyaṁ
21
tō jayadhammabhaēṇaṁ nivāsiṇō vijayakhēḍa-nayarammi । vaṇiyā nihuyaṁ nihuyaṁ nīhariūṇaṁ gayā savvē ॥ 636||
kōsalapurammi tattō vinnattō tēhi bhuvaṇapālanivō । niyadutthaṁ tēṇa taō tē bhaṇiyā kōmalagirāhiṁ ।। 637।।
jaha saccadhammarannā sō dēsō niyayabhāuṇō dinnō । tassa karēmi na tatti kiramha dēsōvi hōi na sō ।। 638 ।।
puṇa vinnattō vaṇiēhi tēhiṁ sō bhuvaṇapāla - naranāhō । jaha amhē ētthēva ya nayarē inhi vasissāmō ।। 639 ।।
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ amhē na bhaṇāmō vasaha nēyamāvasaha । jaṁ ki pi tumha ruiyaṁ taṁ tubbhē kuṇahī sayamēva ॥ 640॥
jayadhammō sōūṇaṁ iyabhaṇiyaṁ bhuvaṇapāla rāyassa । citēi niyayacittē jaha sō bīhēi maha nūṇaṁ ।। 641।।
jaṁ lhū siyammi gāmē balāhiē māriyamma vi na bhaṇiyaṁ । kiṁ vi maha sammuhaṁ tēṇa nēya vaṇiyāṇa rāvāē । 642 ।
gihāmi tassa dē tō haṇiūṇaṁ kamēṇa nīsēsaṁ । iya niya kuvigappēhi pārō ghāu dē ।। 643॥
nāūṇa bhuvaṇapālō rāyā vārēi dūya- vayaṇēṇa । taṁ jayadhammakumāraṁ sō jaṁpai ujjuyaṁ nēya ।। 644 ।।
ēyaṁ pitēṇa puvvaṁ kassa vi pāsāō atthi vinnāyaṁ । jaṁ saccadhamma - rannā niyarajjaṁ vijayadhammassa ।। 645 ।।
dinaṁ marataēṇaṁ haḍhēṇa gahiyaṁ tu bhuvaṇapālēṇa । iya citiūṇa hiyaē sagavvamiya jaṁpiyaṁ tēṇa ।। 646 ।।
maha piuṇō ahigārō haḍhavittīē taē sayaṁ gahiō । tō tuha pāsāō ahaṁ pi saṁpayaṁ taṁ gahissāmi ।।647 ।।
jayadhammabhaṇiyamēyaṁ gaṁtuṁ dūēṇa bhuvaṇapālassa । kahiyaṁ savvaṁ tēṇāvi pēsiyaṁ sēnnamaibahuyaṁ ॥ 648 ।।
tassuvari taō ēsō dubviṇayāō sannaparicattō । jayadhammō baṁdhēuṁ suhēṇa gahiō niva-balēṇa ॥। 649 ।।
khittō guttīē ahilāhiājāṇupūritaṁ mukkō । kaivayadiṇāṇa aṁtē āṇāē bhuvaṇapālassa || 650 ।।
maisāgarēṇa gaṁtuṁ guttīē kaḍiūṇa sō mukkō । bhaṇiō ya jāhi gahiūṇa jīviyaṁ niyamiō dūrē ।।651।।
annaha jai taṁ najjasi majjhammi ṭhiō imassa dēsassa । tā nūṇa bhuvaṇapālēṇa māriyavvōsi dukkhajuō ।। 652 । ।
tō naṭṭhō jayadhammō pāṇē gahiūṇa dūradēsammi । tēṇa vi gahiyā dikkhā pāsaṁḍīṇaṁ samīvammi ।। 653 ।।
uggaṁ tavōvisēsa karēi paṁcanha chanha - divasāṇaṁ । pajjaṁtē pārēi ya jalakhāliya- lukkha-bhattēṇa ।।654।।
juvarāya - paē ṭhaviō niyabhāyā bhuvaṇapālarāēṇa । nāmēṇa vijayapālō tassa ya dinnō pasāyaēṇa ।। 655।।
dēsō sō cēva ya vijayakhēḍanayarassa saṁtiō savvō । jā puvvaṭhii niyayāsā dinnā vijayarāyassa ।।656।।
sēsāṇa vi bhāūṇaṁ gāmā dinnā visēsaō bahuyā । rāyāṇamaṇunnaviḍaṁ gaō sadēsē vijayapālō ।। 657।।
nīō ya vijayasīhō sūrō vi ya tēṇa attaṇā saddhi । aṇujāṇāvēūṇaṁ mahānaridaṁ bhuvaṇapālaṁ ।। 658 ।।
dinnāya uciyagāmā tēsi dōnhaṁ pitēṇa bhāūṇaṁ । mōttūṇa vijayasīhaṁ rakkhatthaṁ vijayakhēḍammi ।। 659।।
surēṇa samaṁ caliō sāhēuṁ duṭṭhasīmasāmaṁtē । pacchimadisāē pattō kuṁḍalasēlē mahāvisamē ।। 660।।
takkaḍa saṁṭhiō tēṇa sāhiō sabarakēu sāmaṁtō । gahiūṇaṁ savvassaṁ puṇō vi tatthēva sō ṭhaviō ।। 661 ।।
sūrēṇa bhamaṁtēṇaṁ kuṁḍalagiri parisarammirammammi | vēgavaīnai-tīrē niyaḍē ghaṇavaṁsajālīē ।। 662।।
diṭṭhō lakkhaṇavaṁtō ēkkō purisō mahīyalē paḍiō | lōhamaēhi kīlēhiṁ kīliō savvagattēsu ।।663 ।।
nītasōṇiō vaṇa- muhēsu karuṇaṁ kaṇaṁtaō saṇiyaṁ । puṭṭhō sō sūrēṇa uvasappēūṇa karuṇāē ।। 664।।
kō bhadda ! tumaṁ kiṁ ēttha āgaō kēṇa tuha kayaṁ ēvaṁ? । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ mahāyasa ! jālī majjhammi ciṭṭhati ।। 665 ।।
dō ōsahivalayāī khittāi maē gavēsiuṁ tāī | āṇēha tuma sigdhaṁ tō puṭṭha ṁ tuha kahissāmi ॥। 666 ।।
tō kuṇai tahā sūrō tō bhaṇiō tēṇa kīliyanarēṇa । salluddharaṇīvalayaṁ ēvaṁ saṁrōhaṇīvalayaṁ ।। 667 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇiṁdacariyaṁ
tō ghasiūṇaṁ paḍhamaṁ valayaṁ lāēsu salla-ṭhāṇēsu । sūrēṇa kayammi tahā ukkhuḍiyā jhatti tē kīlā ।। 668 ।।
tō bhaṇiō bī pi hu ghasiūṇaṁ vaṇamuhēsu mē dēhi । ēvaṁ kayammitattō vaṇāī rūḍhāī saṁvvāī ||669॥
sō jāō sajjaṁgō niyaṁ sarūvaṁ kahēi tassa purō । jaha vēthaḍamma nagē nayarē sūrōdayammi ahaṁ ॥ 670 ॥
kaṇayadhaō nāṇaṁ khayararāyā samāgaō ēttha । vijjā- sāhaṇahēuṁ ēgāgī pavaṇavēgēṇa ।। 671 ||
khayariṁdēṇaṁ diṭṭhē sapaōvaṇagāmiṇā sasēntrēṇa । puvvaviruddhēṇa taō tēṇāhaṁ ērisō vihiō || 672।
jai tumamēttha na ēṁtō saṁpa tō haṁ khatarassuvariṁ । pīḍāē vihariyaṁgō niyajīyaṁ jhatti vimuyaṁtō ।। 673 ||
tō majjha tumaṁ mittō paramō baṁdhū ya ahva jaṇaō ya । tā jaṁ pabhaṇasi inhi karēmi taṁ icchiyaṁ tujjha ।।674।।
tō tēṇa bhaṇiyamēyaṁ aṁbarayala-gāmiṇā taē majjha । niyadaṁsaṇa - dāṇēṇaṁ dhammaṁ ca jasaṁ jaṇaṁtēṇa ।।675 ||
tijayabhima vijaṁ kiṁ tri vi vatthasudullahayaraṁ tayaṁ savvaṁ । saṁsāhiyaṁ na ēttō samīhiyaṁ kiṁ pi mē annaṁ ? ।। 676 ।।
tō kaṇayadhaō pabhaṇai ciṭṭhau ēmēva tāva ēṭṭhō । niyanāmaṭhāṇa kahaṇēṇa saṁpayaṁ kuṇaha maha sōkkhaṁ ।। 677 ।।
tō tēṇa tassa kahiō tatthāgamaṇāvahī savuttatō । aha jōḍiyahatthēṇaṁ sūrō khayarēṇimaṁ bhaṇiō || 678 ||
kāūṇa maha pasāyaṁ vēyaḍḍhanagammi sūrudayanayarē । pāhuṇaō ēhi tumaṁ maha jaha maṇanivvuī hōi ।। 679 ।।
tō bhai sūrakumarō ahaṁ vasē vijayapālajuvarannō । tēṇa tayāṇāē viṇā na jāmi annattha katyavi ya ।। 680 ॥
tō kaṇayadhaō jaṁpai mōyāvissāmi tassa vi samīvē । gaṁtūṇa tumaṁ saṁpai gasyanibaṁdhaṁ vihēūṇaṁ ।। 681 ।।
iya bhaṇiuṁ sō khayarō gaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ vijayapālapāsamma | mōyāvai taṁ kumaraṁ tassuvarōhēṇa sō muyai ||682।।
vijjāka vimāṇē khayarēṇārōviḍaṁ saparivārō । surō sapurē nīō juvarāyā uṇa vijayapālō ।। 683 ||
nayarammi vijayakhēḍē saṁpattō saha niēṇa sēntrēṇa । kōsalapurā uvaṇiē vālēuṁ āṇaē tattha ।।684 ।।
nīīē payaṁ pālai kuvvatō jēṭṭhabaṁdhuṇō bhatti । rāyā vi bhuvaṇapālō bhūṁjaya nikkaṁṭayaṁ rajjaṁ ||685।।
jāyā bahavē puttā chanhaṁ pi hu bhāuyāṇa gahiyakalā | vēyaḍhḍanagē sūrō pariṇai khayarāṇa dhūyāō ।।686।।
kaṇayaddharthakhayariṁdēṇa tassa dinnāō pavaravijjāō । bahumāhappajuyāō raṇasājjaṁ kuṇaṁtassa ।। 687 ।।
sūrēṇa sahāēṇaṁ niyavēriṁ pavaṇavēgakharidaṁ । niddhāḍiūṇa kaṇayaddhaēṇa gahiuṁ puraṁ tassa || 688।।
dinnaṁ
sūrassa karēi rajjamēsōvi akhaliyapayāvō । kōsalapuramma taha vijayakhēḍanagarammi gaṁtūṇa ।। 689 ।।
milai niyabhāuyāṇaṁ kyā vi vijjāharēhiṁ pariyariō । tayaṇunnāō vaccai puṇō vi viyaḍḍhasēlammi । 690 ।
sūrōdayapurabāhi samāgayaṁ bhuvaṇatuṁgamuṇināhaṁ । nāūṇa nahayarapahūkaṇayaō pēsaē purisa ||691।।
kaṁcaṇaurammi nayarē āṇēuṁ sūranaravaraṁ tattha । gaṁtūṇa sūripāsē sayaṁ tu nisuṇēi dhammakahaṁ ॥। 692 ।।
sūrō vi khayararāyā kaṇayadvayapurisasaṁjuō itti । tatthāgaṁtuṁ vaṁdai sūri taō dhammaṁ taō sui ।। 693।।
aha paribuddhō sūrō daḍhasammattō susāvagō jāō । kaivaryādiṇapajjaṁtē vaccai annattha sūri vi ।। 694 । ।
kaṇayaddhayamaṇunnaviḍaṁ pattō sūrō vi kaṁcaṇaḍarammi । sūrassa suō jāō lakkhaṇavaṁtō ya sukumālō ।।495।।
iya jāi suhaṁ kālō savvēsi bhuvaṇapālapabhiīṇaṁ । jayadhammō uggatavaṁ kāūṇaṁ saṭṭivāsasa ।। 696 ।।
cammaṭṭisēsadēhō jāō cakamaṇasattiparihīṇō । jāvajjīvaṁ pitaō paccakkhai savvamāhāraṁ ।। 697।।
paccakkhāṇē vi ṭhiō puvvilla parābhavaṁ saraṁtō sō māsaṁtē mariūṇaṁ vijjakumārō surō jāō ।। 698 ।।
punvabhavaṁ sariūṇaṁ kuppai tō uvaribhuvaṇapālassa । sō dēvō āgaṁtuṁ tatthāṇē nisannassa ।। 699॥
hōūṇa aditaṇū pāḍai sīhāsaṇāō taṁ jhatti । dharaṇiyalē baṁdhēi ya phuḍaṁtabāhāhi cōraṁ va ।।700।।

hā hā ? kimēyamēvaṁ ? jāva bhaṇatō jaṇō samuṭṭha i । sō atthāṇaniviṭṭhō tā uṭṭhē uṁna sakkēi ।। 701 ॥
thaṁbhēūṇaṁ mukkō tēṇa surēṇaṁ jaṇō samaggō vi । pacchaṁtarassa vi sō pariyaṇassa nihaṇaṁ gaō jhatti ।। 702 ।।
utthaṁbhiō taō sō atthāṇajaṇō surēṇa savvō vi । pakarēi vibhūīē rannō dēhassa sakkāraṁ ।। 703 ।।
maisāgarēṇa puṭṭhō imamaṭṭha dēvaguttakēvaliō । tēṇa paribhāviūṇaṁ kahiō jayadhammavr̥ttaṁ tō ।। 70 ।।
dukkhēṇa tēna maisāgarēṇa bhaṇiō piyā sumaimaṁtī । ginhāmi ahaṁ dikkhaṁ virahē nivabhuvaṇapālassa ||705।।
aha sumaimaṁtiṇā sō mahōvarōhēṇa niyapaē ṭhaviō । ahisittō rajjē puṇa āūṇaṁ vijayapālō ।।706 ।।
gahiyā sayaṁ tu dikkhā chuṭṭa māsammi vijayapālō vi । nihaṇaṁ nīō dēvēṇa tēṇa puvvappaōēṇa ।। 707 ।।
nēvi vijaya yappamuhā taha vijayasīhapajjaṁtā । ēēṇēva kamēṇaṁ viṇāsiyā tēṇa dēvēṇa || 708 ||
tammi samayammi pattō vēyaḍḍhanagāō tattha sūrō vi । milaṇatthaṁ niyayasahōyarassa nivabhuvaṇapālassa ।। 709 ।।
pēkkhēi sayalanayara naridabhavaṇaṁ ca sōya-saṁtattaṁ । tō pucchai bhaisāgaramē sasakhvaṁ kahai savvaṁ ।। 710 ।।
tō kaṁdiūṇa bahuyaṁ sūrō khayarēsarō bhaṇai ēvaṁ । rāyappahāṇapurisē jayadhammē aṇuvasaṁtami ॥711 ।।
rajjammikō vi annō ahisiccai nēya ēsa mē buddhī । annaha sō savvassa vi karihī vaṁsassa ucchēyaṁ । 712 ।।
tassōvasamōvāō maṁtijjau kō vitō mahāpurisā । uvavidvāmaṁtaṇaē bhāṁti niyaniyamabhippāyaṁ ॥ 613 ।।
kēvi bhaṇati pūyā kārijjai dēvayāṇa paidiyahaṁ । jaha tāṇa pabhāvēṇaṁ na kiṁpi sō sakkaē kāuṁ ।। 714 ।
annē bhāṁti jattaṁ ēyaṁ kīrau imaṁ pi tāvēkkaṁ । hōmāisaṁtikammaṁ kārijjau taha duijjaṁpi ।। 715 ।।
ēgē bhāṁti kīra ēvaṁ ubhayaṁ pi kiṁ tu taiyaṁpi । dutthiya - dīṇāṇāhāiyāṇa dāvijjaē dāṇaṁ ।। 716 ।।
avarē vayaṁti tinnivi kīraṁtu imāī kiṁtu dhavalaharaṁ । ēvaṁ pariccaijjai ciraṁtaṇa ēttha paricatē ॥717॥
i purṇa sōna pakuppai tattō annattha kattha vi pasē । kārēuṁ pāsāyaṁ ṭhāvijjai tattha navarāyā ।। 718 ।।
annē jaṁpati 'jahā nayaranivēsa va anna ṭhāṇammi । kīrau kōvōvasamō visēsaō tassa jaha hōi || 719 |
suvvai satsu vi ērisaṁ jahā dēvayā visēsēhiṁ । uvvāsiyāiṁ puvvaṁ nayarāī kahiṁ ci kuviēhiṁ ।। 720 ।।
tō tannayaranariṁdā annayaraṭṭhāṇaṭhaviyanayarēsu । rajjaṁ niruvaddavamāyaraṁti suiraṁ nirāsaṁkā ॥ 721॥
।
iya ēvamāiniyaniyabhāvēsu pathāsiēsa savvēhiṁ । tēhiṁ taō niyabhāvaṁ pabhāsaē sūrakhayariṁdō ।।722 ।।
savvēhiṁ vi tumbhēhiṁ bhaṇiyamiṇaṁ saṁgayaṁ paraṁ kiṁtu । ēvaṁ pi kīramāṇē jayadhammasurassa hiyayāō ।।723 ।।
rōsōna ōsaratō saṁbhāvijjai jaō sa jaṇayassa | ahigāriṇō vi rajjaṁ na jāyamantrēṇa saṁgahi ||724 ||
tēṇēsa tassa vaṁsē rajjaṁ kāuṁ na dēi kassa viya । dhavalaharē nayarē vā annamma vi kayanivāsassa ||725||
jai ṭhāṇa- paḍibaṁdhassa kāraṇēṇaṁ havējja sō kuviō । tō ṭhāṇa-pariccāē ēsō kōvaṁ pariccayai ।। 726।।
dēvaya- pūyāīhiṁ vi pasihammai nēya tassa sāmatthaṁ । jēṇēsa anāṇa-tavaṁ tivvaṁ kāuṁ surō jāō ।।727।।
tō majjha iṁmā buddhī kumārajayadhammasaṁtiyā paḍimā । kārēuṁ ahisiccaō rajjē sīhāsaṇē ṭhaviraṁ ।। 728 ||
atthāṇammi vimucca taṁ paṇamēuṁ jaṇō samaggō vi । tattha nisīyau tassa u āṇā bhābhijjaē dēsē ।।729।।
।
cha māsammitaō daṭṭhū ētthāgaō niyaṁ paḍimaṁ । uvasamiuṁ jai jaṁpai jayadhammasurō imaṁ kaha vi ॥ 730 ।।
uvasaṁtō maha kōvō ihiṁ ēyammi rāyavaṁsammi । ajjapabhiī kassa vi uvaddavaṁ nō karissāmi || 731॥
tō annō ahisiccai rajjē iha kōvi hōi jai jōggō । aha ēvaṁ nō jaṁpai tō rajjaṁ vahau ēmēva ।।732||
