24
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
sō savvō vi jaṇō niyaniyaahigāramāyarau ēgō । kīrau pamāṇapurisō jassāyattaṁ vahai || 733||
rāyālaṁkārō puṇa kāyavvō tīē cēva paḍimāē । savvēhiṁ vi paḍivannaṁ taṁ vayaṇaṁ taha kayaṁ ca taō ।।734॥
sūrō vi kaṁcaṇapurē pēsēuṁ khayarē kahāvē । kōsalapuravattaṁtaṁ sayaṁ paḍikkhēi tatthēva || 735 ।।
chammāsāṇaṁ aṁtē jayadhammasurō vi dēi uvaōgaṁ । rajjammi tammi puṇaravi tō pēcchai tattha niya paḍimaṁ ।।736।।
kārijjati rajjaṁ uvasaṁtamaṇō uvēi tō tattha । paccakkhō hōūṇaṁ sūrāijaṇaṁ imaṁ bhaṇai ।।737।।
kōvō ē vi mukkō saṁpai jō kōvi tumha paḍihāi । sō kuṇau ēttha rajjaṁ maha paḍimaṁ ṭhavaha annattha ।।738 ।।
sāpaidiṇaṁ pirannā pūyavvā ya paṇamiyavvā ya । tassa kutassa imaṁ uvaddavaṁ nō karissasāmi ।।739||
savvēhi vi paḍivanaṁ jayadhammasurassa taṁ tahāvayaṇaṁ । ārōviūṇa hatthē sirammi taha sō paṇamiō ya ||740 ॥
sadvāṇammi gaō sō jayadhammasurō adaṁsaṇī hōuṁ । maisāgarapamuhēhiṁ rajjakaē patthiō sūrō ।।741 ||
tēṇa nisiddhaṁ ēvaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca ahaṁ vayaṁ karissāmi । tō bhuvaṇapālaputtaṁ jēṭṭha rajjē vaha tubbhē ।। 742॥
tassāēsēṇa taō tēhi suō bhuvaṇapāla rāyassa । rajjammi bhuvaṇasīhō ahisittō guruvibhūīē || 743 ॥
vihiyaṁ vaddhāvaṇayaṁ savvēsu vi gāma - nagara - dēsēsu । sūrō tamaṇunnaviḍaṁ vēyaḍḍhanagē sayaṁ pattō ।।744 ।।
kaṇayaddhayassa vattaṁ kahiuṁ kaṁcaṇaurammi nayarammi vikkamasīhaṁ nāmēṇa vinayasūyaṁ ṭhavai rajjammi ।। 745 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattō tatthēva ya bhuvaṇatuṁgamaṇināhō । pāsammitassa gahiyā sūranaridēṇa tō dikkhā ।।746 ।।
sikairts kiriō sō bārasaaṁgāī pāḍhiō guruṇā । puvvāṇaṁ guṇaṇatthaṁ sō'haṁ ētthāgaō inhi ।। 747।।
ēttōpuraō surabhaddaiē ciṭṭhaē samōsariō । sūrī vi bhuvaṇatu gō mama dhammagurū saparivārō || 748 ।।
aha harisavasubhijjata bahalapulaō muṇi paṇamiūṇa । sivakēū jaṁpai sīsanihiyakarasaṁpuḍō ēvaṁ ।। 749।।
bhayavaṁ ! mahāpasāō ēsa kaō ajja majjha tumhahiṁ । jaṁ niyacariyaṁ kannaṁtarammi pakkhittamamayaṁ va ॥ 750 ।।
saṁpai puṇō pasāyaṁ kāūṇa payaccha puvvapaḍivanaṁ । pavvajjaṁ pahu maha savvadukkhasaṁdōhaniddalaṇaṁ ।।751।।
ah bhaṇaī sūrasāhū gurummi saṁtē samīvadēsammi । dāuṁ parassa dikkhā na kappaē amha sayamēva ।।752 ।।
puṇa bhai māhaṇasuō sūramuṇi tēsu tassa vi samīvē । niyaguruṇō maṁ dikkhēi jaha imō kuṇasu taha sigghaṁ ।।753 ।।
tō bhai sūrasāhū jai taṁ niyamāi piusamīvāō। maṁ bhāṇasi jaha ēyaṁ tubbhē dikkhēha maha puttaṁ ।। 754 ।।
tō sikkēū pabhaṇai māi-piṇaṁ ahaṁ asuhagārī । gahiyammi vayammi bhaē bhavissaē tāṇa maṇatuṭṭhī ।।755 ।।
tāmākarēha saṁkaṁ maha māi-piīṇa saṁtiyaṁ tubbhē । dāvēha vayaṁ sigghaṁ karēha mā ēttha vikkhēvaṁ ।। 756 ।।
tō sūramuṇī pabhaṇai piyarāṇaṁ jai tumaṁsi asuhakarō । dāhiṁti jhatti saddaṁ tuha vayagahaṇammi tō tāī ।।757 ।।
tō sivakēū jaṁpai bhayavaṁ jaṁ ki pi āyasaha tumbhē । taṁ ciya majjha pamāṇaṁ iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ muṇi namiuṁ ।।758 ||
niyamaṁdirammi vaccai sūrō vi muṇī samuṭṭhiraṁ tattō । gaṁtu guruṇō sāhai taṁ vr̥ttaṁtaṁ diyasuyassa ।। 759 ।।
tayaṇunnāō pacchā niyakaraṇijjēsu vāvaḍō hōi । vikēū vi sagēhē gaṁtuṇaṁ garuyaviṇaēṇa । । 760 ।।
paṇivaiūṇaṁ ammā-piūṇa calaṇēsu mauliyakaraggō । vinnavai jahā tumbhē aṇujāṇaha maṁ vayaggahaṇē । । 761 ।।
taṁ pabhiti tāī kuvidhāēṁ jahā tumaṁ na yāṇāsi । appāṇaṁ ēmēva ya vayagahaṇamaṇōrahaṁ kuṇasi ।।762 ||
annē cciya tē purisā jēhiṁ vayaṁ kī raē sudhīrēhi । tā ciṭṭhasu tuhikkō ki appāṇaṁ vigōvēsi ? ॥763 ||
sivakēuṇā padmaṇiyaṁ ajja va kallō va tammi samayammi | bhōyaṇamahaṁ karissaṁ jammi tumē maṁ visajjihiha । 764 |
I

sivakēūcariyaṁ
ૐ
25
tō payarēhiṁ avannāē gamiyamē yassa jaṁpiyaṁ ēyaṁ । taṁ diyahaṁ savvaṁ pihu tō sivakēū ṭhiō chuhiō ।।765।।
ataff bhaṇiō piyarēhi bhōyaṇassa karaṇatthaṁ । sivakēū tō jaṁpai jai maṁ muṁcaha vayaṁ gahiu ॥766 ॥
piyarāī tassa mōṇaṁ kāūṇa ṭhināī tō khaṇaṁ ēgaṁ । aha sivakēuṁ pucchaṁti tāī kiṁ ginhasi vayaṁ taṁ ? ।।767 ।।
sō bhai siyavaḍāṇaṁ pāsammi ahaṁ vayaṁ gahissāmi । tappiyarēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kuviēhiṁ taō imaṁ jhati ॥768 ।।
jai marasi chuhāē tumaṁ ēvaṁ ciya saṁṭhiō tahavi amhē । suddāṇa siyavaḍāṇaṁ pāsammi tumaṁ na muṁcāmō ।।769 ।।
as vi tuha natthi lajjā bhaṭṭhassa tahāvi lajjimō amhē । māhaṇakulasaṁbhūyasuddāṇa tumaṁ samappaṁtā ? ।। 770।।
tō pabhaṇai sikkēū mōttūṇaṁ maccharaṁ viyārēha । jai tubbhē tō jāṇaha jamaṁtaraṁ vippa - suddā ||771 ||
tō bhai vissabhūī vikēḍaṁ mukkamaccharā amhē । kāyavvammi viyārē tō diya- sutaraṁ kahasu ।। 772।।
tō sikkēū piyaraṁ pabhaṇai jaṁtāya ! kahasu tāva tumaṁ । baṁbhaṇajāīmēttaṁ tumha pamāṇaṁ kiriyarahiyaṁ ॥ 773।।
kiriyā pamāṇamahavā jai jāī kēvala cciya pahāṇā । tō maṁsāsī surapāṇagō ya gō - itthi vahagō ya ।। 774 ।।
mahaṇajāō puttō tumhāṇaṁ pūryāṇijjapayajuyalō । aha kiriya cciya pujjā tō jāiaggahaṁ muyaha ।। 775।।
kattha viya jattha pāsaha kiriyaṁ taṁ māhaṇaṁ va suddaṁ vā । pūēha bhattisāraṁ kuviappēhiṁ kimannēhiṁ ॥ 776।।
tō bhai vibhūī siyaṁbarēsuṁ na vijjaē kiriyā । vēyajjhayaṇaṁ saṁjjhāē vaṁdaṇaṁ nhāṇa-haṇaṇāi ।। 777।।
tō sikkēū pabhaṇai piyaraṁ jaha jā visā vi tuha kiriyā । kiṁ tāya pūryāṇijjā kiṁ vā dhammēṇa saṁjuttā ? | 778 ।
jai tāva paḍhamapakkhō tō gaṁchaya-chipayā i-payaijaṇō । sanvō vi pr̥thaṇijjō jaṁ sōtri karēi niya kiriyaṁ ।।779 ।।
aha dhammamaī kiriyā tumha mayā na uṇa kiriyamēttaṁ pi । tō paḍhamaṁ ciya dhammō jāṇijjau sēya-pīō vā । 780 ।
dhammammi nicchiyammi satthajjhayaṇāiyaṁ aṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ । paribhāvijjau sacca niuṇamaīē niyamaṇammi ।। 781 ।।
sō jattha jattha jāyai dhammō taṁ taṁ pamāṇamiha savvaṁ । jattha puṇa tassa hāṇī jāyai taṁ nūṇamapamāṇaṁ ।। 782 ॥
dhammō tti nāmamēttaṁ tubbhē jāṇaha na tassa paramatthaṁ । ēmēva paraṁ nidaha ayāṇamāṇā mayavasēṇa ॥ 783 ||
tō vissabhūivippō suyassa vayaṇēhiṁ aipaga bhēhi । sāvaṭṭa bhēhi ya niyamammi saṁkāulō jāō ।। 784 ।।
pabhaṇai puttaṁ amhē jai jāṇāmō na dhammaparamatthaṁ । tā avakkhēhi tumaṁ ciya jō jāṇai pucchiyavvō sō ॥ 785।।
tō sivakēū pabhaṇai suṇēhi akkhēmi dhammasavvassaṁ । jaṁ asthi bhaē nisuyaṁ muṇiṇō nāṇissa pāsamma ।। 786 ॥
ēyaṁ dhammarahassaṁ jaṁ kira hiṁsā asēsajīvāṇaṁ । thūlāṇa ya suhr̥māṇa ya uppāijjai na thēvāvi ॥ 787 ॥
aha vissabhūivippō jaṁpara jaha amha daṁsaṇē vi imā । hiṁsā viṇivārijjai dūraṁ sui sai -purāṇēsu ।। 788 ।।
sivakēū pabhaṇai vārijjai kēvalaṁ ciya vaīē । tumhaṁ mayammi hiṁsā rakkhijjai na uṇa kāraṇa ।। 789 ।।
jaṁ jannēsu pasūṇaṁ kīrai ghāō bahuppayārāṇa । jō kuṇai khaṇadvēṇa ya dāhaṁ sayalassa nayarassa ।। 790 ।।
sō bahujīvakhayakarō tappajjaḍa huyavahō ghayāīhi । taha jīvāṇa sarūvaṁ na najjaē nēya hiṁsāē । । 791 ।।
kavihabhēyā jīvā tēsi kāī va jōṇi ṭhāṇāī । kai iṁdiyāī kē sikēsi vā kēttiyaṁ āuṁ ? ।।792।।
taha kai bhaiyā hiṁsā rakkhijjai kēṇa sā uvāēṇa ? । iccāi sarūvaṁ tumha kiṁci na kahijjaē satyē ।।793 ।।
taṁ ci kaha tubbhē jēṇa havai appaṇō kuṭuṁbassa । ihalōē nivvāhō viulō vāvāravirahē vi ।।794 ।।
dijjaṁti māhaṇāṇaṁ gāmāgara - paṭṭaṇāī pavarāī । dhavalaharāī kārāviūṇa vitthinnatuṁgāī ।। 795 ।।
dhaṇa-dhannasamiddhāī musalukkhala - sila-gharaṭṭapamuhēhiṁ । savvēhiṁ ciracchēhiṁ juyāī sējjāsahi || 796।।
taha vāhaṇāī sējjā-vālaya pamuhāī juttavasahāī । jaccaturaṁgā pallāṇakaviyaāharaṇasaṁjuttā ।।797 ॥
puṇa

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
takkālapasaviṇīō khurāiyāō sukhīragāvīō । juttahalāī takkālakhēttakhaṇaṇakkhamāī ca ।।798 ।।
kappāsa-lōha-tila-dhēṇu-hēmamayagāvi bhūtulā purisā । mayasējjā -bhajjāpabhiiyāiṁ ēvaṁ bhaṇaha tubhē ।।799 ||
luddhēhi dhutēhiṁ parūviyāī imāī dāṇāī । pavinā dhammatthi ēhiṁ mūḍhēhiṁ tāī pi ॥ 800 ।।
ēēsi dinnāṇaṁ dāyārajaṇassa hōu jaṁ kiṁpi । phalamasuhaṁ va suhaṁ vā na tattha ciṁtā vi bhēatthi || 801 ||
niyakajjasiddhicitā ēkkacciya vasaī tumha cittammi । paramatthaō u tumha vina kajjasiddhī tahā asthi । 802 ।
ērisadāṇāī jaō givhaṁtāṇaṁ ca ditayāṇaṁ ca । sōkkhaṁ muhuttamēttaṁ dukkhaṁ tu niraṁtaraṁ puraō ।। 503 ।।
ahaṁ vissabhūivippō savimhaō saṁkiō suyaṁ bhaṇai । litāṇa ya ditāṇa ya khaṇamēttaṁ ci ya suhaṁ hōuṁ || 804 । ।
puraō dōnhaṁ pi niraṁtaraṁ pi uppajjaē mahādukkhaṁ । ēyaṁ jaṁ vayasi tumaṁ viyāriūṇaṁ kahasu taṁ mē ।। 805 ।।
sivakēū āha tāō dhaṇalāhakathaṁ suhaṁ iha bhavammi । ginhaṁtāṇaṁ tucchaṁ saṁpajjai tāya tumhāṇaṁ ||806 ||
udaḍaṁ tu nigguṇēhiṁ jaṁ gahiyaṁ paradhaṇaṁ vimōhēuṁ । tassaṇubhāvēṇa bhavē bhavē ya duhiyā bhavaha tumbhē ।। 807।।
taddāṇadāyagā puṇa tassa'ṇubhāvēṇa parabhavē kipiṁ । pāvāṇubaṁdhipunnappabhāvaō sōkkhamaṇahaviraṁ ||808 ||
dōharasaṁsārahāṇa bhāyaṇaṁ tē havaṁti hu varāyā । tēhi jamasuddhadāṇaṁ dinamasuddhammi pattammi || 809 ||
puṇa vissabhūivippō pucchara puttaṁ jahā tumaṁ vaccha ! । dāṇassaya pattassa ya suddhimasuddhi ca mē kahasu ।। 810 ||
aha sikkēū jaṁpaitaṁ dāṇaṁ hōi tāya ! iha suddhaṁ । jaṁ sayamadukkhiyaṁ na ya jaṇēi dukkhaṁ parassāvi ।। 811 ।।
na kayaṁ na ya kāraviyaṁ jaṁkīraṁtaṁ pi nēya aṇunāyaṁ । maṇa va yā kāēhi taṁ phāsūyamēsaṇijjaṁ ca ॥ 812 ॥
vasahī vatthaṁ pattaṁ kaṁbala - bhēsajja - bhatta-pāṇāī । aisayasuddhaṁ dāṇaṁ ginhaṁtāṇaṁ ca dētāṇaṁ ।। 813 ।।
gō-vasaha - āsapamuhaṁ dāṇaṁ sayamēva khuha - tisāīhiṁ । hōi sadukkhaṁ taha parajaṇassa upāyaē dukkha ॥। 814 ॥
siṁgēhi paṭṭyāhiṁya pahagamaṇē kīḍiyāi malaṇēṇa । carai sacittaṁ hariyaṁ sapūyaraṁ piyai pāṇīyaṁ ।। 815।।
laṁgala bhiīyaṁ puṇa sayaṁ aduhiyaṁ pi kuṇai paradukkhaṁ । bhūphālaṇa- pīsaṇa - kaṁḍaṇēhiṁ nihaṇēi pāṇigaṇaṁ ।। 816 ।।
pattaṁ pihr̥taṁ suddhaṁ jaṁ vajjiyasavvapāvavāvāraṁ । cattagharaghariṇī vihavaṁ virattacittaṁ bhavasuhāō ।। 817 ||
kōhō māṇō māyā lōbhō caurō vi nijjiyā jēṇa । niggahiyāī taha iṁdiyāī paṁca 5i aibalāī ।। 818 ।।
jaṁ savvē vihu jīvē rakkhai niya jīviyaṁ va jattēṇa । suhumaṁ pi aliyavayaṇaṁ na bhaṇai na ya ginhai adinnaṁ । 819 |
pālēi baṁbhacēra saṁjuttaṁ navahiṁ baṁbhaguttīhi । ēvaṁvihamuvaēsaṁ dēi parassa vi jahājōggaṁ ॥। 820 ॥
kahiya guṇāṇaṁ majjhē ēkkō vi guṇō na atthi tumhāṇaṁ । ajja vi ēsa visēsō jaṁ dūsaha paramadōsaṁ pi ।। 826॥
appāṇaṁ tu pasaṁsaha dōsēhiṁ sanniyaṁpi aduraṁ । sēyaṁvarā ya ēē putravatēhi guṇēhiṁ juyā ||822॥
jē uyarassa vi kajjē na karēṁti na kārarkhēti āraṁbhaṁ । ghara-khēttāṇaṁ puṇa ciṭṭhau dūrammi āraṁbhō ॥। 823॥
sakuḍuṁbakaē raddhaṁ annaṁ jaṁ hōi iha gihatthēhi । tammajjhāō thēvaṁ thēvaṁ ginhaṁti tē bhamiuṁ ॥ 824।।
taha attaṇō nimittaṁ parēhiṁ nipphāiyāṇa gahāṇa | majjhāō maggēuṁ kiṁ ci vi gēhaṁ nirābāhaṁ ॥। 825||
nivasati tattha kēttiyamittē vi diṇē mamattaparimukkā । laddhē vi aladdhē vi ya thui akkō sē vi samacittā । 826 ।
ērisyāṇa vi tumbhē ginhaha dōsē avijjamāṇē vi । na muṇaha dōsē garuē vi appaṇō ciṭṭamāṇē vi ।। 827 ।।
iya dōsapasaṁgāō guṇavirahāō diyā na ya supattaṁ । suddhattamasuddhattaṁ iya nēyaṁ dāṇapattāṇa ।। 828 ।।
tō vissabhūi vippō suyassa vayaṇēhiṁ tēhiṁ niuṇēhiṁ । muyai maṇāgaṁ pi mayaṁ maṇammi vimhayaparō tattō ॥ 629|
savisēsajāyasaḍhḍō bhaṇai suyaṁ majjha saṁpayaṁ kahasu । jīvāīṇa sarūvaṁ sivakēū bhai tō piyaraṁ ॥ 830॥

27
jai ēyaṁ jāṇēuṁ tumha samīhā maṇammi vipphurai । tō sūrasāhupāsē maē samaṁ ēha lahu tubbhē । । 831 ।।
jaha nāṇadiṇayarō sō saṁsayatimiraṁ harēi tuha savvaṁ । tō bhaṇai vissabhūī suyaṁ jahā laṁghiō si tumaṁ ।। 832।।
tāki pi bhōyaṇa kuṇa inhi tu maē samaṁ jaha muṇissa । pāsammi tassa jāmō tō piyaraṁ bhaṇai sivakēū । 833 |
paḍhamaṁ pi maē vihiyā tāya painnā imā purā tumha । jaha kira vayagahaṇatthaṁ tumhēhi ahaṁ aṇaṇunāō ।। 834 ||
pāṇīyaṁ mōttūṇaṁ ginhissaṁ nēya sēsamāhāraṁ । tō vissabhūivippō suēṇa saha jāi muni pāsē || 835 ।।
sūra muṇī vi aṇunnaṁ guruṇō gahiuṁ asōyasā hissa । tassēva ahē ciṭṭhai silāniviṭṭhō taha ccēva ।। 836 ।।
tō sivakēuṁ daṭṭha sūramuṇī bhaṇai bhuvaṇatuṁgapahuṁ । paḍhamaṁ ciya gaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ vaṁdaha tō sēsa sāhū ya ।। 837 ।।
sivakēūṇā taha cciya taṁ vayaṇaṁ sūrasāhuṇō vihiyaṁ । thaṁbhiyakāō vva ṭhiō thaddhō uṇa vissabhūidiō | 838 |
pacchā āgaṁtūṇaṁ sūramuṇi vaṁdiūṇa sivakēū । ubaviṭṭhō tassa purō hatthussēhaṁ karēūṇa || 839 ||
uvavisai vissabhūī vi tattha tō jōḍiūṇa karajuyalaṁ । sivakēū bhaṇai muṇi purōhiō ēsa maha jaṇaō । 840।
jīvāīṇa sarūvaṁ tumha samīvammi vaṁchaē nāuṁ । tō gaṁbhīrasarēṇaṁ sūramuṇī kahiumāḍhatō ।। 841 ।।
aivittharēṇa mahayā jīvāisarūvamaggaō tassa । jīvāiṇō payatthā ihakahiyā nava jiṇidēhi ||842 ||
jīvā - jīvā punnaṁ pāvā-sava-saṁvarā ya nijjaraṇā । baṁdhō mōkkhō ya imē vinnāyavvā nava payatthā || 843 ॥
iga-du-
du-ti-cau-paṁcidiya-bhēyā jīvā u tattha paṁcavihā । paḍhamamiha bēmi iṁdiyanāmā giramāṇavisayāī ।। 844॥
phāsaṁ rasaṇaṁ ghāṇaṁ cakkhū sōyaṁ ca hōṁti nāmāī । davvidiya bhāviṁdīyabhēyā duvihaṁ tamēkkkaṁ ||845।।
nivvittī uvagaraṇaṁ ubhayaṁ davidiyaṁ muṇēyavvaṁ । bahiaṁtō bhēēṇaṁ nivvīttī vihu duhā nēyā ॥ 846 ।।
hi nivvittī sōiṁdriyassa jaha kanna - sakkulī pamuhā । taha cakkhuppabhiīṇa vinivvittī niyaniyā nēyā ॥ 847 |
aṁtōnivvittī puṇa kēvali diṭṭhā aiṁdiyā nēyā । sōiṁdiyassa ēsā kathaṁ va kusumāgiī hōi || 84 8 ||
cakkhussa masūrasamā ghāṇassa aimuttakusumasāricchā । rasaṇidiyassa aṁtō nivvittī puṇa khuruppasamā ।। 849 ।।
nāṇāgāraṁ phāsidiyaṁ tu vāhallaō ya savvāī । aṁgula asaṁkhabhāgaṁ ēmēva puhattaō navaraṁ ।। 850 ।।
aṁgulapuhattarasaṇaṁ phārasaṁ tu sarīravitthaḍaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । uvagaraṇaṁ puṇa niyaniya visayaggahaṇammi sāmatthaṁ ।। 51 ।।
jaha chēyasatti asiṇō jalaṇassa va ḍahaṇasatti taha ēyaṁ । laddhī taha uvaōgō ubhayaṁ bhāvidiyaṁ nēyaṁ ।। 852 ॥
kammakhaōvasamō laddhī taggayacittattaṇaṁ tu uvaōgō । jōyaṇabārasagāō saddaṁ sōiṁdiyaṁ suṇai ||853 ॥
rūvaṁ pāsai cakkhu jōyaṇalakkhāō sāirēgāō । gaṁdhaṁ rasaṁ ca phāsaṁ jōyaṇanavagāō sēsāī ।। 854 ।।
ginhaṁti jahantrēṇaṁ savisyamaṁgulaasaṁkhabhāgāō । cauiṁdiyāī cakkhū puṇa aṁgulasaṁkhabhāgāō ।। 855 ।।
ēgidiyamma phāsaṁ biiṁdiē taṁ duijjayaṁ rasaṇaṁ । tēiṁdiyammi taiyaṁ nāyavvaṁ hōi ghāṇaṁ tu ॥ 856 ॥
uridiē utthaṁ cakkhū paṁcidiyammi paṁcamayaṁ । nāyavvaṁ sō sōiṁdiyaminhi iṁdiyapahū vōcchaṁ ।। 857 ।।
puḍhavī- jala-jalaṇā - nila-taruṇī ēgiṁdiyā muṇēyavvā । kimi saṁkha - jalūgā -lasa- māivahāī ya bēhaṁdī || 858 ॥
kuṁthu - pivilīya- pisuyā- jyā uddēhiyā ya tēiṁdī | macchaya - masaga payaṁgā - viccaya- bhamarāi cariṁdī ।। 859 ।।
paṁcidiyā ya nāraya- tiriya- maṇussā - marēhiṁ caubhēyā । rayaṇappabhāi bhēyā sattavihā tattha nēraiyā ॥। 860 ।।
rayaṇappaha-sakkarapaha-vāluyapaha-paṁka - dhūmapahanāmā । chuṭṭī tamappā tamatamapahā sattamī puḍhavī ||861 ॥
thalayara-jalayara- nahayarabhēyā tivihā havaṁti tēricchā । tattha gilōiya - mūsaga - gō-mahisāī ya thalacārī |862।
kacchava-macchā mayarā iccāī jalayarā bahupayārā । haṁsa valāyā - sārasa suya-sāriyapamuhanahacārī ॥। 863 ॥

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
narativihakammabhūmi ya akammabhūmī ya aṁtaraddīvā । bhavaṇa-vaṁtara jōi vēmāṇiyā bhēyā cauvihā dēvā ||864 ॥
asurā nāgā vijjū suvanna - aggīya - vāu thaṇiyā ya । udahī dīvadisāviya dasa bhēyā bhavaṇavāsīṇaṁ । । 865 ।।
bhūya - pisāyā jakkhā ya rakkhasā kinnarā ya ki purisā । mahōragā ya gaṁdhavvā aṭṭhavihā vāṇamaṁtariyā || 866 ||
caṁdā taha āiccā gahā cautthāya hōṁti nakkhattā । tārā jōisiyā iya paṁcavihā hōṁti nāyavvā ॥। 867 ||
kappōvaga- kappāigabhēyā vaimāṇiyā bhavē duvihā । kappōvagabārasahā kappāiga hōṁti duvi bhēyā ।।868 ।।
sōhammīsāṇa saṇakumāra māhida - baṁbhalaṁtagayā । sukka sahassārāṇaya- pāṇaya taha āraṇaccuyayā । । 869 ।।
iya kappōvaga bārasa - gēvējjaaṇutarā duhā iyarē । gēvējja tattha tivihā hēṭṭima - majjhimuvarimabhēyā ॥। 870 ।।
pattēyamitivihā hēmihēṭṭimagamā ibhēēṇa । hēṭṭhimahēṭṭima 1 hēṭṭimamajjhimagaṁ 2 hēṭṭimōvarimaṁ 3 || 871 ।।
majjhimaṭṭima majjhimama jjhimagaṁ majjhimōvarimagaṁ ca । uvarimahēṭṭhima uvarimamajjhimagaṁ uvarimōvarimaṁ । 872 |
vijayaṁ ca vējayaṁta jayaṁtamaparājiyaṁ ca savva । ēvaṁ vimāṇabhēyā aṇuttarā hōṁti paṁcavihā ||873 ||
puḍhavi dagāgaṇimāsya ēkkēkkē sattajōṇilakkhāō । vaṇapattēya-aṇatē dasa-cōṭsa jōṇi- lakkhāō ||874 ||
bi-ti- cauridisu dō dō caurō caurō ya nāraya-surēsu । tiriēsu hōṁti caurō cōṭsa- lakkhā ya maṇuēsu । 875 ॥
iya puḍhavikāiyāī paṁcāṇuttarasurāvasāṇāṇaṁ । savvēsi jīvāṇaṁ culasīī jōṇilakkhāī ||876 ॥
saṁjāyai ēgidiya-nēraiya-surāṇa saṁbuḍā jōṇī । vigiliṁdiyāṇa viyaḍā ganbhabhavāṇaṁ ubhayarūvā ।। 877।।
suranārayāṇa jōṇī hōi acittā vi mīsiyā gabbha । sēsāṇa tihā jōṇī sīōsiṇā nāraya- surāṇa || 878 ।।
taha bhayāṇa kā usiṇā tihā u sēsāṇaṁ । maṇuyā paṇiditiriyā ganbhayasēsā aganbhabhavā ।। 879 ।।
bārasa- satta tisattaya-sattaṭṭaya nava ya aṭuvīsa va । kulakōḍilakkhabhū-jala - jalaṇā - nilavigalahariyāṇaṁ ॥ 580 ॥
addhattērasa - bārasa-dasa-dasa ya navaṭṭa-vīsa - paṇuvīsā - jalayara - pakkhi cauppaya ura- bhuyacara - dēva - nirayāṇaṁ ॥ 581 ॥
ura-bhuyacara-
kulakō ḍilakkhabārasanarāṇa kulakōḍi savva ēgattē । ēgā kōḍī sattāṇavaī lakkhāī saḍḍhāī | 882 ॥
puḍhavī- jala jalaṇā - nilasarīramaṁgulaasaṁkhabhāgamiyaṁ । jōyaṇasahassama hiyaṁ vaṇassaīṇaṁ havai dēhaṁ ॥ 283॥
sāmanē 'ēyaṁ ēttha iyāṇi tu bhannai visēsō । vaṇassaikāō duvihō pattēya - anaṁtabhēṇa ॥। 884।।
tattha ya anaṁtakāiyasarīramaṁgula asaṁkhatamabhāgē । taha vāukāiyāṇa vi tēttiya mēttaṁ ciya sarīraṁ ॥ 885 ॥
tattō asaṁkhaguṇiyaṁ tēusarīraṁ taō asaṁkhaguṇaṁ । dagadēhaṁ tattō vi ya asaṁkhaguṇiyaṁ puḍhavidēhaṁ | | 886 | |
jōyaṇasahassamahiyaṁ pattēyavaṇassaīṇa vinēyaṁ । taṁ ca samudāisuvallikamalanālā ināyavvaṁ । 887।।
saṁkhāīṇaṁ bēiṁdiyāṇa bārasa u jōyaṇā dēhaṁ । maṁkōḍyāitēiṁdiyāṇa kōsattiyaṁ dēhaṁ ॥88॥
bhamarāiṇaṁ cauriṁdiyāṇa dēhaṁ tu jōyaṇapamāṇaṁ । paṁcidiēsu nārayadēhaṁ paḍhamāē puḍhavīē | 889 ॥
satta- dhaṇu tinnirayaṇī cha aṁgulā duguṇaduguṇamēyaṁ pi । sēsapuḍhavīsu nēyaṁ jā paṁcadhaṇussayā aṁta ।। 890 ।।
tiriēsu thalayarēsuṁ uragā jōyaṇasahassadī hataṇū । ii ganbhayāṇa māṇaṁ iyarāṇaṁ jōyaṇapuhataṁ ॥ 891 ।।
gabbhayacauppayāṇaṁ chagāuyāiṁ sakīraparimāṇaṁ । sammucchimāṇa tēsi taṁ jāyai gāuyapuhattaṁ ।। 892
jalacārisu macchāṇaṁ sammucchima gabbhayāṇa ya sarīraṁ । jōyaṇa sahassamāṇaṁ pakkhisu dōsu vi dhaṇu
puhataṁ ।। 893 ।।
kammā - kammamahīsuṁ ukkōsēṇaṁ tigāuyā maṇuyā । gabbhabhavā aṁtaradīvayāu aḍadhaṇusayā yāmā ||894 ||
sammucchimamaṇuyāṇaṁ sarīramaṁgulaasaṁkhatamabhāgē । tē gavbhayamaṇuyāṇaṁ sōṇiya - sukkāisu havaṁti ।। 895 ।।

sivakēūcariyaṁ
29
bhavaṇavai-vāṇamaṁtara - jōisiyasurāṇa hōi savvēsi । rayaṇīō sattataṇū sōhammīsāṇayāṇaṁ pi ।। 896 ॥
ēkkē kahāṇi sēsē dudugē ya dugē caukkaē cēva । gēvējjē rayaṇidugaṁ aṇuttarā ēvaṁ śvaṇitaṇū ।। 897 ।।
bāvīsasattatinniya dasavāsasahassa hōi paramaṭhiī। bhū-jala - vāu vaṇāṇaṁ jalaṇassa u tinni'hōratā ।। 898 ।।
puḍhavāīyā paṁca vi suhamā vi havaṁti savvalōyagayā । aṁtamuhuttaṭhiīyā aṁgula assaṁkhabhāgataṇū ।। 899 ।।
ēsu vaṇassaikāō anaṁtaō cēva na uṇa pattēō । vāhijjēti na kēṇai na vāhagā kassa vi imē vi ।। 900 ।।
vāsā bārasaauṇā pana ahōrattamāsachakkaṁ ca । bi-ti cāuridiya āuṁ saṁkhāisu vāsabārasagaṁ ॥ 909 ॥
paṁcidiē rayaṇāipuḍhavinēraiyaṭhiikamāayarā । ēgaṁ ti satta - dasa - sattarē va bāvīsa-tēttīsā ।। 902 ।।
bīyāipuḍhavichakkē mōttuṁ tēttīsa sā jahannaṭhiī । dasavāsasahassāiṁ jahannaṭhis hōi rathaṇāē ।। 903 । ।
tiriēsu balayarēsuṁ gabbhugbhavacaupayāṇa paliyatigaṁ । sammucchrimāṇa culasīvāsa sahassā ṭhiī tēsi ॥ 904 ॥
gabbhayauragāṇaṁ puvvakōḍisammucchimāṇa tēvanaṁ । vāsasahassā gavbhayabhuyagāṇa vi putrvakōḍī u ॥ 905।।
sammucchimāṇa tēsiṁ vāsasahassā havaṁti vāyālā । macchāijalayarāṇaṁ ubhayāṇa vi puvvakōḍīō ।। 906 ॥
bhayapakkhi paliyā saṁkhavibhāgō samucchi mēsu puṇō । tēsu ṭhiī bāvattarivāsasahassā muṇēyavvā ।। 907 ।।
kammā - kammagamaṇuyā tipaliyaṭhaiṇō u aṁtaraddīvē । paliyā saṁkhaṁ saṭhiī aṁtamuhuttā samucchimagā ।।908 ।।
bhavaṇavaīṇaṁ sāgaramabbhahiyaṁ hōi vaṇayarāṇaṁ tu । paliyaṁ ṭhii dōnha vi dasavāsasahassā jahannaṭhiī ।। 909॥
jōisasurāṇa paliyaṁ savāsalakkhaṁ tu paliya aḍabhāgō । tēsi pi jahannaṭhiī vimāṇavāsīṇa tēttīsaṁ । । 910 ।।
ayarā ukkōsaṭhiī jahannapaliyaṁ imaṁ tu ōhēṇa । bhaṇiyaṁ bhavaṇāīyaṇaṁ inhi tu visēsaō vōcchaṁ ।। 911 ।।
camarassa ṭhiī ayaraṁ baliṇō taṁ ahiyamuragapabhiīṇaṁ । jammāṇa saḍḍhapaliyaṁ ūṇamuīṇāṇa paliyadugaṁ ।। 912 ॥
addha addhapaṁcamapaliyāī camara-baliviṇa ṭhiī | navanāgāvaṇaṁ paliyaddhaṁ dāhiṇillāṇaṁ ।। 913 ।।
dēsūṇamuīṇāṇaṁ paliyaṁ aha vaṁtarīṇa paliyaddhaṁ । caṁdāṇa ṭhiī paliyaṁ savāsalakkhaṁ ravīṇaṁ tu ॥ 914 ॥
paliyaṁ vāsasahassa'bhahiyaṁ paliyaṁ gahāṇa ēgaṁ tu । nakkhattāṇa tayaddhaṁ caubhāgō tāragāṇaṁ tu
caṁdāīṇa cauṇhaṁ jahannaṭhi hōi paliyacaubhāgō । tārāṇa aṭṭabhāgō dēvīṇa ṭhiī aō vōcchaṁ
paliyaddhamaddhalakkhaṁ vāsāṇa ṭhiī mayaṁkadēvīṇaṁ । vāsasyapaṇagasahiyaṁ paliyaddhaṁ bhāṇudēvīṇaṁ ।। 917 ।।
paliddha maṇūṇa'hiyaṁ gahadēvīṇaṁ cautthaabhāgā । ahiyā ukkōsaṭhiī dēvīṇaṁ rikkha-tārāṇaṁ ।। 998 ।।
cau caṁdāivahūṇaṁ jahannaṭhii hōi paliyaca bhāgō । tāragadēvīṇaṁ puṇa nēō paliyaṭṭabhāgō u ।।919।।
dō 1 sāhira satta 3 sāhī 4 daha5 cōisa6 sattarē va 7 ayarāī । sōhammā jā sukkō taduvari ēkkēkka mārōvē । 920 ।
jāvuvarimagēvējjē igatīsaṁ sāgarāī paramaṭhiī । vijayāisu igatīsaṁ jahannaukkōsatēttīsaṁ ।। 921 ।।
savvaṭṭammi vimāṇē tēttīsa cēva sāgarāī ṭhiī । ajahanaaṇukkōsā sēsajahannaṭhiraṁ vōcchaṁ ।। 922 ।।
paliyaṁ 1 ahiyaṁ2 dō ayara3 sāhiyā 4 satta5 dasaya 6 laṁtagaē । ēkkēkkavuḍhisēsē jātīsaṁ navamagēvējjē ।। 923 ।
sammucchimatiriyapaṇidiyā vi amaṇāmanussa tiriyāō । gabbhayathī - puma- apumā surathī - pumasēsa a pumāō । 924 ।
iya ēgidiyamāījīvā paṁcidiyāvasāṇā ya । savvē vi sabhēyajuyā hōṁti pajattā ya apajattā ।। 925।।
sammucchima mayā puṇa apajattā cēva tē viṇassaṁti । pajjattī iha sattī tāhiṁ juyā hōṁti pajjattā ।। 926 ॥
āhāra 1sarī ri2 diyapajjattī 3 āṇupāṇu4 bhāsa 5 maṇē6 । cattāripaṁcachappiyaēgidiya - vigala sannīṇaṁ ।। 927।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
dhammādhammāgāsā puggala - kālō ya paṁca vi ajīvā । paḍhamacauatthikāyā puggalarūvī na uṇa sēsā ।। 928 ।।
dhammō carācarāṇaṁ davvāṇaṁ gai uvaggahaṁ kuṇai । ṭhāṇōvaggahakārī tēsi mahammatthi kāō u ।। 929।।
āgāi rarrete dāyagaṁ taṁ anaṁtayaṁ nēyaṁ । dhammādhammā dōnni vi lōgāgāsappamāṇā u ।। 930 ।।
vana-rasa-gaṁdha-sadda - phāsāṇaṁ jīviyasa maraṇassa । nīsāsūsāsāṇaṁ chāyāyava - suha- duhāīṇaṁ ॥931॥
iṁdiyafgajjhaṁ jaṁ kiṁ pivattha annaṁ pi atthi saṁsārē । savvassa tassuvaggahajaṇagā pōggalamayakkhaṁdhā ।। 932 ।।
kālō samayāiaṇēya bhēya bhinnō manussakhēttagaō । cōisarajjupamāṇammi puggalā savvalōmmi ।। 933॥
khaṁdhā dēsapaēsā iyatiti bhēyā havaṁti padama tiē । paramāṇu tti cautthō bhēō puṇa pōggalāṇa bhavē ।। 934 ।।
samaya sarūvō kālō ēvamajīvā havaṁti cōhasahā । nāṇāvaraṇaṁ daṁsaṇaāvaraṇaṁ vēyaṇīyaṁ ca ।। 935 ।।
taha mōhaṇijjamāuṁ nāmaṁ gōyaṁ ca aṁtarāyaṁ ca । kammassa aṭṭha vi imā mūlappayaḍīō nāyavvā ।। 936।।
paṁca-nava-dōnni chavīsa- caura iga sattari dōnni-paṁcēva । mūlapayaḍīṇa uttarapayaḍīō imāō jaha saṁkhaṁ ।। 937।।
ēyāsi majjhāō nēyāō puna - pāvapayaḍīō । sāyaṁ uccāgōyaṁ suranaragaīāṇupuvvidugaṁ ।। 938 ।।
taha paṁciyajāīpaṁcasarīrāī aṁguvaṁgatigaṁ । saṁghayaṇaṁ saṁṭhāṇaṁ dōnni vi ēyāī paḍhamāī ।। 939 ।।
vanna-rasa-gaṁdha-phāsā pavarā taha agurulahaparādhāyaṁ । ūsāsā''yavaujjōya sōhaṇā taha vihāyagaī । । 940 ॥
tasavāya paṁjjattaṁ pattēyathiraṁ subhaṁ ca subhagaṁ ca । sussaraāējjajasaṁ titthayaraṁ caiva nimmāṇaṁ || 941 ।।
tinniya āūṇi tahā bāyālaṁ hōṁti punnapayaḍīō । mai - suyaōhī - maṇapajjavēya- kēvalanāṇapaṇagassa ।। 942 ।।
āvaraṇāī paṁca niddāu paṁca cakkhu accakkhu । ōhī kēvalamēsi daṁsaṇacaugassa āvaraṇaṁ ||943॥
taha asuhavēyaṇīyaṁ kōhō māṇō ya māya lōbhō ya । caurō imē kasāyā pattēyaṁ hōṁti caubhēyā || 944 ||
padama anaṁtāṇabaṁdhī apaccakkhāṇā ya paccakhāṇassa । āvaraṇā saṁjalaṇā ēvaṁ sōlasa imē hōṁti ।। 945 ।।
hāsa - rai- arai- sōgā-bhayaṁ dugaṁchā ya hōi chakkamiṇaṁ । itthī - purisa - napuṁsagavēyā tinnēva micchattaṁ ।। 946।।
chavvīsaṁ payaḍīō mōhassa imāō narayaāuṁ ca । narayagaī tiriyagaī tayāṇuputrīdugaṁ cēva ।। 947॥
ēgiṁ diyā jāīcaugaṁ saṁghayaṇamusahanārāya । nārāyamaddhanārāyakhīliyā taha ya chēvaṭṭha ||948 ||
saṁṭhāṇaṁ puṇa naggōhamaṁḍalaṁ sāivāmaṇaṁ khujjaṁ । huṁḍaṁ paṁcama - masuhā vanna rasā-gaṁdha-phāsā ya ।। 949।।
vadhāvihāya ahā taha thāvaraṁ ca suhamaṁ ca । apajattaṁ sāhāraṇamathiraṁ asubhaṁ ca dubhagaṁ ca ।। 950 ।।
dūsaramaṇaējjaṁ ajasakittināmaṁ ca nīyagōyaṁ ca । aha dāṇa- lābha-bhōgō-vabhōgaviriyaṁtarāyaṁ ca ।। 951 ।।
iya savvāō imāō bāsīi hōṁti pāvapayaḍīō | iṁdiyapaṁca kasāyā - cau pāṇavahō musāvāō ।। 952 ।।
adinnagrahaṇa mēhuṇapariggahākāiyā 1 higaraṇīyā 2 । pāōsiya 3 pariyāvaṇi4 pāṇaivāīya5 āraṁbhī6 ।। 953 ।।
parigaha 7 māyāvattiya micchatta9 āpaccakhāṇa 10 diṭṭhī ya11 । puṭṭiya 12 taha pāḍucciya 13
8
sāhatthiya 16 āṇavaṇī 17 viyāraṇī 18 aṇavakakha19
samaṁtu ṇivāi 14 nēsatthī 15 ।। 954 ।।
aṇabhōgā 20 । pauga21 samudāṇa22 pēmā 23
dōsā 24 kiriyā iriyavahiyā 25 ।। 955 ।।
iya paṇuvīsaṁ kiriyā tinni ya jōgā ya maṇa vayaṇa kāyā । iya bāyālīsavihō kammāṇaṁ āsavō hōi ।। 956 ।।
sami5 guttī 3 dhammō 10 aṇupēha 12 parī sahā 22 caritaṁ ca5 । sattāvannaṁ bhēyā paṇatiya bhēyāisaṁvaraṇē ।। 957 ।।
aṇasaṇabhēyāitavō bārasahā tēṇa nijjarā hōi । kaṇagāvalibhēyā vā ahava tavō'ṇēgahā bhaṇiō ।। 958 ।।

micchattāihēū sattāvannaṁ caurabhēyaṁ ।। 959।।
payaiṭiīaṇubhāgappaēsabhēyā cauvvihō baṁdhō
baṁdhō ।
mōkkhō kammābhāvō saṁtapayāīhiṁ navahiṁ dārēhiṁ । khēttāibhēyaō vā īhasiddhasarūvamavagammaṁ ।। 960 ।।
iya jīvāisarūvē muṇiṇā savvammi savitrē kahiē । sō samahigayatayatthō pucchai hiṁsāsarūvaṁ taṁ । । 961।।
tō kahai muṇī hiṁsā tivihā savvaṇṇuṇā samakkhāyā । pāṇaviṇāsō dukkhuppāthaṇa maha saṁkilasō ya ।। 962 ।।
iccāisarūvaṁ savittharaṁ sāhaē muṇī tassa । taṁ sōuṁ paḍibuddhō purōhiō vissabhūīvi ।। 963 ।।
duvālasa
paḍavajjai sammattaṁ namiūṇaṁ sūrasāhucaraṇēsu । sāvayavayāī ginhai tassa samīvē
vi ।। 964 ।।
tō uṭṭiūṇa pacchā vaṁdai siribhuvaṇatuṁgamuṇināhaṁ । sēsē vi savvasāhū tēṇa samaṁ sūrasāha vi ।। 965 ।।
gaṁtūṇa bhuvaṇatuṁgassa sūriṇō caraṇasannihāṇammi । uvavisa taha kahēi ya tassa sarūvaṁ purō guruṇō ।। 966।।
aha vibhūivippō mauliyapāṇī muṇīsaraṁ bhaṇai । jaha ēsa majjha puttō sivakēū amha uvavārī ||967 ||
tumha payapaupāsē āṇīyā jēṇa ajja iha amhē | saṁpattā jiṇadhammaṁ ihaparalōē ya suhajaṇayaṁ ॥ 968 ॥
ēyassa vi uvayārō airēṇa maē vi tō vihēyavvō । maṇavaṁchiyapavvajjāgahaṇē sāhējja karaṇēṇa ।। 969 ।।
paramattā amhē maṇimā lamahīvaissa sō jamhā gurubuddhīē pāsai sayāvi maṁ subahuviṇaēṇa ।। 970 ।।
jai tassa akahiūṇaṁ ēsō gāhijjaē vayaṁ kaha vi । tō nāyammi nariṁdō kuppai amhuvariniyamēṇa ।।971 ॥
uttamavanō tti imaṁ pūēmi ahaṁ imō vi suhāṇaṁ । puttaṁ niyaṁ samappai iya ēvaṁ citiūṇaṁ maṇē । । 972 ।।
as amhaṁ vi kuppai rāyā kuppau sahijjaē ēvaṁ । tumhaṁ ni kaha vi kuppai jai ēsa taō mahāṇatthō ।। 973 ।।
tō taṁ saṁbōhēuṁ dikkhaṁ ēyassa dāvaissāmi । taṁ āha taō sūrī iha kajjē pā vilaṁbēha ||974 ||
thōvaṁ ciya jaṁ āuṁ ēyassa suyassa tujjha tō vippō । sūri pucchai jīviyaparimāṇamimasta sāhēha ।। 975 ।।
sāhēi taō sūrī bāvīsadiṇāṇi āuyabhimassa । tō vissabhūivippō bhai jahā paccaō amha || 976।।
tumha vayaṇammi sammaṁ karissaē saṁsayaṁ puṇa nariṁdō । kahiē vi imammi taō tappaccayahēumannaṁ pi ।। 977 ।।
sāhēha kiṁpi tassa vi uppajjai paccaō jahā sigdhaṁ । tō kahiyaṁ sūrīhi tumha gayāṇaṁ nivasamīvē ।।978 ।।
inhi khaṇaṁtarēṇa sēṇāvai pēsiō narō ēhī । gahiūṇa tassa lēhaṁ kahaṇatthaṁ vijayavattāṇa ।। 979 ।।
maggami avīsaṁtō sō ēsai tuṭṭidāṇalātthaṁ । lēhaṁ samappiūṇaṁ rannō aha sō parissamaō ।। 980 ।।
takkālē vimarisai iya sōuṁ sō purōhiō jhatti । namiūṇa saparivāraṁ sūri sivakēuṇā sahiō ।। 981 ।।
gaṁtuṁ ranō sāhai imamaṭṭhē sō vi vimyapavannō । pucchara purōhiyaṁ taṁ kajjēṇaṁ kēṇa tattha tumaṁ ।। 982 ॥
ajja ōsi samīvē tēsi sēyaṁvarāṇa suyasahiō । tō tēṇa pasaṁgēṇaṁ jahaṭṭhiyaṁ kahai sō rannō ।।983॥
ēyaṁ kahiūṇa purōhiyammi mōṇēṇa saṁṭhiē saṁtē । vipannacittē ciṭṭhatē tahaya naranāhē ||984 ।।
vinnava dāravālō āgaṁtuṁ naravarassa paṇamēuṁ । raṇasīhadaṁḍavaiṇō ciṭṭhai lēhahāraō dārē ।। 985।।
tō visvayaṇaṁ hasiūṇa palōiyaṁ nariṁdēṇa । bhaṇiō ya dāravālō jhatti pavēsēha taṁ purisaṁ ॥ 986 ॥
tō dāravālamukkō āgaṁtuṁ lēhahāraō rannō । namiūṇa ōṭṭiyāē kaḍḍhēuṁ appaē lēhaṁ ॥ 987 ॥
sāsāuriyahiyaō pacchā hōūṇa jhatti puhaiē । paḍiō mukkō ya tahā sahasa cciya jīviyavvēṇa ।। 988 ।।
tō taṁ samīvavattī uṭhēūṇaṁ jaṇō samāḍhattō । saṁvāhēuṁ aṁgē tō rannā vāriō ēvaṁ ।। 989 ।।
jaha ēsō gayajīō uppāḍēuṁ purassa bāhimmi । nēūṇa ḍahaha ēvaṁ nivalōō kuṇai tō ēvaṁ ॥ 990 ॥
maṇimālī va nariṁdō taṁ lēhaṁ vāiūṇa saṁyamēva । parituṭṭhō jhatti maṇē riuvijaya sarūva'vagamēṇa । 991 ।।

32
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
00
taha sūritāpaccaya saṁjaṇiyavisēsa garuyapariōsō । sahasā samuṭṭiūṇaṁ sahaparivārēṇa saṁcaliō ।। 992 ।।
sa purōhiō vipattō pāsē siribhuvaṇatuṁga muṇivaṇō । taṁ paṇabhiūṇa saṁviṇayamuciyadvāṇammi uvaviṭṭhō । 993 ।
sūrī va tassa sāhai navapāusa mēhagahiraghōsēṇa । dhammaṁ jiṇappaṇīyaṁ jīvāṇa suhakka saṁjaṇayaṁ । । 994 ।।
nāraya- tiriya - narāmarabhēyami bhavē paribhamaṁtāṇa | jīvāṇa natthi annō dhammaṁ mōttūṇa susahāō ।। 995 ।।
dhammapabhāvēṇa jaō laddhē maṇuyattaṇē samāṇē vi । kē vi vilasaṁti viulaṁ lacchi suralōyasāricchaṁ ।। 996 ।।
annē u akayapunnā parihavaṇijjā havaṁti iyarāṇa । tahaya aṇukaṁpaṇijjā laddhavivēyāṇa kēsi pi ॥ 997 ॥
amaravimāṇāgārē kē vi agārē maṇunnaē gōrē । nivasaṁti avisālē dhavalē dhuvvatadhayamālē ।। 998 ॥
anē sachiddakaḍē purāṇataṇachannasaṁkaḍakuḍīrē । kōlaviladhūlibahulē vasaṁti sīyāyavō vahayā ।। 999॥
ēgē hariṇacchīhi hariṇakamuhīhiṁ pīvarathaṇīhi । pihulaniyabāhi kisōyarīhiṁ raisuhamaṇuhavaṁti ॥ 1000 ॥
annē duvvannakurūbakuṁṭakāṇēṇa saha kalattēṇa । kalahaṁtā niyakālaṁ garmēti aiduvviṇīēṇa ।। 1001 |
ēgē niyadēhacchavi pariṇijjiyajaccakaṁcaṇacchāyā । laṁghiyamayaraddhayarūva ridviṇō nayaṇasuhajaṇayā ॥ 1002 ॥
annē thālī budhayasamapannā buṭṭaṭapparakkannā । diṭṭā utrēyakarā savvakurūvāṇa diṭṭhatā ।। 1003 ।।
ēgē ya dēvasō vamavimalaniyattharuiravaravatthā । anē racchānivaḍiyakappaḍapacchāiyakaḍīyā ॥। 1004 ।।
ēgē bhāsurarayaṇāharaṇōhavibhūsiyaṁguvaṁgō ya । annēsi na saṁpajjai karaṁgulī lōharakkhā vi ।। 1005।।
ēgē galaṁtamayajalakavōlavarahatthibaṁdhamārūḍhā । dhariyadhavalāyavattā calati calacāmaruppīlā || 1006 ।।
annē parassa puraō paēhiṁ aṇuvāṇahā pahāvaṁti । tivvāyavataviyasirā savvaṁgagalaṁta sēyajalā || 1007।।
kēsi pi savaṇavivaraṁ jayaāisajīvanaṁdamāīhi । sahēhiṁ suṁdarēhiṁ pīṇijjai sēvayajaṇēhiṁ ॥। 1008 ||
anēsi nisiyamahāsūī muhatōmaraggatikkhēhiṁ । dūmijjai suidivaraṁ duvvayaṇasaēhiṁ lōēṇa ।। 1009॥
navaṇīyatū kōmalaphāsē tūlītalē visālammi | saṁvāhiyā parēhiṁ ēgē nidaṁ aṇuhavaṁti ॥ 1010 ॥
niṣṇunnayammi annē kēvalamēiṇiyalē nirāvaraṇā । parighaṭṭapadvipāsā kuṇati nihaṁ nirāṇaṁdā || 1011 ।।
ēya ēvamāi jaṁ jaṁ saṁpajjai kiṁ pi cāruiyaraṁ vā । jīvāṇa muṇaha taṁ taṁ dhammāhammapphalaṁ sayalaṁ ।। 1012 |
iya nāūṇaṁ naravara ! suhamūlē ujjamaṁ kuṇaha dhammē । savvāhamūlaṁ puṇa pāvaṁ pariharaha dūrēṇa ।। 1013।।
sō dhammō gahiyavvō vīmaṁsēūṇa nimmalamaīē । annaha puṇa tamhaṇē paḍijjaē kūḍadhammammi || 1014 |
jaha aparikkhiyadammē kūḍē gahiē narō vaṇiyahaṭṭē । na lahai kiṁ ci vi kūḍāraō tti baṁdhijjaē rannā ।। 1015 ।।
taha kūḍadhammagahaṇē naragāisu tikkhadukkhalakkhāī। visahatā kālamaṇatamiha bhavē paribhamaṁti jiyā ।। 1016।।
kasa-tāvacchēēhiṁ kī rai kaṇayassa jaha kira parikkhā | āgama- dēva - gurūhi parikkhiyakō tahā dhammō || 1017 ।।
bāyara - suhamajiyāṇaṁ hiṁsā - liyavayaṇa - cōriyā surayaṁ । dhaṇasaṁgō paṁcanha vi āsavadāraṇa ēyāṇa || 10 511
nisibhōyaṇadvāṇaṁ tivihaṁ tiviṇa jāva jīvaṁ pi । jattha kahijjai cāō sa āgamō jēṇa sō kahiō ।। 1019 ।।
sō dēvō puvvattāgamabhaṇiyaṁ muṇai saddahai jō u । kuṇai sayamuvaisēi ya parassa ēsō gurū nēō ।। 1020 ।।
ēsōti ṭhāṇasuddha dhammō suhr̥dāyagō u iccāī । suṇiūṇaṁ naranāhō paribuddhō sāvaō jāō ।।1021।।
tattō nikkhamaṇamahaṁ karēi vikēṇō vibhūīē । vinnavai tahā sūri jā jīvai ēsa sivakēū ।। 1022।।
tā tumbhēhi ihēva ya ṭhāyavvaṁ nayarabāhirujjāṇē । sūrīhiṁ vi paḍivannaṁ tahatti taṁ nivaiṇō vayaṇaṁ ॥। 1023॥
।।

kubēradattacariyaṁ
33
aha tēhi tassa dikhā dinnā sivakēuṇō diyavarassa । sikkhaviō jaikiriyaṁ sō pacchā pāḍhiō ki pi
aha sō sikkēū khaṁtipamuhr̥dasavihasu sāhudhammajuō | paṁcasamiō tiguttō jāō sāhr̥jahuttaguṇō ।।1025।।
rāyā vi paidiṇaṁ ciya gaṁtuṁ sapurōhiō sa parivārō । vaṁdai sūri sūrāimuṇijuyaṁ sasivakēḍaṁ ca ।। 1026 ।।
sō vi sikkē sāhū nāūṇaṁ niyayamāuyaṁ thōvaṁ । kuṇai viṇayaṁ muṇīṇaṁ sahai kilēsaṁ ca kāraṇa ।। 1027 ।।
niyaguruṇāṇunnāō karēi saari | āyaṁbilēṇa pārai pajjattaṁ bhuṁjai na taṁ pi ।। 1028 ।।
tassa kuṇaṁtassa imaṁ samaikkatāī panarasadiṇāī । aha sō namiuṁ sūri vinavaē uttama kaē ।। 1029 ।।
ārāhagōtti nāuṁ samaṇunnāō taō imō guruṇā । āhāraṁ paccakkhai caunvihaṁ jāvajīvāē ।। 1030 ।।
aha kayapaccakkhāṇaṁ taṁ nāūṇaṁ visēsaō rāyā । kayavahumāṇō sapurōhiō vi niccaṁ pi dō vārē ।। 1031 ।।
āgaṁtuṇaṁ tassaṁgatiyammi ciṭṭha muhuttamēgēgaṁ । sō vi suhajjhavasāṇō sattadiṇē aṇasaṇē ṭhāuṁ ।। 1032।।
vayapariyāyaṁ savvaṁ vīsaṁ diyāī dōhiṁ ahiyāī । sammaṁ aṇupālēuṁ paramasamāhīē saṁpannō ।। 1033 ।।
mariūṇa samuppannō kappē sōhammanāmaē dēvō । paṁca patiōvamāū aṇubhujai tattha surasōkkhaṁ ।। 1034 । ।
taṁ aṇuiyammi sūrē paralōyagayaṁ viyāṇiuṁ rāyā । aigaruthavibhūīē kārai taddēha-sakkāraṁ ।। 1035 ।।
rāyā purōhiō taha sūri pucchati kattha uvavannō । sivakēumuṇī mariuṁ aha suyanāṇammi uvaōgaṁ ।। 1936 ।।
dāūṇaṁ sūrivarō sāhai savvaṁ jahaṭṭhiyaṁ tēsi । sōūṇa tē vi hilā jāyā dhammammi daḍhacittā ।। 1037।।
tēsi uvarōhēṇaṁ kavi diṇē tattha ṭhāuṁ sūrī। tō tē aṇunnavēḍaṁ tattō annattha viharēi ।। 1038 ।।
iya sirimunisuvvaya jiṇidacariē sirisiricaṁdasūri viraiē । paḍhamaṁ bīyaṁ ca bhavaggahaṇaṁ samattaṁ
sirimunisuvvayasāmissa taiyabhavō -
paḍhamō vīō ya bhavō muṇisuvvayajiṇavarassa cariyammi । ēsa maē parikahiō aha taiya bhavaṁ pavakkhāmi । । 1039 ।।
atthi iha jaṁbadīvē mahāvidēhaṁ ti vitthaḍaṁ vāsaṁ । sūranaridō vva aṇēgasaṁkhavijaōvaladdhajasaṁ ।। 1040 ।।
tassa ya puvvavibhāē dāhiṇaō nīlavaṁta sēlassa | sīyāsariuttaraō pacchimaō puvvavaṇabhihō ।। 1041 ।।
taha ēgasēvakkhārapavvayāō ya puvvapavibhāē । pukkhalavai tti nāmaṁ vijayaṁ jayavissuyaṁ atthi ।। 1042 ।।
tattha bhuvaṇappasiddhaṁ vissauraṁ nābha atthi varanayaraṁ । jaṁ vissayassa nimmāṇanihasapaṭṭō vva paḍihāi ।। 1043॥
maṇissa vi savvattha jassa nayarassa dūsaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ । jaṁ paḍhamapēcchayāṇaṁ nayaṇāī maṇaṁ ca taṁ harai ||1044 ।।
vissassa vi kamaṇijjō taṁ pālai vissakaṁtanaranāhō । vissasai saccavayaṇassa jassa vayaṇammi vissaṁ pi
sēvāpavi saṁtanamaṁtabhūrisāmaṁtamaulidēsēsu । payajuyalanahālī sahai jassa maṇimāliya vva ṭhiyā ।। 1046॥
savvaṁtē urapavarā bhajjā tassa'tthi vissakaṁta tti । vissassa vi jā kaṁtā kaṁtaṁ ēvaṁ ciya pavannā ।। 1047।।
tī saha visayahaṁ aṇuhavamāṇassa tassa naravaiṇō । vaccai pabhūyakālō avaccarahiyassa nicca pi ।। 1048।।
citā dūmiyacittassa tassa aha annayā maṇē puriyaṁ । jaha nayarabāhiraṭriyakubē rajakkhassa icchāmi ।। 1059 ।।
ōvāiyaṁ jahā sō chiyaputtaṁ payacchaē majjha । iya citiūṇa gaṁtuṁ jakkhāyayaṇē tamaccēi ।। 1050।।
bhai ya jai mē puttō tujjha pahāvēṇa uttamō hōhī । tō'haṁ āgaṁtūṇaṁ tuha jattaṁ kāraissāmi ।। 1051 ।।
tuha saṁtiyaṁ ca nāmaṁ tassa karissāmi niyayaputtassa । iya jaṁpiūṇa rāyā niyapāhāyammi saṁpattī ।। 1052 ।।
aha annā nisāra pacchimajāmammi pēcchaē sumiṇē । sā vissakaṁtadēvī kubērajakkhaṁ sasiṁgāra ॥। 1053 ।।
taṁ daṭhṭhē paḍibuddhā sā sumiṇaṁ kahai niṣaiṇō gaṁtuṁ । sō bhaṇai tujjha puttō bhavissaē dēvi ! guṇajuttō ।। 1054 । ।

=== vardhamanaoutput-34-to-34.json ==========================

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
।। 1058।।
sābaddha uṇagaṁṭhī taha tti paḍivajjiūṇa nivavayaṇaṁ । harisabharanibbharaṁgī taya'ṇunnāyā paḍiniyattā ।। 1055 ।।
niyabhavaṇē saṁpattā ahaṁ sō sivakēusaṁtiō jīvō । sōhammāō caviuṁ tīsē ganbhammi saṁbhūō ।। 1056 ।।
puttattā sā vihu suhaṁsuhēṇaṁ vahēi taṁ gabbhaṁ । saṁjāō ḍōhalaō taiē māsammi aha tīsē || 1057 ।।
jaha gaṁtūṇaṁ jiṇamaṁdirēsu pūēmi jaha sahatthēṇa । jiṇabibāī savvāī sāhuṇō tahaya vaṁdāmi
I
referyābhipāō tīē kahiō imō naravarassa । tēṇa vi tīsē ēsō ḍōhalaō pūriō jhatti ।। 1059 ।।
aha pasipunnami dinē suhēsu nakkhattatihimahattēsu । sō vissakaṁtadēvī pasavai puttaṁ kamalanēttaṁ ॥ 1060।।
vr̥ddhāvas naranāhaṁ dāsī piyavayaṇiyā samāgaṁtuṁ । vatthāharaṇēhiṁ imaṁ sammāṇai vissakaṁtaniva । 1061 ।।
vr̥ddhāvaṇaṁ nariṁdō vissaurē kāravēi samvattō । kuṁkumarasasittasamaggamaggabhūsiyapaḍāyaṁ ca ।। 1062॥
gēhē gēhammi nivaddhatōraṇaṁ gijjamāṇamaṁgalayaṁ । apphāliyavaratūraṁ harisapaṇaccaṁta taruṇiyaṇaṁ ॥ 1063।।
akkhayavattāiṁ puraṁgaṇāṇa karayalagayāī pavisaṁti । kappiyadaṁtujjalasayalataṁdulappayarapunnāī ॥ 1064।।
sasimaṁḍalasarisāī sāhēti va tāī sahasasaṁkhāī । rāyakumārassa aṇēgacaṁda sahasāī jīvittaṁ ।। 1065 ।।
phala-patta - kusuma - vatthā-haraṇakarā tattha āgayā purisā । vaddhāviḍaṁ naridaṁ pañcakkhā kapparukkha vva ।। 1066 ।।
kuṁkumarasacchaḍāhiṁ chaṁḍijjatā jahicchamētthajaṇā । nivainiuttanarēhiṁ nivārayaṁtā vi savvaṁgaṁ ॥ 1067।।
dēhammi amāyaṁtaṁ bahuyattaṇaō bahimmi nōhariyaṁ । sōhaṁti uvvahaṁtā kumārajammāṇurāyaṁ ca ।। 1068 ।।
taṁbōla- vilēvaṇa - kusumavattha - āharaṇapamuhavatthūhi । sammāṇai savvajaṇaṁ jahōciyaṁ vissakaṁtaniva ।। 1069॥
nāṇāvihakusumēhi kārai suramaṁdirēsu pūyāō । dutthiyadīṇāṇāhāṇa dēi dāṇaṁ jahā jōgaṁ ।।1070।।
iya garuyapamōēṇaṁ samagganayarammi dēsagāmēsu । jāyaṁ vaddhāvaṇayaṁ niraṁtaraṁ jāva dahr̥dihē ||1071 ||
gaṁtūṇa kuṇai jattaṁ kubērajakkhassa nayarajaṇasahiō । rāyā ṭhavēi nāmaṁ kubēradattōti puttassa ॥ 1072 ।।
paṁcahi dhāihiṁ juō naridabhavaṇammi vaddhaē kamasō । kumarō kubēradattō dētō pariyaṇamaṇānaṁdaṁ ।। 1073 ।।
aha aṭṭhamammi vāsē samappiō sō kalāṇa gahaṇatthaṁ । āyariyassa samīvē kayasammāṇassa naravaṇō ॥ 1074 ।।
viṇaēṇa ujjamēṇa ya pannāē guṇēṇa ginhai kalāō। bāvataraṁ pi kumarō thēvēhiṁ cēva diyahēhiṁ ।। 1075।।
puṇa sammāṇai rāyā āyariyaṁ viuladavvadāṇēṇa । kumarō jōvvaṇapattō rannā pariṇāviō tattō ॥ 1076 ॥
kannāṇa sayaṁ ēvaṁ mahānaridāṇa rūyavaṁtīṇaṁ । tāhi samaṁ sō bhōē bhuṁjatō gamai diyahāī ॥ 1077।।
sāmaṁta-maṁti-maṁḍaliyaputtaparivāriō paribhamai । ujjāṇakāṇaṇāisu kīlaṁtō vivihakīlāhiṁ ॥ 1078 ।।
jiṇamaṁdirēsu vaccas accai jiṇapuṁgavāṇa paḍimāō । puvvabhavanbhāsēṇaṁ abhaṇijjaṁtō vi atrēṇa ।। 1079 ।।
ciivaṁdaṇānimittaṁ samāgaē tattha pāsiuṁ muṇiṇō । vaṁdai bhattīē taō pucchara jiṇadhammasambhāvaṁ ।। 1080 ।।
suṇiūṇa tē si vayaṇaṁ dhammāyaṁ vahati saddaha । niyasīsaṁ ca dhuṇaṁtō dhammapasaṁsaṁ kuṇai hi
ēvaṁ kamēṇa jāō jiṇidadhammammi sō mahākusalō । niccalasammīi karēṛa gihisamuciyaṁ dhammaṁ
aha sō juvarāyapaē kubēradattō nivēsiō rannā । maṁgalaurassa dēsī kumārabhuttīē sē dinnō ।।
niyasamma niutō subuddhisacivassa naṁdaṇō tēṇa । buddhidhaṇō nāmēṇaṁ bālavayaṁsō paramabhattō || 1084 ।।
ciṭṭhai pāsammi ṭhiō sayaṁ naridassa laddhajasapasarō । aha annayā naridē atthāṇagaē pabhāmi ।। 2085 ||
niyapāsāyāu samāgammi namiūṇa nivaicalaṇēsu । dāhiṇapāsanisanē kubēradattē kumārammi || 1086 ।।

kubēradattacariyaṁ
35
sadvāṇaniviṭṭhē suṁ samaggasāmaṁta- maṁtipamahēsu । vinnattō paḍihārēṇa sīsaārōviyakarēṇa ।। 1087 ।।
jaha dēva ! dāradēsē kaḍyāu samāgaō gahiyalēhō । purisō ciṭṭhai raṇadhavaladaṁḍanāhēṇa paṭṭaviō ।। 1088 ।।
rāyāsēṇa taō pavēsiō ēsa dāravālēṇa । vihiyapaṇāmō lēhaṁ paṇāmaē rāyacalaṇāṇaṁ || 1089 ॥
yā vibhamēṇa gahiūṇa karēṇa chōḍiūṇa sayaṁ । paribhāvai taṁ lēhaṁ avahiyahiyaō asē pi ।। 1090 ।।
satthisivisaurē nayarē mahimahala tilayabhūyammi । sirivissakaṁtarannō sa payāvakkatabhuvaṇassa ॥ 1091।।
papaumāī sirivijayakaḍayaō daṁḍanāharaṇadhavalō । viṇaēṇa paṇamiṅaṇaṁ dharaṇīyalamiliyapaṁcaṁgō ।। 1092 ।।
faras jahā dēvāsēṇa ahaṁ ihuttaradisāē । parabalasīhassuvari samāgaō pallināhassa ।। 1093।।
dēvaniuttēṇa samaṁ cauraṁgabalēṇa dappakaliēṇa । sōhauradēsasīmaṁ aṇēgagirivalayaṁ dupavē ।। 1094 ।।
parabalasīhō vi mamaṁ ētaṁ nāūṇa niyabalasamēō । dēsē pavisaṁtēṇaṁ maē samaṁ ginhaē jujjhaṁ ॥। 1095 ।।
ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇē visamē girighaṭṭārōhaṇāvaya raṇammi । samasugamabhūmibhāgē palāiuṁ jāi dūrammi ।।1096 ।।
ēvaṁ jujjhatō sō chalēṇa saddhi maē gaē tāva । jā sīhauraṁ nayaraṁ samāgayaṁ jōyaṇatigēṇa ॥। 1097 ।।
pacchā palāi sō sīurapurassa majjhamaṇupattō । vārāī piūṇaṁ nayarassa ṭhiō kayapayattō ।। 1098 ।।
kāūṇaṁ pāyāraṁ ahiṭṭiyaṁ bahuyajōha sahasēhi । ēgēṇa jōyaṇēṇaṁ sīhaurapurassa bāhimi ।। 1099 ।।
gaṁtūṇa maē gahiō āvāsō vēḍhiyaṁ ca savvattō । taṁ nayaraṁ avisamaṁ agāhajalabhariyaparihāē ॥। 1100 ।।
vitthinnāē tīsē pēratē ēgagāuyāyāmā । ciṭṭhatī ghaṇakaṁṭī khaṇiūṇaṁ mūlaō ēsā ।। 1101 ।।
ḍhāviyā asēsā saṁjāyā amha kaḍayalōyassa । iṁdhaṇamaī va pauraṁ paṇa pāīṇa jammēsu ॥। 1102 ।।
tisubhāsuṁ nayarassa tassa puhaī kayā karayalaṁ va । kari turaya rahavarāṇaṁ raṇajōggā jōyaṇapamāṇā ।। 1103 ।।
uttarabhāē girivalayaduggama ( vaṇasaṁḍa ? ) vaḍḍakhaḍḍāhi । visamaṁ ca tattha viyarai vaṇayaramaṇuō vikicchrēṇa ॥
tattha vipāyayalōō dhaṇuddharō khaggakhēḍayakarō ya । paurō nirūviō jaṇapavēsanikkā sarakkhaṭṭhā ।।1105 ।।
ēvaṁ kayammi kaivayadiṇēhiṁ niggaṁtu niyayanayarāō । sīhabalō nāmaṇaṁ parabalasīhassa lahubhāyā ।। 1106 ।।
khasarāya samīvē gaṁtūṇaṁ tassa icchiuṁ davvaṁ । upāēi bhayamigaṁ vucchē amha tumhāṇaṁ ||1107।।
uvari karissai kayaṁ raṇadhavalō daṁḍanāyagō niyamā । amhē tumhē viduvē miliḍaṁ tamhā iyāṇi pi ।। 1108 ।।
ēyaṁ ucchēēmō iya sōuṁ sō vi lōbhabhayavasaō । āgaṁtuṁ vēḍhēuṁ niyasavvabalēṇa amha balaṁ ।। 1109 ।।
visamaṭṭhāṇammi ṭiō ukkhaṁdaṁ dēi amha sēnnamma । parabalasīhō vi tahā kathasaṁkēō niyapurāō ।। 1110॥
niggaṁtuṁ rayaṇīē samakālaṁ cēva dēi ukkhadaṁ । ēvaṁ pi pakuvvatā amha pahupyati tēnēya ॥ 1111 ॥
kiṁtu paraṁ amhāṇaṁ kaḍaē kaṇacōppaḍāṇa saṁkaḍayaṁ । na lahai jaō pavisiuṁ bāhi ruddhēsu maggē ।।1112 ।।
sattaṭṭhayapaṭṭaviyā juyalīō lēhava । hayāṇa maē । tāō tumha samīvē pattāō ki va nō ēyaṁ ?
amhē nahu
jāṇāma paḍivattā kāvi nāgayā tāva । ēvaṁ ca lēhavāhayajuyalaṁ kicchēṇa kaḍayāō ।। 1114 ।।
nīhārēūṇa rayaṇīē jāmammi pacchima channaṁ । dāūṇaṁ vōlāvayammaggēṇaṁ ca paṭṭhaviyaṁ ।। 1115 ।।
paribhāviūṇa ēvaṁ karaṇijjaṁ hōi ki pi jaṁ uciyaṁ । taṁ kāyavvaṁ turiyaṁ dēvēṇa ahaṁ nirābhā (hā ) rō ।। 1116 ॥
dēva ! calaṇāṇa puraō vinnattē saṁpayaṁ taō ēyaṁ । lēhr̥tthaṁ niyayiē avahārēu narāhivaī ।।1117 ।।
taṁ vānaraṁ pucchara caliō duijjaō tuha jō । sō kattha tēṇa kahiyaṁ khasaranōrakkhaganarēhiṁ ।। 1118 ॥

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
paribhramaṇaniuttēhi rayaṇīē saṁcarēṇa dūrāō । nāūṇaṁ saṁlaviyā amhē ēvaṁ jahā paraō ।। 1119॥
kē jaṁti imē purisā ubhā paḍikhēha tēsimullāvaṁ । ēyaṁ sōūṇa taō amhē turiyaṁ ciya palāṇā ।। 1120 ॥
dō vi jaṇā puraō haṁsō pacchā ēi tēhi tō mukkō । bāṇō tēṇa haō sō paḍiō ya maō ya mahivaṭṭhē ॥। 1121 ॥
tō bhayasaṁtattha haṁ vēgēṇa palāiō visēsēṇa । taṁ jāva samāgatuṁ tē viniyattā taō pacchā ।।1122 ॥
aha avagayahatthō sōūṇaṁ lēhavāhavayaṇaṁ ca । jhatti kuviō nariṁdō payāṇaḍhakkaṁ dayāvēi ।। 1123 ।।
āisai savvasāmaṁtamaṁḍalā hivaipamuhaniyasēnaṁ । saṁvahaṇatthaṁ gaṁtuṁ jattāē appaṇā saddhi 1124 ।।
aha vinnavai kumārō kubēradattō narāhivaṁ ēvaṁ | dēva ! imō āēsō dāyavvō majjha pasiūṇa ।। 1125 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ laggō pāēsuṁ naravarassa tō kumarō । rāyā vi vissakaṁtō paḍivajjai taṁ kumaravayaṇaṁ ।। 1126।।
āisai savvasēnaṁ kubēradattēṇa saha kumārēṇa । āē sēṇa samaṁ ci ya kumarō vi payāṇaē ṭhāi ।। 1127।।
sēnnapi saharisamaṇaṁ samaṁ kumārēṇa vaccai samaggaṁ । anukūlasauṇajaṇiōcchāhamakhaṁḍappayāṇēhiṁ ।। 1128।।
hē saṁtaturayathaṭṭē gajjaṁtagaiṁdavaraghaḍāḍōvaṁ I dhuvaṁtadhayavaḍāyaṁ calaṁ taraha mukka cikkāraṁ ।। 1129 ।।
vaggatabhiccavaggaṁ vajjaṁtaaṇēgatarasaṁghāyaṁ । taṁ vakkavukkaravabahiriyaṁbarāsēsadisiyakkaṁ ।। 1130 ।।
kaivayapayāṇagāṇaṁ pajjētē pabhaṭṭhavēi aha kumarō । channaṁ ciya niyanna thēvaṁpi sadēsa sīmāē ।। 1131 ।।
kārēi vaṭṭabaṁdhaṁ khasanaravaihēriyāṇa ēṁtāṇaṁ । gaṁtūṇa sayaṁ pacchā āvāsaṁ tattha ginhē ||1132 ॥
thēvaṁ ciya niyapāsē sēnaṁ dhariūṇa vāmadāhiṇaō । sēsaṁ ṭhāvēi balaṁ aduradēsammi pacchannaṁ 1133॥
taṁbōliyavēsēṇaṁ gahiūṇaṁ nāgavallipattāiṁ । hēriyapurisē niyaē pēsai khasarāya sēmmi ।।1134 ।।
kannamma kaṁpi sikkhaṁ dāūṇaṁ tē vi jaṁti tattha taō । pattā khasanaravaiṇō vaṭṭāvaṁdhassa purisēhi ॥। 1135 ।।
na lahaṁti purō gaṁtuṁ karēṁti tē uttaraṁ taō ēvaṁ । amhē lāhanimittaṁ caliyā khasarāyasēnammi ।।1136 ।।
gahiūṇa kē ttiyāī vipannāī tēhi tō vimukkā tē । pattā khasanivakaḍaē bhamiuṁ vikkaṁti pannāī ।।1137 ।।
hēraṁti savvasēna bhēṭṭēūṇaṁ khasassa naravaiṇō । gahiūṇa akkharāī tassa taō tē niyataṁti ॥ 1138 ।।
jati taō tēsi ciya vaṭṭābaṁdhadviyāṇa purisāṇa । pāsammi samappaṁti ya khasanivadinnakkharāī taō ।।1139 ।।
tatthakrēsu lihiyaṁ jaha ēē amha kaḍayamajjhammi । pannāī gahēūṇaṁ ēhiti tahā payāhiṁti ॥। 1140
ēēsi tumhahiṁ kāyanvō nō uvaddavō tamhā । dāyavvaṁ bōlāvayamēṁtāṇa tahā vayaṁtā ।। 1141 ।।
iya akkharatthamavahāriūṇa tō tēhi tē imaṁ bhaṇiyā । jaha tubbhē bhayarahiyā gacchaha āgacchaha tahēva ।। 1142 ।।
tō tēhi hēriēhi kavaḍēṇa kaō niō narō ēkkō । maṁdō taṁ pālēuṁ tattha kathaṁ jhuṁpaḍaṁ ēkkaṁ ।। 1143 ।।
tō tēṇa misēṇa imē ciṭṭhatā tattha tēsimāyāraṁ । paribhāvayaṁti sammaṁ kēttiyabhūmīē asthi gamō ॥। 1144 ॥
savalīvaddaṁ purisaṁ karēṁti naṭṭha kayāvi kavaḍēṇa । tassa gavēsaṇahēuṁ bhamaṁti tē tattha tō dūraṁ 1145 ।।
kaivayadiyahēhi taō nāūṇa gamāgamaṁ samaggaṁ pi । tē kumara hēriyanarā khasapurisāṇaṁ kahēūṇa ।। 1146 ।।
pannāyaṇamisēṇaṁ kubēradattassa jaṁti pāsammi | sāhēti tassa puraō pacchannaṁ sēnnagamaṇapahaṁ ॥। 1147 ॥
tō vāmadāhiṇēsu sēnēsuṁ hariyāṇa majjhāō। dō dō purisē pēsai kumarō dāūṇa kannammi ।। 1148॥
sikkhavaṇaṁ taha ahināṇasaṁjayaṁ appiūṇa lēhaṁ ca । lēhassa tassa majjhē lihāviō tēṇimō atthō ।। 1149 ।।
maggēṇa jēṇa ē vayaṁti tumhahi tēṇa gaṁtavvaṁ । amhāṇaṁ tumhāṇa ya amugē ṭhāṇammi saṁjōō ।। 1150 ।।
niyahēriyapurisēhi daṁsiyamaggēṇa saṁjhasamayammi । saṁvahiuṁ saṁcaliō kubēradattō nivakumārō ।। 1151 ।।

pacchannō gaṁtuṇaṁ ubhaō pāsēsu vēḍhaē purisē । khasarāyasaṁtiē tē baṭṭābaṁdhammi viṇitē ।। 1152 ।।
jēhi kamāuhaṁ tē viṇāsiyā sēsayāō baṁdhēuṁ । gahiyā tattō saha appaṇā ya saṁcāliyā savvē ।। 1153 ।।
puraō niyapurisēhi vaṭṭābaṁdhō karāviō tattō । dāhiṇavāmāī niyasēnāī mēliūṇaṁ ca ।। 1154 ॥
caliō puraō gaṁtuṁ diyahaṁ niggamaiguttaṭhāṇammi । kumarō kubēradattō rayaṇīē tassa purisēhi ।। 1155 ।।
I
nitēhi āṇi khasanaridacarapurisā । kumarassa appiyā pucchiyā ya kumarēṇa tē bēṁti ।। 1156 ।।
jaha amhē paṭṭaviyā khasanaravaiṇā niyāṇa purisāṇa । vaṭṭāvaṁdhaniuttāṇa suddhikaraṇatthamajjajaō ।। 1157।।
tēsi majjhāu na kōvi āgaō tassa suddhikahaṇatthaṁ । tō avasērī jāyā tēṇa niuttā taō amhē ।। 1158 ।।
kāraviyā kumarēṇa tē savvē lōhasikhalābaddhā । paḍhamaṁ rayaṇī paharaṁ gamiuṁ tatthēva tō kumarō ।। 1159 ।।
caliō savvabalēṇaṁ pacchimajāmammi khasanaridassa । āvāsē gaṁtūṇaṁ paḍiō nī saṁkacittassa ॥1160 ।।
baṁdhi saṁgahiō khasa nariṁdō taō pattō vi । kari turaya- kōsasahiō palāiyaṁ sēsa sēnnaṁ tu ।। 1161 ॥
pāṇē gahiūṇa niē kē vi viṇaṭṭhā kathāuhā jōhā । aha kumarō pēsēuṁ purisa raṇadhavalapāsamma ।।1162 ।।
jāṇāvaē sarūvaṁ jaha gahiō baṁdhiūṇa khasarāyā । amhēhi ajja suttō rayaṇīē pacchimē jāmē ।। 1163 ।।
raṇadhavalō sōūṇaṁ tudrumaṇō tassa kahagapurisassa । dēi pasāyaṁ viulaṁ vatthālaṁkā ramāīyaṁ ।। 1164।।
pēsēuṁ niyapurisaṁ pāsammi kubēradattakumarassa । maggāvai kaṇacōppaḍamēvaṁ ca tahā bhaṇāvēi ।। 1165।।
jaha tumbhē vīsatthā sayamējjaha ēttha cōppaḍakaṇaṁ tu । paṭṭhavaha jhatti tamhā sīyai kayaṁ viṇā tēṇa ॥। 1166॥
kaṇacōppaḍakōṭṭhiō paṭṭhaviyāō kubēradattēṇa । kumarēṇaṁ bahuyāō tattō raṇadhavalakaḍayammi ।।1167 ।।
ghāēvayāviūṇaṁ ghāiyapurisāṇa saparapakkhē vi । taiya dinē sō pattō sayaṁ pi raṇadhavalapāsammi ।। 1168 ।।
nāūṇa taō ēvaṁ parabalasīhō maṇammi saṁkhuhiō । jaha saṁpayaṁ bhavissai kōṭṭavarōhō cirakālaṁ ।। 1169 ।।
kaṇacōppaḍaṁ tu savvaṁ niṭṭiyamamhāṇa nayaramajjhammi । tō sayamēva marissai chuhāē majjhaṭṭhiyaṁ savvaṁ ॥ 1170॥
tu
iya citiūṇa pēsa kubēradattassa nivakumārassa । pāsammi niyaṁ purisaṁ tassa muhēṇaṁ ca vinnavai ।। 1171 ।।
|
parabalasīhō ēvaṁ jaha tumhē amha dēha acchaliyaṁ । tō āgaṁtuṁ amhē paṇamāmō tumha pāēsu ।।1172।।
parabala sīnarēṇa iya vinnattē kubēradattēṇa । kumarēṇa tassa dinō hatthō paṭṭhīē sapasāyaṁ ॥ 1173 ।।
paḍivannaṁ tavvayaṇaṁ sammāṇēūṇa taṁ taō tēṇa । saha niyapurisaṁ pēsai parabalasīhassa pāsammi ।। 1174 ।।
kumarō kubēradattō parabalasīhō vi kumarapurisassa । kāūṇaṁ sammāṇaṁ aibahuyaṁ tēṇa saha tattō ॥ 1175 ।।
nīharijaṁ nayarāō āgaṁtūṇaṁ kubēradattassa । kumarassa paḍai pāēsu sō vi uṭṭhāviḍaṁ ēyaṁ ॥। 1176।।
āliṁgai aigāḍhaṁ dāvai uciyāsaṇaṁ ca niyapāsē । vinnavai mauliyakarō parabalasī hō taō kumaraṁ ।। 1177 ।।
girimajjhanivāsīṇaṁ amhāṇaṁ tumha daṁsaṇaṁ dulahaṁ । jai aviṇayaṁ kuṇatō ahamēyaṁ nēya tō nāha ! ।। 1178 ।।
kaha tumhē iha tā kaha hutaṁ tumha daṁsaṇaṁ amha । tā aviṇaō vi ēsō guṇahēū amha saṁjāō ।। 1179 ।।
vacca savvassaṁ pi hu majjha iyāṇiṁ na kō vi asamāhī । tuha payadaṁsaṇalāhassa jēṇa savvassa mavi thōvaṁ ॥
iya vinaviūṇa taō parabalasīhō samaggamavi niyayaṁ । uggaṇai bālavaddhaṁ kubēradattassa kumarassa ।। 1181 ।।
sīhauranayara majjhē kumaraṁ tō nēi paramabhattīē । sammāṇai tattha gayaṁ ḍhōyai savvaṁ bhaṁḍāraṁ ।। 1182 ।।
maṇi- mōttiya ruppa - suvanna - kaṁsa - dūsāiyaṁ taō tassa । kumarō vi taṁ samaggaṁ gahiūṇaṁ tassa taṁ nayaraṁ ॥। 1983 ।।
dēi pasāēṇa puṇō dēsēṇa samanniyaṁ samaggēṇa । vatthāharaṇāīhiṁ ya sammāūṇa aivahuyaṁ ॥1184 ॥

1
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
tinnidiṇē pāhuṇaō hōūṇaṁ tassa cēva tammi purē । niggacchai ahaṁ kumarō parabalasīhēṇa saha tattō ।। 1185 ।।
vaccai khasanaravaiṇō dēsābhimuō samaggasēnnajuō । tō khasarannā kumarō parabalasīhassa pāsāō ।। 1186 ।।
vinnāviō jahā mē uvari pasāyaṁ guruṁ karēūṇa । dēsō na lhūsiyavvō majjha ahaṁ sēvaō tumha ||1187।।
āgaṁtuṁ mama nayarē khasauranāmammi hōha pāhuṇayā । jēṇa ahaṁpi samaggaṁ tumha samappēmi niyakōsaṁ ॥। 1188 ।।
parabalasīhēṇa taō vinnattaṁ savvamēva kumarassa । ēyaṁ tahaṁ tti tēṇa vi kubēradattēṇa paḍivannaṁ ।। 1189 ।।
saṁkalabaṁdhāō taō sapariyō khasanarēsarō mukkōṁ । tēṇa vi āgaṁtūṇaṁ viṇaṇaṁ paṇamiō kumarō ।। 1190 ।।
kumarēṇa vinihatthō ṭhaviō hiṭṭha ēṇa tassa paṭṭhīē । dinnāsaṇō nisannō aha sō kumarassa āsannō ।। 1191 ।।
vighnavai jōḍiyakarō avarāhō ēsa majjha garuaṁ vi । tumhē hi ēkkavāraṁ supasannamaṇēhi khamivvō ।। 1192 ।।
avarāhavirahiyāṇa vi tumha maē jēṇa ērisaṁ vihiyaṁ । sōhaṁ sarīraniggajōggō ēmēva parimukkō ।। 1193 ।।
tumhēhiṁ garuyāē niyayāē taha vi ajjapabhitō । āēsakarō tumhaṁ saṁdēhō iha na kāyavvō ॥1194 ॥
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ kammavasēṇaṁ kathāvi garuyāvi । mujjhati pakuvvaṁtā kajjāī niuṇamaṇō vi ।। 1195 ।।
avarāhavajjiyāṇaṁ khamijjaē jaṁ na kiṁpi taṁ cōjjaṁ । kayadōsassa samatthō jaṁ khamai guṇō sa vinnēō ।। 1196 ॥
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tattō kubēradattēṇa nivakumārēṇa । āiṭṭhā niyapurisā kāraviō majjaṇaṁ tēhi ।। 1197 ।।
khasarāyā vatthāī parihāvēūṇa kumarapāsammi । āṇiō tēṇa samaṁ sō bhuttō gōravēṇa taō ।।1198 ।।
laddhavilēvaṇa taṁbōlakusumasammāṇajaṇiyamaṇahariyō । siliyāvasarammi khaṇaṁ ṭhāūṇaṁ samuciyakahāē ।। 2299॥
kumarēṇa aṇunnāō tēṇaṁ ciya dāviyammi āvāsē । gaṁtūṇa sō pattā khaṇaṁtarē puṇa vi uṭṭhē uṁ ।। 1200॥
pāsē kubēradattassa ēi taṁ pucchiūṇa niyapurisē । dōnni u sikkhaviūṇaṁ khasauranayarammi pēsēi 1201 ॥
gaṁtūṇa tēhi kahiyaṁ khasanaravaiṇō amaccamāīṇaṁ । jaṁ khasarāyā mukkō kumarēṇa mahāpasāēṇa || 1202॥
tō tumhēhi na saṁkā kāyavvā kā vi iyaralōō vi । savvō palāyamāṇō nivāriyavvō pattē ।। 1203 ।।
kāyavvaṁ savvaṁ ciya pavaṇaṁ kumarassa jēṇa pāhunaṁ । tatthāgayassa kīrai tēhi ta nisuṇiuṁ ēvaṁ ।। 1204 ।।
taha cēva kayaṁ savvaṁ puṇō vi tē pēsiyā duvē purisā । khasarāyassa samīvē addhapahē bhēṭṭiyā tassa ।। 1205 ।।
kumarō kubēradatta thēvēhiṁ diṇēhiṁ khasaurē nayarē । saṁpattō pavisaṁtē tammi kaō natharalōēṇa ।। 1206 ।।
khasaranō āēsā mahasavō sayalanayaramajjhammi । sacivāisavvalōō samāgaō sammuhō tassa ।। 1207 ।।
maṁgalatūraravēhiṁ kubēradattō pavēsiō nayarē । tēhi taō sō daṭṭhū purisōhaṁ paḍiniyattē || 1208 ।।
ginhai nayarasa bahiṁ āvāsaṁ vitthaḍē paēsammi | bhōyaṇajāyaṁ pēsa tassa khasō saparivārassa ।। 1209 ।।
bhuttammitaō kumarē kariturayāī jamatthi uvvariyaṁ । taṁ āṇēuṁ savvaṁ kumarassa khasō samappēi ।। 1210॥
bhaṁḍāraṁ pi asēsaṁ kubēradattassa ḍhōyaē puraō । dēsaṁ ca sapuragāmaṁ uggaṇaē tassa khasarāyā ।। 1211।।
kumarō vi taṁ samaggaṁ gahiūṇaṁ kēttiēṇa daviṇēṇa । taṁ karituragāīhi ya sammāṇēuṁ pasāēṇa ।। 1212 ।।
taṁ caiva dēi saṁ bhiccattaṁ tassa saṁpavannassa । siranihiyapāṇijuyalō mahāpasāō ti bhaṇiūṇa । 1213 ।।
paṇamai khasō nariṁdō puṇō vi pāēsu nivakumārassa । ṭhāūṇa kai vi diyahē tatthēva taō niyattēi ।। 1214 ॥
kumarō kubēradattōṁ parabalasīhēṇa khasanivēṇaṁ ca । saṁjuttō niyadēsābhihō turiyappayāṇēhiṁ ॥। 1215 ।।
paccāsannō vaccaṛa jēsi kēsi pi sō nāradāṇa । tē pēsiti samaggā vi pāhuḍaṁ tassa kumarassa ।। 1216 ॥
ēvaṁ accijjatō sayalanaridēhiṁ sō kamēṇa taō । vitthinnannajuttō saṁdēsa sīmāē saṁpattī ।। 1217॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-39-to-39.json ==========================
kubēradattacariyaṁ
39
pēsē taō kumarō vinatti appiūṇa niyapurisē । pāsammi vissakaṁtassa nivaiṇō vattakahaṇatthaṁ ।। 1218 ॥
gaṁtūna tē vi turiyaṁ vissaurē vissakaṁtanaravaiṇō । taṁ vinnattīlēhaṁ appēṁti kumārapēsaviyaṁ ।। 1219॥
tō avagayalēhatthō tudrumaṇō vissakaṁtanaranāhō । viulaṁ pasāyadānaṁ tēsi purisāṇa dēi duyaṁ ।। 1220 ।।
anē pahāṇapura sē pēsa kumarassa sammuhē rāyā । tēhiṁ samaṁ kumarō vi hu vissaurē jhatti saṁpattō ।। 1221 ।।
nāūṇa nariṁdō vihu nigacchai sammuhō kumārassa । daṭṭhūṇa nivaṁ ēṁtaṁ kumarō ōyarai turayāō ।। 122 ।।
annē vi hu sāmaṁtā maṁḍaliyā uttaraṁti tō savvē | parabalasīhō khasapatthivō ya kumarassa diti niyaṁ ।। 1223 ।।
ubhaō pāsē bāhuṁ tattha vilaggō payāi piusamuhō । kumarō tassāsannō gaṁtūṇaṁ muyai nivabāhū 1224 ।।
karivarakhaṁdhuttinaṁ piyaraṁ paṇamai mahī nihiyasirō । puṇa uṭṭhiyaṁ nariṁdō kumāramāliṁgaē gāḍhaṁ ।। 1225।।
āliṁgiūṇa mukkō naravaiṇā tō kubēradattō vi । paravalasīhaṁ khasapatthivaṁ ca daṁsai naridassa ।। 226 ।।
daṁsiyamēttā tē vihu paṇamaṁti parasu vissakaṁtassa | paṇamiya-samuṭṭhiē tō avagūhai vissakaṁtō vi ।। 1227 ॥
raṇadhavaladaṁḍanāhō paṇamai tayaṇaṁtaraṁ naridassa । saharisahiyaō taṁ pi huāliṁgai vissakaṁtaniva ।। 1228 ।।
aha vistarannā samaṇunnāyā samaggasāmaṁtā । maṁḍaliyā ya jahōciyasavāhaṇēsuṁ samārūḍhā ।। 1229॥
kumarō kubēradattō parabalasīhō khasō ya naranāhō । raṇadhavalō daṁḍavaī ārūḍhā varaiṁdēsu ।। 1230 ।।
sirivissakaṁtarannō gayā hirūḍhassa pāsaō savvē | jaṁti kumārappamuhā kamēṇa savvē nayaramajjhē ।। 1231 ।।
ūsaviyadhayavaḍāē vajjaṁta aṇēgatarasaṁghāē । gijjatapavaragēē ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇē ya kayanaṭṭē ॥1232 ॥
bahubaṁ dividavaṁ nnijjamāṇanivakumaravikkamaguṇōhē । dhavalaharadēvabhavaṇaggabhāgamārūḍhanayarajaṇē ।।1233॥
pēcchatē ya savimhayamannōnaṁ aṁgulīē daṁsaṁtē । parabalasīhaṁ khasapatthivaṁ ca kumarēṇa āṇīyaṁ ।। 1234।।
niyapāsāyasamīvē gaō nariṁdō visajjaē savvaṁ । parivāraṁ kumaraṁ puṇa saha'ppaṇā nēi pāsāē ।। 1235 ।।
paravala sīhassa tahā khasassa puhaīvaissa āvāsaṁ । dāvai puḍhō puḍhō maṁdirēsu sirivissakaṁtanivō ॥1236॥
aha vissakaṁtarāyā suhāsaṇatyō kubēradattassa । kumarassa sannihāṇē pucchara kaḍayassa vattāō ।। 1237॥
kumarō vi kahai savvaṁ vr̥ttaṁtaṁ mūlaō samārambha । lajjā saṁkuiyataṇū puraō nivavissakaṁtassa ।। 1238 ।।
rāyāvici maṇē parakkamaṁtassa buddhivihavaṁ ca । acca bhuyaṁ kumārassa tahaya gavvassa parihāraṁ ।। 1239॥
samayammi taō rāyā paravalasīhaṁ khasaṁ caraṇadhavalaṁ । kārai kubēradattaṁ ca bhōyaṇaṁ appaṇā saddhi ॥। 1240 ।।
siliyāvasarammitaō taṁbōlavilēvaṇāisammāṇaṁ । kāūṇaṁ kuṇai nivō tēhi samaṁ uciyamālāvaṁ ।। 1241 ।।
kannē hōūṇa taō kubēradattō nivassa vinnavai । jai vi maē sammāṇaṁ kayamēēsi purā asthi ।। 1242 ॥
tumhahiṁ vi kāyavvaṁ tahāvi ētyāgayāṇa ēēsi । kiṁci vi sammāṇaṁ khasa - parabala sīhāṇa uciyaṁti ॥ 1243 ॥
paḍivajjiūṇa ratnā kumāravayaṇaṁ taha tti nimmaviyaṁ । khasa-paravala sīhāṇaṁ kari turayāīhi sammāṇaṁ ।। 1244।।
rannā visajjiyā tē pahiducittāgayā niyāvāsaṁ । niccaṁ naridapāsē ubhaōkālaṁ pi vaccati ॥ 1245 ।।
piyaraṁ vinnaviūṇaṁ kubēradattō karāvaē jataṁ । savvēsu jiṇaharēsuṁ kamasō ghōsāvai amāri ॥। 1246 ॥
sirivissakaṁtarāyaṁ paravalasīhaṁ khasaṁ ca rāyāṇaṁ । annaṁ ca nivailōyaṁ nicvaṁ sō nēi jiṇabhavaṇē ।। 1247 ।।
daṭṭhūṇa tē vi ukkiyaba lipēcchaṇāiyaṁ savvaṁ । hiṭṭhamaṇā dhuṇiūṇaṁ sīsāī bhāṁti tō ēvaṁ ।। 1248 ।
ajjaṁ ciya saṁjāyaṁ sahalattaṁ amha lōyaṇajuyassa । jaṁ ērisamaccanbhuyamavalōiyamēttha amhēhiṁ ।। 1249 ।।
rāyā bibisakaṁtō jaṁpai amhaṁ vi ihēva nayarammi । nivasaṁtāṇaṁ kālō vōlīṇō bālabhāvāō ।। 1250 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-40-to-40.json ==========================
40
sirimunisuvvayajidicariyaṁ
paramērisamaccanbhūyamamhāṇa na diṭṭigōyarē pattaṁ । amha imō uvayārō kubēradattēṇa kumarēṇa ।। 1251 ।।
ajja kaō āṇīyā uvarōhēūṇa ēttha jaṁ amhē । ṇayaṇamaṇānaṁdatharō diṭṭhō dēvō taō ēsō ।। 1252 ।।
khasa parabala sīhēhi vibhaṇiyaṁ aivimhayappavannēhiṁ । garuyāṇaṁ kōvō vi hu jāyai iyarāṇa guṇahēū ।। 1253 ।।
jai amha uvarikayaṁ na karēṁtō kaha vi ēsa varakumarō । tā kaha āgaṁtavvaṁ amhāṇaṁ hōtamiha nayarē ।। 1254 ।।
kaha ērisōya dēvō jaṁtō amhāṇa lōyaṇapahammi । kaha pēcchatā amhē pūyā balipa hamē risayaṁ ।। 1255 ।।
vissassa vi ānaṁda kuṇamāṇaṁ vissakaṁtadēvassa | caraṇāraviṁdajuyalaṁ kaha pēkkhatā ya aidullahaṁ ॥ 1256 ॥
saṁpai amhē ēyaṁ dēmō ōvāiyaṁ niyamaṇammi । jai kaha vi hu ciṭṭhāmō ētthēva ṭhiyā sayākālaṁ ।। 1257।।
iya tēsi vayaṁtāṇa vi saṁpattō tattha vimalajasasūrī । sō vaṁdiūṇa dēvē uvaviṭṭhō uciyaṭhāṇammi ।। 1258 ।।
nirvāvisakaṁtapamuhēṇa vaṁdiō sō asēsalōēṇa । kumarō kubēra dattō bhaddayabhāvaṁ muṇēūṇa ।। 1259 ।।
sirivistaranō parabalasīhassa khasanaridassa । paḍibōhakaē pabhaṇaḍa sūri jaha kahaha dhamma kahaṁ ।। 1260 ।।
sūrī vi diṭṭi khēvaṁ kubēradattassa tēsu daṭṭhūṇa । nāūṇa tāṇa bhāvaṁ jahajōgaṁ dhammamuvaisai ।। 1261।।
sōūṇa sūrivayaṇaṁ saṁjāyā tāṇa dhammapaḍivattī । tō baṁdiūṇa sūri samuṭṭiyā tē samaggā vi ।। 1262 ।।
ranā saha gaṁtūṇaṁ dhavalaharē tē visajjiyā savvē । niyayāvāsammi gayā maṇē dharatā paramaharisaṁ ।। 1263।।
appāṇaṁ sukayatthaṁ saṁpattīē jiṇidadhammassa । mannatā nicvaṁ pi hu vaṁdati guruṁ ca dēvaṁ ca ।। 1264॥
kaivayadiṇapajjaṁ tē dōnni vi sammāṇiūṇa naravaiṇā । parabala sīha-khasanivā visajjiyā niyayadēsēsu ।। 1265 ।।
niyadēsēsu gayā tē kārēṁti jiṇēsarāṇa bhavaṇāī । pūyaṁti tēsu dēvē nicvaṁ vaṁdati bhattī ।। 1266 ।।
kumarōvayāramasamaṁ mannaṁtā māṇasammi tē niccaṁ । pattamauvvaṁ vatyuṁ pēsaṁti kaē kumārassa ।। 1267 ।।
aha tēhi annasamayē niyaniyarajjēsu turayahēḍāō । gahiyāō tammajjhē dō dō turaē aḍapahāṇē ।। 1268 ।।
।
nivvāḍēuṁ ēkkkkalakkhamullē kubēradattassa । kumarasta kaē pēsaṁti niyayapurisāṇa pāsammi || 1269 ।।
nēūṇa tēhi turayā samappiyā tē kubēradattassa । tēṇāvi vissakaṁtassa appiyā naravariṁdassa ।। 1270।।
rāyā vi jahicchāē pathacchaē turagamēgaṁ । tēṇa vi nirikkhiūṇaṁ ēgō gahiō pavaraturagō ।। 1271 ।।
maṁgalaurāō purisō aha buddhidhaṇēṇa kumarapāsammi । paṭṭhaviō vinnattīlēhaṁ niyamappiūṇa jahā ।। 1272 ।।
tamhāsēṇa maē niṣphāiyamēttha jiṇaharatuṁgaṁ । majjhammi ṭhāviyā taha jiṇidapaḍimā pavararūvā ।। 1273 ।।
taha vittharēṇa mahayā dasāhiyā kāriyā maē tīsē । paḍimādaṁsaṇahēu jaṛa tumhē saṁpayaṁ ēha ।। 1274 ।।
maṁgalauramma nayarē tō haṁ ētthēva tumha āgamaṇē । " pavaṇaṁ karēmi savvaṁ jahā gamissā mi tatthēva ।। 1275 ।।
* taṁ lēhaṁ gahiūṇaṁ sō tō maha tumhēhi jēṇa āgaṁtuṁ । paṇamēmi tumha pāē kaḍayāō samāgayāṇa ahaṁ ॥। 1276।।
aha tēṇa buddhidhaṇapēsiēṇa purisēṇa vissauranayarē । āgaṁtūṇaṁ lēhō samappiō nivakumārassa ।। 1277।।
buddhidhaṇapēsiyaṁ taṁ lēhaṁ avahāriūṇa nivakumarō । dēi paḍilēhamēyaṁ jahā gamissāmi tatthēva ।। 1278 ।।
tam̐ lēhaṁ gahiūṇaṁ gatuṁ maṁgalauramma sō purisō । buddhidhaṇassa samappa taṁ daṭṭu sō vi himaṇō ।। 1279॥
buddhi savvaṁ pipavaṇaṁ kāravai tammi natharammi । siri vispakatarāya kumarō vi aṇunnavēūṇa ।। 1280॥
kuṇai niyaṁ saṁvāhaṁ nayarē maṁgalaurammi gamaṇatthaṁ । āmaṁtiūṇa gaṇayaṁ pucchara divasaṁ aha kumārō ।। 1281 ।।
āruṇatthaṁ ahiṇavaturayammi cauṇha pavaraturayāṇaṁ । majjhāu naridēṇaṁ dinnammi mayaṁka nāmammi ।। 1282 ।।
jōisiēṇa gaṇiūṇa sāhiō sōlasammi ah divasē । turayārōhaṇa divasō tō kumarō annaturayammi । 1283 ।।
1. pavaṇaṁ karēmi savvaṁ tatthēva thirā jai ubhē saṁ
2. dāyavbō āēsī tō maha tumhēhi jēṇa āgaṁtu saṁ ।

=== vardhamanaoutput-41-to-41.json ==========================
kubēradattacariyaṁ
puṇa
I
41
āruhiūṇaṁ caliō kamēṇa pattō ya maṁgalaurammi । pavisai mahasavēṇaṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya jāi jiṇabhavaṇē ।। 1284॥
amhiṇavaṇatthaṁ nimmaviyammī paṁcavihēṇa'bhigamēṇa pavisēi । jaya jaya ravaṁ kuṇaṁtō nisīhiyā puvvayaṁ tattha ।। 1285 ।।
rōmaṁcakaṁcuijjataviggahō jinavaridapaḍimā | kuṇai vihīē pūyaṁ suṁgadhavarakusumamāīhiṁ ॥। 1286 ॥
vihiṇā vaṁda dēva uvauttō sārōttathuipuvvaṁ । aha uvavisiuṁ kārai khaṇamēgaṁ tattha pēkkhaṇayaṁ ।। 1287 ।।
paṇa maūṇa dēvaṁ niyapā sāyammi vaccaē kumarō । tattha kayabhōyaṇavihī buddhidhaṇaṁ sacivamāisai || 1288 ।।
bīyadiṇāō pabhiī kārāvēu dasāhiyaṁ puṇa vi । kumarāsēṇa taō buddhidhaṇō kārai tahēva ।। 1289 ।।
ghōsāvaē amāriṁ dasa vi diṇāī dasāhiyā majjhē । mahayā vicchaḍḍēṇaṁ vittāē dasāhiyāē taō ।। 1290 ।।
jōisiya hiya divasē mayaṁkaturaē samāruhai kumarō । nayarāō bahiṁ gaṁtuṁ taṁ vāha vāhiyālīē ।। 1291 । ।
vikhā dhārāviurī jhaṁpāivicittavāhaṇavihīē | vitthaḍa saṁkaḍaēhi ya kaḍaēhi vāhiuṁ aha sō ।। 1292॥
mukkō uvarimavēgē turaō kumarēṇa dīharapahammi । nijjiṇai javēṇa taō dhaṇumukkaṁ bāṇamanilaṁ ca ।। 1293 ।।
aibhūmi vaccatē tammi turaṁgammi khaṁcaē kumarō । vaggaṁ jāva taō sō ahiyayaraṁ vaṁdhaē vēyaṁ ।। 1294 ।।
kumarō vihu gāḍhayara āyaḍḍhai savvathāmaō rassi । turaō vihu abbhahiyaṁ dhāvai puraō samaṁ visamaṁ ।। 1295 ।।
agaṇaṁtō gayaṇatalaṁ laṁghiukāmō vva pāḍisiddhīē । ravirahaturaṁgamāṇaṁ vaccaṁtō uttaradisāē ।। 1296।।
iya kumaraturaṁgāṇaṁ parōpparaṁ khacaṇammi cakamaṇē । pāraddhapayattāṇaṁ gayāī kaivayamuttāī ।। 1297 ।।
adūraṁ vaccatē kumarammi turaṁgamōvarigayammi । tassa avasaṁ turaṁgaṁ nāūṇa kumārasēnaṁ pi ।। 1298 ।।
paṭṭhīē vēēṇaṁ pahāvaē jāva tāva sō kumarō । daṁsaṇapamaikatō pacchāō payānusārēṇa ।। 1299॥
turayassa jāi sēnnaṁ tāī vi naṭṭhāī pavaṇapathāī । pacchā annāyadisaṁ khinnaṁ ca niyattaē sēnnaṁ ।। 1300 ॥
kumarō thiraṁ pi bhavaṇaṁ niyai bhamaṁtaṁ va turayarayavasaō | ahavā appāṇaṁ piva paraṁ pi pēcchati capalagaī ।। 1301 ।।
pannarasajōvaṇāī nīō aḍavīē tēṇa turaṁēṇa । kumarō kubēradattō saṁtō tatō visannō ya ।। 1302॥
muyai karāō vaggaṁ jhaṁpaṁ dāūṇa uttariukāmō । jāva kumārō turaō tāva ṭiō takkhaṇē uḍḍhō ।। 1303।।
sāsāūriyahiyaō kōvēṇa va kaṁpamāṇa savvaṁgō । kumarēṇa taō nāō jahēsa vivarīyasikkhō ti ।। 1304 ।।
dīharaaddhā samēṇa vihuriyaṁ jāṇiūṇa taṁ turayaṁ । uttariūṇaṁ tattō uttārai vakkharaṁ kumarō ।। 1305 ॥
ullōḍiyama kaviē muhakuharāō turaṁgamassa taō । nīhariyaṁ pāṇēhi laḍhavayāsēhi va lahuṁ pi ।। 1306 ॥
divasaddhēṇa vi kumarō aibhūmi sō gaō hayavilaggō | ahavā āsārūḍhāṇa hōi dūraṁ pi āsannaṁ ।। 1307 ||
davadaḍḍhapaēsāō tattō puraō payāi jā kumarō । āsannaṁ ciya pēccha tāva purō bahalavaṇasaṁḍaṁ ।। 1308 ।।
ghammēṇa vammahēṇa va aha tāvijjata asahasavvaṁgō । vaṇalacchīē dūī va pēsaē sō niyaṁ diṭṭhi ।। 1309।।।
taddiṭṭhanivaḍaṇummāhiya vva āsannasēvayaṁ sā vi । āhavaṇatthaṁ dvayaṁ va pēsaē tassa miupavaṇaṁ ॥ 1310॥
pavaṇasamāgama saṁjaṇiya nivvuī naṁdaṇō vi naravaiṇō । vaṇalacchīē samuhaṁ saṁcaliō maṁdamaṁdagaī ।। 1311 ।।
pasaratapavaṇapēriyapa।yavasā haggahattha mukkēhiṁ । kusumēhiṁ vivihvannēhiṁ vaṇasirī rayai payaraṁ ca ।। 1312 ।।
nīsēsavaṇasarī daṁsaṇammi ūsuyamaṇō vi sō kumarō । pahakhinō vīsamiuṁ vaṁchai ēgattha chāyāē ।। 1313॥
sūrō vikarapphāsaṁ pi na lahaē jīē ahilasaṁtō vi । annōnnamiliyadala nivataruhāṇaṁ samīvāō ।। 1314 ॥
muddiya maṁḍavasaṇāhalayaharama jaṁtarammi pavisēuṁ । tamaisiddhiṁ kumarō sēvai chāyaṁ jahicchāēṁ ।। 1315।।
pavaṇapahallirapallavaparōpparāsaṁgaja ṇiyasukkāraṁ । sikkāraṁ va kuṇati kāmuyamaṇamōhasaṁjaṇayaṁ ॥1316॥

42
sirimunisuvvayajidicariyaṁ
chāyāsannaṁ taṁ pāsiūṇa piyapaṇaiṇi vva īsāē । āgamma jhatti taddidvigōyarē nirvāḍiyā niddā || 1317॥
taha nimbharamāliṁga taṁ maulijjata lōyaṇō jaha sō । ūsāsamēttalakkhijjamāṇacēyannaō hōi ।। 1318 ॥
aha niddāē mukkō niyaicchaṁ pūrijaṁ khaṇaṁ kumarō । siddhammi niē kajjē savvō vi aṇāyarō hōi ।। 1319।।
pariccattō nihāē visiṭṭayaravēyaṇāē sō gahiō । sōhagganihī purisō rujjhai annannanārīhi ।। 1320 ॥
tattō niggaṁtūṇaṁ ujjāṇasiri palōyaē kumarō । kajjavasasiḍhiliyaṁ pi hu sārhēti buhā puṇabhiruiyaṁ ।। 1321॥
āsanna māgaō vihu sūrō nāūṇa niyapathāvassa । apavēsaṁ tammi vaṇē khēēṇa va dūramōsarai ।। 1322 ।।
nihuyaṁ nihālayaṁtō bhamai taruṁ ēkka mēkkamaha kumarō । ēkkammi vivaddharasā na hōṁti chēyāṇa diṭṭhīō ।। 1323॥
jattō jattō cakkhu nikkhivai niēi satya tatyēsō । sāhādalapallava kusumaphalabharāūriyā taruṇō ।। 1324 ॥
rammāō ramyaraṁ palōyamāṇō purō purō vayai । kumarō buhayaṇabuddhī visēsagahaṇujjayā hōi ।। 1325।।
pēkkhēi taō ēkkaṁ sarōvaraṁ garuyapāliparikhittaṁ । ciravippauttamiliyaṁ siddhimittaṁ va kayaharisaṁ ।। 1326
tassābhimuhaṁ gaṁtuṁ pālīē matthayammi āruhai । jā kumarō tā pēkkhaṛa jalabhariyaṁ taṁ samuddē va ।। 1327।।
vimalasilābaddhataḍaṁ aṇēgasōvāṇapatiparikaliyaṁ । nalinayaṇēhiṁ viṣphāriēhi kumaraṁ niyaṁtaṁ va ।। 1328 ॥
pavaṇa samāya kaṁpaṁtakamaliṇīpattapāṇinivahēhiṁ । āhavaṇaṁ va kuṇaṁtaṁ puṇō puṇō tasṣa kumara ।। 1329॥
salilassa vahuttaṇaō tammi paē sē amāyamāṇaṁ va । ucchalithagurutaraṁgēhi ūsasaṁtaṁ va uḍhadisi ।। 1330॥
laharīhiṁ tāḍayaṁtaṁ taḍabhittimabhikkhaṇaṁ va pēllaṁtaṁ । dūrōsāraṇabuddhīē lachumavayā samavijalaṁ ।। 1331 ।।
majjaṁtamattakuṁjaragaṁḍayaluḍḍīṇachappayakulēhiṁ । jalahibhamagahiya saliluppayaṁtanavamē hamāla va ।। 1332 ।।
āsanna viyayavarapuṁḍarīyachāyā virāyamāṇēhiṁ । sēvijjaṁtaṁ va naridamaṁdiraṁ rāyahaṁsahi ।। 1333 ।।
gayaṇamayamavajayaṁtaṁ avirayaviyaraṁtarāyahaṁsēhiṁ । junhā siyapaurapayāvabhāsamāṇaṁ mahābhōyaṁ ॥ 1334 ||
sunnāranaṁ va samīracalikhaṇavitrābhiramaṇijjaṁ । kamalēhiṁ puṁḍarīēhi savvaō sōhamāṇaṁ ca ।। 1335 ।।
vaṇa kariturayana rēhiṁ pāsammi samaṁtaō samatēhi । māṇijjai jammi phuḍaṁ rāyasarī rāyahaṁsēhiṁ ।। 1336॥
majjagakajjasamujjayavaṇakuṁjarakaravimukkasalilēhiṁ । diṇayarakaraparitattaṁ nahaṁgaṇaṁ siṁcamāṇaṁ va ।। 1337।।
kumarō saniyaṁ saṇiyaṁ sōvāṇapaṇa ōyarēūṇa । tīratarupatisāhānisiddha majjhanharavitāvaṁ ॥ 1338 ॥
tassa sarassa taḍatthaṁ piyai jalaṁ sīyalaṁ ca vimalaṁ ca । pakkhālai savvaṁgaṁ jalāvagāhaṁ karēūṇa ।। 1339 ॥
tattō niyattiūṇaṁ tēṇēva pahēṇa uḍḍhamāruhai । pālīsiharagayāē vaṇarāīē tarūṇa taō ।। 1340 ।।
kālō ciyāiṁ ginhai mahurarasāī phalāī pakkāī । tēhiṁ niyapāṇavitti kāūṇaṁ pāliuvarimmi ।। 1341 ।।
bhamiūṇiya ra disāē ōruhai kubēradattavarakumarō । puṇa pēkkhiuṁ payaṭṭō vaṇalacchi tīē vidisā ।। 1342॥
tatthēkkammi paē sē diṭṭhō ussaggasaṁṭhiō sāhū । tēṇa sahasa tti paramakkharammi līṇō parihabāhū ॥1343 ॥
sōmō vva sōmalēsō diṇayarabiṁbaṁ va dittatavatēō । mēru vva niṣpakaṁpō gaṁbhīrō sāgaravarō vva ॥1344 ||
karacaraṇanimmalāruṇanahamaṇikiraṇēhiṁ nīharatēhiṁ niyadēhāō rāyaṁ nīhāraṁtō vva vāhimmi ।। 1345 ।।
sarayasalilaṁ va satyō taha mēṇi maṁḍala va savvasahō । pavaṇō vva apaḍibaddhō aṇissiō aṁtarikkhaṁ va ।। 1346 ॥
daṁsaṇamēttēṇaṁ ciya paṇāsayaṁtō vva pāvapa bhāraṁ । bhaviyajaṇāṇa jaṇēṁtō auvva suhakammasaṁghāyaṁ ॥। 1347 ॥
ciravippauttasahasa tti diṭṭhapiyabaṁdhavāō ambhahiyaṁ । tadaṁsaṇajaṇiyapamōyamuvvatēṇa kumarēṇa ॥। 1348 ।।
॥ chahiṁ gāhākulayēṁ ||

kubēradattacariyaṁ
savappaṇā vi kumarassa tassa diṭṭhī muṇimmi tammi ṭhiyā । vaṇasiridaṁsaṇa cirabhamaṇajāyakhēya vva vīsaṁtā
taṁ daṭṭhūṇa vigappas kubēradattō mammi nivataṇaō । āsāvahāṇaṇamamhaṁ imamāsāpūrayaṁ jāyaṁ ॥1350 ॥
nimmāṇusēvi ratnē ēyammi jamēsa muṇivarō amha । supasannavayaṇakamalō nayaṇāṇa pahammi ōinnō ।। 1351 ।।
ēyassa daṁsaṇēṇaṁ amha kayatthāī tāva nayaṇāī । jāyāī saṁpayaṁ puṇa paṇāmakaraṇēṇa kāō vi ।। 1352 ।।
hōu katthō ēsō iyacitēūṇa vaccai samīvaṁ । tassa muṇissa kumārō jāva taō sō na diṭṭhi pi ।। 1353 ।।
ummīlaṛa thēvaṁ pi hu puṇō vi tō citaē maṇē kumarō । jaha ēsa mahappā catta savvasaṁgō nirīhō ya ।। 1354 ।।
jai dēvidō visayaṁ ērāvaṇavāraṇammi ārūḍhō । āgacchai kaha vi ihaṁ taṁ pi na ēsō avēkkhēi ।। 1355 ।।
siddhisuhabaddhalakkhō asēsasaṁsāra sōkkhaniravēkkhō । tēlōkkasiripi na ēsa mannaē taṇasamāṇaṁ pi ।। 1356 ।
ēmēva ṭhiyaṁ ēyaṁ ajapamāṇaṁ apāsamāṇaṁ pi । pāēsu paṇamiṇaṁ karōmi supavittamappāṇaṁ ।। 1357।।
iya citiūṇa gaṁtūṇa paṇamaē muṇivarastra caraṇēsu । avaṇīsarassa taṇaō pūrijjatō pamōēṇa ।। 1358 ।।
avarṇētō caraṇarayaṁ tassa muṇidassa niyayakēsēhi । kammarayaṁ pi pamajjai appaṇayaṁ nivaiṇō taṇaō ।। 1359 ।।
saṁvāhiūṇa caraṇē ciraṁ muṇidasta tassa diṭṭhīē । puraō cēva niviṭṭhō taggayadiṭṭhī khaṇaṁ kumarō ।। 1360॥
kumarakara phāsēṇaṁ niyapayakamalēsu jāyamāṇēṇa । diṇṇuvaōgō sāhū ussaggaṁ pāriūṇa lahuṁ ।। 1361 ।।
uvavisa tattha phāsūyabhūmipaēsamma taṇapalicchannē । puṇa uṭṭiūṇa vaṁdai kumarō bhattīē taṁ sāhaṁ ।। 1362 ।।
sāhū vi dhammalābhaṁ dāūṇaṁ pucchaē nivakumāraṁ । nimmāṇusammi ratē ēyammi tumaṁ kuō bhadda ! ।। 1363।।
sāhē taō kumarō kubēradattō niyamayaṁ pi । tatthāgamaṇanimittaṁ tassa purō muṇivadissa ॥ 1364 ।।
aha vistarānaṁdaṇī jāva tassa sāhussa | pāsammi ki pi kōūhalēṇa pucchissai sarūvaṁ ॥ 1365 ।।
asūṇa dūramaṁbarabhāyaṁ thiraviggahō taō jāō । kayavāruṇippasaṁgō sūrō saṁkuiyakarapāō ।। 1366 ।।
atyagirimatthayāō ḍhaliūṇaṁ paḍai jala himajjhammi । karacaṁḍō vāruṇilālasō ya bahu lahai vasaṇāī ।। 1367।।
saṁhariūṇa hāsaṁ kamalamuhaṁ mauliyaṁ kamaliṇīē । niyanāhē atthamiē kulīṇa nārīṇa juttamiṇaṁ ।। 1368 ।।
rattaṁbaraparihāraṁ karēi pacchimadisā taō jhatti । lōgaṁtarammi pattē niyaramaṇē sahasakiraṇammi ।। 1369।।
tō sāhuṇā kumārō bhaṇiō jaha bhadda ! saṁpayaṁ amha । karaṇijjavisēsō kō vi vaṭṭaē taṁ karissāmō ॥। 1370।।
kumarēṇa taō sahasa tti sīsa saṁghaḍiyapāṇijuyalēṇa । paṇamaṁtaēṇa sāhū vinnattō kuha niyakiccaṁ ॥ 1371 ।।
tumbhē saṁpa amhē puṇa ēttha vi tumha pāyaparamāṇaṁ । hōumadūrāsannā ciṭṭhissāmō muhuttaṁ pi ।। 1372 ।।
vihiyāṇudvāṇassa vi pajjatē tumha muhamayaṁkāō । nītavayaṇa junhājalēṇa nivvāvaissāmō ॥1373।।
niyasavaṇakaṁdarāī tattō sāhū kayāsanavisēsō । niyakiccammi payaṭṭai kumara vi jahuttamāyarai ।। 1374।।
ēyāō vihasiyāō uiyammi diṇē sirē maha riummi । tamhā tassa parōkkha nāsēmi imāṇa nāmaṁ pi ।। 1375।।
iya citiuṁ ca timiraṁ laddhappasaraṁ pahāviyaṁ turiyaṁ । savvadisāvilayāō kōvēṇēgattha mēlē ।। 1376।।
taha kuṇai jahā tāsi kālīkayaāṇaṇāṇa pavibhāō । thēvō vi na lakkhijjai kēṇa vi dakkhēṇa vi narēṇa
pasara ghajsdhayārō chuṭṭō kasiṇō va kēsapabbhārō । naṭṭammi nahamaṇimmī nahalacchīē ruyaṁtīē ।। 1378 ।।
kālē pāḍhaēṇa vatimiramasīē vilipiyaṁ sayalaṁ । gayaṇaphalayaṁ visālaṁ tārakkharakaḍḍhaṇanimittaṁ ।। 1379।।
nimmalacakkhū vi jaṇō vimalaṁ maliṇaṁ tayā samaṁ visamaṁ । pāsai samarūvaṁ ciya natthi vivēō tamaṁdhāṇa || 1380 ।।
pasaratē timirabharē jugavaṁ ciya savvamēva saṁjāyaṁ । nīlīrasassa majjhē majjēuṁ kaḍhiyaṁ va jayaṁ । । 1381 ॥
dhavalaṁ pivatthu tamasaṁgamēṇa kasiṇaṁ va pāsaē lōō। dujjaṇamiliō suyaṇō vidīsaē tassa sāricchōṁ ।। 1382 ।।

૪૪
sirimunisuvvayajidicarivaṁ
vitthariē tamapasarē sāmalavannō samiddhimaṇupattō kō vā na lahai lacchi udayaṁ pattē sapakkhammi ।। 1383 ||
savvattō vitthariō tusārakaratāratārayāniyarō । nahamaṁḍalē virāya tamāladala sāmalacchāē ।। 1384 ।।
gayaṇamaṇi pariṇaṭṭha annēsaṁtīē gayaṇalacchīē । caṁkramaṇasamumbhinna vva biṁduṇō sēyasalilassa ।। 1385 ।।
kālē māliēṇa va khittō varasēya kusumapanbhārō । uttānaparisaēraṁḍapattavihiyammi paṭṭammi ।। 1386॥
nahamaṁḍalalacchīē nāuṁ mayalaṁchaṇassa āgamaṇaṁ । siyavantrēṇa viraiō kusumasamūhēṇa payarō vva ।। 1387।।
maragayapattē hāraṁ va pōiuṁ mōtiyāī khittāī । sāmāē bhāmiṇīē mayaṁkadaṁsaṇasayanhāē ।। 1388 ||
iyabhīsaṇaṁdhayārē viyaraṁtē sayalabhuvaṇavalayammi । bhīyaṁ va taṁ arannaṁ jāyaṁ savvaṁ pi ainihuyaṁ ।। 1389।।
nagāhā gayavihagaṁ pasuttanī sēsapāyavasamūhaṁ । niyanilayanilukka samaggavaṇayarappāṇisaṁghāyaṁ ॥1390॥
paricattasattasaṁcāramuvarayā sēsasahasaṁdōhaṁ ghōraṛa va ghōraghaggharaghūyaḍaghōsēhiṁ kayani ॥1391॥
niyamahakuharapaviṭṭhē bhuvaṇaṁ daṭṭū ṇa iya samaggaṁ pi । paḍivatārādasaṇō hasai va tamarakkhasō hiṭṭhō ।। 1392 ।।
nivvattiyaniyakiccō sāhū sajjhāyavāvaḍō hōi । kumarōvi samāgatūṇa paṇamiuṁ tassa sāhussa ।। 1393।।
pāsamma nisīyai jōḍiūṇa niyapāṇipaṁkayāṇa juyaṁ । sāhū vi tassa nāuṁ sussasaṁ kahai dhammakahaṁ ।। 1394 ।।
dhammaka kahamāṇassa tassa muṇiṇō muhaṁ apāsatē । rāyakumarē timirappasarēṇa tirōhiyā tāhē ।। 1395 ।।
tassa pagāsahēḍaṁ va uggaō timiramavaharai rāyā । tassāgamaṇē appāṇamujjalaṁ kuṇai rayaṇī vi ।। 1396।।
paḍibuddhēṇa (va) muṇidēsaṇāē caṁdēṇa jhatti mukkāī | caṁdujjaya' ? baṁdhāō savvāī vi.bhamaravaṁdāī ।। 1397।।
baṁdhavimōyaṇa saṁjayaharisabhara nibbhara vva bhamaragaṇā । guṁjiyamisēṇa sasiṇō kuṇaṁti guṇa maṁḍalaggahaṇaṁ ॥। 1398 ।।
junhāduddhapavāhēṇa sasaharō sayalamaṁbaraṁ jhati । pakkhāliūṇa dhavalaṁ karēi ghaṇatimiramasimaligaṁ ।। 1399 ।।
chuhiyāṇa caōra vihaṁgamāṇa sakuḍuṁbayāṇa va jahicchaṁ । dinaṁ sasiṇā pīūsapāṇamaṇiyaṁtittikaraṇa || 1400 ।।
nivaḍataduddhadhārā saṁkāē muddhabhuyagapōēhiṁ । pijjai junhā avivannatanhamuttāṇi ya muhēhi ॥। 1401 ।।
sikara saṁvaliyāṇaṁ maliṇāṇa vi dhavalimā samullasai । uttamaguṇāṇa saṁgēi viguṇō viguṇittaṇaṁ lahai । । 1402 ।।
pārayarasēṇa pakkhāliyaṁ va khaḍiyārasēṇa sitaṁ va । jāyaṁ jayaṁ pi junhā dhavalaṁ phalihēṇa ghaḍiyaṁ va ।। 1403।।
kāgī niyabhattāraṁ bagasaṁkāē pariccaēūṇa । taṁ saddaṁ taṁ saddēṇa jāṇiuṁ puṇa samalliyai ॥। 1404 ।।
patthuya kahāvasāṇē kubēradattōṁ puṇōvi paṇamēuṁ । vinnavai jōḍi (ya) karō taṁ muṇimēvaṁ viṇayajuttō ।। 1405 ।।
tumha samammi muṇidapucchiuṁ kiṁ ci atthi maha vaṁchā । niddāvayaṇa parissamapīḍā tumhaṁ jai na hōi । । 1406।।
tō tumhāsēṇaṁ pucchāmi taō muṇī kumaramāha । niddā - pamāyamajjhē vajjēyavvā taō ēsā ।। 1407 |
muṇiva sahēhiṁ niccaṁ aha kīrai tō nisāē jāmadugā । uvari jāmō ēgō kāyavvō na uṇa puraō vi ।।
paḍhamē dō nisijāmē sajjhāyaparāyaṇāṇa sāhūṇa । vayaṇassamō vivihiō paharō inhi tu kiṁcūṇō ।। 1409 ।।
paḍhamō gaō nisāē tā puccha jahicchamappaṇō'bhimayaṁ । iya sāhuṇā pabhaṇiō pucchara taṁ pamuiō kumarō ॥
bhayavaṁ ! kaha ēvaṁ majjha karēūṇa aigurupasāyaṁ । kammāī baliyāī kiṁ vā baliō purisayārō ।। 1411 ।
aha sāhuṇā paṇiya kumāra ! dōnni vi imāī valiyāī । niyaniyaṭhāṇammi taō baliyattaṁ dōnha vi samāṇaṁ ॥
kammagurūvō jamhā vavasāō hōi savvajīvāṇaṁ । vavasāēṇa ya kammaṁ jīvassa jaṇijjaē nūṇaṁ ।। 1413 ।।
siddhatē vi bhaṇiyaṁ baliyattaṁ kammapurisayārāṇaṁ । annōnnaṁ saṁjāyai kassa vi kaiyā vi abalattaṁ ।। 1314 ।
ēyammi vaiyarē tuha akkhēmi kahāṇayaṁ jahā sammaṁ । pariṇamai tujjha ēsō aṭṭhō savvō maē kahiō ।। 1415 ।।
1. taṁ dujjaya baṁdhāō pā0 ।

45
kumarēṇa taō sīsē hatthē ārōviūṇa iya bhaṇiyaṁ । ciṭṭhāmi kahā savaṇukkuṁṭhiyā hiyaō kahaha tubhē ।। 1416 ।।
tō kahai maṇī vi jahā ihēva vijayammi asthi varanayaraṁ । harisaura nāmēṇaṁ amarāṇa vi jaṁ manōharaṇaṁ ॥
nāmēṇa harisapālō pālai nīīē taṁ puhaivālō । vikkamaguṇasaṁpannō niṭṭaviyā sēsapaḍivakkhō । ।। 1418 ।।
aṁtērapahāṇā dēvī tassa'tthi harisamaināmā । niyaguṇarūvāiguṇēhiṁ dēvīṇa viharai jā gavvaṁ ।। 1419॥
tāṇaṁ jāō puttā siriharisō nāma harisasaṁjaṇaō । jaṇayāṇa sēsāṇa vi jaṇāṇa nayaṇēhiṁ dīsaṁtō ।। 1420॥
siriharisapālarannō samaē annamma niyayadēsassa । majjhāō āgaṁtuṁ paṇihī purisēhiṁ parikahiyaṁ ।। 1421 ॥
jaha amhē dēvēṇaṁ āsī niyamaṁḍalassa majjhammi । sayalasarūviyāṇaṇakajjēṇa nirūviyā puvvaṁ ।। 1422 ।।
paigāmaṁ painagaraṁ paribbhamaṁtēhi dēva ! amhēhi | annannēhi misēhi lōēṇa alakkhiyaṁ tēhi || 1423॥
dhannaranāgā mē bhavaṇē paṭṭailasūrapālassa । diṭṭhā ēgā kannā aṇannasāhāraṇaguṇōhā || 1424 ।।
rūvēṇa puṇa raī pihu lajjāvatī sayaṁ salajjā vi । sayalitthi lakkhaṇēhiṁ saṁjuttā pasatthēhi ।। 1425।।
inhi jōvvaṇa pattā jassa vi tassa vi ya appasarisassa । tō nicchaēṇa dāhī tajjaṇaō sūrapālō taṁ ।। 1426।।
dēvassēya jōggā sā pariṇēuṁ taō samāṇēuṁ । dēvō pariṇēu sayaṁ taṁ kannaṁ mā vilaṁbēu ।। 1427 ।।
tavvayaṇasavaṇasamaṇaṁtaraṁ pi saṁjāyagaruyaaṇurāō । rāyā pēsai purisē rāyā saṁ samappēuṁ ॥ 1428।।
dhanna rāmagāmē pāsē paṭṭailasūrapālassa । taṁ kannaṁ patthēuṁ samappiō tēhi gaṁtūṇa ।। 1429 ।।
tattha siriharisapālā ēsō gāmāhivassa hatthammi । kahiyaṁ ca rāyavayaṇaṁ ahiṇaṁ taō tēṇa ।। 1430॥
bhōyaṇa - nhāṇāīō tāṇa kaō gōravō ahamahaṁtō । hakkāriūṇa gāmassa lēhayaṁ daṁsaē tassa ।। 1431।।
rāyāēsaṁ taṁ vāiūṇa sō tassa sāhai tayatthaṁ । jaha āṇāvai rāyā nirikkhi kannagaṁ tujjha ॥1432।।
aha sō bhajjāē saha kāūṇaṁ maṁtanicchayaṁ pacchā । saṁvāhai taṁ kasaṁ aṇūpamva saha sajaṇaṇīē || 1433।
tajjaṇaṇīē tihuyaṇadēvīē sagaḍamārutīē । kēṇāvi sammuhaṁ ciya jhaḍatti chīyaṁtaō ēsō ॥1434।।
avasauṇō ēsa mahallau tti nāūṇa niyamaṇē bhīyā । pacchā niyattiūṇaṁ gihē paviṭṭhā ṭhiyā jaṁtī ॥। 1435 ।।
dhūyā aṇupamvā puṇa piuṇā saṁpēsiyā vihēūṇa । vatthāisaṁvāhaṁ ārōhēūṇa varasagaḍē ॥1436।।
tīē saha paṭṭaviyā ēgā kammāyariyā tahā caurō । pāikkā āuhapāṇiṇō ya bahudinnasaṁvalayā ।। 1437।।
sammāṇiūṇa ranō purisō tēsi bhalāviyā ēsā bhaṇiyā ya tē ṇi maṁ tē visajjaē jai imaṁ rāyā ॥
tō kulasēṇiha pattā jaha hōi imā tahā karēyavvaṁ । tumhēhi maē ēsā samappiyā tumha niya thavaṇī ।। 1439॥
saha ēīē ya ahaṁ pi saṁpayaṁ ēmi tattha paramēttha । saṁjāyavisaṁvāyā kuḍubiyā kē vi ciṭṭhati । ।। 1440 ।।
saṁbōhijjēti na tē jai saṁpayamēva tōsamuccaliuṁ । dōha vi pakkhāṇaṁ bahukuḍubiyā jaṁti annattha ।। 1441 ॥
tō tō saṁbōhēuṁ ahaṁ pi paṭṭīē āgamissāmi । jai kiṁpi divvavasaō annaṁ pi na jāyaē vigdhaṁ ॥। 1442 ।।
aha tē nariṁda-purisā aṇupamvaṁ kannagaṁ gaūṇa । sigghapayāṇēhi gayā nayarē harisauranāmammi ।। 1443 ||
nayarāsannapahāō puraō hōūṇa nivaiṇō purisā । ' nivavāvīdēsapā sē kannaṁ mōttuṁ puṇō tē u ।। 1444 ॥
jaṁti naridasamī daṇa narēsarēṇa dūrāō । ālattā sapamōyaṁ tē purisā paṇa maūṇa nivaṁ । । । । 1445 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-46-to-46.json ==========================
46
sāhati tassa puraō samāgayā dēva sūrapālassa । paṭṭailassa aṇupasva nāmā varakannagā ēttha ।। 1446 ।।
rannā tē paripuṭṭhā sā saṁpai kammi ciṭṭhaē ṭhāṇē । sārhēti tē vi jaha sā nivasa dēvassa vāvī || 1447॥
puṇa pucchiyā nivēṇaṁ tē purisā (ēva) saṁpayā tīsē । tumhēhiṁ pēkkhiyā kērisitti tō tēhi parikahiyaṁ ॥
amhēhi dēva diṭṭhā jāō kāō vi ēttha itthīō। rūyavaīō puhaīlammi tāṇaṁ samaggāṇaṁ ।। 1449 ।।
rūpēṇa samanbhahiyā aṇūpamvā kannagā imaṁ amhē । jāṇāmō ēyaṁ puṇaṁ sakkēmō pabhaṇiḍaṁ nēya ॥ 1450 ।।
jaha ēriyā annā saṁpai nārī na vijjaē tijaē। jai puṇa kā vi adiṭṭhā amhēhi vi atthi rūyavaī ||
pēkkhissa dēvō vaha sayaṁ pitaṁ saṁpayaṁ ciya taō kiṁ । kīrai dappaṇadaṁsaṇamābaddhē kaṁkaṇē hatthē ।। 1452 ।।
tō rannā tē purisā bhaṇiyāṁ gaṁtūṇa iya bhaṇaha tumbhē । nayarārakkhaṁ vayaṇēṇa majjha jaha taṁ niēūṇa ।। 1453 ।।
katthai nayarasa bahiṁ majjhē vā saṁgayaṁ samāvāsaṁ । appaha aṇūpamvāē tēṇa taō dasiyāvāsē || 1454 ।।
taṁ tattha ṭhavēūṇaṁ tumbhēhi jhatti mama samāgaṁtuṁ । kahiyavvamērisa tō tēhi taha cciya karēūṇa ।। 1555 ।।
āgaṁtūṇa kahiyaṁ naravaiṇō tēṇa tē puṇō bhaṇiyā । niyaniyagihē bhōktuṁ tumbhēhi tattha gaṁtūṇa ।। 1456 ।।
nicca pi ciṭṭhiyavvaṁ tīsē pāsē diyā va rāō ya । tumbhēhi pariciēhi tattha ṭhiēhi jahā tīsē ।। 1457 ।।
araī na hōi cittē jaṁtī sē kiṁ (pi) jāyaē kajjaṁ । tumhē hi vi kāyavvaṁ taṁ sakkaṁ jaṁ puṇa asakkaṁ ।। 1458 ।।
taṁ mama āgaṁtūṇaṁ kahiyavvaṁ tō imaṁ nivāsaṁ । paḍivajjiūṇa savvaṁ taha cēva kuṇaṁti tē niccaṁ ।। 1459 ।।
nivainiuttā purisā gaṁtūṇa aṇūpamvāē pāsammi । rāyāikahāīhi kuṇaṁti sayayaṁ maṇaviṇōyaṁ ॥ 1460 ।।
sā vi paivāsaraṁ citra aṇūpamvā kayasarīrasakkārā । tēhiṁ samaṁ kuṇamāṇī vivihakahāō gamai diyahē ||
sēninittapurisā yā vi ēvaṁ bhaṇati hāsēṇaṁ । sammuhamamvāē jaha amhē tujjha piugāmē ।। 1462 ।।
pannāsajōyaṇāī gaṁtūṇa tumaṁ taō gahēūṇa । ētyāgayā iyāṇiṁ diyā ya rāō ya tuha sēvaṁ || 463।
kuṇamāṇā ciṭṭhāmō pariṇēhī tā tumaṁ jāyā rāyā। hōhisi niyamēṇa tathā naravaiṇō taṁ pasāyavaī ।। 1464 ।।
tō mhāṇa pasāyaṁ kuṇasi tumaṁ kaṁpi tammi samayammi । kiṁ vā nō pariyāṇasi diṭṭha ē vihu diṭṭhipāsammi ||
sā pabhaṇaṛa tē purisē majjha pasāēṇa jai narāhivaī । dēhī ēgaṁ gāmaṁ tō tumha caunha vi jaṇāṇaṁ । । 1466 ।।
bhūmi ēgēgahalassa tammi gāmammi niyamaō dāhaṁ । dāṇirahiyaṁ pasāēṇa vatthajuyalaṁ tahēkkēkaṁ ।। 1467 ।।
jai puṇa dōni lahissaṁ gāmē tō puvvajaṁpiyaṁ savvaṁ । duguṇaṁ pi paryācchassaṁ tumha ahaṁ iha na saṁdēhō || 1468 ।।
ēvaṁ ciṭṭhatāṇaṁ sattaṭṭagayāī tāṇa diyahāī । rāyā annannapaōyaṇēhi aivāulattēṇa ।। 1469 ।।
gaṁtuṁ tattha na pārai kannāē aṇupavāē āvāsē । tō tīē naranāhō tēsi purisāṇa pāsāō ।। 1470 ।।
ēvaṁ bhaṇāviō jaha kajjaṁ amhēhi natthi jai tumha । tō sigdhaṁ pi visajjaha amhē jāmō jahā gāmaṁ ।। 1471 ।।
pāikā vasahā viya sasaṁdaṇā nirūvaōgamēvēha | ciṭṭhēti kuṇatā saṁbalassa hāṇi ahaṁ ca tahā ।। 1472 ।।
iya gaṁtūṇaṁ kahiyaṁ purisēhiṁ tēhi nivaiṇō puraō । tēṇa taō tēsi ciya pāsammi suvannasaya mēgaṁ ।। 1473 ।।
saṁpēsiyaṁ nimittaṁ tīsē taha bhāṇiyaṁ ca ērisayaṁ । kajjāulattaṇēṇaṁ ṭhiō ahaṁ ēttiyadiṇāṇi ।। 1474 ।।
inhi jaṛa kajjāṇaṁ sathāī bahuyāī saṁbhavissaṁti । taha viya diṇadugamajjhē titthāhaṁ āgamissāma || 1475 ।।
cittammikā vi adhiī niyammi na taō taē vihēyavvā । dūradvāṇāu tumaṁ kēṇa vi kajjēṇa ēttha maē ॥। 1476॥
