=== vardhamanaoutput-47-to-47.json ==========================
kubēradattacariyaṁ
47
āṇāviyāsi tēhi vi naridapurisēhi tattha gaṁtūṇaṁ । gēhē aṇūpamvāē nirvādinaṁ appiyaṁ kaṇayaṁ ।। 1477।।
kahiyaṁ ca savvamēva ya tī sē puraō naridasaṁdiṭṭhē । paritudrumaṇā jāyā aṇūpamvā takkhaṇē vi taō ।। 1478 ।।
ate divasamma gaō yā vi aṇūpamvāē āvāsē । ētaṁ daṭṭhūṇa nivaṁ samuṭṭhiyā āsaṇāō taō ॥। 1479 ।।
sigghaṁ aṇūpamvā javaṇiyāē thōvaṁ tirōhiō appā । tīē taō nariṁdō pallaṁ kē puvaṭhaviyammi ।। 1480 ।।
uvaviṭṭhō taṁ daṭṭhē kannaṁ iya jaṁpaē suyaṇu ! ēhi । kiṁ tujjha pēiyaharē ērisaō cēva āyārō ।। 1481 ।।
jaṁ pāhuṇagamma samāgammi gammai palāiuṁ dūrē । iya nivabhaṇiyammi imā sahāyapurisēhiṁ bhaṇiūṇa ।। 1482 ॥
āṇīyā naravaiṇō samōvadēsamma tō karēūṇa । aṁguṭṭhi uvaviṭṭhā ratnā saṁbhāsiyā ēsā ।। 1483।।
tuha muha daṁsaṇa hē amhē ētyāgayā mayaṁkamuhi ! । taṁ puṇa na pēkkhasē amha sammuhaṁ namiya muhakamalā ।। 1484 ।।
pāsaṭṭiēhiṁ bhaṇiyā purisēhi taō naridēvayaṇassa । saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ sammuhamavalōyai sā vi khaṇamēkkaṁ ।। 1485 ।।
rāyā lōyaṇajuyalaṁ tīsē viyasiyasarōyadaladīhaṁ । saralaṁ nāsāvaṁsaṁ bibīphala sarisamaharaṁ ca ।। 1486 ।।
hatthē asōyapallavatullē kummu vva unnaē pāē । payaḍē palōiūṇaṁ sēsaṁgaṁ vatthaṭhaiyaṁ pi ।। 1487।।
saṁṭhāṇa visēsēṇaṁ diṭṭhā vayaṇāṇusāraō tahaya । niruvamakhyaṁ nāuṁ vimhaiō citai maṇammi ।। 1488 ।।
ubhaḍasiṁgāravivajjiyā vi diṭṭhā maṇaṁ vimōhēi । jai tāva imā tō karyāsaṁgārā kērisaṁ karihī ।। 1489 ।।
tassēva ya rajjaphalaṁ tassēva ya maṇuyajīviyaṁ sahalaṁ । tassēva ya visayasuhaṁ jassēsā jāyaē jāyā ।। 1490 ।।
iccāi citiūṇaṁ mayaṇavasāulamaṇō khaṇaṁ rāyā । niyabīḍayaṁ payacchaṛa tīsē kappūradalakaliyaṁ ।। 1491 ।।
avvattajaṁpirīē lajjā pūrijjamānahiyathāē । tīē saha kāūṇaṁ jahōciyaṁ kaṁ pi ālāvaṁ ।। 1492 ।।
rāyā samuṭṭhiūṇaṁ niyapāsāē payāi tattha gaō । hakkāriūṇa pabhaṇai nārī lakkhaṇa viūpurisē ।। 1493।।
gaṁtūna aṇūpamvakannagāē dēhammi lakkhaṇaṁ niyaha । jōggā naridabhajjattaṇassa kiṁ vā ajōggā sā ।। 1494 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tēhi sammaṁ nirikkhiūṇaṁ aṇūpamvādēhaṁ । āgaṁtūṇaṁ kahiyaṁ ranō jaha atthi jōggattaṁ ।। 1495 ।।
tīsē naridabhajjattaṇammi taha sā jaṇissaē puttaṁ । aiyapayāvavaṁtaṁ puhaīē pasāhagaṁ pavaraṁ ।। 1496 ।।
sammāṇiūṇa ratnā visajjiyā tē pahiṭṭhacittēṇa । hakkāriūṇa puṭṭhā vivāhalaggaṁ taō gaṇayā ।। 1497।।
gaṇiūṇa tēhi laggaṁ kahiyaṁ paṁcamadiṇammi naravaiṇō । rāyāmaccēṇa taō puṇō vi tē pucchiyā ēvaṁ ।। 1498।।
pariṇīyāē imāē kannāē aṇupatrābhihāṇāē । amha pahuṇō bhavisi kallāṇaparaṁparā puraō ।। 1499 ।।
pucchālaggassuvari jōisiēhiṁ taō samaggēhi । paribhāviūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ nivapaccakkhaṁ maccapurō ।। 1500 ।।
paribhāviṁtāṇaṁ jōisamma jaṁ ki ci ēi suhamasuhaṁ । taṁ amha kahaṁ tāṇaṁ rusiyavvaṁ nēya tumhēhiṁ ।। 1501 । ।
sacivēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ jōisadiṭṭhē jahaṭṭiyaṁ tumha । nimmalamaṇabhāvāṇaṁ kō avarāhō kahaṁtāṇaṁ ।। 1502 ।।
tō tumbhē nīsaṁkā hōūṇaṁ kahaha jaha parinnāyaṁ । rannō vā annassa va mā kuṇaha bhayaṁ parikahaṁtā ।। 1503 ।।
tēhi ta jōisajāṇaēhiṁ ranō palōiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ । tō rannāvi taha cci ya tē bhaṇiyā jaha amaccēṇa ।। 1504 ।।
sēsāṇa sammaēṇaṁ jōisiyāṇaṁ kahēi tō ēkkō । annē savvē vi guṇā tīsē dōsō imō ēkkō ।। 1505 ।।
ēīē jō puttō bhavissaē sō imassa nayarassa । rāyāṇaṁ haṇiūṇaṁ haḍhēṇa ginhissaē rajjaṁ ।। 1506 ।।
puṇa puṭṭhā tē rannā ēyassa purassa sāmiṇō tassa । kiṁ nāmaṁ jaṁ haṇiuṁ ēīē suō nivō hōhī ।। 1507 ।।
jōisiēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ nāma na muṇijjaē visēsēṇa । sāmannēṇaṁ najjai harisaurā hivaibhāvēṇa ।। 1508 ।।
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ najjai nāma visēsō kahaṁ vi jai tattō । jai amha ghāyagō sō aṇūpamvaṁ tō na pariṇēmi ।। 1509 ।।

48
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
aha siri harisakumārassa tō na rajjē ṭhavēmi ēyamahaṁ । sō cciya rāyā kīrai aṇūpamvākucchi saṁbhūō ।। 1510 ।।
tō maṁtiṇā paṇiō sasaṁbhramaṁ harisapālanaranāhō । jattha aṇatthuṣpattīē jāyaē saṁsayalavō vi ।। 1511 ।।
taṁ pi nayamaggakusalā durēṇa pariccayaṁti karaṇijjaṁ । jattha puṇōṇatthassa'tthi nicchaō tassa vi na cāō ।। 1512 ।।
tō rannā pattēyaṁ gaṇayā savvē vimaggiyā saddaṁ । dēti jahā ēvaṁ ciya duhātihā vattiyaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 1513 ।।
uṛaḍha dēvassa purō karēmi kaha nicchayaṁ gaṇiyamaggē । maivibbhamō vi jāyai suragurutullassa vi maīē ।। 1514।।
tō sacivēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ēkkō cciya jai gaṇēi tā ēvaṁ saṁbhāvijjai ṇūṇaṁ jattha puṇō ēttiyā gaṇayā ।। 1515 ।।
. tumbhē miliyā savvē niuṇattēṇaṁ gaṇēha bahuvāraṁ । tattha ya saṁdēhalavō vi kīrai jaṁ na sā buddhī ।। 1516 ।।
rāyā taō papai aṇūpa vā saṁpayaṁ piusamī | saṁpēsijjau turiyaṁ jaha sō annassa kassa vi ya ।। 1517 ।।
pāsāō pariṇāvara uciyassa pavannajōvvaṇaṁ ēyaṁ । citai ya tahā vihiṇā amayaṁ uppāiūṇa taō ।। 1518 ।।
kaha tattha visaṁ chūḍhaṁ nimmaviuṁ itthirayaṇa mērisayaṁ । dūsaṇamēyaṁ vihiyaṁ jēṇa'mha ajōggayaṁ jāyaṁ ।। 1519 ।।
hā ! daḍḍha divva kamhā paḍhamaṁ ciya nimmiyā taē ēsā । aha nimmiyā vi tō kaha āṇēuṁ daṁsiyā amha ।। 1520 ।
tō maṁtiṇā naridō bhaṇiō jaha pucchiya vva mannaṁ pi । asthi gaṇayāṇa pāsē taṁ bēi nivō jahā puccha ।। 1521 ।।
puṇa pucchara jōisiē sacivō jaha ērisaṁ puṇō tubhē । paribhāvaha ainiuṇaṁ jaṛa para ṇijjai imā kannā ।। 1522।।
rannā tō tīē suō puvvuddiṭṭha karēi savvaṁ pi । kiṁ vā pariṇīyāē antrēṇa vi kuṇai sō ēvaṁ ।। 1523 ।।
gaṇayā bhaṇati tu pahu pariṇīyāē imāē phuḍamēva । tāvatthi sa dōsō tumhahiṁ vi ērisaṁ cēva ।। 1524 ।।
puṭṭhaṁ jaṁ pariṇīyā ēsā kallāṇakāriṇī hōi । amha pahuṇā na vattiya puvvuvari phalaṁ tayaṁ kahiyaṁ । । 1525 ।।
inhi puṇa anaṁ ci ciṭṭhaha tubbhē kuṇatayā pucchaṁ । tīsē suhāsuhaphalaṁ nirūvayāmō puṇō ahuṇā ।। 1526 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇa gaṇaēhiṁ tēhi gahiūṇa kē pi phuḍa saddaṁ । kēvaliyaabhippāēṇa vattiūṇaṁ imaṁ kahiyaṁ ।। 1527।।
jaivi na pariṇai rāyā kannaṁ tahā vi ēīē। jāō puttō niyamā puvvattaṁ sāhaē atthaṁ ।। 1528 ।।
aha maṁtī - pattēyaṁ gaṇaē savvē vi ginhaē saddaṁ । dōccaṁ taccaṁ vāraṁ tē vi taha ccēva jaṁpaṁti । 1529 ।।
tō maṁtī rāyāṇaṁ vinnaviḍaṁ kāravēda sammāṇaṁ । gaṇayāṇa visajjāvara tē savvē tayaṇuniyagēhē ।। 1530 ।।
sayamēgaṁ tē rannō kannē hōūṇa sāhaē ēvaṁ । na visajjijjai ēsā aṇūpamvā jaṇayapāsamma ।। 1531 ।।
jīvaṁtī jaṁ ēsā pariṇēyavvā narēṇa kēṇā vi । tō jaṇihī sō tīsē puttaṁ sō tumha puṇa sattū ।। 1532 ।।
hōhī tamhā ēsā bhāvi aṇatthaṁkarassa bīyasamā । pacchannaṁ hr̥ṇiūṇaṁ kīra kīṇāpāṇiyā ।। 1533 ।।
tō rāyā taṁ vayaṇaṁ suṇiūṇaṁ maṁtiṇō taō jhatti । pacchāyainiyakanē dōnni vi dōhiṁ pi hatthēhiṁ ।। 1534॥
hāhā saṁtaṁ pāvaṁ paryāpamāṇō puṇō puṇō ēvaṁ । nārī sā vi kumārī vīsāsēuṁ ihāṇīyā ।। 1535।।
tīsē kaha citija cittammi vi ērisaṁ mahāpāvaṁ । kāyadhaṁ puṇa dūrē visēsaō garuyapurisāṇa ।। 1536 ।।
bhaviyanvayāē diṭṭhē ciṭṭhai jaṁ kiṁci annahā kāuṁ । taṁ kēṇā vi na tīrai sakkēṇa vi kiṁ puṇa narēṇa ? ।। 1537 ।।
āha puṇō naranāhaṁ maṁtī jaha dēva puhaivālēhi । puttō vi duducittō nigrgāhiyavvō lahaṁ jamhā || 1538 ।।
iya dakkhinnajuyāṇaṁ paē paē taha ya saṁkamāṇāṇaṁ । avavāyabhīruyāṇaṁ dūrēṇa sirī palāēi ।। 1539 ।।
tō āha nivō maṁti adubhāvā imā sayaṁ inhi । amhuvari tāva tattō nihōsāē vi ēīē ।। 1540 ।।
kaha sakkēmi virūvaṁ citēuṁ māṇasammi vi vidūrē । vāyāē kāyarasa va vāvārō tā na juttamiṇaṁ ।। 1541 ।।
jaṁpiya bhavissakālē uppajjissaṁtaputtadōsēṇa । kīrai vahō imīē imaṁ pi dūraṁ naya - viruddhaṁ ।। 1542 ।।

49
jamhā jō cciya dōsassa kāraō hōi ēttha sō cēva । niggahaṇijjō rannā savvakuḍuṁbassa majjhāō ।। 1543 ॥
lōē vaha ēsōcci suvvai āhāṇaō jayapasiyō । jatthēva hōi dōsō akkōsō paḍai tatthēva ।। 1544 ।।
aṁgamuvaṁgaṁ vā kiṁ pi savvadēhaspa majjhayārammi । jaṁ ci ya ahiṇā daṭṭha chijjai taṁ cēva ēhiṁ ।। 1545 ।।
tamhā tīsē puttō upajjissai kayā vi kiṁ nēya । uppannō vi samatyō kathā vi hōhī aha na hōhī ।। 1546 ।।
saṁjāō vi samatyō amhēhi samaṁ karissara virōhaṁ । sō kiṁvā na karissara iccāi sasaṁsaē pakkhaṁ ।। 1547 ।।
inhi ciya kaha ēvaṁ itthī vahasaṁbhavaṁ mahāpāvaṁ । varasaṁtiaṇuṭṭhēmō satthē vi imaṁ jaō bhaṇiyaṁ ।। 1548 ।।
tinni mahāpāvāiṁ imāī sajjā phalaṁti purisāṇa । itthavahō bālavahō taiō niyasāmiṇō dōhō ।। 1549।।
jammi samayammi hōhī avayārī amha naṁdaṇō tīē । paḍiyārō kāyavvō tahāvihō kō vi taiyā vi ।। 1550 ।।
saṁbaccharapajjaṁtē jassa sarīrē bhavissaē rōgō । inhiciya sajjaṁgō kaha sō kaḍḍhāiyaṁ piyai ।। 1551 ।।
aha maṁtī nāūṇaṁ naridahiyayassa nicchayaṁ havaṁ । annamuvāyaṁ paricitiūṇa niyamaṇiyaaṭṭhassa ।। 1552 ।।
vinnavai nivaṁ ēvaṁ tumha maī dēva ! niuṇagaṁbhīrā । dhammāṇugayā ya tahā pariṇāmasuhāvahā cēva ।। 1553 ।।
amha maī vivarīyā pramāṇamihadēva ! tumha āēsō । aha taṁ visajjiūṇaṁ maṁti rāyā harisālō ।। 1554॥
hakkāriūṇa purisē sayaṁ niuttē aṇūpamvā pāsē । āisai paṭṭailasūrapāladhūyaṁ puṇō nēuṁ ।। 1555 ।।
tassēva samappaha sigdyamēva gaṁtūṇa dhannauragāmē । rāmāēsaṁ paḍivajjiūṇa tē uṭṭiyā tattō ।। 1556 ।।
kahiyaṁ gaṁta apavāē savvaṁ na tēhi nivavayaṇaṁ । tīē vi citiyaṁ niyamaṇammi jai ērisaṁ rannā ।। 1557 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ majjha samīhiyamēva taō tēṇa nimmiyaṁ ēyaṁ । jēṇaṁtēuraguttī nirōhadukkhāja chuṭṭāhaṁ ।। 1558 ।।
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ payaḍaṁ puraō naridapurisāṇa । dinnō jō vi nariṁdē kō vi amhāṇa āēsō ।। 1559 ।।
sōci ya sīsassuvari paḍhamaṁ ci ya āsi ērisaṁ nāyaṁ । niyagāmāō vi maē ētthābhimuhaṁ calaṁtīē ।। 1560।।
ki ciṭṭhēti kyāī ēttiya punnāī annajammammi । amhēhiṁ jēṇa rāyā pariṇissa appaṇā amhē ।। 1561।।
kattha imō naranāhō agasāmaṁtapaṇayapayakamalō । katthāhaṁ kōḍuṁbiyakannā gāmammi vatthavvā ।। 1562 ।।
tamhā dugghaḍamēyaṁ jaṁ hōmi ahaṁ imassa kira kaṁtā । kō majjha iha visāō labbhai dinnaṁ niyaṁ cēva ।। 1563।।
ēttō cciya jaṇaṇīē majjha maē saha taō calaṁtīē । saṁjāō avasauṇō jhaḍatti kēṇai purō chīyaṁ ।। 1564 ।।
saṁpai baṁdhavatubbhē niyabharaṇīē mamōvari karēuṁ । aigaruyaṁ kārunnaṁ nēuṁ maṁ muyaha piupāsē ।। 1565 । ।
niyapaḍivajjāē vi hu hōi imaṁ tāva tumha karaṇijjaṁ । sayamēva nariṁdēṇaṁ dinnā sē visēsēṇaṁ ।। 1566 ।।
aha ratnō purisēhi savisāyaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ imaṁ vayaṇaṁ । samahaṁ aṇūpamvā ēttha vi kō bhaiṇi saṁdēhō ।। 1567।।
ēsō mammi khēō amhāṇaṁ vaṭṭaē aimahaṁtō । jaṁ pattaṁ pi hu cattaṁ rannā pattaṁ tuha saricchaṁ ।। 1568 ।।
imannāmō annō kō visaunnō narō iha mahīē । amha pahuṇō vi pāsāō atthi jō tuha varō hōhī ।। 1569 ॥
jē piupēyipuriyā aṇūpamvāē sahāgayā tattha । tēhi narēsarapurisā puṭṭhā vihirayahiyaēhiṁ ।। 1570 ।।
jaha bhō ? tumbhēhi imaṁ vinnāyaṁ kiṁ pi kāraṇaṁ jēṇa । rannā na hu pariṇīyā aṇūpamvā kannagā ēsā ।। 1571 ।।
saṁpēsiūṇa tumbhē ēttiyajattēṇa jā ihāṇīyā । aigaruyasaṁbhramēṇaṁ āvāsō dāviō jīsē ।। 1572 ।।
tumha karē appēuṁ saṁvalayaṁ pēsiyaṁ tahā tubhē । āiṭṭhā jaha rāō diyā ya tatthēva ṭhāyavvaṁ ।। 1573 ।।
saya mahaāgaṁtūṇaṁ palōiyā sāhilāsadiṭṭhīē । ālaviyā sasiṇēhaṁ aṇūpamvā patthivēṇa jahā ।। 1574 ।।
taṁ tumhāṇavi savvaṁ paccakkhaṁ ciya taha nivāsasā । purisitthī lakkhaṇajāṇaēhiṁ ētthēva āgaṁtuṁ ।। 1575 ।।

kubēradattacariyaṁ
sammaṁ nirūviūṇaṁ aṇūpamvāē sarīramiyabhaṇiuṁ । rūvēṇa lakkhaṇēhiṁ ya saṁjuttā kannayā ēsā ।। 1576।।
uciyā pariṇēuṁ naravarassa tassa viya tēhi iya kahiyaṁ । hakkāriūṇa gaṇaē rannā vi gaṇāviyaṁ sigdhaṁ ।। 1577।।
laggaṁ vivāhajōggaṁ tēhi vi paṁcamadiṇammi taṁ kahiyaṁ । laggagaṇāvaṇavattā tumhēhiṁ ciya imā kahiyā || 1578 ।।
jīsē kajjammi kayō uvakkamō ēttiō nariṁdēṇa । paḍisiddhaṁ pariṇayaṇaṁ jaṁ tīsē taṁ mahācōjjaṁ ।। 1579 ।।
abbhitarayā tubbhē imammi kajjammi tāva naravaḍaṇō । vaccaha pāsammi sayā jāṇissaha kāraṇaṁ tamhā ।।1580 ।।
nitrapurisēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ jēttiyamēttaṁ tumē vi yāṇēha । amhē vi tēttiyaṁ ciya jāṇāmō na uṇa abbhahiyaṁ ।। 1581 ॥
tō kannāpurisēhi bhaṇiyaṁ jaha tumha cēva pāsāō । nivaula majjhasakhvaṁ amhē viviyāṇimō na sayaṁ ।। 1582 ।।
rāyapurisēhi bhaṇiyaṁ nāyaṁ jaṁ āsi tattha amhēhi । taṁ kahiyaṁ tumhāṇa vi kahiē u vivāhalaggammi ।। 1583 ॥
ōsāriūṇa lōyaṁ sēsama sēsaṁ pi maṁtiyaṁ tēhi । rannā sacivēṇa tahā saha jōisiēhiṁ khaṇamēkkaṁ ।। 1584 ।।
pacchāvi sajjiūṇaṁ jōisiē kēvalēṇa sacivēṇa । saha kiṁ pi jaṁpiyaṁ patthivēṇa suiraṁ pabaṁdhēṇa ।। 1585 ।।
aha taṁ pi visajjēuṁ rannā hakkāriūṇa amhāṇaṁ । dinnō āēsō jaṁ aṇūpamvaṁ nēha piupāsē ।। 1586॥
abbhitarayaṁ puṇa tattha kāraṇaṁ ki pi nēyajāṇāmō । uddēsēṇaṁ najjai amaccavayaṇēṇimā cattā ।। 1587 ।। .
jōisiyāṇa vi vayaṇaṁ saṁbhāvijjai payaṭṭamiha kiṁpi । paḍhamaṁ ciya tēhi samaṁ kiṁci jaō maṁtiyaṁ tattha ।। 1588 ।।
ēvaṁ tē nivapurisē pajaṁpamāṇē aṇūpamvā bhagai | amha sahāyāṇamimēsimuttaraṁ kēttiyaṁ dēha || 1589 ।।
jai vāulayā ēē kaṁṭhakilēsaṁ kuṇaṁti phalarahiyaṁ । tō ēēhiṁ jahā kiṁ tumhē ciya vāulā hōha ।। 1590।।
tīsē piupurisēhi pajaṁpiyaṁ ērisaṁ visannēhi । kiha amhē vāulayā na havāmō jē samāuṁ ।। 1591।।
ēēṇa nariṁdēṇaṁ bhariyā vāyassa jōyaṇasayaddhaṁ । kāraviyā vihalaṁ ciya khaḍapphaḍaṁ saṁbalakhayaṁ ca ।। 1592 ।।
tattō aṇūpamvā tē niya piuṇā narā imaṁ bhaṇiyā । nīsēsaṁ ciya tumhē avimaṁsiyamēva jaṁpēha ।। 1593॥
jamhā niyagāmāō diṭṭhā tumhahiṁ ēttha ēṁtēhi । maggē aṇēgagāmā adiṭṭhapuvvā tahā nayarā ।। 1594।।
taha suralōya māṇaṁ sayalaṁ pi palōiyaṁ imaṁ nayaraṁ । harisauraṁ nāmēṇaṁ nivāsaṭhāṇaṁ naridassa ।। 1595 ।।
diṭṭhō iṁdasamāṇō naranāhō taha imō harisapālō : saṁbalaē vihu dinnaṁ rannā tumhāṇa kaṇayasayaṁ ।। 1596॥
ēvaṁ aṇūpamvāē jaṁpatīē vi rāyapurisāṇaṁ । majjhāō ēkkēṇaṁ tē tappurisā imaṁ bhaṇiyā । 1597।।
jai puṇa aṇūpavāē piuṇō jāī ayāṇamāṇēṇa । na kayaṁ pariṇayaṇaṁ naravarēṇa iya asthi maha saṁkā ॥। 1598 ।।
tēhi ta paḍibhaṇiyaṁ uttamakhattiyakulammi saṁbhūō । paṭṭailasūrapālō amha pahū najjaē payaḍō ।। 1599 ।।
jamhā paumiṇinayarī naridaarimaddaṇassa nattuyaō | sāvakkabhāuēṇaṁ hayammi jaṇayammi ēyassa ।। 1600॥
jaṇaṇī gahiūṇa imaṁ thaṇaṁdhayaṁ cēva paḍhamarayaṇīē । ēgāgiṇī palāṇā miliyā satthāhavaruṇassa ।। 1601 ।।
tēṇa samaṁ saṁpattā ēttiyadūrammi dhannauragāmē । upannajarē puttē nivāyagēhaṁ gavasaṁtī || 1602॥
।।
paṭṭailajōgapālassa maṁdirē āgayā taō tēṇa । daṭhṭhē sā paripuṭṭhā kahiyaṁ tīē ruyaṁtīē ।। 1603॥
saghaṁ pi niyasarūvaṁ tēṇa vi saṁjāyagaruyakaruṇēṇa । sā dhūyā paḍivannā sagōravaṁ dhāriyā sagihē ।। 1604।।
jāō puttō niruō kaivayadiyahi sūrapālō sō । paṭṭailajōgapālō jaṇaṇīē sūrapālassa ।। 1605 ।।
āvajjiō sabhajjō sapariyaṇō viṇayavittikaraṇēṇa । taha kaha vi jaha ciṭṭhai tannāmaggahaṇalaggō sō ।। 1606॥
pāsai ya sūrapālaṁ niyaputtāō vi ahiyanēhēṇa । sō vi viṇīyattaṇaō suvallahō savvalōgassa || 1607 ।।
sō kamasō vaḍḍhatō duijjaṭhāṇammi attaṇō vihiō । paṭṭailaṁ jōgapālēṇa kasmāttaṁ muṇēūṇa ।। 1608 ।।

sirimunisuvvaya jiṇiṁdacariyaṁ
51
jō kō vikalāyariō maggēṇaṁ tēṇa ēi vaccai vā । taṁ kai vi diṇē aigōravēṇa tatthēva dhārēuṁ ।। 1609 ॥
sikkhāvēi kalāō pāsāō tassa sūrapālaṁ sō । ēvaṁ kamēṇa jāō savvakalāpārapattō sō ।। 1610 ।।
uttamakulasaṁbhūyaṁ tattō pariṇāvaē varaṁ kannaṁ । taṁ nivasēvāē kaē vi sajjaē nēya kattha vi ya ॥ 1611 ।।
aisanē havasaō sō vi na annatthagaṁtumīhēi । tassēva samīvatthō ciṭṭha āṇāē vaṭṭaṁtō ।। 1612।।
tē kaō niccitō savvattha vi jōgapāla paṭṭailō । āvajjiō samaggō gāmajaṇō niyaguṇōhēṇa || 1613
paṭṭailajōṇapālēṇa kāriyaṁ sūrapālajōggagihaṁ । niyagēhāsannamaīvavitthaḍaṁ niyanivāsasamaṁ ।। 1614 ॥
varaṇēṇa jōggapālassa sūrapālō vi maṁdirē tammi । jaṇaṇī - kalattasahiō saṁcariō sōhaṇadiṇammi ।। 1615 ।।
iya kālē vaccatē saṁjāyā dōnni surapālassa । puttā kamēṇa pavarā aṇūpamvā taha ya dhūyā ya ।। 1616।।
paralōga (ga) maṇasamayaṁ appaṇayaṁ jōggapālapaṭṭailō । nāūṇa sayalalōgaṁ mēlēūṇaṁ imaṁ bhaṇai ।। 1617।।
ēsa maha sūrapālō niyaputtāō vi duggapālāō । abbhahiō sayakālaṁ jāṇaha tubbhē vi tāva imaṁ ।। 1618 ।।
ēsō vimajjha bhattō viṣayaṁ taha kaha vi kuṇai jaha annō । kō vi na sakkai kāuṁ tumhaṁ paccakkhamēyaṁ pi ।। 1619 ।।
tā viyarissāmi ahaṁ arddha niyasavvavihavasārassa । ēyassa sēsamaddhaṁ bhavissaē duggapālassa ।। 1620 ।।
taha annaṁ pi bhaṇijjaha tubbhē ṭhāṇammi majjha daṭṭhavvō । tumbhēhi surapālō maē vi ṭhaviō niyapayammi ।। 1631॥
sō cciya ēvaṁ bhaṇiē paṭṭailēṇaṁ bhāṁti tē savvē । gāmapahāṇā purisā jaha vayaṇaṁ tumha puvvaṁ pi ।। 1622 ।।
asi pamāṇaṁ amhaṁ samaē ēyammi purṇa visēsēṇa । juttaṁ ci ya tāva imaṁ bhaṇaha jamannaṁ pi taṁ karimō ॥। 1623 ॥
pacchā paṭṭailēṇaṁ pāsa niviṭṭhō niō suō bhaṇiō । jaha duggahapāla ! tumaē sayakālaṁ sūrapālē ।। 1624 ।।
saha pīīē paramāē vaṭṭiyavvaṁ samaggakajjēsu । ēsō cciya kāyavvō puraō jaṁ tuha guṇajēṭṭhō ।। 1625 ।।
tēṇa vi guruviṇaṇaṁ niyapiivaya taha tti paḍivanē । pacchā aṇicchamāṇō vi sūrapālō samaggēṇa ॥। 1626 ।।
gāmēṇa duggapālāiṇā sahāēṇa jōgapālēṇa । mannāviūṇa ṭhaviō paṭṭailapayammi niyayammi ।। 1627।।
nivihavassa viddhaṁ paṇāmiyaṁ tassa takkhaṇē cēva । sikkhaviō taha ēvaṁ asuhaṁ gāmassa mā kujjā ।। 1628 ।।
ēkkkēṇaṁ sammāṇiūṇa taha khāmiūṇa sappaṇayaṁ । savvō vi taō gāmō visajjiō jōgapālēṇa ।। 1629 ।।
aha sō khaṇaṁtarēṇaṁ pattō paralōya maggapahiyattaṁ । tattō ya vibhūīē vihiō taddēhasakkārō ।। 1630 ॥
kālē duggapālō gayasōō taha ya sūrapālō ya । saṁjāō tē dōnni vi vaṭṭēti tahā jahā bhaṇiyā ।। 1631॥
niya piuṇā taha māyāmahēṇa iya ēsa tumha parikahiō । amhēhi sūrapālassa vaiyarō khattiyavarassa ।। 1632 ।।
bīēṇa rāyapurisēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ jai kulaṁ anāūṇa । ēsā parihariyā tō kahijjaē ērisaṁ rannō ।। 1633॥
taiēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ na ghaḍai ēyaṁ kulaṁ anāūṇa । paḍhamaṁ pi jamēsanivō pariṇēumimaṁ ihāṇēi ।। 1634 ।।
aha annāyakulaṁ pi hu imamāṇāva surūvalōbhēṇa । tō pariharai na ēvaṁ kāraṇamavaraṁtaō ēttha || 1635 ।।
aha āha catthō patthavassa purisō imēṇa jaha kahiyaṁ । taha savvaṁ pi maē vihu sarūvamāyanniyaṁ asthi ।। 1636॥
tassēva samīvāō nivēithaṁ jēṇa nivaiṇō puraō । rūvaṁ aṇupambāē kula - jāisamanniyaṁ savvaṁ ।। 1637।।
jāṇatēṇa vi nisuyaṁ puṇō vi jaṁ saṁpayaṁ maē ēyaṁ । taṁ saṁvāyanimittaṁ tā ēttha na annahā ki pi ।। 1638 । ।
jaṁ paribhāvaha tumbhē saṁbhāvijjaṛa na kāraṇaṁ tamiha । jaṁ savvavannakannāō pariṇaē khattiyakumārō || 1640
'oll
vaṇiṇō vi vihaviṇō annajāiyaṁ kannayaṁ pariṇayaṁtā । niyayaṁgulī pabhiīhiṁ visuiṇō jēṇa dīsaṁti ।। 1641 ।।
satthē vi jaō bhaṇiyaṁ amējjha majjhāu gijjhaē kaṇayaṁ । nīyāu vi varavijjā thīrayaṇaṁ dukkulāō vi । 1641 ॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-52-to-52.json ==========================
5.2
kubēradattacariyaṁ
।।
ēvaṁ paryāparyaṁtāṇa tāṇa jaṁpai aṇūpamvā ēvaṁ । tumha samaggāṇaṁ pi hu jaṇaē hiṁ jā vahū dinnā ।। 1642।।
tēṇēva tumē kahama vi nō nibvijjaha payaṁpiyavvassa । amhaṁ tu suhāyai nēya kiṁcitattaṁ pasīyaṁ vā ।। 1643 ।।
rannā visajjiyā vihu jaṁ ciṭṭhaha ēttha vi garyōcita vva । tā ajja maē bhuttaṁ jaṁ taṁ bhuttaṁ pabhāyammi ।। 1644 ।।
puṇa bhōttavvaṁ mōttuṁ ēvaṁ nayaraṁ na ēttha saṁdēhō । aha tē saṁvahiūṇaṁ savvē vi viṇiggayā tattō ।। 1645।।
saddhi aṇupavāē vahati maggē akhaṁḍiyapayāṇā । kiṁ cūrṇa addhapahē gayāṇa aha annadiyahammi ।। 1646 ।।
vaccaṁtāṇaṁ bhuttattarammi tē rāyapēsiyā purisā । puraō hōūṇa pahassa dāhiṇē rukkhamūlammi || 1647।।
chāyāē vīsaṁtā jāva nisannā mahīē ciṭṭhati । tō tēhiṁ sūrapālō turayārūḍhō pahē ēṁtō ।। 1648 ।।
diṭṭhō durāō cciya vinnāō jaṁpiyaṁ taō tēhi । annōnaṁ ēvaṁ jaha kaha daṁsēmō muhaṁ amhē ।। 1650 ॥
ēyassa niyaṁ inhi jaṁ taiyā tārisāī kahiūṇa । sapasāyarāyavayaṇāī tōsiō ēsa amhēhiṁ ।। 1750 ।।
ambhasthiūṇa dhūyā ēyassa aṇupamvā samāṇīyā । tamapariṇīyaṁ rannā kahaṁ kahēṁtā na lajjāmō ।। 1651 ।।
tā ētthē nivannākhaṇaṁtaraṁ tarutalē vilaṁbāmō । vōlēi jāva ēsō puraō tattō iō amhē ।। 1652 ।।
mammi gamissāmō uṭṭhēūṇaṁ imaṁ samaggēhiṁ । paḍivajjiūṇa vayaṇaṁ aṇuṭṭhiyaṁ tēhi taha cēva ।। 1653 ।।
tattō ya sūrapālō maggammi aṇūpambāē dhūyāē । miliūṇa sarūvaṁ pucchiūṇa ṭhāūṇaya muhuttaṁ ।। 1654 ।।
harisarapurābhimuhaṁ saṁcaliō sayamaṇūpamvā caliyā । dhannaurapahābhimuhī jaṁtīē tīē tō pacchā । 1655॥
tē gaṁtūṇaṁ miliyā dūragayāē narānivaniuttā । puṭṭhā ya tīē tumbhē kattha ṭhiyā ēttiyaṁ vēlaṁ ।। 1656।।
kayamuttaramē ēhi ghammattā tarutalē ṭhiyā paḍiyā । puṇa tē aṇupamvāē puṭṭhā tumhāṇa majjha piyā || 1657।।
jāō katthai samuhō vaccatō harisaurapahābhimuhō । māyāē ta tēhi sasaṁbhramēhiṁ imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ।। 1658 ।।
ki sō jaṁtō ciṭṭhai harisaurē ahaha amha tō miliō । jāyaṁti ahava suttāṇa paḍḍayā cēva ii saccaṁ ।। 1660॥
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ puṭṭhā aṇumvā tēhi kēṇa kajjēṇa । sō puraō saṁcaliō taē vi maggammi miliyāē ।। 1661 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ aṇūpamvāē tāō gāmā paḍhamayaṁ caliō | amhaṁ ciya milaṇatthaṁ paraminhi ēttiē dūrē ।। 1661 ।।
jaṁ āgaō taō sō puraō viha paṭṭiō amaccassa । sēṭṭhissa vavaharassa ya daṁsaṇakajjēṇa harisaurē ।। 1662 ।।
nivapurisēhi bhaṇiyā aṇūpamvā tassa aggaō savvaṁ । tumhēhiṁ niya sarūvaṁ kahiyaṁ niya daṁsaṇāiyaṁ ॥। 1663॥
āmaṁtitīē bhaṇiē laṭhṭhēti payaṁpiūṇa tē savvē । mōṇēṇa ṭhiyā paṁthē vayaṁti tīsē samīvatthā ।। 1664 ।।
ēttōya jayā naranāhaharisapālassa pāsaō maṁtī । kāūṇa maṁtanicchyamaṇūpamvācāryāvasayammi ।। 1665 ।।
saṁcaliō niyagēhē tappēlatēṇa sōhadārāō । bāhiṁ viṇiggaēṇaṁ abbhitarayaṁ niyaṁ purisaṁ ।। 1666 ।।
kannammi dinnasikkhaṁ pēsēḍaṁ bhāṇiō narida-suō। siri siriharisakumārō pacchannaṁ kiṁ pi saha tumaē ।। 1667।।
maha asthi jaṁpiyavvaṁ rayaṇīē ajjatō nahu kahi pi । paḍhamapaharassa samaē gaṁtavvaṁ vīracariyāē ।। 1668।।
kumarēṇa vitaṁ vacaṇaṁ taha tti paḍivajjiūṇa sō purisō | taṁbōladāṇapuvvaṁ visajjiō vihiya sammāṇō || 1669॥
bhaṇiya samayammi maṁtī āgaṁtūṇaṁ nisāē pacchannō । kahai kumarassa puraō aṇūpamvā vaiyaramasēsaṁ ।। 1670।।
jōisiyajaṁpiyāī rannā saha maṁtiyāvasāṇaṁ ca । siriharisakumārēṇaṁ puṭṭhō maṁtī taō ēvaṁ ।। 1671 ॥
ratnā paḍisiddhē tammi vaiyarē kimiha majjha karaṇijjaṁ । maṁtī pabhaṇēṛa taō jaṁ ciya mūlaṁ aṇatthassa ।। 1672 ।।
taṁ ci nāsēyavvaṁ jhatti ta hōi sutthayā savvā । annaha uvēkkhiyammi kīrāṇa kahāṇayaṁ havai ।। 1673।।
tō pucchēi kumārō maṁti taṁ kahasu kērisaṁ majjha । kīrakahāṇayamahasō kahēi tassaggaō ēvaṁ ।। 1674 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇiṁdacariyaṁ
kīra kathānakamucyatē----
53
ēmmi mahāranē vaṇamajjhē asthi pāyavō ēkkō । garuō saralakbaṁdhō sāha - pasāhāhiṁ vitthinnō ।। 1675 ।।
gayaṇaggalaggasi harō parōpparaṁ miliya bahaladalapaḍalō । na kharṇapi jassa sāhaṁtarēsu pavisaṁti ravi kiraṇā ।। 1676 ।
maṇuyāṇa durārōhō kayāiṁ nīḍāī tattha āgaṁtuṁ । paṁcahi kīrasaēhi suhēṇa tē tēsu nivasati ॥ 1677।।
āhārāinimittaṁ cūyāi vaṇaṁtarēsu bhamiūṇa । tatthē va ṭhaṁti puṇaravi sīyāyavavāya - bhayarahiyā ।। 1678 ।।
iya kālē vaccatē kayāi rukkhassa tassa mūlammi | vallīsamuggayā tammi pāyavē caḍiumāḍhattā ।। 1678।।
ēkkō ya tāṇa majjhē ciṭṭhaṛa kīrō aīva pōḍhamaī । anna samayammi sā diṭṭigōyarē tassa āvannā ।। 1780।।
tēṇa ta tē bhaṇiyā mēlēūṇaṁ suyā samaggā vi । jaha kōmalaṁ pitubbhē valli chidēha lahu ēyaṁ ।। 1681॥
annaha parivaṁtī pattā jaraḍhattaṇaṁ imā tumha । garuyamaṇatthaṁ kāhī jassa na pacchā paḍīyārō ।। 1682 ॥
sakkō kēṇa vi kāuṁ tō taṁ pucchē sēsakīragaṇō । kahasu kahaṁ ēiē amha aṇatthō vihēyavvō ।। 1683।।
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jahēsā parivaḍhatī thuḍassuvari caḍihī । khaṁdhapaēsammi taō pōḍhāē tīē payaṭhāṇaṁ ।। 1684 ।।
ārōhaṁtāṇaṁ māṇusāṇa saṁpajjihī taō kō vi । daṭṭhaṇa imaṁ urvāraṁ caḍiuṁ ginhisaē tumbhē ।। 1685 ।।
hasiūṇa tēhi bhaṇiya acvaṁtabhayāluō ahō taṁsi । khōṭṭēsi ērisāiṁ bhavissāī dīhāī ।। 1686॥
paḍhamuggayāya ajja vi ēsāvallī taō pamāṇammi । kiṁ caḍihī kiṁ vā puṇa sukkissai kō imaṁ muṇai ।।1687।।
jai puṇa āgaṁtūṇaṁ vaṇayarajīvō vi tōḍihī ēyaṁ । iya sō hasiō tēhiṁ kāūṇa ṭhiō taō mōṇaṁ ।। 1688 ।।
tājā sā samīvaṁ pattā baṁdhassatō puṇō tēṇa । kīrēṇa suyā bhaṇiyā jaha ajja vi kiṁpi nō naṭṭha ।। 1689।।
miliuṁ savvē tubbhē khaṁḍēha imaṁsu tikkhatuṁḍēhi । tēhi ta paḍibhaṇiyaṁ kimēttiyaṁ ajja vibhayaṁtē ।। 1690॥
jaiyā pēkkhissāmō kaṁpi caḍaṁtaṁ maṇussa miha rukkhē । taiyā nīḍēhiṁtō uḍḍissā mō gayaṇamaggē ।। 1791 ।।
iya tēsi kīrāṇaṁ vayaṇaṁ āyanniūṇa sō kīrō । citēi jahā ēē abuhā tiriya cciya varāyā ।। 1692 ।।
uvaēsassa ajōggā kaṁṭha - kilēsaṁ karēmi tō kamhā । ēēhiṁ saha muhāē mōṇaṁ uciyamiha amhaṁ ॥1693।।
bhaviyanvayāē diṭṭha jaṁ kici tamēva ēttha saṁbhavihī । iya citiūṇa ta majjha saṁṭhiō sō vi ciṭṭhēi ।। 1694 ।।
aha annayā bhamaṁtō vaṇammi ēgō samāgaō tattha । vāhajuvāṇō dhaṇubāṇasaṁjuō tēṇa tē diṭṭhā ।। 1695।।
dūraṭṭhiēṇa rukkhata rahēniviṭṭhaēṇa tammi nagē । nivayaṁtā tō citai sō vāhō ērisaṁ hiyaē ।। 1696॥
nihaṇēmi maggaṇēṇaṁ imēsu jai kaṁ pi ēkkayaṁ tattō । sēsāṇa paḍai tāsō tō jaṁti palāiuṁ savvē ।। 1697॥
aha sō savvēsi ciya tēsi jugavaṁ pi saṁgahanimittaṁ । pāsaṁ pavaṇīkāuṁ tatthēva ṭhiō paḍikkhatō ।। 1698 ।।
tā jāva uḍḍiūṇaṁ tattō annattha tē gayā kīrā । āhārāīkajjēṇa uṭṭiuṁ sō taō vāhō ।। 1699 ॥
gaṁtūna tammi rukkhē tuṁgammi vi jaraḍhavalliṭhaviyapaō । uvari āruhiūṇaṁ nīḍēsu nivēsaē pāsē ।। 1700 ।।
paccāgayā digaṁtē paḍiyā pāsēsu tēṇa tē savvē । āyaḍḍhiūṇa pāsaṭṭiyā vi niyamaṁdiraṁ nēuṁ ।। 1701 ।।
pāradvā tē kīrā maraṇabhaōttatthamāṇasā savvē । jaṁpaṁti vuḍḍhakīraṁ jaha jāyaṁ tumha parikahiyaṁ ॥ 1702 ।।
taiyā tujha kahaṁtassa vi amhēhi vimūḍhabuddhīhi । na kayaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ saṁpai puṇō vi tā chuṭṭaṇōvāyaṁ ।। 1703 ।।
amhāṇa kahasu kaṁci vijhatti karēūṇa paramakārunnaṁ । jā ajja vi nikkaruṇō ēsō amhē na mārēi ।। 1704 ॥
tō bhai buḍḍhakīrō saṁpai maha kōvi na phurai uvāō। jaiyā phuriō taiyā kahiō tumhaṁ apuṭṭhō vi ।। 1705।।
inhi puṇa tumhēhi samaṁ nibaddhō ahaṁ pi ciṭṭhāmi । ēyammi mahāpāsē varhiṇa kayaṁtasarisēṇa ।। 1706 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-54-to-54.json ==========================
54
jai
।।
kī rakathānaka
kōvi uvāōṁ ēttha majjha viṣphurai tō sayaṁ pi ahaṁ । vicchuṭṭēuṁ pattō vaṇaṁtarē jāmi sutthami ।। 1707 ।।
maraṇabhayāuracittēhi kīrō puṇō visō bhaṇiō । jēṇa taē vinnāyaṁ suirabhavissaṁpi vasaṇamiṇaṁ ।। 1708 ।।
tassa tuha sumabuddhissa kiṁpi inhipi natthi annāyaṁ । tā pariya kaha uvāyaṁ amhaṁ khama puvva dubviṇayaṁ ॥ 1709 ।।
annā na kāvi inhi amhāṇa gaī tumaṁ vi mōttūṇaṁ । iya jaṁpiyammi tēhi saṁjāyakivō payaṁpēi ।। 1710 ।।
vuḍḍhō kīrō iyarē inhiciya tumha jaṁpamāṇāṇaṁ । phuriō majjha uvāō ciṭṭhai ēgō tayaṁ suha ।।1711 ।।
nēūṇa jayā ēsō niyagēhē pāsasaṁgaē cēva । savvē vi muyai tubbhē saṁbhēūṇaṁ tayāsāsaṁ ।।1712 ।।
ṭhāyavvaṁ tumhēhi jaha ēsō vigayajīviē nāuṁ । tumhē pāsēhitō kaḍḍhēḍaṁ khivai bhūmīē । 1713।।
savvē vijayāmukkā hōha tathā uḍḍiūṇa jugavaṁ pi । gaṁtavvaṁ tumhēhi paḍivannaṁ tēhitō ēvaṁ ॥ 1714।।
।।
vāhō vi sahipattō rayaṇīē jāva tē parāmusai । niya karayalēṇa kīrē tā pāsai vigayajīya vva ।। 1715।।
saṁruddhasavvasāsē niṣkaṁdē siḍhilakaṁdharā baṁdhē । aha sō vicitai imaṁ jaha ēē pakkhiṇō niccaṁ ।। 1716 ।।
sēcchā paribhamiyā sunnē rannapi akhaliyappasarā । saṁpai pāsaniruddhā saṁpattā tivvamaṇadukkhaṁ ।। 1717 ।।
maṁ pēkkhiūṇa savisēsamēvabhayacattajīviyavvāsā । saṁvaṭṭiūṇa savvē ma ēsa mārōviyā baṁdhē ।।1718 ।।
āgacchaṁtēṇa pahē parōpparaṁ jaṇiya aṁgasaṁghāsā । ullasiya dēha umhā parittā mucchiyā matē ।। 1719।।
inhihiṇaṁ pi gayā gōvā bhaṁgaṁ viṇā vi tō ēē । ēmēva kaḍḍhiūṇaṁ pāsāō khivāmi bhūmīē ।। 1720॥
iya citiūṇa kaḍḍhai ēkkkēṇaṁ imē samaggē vi । tē kīrē ēkkūṇē kīrēhiṁ vi tēhi ii nāyaṁ ।। 1721 ।
jaha ki mukkā savvē amhē jugavaṁ pi tō samuḍḍhīṇā । gayaṇapahē tō sigghaṁ thakkō bhavivvayāvasaō ।। 1722 ।।
ēkkōu vuḍakīrō citai ēsō maṇammi pēccha ahō | kērisayā annāṇā kayagvajaṇa sēharā ēē ॥। 1723।।
sō cēva ahaṁ ēkkō imēhi na paḍikkhiō rukkhēhiṁ । uvaēsaṁ dāūṇaṁ jēṇa maē rakkhiyā ēē ॥। 1724।।
ēyāu māraṇaṁtiyavasaṇāō tēṇa cēva paḍisiddhō । satthēsu samatthēsu vi saṁgō saha mukkhapurisēhiṁ ।। 1725।।
hōṁti guṇā paṁḍiyaē savvē dōsāu abuhalōyammi | bahuēhiṁ vi abuhēhiṁ ēkō vi na labbhaē vibuhō ।। 1726।।
paḍivakkhēṇa vi saddhi viyakkhaṇaṁ paraṁ vihēyavvō । saṁgō ciraṁ pi kālaṁ na khaṇaṁ pi hu mukkha mittēhiṁ ।। 1727 ।।
ahavā kiṁ ēyā majjhavi vihiyāē gaēya citāē । ēyaṁ pi tēhi vihiyaṁ aisuṁdaramēva mannāmi ॥। 1728 ।।
jaṁ tē sayaṁ palāṇā savvē vihu ēttiyāṇa uvayārē । saṁjāē jai ēkkō ahaṁ viṇassāmi kimajuttaṁ ।। 1729 ॥
jaṁ jīviya vyamathiraṁ pavaṇāyapaumiṇadalajalaṁ va । ēvaṁ ciya tassa phalaṁ jaṁ tē uvayarai parakajjē ।। 1730॥
iyarēhiṁ vaṁciō jai vi ēsa rōsaṁ nivāḍihī majjha । tahavi ahaṁ appāṇaṁ rakkhissaṁ ēya pāsāō ।। 1731।।
jāvēsavuḍakīrō ēvaṁ citēi tāva sō vāhō । jugavaṁ pi uppayaṁtē tē kīrē pāsiuṁ sabvē ।। 1732 ।।
jāō sa vimhayamaṇō sakōhahiyaō ya tō karēūṇa । jhati paī vujjōyaṁ tatthagavēsai payattēṇa ।। 1733 ।।
pāsammiṭhiyaṁ kīraṁ kaṁci vi diṭṭhō ya aha imēṇēsō । vāhēṇa vuḍakīrō pāraddhō jāva mārēu ।। 1734 ।।
tā sēṇa vuḍakīrēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ vāhasammuhaṁ ēvaṁ । mārēyavvō na taē bhadda ! rakkhaō saṁtō ।। 1735 ।।
paṁca saē dammāṇaṁ dāvissaṁ tujjha niyamaō cēva । tō tēṇa rakkhiō sō khiviūṇaṁ paṁjarē dhariō ।। 1736 ।।
ōya jahā dammā tuha kattō kī aṁgamēttassa । sō bhaṇai tujjha kajjaṁ dhārīhi kiṁ va kāhi ॥। 1637 ॥
jē kēvi maē bhaṇiyā tē dammē kassai samīvāō । jaitujjha na dāvēmi tōhaṁ tuha vasagaō cēva ।। 1638 ।।
ciṭṭhāmi tāva jaṁ kiṁ pirōyaē tuha maṇassa pacchāvi । taṁ pakarijjasu na tumaṁ nivārai sai parō kōvi ।। 1740 ।।

65
tō sō pāyasamaē kīrō vāhēṇa pucchiō ēvaṁ । kaha bhō kassa samōvē nēmi tumaṁ saṁpayaṁ bhadda ! ॥ 1740।।
kīrēṇa ta bhaṇiō vāhō jaha nēhi maṁ nivapurammi । jattha samiddhō lōō nivasai kōūhalaparō ya ।। 1741 ।।
nēūṇa tattha caummidaṁsēha maṁ purō dhaṇīṇaṁ । jō maggai tassa ahaṁ kahiyavvō paṁcahi saēhiṁ ।। 1742॥
taha caiva ya tēṇa kathana kōi jā dēi tēttiyaṁ mōllaṁ । kīrēṇa taō bhaṇiō vāhō jaha muyaha savvē vi ।। 1743 ।।
ēē nāyaralōē maha gahaṇē natthi jōggathā ēsiṁ । gahiyassa vi majjha guṇā tēsu na agghaṁti kiviṇēsu ।। 1744 ।।
tō rāyaulē nēuṁ nivassa maṁ dēhi nivasuyassa'havā । iyajapatō nisuō suō imō kēṇai narēṇa ।। 1745 ।।
nivauttasēvaēṇaṁ gaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ tēṇa sa pahuṇō kahiyaṁ । tō tēṇa jhatti sō cciya purisa saṁpēsiō tattha ।। 1746।।
hakkārē vāhūṁ nīhariō sōvi sōhadārammi । taṁ pēkkhai niyamatthayanihittasuyapaṁjaraṁ tattō ॥ 1747।।
hakkāriūṇa taṁ nēi jhatti niyasāmiṇō samīvammi । sō nivasuēṇa puṭṭhō mullaṁ kīrassa parikahai ।। 1748 ।।
paṁcasaē dammāṇaṁ na uttaraṁ dēi jāvasō kiṁpi । tōtēṇa rāyaputtō kīrēṇa sayaṁ pi saṁlatō ॥। 1749 ।।
mā kuha kiṁpi cittē viyappamiha ginhaētti ēṇāvi । mullēṇa tumaṁ maṁ rāyautta ! tuha haṁ karissāmi ।। 1750 ।।
aigaruyaṁ uvayāraṁ samayammi samāgayammi tō ēvaṁ suṇiūṇa rāyakumarō taṁ ginhai tēṇa mullēṇa ।। 1751 ।।
taha cēva paṁjaragayaṁ vāhaṁ sammāṇiuṁ visajjēi । tō pabhaṇai taṁ kīraṁ paḍhamavvayakumara ! ki pi phuḍaṁ ।। 1752 ।।
kīrō pabhaṇai kumaraṁ chuhiōhaṁ dēhi bhōyaṇaṁ kipi । dāḍimaphalāiyaṁ dēi tassa kumarō vi āhāraṁ ।। 1753।।
sō kaya pāraṇaō kīrō samaōciyāī bahuyāī । kavvāī paḍhai-pāyayabhāsāē raiyāī ।।1754।।
aha pucchai taṁ kumarō pahiduhiyaō kahēhi bhō ! kīra । vāhagihasaṁṭhiēṇaṁ kaha paḍhiyaṁ ēttiyaṁ tumaē ।। 1755 ।।
sō bhai ēga cittō kumāra ! nisuṇēhi jēṇa sāhēmi । rāyā kō vihu pōḍhaṁ puttaṁ rajjē ṭhaviūṇa ।। 1756।।
pavvaiō tēṇa samaṁ taddēvī thēvadiyahagabbhēṇa । saṁjuttā pavvaiyā gabbhō rannā na vinnāō ।। 1757।।
tī jātīē na ya kahiō virahakāyaramaṇāē । aha tāī dō vikulavai pāsē paḍivannadikhāī ।। 1758 ।।
ciṭṭhati kutāī niyakiriyaṁ kē ttiēhi diyahēhiṁ । vuḍhigayammi gabbhē dēvīē buḍatāvasiyā || 1759 ।।
kulavaipuraō sāhai tēṇa vi sō lajjihi tti rāyarisī । na ya kiṁ ci uvāladdhō tāī pasuttāiṁ mōttūṇa ।। 1760 ।।
dō visayaṁ saha tāvasajaṇēṇa sēsēṇa anna ṭhāṇammi | saṁkamiō rayaṇīē jāyammi taō pabhāyammi ।।1761 ।।
rāyarasīgayaniddō daṇaṁ tāvasāsamaṁ sunnaṁ । jā tattha bhamai pēcchai niya bhajjaṁ tāvasi tāva ।। 1762।।
lakkhijja māṇagabbhaṁ tā nāuṁ gamaṇakāraṇaṁ tēṇa । sēsāṇa tāvasāṇaṁ bahuyaṁ dēvī uvāladdhā ।। 1763 ।।
sambhāvammi vi kahiē tīē taṁ bhaṇai tāva sō rāyā । agahiyavayā kahaṁtī jai tumamēyaṁ mama tathā vi ॥
tā hōtaṁ ai laṭṭha ēvaṁ na caḍatayaṁ kalaṁkamiṇaṁ । ēgāgittaṁ pitahā na hōṁtayaṁ amha iha rannō ।।1765 ।।
aha rōhauṁ payattā sā dēvī tāvasī taō tēṇa । rāyarisiṇā kivāē pasannavayaṇēhiṁ saṁṭhaviyā ।। 1766।।
niyasyasanihāṇē nīyā bhayavēvamāṇasavvaṁgī । punnadiyahēsu puttaṁ taō pasūyā pavaravaṁ ।। 1767॥
ahaṁ taṁ pavaḍhḍamāṇaṁ sō pāḍhai rāyatāvasō payaō । lakkhaṇachaṁdālaṁkāranīisatthāiyaṁ savvaṁ ।। 1768 ।।
tamahaṁ tattha vasaṁtō paccāsannō suṇēmi nīsēsaṁ । ēēṇa payārēṇaṁ kumāra ! ēvaṁ maē paḍhiyaṁ ॥1769।।
sō nivatāvasataṇaō samihāikaē kayāi aidūrē । pagaō niyāsamāō pattō mattēṇa vaṇakariṇā ।। 1770 ।।
vāvāiō yadi maē vi viyaraṇagaēṇa sō tattha । kahiō ya tāvasassa vi satāvasīō gaō sō vi । 1771 ।।

56
kīrakathānakaṁ
tammi pasē daṭṭha puttaṁ gayajīviyaṁ siṇēhēṇa । hiyayaṁ phuḍiūṇa mayāī dōvi virasaṁ rasaṁtāī ॥। 1772 ।।
taṁ taha daṇa maē sadukkha hiyaēṇa taṁ vaṇaṁ cattaṁ । gaṁtūṇa kāṇaṇaṁtaramavaṭṭiō kī ragaṇamajjhē ।। 1773।।
ēsō niyavr̥ttaṁtō tujjha maē sāhiō nivakumāra ! । iya kīrēṇa bhaṇiē puṇō vi taṁ pucchaē kumarō ।। 1774 ।।
taṁ ērisō vi paḍhiō vāhassa karē kahaṁ samārūḍhō । tō tassa kahai kīrō niyavāsatarussa mūlammi ।। 1775 ।।
vallīsamuggamāō pabhiī tā jāva sō kumārēṇa । kīō vāhakarāō tassa kaē tō kumārō vi ॥। 1776 ।।
kārēi kaṁcaṇamayaṁ aipavaraṁ paṁjaraṁ suvitthinaṁ । taṁ tattha khivēūṇaṁ uciyāhārēhi pōsēi ।।1777।।
kuṇaiya tēṇa samaṁ sō rāyakumārō kahāu vivihāō । katthai uciyammi khaṇē ēvaṁ kālammi vaccaṁtē
anna diyahammi kīrō kumaraṁ hakkariūṇa āsannaṁ । pucchara jaha tuha piuṇō tujjha samā kattiyā kumarā ॥
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jahēgō jēṭṭhō kumarō jēṭṭhō kumarō guṇēhi mama sarisō । annē akhamā lahuyā guṇēhiṁ jammēṇa ya samaggā
kīrēṇa puṇō puṭṭhō kumarō sō jēṭṭabaṁdhavō tumha । ēga jaṇaṇīē jāō kiṁvā jaṇaṇī vibhinnā sē || 1781 ।।
kumarēṇa tassa kahiyaṁ puttā paṁcēva amha jaṇayassa । tē kīra paraṁ savvē jāyā annannajaṇaṇīē ।। 1782।।
kīrēṇa puṇō puṭṭhō kumarō jaha kēṇa maṁtiṇā saddhi । maṁtaūṇaṁ rāyā karēi garuthāī kajjāī ॥। 1783 ।।
kumarēṇa taō kahiyaṁ guṇāyarō nāma ciṭṭhaē maṁtī । tēṇa saha savvakajjaṁ maṁtēuṁ sāhaē rāyā ॥। 1784।।
kīrēṇa puṇō bhaṇiyaṁ pīī sacivassa tassa saha tumaē । ki jēṭubaṁdhavēṇaṁ ahiyatharā kahasu mē kumara ।। 1785।।
।
sāhēi tasa kumarō pīivisēsō tahā vihō tassa । sacivasta na tēṇa samaṁ nēya maē dōnha vi samōsō ।।1786 ।।
tō bhai vuḍakī kiṁpi nimittaṁ tahāvihaṁ sariuṁ । tēṇa saha taē pīī kāyavvā kumara ainibiḍā ।। 1787।।
kumarēṇa kīravayaṇaṁ taha tti paḍisajjiūṇa sacivassa । samayaṁtarammi jāē puttē kahiūṇa kīrassa ।। 1788 ।।
niyapurisā pēsaviyā agbhitarayā gimmi sacivassa । sakusuma - taṁbōlāī gahiūṇaṁ pavaravatthāī ।। 1789।।
vr̥ddhāvayanimittaṁ sacivassa samappiūṇa taṁ savvaṁ । tē purisā pabhaṇaṁti ya jaha tumha suyaṁ samuppannaṁ ।। 1790 ।।
sōūṇa ajja kumarō sajāō ai pamōyapaḍipunnō । bhaṇiyaṁ ca amha piuṇō rajjassa samunnaī ēsā ।। 1791 ।।
jaṁ garuyāṇaṁ purisāṇa jāyaē saṁtaīē parivuḍī । rāyaduijjanarassa u visēsaō maṁtitilayassa ।।।।1792 ।।
taṁ sōūṇaṁ maṁtī maṇammi tuṭṭhō aīva tē purisē । sammāṇiuṁ visajjai tammi diṇi jēṭṭhakumarassa ।। 1793 ।।
dōhaṁ piya bhajjāṇaṁ majjhāō kōvamuvagayā ēkkā । tīsē gaṁtūṇa gihē ṭhiō kumārō diṇaṁ sayalaṁ ।। 1794 ।।
mannātō pacchā nisīhasamaē pasāiyā ēsā । tīē saharai sōkkhaṁ aṇubhūyaṁ tēṇa kumarēṇa ॥। 1795।।
aha rattijāgaraṇaṁ niddāē paravasō pabhāyammi । suttōsayalaṁpi diṇaṁ saṁjhāē uṭṭhaūṇa taō
jēṭṭhō rāyakumārō sarīraāvassayaṁ karēūṇa । bhōttr̥̄ṇa duijjāē piyabhajjāē samaṁ raryāṇi
aivāhara nīsēsaṁ rahasōkkhapasattamāṇasō tīsē । maṇanivbuikaraṇatthaṁ īsā dōsō va samahē
jāyammi pabhāyammi tī sēya sarīrakāraṇaṁ jāyaṁ । tō tēṇa vaggacittō saṁjāō jēduō kumarō ।। 1800।
pāsaniviṭṭhō tīsē gamēi diyahaṁ samaggarayaṇi ca । lahai taō sā niddaṁ samuggayaṁ tammi sūrammi ।। 1800।
diṇarayaṇijāgarēṇaṁ saṁjāyāvēyaṇā sirē tassa । suttō sarvapi pacchā samuṭṭhiō taiyajāmammi ।। 1801 ।।
jā bhajjāē sāraṁ karēi tāsāvi tammi samayammi । gayasavvadēhabāhā samuṭṭiyā ēvamāīhi || 1802 ।।
hukkhattamassa na tassa kēṇai narēṇa । maṁtitaṇayasva jammō nivēiō jēṭṭhakumarassa ।। 1803।।
pacchā nāyammi vi tēṇa pēsiyaṁ kiṁpi nēya sacivassa । vaddhāvaṇayanimittaṁ vatthāīyaṁ kumārēṇa ।। 1804 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-57-to-57.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇiṁdacariyaṁ
I
57
aha nāmakaraṇadiyahē puttassa niyassa tēṇa sacivēṇa । vahuō naridalōō nimaṁtiō nāyara jaṇō ya ।। 1805 ।।
bhuṁjāviūṇa sammāṇiūṇa jaha jōggayaṁ samaggaṁ pi । maṁtī visajjai jaṇaṁ rāyanimittaṁ tu sayamēva ।। 1806 ।।
bhōyaṇa - vatthālaṁkāramāiyaṁ satrvamēva ginhēuṁ । vaccai nariṁdagēhē samappaē tassa nīsēsaṁ ।। 1807 ।।
uciyaṁ ālaviūṇaṁ sammāṇēūṇa taṁ nariṁdō vi । maṁti visajjai gihē niyakajjaraō sayaṁ hōi ।। 1808 ।।
sacivēṇa rāyalōō jayā nimaṁtāviō tathā tē vi । dōnnivi jēdukumārā nimaṁtiyā tassa jēṭū ṇa ।। 1809 ॥
paḍisiddhaṁ āgamaṇaṁ niyaṁ vihēūṇa uttaraṁ kipi । paḍivannaṁ tu kaṇiṭṭhaṇa sō gaō tassa gēhammi ।। 1810॥
kaḍidōrayagēvējjaṁgulīyakaḍayāi gahiumāharaṇaṁ । paḍikuppāsaṁ taha puttajaṇaṇijōgāī vatthāī ।। 1811 ।।
tattha ya paṇamaṁtē maṁtinaṁdaṇē vālahāra hatthammi । appara tassāharaṇaṁ taha pāsē vaḍḍamahilāē ॥। 1812 ॥
puttajaṇaṇīnimittaṁ samappaē pavarapaṭṭavatthāī | maṁtī vi tassa ( kaya) bhōyaṇassa naravaikumārassa ।। 1813 ॥
aigaruyaṁ sammāṇaṁ pavarāharaṇēhiṁ kuṇai vatthēhi । kāuṁ uciyālāvaṁ tō namiuṁ taṁ visajjēi ॥। 1814 ॥
kumarassa sacivāṇa ēvaṁ pai diyahaṁ vaṭṭaē mahāpīī । aha annayā ya rannō jāō aṇiyattaō rōgō ।। 1815 ।।
ēgō pahāṇa vējjō taṁ jāṇai taha guṇāyarō maṁtī | jaṇanivvuijaṇaṇatthaṁ tahā vi sō avasaraṁ kuṇai ।। 1816 ॥
anna diyahammi rāyā sacivēṇa samaṁ karēi maṁtaṇayaṁ । rōgēṇa maha sarīraṁ aīva vihurīkathaṁ inhi ।। 1817 ॥
tā thēvaṁ ciya jīyaṁ majjha iyāṇi kahēha kō rajjē । ahisicijjai dōnha vi jēṭṭhakumārāṇa majjhāō ।। 1818 ।।
vinnaas nivaṁ maṁtī kusalattēṇaṁ kalāṇa rūvēṇa । cāēṇa vikkamēṇa ya dōnni vi kumarā samā tāva ।। 1819 ॥
kiṁtu kaṇiṭṭhē kumarō lōyāvajjaṇaguṇēṇa anbhahiō । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ rajjaṁ punnāyattaṁ na guṇavasagaṁ ।। 1820 ।।
purisassa guṇēhiṁtō pasarai kittī jaṇāṇurāō ya । vēsavilaya vva dhaṇīṇaṁ rāyasarī sarai kayasukayaṁ ।। 1821 ॥
maṁtī pabhaṇai naravara ! paḍhamaṁ cidhaṁ saunnapurisassa । jaṁ jaṇahiyayāvajjaṇajaṇayā dī saṁti tassa guṇā ।। 1822 ।।
rāyā jaṁpai saccaṁ saciva ! guṇā hōṁti punnajōēṇa । kiṁtu paraṁ punnāṇa vi nāṇattaṁ dīsai jaṇammi ।। 1823॥
kāī vi punnāī jaṇē jati guṇarāsimēva purisassa । na uṇa lavaṁ pi sirīē sō sirimaṁtassa annassa । ।। 1824॥
guṇarahiyassa vi pāsē gaṁtūṇa guṇī bharēi niyamuyaraṁ । pasupāyā vihu purisā pahuṇō punnēhiṁ jāyaṁti ।।1825 ।।
jaha aṁbuvīcirāyā tō maṁtī pucchaē nivaṁ sāmi । kō aṁbuvīci kahasō jāō rāyā imaṁ kahaha ।। 1826 ॥
aha kahai nivō naya ēkkammi ihāsi kōvi naranāhō । vikkamapa sāhiyā sēsasūra sīmā lamahivālō ।। 1827।।
sēvijjatō saviṣayamannanaridēhiṁ gamai sō kālaṁ । aiviḍalaṁ tassa paraṁ puttō ēkkō vi nahu asthi ॥। 1828 ।।
saccō vāiyadēvāṇa dinnaōvāiēhi bahuēhi । jāō ēgō puttō muttidharō kiṁtu sunnamaṇō ।। 1829 ।।
sō jaṁpiu na yāṇai jai tisiō hōi vēi tō aṁbu । chuhiō ya vici jaṁpai tō jāyaṁ aṁbuvīcitti ।। 1830 ।।
nāmaṁ lōyapasiddhaṁ mūlillaṁ tassa nāmamavalattaṁ । jōvvaṇasamayābhimuhō saṁjāō jāva sō kumarō ।।1831॥
tāva sahasa tti rāyā aviyakkiyajāyasūlarōgēṇa । aiukkaḍēṇa kaluṇaṁ vilasaṁtō nihaṇamuvaṇīō ।। 1832 ।।
sō aṁbuvīcikumarō sacivēṇa'hisiciō taō rajjē । sīmālanaṁridēhi vipaṇaō savvēhi āgaṁtuṁ ।। 1833॥
kārēūṇaṁ pavaraṁ siṁgāra avasarammi āuṁ । uvavēsijja{} niccaṁ maṇimayasīhāsaṇē rāyā ।। 1834 ।।
rāyālaṁkārajuō uvaridharijjaṁtadhavalachattēṇa । vīijjatōsiyacāmarēhiṁ ramaṇīkaraggēhi ।। 1835 ।।
taṁ namiūṇa samaggō naridasāmaṁtamaṁḍaliyavaggō | atthāṇamminisīyai kayaṁjalīniyaniyadvā ।। 1836 ।।
āēsō purṇa kīrai savvēhiṁ vi tēhi maṁtiṇā bhaṇiō । jaha jōggayāē sabvaṁ - karēi phēḍēi sō maṁtī ॥। 1837 ।।

58
aṁbuvīcirāyā kahāṇaga
।
।। 1851।।
।। 1852 ।।
। 1853 ।।
sēvai nivāṇa majjhē kassai ēgassa saṁtiyaṁ dhūyaṁ । pariṇāvara sō maṁtippavarō taṁ aṁbuvīcinivaṁ ।। 1838 ।।
jaha tajjāō puttō rajjadharō jāyaē puṇō kōvi । iyavaccatē kālē vuḍhḍō maṁtīgaō nihaṇaṁ ।। 1839 ।।
tēṇa maratēṇa taō maṁtipaē ṭhāviō niō puttō । sō vi taha cēva rajjaṁ citai savvaṁ pi appavasaṁ ।। 1840 ।।
jaha sēlama paḍimā nivasai dēvālayassa majjhagayā । taha aṁbuvīci rāyā ciṭṭhai atthāṇa viṇiviṭṭhō ।। 1841 ।।
kēvalapaṇāmamēttassa bhāyaṇaṁ sēsayaṁ samaggapi । rajjaphalaṁ aṇubhuṁjjai sacivō bhōppō vva dēvaulē ।। 1842 ।।
aha annā ya saciva bhaṇiō āsanna sēvayajaṇēṇa । ēyassa pisiyapiṁḍōvamassa ki aṁbudīcissa || 1843 ।।
tubbhē kuṇaha paṇāmaṁ niṣphalamēva ya akiṁci kārissa । tumhāyattō savvō iha rajjē vaṭṭaē lōō ।। 1844 ।।
tumhaṁ ciya āēsaṁ avēkkhaē na uṇa aṁbuvīcissa । tā hōha sarva citha rajjasāmiṇō muyahabhiccattaṁ ।। 1845 ।।
iyapabhaṇatō paḍhamaṁ sacivēṇaṁ cāḍujaṁpaō lōō। kāūṇa bhīmabhiuḍi nivāriō pabhaṇauṁ ēvaṁ ।। 1846 ।।
jaha jaṁpatā tumbhē kiccamakiccaṁ na kiṁ picitēha | sāmittamatthaē ki havaṁti siṁgāī kāī pi ।। 1847 ।।
sāsēṇa jassa sabvō rajjajaṇō sasai sō kaha na rāyā । ēttō vi paraṁ annaṁ hōi kuṇatāṇa avavāō ।। 1848 ।।
ucivēṇa imaṁ bhaṇiyā tē savvē jhatti saṁṭhiyā mōṇaṁ । ēvaṁ gayāī kaivaya dipāṇi pacchā puṇō tēhiṁ ।। 1849 ।।
annēsi pāsāō samaē annammi bhāṇiō sacivō । puvvattamaṭṭhamēsō sōūṇaṁ gamai mōṇēṇa ॥1850 ।।
vināyaṁ tēhi taō jaha ēya mamassa kiṁpi niya cittē । paḍihāsiyaṁ na amhē nivāriyā tēṇa ēēṇa
puvvabhaṇirēhi saha tō maṁtiyamē ēhi saṁpayaṁ kici । sacivassa amhavaṇaṁ suhāiyaṁ tēṇa nō ruṭṭhō
tamhā puṇō vi samayaṁtarammi bhāṇijjaē samīvāō। annēsi kēsi pihu sacivō paḍivajjai jayaṁ
tō kami vipatthāvē anyarēsi puṇō vi kēsi pi । pāsāō sō sacivō bhaṇāviō jaha bahū lōō
tumha guṇēhi raṁjiyahiyaō jaṁpēi ērisaṁ cēva । paḍibibavajjiyaṁ jai sacivō rajjaṁ sayaṁ kuṇai
tō laṭṭha hōi tahā amhāṇa maṇōrahā vi pujjaṁti । paramēvaṁ tumha purō na kōi sakkaṛa jaṇō vōttuṁ 1856 ।।
amhē hi vi jaṁ ēvaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ taṁ tharaharaṁjīhāē । tumha bhaēṇaṁ parama bhaṇiēṇa na ya nivvuiṁ lahimō ।। 1857 ।।
jai tumhaṁ pasihāsai tō ēvaṁ kuṇaha ahava mā kuṇaha । sēsāṇa puṇa jaṇāṇaṁ suhaṁ havissai iya kyammi ।। 1858 ।।
iya sōūṇaṁ maṁtīcittammi vicitaē taō ēvaṁ । savvēsi pi jaṇāṇaṁ ēgamayaṁ tāva saṁjāyaṁ ।। 1859 ।।
bhaṇiō ēēhiṁ ahaṁ imammi aṭṭhē puṇō puṇō tamhā । inhi maha kāyavvaṁ kērisamēvaṁ nirūvēmi ।। 1860 ।।
jēsi avavāyāō saṁkēmi ahaṁ sayaṁ pitē tāva । kāriti ēyamaṭṭha majjha samīvāu savvē vi ।। 1861 ।।
rajjāīna kassa vi sāsaṇammi lihiyāiṁ hōṁti ēyāī । jēṇa vivajjāsō vihu iha atthē dīsai jayammi ||
kēsi pi bahunarēsaraparaṁparāēṁ samāgayaṁ rajjaṁ । hatthāu uttaraṁtaṁ dīsaha divvassa jōēṇa || 1863।।
kēsi pi kama paraṁparasēvā nivvattayāṇa vi narāṇa । rajjasirīēi auvva purisasaṁgū suyamaṇa vva ॥ 1864।।
tamhā ḍhaliūṇa sayaṁ samāgayaṁ rajjamēyamamhāṇa । pāēṇa pēlliūṇaṁ pariccayaṁtāṇa nahu juttaṁ ।। 1865 ।।
bhavivvamērii far as puṇa amhāṇa atthi iha samaē । kāūṇa kiṁpi chaumaṁ karēmi ēvaṁ taō inhi ।। 1866 ।
paccatitharāyaṇō tahā mahāmaṁḍalāhivaiṇō ya । āṇāē majjha ṭhiyā vaṭṭissaṁtē jai tahēva ।। 1867।।
tō laṭṭha ēmē vayavahissaēṇukkamēṇa puraō vi । aha kiṁpi visuttissai tō kāluciyaṁ karissāmā ।। 1868 ।।
iya citimannadiṇē hi majjhē cēva dhāriō rāyā। sacivēṇa na atthāṇē nivēsiō sō samāṇēuṁ ।। 1869 ।।
aṭṭāviō ghōsō ērisaō tēṇa savvalōyammi । jaṁ kira ajja naridassa dēhē apaḍuttaṇaṁ jāyaṁ ।। 1870 ।।

sirimuni suvvayajidicariyaṁ
1
59
khaṇamēttaṁ pi na pāvai rannā saha daṁsaṇaṁ nivakalattaṁ । kayasaṁkēō thēvō tayaṁtiē saṁcarai lōō । 1871 ॥
uvavisa sayaṁ puvvaṭṭiīē atthāṇamaṁḍavē gaṁtuṁ । sacivō rajjaṁ citai gayāī iya kāī vidiṇāī || 1872।।
tattō duiyapaghōsō uṭṭhaviō maṁtiṇā jaha nariṁdō । kuṭṭamahārōgēṇaṁ saṁjāō galiyasavvaṁgō ।। 1873 ।।
gaṁbhīrō vi thirōviya nimmalabuddhī ahigayakalō vi । nīsēsasatthaparamatthajāṇaō kammajōēṇa ॥। 1874 ।।
jōvvaṇajaṇiyamaēṇa ya micchahimāṇassa pabalayāē ya । tavviha jaṇavayaṇāṇaṁ uddīvaṇakāraṇāō ya ॥। 1875 ।।
rajjē ahisēyaṁ kāravēi sō attaṇō ō maṁtī । lajjaṁ mōttūṇa niyaṁ kulakkamaṁ taha ya pamhasiuṁ ॥ 1876।।
atthāṇammi nisīyai viraiyaaipavarāyanēvacchō । siyachatta - cāmarāīrāyālaṁkārapariyariō ।।1877 ।।
tannayaranivāsijaṇō sēsāṇa vi gāmanayaramāīṇaṁ । lōō āgaṁtūṇaṁ taṁ paṇamai dinnamaṁgaliō ।। 1878 ।।
sāhaṇiyataṁtavālā niōgisāmaṁtaṭhakkurāīyā । paṇamaṁta ḍhōyaṇēhiṁ samanniyā tē samāgaṁtuṁ ॥1879॥
aha pēsiūṇa dūē maṁḍaliē bhāṇaē navō rāyā । āgaṁtuṁ maṁ paṇamaha jai icchaha appaṇō riddhiṁ ।। 1880 ।।
sōūṇa dūyavayaṇaṁ maṁḍaliēhi taō imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । saṁvahiūṇaṁ ēmō gahiūṇaṁ kiṁ pi maṁgaliyaṁ ।। 1881 ॥
iya bhaṇiuṁ tē dūē niyapāsē gōravēṇa dhārēṁti । aha pēsiuṁ sadūē pasēpparaṁ savvamaṁḍaliyā ॥। 1882 ॥
pucchati jahā tubbhē ki kāhiha navayarassa naravaiṇō । gaṁtūṇaṁ paṇa missaha kiṁvā nō ērisaṁ kahaha ।11883 ॥
tō savvēhiṁ vibhaṇiyaṁ taṁ paṇamēuṁ na atthi amha maṇaṁ । jai tumhaṁ savvēsi samudāē nicchaō hōi ।। 1884 ॥
tō ēgōvarikayaṁ karēi jai sō taō samaggā vi । tubbhē taṁ paḍigāhaha taō na sō tumha pabhavēi ॥। 1886 ।।
paḍivannaṁ savvēhiṁ vi tēhi imaṁ paccayaṁ karēūṇa । dēvappharisāīyaṁ niyapuvvayasavahapuvvaṁ ca ।। 1886 ।।
tē savvē saṁvahiuṁ ṭhiyā taō niyanisu dēsēsu । ahiṇavanaridadyā visajjiyā tēhi bhaṇiumimaṁ ।। 1887 ।।
amhē kukkamāgayanaridavaṁsassa cēva pāikkā । tō taṁ ciya paṇamāmō na tumaṁ tassēva kammayaraṁ ॥। 1888 ।।
kamma bihu rāyā tumaṁṭiō appaṇāvi tō amhēṁ । puvvapurisakka māgayaniyadēsēkaha na rāyāṇō ।। 1889 ॥
tō mhaṁ tumhaṁ pihū samapaḍivattī na bhiccapahubhāvō । jai ēyaṁ ciya jāya tujjha thiraṁ tō tumaṁ laṭṭhī ।। 1890 ।।
tēsi maṁḍaliyāṇaṁ savvēsi pāsaō samāgaṁtuṁ । savvē karhiti dūyā ahiṇavarāyassa tabbhaṇiyaṁ ॥। 1891 ।।
sōūṇa dūvaṇaṁ saṁbuddhō niyamaṇē navō rāyā । citaiya jahā ēē parōpparaṁ vihiyasamudāyā ।। 1892 ।।
savvē viha maṁḍaliyā miliyā maha dujjayā imē tāva । paccaṁtiyarāyāṇō milati ēyāṇa jai kahavi ।। 1893 ।।
tō dēsaṁpi asē niyamēṇa uvaddavaṁti tō ēsō । hōhī garuyaaṇatthō ēmēva ṭhiō na saṁdēhō ।। 1894 ।।
tamhā jaha ṭṭhiīē kī rau iha aṁbuvīci naranāhō । savvaṁ pi jahā sutthaṁ saṁjāyai tassa punnēhi ।। 1895 ।।
amhaṁ sayaṁ pahūṇaṁ ṭhiyāṇa puvvillayaṁ pi māhappaṁ । nīsēsaṁ pi palīyai sasāmivacaṇajāṇiya pāvaṁ ।। 1896।।
amhaṁ sēvayabhāvaṁ cēva kuṇatāṇa jāyaē bhadraṁ । bahunivaparaṁparāēṁ āgayaniyasāmivaṁsassa ॥1897।।
kiṁ tu maē kāyavvaṁ taha kahavi jahā na kō vi lakkhēi । majjha kathaṁ kūḍamiṇaṁ anna pacchā vi māhappaṁ ।। 1898 ।
na hōi tārisaṁ maha puṇvaṁ jaha āsi galiyamāhappō । tō jīvaṁtō vi ahaṁ hōmi mayāō vi hōṇayarō ।। 1899 ।।
māhappaṁ amuyaṁtassa hōi maraṇaṁ pi dhīrapurisassa । bhuvaṇēsalāhaṇijjaṁ gayamāhappaṁ na uṇa jīyaṁ ॥। 1900 ।।
iya citiūṇa pēsai puṇō vi dūē tahēva savvēsi । maṁḍalavaīṇa pāsē sikkhaṁ dāūṇa ērisayaṁ ॥। 1901।।
jaha tumbhē mā bhaṇihaha ēvaṁ pacchā na amha jaṁ kahiyaṁ । ēsōhaṁ tumhavara caliō ciṭṭhāmi sigdhaṁ pi 1902 ।।
saṁpattō tumhāṇaṁ dēsēsa havējja tō samarasajjā । jaha jāṇaha sapamāṇaṁ tubbhē ajja vi asika viyā ॥। 1903 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-60-to-60.json ==========================
60
aṁbuvīcirāyā kahāṇa
gahiūṇa imaṁ sikkha gaēsu dūēsa tāṇa pāsammi । aha sō niyaṭhāṇakathaṁ maṁti sikbaviumēgaṁ ।। 1904 ।।
kiṁpi taō i pabhaṇas mamakaya kaḍyagayarasa ēttha bhaṇiyaṭṭē । tumamappiūṇa lēhaṁ muhasaṁdēsaṁ ca dāūṇa ।। 1905 ।।
pēsijjā purisajyaṁ bhaṇiē samayammi ēvamāisiuṁ । sō navarāyā ḍhakkaṁ dāvēūṇaṁ sayaṁ caliō ।। 1906 ।।
haya-gaya-rahajōhēhi kaliō cauraṁgiṇīē sēṇāē । sigghapayāṇēhiṁ taō ruppēsiyadūyakahaṇāō ।।1907 ।।
taha niyacārēhitō maṁḍaliyā jāṇiūṇa taṁ ētaṁ । savvē saṁvahiūṇaṁ miliyā ēgassa aibaliṇō ।। 1908।।
maṁḍalavaiṇō maṁḍalasīmāē tassa liti āvāsaṁ । āvāsasamaṁtēṇaṁ parihārakkhaṁ karēṁti tahā । । 1909 ।।
pañcatiyanivaīṇaṁ pāsē saṁpēsiūṇa niya dūē । jāṇāvayaṁti ēvaṁ tēhi vima bhīsiyā ēē ॥। 1910 ।।
jaha amhē niya purisē pēsēḍaṁ navanivaṁ bhaṇāvēmō । jai sō na thakkihī tō amhē tumhāṇa pakkhami ।।1911 ।।
savvē saṁvahiūṇaṁ savvabalēṇaṁ samāgamissāmō । tumhahiṁ avaṭu bhō maṇaṁ pi na pariccaēyavvō ।।1912।।
iya paccatiyanivaīṇa vayaṇamāyanniūṇa maṁḍaliyā । savvē vi visēsēṇaṁ sāvaṭṭha bhātaō jāyā ।।1913।।
paccatiyanivaīṇaṁ dūēhi navō narēsarō bhaṇiō । kaḍayammi samāgaṁtuṁ atthāṇa sahāē uvavidva ।। 1914 ।।
jaha amha sāmiēhi bhagāēhiṁ bhaṇāviyaṁ tumha sammuhaṁ ēvaṁ amhē ṭūṇa taē laggēyavvaṁ samaggāṇa || 1915 ।।
maṁḍaliyāṇa imāṇaṁ mā bhaṇiharu janna amha akkhāyaṁ । ēyaṁ bhaṇijjamāṇaṁ nisurya maṁḍaliya ēhi ।। 1916 ।।
tatyāgaēhiṁ puvvaṁ tāṇa samakkhaṁ nivāṇa tē dūyā । ahiṇavarannā bhaṇiyā tumha pahiṁ kathaṁ juttaṁ ।। 1917 ।।
ēyammi cēva samaē appā jāṇāviō jamamhāṇaṁ । ēkkēṇa payāsēṇaṁ tē vi jahā sikkhavēmi lahaṁ ।। 1918 ॥
sigdhaṁ ējjaha inhi tumhē aṁgīkathā maē savvē | paṁcahi kiṁtu nivēhi na sijjhaē ki pi । । 1918 ।।
anē vi paṁcasattayaattasamē mēliūṇa naranāhē । samarammi dukkiyavvaṁ jaha majjha vi pujjaē kōḍuṁ ।। 1920 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tēsi paccakkhaṁ takkhaṇē lihāvēi । rāyāēsaṁ pacchā mukkassa niyassa sacivassa ।। 1921 ।।
hama-gaya-rahajōhāṇaṁ addhaṁ sēnaṁ maē tuha samīvē । mukkaṁ ciṭṭhai savvaṁ pēsēyavvaṁ taē tamiha । 1922 ।।
maṁḍaliyāṇaṁ dappaṁ jhāḍēuṁ aggaō vayaṁtassa । paccatiyanivasamuhaṁ majjha jahā milai taṁ sigghaṁ ।। 1923 ।।
iya rāyāēsa juē pēsē sigghasaṁḍhiē pacchā | maṁḍaliyāṇa nivāṇa ya dūē vi visajjai sa kōvaṁ ।। 1924 ।।
tattō atthāṇāō uṭṭhēuṁ guḍḍurammi pavisēuṁ । chantaṁ sahatthalihiyaṁ lēhaṁ bīyaṁpi paṭṭhavai ।।1925 ।।
tassēva ya jā sikkhā dinnā tēṇāsi puvvamētē । niya nayarāō naharamāṇēṇaṁ tammi aṭṭhammi ।।1926 ।।
tattō payāgaḍhakkaṁ davāviuṁ jhatti bhōyaṇammi kaē । dēi payāṇaṁ puraō āvāsai jōvaṇaṁ gaṁtuṁ ।। 1927 ।।
tassāvāssa puṇō dāhiṇaō asthi gāuyaṁtariyaṁ । ēkkaṁ visamaṁ duggaṁ appaṇayaṁ pavvayataḍammi ।।1928 ।।
vitthinnaṁ dhannidhaṇa-taṇa- pāṇiyapaurayāē saṁjuttaṁ । cittēṇa pataṁpi gahiyaṁ vajjhāga | rēṇa puṇa cattaṁ ॥। 1929 ।।
tō maṁḍaliyanivēhi vinnāyaṁ niya maṇē jahēsanivō । kaṁṭayacaḍiyō ciṭṭhai jujjhissai kayaraṇucchāhō ॥। 1930 ।।
tō maṁtayaṁti miliuṁ maṁḍaliyā nivaiṇō u dūēhi । jaha amhē samakālaṁ savvē saṁjuttathā hōuṁ ॥ 1931।।
tēṇa samaṁ laggēmō jujjhēuṁ nicchyaṁ iya karēuṁ । maṁḍaliyā nivaīhi dūyamuhēhi imaṁ bhaṇiyā ।। 1932।।
saṁvahiuṁ tumbhēhi saṭhāṇa ṭhiēhi tāva gayavvaṁ । āgacchāmō amhē jāva samīvammi tumhāṇaṁ ।। 1933 ।।
na ya ṭhāṇaṁ caiyavvaṁ na ya gaṁtavvaṁ ca sammuhaṁ tassa । paḍiyaṁtu sahēyavvaṁ amhē vi lahuṁ pi ēsāmō ॥। 1934 ॥
maṁḍaliēhiṁ vi ē pēsēuṁ bhāṇiyā nivā ēvaṁ । jaha tumhēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ taha amhē āyarissāmī ।। 1935 ।।
tumhēhiṁ vijhatti paraṁ āgaṁtavvaṁ na jāva ēyassa । āgaṁtūṇaṁ sēnaṁ pacchillaṁ milai avahuyaṁ । । 1936।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-61-to-61.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvaya jiniṁdacariyaṁ
1
61
aha sō ahiṇavarāyā niya bhūmi laṁghiūṇa parabhūmiṁ । jāva paviṭṭhō tāvaya samāgayā payaḍavaradvayā ।।1937 ।।
maṁḍaliyāṇaṁ vidēṇa pēsiyā tēhi ēvamullaviyaṁ । ciṭṭhati amha pahuṇō tuha āgamaṇaṁ samōhaṁtā ।।1938 ।।
tā ha sigdhamēva pujjaṁti maṇōrahā jahā tēsi । tēṇa taō tē bhaṇiyā ṭhāṇa ṭhiyā cēva jaṁpaṁti ।।1939 ।।
cārahaḍi tumhāṇaṁ pahuṇō na paryapi sammuhā ēṁti । tā tumhē tē jaṁpaha gaṁtuṁ jaha ēṁti iha sigghaṁ ।। 1940।।
ih cappaḍō paēsō khaḍapāṇiyaparayā tahā asthi । amhaṁ tumhaṁ ca taō ēsāsamarōciyā bhūmī ।।1941 ।।
paḍivālitā amhē tumhāgamaṇaṁ ihēva ciṭṭhāmō । iha tavvayaṇaṁ dūyā gaṁtūṇa kahaṁti sapahr̥ṇa ।। 1942 ।।
tēhi tēhiṁ samaggēhi ō miliuṁ maṁḍalavaīhiṁ maṁtaṇayaṁ । kāūṇa puṇō dūē pēsēuṁ bhāṇiō saniva ।।1943 ।।
mā ēvaṁ hōu jahā maṁḍaliēhiṁ sayaṁ samāgaṁtu । haṇiō niya pahumaṁtī dūsaṇamēyaṁ hi sahāmō ।।1944 ।।
ētthāgayassa tuha jaṁ amhē karimō tumaṁ pi dacchasitaṁ । ētthaṁtarammi kēṇai kannē siddhaṁ navanivassa || 1945 ।।
pacchannapuvvapēsiyapuṇaāgayalē havāhayasarūvaṁ । tēṇa vi sō kannē cciya kahiūṇa visajjiō kiṁpi ।।1946।।
maṁḍaliyapēsiyā tē dūyā tō tēṇa ērisaṁ bhaṇiyā । ēvaṁ pi karissāmō jaha bhaṇi tumha nāmīhi ।।1947॥
kiṁ tu paraṁtē tattō ṭhāṇāu palāiūṇa vaccatā । jattēṇa rakkhiyavvā tumhēhiṁ ahaṁ tu lahu pattō ।।1948 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ ḍhakkaṁ dāvēūṇaṁ payāṇayaṁ dinaṁ । gaṁtūṇa jōyaṇadugaṁ āvāsaṁ ginhaē tattha ।। 1949 ।।
bīyammi diṇē puṇaravi ḍhakkaṁ vajjāviūṇa jā caliō । tāva salēhaṁ narajuyauddhūli jaṁghamāyāyaṁ ।। 1950 ।।
tēhiṁ samappiyalēhaṁ turayaaō cēva vāiuṁ ēsō । tē maṁḍalavaidūē hakkārai appaṇī pāsē ।। 1951 ।।
kahai ya tēsiṁ puraō jaṁ ēsō ajja amha saṁpattō । lēhō nivāsanayarāō pēsiō tanniuttēṇa ।। 1952 ।।
tumhaṁ ciya sāmīṇaṁ samīhiyaṁ lihiyamēttha āyāyaṁ । jaha aṁvr̥vīcirāyā rāyavimukkō paḍasarīrō ।।1953 ।।
saṁjāō saṁpai bāhirammi uvavēsaṇassa jōggō ya । tā tumhē āgaṁtuṁ jahōciyaṁ kuṇaha maṁgaliyaṁ । । 1954 ॥
ēēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ pacchāhr̥ttaṁ payāṇayaṁ amhē । dāhāmō sigdhaṁ ciya gaṁtūṇaṁ tattha maṁgaliyaṁ ॥। 1955।।
rajjābhisēyamahaṁ kāhāmō tassa jaṁ navō vva imō । jāō jammō tamhā amhāṇa mahūsavō garuō ।। 1956 ।।
iya vōttr̥ṇaṁ dinaṁ niyaṁgalaggaṁ savatthamāharaṇaṁ । lēhārayāṇa tēsi maṁḍalavaidūyapaccakkhaṁ ।। 1957 ।।
dūhi tēhi puṭṭhō maṁtinariṁdō jahā kahaṁ rāyā । nīrōgō saṁpannō kēṇava vējjēṇa paḍiyariō ।। 1958 ।।
maṁtinivēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ēmēva tumē khaṇaṁ paḍikkhēha । nīsēsaṁ pi sarūvaṁ jēṇa kahāvēmi tumhāṇaṁ । । 1959 ॥
iya bhaṇiuṁ sō gaṁtūṇa rukkhacchāyāē tattha uvavisiuṁ । khaṁdhāvārassa jaṇaṁ vālēuṁ pēsaē purisaṁ ।। 1960 ।।
sayamāvāsaṁ tatthē va dāvaē nannittapurisēhi । hakkāriu maha dūē lēhatthaṁ kahai tassa sayaṁ ॥। 1961॥
sayamāvāsaṁ tatthē va dāvaē nanni uttapurisēhi । hakkāriu mahadūē lēhtthaṁ kahai tēsi sayaṁ ।। 1961॥
jaha kira rannō dēhē kēṇai kammēṇa tāva saṁjāyaṁ । bhīmaṁ galaṁtakōḍhaṁ vējjāṇaṁ paḍiyaraṁtāṇa ।।1962 ।।
pacchā vi bahū diyahē tēhi tigicchā kayā payattēṇa । taha vi niyattō dōsō na maṇaṁ pi gaō paraṁ vuḍhi ।। 1963 ।।
tō vējjēhi militaṁ savvēhi vi majjha aggaō bhaṇiyaṁ । jaha ēsa kammajaṇiō rōgō ahaṁ asajjhō tti ।। 1964॥
jāvajjīvaṁ rāyā imēṇa rōgēṇa muccihī nē ya । dukkhaṁ aṇuhavamāṇō kicchrēṇa gamissaē kālaṁ ।। 1965 ।।
tō agga va jalaṁ vāsāhāvijjara nivō jahā ēsō । dukkhaṁ sahiūṇa khaṇaṁ muccai rōgāō kammāō ।।1966।।
annēhi vi pavitra pahāṇa purisēhiṁ vējjavayaṇamiṇaṁ । ēkkēṇēva maē taṁ paḍisiddhaṁ pihiyakatrēṇa ॥। 1967।।
jaha jīvaṁta imaṁ niya pahuṇō sakkuṇōmi nō kāuṁ । jai puṇa kālakamēṇaṁ kahaṁci phiḍḍi sayaṁ rōgō । । 1968 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca ।

=== vardhamanaoutput-62-to-62.json ==========================
62.
1
aṁbuvīcirāyā kahāṇagaṁ
cira pavasiō viāvas vāhīghatthō viuṭṭhai puṇō vi। baṁdhaṇagaō vi muccai maō tti jhīṇā kahā lōē ।। 1969 ॥
tō tēhi puṇō bhaṇiyaṁ na hu sōhai sunnamāsaṇaṁ rannō । rāyālaṁkāradharō jāva nisannō na tattha narō ॥। 1970 ।।
tō tē maṇiyā jaha jīvaṁtē imammi anna naraṁ । na hu rajjammi ṭhavēmi jamhā sō rajjagiddhamaṇō ।।1971 ॥
rajjaṁ chaḍḍāvēuṁ kahūṁ cinō tīraē puṇō pacchā । paḍudēhammi vi jāē amha nivē aṁbuvīcimma || 1972 ।।
tō tēhi imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ jaha amhē nēya annapurisassa । nāmaṁ pi hu vi sahēmō rajjammi ṭhavijjamāṇassa ॥। 1973 ।।
jara tumhē yamēva ya kamavi aṁgīkarēha nivaittaṁ । tō hōi amha sammayamannaha vattaṁ pi na sahēmō । । 1964 ।।
aṁgīkaryāmma rajjē tumhēhi nivō vi jai paḍusarīrō । jāyai tahā vi laṭṭha taṁ rajjē taṁ puṇa tumē ṭhavaha ।। 1975 ।।
tē ēvaṁ caṁpatā maē nisiddhā aṇēgajattīhi । annasamayammi miliuṁ vahuēhiṁ jaṇēhiṁ iya bhaṇiyaṁ ।। 1976 ।।
taha cēva puṇa nisiddhā maē imē ēvamannaannēsu । samaēsu bhaṇaṁtāṇaṁ tēsi majjhaya majjhaya kuṇaṁtassa ।। 1977 ।।
paḍisēhaṁ bahuvāraṁ maē vi paḍivannamannasamayasmi । tēsi vayaṇaṁ uvarōhaō ya juttattaṇāō ya ॥। 1978 ।।
disijattā nōhariē mai pacchā rāyagōttadēvīē । muddhakumārīdēhē avayariuṁ ērisaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । । 1979।।
kammēṇa jēṇa rōgō rannō dēhammi āsi saṁjaṇiō । taṁ bahakhīṇappāyaṁ saṁjāyaṁ vaṭṭaē inhi । । 1979 ।।
majjhakahiōsahēhi tēgicchaṁ kuṇaha saṁpayaṁ tubbhē । agaṇiryādiṇāṇa majjhē jaha nīrōgō havai rāyā ।। 1981 ।।
aha pāsavattiēhi taha cēva kayammi aṁbuviciniyō । niggayakara-caraṇa-nahō kaṇaya saricchacchavī jāō । । 1982 ।।
maṁḍaliyāṇaṁ dūhi pucchiō sō puṇō vi maṁtiniyō। dēvī kahiēhi vi ōsahēhi kaha nimmiyā kiriyā । । 1973 ।।
aha kaha maṁti rāyō ēkkēṇaṁ ōsahēṇa kāraviō । naranāhō vamaṇavihi virēyaṇaṁ puṇa duijjēṇa ।। 1974।।
taiēṇa ōsahēṇaṁ uvalēvō kāriō sayaladēhē । ēēna vihāṇēṇaṁ rāyā ārōggamaṇupattō ।। 1975।।
ōsaha kiriyāīyaṁ nimittamēttaṁ samaggamēvēyaṁ । suhakammēṇaṁ taha dēvayāē savvaṁ kathaṁ laṭṭha ।। 1986 ॥
antrēṇā kimuttēṇaṁ amhaṁ ciya ēsa kōi puṇṇudaō । jaṁ amha imō sāmī puṇannavaṁgī puṇō jāō ।। 1987 ।।
sāmōhabhika bajyō vi jaṇō vimuccihī majjha । taṁ ciya sasāmiminhi puṇō vi rajjē ṭhavaṁtassa ॥। 1988 ।।
tō maṁḍalēsarāṇaṁ dvayā jaṁpati jugavamēvēyaṁ । tumhaṁ cēva na kēvalamamha vi sāmīṇa punnamiṇaṁ ।। 1989 ॥
sāmirahiyāṇa tēsi jaṁ jāō saṁpayaṁ puṇō sāmī । macchagiliggilināō annaha hōtō suduvvārō ॥। 1990 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi ciṁtai maṁtinivō appaṇṇō maṇē ēvaṁ । pēccha ahō punnāṇaṁ jaha māhappaṁ pariṣphurai ॥। 1990॥
nivvavasāyassa vi jaṁ tassa pahuttassa nāmasavaṇē vi । tē cciya dūyā ēē saṁpai jaṁpati kaha viṣayaṁ ।। 1992 ।।
jē puṇvaṁ japatā niṭhuravayaṇāī sammuhaṁ amha । savva vavasāyāṇaṁ pi hu niya sāmittaṁ kuṇatāṇa ।। 1993 ॥
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ payaḍaṁ dūyāṇa sammuhaṁ tēṇa । jaha ciṭṭhaha jaṁpatā saṁpai tubbhē purō majjha । । 1994 ।।
taha tumha sāmiṇō vihu jai jaṁpissaṁti tō suhaṁ hōhī । savvattha vi katthavi kīliyā vihallissaē nēya ॥। 1995 ।।
dūēhi ta bhaṇiyaṁ sārō nāṇassa pacō cēva । amhēhi samaṁ tumbhē saṁpai pēsēha niyapurisē ।। 1996॥
jēṇa niyasāmiyāṇa vipāsāō ērisaṁ bhaṇāvēmō । ajja vi savisēsaṁ ciya paccakkhaṁ tumha purisāṇa ॥। 1997 ।।
tō maṁti naridēṇaṁ pamuiyacittēṇa takkhaṇā cēva । iyabuddhimaṁtapurisā hakkārēuṁ samāiṭṭhā ।। 1998 ।।
dūēhiṁ imēhiṁ samaṁ vaccaha pāsammi maṁḍalavaīṇaṁ । amhēhiṁ jamāiṭṭha tamimē tēsi kahissaṁti ।। 1999॥
taṁ sōūṇaṁ kici vi jaṁtē jaṁpati sammuhaṁ tumha । taṁ tubhēhi sigdhaṁ kahiyavvaṁ majjha āgaṁtuṁ ॥। 12000 ।।
ahamēttō dāūṇaṁ payāṇayaṁ niyayadēsamajjhammi | gaṁtūṇaṁ ṭhāissaṁ jāva tumē ēsa maha pāsē ।। 2001 ।।
।

=== vardhamanaoutput-63-to-63.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇiṁdacarivaṁ
1
63
tō jaṛa maṁḍaliyāṇaṁ pasaṁtavayaṇaṁ kahissaha tumēmē । tō savvasēnnasahiō puraō vi ahaṁ gamissāmi || 2002 ।।
annaha puṇa tatthēvayannaṁ savvaṁ pi saṁṭhavēūṇa | appaparivārajuttō gaṁtūṇaṁ sāmipāsammi ||2003॥
kāūṇa maṁgalīyaṁ samāgamissāmi sēnnamajjhammi । iya sikkhaviuṁ sammāṇiuṁ ca sō tē visajjēi || 2004 ||
tammi dinē tatyēvayavasiūṇaṁ appaṇā pabhāvammi । dāūṇa payāṇāī bhaṇiya paēsammi ciṭṭhēi ||2005 ||
maṁti- nivapēsiyanarā dūēhiṁ samanniyā vi saṁpattā । cau jōyaṇaṁtaraṭṭiyamaṁḍaliyāṇaṁ samīvammi ||2006 ॥
kahiyaṁ dūhi taō maṁtinivāiṭumaggaō tēsiṁ । taṁ sōuṁ tē savvē samakālaṁ pamuiyā jāyā || 2007॥
dinnō tēhi pasāō uttārēūṇa niyasarīrāō । vatthāharaṇāīō dūyāīṇaṁ samaggāṇaṁ ।।2008 ।।
maṁtinaridassa narā sammāṇēuṁ puṇō vi tassēva । saṁpēsiyā samīvē ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa jaha amhē || 2009 ।।
raṇabuddhīē lōyaṁ aibahuyaṁ mēliyaṁ visajjēuṁ । thēvaparivārajuttā pahuṇō paṇivāyakaraṇatthaṁ । 2001 ।।
maṁgaliyaṁ haya-gaya-vattha bhūsaṇappabhiiyaṁ gahēūṇa । niyaniyadēsēhitō sigdhaṁ pi samāgamissāmō ॥2011॥
tāō ṇijjō na kōvi amhuvarimaṁtipavarēṇa । inhi khamiyavvāiṁ puvvillāī duruttāī || 2012॥
maṁḍaliēhi dinaṁ sikkha iya ērisaṁ gahēūṇa । āgaṁtūṇa nivēyaṁti tē purō maṁtirāyassa || 2013 ||
ahasō paṭṭhicittō tattō dāu payāṇayaṁ puraō । vaccai nariṁdanayarē samanni savvasēntrēṇa || 2014।
kārai rajjahisēyaṁ puṇō vi nivaissa aṁbuvīcissa । aigaruyavibhūīē samanniō rāyalōēṇa || 2015 ||
tō rāyalōyasahiō paṇamai mahimiliyamatthaō tattha । uvavisiuṁ kā rāvai nivadaṁsaṇamannalōyassa || 2016 |
nāyarapamuhassa uvāyaṇāī ghēttr̥ṇaṁ dārapattassa । gāma-nayarēsu kārai mahasavaṁ pēsiu puri sē || 2017 ।।
gāyaṁtyāī naccatayāī pamayāulāī pavisaṁti । sammāṇiūṇa dāṇēṇa tāī aha paṭṭhavijjati ।। 2017 ।।
pūijjatiya dēvā sammāṇijjati liṁgiṇō savvē | dīṇāīṇaṁ dāṇaṁ dijjai muccati guttīō || 2019 ।।
taha kaha vikāriō tēṇa maṁtiṇā ūsavō purē tammi । tattha samaē jaṇō jaha vimhaiō pāsavattī vi || 2020 ॥
sacivassa sāmibhatti pāsaṁtō kiṁ puṇō vidūratthō । ēttha samayammi pattā maṁḍaliyāṇaṁ tahiṁ dūyā ॥। 2021॥
vinnattō namiūṇaṁ maṁtivarō tēhiṁ sāmiṇō amha। ēṁtā ciṭṭhēti ihaṁ taiyapayāṇammi dinnami ॥। 2022 ।
amhē tēhi niuttā jaha tumbhē jāha aggaō hōuṁ । maṁtissa kahaha vattaṁ tō tē sacivēṇa paripuṭṭhā || 2023॥
tubbhē vi ihāyāyā ki bahuyadiṇēhiṁ tēhitō bhaṇiyaṁ । tumha purisā jayā iha visajjiyā amha sāmīhiṁ ॥। 2024।
amhē tathā nivāṇaṁ saṁgarabuddhiē | saṁvahēūṇa । āvaṁtāṇaṁ samuhā paṭṭaviyā vattakahaṇatthaṁ ॥। 2025 ।।
mha muhāō aṁbuvicirannō sarīramārōgaṁ । sōūṇa pahasiyamuhā savvē sahasa tti saṁjāyā || 2026॥
dāu amha pasāyaṁ gahiō tatthēva tēhiṁ āvāsō । tammi samayammi pattō rāyakalattassa dūō vi ॥। 2027।।
niya piuṇō naravaiṇō pāsē saṁpēsiō kusalavattaṁ । niya bhattuṇō sarīrassa akkhiraṁ gahiyalēhakarō || 2028 ॥
taṁ vāiūṇa lēhaṁ tassatthō sēsapuhaivālāṇaṁ । tēṇa kahiō ō tē visēsaō pamuiyā jāyā || 2029 ।।
tō tēhi naridēhi iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ visajjiyā amhē । jaha amhē gaṁtaṇaṁ niyaniyasēsu aha tattō ॥ 2030 ।।
maṁgaliyaṁ gahiūṇaṁ naridapāsē samāgamissāma । tumbhē gaṁtūṇa imaṁ niya sāmīṇaṁ nivēēha || 2031 ।।
tattō āgaṁtaṇaṁ miliyā amhē niyāṇa sāmīṇaṁ । saṁvahiuṁ niyanayarāhi nīharaṁtāṇa ihabhimuhaṁ ॥। 2032।।
tēhi samaṁciya pattō dōnnipayāṇē samāgayā amhē । taiyapayāṇē puraō hōūṇaṁ āgayā ēttha ॥2033॥
ēvaṁ jaṁpaṁtāṇa vi tēsi maṁḍalavaīṇa purisāṇaṁ । paccaṁtiya nivaīṇa vi samāgayā takkhaṇē purisā || 2034।।

namiūṇa nivaṁ maṁti ca tē vi sāhēti ērisaṁ tassa । niya nayaraniggayā amha sāmiṇō saṁti iha ēṁtā ॥। 2035 ।।
puraō paṭṭaviyā puṇa amhē tumhaṁ sarūvakahaṇatthaṁ । aha citai sō maṁtī vimhayabhariō niyamammi ||2036 ।।
dēva gihamajjhaṭhaviyaṁ dēvayapaḍimaṁ jahā jaṇō nāuṁ । sayamāgaṁtuṁ paṇamai dēi niyatthaṁ sasattīē || 2037 ।।
tō vilasataṁ atthaṁ paḍimā paḍicāraō jahicchāē । mannijjai ya jaṇēṇaṁ paḍimābhatti kuṇēmāṇō । 2038।।
patthiyamapatthiyaṁ pi hu bhōyaṇa - vatthāiyaṁ tahā lahai । nāyarajaṇapāsāō dēvagihaṁ rakkhamāṇō sō ।। 2039॥
jai paḍimaṁ phēḍēḍaṁ taṭṭāṇē ṭhāi kaha vi sayamēva । tō tassa pattiyaṁ pi hu kō vi na pāḍēi diṭṭhassa ।। 2040 ।।
kaṇamuṭṭhi pi na ḍhōyai karēi khisaṁ visēsaō lōō । amha vi sō cciya nāō nibbhaṁtaṁ ēsa saṁjāō ।। 2041 ।।
jē kuvvatā bhatti puvvaṁ atthaṁ niyaṁ payacchaṁtā । tē amha saṁpayaṁ niyapahummi avahīriē saṁtē ॥। 2042 ।।
jāyā paramavivakkhā pāradvā bhīsaṇaṁ raṇaṁ kāuṁ । amhēhi samaṁ saṁpai pattāṇaṁ puṇō ahaṁ ।।2043 ||

sāmissa pabhāvēṇa lōē māhavyamuvalahaṁtā vi । mannaṁti appaṇō cciya guṇāṇa taṁ vilasiyaṁ mūḍhā || 2045 ।।
iya citiūṇa dūē 'ḍaliyāṇaṁ mahīvaīṇaṁ ca । āvāsammi visajjai sēsaṁ pi jaṇā jahājōggaṁ ।। 2046 ।।
atthāṇāō uṭṭhāviūṇa nivaī pi nēi giha majjhē । jāi sayapi sahē rannō kajjāī citēi || 2047।।
pattā tayammi diṇē maṁḍaliyā paṁca tini naranāhā । kaya maṁgaliyā ranō maṁtispaya jōggayāvēkkhaṁ ।। 2048 ।।
kaivayadiṇapajjaṁtē kaya sammāṇā nivāya maṁḍaliyā । sacivēṇa sadēsēsuṁ vijjiyā harisabhariyaṁgā || 2049।।

tā bhō maṁti! guṇēsu vi saṁtēsu nirakkhaṇīyamiha putraṁ । purisassa visēsēṇaṁ ṭhavijjamāṇassa sāmipaē ॥। 2050 ।।

jaha paṁcanha vimajjhē suyāṇa rajjammi jōggayā jassa । niyanāṇēṇaṁ nāuṁ majjha purō taṁ nivēha || 2052 ।
tō rannā paḍirbhāṇiyaṁ maṇuyāṇaṁ rāgadūsiyamaṇāṇaṁ । kassa vi kammi vi purisē saṁjāyai pakkhavāyamaī ? ।।2053 ।।

tō āha nivaṁ maṁtī putraparitrāṇamannaha kahaṁ tu । dēvassa saṁbhavissara visaē rajjārihasusa ।। 2055।।
jaṁpai taō nariṁdō hōhī kuladēvayāpasāēṇa । jaṁ annayā vi sāhai bhavissa atthaṁ imā majjha ।। 2056।।
nivvass taṁ taha cciya jaṁ dēvā divvanāṇiṇō hōṁti । maṇuyāṇa avēkkhaṁ na ya kuṇaṁti dēvatta bhāvēṇa ।। 2057।।
aha citai niyacittē sacivō ēvaṁ ahō imō rāyā । buddhīē ainiugō vīsasai na kassai narasya ।। 2058 ।।
iya ciṁtiūṇa mannai rannō vayaṇaṁ tahatti sō maṁtī । jaṁpaiya kathā dēvō pucchissai dēvayaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 2059 ।।
rāyā bhāi pāē sōhanadiyahaṁ taō nisāsamaē । suibhūō pūēḍaṁ dēvayapaḍimaṁ purō tīsē ।। 2060।।
saṇaṁ karissamaha sā sumiṇammika hissaē phuḍaṁ majjha । kayamaṁtanicchaō aha rāyā maṁti visajjēi ।। 2961।।
maṁtī gihammi gaṁtuṁ ēgaṁtē lihai bhujjapattammi । rāyakayakajjanicchayamaha taṁ jattēṇa saṁvariḍaṁ ॥। 2062।।
taṁtūhi niyaṁtē aṁgīē gujjhammi nikkhivai । taṁ ghōṛalaē muṁbaī āgaṁtuṁ appaṇā bāhi || 2063 ।
uciyāsamma ṭhāuṁ abhitarayaṁ taō naraṁ ēkkaṁ । hakkārēu jaṁpai majjhāō aṁgithaṁ majjha || 2064।।
āhi sō vi āṇai tō tīsē gujjhayāu kaḍḍhēuṁ । taṁ bhujjaṁtassa karē samappiraṁ bhaṇai iya maṁtī ।। 2065 ।।

jēṭṭāu jō kaṇiṭṭhō rāyasuō tassa ēyamappēha । ēvaṁ ca taṁ bhaṇijjaha suhāsiyāī aubvāī || 2066 ।।
lihiyāī ēttha ciṭṭhati tāī tumhāṇa cēva uciyāī । tamhā hiyayatthāī kāyabvāī taē jhatti || 2067।।
tō tēṇa maṁtipēsiyapurisēṇaṁ tassa rāyauttassa । taṁ bhujjaṁ appēuṁ kahiyaṁ jaṁ maṁtiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ॥। 2068 ।।
kumarō vi vāiūṇaṁ taṁ bhujjaṁ savvamēva maṇamajjhē । hasiuṁ jaṁpai ēyāī majjha puvvaṁ sauvvāī || 2069 ।।
ki kāyavvamimēṇaṁ bhujjēṇa imaṁ taō payaṁpatō । phāḍēuṁ taṁ ailahu khaṁḍarayāī karēūṇa || 2070 ।।
niyadēhadhūvaṇatthaṁ āṇiyaniddhamapāvaē khivai । aha maṁtipēsiyanarō taṁ aṇujāṇāviraṁ gaṁtuṁ ॥। 2071 ।।
maṁhitaṁ kumaracēṭṭhiyaṁ bhujjadahaṇapajjaṁtaṁ । taṁ sōḍaṇaṁ maṁtī vi harisiō citai mammi ।। 2072 ||
taha pēsiyaṁ maē taṁ lihiyaṁ kāūṇa annavavaēsaṁ । taha cēva tēṇa rakkhiyamēyaṁ iyarēhiṁ dīsaṁtaṁ ॥। 2073 ।।
tā mahatō kumarō gaṁbhīrō rajjajōggaō cēva । jai puhaīē putraṁ tō hōhī tīē ēsa paī ।।2074 ।।
aha sō kumarō taṁ bhujjalihiyamaṭṭhē kahēi kīrassa । ēgaṁtaṁ kāūṇaṁ tō kīrō bhaṇai taṁ kumaraṁ ॥। 2075।।
sujjhuvayāraṁ kāuṁ samaō sō ēsa ajja maha jāō । kalladiṇē tō tumaē ēvaṁ ēvaṁ vihēyavvaṁ ॥। 2076॥
kumarō vikīravayaṇaṁ sābhippāyaṁ maṇē muṇēūṇa । kayaharisō savvaṁ ciya paḍivajjai taṁ taha ccēva || 2077।।
tō bīyadi gōsē kumarō kuladēvayāē dēvaccaṁ । saddēuṁ bhaṇai rahē tujjha ahaṁ kiṁ pi sāhēmi ।। 2078 ।।
niyagujjha jai na tumaṁ annassa kahēsi suṭṭha vi piyassa । paḍivannaṁ tēṇa tahā dēvayasavahaṁ vihēūṇa ।। 2079।।
āha kumarō nisāē suttō haṁ ajja sumiṇaē bhaṇiō । kuladēvayāē kallē jahā taē pūiyavvāhaṁ ॥। 2080 ।।
tō ginhiūṇa dammē caurō kārēhi dēvayāpūyaṁ । pucchaṁtassa kahējjā maē imā kāriyā pūyā ।। 2081 ।।
saṁjhāē aṁdhayārē pēkkhissamahaṁ pi pūyamāgaṁtuṁ । iya sikkhaviḍaṁ dammē samappiūṇaṁ tahā caurō || 2082 ।।
kumarēṇa pēsiō sō diṇāvasāṇammi kāraē pūyaṁ । rāyakuladēvayāē bhaṇiē samayammi kumarō vi ।। 2083 ।।
kakkhāē khiviūṇaṁ kīraṁ kuladēvayāē āyayaṇaṁ । vaccai ṭhiyammi nivamaṁdirassa puvyuttara disāē ।। 2084 ।।
dhūvaṁgārāṇayaṇē dēvaccayamāisēi jāi sayaṁ । kuladēvayāē pāsē pacchimabhāē muyai kīraṁ ।। 2085 ||
uggāhiūṇa dhūyaṁ namiuṁ thuṇiuṁ ca dēvayaṁ tattō । nīhariḍaṁ niyagēhē gacchaṛa tattō nivahimmi || 2086।।
rāyāsēṇa taō paḍihārēṇaṁ jaṇō samaggō vi । sēvāvasaranimittaṁ samāgaō ērisaṁ bhaṇiō ।। 2087 ।।
na karissai ajja nivō rayaṇīē avasaraṁ taō tubbhē । vaccaha savvē vi niyaṁ nivāsamaha sō kuṇai ēvaṁ ।। 2088 ।।
sō vi kumārō tattō uṭṭhēūṇaṁ payāi niyagēhaṁ । rāyā vi suī hōuṁ niyasiyasiyadhōyavaravatthō । 2069 ।।

thēvaṁgarakkhasahiō gaṁtuṁ kuladēvayāē bhavaṇammi । daṭṭu pūyaṁ pucchai visēsapūyā kayā kēṇa || 2090 ।।
safar dēvī kahē dēvaccaō maē vihiyā । rāyā bēḍa kimaṭṭhē pujjayarō kahai puttakaē । 2091 ॥
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ ēsā ajja vi sajjōkkiyā taē vihiyā । tō avaṇissāmi taō ēvaṁ ēīē uvaripi ।। 2092 ।।
pūyaṁ karissamavaraṁ iya bhaṇiuṁ pūiuṁ nivō namiuṁ । thōūṇa ya taṁ dēvi icchayamaṭṭhē maṇē dhariḍaṁ ॥। 2093 ॥

kī rakahāṇa
kāvi auvvā vāṇī ēsā mē savaṇagōyaraṁ pattā । kō saṁbhāsa ēvaṁ kōmalavayaṇēṇa maṁ ēttha ॥। 2099 ।।
havā ahirāō puṇō vi nisuṇēmi saravisēsāō। sahassa kāraya narō jai puṇa jāṇijjaē kōi ।। 2100 ॥
iya citi nariṁdō ēgamaṇō hōi jāva tā laviyaṁ । kīrēṇa puṇa taha cciya aha sō ugghāḍiūṇa muhaṁ ॥ 2101 ॥
viṭhō hōi nivō avalōiya caudisi pi saṁbhaṁtō kī rēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ nariṁda! kiṁ niyasi annattō ॥ 2102 ॥
tujjha ahaṁ kuladēvī jaṁpēmi tuhatthi ērisī ciṁtā । jaṁ kira majjha sugāṇaṁ majjhē kō rajjapayajōggō ।। 2103 ।।
hōhī puttō ēyaṁ nāṇaṁ maē nirikkhēḍaṁ । nicchaiyaṁ inhi ciya kahēmi taṁ tujjha nisuṇēhi ॥ 2104 ॥
tō uṭṭhiūṇa hiṭṭhō rāyā bhālayalamiliyakarakamalō । uṛaḍhaṭṭhiō payaṁpai dēvī ! sapasāyamāisau || 2105 | a
kīrō jaṁpai naravara ! jēdusva- kaṇiduō ō tujjha । rajjamirīē jōggō pōḍhapayāvō nivō hōhī ॥। 2105 । ।ba
tapa tumaṁ ahisēyaṁ rajjammi karēhi gaṁtuminhi pi । jaṁ sōhaṇaṁ mahattaṁ ciṭṭha rayaṇīē jāma dugē || 2106।।
ēttō caiva suyaṁtō paḍikkhiō taṁsi saṁpayaṁ na maē । jaggatassa vi kahiyaṁ phuḍavāṇīē vi tuha ēyaṁ ।। 2107॥
suttasya sumiṇaē jai kahē mi tuha ērisaṁ sahamahattaṁ । tō jāi aikta miuṁ tamhā mā kuṇaha iha khēvaṁ ।। 2108 ।।
tō rāyā himaṇō mahāpasāō tti jaṁpirō jhatti । kuladēvayaṁ namēuṁ nikkhatō tīē bhavaṇāō ।।2109 ।।
savvākhasahiō bajjhaduvārasya ḍhakkaṇanimittaṁ । dēvaccaō vi pagaō nikkhamiu maha kīrō ।। 2110 ।।
dēvī paḍimā bhāgāō sarṇiyamavaṇiyalacārī । caḍiō dēvīhimaṁḍavōvari uḍiuṁ tttō ॥ 2111 ॥
pattō kumārapā sē ravilasiyaṁ kahai nssa savvaṁ pi । pabhaṇaḍa ya ēsa taha kumara ! pacciō majjha bhaṇiyassa । । 2112 ॥
inhiciya puhaivaī pēsissai tujjha naṇamāhavaṇaṁ । tō haṁ paṁjaramajjhē saṁpai ciṭṭhāmi pavisēuṁ ||2113 ॥
i bhaṇiuṁ sō kīrō jā pavisai paṁjara smitā pattaṁ । naravaiṇō āhavaṇaṁ tassa kumārassa tattha lahuṁ ॥ 2114 ॥
putragdhānayiṁ kumārō puṇa paṁjarē nivēsēuṁ । jā sējjāē nisīyai tā namiuṁ nivaniuttēṇa ।। 2115 ।।
vinnattō purisēṇaṁ kumāra ! hakkāraē tumaṁ rāyā । kumarēṇa āsaṇēṇaṁ nimaṁtiō pucchiō ēsō ॥2116 ॥
rāyaulē gaṁtaṇaṁ ajja vi indri samāgayā amhē । paḍihārēṇa tayāhaṁ visajjiō sēsalōō ya ।।2117।।
bhaṇiyaṁ va jahā rāyā avasara minhi karissaē nēya । tō kēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ puṇōhi hakkāriyā amhē ।। 2118 ।।
ēvaṁ pucchaṁtēṇa vi turaṁgapallāṇaṇammi sāhaṇiō । āiṭṭhō vatthāīṇāṇaṇē sējjavālō ya ॥ 2119।।
tō tēṇa rāyapēsiyapurisēṇa nivēiyaṁ kumārassa । jaha tīē vēlāē paḍihārēṇa mha iya kahiyaṁ ।। 2120 ।।
jaṁ ajja mahārāō kuladēvī maṁdiramma rayaṇīē । sayaṇaṁ karihī tīsē ārāhaṇakajjajjamaṇō ॥ 2121 ।।
tō avasaraṁ na kāhī visajjiō tēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ sō। savvō vi sēvayajaṇō samāgaō avasaranimittaṁ ।। 2122 ।।
ēvaṁ payaṁpiūṇaṁ paḍihārē uvaraē khataraō । niggaṁtuṁ naranāhō kuladēvīmaṁdirammi gaō ।। 2123।।
kaivapurisasamē uṭṭhāūṇaṁ tattha kēttiyaṁ pi khaṇaṁ । tattō lahu āgaṁtuṁ niyapāsāyammi tēṇa taō ।। 2124 ॥
rannā sasaṁbhramēṇaṁ paṁca pahāṇāirāyalōyassa । hakkārayāī saṁpēsiyāī tinhaṁ pi kumarāṇaṁ ॥। 2125।।
tumha kaṇiṭṭhāṇa taō kumarēṇaṁ pucchiō taō ēsō । jēṭṭhakumārassa gayaṁ āhavaṇaṁ puhai nāssa ।। 2126 ।।
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ na ajjaṁ vi pēsijjaṁtaṁ tayā jayā rannā । tumhā havaṇanimittaṁ paṭṭaviō haṁ iha kumāra ! ।।2127।।
ētthaṁtarammi pallāṇiēṇa kumarassa jhatti āgaṁtuṁ । vinnattaṁ jaha turaō ciṭṭhai pallāṇiō bāhi ।।2128 ।।
kumarō karyāsaṁgārō aha tammi turaṁgamē samāruhiuṁ । caliō rāyābhimuhō vaccaṁ tō citaē ēvaṁ ।। 2129 ।।
saccaṁ taṁ mannijjai kahiyaṁ kīrēṇa majjha jaṁ inhi । ēyassa vi niya pēsiyanarapari kahaṇāṇusārēṇa ॥ 2130 ।।

67
jaṁ lahu ya kumārāṇaṁ pēsiyamavaṇīsarēṇa āhavaṇaṁ । savvēsi iyarāṇa ya na uṇō jēṭussa kumarassa ॥ 2131 ॥
iya citatōpattō kumarō pāsamma puhaināhassa । nabhiraṁ tassa niviṭṭhō tahaṁ siyaniyaḍadē sammi ।। 2132 ।।
jākhiva tattha diṭṭhitā pēcchai kahiya lōyasamavāyaṁ । pubvābhimuhaṁ sōhāsaṇaṁ ca ṭhaviyaṁ rayaṇamaiyaṁ ।। 2133 ।।
aha sō uṭṭaviūṇaṁ varāsaṇē tammi ṭhāviō rannā । rayaṇāimaē kalasē āṇāvēuṁ salilapunnē || 2134 ।।
dēvīkahiē samaē kumarō kīraṁta maṁgala saēhiṁ । ahisittō rajjapaē paṇaō ya nivāilōēṇa ।। 2135 ।।
saṁtē vijētē ēsamaē ṭhāviō niyapayammi । kuladēvaōvaēsā tā tumha imō pahū inhi ।। 2136॥
jaha cēva ahaṁ diṭṭhō puvvaṁ tumhēhi garuyabhattīē । taha daṭṭhavvō ēsō vi saṁpayaṁ paramaviṇaṇa || 2137 ।।
isē sē sikkhaviraṁ puvvanivō sikkhavēi navanivaī । jaha niyapubvanivāṇaṁ lajjaṁ māṇēsi taha kujjā । 2138 ।।
jēssa kaṇiṭṭhāṇa ya niyabaṁdhūṇaṁ viṇīyacittāṇa । jaha jōgaṁ dāyavvaṁ savvēsi dēgāmāī ॥ 2139।।
savyaṁpi rāyasōyaṁ kammagayaṁ garuyabhaktisaṁjuttaṁ । niyaputtaṁ va sayā vihu pāsējjā paramapīīē ॥ 2140॥
iya paḍivanē tassāē sē nivalōya ahiṇavanivēhiṁ । sō puvvanivō dōnhaṁpi kuṇai abbhatthaṇaṁ ēyaṁ ॥ 2141 ॥
dinō tumhaṁ sāmī tassa vi dinnaṁ imaṁ niyaṁ rajjaṁ । dōnnivi kajjāī maē kayāī inhi tu maha kajjaṁ ॥ 2142
tumbhē kuha visajjaha parabhavakajjaṁ mamaṁ pasāhēuṁ । asthi naī nayarāō advāṇē gāuyaddhassa ॥ 2143।।
tīsē taḍammi gaṁtuṁ kāūṇaṁ aṇasaṇaṁ parivasāmi । tā jāva maha samappai ihabhava saṁbaṁdhiyaṁ āuṁ ॥ 2144।।
sēsaṁ puṇa nīsēsaṁ puvvaṁ pi maē kayaṁ niyaṁ kajjaṁ । kārāviyāī suramaṁdirāī bahuē ṭhāṇēsu ॥ 2145 ।।
dināī dāṇāī dīṇāṇāhāiyāṇaṁ savrvvēsi । taha pūiyā ya savvē vi liṁgiṇō gavārāō ।।2146॥
taṁ niyapiuṇō vayaṇaṁ navēṇa rannā taha tti paḍivannaṁ । hakkāriūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ paṁcaulaṁ kammaṭhāṇassa ।। 2147।।
naitīrē samabhāgē maṁḍavayaṁ kāravēha vitthinnaṁ । tatthaṁ ya sāhāraṇa niṣvāyapavāiyāī ṭhāṇāī ।। 2148 ।।
nimmāvēyavvāī jaha āiccō u ēi ēyassa । savvassa vi nimmaviyassa taha ya tumbhēhi kāyavvaṁ ।। 2149 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ savvaṁ visajjiūṇaṁ jaṇaṁ sayaṁ gaṁtuṁ । vāsagihē āṇāvai sapaṁjaraṁ tattha taṁ kīraṁ ।।2150 ।।
bhaṇai ya jaha saccapainna jaṁpa jaṁ kiṁci vaṁdviyaṁ tujjha । kīrēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ sēcchāē muṁca maṁ inhi ॥ 2151 ।।
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ ēyaṁ siddhaṁ ci ya kiṁtu uvavaṇē majjhaṁ । savvammi viyariyavvaṁ taē na gaṁtavvamannattha ।। 2152 ।।
siliyāvasarē vittē nicvaṁpi tumaṁ uvējja maha pāsē । ālāvaṁ kāūṇaṁ maē samaṁ vi vaccējjā ॥ 2153।।
kīrēṇa tammi vayaṇē tahatti paḍivajjiyammi naranāhō । suttō puṇō pahāē samuṭṭhiuṁ vihiyataṇu kiccō ।। 2154।
suramaṁdirēsu pūyaṁ samaggaliṁgīṇa tahaya sammāṇaṁ । dīṇāīṇaṁ dāṇaṁ kārāvai guttimuyaṇaṁ ca ॥ 2155 ॥
tēṇēva pasaṁgēṇaṁ paṁjaraṁ baṁdhāu mōyaē kīraṁ । vinnattē purisēhi naitīrē nimmiē jhuṁpē || 2156॥
puvvanivaṁ niyajaṇayaṁ ārōhēuṁ suhāsaṇē pavarē । sayamāruhiuṁ turaē kaliō cauraṁga sēṇā ।। 2157।।
sammuhaṁ pacaliō pattō jhuṁpammi tattha jaṇayanivaṁ । uttārēuṁ muṁcai sōviya muṁḍiyasirō hōuṁ ।। 2158 ।।
āicasābhimuhaṁ ṭhāūṇaṁ aṇasaṇaṁ pavajjēi । tassa samīvē rāyā sōlasa - paḍicāraē muyai || 2159 ।।
paṁcahi bhicca sahi saha muṁcai tattha taṁtabālaṁ ca । paharayadāṇanimittaṁ taṁ tāhiva vi jhuṁpāī || 2160॥
pāikkāṇaṁ kārai caudisi tassa rāya jhuṁpassa । saṭṭāṇē gaṁtumaṇō jā paṇamai patthivō jaṇayaṁ ॥ 2161॥
tā tēṇa sō nisiddhō paṇamaṁtō ērisaṁ ca saṁlaviyaṁ । jē amha pūryāṇijjā punivā āsaṇē tēsi ।। 2162 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-68-to-68.json ==========================
18
kī kahāṇa
saṁpai tumaṁ niviṭṭhō tō amhāṇaṁ pi taṁsi namaṇijjō । jai na paḍicchasi paṇaḍaṁ amha tumaṁ mā karijjāsi ।। 2163॥ ॥
rannā bhaṇiō jaṇaō jōḍi ( ya ) hatthēṇa savinayaṁ ēvaṁ। sīhāsaṇē niviṭṭō tāya ahaṁ puvvanivaīṇa || 2164 ॥
jai inhi tō paṇaī annassa na kassaī karissāmi । tumhē puṇa namaṇijjā majjha sathā jēhiṁ tubbhēhi ॥ 2165 ।।
dinaṁ mē jammamiṇaṁ tayaṇukayā pālaṇāguṇāruhaṇaṁ । rajjaṁ viinnaminhi dūrēciṭṭhatu ēyāī ॥ 2166 ।।
savvāiṁ kāraṇāī annaṁpi ihatthi kāraṇaṁ garuyaṁ । jaṁ cattasavvasaṁgō dēvō saṁpai muṇisamāṇō ।। 2167॥
liṁga kiṁpi na gahiyaṁ dēvēṇa imō muṇittaṇa vi bhēō । muṇiṇō u suriṁdāṇa vi havaṁti namaṇijja payakamalā ||
kiṁ puṇa amha naridāṇa vaṁdaṇijjā imē na jāyaṁti । jō puṇa dēvēṇa kaō sannāsō dukkarō ēsō । 2169।।
crearer purisōnamasaṇijjō muṇīṇa vi havēi । kā uṇa gihīṇa vattā ēvaṁ navanivaiṇō vayaṇaṁ ॥ 2170 ।।
rāya mahāpurisēhi samatthiyaṁ aṇasaṇīta rāyā । tuhikkō hōūṇaṁ avaṭṭaō paṇamiō rannā ।।2171 ।।
sēsēṇa vi lōēṇaṁ savvē vi visajjiyā taō tēṇa । aṇasaṇiṇō uṭṭhēuṁ niya-niyaṭhāṇēsu saṁpattā ॥ 2172 ॥
rannā jēṭhō bhāyā bhaṇāviō pēsiūṇa niyapurisaṁ । jō tuhabhimaō dēsō kahēha taṁ jēṇa tē dēmi || 2173 ।।
tēttaraṁ kayamiṇaṁ tāō kipi jīvaē tāva । tassēva ya sēvissaṁ payāraviṁdāī pāsagaō ।। 2174।।
tō dēsēṇa na kajjaṁ saṁpai mē kiṁ pi jammi samayasmi । icchā ma ( jjha ) bhavissai tammi sayaṁ ciya kahissāmi
taṁ jēdubaṁdhuvayaṇaṁ kahiyaṁ purisēṇa tēṇa āgaṁtuṁ । rannō sahā niviṭṭhassa tēṇa sō pēsiō puṇavi ॥ 2176 ॥
sikkhaviḍaṁ jaha sēvaṁ tāyassa ahaṁ pi āyarissāmi । taha vi maē rajjabharō tāyāē sēṇa paḍivannō ।।2177॥
tō tumhē vihu dē gahiūṇaṁ tattha kaṁpi niyapurisaṁ । annaṁ pēsēha sayaṁ ciṭṭhaha puṇa tāya pāsammi ।।2178 ।।
tāṇa ahaṁ rajjē ahisitō jēṇa kāraṇēṇēyaṁ । viiyaṁ ciya savvēsi amaccapahāṇa purisāṇa ॥ 2179॥
jai asthi rajjavaṁ tujjha ta taṁ ahaṁ samappē mi । inhi ciya giṇhaṁ tumaṁ tumha ahaṁ sēvaō hōmi ।। 2180 ।।
iya jaṁpiyamma ēnnā sahāniviṭṭō jaṇō samaggōvi । annōnaṁ vayaṇāī palōiūṇaṁ dhaṇai sīsaṁ ॥ 2181 ॥
citēi tahā cittē ahō imō kō vi amahāsattō । jassa udārattaṇamērisaṁ tahā viṣaya - vittīya ॥ 2182 ।।
tō jai jē kumarō paḍivajjissai kahaṁ ci rajja siriṁ । amhē hi taha vi ēsō nivāriyavvō payattēṇa ॥ 2183।।
tassa payacchaṁtō rāyala cchimavaṇī sarōgabhayacittō । puvvanariṁdēṇa jaō amha imō daṁsiō sāmī ||2184 ॥
nihatthēṇa niya paē paṭṭiō dēvaōvaṭṭhō ya । tamhā vaiūṇa imaṁ kahamanaṁ sāmiyaṁ karimō ॥। 2185 ।।
kiṁtu gharaṁ mā bhaṇimō saṁpai ēyassa samma ki ci । niya ranō jā na suyaṁ jēdukumārassa paḍivayaṇaṁ ॥ 2186 ।।
aha sōrāyaniuttōṁ purisō gaṁtaṇa jēṭṭhakramarassa । puraō sāhai savvaṁ niyāmi papiyaṁ aṭṭha ॥ 2187।।
aha sōci kumarō niyamāṇasammi vimhaiō । kaha tēṇa ghaḍamāṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ maha bhāuṇā ēyaṁ ॥ 2188 ।।
ēvaṁ maṇammi vi jaō na citaē kō vijaṁ syaṁ laddhaṁ । rajjaṁ dijjai annassa kassaī niyayapiuṇō vi ।। 2189 ।।
jaṁ rajjatthē lōō ghāyai jaṇayaṁ sahōyaraṁ baṁdhuṁ । puttaṁ pi sayaṁ jāyaṁ ki puṇa sāvakkabaṁdhussa ॥ 2190।।
kō vi payacchai rajjaṁ sakannahiyaō sahatthamārūḍhaṁ । tā ēsa majjha bhāvaṁ lahiuṁ ēvaṁ paryapēī ।। 2991 ।।
paḍivajjēmi ahaṁ jai rajjaggahaṇaṁ taō havai majjha । kēvalamēva lahattaṁ na rajjalāhō na dēsō ya
aha hōi kaha vi dōsā tō sō vi sutē ya vajjiō hōi । tamhā puvvillaṁ ciya kīrau iha uttaraṁ inhi ।। 2193 ।।
'vīmaṁsiūṇa sammaṁ pacchā jaṁ kipi saṁgayaṁ hōhī । taṁ kāhāmō iyaṁ citiūṇa taṁ uttaraṁ dēi || 2194 ||
sō purisō taṁ vayaṇaṁ āgaṁtūṇaṁ nivēyaē rannō । taṁ sōūṇaṁ rāyā vi dhāriuṁ
।।
2992 ।।
muyai cittammi || 2195 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
69
tō avasaraṁ visajjara nivāsaṭhāṇammi vaccai niyammiṁ । kayabhōyaṇē visajjiya siliyāvasarē yatammi nivē ||
āgaṁtū kī kāuṁ gōṭṭhi khaṇaṁ samaṁ tēṇa । vaccai uvavaṇa majjhē rāyā vi khaṇaṁtara saṁtē ॥2197॥
gaṁtuṁ piuṇō pāsē ṭhāūṇa khaṇataō niyattēuṁ । puṇa atthāṇaṁ dāraṁ visajjiraṁ jāi vāsagihē ।। 2198 ।।
iya niccapi kuṇatassa tassa tāō diṇammi sattamaē । pattō nihaṇaṁ sakkāriō ya rāyāilōēṇa ।। 2999 ।।
jēṭṭakumarō vi sēvaṁ piuṇō kāūṇa tēttiya diṇāṇi । nivavirahiyavēlāē tāya parōvakhē ṭhiō sa gihē ।। 2200 ॥
dēsaṁtaragamaṇāī rāyaṁtara kaḍhaṇāicitēuṁ । savvamaṇatthaṁ pacchā niyatacittō samīhōuṁ ||2201॥
niyamabhitarapurisaṁ sikkha viuṁ pēsaē nivasamīvē । gaṁtūṇa sō nivēyai nivai purō jaha ahaṁ tujjha || 2202।।
jēṭhṭhēṇa bhāuṇā pēsiōmhi sō ērisa kahāvēi । jaha jīvaṁtō tāō imaṁ maē āsi vinnantō ।।2203 ||
saggaṁ gayāṇa tumhaṁ kāēṇa samaṁ ahaṁ pi kaṭṭhēsu । āruhiuṁ tumhaṁ ciya pāsammi samāgamissāmi | 2204 ||
tāṇa ta bhaṇiyaṁ jaṇāṇa āhāṇaō ihaṁ asthi । jaṁ gōṭṭhī mayāṇaṁ saṁggagamō jāyaē nēya ।। 2205।।
tō
tuha bhāyā rāyā jaṁ bhaṇai taē tamēva kāyavvaṁ । ēsō tāyāēsō maē pannō kayaṁjaliṇā ।। 2206।।
iya sōuṁ sō rāyā muiyamaṇō pattalaṁ lihāvēuṁ । ai viulasāradēsassa tassa hatthē samappēi ॥2207।।
vatthābharaṇaṁ pauraṁ ca appiraṁ taṁ bhaṇāvaē ēvaṁ । jaha tumbhē gaṁtūṇaṁ jahāsuhaṁ vasaha niyadē sē || 2208 ।।
aha sō purisō gaṁtuṁ jēṭṭhakumārassa pattalāīyaṁ । savvaṁ samappiūṇaṁ nivavayaṇaṁ sāhaē sayalaṁ ।। 2209 ।।
sō vi tahēva aṇui jēṭṭhakumārō nivassa āēsaṁ । aha annayā nariṁdō taṁ kīraṁ jaṁpaē ēvaṁ ।। 2210।।
tujjhuvayā rāṇa maē aṇurūvaṁ natthi kiṁ pi nimmaviyaṁ । tō tuha mahagghalahurayaṇamā liyaṁ baṁdhēmō kaṁṭhē ।। 2211 ॥
kīrēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ naravara ! cukkōsi majjha taṁ nūṇaṁ । buddhīē mārēuṁ jaṁ vaṁchasa maṁ tumaṁ ihi ।।2212 ।।
ranā bhaṇiyaṁ kahatō kīrō jaṁpēi rayaṇalōhēṇa । bāṇēṇa kōi haṇiuṁ maṁ nihaṇaṁ nēi niyamēṇa ॥2213।।
bhaṇai nivō jaha majjha uvavaṇē kōvi jīvajāīṇaṁ । ghāyaṁ khiviḍaṁ na lahai mā vaccasu tō tumaṁ bāhiṁ ।। 2214 ॥
mōttūṇa uvavaṇaṁ tassa cēva majjhē ramāhi sēcchāē । kīrō bhaṇai narēsara mēṁ sakaē kō vi tuha āṇaṁ ।। 2215।।
naya laṁghēi sayannō aṭṭhēṇa vi taṁ jaō kavaḍḍāṇa । labbhai aippabhūyaṁ cauhaṭṭayamajjha vitthariyaṁ ।। 2216॥
maimāriyammi vi puṇō majjha sarīrammi hōi jāvaiyaṁ । pisiyaṁ tāvaiyaṁ nūṇa labbhaē aṭṭhacāēṇa । 2217 ।।
tā tassa nimittaṁ maṁ na kō vihaṇihī narida ! niyamēṇa । kiṁtu aidulaha sumahaggha rayaṇalōhēṇa nihaṇēhī ॥2218॥
laddhūṇa kaṁpi samayaṁ tahāvihaṁ jattha pēkkhai na annō । kaḍivaṭṭayapakkhittaṁ pacchānē niya gimmi ।।2219 ।।
taha kaha vi sō kahī vahagō na tumaṁ pi jaha viyāṇāsi । kammi vikālē kassa vi pāsāō majjha vr̥ttataṁ । 2220।
tattō citihisi tumaṁ narēsara ! niyammi cittammi । jaha sō kīrō pagaō palāiuṁ puvva niyaṭhāṇē ।। 2221॥
tiriyāṇa vaṇayarāṇaṁ pāsammi na atthi savva sōyāī । tā majjha dugaṁ jugavaṁ pi jāyaē niva ! aṇiṭṭayaraṁ । । 2222।।
ēkkaṁ pāṇaviṇāsō duiyaṁ puṇa puvvakahiya avavāō । tō naranāha! ahaṁ kaha mahāsamudaṁ tarēūṇa ||2223॥
buḍḍāmi saṁpayaṁ gōparyāmma jō rakkhiō maē appā | garuyaavāēhiṁtō taṁ kaha ihi viṇāmi ।। 2224॥
ramnā bhaṇiyaṁ jai tuha pasihāsai nēya saṁgayaṁ ēyaṁ । dēsassa sāmiyaṁ taṁ karōmi tō karasai gurussa ॥2224 ।।
jamhā suvvai lōē katthai rāyā bhuyaṁgamō atthi । āyannijjai annattha maṁkaḍō maṇuyanamaṇijjō ॥। 2226॥
ēē jahā tirikkhā vidōvi pālēṁti maṁḍalavaittaṁ । majjha pasāēṇa tumaṁ pi kīra taha hōsu dēsa pahū ।। 2227॥
