kīrō pabhaṇai patthiva! tumaṁ pi aiujjuōsi jaṁ ēvaṁ iyarajaṇō iva pattiyasi ērisāṇaṁ pi vayaṇāṇaṁ ।। 2228 ।।
kiṁ katthai tiriyāṇaṁ saṁbhavai maṇussalōyasāmittaṁ । aha saṁbhavai tahā vi huna majjha ētthatthi atthitaṁ ।।2229।।
tō rāyā tassa kaē niya kalāmaṁdirassa pāsammi । taha maṁtigihasamīvē ēkkēkkaṁ kāraē khaṁbhaṁ ।। 2230 ।।
kaṁcaṇamayamaituṁgaṁ thōraṁ tēsuvari caurasaṁ bhavaṇaṁ । cauttha - vitthaḍūsiyamēkkakkaṁ savva kaṇayamayaṁ ।। 2231॥
caudāraṁ jālakavāḍa saṁjuyaṁ chajjaēhi ramaṇijjaṁ । bahu nijjūhapasāhiyamaṇē ya siharaggakayakalasaṁ ॥2232॥
dhavaluddha
yadhayakaliyaṁ kalakikiṇijālamuhaliyadiyaṁtaṁ । taiyāē bhūmīē pacchimadārassa āsannaṁ ।। 2233॥
kīrō kamāi kīlai uvavaṇarukkhē kayāi khaṁbhagihē । tattha ṭhiō saha ratnā karēi gōṭṭhi nariṁdō vi ।। 2234 ।।
tassa payacchai kālōciyāī sarasāī suṁdaraphalāī । niya hatthēṇaṁ pavaṇīkayāī aiparamapīīē ॥ 2235।।
aha annayā naridaṁ kīrō pabhaṇēi maṁ visajjēha । dōnni diṇē jaha gaṁtuṁ puvvillavaṇammi kīrāṇaṁ ।।2236।।
tēsi puraō daṁsēmi appayaṁ jīvamāṇamāṇēmi । taha tē vi iha paē sē pāsaṁti jahā maha samiddhi ॥ 2237।।
iya paḍivanē rannā gaṁtr̥̄ṇa varṇāmmi milai sō tēsi । taṁ daṭhṭhē tē kīrā jāyā savvē pahidumaṇā ।। 2238 ।।
pucchaṁti kahaṁ chuṭṭī pāsāō pāsabaṁdhayassa tumaṁ । savvaṁpi taō ēsō niya vr̥ttaṁtaṁ kahai tēsi
tammi diṇē tassa taō kuṇaṁti tē gōrakhaṁ jahājōggaṁ ।
daṁsēi khaṁbhasiharaggasaṁṭhiē dō vi maṁdirē niyaē ।
pāsaṁti niuṇa diṭṭhīē savvaō tē taō pasaṁsaṁtō ।
kīrō vi rāyapurisaṁ ēkkaṁ kanammi sikkhavēūṇa ।
sō kahai tassa gaṁtuṁ kannē ṭhāūṇa jaha kira-vayaṁsē । kīrō gahiūṇa niē samāgaō asthi (ai ) bahuē ।। 2244 ||
tēsi bhōyaṇakajjē aṇujāṇaha ajja uvavaṇaphalāī । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ dinaṁ tassēva maē tayaṁ savvaṁ ।। 2245 ।।
tēṇāgaṁtuṁ kahiē nivavayaṇē tē taō uvavaṇammi । gaṁtuṁ savvē kīrā kuṇaṁti āhāramicchāē ||2246॥
nō siliyāvasarē vittammi uvēṁti khaṁbhagēhammi । kīrā nivēṇa diṭṭhā kahati puṭṭhā vaṇasaruvaṁ ।। 2247 ।।
rāyā vi taduciyāī phalāī āṇāviraṁ vicittāraṁ । pavaṇī kārāvēuṁ kīrāṇa purō khivāvēī ।। 2248 ।।
kīrā vi kayāhārā uṭhataṁ naravaī bhaṇatēvaṁ । amhē pāyasama vaṇammi niyaē gamissāma ।। 2249 ।।
aha tē aṇujāṇēuṁ rāyā gaṁtūṇa avasaraṁ kuṇai । tē uvavaṇammi vasiuṁ jaṁti pabhāē saṭhāṇammi ।। 2250 ।।
kīrassa tassa bhajjā ēkkacciya saṁṭhiyā paraṁ tattha । samaē diṭṭhā rannā puṭṭhā kahiyā ya kīrēṇa ॥। 2251।।
tō hasiuṁ naravaiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ bhō bhāya! kīraghuttōsi । kīrāṇayaṇapasaṁgēṇa jaṁ taē āṇiyā kīrī ।।2252 ।।
kīrēṇa vihasiūṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ annaha nariṁda! vīsāō। tujjha na jāyai amhāṇa saṁtiō aṁgamēttāṇa ॥। 2253।।
ēgō vaṁṭhō vaṁṭhō vva uṭṭiuṁ nēya najjaē jaṁtō । gihiṇīsahiō puṇa sō jaha taha gaṁtuṁ na pārēi ।। 2254।।
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ hōhī vīsāsō suṁdarō tathā majjha । jaṇihī bhāujjāyā jayā suyaṁ kīra tuha tullaṁ ॥। 2255।।
kī raṁgaṇāē bhaṇiyaṁ jaṇiē vi maē suē naravariṁda! । tuha bhāuṇā saricchaṁ kō tassa guṇē viyāṇēhī ।। 2256।।
jai hōi tujjha puttō tujjha saricchō muṇai guṇēhiṁtō । sō majjha suyassa guṇē tumamēva jaṇēhi tō paḍhamaṁ ।। 2257।।
puttaṁ appasaricchaṁ tō pacchā jārisō taē bhaṇiō tārisayaṁ narapuṁgava ! ahaṁ pi puttaṁ jaṇissāmi ।। 2258 ।।
nā bhaṇiyaṁ bhō kīra ! punnavaṁtō jayammi tumamēkkō । jēṇa taē saṁpattā attaṇurūvā imā bhajjā ।। 22559 ।।
ēvaṁ gamēi kālaṁ sō rāyā tēṇa kīrajuyalēṇa । sahakēli kuṇamāṇō nicvaṁpi kahāhiṁ vivihāhiṁ ।। 2260॥
bīya diṇē sō savvē tē nēi nariṁdanayarammi
tēsi āṇaṁdayarē pavēsa tēsu tē savvē
dhuṇiūṇaṁ sīsāī ciṭṭhati ciraṁ gayā cōjjaṁ ।। 2242 ।।
pēsai rannō pāsē atthāṇa sahāniviṭṭhassa ॥ 2243।।

kīrēhiṁ tēhi jaha sā taruṁ caḍaṁtī uvēkkhiyāvallī ! jāyā baṁdhaṇaphalayā kumāraiyarāṇa vi tahēva ॥ 2261।।
niggahamakuṇaṁtāṇaṁ paḍhamamaṇatthē kaū vatthussa । kīrāṇa va pariṇāmō viṇāsahēū havai nūṇaṁ ।। 2262॥
as kavi divvajōēṇa kīrabuddhīē tē samaggā vi । chuṭṭā kumāra! kīrā tō nēya gaṇijjaē ēyaṁ ॥ 2263॥
ēyaṁ tu kāṇayamēttiyaṁ ciya ihōvajujjaē kahiuṁ । jattiyamēttē kīrā baddhā pāsēsu vāhēṇa ।। 2264॥
sētu ma kahiyaṁ kōuyajaṇagaṁ ti aggaō tujjhaṁ । kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ na annahā maṁti ! tuha vayaṇaṁ ।। 2265।।
jaha cēva taē bhaṇiyaṁ taha cēva ya cōjja kārayaṁ ēyaṁ । ēkkaṁ ētthamaṇāgaṁ kahiyaṁ jaṁ kassa vi na nāmaṁ । 2266 ॥
(tō) maṁtiṇā paṇiyaṁ paḍhamaṁ ūsuyamaṇēṇa pāraddhaṁ । āsi kahā ṇayamēyaṁ maē kahēu taō kumara ।।2267।।
nāmaggahaṇaṁ na kayaṁ kassa vi saṁbaddhayaṁ iyāṇi tu । jai kōuyaṁ tuha taō kahēmi savvāī nāmāī ।। 2268 ||
kīrassa kayaṁ nāmaṁ vaṇaṁtarē tāvasaṇa paḍuvayaṇō । kālōnāma bāhō nadiuraṁ nāma nagaraṁ tu ॥ 2269॥
rāyā sunaṁdanāmō jēsuō tassa caṁdaṇō nāma । bīō ya naṁdivaddhaṇanāmō taiō sunāmō tti ॥2270 ॥
jayavijaya nāmayā turiya paṁcamā tāṇa bhāyarō jāyā । vimalānaī imāī kumāra jāṇaṁhi nāmāī || 2271।।

I
sō mahainihāṇamaṁtīkumarēṇaṁ aṁbuvicīmatissa । nāmaṁ puṭṭhō sāhai viyāracaurō ti nāmēṇa ।। 2272 ||
ēsa maē diṭṭhatō tuha parikahiō kumāra inhi tu । niryākaccē kuṇacittaṁ muṁca pamāyaṁ puṇa samaggaṁ ।। 2273 ।।
jaha na muṇai naranāhō taha pacchannaṁ niyaṁ naraṁ kaṁpi । āisiūṇaṁ tīsē pahē vahatīē kattha viya ।।2274 ।।
lahiūṇa aṁtaraṁ cōradhāḍinivaḍaṇamisēṇa kārēhi । jhatti viṇāsaṁ jāyai puraō savrvvapi jaha sutthaṁ ।। 2275।।
paḍivajjiūṇa vayaṇaṁ maṁtissa vaha tti tēṇa kumaraṇaṁ । maṁti visajjiūṇaṁ niya purisō pasiō tī sē ।। 2276।।
āvāsē suddhikaē sō gaṁtūṇaṁ puṇō niyattēuṁ । sāhai kumarassa purō jaha sā saṁjhāē nikkhatā ||2277।।
niyagā massābhimuhaṁ saṁvahiūṇaṁ taō paēsāō । taṁ sōūṇaṁ kumarō maimaṁtaṁ appaṇō purisaṁ ||2278 ॥
ēgaṁtē sikkhaviḍaṁ dāūṇaṁ tassa patthiya sahāē । maṁti bhaṇiryāmma kajjē sigdhaṁ ciya taṁ nirūvēī || 2278।।
sō pacchimarayaṇīē uṭṭhēuṁ niyasahāyasaṁjuttō । dhāvai disā niyaṁtō dhanna uraggāmamaggēṇa ॥ 2280॥
diṭṭhā dūrāu taō sagaḍārūḍhā aṇupamvā puraō । vaccaṁtī sannāyā ēgēṇa kumārapurisēṇa ।। 2281 ॥
nāūṇa tē kahiyā kumara niuttassa rāmasīhassa । tēṇa vi sōcciya kannē sikkhaviraṁ pēsiō puraō ।। 2282 ।।
pacchāiyaniyavayaṇō jaha uvalakkhai na kōi taha gaṁtuṁ । ēsa niuṇaṁ niēuṁ magganaḍatyō paḍikkhēi ।। 2283 ||
tā jāva rāmasīhī saṁpattō tattha tassa tō kannē । hōūṇa kahai ēvaṁ jaha nūṇamaṇūpamvā ēsā ।। 2284 ।।
kammayarīē sahiyā sagaḍārūḍhā dhurammi uvaviṭṭhō । tīē cciya kammayarō puraō cattāri pāikkā ॥2285।।
āu sahiyā anē puṇa caurō harisapāladēvēṇa । niyaaṁgarakkhamajjhāu pēsiyā sō haḍāīyā ।। 2286॥
sōūṇa rāmasīhō tavvayaṇaṁ niyamaṇammi citēi । harisaurassāsanē kaē viṇāsamma niyamēṇa || 2287।।
rāyā jāṇai tattō gavēsamāṇō viyāṇaē amhē | dhannauragāmaniyaḍē tamhā ēvaṁ vihēyavvaṁ ॥2288 ॥
iya citiūṇa sō puṇa bālapasāō nirūviō tēṇa । ēkkēkka kaṁḍavāya vva vahāṇa ṭhiēṇa paṭṭhīē ।। 2289 ।।
tīsē diyahammi taē gaṁtavvaṁ jāmiṇīē pāsammi । vasiyavvamalakkhēṇaṁ amhē puṇa gāuyaṁtariyā || 2290 ।।
tujjha vi paṭṭhīē ṭhiyā samāvayaṁtā pahē bhavissāmō । bhōyaṇasamayammi paḍikkhiraṁ tara amha miliyavvaṁ ।। 2291॥
saṁjhāē amhē vihu niyaḍā hōūṇa tuha vasissāmō । iya rāmasīha sikkhaṁ gahiṇa aṇuē sō vi ।। 2292 ॥

jaha bhaṇiya sarūvēṇaṁ vaccai maggammi rāmasīhō vi । cauvīsāē bhiccēhiṁ saṁjuō satyahatthēhi ।। 2293 ।।
।।2293।।
aha maggami vahaṁtī aṇupambā vāsarammi aṭṭhamaē । saṁjhāsamaē pattā dhannauraggāmasīmāēṁ ||2294।।
paccāsannā tattha ya dōnhaṁ gāmāṇa aṁtaraṁ garuyaṁ । pacchimagāmō niyaḍō puraō dūrammi dhannauraṁ ।। 2295 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi sōhaḍapamuhēhiṁ rāyaāyarakkhēhiṁ । bhaṇiyā aṇūpambāē pāikkā bhō paḍikkhēha ।। 2296 ।।
asthi ubhaṁtī saṁjāyā ēttha thēviyā kā vi । ēttō niyattiuṁ tō pacchimagāmē kuṇaha vāsaṁ ।। 2297 ।।
bhiccēhi sūrapālassa jaṁpiyaṁ ēttiyammi dūrammi । samuvēṁtāṇaṁ katthai sauṇabhaṁtī na saṁjāyā ॥2298 ।।
tyāgayāṇa jāō kuō vi pakkhāō ēsa avasauṇō । niyagāmassa pavēsē paccāsannē samaṇupattē ।। 2299 ॥
vaccaha puraō ēttiya vēlāē māṇiō u avasauṇō । tō sōhaḍēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tubbhē savvē vi vaccēha ॥ 2300 ॥
amhē puṇa ēttō cciya niyattiuṁ pacchimammi gāmammi । vasiuṁ pabhāyasamaē harisaurapurē gamissāmō ॥। 2301 ।।
aha tē aṇūpavāē bhaṇiyā tubbhē iō paēsāō । mā viṇiyattaha gāmē maha āgacchaha saha maē vi ।।2302 ॥
tō tattha pakkhiha kavi vāsarē jāvaēra maha tāō । pacchā sammāṇēuṁ visajjihī sō taō tubbhē ।। 2303 ||
tō sōhaḍēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ lajjāmō saṁpayaṁ mahābhāgē । daṁsaṁtā niyavayaṇaṁ amhē tuha jaṇaṇi jaṇayāṇa | 2304॥
taṁ tēttiyaṁ bhaṇittā tammi dinē tāṇa aggaō amhē । gahiūṇa tumaṁ caliyā tēsi vayaṇāṇa majjhami ।। 2305 ।।
ēkkaṁpi nēya saccaṁ jāyaṁ tō kaha na lajjimō iṇhi । tā savvahā vi na taē ētthaṭṭhē kiṁ pi bhaṇiyavvaṁ ॥ 2306 ॥
puṇaravi aṇūpamvāē tē bhaṇiyā jaha kahaṁ sa pahuṇō vi । tubbhē na kuṇaha vayaṇaṁ tubbhēhi vi jēṇa mē kahiyaṁ ॥। 2307 ।।
harisaurapurē tayā iya amhē narabarēṇa āiṭṭhā। jaṁ niyagāmē nēuṁ kusalēṇa aṇupambaṁ yaha ।। 2308 ।।
tō sōhaḍēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kēttiyadūrammi ciṭṭhaē gāmō । tujjha imō pāvijjai jō hatthēṇaṁ itthēhi ||2309।।
tō tattha tumaṁ bhaddē daṭṭhavvā jārisī kira vimukkā । jaṁ jaha ki pi bhaṇaha inhi tō tuha savahō niya piussa ।। 2310 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇa niyattā cattāri vi pacchimassa gāmassa । sammuhamaggē laggā nivapurisā sōhaḍappamuhā ।। 2311 ।।
sauṇāivaiyaraṁ tē jēttiyavēlaṁ ṭhiyā payaṁpaṁtā । tammi pasē umbhā annōna maṇūpamvāīyā || 2312॥
tēttiya vēlaṁ sō bihu bālapasāō ṭhiō palōyaṁtō । dūrapaē sē uḍḍhō vavaēsaṁ kaṁ pikāū ||2313।।
pacchāu rāmasīhō āgaṁtuṁ tattha tassa tō miliō । niya pāi kēhi samaṁ bālapasāēṇa sō bhaṇiō ।। 2314 ।।
pacchāhuttō hōuṁ tumaṁ paḍikvēhi saha sahāēhiṁ । paraō vā āravō aṇūpamvā jāva saṁcalaḥ ।। 2315।।
sō jāva rāmasīhō tavvayaṇaṁ parammuhō jāi । tā tē sōhaḍapamuhā bālapasāēṇa caurō vi ।। 2316 ।।
āgacchaṁtā diṭṭhā sammuhamēva appaṇō taō tēṇa । gaṁtūṇa rāmasīhō bhaṇiō jaha dakkhiṇapahēṇa ।। 2317 ।।
gaṁtūṇaṁ ēgaḍē adissamāṇā havēha khaṇamēgaṁ । vōliti jāva ēē caurō vihu sōhaḍappamuhā || 2318॥
nivaṭṭēūṇa imē aṇūpamvāē samōvaō kahavi । ētā dīsaṁti jamāraōmuhā kēṇaī vihiṇā ||2319।।
taha cēva rāmasōhō tavvayaṇēṇaṁ tirōhiō hōi । bālapasāō paḍiō pāvariūṇaṁ pahaḍammi ||2320।।
pacchimagāmā iō suvāsiṇī kā vi sasurabhavaṇāō । rusiūṇaṁ nōhariyā dhannaurē jāi piugēhē ।। 2321 ।।
tīsē vi hu paṭṭhīē nadiyā vayai taṁ niyattēuṁ । tāō dō vi jaṇīō bālapasāēṇa nō diṭṭhā ।।2322 ।।
nivvaṭṭiēsa sōhaḍapamuhēsu aṇūpamvā vi saṁcaliyā । puraō gāmābhimuhī tā jāva purō vahē pattā ।। 2323।।
tattha rahaṁ dhārēu sarīracitānimittamuttaritaṁ । ubhavahēṇaṁ gaṁtuṁ valaṇammi ṭhiyā sakammayarī || 2324।।
ētō suvāsiṇīē nadiyā paṭṭhilaggiyā diṭṭhā। tō sā sigdhaṁ caliyā pahammi pattā rahasamīvē ।। 2325।।

tō tē nadiyāē rahapurisā pabhaṇiyā jahā bhō bhō । maha bhāu jāyamēyaṁ paḍikkhāvaha aggaō jaṁti ।। 2326 ॥
tō niyagāmakuḍubiyā sā pariciya tti kāūṇa । gahiuṁ kalāiyāē dhariyā ēkkēṇa purisēṇa ।। 2327॥
pattā nadiyā vihu tattha taō pucchiyā ēsā । kahiyaṁ tīē rūsaṇayakāraṇaṁ kiṁ pitāṇa purō ।। 2328।।
purisēhiṁ taō bhaṇiyā suvāsiṇī sōhiṇi tti nāmēṇa । jai tuha nō paḍihāsai tō mā vaccihasi sāsughara । 2329 ।
paramiha pakkhikhaṇamavi aṇupamvā ēi jāva tō tīē । saddhi rahammi caḍiyā vaccijjā niyapiugharammi । 2330|
atthaṁgaō diṇidō saṁpai saṁjāyamaṁdhayārapi । ēgāgiṇī vayaṁtī tō paḍihisi katthai aṇatthē || 2331।।
tō sōhiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ aṇūpamvā kattha saṁpayaṁ pagayā । tēhiṁ vi tīsē kahiyaṁ sarīracitāē atthi gayā ।।2332।
ēttō khaṇaṁtarēṇaṁ bālapasāō samuṭṭhiuṁ jāva । nijjhāyai tō pēkkhai pavisaṁtē gāmamajjhammi 2333॥
sōhamu purisē aha sō gaṁtūṇa rāmasīhassa । taṁ sāhai aha sō vihu saṁvahiūṇaṁ taō calai || 2334।।
citai ya jahā ēyaṁ ailaṭṭhamaṇuṭṭiyaṁ nivanarēhi । jaṁ kira aṇūpamvāē pāsāō tē avakkatā ।। 2335।।
sāhaṁtāṇaṁ amhaṁ niyakajjaṁ saṁpayaṁ na hu mapi । nāṇaṁ saṁpajjissai naravaiṇō ēttha visayammi ।।2336।।
bālapasāēṇa samaṁ samanniō paṁcavīsahi jaṇēhiṁ । gacchēi rāmasīhō puraō jā tāva tammi khaṇē ।।2337 ।।
saṁcarai na kō vihē timirāvuriē samīvavattī vi । dīsai nanadiṭṭhō vi hu najjai jai pariciō vi ciraṁ
taṁ ciya bālapasāyaṁ puraō pēsēi rāmasīhō tō । suddhinimittaṁ sō vi hu pahapāsagaō niēūṇa ।।2339 ।।
pahamajjhaṭṭhiyaṁ rahava sahamaṇuyasamudāya mēttamavvattaṁ । saddēṇa nicchiūṇaṁ kahai taō rāmasīhassa ।। 2340 ।।
sō vi taō tē savvamēlēuṁ ēgaō bhaṇai bhiccē । jaha pahamajjhaṭṭhiyarahapurisē lauḍēhi tāḍēuṁ ||2341।।
paṁca vi pāḍēūṇaṁ mōsaṁ gahiūṇa rahagayaṁ savvaṁ । dhannauragāmamagē pahamuttaritaṁ taō tumbhē ।।2342 ।।
dō dō jaṇāmilēuṁ bhinnā bhinnā puṇō niyattēuṁ । harisaurapurapahēṇaṁ baccējjā jāva vaḍagāmaṁ ||2343।।
pattō jōyaṇamēgaṁ vavahāṇē hōī tassa gāmassa । dēsiyakuḍīē gaṁtuṁ miliyavvaṁ tattha savvēhiṁ ॥ 2344।।
iya rāmasīhavayaṇaṁ taha tti paḍivajjiūṇa tē savvē । āgaṁtuṁ paha majjhē vēgēṇa kuṇaṁti taha cēva ।। 2345 ।।
sayamēvarāma sīhō aṇūpamvā māraṇēkkakayacittō । bhayavasapalāyamāṇaṁ sanaṇaṁda sōhiṇi tattō ।। 2346॥
aṁtaramaviyāṇaṁtō haṇiūṇaṁ tikkhakharagaḍaṁḍēṇa । nihaṇaṁ nēi khaṇēṇaṁ adissamāṇō u iyarēhi ||2347।।
punvuttapagārēṇaṁ palāiuṁ tē vi dēsiyakuḍīē । gaṁtūṇaṁ vaḍagāmē miliyā savvē vi ēttha ।। 2348 ।।
rayaṇīē paḍhamajāmē cittē suttā ya tattha dō paharē । pacchimajāmē duga-tiga- caukka- vidēṇa nōhariuṁ ॥ 2349।।
gamma puṇō miliyā vaccati purō kaēṇa mōṇēṇa । jāyammi pabhāyammi u bhaṇiyā tē rāmasīhēṇa ॥ 2350 ।।
jaṁ jassa karē caḍiyaṁ mōsaṁ tassēva taṁ samaggaṁ pi । na parōpparaṁ pi kassa vi kahiyavvaṁ haṁta tumbhēhi ।। 2351 ।।
jara puṇa kahavi kahissaha suṇata kahayaṁ tathāṇa tō dōnhaṁ । mōsaṁ ahaṁ gahēuṁ kumarassa samappaissāmi ।।2352 ।।
diṭṭha pi na kēṇai pucchiyavva maha pucchaē tathā sō vi । mōsaṁ gahiūṇa maē samappiyavvō kumārassa ।। 2353।।
tasya iya bhaṇiyavvē ayamabhipāō ya rāmasīhassa । jaṁ tēsi niyarahasēṇaṁ pucchaṁta kahaṁta ēkkō vi ।। 2354।।
āyanna taha bahuyaṁ laddhaṁ kēṇā vi hōi tō bīō । macchara gahiō jaṁpai tassa vivakkhassa puraō vi ।। 2355 ।।
ēēṇa payārēṇaṁ. gujjhaṁ savvaṁ pi payaḍayaṁ hōi । ēvaṁ sikkhaviūṇaṁ tē savvē sō niyaya sahāē || 2356 ||
pattō kamēṇa pāsē kumarassa kahēi savva vr̥ttaṁtaṁ । kumarō vi kahai savvaṁ taṁ puraō mai nihāṇassa ।। 2357।।
tayataraṁ pi pattā sōhaḍapamuhā vi sāhiuṁ ranō । jaha vattaṁ niyakajjē laggā ēttō ya pahamajjhē ।। 2358 ।।

kāuṁ sarīracitaṁ aṇūpamvā calai jāva tō jhatti । kōlāhalaṁ suṇēuṁ kammayarīē imā bhaṇiyā ।। 2359 ।।
ētthēva paḍikkha tumaṁ suddhi kāūṇa jāva ēmi ahaṁ । tō jai cōrā ēē hōṁhiṁti kahaṁ vi saṁpattā || 2360।।
tō haṁ dūraṭhiyā vihu lahuyaṁ pāhāṇayaṁ khivissāmi । tuha pāyāṇaṁ samuhaṁtō taṁ puraō palāējjā ।। 2361॥
tō kammarī tattō āgacchai jāva kaivayapayāī । tāva phuḍaṁ pariyāṇai jaha paḍiyā cōraghāḍitti ।। 2362॥
puvvattaṁ saṁkēyaṁ aṇūpamvāē karēi tō jhatti । sā vi palāyai puraō turiyagaī pāṇabhīmaṇā ।। 2373 ||
kammarī puṇa tatthēva saṁṭhiyā niyamuvavisēūṇa । tā jāva (tē) palāṇā cōrā savvē gahiyamōsā | 2364 ||
tō nīsaddaṁ nāūṇa sā purō maṁdamaṁda muvagaṁtuṁ । jā pēkkhai tā pāsai tahēva taṁ sagaḍayaṁ jutaṁ ॥ 2365।।
pāikkā puṇa paḍiyā ciṭṭhēti kaṇatayā mahiyalammi । saṁbhāsiyā ya tīē jaṁpiyamēgēṇa tēsu ta ।। 2366 ॥
avacēyāṇaṁ tīē saṁbāhiūṇa sō vihiō । uvaviṭṭhō annē vihu ēvaṁ saṁvāhiyā caurō ।। 2367॥
tō laddhayahi tēhi vidinnaṁ paḍuttaraṁ tīsē । tō tīē tē bhaṇiyā cōrāṇa iō paṇaṭṭhāṇa || 2368।।
jāyā mahaī vēlā tō uṭṭhēuṁ caḍēha gaḍḍīē । ēkkō saṭṭhēkkaō jō sō khēḍau dōnni vi jaṇīō ||2369 ।।
amhē puṇa pāēhiṁ vaccisāmō aṇūpamvā ya ahaṁ । suiraṁ na paḍikkhijjai ēttha ṭhiēhi iyāṇi tu ।। 2370॥
hakkārēmi aṇūpamvamahaṁ tumē saṁvaha savvē vi । iya bhaṇiu kammayarī aṇūpamvāē vayai pāsē ||2381 ।।
jattha dvāṇē gahiō saṁkēō cōrasaṁkiyamaṇāē । saddhi aṇūpamvāē tammi paēsamma gaṁtūṇa || 2372 ।।
sā tī kuṇai saddē dō tinni vi jāva kō vi paḍisaddaṁ । na hu dēi tāva ēsā gaṁtuṁ puraō visaddēi || 2373 ||
tattha vina kōi saddaṁ jāva payacchēi tāva savvattō । bhamiuṁ bhamiuṁ saddē karēi garuē ya garuyayarē ॥2374॥
sidda asaṇaṁtī sabāhanayaṇā niyattiuṁ pattā । sagaḍa purisāṇa pāsē tīē sarūvaṁ kahai tēsi ।। 2375।।
tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ jayā iha pahā rahatthā samāgayā cōrā । jhatti tathā sōhiṇiyā naṇaṁdasahiyāiō naṭṭhā ||2376॥
jai purṇa sā ēyāsi palāyamāṇīṇa katthaī miliyā । tō tāhi samaṁ gāmē pagayā dhannauraē hōhī ।। 2377।।
tamhā gammau gāmē inhi tō tattha jai gayā na imā । kārissāmō pacchā katthai annattha sē sāraṁ ।। 2378 ।।
iya tanicchiyaṁ tē kāuṁ sagaḍammi āruhōūṇa । kammayarīē sahiyā pagayā dhannauragāmammi ||2379 ॥
kahiyaṁ kammarīē aṇūpamvā saṁtiyāē māūē । tihuyaṇadēvīē purō taṁ savvaṁ kiṁ pi pahamajjhē ।। 2380 ।।
jaṁ vittaṁ taṁ sōuṁ tīē sōyaggitāviyāē vi । paḍhamaṁ ci ya bhiccāṇaṁ uvayārō tāva kāraviō || 2381||

niyaniya vigappa sarisaṁ savvēhiṁ vi jaṁpiyaṁ khaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ । iya nicchiyaṁ pabhāē sasuragihē sōhiṇī taṇaē ॥2385।।

paṭṭaviyā bahupurisā caudisi paṁcajōyaṇē jāva । gāmēsu ya nagarēsu ya sā tēhi gavēsiyā niuṇaṁ ।। 2392 ।।
vattā va nōvaladdhā aṇūpamvā saṁtiyā paraṁtēhi । tattō niyattiūṇaṁ kahiyaṁ dhannauragāmammi || 2393॥
mōttūṇa taō āsaṁ aṇūpamvāē kuḍuṁbalōṇa । akkaṁdiyaṁ pabhūyaṁ bīē divasammi tō lēhaṁ ।। 2394॥
appēuṁ paṭṭaviō purisō pāsammi sūrapālassa । sō tassa addhamaggē ēṁtō gāmammi tō miliō ।। 2395।।
puṭṭhēṇa tēṇa kahiyaṁ kuṭuṁbakusalaṁ muhēṇa tassa purō । lēhō na daṁsiō puṇa taō puṇō sūrapālēṇa ।। 2396।।
sō puṭṭhō kēṇa tumaṁ kajjēṇa samāgaōsi maha samuhō । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ na kēṇai visēsakajjēṇa ēmēva ।। 2397।।
tumhāṇa sārakaraṇatthamāgaō duggapālavayaṇēṇa । tēṇa saha sūrapālō pattō gāmammi tō jhatti ।। 2398।।
tatthāgaō sarūvaṁ dhūyāē jāṇiūṇa aibahuyaṁ । akkaṁ diuṁ pavattō nivāriō kaha vi kicchēṇa ।। 2399 ।।
āgaṁtūṇa samaggō gāmajaṇō tassa duggapālāī । miliō kālakamēṇaṁ tō jāō sō vigayasōō ।। 2400 ।।
anna dinē āgaṁtuṁ kēṇa vi caraḍēṇa annagāmassa । bāhidhaṇaṁ varaṁtaṁ hariyaṁtō paḍiyabubāē || 2401 ।।
taggāmanāyagēṇa purisō pāsammi sūrapālassa । saṁprēsiō kahēuṁ sayaṁ tu sahiō bahū narēhiṁ ।। 2402 ॥
cōrāṇaṁ paṭṭiē caliō miliyō tāṇa tō jāyaṁ । tassa saha tēhi jujjhaṁ bhaggō ghōēhitō valiō ।। 2403 ।।
tammi samayamma pattō saṁvahiuṁ sūrapālapaṭṭailō । caraḍēṇa tēṇa diṭṭhō tō bhaṇiō tō tēṇa kīsa tumaṁ ।। 2404 ।।
kajjēṇa viṇā laggō paṭṭhīē amha tujjha gāmassa । kēraḍiyaṁ piva iṭṭha na uṭṭhavēmō kayā vijaō || 2405 ।।
tā jāhi niyattēuṁ parakajjē mā viṇassaha muhāē । iya sōūṇa kuviēṇa sūrapālēṇa sō jhatti ।। 2406 ।।
jujjhēuṁ pāhuṇaō jamassa saṁpēsiō ō savvaṁ । vālēūṇaṁ dhaṇaṁ taṁ samappiyaṁ tassa gāmassa | | 2407 ॥
tappa bhaisūrapālaṁ rāutaṁ vāharēi savva jaṇō । māriya caraḍassa suēṇa pēsiō dhāyagō tassa ।। 2408 ।।
gāmasamavāyamajjhēdviyassa kaiyā vi sūrapālassa | avacittassa paviṭṭhō sō ghāu chu riyahatthō ।। 2409 ।।
diṭṭhō ya sūrapālēṇa sō taō mōḍiūṇa hatthāōṁ । tassa churiyaṁ gahēḍaṁ puṭṭhō taṁ kēṇa paṭṭhaviō ।। 2410 ।।
kahiyaṁ jahaṭṭiyaṁ tēṇa tassa nīsāriuṁ taō mukkō । karuṇāē tēṇa lōō nivāriō tassa laggaṁtō ।। 2411।।
rāuttasūrapālō tappabhiī sēvaēhiṁ purisēhiṁ । rakkhijjai jattēṇaṁ lahai pavēsaṁ na annāō || 2412 ।।
aha annayā auvvō purisō ēkkō samāgaō tattha । sō ēgaṁtē vōttuṁ vaṁ saha sūrapālē ॥2413।।
ēgaṁtaṁ pacchaṁtō sō pucchijjai samīvalōēṇa । kō taṁ kattō ki vā jaṁpasi iya tāva sāhēha || 2414 ||
sō ēvaṁ ciya jaṁpai ēgaṁtē savvamēva sā hissaṁ । rāuttasūrapālassa aggaō nēya annassa ।। 2415 ।।
ēvaṁ paryāpamāṇē tammi visēsēṇa saṁkaē lōō। ēgaṁtaṁ alahaṁtō gāmē annamma sō gaṁtuṁ ॥2416॥
muṁḍāviūṇa sīsaṁ liṁgavisēsaṁ ca kaṁpi gahiūṇa । ēi puṇō dhannaurē gāmē nēmittiō hōuṁ ।। 2417 ।।
jīviyamaraṇaṁ lāhālāhāra ahaṁ muṇēmi savvaṁpi । ēvaṁ sō appāṇaṁ payāsaē gāmamajjhammi ।। 2418।।
gāmapurisēṇa kēṇai puṭṭhō jīvitha maṇūpamvā ēsō । jaṁpai tīsē jaṇaō jai pucchai tō kahē ma ahaṁ ।। 2419 ।।
tēṇāgatuṁ ēvaṁ kahiyaṁ rāuttasūrapālassa । tēṇa vi bhaṇiō ēsō lahu taṁ āṇēha maha pāsē ।। 2420॥
tēṇāṇīō hakkāriūṇa tō sūrapālapurisēhiṁ । sō niuṇaṁ sōhēuṁ nīō niya nāyagasamīvē ॥ 2421 ॥
tēṇa vi ūsārēuṁ sēsajaṇaṁ savvamēva ēgassa । tassēva purō kahiyaṁ tuha dhūyā jīvaē nūṇaṁ ॥ 2422 ॥
ciṭṭhai garuyasuhēṇaṁ tīē saha tujjha daṁsaṇaṁ hōhī । iya kahiē sō jāō harisāūriya-maṇō jhatti ।। 2423॥
hakkāriūṇa bhajjaṁ tihuyaṇa-dēvipi appaṇō pāsē । tō kahai surapālō tīsē savvaṁpi tavvaṇaṁ ।। 2424॥

kuṁtasīha rāyakahāṇa
sōūṇa sāvitaṁ taha harisiya hiyayā khaṇēṇa saṁjāyā । pucchai puraō vi taō pāsē nēmittiyassēvaṁ ॥ 2425 ।।
inhi ciṭṭha sā kattha amha dhūyā kahaṁ kahaṁ ca tattha gayā । payaḍai niya sabbhāvaṁ sō liṁgīta purō tēsi ।। 2426 ।।
na hāmi ahaṁ liṁgī na ya nēmittī aṇūpamvāē ihaṁ । niyavattā kahaṇatthaṁ paṭṭhaviō tumha pāsamma || 2427 ।।
sōhagiri mēhalāē sīhauraṁ nāma asthivaranayaraṁ । aivisamaṁ maṇasā vi hu alaṁghaṇijjaṁ vivakkhāṇaṁ ।। 2428 ।।
tatthāsi mēccharāyā balavaṁtō dudamō riubhaḍāṇaṁ । sō pauradēsarannō puttēṇaṁ puhaisīṇa ।। 2429 ।।
piuṇō rusiūṇaṁ niggaēṇa bahubuddhivikkamajuēṇa । nihaō taṁ nayaraṁ puṇa adiṭṭhiyaṁ appaṇā tēṇa ।। 2430 ।
sō tatthaō ahimāṇasaṁjuō kuṇai kassa vi na sēvaṁ । caupakkhiyarāīṇaṁ dēsē haṇiūṇa nivvahai ।। 2341 ।।
jaṁ kiṁpi dēsamajhē sāraṁ dupayaṁ cauppayaṁ apayaṁ । taṁ nēti tassa suhaḍā hariūṇaṁ niyabalachalēhiṁ ।। 2432।।
annamma dinē dugaṁtassa paviṭṭha imammi dēsammi । tēṇa niyā dō purisā paṭṭaviyā hēriyā ēttha ।। 2433।।
pōṭṭhiyava sahārūḍhā samāgayā tumha gāmasīmāē । saṁjhāē pahamajjhē aṇūpamvā tēhi sagaḍāō || 2434 ।।
diṭṭhā samuttaraṁtī tō tīē rūvadaṁsaṇāō tē । jāyā vihiryāhayayā citaṁti jahā imaṁ juvaī || 2435।।
jaī nē appēmō amhē niya sāmiṇō taō ēsō । tusiūṇaṁ amhaṁ bahu pasāyaṁ payacchēī || 2436।।
iya citiūṇa tīsē haraṇē kayanicchayā taō ēē । sabalīvaddā thakkā nilukkiuṁ ēgaṭhāṇammi ।। 2437॥
tājā sā palāṇā paḍiyāē tattha cōradhāḍīē । accatamaṁdhayārē gahiyā sā ēgāgiṇī pacchā ।। 2438 ।।
sā tēhi kalāīē bhaṇiyā pōkkarasi jai tumaṁ inhi । tō churiyāē imāē tuha sīsaṁ ginhaissāmā ||2439 ।।
bhīyāē taō tīē na jaṁpiyaṁ kiṁpi tēhi tō ēsā । ārōvēuṁ vasahē nīyā ḍuṁgā hivasamīvē ॥। 2440॥
kahiyaṁ ca jahā gahiyā taṁ daṭṭu sō vi harisiō ēyaṁ । gahiūṇasayaṁ caliō puhaīsīhassa appēuṁ ||2441||
apariciyapurisagahiyā kakkasavayaṇēhiṁ taha ya bhēsaviyā । uṭhivaggamaṇā vaccai aṇūpamvā maliṇamuhachāyā ॥
tō tēṇa ḍuṁgavaiṇā sā bhaṇiyā khēmarāyanāmēṇa । mā kāhisi kipi tumaṁ amhāṇa bhayaṁ niyamammi || 2443।।
tuha jīviyassa taha dēhalaggavatthāivatthu nivahassa । amhē na viṇāsayarā na ya gihiṇī hōsi hōṇassa ।। 2444 ।।
khattiyakulubbhavō jō amhāṇa pahū jayammi vikkhāō । nāmēṇa puhaisīhō sīhō vva parakkamaguṇēṇa ।। 2445।।
sōha girimēhalā saṁgavi samasīhauranayara kayavāsō । paccatiyarāīṇaṁ akkamiṅaṇaṁ ṭhiō bhūmi || 2446 ।।
rūvaviṇijjiyamayaṇō dakkhinnaparō ya guṇavisēsaṇṇū । puvvābhāsī piyajaṁpaō ya saralō kayaṇṇū ya ।। 2447॥
kiṁ bahūṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ nī sē saguṇēhi nimmiō vihiṇā । sō tujjha paī hōhī jassaṁga cciya piyālacchī || 2448 ॥
tō aha sāmi bhajjā hōsi tumaṁ sēvaṇijjapayakamalā । paramaviṇaēṇa niccaṁ namasaṇijjā sajaṇaṇivva ।। 2449॥
tō
payaḍasu appāṇaṁ tumaṁ purō amha vīsasēūṇa । niyajaṇaṇijaṇayagā māiyāṇa nāmāikahaṇēṇa ।। 2450 ।।
taṁ khēmarāyavayaṇaṁ sōūṇa vimukkasavva saṁkāē । kahiyaṁ aṇūpamvāē jaha puṭṭha tassa savvaṁpi ।। 2451 ।।
ḍuṁgā hivō vi sōuṁ aṇūpamvā vayaṇamappaṇō turayaṁ । uttariūṇa samappai tī sē samāruhai vasahaṁ ।। 2452 |
samayammi bhōyaṇaṁ kāravēi aigōravēṇaṁ taṁ ēsō | taṁbōlaṁ dāūṇaṁ puṇō vi maggē purō vahai || 2453 ।।
sīhauranayara sīmāgaō vi citēi sō jahā ēsō । channā appēyavvā puhaīsīhassa amhēhi ॥ 2454 ॥
amhā sō daṭṭhūṇaṁ ēvaṁviharūvasaṁjayaṁ ēyaṁ । jāyanavajōvvaṇabharaṁ karissaē apaṇō bhajjaṁ ॥। 2455।।
tattō lacchī bhajjā tassa imaṁ pāsiūṇa īsāē । asuhaṁ uppāissara ēīē amha pahuṇō ya || 2456॥
sayamavi ujjhissara gurusavakkidaṁsaṇaduhēṇa sā varaī । iya citiuṁ paōsē channaṁ taṁ ṭhavai niyagēhē ॥ 2457 ||

aha niyapurisaṁ saṁpēsiūṇa jāṇāvara puhaisīhaṁ । kannē nihuyaṁ jaha khēmarāyasuhaḍō samāyāō || 2458 ।।
cōrīē gaṁtaṇaṁ inhi tumhāṇa kiṁpi ēgaṁtē । sō vinnaviraṁ vaṁchai tō katthai ēha annattha ।। 2459 ।।
taṁ bhai puhaisīhō lacchī bhajjā mamatthi parikuviyā । tīsē pasāyaṇakaē kiṁpi ahaṁ vāulō inhi ।। 2460 ।
jai na tahāviha mūsuyapaōyaṇaṁ asthi kiṁ pi tō gōsē । ēmi ahaṁ annaha puṇa inhi pi uvēmi sigghaṁpi ॥ 2461।।
tō tēṇa kajjaparamatthajāṇaēṇaṁ narēṇa sō bhaṇiō । taha musuyaṁ na kiṁci vi kajjaṁ tō ējjaha pabhāē ॥ 2462॥
iya jaṁpiyamma sō puhaisīharanā visajjiō gaṁtuṁ । ḍuṁgā hivassa sāhai jāyammita pabhāyammi || 2463॥
pēsēūṇaṁ puraō purisaṁ pāsammi khēmarāyassa । jāṇāvēi nariṁdō tuha gēhē āgamissāmi ॥ 2464 ||
aha bhaṇai khēmarāō aṇūpamvaṁ bhaiṇi lahu kuṇa siṇāṇaṁ । tō niya bhāujjāyā vatthāharaṇāī parihahi || 2465 ।।
jaṁ puhaisī harāyā inhi tuha daṁsaṇatyamiha ēhī । taṁ tīē rūvajōvvaṇalāyannamaēṇa na hu vihiyaṁ ।। 24666 ।।
karacaraṇavayaṇa sōyaṁkāūṇa sammāṇiūṇa taṁbōlaṁ । niyasāhāviyavē sēṇa sā ṭhiyā bāhimuvavisiuṁ ॥ 2467।।
pattō khatarēṇaṁ tattha taō puhaisī hanaranāhō । taṁ daṭhṭhē uṭṭhēuṁ gihamajjhē sā vijhatti gayā ।। 2468 ॥
satimiraṭhāṇammiṭhiyā aṇūpamvā pēkkhaē puhaisīhaṁ । piyai va niccalanayaṇaṁjalīhi tassaṁgalāyanaṁ ॥ 2469 ॥
gaayaṇīka āsaṇammi rāyā vi uvavisēūṇa । tiyapariyaṇaṁ sahāgayamōsārai dūraō savvaṁ || 2470 ।।
tō ḍuṁgavaī purisaṁ niyaṁ nirūvēi paṁgaṇaduvārē । tajjai taṁ iha kassa vi taē pavēsō na dāyanbō || 2471 ।।
tattō bhūnihiyasirō namiūṇaṁ puhaisīhanaranāhaṁ । sahēūṇa aṇūpamvamuvavisara tassa pāsammi ।। 2472 ||
vinnavaiya taṁ cōrī gaēhi amhēhi saṁpayaṁ ēsā । avahariḍaṁ āṇīyā aṇūpamvā nāma tumha kaē ।। 2474 ।।
ajja vi imā kumārī jōvvaṇapattā vi nēya pariṇīyā । kēṇa vi tumha nimittaṁ ciya ēsā rakkhiyā vihiṇā ||
kahiyaṁ aṇūpamvāra tassa samaggaṁ jahā niyasarūvaṁ । taha tēṇa puhaisīhassa sāhiyaṁ khēmarāēṇa ॥। 2475 ।।
daṭaṭhūṇa puhaisīhō nayaṇamaṇāṇaṁdayāriṇi aha taṁ । jaṁpai pahiṭṭhahiyaō ḍuṁgā hivasammuhaṁ ēvaṁ || 2476 ।।
bhō bhō auvvamēyaṁ thīrayaṇaṁ kaha vi pāviyaṁ tumaē । sō bēi tumha punnōdaēṇa sāmiyaṁ imaṁ pattaṁ ।। 2477 ॥
taṁ bhaṇai puhaisīhō tuṭṭhōhaṁ tujjha kiṁpi jaṁ tumaē । iha samaē cōrīē gaēṇa sēsaṁ samāṇīyaṁ || 2478 ।।
lakkhassa va kōḍīē ṭhāṇaṁ savvamēva gahiyavvaṁ । sayamēva taē majjhā tassa na mē kiṁpi dāyavvaṁ ।। 2479 ॥
tō bhai khēmarāō imāē vēlāē kiṁpi na hu anaṁ । āṇīyaṁ amhēhi payaṁ mōttūṇa varakannaṁ ।। 2480 ।।
tō dēi puhaisīhō niyaṁgalaggaṁ samaggamāharaṇaṁ । tassa savatthaṁ sō taṁ vinnava jahā imaṁ savvaṁ ॥2481 ।।
sāmi ! payacchaha dōnhaṁ pi majjhabhiccāṇa tāṇa jēhi imā । āṇēuṁ varakannā samappiyā amha pāsammi ।। 2482 ।।
tēsi ci ya dōnhaṁ kaivaē vi dāūṇa niya sahāyanarē । tēhi samaṁ paṭṭaviḍaṁ tumha samīvē maē ēsā ।। 2483 |
āsi paribhāviyā tō sayaṁ ahaṁ cōriyaṁ kira gamissaṁ । tattō puṇō niyamaṇē sāmi maē citiyaṁ ēvaṁ ।। 2484 ।।
jaha kira ēsā muddhā varaī ēgāgiṇī bhayava sēṇa । sakuṭuṁbaviōgēṇa ya jai kaha vi niyaṁ cayai jīyaṁ । 2485।।
tō hōi nārirayaṇaṁ ērisayaṁ hāriyaṁ muhā cēva । pāvaṁ puṇa amhāṇaṁ gaṁṭhinibaddhaṁ sayā' cēva || 2486 ।।
cōrīviṇayicittā jē amha niccamēva ciṭṭhāmō । annaṁ ca jīvamāṇī vi jai imā tattha vaccēi ।। 2489 ।।
taha vi imē amha narā annāṇavasēṇa lacchidēvīē । kannammi nivaḍamāṇaṁ imamaṭṭha jaṛa na rakkhati ।। 2488 ||
1. ciyasyāvi pā0

78
।
kuṁtasīharāyakahāgamaṁ
tō ai garuyaaṇatyō saṁjāyai citiuṁ taō ēvaṁ sathamēva samamimīē samāgaō sāmi ahamēttha || 2489 ||
maggē samāvayaṁtī imā maē kōmalēhiṁ vayaṇēhiṁ । cittāu bhayaṁ uttāriūṇa vīsaṁbhamāṇīyā ॥2490 ।।
piu-māi - gāmanā māī pucchiyā savvamēva tamimīē । nivvuyamaṇāē kahiyaṁ majjha tahā bhōyaṇāikayaṁ ॥ 2491 ।।
ētyāgayā vi ēsā channā dhariyā bhaē niyagihammi । inhi ēgaṁtē tumha daṁsiyā kahiyavr̥ttaṁtā || 2492 ॥
tā ēyaṁ ciya kāraṇamētyā gamaṇammi majjha nahu annaṁ । tā dēha pasāyamimaṁ tassēva ya bhiccajuyalassa ।। 2493 ।।
aha bhai puhaisīhō ginha pasāyaṁ imaṁ tumaṁ tāva । tēsa dōnhaṁ pi ahaṁ pasāyamannaṁ payacchassaṁ ॥2494 ॥
jamhā tara vilabbhō garuyapasāō imammi kajjammi । jēṇa taē niyabuddhipauṁjiyā suniuṇā ēvaṁ ।। 2495 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇa pasāyaṁ sō dēi paḍicchaē tayaṁ iyarō । tattō bhicca dugassa vi viyarai vatthāiyaṁ uciyaṁ ॥ 2496 ||
dōnivi visajjiūṇaṁ tē bhincē pāsiūṇa taṁ kannaṁ । puhaīsīhō citai niyacittē vimyaṁ pattō ॥ 2497 ॥
pēccha ahō kaha sōhai niyatyasāmannavatthajuyalā vi । ēsā kannā ya saṁpunnasasaharacchāyamuha sōhā ।। 2498 ।।
pavilaggasēvalaṁ pihu kamalaṁ maliṇaṁ pi maṁḍalaṁ sasiṇō । sōhai sahāvasuhayāṇa bhūsaṇaṁ jaṁ va taṁ vañhavā ।। 2499 ।।
iya citiūṇaṁ bhaṇiō puhaīsīhēṇa khēmarāyabhaḍō | bhāyā tumaṁ imīē pēiyavāsō taō kajjō ।। 2500 ।।
tēṇa tahā paḍivannē tavvayaṇē tō aṇūpamvaṁ rāyā । rōmaṁcakaṁpa sēēhiṁ jāṇiuṁ sāṇurāyamaṇaṁ ।। 2501 ।।
saṁkhēvēṇaṁ bhūsiyapasāhiyaṁ kāriūṇa tatyēva । taṁ pacchannaṁ pariṇai kayaharisō takkhaṇē cēva ।। 2502 ।।
aha ēgaṁtē nēuṁ pacchāiyamauyatūlipallaṁkē । gāḍhāliṁgaṇacuṁbaṇavihīhi taṁ nibbharaṁ ramai ।। 2503 ।।
chuhiyanarō sāhīṇaṁ pakkaphalaṁ pāviḍaṁ surahimahuraṁ । kō sigdhaṁ pi na bhuṁjaitihuyaṇadēvī imaṁ sōuṁ || 2504 ।।
tuṭṭhā mammi paivallahāsuyā māyaraṁ suhāvēi । aha nēmittiyarūvī sō purisō sāhai purō vi ।। 2505 ।।
kāuṁ pīikahāō aṇūpambāē samaṁ khaṇaṁ puhaisīhō । tattō nikkhamiūṇaṁ sikkhavaē khēmarāyabhaḍaṁ || 2506 ||
visaē aṇūpamvāē ēvaṁ ēvaṁ taē vihēyavvaṁ । iya taṁ sikkhaviūṇaṁ taō gaō sō niyāvāsē ।। 2507 ।।
hakkārēuṁ bhaṁḍāriyassa āēsamērisa dēi । jaha khēmarāyasuhaḍō parabhūmi gaṁtumaigaruyaṁ ॥। 2508 ।।
kajjaṁ pasāhiūṇaṁ amhāṇaṁ āgaō taō tassa । pēsēhi pasāēṇaṁ dīṇārāṇaṁ dasasahassē ।। 2509 ।।
sakuḍuṁbassa ya jōggaṁ suṁdaravatthāṇa kōḍiyaṁ ēkkaṁ । mōttiyahīrayalaggaṁ āharaṇaṁ kaṇayarayaṇamayaṁ ॥। 2510 ।।
paḍivannāsēṇaṁ tēṇa vi taṁ savvamēva taha vihiyaṁ । nivakayasaṁkēō puvvamēva taṁ khēmarāō vi ।। 2511 ।।
savvaṁ aṇūpamvāē appara nivapēsiyaṁ daviṇamāī । kārai puḍhō nivāsaṁ tīē kaē pūrai vayaṁ ca ।। 2512 ।।
atrēṇa vi kēṇa vi jēṇakajjamuppajjaē samaggaṁ pi । taṁ tīsē pacchannaṁ paṭṭhāvai puhaisīha nivō ॥2513॥
aṇupamadēvi tti kayaṁ tīsē nāmaṁ sayaṁ nariṁdēṇa । annāyā annajaṇēṇa ciṭṭhaē sā niyagihammi ।। 2514 ।।
niccaṁ pi puhaisīhō channō tī sē gihammi gaṁtūṇa । hasiuṁ ramiuṁ ca khaṇaṁ tīē saha ēḍa puṇa sagihē ।। 2515 ।।
aṇupamadēvī taha puhaisīharāyā parōpparaṁ dō vi । aighaṇasiṇēha vasaō gayaṁ pi kālaṁ na yāti ॥ 2516।।
annamma dinē tīē riunhāyāē nisāē sumiṇammi। sīhō guṁjāraṁtō tātō mattakarijūhaṁ ॥ 1517।।
niyamahakuharē diṭṭhō pavisaṁtō jaggiyaṁ taō tīē । tappabhiī vahai imā puttaṁ gabhammi ōinaṁ ।। 2518 ।।
taiē māsammi ḍōhalaō tīē ērisō jāō । jai kayanara - nēvacchā kuṁtaṁ gahiūṇa nihatthē ॥2519 ।।
āruhiuṁ varaturaē sannaddhasamaggasēnnapariyariyā । dhārijjamāṇachattā baṁdiyaṇēhiṁ paढ़tēhiṁ ।। 2520 ।।
purapāyārassa bahi cauddisi paribhamābhitō ēsō । niyamaṇabhāvō kahiō tīē purō puhaisīhassa ।। 2521 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
79
ḍōlayapūraṇatthaṁ tīsē tēṇā vi bhāriyālacchī । ēgaṁtē dhariūṇaṁ bhaṇiyā jaha baṁdiṇī ēgā ।। 2522 ।।
ai rūyavaī daṭhṭhē pariṇīyā sā maē tuha parōkkhē । guttā dhariyā ēgammi maṁdirē ēttiē diyahē ।। 2523।।
inhi muhakuharavi saṁtasumiṇēṇa sūiō tīsē । jāō ganbhō taha ḍōhalō ya puvvōiō kahiō || 2524 ।।
lacchīē sēṇa taō lacchī taṁ bhaṇai sigghamāṇēha । taṁ maha bhaiṇi pāsē majjha cciya ēttha gēhammi ।। 2525।।
maha natthi niyamavactō majjha purō vi ērisaṁ cittaṁ । āsi jaha kaṁpi kannaṁ pariṇēuṁ taṁ bhaṇāmi ahaṁ ।। 2526 ।।
ēsō maṇōrahō maha viṇā vi abbhatthaṇāē saṁpannō । tā ēttha maha pamōō na uṇa visāō maṇaṁ pi maṇē ।। 2527 ।।
pūrēhi ḍōhalaṁ tō tīē tumaṁ āṇiūṇa niyagēhē । sōūṇa puhaisīhō iya tavvayaṇaṁ maṇē tuṭṭō || 2528 ।।
puvaparikahiyarūvaṁ ḍōlayaṁ sō vi pūraē tīsē । aṇupamadēvīlacchi ārāhai niyayajarṇāṇa va ।। 2529 ।।
pēcchai lacchī vi imaṁ niya dhūyāē vi ahiyapīīē । iya sā suhēṇa kālaṁ gamēi tatthaṭṭhiyā niccaṁ । 2530।।
paḍhamaṁ pi puhaisīhō pariṇīyā ēya'ṇupapadēvīē । bhaṇiō jaha dhannaurē na kāriyavvā taē cōrī ।। 2531 ।।
gāmammi tammi jamhā jaṇaō mah vasai sūrapālō tti । taṁ gāmaṁ sō paṭṭai paivarisaṁ rāyapāsāō ।। 2532।।
aṇudēvīvaṇaṁ taṁ paḍivannaṁ taha tti tēṇā vi । aha annayā ya caraḍō samāgaō khattiō tattha ।। 2533 ।।
bahuparivārasamēō paḍivanaṁ tēṇa puhaisīhassa । bhiccattaṁ vaccatō cōrīē tēṇa sō bhaṇiō ।। 2534।।
jaha dhannauraggāmaṁ mōttūṇaṁ sē sagāmanayarēsu । tubbhēhiṁ jahicchāē sayā vi cōrī karēyavvā ।। 2535 ।।
jamhā sō balavaṁtō kharasīsō sāvalēvacittō ya । mārai paraṁ sayaṁ vā samarammi ahiṭṭiō marai ।। 2536।।
tāki niyapāṇēhiṁ saṁsayamārōviēhiṁ kāyavvaṁ । annē vi ya bahugāmā uciyā cōrīē ciṭṭhati ।। 2537।।
isa annavvaari kāūṇa nivāriyā samaggāvi । annē vi cōravaggā tēsi na kahiō sasaṁbaṁdha || 2538 ॥
sō caraḍō gāmaṁtaradhaṇaṁ gahēuṁ pahammi vaccatō । paravāharāē caḍiuṁ tumhēhi viṇāsiō pacchā ।। 2539।।
tassa suēṇaṁ amarisabhariēṇaṁ puhaisī hanaranāhō । vinnattō jaha jaṇaō majjha avihiyā varāhō vi ।। 2540 ।।
āgaṁtumannagāmā parōvarōhāu sūrapālēṇa । nihaō ahaṁ pitō taṁ nisāē gaṁtuṁ haṇissāmi ।। 2541 ।।
tō hakkaūṇa sō puhaisīharannā nivāriō ēvaṁ | gaṁtuṁ niyapāēhiṁ tumaṁ pi kiṁ paḍasi vagghamuhē ।। 2542।।
jō parachaṭṭhi jaggā sō bhullai ki niyāē chaṭṭīē । jō parakajjē jujjhai na jujjhihī sō kaha sakajjē ।। 2543 ।।
jaṁ vittaṁ tuha piuṇō tujjha vi taṁ vaccahī na saṁdēhō । tā jai amha vi bhaṇiyaṁ karēsi mā gacchatō tattha । । 2544 ।।
isī viṇivāriō imō nō gaō sayaṁ tattha । taha vi tuha tēṇa channō paṭṭhaviō ghāyagō ēgō ।। 2545।।
taṁ puhaisīharannā nāūṇaṁ vaiyaraṁ imō puṇavi । hakkāriūṇa bhaṇiō bahuṁ virūvaṁ sakōvēṇa ।। 2546 ।।
tujjhuvari puṇō tuṭṭō rāyā jaṁ ghāyagō taē mukkō । gahiūṇa vi jīvaṁtō vikkamakaruṇā guṇajuēṇa ।। 2547 ।।
tō rannā ēgaṁtē aṇupamadēvīē sammuhaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । jaha taṁ ahināṇajuyaṁ pēsēuṁ kaṁpi niyapurisaṁ ।। 2548 ।।
vārēhi niyaṁ jaṇayaṁ annaggāmassa vāharāē jahā । sō na caḍaḍa annaha puṇa kēṇāvi viṇā siyavvōtti ।। 2549 ।।
aṇupamadēvī taō sikkhaviraṁ pēsiō ahaṁ ēttha । tujjha samīvē ēvaṁ bhaṇāviyaṁ majjha pāsāō ।। 2550 ।।
tumhēhi samaṁ kāuṁ māṇusagairāgaīṁ na icchāmi । tumhē ccayassa rannō mā pariyāṇaṁ imaṁ hōu ।। 2551 ।।
jaha puhaisīharāyā jāmāū hōi sūrapālassa | annaṭṭha iya saṁbaṁdhē nāē tuha kuppaē rāyā ।। 2552 ।।
ēvaṁ vigappaē sō jaha saṁkēēṇa sūrapālassa । maha maṁḍalammi cōri kārēi dhruvaṁ puhaisīhō ।। 2553 ।।
saṁbaṁdhaparitrāṇābhāvē puṇa hōi kā vina hu saṁkā। jaivi na hōi cōrī tuha gāmē cēva ēkkammi ।। 2554 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-80-to-80.json ==========================
80
kuṁtasīharāyakahāṇayaṁ
tahavitha sō tuha jāṇai sāmatthaṁ ujjamaṁ ca kēvalayaṁ । jā puṇa maha suddhīē aparitrāṇammi tuha adhīī ॥। 2555 ।।
sō thē vōcciya dōsō iyaraha puṇa jāyaē aimahaṁtō । iya purisā pēsaṇakāraṇammi saṁtēvi garuyammi ।। 2556 ।।
tumha sabhī vē purisō saṁpai jaṁpēsi ōmaē ēsō । taṁ kāraṇēṇa imiṇā ēyāō cciya samīvāō ।। 2557।।
mā tumhāṇaṁ maccū saṁpajjau tā imaṁ suṇēūṇa । paravāharāē kahamavi dhāvēyavvaṁ na tumhahiṁ ॥ 2558 ।।
ēttōcciya sikkhaviuṁ ēvaṁ tīē ahaṁpi paṭṭaviō । jaṇaṇī jaṇaē mōttuṁ maha taiyaṁ māṇasaṁ kiṁpi ॥। 2559 ।।
jaha annaṁ na viyāṇai majjha samīvāō taṁ gayaṁ tattha । taha kahavi tēhi saddhi jaṁpēyavvaṁ taē gūḍhaṁ ।। 2560 ।।
ētthāgaō ōhaṁ ahivakajjō na jāva pāvēmi । tumhāṇa daṁsaṇaṁ tō saṁjāō ligirūvadha ।। 2561॥
ēyaṁtu ahināṇaṁ tumhaṁ dhūyāē sāhiyaṁ majjha । jaṁ harisaurapurāō ahaṁ niyattā hē tumha || 2562 ||
paraōvacvaṁtāṇaṁ turayārūḍhāṇa taiya diṇapaharē । sagaḍārūḍhā miliyā taha pahamajjhami saṁjhāē ।। 2563॥
kammarīē khittō maha lahu uvalō palāyaṇanimittaṁ । tō bhaṇai sūrapālō savvaṁciya ēyamahimāṇaṁ ।। 2564।।
aṇupamadēvīpē siyapurisō sūrapālamullavai । jai savvamahisrāṇaṁ paḍivayaṇaṁ dēhi tō majjha ।। 2565।।
taṁ bhaṇai sūrapālō kayaṁvasarapaṭṭaṇassa paḍibaddhā । paṁcasayā gāmāṇaṁ tēsi sabvēsi paṭṭailā ।। 2566 ।।
amhēhi samaṁ paṭṭēti savvakālaṁ pi garuyapīīē । rāyaulē jaṁ kajjaṁ taṁ maṁ pucchiya pakuvvaṁti ।। 2567।।
kiṁ bahunā tē kajjammi majjha ranō vihōṁti niravēkkhō । dēsaṁ pi samaggaṁ ujjhiūṇa vacvaṁti amnattha ।। 2568 ।।
tō ēēsi kajjē ahaṁpi tōlēmi attaṇō sati । maṁḍalaniōgiṇō iva ēē maha uvayaraṁti sayā ।। 2569।।
paṭṭailajōgapālō mannijjatō na tēttiyamimēhi । jēttiya dūrē mannaṁti maṁ imē savva paṭṭailā ।। 2570 ।।
jē majjha hatthamajjhē tē nēthā puhaisīharanō vi । vasavattiṇō cciya sayā kammi vikajjē samuppa ।। 2571 ।।
asi pi nivāṇaṁ dēsā ciṭṭhati tumha aibahuyā । lhūsēyavvā sēsā dēsō ēyassa vi nivassa ।। 2572 ।।
ciṭṭhai bahuō tumhaṁ lhasaṇajōggō imaṁ vi mōttr̥ṇa । ēgaṁ kayaṁbasarapaṭṭaṇassa paḍibaddhayaṁ visayaṁ ।। 2573 ।।
iya paḍivayaṇaṁ dāuṁ bhōyaṇamāī karē vi sammāṇaṁ । turiyaṁ visajjiō tō sō purisō surapālēṇa ।। 2574 ।।
gaṁtūṇa kahai aṇupamadēvīē sā vi puhaisīhassa । sō vi paḍivajjiūṇaṁ taha tti taṁ pēsai puṇō vi ।। 2575 ।।
rāuttasūrapālassa sannihāṇammi sō vi gaṁtūṇa । taṁ puhaisōhavayaṇaṁ nīsēsaṁ tassa sāhēi ॥। 2576 ।।
sammāṇiūṇa tēṇa vi sō purisō pēsiō puṇō nayarē । sīhaurē gaṁtūṇaṁ sāhai niyasāmisālāṇaṁ || 2577।।
rāyā vi puhaisīhō hakkārēūṇa savvaparivāraṁ । vārai kayaṁvasarapaṭṭaṇassa visayammi vaccataṁ ॥। 2578 ।।
saṁputrēsuṁ disuṁ suhē mahattammi sāṇupamadēvī । pasavai pavaraṁ puttaṁ sulakkhaṇaṁ tīē aha dāsī ॥। 2579 ।।
gaṁtūṇa puhaisīhaṁ vaddhāvara sō vi aṁgasaṁlaggaṁ । tīsē vatthāharaṇaṁ parituṭṭō dēi savvaṁ pi ।। 2580 ।।
kārai baddhāvaṇayaṁ sīhaurē puhaisīhanaranāhō । sīgiripāyavattisu gāmāṇa vi paṁcasu sasu ।। 2581 ।।
dinaṁ bārasamaṇēi nāmaṁ puttassa kutasīhō ti । sumiṇassa ḍōhalassa ya aṇurūvaṁ puhaisīṇa ।। 2582 |
harisaurē puṇa nayarē paṁcattaṁ uvagaō harisapālō । rajjapaē siriharisō ahisittō rāyalōēṇa || 2583 ।।
avarōhē kayadōsō harisaurāō suhaṁkarō nāma । sōhaurē saṁpattō pāiūṇaṁ kalāyariō ।। 2584 ।।
aha kuṁtasīhakumarō aṭṭamasaṁvaccharaṁ samaikaṁtō । tassa kalāgahaṇatthaṁ samappiō puhaisīhēṇa ॥ 2585 ।।
savvakalā pāragaō sō jāō thēva diyaha majjhammi । jahiyahappabhiī sō uppannō puhaisī hagihē ।। 2566 ।।
ārambhataddiṇāō vaḍḍhai savvaṁpi maṁdirē tassa । dhaṇa dhanna -dupaya- caupaya- ruppa - suvannāiyaṁ niccaṁ ॥ 2567 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-81-to-81.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇiṁdacariyaṁ
81
aha isī patthivamanbhatthēūṇa jāi sō kumarō । sayamēva savvadhāḍīsu laddhavijaō ō ēi || 2588 ।।
ēvaṁ kamēṇa jāō sō pōḍhō sāhaṇēṇa sēntrēṇa । jāyā tassa pasiddhī savvēsu nariṁdagēhēsu ।। 2589 ।।
ēkkō vi puhaisīhō duggējjhō āsi savvarāīṇaṁ । kiṁ puṇa saṁpai juttō pattēṇaṁ kuṁtasīhēṇa ॥। 2590 ।।
ēvaṁ savvatthakahā kī rai savvēhiṁ sūrapurisēhiṁ । aha annā gaēṇaṁ dhāḍīē kuṁtasīhēṇa ।। 2591 । ।
battīsagaiṁdāṇaṁ hēḍāmattāṇa dūramaggammi । nisuyā samāvayaṁtī siriharisamahānaridassa ।। 2592 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tattha gahiyā sā tēṇa viṇāsiūṇa bahulōyaṁ । vaṇijārayāṇa vihavō bahucaḍiō tassa hatthammi ||
tassē yaha hēḍā diṭṭhā maggammi tēṇa sā vi tahā । gahiyā savihavasārā ahāgaō sō niyapurammi ।। 2594 ||
ārōhaṁtāṇa gayāṇa pavvaē duggamaṁ muṇēūṇa । pavvayatalammi nayaraṁ jaṁ āsi ciraṁtaṇaṁ bhaṭṭha ।। 2595।।
taṁ tēṇa samuddhariḍaṁ pāraddhaṁ tammi aha khaṇijjaṁtē । paṇahatarikōḍīō pattāō tēṇa kaṇayassa ।। 2596 ।।
uggaparakkama sammāṇadāṇaguṇaraṁjiō jaṇōpāyaṁ । anna naridēhitō tassa samīvaṁ samalliyai ।। 2597 ।।
siriharisanariṁdō viniyayāō hayagayāṇa hēḍāō । gahiyāō nāūṇaṁ parikuviō kuṁtasīhassa ।। 2598 ।।
pēsēi balaṁ viulaṁ haya-gaya-raha - jōhasaṁjayaṁ pavaraṁ । niyahēriyapāsāōṁ nisuyaṁ taṁ kuṁtasīṇa ।। 2599 ।।
āgacchaṁtaṁ pacchā dōhiṁ vibhāgēhiṁ niyabalaṁkāuṁ । ēttha puhaisīhō ṭhaviō bīyammi ṭhāi sayaṁ ॥ 2600 ।।
girivalayassa pavēsē dōsu vi pakkhēsu tē piyā puttā। dō vi ṭhiyā gōvēuṁ appāṇaṁ rukkhagahaṇē || 2601 ।।
kammaṁtaraṁ vahataṁ taha cēva kayaṁ tu jumnanayarammi । hayagayahēḍāu tahā mukkā tatthēva payaḍāō ।। 2602 ।।
kēttiya sēnajuyāō bāhi uṭṭhāviō imō sahō । jaṁ dōvi piyāputtā katthai dhāḍīē tē pagayā || 2603॥
siriharisahēriēhi daṭuṁ taṁ tārisaṁ suṇēuṁ ca । gaṁtuṁ sēṇāvaiṇō kahiyaṁ aha sō vi hiṭṭamaṇō ॥। 2604।।
āgacchai sigghayaraṁ haya-gayapaṁcaula gahaṇabuddhīē । girivalayassa duvārē saṁpattō pavēsiuṁ laggō ।। 2605 ।।
puraō hōūṇa balaṁ pahāviyaṁ kēttiyaṁpi nīsaṁkaṁ । sunaṁ muṇiūṇa purō karimāīṇaṁ gahaṇahēuṁ ॥ 2606॥
aggāṇīyaṁ muṇiuṁ āgacchaṁtariūṇa aituriyaṁ । taṁ pi balaṁ saṁvahiyaṁ nivāriyaṁ nayarakammaṁtu ॥। 2607।।
pakkhariūṇaṁ turaē guḍiūṇaṁ gayavarē mahāmattē । sannahiūṇaṁ jōhā raṇujjayā takkhaṇē jāyā ॥2608 ||
daṭṭhūṇa parabalaṁ niyaḍamāgayaṁ junnanayarasēntrēṇa । samuhēṇa udviūṇaṁ viṇijjiyaṁ taṁ khaṇadvēṇa ॥। 2709।।
pacchimabalassa vattaṁ jāva kahāvēi tāva taṁ ruddhaṁ । pavisaṁtaṁ ciya dōhi vi piittēhiṁ dusu disāsu ।। 2610||
samakāla mukkaghaṇabāṇadhōraṇī tōḍiyaṁ khaṇadvēṇa । siriharisarāyasēnaṁ avi akkiyalaggabahaghāyaṁ ॥ 2611॥
jāyaṁ parōparuppēlaṇēkkarasiyaṁ rasaṁ tayaṁ virasaṁ । pacchāhuttapalāyaṁtabhūrikāyaranarasamūhaṁ ॥ 2612॥
sammuha bhiḍaṁta suhaḍubbhaḍaṁ ca nivaḍaṁta hama gayaghaḍaṁ ca । kuṁtāsibhalla sēllēhi salliyaṁ cullahiyayaṁ ca ॥। 2613।।
ullasiyati sā suktakaṁṭhamaggaṁta nīranaranivahaṁ । sunnāsaṇabhamiraturaṁgakuṁjaraṁ bhaggarahacakkaṁ ॥ 2614॥
nāsaṁtapaurapāika rucakkathakkaṁ tathēva nāyakkaṁ । bhaṇiyaṁ karuṇāē kuṁtasīhakumarēṇa tō ēvaṁ ।। 2615।।
vaccaha savvē vi tumē saṭṭāṇē saṁpayaṁ maē mukkā । aṁgēṇa kēvalēṇaṁ sēsaṁ puṇa muyaha ētthēva
sāmatavālēhi sāhaṇāhiva maṁḍalavaīhiṁ । mayamucchyinivaḍiyasē sahitō jaṁpiyaṁ ēvaṁ
mukkā faar amhē aṁgēṇa vi kēvalēṇa nō gaṁtuṁ । sakkēmō niṭhurasarapahāra sallaṁta savvaṁgā
iya japamāṇayā viha mucchāmaulaṁtalōyaṇā kē vi । vāhaṇagayā vi sahasā paḍiuṁ laggā mahiyalammi ।। 2619 ।।
tō kuṁtasīhakumarō takkhaṇamupannagaruyakārunnō । vāṇavarisaṁ muyaṁtaṁ niyasēnaṁ vāraē savvaṁ ॥ 2120 ।।
|| 2616 ॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-82-to-82.json ==========================
82
tē
I
kuṁtasīhāyakahāṇa
puṇa mā bhīsēuṁ siriharisanaridasaṁtiē suhaḍē । hakkāriūṇa kēi vi paṭuvai niyammi āvāsē || 2621||
tē vihu niyapāēhiṁ kēi vi vaccaṁti kaha vi kicchrēṇa । uppāḍiyā ya annasu suhāsaṇēhiṁ rahēhi ca ।। 2622 ।।
sōhēuṁ raṇabhūmi gayajīviyasa - parapakkhasuhaḍāṇaṁ । sihisakkāraṁ kārēi kuṁtasīhō taō kumarō || 2623॥
siriharirāyasēnaṁ amuṇiyaparasēnnamakayannāha । annāyabhūmibhāgaṁ paviṭṭhama saṁkaḍammi tahā | 2624 ॥
sannaddhabaddhakavayaṁ iyaraṁ puṇa pariciyamma bhūbhāgē । niggamapavēsakusalaṁ tēsimaō asarisaṁ jujjhaṁ || 2625।।
tēṇa bahuyaṁ pinnaṁ sattūṇaṁ kuṁta - sīhantrēṇa । thēvēṇa vi sahasacciya hayamahiyaṁ savvaō vihiyaṁ || 2626॥
samaruvvariyaṁ savvaṁ hayagaya rahanivahamappaṇō cēva । ginhēi kuṁta - sīhō āuha guḍapakkharāitahā ||2627।।
samarammi ghāiyāṇaṁ saṁpakkha - parapakkha saṁtiyāṇa taō । kārāvai vaṇakammaṁ jahōciyaṁ savvasuhaḍāṇa || 2628 ।।
saṁgāmapaṇaṭṭhēhi siriharisanarēsarassa gaṁtūṇa । bhagganiyasēnavattā kahiyā aha sō suūṇa ।। 2629 ।।
saṁvahai sayaṁ rāyā siriharisō garuyakōvadupēcchō । jāyaṁti bahu asauṇā tahā vi sō na gaṇaē kiṁci ।। 2630।।
nayarāu nīharaṁtassa tassa pavalō samuṭṭhiō । pavaṇō sammuhō saṁchāyatō sēnnaṁ savvaṁ pi dhūlīē || 2631॥
bhaggaṁ ca tēṇa chattaṁ siriharisanivassa pāḍiyaṁ cidhaṁ । thakkammi taō vāē maṁtīhi nivāriō ēsō ।। 2632 ।।
jaha ajja tāva ciṭṭhau payāṇayaṁ puṇa vi annadiyahammi । dāyavvaṁ sumuhr̥ttē paḍivannamimaṁ nivēṇā vi ॥ 2633।।
tattō niryāttiṇaṁ pattō niyamaṁdirammi siriharisō । saṁjhāē āgaṁtuṁ maṁtī vinnavai siriharisaṁ ।। 2634 ||
naranāhaṁ ēgaṁtē jaha dēva jayā nivō harisapālō । tivvāyakēṇa jhaḍa tti paṭṭiō parabhavaṣahammi | 2635 ।।
paḍhamē diṇassa paharē nīhārēūṇa taṁ vibhūīē । vāhi nēuṁ sakkāriūṇa diṇacarimajāmammi || 2636॥
saṁpattō pāsāē tumbhēhi samaṁ imammi nivalōō । gaṇaē hakkārēuṁ vahumaṇussāṇa paccakkhaṁ ।। 2637।।
rajjāhiṁ sēhē tumha nirikkhāviyaṁ maē laggaṁ । tēhi bīryādiṇē taṁ diṇaddhasamaē samakkhāyaṁ ॥ 2638 ॥
ēvaṁ tumhaṁ pi samaggamēva saṁjāyamatthi saṁviiyaṁ । vinnavaṇijjama hiṇavaṁ tumha maē dēva ētāhē ।। 2639 ।।
rayaṇīē niyagēhē gaṁtuṁ suttuṭṭiō pabhāyammi । jāva ahaṁ rajjahisēyakaraṇavichaḍḍumaigasyaṁ ।। 2640 ।।
citēmi tumha visa niyahiyaēṁ tāva āgaō kō vi। maṁjiṭṭhayapacchāyaṇapaḍapāvariō narō ēkkō ।। 2641 ।।
bāhi pāhariēṇaṁ sō saṁlattō jahā taē ēsō । vāvāriumāraddhō ciṭṭha maṁjinavapaḍaō || 2642 ।।
paramēsō thēvaṁ ciyakālaṁ suṁdarayaracchavī hōuṁ । jalasaṁgamammi jāē viṇassihī nūṇamuvariṁtu ॥2643॥
mūlilla bhūmigavviyapavarā ēyammi suttavāḍassa । jaṁ puṇa kajjaṁ sōhājaṇagaṁ raṁgō na sō balavaṁ ।। 2644।।
ēvaṁ nisāmiṇaṁ vīmaṁsiyamērisa maē tattō । jaha kira kumārarajjāhisēyacitā khaṇē ēsō || 2645।।
kannammi nivaḍiō mē ālāvō bāhiraṭṭiyanarāṇa । tamhā imassa aṭṭhō jō sō siriharikumarassa ।। 2646 ।।
rajjammi nivēsijjaṁ tassa nivēēi bhāviṇaṁ aṭṭaṁ । tō ki kō vi bhavissai riūsamatyō kumārassa ।। 2647।।
ēvaṁ sakhaṇusahiyaō sarvāṇijjāō aha samuṭṭhēḍaṁ । tumhaṁ rajjahisēyassuvakkamēvāvaḍō jāō ।। 2648 ।।
nivvattiyāhisēē tumampi nimmiya visajjiyāvasarē । gaṁtūṇa gihē bhōttūṇa carimajā mē diṇassa maē ।। 2649॥
āgaṁtu mitī nisuō jō āsi avitahā ēsō । puvvillataiya diyahē sō gaṁtumaṇō tti āhūō ।। 2650 ।।
puṭṭhō viyaṇammi jahā siriharisamahānivassa rajjammi । jāvajjīvamavigdhaṁ suhaṁ ca niuṇaṁ nirūvēhi ।। 2651 ।।
tō tēṇuvauttēṇaṁ nirūviūṇaṁ nivēiyamiṇaṁ mē । jaha kēttiyaṁ pi kālaṁ sapayāvō vissuō hōuṁ ॥। 2652।।
sirisiriharisanariṁdō maṁdapayāvō bhavissaē pacchā । pāvissai parapakkhāō paribhavaṁ garuyagaruyayaraṁ ।। 2653 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-83-to-83.json ==========================
sirimunisumvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
jaha
83
iya tavvaṇaṁ sōuṁ puṇō vi puṭṭhō maē imō ēvaṁ । paraparibhavammi hōṁtē jīviyakusalaṁ nivassa na vā ।। 2654॥
āhataō nēmittī hōhī nivajīviyassa vi viṇāsō । puṭṭhō bhaē taō sō puṇō jahā nivaiṇō niṇaṁ ।। 2655 ।।
hōhī sayaṁ pi kiṁvā parapāsāō taō nimittaṇṇū । āha jaha vi pakkhāō tō puṭṭhō puṇa maē ēsō ।। 2656।।
sō sattū najjai kiṁ nāmō kattha saṁpayaṁ vasai । nēmittiṇā prabhaṇiyaṁ na najjaē ērisaṁ sammaṁ ।। 2657॥
tattō sasaṁbhramēṇaṁ sapayattēṇaṁ maē imō puṭṭhō । jaha ki pi tassa riuṇō ciṁdhaṁ pi viyāṇiuṁ kahasu ।। 2658।।
tō tēṇa vicitēuṁ kahiyamiṇaṁ jaha imassa naravaiṇō । jō kō vi hatthihēḍaṁ hayahēḍaṁ dūradēsāō ।। 2659 ।।
maggē āgacchati haḍhēṇa ginhissaē sayaṁ gaṁtuṁ । jāṇijjasu niya pahuṇō jīyaṁtakaraṁ tayaṁ sattuṁ ॥2660॥
tāṇa pavvayaka taō maē citiyaṁ jahā kiṁpi । vatthurahassamaīyaṁ pucchāmi imaṁ taō ēsō || 2661 ।।
jai taṁ pi viyāṇissai taō karissāmi pavvayamihō vi । aha taṁ na muṇissai tō imaṁ pi nēyaṁ musā savvaṁ । 2662॥
aha pucchaṇijja vatthaṁ citēmāṇassa majjha cittammi : । viṣphuriyaṁ jhatti aṇūpamvāē maraṇaṁ tahā jāyaṁ ॥। 2663।।
tumbhēhi jahā kahiyaṁ majjha purō tammi cēva samarthammi । tattō tīsē nāmaṁ aginhayaṁtēṇa ēmēva || 2664 ॥
sāmannēṇaṁ puḍhaṁ amhaṁ saṁbaṁdhiṇī sagāmāō । ēgā ihā gayā asi puvvamēttō puṇō caliyā || 2665 ॥
sāniyāmabhihaṁ tattō kēṇā vi amha sā kahiyā । vaccatī apahē kahaṁ ci paṁcattamaṇupattā || 2666।।
tā tumbhē paribhāvaha ēvaṁ saccaṁ uyāhu mōsaṁ ti । tō tēṇa citiūṇaṁ kahiyaṁ jaha sā na hu maya tti ।। 2667 ।।
tō ēsamaē bhaṇiō ajja vi kammayariyā vi tīē samaṁ । paralōya gayā suvvai duijjiyā jēṇa parikahiyaṁ । । 2668 ।।
dōnha vi maraṇaṁ tāsi majjha purō tēṇa ērisaṁ kahiyaṁ । jaha dōnni vi ēyāō diṭṭhāō maē sadiṭṭhīē ।। 2669 ।।
cōrāṇaṁ dhāḍīē khaggābhihayāu parabhavagayāu । kahagōu musāvāī mannijjai nēya sō tāva || 2670 ॥
ēvaṁ maē bhaṇiē bhaṇiyaṁ nēmittiṇā jahā ēvaṁ । savvaṁ pi musā jāō puṭṭhāō taē mama samīvē ॥ 2671 ।।
ciṭṭhēti tāō dōnni vi akkhayadēhāō jīvamāṇīō । kahagēṇa jāō kahiyāō tāō annāō kāō vi
tā tumha kahiyatammaraṇavaiyarē paccayaṁ kuṇatēṇa । nēmittiyassa vayaṇaṁ maē alīyaṁti citaviyaṁ ॥ 2673 ||
tō taṁbōlaṁ dāḍaṁ visajjiō sō aṇāyarēṇa maē । cittammi nivvisaṁkā taō ṭhiōhaṁ diṇē kai vi ।। 2674 ।।
pucchā puṇō vi rayaṇī pacchimajāmammi jāgaraṁtēṇa । rajjahisēyadiṇamuhē narabhaṇiyaṁ taṁ maē sariyaṁ ॥। 2675 ।।
jaha ēyaṁ tavvaṇaṁ nivaissa aṇiṭṭasūyagaṁ niyamā । tā nēmittiyavayaṇaṁ mannijjai nannahā hōṁtaṁ ॥ 2676।।
jamavāya kahiyā jīvaṁtī tēṇa taṁ pi taha cēva । jai puṇa hō hī jamhā atiṇijjō vihivilāsō ।। 2677 ॥
tō kāravēmi suddhi aṇūpamvāē imaṁ vicitēuṁ । uṭṭhēuṁ sayaṇāō pabhāyakiccaṁ karēūṇa ॥। 2678 ।।
jōisiyā āhūyā tē paṁcavi jēhiṁ vi gaṇiyaṁ laggaṁ । puvvaṁ aṇūpambāē maē taō pucchiyā ēē ॥। 2679॥
vaiyara maṇupavāē tahā jahā pucchiō sa nēmittī । tēhi vi tahēva kahiyā sā jīvaṁtī sakammayarī ।। 26850 ।।
gaṇaē visajjiūṇaṁ taō maē pēsiō niō purisō । sikkhavaṇaṁ dāūṇaṁ gāmē dhannauranāmammi ।। 2681 ।।
gaṁtaṇa tattha aha sō suddhi lahiūṇa kaṛavaryādiṇēhiṁ । puṇaravi ihā gaō tēṇa sāhiyaṁ ērisaṁ majjha || 2682||
dhannauragāma sīmā gayapaha majjhē ravimmi atthamiē । harisaurāō jaṁtī aṇūpamvā tattha saṁpattā || 2683 ।।
uttinā gaḍāōṁ kamyarīē samaṁ gayā ya dūrayarē । kāuṁ sarīracitaṁ pahavalaṇatirōhiyasarīrā || 2684 ।।
ētyaṁtarē nanaṁdā sabhāu jāyā samīvagāmāō । tammi paēsē pattā aṇūpamvā saṁtiē sagaḍē ॥। 2685।।
fas afsamāṇā khaṇamēgaṁ jāva tāva āgaṁtuṁ । tattha bahalaṁdhayārē cōrāṇaṁ nirvāḍiyā dhāḍī || 2686 ॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-84-to-84.json ==========================
84
kuṁtasī harāya kahāṇa
piṭṭē pāikkē tīē gahiyaṁ samaggamavi mōsaṁ । tāō dō vi jaṇīō nihaṇaṁ nīyāu kēṇā vi ।। 2687 ॥
ēttha khaṇē āgacchai aṇūpamvā jāva tattha tā nisuō । annayarapurisasaddō sudāruṇō haṇa haṇa bhaṇatō ।। 2688 ॥
tō bhayavasēṇa bhaṇiyā kammarīē aṇūpamvā ēvaṁ । paraō palāyahi tumaṁ ciṭṭhāmi ahaṁ tu khaṇamēttha || 2789 ।।
jāva imē parapurisā ēttō annattha kattha vi vayaṁti । tāva ahaṁ tuha saddaṁ karissamējjaha tumaṁ tattō | 2690 ॥
vihiyaṁ aṇūpavāē tahēva tattō khatarassaṁtē । nīsa saṁjāē gaēsu annayarapurisēsuṁ ।। 2691॥
kammayarī sagaḍasamīvamāgayā nirvāḍiē niē purisē । saddittā uṭṭhaviḍaṁ aṇūpamvāē gayābhimuhī ।। 2692 ।।
tīsē karēi saṭṭē maṁdē garuēya tathaṇu garuyayarē । dūrē dūrayarē viyaiō taō bhamai satī ।। 2693 ।।
jāva na tō sē sahaṁ kō vi payacchai taō niyattēuṁ । sā ruyamāṇī pattā sagaḍammi kahēi niyayāṇaṁ ।। 2694 ।।
tēsi purisāṇa purō tē vihu jaṁpati saṁpayaṁ gāmē । gammau tāva kahijjau tajjaṇaṇīē taō ēsā ।। 2695 ।।
niya dhūyāē sāraṁ sarvapi kārissaē samattīē । iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ gāmē gaṁtūṇa tahēva tēhi kayaṁ ।। 2696।।
jaṇaṇīē vi hu sārā dhūyāē kāriyā payattēṇa । savvattō pēsēu purisē gāmāgarāī || 2697।।
taha vina laddhā suddhī tīsē kattō vi thēvamēttā vi । jaṇaō vi sūrapālō ēttō gaṁtuṁ niyaggāmē ॥। 2698 ।।
kārai niyasattīē gavēsaṇaṁ savvaō vidhūyāē । tēṇa vi tīsē suddhī maṇaṁ pi nō cēva uvaladdhā || 2699।।
sā puṇa aṇūpamyāē kammayarī vāhiṇī sayaṁtēṇa । amha purisēṇa diṭṭhā ciṭṭhatī surapālagihē || 2700 ।।
taṁ puṇa sō pariyāṇā ihā gayā asi tēṇa sā diṭṭhā । iya vaiyarēṇa najjai na viṇaṭṭhā aṇupasvā vi tathā ।। 2701 ।।
āgaṁtuganēmittiyavatthavvayagaṇayavayaṇa savvataṁ । cittē maē viṇicchiyamēttō niya paṇihi vayaṇāō ।। 2702 ।।
inicchiō vihu tathā ayamaṭṭhō na kahiō maē tumha। mā vaiyarēṇa imiṇā tammau dēvō viiihēuṁ ।। 2703 ।।
jai suddhimapavāē ciṭṭhatīē kahi pi jāṇissaṁ । tō paḍiyāra mihaṭṭhē pakarissamahaṁ pisattīē । 2704 ।।।
'iyabuddhīē tumhaṁ ahaṁtēṇa vi maē samāraddhā । suddhī kāūṁ tīsē thēvā vi paraṁ na uvaladdhā ।। 2705 ।।
tattō maē vicitiyamēvaṁ jaha ēttha purisayārassa । avayāsō kō vi na atthi jēṇa divvaṁ mahābalavaṁ ॥ 2706 ।।
anna aṇūpamvā kaha tēṇa payārēṇa chaṭṭaē taiyā । inhi pi tēṇa vihiṇā sā katthai rakkhiyā asthi ।।2707 ||
ēvaṁ nēmittiyavayaṇamaṇupamvā jīvai ttitā miliyaṁ । hatthihayaharaṇavisayaṁ bīyaṁ jā milai tā sahimō ।। 2708 ।।
iya citi viramē ēmēva ṭhiyassa saṁkiyamaṇassa । tumha haya-hatthihēḍā gahiyā tō kuṁta sīhēṇa ।। 2709।।
tēṇa duiyaṁ pi miliyaṁ nēmittiyajaṁpiyaṁ taō majjha । puraō vi tassa vayaṇē saṁjāō pavvaō sudaḍhō ।। 2710॥
citiyamiṇaṁ maē tō jaha sā nēmittiēṇa jīvaṁtī । kahiyā aṇūpamvā ciṭṭhaē taō kuṁta sīhō sō ॥। 2711 ।।
tīsē putō kiṁvā kāē vi annāē ēsa saṁjāō । ēvaṁ viyāṇiyavvē majjha samīhā samuppannā ।। 2712।।
tā jāva tayā tubhē sēnaṁ pavaṇī karēhē tāva maē । jhattiniya paṇihipurisō pallīē kuṁtasīhassa । 2713 ।।
tajjaṇaṇipēiyaharaṁ jāṇēuṁ pēsiō gahiyasikkhō । gaṁtr̥̄ṇa tattha ēsō uvaviṭṭhō vaṇiyahaṭṭammi ।। 2714 ।।
vaṇivēsadharō pucchara kayāṇadagdhaṁ taō narō ēkkō । āgaṁtuṁ saha vaṇiēṇa kuṇaṛa niyagahiyavayalēkkhaṁ ।। 2715।।
kalēkkhami vaṇiō puṭṭhō mē paṇihiṇā nivēēi । jaha ēsa jaṇaṇi bhiccō kumārasiri kuṁtasī hassa । । 2716।।
tō tēṇa paṇihiṇāmē sō bhiccō pabhaṇiō jahā bhadda ! savvattha vittharagaō guṇanivahō kuṁtasīhassa ।। 2717 ।।
savvattha imassa piyā viiō najjai na māuṇō pakkhō । tā jai tumaṁ viyāṇasi tō sāhasu aha bhaṇai bhiccō
na rahaṁ nahiṁ risikulahaṁ varakāmiṇikamalāhaṁ । avaggamaṇuna pucchriyai kau kusalattaṇu tāhaṁ ॥। 2719 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariya
85
tō bhai taṁ paṇahī jai vi imaṁ atthi taha vi sāhēsu । ciṭṭhai majjha ihaṭṭhē jaṁ jāyaṁ kō ugaṁ garuyaṁ ।। 2720।।
tō tassa kahai bhiccō siriharisanaridasaṁtiē dēsē । asthi kayaṁbasarapuraṁ tappaḍibaddhāṇa gāmāṇa ।। 2721 ॥
dōnhaṁ pi aṁtarālē pahamajjhē āgayā diṇatthamaṇē । tēṇēhiṁ kā vi kannā pattā sā ēttha āṇīyā ॥। 2722 ।।
tō rannā pariṇīyā tīsē puttō ya kuṁtasīhō tti । pii - māigāma nāmaṁ puṇa muṇai na kō vi ēīē || 2723।।
tōtē paṇahiṇā pucchiō puṇō sō jahā tumamimīē । nāmaṁ kiṁ pi viyāṇasi sō kahai'ṇupamadēvi tti ।। 2724।।
iya sōuṁ sō paṇihī viṇiggaō takkhaṇē taō bhōttuṁ । ētassa tassa miliyaṁ tumhaṁ sannaṁ hē jaṁtaṁ ।। 2725।।
ētthāgaṇa ēvaṁ maha puraō tēṇa sāhiyaṁ savvaṁ । kajjaṁ viṇā maē taṁ tathā vi kahiyaṁ na tumha purō ।। 2726 ।।
jēṇa tathā tassuvara sēnaṁ ciya āsi pēsiyaṁ uciyaṁ । tumbhēhi pēsiyaṁ taṁ tatha vēkkhāē pabhūyaṁ pi ॥ 2727।।
jai purṇa sayaṁ calatā tumbhē tassuvaritō tathā vi ahaṁ । kahiūṇa ērisaṁ savvamēva nūṇaṁ nivārētō ॥। 2728 ।।
jāva ṇa sa tubbhē na paṭṭiyā taduvari tathā tāva। amhē viṭhiyā ēmēva vihitha mōṇā iyāṇi ॥। 2729।।
samaō tti tumha kahiyaṁ maē taō ērisaṁ viyāṇēuṁ । tassābhimuhaṁ kahamavi dēvēṇa sayaṁ na gaṁtavvaṁ ॥ 2730।।
sōūṇa maṁti jaṁpiyamēyaṁ siriharisamēiṇīnāhō । jāō ki pi sakhēō bhāvi aṇatthābhisaṁkāē ।। 2731 ।।
maṁtimmi puṇa satōsō tabhattimaguṇēṇa saṁjāō । bhaṇai ya maṁtiṁ tumhāṇumaī ētaṁ karissāmō ॥। 2732 ।।
rannā visajjiō tō maṁtī vi gaō gihaṁ mainihāṇō । bīya-diṇē saṁjhāē nivapaṇihi narēhiṁ āgaṁtuṁ ॥। 2733 ||
kahiyaṁ tappuraō vittharēṇa parabhagganiyabalasarūvaṁ । rannā visajjiūṇaṁ hēriyapurisē imē tattō || 2734।।
niyagasyanarē hakkāriūṇa taṁ tēsi savvamakkhāyaṁ । savvēhiṁ vi tēhi ta vinnattaṁ ērisaṁ tassa ।। 2735||
jaha dēva ! tumha pāsē jāva iyaṁ asthi saṁpayaṁ sannaṁ tattō duguṇayaravalaṁ paviyaṁ āsi tumhahiṁ ।। 2736 ||
uvarimmi kuṁtasīhassa taṁ pi giraduggavalava sē ṇimiṇā । bhaggaṁ līlā ēcciya savvaṁ gahiyaṁ ca lhasēu ।। 2737।।
guḍapakkhara ra hasannāhapabhiiyaṁ raṇaviṇadvasēsaṁ ca । haya-gaya-rahakara hāī sayaṁ samaggaṁ pi saṁgahiyaṁ || 2738 ।।
tēṇa imō saṁjāō saṁpai pōḍhō nisaggasūrō ya । tumhē puṇa thēva balā tassuvari taō sayaṁ inhi ॥। 2739 ।।
tumha na jujjhai jattā kāyadhvā tāva kaivaryādiṇāī । jai sō sayaṁ pi ēsai tō jaha juttaṁ karissāmō ॥। 2740 ।।
tēṇa vi taṁ paḍivannaṁ vayaṇaṁ juttaṁ pi garuyapurisāṇa । kattō vi kuṁtasīhō sarūvamēvaṁ suṇēūṇa ।। 2741 ।।
saṁvahiūṇaṁ ginhai kathaṁva sarapaṭṭaṇaṁ mahāduggaṁ । annāī vi duggāī ginhai dō tini sighaṁ pi ॥। 2742 ।।
ēvaṁ kamma miliō bahulōō tassa kuṁtasīhassa । harisaurapurābhimuhō tā caliō kayaraṇucchāhō ॥। 2743।।
bhaṭṭa paṭṭaviūṇaṁ siriharisō tēṇa kuṁtasīhēṇa । ēvaṁ bhaṇāviō jaha tujjha maē jō iō maggō || 2744।।
ētassa ēttiya diṇē jāva tumaṁ nāgaō iyāṇitō । ahamēva sayaṁ pattō tujjhuvariṭhiyassa visaṭhāṇē ।। 2745 ।।
ḍhukkēha saṁpayaṁ mē jujjhē dūrammi aha palāēha | ahavā āgaṁtūṇaṁ sēvāē majjha pavisē || 2746 ||
ēvaṁ bhaṭṭa muhāō sōuṁ siriharisapatthavō jhatti । jāō ghayasattahuyāsaṇō va kōvēṇa diptō || 2747।।
tivalīta raṁgabhaṁguraniḍālavaṭṭō phuraṁta ahōṭṭhō | tāḍāvara raṇabhēri saṁvāhai savva niyasēnaṁ ।। 2748 ।।
viyalaṁtamaya kavōlē guḍiyāidē khivāvai sa cāvaṁ । nārāyasēllaniyaraṁ sannāhaṁ khivai niya aṁgē ।। 2749 ।।
vaha kuṁtasaha bhaṭṭē vinnaghāē puṇō vi tassēva । pāsē pēsai sahadinnavāyaniyabaṁdividēṇa ॥। 2750।।
tēsi muhē bhāi taṁ ēvaṁ jaha taē jai kahaṁ ci । giriduggabalēṇa chalēṇa amha sēnaṁ asaṁvaḍhaṁ ।। 2751।।
bhaggaṁta gahiyāī pavvaṁtiya paṭṭaṇāī dō ttinni । tā ēttiēṇa vi tumaṁ gaōsi kiṁ gavvagirisiharaṁ ।। 2752 ।।
।

=== vardhamanaoutput-86-to-86.json ==========================
86
kuṁtasī harāyakahāṇa
jā ajja va ahamakkhadēhō ciṭṭhāmi tāva kiṁ pitaē । nayabhaggaṁ na ya gahiyaṁ savvaṁ tuha uyara majjhāō ।। 2753 ।।
inhi kassiṁ niccharaṇa jai jaṁpiḍaṁ na nāsihisi । kālēṇa kaḍḍhiūṇaṁ āṇīō taṁsi sa paēhiṁ ।। 2754 ।।
ēsōhaṁ saṁpattī tuha samuha jhatti saṁpa muhuttaṁ । ēmēva ciṭṭhiūṇaṁ dējjasu tō murṇāsi sapamāṇaṁ ॥। 2755।।
i sikkhavi bhaṭṭē pēsēuṁ kuṁtasīhapāsamma । sirisiriharisanariṁdō kayasannāhō sayaṁ tattō ॥। 2756 ।।
sajjīkaē kariṁdē karakayakuṁtī samāruhai laggō । jāva kira tāva pattō tattha samaṁtī mainihāṇō । 2757 ।।
ēgaṁtē dhariūṇaṁ vinnattō tēṇa sō nivō ēvaṁ । puvvaṁ jaṁ tumha maē siṭṭha savvaṁ pi taṁ inhi ॥। 2758 ।।
ki pamhusiūṇa gayaṁ tamāha rāyā sarāmi taṁ savvaṁ । tō maṁtī āha nivaṁ jai saraha karēha kiṁ ēvaṁ ।। 2759 ।।
puṇa maṁti āha nivō jaī kiccamiṇaṁ na kimavaraṁ kiccaṁ । maṁtī pabhaṇai saṁpai vē saṁtarakaraṇaō juttaṁ ।। 2760।।
dēsaṁtaragamaṇaṁ ciya na uṇō sayamēva kālamuhagamaṇaṁ । jaṁ nīīsu kahijjai ca ējja puhaī pi attaṭṭhē ।। 2761 ।।
tō āha nimaṁti rakkhijjai savvakālamēvappā । kiṁtu samarammi sō vi hu uvēkkhaṇīō na dhīrēhiṁ ।। 2762 ।।
kiṁ ca mahāpurisāṇaṁ pāṇēhiṁ tō vi vallahā kittī । na uṇō kittiviṇāsē kharṇapi rakkhati tē jīyaṁ ॥। 2763।।
suṭṭha vi ruṭṭha divvaṁ jīviyarajjāṇamēva mē haraṇaṁ । kāuṁ sakkai na uṇō kittī kuṁdadhavalāē | | 2764।।
jīvaṁ tassa vi rajjaṁ maha annō bhuṁjaitti na sahēmi । ginhai jiyaṁta vitta ya khallaṁkō vitti ki hōi ।। 2765 ।।
dōnhaṁ gaīṇa ēgā kā vi gaī majjha saṁgayā nūṇaṁ । haṇiūṇa riḍaṁ rāyā hōmi vivajjāmi vā samarē ।। 2766 ।।
uktaṁ ca-
kusumastakasvadvayī vr̥ttirmanasvinaḥ । mūrdhni vā sarvalōkasya śīryatē vana ēva vā ॥2767।।
taiyaṁ pi maṁtimaṁtasi tumaṁ pi jaṁ mai vivajjaō ēsō । tuha pahuviō ya kāya ramaṇassa annaṁ na ki pi puṇō ।। 2768 ।
iya siriharisō rāyā maṁti saṁbōhiūṇa akkhuhiō । āruhiūṇa karidaṁ sabalō nīharai nayarāō ।। 2769।।
maṁtī sabāhanayaṇō citai jaha ēsa khattiō jaccō । jiṇa iva sattuṁ marai varaṇammi taiyaṁ na ēyammi ।। 2770 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca--
dhavalihi juttaraṁ vinni paratitni kayā vina huṁti । aha uṭṭaṁ kiṁ hi bharu caḍai aha majjhaha tuṭṭa ti ।।2771 ।।
ētthaō divvē vi muhē vijaya kahā dūragāmiṇī nūṇaṁ । appāyattaṁ maraṇaṁ jaṁ tassa tayaṁ dhruvaṁ hōhī || 2772 ||
ētacciya aṇatthasūyagaṁ jāyamii tathā vayaṇaṁ । suttaṁ atthi na raṁgō taha khattaguṇō iha na punnaṁ ।। 2773 ||
iya citiūṇa maṁtī taō palāṇō samīhiyapasē । rāyā vi kuṁtasīhō saṁpattō naya bahibhāē || 2774।।
siriharirāyapē siyabhaṭṭē hi tō nisamma taṁ vayaṇaṁ । sannaddhasavvasēnnō siriharisā gamaṇamīhēi || 2775।।
siriharisō vi naridō bahusēnnasamanniyaṁ susannaddhaṁ । puraō pāsaṁtō kuṁtasīhamairēṇa tayabhihō || 2776 ||
dhāvas paharaṁtō nisiya sēllanā rāyaniyaravarisēṇa । pāḍatō mattakāriṁda - turayasuhaḍāṇa saṁghāē ।। 2777।।
daṭṭhūṇa kuṁtasīhō taṁ kuviyakayaṁtaduddharaṁ puraō । āgacchaṁtaṁ citai niya bhuyadaṁḍē palōyaṁtō ।।2778।।
ajjēva samarakō pujjissai majjha jujjhamāṇassa । siriharisamahā suhaḍēṇa saha imēṇaṁ ticitaṁ ।। 2779 ।।
kumaramma kuṁtasīhē saṁpattō jhatti aṁtiē tassa । kōvēṇa niṭṭarāī siriharisanivō payaṁpatō ।। 2780।।
aha tassa pasaṁsaṁtō cārahaḍiguṇaṁ samuṭṭhaē samuhō । sō kuṁtasīhasuhaḍō mattagaiṁdammi ārūḍhō ॥। 2781 ।।
siriharisa naridēṇaṁ kutaṁ uppāḍiūṇa pakkhittaṁ । kōvēṇa kuṁtasīhassa sammuhaṁ taṁ taṁ jhati ॥ 2782 ॥

87
aṁgaṁ pariyattēuṁ ṭālēuṁ appaṇō sarīrāō । siriharisanivō hiyaē kuṁtaṁ khiviūṇa ukkhittō ।।2783 ।।
khittō ya mahīvīḍhē palālapūlō vva nihaṇamaṇūpattō । bhaggaṁ annāyagaṁ taṁ jhatti palāṇaṁ balaṁ tassa ॥। 2784 ।।
tassēva paṭṭhilaggō majjhē nayarassa aha paviṭṭhō sō । gaṁtūṇaṁ rāyaulē uvaviṭṭhō tassa pāsā ।। 2785।।
āṇaṁdāūṇa niyaṁ taṁ nayaraṁ rakkhaē samaggaṁ pi । tēṇa vi sōcciya cittē paḍivannō nāyagō tattō ।। 2786 ।।
siriharisarāyamaraṇaṁ suṇiuṁ aṁtēuraṁ samaggaṁ pi । niggayamabhiṁtaraō bhaṇāviyaṁ kuṁtasīhēṇa ॥। 2787।।
tumhē maha niyajaṇaṇī tulāō puvvavattaṇaṁ niyayaṁ । ginhēūṇa taha cciya ciṭṭhaha mā caḍaha kaṭṭhēsu ।। 2788 ।।
aṁtēurēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ siriharisanariṁdakannayā paṇagaṁ । ēyaṁ pariṇāvijjaha tō amha taē kayaṁ savvaṁ ।।2789 ।।
inhi puṇa amha gaī pāyā siriharisadēvarāyassa | tō kuṁtasīhakumarō taha tti taṁ manniraṁ vayaṇaṁ ।। 2790।।
siriharisanivēṇa samaṁ dāvai aṁtēurassa kaṭṭhāī । kannāō puṇō saṁbōhiūṇa dhārai gurusuhēṇa ।। 2791 ।।
sigghayara saṁḍhiyāṇaṁ pāsammi samappiūṇa vinnatti । siriharisaviṇāsāī saruvamakkhāvaē piuṇō ।। 2792 ।।
bamma dinē miliḍaṁ savvēhiṁ vi nayarapamuhalō ēhi । sō kuṁtasīhasuhaḍō vinnattō ērisaṁ aṭṭha ।। 2793 ।।
rajjammi attaṇō kāravēha tubbhē iyāṇimahisēyaṁ । sāmiparivajjiyāṇaṁ paḍivajjaha amha sāmittaṁ । । 2794।।
tō bhai kuṁtasīhō nāyaralōyaṁ jahā puhaisīhō । amhaṁ sāmī tassēvāēṁ samaṭṭima amhē || 2795 ।।
tumbhē vi tō ihaṭṭhē taṁ cēva vayavinnavēha maha jaṇayaṁ । tēhi miliūṇa tattō vinnatī puhaisīhassa ।। 2796।।
sīhaurē paṭṭaviyā jaha amhaṁ puvvasāmiō vihiṇā । hariō inhi annaṁ paūiṇaṁ sāmiyaṁ dēha ॥। 2797 ।।
tattha puṇa kuṁtasīhō nayarā rakkhaganirūvaṇāīyaṁ । savvaṁ karēi sutthaṁ sa bāhirabbhitarajaṇassa ॥। 2798।।
tappēsiyasaṁḍhiyagā pattā pāsammi puhaisīhassa । tē kuṁtasīhavinnattilēhamappati ēyassa ।। 2799 ।।
sāhitiya jaha diṭṭhē puhaīsīhō ya avagayatayatthō । tuṭṭhō dēi pasāyaṁ saṁḍhiyagāṇaṁ bahu tēsi ॥ 2800 ।।
kahiyaṁ aṇūpamvāē saṁvāhēūṇa sikkhavēūṇa । taṁ pēsai harisaurē patthāṇē ṭhāiē sāvi ।। 2801 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattā harisauranivāsilōyavinnatti । gahiuṁ purisā appēṁti tassa sō taṁ nirikkhēuṁ ।। 2802 ।।
tē bhai jaha ihaṭṭhē aṇupamadēvī maē niyaṁ sikkha । dāūṇa kuṁtasīhassa sannihāṇammi paṭṭaviyā ॥। 2803।।
ciṭṭha patthāṇa ṭhiyā tubhē saha tīē jāha harihasaurē । iyarannō āiṭṭha taha cēva aṇuṭṭiyaṁ tēhi ||2804 ||
aṇupamadēvī gaṁtu harisaurē puhai sōhasikkhavaṇaṁ । kahiūṇa kuṁtasīhaṁ ahisicāvēi rajjammi || 2805।।
siriharisarāyakannā paṇagaṁ āpucchiūṇa icchataṁ । aigaruyavibhūīē pariṇāvara kuṁtasīhāō ।। 2806 ।।
māravayaṇēṇa ēsō kayaṁvasaranayaraṁ saṁtiyaṁ dēsaṁ । dēi pasāēṇa taō māyāmaha sūrapālassa ।। 2807 ||
maṁḍaliyā sāmaṁtā sāhaṇiyataṁtavālamāīyā । saṁgāmalaggaghāyā sīhaurē jēṭṭiyā āsi ||2808 ।।
siriharisanarēsara sēnna saṁtiyā tāṇa majjhaō kē vi । jē na mayā tē sajjhā saṁjāyā āgayā tattha ।।2809॥
harisaurē āgaṁtuṁ atthāṇē kuṁtasīharāyassa । paramaviṇaēṇa paṇayā tēṇa vi tē vihirasammāṇā ।। 2810 ॥
niyaniya pasu ṭhaviyā annē vi narēsa rājahājōggaṁ । uṭṭhāviyāya kē vi hu tahēva saṁṭhāviyā kē vi ।। 2811 ।।
sōhagirisamavatthaṁ dērsa piuṇō vi dēi kaṁpi niyaṁ । annanivasaṁtiyaṁ pihū ginhēuṁ tassa appēi ॥। 2812 ॥
aṇupamadēvī jāyā puttā annē vi saṁti jē caurō । tēsu samatthaṁ puttaṁ sīhaurē ṭhāviḍaṁ pacchā ।। 2813॥
samāgacchai pāsē puttassa nivassa kuṁtasīhassa । sō puhaisīharāyā salahuēhiṁ tihiṁ suēhiṁ ॥। 2814 ।।
nayarammi kayaṁbasarē puttaṁ ṭhaviūṇa sūrapālō vi । tihuyaṇadēvī sahiō harisaurē ciṭṭhaē ya ṭhiō ।। 2815 ।।

kuṁtasī harāyakahāṇaya
kamalasirī dēvīē puttaṁ aha jaṇai kuṁtasīhaniyō । nāmēṇa rāyasīhaṁ guṇēhiṁ jaṇayassa paritullaṁ || 2816॥
sāhiya asēsa sīmāla rāyasamavāyajāyaja sapasarō । sirikuṁtasīharāyā cirakālaṁ pālaē rajjaṁ ॥। 2717।।
anna dinē thērā samāgayā kē vi tattha vāhimmi । tēsi vaṁdaṇahēuṁ nayarajaṇaṁ jāṇiuṁ jaṁtaṁ ॥ 2818 ||
rāyā vikuṁtasīhō tattha gaō kōugēṇa riddhīē । māyāmaha - māyāmahiṁ jaṇaṇī jaṇayāi jaṇajuttō ॥ 2819।।
namiūṇa muṇidaṁ paṁjalī tau uciyaṭhāṇauvaviṭṭhō । āyannai dhammakahaṁ kahijjamāṇi muṇidēṇa ॥। 2620 ।।
culasīijōṇilakkhē bhavē bhamaṁtāṇa kammavasagāṇa | jīvāṇa māṇusattaṁ dulahaṁ dhammō visēsēṇa ॥। 2021 ।।
jujjha-jala-jalaṇa- bisahara- kēsari kari - rōga cā ragabhayāī । dhammapabhāvēṇa jaō jhatti paṇassaṁti jaṁtūṇa ।। 2822 ।।
mattakari-turaya-rahasaṁkasmmi suhaḍubbhaḍammi saṁgāmē । pāvaṁti jhatti vijayaṁ ajjiya dhammā narā puvvaṁ ।। 2823 ।।
jē aṇuvajjiyadhammā tēsi tu kamāgayā vi rajjasirī । acchidiūṇa gijjhai haḍhēṇa kēṇai saunēṇa ।। 2824 ।।
āyanaūṇa ēvaṁ siriharisanivassa attaṇō ya mihō । saṁjāyasamaravaiyaramaṇusariuṁ kuṁtasōhanivō ॥। 2825 ।।
āpucchai tē thēraṁ jaha bhayavaṁ ! paṁcagāmasayasāmī । duggabalēṇa ajēō amha piyā āsi iyasi ।। 2826 ||
nivaraṇa puhaisīhō ēsō ēyassa aṁgajāō'haṁ । siriharisō uṇa rāyā kamāgaō viuladē pahū ।। 2827 ।।
paurakari puraya-raha- jōhasaṁjuō vikkamī nayaparō ya । tā kaha ēsa mamāō pattōbhibhavaṁ ca maraṇaṁ ca ।। 2828 ।।
kaha majjha rāyalacchī viulā ēyassa saṁtiyā jāyā । pasiūṇa kahaha ēyaṁ tujjhē jaṁ muṇaha satrvaṁ pi ।। 2829 ।।
aha tē suavauttā thērā hōūṇa tassa sāhēti । jaha dēsssa imassēva asthi paccaṁtiyaggāmō ।। 2830।।
taggāmaṭhakkurasya u vayaṁsagā dōnni sēvagā āsi । tē āhēḍyahēuṁ aḍavīmajjhē pariyaḍaṁtā ||2831||
pāsaṁti sāhujuyalaṁ maggaparibhaṭṭamaggaō jaṁtaṁ । ēgō tēsu duijjaṁ bhaṇai jahā liṁgiṇō kēī || 2832 ॥
ēē pahaparibhaṭṭhā kā ēsi daṁsimō nayaramaggaṁ । iyarēṇa utavghayaṇaṁ tassuvarōhēṇa paḍivannaṁ ।। 2833॥
paḍhamō puraō gaṁtuṁ muṇiṇō namiūṇa nayaragāmi pahaṁ । daṁsai tēsi biiō vi tathaṇulaggō kuṇai ēvaṁ ॥2834 ॥
pacchā niryāttiumaṇā aṇujāṇāvēṁti jāva tē muṇiṇō । daṭṭū ṇa jōggayaṁ tāva tēhi sāhūhi kahēūṇa ।। 2835 ।।
saṁkhēvēṇaṁ dhammaṁ tē bhaṇiyā niravarāhajīvāṇaṁ । hiṁsāni sēha maṁgīkarēṁti taha maṁsaparihāraṁ ॥ 2836 ।।
iya niyamaṁ dāuṇaṁ tēsi muṇiṇō gayā purō maggē । tē karyāniyamā dōnni vi niyattiuṁ niya gihē pattā ॥ 2837||
niyamaṁ pālatāṇa tāṇa diṇāī gayāī bahuyāī । annasamayammi nāyaṁ niyamasarūvaṁ imaṁ tēsi ॥ 2838 ||
taggāmaṭhakkurēṇa pāhuṇagē āgayammi tō tēṇa । tē dōnnivi āiṭṭhā hariṇadugaṁ haṇiumāha || 2839॥
cittēṇa viṇā dōhiṁ vi paḍivannaṁ ṭhakkarassa taṁ vayaṇaṁ । bhamiūṇa vaṇē hariṇē diṭṭha vihu nō haṇissāmō || 2840 ।
āgaṁtumuttaramiṇaṁ kāhāmō ajja na hariṇā diṭṭhā | iya citiūṇa dōnni vi tē vaccaṁtā vaṇābhimuhaṁ ।। 2841 ।।
niyaniya maṇō vigappē payaḍaṁti parōpparaṁ taō puraō । pattā vaṇē tarutalē dō vi nisīyaṁti ēgattha ।। 2842 ।।
jā ciṭṭhati khaṇaddhaṁ acaliya puvvilla suddhapariṇāmā । tā mayajūhaṁ puraō vōlīṇaṁ tā (va) dōnhaṁpi ॥2843॥
jēṇa paḍhamaṁ duijjō bhaṇiō muṇimaggadaṁsaṇanimittaṁ । sō nivvigappacittō vīō mayajūhadaṁsaṇaō ॥2844 ।।
citai a kyāsē amhē sāmī bhaṇissai virūvaṁ । tamhā parataṁtāṇaṁ naamha niyamō palai kō vi ।। 2845 ।।
tā kiṁpi hariṇajūhaṁ maggēṇimiṇā puṇō vi jai ēi । tā nūṇa haṇiumēgaṁ pāvēmi pahupāsē ||2846 ||
duiyassa jai kahissaṁtō majjha vi haṁtumēsa nō dāhī । tā ēyamakahiūṇa vi imassa sāhēmi pahukajjaṁ ।। 2847।।
iya citiūṇa cāvaṁ caḍāviyaṁ tēṇa attaṇō jhatti । bīēṇa pucchiō tō kuṇai imaṁ uttaraṁ ēsō || 2848 ||

jaha vaṇamajjhē ēgō sajjadhaṇū hōi jai taō laṭṭha । tattō khaṇaṁtarēṇaṁ mayajū hē ucchiraṁtammi ।। 2849 ।।
cāvē saraṁ ṭhavēṁtō daṭhṭhē bīēṇa vāriō ēsō । taha vihu aṭhāyamāṇē rummi samāyaḍdiuṁ churiyaṁ ।। 2850 ।।
chinnā cāvapaḍaṁcā apaḍiyachariyāē mukkavāṇēṇa । viddhō ēgō hariṇō thēvaṁ gaṁtuṁ gaō nihaṇaṁ ।। 2851 ।।
tō tēṇa pahuṁcāchēyagēṇa bhaṇiō bahuṁ virūvamimō । kuddhō maṇē taduvari duvvayaṇaṁ pahuṁcachēēhiṁ ॥। 2852 ।।
taṁ haṁtumicchara taō mayahariṇaṁ ginhiūṇa pahugēhē । nēūṇassa daṁsai kahai ya niyamittavr̥ttaṁtaṁ ॥। 2853 ।।
taṁ sōuṁ sō sāmī tadurikuviō payaṁpai virūvaṁ । kahaga puṇō pasaṁsai tēṇāṇīyaṁ ca taṁ hariṇaṁ ।। 2854 ।।
tasēva ya pāsāō ukkatāvēī tō payāvēi । bhuttē pāhuṇēsuṁ taṁ bhōyai appaṇāsaddhi ।। 2855 ।।
pāhuṇagabhuttasēsaṁ mayapisiyaṁ ṭhakkarō sayaṁ asai । tassa vi parivēsāvai tēṇa vi bhuttaṁ tamākaṁṭhaṁ ।। 2856 ।।
bhuttuṭṭiōsa pahuṇē sō āiṭṭhō jahā tamāṇēhi । niyamittaṁ baṁdhēuṁ tō tēṇa pahū imaṁ puṭṭhō ॥। 2857 ।।
jai sō karēi ghāyaṁ ghēppaṁtō tō kimēttha karaṇijjaṁ । āha pahū tumhē vi hu karējja ghāyaṁ taō ēsō ।। 2858 ।।
tammāraṇabuddhīē pahupāsē maggijaṁ jaṇē paṁca । taggihasamuha caliō sō puṇa mittō vaṇāhitō ॥। 2859 ।।
āgaṁtuṁ niyagēhē bhōttuṁ suttuṭṭiō tamāvataṁ । duṭṭumaṇaṁ muṇiūṇaṁ kuviō aṁgēṇa lahu naṭṭhō ।। 2860।।
iyarō tahagaō tamapāvatō kuḍuṁbayaṁ tassa । cāragagihammi dhārai gitu ginhai sayaṁ tassa ॥। 2861 ।।
sāmimaṇunnaviūṇaṁ jāyavasūī nisāē aṇutāvaṁ । bhagganiyamassa kāuṁ mariuṁsō naravaī jāō ।। 2862।।
harisaurē siriharisō nāma kaidiyaha niyamapālaṇaō। tabbhaṁgāō taha mittadōhaō paribhavaṁ pattō ॥ 2863 ॥
tuha
pāsāō rajjabbhaṁsaṁ maraṇaṁ ca tassa jō mittō । naṭṭhōṁ pumbillabhavē sō pāviyasāmisammāṇō ।। 2864 ।।
cāramukkakuḍubō niyaniyamaṁ pāliūṇa jājīvaṁ । āukkhayammi mariḍaṁ saṁjāō taṁ sihairāyā ।। 2865।।
iya muṇikahiē jāī sariuṁ paccakkhadiṭṭhapugvabhavō । sō kuṁtasīharāyā tavvayaṇē jāyapaccayaō ॥2866 ॥
pucchai siriharisa gaī kahai muṇī tuha raṇē nihayasēnnō । rōjjhāṇē nihaō taē gaō ēsa naraē tō ॥2867॥
pucchara aṇupamadēvī muṇi tahā saṁbhamaṁ tathā kāuṁ । kaha harisapālarannā tō pariṇīyā ahaṁ cattā ॥2868।।
tō gaṇaya puccha nivamaṁtimaṁtaṇappabhii jāva vaha majjhē । sanaṇaṁdabhāu jāyā viṇāsiyā kahai tāva muṇī ।। 2869 ।।
āsavadāravivāgappabhiisarūvaṁ (bha) vassa sēsaṁpi । sāhaī sūrītō kuṁtasīharāyā iha bhavassa ।। 2870 ।।
niyaṁ cariyaṁ dhāḍipayāṇa samarakaraṇāiyaṁ sarēūṇa । bhavaduhabhīō sūri namiūṇa gaō niyaṁ gēhaṁ ।। 2871 ।।
kamalasirī kucchibhavaṁ niyasuyamahisiciūṇa riddhīē । rajjammi rāyasīhaṁ attasamaṁ vikkamaguṇēṇa ॥ 2872 ।।
māyāmaha - māyāmahi jaṇaṇī - jaṇaēhiṁ sahakalattēhi । sēvayalōēṇa (ya) sūri aṁtiē ginhiuṁ dikkhaṁ ।। 2873।।
sikkhiyars kiriō paḍhiyaāgamō pāliyāmalacaritō । mariūṇa samāhijuō uppannō paḍhama kappammi
॥ iti śrī kuṁtasī harāyakathānakaṁ samāptaṁ ॥
।।2874 ।।
puṭṭhē ca taē ēvaṁ ciṭṭhai jaṁ vakammapurisadhārāṇaṁ । ki baliyaṁti tayaṭṭhē kahiyaṁ akkhāṇayaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 2875।।
ēyammi kahijjētē annaṁ pi samāgayaṁ pasaṁgēṇa । juyalaṁ kahāṇayāṇaṁ samatthiyaṁ taṁ pi nīsēsaṁ ।। 2876।।
atyō kahāṇayāṇaṁ ēyāṇaṁ patthuyammi vatthummi | saṁpai saṁjōijjai suṇēhi taṁ kumara ! tumaminhi || 2877।।
iha hōi duhāmmaṁ pāvasahāvaṁ ca puṇṇarūvaṁ ca । tattha siriharisarannō nivvaḍiyaṁ pāvakammaphalaṁ ।। 2878।।

kubēradattacariyaṁ
vavasāō puṇa vihalō attha - phalaō ya tassa saṁjāō । kēvalapunnassa phalaṁ jāyaṁ puṇa'ṇupamadēvīē || 2879 ||
kumara taha aṁbuvicissa nivaiṇō kēvalassa punnassa । jāyaṁ phala mahalō puṇa jāō tammaṁ ti vavasāō || 2880||
putraṁ vavasāō vi ya ubhayaṁ puṇa naṁdivadvarṇānivassa । samakālaphalaṁ jāyaṁ ranō taha kuṁtasīhassa, ।। 2881 ।।
tā ēsihaparamatthō kammaṁ asuhaṁsuhaṁ ca jīvāṇaṁ । dēi phalamappaṇō kēvalaṁ pi na uṇō purisayārō || 2882 ॥
annaha kammaṁ ciṭṭhas kī raha jai annahā purisayārō । tō kammaṇāṇurūvaṁ hōi phalaṁ na uṇa iyarassa ||2883 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁca--
1
dhārijjai ēṁtō jalanihī vi kallōlabhinnakula sēlō । na hu annajammanimmiyasuhāsuhō divvapariṇāmō || 2884 ।।
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa muṇimmi uvaraē vaṁdiūṇa tō kumarō । uṭṭhai kubēradattō muṇī vi vaccai saṭhāṇammi ॥। 2885।।
ētthatarammi jāyā pabhāyapāyānisā tamappasarō । nāsai nahaṁgaṇāō aṇāgayaṁ sūrakara bhīō || 2886 ॥
saṁkōsya karapāō viyacchāō khaṇēṇa saṁjāō । kālavasā nāsagayaṁ nisaṁniēuṁ nisānāhō ||2887 ||
tārāyaṇō vi tārāvahammi tārāvaiṁ galiyatēyaṁ । avalōiūṇa vilayaṁ khēēṇa va jhatti saṁpattō ॥ 2888 ||
jēsi jahicchaṁ dinnō nisimayaraṁdō nisāvasāṇammi । kumuēhi tē vi baddhā mahurajjhaṇiṇō vi bhamaragaṇā । 2889 ।
ahavā jaḍāsayāṇaṁ dētāṇa vi dāṇamaisayamahagghaṁ । saṁgō na hōi suhaō pariṇāmē sēvayajaṇāṇa ॥। 2890 ।।
pubvadisā pattā dūī aruṇappahā diṇidassa । kayakuṁkumaṁgarāya vva sā vi jāyā tayāgamaṇē ॥। 2891 ।।
āsāō viyasiyāō aidūramasēsabhuvaṇavalayassa । mittammi udayapattē kassava ēvaṁ na saṁbhavai ।। 2892 ।।
āsi paṇaṭṭā pugvaṁ diyahassa vivajjaēṇa jā lacchī । laddhē diyahammi puṇō sā jāyā kamalasaṁḍassa ।। 2893 ||
pasaraṁtakiraṇajālē taraṇimmi taō niēvi disibhāyaṁ । pacchāhuttaṁ caliō kubēradattō nivaṁgaruhō ।। 2894 ।।
muṇivayaṇāyannaṇa saṁkiya vva niddāpalāiyā āsi । jātacciramētīē kumarō āligiō gōsē ।। 2895 ।।
maulaṁtanēttakamalō vaccaṁtō ēvamēva sunnamaṇō । khaḍḍāē khaliyapaō paḍamāṇō jaggaō jāva ||2896।।
pēccha disā vibhāyaṁ uḍḍhō hōūṇa tāva jāṇēi । annadisāē laggaṁ appāṇaṁ tō niyattēuṁ ।। 2897 ।।
jāva paṭṭassai kiramaṁgalauranayara maggasammuhaō । tā tassa vā maggāu dhāviō mattamāyaṁgō ।। 2898 ।।
vaṇakuṁjarajūhāō gajjatō dāṇasittamahivīḍhō । ukkhiviyasuṁḍadaṁḍō diṭṭipahē jhatti ōinō || 2899 ।।
akkhuhiyamaṇō ṭhāuṁ khaṇamēgaṁ tattha cēva tō kumarō । pāsāgaēgaiṁdē uppaiō gayaṇamaggami ||2900 ||
tassēva paṭṭibhāē paḍiu pāēhi pahaṇiḍaṁ gāḍhaṁ । uttinnō pucchēṇaṁ parammuhō dhāvitaṁ turiyaṁ ।। 2901 ||
hatthī vi kumarapāyappahāra aidūmiō sakōvamaṇō । pacchā huttō valiuṁ paha | viō kumaramaggēṇaṁ ।। 2902॥
kumarō vi tassa āsaṁdasaṁtō vayai pasariyakarassa । dūrammi taō nēuṁ niyattaē jhatti vāmēṇa ।। 2903॥
hatthi vi jāniyattas kumarō gaṁtūṇa tāva pucchammi । taṁ ginhēuṁ tēṇēva saha taō bhamai cakkaṁ va ।। 2904 ।।
tattō khaṇaṁtarēṇa āruhiuṁ pacchimammi bhāgammi । khaṁdhammi paē kāuṁ jhaṁpaṁ dāuṁ purō ṭhāi ।। 2905 ।।
tattō niyattiūṇaṁ tayabhihō jāva ṭhāi sō hatthī । tāva purō pahāvai ai vēgēṇaṁ nivaṁgaruhō ।। 2906॥
hatthī vi tayamaggēṇa dhāvaē jāva kēttiyaṁ dūraṁ । tāva valiūṇa kumarō dāhiṇabhāēṇa sigdhaṁ pi ॥ 2907॥
ginhai puṇō vi pucchē gāḍhaṁ āyāsiūṇa taha dharai । tarai jahā sō valiuṁ na vāmaō nēya dāhiṇaō || 2908।।
mōttūṇa taō pucchaṁ tāḍai pavikaḍhiṇamuṭṭhidhāēṇa । pacchimajaṁghā juyalē puṇō vi āruhai paṭṭīē ।। 2909 ॥
ēēṇa pagārēṇaṁ puṇō puṇō kaha vi taha kaō hatthī । kumarēṇa jahā saṁtō sō tassa vasaṁgaō śatti ।। 2910 ॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-91-to-91.json ==========================
sisimanisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
aha tammi āruhēuṁ kumarō niyanayara maggamaṇusarai । apphālatō niya karayalēṇa kuṁbhatthalaṁ tassa ।। 2911 ।।
jaṁ āsi kumarasēnaṁ pacchāhuttaṁ gayaṁ niyattēuṁ । vīsamiūṇaṁ taṁ jēmiūṇa purṇa saṁvahēūṇa ।। 2912
nōhariyaṁ nayarāō samāgayaṁ tēttiē paēsammi । jēttiya dūrammi payāī āsi diṭṭhāī turayassa ।। 2913 ।।
tattha khaṇaṁ ṭhāūṇaṁ annōnnaṁ maṁtiūṇa disibhāyaṁ । gahiūṇa taō caliōṁ uddēsēṇuttaradisāē ॥। 2914 ।।
vāmammi dāhiṇammiya turayārōhā nirūviyā siṁgghā । raryāṇi pi vahēūṇaṁ bīryādiṇē paḍhamapaharagmi ।। 2915 ।।
diṭṭhō sammuhamēṁtō ārūḍhō mattahatthibaṁdhammi । kumarō kubēradattō sē nēṇa pasannamuhakamalō ।। 2996 ।।
aha sēnnagayajaṇēṇaṁ parōpparaṁ pēkkhiūṇa vayaṇāī । vimhiyamaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ pēkkha ahō kē risaṁ cōjjaṁ ।। 2917।।
ēkkamaviṇīyaṁ turayaṁ nēūṇaṁ āṇiō karī mattō | kaha kumarēṇa vaṇāō tā nūṇaṁ ēsa punnanihī ।। 2918 ।।
sēntrēṇa paṇamiō tō kumarō jaṁpēi mā tumē niyaḍā । hōjjaha imassa vaṇakuṁjarassa dūraṭṭiyā vaha ।। 2919।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattā turayārōhāvi vāmabhāyāō । sēntrēṇa jē niuttā āsi kumāraṁ gavasē ।।2920 ।।
namiūṇa tēhiṁ kumarō vinnattō tāsāsamē amhē । asi gayā kuṇamāṇā gavēsaṇaṁ tumha tō tēhi ।। 2921।।
kahiyaṁ amhāṇa imaṁ jaha inhi amha tāvasakumārā । āsi gayā dōnni bahi samihāīṇaṁ gahaṇahēu ।। 2922 ।।
diṭṭhō tēhi kuṇatō kīlaṁ saha mattavaṇa- gaiṁdēṇa । ēkkō rāyakumārāgārō taruṇō narō kōvi ।। 2923।।
taṁ pēkkhaūṇa tatthā niyattiu jhatti tē taō ēttha । āgaṁtūṇa kahēuṁ amha gayā annadisibhāē || 2924 ।।
tō mhē taṁ tāvasavaṇaṁ suṇiūṇa takkahiyamaggē । laggā ihāgayā varakumāra tumhaccabhaṁtīē ।। 2925।।
jā tāva punnavasaō paccakkhacciya nirikkhiyā tumbhē । iya sōuṁ kumarēṇaṁ tē puṭṭhā tattha tumbhēhi ।। 2926।।
arata dōriyā asthi pēkkhiyā katthaī jai taō taṁ । pēcchēu lahu āṇaha tēhiṁ vi kahiyaṁ jahā diṭṭhā ।। 2927 ।
uḍyāṇa chāiyāṇaṁ uvari nārēṇa baṁdhaṇanimittaṁ । valayaṁtā vakkaladōriyāō bahutāvasakumārā ।। 2928 ।।
ciṭṭhati iō niyaḍā bhaṇiyā kumarēṇa tē taō gaṁtuṁ । āṇiti dōriyaṁ jāiūṇa lōhaṁ kuḍīsahiyaṁ ।। 2929 ॥
vatthāī phāliūṇaṁ vēḍhāvēūṇa tēhi taṁ kumarō । karikaṁṭhakalāvaṁ kāravēi lōhaṁkuḍīē u ।। 2930 ।।
kārēi aṁkusa pēsa ya purisē turaṁgamārūḍhē । maṁgalaurammi nayarē paṭṭajyakalāvamāṇēuṁ ।। 2931 ।।
dūraṭṭhiyantrēṇaṁ pariyariō savvaō vi nivakumarō । jā vaccai tā dāhiṇadisāē pattā gavēsaṁtā ।। 2932 ।।
kumaraṁ āsārōhā taṁ namiuṁ tē milati sēnnassa । aha kumarō, apahē katthai uciyamma dēsamma ।। 2933।।
āvāsaṁ ginhāvai niyantraṁ savvamappaṇāya puṇō । taṁ mattavaṇagaiṁdaṁ nēūṇa jalāsaē viṅalē ।। 2934।।
pāṇīyaṁ pāēuṁ kārēūṇaṁ jalāvagāhaṁ ca । naliṇīnālāhāraṁ gāhēu kēttiyaṁ vi taō ।।2935 ।।
vālai jāva gaiṁdaṁ nīhariumaṇō taō nivakumārō । tāva sarōvaramajjhāu uṭṭhiō jalakarī ēkkō ।। 2936 ॥
tēṇāgatūṇa ahōu pacchimabhāyammi thōrahatthēṇa । vaṇahatthī sō viniyattiūṇaṁ taṁ haṇai daṁtēhi ।। 2937 ।।
aha tassa vaṇagaiṁdassa daṁtaghāēṇa tāḍiō vāḍhaṁ । jalahatthī jhatti palāiūṇa salilē agāhammi ।।2938 ।।
gaṁtuṁ lukkō pacchā puṇō visō vaṇakarītayaṇumaggē । dhāvatō paḍisiddhō kumarēṇa kubēradattēṇa ।। 2939 ।।
nīhāriō vaṇakuṁjarakhaṁdhagaō saravarāu tō kumarō । niyasēnnāō dūrē sallai bhakkhammi taṁ nēuṁ ।। 2940।।
āgalai sayaṁ tattō taṁ ciya sō varai vaṇakarībhakkhaṁ । āvāsammi kumārō āgaṁtūṇaṁ kuṇai niddaṁ ।। 2941 ॥
tō nhāṇa - bhōyaṇāī kāuṁ gamiūṇa ghammasamayaṁ ca । tattō sēnnaṁ puraō payāṇayaṁ dāvaē kumarō ।। 2942 ||
āruhiūṇa sayaṁ puṇa khaṁdhē varṇasaṁdhurassa jā valai । maṁgalaurāu pattā tā takkhaṇamāsavārā vi ।। 2943 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-92-to-92.json ==========================
92
kubēradattacariya
paṭṭamaiyaṁ kalāvaṁ suvannamayadaṁḍa maṁkusaṁ gahiu । daṁsaṁti tattha kumarassa sō vi taṁ gāhiuṁ purisaṁ ||2944॥
ārōhāvara tuṁgē rukkhammi sayaṁ tu tattha gaṁtūṇa । dhārēi vaṇagayaṁ tassa hatthaō taṁ gaūṇa ।। 2945 ।।
pūrēi kalāvaṁ kuṁjarassa kaṁṭhammi ginhai karammi । aṁkusamaṇusamayaṁ ciya kōmalavayaṇēhiṁ taṁ hatthi ।। 2946 ॥
palhāyaṁtō vaccai phāsatō karayalēṇa kuṁbhammi । hatthī vi kumarasāmatthasaṁkiō pīigahiō ya ।। 2947॥
aviṇāsaṁtō vaccai maggammi vimukka savvamaṇa khaṇusō । saṁjhāsamaē pattō kumarō nayarassa bāhimmi ।। 2948 ।।
āvāsaṁ dāvēuṁ rayaṇīē vasai tattha hatthi tu । rukkhami aṁbilīē āgalai kaōvayātalē ।। 2949॥
kayapavaramaṁca sōhē nayarammi taō pabhāyasamayammi । pavisai kumarō vaṇavāraṇassa baṁdhē samārūḍhō ।। 2950।।
puraō pacchā dāhiṇauttaraō tassa vagagaiṁdassa । hatthasaē gēṇa jāi dūraṭṭiō lōō ।। 2951।।
pēkkhijjatō kumarō savimhayaṁ savvanayaralōēṇa । pattō niya pāsāē cirēṇa kīrata maṁgaliō ।। 2952 ॥
ūsārāvēūṇa ciraṁtaṇaṁ kaṁpi karivaraṁ tattō । tassa kuḍīē nēuṁ taṁ sayamā galai vaṇakariṇaṁ ।। 2953।।
aha pāhariyāijuyaṁ paṭṭagayārōhayassa appara taṁ । ārōhapaumatārē bhaṇai ya jaha vaṇagayaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 2954 ॥
salilaṁ taha bhōgaṁ gāhiūṇa gacchējja niyōgahaṁ tubbhē । tēhi tahā paḍivannē kumarō gaṁtūṇa niyagēhē ।। 2955 ।।
majjaṇa ya bhōyaṇāī kiccaṁ kāūṇa diṇataiya jāmē । ēḍa vaṇakarikuḍīē ārōhayapaumatārā vi ।। 2956 ।।
vaṇagaya vi sayaṁ kumarāēsaṁ kāūṇa niyaṁgihammi gayā । bhōttūṇa jāva sayaṇammi saṁṭhiyā tāva tēhi suyaṁ । । 2957।।
jaha kira kumarō pagaō vaṇagayasālāē tō imē jhatti । niyaniya bhavaṇēhitō saṁpattā takkhaṇē tattha ॥ 2958।।
karilakkhannuparisā gahēḍā vaṇijakāriṇō ya tahā । hakkāraēṇa kumarassa āgayā tattha sigdhaṁ pi ।। 2959 ।।
dhavalaharapaḍacchāyā nihittapallaṁ kasaṁ ṭhiō kumarō । puvvuttapurisavaggēṇa parigaō karīkuḍīsamuha ||2960 ॥
cidr̥i avalōyaṁtō taṁ vaṇahatthiṁ sayaṁ samāṇīyaṁ । karilakkhannupurisē āisai ō jahā tumbhē ।। 2961॥
uṭṭhēūṇaṁ ēyaṁ samaṁtaō vaṇagayaṁ palōēha । lakkhaṇamimassa pacchā suhāsuhaṁ majjha sāha ||2962 ।।
kumarā ēsāṇaṁtaramuṭṭhēuṁ tē vitaṁ palōēḍaṁ । kumarassa sannihāṇē uvavisiuṁ savinayaṁ bēṁti ।। 2963।।
di amhēhiṁ karī saṁgōvaṁgō vi savvaō ēsō । garimāē rūvēṇa yana khūṇamēyassa hathissa || 2664॥
nīsēsalakkhaṇajūō ēsa karī bhaṭṭajāisaṁbhūō । saṁṭhāṇamāṇakaliō nivāṇa ārōhaṇē uciō ||2965 ।।
dēi niya sāmiṇō sigdhamēva rajjaṁ mahāvibhūiṁ ca । saṁgāmē riūvijayaṁ kallāṇaparaṁparaṁ ca sayā ।। 2966 ।।
tō āha imē kumarō lakkhaṇa makkhēha bhaddajāissa । kariṇō vivaraṇa taō kumaraṁ tē vinnavaṁti imaṁ ।। 2967 ।।
tumbhē kumāranī sēsasatthaparamatthajāṇayā sammaṁ । sayalakalātattaviū sayaṁ pitō ki purō tumha ॥। 2968 ।।
kahi sakkā amhē puraō surasāmiṇō kimantrēṇa । kēṇa vi tīraṁti guṇā vannēuṁ dēvalōgassa ।। 2969 ।।
tō bēi puṇō kumarō annē ciṭṭhati amha pāsammi । jē uvaviṭṭhā tēsi purau sāhēha mā amha ।। 2970 ।।
iya bhaṇiyā kumarēṇaṁ kahaṁti tē tassa bhaddahatthi guṇē । vaṭunnaya- saṁhaya-kuṁbhamaṁḍalēṇaṁ maṇunna sirō ॥2971॥
duguṇī kaya hatthaggēṇa cuṁbamāṇō vasuṁdharā vīḍhaṁ । āyaṁba pukkharāgārapukkharō āyayaṁgulaō ।। 2972।।
mahupi sumanayaṇō karasaṁsattaṁ samunnayaggaṁ ca । caṁpagapīyacchāyaṁ kalayaṁtō daṁtamusalajuyaṁ ॥। 2973।।
saṁpunnabiṁdu kuṁbhō niddhacchāyābhirāmadēhō ya । migacāsacavalavitthinnakannapallavavirāyaṁtō ।। 2974 ।।
aṇubiṁdumāliyā kaliyacittamuhamaṁḍalēṇa kayasō hō । kannēsu tahā cibugē suhamuggaya rōmarēhaṁtō ।। 2975 ।।
udhurabaṁdhura kaṁṭhō sōhaṇavaṁsō ya pihula paṭṭī ya । paḍipunnakucchibhāō pāsēsu manōharāyā rō ।। 2976।।
