=== vardhamanaoutput-93-to-93.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
।
93
āyāma sēhasamanniō ya sūrō palaṁbariu pucchō । kummāyārēhiṁ chaṇidubibavahi pāhi ।। 2977 ||
supasatthēhi nahēhi gamaṇēṇa ya mahiyalaṁ bihū saṁtō । unnamiyapuvvakāō namapacchimavibhāō ya ।। 2978 ।।
saṁpunnagatta saṁdhī navapā usamē haga jjisamaghōsō 1 rattō- tālu-jīhō āyaṁbikannakaramajjha ।। 2979 ।।
ārambhapukkharāō uvasvarikamēṇa thūlayara hatthō । uvaciyakavōlabhāō vēgajuō saviṇaō dakkhō ।।2980 ।
parajūhabhaṁjaṇakhamō parakuṁjaraghāyajāyamayapavahō । kōvijjatō kuppai aṇuṇīō lahuvasī hōi ।। 2981 ।।
savvasuhalakkhaṇadharō mattaṁgapaṭṭhiō mahākāō । hōi kumārakaridō uppannō bhaddajāīē || 2982 ।।
tō āha paumatārō tē karilakkhaṇaviyāṇaē purisē । bhaddagayāyā mussyapariṇāhapamāṇa makkhēha || 2983 ||
aha tē kahaṁti jaha talasaṁdhidvāṇāu āsaṇaṁ jāva । sattēva hōṁti hatthāussēhō bhaddahatthissa ।। 2984 ।।
taha vāu tiriyaṁ parimāṇaṁ hōṁti jāva navahatthā । āyāma pariṇāhē nēyā majjhammi dasahatthā ।। 2985 ।।
ēkkēṇa taō karilakkhaṇaṇṇu purisāṇa majjhaō bhaṇiyaṁ । ajjavi imasya kariṇō amhēhi na tāluyaṁ diṭṭha । 2986 ।
tallakkhaṇavisēsēṇa lakkhaṇijjaṁtu lakkhaṇaṇṇūhi । kumarō pabhaṇai pēkkhaha uṭṭhēuṁ taṁpi lahu tubhē ।। 2987 ।।
sō pabhaṇē kumāraṁ hatthipagaṁ bhaṇaha kaṁ pijaṇēsō । biyaḍāvaikarivayaṇaṁ tēṇa taō kāriyammi hā ।। 2988 |
uṭṭhēu tē kariṇō tālutalaṁ pēkkhiūṇa sāhēti । kumarassa purō jaha tālulakkhaṇaṁ duṭumēssa ।। 2989 ।।
kumarō pucchara kiha tē bēṁti jahā kasiṇakaṁ dilaṁ kāmaṁ । taṁ tārisaṁ tu puvvutta bahuguṇaggāmanāsayaraṁ ।। 2990 ।।
tō saṁbhaṁtō kumarō uṭṭhēuṁ taṁ sayaṁ palōēuṁ । uvaviṭṭhō pallaṁkē hiṭṭhō jaṁpai ō ēvaṁ ।। 2991 ।।
karilakkhaṇaṇupurisāṇa sammuhaṁ jaha imaṁ aipasatthaṁ । kasiṇaṁ pi tālukariṇō imassa jaṁ dāhiṇāvattaṁ ।। 2992 ।।
jai hōi dāhiṇāvatta- vajjiyaṁ kēvalaṁ pi taṁ kasiṇaṁ । tō jaha kahiyaṁ tumhēhi dūsaṇaṁ taṁ tahā havai ।। 2993॥
ahavā imasa kariṇō jai tahavaī tāludāhiṇāvattaṁ । taha vi kasiṇaṁ pi ēyaṁ nayaṇaguṇēhiṁ na dōsayaraṁ ।। 2994 । ।
jamhā satthē bhaṇiyaṁ kammi vi aṁgammi hatthiṇō jāyaṁ । avalakkhaṇa miyaraṁgassa kassaī lakkhaṇaguṇē ṇaṁ ।। 2995 ।।
nāsijjaiti kariṇō ēyassa u nayaṇalakkhaṇaṁ asthi । mahupiṁganiddhadippaṁtalōyaṇō jaṁ imō tamhā ।। 2996।।
kasi pi tālu ēyassa dūsaṇaṁ attaṇō na ya jaṇēi । tō bēṁti daṁtilakkhaviū jahāṁ kumara ! amhēhi ।। 2997।।
ēttō cciya vinnattaṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya jaha na tumha sakkamō ki pi kahēuṁ amhē sayalakalā pārapattā ||2998 ।।
tō bhai puṇō kumarō giricarayāī havaṁti karibhēā । tē vi iha jāṇiyavvā bhāṁti tō paumalā rāī ।। 2999 ।।
tumhē cciya tē sāhai tō kumarō kahai giricarā ēgē । annē hōṁti naicarā ubhayacarā hatthiṇō avarē । 3000।
tattha naicarāu varō giricaraō giricarāō ubhayacarō । pavarō imō puṇa karī ubhayacarō ubhayaguṇabhāvā ।
jaṁ giricarō gurummi vithalē lahuṁ caḍai saṁkai jalāō। cuyajalabhaō naicarō thalammi āruhi nō sigghaṁ ।।3002।।
ubhayacarō girijalalaṁghaṇē vi kusalō jōsa vaṇahatthī । jamhā vaṇas majjhē paṭṭhīē majjha dhāvaṁtō ।। 3003 ।।
ārūḍhō thalasī sē maē samaṁ kīliūṇa tō suiraṁ । khinnō majjha varānaō imammi tō haṁ samārūḍhō ||3004 ।।
maṁgalaurasta maggē āgacchaṁtēṇa tō maē ēsō । jalapāṇakaē nīō sarōvarē jhattiō innō ।। 3005 ।।
uṁḍammi jalē vihiō jalāvaga hō a saṁkiṇimiṇā । ubhayapurṇa daṁsaṇāō tō tajjai ēsa ubhayacarō ।। 3006 ।।
annē vi guṇācaurō nirikkhivvā buhēhi hatthīṇaṁ । iya kumaraṇaṁ bhaṇiē itharē pucchaṁti taṁ sabvē ।। 3007 ।।
jōḍiyakarā savinayaṁ sasaṁbhamaṁ jaha kumāra tē vi guṇē । caurō vi kahasu amhaṁ garuyapasāyaṁ karēūṇa || 3008।।
kumarō kubēradattō kahas taō rūvagarimavalasattē । ēē guṇāgayāṇaṁ caurō vi jahuttaraṁ pavarā 113009।।
।

kubēradattacariyaṁ
rūvaṁ garimāya imaṁ ciṭṭhai ubhayaṁ pivanniyaṁ pubvaṁ । bala-satta-sarūvaṁ saṁpayaṁ tu sāhijjaē kamasō ॥। 3010 ॥
tattha balassa parikkhā najjai vihiṇā imēṇa hatthīṇaṁ । kaṇayassa va rūppassa va taṁbassa va palasahassāī ।। 3011 ।।
aṭṭhārasa-paṭṭhīē ārūḍhāī vahēi jō hatthī । līlāē cciya dasajōyaṇāī sō uttamabalaḍḍhō ।। 3012 ।।
cōṭsa sahassa bhāraṁ gahiuṁ jō jāijōyaṇē satta । maggammi ēsa hatthī majjhimabalasaṁjuō nēō ।। 3013 ।।
jō dasa sahasabhāraṁ gahiūṇaṁ jāijōyaṇē paṁca | maggammi ēsa hatthī jahannabalasaṁjuō nēō || 30 14 ।।
ahavā khāirakhabhaṁ sōsayakhaṁbhaṁ va nivvaṇaṁ saralaṁ । bārasarayaṇipamāṇaṁ satihāē dōnni hatthē u ।। 3015 ।।
pariṇāhēṇaṁ kaliyaṁ caurō hatthē mahīyalanihittaṁ । jō bhidai ukkhaṇiuṁ pāḍai vā sō balappavarō || 3016।।
taṁ ci sahityaṁ bhūmigayaṁ uvariduguṇadīhattaṁ । dō hatthadōnniaṁgulapariṇaddhaṁ jō karīkhaṁbhaṁ ||3017।।
bhidai ukkhaṇiūṇaṁ khivai va sigdhaṁ pi majjhimabalō sō। taṁ pihityanihittaṁ bhūmī uvari duguṇaṁ tu । 3018 ।।
paḍhamuttapamāṇāō thūlaṁ advēṇa jō tahā kuṇai । sō kuṁjarō buhēhiṁ jahannabalasaṁjuō nēō || 3019।।
inhi kahēmi sattaṁ taṁ hiyayaadīṇayā sarūvaṁ tu । ēyaṁ parikkhiyavvaṁ kariṇō imiṇā vihāṇēṇa ॥। 3020।।
uvalēhiṁ iṭṭayāhi va viṇimmiyaṁ phalayalōhaghaṇabaddhaṁ । kārēūṇaṁ thaḍayaṁ daḍhaṁ ti hatthūsiyaṁ laṭṭha ।। 3021॥
vitthārēṇa cha hr̥tthaṁ cōhamahatyāyayaṁ vihiparihaṁ । saravāyadugaṁ sōhiyabhūmiyalaṁ savva pāsēsu || 3022 ।।
tassa thaḍayassa ubhaō pāsēsu nivēsiūṇa karijuyalaṁ । kāriyavarasiṁgāraṁ samatthaārōhayasaṇāhaṁ ॥। 3023 ||
ḍhōijjai annōnaṁ jujjha kaē tattha daṁtakhayadēhō । vēyaṇamasarisamuppajjamāṇamavaganniūṇaṁ pi ॥। 3024।।
karadaṁtanivāēhi thaḍayaṁ jō bhaṁjiuṁ samīhaṁtō । paḍikuṁjaraṁ nihaṁtuṁ sarai purō nō avakkamai ।। 3025 ।।
ghāsu paḍatēsu vi paḍighāyaṁ cēva kuṇai puṇa ruttaṁ । galagajjiravāūriyadiyaṁtabhāō payattēṇa ॥। 3026।।
mahathā viṇiyattijjai taō paēsāō kuṁjarō kira jō । ēsō uttamasattō nēō karilakkhaṇannūhi ||3027 ।।
cauraṁgabalasamūhaṁ duddharavarakarighaḍā mahābhīmaṁ । sammuhamuvasappataṁ javēṇa kayakalayalārāvaṁ । 3028 ।।
daṭṭhūṇa abhimūhō dhāviūṇa vēgēṇa rōsarattacchō । paḍikuṁjara kayadiṭṭhī jō bhidaṭṭa sō vi gurusatō ॥। 3029 ।।
sadda samuhaṁ sattaṁ saṁtāsavajjiō jō u । hatthī gayaṁ ca kayagaṁ bhidai tassuttamaṁ sattaṁ ॥ 3030||
pajalaṁ jalagajālā jālasamuṭṭhata sahaattatthō । viyarai varṇāmma jō sō vi uttamō hōi sattēṇa ।। 3031 ।।
parisaṁkatō ārōharaṇa jō nijjaē puṇa haḍhēṇa । saṁkuyamāṇō dīṇō jāyaṁtō maṁdamaṁdayarō ||3032 ||
avalōyai parasāī cikkārarakhaṁ puṇō puṇō kuṇai । dōṇēhiṁ lōyaṇēhiṁ pāsai paḍikuṁjarābhimuhaṁ | | 3033 ।।
hathajōharahasamūhaṁ paḍivajjai pāvagaṁ va pajalaṁtaṁ । ēsō ahamō hatthī na hōi saṁgāmajōgō ti ॥ 3034।।
ēsō puṇa vaṇahatthī uttamabalavēgasattasaṁjuttō । aivēgadhāviyassa vi majjha vaṇē ēsa karī ||3035।।
paṭṭhīē āgaṁtuṁ lahumiliō tēṇa najjaē vēgō । jaṁ puṇa imassa samuhō hōūṇa ahaṁ khaṇē tammi ||3036।।
gaṇē upaiūṇaṁ paḍiō ēsa paṭṭibhāyammi । tattō vi uppaēḍaṁ bhūmī ēgaō silāuvari ||3037।।
maha payabhārakakaṁtā aṇēga khaṁḍāī sā silā jāyā । payaghāyamagaṇiuṁ mē puṇa valiuṁ dhāviō ēsō || 3038 ।।
hatya vēgēṇaṁ ciya paṭṭhīē majjha tēṇa najjaṁti । balasattāī dōnni vi tattha balaṁ najjaē ēvaṁ || 3039॥
jaṁ dūranahalāō nirvāḍayadaḍhapāyaghāyapīḍāē । bhūmīē na nivannō thēvaṁ namijaṁ tahēva ṭhiō
sattaṁ ēyasta puṇō najjai ēvaṁ pathābhighāēṇa । biharī kaō vi jamimō pahāviō majjha paṭṭhīē
annayarapayārēhiṁ va balasattāī imassa najjaṁti । jaṁ pucchē dhariūṇaṁ pacchā huttō bhaē ēsō

sirimunisubvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
95
āō pattēṇa taha vi caliō na ēsa ṭhāṇāō । ēēṇa dēhasāmatthamuttamaṁ najjai imassa ।। 3043 ।।
taha pāṇighāyadhāvaṇaviṇiyattaṇacakkabhamaṇapabhiīhi । ārōhaṇāvarōhaṇamā īhiṁ maē samaṁ nīō | | 3044 ।।
tō maikhadhārūḍhē maggē maṁgalaurassa jā ēi । saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ khinnattaṇēṇa tā diṭṭhamēēṇa || 3045।।
sammuhamā gacchaṁtaṁ mama sēnnaṁ takkhaṇē vi tō ēsō । ukkannō saṁjāō taṁ hr̥ṇiumaṇō palōyaṁtō || 3046॥
kira dhāvisa sahasā tayabhimūhō tāva iṁgiēhiṁ maē । nāūṇa karayalapphālaṇēṇa taha kōmalagirāhiṁ ॥ 3047 ।।
siddhō payaīē ṭhiō taō saravarammi pakkhittō । viṇiyattaṁtō tattō jalakariṇā pacchimapaē sē || 3048 ||
pahaō karēṇa parivattiūṇa ēēṇa daṁtamusalēhi । viddhō sō jalahatthī naṭṭhō paraō paviṭṭhō ya ।। 3049॥
gaṁbhīrayarē salilē paṭṭhīē tassa ēsa vaccaṁtō । mahayā kicchrēṇa maē niyattiūṇaṁ bahiṁ nīō || 3050 ।।
ēēhi cēṭṭiēhi najjai ēyassa uttamaṁ sattaṁ । tā savvahā vi ēsō savvēhiṁ guṇēhiṁ paḍiputrō ।। 3051 ।।
ēvaṁ kahiūṇa ṭhiyaṁ pucchara ārōhaō nivakumāraṁ । jaī gijjhai mōllēṇaṁ imō karī kiṁ taō lahai ।। 3052।।
aha kumarō hēḍāuyapurisē pucchē kahaha karimōllaṁ । jaṁpati tē vi ēvaṁ amhē ēyassa hatthissa || 3053।।
mullaṁ nō jāṇāmō jēṇa na amhēhi ērisō hatthī । kīō diṭṭhō nisuō kayā vi katthai sammammi ।। 3054 ।।
ēvaṁ puṇa jāṇāmō niyabuddhīē jahērisō hatthī । kaṁcanakōḍīē vi hu labbhaṁtō muccaē nēya || 3055 ।।
annēhi ta bhaṇiyaṁ punnamamullaṁ jamatthi kumarassa । tēṇēsa samāṇī ō tō mullamissa kaha hōi ।। 3056।।
paraṁtārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kumara ! imō gaṁdhasiṁdhurō nūṇaṁ । annē kariṇō ēyassa hēṭṭhavāsē na jaṁti jaō || 3057।।
ēvaṁ kuvvatāṇa vi kumarappamuhāṇa tattha karivisaē । nāṇāvihamālāvaṁ saṁḍhiyagā jhatti saṁpattā ||3058 ।।
vissarāō sirivissakaṁtapuhaisarēṇa paṭṭaviyā । namiuṁ kumarakarē tē rāyāēsaṁ samappaṁti || 3059 ।।
muhavayaṇēṇa kahaṁti ya jaha tumbhē vissakaṁtanaranāhō । hakkārai sigghayaraṁ vissaurē niyasamīvammi ||3060।।
kumarēṇa vāiūṇaṁ rāyāēsaṁ sayaṁ samaggāṇa | puraō nivēiyamiṇaṁ pāsanividvāṇa niyayāṇa || 3061 ।।
dōvā riēhi kahiyaṁ jaṁ muhavayaṇēṇa ēttha vi tamēva । rāyāēsē lihiyaṁ samāgayaṁ amha āvaṇaṁ || 3062॥
ēya bhaṇiūṇaṁ kumarō niyapariyaṇamāisēi saṁvahiuṁ । ṭhāvēi lacchivaddhaṇanāmaṁ aha vaṇa iṁdassa ||3063।।
bīma dinē sō lacchivaddhaṇaṁ sidhuraṁ samāruhiuṁ । sigdhaṁ vaccai vissaurasammuhaṁ gurupayāṇēhiṁ ॥ 3064।।
kaivayadiṇēhiṁ pattō kubēradattō rammi vissaurē । paṇamai piuṇō payapaṁkayāiṁ paramāē pīīē || 3065 ||
piuṇā kubēradattō gāḍhaṁ āliṁgiūṇa iyaṁ bhaṇiō । vaccha ! tumaṁ maha jāō gihattha dhammōvathārakarō ।। 3066।।
jaha puṇvaṁ taha saṁpai hōsu sahāō subāhu dhammammi । niyabhuyakhaṁbhē ārōviūṇa sathalaṁ pi rajjabharaṁ ॥ 3067।।
aha sō kubēradattō rāyakumārō sirammi saṁghaḍijaṁ । karakamalajuyaṁ vinnavai ērisaṁ niyayajaṇayassa || 3068 ।।
dēva ! maha ēttiya cciya icchā jaha tumha pāyaparamāṇaṁ । āṇaṁ kuṇabhāṇō niccamēva ciṭṭhāmi niyaḍatthō । 3069 ॥
kiṁtu sivasōkkha sahāyacarittadhammami ujjamaṁtāṇaṁ । tumhāṇamaṁtarāyaṁ karēmi kaha saṁpayaṁ tattō ॥ 3070।।
kuha sakajjaṁ tumbhē tumhāsō pamāṇamamhāṇa । iya vittō rāyā kubaradattēṇa kumarēṇa ।। 3071।
hakkāriṇa gaṇaē harisavisappaṁta pulayakaliyaṁgō । rajjāhisēyadiyahaṁ kubēradattassa pucchē ||3072||
taiyammi diṇē diyahō pabhāyasamayammi tēhi parikahiō । rāyā pavaṇīkārai savvaṁ ahisēya sāmariṁga || 3073 ।।
paṇajōyaṇavavahāṇē ṭhiyāṇa sirivimalajahamuṇidāṇa hakkāraṇakajjēṇaṁ pēsai purisē payattēṇa || 3074।।
jāmma yadi kubēradattassa kāraē rāyā । paḍhamaṁ ciya rajjapaē mahāvibhūīē ahisēyaṁ ।। 3075 ||

=== vardhamanaoutput-96-to-96.json ==========================
96
kubēradattacariyaṁ
।। 3091 ।।
aha sō kubēradattō paṇaō sāmaṁtamaṁtipamuhēhiṁ । jāō mahānariṁdō jasabhariya samaggabhuvaṇayalō || 3076 ।।
kārai samaggajiṇamaṁdirēsu pūyāō dēi dāṇāī । mōyāvai guttīō sammāṇai māṇaṇijjajaṇaṁ ।। 3077 ।।
pēsiyapurisēhi taō āgaṁtuṁ vissakaṁtanaravaiṇō । kahiyaṁ sirivimalajasō sūrī ētthāgaō inhi ।। 3078 ॥
aha vistaratā tē purisā pēsiyā samīvammi । rannō kubēradattassa akkhiraṁ sūri āgamaṇaṁ ॥ 3079॥
tēṇa vi taṁ sōūṇaṁ takkālaṁ ciya samaggasāmaggī । piuṇō nikkhamaṇakaē kāraviyā savvasattīē || 3080 ॥
siviyāē āruhiuṁ nigacchai vissakaṁtanaranāhō । rannā kubēradattēṇaṇumaggagaēṇa bhūīē || 3081 ॥
gaṁtuṇaṁ ujjāṇē sirivimalajasassa sūriṇō pāsē । ginhai dikkhaṁ aḍḍhāijjasaēhi saha narāṇaṁ ।। 3082 ।।
tēsi majjhēmaṁtī subuddhināmō vi ginha dikkhaṁ । sūrī vi sāhūkiriyaṁ savvaṁ sikkhavai tē savvē | | | 3083 ।।
rāyā kubēradattō saha ahiṇavadikkhiēhiṁ sāhahi । namiūṇa saparivāraṁ sūri vaccai saṭhāṇammi ||3064 ||
ṭhāūṇa kaivaryādiṇē kubēradattēṇa puhaināhēṇa । vaṁdijjatō sūrī sapariyaṇō vaccai vihārē ||3085 ||
sāhū vi vistakaṁtō bārasaaṁgāī paḍhāi sayalāī । ṭhāvijjaḍa niyaguruṇā āyariyapayammi dāūṇa | 3086 ।।
saha dikkhiya sāhugaṇaṁ parivāraṁ sō taō niyagurussa । āṇāē viharaṁtō vissaurē ēi bahuvāraṁ ||3087 ।।
tatthaya kubēradattāvarṇa parapamuhatayaralōyāṇaṁ । niyadēsaṇāē jiṇavaradhammammi samujjamaṁ jaṇai || 3088 ।।
rāyā vi paṭṭabaṁdha kārāvai lacchivaddha karissa । maṁgalaurammi purisē saṁpēsai buddhidhaṇapāsē ॥ 3089 ।।
tassāhavaka aha sutthaṁ kāūṇa sayala sammi । āgacchai buddhidhaṇō kubēradattassa pāsammi ||3090 ।।
taṁ ṭhāvas maṁtipaē kubēradattō narēsarō niyaē । hakkārayāī pēsai savvēsi sēvayanivāṇa
tē visamāgaṁṇaṁ hari kari-rahamāiēhi maṁgaliyaṁ । kuvvaṁti tassa ranō kubēradattassa bhattī ।। 3092 ।।
khasa parabala sīhāṇa vihu naravaiṇō dō vi niyayadēsāō । āgaṁtuṁ maṁgaliyaṁ kuṇati ahiṇavanaridassa ।। 3093 ॥
khasaparabala sīhāṇavi vijaē tassā - si pōrisaṁ payaḍaṁ । jaṁ puṇa ēkkagēṇa vi āṇīō vaṇakarī mattō ।। 3094 ।।
taṁ sōūṇaṁ sabbē annē vihu saṁkiyā mahīvaiṇō । pēsaṁti pāhuḍāī pasāyaṇatthaṁ sayā tassa ।। 3095 ।।
rūyavaīō vaha kanyāō pēsaṁti bhūsiyaṁgīō । jāyāī tassa ēvaṁ tinnisayāī kalattāṇaṁ ।। 3096 ।।
tēhi samaṁ visayasuhaṁ aṇuhavamāṇō surō vva suralōē । puvvajjiyasuhakammō gamēi kālaṁ kayāṇaṁdō ||3097 ।।
gāmē vā nagarē vā jattha na jiṇamaṁdiraṁ purā asthi | ṭhāṇēsu tēsu savvēsu kāraē cēharāī
rahajatāu pavattai visiṭṭaaṭṭhāhiyāu kārēi । pūēi sāhuvaggaṁ sammāṇai sāvayajaṇaṁ ca
iya viṣphuriyapayāvaspa tassa rajjaṁ pasāhamāṇassa । samaikkatāī taō aṇēgalakkhāī pugvāṇaṁ
aṁtē pahāṇādēvī aha mayaṇasuṁdarī tassa । annasamayamma pēcchaṛa amaraṁ sumiṇēsu vēsadharaṁ
taṁ pāsi pabuddhā kaha pabhāyammi sā naridassa । sō sumiṇapāḍhayāṇaṁ tē vi hu paribhāviūṇaphalaṁ ।। 3102 ।।
tassa pahaṁti puttaṁ bhavissamavaṇīsaraṁ gurupayāvaṁ । rāyā vi pūiūṇaṁ hidumaṇō tē visajjēi ||3103 ||
gaṁtūṇa taō sāhai sumiṇaphalaṁ mayaṇasuṁdarī ēsō । sōūṇa sā vi hiyaē parituṭṭā vahai taṁ gabbhaṁ ||3104 ।।
paḍipunnavāsarēhi pasavai puttaṁ sulakkhaṇaṁ ēsā । rāyāṇaṁ vaddhāvara āgaṁtūṇaṁ piyaṁvaiyā ||3105 ।।
rāyā va dēi tīsē aibahuyaṁ pāriōsiyaṁ dāṇaṁ । vaddhāvaṇayaṁ kārai taō samaggammi dēsammi
bārasamaṇēi nāmaṁ ṭhāvai puttassa amaradatta tti । paṁcahi dhāīhiṁ juō suhēṇa sō vaḍḍhaē tattha
parivaḍhatō kamasō kalāṇa savvāṇa pāragō hōi । jōvvaṇabharaṁ pavannō kannāō mahānaridāṇaṁ

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
97
pariṇāvijjairannā vivihavilāsē ya kuṇai tāhiṁ samaṁ । taṁ rajjabhara samatthaṁ nāūṇa kubēradattaniva ।। 3109 ।।
cii jai iha samaē bhayavaṁ sirivissakaṁtamuṇināhō । vissaurē dēi paē tō haṁ sāhēbhi niyamaṭṭaṁ ।। 3110 ।।
annamma dinē ujjaṇapālapurisēṇa sō samāgaṁtuṁ । vaddhāviō kahēu piuṇō sūrissa āgamaṇaṁ ॥ 3111 ।।
tavvayaṇasavaṇasamakālamēvasittō vva amayavuṭṭhīē । jāō kubēradattō rāyā tavvaṁdanimittaṁ ॥ 3112 ॥
saṁvahiuṁ jāi taō ujjāṇē vaṁdaē muṇidassa । pāyāravidajuyalaṁ puhaīla miliyapaṁcagō ||3113 ॥
sōūṇa tassa dēsaṇamamayarasāsārasarisasuhajaṇayaṁ । saṁviggamaṇō mauliyakarakamalō vinnavai sūriṁ ॥ 3114 ।।
ha ha bhēhi ahaṁ puhaī rajjē nivēsiō puvvaṁ । saṁjamarajjammi tahā ṭhavēha maṁ saṁpayaṁ jhatti ।। 3115 ।।
tuha pakamalēhiṁ samaṁ virahō ētti ya diṇē maē sahiō । pasiūṇa sapāyāsanna sēvayaṁ kuṇaha maṁ inhi ।। 3116 ॥
aha bhai nivaṁ sūrī saṁpa tuha saṁgayaṁ vayaggahaṇaṁ । rajjabharuvvahaṇakhamē jāē pattē amaradattē ॥ 3117|
niyasa sanihiyahatthō mahāpasāō tti jaṁpiḍaṁ rāyā । sūri namiūṇa taō gaṁtūṇaṁ niyayapāsāē ॥3118 ॥
mahayā vicchaḍēṇaṁ rajjē ahisiṁcaē amaradattaṁ । aha taṁ aṇajāṇāvara dikkhāgrahaṇammi appāṇaṁ ।। 3119 ।।
tō amaradattarāyā kubēradattassa kāraē rannō । nikkhamaṇa mahāmahimaṁ nimmāvara uttamaṁ siviyaṁ ।।3120।।
kārēi jiṇaharēsuṁ pūyāō pavaravatthakusumēhiṁ । paḍilā bhai muṇivaggaṁ āhārāīhiṁ suddhēhiṁ ॥3121।।
sammāṇai sāhammiyajaṇaṁ samaggaṁ pi paramapīīē । dīṇāṇāhāīṇaṁ jahicchiyaṁ dāvaē dāṇaṁ ।। 3122 ।।
piuṇō nikkhamaṇamahāhisēyamuṭṭhavai rayaṇakalasēhiṁ । aha taṁ kārēūṇaṁ sigāraṁ maṇaharāgāraṁ ॥313।।
ārōhai siviyāē uvaridharijjaṁ dhavalachattēṇaṁ । camarēhi ḍhalatēhi mayaṁkakarajālavimalēhi ।। 3124 ।।
puraō pēcchaṇaēṇaṁ jaṇamaṇaharaṇēṇa kīramāṇēṇa । savaṇasuhr̥dāyagēṇaṁ gijjaṁtēṇaṁ ca gēēṇa ।। 3125 ।।
vēthāliyakakōlāhalēṇa vajjaṁtatūranivahēṇa । hayagaya rahajōhē hi caudisi vihiyavēḍhēṇa ॥ 3126।।
siviyā pacchimabhāē gacchaṁtēṇaṁ ca amaradattēṇa । bhūvēṇa lacchivadvaṇagaiṁdakhaṁdhāhirūḍhēṇa ।। 3127॥
purisāṇa sahassēṇaṁ ukkhittaṁ siviyamahasamārūḍhō । rāyā kubēradattō vaccai aiguru vibhūīē || 3128 ।।
nayara hi ujjāṇē tīsē avarōhiūṇa siviyāē । piyāhiṇī karē vaṁdai muṇipuṁgavaṁ tattō ।। 3129।।
ēgadisāē hōuṁ mōttūṇaṁ savvamēvalaṁkāraṁ । paṁcaha muṭṭhīhi taō lōyaṁ kāūṇa sayamēva ॥। 3130 ।।
āgaṁtuṁ vistarasa sūriṇō caraṇakamalapāsammi । vinnavai jahā bhayavaṁ ! dikkhaṁ mē dēha sayamēva ।। 3131।।
paṁcanamōkkārasamuccāraṇapuvvaṁ gurū vi sāmaiyaṁ । ārōvai tassa sayaṁ jaīṇa kiriyaṁ ca sikkhavai ।। 3132 ।।
aha sō kubērattō jāō paramasaṁjaō ēvaṁ । annē vi tēṇa saddhi paṁcasayā buddhidhaṇapahā ॥। 3133।।
pavvajjaṁ paḍivannā tattō sirivissakaṁtamuṇināhō । pavvajjā māhappaṁ vannai nī sē saduhadalaṇaṁ ।। 3134।।
taha tīsē dulahattaṁ taṁ sōuṁ amaradattanivapamuhā । jai dhammammi asattā dhammaṁ pucchaṁti gihijōggaṁ ।। 3135।।
sūrī vi kahas tēsi agāridhammaṁ savittharaṁ tē vi gihidhammaṁ paḍivannā nimmalasammatta saṁjuttaṁ ||3136 ॥
aha baṁdiūṇa sūri sapariyaṇaṁ amaradattanaranāhō । niyamaṁdirammi vaccai samagganiya sēnnapariyariyariō ।। 3137।।
vaṁditō nivaamaradattapamuhēṇa nayaralōēṇa । sūri vi kaivayadiṇē ṭhāūṇaṁ tammi nayarammi || 3138 ।।
maṁgalaurammi vaccai nijjāmai tattha vimalajasasūri । sō vi kayauttamaṭṭhō pajjaṁtē jāi nēvvāṇaṁ ।। 3139।।
sāhū kubēradattō viharatō niyagurūhi sahabhuvaṇē । aṁgāī samaggāī vi karēi kaṁṭhōṭṭamukkāī || 3140।।
aha sō kubērasāhū samaggasuyasāgarassa pāragaō । sūripaē ṭhaviūṇaṁ saha dikkhiya sāhupaṁcasaē | | 3141 ॥

parivārē dāūṇaṁ aṇunāō mahiyalammi viharē | paigāmaṁ painagaraṁ paḍibōhaṁtō bhaviyalōyaṁ ||3142 ।।
sirivissakaṁtasūrī puvvāṇamaṇēga saya sahassāiṁ । pariyāyaṁ pālēuṁ sijjhai dhuyasavvakammaṁsō || 3143 ॥
sūrī kubēradattō suiraṁ mahimaṁḍalammi viharēuṁ । paḍivōhaṁ kāūṇaṁ bahuyāṇaṁ bhaviyasattāṇaṁ ।। 3144 ॥
taha sāhu sāhaṇīṇaṁ dikkhēūṇaṁ anēgasahasāī । pavvajjāpariyāyaṁ pālēūṇaṁ cirakālaṁ ||3145 ॥
ṭhaviūṇaṁ niyaṭhāṇē rāyarisi kaṁ pi sayalaguṇajuttaṁ । pajjētē saṁlihiuṁ māsaṁ kāuṁ aṇasaṇaṁ ca ।। 3146 ।।
mariuṁ samāhittō saṇakumārammi dēvalōgammi । ukkōsaṭhiī jāō suriṁdasāmāṇiō dēvō ।। 3147 ।।
sō tattha punnasamudayasamajjiuṁ suravimāṇavara riddhi । aṇuhavamāṇō kālaṁ gamēi suhasāyaranimaggō ।। 3148 ।।
|| iya sirimuṇisuvtrayajiṇidacariē sirisiricaṁdasūriviraiē taiyaṁ cautthaṁ ca bhavaggahaṇaṁ samattaṁ ॥
paṁcamō vajjakuṁḍalakumārabhavō ।
taiō tahā utthō sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyammi । kahiō maē bhavō paṁcamaṁ tu inhi pavakkhāmi ।। 3149 ॥
ēyammi jaṁbudī vē avaravidēhammi bhadasālassa | pacchimaō puvvēṇaṁ vakkhāragirissa dēvassa ।। 3150।।
sīōyā uttaraō dāhiṇaō nīlavaṁta sēlassa | gaṁdhāvai tti nāmēṇa asthi vijayaṁ jayapasiddhaṁ ।।3151||
sōgaṁdhitti nāmaṁ vijaē ēyammi vijjaē dēsō । mēiṇivalayapasiddhō dhaṇēṇa dhantrēṇa ya samiddhō ॥। 3152 ।।
bahusurahikayadēhō abalāṇaṁ piuyarayaṇadhaṇa kaliō । varavisayagāmarammō sōhai jō taruṇapurisō vva ।। 3153 ।।
tatthasthi suvitthinnaṁ nāmēṇaṁ gaṁdhamāyaṇaṁ nagaraṁ । īsarapāsāyaparaṁparāhiṁ sōhaṁtadala nivahaṁ ।। 3154 ।।
aṁbarayalacuṁbiradēva maṁdirēhiṁ samūsiyadhaēhiṁ । ulla sirasārakēsarasirīē saṁgābhirarmāṇijjaṁ ।। 3155 ।।
kuṁkuma-kappūrāgurucaṁdaṇa- katthūriyā saricchēhiṁ । kayavikkayasaṁ kāmijjamā ṇabahusurahidavvēhi ।। 3156 ।।
ucchaliya bahalaparimalamaṇavarayaraṇaṁtavēṇuvīṇā hi guṁjata mahura mahuyarajhaṁkāravirāvamaṇaharaṇaṁ ।। 3157 ।।
uttuṁgadhavalapāyārasiharavijjāharīṇa paṁtīhi । vilasatabāhiradalaṁ lacchīlīlā nivāsaṁ ca ।। 3158 ।।
puhuīvisālasaravaravihasaṇaṁ jaḍapasaṁgaparimukkaṁ । jaṁ sōhai hasiya sahasvattāsamavibhamaṁ bhuvaṇē ।। 3159 ।।
॥ chahiṁ gāhāhiṁ kulayaṁ ॥
niyakaravālajalēṇaṁ pasamaṁ saṁpāviō jhatti ॥ 3160 ॥
jēṇa payākō paḍivakkhapakkhapuhaīsarāṇa samarē |
paṇamaṁta aṇēya nariṁdaruṁda māṇikkamauḍakiraṇēhi । jassa payāsijjai pōrisassa pasarō syāvasarē ।। 3161 ।।
sō vajjanāhicakkī taṁ pālai palayanīyapaḍivakkhō । tassaṁtēurapavarā bhajjāsi suhāvaī nāma ।। 3162 ।।
nāmāṇurūvacariyādaṁsaṇacaṁkamaṇavayaṇamāīhiṁ । savvēsi pi jaṇāṇaṁ maṇāī jaṁ sā suhāvēī ।। 3163 ||
niya bhattuṇā samāṇaṁ visayasuhaṁ tīē aṇuhavaṁtīē । anna - samayammi sumiṇē saryāṇijja- gayāē rayaṇīē ।। 3164 ।।
didvipahaṁ paḍivannō puraṁdarō caṁdadhavalavaravatthō । nāṇārayaṇa vihasaṇavi sē sabhāsuriyasavvaṁgō ।। 3165।।
vāmē ēkkammi karē kalayaṁtō vajjamujjalajuillaṁ । bīēṇa samappatō karēṇa maṇikuṁḍalaṁsakarē ।। 3166॥

ravimaṁḍala - samatēyaṁ virayaṁtaṁ aṁdhayāraviddhaṁsaṁ । japatō ginha imaṁ hōhī ēkkaṁ pi tuha ēyaṁ ।। 3167 ।।
aisaya sōhā hēuṁ ēyassa pahāvaō asēsaṁ pi । sēyaṁ saṁpajjissai annaṁ pi na saṁsaō ēttha ।। 3168 ।।
tammi nihatthapattē paḍibuddhā sā kahēi gaṁtūṇa । pāsammi bhattaṇō vajjanāhiṇō cakkavaṭṭissa ॥3169॥
sāhē sō vi tuha dēvinaṁdaṇō kō vi suṁdarī hōhī । jō vaḍhatō kamasō maṁ ca tumaṁ nivvayaṁ kāhī ||3170।।
jamhā kallāṇaparaṁparāē accaṁta kāraṇaṁ ēsō । dēvi sumiṇō maṇunnō tumaē nijjhāiō ajja ।। 3171 ।
ēvaṁ ciya hōu imaṁ dēvagurūṇaṁ pasāyaō dēva । iya pabhaṇaṁtī dēvī baṁdhai vatthaṁcalē rāṭhi ।। 3172 ।।
sumiṇaṁ pasaṁsiūṇaṁ puṇō puṇō vajjanāhiṇā rannā । dēvī visajjiyā vāsamaṁdiraṁ niyayamaṇupattā ।। 3173 ।।
citaṁtī puṇaruttaṁ sumiṇatthaṁ cakkavaṭṭiṇā kahiyaṁ । dēvī suhāvaī niya maṇammi garuyaṁ vahai harisaṁ ।। 3174 ।।
aha sō kubēradattō dēvō caviu saṇakumārāu । kappāō uṣpannō tīsē dēvīē gabbhammi ।।3175।।
aha sā suhēṇa ganbhaṁ vahamāṇī punnaḍōhalādēvī । paḍipunnēsu diṇēsuṁ pasavai puttaṁ kamalanēttaṁ ।। 3176 ।।
jāē va vajjanāhī rāyā vaddhāviō samāgaṁtuṁ । kalahaṁsī nāmāē dāsīē puttajammēṇa
pōūsavarisasarisaṁ savaṇēsu suhaṁ samappayaṁtīē । nīsēsamma vi dēhē uppāiyabahalapulayā
āsattamakuladāliddadaṁ tinihalaṇapaccalaṁ tīsē । viyarai dāṇaṁ paṁcāṇaṇaṁ va sanivō taō jhatti
kārai vaddhāvaṇayaṁ garuyavibhaīē sayalanayarammi । dahadiyahāī naridō bārasamē vāsarē pattē
puttassa vajjakuṁḍalanāmaṁ subhiṇāṇusāraō kuṇai । aha sō suhēṇa vaḍḍhai paṁcahi dhāīhiṁ pariyariō
tō aṭṭamammi vāsē pāsammi samappiō kalāguruṇō । bāvataraṁ pi ginhai kalāō lēhāipayāō lahaṁ ।। 3182 ।।
aha sō jōvvaṇapattō aṇēyarāīsarāṇa taṇaēhi । sēvijjatō ujjāṇakāṇaṇāīsu paribhamai || 3183 ।।
jaṇaṇīē jaṇassa ya iyarajaṇāṇaṁ ca nayaṇapahapattō । amayarasēṇa va tēsi sicaṁtō savvagattāī ।। 3184 ।।
jaṇayāṇaṁ samaṇōvāsayāṇa saṁgēṇa tassa saṁjāyā । jiṇadhammē paḍivattī puvvabhavanbhāsaō ya tahā ||3185।।
pūēi jiṇapaḍimaṁ gharammi cēiyaharammi taha gaṁtuṁ । vaṁdēi jai jaṇaṁ suṇai dēsaṇaṁ paramasaddhāē ।।3186 ।।
kāmarai pahāṇaṁ rūpavaīṇaṁ naridakannāṇaṁ । paṁcasaē pariṇāvara taṁ jaṇaō vajjanāhiniyō । 3187 ।।
tassa kaē pāsāyaṁ kārai sirivajjanāhicakkabaī | paṁcahi pāsāyasaēhi saṁjayaṁ tuṁgaramaṇijjaṁ ।। 3188 ।।
tatya ṭhiō sō kumarō tāhi samaṁ appaṇō paṇaiṇīhi । bhuṁjai viulē bhōē puvvajjiyasukyasaṁjaṇiē । । 3189 ।।
aha vajjanāhicakkī ṭhavēi taṁ vajjakuṁḍalakumāraṁ । juvarāyattē samayaṁtarammi dāūṇa bahudēsaṁ ||3190॥
maisāgarō timaṁtī ciṭṭhai sirivajjanā hicakkissa । maṁtissa tassa taṇaō nāmēṇaṁ mainihāṇō tti ॥ 3191॥
sō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ niyamaṁḍalacitagō samāiṭṭhō । iṭṭhavayaṁsō vissaṁbhaṭhāṇamābālakālāō ॥3192।।
annasamma siricakkavahitaṇayassa sabhavaṇagayassa । pattōdārammi nariṁdanaṁdaṇō vīrasēṇō tti । 3193 ||
āpucchiūṇa kumaraṁ paḍihārēṇaṁ pavēsiō majjhē । ēsō dūrāō cciya paṇaō pāē kumarassa ।। 3194।।
paṭṭhīē dinnahattha kumarēṇaṁ diṭṭidaṁsiyammi taō । sō āsaṇē nisannō puṭṭhō ya paōyaṇaṁ kahai ॥। 3195 ।।
kumarapayasēvaṇaṁ ci kumarō paḍihāramāisai tattō । kārēyavvō sēvaṁ majjha taē ēsa nicca pi ॥ 3196॥
kumarēṇa puṇō puṭṭhō dēsāu kuō samāgaō taṁ si । tō bhaṇai vīrasēṇō ēgaṁtō vinnavēyavvaṁ ।।3197 ।।
aha cakkavaṭṭipā sē saṁvahiuṁ vajjakuṁḍalō kumarō । sēvākajjammi gaō puṇō niyattō muhuttaṁtē ||3198 ।।
rāyasūyavīra sēṇō rāyaulē vajjakuṁḍalēṇa samaṁ । pagaō samāgaō taha kumarēṇa visajjiō aha sō ।। 3199॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-100-to-100.json ==========================
100
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
namiūṇa niyāvāsē caliō kumarassa vayaṇaō tattō । paḍihārēṇa sapurisaṁ pēsēḍaṁ pucchiō ēvaṁ ॥3200 ।।
ēhiṁ upaēhi ya saha tumhaṁ kēttiō ya parivārō । vaḍḍupurisēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ māhavarāēṇa tō tassa || 3201 ।।
tīsaṁ āsā vīsaṁ karahā gōṇā tahēva pannāsaṁ । sāuhapurisāṇa saē dō kammayarāṇa sayamēgaṁ ।। 3202 ||
paḍihārapēsiēṇa purisēṇaṁ ērisaṁ taō bhaṇiyaṁ । savvassa imassa kaē gēnhaha kaṇacōppaḍaṁ tubhē ॥3203 ||
kōṭṭhāgārē gaṁtuṁ jugavaṁ ciya ēkkamēkkamāsassa । uciyaṁ mahākhalē taha ginhaha khaḍakaḍavamāīyaṁ ।। 3204 ||
māhavarāēṇa taō palōiyaṁ vīrasēṇa muhasammuhaṁ । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ pasāō samaē sayamēva maggissaṁ । ।। 3205।।
iya vīrasēṇa vayaṇaṁ tēṇāgaṁtūṇa pēsiya narēṇa । paḍihārassa nivēiyamēsō vi kahē kumarassa || 3206।।
āyanniūṇa kumarō taṁ vayaṇaṁ niyamaṇammi dhārēuṁ । tunhikkō hōūṇaṁ sakammaniraō havai pacchā ।। 3207 ।।
rāyasuyavīra sēṇassa vajjakuṁḍalakumā rapayasēvaṁ । iya kuṇamāṇassa pabhūyavāsarā tattha aikaṁtā ॥। 3208 ।।
annamma dinē sō vīrasēṇanāmō naridaaṁgaruhō । gaṁtūṇa niyattō vajjakuṁḍala kumāra sēvāē || 3209।।
niviṭṭhō ciṭṭhai tassāsō tōyapāyaṇanimittaṁ । pallāṇiēṇa nīō ajja vi nō ēi tattha khaṇē ।। 3210 ।।
bahuāsavārasahiō nōhariō vajjakuṁḍalakumārō | haṭṭassa samīvēṇaṁ vaccatō pēkkhiō tēṇa ।। 3211 ।।
kumarassa vitammi gayā diṭṭhī tō jhatti uṭṭiō ēsō । payacārēṇa vi caliō purō ṭhiō kumaradiṭṭhīē । 3212 ।
aha taṁ jā paḍisēhara kumarō tā pāiūṇa pāṇīyaṁ । pallāṇiēṇa turaō āṇēuṁ appiō tassa ।। 3213 ।।
vaggā gahiō pathacāriēṇa dhāvaṁtaēṇa tammi taō । vēēṇa vīrasēṇō ārūḍhō dhāvamāṇō vi ।। 3214 । ।
diṭṭhō ya āruhaṁtō kumarēṇaṁ vajjakuṁḍalēṇāsō । cittammi camakkārō saṁjāō tassa tō jhatti ॥। 3215।।
pallāṇissa hatthē pamhusiyā cammalaṭṭhiyā āsi । jā tēṇa sā pakkhittā tayabhimhī mahilē paḍiyā || 3216 ।।
vērpahāviyaturayaṁ adharaṁ tēṇēva tēṇa sā gahiyā । namiūṇa mahilāō palōiyaṁ taṁ pi kumarēṇa ।। 3217 ।
tō savisēsaṁ jāō tassa maṇē vimhaō kumārassa । gaṁtūṇa taō puraō ujjāṇatarūṇa chāyāē ।। 3218 ।।
vīsaṁtō khaṇamēgaṁ āsagaō vajjakuṁḍalakumārō । āisai sēllahatthē āsārōhē taō ēvaṁ || 3219॥
ēkkkēṇa tubhē sēllāī khivaha rukkhasamuhāī । kassa va kēttiyadūrē sēllaṁ vaccai va khuppai vā ।। 3220 ।।
jēṇēvaṁ jāṇijjai tō tēhi kayaṁ tahēva savvēhi । thēvaṁtariyāī āraō ya paraō rukkhēsu ।। 3221 ।।
khuttāī sēllāī duti- cau-paṁcagulappamāṇāiṁ । tō vīrasēṇavayaṇaṁ nirikkhiyaṁ cakkitaṇaēṇa || 3222।।
uttariūṇaṁ turayāu tēṇa tō khittamukkhivēūṇaṁ । sēllaṁ duguṇaṁ bhūmi gayamanasi samīvāō ।। 3223 ।।
ciciṇitarussa baṁdhaṁ bhēttr̥ṇaṁ niggayaṁ samaggaṁ pi । sēllassa phalaṁ daṁḍō purṇa khaṁdhabbhaṁtarammi ṭhiō ।। 3224 ।।
taṁ daṭṭaṇa kumārō visēsavimhaiyamāṇasō jāō । pucchai ya vīrasēṇaṁ kamhā tumaē turaṁgāō || 3225 ।।
uttariūṇaṁ khittaṁ sēllaṁ ki hayaṭhiēṇa na pamukkaṁ । tō bhaṇai vīrasēṇō maha thāmaṁ na sahaē turaō ।।3226 ॥
sēllaṁ vimuyaṁtassa ya āyāsō hōi pāyaka ēsu । tēṇakkatō paṭṭīē ghōḍaō hiramunigara3 ।। 3227।।
ahavā mahīē niass kumāra ! ēēṇa kāraṇēṇa ta । uttariuṁ turayāō khittaṁ sēllaṁ maē ēyaṁ ।। 3238 ।।
tō uttariu kumarēṇa appiō tassa appaṇō turaō । bhaṇiyaṁ ca tuha balamimō sahai na vā iya parikkhēha । 3229।।
aha tattha vīrasēṇō āruhiuṁ thōra cūyasāhāē । tiriyaṁ gayāē dōhiṁ vi itthēhi aidaḍhaṁ vidiu ।। 3230॥
urūhi bhīḍiūṇaṁ turayaṁ uppāḍiūṇa puhaitalaṁ । aṭṭha gulāī chaḍḍāviūṇa daṁsai kumarassa || 3231।।
tō nirabalaṁ varaya paricalaṁta pāō khaṇēṇa saṁjāō। turaō taralacchijuō niyajīyaṁ caiukāmō vva ।। 3232।।

101
।। 3248 ।।
।। 3249 ।।
kumarēṇa vīrasēṇō aha bhaṇiō muṁcamuṁca lahu turayaṁ । uggahāu ēyaṁ vivajjihī annahā ēsō || 3233 ।।
tō kumaravayaṇasamaṇaṁtaraṁ pi siḍhilīkaō turaṁgō sō । sigghapi vīrasēṇēṇa satthadēhō ō jāō ।। 3234।।
tō jāva vihiyamaṇō sō ciṭṭhai vajjakuṁḍalakumārō । tāva dhaṇubāṇahatthā kēi vi tatthā gayā jōhā ।। 3235।।
dēsaṁtarāu dūrāō rāyasēvāvihāṇa kajjēṇa । kumarēṇa pēkkhiūṇaṁ tē ālattā pattē || 3236||
tō bhai vīrasēṇō samakālamimē muyaṁtu bāṇagaṇaṁ । bhāmaṁtō kuṁtamahaṁtaṁ savvaṁ ṭālaissāmi || 3237।।
tō kumārāsēṇaṁ jōhā muṁcati vīrasēṇammi । saraniyaraṁ taṁ ṭālai tahēva sōtō niyamammi ।। 3238 ||
tavvikkamēṇa tūsai taṇaō cakkissa aha niyāvāsē । gaṁtūṇa sō asēsaṁ sēvayalōyaṁ visajjēi ।। 3239 ।।
sēvāē vīrasēṇō bīyammi diṇē samāgaō saṁtō । ēgaṁtē hōū ṇaṁ puṭṭhē kumarēṇa sō ēvaṁ ।। 3240।।
jaha bhadda ! taē puvvaṁ iya bhaṇiyaṁ āsi niyayavr̥ttaṁttaṁ । ētē tumha purō kyāvi savvaṁ kahissāmi || 3241।।
tō taṁ kahē hi saṁpai bhaṇiō kumarēṇa ērisaṁ aha sō । sai māhavarāyaṁ kahāvaē tassa pāsāō ।। 3242 ।।
sō kahai ēttha dēsō atthi susēṇōti tattha puhaivaī । nāmēṇa siṁdhuvīrō tassa suā vīrasēṇōtti ।। 3243॥
juvarāyapayaṁ pālai aha jāō tassa cullamāūē । paumasirīē pattō nāmēṇaṁ siṁdhusēṇōti ।। 3244 ||
tami kalā gahaṇakha mē saṁjāē siṁdhusēṇanaranāhaṁ । bhaṇiuṁ paumasirīē juvarāyattē niō puttō || 3245।।
saṁṭhāviō imō puṇa tīē phēḍāviō sadēsamma । annaṁ pi gāmamāī dijjaṁtaṁ vāriyatassa || 3246।।
ēvaṁ pi ēsapiyaraṁ sēvai niccaṁ pi paramabhattīē । taha viya sō sē vijjai savvēṇa virāyalāēṇa || 3247।।
taṁ daṭhṭhē paumasirī gayā paōsaṁ bhaṇēi puhaivaī । savvassaṁ hariūṇaṁ jēṭṭhasuyaṁ aṁgamēttēṇaṁ
nīhārēhi sadēsāu tassa rannā taō samaggaṁ pi । vihavaṁ avahariūṇaṁ niyapurisō ēvamāi
jaha majjhāē sēṇaṁ gaṁtūna vīrasēṇavarakumaraṁ । bhagaha tumaṁ jēṇēsō ēkkaṁgēṇēva mamadē
nīsēsaṁ caiūṇaṁ kattha vi annattha vaccaē dēsē । sō purisō bhaṇai taō dēva ! na sakkēmi iya vōttuṁ
kumarassa sammuhamahaṁ tā annaṁ kaṁ pi āisaha ēttha । rannā annō bhaṇiō tēṇa vi taha cēva paḍisiddhaṁ ।। 3252।।
ēvaṁ caurō paṁcaya bhaṇiyā annē vi tēhi vi nisiddhaṁ । daṭhṭhē taō vilakkhaṁ rāyāṇaṁ jaṁpaē annō ।। 3253।।
lihiūṇa sahatthēṇaṁ bhujjē atthaṁ imaṁ samappēha । tubbhē majjha samīvē tō haṁ kumarassa appēmi ।। 3254।।
taha caiva taō rannā lihiūṇa galaṁtalōyaṇajalēṇa । puttassa siṇēhēṇaṁ tharaharamāṇēṇa hatthēṇa ।। 3255 ।।
tasya samīvāō taṁ bhujjaṁ appāviyaṁ kumārassa । ētthaṁtarammi tō vajjakuṁḍalō jaṁpaē ēvaṁ ।। 3256 ।।
jara siṁdhuvīrannō ēttiyamēttō vi vīrasēṇammi । atthi siṇēhō tō kiṁ iya ēyaṁ sō pavāsēi ।।3257।।
māhavarāēṇa taō vinnattō vajjakuṁḍala kumārō । paumasirīpariṇīyā pahuṇā amhaṁ jayā paḍhamaṁ ।। 3258 ।।
patthēūṇa pathattēṇa gāḍhaaṇurāyagahiya hiyaēṇa । paumasirīē vihiō vayaṇanibaṁdhō tathā ēsō || 3259।।
vinnattīō caurō jai majjha karēhi samaya bhaṇiyāō । tō pariṇāma ahaṁ appāṇaṁ tuha samīvāō ।। 3260।।
pavinnasmi naridēṇa tammi aṭṭamma patthiyaṁ tattō । pattaṁ paumasirīē sahatthalihiyaṁ naridāō ।। 3261।।
tēṇa vi taṁ lihiṇaṁ tivvaṇurattēṇa appiyaṁ tīsē । tattha niyadhammahatyō tavvayaṇēṇaṁ puṇō lihiō ।। 3262।।
bhujjammi vi lihiṇaṁ ēṭṭhō tēṇa vīrasēṇassa । paṭṭhaviō jaha jāṇai imō sapiuṇō paravasattaṁ ।। 3263।।
ēēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ ēyammi nibō nibaddhanēhō vi । ēyassa savvamēvaṁ karēi bhajjōvarōhēṇa ।। 3264 ।।
āyannikaṇa ēyaṁ dhuṇai siraṁ vajjakuṁḍalakumārō । jaṁpaiya ahō ! itthī vasaṁgayā garuyapurasā vi ।। 3265 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-102-to-102.json ==========================
102
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
taṁ natthi jaṁ akajjaṁ na kuṇaṁti vimukkasavvajaṇa lajjā । aha bhaṇai vīrasēṇō ēsō dōsō na tāyassa || 3266 ।।
ahaṁ ciya kammāṇaṁ vivarīyattaṁ samāmēvēyaṁ । ahavā aṇukūlattaṁ jaṁ diṭṭha tumha payajuyalaṁ ॥। 3267।।
aat maharāō puṇō vi vinnavai cakkiṇō taṇayaṁ । tāsi vinnattīṇaṁ caunha majjhāō ēkkāē || 3268।।
vinnattīē rajjaṁ patthai puttassa paumasiridēvī । bīyāē vīrasēṇassa kāraē vittivicchēyaṁ ॥ 3269 ॥
taiyāē savvassaṁ lhūsāvai tassa taha cautthīē । dēsāu vīrasēṇaṁ nivvāsai ēkka aṁgaṇa || 3270 ||
aha ēsa vīrasēṇō bhujjaṁ piipēsiyaṁ niēūṇa । vāyā saṁkaḍapaḍiyaṁ nāūṇa taō niyaṁ jaṇayaṁ ।। 3271 ।।
pabhaṇai bhujjasamappagapurisassa purō piussa vayaṇēṇa । jīyaṁpi caēmi ahaṁ dēsacvāssa kā vattā || 3272 ॥
niya pariyaṇaṁ pi jaṁpai bhattō jō kō vi sēvaō majjha । kēṇā vi tēṇa na maē vaccaṁtēṇaṁ samaṁ inhi ।। 3273 ||
ētō āgaṁtavvaṁ jāva na dēsaṁ cayāmi tāyassa । amha kalattēhi pi hu kāyavvō ēsa āēsī ।। 3274 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ caliō khaggasahāō niyāu gēhāō । laṁghēūṇaṁ piuṇō dēsaṁ kamasō gaō puraō ।। 3275 ।।
jē pāṇīyaṁ pāuṁ bahiṁ gayā āsi kēttiyā vihayā । tē purisē pēsēḍaṁ savvē vi maē kayā guttā || 3276॥
parivārō visamaggō mēlēūṇaṁ maē imaṁ bhaṇiō । sirisiṁdhuvīrarannō dēsāō annasamma || 3277।।
pattassa vīrasēṇassa rāyauttassa sannihāṇammi । gaṁtūṇaṁ miliyavvaṁ sabvēṇa vi tēṇa jassatthi ।। 3278 ||
kavi bhattī tumhaṁ majhē kumarammi vīrasēṇammi । paḍivannaṁ tēṇa taō parivāraṇaṁ taha kayaṁ ca ।। 3279।।
dīṇārāṇa sahassaṁ sōlasa turaē ahaṁ pi ghēttūṇa । miliō āgaṁtūṇaṁ ihāvayaṁtassa ēyassa ।। 3280 ।।
annē āsā karahā gōṇā ya pahammi anna lōēṇa | pāhūnnayammi dinnā gēhāgayavīrasēṇassa || 3281 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalē bhaṇiō kaha ētiō vi parivārō । dīṇāra sahassēṇaṁ ēttiya diyahāī nivvahaḥ || 3282||
māhavarāō sāhai jō dēsō āsi vīrasēṇassa । dinnō jaṇaēṇa tahiṁ kusumapuraṁ asthivaranayaraṁ ॥3283॥
tattha nivasē sēṭṭhī piyamittō nāma sāvagō ibbhō । jiṇabhavaṇaka bhūmī dinā sē vīrasēṇēṇa || 3284।।
niṣphannē jiṇabhavaṇē āyāṇaṁ kāriyaṁ aipabhūyaṁ । annēsu vi kajjēsuṁ pēkkhijjai gōravēṇēsō || 3285।।
jāō siṁdhusēṇō sāmī nayarassa tassa jammi diṇē । tappabhiī sō piyamitta sēṭṭhi kā riyajiṇaharassa || 3286||
kuṇai uvaddavamasaī maccharaō vīrasēṇakumarassa । piyamittasēṭṭiṇā tō vavahārō tattha saṁvariō || 327||
jiṇaharapasibaṁdhēṇaṁ sō ciṭṭhai kēvalēṇa aṁgēṇa । pāraddhō vavahārō vittharaō vaṇiyauttēhiṁ ॥3288 ।।
tēṇa iha gaṁdhamāyaṇapurē taō vīrasēṇamihanāuṁ । āgayamēsō lēhēṇa bhāgaē niyayavaṇiuttē ॥3289 ॥
sōluttaramēkkasyaṁ dīṇārāṇaṁ didiṇē dējjā । kumarassa vīrasēṇassa ciṭṭhaē jā imō tattha ।। 3290॥
tō dēti vāṇiuttā tē amhaṁ puvvabhaṇiyadīṇārē । paidiyahaṁ ciya jāyai tēṇa taō bhōyaṇāīyaṁ ॥ 3291।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ amhaṁ pi pāsaō tumbhē । ēvaiē dīṇārē ginhaha paivāsaraṁ cēva ।। 3292 ।।
māhavarāēṇa taō vinnattaṁ vajjakuṁḍalassēvaṁ । tumha pasāēṇa na amha vaṭṭaē ki pi iha khūṇaṁ
tumhēhiṁ pasannēhiṁ garuyaphalaṁ ēttha kiṁ pi īmō । tō āha cakkitaṇaō tumha ahaṁ taṁ pi pūrissaṁ 3294 ।।
ja tumhēṁ parihāsa kahēha tō saṁpayaṁ pitaṁ majjha । māhavarāō jaṁpai kahēbhi inhi pitaṁ tumha || 3295||
jappabhii vīrasēṇō viṇiggaō siṁdhuvīrapāsāō । tappabhii tassa jāyā araī garuī niyamammi ।। 3296 ।।
taha vi jāṇaṁ lajjāē avasaraṁ sō karēi niccapi । rajjapi citaē abahumānayaṁ sidhuvīranivō ॥3297 ।।
tēṇaṁ ciya khēēṇaṁ dēhē tassuṭṭiō guruvāhī । vējjāṇaṁ paḍiyārā savvē pihu vihalayā hōti ।। 3298 ।।
|

।। 3293 ||
॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-103-to-103.json ==========================

103
jē amha pēsiya narā pacchannā paumakhēḍanayarāō । iha ēṁti tē kahaṁti ya jai kai vi diṇē nivō jiyai ।। 3299 ।।
tassa viruvaṁ mā hōu kiṁ pi amhāṇa jīviēṇā vi । sō siṁdhuvīranivaī jīvaukālaṁ aipabhūyaṁ ||3300 ||
kiṁtu jara divvavasaō jāyai saggami tassa patthāṇaṁ । rajjammi siṁdhusēṇō hōi taō tammi samayamma। । 3301 ।।
amhuvari gurupasāyaṁ kāūṇaṁ vajjanāhinivanāhaṁ । vinnaviḍaṁ amhaṁ khaggavattalādāvivvatti ||3302||
dēsassuvari susēṇassa kāumēyaṁ pi jujjai na amha । jamhā tumha pasāēṇa hōi annaha vi nivvā hō ||3303 ||
sō ēkka jaṇa jāō lahubhāyā hōi vīrasēṇassa । tō niyaputtō vva imō parihavaṇijjō na ēyassa ||3304||
annō vi kō vi jai tassa siṁdhu sēṇassa parihavaṁ kāuṁ । icchai sō vi imēṇaṁ nivāriyavvō samatthē ||3305।।
kiṁtu piyamittanāmō piyamittaṁ vīrasēṇakumarassa । suyaṇō parōvayārī bahurāyaṇāīsarō sēṭṭhī ||3306 ||
nikkāraṇaṁ pisō dēhavivadhammāṇa pāvaē pīḍaṁ । niccaṁ pi sidhusēṇāu vīrasēṇappaōsēṇa ||3307।।
ēttiyamittaṁ piduhaṁ vi sahaṁtō tattha ciṭṭhaē ēsō । jiṇaharabhaṁgassa nivāraṇatthamatthapayāṇēṇa ।। 3308 ||
jō kō vi siṁdhusēṇassa pāsavattī nisēvaō lōō । taṁ piyamittō uvayarai savvayā atthadāṇēṇa ॥3309॥
piyamittassēva na kēvalassa kajjēṇa kīraē ēvaṁ । tassa viya siṁdhusēṇassa saṁtiyaṁ kāraṇamihatthi ।। 3310 ।।
jaṁ sō niddōsavisilōyapīḍaṁ ca dhammadhaṁsaṁ ca । kubvaṁtō rakkhijjai annaha buḍḍui mahāpāvē ||3311॥
ēēsi dōnhaṁ ciya kajjaṁ ēyaṁ na kēvalaṁ cēva । nivalōyassa hiyamiṇaṁ savvassa susēṇadēsassa ||3312।।
jamhā naridalōō āsi samaggō vi vīrasēṇassa । aisaya bhattō tammi vi karissaē sō bahupaō ।। 3313 ।।
kōhēṇa ya lōhēṇa ya avivēēṇa ya samaggadēsassa । uppāissara jaha taha uvaddavaṁ nīyajaṇasaṁgrī ।। 3314 ||
ēhi kāraṇēhiṁ imammi aṭṭhē kumāra tuha pāyā । amhēhi vinnavijjati saṁpayaṁ aiyattēṇa ।। 3315।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalō sō māhavarāyassa vayaṇavinnāsaṁ । sōūṇa vimhiyamaṇō paḍivajjai savvamēvēyaṁ ॥3316॥
dāvēūṇaṁ tēsi taṁbōlaṁ dō vi tē visajjēi । sirivajjakuṁḍalō aha sakiccakaraṇujjaō hōi ।। 3317।।
siliyāvasarē gaṁtuṁ rāyaulē cakkavaṭṭiṇō puraō । sāhēi vīrasēṇaṁ samāgayaṁ appaṇī pāsē ।। 3318 ।।
tassa sarūvaṁ pi samaggamēva parikahai cakkavaṭṭissa । sēsaṁ mōttūṇaṁ khaggavattalāpatthaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ ॥। 3319।।
sōūṇa cakkavaṭṭī paumasirī siṁdhuvīracariyāī । citai nārīsu narāṇa pēmmamaidāruṇavivāgaṁ ।। 3320।।
aha vajjanāhiṇā cakkavaṭṭiṇā vajjakuṁḍalō bhaṇiō । jaha tumaē daṭṭhavvō sagōravaṁ vīrasēṇō sō ।। 3321 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ matthayaviṇihittahatyajuyalēṇa । paḍivaṇṇaṁ taṁ vayaṇaṁ niya piuṇō cakkavaṭṭissa ||3322।।
aha cakkaṭṭā sō visajjiō vajjakuṁḍalō kumarō । niyamaṁdirammi gaṁtuṁ sakicca sāhaṇaparōhōi ।। 3323।।
aha tas vīrasēṇassa vajjakuṁḍalakumā rapayasēvaṁ । kuṇamāṇassa gayāī annāīvi kaivaya diṇāī ।। 3324॥
annamma diṇē purisō samāgaō paumakhēḍanayarāō । kahiyaṁ tēṇa sarūvaṁ ēgaṁtē vīrasēṇassa ।। 3325।।
jaha siṁdhuvīrarannā nāūṇaṁ niyasarīramaiviharaṁ । rajjammi siṁdhusēṇō nivēsiō savva paccakkhaṁ ।। 3326॥
sikkhaviō jaha savvaṁ paripālējjā naēṇa niyadēsaṁ । tō taddiyaha nisāē divaṁ gaō siṁdhuvīranivō ॥। 3327।।
bārasamaṁ ajjadiṇaṁ rajjaniviṭṭhassa siṁdhusēṇassa । māhavarāyassa taō taṁ kahiyaṁ vīrasēṇēṇa ।। 3328 ||
tō dō viuṭṭiūṇa āiccē aṇuiē vigaṁtūṇa | pāsammi vajjakuṁḍalakumarassa kahaṁti taṁ savvaṁ ॥3329॥
tō jāva vajjakuṁḍalakumarō saṁvaha cakkavaṭṭissa । pāsammi gaṁtu kāmō tāva khaṇadvēṇa āgaṁtuṁ ।। 3330 ।।
kannamma kipi kahiyē purisēṇēkkēṇa vīrasēṇassa । tēṇā vi vajjakuṁḍalakumarassa nivēiyaṁ kannē ।। 3331 ।।

104
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
hakkārēu purisō āvāsāō samāgaō majjha । gaṁtūṇa tattha tō haṁ puṇō vi hai āgamissāmi ||3332 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ samannāō niyammi āvāsē । jā jāi vīrasēṇō tā diṭṭhō sāgarō nāma ।। 3333 ||
piyamittavaṇiyaputtō tēṇa tahi āsaṇē samāsīṇō । tō tēṇa vīrasēṇō paṇaō lahu āsaṇaṁ mōtuṁ ।। 3334॥
ētē uvi vinnattō tō imaṁ jahā inhi । kusumaurāō piyamittapēsiō āgaō purisō ||3335।।
lēhaṁ gahiūṇa imaṁ tō hatthāō imassa taṁ gahiraṁ । vāēi vīrasēṇō jāva taō tatthimaṁ lihiyaṁ ॥ 3336॥
rajjammi sidhusēṇaṁ nivēsiuṁ siṁdhuvīranaranāhē । saggaṁ gaō ō mē kahāviyaṁ āsarāēṇa ||3339।।
jaha puvvaṁ amhahiṁ jīvaṁtē siṁdhuvīra nāhē । daṁsēumissa bhayaṁ nivāriō siṁdhusēṇanivō ||3338 ।।
tuha jiṇamaṁdirabhaṁgaṁ kāritō ēttiyāī diyahāī । saṁpai niraṁkusō ēsa rakkhiuṁ tīraē nēya ।। 3339॥
tō amha bharavasēṇaṁ na ciṭṭhiyavvaṁtaē maṇāgaṁ pi । jō kō vi tujjha annō phurai uvāō sa kāyavvō ।। 3340।।
tō siṁdhusēṇarāyā jiṇaharabhaṁgaṁ karissaē jaimē । tō kaya paccakkhāṇō bhakkhēvi visaṁ marissāmi ||3341 ॥
mai jāyammi parōkkhē majjha suō vīra sēṇakumarassa । vaṇiuttēhi sāgarapamuhēhi bhalāvivvati ।। 3342 ।।
ēvaṁ piyamittaṇaṁ sāgarapamuhāṇa vaṇiyaputtāṇa । saṁpadr̥viyaṁ lēhaṁ avahārēūṇa kathakhēō ||3343||
tō vīrasēṇakumarō sāgarasamuhaṁ payaṁpaē ēvaṁ । taha kaha vi karissamahaṁ jiṇaharabhaṁgō jaha na hōi ।। 3344 ।।
pēsēuṁ niyalēhaṁ jāṇāvēyavvamērisaṁ tumaē । piyamittassa jahā sō na kiṁ pi adhiī maṇē kuṇai ||3345।।
iyasikkhaṁ dāūṇaṁ visajjiūṇaṁ ca sāgaraṁ sagihē । māhavarāēṇa sammataṁ lēhaṁ attaṇō hatthē ||3346॥
gahiūṇa puṇō sigdhaṁ samāgaō vajjakuṁḍalasamīvē । daṁsēi tassa lēhaṁ sō vi niēūṇa taṁ tattō ।। 3347 ।।
vaccai naridabhavaṇē sahiō kumarēṇa vīrasēṇēṇa । tammi samayammi cakkī ajja vi nō dēi atthāṇaṁ ।। 3348।।
paḍihārāō jāṇāviūṇa sirivajjanāhicakkissa । gaṁtūṇa sannihāṇē ēgō vinnavai ēgaṁtē ।। 3349।।
savvaṁpi sarūvaṁ sidhusēṇarāyassa saṁtiyaṁ sammaṁ । piyamitta sēṭṭhipēsiyalēhaṁ ca payaṁsaē tassa || 3350 ।।
aha khaggavattalādāvaṇammi vinnavai vīrasēṇakaē । cakkī vi takkhaṇē khaggavattalaṁ tō lihāvēi ||3351 ।।
hakkārāvējaṁ vīrasēṇamappēi taṁ sayaṁtassa । sammāṇēūṇa visajjaē ēyaṁ taō ēsō ||3352 ||
namiūṇa cakkavaṭṭi viṇaēṇa savajjakuṁḍalakumāraṁ । niya āvāsē gaṁtuṁ sigdhaṁ saṁvahiumārō ||3353 ।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalō bihu visajjiē avasarammi cakkissa । niyamaṁdirammi pattō nāuṁ tō vīrasēṇēṇa ।। 3354 ||
āgaṁtuṁ vinnattō gamaṇatthaṁ maṁḍalēsu sēṇammi । ētē nēūṇaṁ puṭṭhō sō cakkitaṇaēṇa ||3355।।
tuha pāsa thēvacciya sāmaggī jēttiyaṁ tumaṁ bhaṇasi । tēttiya sannaṁ saha paṭṭavēmi tumaē ahaṁ inhi ।। 3356 ।।
hasiūṇa vīrasēṇēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ kiṁ karissaē annaṁ । sēnnaṁ mē ēēṇa vi sēntrēṇa ahaṁ gahissāmi ||3357 ।।
rajjaṁ tassa samīvāu dubviṇīyassa sidhusēṇassa । kiṁ ca jai tassa sasurō māulaō vā samāgaṁtuṁ ।। 3358 ।।
na kassii sāhējjaṁ jamhā tē nivaiṇō mahābaliṇō । tēsu samāgacchaṁtēsu tumha vattaṁ kahā vissaṁ ॥। 3359।।
innitta sō vajjakuṁḍalō vīrasēṇakumarēṇa । dāraṁ vatthāharaṇāī tassa tō taṁ visajjēi ।। 3360।।
aha vīrasēṇakumarō namiūṇaṁ vajjakuṁḍalakumāraṁ । vaccai sakajjasāhaṇasamujjaō lahu payāṇēhi ||3361 ।।
aha cakkā hivataṇaō uvasamaō bahuta asuhakammāṇaṁ । vihavāi phalaṁ mannai jiṇapaḍimāī suviṇiōgaṁ ॥ 3362 ।
tō pūya paidiyahaṁ gimmi vārāō tinnijiṇapaḍimaṁ । aṭṭhahiṁ vi payārēhiṁ nāṇāviha bhaṁgiramaṇijjaṁ ॥ 3363।।
vaṁdai namasai tahā aviralarōmaṁcakaṁcuijjatō । ēvaṁ ciyaciibhavaṇē vaṁdai sāhū suṇai dhammaṁ ।। 3364 ।।

ēkkkē jiṇabhavaṇē vaccai niccaṁ pi kāraē avvaṁ । bahigāmēsu viniyaḍēsu jāi saḍhēhi vāhariō ।। 3365
jattā visēsasamaē gahiūṇaṁ cakkavaṭṭiṇī āṇaṁ । iya vajjakuṁḍalō sō viggajuttaṁ gamai kālaṁ ||3366।।
aha kaivayadiyahaṇaṁ pajjaṁtē vīrasēṇakumarēṇa । māhavarāō pāsammi pēsiō cakkitaṇayassa ।। 3367 ।।
taṁ paṇa maūṇa sō tēṇa pucchiō tassa kahai saṁkhitaṁ । jaṁ vīrasēṇakumarēṇa vēḍhiyaṁ paramakhēḍapuraṁ ||3368 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ kumarēṇa sasaṁbhramēṇa sō puṭṭhō । kēttiyantrēṇa puraṁ pavēḍhiyaṁ vīrasēṇēṇa ॥। 3369 ।।
aha sō māhavarāō kahēi saṁkhaṁ samaggasēnnassa । panarasahatthisayāī hayāṇa aḍḍhāiyā lakkhā ||3370।।
caurōpāikkāṇaṁ kōḍīō rahavarāṇa puṇa saṁkhā । kā vi maē vinnāyā na tārisī nicchayasamēyā ।। 3371 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ māhavarāō puṇō visō puṭṭhō। kaha tassa ēttiyabalaṁ jāyaṁ mē kahasu vittharaō ||3372 ॥
sō kahai vīrasēṇō ēttō ṭhāṇā pahammi vaccaṁtō । jēsi kēsi pi gaō majjhēṇaṁ ṭhakkurāṇaṁ ।। 3373 ।।
savvēhi tēhi dhariō pāhuṇaō turaya-karahamāīhiṁ । sammāṇiō ya ēvaṁ saṁjāyaṁ tassa turayāṇaṁ ||3374 ।।
sahasadugaṁ anbhahiyaṁ karahāṇa sayāī aṭu ahiyāī । caḍiēhiṁ pāyalēhiya pāikkāṇaṁ dasahassā ।। 3375 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēhi ēvaṁ jaṁ ki pi payaṇaṁ tuhamhēhi । taṁ savvaṁ kahiyavvaṁ amha taē nivviyappēṇa ||3376।।
ēsō puṇa nīsēsō tumha pasāyassa vilasiyavisēsō । sō cēva vīrasēṇō annaha ēēṇa maggēṇa ॥। 3377।।
āyāō puṇvaṁ pihu diṭṭhō kēṇa vi paraṁ na ālattō । jaṁ ajja vi tassa tathā āsi pasāō na tumha kaō । 3378 ।।
gaṁtaṇa taō gahiō āvāsō vīrasēṇaku marēṇa । ēttiya sēntrēṇa samaṁ susēṇa dēsalsa sīmāē ।। 3379 ।।
gahiūṇa khaggavattalamuvāgaō vīrasēṇavarakumarō । savvattha vi vitthariō ēsa pavāō purā cēva ||3380।।
tatthaṭṭhiēṇa tattō maṁḍaliyāīṇa pēsiyā imiṇā । savvēsi niya dūyāsikkhavaṇaṁ ērisaṁ dāraṁ ।। 3381 ।।
jaha siṁdhuvīraranō aṁgaruhō haṁ ca siṁdhusēṇō ya । pahuputtattaṁ dōnhaṁ pi amha samamēva tō tumha ||3382 ।।
paḍhamasuō ahigārī rajjassa ahaṁ imō maha visēsō । rajjapaṭṭhā vihiyā naravaiṇā siṁdhusēṇassa ||3383।।
tassa vi naravaiṇō jō sāmī sirivajjanāhicakkavaī । tēṇa viinnaṁ rajjaṁ majjha susēṇammi dēsammi | 3384 ।।
ēvaṁ vicitiūṇaṁ uciyaṁ jaṁ ki pi kuṇaha tubbhē । jai maṁ samīhaha taō āgaṁtūṇaṁ maha samīvē ॥। 3385।।
ginhaha āvāsa annahā u hōūṇa siṁdhusēṇassa । pakkhammi jujjha sajjā āgacchaha sammuhā majjha ।। 3386 ।।
gaṁtūṇaṁ tēhi taō dūēhiṁ savvamaṁḍalavaīṇaṁ । sāmaṁtaḍaṁḍaṇāya gataṁ tāhi va sāhaṇavaīṇaṁ ।। 3387 ।।
taṁ vīrasēṇavaṇaṁ kahiyaṁ tēhi vi payaṁpiyaṁ ēvaṁ । jaṁ amha samīhā vīrasēṇakumarassa nannassa ||3388 ||
dūhi ta bhaṇiyaṁ jai ēvaṁ sambamēva tō tubbhē । saṁvahiraṁ āgacchaha kaḍaē sirivīrasēṇassa ।। 3389 ।।
maṁḍaliyāīhi ta bhaṇiyaṁ jaha saṁpayaṁ pinō amhē । āgaṁtuṁ tattha khamā kiṁtu niē sōyarē purisē ।। 3390 ।।
thēvēṇa vinnēṇaṁ samanniē tattha pēsaissāmō । samayaṁtarammi amha saṁyaṁpi tatthāgamissāma ।। 3391 ।।
dūhi ta bhaṇiyaṁ pēsaha inhi pi sōyarē purisē । tō kēṇa viṇiyaputtō kēṇa vi bhattijjaō taha ya । 3392।
atrēṇa viniya bhāyā ēvaṁ kēṇāvi kōvi paṭṭaviō । niyasattī aṇuruvaṁ davvaṁ pihu pēsiyaṁ tēhi ||3393 ।।
dōṇārā lakkhō taha piyamittassa vāṇiuttēṇaṁ । vārēhi dōhiṁ tīhi vipaṭṭaviō vīrasēṇassa ।। 3394।।
ēgaṁ lakkhaṁ saṁpai ahaṁ gahēūṇa tassa pāsāō । vaccissāmi samīvammi vīrasēṇassa kumarassa ||33995।।
annēsi pi bahūṇaṁ susēṇadēsē nivāsivaṇiyāṇaṁ । dhaṇavaṁtāṇa samīvē maggijjai icchiyaṁ davvaṁ ।। 3396।।
āūṇaṁ kēi vi vaṇiṇō sayamēva diti niyadaviṇaṁ । jaṁpaṁti jayā tumhaṁ hōi tathā amha dāyavvaṁ ।।3397।।

vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
ēēṇa payārēṇaṁ davvēṇa na kipi vijjaē khūṇaṁ । jē kē vivitti rahiyā sēvaṁtā āsi tē savvē ।। 3398 ।।
khattiyakumarā mōttūṇa siṁdhusēṇaṁ samāgayā pāsē । kumarassa vīrasēṇassa saṁjuyā savva sabalē ।। 3399।।
pāvaṁti tē maṇāgaṁ bhōyaṇamēttāi vīrasēṇāō । tēṇa vi tē parituṭṭhā sēvaṁti bhavissa āsāē || 3400।
ēvaṁ sēnnaṁ bahuyaṁ saṁjāyaṁ vīrasēṇakumarassa । āsāṇa bīsa sahasā pāikkāṇaṁ pi lakkha dugaṁ ।। 3401 |
iya siṁdhusēṇa ratnā nāyaṁ jaha vīrasēṇa dūēhiṁ । gaṁtūṇa kiṁ pi bhaṇiyā maha maṁḍaliyā iṇō savvē || 3402 ।
tō tēṇa saṁkiṇaṁ maṁḍaliyāīṇa āhavaṇahēuṁ । niyapurisā pēsaviyā tēhi vi kayamuttaraṁ ēyaṁ ||3403 ।।
saṁvahiūṇaṁ kaivayadiṇapajjētē samāgamissāmō । āgaṁtuṁ dūēhiṁ kahiyamiṇaṁ sidhusēṇassa || 3404 ।।
saṁkiyamaṇēṇa dūē pēsauṁ tēṇa tē puṇō bhaṇiyā । niya aṁgēṇaṁ tubbhē āgaccha tāva sigdhaṁ pi ।। 3405 ।।
jamhā tumha samaṁ gurukajjaṁ maṁtaṇijjamiha asthi । maṁḍaliyāīhi vi uttaraṁkayaṁ saṁkiēhi taō ।। 3406 ।।
amhē āhūyā vīrasēnakumarēṇa pēsiuṁ dūē । amhēhiṁ apavinnē lōbhēuṁ amha suyapamuhā || 3407 ।।
dūhi tēhi nayā pāsē kumarassa vīrasēṇassa । ghēttūṇa sāhaṇaṁ saha rāutēhi pabhūēhi ||3408।।
puvvaṁ pitē khaṇusā iō taō gaṁtukāmayā āsi । dūēhiṁ tēhi bhaṇiyā gayā taō jhatti uṭṭhē jaṁ ॥। 3409॥
amha samīvē tumhēṁ āgaṁtūṇaṁ gayāṇa inhi tu । paṇihipurisēhi kahiyaṁ jaha tē sēnnaṁ aipabhūyaṁ ।। 3410 ॥
gahiūṇa vīrasēṇāu tumha dēsē uvavissaṁti । tēṇā gaṁtuṁ rannō pāsammina sakkimō inhi ।। 3411 ।।
jaī siṁdhusēṇa rāyā karēi uvarimmi vīrasēṇassa | kaḍayaṁtō saṁvahilaṁ amhē vihu tattha vaccāmō ||341
jaṁ viya aṇatthadāraṁ saṁruddhē tammi cēva paḍhamaṁ pi । kā vi hiyayammi saṁkā saṁjāyai nēya ahaṁ pi ॥। 3413 ।।
puvvaṁ pi matiyamaṇaṁ dvayamuhēhiṁ parōpparaṁ tēhi । jaṁ siṁdhusēṇarannō dūyāṇa purō bhayavvaṁ ।। 3414 ।।
ēēṇa kāraṇaṁ tullaṁ ciya jāyamuttaraṁ tahiṁ | sāhaṇiyataṁ tavālēhiṁ sāhiyaṁ sayamiṇaṁ tayā || 3415।।
gaṁtūṇa siṁdhusēṇassa jaha gaō amha saṁtiō amugō | dūēhiṁ vīrasēṇassa kaḍhiō amha ( a ) kahēuṁ ।। 3416 ।।
tō sidhusēṇarāyā tēsi uvari maṇāgamavacittō । hōuṁ puṇaṁ ujjumaṇō jāō sayamēva kahaṇāō || 3417।।
kahiē visayaṁ maṁḍalavaīṇa vayaṇēsu paccaō na tahā । taha vi niva siṁdhusēṇō saṁsai ya maṇōvi pēsēi || 3418 ।।
niyadaṁḍanāyagēṇaṁ saha tē sāmaṁtamaṁḍaliyapamuhē । niya sāmaggīsahiē sammāṇēuṁ kaivaēvi ।।3419।।
kōyabalamajjhāō nirūvaē tattha mattahatthisayaṁ । paṁcāsahaya sahassē paṁcayapa ikkalakkhāī ॥ 3420 ।।
ēvaṁ pabhūyabalasamudaēṇa saha pēsiō mahāṇaṁdō । nāmēṇa daṁḍanāhō jāi akhaṁḍappayāhi ।। 3421 ||
gaṁtūṇa taṁ samaggaṁ sēnnaṁ kumarassa vīrasēṇassa । miliūṇa saṁpayaṭṭaṁ pavisēuṁ dēsamajjhami ||3422।।
saha vīrasēṇa kumarēṇa āgayaṁ sirinivāsaṭhāṇammi । tattha mahābhaṁḍāriyapuriyō ēgō samāgaṁtuṁ ।। 3423।।
kumarasa vīrasēṇassa sāhaē bhūmi viṇihiyaṁ davvaṁ । pubvilla naridāṇaṁ khaṇāviraṁ taṁ samaggaṁ pi ॥ 3424 ॥
saṁgahiyaṁ kumarēṇaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ ēkkāē kaṇayakōḍīē । nāūṇa siṁdhusēṇō rāyā ēvaṁ maṇē kuviō ||3425||
sayamēva vīrasēṇābhimuhaṁ jā calai tāva paḍisiddhō । māulayanaṁdaṇēṇaṁ mahiṁdarāēṇa sō jhatti || 3426 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇaṁ ēvaṁ sēnnaṁ jaṁ ki pi ciṭṭhaē tassa । pāsammi vīrasēṇassa saṁtiyaṁ tujjha taṁ savvaṁ ॥ 3427।।
gaṁtūṇa tassa miliyaṁ kēhi vi vayaṇēhi tēṇa bhōlaviyaṁ । saṁpai tumaṁ pi vaccasi sēnēṇaṁ jēṇa saha tattha ।।3428
tassa vi kō muṇai maṇaṁ tattha gayaṁtaṁ pitaṁ samappēuṁ । tassēva vīrasēṇassa jaī milai kō nivārē ||3429 ।।
dō citō jēṇa imō parivārō tumha saṁtiō sabdō । tā kassa vi bīsāsō kāuṁsakkijjaē nēya ।। 3430 ।।
।

jugavaṁ pi phēḍiūṇaṁ ciraṁtaṇaṁ savvamēva navamavaraṁ । kāuṁna tīraē saṁpayaṁ pi sattumi samunnē || 3431 ||
majjhēṇaṁ thēva cciya jai phēḍijjaṁti kēi vitaō tē । gaṁtuṇaṁ vīyapakkhē milati tuha hōṁti niravēkkhā || 3432 ।।
annē aphēḍiyā viha appa bhaēṇaṁ caēvi tuha pāsaṁ । vaccati vīrasēṇaṁ ēvaṁ tumhēhi visayaṁ pi ।। 3433॥
sō hōi kaō pōḍhō sayapi tumbhē havēha asahāyā । tā attasamīvakayaṁ sēnnaṁ rakkhēha gayasē || 3434 ॥
jaṛa kaha vi vīrasēṇō uvavidvāṇa vi ihēva tumhāṇaṁ । āgacchihī tahā vihu duggārāyaṇaṁ karissāma ||3435 ।।
na uṇō amhē jjjhatēṇa samaṁ saṁpayaṁ gahissāmā | sāhējja balēṇa duhā cittassa imassa sēnnassa || 3436॥
pēsēuṁ niya dūē lacchōramaṇābhihāṇa nayarāō । rāyā aṇaṁgadēvō amha piyā tumha māulaō ||3437।।
hakkārijjau rayaṇatthalāu puṇa mayaṇa dēvanaranāhō। tumha sasurō balidvā dō vi naridā imē inhi ।। 3438 ||
saṁpattēsu imēsuṁ dōsu vi bhūmīsarēsu tō jattā । uvarimmi vīrasēṇassa kī raē sāvaṭṭa bhēhi ||3439।।
sēnaṁ piduhā cittaṁ jaṁ ciṭṭhai tumha taṁpi sāsaṁkaṁ । jāyai na milai tattō gaṁtūṇaṁ vīrasēṇassa || 3440 ।।
paḍivajjiūṇa ēvaṁ mahiṁdarāyassa jaṁpiyaṁ tēṇa । mukkō kaḍayāraṁbhō naravaṇā siṁdhusēṇēṇa || 3441 ॥
tatō pahāṇapurisā raṇatthalalacchiramaṇanayarēsu । dōnhaṁ pi naridāṇaṁ pāsē saṁpēsiyā jhatti || 3442 ||
ēyaṁ ca amha savvaṁ jāṇāvara saṁdhiviggahaniuttō । nāmēṇa jayāṇaṁdō pacchannē pēsiuṁ purisē ||3443||
nāmēṇa sūradēvō rāyāēsāṇa lēhaō asthi । kāyasthō sō vi imaṁ jāṇāvaē amhaṁ ||3444 |
tō āha vajjakuṁḍalakumarō jaha ērisammi parivārē । jaṁ siṁdhusēṇarāyā jīvai ajja vitamacchariyaṁ ॥। 3445 ।।
māhavarāō aha vinnavēśa taṁ vajjakuṁḍalakumāraṁ । nūṇa na jīvai ēsō jai rūsai vīrasēṇō sē || 3446॥
kiṁtu paramēttiyaṁ ciyaṁ paōyaṇaṁ tassa vīrasēṇassa । jaṁ rajjaṁ gahiūṇaṁ kīrai dēsō suhī savvō ।। 3447 ।।
taha taṁpi saṁvissas jai sō vayaṇaṁ karissaē tassa । tō bēi vajjakuṁḍala kumarō ēvaṁ na saṁbhavai ।। 3448 ।।
sā mittaṁ hōṛa kathaṁ paḍhamaṁ dēsammi jammi kira jēṇa । sō tammi cēva dēsē kaha sakkai sēvaō hōuṁ । । 3449 ।।
tamhā ēsa varāō na bharāḍō na ya bhavissaē bhaṁḍō । dunha vi gaīṇa cukkō jāō taha sōyaṇijjō ya ।। 3450 ।।
aha taṁ māhavarāō vinnaē vajjakuṁḍalaṁ ēvaṁ । ēttiya dūraṁ karuṇā jai tumhaṁ siṁdhusēṇammi || 3451 ।।
tō dijjau āēsō ētthāgamaṇammi vīrasēṇassa । savvaṁpi tattha caiu jaha sō aṁgēṇaṁ iha ēi || 3452।।
tō hasiūṇaṁ cakkissa naṁdaṇō taṁ bhaṇēi jaha ēvaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ maē sarūvaṁ na uṇa ahaṁ tassa sāvēkkhō || 3453॥
icchāmi vīrasēṇaṁ cēva ahaṁ garumunnāī nēuṁ । sāhēha patthuyamiō māhavarāō taō kahai || 3454 ।।
tō ucchuvāḍanāmē niyaḍē gāmammi ucchucaraṇatthaṁ । gaya sāhaṇaṁ nariṁdēṇa pēsiyaṁ sidhusēṇēṇa ।। 3455 ।।
nāūṇa vīrasēṇō sayaṁ gaō āsasāhaṇa samēō । vahiūṇa ahōrataṁ ginhai gayasayatigaṁ tattha ।। 3456 ।।
dōnniya turayasahassē pēsēūṇaṁ taō sirinivāsē । gayasāhaṇaṁ samaggaṁ sayaṁgaō vāhavallīē ||3457 ।।
gāmē carēhiṁ nīō tattha turaṁgāṇa sōlasasahassā । gahiyā vallinibaddhā caramāṇā kōraḍitēṇa ।। 3458 ।।
annēsiṁ puṇa saṁtiyamēsa na kēsipi ginhai taṇaṁ pi । kōḍuṁbiyavaṇiyāīṇa rakkhaē tē visēsēṇa ।। 3459 ।।
dēi paraō va tattō payāṇayaṁ sirinivāsanayarāō । kālēṇa taō nīō gāmē vaṇavaddanāmammi || 3460 ||
sō vīrasēṇakumarō khaṇāviūṇaṁ suvannakōḍidugaṁ । ahiyaṁ tattha vi ginhai puvvanariṁdāṇa niyayāṇa ।। 3461 ।।
iya siṁdhusēṇarāyā sōuṁ jāō jalaṁtakōvaggī । hakkāriṇa maṁtara mahiṁdarāēṇa saha ēvaṁ ||3462।।
jaha jaha sahima amhē taha taha amhāṇa matthaē caḍai । sō duṭṭavīrasēṇō tā ēvaṁ phurai maha cittē || 3463 ।।
।।

hōu varaṁ maccū vi hu parāhavō taha vi tīraē nēya । sahiuṁ parapakkhāō tā jāmi sayaṁ pi tassuvari ||3464 ॥
jaṁpai mahiṁdarāō tō ēvaṁ jai vi puvvabhaṇiyaṁ mē । na taraha kāuṁ tubbhē taha vi na juttaṁ sayaṁ tumhā ।। 3465 ।।
gaṁtu tassābhimuhaṁ maṁ cēva ya paṭṭavēha mā annaṁ । puvvilladaṁḍanāhō vva annahā sō vi taṁ kāhī || 3466॥
aha siṁdhusēṇarāyā taṁ cēva mahiṁdarāyamāisai । sattahiṁ hatthisaēhi mattēhiṁ samaṁ turaṁgāṇaṁ ||3467।।
ēkkēṇaṁ lakkhēṇaṁ pāikkāṇaṁ ca sadvilakkhēhiṁ । nivavīḍayaṁ gahēuṁ mahiṁdarāō viṇikkhatō || 3468॥
ēkkēkkajōyaṇāī dāūṇa payāṇayāī sō tinni । dō tinni diṇāī ṭhiō puvvuttaṁ milai jā sēnnaṁ ।। 3469 ।।
sāhaṇiyataṁtasāmaṁtamaṁḍalāhivaipamuhalōēṇaṁ । puvvuttasēnnasaṁkhā saṁjāyā jhatti tō tattha ॥ 3470 ।।
saṁkiyacittō annamma vāsarē kēvalē vi nāikkē । mēlēūṇaṁ jaṁpai mahiṁdarāō rahē ēvaṁ ||3471 ।।
duddhēṇa hōi daḍḍhō jō sō dahiyaṁ pi asai phukkēuṁ । mahaṇaṁdēṇa nariṁdō purā vi jaṁ vaṁciō asthi ।। 3472 ।।
tēṇa bhaṇāmō ēvaṁ jai saṁvaiūṇa' vīrasēṇassa । tubbhē milissaha taō paḍhamaṁ piiō na vaccāmi ।। 3473 ||
tēsi majjhē ēkkēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ garuyariddhi' maṁtēṇa । jā jīvasi tāva na taṁ kahaṁ ci amhē pariccayāmō ॥ 3474 ।।
iya bhaṇirē tammi taō mahiṁdarāō muhāī annēsiṁ । savvēsi pi palōyai tēhiṁ vi taha cēva paḍivannaṁ ।।3475।।
jaṁpara mahiṁdarāō puṇa ēvaṁ tē payaṁpiyaṁ tumha । jai saccaṁ ciya ēvaṁ uppāyaha paccayaṁtō mē ।। 3476 ।।
jaha kaha vi tēṇa bhaṇiō tassa tahā paccaō kaō tēsiṁ' । aha sō mahiṁdarāō nivvayahiyaō purō caliō
avasauṇē saṁjāē addhapahē caiva dāumāvāsaṁ । kaivayadiṇāī tatthēva saṁkiō sō vilaṁbē || 3478 ||
tō vīrasēṇa dūyā savvēhiṁ nāyagāṇa tattha gayā । tēsi puraō kahiyaṁ tēhi jahā atthi amhēhiṁ ॥ 3479 ।।
ērisayaṁ pavitraṁ mahiṁdarāēṇa saha jahā amhē । taṁ jīvaṁtaṁ caiuṁ kattha vi annattha na vayāmō ।। 3480 ।।
dūēhaṁ taō bhaṇiyaṁ tumhēhaṁ vīrasēṇakumarēṇa । saha paḍivannaṁ jaṁ taṁ musā karissaha kiminhi pi ।। 3481 ।।
tēhiṁ taō paḍibhaṇiyaṁ bhavissaē taṁ pi annā nēya । jamhā tumhēhi sama amhē lōhaṁ na kāhāmō || 3482 ॥
gaṁtūṇa taō kahiuṁ dūēhiṁ imaṁ pi vīrasēṇassa । tēṇa chalēṇāgaṁtu mahiṁdarāō ō rāō ||3483॥
savvaṁ pi tassa sēnnaṁ miliyaṁ gaṁtūṇa vīrasēṇassa । puvvuttannasaṁkhā iya jāyā vīrasēṇassa ।। 3484।।
sōūṇa siṁdhusēṇō mahiṁdarāyassa taṁ tahā maraṇaṁ । miliyaṁ ca vīrasēṇassa akkhayaṁ savvamavisēnaṁ ॥ 3485 ।।
saṁbhamasamāulamaṇō ciṇāviḍaṁ jhatti purapaōlīō । pāyārē ārōhai pahāṇa jōhē " jayaṁtāi ।। 3486 ।।
pēsēi puṇō vi purisē pāsē māulayasasurarāīṇa । tō sayamakkaṁdai majjha saṁṭhiō paramakhēḍassa ||3487।।
ēgaṁtamaṁtiyāī mahiṁdarāyassa tāiṁ sumaraṁtō । sasiṇēhāī hiyāiṁ pariṇāmasuhāvahāraṁ ca ॥3488॥
mucchaṁ gacchai cēyai puṇō vi kaṁdēi uccasaddēṇa । tāḍai siraṁ ca hiyayaṁ dōhiṁ vi hatthēhiṁ puṇarutaṁ ॥3489।।
pāē pasāriūṇaṁ raṁḍa vva ruyaṁtaō na viramēi । vilavēi bahupayāraṁ citatō tassa cariyāī ॥ 3490॥
hā bhāya ! nēha nibbhara pāhuṇaō taṁsi āgaō majjha । nikkaruṇēṇa maē puṇa kaōsi kīṇā sa pāhuṇaō ।। 3491 ।।
nāūṇa mama aṇatthō hōtō aṁgīkaō sayaṁ tumaē । parajīviyassa kajjē na kō viniya jīviyaṁ cayai ॥। 3492।।
kō annō tuha tullō mahīyalē sayaṇavacchalō hōhī । kō vā parōvayārī kō vā niya jīyaniravēkkhō || 3493।।
hōṁti jaē dāyārō bahuyassa vi kē vi niyayavihavassa । jō dēi niyaṁ jīyaṁ tumaṁ va diṭṭhō na sō kō vi ।। 3494 । ।
kō maṁtaṇayammi ṭhiō maṁtissai dīhakajjapariṇāmaṁ । kassa purō jaṁpissaṁ niyadukkhamalakkhaṇō ahahyaṁ ।। 3495 ।।

kiṁ tē vannāmi ahaṁ pannaṁ kiṁ vā parakkamaṁ asamaṁ । kō ēkkō tujjha guṇō sakkijjai vanniraṁ bhāya ।। 3496 ।।
iccāi bahupayāraṁ vilavaṁtō siṁdhusēṇanaranāhō । paumasirīē kahamavi saṁbōūṇa saṁviō || 3497।।
nayaraṁ ca paumakhaṁḍē savvattō vēḍhiyaṁ samāgaṁtu । kumarēṇa vīrasēṇēṇa savvasēntrēṇa niyaēṇa ।। 3498 ।।
ēttō anaṁgadēvō sōūṇaṁ siṁdhusēṇapurisāō । maraṇaṁ mahiṁdarāyassa jhūraē bahupayārēhi ||3499 ||
aha sō saṁṭhaviūṇaṁ appāṇaṁ jaliyakōvaduppēcchō । uvarimmi vīrasēṇassa savvasēntrēṇa saṁcaliō ।। 3500 ।।
tihiṁ sahassēhi gayāṇaṁ tihi lakkhēhiṁ ca pavaraturayāṇaṁ । lakkhēṇa rahavarāṇaṁ paṁcahi pāikka kōḍīhi ||3501 ||
ēttiyamēttēṇaṁ ciya sēntrēṇa samanniō mayaṇadēvō । rāyā caliō navaraṁ kiṁcūṇā rahavarā tassa || 3502 ||
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ māhavarāyassa sammuhaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । kēttiyamēttaṁ sannaṁ sāhijjē tumha pēsēmi ||3503॥
māhavarāēṇa taō vinnattō vajjakuṁḍalakumārō । kajjaṁ sēntrēṇa na kiṁ pi amha tumhē sayaṁ calaha || 3504 ।।
kusumapuraṁ jānayaraṁ piyamittajiṇidabhavaṇajattāē । daṁsaṇamisēṇa cakki aṇunnavēūṇa kavi diṇē || 3505।।
bārasahiṁ jōyaṇēhiṁ kusumapurāu puraṁ paumakhēḍaṁ । tattha ṭhiyāṇa vi tumhaṁ bhaēṇa ēhiṁti tē nēya || 3506।।
tō vajjakuṁḍa lēṇaṁ māhavarāyāō sikkhavēūṇaṁ । piyamittavāṇiōttō paṭṭaviō cakkipāsamma ||3507।।
sāgaranāmō bhariuṁ suvannathālaṁ vicittarayaṇēhiṁ । cakkissa ḍhōiuṁ taṁ vinnattō tēṇa sō ēvaṁ || 3508।।
jaha dēva amha sāmī piyamittō nāma atthi kusumapurē । tēṇatthi kāriyaṁ tattha maṁdiraṁ titthanāhassa ।। 3509 ।।
tattha bhavissas jattā rahabhamaṇaṁ vittharēṇa garuēṇa । tēṇēsa tattha īhas āgamaṇaṁ dēvapāyāṇaṁ ।। 3510 ।।
aha kaha vi dēvapāyā tattha pahuppaṁti saṁpai na gaṁtuṁ । āisaha vajjakuṁḍalakumaraṁ pasiūṇa tō amha ।। 3511 ।।
hakkāriūṇa cakkī kumaraṁ tō vajjakuṁḍalaṁ bhaṇai । gamaṇatthaṁ kusumapurē paḍivajjai sō vi taṁ vayaṇaṁ ।। 3512।।
aha sō niyasēntrēṇaṁ taha cakkinirūviēṇa saha caliō । paṇavīsasahassēhiṁ mattāṇaṁ pavarahatthīṇaṁ ।। 3513||
paṁcahi rahalakkhēhiṁ dasahiṁ u lakkhēhiṁ jaccaturayāṇaṁ । taha panarasakōḍīhi pāikkāṇaṁ sadappāṇaṁ ।। 3514 ।।
tammi samaē payaṭṭō hēmaṁtariūbharēṇa lōyāṇaṁ । taruṇāṇa vi thērāṇa va kaṁpāvatō sarīrāī ।। 3515 ।।
sūrō vi sīyalēṇa vi maṁdapayāvō kaō tayā tēṇa । kassa vi kahiṁ pi samaē jayammi ullasai māhappaṁ ।। 3516 ।।
jā sarayatāvataviō āsi jaṇō tā nisāē sēvatō । paḍhamaṁ pi caṁdapāē susīyalē paramapīīē ।। 3517 ।।
hēmaṁtē uṇa pasaratanibiḍahimapurapīḍiō lōō । puvvaṁ pi diṇamuhē unha- kiraṇapāē nisēvēi || 3518 ।।
jēṇa jayā saṁjāyas paōyaṇaṁ taṁ tayā payattēṇa । bhayai jaṇō payaīē na vallahō kō vi kassa viya ।। 3519 ।।
nivvivarabhittibhāē kuṭṭimabhavaṇassa majjhauvaraē । sōvaṁti narā dhaṇiṇō saṁghaḍiyakavāḍa puḍaē ।। 3520 ॥
ginhaṁti sīyarakkhaṁ tattha vi tē īsi sīyaparibhūyā । diyahē ya aggisagaḍiṁ niyaniyaḍāō na phēḍaṁti ।। 3521 ।।
ērisayasīyayālē vaṭṭatē cakkavaṭṭiṇō taṇaō । māhavarāēṇa samaṁ vaccai paṁthē saparivārō || 3522॥
gaṁtuṇa paṁjalēṇaṁ maggēṇaṁ tāva jāva sirikhēḍaṁ । ginhai tatthāvāsaṁ savittharaṁ cakkiṇō taṇaō || 3523।।
sirikhēḍāō dāhiṇauttaraō chacca jōyaṇē dō vi । nayaraṁ ca paumakhēḍaṁ taha kusumapuraṁ ca jaha saṁkhaṁ ।। 3524 ।।
tattō māhavarāō gaṁtuṇaṁ vīrasēṇakumarassa । sāhēi vajjakuṁḍalakumara sirikhēḍa saṁpattaṁ ॥ 3525।।
dāūṇa vīrasēṇō sikkhaṁ taṁ vajjakuṁḍalasamīvē । pēsai puṇō vi sigghaṁ sō gaṁtuṁ tassa vinnavai ।।3526।।
jaha vīrasēṇakumarō kumāra tuha pāya-paṁkayajuyassa । majjha muhēṇaṁ ēyaṁ vinnatti kuṇai viṇayajuō ।। 3527 ।।
āsannā dō vi nivā aṇaṁgadēvō ya mayaṇadēvō ya । saṁpattā majjha taō tumhāgamaṇaṁ ahaṁ tēsi ।। 3528 ।।

vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
jāṇāvissamuvāēṇa kēṇaī tōbhaēṇa tē tumha । jaha jaṁti niyattēuṁ aha vi bhayā ēṁti maha samuhaṁ ।। 3529।।
tō taṁ cautthādiyahē tumha samīvammi pēsiuṁ purisaṁ । garuyāē vi nisāē jāṇāvissāmi savvaṁ pi ।। 3530 ।।
jai tē hōṁti niyattā tā tubbhē vayaha kusumapuranayarē । aha ēṁti samarasaddhāē sammuhā majjhatō jhatti || 3531॥
addhaṁ' sēnnaṁ dhariuṁ attasamīvammi sēsa addhaṁ tu । turbhēhi majjha pāsē pēsēvvaṁ akayakhēvaṁ ।। 3532।।
tō kāūṇa pasāyaṁ majjhuvari diṇāī jāva cattāri । tumhēhiṁ ciṭṭhiyavvaṁ sirikhēḍē cēva nayarammi || 3533।।
iya vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ paḍivajjēuṁ visajjiō jhatti । māhavarāō pāsammi vīrasēṇassa tēṇā vi ।। 3534 ।।
sāgārā akkhōhā dakkhā paracittajāṇayā purisā । paccuttarammi kusalā dōnhaṁ pi nivāṇa pāsammi ।। 3535 ।।
sikkhaviuṁ paṭṭaviyā gaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ tē vi tāṇa sāhēṁti । dōnhaṁ pi naridāṇaṁ jaha amhē cakkitaṇaēṇa || 3536।।
saṁpēsiyā samīvē tumhāṇaṁ tēṇa bhāṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ । jaha amha vīrasēṇō āgaṁtuṁ sēvaō jāō || 3537।।
sō siṁdhavīranivanaṁdaṇō tti kāuṁ sa gōravaṁ diṭṭhō । amhēhi tassa dāuṁ pāraddhō jīvalōō ya ।। 3538 ।।
tēṇa na gahiō bhaṇiyaṁ ca ērisaṁ majjha jīvalōēṇa । inhi na kiṁpi kajjaṁ jattha diṇē vinnavēmi ahaṁ ।। 3539 ।।
tumha tayā vinnattī ēkkā tumhēhiṁ sāriyavvā mē । iya bhaṇiuṁ sēvaṁtō ṭhiō imō tāva jāva piyā ।। 3540 ।।
nisuō imēṇa paralōyapaṭṭiō tō aṇēṇa āgaṁtuṁ । vinnattō jhatti ahaṁ jaha majjha susēṇadēsassa ।। 3541 ।।
dāvēha khaggavattalamēsa taō vāriō maē ēvaṁ । ēkkaṁgō kaha taṁ siṁdhusēṇamavaṇēsi rajjāō ।। 3542 ।।
tamhā annaṁ dētaṁ viulaṁ dāvēmi tujjha jattha tumaṁ । aṇuhavasi rajja lacchi asaṁkilēsō ciraṁkālaṁ ।। 3543 ।।
aha tēṇa niyaṁ ahimāṇadukkhamasamaṁ nivēiuṁ amha । ēsō cciya dēsō khaggavattalāē taō gahiō || 3544||
amhēhiṁ taō dinnō ēkkō vi jaṇō na tassa sāhējjē । jaṁ siṁdhuvīraputtā dō vi imē amha tulla tti ।। 3545।।
ēyaṁ ca āsi nāyaṁ maē jahā ēsa bhaggamayapasarō । ēhī taō vilakkhō jamēsa adhaṇō ya asahāō ।। 3546 ।।
taiyā dāvissa mahaṁ jahō ciyaṁ kaṁpi dēsamēyassa | ahimāṇaggahagahiō gamissaē ahava paralōyaṁ ।। 3547।।
tō sukayadukkayāṇaṁ hōhīṇa bhāyaṇamimō niyakayāṇaṁ । ēyaṁ puṇa āsi maṇē vi amha na jahā imō ēvaṁ ।। 3548 । ।
khiviūṇa paumakhēḍē satatamavi siṁdhusēṇamavaṇīsaṁ । pāḍissai saṁkaḍaē vasīkayā sēsadēsajaṇō ।। 3549।।
tā jāva saṁpayaṁ cakkavaṭṭiāṇāē kusumapuranayarē । saṁcaliō haṁ piyamittasēṭṭhijiṇabhavaṇajattāē ॥ 350 ॥
pattō sirikhēḍapurē tāva jaṇāō imaṁ maē nisuyaṁ । jaha paumakhēḍanayaraṁ pavēṭiyaṁ vīrasēṇēṇa || 3551 ।।
taha siṁdhusēṇarannō sāhējjatthaṁ aṇaṁgadēvanivō । āgacchaṁtō nisuō duijjaō mayaṇadēvō ya ।। 3552 ||
tō tumha ēyamuciyaṁ na hōi jaṁ ēkka jaṇayajāyāṇaṁ । ēēsi dōnhaṁ pi hu parōpparaṁ jujjhamāṇāṇaṁ ।। 3553 ।।
ēkkassa kuṇai tubbhē sāhējjaṁ duiyayaṁ paribhavēha | aha ēvaṁ pi karissaha tō pakkhē vīrasēṇassa ।। 3554।।
annō kō vi bhavissai balavaṁtō jassa pāsaō tumbhē । akkhayadēhā dēsē puṇa na gamissaha niyattēuṁ ॥ 3555 ।।
jaṁ vajjakuṁḍa lēṇaṁ kahāviyaṁ tumha taṁ imaṁ kahiyaṁ । amhēhiṁ taō inhi visajjahā jēṇa vaccāmō ।। 3556 ।।
tō tēhiṁ vajjakuṁḍalapurisā bhīēhiṁ bhāsiyāiya tē । jaha amh vajjakuṁḍalakumarō sāmī taō juttō ।। 3557 ।।
tēṇuvaēsō dinnō āēsō tassa saṁtiō amhaṁ । sīsassuvari kajjaṁ na kiṁ piṇē siṁdhusēṇēṇa ।। 3558 ।।
amhē tumhēhiṁ samaṁ āgaṁtuṁ vajjakuṁḍalakumāraṁ । paṇamissāmō ahavā tubbhē vaccaha purō sigghaṁ || 3559।।
mōttūṇa sēnnamajjhē saṁṭhavagaṁ kaṁpi tārisaṁ purisaṁ । chaḍayā hōuṁ pacchā amhē visamāgamissāma ।। 3560 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ sammāṇiūṇa vatthēhi bhūsaṇēhiṁ ca । dōhiṁ pi nariṁdēhiṁ visajjiyā jhatti tē purisā ।। 3561।।
1 ii sē0 pā.

=== vardhamanaoutput-111-to-111.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
111
gaṁtaṇa tēhi kahiyaṁ nivabhaṇiyaṁ vīrasēṇakumarassa । tēṇa vi tē sirikhēḍē paṭṭaviyā takkhaṇē cēva ।। 3562 ।।
sikkhavaṇaṁ dāūṇaṁ jaha tumbhē niya payaṁpiyaṁ savvaṁ । tēhi nariṁdēhiṁ samaṁ tappaḍivayaṇaṁ ca kahiūṇa ।। 3563।।
kumarassa vajjakuṁḍalanāmassa taō ya aggaō tassa । tēhiṁ nivaīhiṁ dinaṁ vatthāharaṇāī ḍhōijjā ।। 3564 ||
jai sō tumha samappai taṁ ginhijjaha taō samaggaṁ pi । taha vinnavijjaha imaṁ jayā nivā dō vi tē tumhē ।। 3565 ।।
pāsammi mayaṇadēvō aṇaṁgadēvō ya ēṁti tumhēhi । taiyā mēlēya vvō tēsi sadassa sōti ॥ 3566।।
inhi nisi pi vahiuṁ pabhāyasamayāō āraō tattha । gaṁtūṇa vajjakuṁḍalakumarō tumbhēhi davvō ।। 3567।।
tēṇa saha maē gahiō saṁkēō asthi ajjadiyahāō । aikaṁtapaṁcamadiṇē māhavarāyassa vayaṇēṇa ।। 3568 ।।
sā cēva imā saṁkēyajāmiṇī ajjavaṭṭaē jāyā । tō sō nisi pi savvaṁ ciṭṭhissai ajja jaggaṁtō ।। 3569॥
maha dūyassa niyaṁtō maggaṁ ēṁtassa tō na tumhēhiṁ । kattha vi pahē pamāō niddāluddhēhi kāyavvō ।। 3570 ।।
iya sikkhaṁ gahiūṇaṁ tē purisā vīrasēṇapāsāō । ēṁti sirikhēḍamaggē ēttō sō cakkiṇī taṇaō || 3571 ।।
tīē cēva nisāē jiṇapaḍimaṁ pūiūṇa saṁjhāē । sayaṇatalammi nivannō paḍihāraṁ ēvamāisai || 3572 ।।
savvēsi nāyagāṇaṁ jāṇāvaha pēsiuṁ niē purisē । jaha ajja ciṭṭhiyavvaṁ savvēhiṁ vi saṁvahēūṇa ।। 3573।।
tumhahiṁ rayaṇīē jamhā kumarō kahiṁpi āēsē । tumhē pēsissai tō tahēva tē bhāṇiyā tēṇa ।। 3574 ।।
aha pāsanisannaṁ vajjakuṁḍalō sahacaraṁ niyaṁ bhaṇai । jigamittasāvagaṁ jaha jaggēyavvaṁ maē ajja || 3575।।
ciṭṭai ciraṁ nisāē kajjēṇaṁ kumaravīrasēṇassa । tō maha viṇōyahēḍaṁ kaṁpi kahaṁ sōhaṇaṁ kahaha || 3576।।
vīrarasapōsayaṁ taha savvaṇṇumayāṇuviddhamairasiyaṁ । jaggai maha pāsajaṇō suhēṇa taha tīē akkhittō ।। 3577 ।।
antrēṇa suhāsiyabhāsaēṇa bhaṇiō imaṁ tu jigamittō । jā majjha rōyai kahā kahēsi jai taṁ tumaṁ tō haṁ ।। 3578 ।।
jaggissaṁ annaha puṇa karissaminhi pi nūṇa niddamahaṁ । anēṇa imō bhaṇiō kuṇa niddaṁ kiṁ tumā dīhaṁ ।। 3579 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ hasiūṇaṁ paḍhamaō imaṁ bhaṇiō । akkhēhi kērisī tuha cittassa kahā suhāvēi || 3580 ॥
sō jaṁpai majjha kahā rōyai purisassa saṁtiyā tassa । jō parakajjammi duhaṁ suhī vi hōṁtō sayaṁ sahai ||3581 ।।
jaha inhi sahasi tumaṁ hēmaṁtamahāhimassa duhamasamaṁ । ēēṇa ēttiēṇaṁ sēntrēṇa samaṁ samaggēṇa ।। 3582 ।।
caiūṇa gaṁdhamāyaṇanayarammi nivāyamattaṇō bhavaṇaṁ । ētthāgaōsi paddharabhūmīē jaggasi nisiṁ ca || 3583 ॥
tō jaṁpai jimitta taṁ kaṁ pi kahaṁ ahaṁ kahissāmi । jā tujjha vi kumarassa ya accataṁ sammayā hōhī ।। 3584 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalō taṁ jiṇamittaṁ pucchaē taē ēsā । kattha nisuyā kahā jaṁ kahissasē saṁpayaṁ amha ||3585 ।।
sō bhaṇai varisayālō jō ēsa gaō ahaṁ tayavasāṇē । samaṇunnaviḍaṁ tubbhē gaō ṭhiō sayaṇamiṇatthaṁ ।। 3586।।
dāsaurē tattha tayā samāgayā sūriṇō sujasanāmā । saha parivārēṇa ṭhiyā diyahāṇaṁ māsamēkkaṁ tē ।।3587 ।।
taccaraṇapajjuvāsaṇakāraṇaō haṁ pi saṁṭhiō tattha । tēttiya diyahāṇi puṇō suyaṁ maē tēsiṁ pāsāō || 3588 ।।
jiṇapūyāphalakahaṇāvasarē siricaṁdakittiṇō rannō । vikkamanihiṇō cariyaṁ bhuvaṇacamakkārasaṁjaṇayaṁ ॥ 3589 ॥
caṁdakittiniva kahā --
sō pubvabhavē jaṁbuddīvēravayassa dāhiṇaddhami । māluyagāmē payaīē bhaddaō gahavaī āsi ।। 3590 ॥
sō bhūīsaranayarē niyakajjēṇāgaō dhaṇaḍḍhassa | jiṇaharaṭhiyassa saḍḍhassa aṁti jattasamayammi ।। 3591 ।।
niya sadvāē uvarōhiūṇa saḍḍhassa appiraṁ davvaṁ । pūyaṁ baliṁ ca kārai jiṇassa savisēsamannadiṇē ।। 3592 ।।
saḍḍhēṇa niddha mahurāhārēhiṁ bhōiō imō sagihē । lajjāē sō vi bhuttō abbhahiyaṁ pi hu na paricattaṁ ॥ 3593 ॥
tēṇājinnēsō mariuṁ pūyāphalēṇa saṁjāō । siricaṁdakittirāyā purō vi kittīmē taccariyaṁ ॥ 3594 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-112-to-112.json ==========================
112
caṁdakittinibakahā
ēravayaddhē tatthēva atthi vitthinnagāmanayarēhiṁ । airamaṇijjapaēsō dēsō nāmēṇa harikēsō ।। 3595 ।।
savvattha bhūikaliō vitthinnajaḍāsaō vi sāhārō । jō caurāṇaṇa gōviṁdabahumaō sōhai harō vva ॥ 3596।।
tatthatthi pavaranayaraṁ caṁdauraṁ nāma amarapurasarisaṁ । surayaṇasahassa rēhiramaccharasāūriyadiyaṁtaṁ ॥ 3597 ॥
jattha vaṇi-vivaṇiṭhāṇaṁ nayarasirīvayaṇapaṁkayasamāṇaṁ । pasaraṁtadaṁtahīrayapaṁtī dittīhi rēhataṁ ।। 3598 ||
pavisaṁtapavarapūgīphalamujjalanāyavallidalalaliyaṁ । ullasiyabahalakappūraparimalaṁ jāiphalakaliyaṁ ।। 3599 ।।
jassa bahiṁ pāyārō suhāsiō sahai sāhupurisō vva । kavisīsayasayakaliō rāvaṇaraiō vva saṁgāmō ।। 3600 ।।
vēyaḍḍhagirivarō iva vicittavijjāharīhiṁ ramaṇijjō । parapurisaduppavēsō mahāsaīhiyayabhāvō vva ॥ 3601 ॥
pāyārasamaṁ tēṇaṁ rēhai varavāripūriyā parihā । himagirisaṁkāē samāgaya vva gaṁgāmahāsariyā || 3602 ॥
caṁdakaravimalakittī taṁ pālai caṁdakittinaranāhō । karavālapukkharē jassa nivasirī iyararāyasirī ।। 3603 ।।
jō kō vi maggaṇajaṇō taṁ maggai ēkkasi pi gaṁtūṇa । sō hōi maggaṇijjō iyarēsiṁ savvakālaṁ pi ।। 3603 ||
sō annayā nariṁdō pasibuddhō rayaṇiviramasamayammi । jā ciṁtaṁtō ciṭṭhai sējjagaō rajjakajjāī ॥। 3604।।
tā kiṁpi sumariūṇaṁ sayaṇijjāō samuṭṭhiō jhatti । vihiyapabhāyāvassayakammō paḍihāramāisai ।। 3606 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tumaṁ atthāṇamaṁḍavaṁ kāravēhasāraviyaṁ । tammigaē taṁ vayaṇaṁ taha tti paḍivajjiuṁ pacchā ।।3607।।
kayadēvapavarapūōviraiyaaipavaravatthasiṁgārō । savvaṁgabhūsaṇadharō sirammi kayakusumasēharaō || 3608।।
vinnattō paḍihārēṇa jhatti āgaṁtumauliyakarēṇa । atthāṇamaṁḍavō dēvavaṭṭaē kāriō pauṇō ।। 3609 ॥
tavvayaṇāṇaṁtaramēva patthivō tattha saṇiyamāgaṁtuṁ । uvavisai rayaṇarēhaṁtakaṇayasīhāsaṇassuvariṁ ।।3610।।
rāyāsēṇa taō paḍihārō muyai sēvayajaṇōhaṁ । dāragayaṁ sō vi nariṁdapaṇamaṇaṁ kāumuvavisai ।। 3611।।
niya niya ṭhāṇē sāmaṁtamaṁtimaṁḍaliyataṁtavālāī । aha sō saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ jammi vi nikkhivai niyadiṭṭhi ।। 3612 ।।
atthāṇajaṇē rāyā tabbhārakkaṁtamivasiraṁ tassa । saṁghaḍiyapāṇisaṁpuḍavihiyāvaṭṭhēbhamavaṇamai ।। 3613 ।।
atthāṇajaṇāu bahiṁ pi pēsaē jāva sō nivō diṭṭhi । tā niyai kuṭṭimayalaṁ maṇimayamuṭṭhatakiraṇōhaṁ । 3614 ।।
kuṁkumarasacchaḍāsēyasōṇamunni kinnatāmarasaṁ atthāṇamaṁḍavasirīyaṇaṁ va pamōyapahasaṁtaṁ ॥3615 ॥
kuṁkumakayaṁgarāyaṁ vipphāriyalōyaṇaṁ niyaṁtaṁ va । vasuhāhimacca bhuyapayāvaviṣphuriyamāhappaṁ ॥ 3616॥
jāva taō ṭhāṇāō diṭṭhi sāharai nēya naranāhō । tammi pasē sahasa tti tāva tēō paripphuriō || 3617।।
sahasaṁsupayāsāō caugguṇō taṁ palōiūṇa taō । aivimhayaṁ vahatō atthāṇajaṇaṁ nirūvēi ।। 3618।।
tattha vi tēyappasarō tārisaō cēva tō niyasarīrē । jāva nivēsai diṭṭhi tattha vi rayaṇāharaṇapaḍalaṁ ।। 3619 ।।
māsaliyakiraṇajālaṁ avalōyai aha sahāgaō vi jaṇō । muhakamalāī palōyai parōpparaṁ taṁ taha niyaṁtō ।। 3620 ।।
aha paḍihārō pēkkhiyapuvvadisi vinnavēi rāyāṇaṁ । puvvadisāē dīsai dēvaduijjaṁ va ravibiṁbaṁ ।। 3621 ।।
tō acchariyāū riyahiyaēṇaṁ jāva rāyalōēṇa । saccaviyaṁ rannā viyatā diṭṭhataṁ taha ccēva ।। 3622 ।।
jā kiṁpi viyappara puhaisāmiō māṇasammi vimhaiō । vēyāliēṇa ēkkēṇa tāva sahasa tti vinnattō ।। 3623।।
tujjha payāvasamāṇattalaṁbharasiō diṇēsarō dēva । ēyaṁ karēi rūvaṁ duijjamabbhahiyatēillaṁ ||3624।।
ētthaṁtarē samaggō atthāṇa jaṇō parōpparaṁ bhaṇai । ciṭṭhau amhēhi amha puvvapurisēhiṁ vi na ddiṭṭha ॥3625।।
ērisayaṁ katthai na ya suyaṁ pi jaṁ saṁpayaṁ palōēmō । tā kiṁ uppāō kō vi uṭṭiō ayamayaṁḍē vi ।। 3626 ।।
nēmittiyasaccāē sassa vi kiṁ vayaṇamannahā hōhī । taṁ jēṇa amha pahuṇō kallāṇaparaṁparā kahiyā ॥। 3627।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-113-to-113.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
113
nimisaṁtarēṇa tattō sammuhamētaṁ niēvi taṁ tēyaṁ । vēyāliyāṇa antrēṇa ērisaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ puṇa vi ॥ 3628।।
taṁ dēvataraṇibiṁba duijjamēyaṁ samēi tuha pāsē । sēvākajjēṇa va tuha payāvatullattamalahaṁtaṁ ।। 3629 ।।
ēvaṁ rāyapamuhassa savvalōyassa vimhiyamaṇassa । khaṇamēttēṇa paviṭṭhō kannē kiṁkiṇijhaṇakkārō ॥ 3630 ।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ khaṇēṇaṁ aṇēyavarakaṇayakhaṁbhapaṁtīhi । sōhataṁ nayaṇapahaṁ ōinnaṁ maṇimayavimāṇaṁ ॥ 3631 ॥
dhuvaṁtadhayavaḍāyaṁ payaḍasirīyaṁ pasaṁtabahutēyaṁ । jāva salīlaṁ rāyā avalōyai tāva taṁ jhatti ॥ 3632||
atthāṇamaṁḍavassā na dūraō na ya samīvaō pattaṁ । tammi niviṭṭhā ciṭṭhati tinni siṁgāriyā purisā || 3633 ||
varahārakaḍayakēūrakuṁḍalāīhiṁ bhūsaṇasaēhiṁ । bhūsiyasavvasarīrā sōhaṁtā surakumāra vva ॥ 3634।।
taṁ majjhāō juyalaṁ uttinnaṁ jhattigayaṇamaggēṇa । taṁ dharaṇīyala sammiliyajāṇukarayalasiṁraṁ paṇayaṁ ।। 3635 ।।
nivaipayāṇaṁ puraō tēsiṁ dōnhaṁ pi āsaṇāraṁ nivō । dāvēūṇaṁ jaṁpai tumhē ēēsuvari uvavisaha || 3636।।
tō tē dōna vi purisā uṛaḍhā hōūṇa sirinihiyahatthā । viṇaēṇa vinnavaṁti na apasāō dēvakāyavvō ।। 3637 ।।
amhāṇaṁ jaṁ amhē tumha vi āēsaō nisīēmō । nō āsaṇēsu dēvō amhāṇa vi sāmiṇō pujjō || 3638 ||
tumhāsō tā matthayammi amhāṇa dēva ! savisēsaṁ । paramatthi ēttha kāraṇamaigaruyaṁ taṁ nisāmēha || 3639 ।।
niyasāmiēṇa amhē ūsuyakajjēṇa tumha pāyāṇaṁ । pāsammi - pēsiyā taṁ āyannaha vinnavijjaṁtaṁ ॥ 3640 ।।
amha pahū vēyaḍḍhē dāhiṇasēḍhīē rayaṇauranayarē । maṇicūḍō nāmēṇaṁ nivasai vijjāharanariṁdō || 3641 ।।
amha muhē sō vinnavēi dēvassa pāyaparamāṇaṁ । niyapaḍivanaṁ saṁpai pālijjau dēva! airēṇa || 3642 ||
tō citai naranāhō taṁ ciya ēyaṁ phuḍaṁ samāvaḍiyaṁ । rayaṇiviramammi jaṁ ajjasumariyaṁ āsi amhēhiṁ ।। 3643 ||
jaṁ kira sō cciya divasō aṭṭamaō ēsa ajja saṁpattō । jattha maē saṁkēō khayarēṇa samaṁ kaō āsi ।। 3644 ।।
puṇa
vinnattaṁ khayarēhiṁ tēhiṁ mā dēva ! kīrau vilaṁbō । jaṁ jāṇatō ciṭṭhai kajjaṁ dēvō vi sayamēva ।। 3645 ।।
tēṇērisaṁ vimāṇaṁ diṇamaṇitēyāu abbhahiyatēyaṁ । rayaṇamayaṁ pēsaviyaṁ dēvassārōhaṇanimittaṁ ॥ 3646 ॥
annaha amhē ēmō nahamaggēṇēva kēvalēṇēha । ērisavimāṇavittharakaraṇakilēsēṇa kiṁ kajjaṁ ।। 3647 ॥
taṁ khayarāṇaṁ vayaṇaṁ suṇiūṇaṁ sēsamaṁtiṇō savvē । citaṁti niyaniyamaṇē kiṁpi rahassaṁ imaṁ kajjaṁ || 3648 ||
tō amhāṇa na kahiyaṁ naravaiṇā ēyamappaṇō cēva । cittē dhariuṁ mukkaṁ suhumamaī vā mahāmaṁtī ।। 3649 ।।
jāṇissai dhruvamēyaṁ jamakahiyaṁ kiṁ pi kajjamēyassa । na muyai kayā vi nivaī tā amha kimēttha ciṁtāē ? 3650 ।।
suhumamai viha maṁtī vimhaiō niyamaṇammi citē । kiṁ accabbhayamēyaṁ vayaṁti vijjāharā ēē || 3651 ॥
jaṁ sō kō maṇicūḍō kharidō ēttha āgaō kaiyā । kaiyā maṁtiyamēyaṁ tēṇa samaṁ amha naravaiṇā || 3652।।
jai tāva amha rannā rahassa kajjaṁ ti sāhiyaṁ nēyaṁ । tā kiṁ na sō vi kēṇā vi āgaō haṁta iha diṭṭhō || 3653 ॥
ēyāṇa vi dōnhaṁ pi hu majjhāō kō vi āgaō na suō। pāsammi nivassa maē rāyāsannāō vi jaṇāō । । 3654 ।।
ahavā kiṁ mama ēyāē saṁpayaṁ ēttiyāē ciṁtāē । inhi ciya hōhī payaḍamēva savvaṁ pi jaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 3655 ॥
jamhā uttaramēyāṇa kiṁ pi rāyā karissaē tāva । tattō cciya uttaraō jai puṇa jāṇijjaē kiṁ pi ।। 3656 ।।
iya citiūṇa vayaṇaṁ naravaiṇō pēcchaē mahāmaṁtī । rāyā vi tammi maṁtimmi pēsaē maṁtharaṁ diṭṭhi ।। 3657 ।।
lajjāē saṁkuyaṁtō jaṁpai ya sasaṁbhamō mahāmati । kajjamiṇaṁ amhēhiṁ tumha na kahiyaṁ pamāēṇa ।। 3658 ।।
annaha kaha na kahēmō tumhāṇa vi jaṇayanivvisēsāṇa । tā avarāhō ēsō khamiyavvō amha tumhēhiṁ ।। 3659 ।।
suvvau kajjarahssaṁ majjha kahaṁtassa taṁ iyāṇi pi । iya naravaiṇā bhaṇiē khayarakumārāṇa majjhāō || 3660॥
|

=== vardhamanaoutput-114-to-114.json ==========================
114
i
caṁdakittinivakahā
vijjusihō nāmēṇaṁ ēkkō jaṁpēi jōḍiyakaraggō | acchaliyaṁ mama tumhaṁ kiṁ pi ahaṁ vinnavissāmi || 3661 ॥
dēva ! na juttaṁ ēvaṁ jaṁ kira garuyāṇa jaṁpamāṇāṇaṁ । aṇaṇunnāō annō pabhāsaē aṁtarē bhāsaṁ ॥। 3662 ।।
niyamāmikajjakaraṇammi ūsuō paramahaṁ na sakkēmi । kālavilaṁba sahiuṁ tēṇa na mē ēsa avarāhō || 3663।।
garuyapasāyaṁ kāuṁ dēvō āruhau iha vimāṇammi । savvaṁ pi vaiyaramimaṁ maṁtissa ahaṁ kahissāmi || 3664 ||
tō ciṁtēi nariṁdō juttamiṇaṁ khayarēṇa vinnattaṁ । taṁ ciya ēyaṁ jāyaṁ jaṁ vuccai iyaralōēṇa ।।3665।।
ēkkēṇaṁ kajjēṇaṁ kajjāī havaṁti dōtri vi kyāī । cūyā vi siṁciyā hōṁti tappiyā tahaya piyarō vi ।। 3666।।
garuyāṇa lajjaṇijjaṁ niyapōrisapayaḍaṇaṁ sayaṁ kāuṁ । jamhā tattō chuṭṭāmi tāva ēkkaṁ imaṁ kajjaṁ ।। 3667।।
trīyaṁ puṇa niyapaḍivannapālaṇaṁ sāhiyaṁ havai sigdhaṁ । sappurisāṇaṁ taṁ ciya jaṁ karaṇijjaṁ payattēṇa ।। 3668 ।।
isa citiūṇa bhaṇiō suhamamaī nivaiṇā mahāmaṁtī । ēsō vi kahau jaṁ atthi usuyaṁ amha kajjamiṇaṁ । । 3669 ।।
sayamakahaṇāvarāhō amha na tumhēhiṁ kō vi gahiyavvō । jamhā kattha vi kajjē ēgaṁtō natthi vibuhāṇa || 3670।।
annaṁ ca tumha aisahumabuddhivāvārarajjusaṁjamiē । savvattha vikayasutthē rajjē ciṁtā na mē asthi || 3671।।
sāmittamēttamēva ya kēvalamahamaṇuhavaṁtaō ēttha । kīlāmi jahicchāē vēyaḍḍhanagē vi gaṁtr̥̄ṇa || 3672 ।।
taṁ ci karissaminhi auvvaṭhāṇammi khēyaridassa । abbhatthaṇāē tattō puṇa sigghamihāgamissāmi ।। 3673 ||
kajjavasā ṭhāyavvaṁ jai tattha bhavissaē bahudiṇāṇi । tō khēyarajuyalāō tumhaṁ jāṇāvaissāmi || 3674।।
ēgāgiṇō vidēsaṁtarammi vaccaṁtayassa avasērī | majjha na tumhēhi maṇammi kā vi thēvā vi kāyavvā ।। 3675 ।।
sēṇāsahassa samahiyasāmatthō tumha buddhiuvaēsō । jaṁ suṁdarō sahāō sayā vi maha atthi sannihiō ।। 3676 ।।
annaṁ pi atthi bhaṇiyavvamēttha taṁ suṇau sāvahāṇamaṇō | atthāṇajaṇō savvō jō amha samīhaē sēvaṁ ।। 3677 ।।
maivēyaḍḍhanagammi vi gayammi kēṇā vi maṁtiṇō vayaṇaṁ । tēṇa na hu khaṁḍiyavvaṁ amhāṇa vi māṇaṇijjassa ।। 3678 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇa nariṁdō khaggaggāhissa pāsaō khaggaṁ । gahiūṇa ya kōyaṁḍaṁ kōyaṁḍadharassa pāsāō ।। 3679 ।।
pāsammi samappai khayarassa tō vijjumālināmassa । tēṇēva dinnabāhuṁ dāhiṇahatthēṇa gahiūṇa || 3680 ।।
sīhāsaṇāu sahasā samuṭṭhiō sahasahāgayajaṇēṇa । vijjusiṇaṁ bhaṇiō taḍitēō khēya taiā ।। 3681 ।।
kuha vimāṇaṁ āsannamēttha āruhai patthivō jēṇa । tō rannā paḍisiddhō sa parakkamapayaḍaṇanimittaṁ ॥ 3682 ॥
niya pariyaṇassa puraō jaha sō savvō vi nivvuō hōi । maha asahāyattaṇaō maṇaṁ pi na maṇē kuṇai adhiī । 3683 |
ēya bhāvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tēṇēttha ṭiyammi iha vimāṇammi | ārōhaṇaṁ karissaṁ aha uppaiuṁ gayaṇamaggē ।। 3684 ।।
pēkkhaṁtassa savimyamatthāṇajaṇassa patthivō tattha । ārūḍhō sahasacciya sihō vva karidakuṁbhayaḍē ।। 3685 ।।
khayarō vi vijjumālī naravaiṇō aṇupayaṁ tahārūḍhō । rāyāvi vimāṇagaō atthāṇajaṇaṁ khaṇaṁ niyai || 3686।।
jayasaddō samakālamēva savvēṇa tēṇa ugghuṭṭō । bhaṇiyaṁ puṇō puṇō taha puṇō vi dēvō bhavau amha || 3687।।
āṇaṁdabharaniraṁtaranayaṇāṇaṁ daṁsaṇijjamuhakamalō । namaṇijjapāyaparamō siracuṁbiyamēiṇitalāṇa || 3688 ।।
aha tammi vimāṇavarē puvvābhimuhaṁ raēṇa vaccatē । jugavaṁ pi samaggasabhā jaṇēṇa diṭṭhī pariduviyā ।। 3689 ।।
tā jāva taṁ vimāṇaṁ nayaṇāṇamagōyarammi saṁpattaṁ । tattō niyattiūṇaṁ diṭṭhi dvāṇē puṇa niviṭṭhō ।। 3690 ।।
savvō atthāṇajaṇō vimhayarasaparavasō mihō vayai । kiṁ kiṁ ēyassa narēsarassa - ēkkaṁ pasaṁsēmō ॥ 3691 ।।
savvaṁ pijaō cariyaṁ jaṇiyacchariyaṁ jaṇassa savvassa । dakkhinnamaṇannasamaṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya jēṇa ēyassa || 3692 ।।
tattō sāhasamaulaṁ parōvayārittaṇaṁ taō ahiyaṁ । tattō parakkamō puṇa jayassa savvassa abbhahiō ।।3693।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
115
kiṁbahuṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ savvē vi guṇā na vanniuṁ sakkā । amhārisēṇa kēṇai ēyassa mahānariṁdassa || 3694।।
iya aviyakkiyasaṁjāyarāyavirahēṇa dummiya maṇassa । atthāṇajaṇassa ciraṁ kahāpabaṁdhō imō jāō ।। 3695 ।।
aha suhamamaīmaṁtī vijjusihē khēyarammi niyadiṭṭhi । pēsēi paḍikkhatē patthāvaṁ patthuyaṁ vōttuṁ ॥ 3696 ।।
aha sō mauliyakarakamalasaṁpuḍō tassa kahiumāḍhattō । jaha ajja vāsarāō jaṁ navamadiṇaṁ aikkataṁ ।। 3697 ।।
tassa rayaṇīē taiē jāmē āujjanaṭṭagēyāṇaṁ । mahurajjhaṇīhiṁ savaṇaṁtarēsu pavisaṁtaēhiṁ taō ।। 3698 ।।
sējjagaō paḍibuddhō sahasacciyacaṁdakittinaranāhō । taṁ nisuṇaṁtō ciṁtai pēcchaṇayamauvvayaṁ ēyaṁ ॥ 3699 ।।
kiṁpi kahi piṭṭhāṇē ciṭṭhai saṁjāyamāṇamasamāṇaṁ । tā kiṁ kassa vi gēhē ibbhassa mahūsavō kō vi ।। 3700।।
ahavāna ēsa saddō majjhē nayarassa kiṁtu bāhimmi । puvvadisāē pāsē maṇōramujjāṇadēsassa ।। 3701 ||
tattha ya nāyaralōassa pēcchaṇaṁ tāva nēya saṁbhavai । kiṁ cērisaṁ na katthai pēcchaṇayaṁ diṭṭamamhēhiṁ ||3702||
tā kiṁpi jāṇiyavvaṁ tattha vi gaṁtūṇa ēyamamhēhiṁ । iya caṁdakittirāyā citēūṇaṁ niyamaṇammi ।। 3703 ।।
tō sayaṇijjatalāō uṭṭhē uṁ baṁdhaē daḍhaṁ kēsē । gāḍhīkarēi parihāṇagaṁṭhimā baṁdhaē churiyaṁ || 3704।।
taha aṁgamuttarīēṇa chāiraṁ pāṇigahiyavarakhaggō । pajalaṁtamaṇipaīvāu vāsabhavaṇāu niggaṁtuṁ ||3705।।
chēyattaṇēṇa parivaṁciūṇa jaggaṁta vi jāmillē । pattō puvvapaōlī pāsē valiuṁ taō tiriyaṁ ।। 3706।।
ārūḍhō pāyārē payaḍīsu paē kamēṇa ṭhāvaṁtō । tatthaṭṭiō paēsē jattha ya aṭṭālaō atthi ।।3707 ||
khaṇamēgaṁ tattha nirikkhiūṇa pāyārabāhiruddēsaṁ । uppaiō gayaṇayalē vihaṁganāhō vva aidūrē || 3707 ||
tō laṁghiūṇa parihaṁ mahānaī vitthaḍaṁ taō paraō । dūrayaraṁ gaṁtūṇaṁ puhaīē saṁṭhiō uḍ ॥3709।।
nivaḍaṁtassa yatō tassa tattha payaghāyakaṁpiyā puhaī । vēyaṇamasahaṁtī ghummiya vva jāyā khaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ ॥। 3710।
pēcchaṇayasaddasavaṇāṇusāraō paṭṭiō purō tattō । jaṁtō kamēṇa pattō maṇōramujjāṇamajjhami ||3711।।
harisēṇa vahasirēhiṁ kusumēhiṁ maggapāyavagaēhi । uvaṇīyaṁ gaṁdhamuvāyaṇaṁ va ginhaṁtaō tattha ।। 3912 ।।
baccai kamēṇapuraō jaha jaha āsannaō taō hōi । taha taha sō pēcchaṇayaṁ kannaggaṭṭiyaṁ va nisuṇēṛa || 3713।।
pāḍavasuttālacalaṁtanaccaṇīcaraṇaraṇiranēurayaṁ । vajjaṁtavēṇuvīṇā jhuṇimasiṇiyagāiṇī sadaṁ ।। 3714 । ।
āujiyakaraphāliyapaḍahamuiṁgāiāujamuhēhiṁ । uṭṭaṁ tagaruyasaddēhiṁ āhavaṁ taṁ va taṁ vinivaī ।। 3715 ।।
ēvaṁ tassa vayaṁtassa tattha kōūhalāulamaṇassa । pattaṁ nayaṇāṇa pahē juyāijiṇamaṁdiraṁ jhatti ।। 3716 । ।
taṁ phalihasilāghaḍiyaṁ pasaratēhi karēhiṁ niyayēhi । ōsāriūṇa timiraṁ dāvēyaṁ taṁ va avayāsaṁ ॥ 3717।।
bahaladalanīlapāyavapaḍalassabbhaṁtarammi dīsaṁtaṁ । taṁ sahai dhavalavannaṁ gayaṇē sarayabbhakhaṁḍaṁ ca ।। 3718 ।।
tasya putrvābhimuhassa jāva jiṇamaṁdirassa dāraggē । sōvāṇasannihāṇē gacchai tā pēcchaē puraō ।। 3719।।
majjhē pajalaṁtamaṇippavaī va pasaraṁtaghaṇapahājālaṁ । dūrō sāriyatimiraṁ taḍicchaḍāḍōvapiṁgalayaṁ ।। 3720।।
tō jāva garuyasaṁbhamavasēṇa sōvāṇapaṁtisu payāī । dētō turiyaṁ turiyaṁ uvari ārōhai naridō ||3721।।
gaṁtaṇa valāṇayadāramaggaō tattha pēsaē diṭṭi । tāva na sō ujjōō na pēcchaṇaṁ nēya gēyajhuṇī || 3722।।
ēgapaēcciya savvaṁ karhipi naṭṭha na pēcchaē kiṁci । niddāyaṁtaṁ va jiṇidamaṁdiraṁ kēvalaṁ niyai || 3723।।
aha citai sō gayā kimayamaccabhūyaṁ palōēmō । naḍapēkkhaṇaṁ va khaṇadiṭṭhanakhvaṁ samaggapi ।। 3724 ।।
pēcchāmi sumiṇayaṁ kiṁ kiṁ vā maivibbhamō samuppannō । kiṁ kō vi divayāī daṁsēi mamērisaṁ kiṁ pi ।। 3725।।
