=== vardhamanaoutput-116-to-116.json ==========================
116
caṁdakittiniva kahā
ahavā jaṁ vā taṁ vā kiṁpi imaṁ hōu kiṁ viyappēhiṁ । pēkkhāmi tāva puraō kimatthi ēyassa majjhammi । । 3726 ।।
iya citiūṇa jiṇamaṁdirassa majjhammi pavisai nariṁdō । jā tāva purō pēcchai tavaṇijjamayaṁ jiṇapaḍimaṁ ॥ 3727
tadaṁsaṇā sahasatti tassa jāō maṇammi āṇaṁdō । galiyaṁ nayaṇēsu jalaṁ aṁgammi samuggaō pulaō || 3728।।
tō dharaṇīyalasammiliyajāṇukarayala sirēṇa paṇivāō। puhaīsarēṇa vihiō paḍimāē tayaṇuuvavisiuṁ । 3729 ।
mauliyakarakamalajuō sō citiumērisaṁ samāḍhattō । pēccha ahō ! sukayāṇaṁ pariṇāmō kērisō majjha ॥। 3730 ।।
amayarasavarisasarisaṁ uppāyaṁtō suhaṁ sarīrammi । paramappā kō vi imōjamajja dēvō maē diṭṭhē || 3731 ।।
tā bhavivvamavassaṁ kēṇai kallāṇasamudaṇaṁ mē । āsannēṇaṁ ci ya ēttha saṁsaō natthi vō vi ।। 3732।।
ēttō cēva vicittā kittijjara divvapariṇaī lōē | annaha kāuṁ citiyamannaha jaṁ pariṇamai kajjaṁ ।। 3733 ।।
tucchidiyasuhajaṇayaṁ pēcchaṇayaṁ ēttha pēcchiuṁ pattō । tāva ahaṁ jāyaṁ puṇa daṁsaṇamēyassa dēvassa ।। 3734।।
jaṁ akayasukayakammassa pāṇiṇō savvahā vi ai dulahaṁ । rōrassa va rayaṇamahānihāṇamāsattamakulāō ।। 3735 ।।
jaṁ jēṇa pāviyavvaṁ jayā kayāī tayā sa taṁ lahai । bahuyaṁ pi ujjamaṁtō na annasamayammi pāvē ।। 3736।।
annaha ihēva nayarē majjha vasaṁtassa ēttiō kālō । aikaṁtō maggēṇa ya gaōhamēēṇa bahuvāraṁ ॥ 3737।।
gamiyamavannā savvayā vi paramēyamēyabuddhīē । arahaṁtasaṁtiyamimaṁ dēvaharaṁ kiṁ pi asthiti || 3738 ।।
majjhammi pavisiūṇaṁ kayāvi puṇa kōuēṇa vina ēsō । dēvō maē mahappā palōiō akayaputrēṇa || 3739।।
iya ciṁtiūṇa ēgaggamāṇasō aikayatthamappāṇaṁ । mannatō naranāhō taṁ dēvaṁ thuṇiumādattō || 3740 ।।
tē cciya dhannā mayā tēsi jīyaṁ pi mannimō sahalaṁ । jē niyayajammamajjhē niyaṁti taṁ ēkkavāraṁ pi ।। 3741 ।।
jē uṇa paidiyaī ciya saṁciyasuhakammanimmalappāṇō । tuha muhakamalē diṭṭhi mahuyarilīlaṁ nayaṁti niyaṁ ।। 3742 ||
tēsi tu kiṁ bhaṇāmō tē cciya bhuvaṇattaē vi sārayarā । tuha daṁsaṇaō niccaṁ dalaṁti jē puvvapāvāī ।। 3743 ||
tuha guṇaparamatthaṁ jāṇiūṇa jē dēvasaṁthuṇaṁti tumaṁ । thōyavvā annēsi pi hr̥ti tē nūṇamairēṇa || 3744।।
tuha guṇalavaṁ pi nāhaṁ nāha ! viyāṇāmi niruvaēsō jaṁ । taha vi gurubhattibhariō bhaṇāmi vinnatti vayaṇamiṇaṁ
jaṁ ki pi tijayasāmiya ! tuh uvarikayāē hōi bhattīē । taṁ saṁpajjau sēyaṁ sayā vi maha hōu antrēṇa ।। 3746।।
annaṁpi kuṇaha ēkkaṁ karuṇaṁ kāūṇa majjha uvarimmi । niyapayakamalēhiṁtō vālēyavvā maha na bhattī || 3747 ।।
i thuṇiūṇaṁ taha paṇamiūṇa jiṇapaḍimamasamabhattīē । sō caṁdakittirāyā viṇiggaō jiṇaharāu bahi ||48
tattō nayarābhimuhaṁ gaṁtuṁ jā kira kaō abhippāō । naranāhēṇaṁ sahasatti tāva puvvē disābhāē ||3749।।
diṭṭhaṁ viyaṁbhamāṇaṁ kiṁsuyakusumāruṇaṁ kiraṇajālaṁ । gayaṇaggavilaggaṁ pāsiūṇa taṁ citai sa ēvaṁ ।। 3750 ।।
saṁjhabbharāyasarisaṁ kimēyamubbhāsaē iō ēvaṁ । saṁjhārāō nahavai tāva imō janna saṁbhavai ।। 3751।।
divasāvasāṇasamaē havējja sō pacchimāē āsāē । ēsā puṇa puvvadisā rayaṇīya bahū aikkaṁtā ।। 3752 ।।
tāki pabhāyapāyā jāyā rayaṇī vi ēsa aruṇudaō । ēsō vina ghaḍai cciya ahijjatō maṇē sammaṁ ||3753 ।।
nakkhattēṇaṁ jēṇaṁ vihāi rayaṇī imammi māsammi । taṁ matthayappaēsā ajja vi thēvaṁ aikkataṁ ।। 3754।।
tō disi dāhō kimimō sō vi na saṁbhamai chinnamūlō jaṁ । sō hōi ēsa bhūmītalassa saṁlaggaō cēva ।। 3755 ।।
gāmō kō vipattiō havējja kiṁ ēsa iha paēsammi । sō vi na saṁbhavai jaō jēttiya dūrē imō tēō ।। 3756 ।।
taṭṭhāṇāō paraō gāmō saṁvasai suddhapuvvāē | ūsara bhūmittaṇaō davō vi na hu ēttha saṁbhavai || 3757॥
naya maṇuyāṇa dāhāṇaṁ ēyaṁ kayāvi saṁjāyaṁ । sammaṁ citijjaṁtō aggissa na ēsa tēō vi ।। 3758 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
117
jamhā dhūmasihā iha samullasaṁtī na dīsaē kā vi । na ya jālā vi jalatī avalōijjai kavilakaṁtī ।। 3759 ।।
kuṁkuma-kusuṁbha- kēsarasarisacchāō avaṭṭiō ēsō । vilasai tēyavisēsō tā ki pi imaṁ na jāṇāmi ।। 3760 ।।
aha
kiṁ bahuṇā parikappiēṇa tatthēva jhatti gaṁtr̥̄ṇa । avaṇijjau hiyayāō ēsa asēsō vi saṁdēhō || 3761 ।।
iya citiūṇa rāyā āsannō jāva tassa tēyassa । gacchai tā sō tēō aggēyadisāē saṁkatō ||3762 ।।
tō ciṁtai puhaivaī vijjuppuṁjō kimēsa saṁcaliō । niyaṭhāṇāō ahavā visaṁvayai dūramēyaṁ pi ।।3763।।
jamhā khaṇē khaṇē sō adaṁsaṇī hōi dīsaē taha ya । daṁsaṇapahamacayaṁtō ēsō puṇa calai ṭhāṇāō || 3764।।
tā kiṁ sō cciya ēsō tēō jō dēvamaṁdirē diṭṭhō । inhi maē adiṭṭhō hōūṇa iha ṭṭhiō payaḍō || 3765 ।।
pēcchaṇaēṇa sayaṁ sō diṭṭhō puvvi maē paraṁ tattha । tēṇēva saha paṇaṭṭhī ēsō puṇa kēvalō tēō ।। 3766 ।।
niuṇaṁ pi nirūvijjaṁtamēyamamhāṇa nicchayapahammi । uyarai nēya kahamavi atthi puṇō nicchaō ēsō ।। 3767॥
purisavisēsēṇa sacēyaṇēṇa kēṇai ahiṭṭiō ēsa । tēyavisēsō ciṭṭhai kahannahā saṁkamai ēvaṁ
।।3768।।
tā jattha tattha vaccau ēsō ēyassa jāva paramatthō । tēyassa na vinnāō maē niyattāmi nō tāva || 3769 ।।
iya citiūṇa turiyaṁ jāva gaō aggaō puṇō rāyā । tāva pahāpuṁjō sō saṁkamiō dāhiṇadisāē || 3770 ।।
tassāṇumaggalaggō pahāviō patthivō puṇō jāva । nēraiyāē disāē gayaṁtaō taṁ pahājālaṁ ।। 3771।।
tattha vi jāva pavattō baddhapainnō narēsarō gaṁtuṁ । tāva taō tēyāō pariṣphuḍā niggayā vāyā ||3772 ।।
tīē sō paḍisiddhō jaha bhō bhō ! bhūmigōyarā inhi । mā ēhi sammuhō mē avarāhā tinni tē khamiyā ॥। 3373।।
garuyā vi maē paḍhamaṁ karuṇaṁ kāūṇa niyaya garimāē । jai ēsi saṁpayaṁ puṇa tō mā bhaṇihisi na mē kahiyaṁ । । 3774 ।।
jai dīhajīviyavvaṁ abhivaṁchasi attaṇō tumaṁ kaha vi । tā jāhi niyaṁ gēhaṁ piyasu jalaṁ sīyalaṁ suiraṁ ।। 3775।।
aha savvassa vi bhaṇiyassa tassa akkhuhiyamāṇasō bhaṇiyaṁ । paccuttaraṁ nariṁdō karēi pacchāṇuputrvīē ।। 3776।।
jaṁ ki pi jaṁpiyamiṇaṁ ahō mahāpurisa ! jaṁpiyaṁ tumaē । taṁ savvamasaṁbaddhaṁ tassa phalaṁ kiṁ ci vi na atthi ।। 3777।।
jaṁ tāva taē bhaṇiyaṁ piyasu jalaṁ sīyalaṁ ti kira vayaṇaṁ । tattha himakālarayaṇīē pacchimāē tisā kassa ।। 3778 ।
tīē viṇā vi tōyaṁ na tuccha kālaṁ pi kō vi āviyai । suiraṁ pi tassa pāṇaṁ mahāviruddhaṁ kaha na hōi ||3779।।
jaṁ ca payaṁpiyamēyaṁ tumaē niyamaṁdiraṁ vayāhi tti । tattha gihaṁ mē puhaī tatthēva ṭhiōmhi sayakālaṁ ||3780।।
jaṁ ca taē bhaṇiyamiṇaṁ dīhaṁ jai jīviyaṁ samahilasasi । tattha vi kiṁ saṁdēhō bhaṇijjaē siddhavatthummi || 3781 ।।
jē jīvā saṁsārē surēsarāī vi kīḍapajjaṁtā । tē jīyamattaṇō dīhamēva savvēvi icchati ।। 3782 ।।
jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tuha khamiyā mahāvarāhā maē purā tinni । taṁ savvahā vi vivarīyamēva jaṁ tujjha avarāhā || 3783।।
savvē vi maē khamiyā maha nayarē jaṁ samāgaō taṁ si । majjha apucchāē jahicchamētthaviyarēsi rayaṇīē ।। 3784 ।।
taha majjhavi appāṇaṁ gōvēsi na hōsi payaḍarūvēṇa । paṭṭhīē ēṁtassa vi paraō paraō palāēsi ||3785।।
ēvaṁ kayāvarāhō jēṇa maē taṁsi nē ya niggahiō । tēṇa khamiyaṁ pina maē tujjha tumaṁ majjha khamasi ||3786।।
ēēṇa pagārēṇaṁ ahō mahāpurisasavvamēvēyaṁ । tumaē payaṁpiyaṁ jaṁ taṁ jāyaṁ palaviyappāyaṁ ।। 3787 ।।
iya dūsēuṁ kamasō jutti juyaṁ parapayaṁpiyaṁ savvaṁ । tunhikkō saṁjāō jāva mahī maṁḍalāhivaī || 3788।।
tāva puṇō vi pahāmaṁḍalāu tattō viṇiggayā vāṇī । savvamahō taṁ vuccai jaṁ puhaī appacaṁga tti ||3789।।
ēkkēkkasō samaggaṁ pi amha dūsēsi jaṁpiyaṁ tuṭṭhō । appāṇaṁ tu na jāṇasi dētō aṇuciyamuvālabhē ।।
jēhuṁ tīha rayaṇiyarā kassa vi tē dēti daṁsaṇaṁ na niyaṁ । patthaṁtassa vi pāsammi saṁṭhiyassā vi maṇuyassa ।। 3791।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-118-to-118.json ==========================
118
caṁdakittinivakahā
nāyaṁ imaṁ pi na taē ēttiya kālēṇa nivaiṇā hōuṁ । uttāṇō bhamasi muhāē appaṇī jaṁpiyavvēṇa ।। 3792 । ।
aha bhai punāhō bhadda jaō ērisaṁ maē nāyaṁ । rayaṇīē tēṇa bhamāmi nayarabāhimmi ēgōhaṁ | | 3793।।
rayaṇīyarē niyaṁtō niya nayarōvaddavassa rakkhaṭṭā । tēsi nayarapavēsaṁ nivārijaṁ niggahatthaṁ ca ।। 3794।।
bēi naridābhimuhaṁ puṇō visā tēyaniggayā vāṇī । rē kappaḍiya ! na ciṭṭhasi tunhikkō niṭhuraṁ bēṁtō ।। 3795।।
jaha jaha sahāmi jaṁpāmi kōmalaṁ taha tahāruhasi sīsē । viccuyaḍakkassa va pāyavēyaṇāmaṁta rahiyassa ।। 3796 ।।
duvvayahi imēhiṁ nūṇaṁ taṁ hōsi lōgapālassa । pāhuṇaō dāhiṇadisigayassa natthēttha saṁdēhō || 3797 ।।
aha jaṁpai pahasaṁtō puṇō vi puhaīsarō salīlāē । saccamiṇaṁ tuha vayaṇaṁ na kōvi annō vayai ēvaṁ ।। 3798।।
ahamēttha lōgapālō saṁpai ciṭṭhāmi dāhiṇadisāē । tassa mama pāhuṇō taṁ havēsi ukkhāyakhaggassa || 3799।।
dubvayaṇāī vayaṁtō imāī pāgayajaṇassa uciyāī । aviyakkaṁtō cittammi kiṁci visamaṁ samaṁ vā vi ।। 3800 ।।
puṇa vi sakōvaṁ sā vayai bhāraī tēyamaṁḍalappabhavā । tuha nūṇa punnakālō vaṭṭai tēṇēha kaḍḍhēuṁ ।। 3801 ।।
āṇīō sihaḍhēṇaṁ saṁpai tō jaṁpaē puṇō rāyā । kō ērisaṁ viyāṇai vōttuṁ anō tumaṁ mōtuṁ ||3802।।
punnaṁ bhannai sukayaṁ tassa ya kālō kahijjaē samaō । sō majjha vaṭṭai taō tēṇāhaṁ ētthaṁ āṇīō || 3803 ||
jattha durāyārō taṁ diṭṭhīē majjha gōyaraṁ pattō । tō niggahiūṇa tumaṁ hōhissa mahaṁ suhī inhi ||3804।।
puṇa bhai nivaṁ vāṇī viṇiggayā tēyamaṁḍalāhiṁtō । paṁḍiccēṇaṁ taha pōrisēṇa aimōḍiō taṁ si ।। 3805 ।।
ēsa tumaṁ saṁpai pāvamajjhapajalaṁtakōvajalaṇassa । jālāsu akālē cciya līlaṁ salahassa aṇuhavasi ।। 3806।।
aha jaṁpai puhaivaī kōvasihī tujjha pasimihī jhatti । majjha vilasaṁtapukkharaujjalataravāridhārāē ।। 3807 ।।
aha nivaduvvayaṇasarābhighāyaparitāḍiō vva hiyayammi । tassullasaṁtanimmalamaū hajālassa majjhāō ।। 3808।।
purisavisēsō sahasatti kōvi aipayaḍadaṁsaṇō jāō । savvaṁgaṁ rayaṇāharaṇabhāsurō surakumārō vva ।। 3809।।
tēṇa karavālalaṭṭhī jhatti samāyaḍḍhiyā jhalakkaṁtī । vijjulaya vva karālā karayalagahiyāē aha tīē ।। 3810।।
sō hakkai naranāhaṁ phōḍitō nahayalaṁ va saddēṇa rē duṭṭha ! dhiṭṭimaphalaṁ niyaṁ iyāṇi pi aṇuhavas ।। 3811 ।।
itubha kā vi sattī tō purisō hōsu kiṁ paḍikkhēsi । aha taṁ puhaīnāhō sā'vannaṁ bhaṇai hasiūṇa ।। 3812।।
puvvaṁ ciya purisō haṁ vihiṇā ciṭṭhāmi nimmiō tāva | hōmi visēsēṇa puṇō saṁpai purisō tuhāṇāē ।। 3813 ।।
kiṁ ēttiyasaṁraṁbha kāūṇa vi aiciraṁ vilaṁbēsi । ajja vi paharasi sigdhaṁ iya bhaṇiuṁ kaḍdiuṁ khaggaṁ ।। 3814 ।।
naranāhō nikkhōhō jāva ṭhiō tassa sammuhō tāva । tēṇa purisēṇa mukkō khaggapahārō naridassa ।। 3815।।
rannā vi tassa khaggō dukhaṁḍiō niyaya khaggadaṁḍēṇaṁ । khaṁḍijjatō abhiḍiūṇa sō khaṁḍaē mauḍaṁ । । 3816॥
jamajīhāē saricchā pacchā āyaḍḍhiyā churī tēṇa । sā vi taha ccēva nivēṇa muṭṭhisēsā kayā jhattī ।। 3817 ।।
gurumaccharēṇa aha sō laggaṁtō bāhuḍaṁḍajujjhēṇa । gahiuṁ vāmakalāīē vāmahatthēṇa naravaṇā ।। 3818 ।।
niyamatyayassa urvāriṁ vārāō tinni bhāmiūṇa taō । mukkō maṁda maṁda dayāē bhūmīē mucchagaō ||3819॥
ninnaṭṭha savvacēṭṭhō ciṭṭhai kaṭṭhē va jāva nipphaṁdō । sō purisō tāva narēsarēṇa karuṇāparavasēṇa ।। 3820 ।।
niyamuttarīyavatthaṁcalēṇa kāūṇa pavaṇamaipabalaṁ । saṁvāhiūṇa aṁgēsu laddhayannaō vihiō || 3821।।
caliō sāsō ummīliyāī nayaṇāī caliyamaṁgēhiṁ । tassa nariṁdēṇa taō sapucchiō bhadda ! kiṁ tujjha ।। 3822 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-119-to-119.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvaṇi dacariyaṁ
।
119
ajja vi bāhai aṁgaṁ kiṁ pitaō sō purōgayaṁ daṭhṭhē । rāyāṇaṁ jhatti samuṭṭhiūṇa jujjhujjuō jāō ।।3823।।
apahuppaṁtō sō tassa dēhasāmatthaō nariṁdassa । vijjābalēṇa laggō samaccharō jujjhiuṁ tattō ॥ 3824।।
uppāḍiūṇa rukkhaṁ muyai naridassa sammuhaṁ garuyaṁ । sō purisō tamapattaṁ narēsarō aṁtarē caiva ।। 3825 ।।
ētaṁ khaṁḍākhaṁḍi aṇēgahā kuṇai khaggaḍaṁḍēṇa । aha sō purisō gayaṇē uppāyai pavvayaṁ garuyaṁ ।। 3826 ।।
sō matthayappa sē nivassa nivaḍēi ajja vi na jāva । tāva taō ṭhāṇāō ōsariūṇaṁ nivō jhatti ।। 3827 ।।
chēyattaṇēṇa gayaṇē uppaiūṇaṁ girissa tassē va । siharammi samārūḍhō girīniviṭṭō mahīē || 3828 ||
vijjāsāmatthēṇaṁ puṇō vi sō pavvaō saha nivēṇa । tēṇa samukkhittō aṁbarammi dūrayaramairēṇa ।। 3829 ।।
rāyā vi gaṁḍasēlaṁ pavvayasiharāu ḍhāliuṁ ēkkaṁ । sayamuppaiūṇa gaō mahīyalē jhilai taṁ uvalaṁ ॥ 3830।।
tēṇa tahā taṁ sēla acchōḍai mahiyalammi nivaḍataṁ । sayasikkarō disāsuṁ jaha vaccai takkhaṇē cēva ॥ 3831 ।।
aha tassa vikkamaguṇaṁ nivassa taṁ tārisaṁ niēūṇa । cittacamakkāravihāṇapaccalaṁ sayalalōyassa || 3832 ||
mōttūṇa samarasaṁraṁbhamavaṇaō pāyapaṁkayajuyammi । sō purisō jhatti karēi khāmaṇaṁ payaṁpatō ||3833।।
jaṁ kiṁ pi kannakaḍuyaṁ pajaṁpiyaṁ saṁpayaṁ maē tumha । kāyassa taha kilēsō jō vihu uppāiō kō vi ॥ 3834।।
ēttiya kālaṁ kāūṇamasama saṁgāmavaiyaraṁ ēyaṁ । hōūṇa pasannamaṇō savvaṁ taṁ khamaha maha inhi ।। 3835 ।।
aha taṁ gahiraṁ hatthēṇa patthivō jhatti uṭṭhavēūṇa । ēgapaēsē nēuṁ uvavēsēuṁ bhagai ēvaṁ ॥3836।।
as rarāhō vihiō bhadda ! taē hōi kōi amha maṇaṁ । tō tattha khāmaṇamiṇaṁ kāyavvaṁ hōi tuha juttaṁ ।। 3837 ||
kāūṇa vi uvayāraṁ jaṁ khāmasi taṁ puṇō ai viruddhaṁ । aha vimhaiō dūraṁ sō purisō jaṁpaē ēvaṁ ।। 3838 ||
acchariyaṁ jaṇai imaṁ tuha vayaṇaṁ maha maṇammi naranāha ! । jaṁ avayāraṁ pi kayaṁ jaṁpasi uvayārabhāvēṇa ।। 3839।।
aha rāyā taṁ purisaṁ āha jahā bhadda! nisuṇa iha juti । jaha atthi taē vihiō uvayārō saṁpayaṁ majjha ।। 3840 ।।
jaṁ tāva kannaḍuyaṁ kiṁpi taē majjha sammuhaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । tēṇa maē vinnāyaṁ jaṁ ērisaniṭhuragirāhi ||3841 ।।
savvō vi jaṇō ēvaṁ dūmijjai māṇasēṇa dukkhēṇa । tā savvahā vi na maē bhaṇiyavvaṁ ērisaṁ kaḍuyaṁ ।। 3842 ॥
kassa vi jaṇassa samuhaṁ raṁkassa vi sēviyāvarāhassa । tattō tuha vayaṇāō ēsa vivēō sappanna || 3843॥
ajjhāvayāu bālattaṇammi jagaī jaṇāu rajjammi । jō na guṇō mama jāō sō ajja tumāu saṁpannō || 3844 ।।
samarasamāraṁbhēṇa vi kāyakilēsō tahāvihō kō vi । majjha na jāō kiṁ puṇa vāyā mama payammi sō paḍiyō ||
vāyāmō puṇa niccaṁ uvēcca purisēṇa hōi karaṇijjō । tattō jāyai dēhassa lāghavāī guṇō jēṇa ।। 3846 ||
tassa pamāyavasēṇaṁ kayassa pakkhō vi samahiō jāō । tatthajja ujjamamahaṁ kāraviō kēttiyaṁ pitaē ।। 3847 ॥
ēyāē juttīē dō uvayārā taē kayā majjha । tattha tuha tēṇa khēō thēvō vi na hōi kāyavvō ।। 3848 ।।
taṁ saccaviyaṁ tuma jaṁ vuccai sajjaṇō suruṭṭhō vi । kuṇai parassuvayāraṁ aviyārō na uṇa avayāraṁ ।। 3849॥
āyanniūṇa iyarāya jaṁpiyaṁ juttisaṁjuyaṁ savvaṁ । niyamāṇasammi ciṁtai sō vimhayaparavasō purisō ।। 3850 ।।
ēyassa ahō garimā ahō vivēō ahō khamā asamā । suyaṇattamahō uciyaṇṇuyā ahō vayaṇavinnāsō || 3851 ।।
tā savvahā vi maha ciṁtiyassa kajjassa sāhagō ēsō । saṁbhāvijjai niyamā kahēmi tā hiyamēyassa ।। 3852 ।।
isa citiūṇa bhaṇiō purisēṇa narēsarō taō tēṇa । jaha caṁdakittināmō tumaṁ nariṁdō jayapasiddhō || 3853।।
yi kittiribhuvaṇaṁtarō ya savvattha najjasē payaḍō । jai tumhē aṇujāṇaha kahēmi tō tumhamappāṇaṁ ।। 3854।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-120-to-120.json ==========================
120
caṁdakittini kahā
aha ratnā paḍibhaṇiō sō purisō bhadda ! kahasu vīsatthō । savvaṁ pi kō tumaṁ kiṁ nimittamētthāgaōsi tti ।। 3855 ।।
kēṇa va kajjēṇa taē ēttiyamittō kaō samāraṁbhō । iya sōccā nivavayaṇaṁ sō purisō kahiumāḍhattō ।। 3856 ।।
iha ēravaēvāsē vēyaḍḍhē dāhiṇāē sēḍhī । rayaṇauranayara sāmī āsi nariṁdō rayaṇacūḍō || 3857 ।।
tassaṁtēurapavarā rayaṇavaī nāma piyayamā āsi । tēsi jāō puttō maṇicūḍō nāma guṇakaliō || 3858।।
puṇa saṁjāyā dhūyā tassuvarigaē hiṁ bahuyavāsēhiṁ । tīsē ya jammakālē niyadēhapahāhiṁ sūiharaṁ ॥ 3859।।
nīsēsaṁ pi pahāsiyamaō kayaṁ sē pabhāvaī nāma । sā sasikala vva niccaṁ vaḍḍhai dhāīpariggahiyā ।। 3860 ।।
sā pubvajjiya sukayā nayaṇamaṇāṇaṁdayāriṇī jāyā । aṁtēurapamuhāṇaṁ savvēsi rāyalōyāṇaṁ ।। 3861 ।।
hatthāō hatyaṁta ramaṇusamayaṁ saṁcarēi sā tēsiṁ । niddāyaṁtī kahamavi jai muccai tēhi sayaṇijjē || 3862 ||
anna samayammi nayarē jiṇidassa maṁdirē jāō । jattā mahūsavō tattha savvavijjāharā miliyā ।। 3863 ||
rāyā vi rayaṇacūḍō savvēṇa vi pariyaṇēṇa saṁjuttō । tattha gaō vaṁdittā dēvē ēgatya āsīṇō ।। 3864 ।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ khaṇēṇaṁ dō cāraṇasamaṇayā samāyāyā । guṇacaṁdō muṇicaṁdō nāmēṇaṁ gayaṇamaggēṇa ।। 3865 ।।
tē abhivaṁdiya dēvē tassēva ya rayaṇacūḍarāyassa । āsannammi viinnāsaṇē nisannā samāgaṁtuṁ ।। 3866 ।।
tē paṇamiūṇa rāyā tēhiṁ samaṁ jāva ciṭṭhai kuṇaṁtō । dhammaviyārakahāō tā tattha samāgayā dhūyā || 3867 ।।
dhāīkaḍīē caḍiyā pabhāvaī rayaṇabhūsiyasarīrā । tivarisajammā avvatta taṁ jaṁpirīkannasuhajaṇaṇī ।। 3868 ।।
taṁ rayaṇacūḍavijjāharēsarō pāsiūṇa sahasa tti । ginhai tīsē pāsāu appaṇō pāṇijuyalēṇa ॥ 3869।।
tō tēsi samaṇāṇaṁ paṇāmaē pāyapaumajuyalēsu । kōmalavayaṇēṇa taō tē vihu taṁ dhammalārbhēti ।। 3870 ।।
piuṇō pāṇiṭhiyacciya tōsāviya saṁtavayaṇasayavattā । papphullanayaṇanaliṇāmuhakamalāī palōyaṁtī ।। 3871 ।।
tēsiṁ cēva muṇīṇaṁ jā ciṭṭhai tāva taṁ tahā daṭhṭhē । guṇacaṁdamuṇīpabhaṇai suyammi dāūṇamuvaōgaṁ || 3872।।
bhaddē ! tujjha bhavissai bhattā kharyāraṁdapaṇayapayakamalō । khayarāṇa cakkavaṭṭī aō karijjāsi bahudhammaṁ । । 3873।।
cāraṇamuṇissa taṁ tassa jaṁpiyaṁ pāsavattiṇā piuṇō । maṇicūḍēṇa vi nisuyaṁ anēṇa vi khayaravaggēṇa ।। 3874 ।।
tattō khaṇaṁtarēṇaṁ cāraṇamuṇiṇō gayā niyaṭṭhāṇaṁ । rāyā vi rayaṇacūḍō niyayā vāsammi saṁpattō ॥ 3874।।
aha kēttiyammi kālē aikaṁtē gayaṇavallahapurammi । jō āsi cakkavaṭṭī khayarāṇaṁ sō gaō nihaṇaṁ ।। 3876 ।।
ēyaṁ ca rayaṇacūḍēṇa rāiṇā mēhamālināmāō । niya sēvayāu nisuyaṁ samāgayāō taō nayarā ।। 3877 ।।
tō rayaṇacūḍakhayarēsarō taō taṁ giraṁ nisāmēuṁ vajjāhaō vva jāō gaṁḍayalanihittakarakamalō ।। 3878 ।।
citai maṇammi ēvaṁ aciṁtiyaṁ kaha ahō imaṁ jāyaṁ । tassa guṇacaṁdamuṇiṇō vayaṇaṁ kiṁ annahā hōhī ।। 3879।।
dhūyā pabhāvaī mē saṁpai jōvvaṇasiriṁ samāruhai । tīē pariṇayaṇakālō hōhī tā kiṁ karēyavvaṁ ॥ 3880 ।।
iya niccamuvvahaṁtō ciṁtābharapūriyaṁ niyaṁ cittaṁ । kālaṁ gamēi duhiō khayaranariṁdō rayaṇacūḍō ||3881 ।।
aha annayā muṇidō guṇabhaddō nāma cāraṇamuṇīhiṁ । bahuēhiṁ pariyariyō samāgaō tammi nayarammi || 3882 ।।
nāūṇaṁ taṁ samāgayamujjāṇē rayaṇacūḍakhayariṁdō । sahasa tti vaṁdaṇatthaṁ tassa gaō paramabhattīē || 3883 ||
taṁ vaṁdiūṇa paharisavasēṇa pulaijjamāṇasavvaṁgō । kattha vi uciyapaēsē uvavisiu saviṇayaṁ suṇai ।। 3884 ।।
guṇabhaddamaṇidēṇaṁ kīraṁti dhammadēsaṇaṁ pavaraṁ । laddhāvasarō pacchā pucchai niyasaṁsayamasēsaṁ ।। 3885 ।।
bhayavaṁ ! samaē ēkkammi ēttha āsī samāgaō sāhū । guṇacaṁdō nāmēṇa tumhāṇaṁ cēva sō sīsō ।। 3886 ।।
jattā samayammi jiṇidamaṁdirē tēṇa sannisantrēṇa । mama hatthasaṁṭhiyāē dhūyāē ti varisavayāē ।। 3887 ।।
।

sirimunisuvvayajidicariyaṁ
1
121
samuhaṁ pabhāvaīē bhaṇiyaṁ jaṁ tujjha hōhiī bhattā । khayarāṇa cakkavaṭṭī taṁ vayaṇaṁ annahā jāyaṁ ॥ 3888 ||
tō ki tēṇa vi guṇavaṁtaēṇa muṇiṇā ajāṇiyaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । tō sūriṇā sabhaṇiō sā pariṇīyā kimantrēṇa ॥ 3889 ।।
tō bhaṇiyaṁ khayaranarēsarēṇa sā atthi ajja vi kumārī । kiṁtu sakhēyaracakkī arisīhō niṇamaṇupattō ।। 3890 ।।
bēi muṇidō kharidamēvamullavasi tō tumaṁ kamhā । jaṁ saṁjāyaṁ guṇacaṁdasāhuṇō annahā vayaṇaṁ ||3891 ।।
rāyā jaṁpaṛa bhayavaṁ kaha puṇa taṁ annahā na saṁpannaṁ । guṇacaṁdasāhuvayaṇaṁ tumhē maha saṁsayaṁ haraha ।। 3892।।
tō sūrī uvaōgaṁ suyammi dāūṇa bhaṇai kharyāridaṁ । guṇacaṁdēṇa jamuttaṁ bhāvatthaṁ tassa nō muṇasi ॥ 3893॥
guṇacaṁdavayaṇatattaṁ ēvaṁ jō kō vi tujjha dhūyāē । bhattā bhavissaē sō hōhī khayarāṇa cakki ti ॥ 3894 ॥
tīsē puvvabhavajjiyapunnāē pāviūṇa bhaṭṭittaṁ । paḍhamamacakkī vi narō pacchā hōhī khayaracakkī ।। 3895 ।।
puvvaṁ pi khayaracakkī jō uṇa sō nēya tujjha dhūyāē । hōhī bhattā kharida ēsa muṇivayaṇabhāvattha ||3896।।
rāyā vinnava puṇō sūriṁ bhayavaṁ ! kimannajammammi । punnaṁ kayamēyāē jēṇēsā ērisapabhāvā ।।3897।।
tō āha muṇivariṁdō khayaraṁda suṇēha jaha kayaṁ tīē । punnaṁ annami bhavē taṁ taha sāhēmi tuha savvaṁ ।। 3898 । ।
rāīmaī kahā -
iha cēva ya ēravaēvāsē vissauramatthi varanayaraṁ । tatthāsi rāmadēvō nāmēṇa vaṇī dhaṇasamiddhō ।। 3899 ।।
tassa ya bhajjā rāīmai tti khvāiguṇagaṇasamiddhā । annasamayammi kēṇa kajjēṇa gaō saujjāṇaṁ ।। 3900 ।।
daṇa tattha sāhu kaṁpi taō vaṁdaē pahidumaṇō । sōūṇa taō dhammaṁ paḍibuddhō sāvaō jāō ।। 3901 ।।
gaṁtūṇa taō gēhaṁ niyamahilāē purō pasaṁsēi । taṁ sāhuṁ sā ciṭṭhai mōṇēṇa na kiṁ pi jaṁpēi ।। 3902।।
sō citai maha gihiṇī jai ēsā vihu karēi jiṇadhammaṁ । tō majjha suhēṇaṁ ciya dhammō nivvahai nivvigghō ॥
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyā sā tēṇa tumaṁ pi ēhi daṁsēmi । jēṇa tuha pavarasāhuṁ taṁ dhammō jēṇa maha kahiō || 3904।।
tassuvarōhēṇa gayā sā tēṇa samaṁ muṇissa pāsammi । muṇiō dhammō vi paraṁ na pariṇaō kō vi cittammi ।। 3905 ।।
tō paṇamiūṇa sāhuṁ samāgayā niyagihaṁ saha piēṇa । sō rāmadēvasaḍḍhō dēvālayasaṁṭhiyāō taō ।। 3906 ।।
āicappabhiīṇaṁ paḍimāō savvadēvakhvāṇaṁ । gēhāō nīhārai ṭhāvara jiṇasaṁtiyaṁ paḍimaṁ ।।3907।।
pūēi paidiṇaṁ ci taṁ sō vaṁdēi ca paramabhattīē । rāimaī puṇa na kuṇai jiṇapaḍimāē paṇāmāī ।। 3908।।
niyabhattī kiṁci vi tassuvarōhēṇa jai kuṇai kiṁpi । sō pannavēi bahuhō vi sā tārisī cēva ||3909।।
cittammi vahai khēyaṁ nīhāriyapuvvadēvarūvāṇaṁ । āṇēuṁ pacchannaṁ gigadēsē ṭhavai tāī ।। 3910॥
pūēiya paidiyahaṁ taṁ nāuṁ rāmadēvasaḍḍhō vi । citai jaha pēccha ahō kammāṇaṁ pariṇai cittā ।। 3911 ॥
ruvāī guṇanivahō jaha ēīē viṇimmiō vihiṇā । jiṇadhammammi pariṇaī taha na kayā tēṇa thēvaṁ pi ।। 3912 ।।
ahavā savvaguṇāṇaṁ savvattha vi dīsaē na samudāō । kammi vi viralammi jaṇē jai hōjjā sukayapunnammi ।। 3913
ēīē tāva dīsai hōṁtō na jiṇidadhammapariṇāmō । sāvayadhūyaṁ pariṇēmi kaṁ pi tā maggiuṁ inhi ।। 3914।।
mai annattha gayammi vi jaha sā bhakti karēi sayamēva । jiṇapaḍimāē sāhuṇa dēi taha bhattapāṇāī ।। 3915 ।।
aha sō kassa vi vatthavvayassa saḍḍhassa kāraṇaṁ kahiuṁ । patthēūṇaṁ dhūyaṁ mōhiṇināmēṇa pariṇēuṁ ।। 3916 ।।
āi niyammi gihē taṁ daṭṭhaṇaṁ samāgayaṁ tattha । citai rāimaī vihu pariṇīyā sāviyā ēsā ।। 3917 ।।
uvari majjha imēṇaṁ daiēṇa jiṇidadhammatisiēṇa । taruṇēṇa vihaviṇā vihu na uṇō visayāṇurāēṇa ||3819।।
tā jai ēēṇa samaṁ saṁpai rūsaṇayamāḍhavēmi ahaṁ । tōhaṁ hōmi na kiṁci vi ēsā gharasāmiṇī hōi ।। 3919 ॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-122-to-122.json ==========================
122
rāimaīkahā
puvvaṁ pi tāva na kayaṁ maē maṇunaṁ imassa jaṁpaiṇō । cittaṁ nāūṇa imā jiṇapaḍimā pūiyā nēya ।। 3920 ।।
jai vi mama natthi bhāvō hiyayammi tahā vi bhattaṇō cittaṁ । aṇuvattēyavvaṁ ciya jassa pasāēṇa vilasāmi ।। 3921।
ajja vinaki piṭṭha ciṭṭhai maha ēttiyammi vi gayammi । jā ajja vi pasaramimā navariṇīyā na pāvēi ||
tāva sayaṁ ci savvaṁ karēmi ēyassa bhattaṇōbhimayaṁ । jaha puvvaṭhiī ēcciyaṭiō sayā ēsa maha vahai ।। 3923 ।।
iya citiūṇa ēsā saṁvariūṇa visāyachāyaṁ pi । hōūṇa pasannamuhī rāimaī bhaṇai niya daiyaṁ ।। 3924 ।।
nāha ! pasāō ēsō majjha mahaṁtō taē kaō ajja । jaṁ maha bahiṇī ēsā majjha sahāyā samāṇīyā || 3925 ।।
sōūṇa tīē vayaṇaṁ tō ciṁtai rāmadēvavarasaḍḍhō । iya nāyaṁ āsi maē jaha ēsā rūsihī majjha ।। 3926 ।।
jā pēcchāmi imaṁ tā savisēsaṁ pahasiyāṇaṇā jāyā । tā kiṁ pi auvvamimaṁ jāyaṁ dhammappabhāvēṇaṁ ।। 3927 ।।
iya citiūṇa tō rāmadēvavarasāvaō imaṁ vayai । daiē jaha cēva taē jaṁpiyamēyaṁ taccēva || 3828 ||
ēsō cciya abhippāō maha cittē kiṁ pi jaṁ tumaṁ kiccaṁ । giha saṁtiyaṁ na sakkasi kāuṁ taṁ kāravissāmi ।।3929॥
ēīē pāsāō i bēṁtō rāmadēvasaḍḍhō sō । citai niyammi cittē jiṇapaḍimā pūyaṇāīyaṁ ।। 3930 ||
rāimaīē vi ēvamēva paricitiyaṁ niyamaṇammi । tammi khaṇē daiyagiraṁ anaṁtaruttaṁ nisāmēuṁ ।। 3931।।
aha sō paḍaṁ jaṁpai ki tu paraṁ tujjha bhīyacittēṇa । na maē tujjha vi kahiyaṁ paḍhamamimaṁ āḍhavatēṇa ।।3932।।
tā su daramēva imaṁ jāyaṁ jaṁ sammayaṁ tuha maṇē vi । sā bēi saṁmayaṁ ciya maha taṁ jaṁ tumha abhiruiyaṁ ।। 3933॥
iya tavtrayaṇaṁ sōuṁ citai sō sāvaō niyamaṇammi । mannāmi imaṁ jai tuha jiṇaṁdadhammē vi hōi ruī ।। 3934॥
rāimaī puṇa citai jiṇapaḍimā pūyaṇāiyaṁ inhi । jai vi karissāmi ahaṁ taha vi imō mannihī kavaḍaṁ । । 3935।।
jamhā āiccāī parimāṇaṁ pūyaṇābhiōgō mē । daiēṇa majjha diṭṭhō ciṭṭhai tamhā tamabhisaṁkaṁ ।। 3936।।
ēyassa māṇasāō kēṇa vi phēḍēmi niyauvāēṇa । iya citiuṁ viṇicchiya taduvāyā sāyaraṁ tattō ।। 3937 ।।
ēsā jaṁpēi jahā annaṁpi tuhatthi kiṁ pi kahiyavvaṁ । nāha maē taṁ pi tumaṁ ēgaggamaṇō nisāmēhi ।। 3938।।
ēgammi aīyadi bhaṇiyāhaṁ māṇusēṇa kēṇā vi । viyaṇammi kulakamāgayadēvayarūvāṇa jaṁ cāō ।। 3939।।
ajja tuha piyayamēṇaṁ vihiō taṁ tēṇa saṁgayaṁ na kayaṁ । hōi aṇiṭṭha garuyaṁ niyamā ēvaṁ kuṇaṁtāṇaṁ ।। 3940 ॥
tāī gahiūṇa tamhā gigadēsē ṭhavēha tāva tumaṁ । pūijjasu pacchannaṁ pacchā aṇuvattiuṁ daiyaṁ ।। 3941 ॥
tassa vi pāsāō pūyamēsi niccaṁ pi kāravijjāhi । taṁ kayamēttiyakālaṁ tattha pamāṇaṁ tumaṁ inhi ।। 3942 ।।
taṁ bhaṇai rāmadēvō ! muddhē ! kēṇā vi vippaladdhāsi । savvamapamāṇamēyaṁ jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tēṇa tu samuhaṁ ।। 3943॥
savvaṇṇucciya dēvō nīsēsasurāsuriṁdanayacalaṇō । āiccāidēvā savvē viya sēvayā tassa ।। 3944 ।।
jaha hōi cakkaṭṭī savvēsi iyaranaravarāīṇaṁ । namaṇijjapāyapaumō taha sēsasurāṇa ēsa jiṇō ।। 3945 ।।
jō cakkaṭṭī sēvaṁ caiūṇaṁ karai iyara narasēvaṁ । kērisayaṁ tassa phalaṁ havējja tattō tumaṁ kahasu || 3946 ||
aha citai rāimaī niya cittē nūṇamēsa maha bhattā । luṁciyasirēṇa tēṇaṁ mukkō dhatturiūṇa daḍhaṁ ।।3947।।
tō ciṭṭhai ginhaṁtō iṭṭālē ēsa kaṇayabuddhīē । jaṁ puṇa jaccasuvannaṁ taṁ iṁgālaṁ va pariharai ||3948।।
jō paccakkhō dēvō āiccō sayalabhuvaṇavalayassa । taṁ caiumadiṭṭhō jō kō vi jiṇō taṁ muṇai dēvaṁ ।। 3949।।
kiṁ majjha aṇēṇa samaṁ uttarapaccuttarēhiṁ raiēhiṁ । kō vi na atthō sijjhai hōi aṇatthō paraṁ ēkkō ।। 3950॥
tā mannāmi asēsa ēyassa payaṁpiyaṁ imaṁ inhi । jō dēvō majjha maṇē tattō taṁ kō vi nō harai ||3951 ।।
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ rāimaīē jahā tuhāēsō । niccaṁ majjha pamāṇaṁ kaēṇa ki bahuviyārēṇa ।। 3952 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-123-to-123.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
123
tuṭṭhēṇa taō bhaṇiyā rāimaī rāmadēvasaḍḍhēṇa । sāhu piē saṁlaviyaṁ taē imaṁ majjha maṇaharaṇaṁ ।। 3953 ।।
tamhā dēva ya rūvāī tāī nēūṇa kattha vi caēha । jiṇapaḍimā pūyaṁ karēhi nicca pi bhattīē ।। 3954 ।।
paḍivajjiūṇa taṁ taha vayaṇaṁ niyabhattuṇō taō gaṁtu । sā rāimaī mucai sahī gihē dēvarūvāī ।। 3955 ।।
taṁ tajjai ēyāiṁ pūēyavvāiṁ paidiṇaṁ tumaē । pūyāmōllaṁ puṇa majjha pāsaō taṁ gahijjāsi ।। 3956।।
hipa bhaī sā jiṇapaḍimaṁ vittharēṇa pūyaṁtī । vaṁdaṁtī vi ya niccaṁ hiyayaṁ daiyassa avaharai ।। 3957।।
jai ēṁti kē vikaiyā vi sāhuṇō tattha tāṇa pāsammi । vaccai sā bhattīē vaṁdai dhammaṁ ca nisuṇēi ।। 3958 ।।
aha rāmadēvasaḍḍhō citai niyamāṇasammi parituṭṭhō । ēīē dūsaṇamēyamēkkamēvāsi aigaruyaṁ ।। 3959 ।।
jaṁ na kutī dhammaṁ jiṇabhaṇiyaṁ saṁpayaṁ puṇa imaṁ pi । jaṁ kāuṁ pāraddhā tō ēīēna mullaṁ pi ।। 3960।।
iya citiūṇa ahiṇavapariṇīyaṁ sāvayassa sō dhūyaṁ । mōttūṇa garuyamāyaramudā sa cittēṇa pāsēi ।। 3961।।
rāimaī vi sarvākka taṁ mōhiṇināmiyaṁ siṇēhēṇa । paḍhamaṁ pāsai kaivayadiṇāṇi vīsāsajaṇaṇatthaṁ ।। 3962 ॥
tīsē isa tahā jiṇapaḍimā pūyaṇaṁ mitaṁ pacchā । vāvārai iya bhaṇiyaṁ tumaṁ pi kārējja sē dhammaṁ ।। 3963 ॥
cittammi puṇō citai chuṭṭāhaṁ taṁtalīē ēyāē । ēsacciya kuṇau imaṁ jā jāyā sāvayakulammi ||3964।।
aipavalamahāmicchattakammapaḍalassa udayaō tīsē । thēvaṁ pi na saṁjāō maṇammi jiṇadhammapariṇāmō ।। 3965 ।।
tīsē uvarimmi jahā cittaṁ uttarai bhattuṇō dūraṁ । taha sikkhavai savakki paiṇō nihuyaṁ sutassa ||3966।।
taṁ sāvayassa dhūyā ālassaṁ tuha na jujjaē tēṇa । kāuṁ kayā vi bhaddē jiṇavaṁdaṇapūyaṇāīsu ।। 3967।।
aha mōhiṇī vicitaiē sā maha dēi sōhaṇaṁ sikkhaṁ । hōūṇa savakkī bihu kaha pēcchai mōhiyā majjha ।। 3968।।
saḍḍhō vi rāmadēvō niyacittē ērisaṁ vicitē । rāimaī ai sacchā savakkivēhaṁ na dhārēi ।। 3969।।
jēṭṭhā bhaiṇī lahuyaṁ bhaiṇi jaha kaha vi pālaē kā vi । taha ēsā savvaṁ pihū karēi tattiṁ savakkīē ।। 3970 ।।
ēīē vinimittaṁ kuṁkumavatthāiyaṁ samaggaṁ pi । patthēi majjha pāsē ēsā sayamēva sayakālaṁ ।। 3971 ।।
iya sā paipabhiīṇaṁ māyāē māṇasāī raṁjaṁtī । savvattha vi laddhajasā rāimaī harisiyā jāyā ।। 3972 ।।
buddhipaōgēṇa puṇō tahā tahā sā karēi jaha tīsē । urvāra paī pariyaṇō savvō vi paōsamuhavvahai ।। 3973।
jaha jaha ya mōhiṇī sā dūsijjai pariyaṇēṇa paiṇā ya । taha taha sā rāimaī tuṭṭā citai niyamaṇammi ।। 3974 ।।
jaha taiyā kayamēyaṁ maē maṇunnaṁ jayā palōēḍaṁ । pariṇīyaṁ pi savakki ahaṁ na jāyā payaḍakōvā ।। 3975 ।।
tēṇa uvāēṇa taō niya sāmittaṁ maē na hāraviyaṁ । ēsā vi niyasavakkī mōhiṇiyā kiṁkari vva kayā ।। 3976 ॥
to purṇa hiyayakasāō bāhimmi maē payāsiō hōṁtō । tō taiyacciya chārō jāō maha matthaē hōtō ।। 3977 ।।
sā mōhiṇīvarāī savakkimāyaṁ ayāṇamāṇīu । ujjuyamaittaṇēṇaṁ tīsē dāsi vva vaṭṭēi ।। 3978 ।।
ēkkaṁ ciya dukkha māṇasammi niccaṁ pi sā imaṁ vahai । jaṁpai pāsāu kayā vi cārayaṁ nēya pāvēi ।। 3979 ।।
i māyāē kammaṁ uvajjiūṇaṁ mayā samāṇī sā । rāimaī thalagāmē kammi vi duggayakuḍuṁbammi ।। 3980 ।।
sattanhaṁ dhūyāṇaṁ urvāraṁ sā aṭṭhamī puṇō jāyā । tō tīsē piyarēhiṁ bahu dhūyā jammaduhiēhiṁ ॥ 3981।।
nāmaṁ pina sē dinaṁ taō jaṇēṇaṁ sayaṁ pi ullaviyā । ninnāmiya tti ēsā taṁ ciya nāmaṁ taō jāyaṁ ।। 3982 ।।
māyā piūṇa sayaṇāṇa iyaralōyāṇa taha ya savvēsiṁ । jāyā aṇiṭṭarūvā diṭṭhā vi jaṇēi uvvēyaṁ ।। 3983।।
akaē kaē vi savvō tīsē uvari vikhvavayaṇāī । jaṁpatō kō vi jaṇō kayā vihu nēya vi ramēi ।। 3988 ॥
jai puṇa pariṇayaṇa kahaṁ kuṇati kēṇā vi saddhimēīē । māyā piūṇi tō sō parammuhō ṭhāi saha satti । ।। 3985 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-124-to-124.json ==========================
124
vajjakuṁḍalacariya
maggammi bhamaṁtī jai diṭṭi pahē paḍai kassa vi jaṇassa । sō bēi alakkhaṇi kē kīsa tumaṁ āgayā ēttha ! ।। 3986 ।।
āgaṁtūṇaṁ amhaṁ muhaṁḍayaṁ daṁsiyaṁ niyaṁ ēyaṁ । diṭṭhē muhammi tuha ajjabhōyaṇaṁ katthaṇē hōhī ।। 3987 ।।
jai puṇa kajjavasēṇaṁ saṁbhāsai kaṁ pi kōmalagirā vi । tō sō jhaḍatti tāḍai muhammi taṁ lēṭṭhamāīhi ।। 3988 ।।
iya duvvayaṇāīhiṁ dūmijjaṁtī maṇammi aṇavarayaṁ । niddāyaṁtī kahama vi jai duhassa aṁtaraṁ lahai ।। 3989 ॥
jharēi taō niccaṁ appāṇaṁ kiṁ maē mahāpāvaṁ । jammaṁtarammi vihiyaṁ jēṇa ahaṁ ērisī jāyā ।। 3990।।
gāmammi tammi ciṭṭhau gāmaṁtarasaṁtiēṇa vi narēṇa । kēṇā vi na pariṇīyā jōvvaṇasamayaṁ pi sā pattā ।। 3991।।
dukkhēṇa gamai diyahē nivvinnā jīviyassa vi niyassa । aha kāuṁ uḍḍhamuhaṁ sā nīhariyā sa gāmāō ।। 3992।
ēgamma gayā gānē kaivaya gāmaṁtarāī laṁghēuṁ । tattha bhamaṁtī bhikkhaṁ na lahai gāsaṁ pi kattha viya ।।3993 ।।
ēgammi gharē diṭṭhō ajjā saṁghāḍaō taō tīē । paḍilābhijjatō gōravēṇa tō sā vicitēi ।। 3994 ।।
dhannāō yāō lahaṁti jāō sagōravaṁ bhikkhaṁ । paḍisēhaṁtīō vihu gēhē gēhē puṇō ahahyaṁ ॥। 3995।।
sitthaṁ pi na pāvēmi duvvayaṇāī lahēmi suddhāī । tā ēyāsiṁ pāsammi jāmi vaṁdāmi ēyāō ।। 3996 । ।
mōttūṇa taō bhikkhābhamaṇaṁ ajjāṇa piṭṭaō laggā । dūrē dūrammi ṭhiyā tāva gayā jāva ajjāō ।। 3997।।
niyavasahiṁ pattāō taō ṭhiyā dāraēgadēsammi । sā tāva jāva ajjāu bhu jiuṁ paṭṭiyāu bahi ।। 3998।।
tō tīē vaṁdiyāō tāō jaṁpati dhammalābhō tti | saṇa sumahurēṇaṁ pasannanayaṇāṇaṇāu ta ।।3999।।
tō citai sā ēvaṁ pamōyapūrijjamāṇasavvaṁgā । ajja maha kannakuharē paviṭṭhamēyaṁ subhaṁ vayaṇaṁ || 4000।
ēyāṇaṁ vayaṇāō viṇiggayaṁ paṇamaṇijjapāyāṇaṁ । ēyāsi ciya jāyaṁ maṁ daṭhṭhē vayaṇamakasāyaṁ ॥ 4001 ॥
savaṇāṇaṁ nayaṇāṇa ya jaha majjha suhaṁ imāhiṁ saṁjaṇiyaṁ । annaṁ pi taha bhavissai ēyāhi tō sivaṁ savvaṁ ॥। 4002 ॥
iya citiūṇa laggā puṇō vi paṭṭhīē tāṇa ajjāṇaṁ । bhukkhiyatisiyā vi pamōyapāsaō amayasitta vva । । 4003 ।।
daṭṭhūṇa paṭṭhilaggaṁ ajjāu taṁ bhāṁti kiṁ bhaddē ! | amhēhi samaṁ caliyā ēsi tumaṁ kāraṇaṁ kahasu ||4004 ||
ninnāmiyāē bhaṇiyaṁ ēmēva uvēmi tumha daṁsaṇaō । jaṁ jāō kō vi auvva paharisō majjha hiyayassa ॥। 4005 ।।
ajjāhiṁ taō citiyamēyaṁ niya māṇasammi jaṁ ēsā । kā vi varāī duhiyā dhammassa bhavissaē jōggā ।।4006।।
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyā ajjāhiṁ imā vayāhi taṁ bhaddē ! | amha vasahīē tatthaya vaṁdēhi pavarttāiṇi gaṁtuṁ ॥। 4007 ।।
ninnāmiyā vitāsi vayaṇēṇa uvastayammi gaṁtūṇa | vaṁdai pavattiṇi sā vi pucchara kā tumaṁ bhaddē ! ||4008।।
tō tīē nīsēsaṁ niyaṁ sakhvaṁ nivēiyaṁ tīsē । tā jāva sa gāmāō samāgayā tattha vasahīē || 4009 ||
ēyaṁ puṇō vikahiyaṁ bhikkhagayāē maē ihaggāmē । jāva na katthai sitthaṁ pi pāviyaṁ citiyaṁ tāva ।।4010 ।।
jaṁ bhukkhāē maraṁtī karēmi kiṁ saṁpayaṁ aō gaṁtuṁ । kattha vi cayāmi jīyaṁ pavvayasiharāu paḍiūṇa ।।4011 ||
ahasā pavattiṇīē bhaṇiyā bhaddē ! na ēva ma vihīē । pāṇaccāyammi kaē dukkhāṇaṁ chuṭṭaē kōī ||4012।।
ahiyayarāiṁ tāiṁ jāyaṁti visasaō vi jīvassa । tēṇa vihīē maraṇaṁ kuṇa jō bhaṇiō jiṇidēhi ||4013 ॥
nināmiyāē bhaṇiyā pavattiṇī taṁ kahēha majjha vihiṁ । jēṇa mayāṇaṁ na puṇō ērisa dukkhāiṁ jāyaṁti ।। 4044 ।।
kahai payattēṇa taō pavattiṇī tīē bālamaraṇāṇaṁ । nīsēsaṁ pi sarūvaṁ paṁḍiyamaraṇāṇa ya tahēva ।।40 14 ।।
sātāī suūṇaṁ pavattiṇi bhaṇai garuyaviṇaēṇa । sāmiṇi karēha taha jaha puṇō vi dukkhaṁ na pāvēmi ॥। 4016।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
125
tuha pāyāṇaṁ saraṇaṁ pattāhaṁ saṁpayaṁ taō bhaṇasi । jaṁ kiṁ pi tumaṁ tamahaṁ karēmi iha saṁsaō natthi ||40 17 ।।
nīyā pavattiṇīē sumaṁgalāē imā taō jhatti । pāsammi niyagurūṇaṁ kallāṇanihāṇanāmāṇaṁ ||4018 ।।
tēhi vidinnā dikkhā nāūṇaṁ samaṇadhammajōgattaṁ । tīsē kayaṁ ca nāmaṁ sunāmiyajjatti tō namiuṁ ॥ 4019।।
kallāṇanihāṇaguruṁ pavattiṇīē samaṁ gayā vasahiṁ । gahiūṇa taō sikkhaṁ duvihaṁ pi karēi pavaravayaṁ ॥। 4020 ||
aha sā sunāmiyajjā sumaraṁtī ginivāsadukkhāī । niravajjaṁ kuṇai vayaṁ savvajjāṇaṁ pi bahuviṣayaṁ ।। 4021।।
kaivayadiṇapajjaṁtē kallāṇanihāṇa muṇivariṁdassa । lōyālōyapayāsaṁ uppannaṁ kēvalaṁ nāṇaṁ ||4022॥
miliyā bahavē dēvā kēvalimahima karēṁti tō tassa । tēhi kayakaṇayakamalē uvaviṭṭhō kahai sō dhammaṁ ।। 4023।।
baṁdhati jahā kammaṁ micchattāīhi kāraṇēhi jiyā । tavvasagayā ya jaha tē sahaṁti naragāisu duhāī ||4024 । ।
jaha suhaguru saṁjōyaṁ laddhaṇaṁ pattanimmalavivēyā । khaviūṇa kammajālaṁ lahaṁti tē mōkkha sōkkhaṁ ca ।।4025 । ।
sā vi hu sunāmiyajjā sumaṁgalāē pavattiṇīē samaṁ । tassa abhivaṁdaṇatthaṁ tattha gayā dēsaṇaṁ suṇai ||4026।।
laddhāvasarā pucchara sunāmiyajjā pavattiṇi muhēṇa । kammēṇa jēṇa jāyaṁ bahu dukkhaṁ mē gihatthāē ||4027 ।।
tō kēvaliṇā bhaṇiyaṁ paē para dukkhakāraṇaṁ kammaṁ । baṁdhaṁtō cciya cidr̥i rāgaddōsāṇugō jīvō || 4028॥
puvvabhavē puṇa tumaē gahiyāē aimahaṁtaīsāē । uttāriyāī paipariyaṇassa cittāī māyāē ||4029।।
savakkī mōhiṇināmāē uvarisā taō tēsi । jāyārō saṭṭāṇaṁ tumaṁ pahidvāya taṁ daddhuṁ ॥ 4030।।
savvō viēsa attha savittharō tēṇa aggaō tīsē । parikahiō kēvaliṇā sā taṁ sōūṇa nīsēsaṁ ।। 4031 ||
saṁjāyajāisaraṇā gurusaṁvēgaṁ gayā niyamaṇammi | puṇa kēvaliṇā bhaṇiyā jai pavvajjaṁ na ginhaṁtī ॥ 4032।।
iha jammē taṁ bhaḍhē! tō ajja vi kammamēyamaibahuyaṁ । jammaṁtarēsu dētaṁ tuha dukkhaṁ dāruṇavivāgaṁ ।।4033॥
hāsēṇa vi jaṁ jīvō kammaṁ baṁdhēi taṁ pi dasaguṇiyaṁ । dēi phalaṁ jaṁ ca puṇō bajjhai ghaṇarāgadōsēhiṁ ॥ 4034।।
tassa vivāgō jammaṁtarāṇa bahuyāsu kōḍakōḍīsu । samaikkaṁtāsu vinēyapāvaē kahamavisamatti ।।4035 ।।
taṁ sōūṇaṁ bhīyā sunāmiyajjā maṇē vicitē । dullahasāmariṁga pāviūṇa ēvaṁ iha bhavammi ||4036।।
ēēṇaṁ ciya dēhēṇa puvvakammāī savva sattīē । kāūṇa tavaṁ ghōraṁ khōḍēmi puṇō vi kō muṇai ।।4037।।
jammaṁtarammi ēsā sāmaggī jāyaē na vā amha । tā saṁpayamappāṇaṁ chōḍēmi imāu kammāō || 4038 ।।
iya citiūṇa tīē vinnattō kēvalī jahā bhayavaṁ ! । dēhi mamabhiggahamimaṁ jaṁ jājīvaṁ maē kajjō ||4039।।
chaṭṭāita visēsō kāyavvaṁ aṁbilēṇa paraṇayaṁ । nāūṇa nivvahaṁtaṁ tīsē taṁ kēvalī dēi ||4040।।
chaṭṭha-ṭṭhama- dasama duvālasāi aha sā karēi ghōra tavaṁ । pāraṇayamaṁbilēṇaṁ sahēi sīyāyavāīyaṁ ॥ 4041 ॥
paṇuvīsaṁ vāsasayaṁ kāuṁ sā ērisaṁ tavaṁ ghōraṁ । parisusiyaru hiramaṁsā jāyā cammaṭṭisēsataṇū ||4042।।
kāūṇamaṇasaṇaṁ vāsarāī tīsaṁ samāhisaṁpannā । mariūṇa samuppannā dēvī sōhammakappammi ||4043।।
sakkssa aggamahisī sattayapaliōvamāī sā āuṁ । tattha parivāliūṇaṁ āukhaēṇaṁ taō caviraṁ ।। 4044 ।।
uppannā tumha gharē dhūyattāē pabhāvaī ēsā । tassa tavassaṇubhāvā khayarēsara ! ērisī jāyā ।।4045 ।।
ēyaṁ pabhāvaīē kahaṇāvasarammi tattha pattāē । savvaṁ pi sayaṁ nisuyaṁ sariyā puvvā ya niyajāī ।।4046।।
tō paṇamiūṇa sūri sirammi ārōviūṇa karajuyalaṁ । vinnavai sāmi saccaṁ savvaṁpi imaṁ taē kahiyaṁ ॥ 4047 ||
nāyaṁ maē vi ēyaṁ jāīsaraṇēṇa saṁpayamasēsaṁ । tumha kahaṁtāṇaṁ iha ēgaggamaṇaṁ suṇaṁtīē ॥ 4048।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-126-to-126.json ==========================
126
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
jaha ēyaṁ nāgadivāyarēhiṁ tumhēhiṁ majjha pahu kahiyaṁ । annaṁ pi kahasu taha mē puṇō bhavissai kayā vi vayaṁ ।।4049 ।।
aha pabhaṇai taṁ sūrī ajja vi tuha kammamatthi bhōgaphalaṁ । tamaṇuhaviūṇa pacchā vayaṁ pi vacchē! tumaṁ lahasi । । 4050
ētthaṁtarammi pucchai taṁ sūri rayaṇacūḍakhayariṁdō । bhayavaṁ ! kō pariṇēhī pabhāvaī amha dhūyamimaṁ ॥ 4051 ॥
sūrī pabhaṇai rāyaṁ pariṇēhī caṁdakittinaranāhō । caṁdaura nayarasāmī pabhāvaī tujjha dhūyamimaṁ ।। 4052 ||
tō paṇa miūṇa sūriṁ samuṭṭhiō rayaṇacūḍa kharyāriṁdō । saddhi pabhāvaīē niyamāvāsaṁ samaṇupattō ||4053 ||
rayaṇaurāō sūrī katthai annattha vihariō tattō pattā pabhāvaī vi hū jōvvaṇalacchi maṇabhirāmaṁ ।। 4054।।
aha annayā kayāī siddhāyayaṇammi savvakhayarēhiṁ । pāraddhā jattā tattha sō gaō rayaṇacūḍō vi ।।4055 ।।
tassaṁtēurasahiyā pabhāvaī kannayā vi tattha gayā । savvaṁgaṁ rayaṇāharaṇabhūsiyā bhāsurasarīrā ।।4056।।
iṁdauranayaravāsī khayarō nāmēṇa kaṇayakēu ti । kharyāriṁdakaṇayacūḍassa naṁdaṇō āgaō tattha ।।4057 ।।
diṭṭhā pabhāvaī tēṇa tattha bhattīē jiṇavaraṁ dēvaṁ । vīṇāravaparihavakāriṇīē vāṇīē vaṁdaṁtī ||4058 ।।
jāō niccaladiṭṭhī tattō sō cittalihiyamutti vva । īsāīēṇōvahaō hiyayammi sarēhiṁ mayaṇēṇa ।। 4059 ।।
sā vaṁdiūṇa dēvaṁ pabhāvaī jaṇaṇivaggapāsammi । āgaṁtuṁ uvadiṭṭhā diṭṭhō diṭṭhīē vi na sōu ||4060।।
vittē jattā samayē niyaniyaṭhāṇaṁ gaō samaggō vi । vijjāharāṇa lōō maṇaṁ viṇā kaṇayakēū vi ।।4061 ॥
virahāvasthā paḍiō sō ciṭṭhai jāva vāsabhavaṇammi । na karēi bhōyaṇaṁ pi hu tā nāyaṁ kaṇayacūḍēṇa ॥ 4062।।
hu
mittāō tassa savvayanāmāō puvvabhaṇiyabhāvāō । siddhāyayaṇē daṭhṭhē pabhāvaī pēkkhamāṇaṁ taṁ ।।4063।।
tō pēsiūṇa māṇusamēvaṁ rāyā bhaṇāvaē kumaraṁ । taṁ kuṇasu tāva bhōyaṇamuvari karissāmi tuha iṭṭha ||4064।।
iya niyajaṇayāēsaṁ suṇiūṇaṁ kaṇayakēuvarakumarō । lajjāsaṁkuiyataṇū citai tāēṇa vinnāō ||4065 ।।
nūṇamaṇōgayabhāvō majjha taō tēṇa ēsa āēsō । paṭṭhaviō saṁpai tā kahaṁ pi jai avalavēmi ahaṁ ॥। 4066 ।।
lajjāvasēṇa ēyaṁ tahā vi pacchā vi payaḍayaṁ hōhī tamhā na kiṁ pi annaṁ uttaramiha jujjaē kāuṁ ।।4067।।
paḍivajjiūṇa tāyāēsaṁ saṁpai gahēmi āhāraṁ । hōyavvaṁ na hu lajjāluēṇa kajjatthi purisēṇa || 4068।।
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kumarēṇaṁ kaṇayakēuṇā ēvaṁ āisai kiṁ pitāō jaṁ taṁ ciya mē pamāṇaṁti ॥ 4069 ।।
bhaṇiūṇa takkhaṇē cciya pāraddhō ēsa bhōyaṇaṁ kāuṁ । pēsiyapurisēṇa imaṁ kahiyaṁ gaṁtuṁ naridassa ||4070 ||
dāūṇa sō vi sikkha pēsēi pahāṇa khēyaraṁ tattō । bahuparivārasamēyaṁ pāsē sirirayaṇacūḍassa ||4071 ||
gaṁtūṇa tēṇa bhaṇiō viṇaṇaṁ rayaṇacūḍakhayariṁdō । jaha iṁdauranariṁdēṇa pēsiyā kaṇayacūḍēṇa ॥।4072।।
amhē tumha samīvē tumhēhiṁ samaṁ imō ahilasēi । kāuṁ viulasiṇēhaṁ vivāiguṇēhiṁ tullattā ||4073 ||
sō
।
•
puṇa hōi siṇēhō avaccasaṁbaṁdhaō mahānibiḍō । tēṇamha pahū patthara pabhāvaī nāma tuha dhūyaṁ ॥ 4074।।
niyaputtassa nimittaṁ guṇanihiṇō kaṇayakē unāmassa । dōnha vi bahūvarāṇaṁ ēsi uciō havau jōgō ॥ 4075 ।।
tō rayaṇacūḍarāyā ciṁtā jaha sūriṇā samakkhāō । bhattā pabhāvaīē maha puraō caṁdakittinivō ||4076 ॥
tō annassa na dāuṁ varassa jujjai pabhāvaī dhūyā । na ya kaṇayacūḍadvayassa aggaō kahiumii juttaṁ ।।4077।।
tamhā annaṁ parikappiūṇa dāūṇa uttaraṁ kiṁ pi । ēsō visajjiyavvō iya ciṁtēuṁ rayaṇacūḍō ||4078 ।।
rāyā pabhaṇai dūyaṁ kiṁpi ajuttaṁ na bhāṇiyaṁ ēyaṁ । tumha pahuṇā paraṁ kiṁ kāraṇamiha ērisaṁ asthi ||4079 ।।
siddhālayajattāē paraō iha āsi āgaō sūrī । guṇabhaddō nāmēṇaṁ tappāsē dēsaṇaṁ sōuṁ ॥ 4080 ॥
bhavasuhavirattacittā amhaṁ dhūyā pabhāvaī jāyā tīē gihāgayāē vinattō haṁ jahā tāya ! ||4081 ।।

pavvajjā gahaṇatthaṁ guṇabhaddamudisannihāṇammi | maṁ aṇujāṇaha kāuṁ mahāpasāyaṁ uvari majjha ||4082 ।।
iya tavvayaṇaṁ sōuṁ jāō haṁ vajjatāḍiya sirō vva । sajalanayaṇēṇa pacchā maē imā dhāriūṇa karē ।।4083 ।।
mahayā nibaṁdhēṇaṁ nivāriyā jāva kai vi diyahāī । majjhavarōhēṇa taō giṭṭiyā gamai sā kālaṁ ।।4084 ।।
saṁpas jaō kutō atthittaṁ ciṭṭhaē kaṇayacūḍō । maha dhūyāē tō'haṁ kaīvayadiyahāṇa majjhammi || 4085 ||
kēṇāvi uvāēṇaṁ ēvaṁ saṁbōhiūṇa tuha pahuṇō । jāṇāvissāmi lahaṁ taō tumaṁ kaṇayacūḍassa ||4086 ।।
gaṁta hasu ēvaṁ jaha sō khēyaṁ na kiṁ pi niyacittē । kuṇai taha taṁ bhaṇijjasu iya sikkhaviūṇa taṁ dūyaṁ । 14087 ।।
sammāūṇa tahā visajjaē rayaṇacūḍakharidō । gaṁtūṇa sō vi sāhai taṁ savvaṁ kaṇayacūḍassa || 4088 ||
tēṇa vi taṁ ciya dūyaṁ pēsēuṁ kaṇayakēukumarassa । savvaṁ kahāviyamimaṁ taṁ sōuṁ sō vi sahasatti ॥ 4089 ।।
vajjāhaō vva sīsē saṁjāō kaṇayakēuvarakumarō । abbhahiyadēhadāhō gahiō gurucittakhēṇa ॥ 4090 ।।
mayaṇasaravihuriyaṁgō ciṭui sō sunnamāṇasō sayayaṁ । saṁbhāsiō na jaṁpai aha jaṁpai tō asaṁbaddha ||4091।।
taṁ taha daṭṭhūṇa taō saṁjāō tassa pariyaṇō savvō । aigasyakhēyabhariō parōpparaṁ maṁtaē nihuyaṁ ॥ 4092।।
aha tassuvari jāyā kaṇagavaī nāma atthi tabbhaiṇī । tīē hakkārēuṁ piyaṁkarī nāma niya dhāī ॥4993॥
bhaṇiyā jahā maē jēṭṭhabaṁdhuṇō kaṇayakēunāmassa । nisuyaṁ sarīrakāraṇamaō tumaṁ tassa pāsamma ||4094।।
gaṁtuṁ sarīravattaṁ pucchasu vayaṇēṇa majjha sigghaṁ pi । gaṁtūṇa tattha aha sā pabhaṇai taṁ kaṇayakēumiṇaṁ ।।4095 ।।
tuha lahu bhaiṇīē ahaṁ kaṇagavaī nāmiyāē tuha pāsē । paṭṭaviyā sōūṇaṁ tujjha sarīrassa apaḍuttaṁ ।। 4096॥
ciṭṭhai sayaṁ tu ēsā kēṇa vi kajjaṁtarēṇa garuēṇa । akkhaṇiyā saṁpai tēṇa nāgayā tumha pāsammi ||4097।।
tō sa sarīrasarūvaṁ kahēhi mama aggaō samaggaṁ pi । tō bhaṇai kaṇayakēū ciṭṭhai maha suṁdaraṁ dēhaṁ ।।4098 ।।
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ saccaṁ jai na kahasi tujjha atthi tō savahō । ai garuō khēyarapatthivassa sirikaṇayacūḍassa।।4099।।
tō tēṇa savvalōyaṁ sēsaṁ ōsāriūṇa sā bhaṇiyā । kassa vi ahaṁ rahassaṁ na kahēmi paraṁ imaṁ kiṁtu ।।4100 ।।
tāyassa tara savahō dinnō garuō mamatthitō tēṇa । sakkēmi na ninhaviḍaṁ kahēmi savvaṁ pituha saccaṁ ।। 4101 ।।
kahiyavvaṁ na hu kassa vi puraō tumaē imaṁ piyassā vi । tīē bhaṇiyaṁ ki mahaṁ ēttiyamavinēya jāṇāmi ।।4102 ।।
kaha vīsatthō savvaṁ kumāranīsaṁkiō tumaṁ majjha । jai na guṇō vi bhavissai tā nūṇa na dūsaṇaṁ hōhī ||4103 ||
tō tēṇa purō tīsē savvaṁ pi rahassa mattaṇō kahiyaṁ । tīē bhaṇiō kumarō jai ēvaṁ tō ahaṁ jāmi || 4104 ।।
pāsē pabhāvaīē taṁ mannāvēmi tujjha bhajjattaṁ । hiṭṭhēṇa tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ mamāvi ēvaṁ maṇē āsi ।।4105 ।।
jah tattha kaṁ pi pēsēmi khēyari ēsa nicchaō na kaō । āsi piyaṁkari jaṁ kira pēsēyavvā tumaṁ cēva ।। 4106 ॥
tō laṭṭhamimaṁ jāyaṁ taē sayaṁ ciya jamēvamulluviyaṁ । tā jāhi tattha ēyaṁ kaiṇagavaīē na kahiyavvaṁ ॥ 4107॥
iya paḍivajjēūṇa vi ēsā gaṁtūṇa kahai savvaṁ pi । viyaṇē kaṇagavaī ētabbhāvaviyāṇaṇaṭṭāē ।।4108 ।।
kaṇagavaīē bhaṇiyā piraṁkarī bhāuṇā jahā majjha । kahiyaṁ niyaṁ rahassaṁ tujjha tahāhaṁ pi sāhēmi ||4109 ।।
ēttiya divasāī maē tujha vi puraō na sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ । lajjāē gōvēḍaṁ dhariyaṁ niyamaṇagayaṁ cēva ।।4110॥
saṁpai jāō samaō tattha tumaṁ kaṇayakēukumarēṇa । jaṁ pēsiyāsi piyasahi majjha vi tatthatthi jaṁ kajjaṁ ॥ 4111॥
jattha samaē gayāhaṁ siddhāyayaṇammi dēvatāē । tattha tayā diṭṭhipahaṁ pattō maṇikumarō mē ||4112 ।।
tō haṁ hiyayammi jhaḍatti tāḍiyā mayaṇabāṇasēṇīē । niccaladiṭṭhī taṁ ciya pāsaṁtī saṁṭhiyā suiraṁ ।।4113॥
diṭṭhā jaṇaṇīē ahaṁ pāsanisannāē kaṇayarēhāē । nāūṇa majjha bhāvaṁ misēṇa saṁbhāsiyā tīē ।।4114 ।।

vacchē ! jaṁ jaṁ kiṁci vi ēyammi jiṇidamaṁdirē asthi । taṁ taṁ ramaṇijjayaraṁ pāsaṁtāṇaṁ maṇaṁ harai ।।4115 ।।
jattha niviṭṭhā diṭṭhī tattha ṭhiyā cēva ciṭṭhai ciraṁ pi । na taō ṭhāṇāu maṇaṁ pi vaṁchaē gaṁtumannattha ।।4116।।
tā tō vinivēsasu diṭṭhi maṁḍavagaēsu rūvēsu । varasālahaṁ jiyāsu ya accharasāṇaṁ saricchāsu ।।4117॥
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa taō jaṇaṇī maha maṇaviṇōyakaraṇatthaṁ । daṁsai jiṇidabiṁbaṁ tassa ya pūyāiyaṁ pacchā ।।4118।।
nāō ma vi bhāvō jaṇaṇīē jaṁ imā muṇēūṇa । maha maṇabhāvaṁ gūhai jāṇai kiraṇajjihī ēsā ।।4119 ।।
jattā samayāṇaṁtaramihāgayāhaṁ samaṁ sajaṇaēṇa | mōttūṇa niyaṁ cittaṁ maṇicūḍakumārapāsammi ||4120।।
dāhajjarēṇa vihariyadēhā ciṭṭhāmi jāva sayaṇijjē । paḍiyā talluvēlli kuṇamāṇī nimalahaṁtī ||4121।।
savvaṁ rayaṇi pitaō sahīhi gaṁtūṇa sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ । maha māāē puraō nīsēsaṁ kaṇayarēhāē ||4122।।
sā vi samāgatūṇaṁ maṁ pucchai putti vāhaē tujjha । kiṁ kiṁ aṁgē kēṇā vi kāraṇē risaṁ kahasu ।।4123 ।।
naya jātī viha tīsē kahiya maē sajaṇaṇīē । lajjāsaṁkuiyāē uttaramēyaṁ kayaṁ tattō ।।4124 ॥
ammō ahaṁ na jāṇē sarūvamēyassa niyasarīrassa । jai jāṇissaha tubbhē kiṁ ci sahāvaṁ sadhūyāē ||4125।।
haṇi kaṇayarēhā niyaṁ niyahiyayamajjhagayamēva । jaṁpai putti ! anāyaṁ sarūvamēyaṁ na mē asthi ||4126 ॥
। ॥
siddhāyayaṇē jattāē jaggiyā jaṁ ciraṁ tumaṁ tattha । tēṇa ajinaṁ jāyaṁ bāhara sīsaṁ taṇū unhā ॥4127॥
siṁgāriyā gayā taṁ tattha taō vahujaṇassa diṭṭhī vi । laggā saṁbhāvijjai tattha vi jattaṁ karissāmi ।।4128 ।।
kattō vi ha āṇissaṁ tahāvihaṁ maṁtavāiyaṁ kaṁpi । takkaraphāsēṇa taō jhatti tumaṁ sajjiyā hōsi ।।4129 ।।
ētyaṁtarē maē citiyaṁ jahā majjha maṇagayaṁ bhāvaṁ । jaṁpai jaṇaṇī savvaṁ pi gōvayaṁtī viyaḍḍhattā ।।4130 ।।
maṁ bēi puṇō jaṇaṇī rasajaraṇatthaṁ suēhi taṁ tāva | gaṁtūṇa tuha sarūvaṁ kahēmi ēyaṁ ahaṁ rannō ।।4131 ।।
jaha sō kaṁ pi uvāyaṁ karēi tuha dēhasajjayā hēuṁ । iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ jaṇaṇī majjha gayā rāyapāsammi ।। 4132 ।।
kahiyami tassa tī majjha sarūvammi jaṁpiyaṁ tēṇa । ṭhāṇē kayāṇurāyā kaṇayavaī kannayā amha ||4133||
tō tassa dāumēsā uciya cciya rayaṇacūḍataṇayassa । kiṁ tu ahimāṇavasaō na dēmi tassappaṇō dhūyaṁ ||4134 ॥
tō puṭṭhō jaṇaṇīē maha jaṇaō kērisaṁ tuhābhimāṇaṁ । siṭhṭhē ca tēṇa tīsē saccayapāsāu jaṁ nisuyaṁ ॥ 4135 ।।
siddhāyayaṇaṭṭiya rayaṇacūḍadhūyaṁ pabhāvaī daṭhṭhē । jaha kaṇayakēukumarō jāō vammahasarābhihaō ||4136 ॥
jaha niya khēyarapurisaṁ pēsēuṁ maggiō rayaṇacūḍō । dhūyaṁ pabhāvaī jaha tēṇa nisēhō kaō tīsē ।।4137 ।।
kahiūṇa ēkamāī bhaṇiyā tāēṇa tō kaṇayarēhā । daiē maha ahimāṇō saṁjāō kāraṇēṇimiṇā ||4138 ।।
tō jaṇaṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ iha ahimāṇassa kāraṇaṁ natthi । jaṁ rayaṇacūḍakhayarēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ kiṁ pi na ajuttaṁ ।।4139 ।।
tāṇā taō bhaṇiyaṁ niyaṁgaruhadukkhadūmiēṇa maē । gurunēhaṁ daṁsēuṁ ēsō maggāviō dhūyaṁ ॥। 4140 ।।
ts vihu na tassa duṭṭō bhāvō hiyayammi vaṭṭaē kō vi । taha vi mama patthaṇābhaṁgasaṁbhavō atthi ahimāṇō । । 4141 । ।
jai rayaṇacūḍarāyā pabhāvaī dēi kaṇayakēussa । tō maṇicūḍassa phuḍaṁ kaṇagavaī dēmi nēyarahā ||4142 ।।
ēsā majjha pannā tumaṁ tu gaṁtūṇa kahasu dhūyāē । ēvaṁ jaha kira tuha vaṁchiyatthasiddhi lahaṁ cēva ||4143 ||
tujjha jaṇaō karissara ēvaṁ sōūṇa jaha vimukkāsā । hōūṇaṁ sā niya jīviya vva mujjhēi na jhaḍatti । । 4144 । ।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ disuṁ samaikkatēsu kēttisuṁ pi । tavvisaē maṁtēuṁ jahōciyaṁ āyarissāma ।।4145 ।।
nāūṇa tāyamaṇanicchyaṁ taō ki pi jaṁpiyaṁ nēya । tassābhimuhaṁ jaṇaṇīē majjha āgaṁtumiyakahiyaṁ ॥। 4146 ।।
vigayāṇaṁdamuhīē jaha putti ! piyā tuhicchiyapayatthē । duyamujjamaṁ karissai pamāṇamuḍḍhaṁ tuha divvaṁ ॥। 4147।।

129
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ mukkāī tīē aṁsūṇi jhatti nayaṇēsu । nāyaṁ taō maē jaha sajjha piuṇō na mē kajjaṁ ।।4148।।
tēṇēsā maha jaṇaṇī milāṇamuhapaṁkayā payaṁpaṁtī ! muyai nayaṇaṁsuvāyaṁ airittaduhaṁ muyaṁti vva ॥ 4149॥
tō jai ahaṁ visannaṁ appāṇaṁ kahai daṁsaissāmi । paīē tō hōhī aiduhiyā maha duhēṇēsā ।।4150 ।।
saṁvariūṇāgāraṁ tō jaṁpēmi tahā jahā ēsā । saṁtaṁ pi majjha visaē jhaḍatti dukkhaṁ pariccayai ।।4151 ।।
iya citēūṇa maē bhaṇiyā jaṇaṇī pasannavayaṇāē । mā ammō ! majjha kaē maṇaṁ pi khēyaṁ maṇē vahasu ।।4152 ।।
aṁbāē tāyassa ya na hōi dōnhaṁ pi jaṁ kuṇaṁtāṇa । tēṇa viṇā vi sarissara aṭṭhēṇa maṇōharēṇā vi ।।4153 ।।
sōūṇa majjha vayaṇaṁ ēvaṁ jāyā khaṇēṇa maha jaṇaṇī । nivvuyahiyayā tattō payaḍai maha tāya sabbhāvaṁ ।।4154 ।।
jaṁpaiya taha ēvaṁ vacchē ! laṭhṭhē taē kayaṁ ēyaṁ । jaṁ niyacittaṁ tattō ṭhāṇāu niyattiyaṁ jhatti ||4155 ।।
jamhā pabhāvaīē visayavirattāēṁ dullahō laṁbhō tayabhāvē tujjha samīhiyaṁ pi manē asajjhaṁ ti ।। 4156 ।।
dōnhaṁ pi tumha bhaiṇī bhāūṇaṁ saṁtiyaṁ mamāsi duhaṁ tattha tuha visayaminhi majjña maṇāō gayaṁ dukkhaṁ ।।4157 ।।
saṁpai bhaṇēmi tāyaṁ tujjha jahā sō gaē annaṁ । aṇurūvaṁ kaṁ pi varaṁ jō taṁ sigdhaṁ pi pariṇē ।।4158 ।।
bhaṇiyā maē sajaṇaṇī taō jahā majjha pariṇayaṇacitaṁ । mā kaṁ pi kuṇaha tubbhē maha bhāyā havau nīrōgō । ।4159 ।।
tāva taō nīsēsaṁ bhavissaē suṁdaraṁ mama na khūṇaṁ । iya maha vayaṇaṁ sōuṁ gayā saṭhāṇaṁ taō jaṇaṇī ॥। 4160 ।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ tu maṇicūḍasaṁgamōvāyacataṇasayanhā | jāyā duhajalahinimaggamāṇasā savvahā vi ahaṁ ॥। 4161 ।।
kiṁ tu nigūḍhāyāraṁ na kō vi jāṇē imaṁ bahiṁ annō । baṁdhuduhadukkhiyā vihu gayā na tavvattapucchatthaṁ ।।4162।।
mōttuṁ tumaṁ na annā sahiyaṇamajjhammi tārisī atthi । jā kaṇayakēupāsē pēsijjai pucchiuṁ vattaṁ ॥ 4163॥
āsi tumaṁ puṇa pagayā surahī gāmammi bhāiṇējjīē । sīyāē saṁbōhaṇahēuṁ niyapaiparuṭṭhāē ॥। 4164 ।।
tatthēva taō laggāī tujjha diyāī kaivayāī pi । ahama viṭhiyā piyaṁkari paḍivālēṁtī tuhāgamaṇaṁ ।।4165 ।।
jaṁ vēlaṁ vinnāyā tumaṁ maē ēttha āgayā ammō । takkālēcciya hakkāriūṇa paṭṭāviyāsi lahuṁ ॥ 4166 ।।
pāsammi kaṇayakēussa bhāuṇō paḍhamamēva tō pacchā । inhi niyaṁ sarūvaṁ maē purō tujjha akkhāyaṁ ||4167॥
tā kaṇayakēukajjammi paṭṭiyā saṁpayaṁ tumaṁ ammō । majjha vi sāhijjasu nicchaēṇa kajjaṁ gayā tattha ।।4168 ।।
aha sā jaṁpai ēyaṁ ajja taē sāhiyaṁ jaō majjha । ahamavi taō tuha purō kahēmi savvaṁ sasabbhāvaṁ ।।4169 ।।
tuha jaṇaṇīē surahīgāmē saṁpēsiūṇa niyapurisaṁ । hakkāriūṇa maṁ ēttha akkhiyaṁ ajja rayaṇīē ॥ 4170 ॥
maha puraō nīsēsaṁ tujjha sahavaṁ taō pabhāyammi । tuha vayaṇēṇa gayāhaṁ samīvaō kaṇayakēussa ।। 4171 ।।
sōūṇa tassa vayaṇaṁ takkajjaṁ sāhijaṁ kayamaṇāē । tujjha vi kajjaṁ kāuṁ maē maṇē dhariyamiṇamāsi ।।4172 ।।
inhi tu visēsēṇaṁ tuha kajjē ujjamaṁ karissāmi । jaṁ niyamuhēṇa tumaē ēttiyamabbhatthiyā haṁ tō ।।4173॥
muttāhāraṁ kaṁtaṁ ēvaṁ guṇasaṁgayaṁ niē kaṁṭhē । kuṇa ērisāṇa supurisajaē vi uciō tumaṁ cēva ||4174।।
ēyāē gāhāē juttaṁ hāraṁ samappiraṁ tīsē । pāsē piyaṁkarīē kaṇagavaī taṁ visajjēi ।।4175 ।।
bhaṇaiya taha tēṇa tayā ahaṁ pi diṭṭhā siṇiddhadiṭṭhīē । tō paḍivajjissai sō tuha vinnatti na saṁdēhō ||4176।।
iya kaṇagavaī sikkhaṁ gahiraṁ hāraṁ ca sā piyaṁkariyā । jā saṁcaliyā pāsē turaṁtī kaṇayakēussa ||4177॥
maggami tāvadiṭṭhō ēṁtō sō saccaō taō tīē । ēgatē nēūṇaṁ bhaṇiō jaṁ mē kahaha savvaṁ ।।4178।।
āsi tayā taṁ pāsē khayarakumārassa kaṇayakēussa | siddhāyayaṇammi jayā pabhāvaī tēṇa sā diṭṭhā ।।4179 ।।
tīsē bhāvō nāō kō vi taē kaṇayakēuṇa uvari । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tayā haṁ pāsaṭhiō cēva ciṭṭhatō ।।4180 ।।

vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
||4188 ।।
।।4189 ।।
।।4190 ।।
।।4193 ।।
।।4194 ।।
kumarassa kaṇayakēussa kiṁ tu tīsē na bhāvalēsō vi । vijjai pabhāvaīē kumarammi udāsadiṭṭhī sā ||4181 ।।
tō taṁ visajjiūṇaṁ gaṁtūṇaṁ kaṇayakēuvarakumarō । bhaṇiō tīē saṁpai rayaṇaurē paṭṭiyamhi taō ॥। 4182 ।।
dinnāī tēṇa tīsē varavatthāī suvannasaṁkaliyā । kaṁkaṇajuyalaṁ ca tahā pabhāvaī puṇa nimittaṁ ||4183 ।।
paṁcasarōvarahārī samappiō pavaravatthasaṁjuttō । tattō piyaṁkarīē sō paḍisiddhō imaṁ bhaṇiuṁ ।।4184 ।।
gaṁtuṁ pabhāvaīē bhāvaṁ cittassa tāva jāṇāmi । tattō tassa samuciyaṁ jaṁ kici vi taṁ karissāmi ।।4185 ।।
jara puṇa tai ninnēhā sā ciṭṭai tō imaṁ pakīraṁtaṁ । jāyai lāhavajaṇayaṁ iya tīsē jaṁpiyaṁ sōuṁ । । 4186 ।।
hārāivāliūṇaṁ gahiyaṁ taṁ kaṇagakēuṇā savvaṁ । sā bhaṇiyā kaṇagavaī aṇujāṇissa tumaṁ jaṁti ॥ 4187 ॥
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ kāūṇaṁ uttaraṁ maē ēsā । appāṇaṁ mōyaviyā jaha tattha mamatthi māusiyā
kamalasirī nāmēṇaṁ rayaṇaurē tēṇa tīē milaṇatthaṁ । tattha gamissāmi ahaṁ jaṁ diṭṭhāē maē tīsē
vōlīṇō bahukālō taddaṁsaṇaūsuyā ahaṁ tattō । gaṁtūṇa tattha tīsē sarīrasāraṁ karissāmi
iya sōuṁ hiṭṭēṇaṁ vicitiyaṁ kaṇagakēuṇā cittē । dhūttī ciṭṭhai ēsā jāṇai kūḍuttaraṁ kāuṁ ।।4191।।
ēsā majjhavi kajjaṁ sāhissai nūṇamērisaṁ mantrē | iyacitiuṁ visajjai piyaṁkari jhatti sō kumarō ।।4192 ।।
gaṁtuṁ sā rayaṇaurē kuṇai uvāēṇa daṁsaṇaṁ tīē । saddhi pabhāvaiē ēgaṁtē kahai tō tīsē
aṇurattō aimēttaṁ tujjhuvariṁ kaṇayakēuvarakumarō । jappabhiḍaṁ taṁ diṭṭhā siddhāyayaṇē ṭhiyā tēṇa
visāō ārambha tassa niddā chuhātisā savvaṁ । ēga paē cciya naṭhṭhē ciṭṭhai sō sukkakaṭṭhē va ।।4195 ।।
kīrau karuṇā sāmiṇi tā tassuvariṁ sa tumha dāsattaṁ । paḍivajjissai bhīō visamāuhāṇa-ghāyāṇaṁ ॥ 4196।।
ahaṁ bhaṇiyā mahurasaraṁ pabhāvaīē piyaṁkarī ēvaṁ । kiṁpi ajuttaṁ na taē laviyaṁ ēyaṁ paraṁ kiṁtu ॥ 4197।।
siriguṇabhaḍamuṇidassa dēsaṇā sā jayā maē nisuyā । taddivasāō ārambha majjha jāyā vayasamīhā ।। 4198 ।।
tāō paraṁ visajjai navayaggahaṇammi maṁ taō ēvaṁ । ciṭṭhāmi gimmi ṭhiyā puṇō vi tāyaṁ bhaṇissāmi ।।4199 ।।
tō jēi na visajjissai tāō maṁ kahavi dikkhagahaṇatthaṁ । tō jaṁ tayā bhavissai uciyaṁ tamahaṁ karissāmi । 4200 ।
aha sā piyaṁkarīē pabhāvaī jaṁpiyā jahā tāva। ēsō atthō ciṭura annaṁ vinnattiyaṁ suṇaha ||420 1 ||
maṇicūḍakumārēṇa saha mē jaha daṁsaṇaṁ havai sigdhaṁ । taha kāravēhi saṁpai ēsō cciya mēṁ maha pasāō ||4202 ।।
niyaṁdāsi pēsēuṁ pabhāvaī daṁsaṇaṁ karāvēi । maṇicūḍakumārēṇa saha jhatti piyaṁkarīē taō ||4203 ||
uciyapaḍivattikaraṇāṇaṁtaramē sākarāviḍaṁ viyaṇaṁ । daṁsēuṁ taṁ hāraṁ piyaṁkarī bhaṇai maṇicūḍaṁ ॥4204।।
jaha iṁdaurē nayarē dhūyā kharidakaṇagacūḍassa । khvāiguṇanihāṇaṁ kaṇagavaī nāma atthitti ।। 4205 ।।
sīē kaō varāhō siddhāyayaṇē gayāē jattāē । nijjhāiō ciraṁ jaṁ taṁ tattha tiricchadiṭṭhīē ।।4206 ।।
taṁ asatō taddiṇapabhiī bāṇēhiṁ taṁ haṇai mayaṇō । sō tumha rūvavijiō dāsattaṁ kuṇai niccaṁ pi ॥। 4207 ।।
jō kō vi tumha pāē nijjhāēuṁ muhaṁ palōēi । vaṁkāē diṭṭhīē tassa na sō sahai thēvaṁ pi ॥। 4208 ।।
tā taṁ tīsē daṁḍē ginhēhi karaṁ karēṇa niyayēṇa । pacchā karēhi dāsi tamappaṇō jāva jīvaṁ pi ।।4209 ।।
mayāvahi mayaṇāō hammati bāṇadhāraṇīhi imaṁ । taha tīē paṭṭaviyaṁ ḍhōyaṇaē ginhahāramimaṁ ॥ 4210 ||
bhujjaṁ ca sakaralihiyaṁ iha baddha chōḍiūṇa vāēhi । iyabhaṇiuṁ sā appara hāraṁ kumarassa sō gahiraṁ ।।4211 ।।
maṇicūḍō taṁ bhujjaṁ chōḍēuṁ vāiuṁ avagayatthō । citai hiṭṭhō hiyaē piyaṁkarīē jahā laviyaṁ ।।4212 ।।
vakāē uttīē gāhāē vi hu imāē taha atthō । lihiō kaṇagavaīē atyaṁtarasūyagō ēsī ।। 4213 ।।

॥। 4230 ॥
tō maṇicūḍō hāraṁ pahiṭṭhahiyaō khivēi niyakaṁṭhē । iya jaṁpaṁtō ēkkō gāhatthō tāva ēsa kaō ||4214।।
bīyaṁ gātthaṁ puṇa inhi tuha maṁtaṇēṇa sāhissaṁ । tuha vinnattī ēsā maṇē nihittā maē savvā ।।4215 ।।
ēttha puṇakāraṇaṁ pi hu tujjha purō saṁpayaṁ pi sāmi । tīsē majjha vi tullō parōpparaṁ tāva aṇurāō ||4216 ।।
ēttiyadiṇāī jāō taha vi vilaṁbō jamēttha vatthummi । tamaṇēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ pabhāvaī kaṇagacūḍēṇa ।।4217 । ।
māviyā samīvē maha piuṇō kaṇayakēuṇō hēuṁ । tēṇa na sā paḍivannā kāraṇaō tāva kattō vi ।।4218 ।।
ēīē saṁkāē majjha piyākaṇagacūḍapāsamma । maggāvaikaṇagavaī majjha nimittaṁ sayaṁ nēya ।।4219 ॥
tō kaṇagavaī pāsē pēsissaṁ jāva māṇasaṁ kaṁpi । tīsē bhāvaṁ nāuṁ karissamavahārasaṁkēyaṁ ॥ 4220 ।।
tāva tumaṁ saṁpattā tīē saṁpēsiyā iha sapi । nāō tuha pāsāō tīsē bhāvō maē savva ॥ 4221||
tā kahasu tumaṁ ēyaṁ maha piuṇō patthaṇāē kaṇagavaī । sō dēi kaṇagacūḍō majjha nimittaṁ aha na dēi ||4222 ॥
bhaṇiyaṁ piyaṁkarīē kaṇagavaiē tumammi aṇurāyaṁ । nāūṇa kaṇagarēhāē jaṁpiō kaṇagacūḍaniva ।।4223॥
paḍisiddhā tēṇa paraṁ pabhāvaīē alābhakōvēṇa । kaṇagavaī tuha dāuṁ naravaiṇā kaṇagacūḍēṇa ॥। 4224।।
tō maṇicūṛō pabhaṇai piyaṁkari bhaṇasi jēṇuvāēṇa । tēṇāhaṁ kaṇagavaī harāmi ahasā bhaṇai kumaraṁ ।।4225 ।।
piuṇō āsaṁ mōttuṁ kaṇagavaīēvi pēsiyā ayaṁ । tujjha samīvammi taō jaōvahāratthiṇī sā vi ।।4226 ॥
sā jāi kāmapaḍimaṁ pūēuṁ naṁdaṇammi ujjāṇē । aṭṭhami caudasīsuṁ tayā tuhāvaharijaṁ samaō ||4227 ।।
iya tavvaṇaṁ sōuṁ maṇicūḍō kaṇagavai kayaṁgāhaṁ । ēvaṁvihassa jōggā mayatthi bhuvaṇē tumaṁ cēva
iya kaya navuttaraddhaṁ sattasarē baṁdhiūṇa hārammi । ēēṇa juyaṁ tattō āharaṇaṁ kaṁkaṇāīyaṁ
rayaṇamayaṁ vatthāṇi ya piyaṁkarīē samappiuṁ bhaṇaṛa । taṁ ēyaṁ jaha ēyaṁ kaṇagavaīē tamappējjā ।
saṁdēsaṁ ca kahējjā imaṁ jahā ajja divasaō chaṭhē । divasammi aṭṭamitihī jā hōhī tīē maṇicūḍō ।। 3231||
āgaṁtuṁ iṁdaurē ujjāṇē naṁdaṇammi tattha gayaṁ । kāmapaḍimāgihāō harissaē taṁ jai na vigdhaṁ ॥ 4232 ॥ |
annaṁ kiṁ pi bhavissas iya sikkhaviḍaṁ piyaṁkari kumarō । vatthāharaṇēhi tahā sammāṇēuṁ visajjēi ||4233 ||
aha sā maṇicūḍakumārajaṇiyasammāṇaharisiyā tattō । uppaiḍaṁ iṁdaurē kaṇagavaīē gayā pāsaṁ ॥ 4234 ||
maṇicaḍapēsiyaṁ taṁ vatthāharaṇaṁ samappiraṁ tīsē । gāhaṁ ca hāravaddhaṁ kahas taō tēṇa saṁdiṭṭha ||4235 ॥
kaṇagavaī taṁ daṭṭhē maṇicūḍakumārapēsiyapasāyaṁ । gāhaṁ ca vāiūṇaṁ tassaṁ diṭṭhē ca suṇiūṇa ||4236 ।।
jāyā pahihiyā avaguhai taṁ piyaṁkari paḍhamaṁ । aha dēi niyaṁgagayaṁ vatthāharaṇāiyaṁ tīsē ।।4237॥
parihai sayaṁ tu maṇicūḍapēsiyaṁ vatthabhūsaṇāīyaṁ । hāraṁ ca khivai niya kaṁṭhakaṁdalē tayaṇurāṇa ||4238।।
tō kaṇayakēukajjaṁ pucchai siddhaṁ na vatti tappāsē । sā kahai na siddhaṁ jaṁ pabhāvaīē na paḍivannaṁ ॥4239॥
tō ṭhāuṁ khaṇamēgaṁ sasahōyaradukkhadukkhiyā ēsā । jaṁpai piyaṁkari jaha taē na ēyaṁ kayavvaṁ ॥ 4240 ॥
tassa purō jaha ēsō āsā laggō gamēi diyahāī । kāī vi jāva harijaṁ
pacchā taha kaha vi ahaṁ pabhāvaī niya naṇaṁdaraṁ vōcchaṁ । jaha sā paḍivajja
tō tumamappāṇaṁ gōviūṇa ciṭṭhēha tēttiya diṇāī । iya tīē paḍivannē
saccaya nāmō khayarō kaṇagavaī pēsiuṁ taō dāsi । bāhi taṁ pucchāvai kajjēṇaṁ kēṇa pattōsi ||4244 ॥
sō āha jahā kēṇa vi dūrāō gayaṇamaggaō ēṁtī । diṭṭhā piyaṁkarī tō khayaramiyaraṁ samuddissa ।। 4245 ।।
ēmēva tēṇa jaṁpiyamēvaṁ jaha pēccha gayaṇamaggammi । kēttiya dūrāō imā piyaṁkarī ciṭṭhaē ēṁtī || 4246॥
।।4241॥
maṇicūḍō nēi maṁ tattha
majjha bhāuyaṁ bhaṭṭibhāvēṇa ॥। 4242 ॥
sahasā dārammi saṁpattī || 4243 ॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-132-to-132.json ==========================
132
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
tō tēṇa pēkkhiūṇaṁ gayaṇābhimuhaṁ tamēva aṇubhaṇiyaṁ । taṁ kaṇayakēukumarō gihamajjhagaō suṇēūṇa ।। 4247 ।।
bāhi nikkhatō jāva pēkkhaē tāva tēṇa sā diṭṭhā | pavisaṁtī iha bhavaṇē sayamēva piyaṁkarī tattō ॥ 4248॥
paṭṭaviō haṁ tīsē hakkāraṇakāraṇēṇa tēṇa lahuṁ । niyagihamajjhēṇa taō samāgaō saṁpai gimmi ||4249 ॥
taṁ dāsīē gaṁtuṁ kaṇagavaīē nivēiyaṁ savvaṁ । tīē sayaṁ pi nisuyaṁ gihamajjhaṭhiyāē bhannaṁttaṁ ॥ 4250 ।।
aha kaṇagavaī jaṁpai piyaṁkari taṁ jaō parinnāyā । maha bhāuṇā taō tassa aṁtiē saṁpayaṁ jāhi ॥। 4251 ।।
kiṁtu taē kahiyavaṁ jahaṭṭiyaṁ nē ya aggaō tassa । ēyaṁ ciya vattavvaṁ tuhicchiyaṁ nicchiyaṁ hōhī ।। 4252 ।।
kaṛavayadiṇāṇa majjhē aha sā paḍivajjiūṇa tavvayaṇaṁ । saha saccaēṇa pagayā pāsammiu kaṇayakēussa ।।4253 ।।
sōvālabhaṁ sā kaṇayakēuṇā bhāsiyā jahā bhaddē ! diṭṭhāsi gayaṇamaggē taṁ dūrāō maē maṁtī ॥। 4254।।
tā kattha gayāsi tumaṁ tīē bhaṇiyaṁ gayamhi tuha kajjē । sō bhaṇai tō na kiṁ taṁ paḍhamaṁ pattāsi mama pāsē ||4255
sā bhai sunnayāē ēmēva gayamhi kaṇagavaigēhē । tattha gayāē nāyaṁ maē taō tayabhisaṁkāē । 4256 ॥
na niyattāhaṁ tattō gihammi tīsē tahēva ya paviṭṭhā | tīē saha māusiyā milaṇāi kahaṁ karēūṇa ।।4257 ।।
jāva kira āgamissaṁ tuha pāsē tāba saccaō pattō । mama hakkāraṇahēuṁ tō tēṇa saha pattāhaṁ ॥। 4258 ।।
tō bhai kaṇayakēū piyaṁkari kahasu patthuyaṁ inhi । sā jaṁpai sijjhissai kālavilaṁbēṇa tuha kajjaṁ ॥। 4259॥
sō bhaṇai kiṁ taē sā pabhāvaī pabhaṇiyā tahā tīē । kiṁ kayamuttaramēvaṁ savittharaṁ majjha sāsu || 4260 ।।
jaṁpai piyaṁkarī tō kavōlavāēṇa tujjha kiṁ sajjhaṁ । bahuṇākaraṇa niyavaṁchiyattha siddhīē tuha kajjaṁ ॥ 4261।।
tō bhaṇai kaṇayakēū jaṁ na kahasi vittharaṁ tumaṁ majjha । jaṁ sunnamaṇāsi gayā kaṇagavaī maṁdirē paḍhamaṁ ||4262 ॥
taṁ mannāmi na siddhaṁ maha kajjaṁ kiṁ pi tattha tuha bhaddē ! tā jaha puvvaṁ tumaē savahaṁ dāūṇa puṭṭhō haṁ ।।4263।।
taha tujha vi dēma ahaṁ savahē bahuē tumaṁ sajaṇayassa । jaṇaṇīē ya gurūṇaṁ taha niyakuladēvayāē ya ॥। 4264।।
taha kaṇayacūḍarannō dēvīē taha ya kaṇayarēhāē | dēhammi kuṇasi dōhaṁ jai savvaṁ nēyasāhasi ।।4265 ।।
dina vahāē tattō piyaṁkarīē jahaṭṭhiyaṁ tassa । akkhāyaṁ niya bhaṇiyaṁ pabhāvaī pabhaṇiyaṁ taha ya ।। 4266।।
sōūṇa kaṇagakēū taṁ cita dāhagr̥hiyasavvaṁgō | jāva na dikkhaṁ ginhai sā ajja vi tāva taṁ jhatti ||4267।।
gaṁtuṁ pabhāvaī avaharāmi jīvāmi annahā nāhaṁ । iya citiūṇa saṁvahai ēsa rayaṇauragamaṇakaē ।।4268 ।।
maṇicūḍō vi kumārō paguṇō aṭṭhami diṇōrvāri hōuṁ । tāva ṭhiō jāva diṇaṁ taṁ ciya gamaṇassa saṁpattaṁ ॥ 4269।।
tō niya samaggasāmaggisaṁgaō jāva gaṁtumāraddhō । sō maṇicūḍakumārō samuṭṭhiō tāva halabōlō ।। 4270।।
aṁtēurassa majjhē jāō tō rāyalōyasaṁkhōhō । dhāvaṁti ukkhayāu hatthā suhaḍā saṭhāṇāō ।।4271 ।।
kiṁ kiṁ ēyaṁ jāyaṁti jaṁpirā jaṁti rāyabhavaṇammi । taṁ sōuṁ maṇicūḍō vi jāi tatthēva vēgēṇa ।। 4272 ।।
rāyā vi rayaṇacūḍō kōlāhalasavaṇaō niyaṁ purisaṁ । aṁtēurammi pēsai pucchēḍaṁ kalayalasakhvaṁ ।।4273।।
sō gaṁtūṇaṁ aṁtēurammi purisōvabuddhaparamatthō । gaṁtr̥̄ṇa rāyapāsē kahēi ēvaṁ jahā dēva ! ||4274 ।।
dhūyā pabhāvaī tuha jāva sapāsāyasiharamārūḍhā । rayaṇauranayarasōhaṁ pāsaṁtī ciṭṭhaē tāva
iṁdaurāō nayarāō naṁdaṇō kaṇayacūḍarāyassa । āgaṁtu kaṇagakēū taṁ avaharijaṁ avakkatō ||4276 ॥
maṇicūḍēṇa vi ēvaṁ pāsaniviṭṭhēṇa rayaṇacūḍassa । sōūṇa sayaṁ jaṁtō kuḍhāvaē tassa paṭṭhīē ||4277।।
rāyā nivāriō maggiō ya gaṁtuṁ sayaṁ pi āēsō । tēṇa aṇunnāō paṭṭiō ya sō tassa paṭṭhīē || 4278।।
diṭṭhō jaṁtō sō nahapaṇa iṁdauramaggamujjhēu । uttarasēḍhī samuhaṁ maṇicūḍēṇaṁ kaṇagakēū

tō hakkiō sarōsaṁ vaccasi rē duṭṭu ! kattha ginhēuṁ । bhaiṇi pabhāvaī maha tā maṁcasu sigghamēvēyaṁ ॥4280 ।।
anna (ha) na atthi tuha jīviyanvaminhi pi hōsi pāhuṇaō । kīṇāsassa viṇassahi mā ālēṇēva taṁ tamhā ॥
aha bhaṇai kaṇagakēū niyajīviyarakkhaṇatthamavahariyā । ēsā pabhāvaī saṁpayaṁ (ma ) ē jhaṁkhasi kimālaṁ ।।4282 ।।
iya gavvajaṁpirā tē parōpparaṁ khēyarēsarakumārā । gururōsadaṭṭaōṭṭhā abbhiṭṭhā dō vi jujjhēu ||4283॥
iyarā iyarēhiṁ samaṁ khayarā jujjhati ubhayasēnēsu । hammatā vijjhatā parōpparaṁ khaggabāṇēhi ||4284।।
maṇicūḍakumarasēntrēṇa tāḍiyaṁ kaṇagauṇō sēnnaṁ । aha taṁ jhatti paṇaṭṭhaṁ disōdisi katthai kahiṁ pi ||4285 ।।
maṇicūḍēṇa vi sō kaṇagakēukumarō paṇāsiō jhatti । gahiuṁ pabhāvaī jiya vimāṇamārōviḍaṁ nīyā ||4286।।
niya nayarē rayaṇaurē rannā vaddhāvaṇaṁ ca kāraviyaṁ । kumarō vi kaṇayakēū pattō iṁdauranayarammi ।। 4287 । ।
aha kaṇayacūḍarāyā sōūṇaṁ vilasiyaṁ niyasuyassa । saṁjāyagaruyakhēō hakkārēūṇa taṁ bhaṇai ||4288।।
kīsa ta kayamēyaṁ kajjamaṇālōiyaṁ sayaṁ cēva । amhāṇa vina hu kahiyaṁ phalaṁ pi tō tārisaṁ jāyaṁ ।। 4289 ।।
jaṁ rayaṇacūḍarāyā saṁpai khayarēsarāṇa majjhammi । bahuyāṇaṁ balavaṁtō tō tēṇa samaṁ jaha tahēva ॥4290।।
hōi virōhō kāuṁ na saṁgaō tujjha dikkakhyassa । iha tuha kajjē ciṁtā amhāṇa vi nivasai maṇammi ।। 4291 । ।
sakkammi paraṁ kajjē āraṁbha kīraē vivēīhi । annaha puṇa kīraṁtē jaha tuha jāyaṁ tahā hōi ।।4292।।
vijjāē sahāēṇa va appāṇaṁ bahubalaṁ vihēūṇa । ai garuyakajjakaraṇē payaṭṭiyavvaṁ taō hōi 4293 ।।
jaī nicchaēṇa ēyaṁ karaṇijjaṁ māṇasammi tuha vasai । appāṇaṁ sappāṇaṁ kīē vi juttīē tō kuṇaha ।।4294 ।।
aha kaṇayakēukumarō niya piyaraṁ kaṇayacūḍakhayaridaṁ । aṇujāṇāvēūṇaṁ uttarasaṁḍhīē baccē ||4295।।
niya bharyāṇi kaṇagavaī avaharaṇabhaēṇa nēi tatthēva । maṇicūḍammi kumārē baddhaṇurāyaṁ viyāuṁ ।। 4296।।
tatthatthi lacchiramaṇaṁ nayaraṁ suranāhanayararamaṇijjaṁ । taṁ pālai raṇasīhō bahuvijjāladdhamāhappō ।।4297।।
pāsammi kaṇagakēū tassa gaō kuṇai paidiṇaṁ sēvaṁ । annadiṇē raṇasīhō taṁ jaṁpai kahasu niya kajjaṁ ॥। 4298।।
sō ētē savvaṁ tassa purō niya sarūvamakkhēi । tō tēṇa tassa dinnā paravijjā yaṇīvijjā ।।4299 ।।
taha parabalakhōhaṇiyā puṇō vi vijjā duijjiyā dinnā । dunhaṁ pi hu vijjāṇaṁ kahiō taha sāhaṇōvāō ||
gahiūṇa dōvi vijjāō tāō raṇasīhakhayaranāhāō । tō kaṇagakēukumarō āgaṁtuṇaṁ niyāvāsē ||4301 ॥
ēgaṁtē hōūṇaṁ kahēi savvassa tāō vijjāō । suṇai kahijjaṁ tīō sasāhaṇāō vi kaṇagavaī ||4302 ।।
javaṇīē aṁtariyā maṁtijjaṁ taṁpi tēhi taha ēyaṁ | āyanna jaha siddhē vijjājuyalammi ēyammi ||4303 ||
kajjajuyaṁ sijjhissai jēṇa kaō paribhavō raṇē amha । sō nihaṇaṁ nijjissai maṇicūḍō kajjamēkkamiṇaṁ ॥
kajjaṁ duijjayaṁ puṇa pabhāvaī niyabalēṇa hariūṇa । pariṇissāmi haḍhēṇaṁ tō vijjāsāhaṇaṁ karimō ॥। 4305 ।।
tē maṁtiūṇa ēvaṁ dōnni vi raṇasīhakhayararāyassa | gaṁtūṇa sannihāṇē patthaṁti tahāvihasahāyaṁ ॥ 4306॥
vijjāsāhaṇahēuṁ aha kaṇagavaī maṇammi aibhīyā । lihiuṁ vijjājuyalaṁ bhujjammi sasāhaṇōvāyaṁ ।।4307 ।।
vijjāṇaṁ ca pabhāvaṁ parōpparaṁ kaṇayakēu savvāṇaṁ । ēgaṁtamaṁtiyaṁ taha tō taṁ bhujjaṁ samappēuṁ ||4308||
hatyē piyaṁkarīē pacchannaṁ taṁ ca pēsaē jhati । maṇicūḍakumarapāsē sā gaṁtuṁ tassa taṁ dēi ||4309 ।।
sō chōḍiūṇa vāyai maṁtiya ahiyaṁ ca tattha lihiyamiṇaṁ । tē kaṇagakēu savvā jā vijjāō na sāhati ।।4310 ।।
tāva taē sigdhaṁ ciya sāhēyavvā u dō vi vijjāō । jēṇa tuha paribhavaṁ tē raṇammi kāuṁna sakkaṁti ।। 4311॥
aha avagayalē hatthō sammāṇēuṁ piyaṁkari jhatti । tatthēva puṇō pēsai sō maṇicūḍō varakumārō ।।4312 । ।

pucchai pannattimahāvijjaṁ kō majjha uttarasahāō । vijjā sāhaṇakammē hōhī tō tīē taṁ kahiō ।। 4313।।
caṁdauranayarasāmī laddhajasō caṁdakittinaranāhō । tō jāva tujjha pāsē ēhī kira kumaramaṇicūḍō ।। 4314 ।।
tāva sirirayaṇacūḍēṇa rāṇā appaṇō samīvammi । āhūō maṇicūḍō tassa purō tēṇimaṁ kahiyē || 4315 ।।
jaha ajja divasacarimē samāgaō sō puṇō vi guṇabhahō । sūrī iha ujjāṇē taṁ suṇiumahaṁ gaō tattha ।।4316 ।।
tavvēlaṁ puṇa sīsamma vēyaṇā āsi tujjha saṁjāyā । tēṇa tumaṁ nāhūō vaccatēṇaṁ maē tattha ।।4317।।
।
tō vaṁdittā sūri tassa suyādēsaṇā maē tattha । thēvā vi taō kahiyaṁ majjha imaṁ sūriṇā tēṇa ।।4318 ।।
ajja maha avahiṇāṇaṁ vimalajjhavasāṇāō samuppannaṁ । tēṇa tuha thēvamāuṁ nāuṁ amāgaō ēttha ।। 4319।।
kahaṇatthaṁ tuha vīsaṁ diṇāṇi jīyaṁ jamatthi ēttāhē । jaṁ hōi kiṁpi juttaṁ inhi naranāha taṁ kujjā ।।4320 ।।
tō paṇamiūṇa sūrī vinnattō mauliyaggahatthēṇa । jhatti maē jaha bhayavaṁ ! majjha pasāō kaō garuō ।।4321 ।।
tumhahiṁ jaṁ pattō pamāyanidāē bōhiō iyahaṁ । maṇicūḍakumārē rajjabhāramārōviḍaṁ inhi ।। 4322।।
ginhissaṁ dikkhamahaṁ bhayavaṁ ! tuha pāyapaumapāsammi । iya vinnaviḍaṁ sūri vaṁdittā ēttha pattōmhi ||4323 ||
tā ginha tumaṁ rajjaṁ dikkhaṁ ginhāmi puṇa ahaṁ inhi । iya sōūṇaṁ rannō āēsaṁ jhatti sō jāō || 4324।।
vajjāhau vva sīsē nayaṇēsu galaṁtabāhajalapavahō । gurusōyaruddhakaṁṭhō na kiṁpi japēṛa paḍivayaṇaṁ ।। 4325।।
tō rayaṇacūḍarannā maṇicūḍō takkhaṇē uvālō । ēttiya diṇāṇi amhē ēvaṁ jāṇaṁtayā hōṁtā ॥4326॥
amhēhi atthi jāō puttō aipayaḍavikkamō ēsō । raṁḍa vva rōyasi tumaṁ tā inhi ērisē kajjaṁ ।। 3227 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ rannā sayamēvayalūhiyāiṁ nayaṇāī | maṇicūḍakumārassāsannanisannassa tō bhaṇiō ।। 4328।।
sō ēvaṁ jaṁ uṭṭhasu sappurisakayaṁ karēhi dhīrataṁ । rajjadhuraṁ dhārēu saṁpai maṁ nivvayaṁ kuṇasu ।। 4329॥
ērisiyā tuha bhattī mama uvari mamēvahārasē kajjaṁ । avasarapattaṁ inhi kāūṇa siṇēhamabuhāṇa ||4330 ।।
iya bhaṇiō sō rannā maṇicūḍō dhīrimaṁ karēūṇa | saṁṭhaviyappā jaṁpaṛa tumhāsō pamāṇaṁ mē ।। 4331।।
tō rāyā mēlēḍaṁ samaggasāmaṁtamaṁtimaṁḍaliē । taṁ rajjē ahisicai sikkhavaī tayaṁ pariyaṇaṁ ca ॥4332||
tō rayaṇacūḍarāyā rayaṇavaīē samaṁ piyayamāē । maṇicūḍarāyapamuhēṇa savvalōēṇa pariyariō ||4333 ||
aigasyavibhūīē gaṁtuṁ guṇabhasūriṇō pāsē । ginhai dikkhaṁ lōō niyattaē sēsaō savvō ।।4334।।
maṇicūḍarāyapamuha aha rāyā taṁ jaṇaṁ visajjēuṁ । maṇicūḍō caṁdaurē ihāgaō vijjusihasahiō ।। 4335 ।।
rayaṇīē taiya jāmē uttarasāhagapaōyaṇanimittaṁ । pāsammi caṁdakittissa nivaiṇō suhapasuttassa || 4336।।
sōhaṁ maṇicūḍanivō ōyaṇēṇāgaō imēṇēha । jaṁ puṇa ēvaṁ māyā kayā maē tatthimō hēū ।।4337।।
niddā khōha bhaēṇaṁ amhēhiṁ kaō na tumha paḍibōhō । tō kālajāvaṇatthaṁ āgaṁtu nayarabāhimmi ||4338||
jā pēcchaṇayāraṁbhaṁ kārissaṁ kīra maṇōramujjāṇē । tāvagayaṁ diṭṭhipahē juyāijiṇamaṁdiraṁ majjha ॥ 4339 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tattha paḍimaṁ namiuṁ thuṇiuṁ ca tō samāraddhaṁ । vijjāsattīē maē pēcchaṇayamimēṇa bhāvēṇa || 4340 ।।
jamihaka pēcchaṇa tini vi kajjāī hōṁti vihiyāī । jiṇavarabhattīniyamaṇaviṇōyaṇaṁ tumha paḍibōhō ||
tō caṁdakittirannā bhaṇiyaṁ saccaṁ payaṁpiyaṁ tumaē । pēcchaṇayasahasavaṇēṇa jaggiyaṁ jēṇa amhēhi ||4342||
aha kharyāriṁdō jaṁpai vijjāē maṇipaīvadhārīō । gāyaṇa - vāyaṇa - naccaṇi samudāō tattha nimmaviō ||
vijjusihō puṇa ēvaṁ sikkhaviuṁ pēsiō tuha samīvē । jaggai jayā nariṁdō tayā taē majjha kahiyavvaṁ ॥4344।।

ētthaṁtarammi hōuṁ vijjusihō jhatti payaḍarūvēṇa । maṇicūḍassa samappaṛa mauḍaṁ khaṁḍīkayaṁ samarē ||4345!!
taṁ naranāhō pucchai khayaridasamīvaō kimēyaṁ ti । sō bhaṇai tujjha khaggēṇa khaṁḍiō ēsa mē mauḍō ||4346||
naranāhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ khaggō cciya āhaō tayā tujjha । khittō khaggapahārō kharida ! maē na mauḍassa ।। 4347 ।।
khayariṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tuha khaggahaēṇa majjha khaggēṇa । dhārāē niviṭṭēṇaṁ ēsa dukhaṁḍī kaō mauḍō ||4348 ||
tō naravaiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ hāhā ēyaṁ na suṁdaraṁ jāyaṁ । kharyāriṁdēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ suṁdaramēvamha jāyamiṇaṁ ।। 4349 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ narēsarēṇa kaha hāṇi suṁdaraṁ tumaṁ vayasi । kharyāraṁdō bhaṇai taō guṇajaṇaṇī imā hāṇī ||4350||
jai aṁtarē na hōṁtō ēsō mauḍō tayā pahārassa । tō tēṇa majjha sīsaṁ jhatti dukhaṁḍī kayaṁ hōṁta ।। 4351 ।।
tattō āsi samattākahā samaggā vi majjha saṁgāmē । tā mauḍamatthaē cciya paḍiyaṁ savvaṁ duriyamēyaṁ
tō bhaṇiyaṁ naravaiṇā sāhijjau patthuyaṁ puṇō puraō । tō khayaraṁdō jaṁpai vijjusihō tuha pasuttassa
vāsabhavaṇassa dārē pacchannō tāva saṁṭhiō jāva । taṁ paḍibuddhō tattō niggaṁtuṁ āraō caliō
pacchā tuha paṭṭhīē laggō ēsō vi āgaō nihuō । pāyārē āruhiuṁ uppaiuṁ gayaṇamaggammi ।।4355 ।।
parihāē adūraṁ tuha nivayaṁtassa payanihāēṇa । aigaruō paḍisō samuṭṭhiō kaṁpiyā puhai ।।4356।।
jammi khaṇē tavvēlaṁ ciya paḍisahō sakannakuharammi । amha paviṭṭhō ghōrō taha tharahariyaṁ jiṇāyayaṇaṁ ॥4357।।
tō jāō saṁkhōhō maha hiyaē saṁtimavi karitāṇa । ki ēsō vēyālō samuṭṭhiō dīsaē kō vi ॥4358।।
pāraddhammi vivarapēcchaṇammi bhattīē ēttha jiṇabhavaṇē । ki ēsō bhūkaṁpō jāō saha bhēravaravēṇa ।। 4359।।
jā ēvaṁ saṁbuddhō citāmi khaṇaṁ sa tāva saṁpattō । vijjusihō maha pāsē turiyaṁ turiyaṁ aipahiṭṭhō ।।4360 ।।
tō pucchiō maē sō ki paḍibuddhō sa caṁdakitti nivō। vijjusihēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ paḍibuddhō sō iha vi pattō ।। 4361 ।।
tō saṁlattō samaē katthataō tēṇa akkhiyaṁ savvaṁ । majjha jaha pēcchaṇārāvasavaṇaō taṁsi paḍibuddhō ।।4362 ||
jaha sayaṇagaēga taē pēcchaṇayagayā kayā bahuviyappā । jaha uṭṭhiūṇa tattō saṁvahiuṁ taṁ pavattōsi ॥। 4363।।
saṁvahamāṇammi tumammi tēṇa jaha citiyaṁ kahi gamihī । ēsa nivōtti taō jaha tuha paḍibōhāō ārambha ।।
tuha maṇacatiyabhāvā pannattīē payāsiyā tassa । ēmāi jāva jiṇaharasamīvadēsāgaō taṁsi ||4365।।
taṁ saccā vinnāō maē tumaṁ pēcchaṇāṇurattamaṇō । tō tuha cittukkaṁṭhā jaṇaṇatthaṁ pēcchaṇaṁ puṇavi ॥4366॥
pāraddhaṁ aisayavittharēṇa aha taṁ puṇō vi mē kahiō । vijjusihēṇaṁ jiṇamaṁdirassa dārammi saṁpattō ॥ 4367 ॥
tō
tuha dhīrataparikkhaṇatthamēyaṁ jhatti saṁvariyaṁ । pēcchaṇayaṁ nīsēsaṁ sunaṁ ca kayaṁ jiṇāyayaṇaṁ ||4368 ||
tō pacchannēṇa maē nirikkhiō taṁsi ki karēsitti । jai bhīōsi na pavisasi aha nō pavisihisi tō aṁtō ।।
tāva tumaṁ nikkhōhōkhaṇaṁtaraṁ vimhayaṁ maṇē kāuṁ । majjhammi gaō jiṇamaṁdirassa diṭṭhō taē dēvō ।।4370।।
tō baṁdiūṇa dēvaṁ nīhariḍaṁ jiṇagihāu bāhimmi । jā vaccasi pāsāē niyammitā taṁ puṇō vi maē || 4371 ||
sāhasaparikkhaṇatthaṁ tuha bhaṇiyā jālamāliṇī vijjā । jaṁ puvvadisāē maha samaṁtaō kuṇa pahājālaṁ ॥4372।।
ēvaṁ kayammi tīē taṁ daṭhṭhē kōugēṇa taṁ caliō । līlāē tassa samuhaṁ maṇapi na maṇammi saṁkhuhiō ||4373।।
sēsaṁ tujjha samakkhaṁ jāyaṁ savvaṁ pi tattha kiṁ kahimō । pahajāladaṁsaṇēṇa vi taṁ nikkhōhaṁ puṇō nāuṁ ।।4374।।
cittammi maē nicchiyamēvaṁ jaṁ ēsa tāva ai dhīrō । niyamāṇasammi kiṁ puṇa sārīrabalaṁ parikkhāmi ।।4375 ।।
tō vijjusihō bhaṇiō maē imaṁ jaṁ taē adissēṇa । ṭhāyavvamudāsēṇaṁ mai jujjhatē vi saha imiṇā ||4376 ।।
kajjēṇaṁ tēṇa taē saddhi jujjha maē samāraddhaṁ । jaṁ jujjhē puṇa jāyaṁ tumapi taṁ jāṇasi asē ।।4377।।

caṁdakittinivakahā
jō kō vi ahaṁ kajjēṇa jēṇa ētthāgaō tayaṁ savvaṁ । ēyaṁ nivēśyaṁ tuhaṁ uḍḍhaṁ tubbhē pamāṇaṁ ti ।। 4378 ।।
aha āha caṁdakittīnaranāhō khayaranāhamaṇicūḍaṁ । jaṁ kiṁpi tumaṁ jaṁpasi tamahaṁ saṁpai karēmi tti ।। 4379 ।।
tō vayai khēyariṁdō maṇicūḍō divasasattagēṇaiva । sāhēyavvā sagharē paravijjā chēyaṇī vijjā ।।4380 ।।
parabalakhōhaṇiyā puṇa sunnārannammi visamasēlammi | sāhēyavvā vijjā bahūvasaggā tahā ēsā ॥। 4381 ।।
ēkkō vijjā sāhagapurisō ēkkōya uttara-sahāō । dōcci purisā tīsē vijjāē sāhaṇē jaṁti ।। 4382 ।।
vijjāē kīramāṇē ghōruvasaggē nirikkhi iyarō । saṁkhuhai uttara - sāhagamicchāmi tumamēva ।।4383।।
niyagēhagaō diṇasattagēṇa paravijjachēryāṇi vijjaṁ । sāhēūṇaṁ tattō gamissamahamamē divasē ||4384 ।।
nīlaṁjaṇammi sēlē tammi dinē diṇamuhē vi tuha pāsē । pēsissaṁ khayarajuyaṁ taō tumaṁ jhatti ējjāhi ॥। 4385 ।।
tō caṁdakittirannā bhaṇiyaṁ nīsaṁsayaṁ karēmēvaṁ । vacca tumaṁ saṭṭāṇē maṇicūḍō bhaṇai tō ēvaṁ ||4386।।
siranihiyapāṇijyalō mahāpasāō tti saṁpayaṁ amhē । nahamaggēṇaṁ nēmō niyapāsāyaṁ tumaṁ tāva ।। 4387 ।।
pacchā vi gamissāmō niya nayarē tō narēsarō jhatti । uṭṭhēuṁ tēhi samaṁ gayaṇēṇa gaō sagēhammi ।। 4388 ||
maṇicūḍō khayariṁdō paṇamēuṁ caṁdakittinaranāhaṁ । vijjusihēṇaṁ saha khayarēṇa pattō niyaṁ naraṁ ।। 4389 ।।
niya gihagaēṇa tō tēṇa tattha paravijjachēyaṇī vijjā | saṁsāhiyā diṇēhiṁ satrttāhi tō ēttha pēsaviyā ॥। 4390।।
amhē ajjaṭṭamavāsarammi sūruggamassa samayammi । vijjusihō haṁ taha vijjumālināmō duijjō ya ।।4391 |
dōṇhaṁ pi niggayāṇaṁ amha taō ṭhāṇaō puṇō pacchā । paṭṭaviō taḍitēō taiō vijjāharō pahuṇā ।। 4392 ।।
vijjāē kāraviyaṁ rayaṇavimāṇaṁ imaṁ gahēūṇa । ravi maṁḍalāu abbhahiyatēyapasarēṇa dippaṁtaṁ ।।4393 ।।
ēvaṁ ēyaṁ kahiyaṁ savittharaṁ savvamēva tumha maē । siricaṁda kittirannō vēyaḍḍhē kāraṇaṁ gama ।।4394 । ।
varamaṁti saṁpayaṁ mē āēsaṁ dēha jēṇa vaccāmi । sō tēṇa maṁtiṇā tō visajjiō paṭṭiō jhatti ।।4395।।
savvē atthāṇa jaṇā vijjusihāō tayaṁ suṇēūṇa । āṇaṁdapūriyamaṇā pēkkhati muhāī annōnnaṁ ।।4396 ।।
sīsāī dhuṇēūṇaṁ vayaṁti ēvaṁ ahō mahārāō । sāmī amhāṇamimō savvēsimacitamāhappō ।। 4397 ।।
maṇuyārṇācitaṇijjō na ēsa vijjāharā vi jassēvaṁ । sēvaṁ amarakumārāgārā pakaraṁti dāsa vva ।। 4398 । ।
aha rayaṇaurē nayarē āgamaṇaṁ caṁdakitti naravaiṇō । paḍivālitō ciṭṭhai kharyāriṁdō jāva maṇicūḍō ||4399 ।।
taḍitēyavijjumālīhiṁ saṁjuō tāva jhatti saṁpattō । sō vi nivacaṁdakittī tattha vimāṇē samākhḍhō ।।4400 ।।
ōyariyavimāṇāō pāsāē jāi jāva naranāhō । tā uṭṭiūṇa maṇicūḍakhēyariṇa sō namiō || 4401 ।।
ai paharisēṇa tēṇa vi gāḍhaṁ āligiō khayararāyā । ēgaṁtē gaṁtūṇa sō vi taō caṁdakittissa | ||4402 ।।
rāyassa dēi vijjāu jāu sijjhati paṭṭiyamēttāō। nahagāmiṇipamuhāō dō vi taō jhatti vaccati ।।4403 ।।
nīlaṁjaṇammi sēlē patthuyavijjāē sāhaṇanimittaṁ । tatthaguhāē ēkkāē dāradēsammi maṁḍalayaṁ ||4404 ||
kāūṇaṁ tattha ṭhiō maṇicūḍō javai pāṇijāvēṇa । vijjaṁ ēgaggamaṇō niyadēhē maṁtakayarakkhō || 4406 ||
rāyā vi caṁdakittī kōyaṁḍakivāṇapāṇiuvauttō । nāsannamma na dūrē tassa ṭhiō ciṭṭhai niyaṁtō ||4406 ।।
savvāō vidisāō ēvaṁ gamiūṇa dō ahōrattē । taiyammi dinē āsannataruvarāṇaṁ phalē pattē ||4408 ||
sayamavi paḍiē gahiūṇa tēhiṁ dōhiṁ pi pāraṇaṁ vihiyaṁ । pacchā puṇō vi niyaniya vāvārē saṁṭhiyā dō vi ।। 4409 ।।
annē vi ahōrattē dōnni gaē ēvamēva nivvigghē । taiyaṁ pipāraṇadiṇaṁ tahēva aha rayaṇi pāraṁ ।।4409 ।।
bhīsaṇavēyālāī uvasaggā uṭṭiyā mahāghōrā । tō jāva navamavāsarapāraṁbhē uggaō sūrō
।।4410 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
137
tē caṁdakittipuhaīsarēṇa savvēvi ṭāliyā tassa । niya punnapahāvēṇaṁ taha sārīrēṇa ya balēṇa ॥। 4411 ।।
tammi samayammi siddhā vijjā maṇicūḍakharidassa | khēḍayakhaggakaraggā paccakkhā tattha hōūṇa ।।4412 ।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē samayammi jammi tuha jāyaē bhaē kajjaṁ । tammi samayammi tumaē sariyavvāhaṁ jahā ēmi ।। 4413 ।
tō taduciyapaḍivatti kāuṁ taṁ vijjadēvayaṁ jhatti । tatō visajjiūṇaṁ samāgayā dō vi rayaṇaurē ।।4414।।
maṇicūḍacaṁdakittī khayaramaṇuēsarā taō tattha । nhāyavilittā bhuttā suhaṁ pattā ya sējjāsu ||4415 ।।
tō caṁdakittirāyaṁ pabhāvaī tattha āgayaṁ sōuṁ । tahaṁsaṇūsuyamaṇā gamē vāsaṁ va nāḍi pi ।।4416 ।।
rāyā vi caṁdakittī pabhāvaīdaṁsaṇē kayahilāsō । ukkaliyā ulahiyaō khaṇaṁ pi dukkhēṇa bōlēi ||4417||
maṇicūḍō kharida paḍibuddhō sigghamēva jōisiyaṁ । hakkariūṇa pucchaṛa pabhāvaīē vivāhadiṇaṁ ॥। 4418 ।।
tēṇa vi taiē diyahē pāṇiggaṇassa sāhiyaṁ laggaṁ । tō maṇicūḍanivēṇaṁ vivāhajōggā samaggā vi ।।4419 ।।
kāraviyā sāmaggī samāgaē laggavāsarē tattō । ai garuyavibhūīē pabhāvai caṁdakīttīṇaṁ ॥ 4420 ||
jaṇiyaṁ pāṇiggahaṇaṁ vadvāvaṇayaṁ ca kāriyaṁ nayarē । aigaruyapabaṁdhēṇaṁ jāyā jugavaṁpi jaṁ tēsi ||4421 ।।
tatthūsavā mahaṁtā ēē jāō navō nivō tassa | siddhāgaruī vijjā pabhāvaī taha ya pariṇīyā ||4422 ॥ |
jāyaṁ ca saṁgamasuhaṁ pabhāvaīēya caṁdakittissa । sā rayaṇī bōlīṇā tēsi ēkkaṁ muhutta va ।।4423।।
aha pēsaviyā puṇaravi kaṇagavaīē piyaṁkarī tattha । maṇicūḍarāyapāsē tīē tassēvamakkhāyaṁ ||4424 ||
parabalakhōhaṇivijjaṁ pasāhayaṁ tarasa kaṇaya kēussa । jōyaṁ mahaṁtavigdhaṁ uttarasāhagavarāhēṇa || 4425 ।।
tō sō vilakkhahiyaō iṁdaurē saṁpayaṁ samāyāō । kahiyaṁ ca niyaya piuṇō purō sarūvaṁ samaggaṁ pi ।। 4426 ||
piuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ jai tuha cittē saṁvasai paribhavō kō vi । tō tattha puṇō gaṁtuṁ raṇasīhanivassa pāsammi ।।4427 ।।
patthēhi puṇō annaṁ uttarasāhagamaīvabalavaṁtaṁ । dhīraṁ nikkhōhamaṇaṁ vijjaṁ sāhēhi tō ēyaṁ ॥। 4428।।
jai puṇa niya cittāō uttārēūṇa paribhavō mukkō । tō niccitō hōuṁ ciṭṭhasu niya maṁdirammi ṭhiō ।4429 ।
baddhāmarisō dhīrō kajjāraṁbhēsu vigdhanihaō vi । puṇa puṇa tattha payaṭṭai sāhai kajjaṁ aha marēi ||4430।।
iya sōuṁ piuvayaṇaṁ vinnattō kaṇayakēuṇā jaṇaō । tāyajiyaṁ tassa namē parābhavō ēsa pamhusa ।।4431 ।।
tā vaccissāmi puṇō karissamahamujjamaṁ ihatthammi । tāēṇa aṇunnāō vaccissai sō puṇō tattha ।।4432।।
inhi pi appaṇā saha jai maṁ sō nēi tō puṇō vigdhaṁ । jai puṇa vijjā sijjhai tassa taō hōi aivigdhaṁ । 4433 ।
jara tuha vijjā siddhā tō haṁ sigdhaṁ taēva hariyavvā । ahava na siddhā sāhasu tō kāuṁ ujjamaṁ garuyaṁ ।।4434 ।।
maṇicūḍēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ siddhā sā majjha saṁpayaṁ vijjā । siricaṁdakittirannō bhaiṇīvaiṇō pasāēṇa ||4435 ।।
kō ēttha kālakhēvō saṁpai kallaṁ cauddasīē vi । pubvōiya saṁkēyadvāṇammi ahaṁ samāgaṁtu ||4436॥
avahariḍaṁ kaṇagavaīṁ nūṇaṁ pariṇēmi iha samāṇēuṁ । tō taṁ gaṁtūṇa tahi saṁvāhēuṁ tayaṁ muyam ||4437॥
maṇicūḍassāēsaṁ lahiūṇaṁ paṭṭiyā piyaṁkariyā । iṁdaurē gaṁtūṇaṁ kaṇagavaīē nivēēḍa
।
harisēṇaṁ kaṇagavaī hiyaē dēhē ya tō amāyaṁtī । pauṇī hōūṇa ṭhiyā pabhāyadivasassa uvarimmi ||4439 ||
sayaṇammi pattā sā khaṇē khaṇē jaggaē bahiṁ jāi । jōēi jahā rayaṇīē kēttiyaṁ sēsamajjaviya ।।4440 ।।
rayaṇīē vihāyāē saṁvahiūṇaṁ piyaṁkarī sahiyā । kāmapaḍimānimittaṁ gahiūṇaṁ pūyauvagaraṇaṁ ।।4441 ।।
kaivayaparivārajuyā saṁpattā jāva naṁdaṇujjāṇē । tā saṁpattō khayarēmarō vi tatthēva maṇicūḍō ||4442 ।।
kaṇagavaīē tassa ya parōpparaṁ diṭṭhimēlaō jāō । hiyayammi pasiyāī dōnni vi tō jhatti ukkhittā ||4443 ||

=== vardhamanaoutput-138-to-138.json ==========================
138
caṁdakittinivakahā
maṇicūḍēṇaṁ ēsā savvassa vi pariyaṇassa majjhāō। ēgāgiṇī taō tīē sēsalōēṇa vāhariyaṁ ।।4444 ||
gaṁtūṇa kaṇayacūḍassa kaṇayakēussa sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ । kaṇagavaī maṇicūḍēṇa khēyariṁdēṇa jaṁ hariyā ||4445 ।।
tavvayaṇasavaṇasamaṇaṁtaraṁ pi tē dōvi dhāviyā turiyaṁ । piiputtā niyakhēyarabalēṇa savvēṇa saṁjuttā ||4446 ||
laggā paṭṭhīē tassa jhatti maṇicūḍakhēyariṁdassa । sō vi hu pattō sigdhaṁ niya khayarasēnnamajjhammi ||4447 ||
tapaṭṭhīē pattaṁ hakkataṁ kaṇagacūḍasēnnapi । taṁ daṭṭhaṇa ruṭṭhō maṇicūḍō niya vimāṇammi ||4448 ।।
kaṇagavaī mōttūṇaṁ rakkhagakhayarabalēṇa saṁjuttaṁ । caliō tēsi samuhaṁ sīhō va kuraṁgajūhāṇaṁ || 4449।।
abbhiṭṭāī dōnnivi khayarabalāī samaccharaṁ jhatti । tēsi aggāṇīyaṁ maṇicūḍassaggasēntrēṇa ||4450।।
bhaggaṁ jhatti paṇaṭṭhē pattaṁ saraṇammi kaṇayacūḍassa । tō kaṇagakēukumarō samuṭṭiō rōsadaṭṭhōṭṭō || 4451 ।।
tō tēṇa bhajjamāṇaṁ aggāṇīyaṁ niyaṁ niēūṇa । maṇicūḍakhēyariṁdēṇa tāḍiyaṁ tassa taṁ sēnnaṁ ।।4452 ।।
aivēgamukkaaitikkhabāṇapasarēṇa mucchiyaṁ savvaṁ । paharaṁtassa ya cāvaṁ dukhaṁḍiyaṁ kaṇagakēussa ।।4453 ।।
annaṁ pi jāva cāvaṁ gahiuṁ paguṇī karissai kirēsō । tā uppaiuṁ gaṁtūṇa tavvimāṇammi sō baddhō || 4454 । ।
maṇicūḍakhēyariṁdēṇa jīviyaṁ tassa nēya niggahiyaṁ । karuṇāē kaṇagavaīē taha ya lajjaṁ kuṇatēṇa ॥। 4455 ।।
tō kaṇagacūḍarāyā maṇicūḍaṁ pahariuṁ samārō । sō vi saradhōraṇīē maṇicūḍēṇaṁ kaō viharō || 4456 ।।
pacchā khaṁḍiyadhaya-daṁḍacaṁḍakōyaṁḍabāṇapasarō sō । jhatti khuruppēṇa uraṁmi tāḍiō pāviō mucchaṁ ।।4457 ।।
baddhō sō vigahēḍaṁ jāva niyattissaē jiya vivakkhō । nāūṇa raṇāraṁbhaṁ tā pattō caṁdakittī vi ॥ 4458 ॥
taṁ daṭhṭhē maṇicūḍō gaṁtuṁ iṁdauranayaramicchaṁtō । siricaṁdakittirāyaṁ āpucchai tattha gamaṇatthaṁ । 4459।।
tayaṇunnāō valiō maṇicūḍō tēṇa caiva saṁjuttō । mucchiyamayasēsā khayarā ya naṭṭhā parabalassa ।। 4460।।
tē dōvi paṭṭhilaggē ēṁtē daṭṭhūṇa maṇuyakhayariṁdē | bahuvijjāharabalasaṁjuē ya tō tē maṇē khuhiyā || 4461 ।।
parabalakhayarā savvē tēsi dōnhaṁ pi sēvamāvannā । tēhiṁ ca kaṇayacūḍō rāyā taha kaṇagakēū ya ||4462 ||
kēhi vi khayarēhiṁ samaṁ rayaṇaurē pēsiyā imē dō vi । nikkhittā guttīē kaṇagavaī puṇa samaṁ nīyā ||4463 ||
tō pattā iṁdapurē maṇicūḍō caṁdakittirāyā ya । bhīō ya nayaralōō dhīraviō tēhi savvō vi ||4464।।
aha saṁpattā tē kaṇagacūḍakhayarāhivassa pāsāē । maṇicūḍacaṁdakittī khēyaramaṇuēsarā dō vi ।। 4465 ।।
tēsi māhappaṁ pāsiūṇa sō nayarasaṁtiō lōō । vimhaiyamaṇō jaṁpai suridasamavikkamā ēē ।।4466।।
ēkkō viha maṇicūḍō su dujjaō iyara khayaralōyāṇa । kiṁ puṇē imiṇā siricaṁdakittiṇā saṁjuō rannā ।। 4467 ।।
tā amha sāmi ēhi viṇāsiyaṁ jaṁ imēhi saha samarō । pāraddhō payaḍaparakkamēhiṁ dōhiṁ pi gavvavasā || 4469 ।।
saṁpai amhēṁ pahuvirahiyāṇa saraṇaṁ na kō vi annōtthi । ēēsi ciya sēvaṁ paḍivajjāmō taō gaṁtuṁ ।।4469 ।।
iya maṁtiūṇa savvē nayarajaṇā pavaraḍhōyaṇayahatthā । pattā naridadārē paḍihāranivēiyā tattō ||4470 ||
puraō naridapāsē pattā appiti ḍhōyaṇāī kamā । kappūrāguruvara- vattha - kaṁtraṇāharaṇamāīṇa ||4471 ।।
tō paṇamiūṇa saviṇayamārōviyakarauḍā siraggammi । iya vinnaviti inhi tumhē amhāṇa hōha pahū ।।4472 ।।
maṇicūḍēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jai ēvaṁ caṁdakitti naranāhō । tō ahisiccau rajjē aha bēṁti imē kuṇaha ēvaṁ ||4473।।
tō garuyavibhūīē ahisittō yarāhivapayammi । siricaṁdakittirāyā maṇicuḍāīhi savvēhi ||4474 ।।
paṭṭaviyā rayaṇaurē pabhāvaīē samānayaṇa hēḍaṁ । vijjāharā pahāṇā taṁ gahijē tē samāyāyā ||4875 ।।
