sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacarivaṁ
139
tō pucchiūṇa divasa mahāvibhūīē khayararāēṇa । kaṇagavaī pariṇīyā maṇicuḍēṇaṁ pahiṭṭhēṇa ||4476।।
kaṇagavaī purṇa hiyaē hēi harisaṁ ca taha visāyaṁ ca । sissa kāraṇamiṇa maṇicūṛī jaṁ varō ladō ||4477 ||
ēyaṁ ca kāraṇaṁ puṇa garuyavisāyassa jaṁ kaṇagacūḍō । jaṇaō baddhō khittō guttīē kaṇayakēū ya ॥4478 ।।
pāraddhaṁ paurēṇaṁ vaddhāvaṇayaṁ purammi vittharaō । mūlillē pāsāē sayaṁ ṭhiō caṁdakittinivō ॥। 4479 ।।
maṇicūḍō kharidō ṭhiō puṇō kaṇayakēu pāsāē । tē dō vi nivvuyamaṇā niti dinē kēttiē tattha ।।4480 ।।
maṇicūḍaṁ kharyāradaṁ pucchēuṁ caṁdakittinaranāhō । caṁdaurē vijjusihaṁ pēsai taha vijjumāli ca ।।4481 ।।
suhamamaimaṁtipā sē kahaṇatthaṁ niyayakhēmavattāē । taha pucchiuṁ sarūvaṁ rajjammi vi dutthasutthassa || 4482 ।।
tō tē dōnni vi khayarā gaṁtūṇaṁ tattha maṁtipavarassa । puraō kahēṁti savvaṁ cariyaṁ siricaṁdakittissa ||4483॥
maṁtī vi takkhaṇaṁ ciya āhavaṇaṁ savvarāyalōyassa । pēsēūṇa sayaṁ puṇa saṁpattō rāyabhavaṇammi ||448 4 ||
tō paṇa maūṇa rannō sīhāsaṇamappaṇī samuciyammi । ṭhāṇammi samuvaviṭṭhō tēhi samaṁ dōhi khayarēhi ।।4485 ।।
pattō khatarammi vi nīsēsō rāyasēvayajaṇō bi । sāmaṁta maṁti-maṁḍaliya-taṁtavālāiō tattha ।। 4486 ।।
sīhāsaṇaṁ paṇamiuṁ rannō maṁti ca tē vi savvē vi । saṭṭāṇēsu nisannā kayapaḍivattī jahājōgaṁ ॥। 4487 ।।
tō suhamamaīmaṁtī tasi taṁ daṁsiūṇa khayaradugaṁ । kaha jahā ēē tē dōnni vi khayarā samāyāyā ||4488 ।।
amha pahū vinnaviḍaṁ nīō vēyaḍḍhapavvaē jēhiṁ । sakusalakahaṇatthamimē puṇō vi iha pēsiyā tēṇa ।।4489 ।।
kahiyaṁ amha sarūvaṁ savvaṁ ēēhi saṁpayaṁ tumha | aṁkkhāvēḍaṁ ēē paḍivālēuṁ ihāṇīyā ||4490 ॥
tō maṁtibhaṇiēhiṁ dōhiṁ vi khayarēhiṁ tēhi akkhāyaṁ । savvaṁ pi nivasarūvaṁ atthāṇajaṇassa tassa purō ।।4491 ।।
puṇa bēṁti maṁtiṇaṁ tē amhaṁ ēsō vi asthi āēsō । siricaṁdakittipaṇō jaṁ pucchējjā suhaṁ rajjē ||4492 ।।
tō maṁtī tē paṇa dēvapayāvēṇa pahiyappasarā । pabhavaṁti na tāva riṅa tahēva viṇaṇa vaṭṭēti ||4493 ।।
amha pamāyā kaha vi hu bāhijjai jai parōpparaṁ lōō । pucchēyavvō sō vi hu tumhēhi sayaṁ ihāyāō ||4494 ।।
iya maṁtiṇā bhaṇiḍaṁ āhavaṇaṁ pēsiuṁ purajaṇassa । atthāṇajaṇō bhaṇiō kahēha tumbhē niyasakhvaṁ ।। 4495 ।।
vijjusihavijjumālīṇa khayarāṇaṁ kahēṁti tō savvē । atthāṇajaṇā amhaṁ lavō vi asuhassa nō asthi ।।4496 ॥
dēvassa pasāēṇaṁ ēyaṁciya bahuyamasuhamamhāṇaṁ । jamaigayā bahudiyahā diṭṭhāṇaṁ dēvapāyāṇaṁ ।। 4497 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattō nāyaralōō vi tattha nīsēsō । kayauciyapaṇāmāī sō vi niviṭṭhō jahadvāṇaṁ ।। 4498 ।।
maṁtivayaṇēṇa sō vihu kahēi taṁ ciya purō nahyarāṇa । nīsēsaṁ jaṁ kahiyaṁ atthāṇajaṇēṇa tāṇa purō ।।4499 ।।
tō tē bhāṁti khayarā bhayavasaō ēsa ciṭṭhai nivassa । rajjabharaṁ tumha taō khiviḍaṁ sō jāi tattha sayaṁ ।। 4500 ।।
paramēsa kamō pahuṇō jaṁ niya [sēvaya] jaṇāṇa suhadukkhaṁ । pucchāvijjai jai vi hu suhēṇa ciṭṭhēti tē dūrē । ।4501 ।।
jaṁ kiṁ pi tumha kajjaṁ kahiyavvaṁ caṁdakittirāyassa । taṁ amha kahaha saṁpas vēyaḍḍhē jēṇa vaccāmā ।।4502 ।।
aha suhamamaī jaṁpara ēvaṁ dēvassa vinnavēyavvaṁ । tubhēhi amha vayaṇaṁ jaṁ avasērī na kāyavvā ||4503 ||
iha sassa purassa va gāmassa va ēgamāṇusassa vi ya । kajjamasiddhaṁ sāhaha saṁpayamanaṁ pi tattha tumē ।। 4504 ।।
dēvēṇa kiṁtu sigdhaṁ niya pāyā amha daṁsiyavva tti । bhaṇiuṁ maṁtī khayarē tē sammāṇai visajjii ya ।। 4505 ।।
aha gaṁtaṇaṁ tē caṁdakittirāyassa sa-maṇicūḍassa | sāhati tayaṁ savvaṁ ta pahilā duvē tē tri ।। 8506 ।।
daṭṭṇa guṇakalāvaṁ māhaṣpaṁ caṁdakittinivaissa । savvē vi tammi jāyā kyāgurāyā mahākhayarā ।। 8507 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-140-to-140.json ==========================
140
siricaṁdakitticariyaṁ
jē kē vi khēyariṁdā dāhiṇasēḍhīē tattha nivasaṁti । tē savvē niyacittē vahaṁti garuyaṁ avaṭṭhabhaṁ ।। 4508 ।।
jai
kō vi amha annō karissaē paribhavaṁ balīkhayarō | tō gaṁtuṁ kahissāmō vattaṁ siricaṁdakiṁttissa ।। 4509 ।।
iya āsāē savvē karēṁti tē caṁdakitti naravaiṇō । bahu aṇuṇayaṁ sayā vi hu samīvamāgaṁtu sayamēva ।।4510 ।।
tō jō jō appabalō kharyāriṁdō iyara khēyariṁdēṇa । pārabbhai āgaṁtuṁ sō sō vattaṁ kahai tassa ।। 4511 ।।
tō caṁdakittirāyā pakkhē hōūṇa tassa taṁ iyaraṁ । mūlāō ucchēyai ṭhavēi niya sēvayaṁ tattha ।।4512 ।।
ēvaṁ kamēṇa savvē dāhiṇasēḍhī gayā naharyāriṁdā । uvasāhiūṇa sēvaṁ pavēsiyā attaṇō tēṇa ।। 4513 ।।
tō maṇicūḍāīhi miliūṇaṁ savvakhēyaridēhi । vijjāharacakkipaē ahisittō caṁdakittiniva ।।4514 ।।
jāyaṁ vaddhāvaṇayaṁ khayariṁdā ḍhōyaṇēsu āmaṁti । rahakarituraē - kannā-vasthāharaṇāiyamasēsaṁ ॥। 4515 ।।
tō khayara cakkaṭṭīkā vajjaṁ samaggamavi annaṁ । giṇhai kannāō puṇa pabhāvaī pucchiuṁ lēi ॥। 4516।।
pariṇēi vibhūiē bhajjāṇa sayaṁ kamēṇa tō jāyaṁ । paḍisēhaṁtassa vi tassa nivaṇō caṁdakittissa ।। 4517।।
paṭṭamahādēvittē pabhāvaī tēṇa ṭhāviyā tattō । vijjāharacakkipayaṁ ēvaṁ sō vilasai jahicchaṁ ।। 4518।।
aha maṇicūḍaṁ kharyāriṁdamannayā caṁdakittinaranāhō । āisai jahā gaṁtuṁ rayaṇaurē qaṇayacūḍanivaṁ ।।4519 ।।
muyasu tumaṁ gōttīē kaḍḍhēuṁ kaṇayakēuṇā saddhi । āēsēmhāṇaṁ tahā tamēvaṁ bhaṇijjāsi ||4520 ।।
paḍivajjiūṇa sēvaṁ amhāṇaṁ ginha icchiē nayarē । kammi vi rajjaṁ ahavā iṁdauraṁ pi hu tumaṁ ginha ।। 4521 ।।
iya khayaracakkavaiṇō sikkhaṁ gahiūṇa caṁdakittissa । maṇicūḍakhēryāradō sigdhaṁ gaṁtūṇa rayaṇaurē ।। 4522।।
mōyāvai guttīē sakaṇayakēḍaṁ pi kaṇayacūḍanivaṁ । āṇāvai pāsāē niyammi ahaṁ taṁ saputtaṁ pi ।। 4523 ।।
tē dōvi taō uciyāsaṇēsu paḍivattipuvvayaṁ ṭhaviyā । āhūyā kaṇagavaī vitattha maṇicūḍarāēṇa ॥। 4524 ।।
aha jaṇayakaṇayacūḍassa nivaḍiyā sā parasu viṇaēṇa । nayaṇāī bāhajalapūriyāī sahasā kuṇēmāṇī ।।4525 ।।
tō tasē āsīsā dinnā jaṇaēṇa harisiyamaṇēṇa । putti tumaṁ jā jīvaṁ pi avihavā sūhavā havasu ।।4526 ।।
aha uṭṭhaviu piuṇā ucchaṁgē ṭhāviūṇa sā bhaṇiyā । jaha putti baṁchiyaṁ tuha niyapunnēhi sayaṁ jāyaṁ ॥ 4527।।
sasiṇēhēṇa vi hōuṁ jaṇaēṇa maē na tāva taṁ vihiyaṁ । tā kammapariṇai cciya suhāsuhāṇaṁ jaē jaṇaṇī ||4528 ।।
amhē sayaṁ jai tayā tujjha kuṇatā samīhiyaṁ kaha vi । amhāṇa vi ēsa vihī na hōjjamannijjaē ēvaṁ ।।4529 । ।
piuucchaṁgāō uṭṭiūṇa tō kaṇaṇakēuṇō pāsē । uḍḍha ṭhiyā paṇamiyā tēṇa vi sāgasyaviṇaṇa ||4530 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca bhaiṇi savvaṁ avaraddhaṁ majjha saṁpayaṁ khamasu । tujjha samīhiyakajjē maē vi vigdhō kaō āsi ||4531 ।।
tō tīē āsīsāvayaṇaṁ ukkittiyaṁ imaṁ tassa । akkhaiō taha ajarāmarō ya bhāuya tuma hōjjā ।।4532 ।।
aha sā maṇicūḍanivassa vayaṇaō uṭṭhaūṇa niyaṭhāṇaṁ । saṁpattā kaṇagavaī maṇicūḍēṇaṁ taō tēsi ।। 4533 ।।
piuputtāṇaṁ puraō āēsō khayaracakkavaṭṭissa । kahiō savvō vi taō maṇicūḍō bēṁti tē ēvaṁ ||4534 ।।
jaṁ khayaracakkavaṭṭī ēvaṁ viyarēi amha āēsaṁ । apariciō vi hu hōuṁ taṁ savvaṁ tumha dakkhinnaṁ ।।4535 ।।
tumhēhi vi amhāṇaṁ akayaṁ mukkaṁ na kiṁ pi jaṁ samarē । taha attavasagayāṇa vi na amha jīyaṁ tayā hariyaṁ ।।4536।।
jamhā jīviyadāṇaṁ abbhahiyaṁ sayalaiyaradāṇāṇaṁ । sasamuddā vi hu puhaī na hōi takkōḍimaṁ sē vi ।।4537।।
jai dāvasi taṁ rajjaṁ amhaṁ dāvēhi icchiyaṁ tō taṁ । icchiyamēyaṁ jaṁ saṁjamassa rajjaṁ pariṇhāmō ||4538।।
maṇicūḍēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ sujuttamēyaṁ vivēyavaṁtāṇa । savasēṇa vi tāēṇaṁ taṇaṁ va cattaṁ niyaṁ rajjaṁ ॥। 4539।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
141
gihavāsagiddhacittāṇa rajjavaṁchāu hōṁti ēyāu । visayavirattāṇa puṇō ramai maṇō saṁjamē cēva ॥ 4540 ।।
taṁ hōsi amha sasurō jaṇaō vva taō purā vi namaṇijjō । saṁpai visēsaō puṇa sirassa uvariṁ vayakaicchō ||
jō amha sālaō kaṇayakēukumarō na sō vi hāsassa । ṭhāṇaṁ saṁpai kiṁ puṇa gōraviō jēṭṭhabaṁdhu vva ।।4542 ।।
ēyaṁ pitumha ṭhāṇaṁ appaṇayaṁ caiva jattha appaṇaō । jāmāū dikkariyā basēi bhaiṇī ya bhaiṇivaī ||4543 ।।
tāhi vīsatthā ētthēva ya tāva jāva iha ēi । tā ya guruguṇabhaddō avahinnāṇī muṇippavarō || 4544।।
tumhāṇa vaṁchiyatthaṁ pacchā savvaṁ pi pūraissāmi । saṁpas pahāṇāīyaṁ karēha tā avasarappattaṁ ॥। 4545 ।।
tō uṭṭiūṇa maṇicūḍavayaṇasavaṇaṁtaraṁ piyā-puttā । gajjaṇaharaṁ paviṭṭhā nhāyā tē dō vi vittharaō ||4546 ||
taha garuyagōravēṇaṁ karāviyā bhōyaṇaṁ vilēvaṇayaṁ । dinaṁ taṁbōlaṁ taha kusumāharaṇaṁ tu na gihīyaṁ ॥। 4547।।
aibahuyapatthaṇāhiṁ vi viijjamāṇaṁ nirīhabhāvēgaṁ । tō ahiyayaraṁ jāō maṇicūḍō tēsu aibhattō ।।4548।।
ēvaṁ ciṭṭhatāṇaṁ nimmalabhāvāṇa tāṇa tattha taō । ujjāṇē saṁpattō guṇabhaddō nāma varasūrī ||4549।।
nāūṇaṁ taṁ samāgayamaipaharisavasavisaṭṭarōmaṁcō । maṇicūḍakhēyariṁdō jāṇāvara kaṇagacūḍassa ॥। 4550।।
āyanniūṇa kannāmayaṁ va tō sūriṇō samāgamaṇaṁ । sō vi saputtō jāō āṇaṁducchaliyaghaṇapulaō ॥। 4551 ।।
tō kaṇagacūḍarāyaṁ sakaṇagakēuṁ pi patthaṇā puvvaṁ । kāravaē sigāraṁ pavaraṁ maṇicūḍakhayariṁdō ||4552 ।।
vīijjatō siyacāmarēhi siradhariyadhavalavarachattō । ārūḍhō mattamahāgayammi kayapavarasiṁgārō ।।4553 ।।
rāyaṁ tu kaṇayacūḍaṁ ārōvēḍaṁ mahāgaiṁdammi । aigaruvibhūīē kāūṇaṁ appaṇī puraō ।। 4554।।
annammi tahāvaravāraṇammi ārōviḍaṁ kaṇayakēuṁ । kāūṇa appaṇō taṁ dāhiṇabhāē vibhūijuyaṁ ॥। 4555 ।।
pariyariō savvattō tattō cauraṁgiṇīē sēṇāē । saṁpattī ujjāṇē ōyariu karivarāō taō ।।4556 ।।
maṇicūḍakharidō saṁjuttō kaṇayacūḍanaravaiṇā । taha kaṇayakēuṇā viya bhattīē namaṛa taṁ sūri ।।4557 ।।
sēsaṁ pi sāhuvaggaṁ namiūṇa kamēṇa sūripāsammi । āgaṁtuṁ uvaviṭṭā pucchaṁti ya rayaṇacūḍassa ।।4558 ।।
muṇiṇō sarūvamakkhēṛa muṇivarō tēsimaggaō savvaṁ । paḍhamaṁ ciya gahiyavaō jājīvaṁ aṇasaṇaṁ kuṇai || 4559 ।।
paḍhiūṇa kēttiyaṁ pi hu sāmāyāri jaīṇa jāṇēuṁ । kuṇai jahōiyakiriyaṁ viṇayaṁ taha savvasāhūṇaṁ ॥। 4560 ।।
vēyāvaccaṁ ca tahā bālāīṇaṁ samujjaō kuṇai । niccujjammiu sajjhāē khaṇē khaṇē abhiraō hōi ।।4561।।
kuṇaiyakāussaggaṁ dhammajjhāṇaṁ jhiyāi tattha ṭiō । tassa kutassēvaṁ gayāī aṭṭhārasadiṇāī ||4562।।
ēgē ṇūṇē vīsaima vāsarē rayaṇacūḍasāhussa । sōhammē saṁjāyaṁ samāhipattassa dēvattaṁ ॥ 4563 ॥
taṁ sōūṇaṁ maṇicūḍakhēyariṁdassa māṇasē jāō । kiṁ pi visāō taha paharisō ya aha sūriṇō pāsē ।।4564।।
sō pucchai jiṇa-dhammaṁ gaṁbhīrasarēṇa kahai sūrī vi। saṁsārē jē jīvā suhēsiṇō tāva tē savvē ॥ 4565॥
jāṇaṁti suhōvāyaṁ nēva paraṁ kiṁpi taṁ pakuvvaṁti । tē kammaṁ mōhavasā jēṇāṇuhavaṁti dukkhāī ॥ 4566।।
jamhā naṭṭhavivēyā jaṁ ciya dukkhaṁ muṇaṁti taṁ cēva । sōkkhassa saruvēṇaṁ paramatthasuhaṁ ayāṇaṁtā || 4567।।
kōhō māṇō māyā lōbhō cattāri huti hum̐ kasāyā । taggahiyāṇaṁ jāyai vivajjaō tēṇa jīvāṇaṁ ।।4568।।
māṇakasāō ahiō maṇusu kahijjaē jiṇidēhiṁ । tavvasagayā ya maṇuyā havaṁti sēla vva aithaḍḍhā ।।4569।।
namaṇārihēsu vinayaṁ kuvvaṁti na kiṁtu attaṇō cēva । kīrataṁ paṇivāyaṁ savrvvēhiṁ vi tē samīhaṁti ।। 4570।।
pacchā kēṇa vi balavaṁtaēṇa tō tēsi bhajjaē dappō । paḍibhaggadappapasarā lahaṁti bahumāṇasaṁ dukkhaṁ ॥। 4571 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-142-to-142.json ==========================
142
siricaṁdakitticariyaṁ
māṇasadukkhōvā vidati raī na kattha vi kayā vi । araīē ghaṇakammaṁ baṁdhaṁti taō bhamaṁti bhavaṁ ।।4572 ।।
rajjē vi hōi lōbhō kēsi hi māṇamāruhaṁtāṇa । tamapāvaṁtā tō tē havaṁti kōhānalujjaliyā ।। 4573 ।।
apahr̥ppaṁtā pacchā māyāē pavisiūṇa majjhammi | vīsāsēūṇa taō haṇaṁti piyaraṁ pi bhāyaṁ pi ।। 4574।।
vivajjaṇē vi icchā garuī pāēṇa māṇavaṁtāṇa | saṁjāyai purisāṇaṁ citaṁtāṇaṁ maṇē ēvaṁ ।।4575 ।।
annēhita amhē viulasirīyā kahaṁ pi jai hōmō । tō gasyavihaviṇō vihu amhaṁ ciya ēṁti pāsammi ।। 4576 ।।
sammāṇa hōmō amhē cciya rāya mhalōyāṇaṁ । pattasirīyā pacchā icchaṁti parāṇa hōṇattaṁ ।। 4577 ।।
pēcchati ucchalaṁtaṁ annaṁ jara niyayapunnajōēṇa । icchati tassa vigdhaṁ kāuṁ vi vihappayārēhiṁ ॥। 4578 ।।
yā vihavasya taṁ kāuṁ kaha vi jai na pārēṁti । tō dēhassa vi cukkaṁti tassa kēṇai uvāēṇa ।।4579 ।।
tō rannā vinnāyā khaṇēṇa pāviti vaṁdhaṇaṁ tattō । savvassassa viharaṇaṁ lahaṁti jīviyaviṇāsaṁ pi ।।4580 ।।
ikō vikaha vi kiṁci vi kyā vi kahiyaṁ karēi na khaṇēṇa । tā tammi kuṇai kōvaṁ māṇīmaṇuō maṇē kō vi
garuē vi haniya kajjē jāyammi na jāi tassa pāsammi । garuyassa vi bahujaṇamāṇaṇijjavayaṇassa vi jayammi
avalēvakalusiyamaṇō tassa ya ginhēi dūsaṇasayāī । jassa vi tassa vi puraō avijjamāṇāī visayā vi ।। 4583 ।।
jai sō garuō jāṇai garuyamavāyaṁ karēi tō tassa । asamāṇaviggahaṁ pi hu kuṇaṁti iya māṇiṇō maṇuyā ॥। 4584 ।।
iha lōgafmma vi lahiuṁ dukkhāṇa paraṁparāu paralōē । naragāīṇaṁ dukkhāṇa bhāyaṇaṁ hōṁti sayayaṁ pi ।। 4585 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi citai niyacittē kaṇayacūḍakhayariṁdō । amha vi aṇugayamēyaṁ saṁjāyaṁ ki pi vakkhāṇaṁ ।। 4586 ।।
amha suyassa na dinnā pabhāvaī patthiyā vi amhēhi । jaṁ rayaṇacūḍarannā tēṇa'himāṇēṇa na maē vi ।। 4587।!
dinā icchaṁtī vihu kaṇagavaī rayaṇacūḍa - puttassa । tīsē haraṇammi tahā na citiyaṁ appasāmatthaṁ ।।4588 ।।
ahimāṇagahagdhatthēṇa tēṇa saha saṁgarōsamāraddhō । tassa'himāṇassa phalaṁ ihēva tā amha nivvaḍiyaṁ ।। 4589 ।।
puṇa bhai guruahimāṇasōkkhakakhāṇa dukkhamiyakahiyaṁ । visayasuhatthīṇa duhaṁ vannijjai ki pi inhitu ।। 4590 ।।
vimaya suha laṁpaḍāṇaṁ dullaha-itthī-jaṇē vi ahilāsō । saṁjāya alahaṁtā taṁ tē jhijjaṁti hiyayammi ||4591 ||
aha kamavi mōhavasā tattha payaṭṭēti hahavihāṇēṇa । pāvaṁti tō aṇatthaṁ pāṇāṇa vi kēḍa cukkaṁti ।। 4592 । ।
paralōyaduhaṁ puttamēva pāvaṁti niyamaō tē vi । ēvaṁ sōkkhamaīē jīvā dukkhē payaṭṭēti ॥। 4593 ।।
ēyammi aṁtarē kaṇayakēukumarō vi citaē ēvaṁ । amhaṁ pi samuciyā kiṁ ci dēkhaṇā ēsa saṁjāyā ।।4594 ।।
jamaṇicchaṁtīē vihu pabhāvaīē maē uvarirāgō । baddhō alahaṁtōhaṁ taō imaṁ hariumārō ॥। 4595 ।।
tō pattaparibhavō vihu ahimāṇāōṁ tahāṇurāyāō । na ṭhiō tunhikkōhaṁ kāumuvāyaṁ puṇa paṭṭō || 4596॥
taṁ
gavaī haraṇē puṇa jaṇaēṇa vi maṇē citiyaṁ kiṁ pi । ahimāṇaggahiēṇaṁ phalaṁtaō tassa uvaladdhaṁ ।। 4597 ।।
bhaṇai gurū tā ahimāṇa- visaya- sōkkhāu niyamaṇaṁ jhatti । viṇiyattēuṁ dēyaṁ paramatthasuhammi viduhēhiṁ ॥। 4598 ।।
puṇa paramatthasuhaṁ mōkkhammi gayāṇa gammaē mōkkhē । kammakkhaēṇa sōuṇa kammakhaō hōi dikkhāē ।। 4599 ।।
dikkhaṁ pi kuṇaṁtāṇaṁ visaya virattāṇa māṇa-mukkāṇa | mōkkha samāṇaṁ sōkkhaṁ saṁbhavaī ihēva jīvāṇa ।।4600।।
tō kaṇayacūḍarāyāsa kaṇayakēū vi uṭṭiḍaṁ guruṇō । vaṁdēi bhaṇai ya imaṁ kīrau dikkhā pasāō mē ।।4601 ।।
puvaṁ pi tāva cittaṁ visaya - virattaṁ mamāsi gihavāsē । tumhōvaēsa-savaṇā jāō puṇa saṁpai visēsō ||4602 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-143-to-143.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
143
āha gurū juttamigaṁ amhē vi paōyaṇēṇa ēēṇa । iha saṁpai saṁpattā iya vōttuṁ dēi tēsi vayaṁ । 460 3 ॥
maṇicuḍakhēridō guṇabhaṭamudidiḍaṁ namiuṁ । vinnavai jōḍiyakarō bhayatraṁ ! saṁpai asakkō haṁ ।। 4604 ।।
savvaviraīē gahaṇē tā gihi-dhammaṁ payaccha maha inhi । guruṇā vi tassa dinō gihi-dhammō vimalasammattō।।4605 ।।
tō vaṁdiūṇa ēsō niya pāsāē samāgaō tattō । vaṁdai nicvaṁ sūri sapariyaṇaṁ gaṁtumujjāṇē ।।4606 ।।
siriguṇabhaddō sūrī taya vikaśvayadiṇāī ṭhāūṇa । maṇicūḍamanaviḍaṁ parihariō annaṭhāṇammi ||4607 ||
maṇicaḍō iṁdaurē gaṁtaṇaṁ caṁdakittirāyassa | sāhēs Treasts aṇayakē usa vayagahaṇaṁ ॥4609 ।।
tō caṁdakittirāyā savimhaō niyasiraṁ dhūṇēūna । bhagai jaha dukkaramiṇaṁ kayamēēhi vayaggahaṇaṁ ।। 4609 ।।
khijjaṁti rajjakajjē taṁ alahaṁtā vi kē vi dīṇamaṇā । sappurisā puṇa rajjaṁ ginhaṁti na dijjamāṇaṁ pi ।। 4610 ।।
aha bhaṇiō maṇicūḍō naravaṇā caṁdakittiṇā ēvaṁ । amhēhi sāhiyāī iha tāva samaggakajjāī ।। 4611।।
annaṁ na kiṁci vi tahākaraṇijjaṁ amhaṁ saṁpayaṁ atthi । caṁdauranayararajjaṁ sutaṁ ciṭṭadra bahudiṇāṇi ।।4612 ।।
tā saṁpai vaccāmō amhē sigdhaṁ pi caṁdauranayarē । iṁdauranayaratattī taē samaggā vi kāyavvā ।। 4613 ।।
tō maṇicuḍō rāyā-sirammi ārōviūṇa karajuyalaṁ । vinnava cakkavaṭṭi khayarāṇaṁ caṁdakittimiṇaṁ ॥ 4614।।
kīrau ēvaṁ saṁpai dāhiṇa - sēḍīē ēttha kharyāriṁdā | ciṭṭhati kē jē tē amhē ya taē samaṁ ēmō ।। 4615 ।।
puraō jāṇāvijjau caṁdaurē savvarāyalōyāṇaṁ । nayarassa ya jaha tē vihu tumhāgamaṇaṁ suṇēūṇa ।। 4616।।
kuvvaṁti kaṁpitta tō dāuṁ caṁdakittiṇā sikkhaṁ । vasukēu vāsavā dōnni khērā pēsiyā tattha ॥। 4617।।
kharidāṇaṁ tēsi āiṭṭhā dārasēvayā jhatti । siricaṁdakittirannā jaṁ tumhē niyayasāmīṇaṁ ।।4618।।
gaṁtaṇaṁ jāṇāvaha gamissaē caṁdakittinaranāhō । caṁdaurē tā tumbhē āgaṁtuṁ milaha tassa lahuṁ ।। 4619।।
tō āē sāṇaṁtaramēvagayādārasēvayā savvē । niyaniya khayariṁdāṇaṁ pāsammi kahaṁti taṁ savvaṁ ॥। 4620 ।।
tō tē vi takkhaṇaṁ triya āēsaṁ khayaracakkiṇō sōuṁ । niyaniya sāmaggīē samāgayā tassa pāsammi ||4621 ||
aha caṁdakitti khēra cakkikāūṇa savvasāmariṁga । maṇicaḍāīhiṁ samaṁ khayara naridēhi saṁcaliō ||4622॥
ēgammi varavimāṇē aṇēgamaṇi - khaṁbhapaṁtisōhaṁtē । sayamāruḍhō sīhāsamma pavarē samāsīṇō ।।4623 ।।
kannaṁtarālaghōlaṁtakuṁḍalō mauḍamaṁḍiyasiraggō । vacchayala - luliyahārō kaṁkaṇa- kēūrakayasōhō ||4624 ||
dhariya-dhavalāyavattō vīijjatō ya sēya- camarēhiṁ । vijjāharakāmiṇi-pāṇipaṁkayakkaṁtadaṁḍēhi ||4625 ।।
maṇicaḍakhēyariṁdō niya dāhiṇabāhusannihāṇammi । uvavēsiō viinē vibhinnasīhāsaṇē tattha ||4626 ||
vāma bhussa samī nivēsiyā gōravārihā khayarā । saṁgāmasīhapamuhā tēhi saṁmaṁ dō vi disāsu ॥ 427 ॥
saṁlāvaṁ virayaṁtō kahāpabaṁdhaṁtarēsu pēcchaṁtō । puraō pāraddhaṁ pavarapēcchaṇaṁ naravahūhi ||4628||
sakkō vva vimāṇagaō sōhammasahāē sōhamāṇō sō । vijjāhararāyāṇa vi maṇē jaṇēṁtō camakkāraṁ ||4629॥
apphāliya-gahira aṇēga tūra- saddēhiṁ vittharaṁtēhi । paḍisaḍiyadisi cakkēṇa saṁṇijjaṁtamahimō vva ।।4630 ।।
annamma vimāṇē puṇē pabhāvaī iyara savvadēvīhi । niyadāsīhi siṁgāriyāhiṁ sahiyā samārūḍhā ।।4631।।
savvaṁgē vi rayaṇāharaṇēhiṁ vihūsiyā virāyaṁtī | accharasā pariyariyā surapaṇō aggamahisi vva ॥ 4632।।
ēvaṁ mahāvibhūīē bhāsamāṇō samagganaha-maggaṁ । raviṇā saha chāyaṁtō khayariṁdāṇaṁ vimāṇēhiṁ ।।4633 ।।
ujjayaṁtēhi disāṇaṇāī pasaraṁtakiraṇajālēhi । siricaṁdakittinivaravipayāva - samahiḍdiēhiṁ va ।। 4634 ।।
surahi-vilēvaṇa-kusumēhi khayarēhiṁ vilaggalaggēhiṁ । paviyaṁbhamāṇaaighaṇasōrabbha- virāyamāṇēhiṁ ॥ 4635 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-144-to-144.json ==========================
144
siricaṁdakittacariyaṁ
caṁkamaṇavēyakaṁpiyakaṇaṁtakalakikiṇīviyāhi । nīhariya-mahura-mahuyara jhaṁkāra-ravāulēhiṁ ca ।।4636।।
vijjāhararajjaṁ sāhiūṇa niya nayaramāvayaṁtassa । gayaṇa- pahēṇaṁ tassēva khēyariṁdāṇacakkissa ||4637 ।।
gayaṇasirīē gayaṇaṁgaṇammi harisēṇa payariēhiṁ va । viyasiyatāmarasēhi nāṇāvihavannasuhaēhiṁ ॥ 4638 ।।
sukēu - vāsavēhiṁ dōhiṁ vi khayarēhiṁ caṁdauranayarē । gaṁtuṇaṁ nivabhavaṇē nivasēvayalōyamajjhammi ।।4639 ।।
pavarammi āsaṇē saṁṭhiyassa suhumamai saciva-tilayassa । puraō kahiyaṁ jaha caṁdakittikharyaridavaracakkī ।।4640 ।।
saṁvahamāṇō ciṭṭhai āgamaṇatthaṁ imammi niyanayarē । paṭṭhaviyā tēṇamhē tumhaṁ jāṇāvaṇaṭṭāē ॥4641॥
iyavijjāharavayaṇaṁ sōḍaṇaṁ suhamamaimahāmaṁtī । harisiyacittō saha savvarāyalōēṇa kārēi ॥। 4642 ।।
kōḍuṁbiya purisēhi savvattha mahasavaṁ purē tammi । kuṁkuma-rasa- sitta samagga-maggamūsiya- paḍāyaṁ ca ॥। 4643 ।।
ahiṇavapaṭṭa suya-vēḍhiēhi muttā - vaūla - ruirēhiṁ । vihiyabahubhūmi ēhiṁ āliṁgaṁtēhi gayaṇayalaṁ ।। 4644 । ।
ūsiya-dhavaladhaēhiṁ raṇaṁtakala kiṁkiṇīkalāvēhiṁ । viraiyasavvattamavēsa - vēsavilayāhiṁ kaliēhiṁ ॥। 4645 ।।
ṭhāṇēṭhāṇammi nivēsiēhi uccēhi maṁcanivahēhi । accharasāsahiēhi va sudipēsiyavimāṇēhiṁ ॥4646 ।।
sōhaṁtarāyamaggaṁ maggammi alabbhamāṇaavayāsaṁ । purisēhi paharisāō iō taō saṁcaratēhi ||4647।।
gēhēgēhammi nibaddhatōraṇaṁ gijjamāṇa- maṁgalayaṁ । apphāliya- varatūraṁ harisa - paṇaccaṁta - taruṇiyaṇaṁ ।। 4648 ||
vasukēu - vāsavēhiṁ vijjāsāmatthaō nayarabāhi । kāriyapāsāēhi khayaridāṇaṁ nivāsakaē ।।4649 ।।
maṇuiṁda-nayara - sōhā viṇijjiēṇēva amaranayarēṇa । viraijjamāṇasēvaṁ virāyamāṇaṁ visēsēṇa ।। 4650 ।।
vasukēu - vāsavā maṁtiaṇumayā sammuhā taō caliyā । ētassa caṁdakittissa nahayalē aṁtarē miliyā ॥। 4651 ।।
sārhēti paṇamiūṇa jaha caṁdaurammi dēvanayarammi । suhr̥mamaimaṁti pamuhō ciṭṭhai ukkaṁṭhiō lōō || 4652 ।।
tumha payapaṁkayāṇaṁ daṁsaṇakajjammi kayapavēsamahō । maṁtipuraō kahāmō tumhāgamaṇaṁ purō gaṁtuṁ ॥4653 ।।
siricaṁda - kittiṇā tē aṇunāyā āgayā puṇō tattha । maṁtissa kahaṁti jahā niyaḍō pattō khayaracakkī ।।4654।।
taṁ sōūṇaṁ maṁtī viṇiggaō sammuhaṁ naridassa । sāmaṁti-maṁti- maṁḍaliya-taṁtavālāilōēṇa ॥4655।।
thaḍḍhēhiṁ hayavarāṇaṁ ghaḍāhiṁ taha matta gayavarāṇaṁ ca । paṁtīhi rahavarāṇaṁ saṁghāēhiṁ payavarāṇaṁ ।।4656 ।।
nāyara - jaṇō vi sabvō niya niyaviṁdēṇa jhatti nīhariō । aṇumaggēṇaṁ ciya tassa maṁtiṇō savvavibhūīē || 4657।।
pamayāulāī gāyaṇa - vāyaṇa caṁdāī baṁdi - nivahō ya । paharisaparavasappā savvō nīharaṛa nayarāō ।।4658 ।।
ēvaṁ kayasamudāō tāva gaō sō jaṇō samaggō vi । jāva kamēṇaṁ pattō maṇōramujjāṇaparabhāē ।।4659 ।।
pattā vimāṇapaṁtī nayaṇapahaṁ tattha tassa lōyassa । taṁ daddhuṁ sō jāō aṇimisanayaṇō surajaṇō vva ।।4660।।
vimhaiyamaṇō citai sancō vi hu purajaṇō jahā pēccha । kērisamacchariyamahō imassa amhāṇa sāmissa ।। 4661 ।।
ēkkēṇa vimāṇēṇaṁ ēkkaṁgē va niggaō taiyā । niyanayarāō girikāṇaṇāō kēsarikisōrō vva ॥ 4662 ॥
saṁpai puṇa saṁpattō bahuyasahassēhiṁ saha vimāṇāṇaṁ । vijjāhara - kōḍīhiṁ ya bhiccattaṇamuvvahaṁtīhi ।। 4663 ।।
sappurisāṇaṁ jāyai sōhāē nimittamēvaparivārō । siddhī puṇa kajjāṇaṁ tāṇaṁ niya bhuyabalē vasaī ।।4664।।
iya ciṁtaṁtassēva ya paccōṇī niggayassa lōyassa । sō saṁpattī sahasati tassa pāsē khayaracakkī ||4665 ॥
bhūmīē āsataṁ kārāvēūṇa tō niyavimāṇaṁ । maṇicūḍabahulaggō tattō uttarai naranāhō ||4666।।
vasukēu - vāsavā puṇa kahaṁti maṁtissa pucchiyā tēṇa । ēkkēkkēṇaṁ nāmāī khēyaridāṇa sambēsi ||4667।।

ihalōya-phalēṇaṁ
।।
145
pii māi-nāmapuvvaṁ pabhāvaī pamuhasavvadēvīṇaṁ । nāmāī kahiṁti tahā ēkkēkkēṇaṁ pasaṁsēuṁ ॥ 4668।।
annē vi khēyariṁdā uttinā niyavimāṇaō savvē । niyaparivārasamēyā dīsaṁtā surakumāra vva ।।4669।।
paṇamai maṁtī siricaṁdakittipuhaīsarassa pāē । sō vi samuṭṭhaviūṇaṁ āliṁgaṛa taṁ payatēṇa ॥4670।।
paṇayā annēvi kamēṇa maṁtiṇō maṁḍalīyasāmaṁtā । sāhaṇiyataṁtavālāiyā ya taha nāyarajaṇā ya ।।4671।।
savvēvi patthivēṇaṁ tē jaha jōgaṁ jahakkamaṁ cēva । avagūhiyāya saṁbhāsiyāya tumbhē ṭhiyā laṭṭhā ||4672।।
jaṁpati tē vi niyamatthayammi ārōviūṇa karajuyalaṁ । tuha pāyapasāēṇaṁ laṭṭha cciya savvayā amhē ।।4673 ।।
miricaṁdakittirāyā maṇicūḍaṁ maṁtiṇō payasēi । nāmukkittaṇaputraṁ tabbāhuvilagganihatthō ||4674 ।।
ēsō ēsa mahamṇā khayarī sarōjassa kajjamuddisiuṁ । vēyaḍḍhagirimmi gayā amhē pattā ya riddhimimaṁ ॥। 4675 ।।
maṇicūḍassa vi kahiyaṁ ēvaṁ jaha ēsa sō mahāmaṁtī । jassuvarirajjabharamujjhiūṇa amhē gayā taiyā ||4676।।
aha sukkō niyayāō hatthāō caṁdakittiṇā rannā । maṇicūḍō khayaraṁdō āliṁgaḍa maṁtiṇaṁ jhatti ।।4677 ।।
anōnnaṁ kiṁpi taō thēvaṁpi kuṇaṁti uciyamālāvaṁ । kusalakā pucchaī tē dōna vi maṁti- kharidā ॥ 4678।।
maṇicūḍō dēi puṇō bāhu siricaṁdakittirāyassa | maṁti vi jōḍiyakarō niya pahuṇī samuhō hōi ।। 4679।।
maṁjulayā bāhulayaṁ avalaṁbauṁ pabhāvaī dēvī | ōinnā annāō vi dēvīu vimāṇamajjhāō ||4680 ।।
tāsi pi dēvī maṁtippamuhō jaṇō samaggō vi । bhūnihiya jāṇukarayalasīsō sahasati taṁ namiō ॥। 4681 ।।
aha caṁdakittirāyā tava maṇicūḍabāhu saṁlaggō । payacārēṇaṁ caliō juyāi jiṇamaṁdirābhimuhō ।।4682।।
gaṁta tattha majjhammi pavisiuṁ tityanāhapaḍimāē । paṁcagaṁ paṇivāyaṁ karēi sō paramabhattīē ॥ 4683 ||
jōḍiyakarō sira vinnavai ya dēva ! jaha paṇāmō । ihalōya - phalēṇaṁ maha puvviṁ phaliō tahā inhi ।।4684 | |
ēsa paṇāmō jāyau paralōya - phalassa dāyagō majjha । iya bhaṇiūṇa nisīyai tahāvihē kammi vipasē । 4685 ।
dēvī bhāvaī iyaradēvī sahiyā jiṇēsaraṁ namijaṁ । paṭṭhimmi nisīyai khayara cakkiṇō caṁdakittissa ||4686।।
kharida-naridāījō vi namiuṁ jiṇaṁ uciyadē sē । uvavisai diṭṭisannāē sāmiṇō caṁdakittissa ।। 4687 ।।
āisai pāulāī caṁdaurapurāu āgayāī taō । pēkkhaṇayakaraṇa karēṁti taha caiva tāī pi ।।4688 ।।
daṭṭhaṇaṁ pēvaṇayaṁ khapi tō udviṇa paṇa nēuṁ । jiṇapaḍimaṁ nīhariuṁ bāhimmi vimāṇamārūḍhō ।।4689 ।।
dēvīō vi vima.ṇē ēgammi samāruhati savvā ō | āhaḍhā khayariṁdā sēsā niyaniyavimāsu ।। 4690 ।।
bhūgōyarānaridā sāmaṁtā maṁtiṇō ya maṁḍaliyā । kari kariṇī turaya-rahāi vāhaṇēsuṁ samārūḍhā ||4691।।
puvvōtriyā ṭiīē tathaṭṭaō vimāṇammi | caṁdauranayarasammuhamaha vaccai caṁdakittinivō ||4692॥
pacchimamāyammi ṭiyaṁ vijjāharacakkiṇō vimāṇassa । vayai vimāṇaṁ dēvī ṇiyaravimāṇāī pāsēsu ।। 4693 ।।
hēṭṭā ya bhūmigōyara - rāyāṇō uvari varavimāṇagayā । vaccati khēyaridā tēsi chāyaṁ pakubvaṁtā ।।4694।।
siricaṁdakittirāyā khayaranariṁdā ya caṁdaurasōhaṁ । pēcchaṁtā jaṁti kamēṇa savvaō dinnadiṭṭhīyā ।। 4695 ।।
ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇē maṁcēsu pēcchaṇāī thirāī pēcchatā । sibiyāsu rahavarēsu ya balāī tāī palōyaṁtā ॥। 4696 ||
nagarapaōlīdārē parōpparaṁ karituraṁgamāīṇaṁ । saṁghaṭṭēṇa sadukkhō hōi pavēsō cirēṇa tahā ||4697।।
puvvapaōlīdāraṁ pariccaēūṇa jaṁti annannaṁ । jē dāraṁtē tattha vi bhīḍijjaṁtā niyattaṁti ।। 4698 ।।
tēṇa vilaṁbēi ciraṁ pavisaṁtē bhūmigōyarē puraō । siricaṁdakittikhēyara cakkīgayaṇē thiravimāṇō ।। 4699॥
surabhavaṇōvari kēi vi ārūḍhā nayara-nāri-nara-vaggā । gurutaruvarēsu kēi vi kē vi gayā hammiya-talēsu ।।4700।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-146-to-146.json ==========================
146
dhannō
siricaṁdakitticariyaṁ
pāyāvari kēi vi kē vi varaṁḍēsu tuṁgatuṁgēsu । kē vi vivaṇīṇa paṁtisu pavēsabhavalōiuṁ rannō ।।4701 ।।
khayaravimāṇēsu gayā diṭṭhī bhūgōyarāṇa aviyanhā । nayara bhavaṇēsu vihiyā na niyattai khayara - jaṇa - diṭṭhī ||
nayara - nara-nāri-vaggō vayai samaggō pabhāvaī daṭhṭhē । cittammi vimyagaō pabhāvaī sā imā dēvī || 4703 ||
jīē pahāvō kahiō vijjusihēṇaṁ purā nariṁda - gihē । sō nivvaḍiō saṁpaṛa phalēṇa sa visēsaō cēva ।। 4704 ।।
na amhāṇa pahū jassēsā vaha gēhiṇī - sadaṁ । jā niyasōhaggēṇaṁ suraṁgaṇāṇaṁ dalai māṇaṁ || 4705 |
ēsā vi hu dhannayarā jā sakka parakkamaṁ pahuṁ amha | saṁpattā bhattāraṁ sudullahaṁ sura-vahūṇaṁ pi ॥ 4706 ||
jīvaṁtu ciraṁ kālaṁ amhāṇa vi jīviēṇa ēyāī । rāyā tassa kalattaṁ ca jēhiṁ ēyaṁ kayaṁ nayaraṁ ||4707 ।।
rūvālōyaṇatisiyaaṇimisa nayaṇattaṇēṇa vaddrutaṁ । maṇuyanivāsaṁ pi virāyamāṇamamarāṇa bhavaṇaṁ va ।।4708।।
āyannaṁ tō nāyarajaṇāṇamullāvamērisaṁ kamasō । pattō niya pāsāyaṁ tatyuttinnō vimāṇaō ।।4709 ।।
dēvī pabhāvaī ciya samaṁ samaggāhi annadēvīhi । uttariūṇa vimāṇā avarōha - gihēsu saṁpattā ॥। 4710 ।।
siricaṁdakittirannā maṇicūḍanarēsarassa āvāsō niya pāsāyāsa dinō juvarāyapāsāē ||4711।।
sēsā vi khēyariṁdā nariṁdaāṇāē saṁṭhiyā savvē । vasukēu - vāsavēhiṁ daṁsiyapāsāya- paṁtīsu ||4712 ।।
sēsō vi maṁtipamuhō visajjiō caṁdakittiṇā rannā । savvō vi jaṇō niyaniya āvāsaṁ jhatti saṁpattō ।।4713 ।।
aha caṁdakittirāyā abbhitaraē bhaṇēi niyapurisē । savvēsi khēyaṇāṇaṁ pāhūnnaya-pēsaṇa nimittaṁ ॥ 4714 । ।
maṇicūḍakhērassa vi āvāsē sēsapariyaṇa-nimittaṁ । bhōyaṇamāī pēsai taṁbōla - vilēvaṇāīya ।।4715 ।।
jaha appaṇō taha cciya maṇicūḍanivassa nhāṇamāīyaṁ । kāraviumappaṇāsaha taṁ bhuṁjāvai mahārāyā ।।4716 ।।
siliyāvasarē tattō suhamamaī maṁti-sēharō pattō । puṭṭhō ya tēṇa viṇaō gaēṇa siricaṁdakittinivō ||4717 ।।
bēyaḍḍhanagē dāhiṇasēḍhīvijayassa vaiyaraṁ savvaṁ । tēṇa maṇicūḍarāyā taṁ tassa kahēumāṇattō || 4718।।
tēṇa vi tassa sarūvaṁ jahavattaṁ savvamēva akkhāyaṁ । puvvanisuyaṁ pi sacivēṇa taṁ suyaṁ vimhiyamaṇēṇa ।।4719।।
tēṇēva samaṁ maṇicūḍarāiṇā caṁdakittirāyassa । vikkamakahaṁ kuṇaṁtō ṭhiō khaṇaṁ tattha sō maṁtī ||4720 ।।
maṁti- maṇicūḍapamuhaṁ visajjiūṇaṁ jaṇaṁ samaggaṁpi । siricaṁdakittirāyā sējjāē ṭhāi khaṇamēgaṁ ।। 4721 । ।
aha uṭṭiuṁ khaṇaṁ tē kāuṁ takkālakiccamavaraṁ pi । taiē jāmammi karēi avasara caṁdakittinivō ||4722 ||
bhūgōyarā nariṁdā sāmaṁtā maṁtiṇō ya maṁḍaliyā । nayara - nivāsīya jaṇō niōgiṇō sēvayajaṇā ya ।।4723 ।।
gāmāya dēsa - visayā jaha sattīē kuṇaṁti maṁgaliyaṁ vijayaṁ kāūṇa samāgayassa siricaṁdakittissa ।। 4724 । ।
raha - kari-turaṁgamēhi vatthāharaṇēhiṁ kaṇaya- ruppēhi । vēgasara - kara raha-gō-mahisa- sva-pahēhiṁ vatthahiṁ ।। 4725 ।।
pavisaṁti pāulāī kuṇaṁti kalahaṭṭayaṁ pahiṭṭhāī । cāraṇa- maggaṇa - baṁdiyaṇa-vaṁda - kōlāhalasayāī || 4726।।
siricaṁdakittivikkimaguṇavannaṇaṁ visaya saṁpayaṭṭāī । ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇammi samucchalaṁti nivabhavaṇapaṁgaṇa || 4727।।
rāyā vi caṁdakittī maṁgaliyasamāgayāṇi vatthūṇi । ginhaṁtō viyaraṁtō ya uciyalōyassa cāēṇa || 4728 । ।
sōhai varisāsu mahōyahi vva sariyā sahassa salilāī । saṁginhatō dētō mēhāṇa jalaṁ jahicchāē ।। 4729 ।।
lēṁtassaya dētassa ēvaṁ siricaṁdakittinivaissa । aṭṭhaahōrattāiṁ samakkaṁtāī nimisaṁ va ।।4730 ।।
sammāṇiūṇa savvē aha vijjāharanivē visajjēi । maṇicūḍaṁ puṇa tatthēva dhāraē saparivāraṁ pi ॥।4731।।
sāhēi tassa puraō niyabhāvaṁ jaha maṇōramujjāṇē । jiṇabhavaṇē kārēḍaṁ varajattaṁ asthi maha vaṁchā ||4732 ||
taṁ sāvaōsi tamhā jāṇasi savvaṁpi tattha karaṇijjaṁ । sō bhaṇai tattha ēvaṁ tahāvi ihanayaravatthavvē || 4733 ।।

mirimunimuvvayaji ṇiṁdacariyaṁ
147
hakkāriūṇa savvē mahiḍdiē sāvaē imaṁ bhaṇaha । kārissāmō amhē maṇōramujjāṇajiṇabhavaṇē ||4734।।
jattamai vittharēṇaṁ tō tumbhē tattha niccamāgaṁtuṁ । majjhammi sayaṁ hōuṁ takkaraṇijjaṁ karāvēha ||4735||
sāvagadhammi kamō ēsō jaṁ kira mahiḍdiēhi pi । sāvayajaṇēhiṁ rōrō vi sāvaō patthaṇijjōtti ||4736 ॥
jiṇajattā pāraṁbha kāyavvō kō vi ēttha na hu gavvō । dhammammi jaṁ sahāō karaṇijjō hōṛa annō vi ।।4737 ।।
aha caṁdakittirāyā jiṇabhaddappabhiiē mahiḍaḍīē । hakkāriūṇa savvē tavvisaē bhaṇi taha
cēva ||4738 ।।
tē vihu kayappaṇāmā pamōyapūrijjamāṇasavvaṁgā । jaṁpaṁti jahā ēyaṁ amhaṁ ciya dēva gurukajjaṁ ।।4739।।
jaṁ jiṇajattā kajjē dēvō amhāṇa dēi āēsaṁ । sadbhāvaīē jāyai nimaṁtaṇaṁ jaha tahā taṁpi ॥ 4740 ॥
paralōyaviruddhammi vi kajjē jai kaha vi āisai dēvō । amhē taṁ pi gaṇēmō mahāpasāō tti niyacittē ।।4741 ।।
jaṁ puṇaparalōyahiyaṁ sayaṁpi karaṇijjamamha dēvō vi । taṁ ciya āisai tayaṁ ummāhiya- mōralaviyaṁ va ।।4742 ।।
iya tē paryāpamāṇē saḍḍhē sōūṇa harisiō rāyā । citai imē kayatthā jiṇabhattī ērisī jēsi ||4743 ||
ahamavi bahupunnō jassa purē vasai ērisō lōō । jiṇadhammaṇarattamaṇō iya ciṁtēūṇa tē bhāi ।।4744।।
atthasahāē tumbhē ēttiyakālaṁ ahaṁ viyāṇaṁtō । inhi tu majjha jāyā dhammasahāyā vi aipavarā ।।4745 ।।
aha tē visajjiūṇaṁ taṁbōlāīhiṁ vihiyasammāṇā । maṇicūḍaṁ kharyāriṁdaṁ bhaṇai imaṁ caṁdakittiniyō ||4746 ।।
jaha puvvaṁ rattīē ihāgaēṇaṁ naē kayaṁ taiyā । ētthēvaya jiṇabhavaṇē pēcchaṇayaṁ aimaṇabhirāmaṁ ||4747 ||
taha ēkkēkkaṁ niccaṁ pēcchaṇayaṁ saṁpayaṁ pi kārējjā । maṇicuḍēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tumhāsō pamāṇaṁ ti ||4748 ।।
jaṁ amhāṇaṁ ḍhaliyaṁ ghayamēyaṁ sattyāṇa majjhammi । ēkkaṁ tumhāēsō dōccaṁ kajjājiṇē jattā ||4749 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi citai maṇicuḍō khēyarēsarō ēvaṁ | jaṛa iha samaē kaha vihu guṇabhaddō ēi varasūrī ||4750 ।।
tō saṁjāyai laṭṭha jattā karaṇē sayaṁ payaṭṭassa । jvavahaṇaṁ kuṇatā tē bhāvamimassa vaṁti || 4751 |
tō niccharaṇa ēsō amhāṇaṁ samahiō aivivēī । saṛaḍhō hōi viyadō pabhāvaīē sarisadhammō ||4752||
jiṇabhaddasāvaēṇaṁ āgaṁtuṁ caṁdakittinaranāhō । vinnattō jutti juyaṁ dēva ! jahā dōnha divasāṇaṁ ||4753 ।।
pajjaṁtammi bhavissai kallāṇadugaṁ jugāidēvassa | jammassa ya dikhāē tā tammi dinē imō juttō || 4754।।
jattāē pāraṁbhō kīraṁtō amha saṁmayaṁ ēvaṁ । uḍḍhaṁ dēvāsō jaha hōi tahā payaṭṭāmō । ।4755।।
tō bhai caṁdakittī tumhē cciya jāṇayā ihatthammi । tā jammi kammi vi diṇē tumha mayaṁ tammi kārēha ||4756।।
kuṁkuma - kappūrāgarūpamuhāṇaṁ savvasāradavvāṇaṁ । nhavaṇōvayāriyāṇaṁ kuṇaṁti tē pēcchaṇaṁ rannō ।।4747 ॥
rāyā niyabhaṁḍāriyapāsāō tāī tāṇa dāvēi । tē gahiūṇaṁ savvaṁ pauṇaṁ kāūṇa muṁcati ॥ 4748 ॥
sattami diṇē pabhāē jiṇabhaddappabhiiṇē samaggā vi । āgaṁtūṇaṁ sadr̥ḍhā rāyāṇaṁ vinnavaṁti imaṁ || 4759 ।।
jaha dēva ! cēttabahulassa aṭṭhamī sā bhavissai pabhāē । dēvassa jīē kahiyaṁ kallāṇadugaṁ purā āsi ||4760।।
tā dēva ! pabhāyammi vi dēvēṇaṁ uggayammi sūrammi । āgaṁtavvaṁ sigdhaṁ jaha kīrai nhavaṇa - pāraṁbhō ।।4761 ।।
rannā visajjiyā tē taha tti paḍivajjiūṇa tavvayaṇaṁ । nivabhavaṇāō bāhi viṇiggayā āgayaṁ sūriṁ ।।4762 ।।
sōuṁ maṇōramammī ujjāṇē jaṁti taṁ namēuṁ tē । taspa kahēṁti nivō iha jiṇabhavaṇē kārihī jataṁ ।।4763।।
aha āgaṁtuṁ bhaṇiō maṇicūḍō tēhi jaha ihāyāō । inhi guṇabhaddapahū bhaṇaha nivaṁ vaṁdai jahā taṁ ||4764 ।।
bhagabhāvammi ṭhiō puvvaṁ pi hu ēsa vaṭṭaē tāva । jai suṇai sūri-dēsaṇamāsu taō sāvaō hōi ||4765 ।।
maṇicūḍō āha taō iya vasai maṇē mamāvi tō ēyaṁ । laṭṭhē tubbhēhi kayaṁ jaṁ kanhiyaṁ sūri āgamaṇaṁ ।।4766 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-148-to-148.json ==========================
148
siricaṁdakittacariyaṁ
iya bhaṇiuṁ dāūṇaṁ taṁbōlaṁ tē visajjaē saḍḍhē । jāi sayaṁ maṇicūḍō pāsē nivacaṁdakittissa ||4767 ।।
gaṁtaṇa tassa sō vinnavēi jaha dēva ! āgaō ēttha । asthi guṇabhaddasūrī maṇōramujjāṇaāsannō ।।4768 ।।
pāsamma jassa tāō pavvaiō amha rayaṇacūḍanivō । tā tassa vaṁdaṇatthaṁ gammau saṁpai muṇidassa || 4769 ।।
tumhēhi jassa bhavaṇē juyāidēvassa asthi pāradvā । jattā saṁpai jāṇai tassa guṇē ēsa nīsēsē ।।4770 ।।
annaṁ pi asthi nāṇaṁ ēyassa aiṁdiyaṁ jaō muṇai । puṭṭhamaīyaṁ savvaṁ aṇāgayaṁ vaṭṭamāṇaṁ ca ।।4771 । ।
āgaṁtūṇaṁ kahiyaṁ ēēṇa muṇīsarēṇa tāyassa । vīsadiṇāṇaṁ majjhē āuṁ taha cēva taṁ jāyaṁ ॥ 4772 ।।
vinnattimēvamāyanniūṇamaṇicūḍa khēyaridassa । muṇidaṁsaṇāhilāsī jāō siricaṁdakittiniyō || 4773।।
sūrissa samāgamaṇaṁ kuō vi nāuṁ pabhāvaī ēvi । paṭṭaviyā maṁjulayā naridapāsamma vinnavi || 4774।।
tī vitammi samaē āgaṁtuṁ caṁdakittinaranāhō । vinnattō jaha dēvī pabhāvaī dēvapāyāṇaṁ || 4775।।
ēvaṁ vinnavai jahā guṇabhaddamuṇidavaṁdaṇanimittaṁ । jāmi ahaṁ āēsaṁ jai dēvō dēi maha inhi || 4776।।
tō bhai caṁdakittī maṁjulayaṁ jaha tumaṁ bhaṇahi gaṁtuṁ । dēvi jaha saṁvahiuṁ sā ciṭṭhai saṁpayaṁ sigghaṁ ||4777।।
amhē vi tassa vaṁdakajjēṇaṁ jhatti jaṁ gamissāmō । tō amhēhi samaṁ sā vi jāi tuha sāmiṇī jēṇa ।।4778 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tī kahiyaṁ pabhāvaīē taō pahidvāsā । saṁvahiuṁ jhatti ṭhiyā rāyāhavaṇaṁ samīhaṁtī ॥। 4779।।
niyadāsī pāsāō pabhāvaīē kahāvaē rāyā । jaha amhē saṁcaliyā tumaṁ pi āgaccha sigdhaṁ pi ।।4780 ।।
annāha va dēvīhi samanniyā sā vi tō tayaṁ sōuṁ । sāhai annāsi pi hu dēvīṇaṁ tāu sōūṇaṁ ।। 4781 ।।
hu
ēvaṁ paṭṭihiyā saṁvahiuṁ tō pabhāvaīē vi । saha jaṁti rahārūḍhā aṇumaggēṇaṁ naravaissa ||4782 ।।
gaṁtuṇaṁ ujjāṇē ōyariḍaṁ vāhaṇāu naranāhō । siricaṁdakittināmō namaḥ muṇidaṁ kayāṇaṁdō ॥। 4783।।
dēvīō vi savvāō uttariuṁ tayaṇu rahavarēhiṁtō । vaṁdati taṁ muṇidaṁ tahēva maṇicūḍakharyāriṁdō ||4784 ।।
sēsō vi hu parivārō nīsēsō paṇamaē muṇirvāridaṁ । aha rannā saha savvē uciyapa sē nisīyaṁti ||4785 ।।
sūrī vidhammalābhaṁ tēsiṁ dāūṇa dēsaṇaṁ kuṇai । jaṁ kira aṇāijīvā aṇāikammaṁ aṇāibhavō ।।4786 ।।
micchattāīyā viha aṇāīyā kammabaṁdhaṇanimittaṁ । jīvāṇa haṁti baddhā tēṇa taō tē bhamaṁti bhavē ।।4787 ।।
narasuṁ tiriē ya kucchiyamaṇusu hīṇadēvēsu । dukkhāī sutikkhāī niraṁtarāī pi sihaṁtā ।।4788 ।।
tattā vibhaṭṭhāō anaṁtaguṇa tāva saṁgayā narayā । tēsumpannā jīvā khaṇē khaṇē nirayavālēhiṁ ॥। 4789 ।।
siya-bhalla - kuṁta- tōmara-saēhiṁ vijjhati tikkha vāsīhi । kaṭṭhē va tacchiyaṁti ya paccati ya tēlla- kuṁbhīsu ॥
kaṁdaṁti ya vilavaṁti ya karuṇāiṁ bhāṁti pāyapaṇayasirā । taha vi hu tē dīṇamuhā muccati na nirayapālēhiṁ । 4791 ।
tilamittakhaṁḍiyā vi hu pavvayapaḍaṇēṇa cunniyaṁgā vi । daḍḍhā vihu bhaggā vi huna maraṁti puṇō tahā huṁti ।।4792।।
iha māhahimāō vi hu anaṁtaguṇasīyalā mahānirayā । ciṭṭhēti kēi tēsu ya tattēhiṁ tō duhamaṇaṁ taṁ ।।4793 ।।
iccāinaraya-dukkhaṁ vāsa-sahassēṇa jī sahasajuō । jai kahai kō vi taha vi huna tarai savvaṁ pi taṁ kahiuṁ ॥
maṇuēsu dāsapēsattaṇāidukkhaṁ tu tumha paccakkhaṁ । ārā-kasaṁkusāī ghāya - vahāīyatiriē ॥। 4795 ।।
hī surē duhaṁ paraāṇā karaṇaō ai mahaṁtaṁ । parariddhidaṁsaṇē taha jāyai īsānalasamutthaṁ ।।4796।।
iya nāuṁ micchattaṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya tāva hōi caiyavvaṁ । gahiyavvaṁ sammattaṁ sōkkhanimittaṁ tayatthīhi ।।4797 ।।
aha pucchai naranāhō micchattaṁ hōi kērisa jassa । parihārō kāyavvō kērisayaṁ taṁ ca sammattaṁ ॥। 4798 ।।
tumhēhi jassa gahaṇaṁ kāyavvaṁ kahiyamamha taṁ savvaṁ । puṇa sa viyāraṁ akkhaha karimō jaha taha tahaccēya ।। 4799 ।।
hu

=== vardhamanaoutput-149-to-149.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariya
149
āha gurumicchataṁ taṁ bhannai jassa udayaō jīvā । vīvarīyaṁ savvaṁ pi hu tattaṁ pēcchaṁti viusā vi ।।4800 ।।
dēvattaguṇō ēkkō vinatthi jassēha taṁpi dēvaṁ ti । mannaṁti guruguṇēhiṁ mukkaṁ pi guruttabuddhī ||4801 ।।
pāvaṁ pi hu buddhī dhammassa garṇēti ērisaṁ ēyaṁ । micchattaṁ titthayarēhiṁ vanniyaṁ muṇasu naranāha ।।4802 ।।
jō dēva -guṇēhiṁ juō sō dēvō jō ya guruguṇasamēō । sōu guru niravajjō jō uṇa sō nicchiō dhammō ॥। 4803 ।।
ēsō ajjhavasāō jāyai jīvassa kōvi jō vimalō । taṁ saṁmattaṁ ti vayaṁti jiṇavarā vimalanāṇadharā ||4804 ।
naya rāgō na ya dōsō na ya mōhō hōi jassa sō dēvō । jō rāgāīhiṁ juō sō uṇa nēō adēvō tti ।।4805 ।।
rāgō kalattasaṁgēṇa najjaē paharaṇāṇa vahaṇēṇa । dōsō phuḍō muṇijjai mōhō vi ajutta - vayaṇēhi ||4806 ||
rāgādōsakō arahaṁtō cēva sō paraṁ dēvō । tassēvāṇāē ṭhiyā guruṇō vi susāhuṇō nēyā ॥। 4807 ||
jē kōha -māṇamukkā māyā-lōbhēhiṁ vajjiyā niccaṁ । ruddhaṁti iṁdiyapasarā dayāvarā savvajīvēsu ||4808 ||
sattasu ya mittēsu ya samacittā cattaputta-saṁbaṁdhā । iccāiguṇagaṇajuyā parōvāēsamma ujjuttā ||4809 ।।
sōcci dhammō jattha ya maṇēṇa vayaṇēṇa taha ya kāraṇa । vārijjai parapīḍā kīraṁtī niccakālaṁ pi ।। 4810 ॥
aliya-vayaṇaṁ na bhannai ginhijjai nē ya paradhaṇamadinaṁ । muccai mēhuṇavaṁchā mucchā na niē vi dēhammi ||4811 ||
rayaṇī-bhōyaṇaviraī ēvaṁ sāvajjajōgaparicattō । savvattha vi niravajjō dhammō paḍivajjiyavvōu ।।4812 । ।
ēvaṁ kahiyaguṇēhiṁ rahiō na gurū nē ya dhammō vi । jō taṁ pi guruṁ mannai dhammaṁ vā tassa micchattaṁ ।।4813 ।।
tappabhavaṁ puṇa dukkhaṁ inhi ciya vanniyaṁ purō tumha । tā micchattaṁ mōttuṁ sammataṁ ginha jaha bhaṇiyaṁ ॥। 4814 । ।
sammarttāmma pavannē ruddhāiṁ naraya - tiriya-gamaṇāī | nara- sura- siva- sōkkhāī havaṁti karayalagayāī va ।।4815।।
aha āha caṁdakittī bhayavaṁ ! tumhēhiṁ jaha imaṁ kahiyaṁ । micchattaṁ sammattaṁ bhavassarūvaṁ ca taṁ savvaṁ ।।4816 । ।
cittammi avagayaṁ mē tahatti inhi samāisaha kiccaṁ । aha ōhīnāṇēṇaṁ nāūṇa guru jahāēsō ||4817 ।।
sammattamēttajōggō saṁpai taṁ cēva tō payacchāmō । ēyassa iya vicitiya bhāi jahā rāya ginhāhi ||4819 ॥
micchattacāyaniyamaṁ sō vi ya ginhēi uṭṭiūṇa taō । jaha ajjappabhii maē tivihaṁ tivihēṇa micchattaṁ ।।4819।।
paricattaṁ sammattaṁ puṇa paḍivanaṁ tahēva jā jīvaṁ । saṁkā - kaṁkhāīyā paricayavvā ya aiyārā ||4820।।
sāmaṁta-maṁtimāī vikēvi sammattamahiṇavaṁ pattā । jēsi na āsi puvvaṁ tahāvarōhaṁ gaṇāō vi ||4821।।
aha puṇa vinnavai guruṁ narēsarō jaha juyāijiṇabhavaṇē । kallē kallāṇadiṇā ārambhē bhavissaē jattā ।।4822||
tā kāūṇa pasāyaṁ amhāṇaṁ uvari tēttiyadiṇāṇi । ēttha paḍikkhēyavvaṁ āgaṁtavvaṁ ca jiṇa-bhavaṇē ।।4823 ।।
taha
paḍivannē guruṇā taṁ namiuṁ jiṇaharammi gaṁtūṇa । dēvamabhivaṁdiūṇaṁ rāyā pattō niyāvāsaṁ ।।4824 ।।
sēsaṁ visajjiūṇaṁ maṇicūḍanarēsarāiparivāraṁ । āisai suttahāraṁ hakkārēūṇa jaha ēgaṁ ।।4825 ।।
phaliharayaṇāmayaṁ kuṇa juyāijiṇadēvasaṁtiyaṁ paḍimaṁ । savvāvayavavibhattaṁ nayaṇamaṇānaṁdasaṁjaṇayaṁ ।।4826।।
jiṇabhaddasāvayaṁ taha hakkārēūṇa bhaṇai naranāhō । jaha ēsa muttahārō tajjēyavvō taē niccaṁ ।।4827 ।।
nipphāyai jaha sigdhaṁ juyāijiṇapaḍimamētthaābhārō । tujjha cciya mīsēsō amhē puṇa iha nirābhārā ।।4828 ।।
tō paḍivannā sē dōvi visajjēi sō mahārāō । taṁbōlapayāṇāī kāūṇaṁ garuyasammāṇaṁ ||4829।।
siricaṁdakittirāyā sayaṁ sakajjēsu vāvaḍō hōi । jāyammi pabhāyammiō hakkārēuṁ samāisai ।।4830 ।।
nayarārakkhaṁ dujjōhaṇamēvaṁ jaṁ taē samaggō vi । cārayagihāu lōō mōttavvō jhatti inhipi ।।4831।।

siricaṁdakittiriyaṁ
।।4847 ।।
।।4848 ||
tajjēūṇaṁ ṭhāṇaṁtarāī taha hiṁḍikāraē purisē । rakkhēyavvaṁ nayaraṁ sabāhirabbhitaraṁ tumaē ||4832 ||
taha kaha vi jahā jāyai uvaddavō nēya kassai jaṇassa । rōrassa vi aṭṭha diṇē ajjappabhiī jaō kō vi ।।4833 ।।
dhārēyabvō na maē guttīē kayamahāvarāhō vi । jāva samappai jattā juyāi jiṇadēva bhavaṇammi ||4834 ||
sō vi paḍivajjēūṇaṁ tahatti puhaīsarassa āēsaṁ । rannāṇunnāō uṭṭhaūṇa taṁ taha aṇuṭṭhēi ||4835 ।।
kayapābhāiyakiccō saṁvahiuṁ caṁdakittinaranāhō । saha avarōhēṇa tahā maṇicūḍēṇaṁ khayaravaiṇā ||4836 ।।
gaṁtūṇaṁ ujjāṇē paḍhamaṁ guṇabhaddasūriṇō namiuṁ । ciivaṁdaṇāvihāṇaṁ pucchēi paḍhēi jāṇaiyā ||4837।।
jiṇabhavaṇagamaṇakajjē sūri āmaṁtiūṇa uṭṭhēi । jāi taō jiṇabhavaṇē juyāidēvassa sigdhaṁ pi ।।4838 । ।
gurukahiyavihāṇēṇaṁ karēi ciivaṁdaṇaṁ saparivārō । pēkkhēi taō niuṇaṁ phullaharaṁ sāvaēhi kayaṁ ॥4839।।
sippikarōḍāīhi bahubhaṁgikaēhi nayaṇamaṇaharaṇaṁ । avalōyai balikammaṁ aṇēgabhaṁgīhiṁ nimmaviyaṁ ॥ 4840 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattō guṇabhaddamuṇīsarō saparivārō । abhivaṁdiūṇa dēvē dēvābhimuha samāsīṇō ॥ 4841 ।।
kuṁkuma- kappūrāguru-caṁdaṇarasa - surahi salila-saṁpannaṁ । rayaṇamayamēgakalasaṁ ginhai siricaṁdakittinivō ||4842 ।।
dēvassa dāhiṇadisīē ṭhāmaṇicūḍakhēyariṁdō u । gahiūṇa tārisaṁ ciya kalasaṁ vā mē havai bhāē ||4843 ।।
vajrjjata -bahuvihāujja-vaṁda - paḍisadda - pūriya- diyaṁtaṁ । ḍhālaṁti jiṇēsara - biṁba - matthaē dō vi tē kalasē ||4844 । ।
pacchā āgaṁtūṇaṁ guṇabhaddamuṇida-vaṁdaṇaṁ kāuṁ । dōnni vi katthai uciē ṭhāṇammi ta nisīyaṁti ॥ 4845 ।।
sēsō puṇa nhavaṇavihī savvō vihu sāvaēhiṁ nimmaviō । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ tu raiyā jiṇassa aṁgammi varapūyā ।।4846 ।।
pāra pēcchaṇayaṁ paḍhamaṁ caṁdauravāsilōēṇa । vijjāharēhiṁ tattō vihiyaṁ naṭṭa maṇabhirāmaṁ
uttāriūṇa tattō ārattiyamaimahaṁtavittharaō । maṁgala- dīvaṁ ca tahā vaṁdaṁti kamēṇa tō dēvaṁ
guṇabhaddasūriṇā saha tattō taṁ vaṁdiūṇa sabvē vi । niggaṁtūṇaṁ jiṇamaṁdirāō tē jaṁti saṭṭā
sattaṁ pavattai taō avāriyaṁ caṁdakittinaranāhō । ēvaṁ aṭṭhadiṇāī jāyā jattā vibhūīē
aṭṭhamadiṇammi paḍimā juyāidēvassa phaliharayaṇamaī । nipphaiumāṇīyā tatthēvayasuttahārēṇa ॥। 4851 ।।
tīsē tattha paṭṭā kāraviyā vittharēṇa naravaiṇā । aiviuladavvadāṇēṇa tōsiō suttahārō vi ।।4852 ।।
taṁ cēva ya navapaḍimaṁ jiṇassa ārōviūṇa rahamajjhē । bhāmēi sayalanayarē mahāvibhūīē tini diṇē ।।4853 ।।
vittāē jattāē nēūṇaṁ niyagihammi taṁ paḍimaṁ । ṭhāvai vicittaṭhāṇē diṇāī dasa vittharēṇa taō ।।4854 ।।
pūyaṁ bali ca kārai tīsē paḍimāē caṁdakittinivō । taha sēsajiṇaharēsu ya kārai pūyaṁ kaivasu ।। 4855 ।।
niccaṁ nicca pi tahā jaha gēha - jiṇida-paḍima- pūyāē । saha savvajiṇaharēsu vi dasadiṇamajjhē havai pūyā ।। 4856 ।।
paḍhamaṁ gharajiṇapaḍimaṁ pūēḍaṁ vittharēṇa tō jāi । ujjāṇē jiṇabhavaṇē tō vaccai sūri vasahī ||4857।।
tattō kayapūē annēsu jiṇālaēsu vaccēi । niccaṁ karēi ēvaṁ vivaḍḍhamāṇāē bhattīē ।।4858 ।।
aṁtē sāhiyāē vittharaō saṁghabhōyaṇaṁ kuṇai । paḍilābhai vatthēhi cauvihasaṁgha pahidumaṇō ||4859 ।।
jattā sahā ya sābayajaṇaṁ tu sammāṇaē visēsēṇa । tattō bahaō vi jaṇō jiṇa dhammasamujjaō jāō ||48603।
sammāṇiūṇa tattō visajjaē khēyariṁda- maṇicūḍaṁ । saṁgāmasīhakhayaraṁ iṁdaurē pēsaē rakkhaṁ ।।4861||
namiuṁ pabhāvaī tō bēthaḍḍhanagammi jāi maṇicūḍō । tēṇēva samaṁ vaccai khayarō saṁgāmasīhī tri ||4862।।
rāyāṇamaṇunnaviḍaṁ vihāramannattha kuṇai sūrīvi । rāyātamaṇuvvaiḍaṁ niyatti ēi saṭṭā ||4863।।
varajiṇapaḍimaṁ niccaṁ tikālamavi vitrēṇa pūēi । paidiyahaṁ pi pabhāē juyāi jiṇamaṁdirē jāi ।। 4864।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
151
sēsēsu jiṇaharēsuṁ visēsakajjammi sāvayajaṇēhiṁ । āmaṁtiō nariṁdō vaccai sayamēva kaiyā vi || 4865 ।।
ēvaṁ jiṇidadhammaṁ tassa kuṇaṁtassa taha ya nīīē । pālaṁtassa ya rajjaṁ visayahaṁ aṇuhavaṁtassa । ।।4866।।
vaccai kālō ēttiya kayāi jē kē vi sāhuṇō guṇiṇō । guṇabhaddasūripamuhā tēsiṁ pāsammi gaṁtr̥̄ṇa ।।4867।।
jīvāipayatthāṇaṁ kuṇai viyāraṁ paḍhēi kipi navaṁ । ginhai aṇuvvayāī mahavvasuṁ kahilāsō ।।4868 ।।
bēyaḍḍhanagavarāō khayaranariṁdā vi ēṁti jaṁti tahā । aṇavarayaṁ ci ya pāsē rannō siricaṁdakittissa ।। 4869
rāyā vi tattha vaccai kharidēhi nimaṁtiō kajjē । siddhāyayaṇē jattākaraṇatthaṁ jāi sayamēva ।।4870 ।।
annēsu vi sāsayajiṇaharēsu naṁdīsarāiṭhāṇēsu । aṁtēurasahiō vi hu sapariyaṇō jāi kaiyā vi ।।4871 ।।
aha annā nisāē pacchimajāmē pabhāvaī dēvī । pāsittā pavisaṁtaṁ sīhaṁ niyavayaṇakuharammi ||4872 ||
paḍibuddhā naravaiṇō sāhai paḍibhaṇai sō vi tuha puttō । dēvi ! bhavissai bhuvaṇabbhahiyapayāvō na saṁdēhō ||4873 ।।
tumhāṇaṁ vayaṇamiṇaṁ ēvaṁ hōu tti sā vi pabhaṇaṁtī | baṁdhai maṁṭhi niyauttarīyavatthaṁcalē jhatti ।।4874 ।।
aha pasipunadiṇēhiṁ pasavai puttaṁ pabhāvaīdēvī । savvaṁgalakkhaṇadharaṁ sukumālaṁ pāṇipāsu ॥4875।।
kārai vaddhāvaṇayaṁ rāyā nayarammi sayaladēsē ya । dasamadiṇē arisīhō tti ṭhavai puttassa tō nāmaṁ ॥4876 ।।
dasadivasāṇaṁ majjhē nāyaralōēṇa sayaladēsēṇa । rannō vaddhāvaṇaē vatthāharaṇāi āṇīyaṁ ||4877 ||
puttaṁ pabhāvaīē jāyaṁ nāūṇa niyayanayarāō । vatthāharaṇē gahiuṁ caṁdaurē ēka maṇicūḍō || 4878 ।।
nāmakaraṇassa divasē rannō saṁtēurassa viyarē । sōvatthāharaṇāī pabhāvaīē visēsēṇa ।। 4879 ।।
suhumamaimahāmaṁtippamuhāṇa vi dēi garuyapurisāṇaṁ । savvēsi jahajōggaṁ vatthāharaṇāī maṇicūḍō ||4890 ।।
annē vi khēryāraṁdā samāgayā vatthabhū saṇasaṇāhā । rannō karēṁti uciyaṁ parivārasamanniyassā vi ।।4881 ।
rāyāvi tammi diyahē bhūgōyara ēya khayaravaggaṁ ca । bhōyaṇavatthāihiṁ sammāuṁ visajjē ||4882 ।।
aha vaḍḍhatō kamasō samappiō aṭṭhamammi vāsammi । āyariyassa samīvē kaya sammāṇassa sō rannā ।।4883॥
pannāē ujjamēṇaya gahiyāu kalāu tēṇa sigdhaṁ pi । gahiyakalō sō rannā juvarāyapayammi saṁṭhaviō ।। 4884।।
aha ōhīnāṇēṇaṁ samayaṁ nāūṇa āgaō jhati । siriguṇabhaddāyariō caṁdaurē bāhirujjāṇē ||4885 ।।
guṇasiripavattiṇī vihu samāgayā tattha tammi samayammi । nāūṇa gaō rāyā ujjāṇē sūripāsammi | ।।4886 ।।
aṁtēuramarisīhō kumarō annō vi rāyaparivārō । rāyāṇumaggalaggō sūrisamavē samapattō ॥ 4887॥
tē savvē bhattīē sūri namiūṇa tatthuvavisaṁti । sūrī vi gahirasaddēṇa dēsaṇaṁ kuṇai tēsi taō ||4888 ।।
tē bhavanivvēyakaraṁ vakkhāṇaṁ sūriṇō nisāmēuṁ । jāō rāyāijaṇō jhatti pabhūō vayābhimuō ||4889 ||
tō uṭṭiūṇa rāyā sūri vinnavai jāva arisīhaṁ । kumaraṁ vēmi rajjē tāvāgaṁtūṇa ginhāmi ॥। 4890 ।।
dikkhaṁ bhavakkhayakari bhayavaṁ ! tumhaṁ payāṇa pāsammi । iya bhaṇiuṁ namiūṇa ya sūri tō caṁdakittiniva ।।4891 ।।
baccai niya pāsāyaṁ tattha gaō pamuhalōyassa । sāhai niya hiyayagayaṁ bhāvaṁ tō tē vi bēṁti imaṁ ।। 4892 ।।
tumhē cciya amha gaī jaha gihavāsē tahēva vayagahaṇē । tō arisīhaṁ kumaraṁ bhaṇai jahā ginha rajja bharaṁ ॥4893 ।।
jaha amhē sāhēmō ta sahāēṇa jhatti paralōyaṁ । tō vinnavai kumārō rāyaṁ jaha dēvapāyaṇaṁ ।। 4894 ।।
pāsē bhūminiviṭṭhassa nivvuī mah maṇassa saṁbhavai । jā sā rajjē sīhāsaṇammi saṁjāyai na majjha ।। 4895 ।।
kiṁ tu na dēvā ēsōsakkijjai laṁghitaṁ taō inhi । sōcciya majjha pamāṇaṁ aha rāyā bhaṇai juttamiṇaṁ ।।4896 ।

vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
jāṇāvai maṇicūḍaṁ vēyaḍḍhanagammi saṁsakhayarēvi । saṁgāmasīhapamuhē pēsēuṁ tattha khayaradugaṁ ।।4897 ।।
tattō nāyasarūvā samāgayā tē vi rāyapāsammi । tō arisīhakumāraṁ rajjē ahisiṁcai naridō ||4898 ।।
vimalamaī suhamamaissa naṁdaṇaṁ ṭhāvaē ya maṁti-paē । ahi-arisīharnāridassa rajjalōyaṁ samappēi ॥। 4899 ।।
arisīhamahārāō jiṇahara - pūyā iyaṁ mahāmahimaṁ । kārēi vibhūīē nikkhamaṇē caṁdakittissa । ।4900 ।।
aha kaya suhasiṁgārō ārūḍhō mattasiṁdhurakkhaṁdhē । gaṁtūṇa sūripāsē ginhai dikkhaṁ nivō jhati ॥49001
sumamaitipahā purisasayātinni nivaiṇā saddhi । pavvaiyā bhūgōyarakhayaravaggāṇa majjhāō ।।4902 ।।
dēvīō vi pabhāvai pamuhāō saparivārasahiyāō । ginhaṁti vayaṁ saṁsāradukkhanivvinnahiyayāō ।। 4903 ।।
jaha caṁkamaṇaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ bhōyaṇa-sayaṇāsaṇaṁ ca kāyavvaṁ । jaha bhāsiyavvamēmāisikkha vēūṇasavvaṁ pi ।। 4904 । ।
jaijaṇakiriyaṁ guṇasiripavattiṇīē samappaē sūrī। guṇabhaddō paṁcasaē pabhāvaī pamuhaajjāṇaṁ ।।4905 ।।
sāhūṇa caṁdakittippamuhāṇaṁ sayatigaṁ sapāsamma । sikkhaviūṇaṁ kiriyaṁ ajjhāva aiyattē ||4906॥
sāhū ya caṁdakittī bārasa aṁgāithēvadiyahēhiṁ । paḍipunnāī ahijjai aha sūripaē paṭṭaviō ।। 4903 ।।
sō niguruṇā taṁ ci samappiuṁ sayatiyaṁ susāhūṇaṁ । aha caṁdakittisūrī viharai saha tēhi dēsēsu ।। 4908।।
pasihaṁtō bahu bhaviya - kamala - saṁḍāī caṁdabhāṇu vva । dikkhēuṁ bahusīsē suhaajjhavasāṇa saṁpannō ।।4909।।
uppannavimalanāṇō sūripaē ṭhāviḍaṁ niyaṁ sīsaṁ । māsaṁ vihiyāṇasaṇō dhūya - kammō sō sivaṁ pattō ।।4910।।
ētthaṁtarammi mauliya-kara- juyalaṁ matthaē nivēsēuṁ । kuṇai paṇāmaṁ siricaṁdakittiṇō sūriṇō kumarō ।।4911 ।।
sō vajjakuṁḍalō taha jiṇamittaṁ sāvagaṁ pasaṁsēi । jaha ajja taē amhē amayarasēṇēva saṁsittā ।। 4992 ।।
siricaṁdakitticariyaṁ jaṁ kahiyaṁ vittharēṇa iya ēvaṁ । tō jiṇamittō pabhaṇai ajja vi saṁkhittamēvēyaṁ ।।4913 ।।
tumha maē parikahiyaṁ tēṇa puṇō sujasasūriṇā taiyā । māsēṇaṁ diyahāṇaṁ savittharaṁ ēyamakkhāyaṁ ।। 4994 ।।
puvvabhavariddhivannaṇaniyakāriyapūyadaṁsaṇapamōō । rāyabhavajaṇaya jaṇaṇīvannaṇasumiṇāivannaṇayaṁ ।। 4995 ।।
gabbhammi ḍōhalō janmakālavaddhāvaṇaṁ kalāgahaṇaṁ । jōvvaṇa-kīlāvannaṇa-rajjahisēyāiyaṁ savvaṁ ।।4996 ।।
tēhi avitrēṇa kahiyaṁ mukkaṁ maē puṇa samaggaṁ । puvvillaṁ rajjāō ārambha nivēiyaṁ tumha ||4917।।
tō vajjakuṁḍaṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ jigamitta tujjha vi na tucchā । avahāraṇammi sattī jēṇa taē ēttiyaṁ kahiyaṁ ।। 4918 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ dinnāiṁ tassa vatthāī kaṇayasaṁkaliyā । hatthakaḍayāī cāruyabīḍaṁ kumarēṇa tuṭṭhēṇa ।।4999 ।।
aha jaṁpiyaṁ suhāsayapurisēṇaṁ kumararaṁjiēṇa taē । dinaṁ ēyassa imaṁ ahaṁ tu kiṁ dēmi tuṭṭhō vi ।।4920 ।।
jassa maha na kiṁ ci vi bhaṇiyaṁ tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇēvaṁ । majjha vi pāsāu taē bahu ciṭṭhai dinnamēyassa ।। 4921 ।।
sō jaṁpara kaha ēvaṁ bēi kumārō na jō tumaṁ dēsi । kassai pasaṁsavayaṇaṁ pasaṁsiō tēṇa ēsa taē ॥। 4922 ।।
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ pasaṁsā karēi ki dāṇavajjiyā saṁtī । kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ taṁ jāyai nēya dāṇēṇa ||4923||
jaṁ hōi pasaṁsāē sō bhagai kumāra jāṇiō taṁsi । jēṇa pasaṁsaṁ puraō karēsi nidēsi dāṇaṁ tu ।।4924 ।।
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ kahēha kiṁ kāraṇaṁ taē nāyaṁ । sō bhaṇai kāraṇamiṇaṁ na kiṁpi icchasi tumaṁ majjha ॥
dāu kavaḍiyaṁ pi hu niggamidaṁ kēvalaṁ pasaṁsāē । vaṁchasi tō tīē na kiṁpi mē vijjaē kajjaṁ ।। 4926 । ।
gālīsa pi dijjasu amha tumaṁ bahuyadaviṇadāṇajuyaṁ । bahuyāhi vi gālīhi dēhāu na phiṭṭaē khaṁḍa ।। 4927 ।।
davvēṇa puṇō gēhē allānillāya hōi sāravaṇā । kīraṁti vilāsā bahuvihāya hiyaicchiyā tēṇa ।। 4928 ।।
iccāi tēṇa saddhi kēlī kila kē liēṇa kuṇamāṇō । suviyaḍḍhavayaṇagōṭṭhi jā ciṭṭhai cakkiṇō taṇaō ।। 4929 ।।

153
tā rayaṇīē pacchimaca ughaḍiyaṁ jhatti vajjiyaṁ tattha । taṁ jāva vajjakuṁḍalakumarō vimhiyamaṇō suṇai ।। 4930 ।।
jaṁpaiya jāva ēvaṁ pāsanisannāṇa sammuhaṁ tāṇa । dīhā vi imā rayaṇī kaha pēkkhakhaṇaṁ va bōlīṇā ।।4931 ।।
parihārēṇāgatuṁ vinnattō tāba sō imaṁ kumarō । jaha vīrasēṇapurisā ciṭṭhēti samā gayā dārē ||4932 ।।
āyantriūṇa ēvaṁ kumarō saṁbhaṁtamāṇasō sahasā । uṭṭhēuṁ sayaṇāō ṭhiō niviṭṭō payaṁpatō ।।4933 ।।
jhatti pavēsēha imē pavēsiyā tēṇa tē vi āgaṁtuṁ । namiraṁ kumaraṁ dinnāsaṇēsu saṇiyaṁ nisīyaṁti ।।4934 । ।
aha bhaṇiyā kumarēṇaṁ vinnavaha paōyaṇaṁ niyaṁ tubhē । tē bēṁti kēvalāṇaṁ tumha purō vinnavissāma ||4935 ।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalō sō dūrāō sāriūṇa sēsajaṇaṁ । sayamēkkō tattha ṭhiō dōya jaṇā vīrasēṇassa ।। 4936 ।।
vinnattaṁ tēhiṁ taō payaṁpiyaṁ jaṁ sayaṁ saha nivēhiṁ । paccuttaraṁ ca tēsi kahiyaṁ savvaṁ purō tassa ।। 4937 ।।
taha daṁsiyaṁ samaggaṁ agaṁgadēvāu mayaṇadēvāu । laddhaṁ vatthāiyaṁ tēsi ciya tēṇa taṁ dinaṁ ।। 4938 ॥
vinnattaṁ tēhi puṇō tēsi nivaīṇa vinnavaṁtāṇa । dējjaha saddaṁ tubbhē jamimē amhēhi paṭṭaviyā ।।4939 ।।
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ savvaṁ ciya ēyamannā nēya । jē vīrasēṇapurisā tē vi hu amhēccayā cēva ।। 4940 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tē vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ visajjiḍaṁ tattō । kāuṁ sarīrakiccaṁ jiṇapaḍimāē kayā pūyā ।।4941 ।।
kāūṇa tattha viyaṇaṁ taō pattō maṇunnasayaṇammi । paḍibuddhō diṇapaharē tattō kāūṇa siṁgāraṁ ।।4942 ।।
atthāṇē uvaviṭṭhō samāgayā nāyagā samaggā vi । sēvākajjēṇa taō saṁpattā tē vi dō vi nivā ।।4943 ।।
namiūṇa vajjakuṁḍalakumaraṁ dinnāsaṇēsu uvaviṭṭhā | tēṇaṁgadēva niva-mayaṇadēvapuhaīsarā dō vi ।।4944 ।।
mauliya-kara-kamalajuyā viṇayaparā vinnavaṁti tō kumaraṁ । niya dēsāō amhē āgacchaṁtā paumakhēḍē ।। 4945 ।।
nō siṁdhusēṇapakkhē hōūṇaṁ kiṁtu vīrasēṇassa । taṁ nihaṇaṁ tassa nivāraṇāya majjhatthabuddhī ||4946।।
jaha jīvaṁtō sō hōi tumha pāyāṇa sēvaō puṇavi । aha tumha saṁtiēhi purisēhi amha parikahiyē ||4947।।
gaṁtr̥̄ṇa tattha ēvaṁ jaha ciṭṭhai vajjakuṁḍalakumārī | saṁpattō sirikhēḍē tō amhē āgaya। ēttha ।।4948।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ jaha nisu māsi amhēhiṁ । annārisaṁ taō tē paṭṭaviyā tumha pāsamma ।। 4949।।
sō siṁdhusēṇa rāya saṁpara maha ēu sannihāṇammi । jaha cakkavaṭṭiṇō taṁ kāūṇaṁ sēvayaṁ tattō ।।4950।।
ṭhāmi puṇō sē kammi vi taṁ nāyagaṁ jahā tattha । sō ciṭṭhai rajjasiri aṇuhavamāṇē niyasuhēṇa ॥। 4951 ।।
aha tēhi mauliyakaraṁ paṇamiyasīsē hi dōhi vi nivēhi । vinnattō cakkisuō jaha amhē siṁdhusēṇassa ।।4942।।
tassa pahū tō ēsō tubhēhi kaō bhavissai puṇō vi । paraminhi pēsēḍaṁ niyapurisē vīrasēnāō ।।4953।।
dāvēha dhammadāraṁ tassa jahā paumakhēḍamajjhāō । sō nimgaṁtuṁ pāvai ēi taō tumha pāsammi || 4954 ।।
aha kumarēṇaṁ annō niya purisō pēsiō paumakhēḍē | dōnha vi nivāṇa tēsi paccakkha sikkhavēūṇa |4955।।
pāsamma vīrasaṁṇassa tassa purisā ya pēsiyā puraō । channaṁ sikkhaviḍaṁ tēhi tassa taṁ sāhiyaṁ gaṁtu ।। 4956 । ।
tēhi vidōhi pinivēhi pēsiyā siṁdhusēṇapāsamma । kumarapurisēṇa saddhi niyapurisā sikkhavēūṇa ।।4957 ।।
tō siṁdhusēṇa-sasuraya- māulayā dō vi mēiṇīvaiṇō । bhaṇiyā kumarēṇa jahā maē samaṁ ēha kusumapurē ।। 4958 ।।
tatthēva āgamissara maha pāsē siṁdhusēṇanaranāhō । paḍivannaṁ tēhi taō taha tti taṁ kumaraāi ।। 4959 ।।
niyavāṇiuttasāgaravayaṇēṇaṁ puvyamēvasavvaṁ pi । piyamittēṇaṁ pavaṇaṁ jattanimittaṁ kayaṁ āsi
tō tattha vajjakuṁḍalakumarē pattammi jhatti pāradvā । piyamittēṇaṁ jattā kusumapurē niyayajiṇabhavaṇē ।। 4961 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-154-to-154.json ==========================
154
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
aha kumaravajjakuṁḍalapēsiyapurisēṇa vīrasēṇāō । laddhē nayarapavēsē māula - sasurāṇa ya narēhiṁ ॥। 4962 ।।
pavisē vi siṁdhusēṇō rāyā saṁbōhiūṇa nayarāō । nīhāriō samīhiyajaṇēṇa sahiō ya jaṇaṇīē ॥। 4963 ।।
nayarammi vīrasēṇō purajaṇakayamaṁgalō paviṭṭhō ya । ahisitō suhalaggē nivāilōgēṇa rajjammi ।।4964।।
jattā pāraṁbhadiṇāu paṁcamē vāsarammi saṁpattō । kumarāipurisasahiō kusumapurē sidhusēō vi ।। 4965।।
jiṇabhavaṇē gamaṇatthaṁ saṁvahamāṇō niyammi āvāsē । gaṁtūṇa tēṇa kumarō paṇaō mahinihiyasīsēṇa ।। 4966।।
nihatthō paṭṭhīē caraṇavilaggassa tassa kumarēṇa । dinnō uciyālāvō saha tēṇa kaō khaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ ।। 4967 ।।
tattō visajjiō sō māulayaagaṁgadēvaāvāsē ! gaṁtaṇa tassa kaṁṭhē laggēūṇaṁ khaṇaṁ runnō ।।4968 ।।
bhāyaṁ mahiṁdarāyaṁ sumaraṁtō tassa nāma ginhaṁtō । jaṁpēṛa taō ēvaṁ jaha majjha na rajjaparibhaṁsō ।। 4969॥
taha dukkhaṁ uppāyai mahiṁdarāō maō jaha muhāē। sumarijjatō dūmēi maha maṇaṁ avirayaṁ cēva ।। 4970 ।।
ahaṇaṁgadēvarāyā payaṁpaē siṁdhusēṇanaranāhaṁ । na ya hōi sōyaṇijjaṁ mahiṁdarāyassa maraṇamiṇaṁ ॥। 4971 ।।
jēṇa niyajaṇaya bhaiṇīsuyassa tuha pāṇarakkhaṇanimittaṁ । niya pāṇā paricattā sō cēva pasaṁsaṇijjō ṇē । । 4972 ।।
jāēṇa jaē jīvēṇa tāva niyamēṇa kammi vi khaṇammi । jattēṇa rakkhiēṇa vi mariyavvaṁ kēṇai misēṇa ।। 4973 ।।
tāja kassa vipāṇē rakkhatēṇaṁ marijjaē tēṇa । tā kiṁ na hōi laddhaṁ jasamakkhayamajjiṇaṁ tēṇa ।। 4974 ॥
tā savvā vinataē mahiṁdarāyassa vaiyarē khēō । kāyavvō kō vi maṇē maṇaṁ pi jai mannasi tumaṁ maṁ ।।4975 ।।
māulayabhāiṇējjā tē ēvaṁ kayaparōpparālāvā । kajjaṁtaravakkhittā saṁvr̥ttā tō muhuttaṁ tē ।। 4976॥
nirvāsiṁdhusēṇa bhajjā aha paumasiri aṇunnavēūṇa । niya piuṇō āvāsē mayaṇasirī paṭṭiyā tattō ।। 4977।।
sēṭṭhī piyamittō vi hu nāūṇaṁ sidhusēṇamāyāyaṁ । tassa samīvē gaṁtuṁ taṁ paṇamēuṁ nimaṁtēi ।।4978।।
niyabhavaṇē bhōyaṇakāraṇāya tēṇā vi māulō puṭṭhō । sō bēi sidhusēṇō ajja dinē amha pāhuṇaō ।। 4979 ।।
tō piyamittō tattha ṭiō vi āṇāviḍaṁ niyagihāō । ghaya-sāli-dāli-pakkanna māi-vatthāiāharaṇaṁ । । 4990 ।।
paumasirīē sahiyassa sidhusēṇassa ḍhōyaē puraō । gāhēi viṣayapubvaṁ visajjiō tēṇa jāi gihaṁ ॥। 4981 ।।
tattō payāijiṇamaṁdirammi kārēi nhavaṇamāīyaṁ । puvvāgaōvaviṭṭhē cakkā hivanaṁdaṇē tattha ।।4982 ।।
piyamittasēṭṭhipēsiyapurisēṇāmaṁtiō samāyāō । jattā pajjaṁtadiṇē tattha nivō vīrasēṇō vi ।। 4983॥
mahayā vicchr̥ḍḍēṇaṁ jiṇidapaḍimā rahō paribbhamiō । kusumapuranayaramajjhē cauvihasaṁghēṇa pariyariō ||4984 ।।
sadvāṇapavi rahē piyamittō vajjakuṁḍalēṇēvaṁ । bhaṇiō bhaṇa jiṇa-bhavaṇē jaṁ kijjau ēttha āyāṇaṁ ।। 4985 ।।
tō piyamittō vinnavai cakkitaṇayaṁ jahā samāisaha । naranāhahvīrasēṇaṁ ja (ta) ha tatti kuṇai jiṇa-bhavaṇē।4986।
sēsaṁ na kiṁpi khūṇaṁ tumha pasāēṇa majjha vi ihatthi । pōḍhō bhaē vi vihiō samuggaō ciṭṭhai imassa || 4987 ।।
tō jiṇaharatattikaē āisiuṁ vīrasēṇanaranāhaṁ । taṁ taha agaṁgadēvaṁ visajjiuṁ mayaṇadēvaṁ ca ।।4988।।
nirvāsiṁdhusēṇasahiō rūyaṁ gaō vajjakuṁḍalakumārō । piyamittamaṇunnaviḍaṁ kaō ciō tēṇa niyaṭhāṇē ।।4989 ।।
tattha nivasiṁdhusēṇō kumarēṇaṁ cakkavaṭṭiṇā saddhi । kārēūṇaṁ daṁsaṇa mōlaggaṁ tō kaō niccaṁ ।।4990 ।।
aha annadiṇē sūrī samāgaō sujasanāmaō tattha । tavvaṁdaṇāya caliō cakkī parivārasaṁjuttō ।। 4999 ।।
tēṇa saha vajjakuṁḍalakumarō vi gaō sasiṁdhusēṇanivō। savvē vi vaṁdiūṇaṁ sūri pāsēsu uvaviṭṭā ।।4992 ।।
sūrī vi dēi si dhambaēsa jahā vi vēīhi । laguṇa māṇusa bhavaṁ dulahaṁ jiṇa dhammasaṁttaṁ ।। 4993 ।।

na māō kāyavvō vivāisu vajjiūṇa paḍibaṁdhaṁ । aṇavarayamēvajattō karaṇijjō caraṇa dhammammi ।।4994।।
patraṇāhyasuramaṁdirasiharapaḍāyaggacaṁcalō vivō । sarayabbhavibbhamaṁ jōvvaṇaṁ ca jīyaṁ ca vijjucalaṁ ।। 4995 ।।
sayaṇāṇaṁ saṁghāō pariyaṇavaggō ya kajjakayanēhō । iha jammammi vi vihaḍai viṇā vi kajjēṇa gayalajjō ।। 4996
iccāi aṇiccattē bhavassa kahiyammi sūriṇā tēṇa । visayakasāyavivāgē aṇēgabhavakōḍikaḍuyammi ||4997।।
saṁsāra-suha-virattō sahasa cciya vajjanāhicakkaharō । rajjammi vajjakuṁḍalakumaraṁ ahisiciuṁ tattō ।। 498 ।।
pavvajjaṁ paḍivajjai samaṁ sahassēṇa naravarāīṇaṁ । dēvī suhāvaī vihr̥ tēttiyarāyāidhyāhi ।। 499 ।।
rāyā vi siṁdhusēṇō puvvaṁ pi mahiṁdarāyamaraṇēṇa । rajjabbhaṁsāiparābhavēṇa dūmiyamaṇō āsi ||5000||
āyanniyadhammakō visēsaō bhavaduhāṇa nivvintō । paḍivannō pavvajjaṁ tēṇēva ya cakkiṇā saddhi ||5001 ||
sō vajjanāhisāha ciṭṭhēuṁ kaī vi vāsarē tattha । sujasāyariēhi samaṁ annattha gaō vihārēṇa ।।5002 ।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalanivō phēḍēuṁ kēvi kēvi ṭhāvē । niyamaṁḍalammi tattō vijayaḍḍhanaridadēsēsu ।। 5003 ।।
cālitō ṭhāvēṁtō pariyaḍa aṇēyamēiṇīvaiṇō । raha-kari-turaṁgavatthāharaṇāiuvāyaṇāī va ।। 5004 । ।
tēhitō ginhatō kāritō gāmanagaramāīsu । ahiṇavajiṇabhavaṇāī jinnāī samuddharaṁtō ya || 5005 ।।
yā jattāu tahā kārāvitō bahuppayārāō । rahabhavaṇāī bhaviyāṇa bhūmisaṁtōsajaṇayāī ||5006 ||
iya sō aṇukkamēṇa saṁpattō gaṁdhamāyaṇapurammi | nāyarajaṇēṇa vihiō mahasavō tammi pavitē ।। 5007।।
jiṇasāsaṇappahāvaṇaparāyaṇō vajjakuṁḍalō rāyā । nisaṁsaniyakaṁṭayamaṇupālitō niyaṁ rajjaṁ । । 5009 ।।
saṁpajjatajahicchiyamaṇōrahō asarisaṁ visayasōkkhaṁ । aṇuhavamāṇōṇēgāu gamai vāsāṇa kōḍīō || 5009 ।।
kāmaraidēvīē bhāyā nāmēṇa kāmadēvō ti । svassa saṁpayāē paccakkhō kāmadēvō vva ।। 5010 ।।
sayalakalāpāragaō ahigayanīsēsasatthaparamatthō । dakkhō dakkhinnaparō kayaṇṇuō uciyakārī ya ।। 5011 ।।
suyaṇō saralasahāvō parōvayārī priyaṁvaō suhaō । gaṁbhīrō thirapagaī uyāracitta pasaṁtī ya ।। 5012 ।।
sō vajjakuṁḍalanarēsarassa āsanna sēvaō sayayaṁ । maṇavīsāsadvāṇaṁ paramaṁ vīsaṁbhabhavaṇaṁ ca ।। 5013 ॥
tēṇa saha sayākālaṁ kuṇai nivō vajjakuṁḍalō kēli । niyapāsāō gaṁtuṁ kahiṁ pi sē dēi na khaṇaṁ pi ।। 5014 । ।
kaśyā vi vajjakuṁḍala naranāhō gaṁdhamāyaṇapurāō । āsāṇa sāhaṇēṇaṁ vāhimmi viṇiggaō bhamiuṁ ।। 5015 ।।
tēṇa saha kāmadēvō vi niggaō varaturaṁgamārūḍhō । bhamiūṇa vajjakuṁḍalapuhaīnā hē niyattatē ।।5016।।
turaya-khura- khaṇiya-
-ghaṇa-rēṇu-niyara aṁdhāriyammi disicakkaṁ । diṭṭhīhi adīsaṁtē puraō vi ṭhiē sahatthē vi । 5017 |
turayāu kāmadēvō paḍiō bhūmīē kēṇa vi na diṭṭhō । iyaraturaṁgāṇa khurēhiṁ khaṁḍiō sō gaō nihaṇaṁ ||5018 ।।
tō pāsamma niē saṁpattō vajjakuṁḍalarnāradō । sēsō vi sēvayajaṇō gēhammi gaō niyaniyammi ||5019।।
aha vihiyamajjaṇavihī jiṇida-bibaccaṇaṁ karēūṇa । bhōyaṇabhavaṇammi gaē bhuvālē bhōyaṇa-nimittaṁ । 5020 ॥
saha bhōyagapūrisēsu vi paḍihāraniuttaēhi purisēhiṁ । savvattō kayasaddē savvēsu samāgaēsu lahum̐ ।। 5021 ।।
mōttūṇa kāmadēva tō rāyā jāva pēsaē diṭṭi । ēkkaṁ ciya tāva na taṁ pēkkhai sēsaṁ jaṇaṁ savvaṁ ||5022।।
tō rannā paḍihārō puṭṭō jaha kēṇa kāraṇēṇajja । dīsai na kāmadēvō tō paḍihārēṇa vittaṁ ॥ 5023।।
nāmuccāraṇapuvvaṁ savvēṁsi kāriō maē sahō । jahannayā tahajja vi na muṇēmi sanāgaō kaha vi ।। 5024।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ nivēṇa bhaṇiō puṇō vi paḍihārō । pēsēuṁ kaṁpi vivahaṁ puṇa niuṇaṁ taṁ gavēsēha ।। 5025 ।।
jai hōjja ēttha na imō gihē va tō gaṁtumēyamāṇēha । rāyāsānaṁtaramēva taō pēsiō tēṇa ।। 5026।।

156
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
paḍihārēṇa purisō sikkhaviūṇaṁ naridasaṁdiṭṭhaṁ । bāhi gihē ya aha sō gaṁtūṇaṁ jhatti viṇiyattō ॥ 5027॥
āgaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ sāhai ranō puraō jahā maē gaṁtuṁ । gēhē vi kāmadēvō puṭṭhō tattha vi paraṁ natthi ।। 5028।।
gihamāṇusēhiṁ kahiyaṁ gōsaggē niggaō niyagihāō । jaṁ ēsō taṁ ajja vi na ēi bāhi kahi pi ṭhiō ।। 5029 ।।
tō tatthaṁ paṁcavallahasāhaṇiēṇaṁ nivēiyaṁ rannō । jammi turayammi caḍiuṁ tumhēhi samaṁ gaō ēsō ।।5030|
sō tāva maē diṭṭhō turaō baddhō turaṁgasālāē । rannā bhaṇiuṁ gaṁtuṁ puccha tumaṁ thāṇavālaṁ taṁ ।।5031॥
kēṇāṇēuṁ turaō samappiō ēttha sō vi gaṁtr̥̄ṇa | sāhaṇiō pucchē tamāgaō kahai naravaṇō ||5032 ||
jaha sō tassa turaṁgō kēṇa vi purisēṇa nē ya āṇīō । sunnāsaṇō sayaṁciya samāgaō dinnamuhakaviō । । 50033 ।।
pallāṇēṇa samēō tō rannā jaṁpiyaṁ vicitēuṁ । turayāu kāmadēvō paḍiō bāhimmi kattha vi ya ।। 5034 ।।
iya vōttūṇaṁ saṁbhaṁtamāṇasō jhatti uṭṭiō rāyā । parivēsiyaṁ pi mukkaṁ tahēva thālammi nō bhuttaṁ ॥ 5035 ।।
payacārēṇa caliō gavēsaṇaṁ tassa kāmadēvassa । kāuṁ kāmaraī vihu nāuṁ caliyā saha nivēṇa ||5036 ||
pacchā sāhaṇiēṇaṁ pallāṇēūṇa ḍhōiō turaō । tatthārūḍhō rāyā rahammi dēvīō kāmaraī ।।5037 ।।
diṇṇuvaōgēṇa taō rannā vimaṁsiyaṁ imaṁ jaha sō । diṭṭhipahammi ṭhiō mē gaō tahā āgaō tattō ॥ 5038।।
tā jāva sāhaṇāī miliyāī cauddisi pi āgaṁtuṁ । saṁjāyaṁ tattha taō rayaṁdhayāraṁ mahāghōraṁ ||5039 ॥
tō rēṇubhaēṇa maē aisigdhaṁ niya turaṁgamō mukkō । sēsā vi āsavārā vēēṇa pahāviyā tattō ।।5040 ।।
saṁjāō saṁghaṭṭa parōpparaṁ tattha āsavārāṇaṁ । saṁbhāvijjai paḍiō tō sō tatthēva nannatya ।। 5041 ।।
iya citiūṇa rāyā tammi paēsammi vaccaē jāva। puraō hōuṁ diṭṭhō paḍiō sō tāva tēṇa tahi ||5042 ||
turaya-khura- khunna- dēhō nihaṇaṁ pattō raōhadullakkhō । daṭṭhaṇa jhatti taṁ vajjakuṁḍalōnaravaī jāō ।। 5043 ।।
maulaṁtalōyaṇajuō nivaḍiō kāmō turaṁgapiṭṭhāō । pāsaṭṭiēhiṁ ōyāriūṇa khittō rahē tattō ।। 5044 ।।
kāmaraīdēvīē diṭṭhō rāyā tahaṭṭiō tēhiṁ । majjhammi khipyamāṇō rahassa kasaṇīkayamuhēhiṁ ॥। 5045 ।।
dēvīē saṁbhamāulahiyāē pucchiyaṁ kimēyaṁ ti । tēhiṁ taō jaha vattē kahiē dēvī khaṇaṁ diṭṭhi ||5046 ||
khiviūṇa kāmadēvē paḍiyammi mahīyalē vigayajīē । valiuṁ sakhyahiyayā rahammi vaccai mahīvaiṇō ||5047 ||
caṁdaṇarasakayasēyaṁ maūrapicchāṇa tāliyaṁṭēṇa । vīēūṇaṁ taṁ caṁpiuṁ ca hiyaē sahatthēṇa ||5048 ||
saṁbhāi maharagirā jā dēvī tāva naravaī saṇiyaṁ । ummiliūṇa nayaṇāī hukkārēūṇa uṭṭhēi ।। 5049 ।।
jaṁpaiya jahā savvaṁ caṁdaṇakaṭṭhāipaguṇayaṁ kuṇaha । jaha kāmadēvakāō sakkārijjai sayaṁ gaṁtuṁ ॥। 5050 ।।
takkhaṇamēva taō tē pavaṇīkāūṇa caṁdaṇāiyaṁ । tassukkhivaṁti dēhaṁ garuyavibhaīē taṭṭhāṇā ।। 5051 ।।
tō vayai vajjakuṁḍalarāyā jaha ēsa kāmadēvōmaṁ । bhaiṇivaī bhaiṇimimaṁ caiūṇa sayaṁ gaō ēkkō ।। 5052 ।।
taha vihu amhē ēyassa piṭṭaō piṭṭaō saṁpayaṁ gamissāmō । iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tassagumaggēṇa gaō rahārūḍhō ।। 5053 ।।
vaccatō vayai imaṁ kaha dēvi imō sahōyarō tujjha । niṭhuracittō jāō amhē hakkāra nēya ।। 5054।।
vaccatō gāmaṁtaramēsō tuha dijjaē uvālaṁbhō । ēvamasaṁbaddhāī vayaṇāī tassa
bhīyā mammi dēvī kāmaraī citaē kahamimōvi । rāyā viyakkhaṇāṇaṁ sirōmaṇī vayai
nēhēṇa kāmadēvassa nūṇamēyassa mōhiyaṁ hiyayaṁ । hā divva ! ki akaṁḍē paharasi amhāṇa uvaruvari ।। 5057।।
avahariūṇaṁ guṇarayaṇasāyaraṁ bhāyaraṁ imaṁ ēkkaṁ । amhāṇa pāṇanāhassa ērisiṁ kuṇasi kimavatthaṁ ||5058 ||
iccāi citiūṇaṁ rāyāṇaṁ pabhaṇaē taō dēvī । jō dēva kāmadēvō taē vi saha niṭhurō ēvaṁ ।। 5059।।
suṇiūṇa || 5055।।
vigalamaī ||5046 ||

mirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
157
saṁjāō sō nr̥ṇaṁ kayagghanarasēharō jaē sayalē । nō tumamimassa nāmaṁ pi dēva mā ginha maha puraō || 5060।।
iccāibahuppayāraṁ payaṁpamāṇī maṇaṁ naravaissa । uttārai kāmaraī abhikkhaṇaṁ kāmadēvāō ||5061 ।।
jaṁ kiṁpi naridō kāmadēvavirahānalēṇa vi ha ramaṇō । palavaṛa tappaḍivayaṇaṁ puṇō puṇō dēi sā dēvī ।।5062।।
garuyaṁ pi sahōyaramaraṇa - dukkhamavahīriyaṁ samaggaṁ pi । tīē rannō sunnattavigamacitāuramaṇāē ।।5063 ।।
sō kāmadēvadēhassa dāhakālammi dhāriō tīē । dūriṭṭiō cēva nivō kāūṇa kahāhiṁ vikkhēvaṁ । । 5064।।
tattō ṭhāṇā taō pabhyaparivāraparigaō rāyā । dēvī vayaṣēṇa niyattiūṇa pattō niyagihammi ||5065 ||
jimittēṇa bhaṇiyā kāmaraī - dēvidivasapajjatō । jāō ēsa bhavissai aivēlā bhōyaṇē tumha ||5066 ।।
tā kiṁpi pāṇadhāraṇamēttaṁ tubbhē kaha kavalagahaṁ । jai vina tumhāṇaṁ kāvi atthi niya jīviyāvēkkhā ||5067।।
taha vihu bhaṭṭiyajīvarakkhaṇaṁ tumha hōi kāyavvaṁ । tō dēvīē bhaṇiyaṁ nivammi bhuttammi bhuṁjissaṁ ॥। 5068 ।।
jaṁ kiṁ ci vibhaviyavtraṁ gabhassa bhavissaē tamēyassa । tō jiṇabhittō pabhaṇai rāyāṇaṁ dēva bhuṁjēha ||5069 ।।
rāyā jaṁpai ētaṁ ahaṁ pakkhimi kāmadēvamiha । gaṁtūṇa tumaṁ tumhā hakkārēūṇa taṁ ēhi ॥ 5070 ।।
jimittō bhai taō na amha hakkāriēṇa sō ēi । tō rannā kāmaraī bhaṇiyā gaṁtūṇa dēvi tumaṁ ॥ 5071।।
āṇēhi niyasahōyaramamhāṇa jamēsaciṭṭhaē ruṭṭhō । jāva na uṭṭai dēvī ginhai bāhummitō rāyā ।। 5072 ।।
uṭṭhēhi tti bhatō puṇō puṇō uṭṭaē taō ēsā । vaccai niyammi ṭhāṇē rāyā visijjiuṁ lōyaṁ ||5073।।
sēsaṁ savvaṁ pitaō ēgō hōūṇa bhaṇai jiṇamittaṁ । mā bīhēsi tumaṁ mē imāṇa asamaṁjasagirāṇaṁ ।। 5074 ।।
kāraṇavasēṇa ēvaṁ aṇuṭṭiyaṁ ciṭṭhaē maē savvaṁ । vigalattaṁ maha cittassa vaṭṭaē na uṇa thēvaṁ pi ।। 5075 ।।
bhōttūṇaṁ taṁ pi kāraṇamahaṁ kahissāmi tujjha savvaṁ pi । tā ki pi saṁpai tumaṁ bhōyaṇajāyaṁ samāṇēhi ||5076 ।।
jā atthamai na sūrō tā kāmaraī pi bhaṇaha gaṁtūṇa । saṁbōhēūṇa maē rāyā bhuṁjāviō inhi ||5077 ।।
dēvi! tumaṁ pahu bhuṁjasu bhattāē tujjhatō kahissāmi । tuha saṁtiyāī vayaṇāī jāī kahiūṇa naranāhō || 5078 ।।
mannāviuṁ maē tō kāraviō bhōyaṇaṁ pahidumaṇō । iya vayaṇēhi paḍivannabhōyaṇaṁ taṁ karēūṇa ।। 5079 ।।
iha āgaṁtuṁ bhuṁjasu ē samaṁ ērisaṁ nivāsaṁ । sāhēuṁ jiṇamittō pattō taha jhatti bhuttō ya ॥ 5080 ।।
saṁtaṁurapamuhō sō vi hu rāyapariyaṇō bhuttō । dūrō sāriyanīsēsasēsalōō nivō tattō ॥ 5081 ।।
sikkhaviṇaṁ pēsa jiṇamittaṁ kāmaraisamīvammi । aha gaṁtuṁ sō tīsē pāsē ēvaṁ payapēī ||5082 ।।
dēvi! maē jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ āsi purō tumha bhōyaṇammi kaē । āgaṁtuṁ sāhissaṁ taṁ saṁpai nisuṇa sāhēmi ।। 5083।।
aha tīē aṇunnāō sō sāhai dēvi rāyapāsāō । uṭṭhēumāgayāṇaṁ tumhaṁ iha niya nivāsammi ||5084 ।।
daṭṭhūṇaṁ sunnamaṇaṁ nivaī nēhēṇa kāmadēvēssa । bhōyaṇamavi akuṇataṁ citatō jāva ciṭṭhāmi ||5085 ।।
tā majjha maṇē phuriō ēsa uvāō jahā kaivayaṁ pi । ēvaṁ ēvaṁ vōttuṁ bhōlaviyaṁ nivaiṇō cittaṁ ॥ 5086 ।।
kārēmi bhōyaṇamimaṁ iya citēuṁ ahaṁ naridassa । pāsāō uṭhēuṁ bāhi gaṁtuṁ khaṇaṁ ṭhāuṁ ॥ 5087 ।।
tō puṇō paṭṭhi uvaviṭṭhō vajjakuṁḍalasamīvē । tassābhimuhaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ maē imaṁ dēva ! inhi mē ।। 5088।।
bāhiṁgayassa miliyā kāmaraī dēvi pēsiyā dāsī । tīē maha kahiyamiṇaṁ jaha dēvīē tuhābhimuha ।।5089 ।।
ēvaṁ bhaṇāviyaṁ jaha dēvēṇaṁ kāmadēvamāṇēuṁ । paṭṭhaviyāhaṁ ciṭṭhāmi kiṁtu chuhiyā na sakkēmi ।। 5090 ।।
gaṁtu mahaṁ jamhāsō dīhē maggammi vaṭṭaē pagaō । chuhiyammi puṇō dēvē kahamavi ya ahaṁ na bhuṁjāmi ।। 5091 ।।

vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
annēhiṁ gaēhiṁ puṇō bahuēhi vi āgamissai na ēsō । ṭhāṇaṁ pi tassa annō na jāṇaē jattha sō atthi ।। 5092 ।।
tā jai āṇīēṇaṁ kajjaṁ tēṇatthi kiṁ pi naravaṇō । tā bhuṁja ēsasayaṁ ahaṁ pi jaha bhuṁjiraṁ jhatti ! 5013 ॥
vaccāmi tattha ēvaṁ gaṁtr̥̄ṇa tumaṁ kahēhi naravaiṇō । tēṇāgaṁtūna maē nivēśyaṁ dēva ! tumha imaṁ ॥। 5094।।
iya sōūṇa naridō hiṭṭamaṇō jhatti uṭṭiuṁ bhuttō । tō āgaṁtuṁ kahiyaṁ tumaṁ pi bhuṁjāviyāsi maē ॥। 5095 ।।
saṁpai tuha dēvi imaṁ ciṭṭhai amhēhi vinnavēyavvaṁ । jaṁ kaha vi diṇē appānandasiyandō nivassa ta ।। 5096 ।।
jaha amhē āsāē laggamimaṁ bhōyaṇaṁ karāvēmō । gahiūṇa kāmadēvaṁ dēvī ajjaha va kallami ||5097 ।।
nr̥ṇaṁ samāgamissai iya ēvaṁviha kahāviṇō ēṇa । bhuṁjatō naranāhō na cukkaē tāva dēhāō ।। 5098।।
kālakkamēṇa taha māṇasāu sōgō vi vigalaē tassa । sunnattaṇaṁ pi phiṭṭai tattō sutthaṁ havai savvaṁ ।। 5099 ।।
paḍivannaṁ dēvīē jigamittapayaṁpiyaṁ taō ēvaṁ । bhaṇiyaṁ ca suṁdarī tuha ēsa uvāō maṇē phuriō ।।5100।।
āsi ahaṁ ai bhīyā abhuṁjamāṇē narēsarē puvvaṁ । inhi tuha vayaṇēhiṁ maṇaṁ pi nivyamaṇā jāyā ।। 5101 ।।
tā gaccha tumaṁ pāsē nivassa inhi maṇōgayaṁ bhāvaṁ । nāuṁ nāuṁ taduciya kahāhiṁ kujjāraī tassa ।।5102 ।।
i sikkhatriō tīē jiṇamittō jaṁpaē jahā dēvī । ēsōcciya kāyavvō tumhāsō maē niccaṁ ॥ 5104।।
tassa samīvāra ahaṁ khaṇaṁ pi dūrē na katthai gamissaṁ । sēsāṇaṁ pi jaṇāṇaṁ rāyāṇaṁ daṁsaissāmi ॥। 5104 ।।
dūragayaṁ khaṇamēkkaṁ jaha tē taṁ paṇamiūṇa vaccati । sacivāiṇō sacittē kuṇaṁti khēyaṁ ca na hu kaṁpi ।। 5105 ।।
iya vōttūrṇa dēvīē aṇumaō niggaō taō ēsō । ēi nivassa samīvē kai savvaṁ jahā bhaṇiyaṁ । । 5106 ।।
rāyā vi kēṇai samaṁ annēṇa na jaṁpaē maṇāgaṁ pi । jigamittamuhēṇaṁ ciya savvēsi dēi āēsaṁ । । 5107 ।।
jimittō uṇa tēsi kahai jamajja vi nivō sasōgō tti । sō vi jaṇō naravaiṇō majjhaṁ na muṇai tahā ki pi
tattō dūragaō cciya ciṭṭaḍa niccaṁ nivassa āṇāē । jaṁ jigamittō jaṁpai taṁ caiva sasaṁbhamō kuṇai || 5109 ।।
jai uṭṭhiūṇa vaccai katthai kajjammi kaha vi jigamittō ! nivapāsāō taha vi hu vinnavai na kō vi naranāhaṁ
garummi vi uppanē kajjē ēṁtaṁ sahati jiṇamittaṁ । tassa kahiūṇa pacchā durē gaṁtaṇaṁ ciṭṭhati ।।5111 ।।
kajjatthiṇō maṇussā jimittō tayaṇu pucchiuṁ nivaī । hakkāriūṇa tēsi uciyaṁ nisayaṁ dēi ॥ 5112 ।।
dō tinnividihāī ēvaṁciya vajjakuṁḍalanivēṇa । gamiyāī taō puṭṭhō jigamittēṇaṁ jahā dēva ! ।।5113 ।।
tumhēhiṁ mamāsō dinō paḍhamammi vāsarē āsi । ērisaō jaha ēyaṁ kavaḍēṇa kathaṁ maē savvaṁ ।। 5114 ।।
kāraṇavasēṇa taṁ pi hu tuha puraō kāraṇaṁ kahissāmi । ajja vi tumhēhiṁ na taṁ kahiyaṁ mē kaha hatō inhi ।। 5115 ।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalanivō hasiuṁ jiṇa mittamēvamullavai | suṇa jēṇa kahēmi ahaṁ iya bhaṇiuṁ kahiumāḍhattō ।। 5116 ।।
kāmaraīdēvīē bālattāō vi kāmadēvammi । aigaruō pasibaṁdhō saṁjāō kaha vi kammavasā ।।5117 ॥
jāva diyahasamajhē vāraṁ ēkkaṁ pi ēsa nō diṭṭhō । tīē tāva na jāyai thēvō vi maṇammi saṁtōsō ॥। 5119 ।।
ēēṇa kāraṇaṁ pariṇīyāē vi tīē āṇīō । ēsa iha appaṇā saha niccaṁ jaha sā imaṁ niyai ।।5119 ।।
tō jai ēsā ēyassa kaha vi āyannaē duhaṁ jāyaṁ । thēvaṁ pi sarīrē rōgamāiyaṁ taha vi hōi imā ।।5120 ।।
jayajīviya vya nēhēṇa mōhiyā takkhaṇēṇa mucchāē । jai puṇa paccakkhaṁ ciya taṁ pēkkhai nihaṇamaṇupattaṁ ॥5121 ॥

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
।
159
tō takkhaṇē vi ēsā niyaṁ jīyaṁ cayai natthi saṁdēhō । ēīē vi vinnāē ganbhō vi viṇassaē nūṇaṁ ||5122 ॥
ganbhō puṇa ēīē pahāṇasumiṇēṇa sūiō asthi । sō hōhī sayalassa vi imassa sāmī mahiyalassa ।। 5123 ।।
uggapayāvō niddaliyasayaladariyā ridappamāhappō । jamimassa paḍhama saṁbhavadiṇammi diṭṭhō muhapaviṭṭhō । । 5124 ।।
sumimmi syaṇipacchimajāmē sējjāē suhapasuttāē । dēvīē diṇanāhō tēyaḍḍhō niyatamapasarō ।। 5125 ॥
nāsiyatārayaniyarō ucchāiyahariṇalaṁchaṇacchāō । tēṇa asāmannaguṇō saṁbhāvijjai imō ganbhō ।।5126 ।।
dēvīē gabbhassa ya dōnhaṁ pi maē viṇāsarakkhaṭṭā । niyayaṁ sarūvamēvaṁ payāsiyaṁ aggaō tīsē ।। 5127।।
niya bhāuṇō vi pāsāu jēṇa amhāṇa uvari paḍibaṁdhō । dēvīē aigaruō tō maṁ daṭṭhaṇa niccēṭṭha ।। 5128 ।।
saṁjāyagaruyadukkhā majjha samīvaṁ samāgayā dēvī | vāyapayāṇāīyaṁ uvayāraṁ kāumāraddhā ।। 5129 ॥
mucchāvigamē vihu mē asamaṁjasa bhāsiyāī suṇiūṇa । kayagurumaṇasaṁtāvā jāyā pamhubhāuhā ।। 5130 ।।
daṭṭhūṇa vi niṇagaya sahōyaraṁ tassa dukkhamēīē । na maṇaṁ pi maṇē jāyaṁ mama dukkhēṇaṁ sadukkhāē ।।5131 ।।
*jah pavaradavvahāṇīē annamaṇunnayaradavvahāṇī । jāyāē tirōhijjai uppāyaṁtī maṇē dukkhaṁ ।।5132 ॥
tah bhāumaraṇadukkhaṁ samubbhavaṁtaṁ maṇammi dēvīē । maha maṇasunnattaṇajaṇiyagaruyadukkhēṇa aṁtariyaṁ ॥ 5133 ।।
tō jimitta sīsaṁ dhuṇiūṇaṁ vajjakuṁḍalanaridaṁ । vinnavai dēvaṁ ēsā na hu buddhī hōi annassa ।। 5134 ।।
ēsagaruō aṇatthō dēvēṇaṁ rakkhiō niyamaīē । ēmēvayaniggamihī ajja vi dēvō kaidiṇāī ।। 5135 ।।
jaṁ āsi bhayaṁ tumhāṇa māṇasē dēva taṁ gayaṁ tāva । mannāmi ahaṁ inhi kiṁ kīrai dummaṇā dēvī ॥। 5136 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ jigamitta ajja vi cautthaṁ । diyahaṁ ēyaṁ dēvīē bhāuṇō parabhavagayassa ।। 5137।।
tō aha nimittaṁ jai dēvīē phiṭṭaē kaha vi dukkhaṁ । ugghaḍai taha vi tīē maṇammi lahu bhāumaraṇaduhaṁ ॥ 5138 ।।
jimittō bhai taō saṁjāyaṁ saṁpayaṁ hayappasaraṁ । taṁ bhāumaraṇadukkhaṁ dēvīē ēttiya diṇēhiṁ ॥ 5139 ।।
hōtaṁ ciya tāva na taṁ saṁbhāvijjai kahaṁ pi aha hōi । tō thēvaṁ ciya kiṁ ci vi tamhā muccau kavaḍamēyaṁ ।। 5140 ।।
sēsō vi jaṇa savvō kīrau sāṇaṁdamāṇasō inhi । niya ālāvāīhiṁ dēvī vihu lahau paramasuhaṁ ।। 5141 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalanivō jaṁpa jigamittajārisaṁ bhaṇasi । taṁ atthi tārisaṁ ciya taha vi aṇatthassa saṁdēhē ।। 5142 ।।
paḍiyārō kāyavō subuddhipurisēhi tā tumaṁ gaṁtuṁ । pabhaṇasu pabhāyasamaē dēvi jaha ajja rayaṇīē ।। 5143 ।।
suttē maē diṭṭhō sumiṇō kira gōttadēvayā rannō । āgaṁtuṁ maṁ pabhaṇai jaha iha navarē jiṇaharāī ।। 5144॥
ciṭṭhēti jāī kā vi tēsi majjhāu paidiṇaṁ cēva । ēkkēkkammi jiṇaharē jai pūyaṁ kuṇai kāmaraī ।। 5145 ।।
dēvī ēgaggamaṇā acitamāṇīya sayaṇagihatatti । tā jāva samatthijjai savvajiṇaharēsu jiṇapūyā || 5146 ।।
tō paḍhamē cciya diyahē puyāraṁbhassa jāyaē rāyā । satthamaṇō sayamēvaya uvē jiṇamaṁdirēsuṁ pi ।। 5147 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ dēvī sā sahasacciya adaṁsaṇīhūyā । ahama vi tō paḍibuddhō ṭhiō ya jaggaṁtaō cēva ।। 5148 ।।
citatō ya tahēyaṁ saccaṁ sumiṇaṁ kimēyamaha vi tahaṁ । vīmaṁsiyaṁ maē tō jaha kīrau tāva jiṇapūyā ।।5149 ।।
savvajiṇamaṁdirēsuṁ tō jai saccō havējja sumiṇatthō । tō laṭhṭhē aha vitahō tahāvi dhammō kaō hōī ॥। 5150 ।।
iya nicchiūṇa pacchā samāgaō haṁ tuhaṁ tiē inhi । kahiō sumiṇō ya maē jaṁ uciyaṁ dēvi! taṁ kuṇaha ।। 5151 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-160-to-160.json ==========================
160
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
iya vajjakuṁḍalāō sikvaṁ gahiuṁ taō pabhāyammi । gaṁtuṇaṁ jigamittō dēvīē kahai aha sā vi ।। 5152।।
kāmaraī tatrvayaṇaṁ juttijuyaṁ jāṇiūṇa taṁ cēva । jiṇamittaṁ jiṇamaṁdirapūyākaraṇatvamāisa || 5153 ।।
sō tīē saha vaccai jiṇabhavaṇē kāraē ya varapūyaṁ । jigamittō tō gaṁtuṁ sāhai ēvaṁ naridassa ।। 5154 ।।
rāyā vipamiṇō kāmaraī bhāvavuḍhijaṇaṇatthaṁ । jiṇamittaṁ sikkhaviḍaṁ puṇa pēsai tīē pāsammi ।। 5155 ।।
sō gaṁtuṁ jiṇabhavaṇē dēvīē kahai kannamūlammi । vaddhāvijjasi taṁ dēvi saṁyaṁ jaṁ nivō jāō ।।5156 ।।
satthamaṇō supasatthaṁ jaṁpai savvaṁ pi saṁpai jaō hūṁ । hakkāriūṇa bhaṇiō tēṇēvaṁ kāmadēvassa ।। 5157 ।।
nēhēṇa mōhiō haṁ jigamittadiṇāī ēttiyāī ṭhiō । uggayamatthamiyaṁ vā na kiṁpi nāyaṁ maē jamiha ।। 5158 ।।
inhi triya cēyannaṁ laddhaṁ tā kaha bhavissaē dēvī । sā kāmarai nēhēṇa bhāuṇō vihariyā saṁtī ।।5159 ।।
tattō maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ciya dēva ! hōtayaṁ āsi । tīsē paraṁ tuha duhaṁ āgaṁtuṁ uvarisaṁjāyaṁ । । 5160।।
tēṇa niyabhāi maraṇubbhavaṁ duhaṁ tattha nēya sammāyaṁ । tō jaṁ tuha sālayavirahasaṁbhavaṁ dukkhamuppanaṁ ॥ 5161 ॥
tassōvasamaṇahēuṁ pūyaṁtī bhamai sā jiṇaharēsu । jiṇapaḍimāō ōyāiyāī dētī bahuvihāī ।। 5162 ॥
tō āha nivō ciṭui kāmaraī kattha saṁpayaṁ dēvī । aha jiṇaharē ṭhiyā iha maē tumaṁ tassa lahu kahiyā ।। 5163 ।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalēṇaṁ rannā bhaṇiyaṁ paṭṭicittēṇa । jattha gayā sā dēvī ciṭṭhai tatthēva gacchāmi ।। 5164 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ laggō saṁvahiuṁ vajjakuṁḍalō jhatti । ētthāgamaṇatthaṁ tō ahaṁ purō hōumihapattō ।।5165 ।।
nivavattā kahaṇatthaṁ jaha jāyai sumiṇapaccaō tumha । inhi jāmi iōhaṁ puṇāgamissaṁ saha nivēṇa ।।5166 ।
iya pabhaṇatō ēsō dēvīē aṇumaō jiṇagihāō । nīhariḍaṁ taṁ rannō kahēi savvaṁ pi gaṁtr̥̄ṇa ।।5167 ।।
tō sōūṇaṁ rāyā harisiyacittō gadakhaṁdhammi । ārūḍhō bahuparivārasaṁjuō jiṇaharē pattō ।।5168 ।।
nhavaṇa - vilēvaṇa-pūyaṇamāīyaṁ tattha vitrasamēyaṁ । kārēūṇaṁ pattō puṇō vi niyayammi pāsā ।। 5169 ।।
bhōyaṇasamayāṇaṁtaramāmaṁtēūṇa kāmarai-dēvi । niyasuha- dukkhālāvaṁ khaṇaṁ nivō kuṇai tīē samaṁ ।। 5170 ।।
bīyammi cēharē puṇō pabhāē payāi puhaivaī । dēvīē maha kārai tahēva tattha vi nhavaṇamāī || 5171 ।।
dō tinniva annāī vi diṇāī ēkkēkkajiṇaharē gaṁtuṁ । tō rannā jigamittō sikkha viḍaṁ bhāṇiō dēvi ।। 5172 ।।
aha tēṇa niyagihagayādēvī niyauttarēṇa vinnattā । jaha dēviē mēkkka jiṇaharē pūyakaraṇēṇa ।।5173 ।।
laggites bahukālō ēvaṁ sīyaṁti rajjakajjāī । rannō niccaṁ pi jigiṁdamaṁdirē ciṭṭamāṇassa ।। 5174 ।।
taha appaduijjāē tujha vi dēhammi jāyaē bāhā । uvaviṭṭhāē suiraṁ jiṇabhavaṇē ciṭṭamāṇīē || 5175 ।।
tō kāmaraī jaṁpai jigamittakimēttha kīraē inhi । sō āha sēsajiṇaharanivahē jugavaṁ kuṇaha pūyaṁ ।। 5176 ।।
sā vayai jugavamēva savrvvasuṁ sēsacēiyaharēsu । pūyākaraṇaṁ dukkaramahakīrai taha vi kaha gaṁtuṁ ।। 5177 ।।
sakkijjai tēsu sayaṁ jigamittō bhai asthiha uvāō । pucchai dēvī sō kērisō tti tō āh sō ēvaṁ ।। 5178 ।।
ēkkammi jiṇāyaṇē sayaṁ tumaṁ ciṭṭha samaēsu puṇō । niyapaḍibibāī ṭhavēhi dēvi sā bēi maha sattī ।।5179 ।।
natthi paḍibiṁba karaṇē jigamittō bhai saṁpai navāī । kārēmi na tāī aha pubvaṁ pi kayāī ciṭṭhēti ।। 5180 ।।
punnēhi tujha sā bhai kaha maē tāī nēya nāyāī । jigamittō bēi tumaṁ muṇasi maē tāī kahiyāī ।। 5181 ।।
dēvī jaṁpai jimitta ēyamacca bhuyaṁ tumaṁ bhaṇasi । tā kahasu sigdhamēvaya phiṭṭai maha jēṇa saṁdēhō ।।5182 ।। ।
sō bhaṇai dēvi ! paḍhamaṁ pariṇīyā vajjakuṁḍalēṇa tumaṁ । tayaṇaṁtaramēgūṇaṁ bhajjā saya paṁcagaṁ tēṇa । । 5183 ।

=== vardhamanaoutput-161-to-161.json ==========================

161
pariṇīyaṁ dēvi taō ēgūṇāī pi paṁcavisayāī । nivabhajjāṇaṁ tāṇaṁ tuha paḍibibāī bhannaṁti || 5184।।
dēvī bhaṇai ēvaṁ kayammi ārāhiō havai sumiṇō । āmaṁ ti sō vi jaṁpara aha taṁ paḍivajjiuṁ davī ।।5185 ।।
jiṇamittaṁ bhaṇai puṇō kārēhi imaṁ nariṁdapāsāō । sēsāṇaṁ dēvīṇaṁ dāvēūṇaṁ samāēsaṁ ॥ 5186 ।।
aha jimittō dēvi aṇunnavēūṇa uṭṭiuṁ ēi । rannō pāsē sāhēi tassa dēvīē paḍivayaṇaṁ ।। 5187 ।।
aha rāyā jiṇamittaṁ kaṁcuiṇā saha samaggadēvīṇaṁ । pāsammi pēsiṇaṁ āēsaṁ dāvaē ēyaṁ । । 5188 । ।
jaha kāmarai dēvī pūs jiṇamaṁdirēsu paḍimāō । tubbhē vi kuha pūyaṁ ēkkēkkē cēiyaharammi ।।5189 ।।
hattiō vidhammō tumhaṁ pi hu jāyaē pabhāyammi । tā saṁvahiuṁ vaccaha uddiṭṭhēsuṁ jiṇaharēsuṁ ॥ 5190॥
pavanē dēvīhi ōvagaraṇajuyāu savvāō । pēsai tāu pabhāē puḍhō puḍhō jiṇaharēsu niva । । 5191 ।।
inivvattiya sasu vi jiṇaharēsu jugavaṁ pi । rāyā gamēi kālaṁ ārāhatō tivaggaṁ pi ।। 5192 ।।
uppannakahiyapūriyaḍōlayā sā vi kāmaraidēvī । aigasyapamōyajuyā suhaṁsuhēṇaṁ vahai gabbhaṁ ॥ 5193।।
samayammi taō pasavai puttaṁ paumadaladīhanayaṇajuyaṁ । ai pavarakhyavaṁtaṁ niyadēhapahāhayatamōhaṁ ॥ 5194 ।।
vr̥ddhāvayaaṁtē urajaṇassa dāu jahicchiyaṁ dāṇaṁ । kārai vaddhāvaṇayaṁ samagganayarammi naranāhō ।।5195 ।।
sammāṇiya sayalajaṇaṁ bārasamē vāsarammi puttassa । sumiṇāṇusāri nāma payāvadēvō tti ṭavai niva ।। 5196।।
aha vaḍha sō kamasō nivabhavaṇē paṁcadhāi parigahiō । samayammi kalāyariyassa appiō gahiyasavvakalō
pattō jōvvaṇalaccha nivēṇa pariṇāviō surūvāṇa । kannāṇaṁ aṭṭhasayaṁ mahānaridēhi jāyāṇaṁ ।। 5198 ।।
ṭhaviō juvarāyapaē rannā dinnō ya tassa bahudēsō | vitthāriyajasapasarō niya jaṇayaṁ sēvaē ēsō ।। 5199 ।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalanivō nāūṇaṁ rajjabhāravahaṇakhamaṁ । puttaṁ payāvadēvaṁ rajjē ṭaviuṁ samīi || 5200।
gahiraṁ vayaṁ sayaṁ puṇa citatō bhavasarūvamaivirasaṁ । sumaraṁtō maraṇaṁ tārisaṁ ca taṁ kāmadēvassa ।। 5201 ॥
pālai rajjamakāmō nivvinnō bhīmabhavanivāsassa । paḍivālitō ēṁtaṁ tahāvihaṁ kaṁ pi muṇipavaraṁ ।। 5202 ।।
sō vajjanāhisāhū dukkaratava caraṇavāripūrēṇa । pakkhāliyakammamalō saṁpattō sāsayaṁ sōkkhaṁ ।। 5203 ।।
tayaṇa sujasō vi sūrī paḍibōhiya bhaviya-kamala-vaṇasaṁḍō । ṭhaviūṇa niyadvāṇē vimalajasaṁ nāmagaṇanāhaṁ ।। 5204 ।।
tava-davahuyāsaṇēṇa ḍahiūṇa asēsakammavaṇagahaṇaṁ । avagāḍhō gayabāhaṁ sāsayasuhasāgaramagāhaṁ ॥। 5205 ।।
iya jaṇaparaṁparāēṁ suṇiūṇaṁ vajjakuṁḍalanivō vi । saṁsārāsārataṁ paikkhaṇaṁ bhāvai maṇammi || 5206 ||
aha vimalajasō sūrī viharatō gaṁdhamāyaṇapurammi । pattō kamēṇa caunāṇasaṁjuō tammi samayammi ।। 5207 ।।
sōūṇa taṁ samāgayamamayarasēṇēvasittasavvaṁgō । nijjāi vajjakuṁḍalanaranāhō jhatti nayarāō || 5208 ।।
gaṁtr̥̄ṇa tattha sūri vaṁdai āṇaṁdagaliyanayaṇajalō । uvavisiumuciyadē sē paḍhamaṁ ciya pucchai saruvaṁ ।। 5209।।
sujasāṇaṁ sūrīṇaṁ niya piuṇō vajjanāhi muṇiṇō yauṁ । vimalajasasūriṇō vihu savittharaṁ tassa sāhēti ।।5210।।
niyamatthayammi dōnni vi hatthē ārōviūṇa tō rāyā । kuṇai paṇāmaṁ paharisagalaṁtabahubahalabāhajalō ।।5211।।
jaṁpaiya jahā duhamayabhavappavaṁcāu mōiō appā । dōhi vi bhayavaṁtēhi tēhi mahāsattavatēhi ।। 5212 ।।
jaṁ tē sāsayasōkkhaṁ saṁpattā ēttiēṇa maha tōsō । tēsi pāyāpaṇayā puṇō maē jaṁ na taṁ dukkhaṁ ।। 5213।।
tē āgayā ya bahusō sujasamahāsūriṇō iha purammi । saha vajjanāhimuṇiṇā karuṇāpīūsajalanihiṇō ।। 5214।।
kiṁtu tayādēsēsuṁ iyaranaridāṇa cālaṇanimittaṁ । amhē paribbhamaṁtā tēṇa na taddaṁsaṇaṁ jāyaṁ ॥। 5215।।
