=== vardhamanaoutput-162-to-162.json ==========================
162
ha
vajjakuṁḍalacariyaṁ
annēsu vi dēsēsuṁ tē muṇiṇō vihariyā dayānihiṇō । jattha mhē baccaṁtā tattha paraṁ tēna saṁpattā ।।5216 ।।
sō ahaṁ ciya dōsō kammassa suhaṁtarāyajaṇagassa । na ciṁtāmaṇisaṁgō kyā vi jāya annassa ।।5217।।
tēhi sayaṁ niyaṭhāṇē tē tumhē ṭhāviyā guṇasamuddā | amhāṇa tē vi tēsi tullā ahavā di amahiyā ।। 5218 ।।
mēhassa unnayassa va tuha maggaṁ maha palōyamāṇassa । inhi maṇināha gayā bahudiyahā duhiyahiyayarasa ।। 5219।।
tuha pāyakayāṇaṁ inhi āgamaṇasavaṇasamakālaṁ । taṁ maha duhaṁ palāṇaṁ palōyaṇē tāṇa kiṁ bhaṇimō ।। 5220 ।।
nāha maṇōrahabīyaṁ jaṁ maha hiyayammi vāviyaṁ āsi । ēttiyakālaṁ saṁpaṛa taṁ tuha āgamaṇasavaṇēṇa ।। 5221 ।।
aṁkuriyaṁ pallaviyaṁ daṁsaṇaō saṁpayaṁ kusumiyaṁ va । pahu dikkhādāṇēṇaṁ taṁ sahalaṁ kuṇaha inhi tu ।। 5222।।
aha vimalajasō sūrī āha imaṁ vajjakuṁḍalanaridaṁ । saṁsārammi asārē imammi dukkhāṇa khāṇimmi ।। 5223 ||
sōkkhassa lavō vikhaṇaṁ pi natthi causu vi gaīsu jīvāṇaṁ । mōttūṇa mōkkhamēkkaṁ sōuṇa sijjhai narabhavammi ||
laddhūṇa vi maṇuyabhavaṁ mōttūṇaṁ mōkkhasāhaṇōvāyaṁ । jē tucchaṁ visayasuhaṁ sēvaṁtā taṁ garmēti muhā ।। 5225 ।।
tē tassa mahāmaḍhassa sālisā hōṁti viyaliyavivēyā । dahiūṇa caṁdaṇaṁ jō karēi iṁgālavāṇijjaṁ । ||5226 ||
tā uciyamiṇaṁ kāuṁ tumhāṇa vivēyavaṁtapurisāṇā । juttō na kālakhēvō bahuvigdhaṁ hōi jaṁ sēyaṁ ।। 5227।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalanivāṇumaggalaggaṁ samāgayaṁ tattha । aṁtēuraṁ pi savvaṁ pāsanisanaṁ sui ēyaṁ ॥ 5228।।
tēṇa vi vinnattō vajjakuṁḍalō mēiṇīsarō ēvaṁ | amha vi dikkhaṁ dāuṁ caraṇē vinnavaha sūrissa ।। 5229 ।।
tumhēhi vimukkā amhāṇa vi natthi kā vi annagaī । jō cēva tumha maggō amhēhi vi sōgaṁtavyō ।। 5230।।
sūrīhiṁ sayaṁciya jaṁpiyaṁ taō ēvamēva tumhaṁ pi । jattaṁ visēsaō puṇa nivammi ēvaṁ kutammi || 5231॥
ōrōhēṇa samaṁ ciya rāyā harisiyamaṇō samuṭṭhēḍaṁ । namiūṇa sūricaraṇē migdhaṁ pattō niyāvāsaṁ ।। 5232।।
āmaṁtiūṇa puttaṁ payāvadēvaṁ payāsaē tassa । niyābhippāyaṁ payaṇa taha pālaṇōvāyaṁ ।।5233।।
tō vajjakuṁḍalanivō suhē muhattammitassa ahiṁsētraṁ । rajjapara nivvattaḥ pavitrēṇaṁ garutarēṇa ||5334 ||
aha sō yāvadēvō mahānaridattaṇaṁ samaṇupattō । rāyāisayalalōēṇa paṇamiō paramaviṇaē ।। 5235 ।।
aha sō vi takkhaṇē cciya nikkhamaṇatthaṁ niyassa jaṇayassa । kārēḍa rayaṇakaṁcaṇa - ruppamayāṇēgakala sēhi ||5236||
ahisēyamaṁgalūhaṇa-vilēvaṇaṁ divva-vatthaparihāṇaṁ । nāṇāviharayaṇāharaṇabhūsaṇaṁ kusumasaṁjamaṇaṁ ॥ 5237।।
iya kāriyasiṁgāraṁ ārōhēūṇa kaṁcaṇarahammi |
ārōhēūṇa kaṁcaṇarahammi । sirivajjakuṁḍalanivaṁ ēmēvatēuraṁ tassa ।। 5238 ।।
pavibhattēsu rahēsuṁ ārōvēūṇa raiyasiṁgāraṁ । mattagadārūḍhō aṇugacchaṁtō sa parivārō ।। 5239 ।।
rāyā payāvadēvō kāriyapūyō jiṇidabhavaṇēsu । dīṇāṇāhāīṇaṁ dāvitō vihidāṇāī ।। 5240 ।।
baṁdīhiṁ paḍhijjaṁtē gijjaṁtē maṁgalē kulavahūhiṁ | ṭhāṇaṭṭhāṇē pamayāulēhiṁ kī tapēcchaē ।। 5241 ।।
nēu sayaṁ samappai sūrissa vihīē dēi sō dikkhaṁ । jigamittāijaṇāṇaṁ saēhi paṁcahi saha nivasta ।। 5242 ।।
kāmarai pahāṇaṁ paṁcasayāṇa rāyabhajjāṇaṁ । sikaviḍaṁ muṇikiriyaṁ pavattiṇīē samappēḍa ।।5243||
ajjāṇaṁ paṁcasaē muṇīṇa tē dharai appaṇī pāsē । rāyā payāvadēvō sāvayadhammaṁ pavajjēṅa || 5244 ||
aha baṁdiūṇa sūri samaggaparivārasaṁjuyaṁ tattō । rāyā payāvadēvō payāiniyayamma pāsāē ।। 5245 ।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalamuṇī siddhatama hijjaē gurusamīvē । kāmaraī pamuhō vihu āgamamajja gaṇō paḍhai ।। 5246 ।।
rāyā payāvadēvō paidiyahaṁ vaṁdaē samāgaṁtuṁ । sūri sapariyaṇaṁ saha navadivikhayajaṇaya jaṇaṇīhi ।। 5247 ।।
aha vimalajasō sūrī ṭhāūṇaṁ kai vi vāsarē tattha । viharaḍa annattha taō niyaparivārēṇa saṁjuttō ॥ 4248 ||

annē vi kavi diṇē ajjāō tattha saṁvasēūṇa । vaṁdijjatīyō nivēṇa jaṁti tattō vihārammi ||5249 ।।
pannāi ujjamēṇa ya viṇaēṇa ya vajjakuṁḍalaṇagārō । niya nāmaṁ va samaggaṁ duvālasaṁgaṁ kuṇai sigdhaṁ ।। 5250 ।।
aṇuōgamaṇunnāuṁ ṭhāvēūṇaṁ ca gaṇahara - payasmi । taha jimittāīyaṁ samappiūṇaṁ ca parivāraṁ ।। 5252 ।।
dēsēsu visajjaḍa vajjakuṁḍalaṁ gaṇaharaṁ vihārēṇa । vimalajasō sūrivarō sayaṁ pi annattha viharē ।। 5252।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalagaṇī appāṇaṁ saṁjamēṇa ya tavēṇa । bhāvēmāṇō nāṇāvihadēsēsuṁ vihariūṇa ।।5253 ।।
paḍivōhamaṇagāṇaṁ kāūṇaṁ bhaviyakamalasaṁḍāṇaṁ । nāūṇa suyabalēṇaṁ niyaḍaṁ niya āupajjaṁtaṁ ॥ 5254।।
ṭhaviūṇa niyaṭhāṇē tahavihaṁ kaṁ pi guṇagaṇanihāṇaṁ । aṇagāraṁ tassa gaṇaṁ samappiūṇa samaggaṁ pi ।। 5255।।
kāūṇa vicittēṇaṁ tavēṇa saṁlēhaṇaṁ sarīrassa । kōhāikasāyāṇa ya nīlammi nagammi gaṁtaṇa ।। 5256॥
paccakkhiūṇa bhattaṁ māsaṁ diyahāṇa aṇasaṇaṁ kāuṁ । pāōvagamaṇapuvvaṁ kālaṁ pattō samāhī ।। 5257।।
kappammi baṁbhalōē uppannō suravarō mahiḍḍhīō । dasasāgarōvamāū tattha vi bhuṁjai viulabhō || 5258।।
iya sirimuṇisuvvayajiṇidacariē sirisiricaṁdasūriviraiē paṁcamaṁ chaṭṭhē ca bhavaggahaṇaṁ samattaṁ
sirima nisuvvaya jiṇidassa saptamō bhavō
sirivammakumāra cariyaṁ--
paṁcamaō taha chaṭṭō sirimuṇisuvvayajaṇiṁdacariyammi । kahiō maē bhavō sattamaṁ tu inhi pavakkhāmi ।।5259 ।।
ētthēva jaṁbaddīvē bhārahavāsamma dāhiṇē addhē । majjhima-khaṁḍē vara - gāma-nayaraniyarēhiṁ saṁkinnō ।।5260 ॥
dēsō artha samiddhō supasiddhō sayalamēiṇīvalaē । nāmēṇa surasēṇō kaṇēhiṁ sūrō bahuvihēhi ||5261।।
jalayāgamassa samaē ghaṇamālāsāmalassa gayaṇassa । paribhamirabalāyāvalayakaliya bahumajjha bhāyassa ।। 5262 ।।
uvvahai siri pasariyanavahariyaṁ jattha mēiṇī valayaṁ । sairaṁ viyaraṁtaaṇēyadhavalagōmaṁḍalāinnaṁ ।।5263 ||
saraē siyabbha-nibbharanahaṁṁgaṇā bhōyavibbhamaṁ vahai । navakalama sāli taṁdula - rāsīhiṁ kuḍumbakhalabhūmī ||5264।।
hēmaṁta mma mahāhimayā vi saṁdhijjaē kamalalacchī । jattha jalāgayajuvaī vayaṇēhiṁ khaṇaṁ saravarēsu ।। 5265।।
sisirammi kāṇaṇāṇaṁ talēsu ghaṇapaḍiyapannapūrēsu । siharēsu navaggayabahalapallavullasiya sōhēsu ||5266।।
cakamaṇakilaṁtāṇaṁ majjhanhardiṇidataviyapahiyāṇa । akayapayattāṇa vi hōṁti sattharāsīyalacchāyā ।।5267 ।।
maharā viparayaravā jattha vasaṁtammi taruṇapahiyāṇa । saṁbhariya - piyayamā jaṁpiyāṇa uvvēyayā hōṁti ।। 5268 ।।
gimhammi vi umhaṇē diyā vi dīharapaṭṭē vi pahiyajaṇō । āsannāsannajalāsayammi na kuṇai jaluvvahaṇaṁ । 5269 ।
ṭhāṇadvāṇā vāriyasattē labbhaṁtamaṇaharā hārē । nāṇāvihāsu dēsiyakuḍī saṁpattasuhavāsē ॥5270।।
mōhaṁdhamaṇuyakāriyakāmuyajaṇadaiyakāmasattēsu । juvaijaṇasaṁgamasuhē muhāē saṁpajjamāṇammi ।।5271।।
ārōggasālanivahē savvacigicchaṁ gagaṇasamāinē । nīrōgī kīratēsu sāyaraṁ rōgipurisēsu । ।5272।।
iya savvapayārēhiṁ jammi samuppajjamāṇadēhasuhā । cirapavasiyā vi pahiyā niyagēhasuhassa na saraṁti ।। 5273 ।।
iya ēvamā bahuguṇahaē dēsamma asthi purī । caṁdaurī nāmēṇa ramaṇijjā amayanayari vva ।। 5274 ।।
bahu buhaguru-kairisiṁgaṇa sahiyā hasai vva jā suriṁdauri । ēkkēkka kai gurubuhaṁ samanniyaṁ sataha risīhi ।।5275 ।।
dēsē katthai jaṁ atthi kiṁ pi savvaṁ pi vatthu taṁ tattha । kappatarulayāē iva pāvijjai punnavatēhiṁ ॥ 5276।।
taṁ nayariṁ parivālai rāyā narapuṁgavō jayappayaḍō । anivāriyakarapasarō sayā vivāēya cāvē ya ।।5277।।
viyaḍariukaraḍighaḍakaraḍapāḍaṇappayaḍapōrisappasarō । pasaratasiyajasōhō sōhōhāmiyatiyasanāhō ।।5278।।
savvāvarōhapavarā tassa naridassa sahayarī āsi । punnasirī nāmēṇaṁ punnasasicchāyamuhakamalā || 5279 ।।
tī samanni sō mahārnāradō virāyai jaṇammi । mayaraddhaō vva niyabhāriyāē samalaṁkiō sakkhaṁ ।।5280 ।।
paṁcappayāraniruvama visayasuhāsattamāṇasāṇa taō । jiṇadhammarayāṇa ya tāṇa vāsarā aigayā bahuyā ।। 5281 ।।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
aha annā nisāē niyavāsaharammi rayaṇarayammi । pajalaṁtamaṇipaīvappahā pahā vōsariyatimirē ।। 5282 ।।
।।5282।।
navaṇīyāu vi aimauyaphāsamuhayammi rammasayaṇijjē । punnasirīdēvīē suttāē pacchimē jāmē || 5283 ।।
siyavattha - siyavilēvaṇasiya- kusumāharaṇa-bhūsiyasarīrā । sumiṇammi sirī diṭṭhā viyasiyasayavattasamavayaṇā ।।
iya jaṁpatī jaṁ tuha vammahasamarūvadhāraō puttō । uttamasattanivāsō bhavissaī savvaguṇajuttō ।। 5285 ।।
taṁ daṭṭhē paḍibuddhā sā harisubhinnabahalarōmaṁcā । narapuṁgavassa ranō puraō gaṁtūṇa sāhēi ।। 5286।।
sōūṇa sōvitīsē taṁ vayaṇaṁ niyamaṇē kayāṇaṁdō । sumiṇassa phalaṁ sāhai jaṁ maṁ guṇajuttaputtassa ।। 5287 ।।
taṁ naravaṇō vayaṇaṁ ahiṇaṁdatī puṇō puṇō dēvī । tayaṇunnāyā vaccai sāṇaṁdamaṇā niyaṁ bhavaṇaṁ ।। 5288 ।।
sā tattha rayaṇisē gurudēva kahāhiṁ aipasatthāhi । gamai jahā nihāē na pāsaē kusumiṇaṁ kiṁ pi ।। 5289 ।।
aha vajjakuṁḍalasurō caiūṇaṁ baṁbhalōyakappāō । puttattēṇuvavannō tīsē dēvīē gabbhammi ।।5290 ।।
gabbhassa tassa punnōdaēṇa rannō asēsarajjammi । savvapasatyapayatthāṇa pagarisō paidiṇaṁ hōī ।। 5291 ।।
narapuṁgavassa rannō pubvaṁ jē kē vi patthivā garuyā । saṁgarasaṁraṁbhēṇa vi paṇivāyamuvāgayā nē ya ।। 5292 ।।
tē savvē visayaṁ ciya saṁdhi kāūṇa sēvamāvannā । punnasiridēvīgabbhāṇubhāvaō tassa sahasa tti ।। 5293 ।।
taiē māsammitaō saṁjāō ḍōhalō imō tīsē । nhāya - vilittāhaṁ jai savvattamaraiyasiṁgārā ।। 5294 ।।
ārūḍhā mattamahākarimmi siridhariyadhavalavarachattā । vīijjatī cāmarajūēṇa sasijuharūirēṇa ||5295।।
cauraṁgiṇīē sēṇāē parigayā savvacēiyaha rēsu । varasurahikusumanimmāsiyāu pūyāu pēkkhāmi ।।5296।।
taha siṁghāḍaga-caccara- caukka-tiga-pamuhasavvamaggēsu । nayarīē viparaṁtī dīṇāṇāhāṇa dāṇāī ॥। 5297 ।।
icchāē payacchāmitti jāṇiūṇaṁ taō naridēṇa । pūriyaḍōhalayā sā suhaṁsuhēṇaṁ vahai gabbhaṁ ।। 5298 ।।
aha vaḍhatō kamasō sō gabbhō paidiṇaṁ pi pīṇēi । lāyannavisēsujjalajaṇaṇīē aṁguvaṁgāī ।। 5299 ।।
taṁ gabhamuvvahaṁtī punnasirī sahai sā mahādēvī । aṁtō nihittapunnidubibasa rayabbhamāla vva ॥ 5300।।
paḍipunnēsu diṇēsuṁ pasatthatihi - vāra- karaṇa - nakkhattē । jōgē laggē ya suhē uccaṭṭhāṇaṭṭiyagihēsu ॥ 5301 ।।
pasavai suhēṇa puttaṁ viyasiyasayavattapattasamanēttaṁ । sarayabbhavipyamukkaṁ mayaṁka biṁbaṁ va patniṁ ॥ 5302 ।।
ujjayaṁtaṁ niyadēhadittipasarēṇa sūibhavaṇassa । abbhaṁtaraṁ samaggaṁ pi bhuvaṇavalayassa va visālaṁ ||5303 ||
taṁ pēkkhiūṇa sahasā pahāviyā suvayaṇā taō dāsī । ū suyapayasaṁcārā raṇaṁtamaṇi - nēurasaṇāhā ।।5304।।
akkaṁtāṇaṁ amhaṁ aiviyaḍa niyaṁbabibabhārēṇa । vēgēṇa gamaṇasattī na vijjaē sāmiṇī taō taṁ ।।5305 ।।
saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ amhē puraō cālēhi iya bhāṁti vva । tīsē caraṇāsu mahuraraṇaṁtamaṇinēuramisēṇa ।।5306।।
guruthaṇabhārakkataṁ bhajjissai jhatti tuha kisaṁ majjhaṁ । iya vārai vva raṇirā rasaṇā taṁ sigghagamaṇāō ||5307 ।।
ahasā gaivēga- samullasaṁtaghaṇasāsaruddhahiyayā vi । gaṁtuṇaṁ vaddhāvara naranāhaṁ putta - jammēṇa ॥5308।।
amayarasasēyasarisēṇa tīē vayaṇēṇa tēṇa naranāhō । aṁkuriya-paharisāyārajāyarōmaṁ pabbhārō || 5309 ।।
niyadēhāō ōyāriūṇa nīsēsamāharaṇabhāraṁ । tīsē cēvaya kaṁṭhē ārōvai bhāra bhaggō vva ।।5310 ।।
kāriyavaddhāvaṇaō vittharaō tīē savva nayarīē । jaha jōggaṁ sammāṇiyanīsēsajaṇō taō rāyā ।। 5311 ।।
bārasamavāsarē sumiṇadaṁsaṇassāṇusāraō nāmaṁ । sirivammō tti nariṁdō ṭhāva puttassa aha tassa ।। 5312 ।।
tajjaṇaṇīē diṭṭā sumiṇammi sirī jaō tahā tīē । vammahasarisō puttō hōṁtō tīsē samāiṭṭhī ।।5313 ।।

165
aha sō paṁcahi dhāihiṁ parigaō paidiṇaṁ pi vaḍḍhatō । navasasaharō vva gayaṇē bhavaṇē narapuṁgavanivassa ।। 5314।। ।
nīsēsanariṁdajaṇassa khīranīrāyarammi va maṇammi । salilassa va kallōlē harisassa pavittharaṁ nēi ।।5315 ।।
saṁcarai karāu karaṁ mahaggharayaṇaṁ va thēvakayamullaṁ । sirivammakumārō nivajaṇassa vimyapavannassa ||5316।।
jaṁpiuṁ pavattō avvattakkharagirāhiṁ sō kumarō । saṁjaṇai paramasōkkhaṁ kassa ṇa savaṇaṁtarāsu ।। 5317।।
taṁ ci saṁbhāsaṁtō avarōhajaṇō khaṇaṁ na viramēi । niyasaddaviṇijjiyamattakōilāvēṇuvīṇaravaṁ । । 5318 ।।
avarōhasuṁdarīṇaṁ sōuṁ tassēva vayaṇamahilāsō । siḍhilīkayasuya-sāriyavihaṁga - pāḍhaṇapayattāṇa ॥ 5319।।
niruvamarūvaṁ navaṇīyamauyaphāsaṁ sugaṁdhinīsāsaṁ । parahuya sumahara - saddaṁ sirivammakumāramaṇavarayaṁ ॥ 5320 ।।
nayaṇēhiṁ nihālatō āliṁgaṁtō ya niyayahiyaēṇa । nāsāē nīsāsaṁ agghāyaṁtō ya taha tassa ।। 5321 ।।
savaṇēhiṁ nisutō vayaṇaṁ narapuṁgavāirāyajaṇō । suhamadiyāṇa pāvai tēṇēkkēṇa vi caunhaṁ pi ।। 5322।।
kaṇayaghaḍiyammi sagaḍē nāṇāviharayaṇajālajaḍiyammi । aha sō laggakaraggō caṁkramaṇavilāsamabbhasai ।।5323
aikōmalāī suhalakkhaṇāī ahiṇavakai vva saṁkaṁtō । saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ ṭhāvai payāī sirivammavarakumarō ।। 5324 ।।
iyapaidiṇaṁ kuṇatō kamēṇa caṁkamaṇapaccalō jāō । sō katthai avilaggō vi kuṭṭimē calai līlāē ||5325।।
kuṁkuma - rasacchaḍāsēyasōhirē kuṭṭimammi maṇibaddhē । tammi calatē kumarē payapaḍibiṁbē suuṭṭhati ।।5326 ।।
satthiya-sarōya-kalasa-cchattāyārāī laṁchaṇavarāī | kāī pi jāī tēsuṁ ghaṇasāraraēṇa rēhāō ।। 5327।।
avarōhavahūō pūrayaṁti kōūhalēṇa sikkhēḍaṁ । tārisakhvāiṁ sayaṁ pi jēṇa jāṇaṁti ālihiuṁ ॥ 5328 ॥
nāṇāvannamahāmaṇiviṇimmiēhi turaṁgamāīṇaṁ । paḍirūvēhi jahicchaṁ aha sō kīlai nivakumārō ।। 5329 ।।
kumarō paripphuḍakkharavāṇīē jaṁpirō jayā jāō । na tayā kassai sō jaṁpiūṇa viramaṁtaōbhiō ।।5330 ।।
niyakaṇayapaṁjarāṇaṁ pāsē kumarassa saṁcaraṁtassa । gihakīra - sāriyāō kuṇaṁti bahucāḍuvayaṇāī ॥। 5331।।
tappaḍivayaṇāyannaṇasayanhahiyayāu kaṁkhamāṇīō । sikkhēḍaṁ tassa paripphuḍakkharuccārasakkāraṁ ।।5332।।
cau-paṁca-varisajammō sirivammō jāva sō nivakumārō । jāō tāva urabbhaṁ, taruṇaṁ āṇāviraṁ rāyā ।। 5333 ।।
cārēūṇaṁ hariyaṁ javāiyaṁ kāriūṇaṁ balavaṁtaṁ । muhadinna lōhaka ḍiyāliyaṁ ca hatthē gahiyavaggaṁ ।। 5334 ।।
ēkkēṇaṁ purisēṇaṁ dakkhēṇaṁ bhūmisaṁṭhiēṇēva । kāriya caṁkamaṇasamaṁ jāṇāviya vaggasaṁcāraṁ ।।5335 ।।
parikammiūṇa ēvaṁ kaṁcaṇakaviyaṁ muhammi dāvēraṁ । kayapaṭṭasūttavaggaṁ ārōviyapavarapallāṇaṁ ।।5336।।
āyaḍiya paṭṭā kaṁṭhami kaṇaṁta kiṁkiṇījālaṁ । causu vi caraṇēsu tahā vajjirasaṁjamiyaghagghariyaṁ ॥ 5337॥
āruhaṇatthaṁ appara taṁ sirivammassa tassa kumarassa । kayasiṁgārō sō vi hu tatthārūḍhō paribbhamai ।। 5338 ।।
hu
pāsā yapaṁgaṇē dasudisāsu pāsaṭṭhiēhi purisēhiṁ । dhārijjatō āsaṇathējjattha kai vi diyahāī ।। 5339 ।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ sayaṁ ciya ārōhai tattha avarapurisāṇa | sāhējjēṇa viṇā vihu vāhēiya taṁ jahicchāē ||5340 ।।
puraō dhāvaṁtēhi samāṇajammē hi sēvayasuēhiṁ । dāhiṇakaraggasaṁṭhiyamasikasiṇiyakaṭṭakhaggēōhi ॥। 5341।।
vāmakaruppāḍiyakhēḍaēhiṁ iyacāḍuyaṁ bhaṇatēhi । jayajīvanaṁdasuiraṁ avahāraha āsaṇaṁ kumara || 5342।।
avarōhacāriṇīō dāsīō paikhaṇaṁpi tassuvari । uttāriūṇa lōṇaṁ khivaṁti savvāsu vidisāsu ।। 5343 ।।
dakkhā khajjūrāīṇi khāimāī tahā bahuvihāī । tassuvari bhamāḍēuṁ khivaṁti taha caiva savvattō ॥ 5344 ।।
mōttūṇa khaggakhēḍayajuyalāī mahīyalammi aha turiyaṁ । sēvaryāḍabhā ahamahamiyāē dhāvati gahaṇatthaṁ ॥ 5345 ।।

ta idakhāī dakkhā ginhaṁti tāī kēvi lahaṁ । tō tē taha dhāvaṁtē da{} gaṁ hasai sō kumarō ||5346 ॥
pāsāōvari bhūmīē saṁṭhiō taṁ tahā payārēṇa । pahasaṁtaṁ niyakumaraṁ nijjhāēūṇa naranāhō ||5347 ।।
pūgī - phala - phālīhi hiyaē haṇiuṁ varōhadāsīō । uḍḍha avalōyaṁtīu tajjaē tāu diṭṭhīē ||5448 ||
tō tāu visēsēṇaṁ āṇāvēḍaṁ phalāī vivihāḍaṁ | kāuṁ nium̐chaṇāī kumarassa khivaṁti dūrammi ।। 5349 ।।
ēvaṁ pakīlamāṇō paidiyahaṁ bahuvihāhiṁ kīlāhiṁ । kaiyāvi kōuēṇaṁ asōgavaṇiyāisu payāi ।।5350 ।।
sō narapuṁgavanaranāhanaṁdaṇō tattha rāyahaṁsāṇaṁ । taṇaēhi samaṁ kīlai muiyamaṇō appasarisēhi ||5351||
suvisuddha bhayapakkhēhiṁ mahara - saddēhiṁ suṁdaragaīhiṁ | kamalāhārēhiṁ tahā nimmalamāṇasa karahiṁ ।। 5352।।
diyahaṁtarēhiṁ vaḍḍhadēhō kumarassa tassa cariēhiṁ । harisō nivassa hiyaē gēhē vihavō ya punnēhi ||5353 ||
aha taṁ nāūṇa nivō kalagahaṇō ya vayammi vaṭṭataṁ । pēsēūṇaṁ purisaṁ hakkārāvara kalāyariyaṁ ।।5354 ||
jayasamma nāmēṇa saṁpattō ēsa takkhaṇē cēva । ujjhāō saṁjuttō pattēṇaṁ caṁḍasammēṇa ।। 5355 ।।
aha taṁ puhaī nāhō āsaṇa - phala - phulladāṇamāīhi । sammāṇēūṇa pasannavayaṇakamalō vayai ēvaṁ ।।5356 ।।
tumhē dēhēṇa daḍhā ṭhiyā ta bhai jōḍiyakaraggō । jayasammō ujjhāō ajjēvadattamuvajāyaṁ || 5357।।
dahē maṇēya amhaṁ saṁjāē tumha daṁsaṇē dēva । aha rāyā jayasammaṁ bēi jahā avahiyā suha ||5358।।
tumhāṇa puvvapurisā kamēṇa ārambhasubahukālāō । amhaṁ puvvanivāṇaṁ kalāṇa uvaēsayā jāyā ।। 5359।।
inhi puṇa amhāṇaṁ tumhāṇa ya kaha vi viulapunnēhi । amha sirivammakumarō kulappaīvō samuppattī ।।5360 ।।
jōggō ya kalāgahaṇassa saṁpayaṁ ciṭṭhaē imō jāō। tō kammi vi suhadiyahē ēvaṁ nēūṇa saṁyamēva ।। 5361 ।।
amhē tumhaṁ sagihaṭṭhiyāṇa sigdhaṁ samappaissāmō । jaha kaha vi guṇārūḍhō hōi imō taha karijjāhi ।। 5362 ।।
tō jayasammō ēvaṁ taha tti paḍivajjaē nivaśvayaṇaṁ । aha rāyā taṁbōlaṁ dāvēūṇaṁ sakappūraṁ ।।5363||
jayasammamuvajjhāyaṁ visajjaē sāyaraṁ sa puttaṁ pi । uṭṭhēḍaṁ hiṭṭamaṇā gihaṁ gayā tē vi pi puttā ।।5364 ।।
hkkārāvai gaṇayaṁ rāyā taṁ pucchiūṇa takkahiyaṁ । ōjjhāyarasa kahāvai diya tēṇaṇumaē tammi ।। 5365 ।।
tihi-vāra-karaṇa - nakkhatta - jōgalaggēsu sōhaṇēsu ta । kīraṁtamaṁgalēhi kaṁcaṇa - rayaṇāikalasahi ।।5366 ।।
kayamajjaṇaṁ vittiṁ ahiṇavagōsīsacaṁdaṇarasēṇaṁ । kayasēyakusuma - sēharamujjalasuniyatthavaravatthaṁ ॥। 367।।
avimalathūlamuttāhalāṇa hārēhi bhūsiyasarīraṁ । tuhiṇāyalaṁ va vilasirapunnimasaraiṁdukara-niyaraṁ ।। 5368 ।।
taṁ ārōvai rāyā niyamucchaṁgaṁ karidamārūḍhō । siradhariyadhavalachattō ḍhalaṁtasiyacāmaspīlō ।।5369 ।।
kari turaya-rahārūḍhēhi maṁti - sāmaṁta maṁḍalavaīhiṁ । parivāriō samaṁtā aṇēyapāikkalakkhēhi ||5370 ।।
sirivammalē hasālā pavēsamāyanniūṇa taṁ savvō । dhāvai nayarassa jaṇō nirikkhaṇatyaṁ duyagaīē || 5371।।
maggammi amāyaṁtō ubhaō bhāgēsu bhavaṇapatīsu । ārūḍhō avalōyai duijjataiyāibhūmīsu ।।5372 ।
naranāhasīhadārāu pabhiijayasamma maṁdiraṁ jāva । āvaṇa- gihāī maggē naranārimayāī jāyāī ||5373 ।।
bhakkhāī jāī kāī viphalāī nāraṁga dakkhamāīṇi । ōllāṇi ya sukkāṇi ya tēsi bhariyāī thālāī ।। 5374 ।।
purisāṇa ya mahilāṇa ya sirēsu ṭhaviyāī piṭṭhaō jaṁti । avarōhabuḍḍhanārī janō ya vaccai rahārūḍhō ।।5375 ।।
sāmaggīē imāē narapuṁgavapatthavō niyagihāō । sirivammakumarasahiō saṁcaliō rāyamaggami ||5376 ।।
aṁbarakuharaṁ pūraṁtaēhi tūrēhiṁ tārasahi । vajjaṁtēhiṁ dūrayarapasariēhiṁ paḍiravēhiṁ ॥ 5377 ।।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
maivaddhaṇō vi kāriyavarasiṁgārō kumārapāsammi । āgaṁtūṇa nisīyai tammi khaṇē sajaṇayāṇā ॥ 5411।।
kāūṇa namōkkāraṁ paḍhamaṁ savvaṇṇuṇō ti jayaguruṇō । pacchā sarassaīē dēvīē paramaviṇaēṇa ।। 5422 ।।
tēsiṁ dōnhaṁpi, taō, payacchaē māiyāē parivāḍi । jayasammauvajjhāō paripphuḍuccariyavannēhi ||5413 ।।
ēvaṁ duiyaṁ taiyaṁ vāraṁ dāūṇa tāṇa parivāḍi । jāva cautthaṁ vāraṁ ujjhāō dāumārō || 5414 ।।
tā paḍisēūṇaṁ puhaīnāhēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ ēyaṁ । ujjhāya puccha kumaraṁ tuhāgayā māiyā nō vā ।। 5415 ।।
ujjhāēṇa taha cciya puṭṭhō kumarō payaṁpaē ēvaṁ । paḍhamāē cēva imā parivāḍīē mamāyāyā ।। 5416 ।।
tō vimhayaṁ pavanō ujjhāō bhaṇai paḍha kumāra sayaṁ । paḍhiyā kumarēṇa taō phuḍakkharā akhaliyā jhatti ।।5417 |
sīsaṁ dhuṇiūṇa taō jayasammō pucchaē niyaṁ puttaṁ । avahāriyā taē ki maivadvaṇamāiyā ēsā ।। 5418 ।।
sō bhai saṁpayaṁ ciya cauttha vāraṁ paḍhaṁtaē kumarē । ciṭṭhai majjha vi ēsā samāgayā mājhyā tāya ।। 5419 ।।
piuṇō āṇāē taō paḍhiyā tēṇa vi phuḍakkharā taha ya । tō jayasammō daṁsai lihiṇaṁ paṭṭaē vannē ।। 5420 ।।
guruṇō vayaṇēṇa taō tahēva kumarō vi vanna - samavāyaṁ । savvaṁ pilihai paṭṭē suddhāvayavaṁ vigayasakō ।।5421 ।।
accabbhuyamavahāraṇasatti daṭṭhūṇa tassa jayasammō । ēkkēkkassa vi vannassa daṁsaē ṇē ya saṁjōē ।। 5422 ॥
vannaṁtarasarasahiē vayaṇuccārēṇa saṁjuē lihiuṁ । tassaṇulaggō kumarō taha cēbuccāraē lihaē ||5423।।
savvē vivimhiyamaṇā pahāṇapurisā narēsarassa taō । uttārayati kamasō kumarassuvari nium̐chaṇayaṁ । । 5424 ।।
avarōhabuḍḍhanārījaṇāvi ōyāriūṇa lūṇāī । kaḍḍhati bhālavaṭṭē tassa samīṭikkayāī taō ।। 5425 ।।
tō jayasammō jaṁpai vaṇṇuccārammi tāva kusalattaṁ । saṁpannaṁ savvakkharasaṁjōyajuē vi aipavaraṁ ।। 5426 ।।
nāyara - livīya jāyā imassa airēga pariciyā savvā । sēsāō vilivīō daṁsiyamēttāu ginhēi || 5427 ।।
pariminhi aivēlā jāyā kumarō vi bhukkhiō hōhī । tō muccau avasēsaṁ puṇō pabhāyammi bhaṇiyavaṁ ॥
annaṁ ca ajja paḍhamaṁ diyahaṁ tō ēttha thēvaō cēva । pāraṁbhō kīraṁtō saṁjāyai khēmajaṇaō tti ।।5429 ।।
ēkkēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ tattha naridassa nammasacivēṇa । ujjhāya taō tumaē appāraṁbhō kaō ēsō ॥। 4330 ।।
annē pōḍhā vi narā jaṁ na ahijjēti cauhiṁ māsēhiṁ । taṁ tēttiya ghaḍiyāhi vi taē imō pāḍhiō kumarō ।।5431 ।।
tēṇa vayaṇēṇa savvē nivapurisā niyamaṇammi hasiūṇa । tattō mōṇēṇa ṭhiyā vārai diṭṭhīē taṁ ca nivō ||5432 ||
tō jaṁpai ujjhāō iya taṁ parihāsajaṁpiraṁ purisaṁ । savvaṁ ciya bhō ēvaṁ annāvēkkhā tuha vayaṇaṁ ।। 5433।।
kumaraṁ tu paḍucca asaccamēva jamhā imassa pannāē । ēga paē cciya savvaṁ bhaṇiyanbaṁ hōi satthaṁ pi ।।5434 ।।
dhannēgamāṇagassa u āhārō hōi jassa purisassa । tassēga pāilīē appāhārattaṇaṁ havai ।। 5435 ।।
dhannassa sēiyāē bhuttāē hōi jassa puṇa tittī । tassēgamāṇagēṇa vi bhannai āhārathēvattaṁ ।। 5436 ||
jaha ēyaṁ kira ēvaṁ satyāraṁbhē vi taha muṇēyavvaṁ । pannā māṇēṇaṁ satthāraṁbhassa thēvattaṁ ॥ 5437 ||
jayasammēṇa kumārō puṭṭhō jaha vaccha ! taṁsi ai chuhiō । kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ ajjaṁ chuhaṁ nēya jāṇāmi । 5439 ।
ēvaṁ ci jāṇēhaṁ jai ajja vi ki pi suvvaē tumha । pabhaṇaṁtāṇaṁ vayaṇaṁ ēttō uṭṭhajjaē nēya ।।5439।।
kumarassa imaṁ vayaṇaṁ jayasammō naravarō ya sōūṇa । aiparamapamōēṇaṁ pūriyahiyayā duyaṁ jāyā ।।5440 ।।
aha jayasammō nivaī vayai jahā dēva ! annajammammi । paḍhiyāu samaggāō kalāō ciṭṭhēti kumarēṇa । । 5441 ।।
ēyammi puṇē jammē ciṁtēyavvāu kēvalamimāō । jaha ajjadiṇaṁahīyaṁ kō vihu citai diṇē bīē || 5442।।
ārōggaṁ maggāmō kēvalamēyassa dēva ! kumarassa | ciṭṭhati sayaṁ siddhā annē savvē vi paḍhaṇaguṇā ||5443।।
I

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
169
ētthaṁtarasmi tattō samuṭṭhiūṇaṁ gaō sajaṇaṇīē । sammi māhavō tēṇa patthiyā bhōyaṇaṁ ēsā || 5444।।
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ puttaya ! lahuē niyabhāuyammi chuhiyammi । tuha samuciyaṁ na bhōttuṁ jēṭussa sahōyarassa taō ।। 5445 ।।
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ maē sō āhūō paramuvāgaō nē ya । tō jaṇaṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ kiṁ sō ciṭṭhai pakuvvatō ||5446 ||
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ na kici vi ēmēva ya sō mahāī pāsaṁtō । ciṭṭhai ujjhāya-nivāṇa bhāsamāṇāṇa annōnnaṁ ।।5447 ।।
tīē pusō bhaṇiō nihuyaṁ hakkāriūṇa āṇēhi । maivadvaṇasirivammē dōnni vitaṁ majjha vayaṇēṇa ।। 5448 ।।
jēṇa taē saha tē vihu dōvi kumārā karēṁti ki pi lahuṁ । bhōyaṇamēttaṁ jaha pittadūsaṇaṁ dīvaē nē ya ।। 5449 ।।
aha māhavēṇa gaṁtuṁ tē pattēyaṁ pi kanna laggēṇa । bhaṇiyā dōnivi jugavaṁ ujjhāyamuhaṁ palōyaṁti ॥ 5450 ।।
ujjhāyassa vi tō māhavēṇa hōūṇa kannamūlammi । sāhiyamēyaṁ tēṇāvi tē duvē sanniyā tattō ॥ 5451।।
maivaddhaṇa-sirivammā samuṭṭhiyā jhatti tō nivakumārō । rannō muhammi diṭṭhi khivai taō bēi ujjhāō ।। 5452।।
rannā saṁpai amhaṁ samappiō taṁsi tō taē bhaṇiyaṁ । amhaṁ ciya karaṇijjaṁ rannō vi sayaṁ bhaṇatassa ।। 5453 ।।
ujjhāyavayaṇamēyaṁ samatthiyaṁ patthivēṇa tō jhatti । dō vi caliyā kumārā paḍisēuṁ imaṁ bhaṇiyā ।। 5454।।
jayasammēṇaṁ tubbhē ginhaha paḍhamaṁ sarassaī sēsaṁ । tīsē pabhāvaō jaha visēsaō hōi tumha suyaṁ । । 5455 ।।
dēvī paḍimā puraō āṇāvēūṇa kēttiyāiṁ ca । sīsāṇa samīvāō thālāī tēsi majjhāō ||5456।।
ēkkaṁ dakkhā thālaṁ appēuṁ pēsiō narō ēkkō । tēhi samaṁ bhajjā sōmasirīē samīvammi ।। 5457 ।।
sā bhāṇiyāya ēvaṁ paḍhamaṁ pi imaṁ sarassaī sēsaṁ । dāūṇa kumārāṇaṁ dāyavvaṁ bhōyaṇaṁ sēsaṁ ॥ 5458।।
tēsu gaēsu tattō nīsēsāī pi sēsathālāī । pavibhaṁjiraṁ payacchai sēsāṇaṁ savvasīsāṇaṁ ।। 5459 ।।
tō jayasammēṇa puṇō pāraddhā patthuyā kahā kahiuṁ । narapuṁgavassa puraō puhaivaiṇō jahā dēva ! ॥ 5460।।
vijjāgahaṇammi samujjayassa purisassa dasa guṇā hōṁti । paṁcēvayabāhiriyā abhitarayā vi paṁcēva ॥ 5461 ।।
ārōggabuddhiviṇayā ujjamasatthāṇurāyanāmāṇō । paṁcavi abhitarayā bāhirayā puṇa imē annē || 5462।।
pōtthaya māyariō taha nivāsaṭhāṇaṁ sahāya āhārō । ēēsu buddhimuhā ciṭṭhēti guṇā nava kumārē || 5463।।
gaṁbhīrayā guṇō puṇa bālassa vi kō vi niruvamō cēva । ēyassa dēvaguṇamaṁdirassa sirivammakumarassa ।।5464।।
kaṁṭhāgaē vi jāē jaṁ ēsō māiyāē pāḍhammi । ginhai dijjaṁtīō parivāḍīō thirappagaī ।। 5465 ।।
puṭṭhēṇa taō kahiyaṁ kaṁṭagayā majjha māiyā jāyā । parivāḍīē bhaṁgabhaēṇa akkhiyaṁ na uṇa sayamēva ॥ 5466।।
iccāikumarapannāi guṇagaṇaṁ tassa vannayaṁtassa । jayasammassa nariṁdō nisuṇaṁtō jāi nō titti ।। 5467 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattō tattha kumārō vi bhōyaṇaṁ kāuṁ । aha sō nivēṇa bhaṇiō vaccha ! tumaṁ ciṭṭha ētthēva ॥ 5468।।
ārāhatā niya gurupayāī ginhaṁtaō kalānivahaṁ । jaiyā ēsa visajjai taiyā taṁ niya gihaṁ ēhī || 5469 ||
i sikkhaviḍaṁ kumaraṁ mōttūṇaṁ tassa sannihāṇammi । parivāraṁ ca samuciyaṁ sahiyaṁ avarōhadāsīhiṁ ॥ 5470 ।।
jayasammēṇa vi kumarassa daṁsiyaṁ maṁdiraṁ cauduvāraṁ । sayayaṁ nivāsaṭhāṇaṁ dō bhūmīyaṁ suvitthinaṁ । । 5471 ।।
tō uṭṭhaūṇa rannā sayamēva palōiyaṁ imaṁ gaṁtuṁ । jayasammō vi samaṁ ciya naravaiṇā tattha saṁpattō ||5472।।
bhaṇiō imō nivēṇaṁ ujjhāyanariṁdamaṁdirasamāṇaṁ । gimēyaṁ annēhi vibhūsiyaṁ bhūribhavaṇēhiṁ ॥ 5473।
āha ō jayasamma kaliṁgadēsāu āgaō āsi । kō vi purā nivaputtō tassa nimittaṁ taō ēyaṁ ॥। 5474 ।।
tumhāṇa puvvapurisēṇa kēṇaī kāriūṇa sē dinaṁ । ṭhāūṇa iha ciraṁ sō piuṇā hakkāriō pacchā ||5475।।
rajjōvavēsaṇatthaṁ gaō sadēsamma ṭhāviō rajjē । tō amha putrvapurisassa patthivēṇaṁ imaṁ dinaṁ ॥5476||

170
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
jayasammamaṇunnaviḍaṁ kumaraṁ mōttūṇa tassa pāsammi । narapuṁgavō nariṁdō pattō niyayammi pāsāē ।।5477 ||
sirivammakumārō vihu gurūviṇayaṁ paidiṇaṁ pi kuṇamāṇō । samuciyapaḍivattīē viśēyavaggaṁ ca raṁjaṁtō ।। 5478 ।।
kayaujjamō ahijjai kalākalāvaṁ gurūvaēsēṇa । ēgaggadhāriyamaṇō iṁdiyasōkkhassa nirakha ||5479 ।।
āgaṁtūṇaṁ narapuṁgavassa puhaīsarassa pāsammi । kumarasarīrapautti nicvaṁpi kahē parivārō ।। 5480 ।।
kumarasamīvāō samāgayāṇa purisāṇa sannihāṇammi । sō vi auvvamauvvaṁ vatyuṁ pēsai kumarajōggaṁ ।। 5481 ।।
jaṁ ki pi vatthusāraṁ uvēi taṁ savvamēva sō kumarō । ujjhāyassa samappai ujjhāō kiṁpi jaṁ dēi ।। 5482 ।।
tassuvarōhaṁ kāuṁ taṁ pi hu sō ginhiūṇa niya hatthē । māhavamavaddhaṇapabhiiyāṇa viyarai vibhaṁjēuṁ ।। 5483 ।।
punasirī vihu jaṇaṇī niyadāsīṇaṁ samappiuṁ pāsē । kaiyā vi kiṁci kiṁci vi jaṁ pēsai kumārapāōggaṁ ।।5484 ।।
taṁ pihr̥ puvvattēṇaṁ vihiṇā savvaṁ pi nēi uvaōgaṁ । iya tattha tassa ciṭṭhatayassa kumarassa chammāsā ॥। 5485 ।।
samaikkaṁtā tattō ciṁtā narapuṁgavassa naravaiṇō । saṁjāyā jaha inhi kumaraṁ gaṁtūṇa pēcchāmō ॥5486 ॥
tō purisaṁ pēsē puraō jāṇāvara niyāgamaṇaṁ । ujjhāyassa sayaṁ ciya ucchā vaccai gihē tassa ।। 5487।।
kayasamuciya paḍivattī tattha nisīyai taō naravariṁdō । bhūmiliyajāṇukarayala sirēṇa paṇaō kumārēṇa ।। 5488।।
harisabharanibbharaṁgō samuṭṭhiō paṇamiūṇa jā kumarō । tāva nariṁdēṇa pasāriūṇa niyabāhuparihajuyaṁ । ।5489।।
āliṁgiō sunibiḍa hiyaēṇa samaṁtaō khaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ । ucchaṁgammi samārōviūṇa puṭṭhō sarīrasuhaṁ ।। 54900 ।।
tēṇa ya paṇaya sirēṇa jōḍiyahatthēṇa tō imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । tāya tuha pāyapaṁkayapasāyaō majjha nicca suhaṁ ।। 5491 । ।
tō viṇaya-vayaṇa- vinnāsa-raṁjiō taṁ nivō niyamakāō । ōyāriūṇa āisai āsaṇē uvavisa niyammi । 5492 ।
rāyāēsāṇaṁtaramēva taō āsaṇammi niyayammi । uvavisiūṇaṁ jōḍiyakarō ṭhiō sō nivābhimuhō ।। 5493 ।।
aha narapuṁgavarāyā jayasammaṁ pucchaē uvajjhāyaṁ । kiṁ kimahīyaṁ kumarēṇa saṁpayaṁ paḍhai ki ēsō ।। 5494 ।।
tō jayasammō sāhai sasaṁbhramō naravarassa jaha dēva | paḍhamaṁ kalā nīsēsā kayā kumārēṇa sāhīṇā ||। 5495 ।।
āīē lēhakalā pajjaṁtē sauṇaruyakalā hōi । jaṁ ēsa kamō kahiō kalāṇa bāvattarī ēvi ।।5496।।
tō vimhiṇa bhaṇiyaṁ naravaiṇā ujjamēṇa ēēṇa | sēsa kalāu paḍhissai kumarō kēvaiya kālē ।। 5497 ।।
jāvuttaraṁ karissai jayasammō tāva nammasacivēṇa । naravaṇō maṇabhāvaṁ vivarīyaṁ jāṇamāṇēṇa । । 5498 ।।
sahasacciya saṁlaviyaṁ ēvaṁ jaha dēva ! ēttiē kahiē । nāyaṁ maē sayaṁ ciya puraō jāvaiya kālē ।। 5499 ।।
savvāṇaṁ pi kalāṇaṁ bhavissaē pāragāmiō kumarō । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ sāhasu tēṇa palattaṁ taō ēvaṁ ।। 5500 ।।
chammāsēṇēgakalā dēva ! ahīyā jaō kumārēṇa । saṁvaccharēṇa paḍhihī dō caiva kalāu tō ēsa ।।5501 ।।
ēēṇa lēkkhaṇaṁ kalāṇa savvāṇa pāragō hōhī । chattīsahi vāsēhiṁ ēsa kumārō na saṁdēhō ||5502 ।।
tō rāyā kayabhiuḍī sammuhamullavai nammasacivassa । jaṁ kiṁ ci vi tāva taē palavaṁtēṇēva ṭhāyavvaṁ ।। 5503॥
aha niya vayaṇaduvārē dō vi karēṁ ṭhāviūṇa sō jhatti | jāṇuvari nāmiyamuha kaya mōṇō saṁṭhiō nihuō ।। 5504 ।।
tō jayasammō jaṁpai jēṇabhipāēṇa gaṇiyamēēṇa । tēṇa niyamēṇa jāyai tāva iyaṁ kālaparimāṇaṁ ।। 5504 ।।
narapuṁgavēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ muṇiyaṁ ēēṇa niyamaṇē ēvaṁ । jaṁ kira akkhamamāṇō bēṁtō ciṭṭhai imaṁ rāyā ॥5506 ।।
vimhaiē ṇa maē puṇa payaṁpiyaṁ ērisaṁ jaō majjha । māsēhiṁ dasahi ēsā paḍhamakalā avagayā sammaṁ ॥ 5507 ।।
māyā maha sālagaō kuṇaṁtaō ujjamaṁ sayaṁ pi ahaṁ । ujjhāō savisēsaṁ ucchāhaṁtō mamaṁ paḍhaṇē ।। 5508 ।।
।

ujjhāyassa vi ēsō abhipāō āsi niya maṇa taiyā । jai jaṇayassāṇāē vaccai narapuṁgavō kahavi ॥। 5509 ।।
turiyaṁ ciya piyavāsē ēttō agihīya savvakalapaḍalō । thēvēṇa vi tō ēsā mama kittī hōi annassa ||5510 ॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-172-to-172.json ==========================
172
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
sirivammakumārō vihu payacārēṇaṁ gihassa jā dāraṁ । aṇugaṁtūṇaṁ piyaraṁ tayaṇunnāō niyattēi ।। 5534 ||
guru āṇā parataṁtō havai nariṁdō vi gaṁtumavarōhaṁ । punnasirīdēvīē puraō sāhē jaha ajja ।। 5535 ।।
amhē kumārapāsē āsi gayā paḍhai sō payattēṇa । niccaṁ samāhiyamaṇō daḍhō ya bāḍhaṁ sarīrēṇa ।। 5536 ।।
tō dēvīē rāyā vinnattō dēva ! tumha āēsō । jai hōi ahaṁ pi taō gaṁtuṁ pēcchāmi sirivammaṁ ।। 5537 ।।
aha rannā sā bhaṇiyā dēvi ! kumārassa tāva cittammi । amhāṇaṁ tumhāṇa ya na vaṭṭaē daṁsaṇukkaṁṭhā ||5538।।
paḍhaṇāsattamaṇō sō mannai savvaṁ pi aṁtarāyaṁ va । saṁbhāsaṇamannēsi siṇēhajuttāṇa vi jāṇa ।। 5539।।
paḍibōhiūṇa ēvaṁ dēvi puhaīsarō sakajjēsu । jāō pasattacittō iya kālē kēttiē vi gaē । । 5540 ।।
vinnattō dēvī puṇō vi narapuṁgavō mahārāō । jaha kumaradaṁsaṇakaē araī bāḍhaṁ maha maṇammi ।। 5541 ।।
tō rannā punnasirīdēvī bhaṇiyā maē saha tumaṁ pi । kumarassa daṁsaṇatthaṁ pabhāyasamayammi gacchējjā ।। 5542 ।।
naravaiṇō taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ takkhaṇē vi sā dēvī । ānaṁdapūriyamaṇā jāyā sudaṁsaṇāsāē ।। 5543।।
bīya diṇē pēsēuṁ purisaṁ jāṇāvara niyāgamaṇaṁ । jayasammassa naridō sayaṁ pi vaccai tayaṇu tattha ।। 5544।।
punnasirī vihu dēvī rāyāsēṇa piṭṭaō ēi । jaṁpāṇa samārūḍhā bahudāsīvaggapariyariyā ||5545 ।।
jayasammagihammi taō viyaṇaṁ kāūṇa javaṇiyaṁ dāuṁ । majjhammi samōinnā aha sā jaṁpāṇa majjhāō ।। 5546 ।।
kayasamuciyapaḍivattī sōmasirīē taō nisannā sā । bāhimmi āyarakkhēhiṁ rakkhiē nayarasaṁcārē ।।5547।।
dēvīē pēsaviyā dāsī baccai kumārapāsammi । jayasammassa nivassa ya pāsē sō ciṭṭhai niviṭṭhī ।। 5548 ।।
bhaṇiō sō dāsī kumāra ! tuha daṁsaṇatthamihadēvī । ciṭṭhai ujjhāyagihammi āgayā ēhi taṁ tattha ।।5549 ।।
dōccaṁ taccaṁ pi imaṁ bhaṇiō vi na jāva jaṁpai kumārō । tīē tō vinnattō narapuṁgavamēiṇīnāhō ।। 5550॥
āisaha dēva ! kumaraṁ jaha dēvi paṇamaē imō gaṁtuṁ । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ muddhē ! na muṇasi kiṁ ēttiyaṁ pitumaṁ ।। 5551 ।।
jahāō pabhiī amhēhiṁ samappiō imō kumarō । ēyassa uvajjhāyassa tahiṇāō samārambha ।। 5552 ।।
kumarammi amha āṇā payaṭṭaē nē ya kā vi tō inhi । ujjhāyamaṇunnaviḍaṁ nēhi kumāraṁ jaṇaṇipāsē ।। 5553 ।।
tīē tahēva kāuṁ nīō jaṇaṇīē aṁtiē kumarō । kāūṇa paṇāmaṁ dūraō vi bhūmiliyajāṇusirō ।। 5554।।
uṭhatō dēvīē gāḍhaṁ āliṁgiō muyaṁ tīē । āṇaṁdajalaṁ naṇuppalēhi aṁkē taō ṭhaviō ।। 5555 ।।
paricuṁbiō ya sīsē bhaṇiō ya jahā kahaṁ tumaṁ putta ! ēga paē cciya jāō ai niṭṭuramāṇasō ēvaṁ ।। 55576 ।।
jaṁ amha daṁsaṇakahāmēttaṁ pitaē kayāvi nē ya kayaṁ । majjhammi ēttiyāṇaṁ samaikkatāṇa diyahaṇaṁ ।। 5557।।
amhē puṇa tuha daṁsaṇavirahānalaḍajjhamāṇahiyayāiṁ । ēkkaṁ pi khaṇaṁ na lahaṁtayāiṁ niyamāṇasammi raī ।। 5558 ।।
dēvīvayaṇēṇimiṇā bāhōlliyalōyaṇō khagaṁ hōuṁ । tunhikkō cēva ṭhiō kumarō ōṇayamuhō ki pi ।। 5559 ।।
dēvīē daṭṭhaṇaṁ kumāravayaṇaṁ jalōllanayaṇatō । niyauttarīyavatthaṁcalēṇa parimajjiuṁ saṇiyaṁ ।। 5560 ।।
avagūhiō kumārō hiyaēṇa samaṁ puṇō vi aigāḍhaṁ । bhaṇiyaṁ ca vaccha ! adhiiṁ mā kāhisi kaṁpi niyacittē । 5561 ।
inhi tuha muhakamalassa daṁsaṇē majjha hiyayamajjhāō । savvā vi gayā araī sittā amaēṇa va taṇū mē ।। 5562 ।।
tō nikkhaṇu sō hōuṁ pūrēhi maṇōrahē sajaṇayassa । ginhēūṇa kalāō nīsēsāō vi sigdhaṁ pi ।। 5563 ।।
iya jāva payaṁtī ciṭṭhai dēvī ! samaṁ kumārēṇa । tā jayasammassa suō samāgaō māhavō bāhi ।। 5564 ||
hakkāriūṇa bhaṇiyā tēṇa taō ēvamappaṇō jaṇaṇī । ammō tāēṇa ahaṁ paṭṭaviō kumarapāsamma ।। 5565 ।।
ēvaṁ mamāu ēsō bhaṇāviō jaha samāgaēṇa taē । saha ālāvaṁ kāuṁ iō gamissai gihaṁ nivaī ।।5566 ||

173
tā sigdhaṁ ci dēvi aṇunnavēūṇa āraō ēhi । ēvaṁ māhavavayaṇaṁ sōmasirīē taō gaṁtuṁ ।। 5567।।
kajjaliyāē kahiyaṁ dāsīē tīē akkhiyaṁ ēyaṁ । dēvīē tīē vi hu visajjiō jhatti tō kumarō ।। 5568 ।।
sō paṇamiūṇa jarṇāṇa jayasammasamīvamāgaō turiyaṁ । kumarassa aṇupaṇa vi dēvī saṁpēsiuṁ dāsi ।।5569।।
nivamaṇujāṇāvēuṁ tattō niyamaṁdirammi saṁpattā । ētthaṁrammi rannā kahaṁtaraṁ patthuyaṁ mōttuṁ । । 5570 ।।
jayasammō paripuṭṭhō kumarēṇaṁ kaikalāō paḍhiyāō । sō kahai suttaō atthaō ya savvāō gahiyāō ।। 5571 ।।
karaṇēṇaṁ puṇa thēvāu cēva gamiyāu paricayamimēṇa । jāsu na tahā kilēsō uppajjai kō vi kāyassa ।। 5572 ।।
jujjha nijujjhāi kalāu jāu bahukāyaparisamakarīō । tāsi abbhāsō karaṇaō u kāhī imō inhi ।। 5573 ।।
ginhēṁi pōḍhimaguṇaṁ jāva sarīraṁ imassa kumarassa । ēkkēṇa ahava da ēhi u gaēhi saṁvaccharēhiṁ imō || 5574 ।।
saṁjāissai jōggō jēṇa paviṭṭhassa lēhasālāē । jāyāī paṁcasaṁvaccharāī māsēṇa ahiyāī ॥ 5575 ।।
taha aṭṭhavarisajammō āsi tayā tō imēhiṁ miliēhiṁ । saṁvaccharāī tērasa havaṁti ēyassa inhi tu ॥ 576 ।।
annāī vi dōnni jayā gamihī saṁvaccharāī tō ēsō । pannarasavarisajammō savvāyāsakkhamō hōhī ।। 5577 ।।
ah narapuṁgavarāyā āha jahā vimalamai juyassā vi । iyarajaṇassāvēkkhāē tāva sirivammakumarēṇa ।। 5578 ।।
sigdhaṁ ciya gahiyāī kalāṇa savvāṇa cēva satthāī । kiṁ tu jaha lēhasatthaṁ chammāsēhiṁ vi gahiyamimiṇā । । 5579 ।।
tīē avēkkhāē sēsasatthagahaṇaṁ cirēṇa kālēṇa । kumarēṇa kayaṁ mama tāva ērisaṁ phurai cittammi ।। 5580 ।।
tumhāṇavi kiṁ ēvaṁ parihāsai ah mamēva ēgassa । iya jaṁpiyammi rannā jayasammō vayai tō ēvaṁ ।। 5581 ।।
ēyassa asattōē kālavilaṁba na kō vi saṁjāō । kāraviō ajjhayaṇaṁ savilaṁbamimō maē cēva ।। 5582 ।।
dēhassa akkhamattaṁ sigdhakalā gahaṇaō ya cakkhubhayaṁ । ēyassa saṁkiūṇaṁ kālavilaṁbō maē vihiō ।। 5583 ||
kumarassa daṁsaṇatthaṁ puvvi tubbhē ihāgayā jaiyā । taiyā u saddalakkhaṇamēvāsi pariphuḍamissa ।। 5584 ।।
tattha parikkhā ciṭṭhas puvvaṁ pi kayā imassa dēvēṇa । inhi tu kavvasatti parakaya kavvassa bōhaṁ ca ।। 5585 ।।
dēvō parikkhaō taō kīrai ēvaṁ ti jaṁpiuṁ rannā । bhaṇiyaṁ kumārahāraṁ kaṁṭhagayaṁ majjha vannēhi ।। 5586 ।।
chaṁdēṇaṇuṭṭhahēṇaṁ lahuṇa cciya tāva sakkayagirāē । āēsō tti bhaṇatō kumarō kavvaṁ bhaṇaṛa jhatti ।। 5587 ।।
hārōyaṁ jñāpayatyēvaṁ dēvatvadurasisthitaḥ । savr̥ttāḥ sadguṇāmuktā vasaṁti hr̥dayē tava ।। 5588।।
kasiṇa mī disasi daṁsēūṇaṁ nahammi naranāhō । bhaṇai puṇō vi kumāraṁ kiṁ ci vi garuēṇa chaṁdēṇa ।। 5589 ।।
bannēhi imaṁ pitaō kumarō pucchēi kāē bhāsāē । rāyā āisai jahā putrvāē cēva bhāsāē ।। 5590 ।।
chaṁdataraṁ niya maṇē citēūṇaṁ khaṇataō kumarō । sigdhaṁ pi bhai kavvaṁ ēgaggamaṇē nivāijaṇē ।। 5591 ।।
narēndraśubhra ēṇa yaśōbharēṇa jitadyutiḥ sannatilajjita: śaśī ।
na cēdidaṁ takathamujvalē'hani prakāśayatyēṣa na kāntimātmanaḥ ।। 5592।।
tō raṁjiēṇa rannā bhaṇiyaṁ amhēhi nō alaṁkārō । niddiṭṭhōṁ kō vi imassa paḍhamaabbhāsakārissa ।। 5593 ।।
taha visayaṁ kumarēṇaṁ sālaṁkārāī dōnni vi kayāī । kavvāī imāī jaō paḍhamē kavvē alaṁkārō ।।5594।।
bhaṇiyō silēsa nāmō duijjaē puṇaṇumāṇanāmō ya । tō aidukkaramēyaṁ kī tē sigghakavvammi ||5595 ।।
paḍhamaṁ ciya amhēhi atthaṁ ēyassa nisiṁtēhi । āsi imaṁ vinnāyaṁ jaṁ ēsō ciṁtiūṇa ciraṁ ।। 5596 ।।
chaṁdappūraṇamēttaṁ karissaē jēṇa dukkaraṁ tāva | chaṁdarahiyaṁ pi mōkkalasakkayakaraṇaṁ subahuyāṇa ।। 5597 ।।
kiṁ
puṇa chaṁda nibaddhaṁ tattha vi savaṇijja saddavinnāsō । tattha ciya alaṁkārō ēkkēkaṁ dukkaraṁ ēyaṁ ।। 5598 । ।

174
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
sēhiṁ viviusēhiṁ rannō pāsamma sanniviṭṭhēhi । ēvaṁ narivayaṇaṁ samatthiyaṁ tad vayaṁtēhi ।। 5599 ।।
tō jaṁpa jayasamma pāyayabhāsāē saṁpayaṁ kavyaṁ । kārēha dēva kumara sirivammaṁ āha tō rāyā ।।5600 ।।
hatthaṁgulīgayaṁ mē nīlamaṇi gaṇayamuddiyājaḍiyaṁ । gāhābaṁdha ciya vannēhi taō bhai kumarō ।।5601 ।।
nīlamaṇipāpaḍalaṁ nivaṁgulīyammi kaṇayaruiruiraṁ । ahiṇavaghaṇavaṁdaṁ pi va vijjulayā piṁgalaṁ sahai || 5602।।
sōūṇa imaṁ gāhaṁ narapuṁgava pathivō papē । uvamālaṁkārajyā kumarēṇa kayā imā gāhā ।। 5603।।
tō jaṁpai jayasammō niralaṁkāraṁ naridakumarassa । ēkkaṁ pi na saṁjāyai vayaṇaṁ tō saṁpayaṁ tubhē ।। 5604।।
apabhaṁsa - pisāyāṇaṁ bhāsāē kavvakaraṇamāisaha । tā viura paṁḍiēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kimimāhi bhāsāhi ||5605 ।।
nāmaṁ pi gijjhamāṇaṁ jāsi kannēsu jaṇai uvvēyaṁ । sōyārāṇaṁ dūrē tabbhāsā viraiyaṁ kavyaṁ 15606।।
ēkka cciya paḍhamaṁ sakkayassa vāṇī buhāṇa maṇaharaṇī । ujjhā uvarōhēṇaṁ imā vigāhā nitrēṇa suyā ।। 5607।।
āha puṇō jayasammō pāḍhijjau kō vi paṁḍiō kavvaṁ । ki pi auvvaṁ visamaṁ sakkayamahavā vi pāgayayaṁ । । 5608 |
vakkhāṇiūṇa atthaṁ tassa jahā jhatti sāhaē ku marō । bhūsannāē rannā tō paḍhaṇē pēriō viurō ।।5609 ।।
sō āha kumarakiṁci vi paḍhāmi panhōttaraṁ purō tujjha । sakkaya bhāsāē kayaṁ bēi kumārō paḍha jahicchaṁ ॥। 5610 ।।
atha viduraḥ paṭhati ---
kathaṁ saṁbōdhyatē pr̥thvī, kā priyā pr̥thivī bhujām । kaḥ śaktō pi kriyāmandaḥ kīdr̥śaḥ syātkr̥tī nr̥paḥ ||5611।।
tatō vimr̥śya kumāraḥ kathayati । kavilālasa:-
tō babaī viura vihō kumāra ēvaṁtaē parikṣāyaṁ । avi citiyaṁ pituriyaṁ inhi annaṁ nisāmēhi ।। 5612 ।।
sakkayabhāsāē cciya ahiṇavapanhōttaraṁ paḍhijjataṁ । aṭṭadalapaumabaṁdhēṇa uttaraṁ jassa dāyavvaṁ ।।5613 ।।
ityuktā punarayaṁ paṭhati-
kō bharttā mānuṣīṇāṁ haragalavasatiḥ kaśca kaḥ svarga sadmā |
śabdō vācyaḥ kimuccaḥ samarabhuvibhayaṁ kaḥ
sthāpyaḥ kō'dhijya cāpē jagadanabhimataḥ kaśca
pumānnō vidhattē ।
kō vā nr̥pēṇa ।
grāhyaḥ pāśvatprijānāṁ nigadapurajitē kastu kāmasya kētuḥ ।। 5614 । ।
ēyaṁ pi khaṇaṁ vīmaṁsiūṇa kumarēṇa māṇasē niyaē । kahiyaṁ jhaḍa tti viurassa aggaō uttaraṁ ēvaṁ ।। 5615 ।।
tadyathā - - nāgasutādhīśamakaraḥ ॥
viurēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ avagayamēyaṁ pijaṁ kumārēṇa । taṁ paṇhōttarapaḍhaṇē avagayamamhaṁ pi kōuyayaṁ ॥ 5716 ।।
tō bēi cauravibuhōna sakkayaṁ kēvalaṁ paḍhissāmō । panhōttaramamhē kiṁ tu mīsiyaṁ pāgayagirāē ।। 5617 ।।
ityuktvā paṭhatyasau । tadyathā--
saṁbōdhayanti vibudhāḥ pradhānakamalaṁ kathaṁ prakathayāśu । mayaṇakayajhāṇavigghō bhaṇa kō kira kērisō jāō ।। 5618 ।।
bhāsācittayamēyaṁ panhōttaramēttha uttaraṁ dēyaṁ । gayapaccāgayajuttīē kumara paricitiūṇa taē । । 5619।।
jō jīē bhāsāē panhō iha ciṭṭhaē kaō kumara । tīē cciya bhāsāē dēyaṁ tassuttaraṁ kamasō ॥। 5620 ।।

175
caurēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ ēyaṁ paricitiūṇa amhēhi । garuyapayattēṇa kayaṁ nāyaṁ kumarēṇa līlāē ।। 5621 ।।
ityuktvā punarayaṁ paṭhati
paulōmī paripr̥cchati paryantaṁ kaścakāra gōtrasya । maṁtrī pr̥cchati nr̥pati jagata: kō vallabhō dēva ।। 5622 ।।
idamapi jñātvā kathayati kumāraḥ । sacivāsavaḥ । idānīṁ citrāṅgadaḥ paṭhati ।
kā vallabhā sarvajagajjanānāṁ kē vā bhavēyurvvaṇijāmabhīṣṭāḥ ||
kō vāhanaṁ satvaragāmipuṁsāṁ kāṁ vañcakāścita gatāṁ vahanti ।। 5623 ।।
kiṁ śastra niṣpattiṣu vastu mukhyaṁ kō vā dhvaniḥ syātpratiṣēdha vācī ।
anhō niśāyāśca caturtha bhāgaḥ kimucyatē buddhimatābhivēhi || 5624 ||
kā prēyasī dānavasūdanasya sambōdhanīyaśca tathāyamēva । rasāpanōdaṁ pravidhāya dhīraividhīyatē kō viratau sphurantyāṁ
mānārthamākhyāti ca kō'vadhātuḥ saṁbōdhanaṁ kiṁ kusumāyudhasya ।
।।5625।।
sampūrṇa savrvvāvayavavaliṣṭaṁ karōtyaśaktaṁ puruṣaṁ javātkaḥ ।।5626 ।।
āviḥ kurvannapi snēhaṁ hitatvaṁ darśayannapi । viśraṁbhabhūmiḥ sudhiyāṁ kaḥ pumānnōpajāyatē ॥ 5627 ।।
paṁcasilōgēhi imaṁ paḍhiyaṁ panhōttaraṁ taō vayai । cittaṁgaō kumāraṁ ēvaṁ pi viyāṇiyaṁ tuma ।। 5628 ।।
i kaha vitaō puṇaravi paḍhāmi panhōttaraṁ na tē puraō। kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ jai kuṇasi tumaṁ pannamimaṁ । । 5629 ।।
tō haṁ jāṇatō vina kahissaṁ uttaraṁ purō tujjha । cittaṁgaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ imā pannā maē mukkā ।। 5630 ।।
kāūṇa gurupasāyaṁ amhuvari tumaṁ kumāra ēyassa । panhōttarassa uttaramaviyappaṁ cēva sāhēhi ।। 5631 ।।
līlāē paribhāvas jāva kumārō na tāva jāṇāi । tō niuṇayarō hōuṁ ēgaggamaṇō vi ciṁtēi ।। 5632 ।।
taha viha aviyāṇatō cittaṁgayapaṁḍiyassa pāsammi । pucchai tatāvali sō tō iyarō kahai ēyassa ।। 5633 ||
tā tā tataḥ ।।
sōūṇa tatāvaliyaṁ ēvaṁ iyarēhiṁ pāsavattīhi । vihēhi niyayiē savimhayaṁ citiyamiṇaṁ ti ।। 5634 ||
ciṭṭhēti subahuyāī panhāī uttaraṁ tu ailahuyaṁ । cauakkharēhi kahiyaṁ jāṇissai kahai maṁ kumarō || 5635 ।।
kumarēṇa tatāvaliyaṁ sammaṁ paribhāviūṇa niyahiyaē । khaṇamittēṇaṁ ciya jāṇiūṇa kahiyaṁ purō tassa ।। 5636।।
māyāmayaḥ ।।
sōūṇa uttaramiṇaṁ citaṁgayapaṁḍiō siraṁ dhuṇiuṁ । vihiyahiyaō kumaraṁ pasaṁsaē sāhu sāhu maī || 5637।।
tujjha kumāravibhinnaṁ jēṇa taē ērisaṁ pi duravagamaṁ । panhōttaraṁ taō tuha natthi duijjō jaē maimaṁ ।। 5638 । ।
annē bhāṁti viurappamuhā savvē vi paṁḍiyā tattō । tuṭṭhōsi tumaṁ ēkkō uttarasavaṇēṇa ēēṇa ।। 5639 ।।
jō jāṇatō ciṭṭhasi pubaṁ pi sayaṁ kayassa ēyassa । panhōttarassa aṭṭhē aviyāṇaṁtā puṇō amhē ।। 5640 ।।
kaha saṁtuṭṭā hōmō tā kumarō amha niya muhēṇēva । ēyassa kahau aṭhṭhē tūsāmō jēṇa amhē vi ।। 5641 ।।
kō sirivammata mārō hasiūṇaṁ bhaṇaḥ suṇaha bhō viusā । savisaggassa vi māyāmaya sahassēha vakkhāṇaṁ ।। 5642 ।।
paṁcasu vi silōgēsuṁ cōdasapanhāī ēttha ciṭṭhati । aṁtimapanhasuttaramēsō sō samaggō vi ।। 5643 ।।
sēsāṇaṁ puṇa tērasapanhāṇaṁ uttarāī khaṁḍēuṁ । caurō vārāu imaṁ sa tattō kahijjati ।। 5644 ।।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tatthēsa khaṁḍaṇavihī payāṇa savvāṇa saṁtiō tumha | sāhijjai aṇukamasō ēgaggamaṇā nisāmēha ||5645 ।।
paḍhamaṁ ci ya mā saddō āyā hō taō ya savisaggō । yasō savisaggō māyā saddō sa aṇusārō ||5646 ।।
aya saddō savisaggō mā saddō yā ma saha savisaggō । ī saddō ya a saddō taha kēvalaō visaggō ya ॥5647।।
mā saddō ē sō āmaya sō visaggasaṁjuttō । ēēsi savvēsi ēsā ṭhavaṇā muṇēyavvā ।। 5648।।
mā1 āyā2 maya: 3 māyāṁ4 aya: 5 mā6 yāma: 7 ī8 a9: । 10 mā 11 ē12 āmayaḥ । 13
suṇiuṁ vakkhāṇamiṇaṁ viurāīyā vi paṁḍiyā savvē । cittaṁgaō vva jāyā pasaṁsaṁgā kumarapannāē ॥। 5649 ।।
aha rannō dāsīē māhaviyāē payaṁpiyaṁ kumara । jattha ya nivaḍaṁti ghaṇā kuṇaṁti kiṁ cunniyā tattha ।। 5650।।
ēē ya mahāviusā cittaṁgayamāṇō paḍhati jahiṁ । kō paḍhiḍaṁ ahigārō itthamēttassa mama tattha ।। 5651 ।।
kiṁtu paraṁ niyapiyasahi gōṭṭīsu gayā ahaṁ pi japēmi । ēvaṁ jaha kira paḍhiyaṁ maē vi viusāṇa majjhami ।। 5652 ।।
rāyakumārassa purō ēvaṁ panhōttaraṁ taō majjha । kumaranisāmēhi khaṇaṁ mahāpasāyaṁ karēūṇa ।।5653 ।।
kumarēṇa aṇunnāyā paḍhai taō pāgayāē bhāsāē । māhaviyā niyahiyaē muvvahaṁtī garuyaharisaṁ ॥। 5654 ।।
saṁbōhijjai kuṁjarō kiha tahā cāmīyarē kiṁ kayā । sunnārēhi sirī lahaṁti maṇiṇō jaccā vi tēyasiṇō ।।
vāhiṁ bōha kō nisēṇajhuṇī sūrīhi akkhijjaē । dhāū kō ya gaī nivittikahaṇē saṁḍā tahā kērisā ।। 5655 ।।
nīīē savvakālaṁ vaṭṭaṁtā kērisā narā huṁti । viyaraṁti sūracaṁdā ujjōyaṁtā jayaṁ kaha vā ।। 5656।।
sirivammakumārēṇaṁ ēyaṁ pi vicitiūṇa khaṇamēgaṁ । kahiyaṁ māhaviyāē uttaramēyassa gayaṇatthā ।। 5657 ।।
aha sā uṭṭhēūṇaṁ vatyaṁcalamuvarimayassa lahaṁ । kumarassa bhāmiūṇaṁ puṇō niviṭṭhā niyaṭṭhāṇē ॥। 5658।।
tō narapuṁgavarāyā jayasammēṇaṁ samaṁ karēūṇa । kumarapaḍibaddhamēva ya kahaṁ khaṇaṁ uṭṭiuṁ tattō ।। 5659 ।।
puvvapaōgēṇēva ya nivamaṇugaṁtūṇa dāradēsāō । viṇiyatti kumārō pattō jayasammapāsamma || 5660।।
aha vaccharāṇa dōnhaṁ pajjaṁtē karaṇaō visēsāō । abbhasai kalāō āyarēṇa jā paṁcavarisāī ।। 5661।।
dasahi varisēhi ēvaṁ nīsēsāsu vi kalāsu nimmāō । kāyakaya bhāsēṇa vi jāō narapuṁgavaṁ garuhō ।।5662 ।।
tō caṁḍasammanāmaṁ jayasammō pēsiūṇa niyaputtaṁ । narapuṁgavassa rannō jāṇāvara ērisaṁ aṭṭha ।। 5663।।
taha pucchāva diyahaṁ puṇō vi kumarassa niya gihē gaṁtuṁ । gaṇayāō nāūṇaṁ sāhai rāyā vi taiyadiṇaṁ ।। 5664
sāhiyadiṇami tattō pavēsasamaōvavanniyavihīē । niggacchai nivakumarō jayasammōjjhāyagēhāō ।। 5665 ।।
navaraṁ ēsa visēsō jaṁ kumarō mattarivarakbaṁdhē । sayamēva samārūḍhō gahiūṇaṁ aṁkusaṁ hatthē । । 5666।।
jayasammō ujjhāō nivapēsiyavarakarēṇumārūḍhō । dāhiṇapāsammi ṭhiō samāgaō nivakumārassa । 5667।।
nivapēsiyahaya-gaya- sāhaṇēhiṁ parivēḍhiyā taō dō vi । kayamaṁgalōvayārē pavisaṁti naridadārammi ।।5668 ।।
ōyariyakarēṇūō jayasammō vihiya uciyapaḍivattī । nivapāsammi nisannō sirivammō uṇa gaiṁdāō ।। 5669।।
ōyariḍaṁ namai nivassa tēṇa āliṁgiūṇa sō gāḍhaṁ । sīsammi cuṁ biūṇa ya nivēsiō pāyavīḍhamma ।। 5670।।
puṭṭhō ya kāyakusala imō vi jōḍiyakarō namiyasīsō। vinnavai nivaṁ jaha dēva ! tumha pāyapasāēṇa ।।5671 ।।
tō jayasammēṇa samaṁ kumārakalagahaṇa saṁgayakahāō । kāūṇa pīidāṇaṁ tassa nariṁdē bahudinaṁ ।। 5672 ।।
jīē karēṇuyāē ārūḍhō āgaō niyagihāō । ujjhāō tassēvayasā vi viinnā pasāēṇa ।। 5673 ।।
aha taṁ visajjiūṇaṁ ujjhāyaṁ uṭṭhaō naravaridō । sirivammakumāraṁ paṭṭavēi jaṇaṇīē pāsamma ।। 5674।।

gaṁtūṇa tatthaē sō kayappaṇābhōvagr̥hiō tīē । paricuṁbiūṇa ya sirē nivēsiō āsaṇē uciē ।।5675 ।।
kāūṇa pīipuvvaṁ ālāvaṁ kaṁpi saha sajaṇaṇīē । tayaṇunnāō tattō namiu sēsā dēvīṇaṁ ।। 5676।।
ladvāsīsō tāsi pāsāō niggaō nivasamīvaṁ । pattō dinaṁ tēṇā vi tassa juvarāyadhavalaharaṁ ।। 5677॥
tattha kayamajjaṇavihī āgaṁtuṁ bālasēvayajaṇēhiṁ । paṇaō bahuēhiṁ taō kumarēṇa vi tēhi savvēhiṁ ।। 5678 ।।
saha ālāvō vihiō jahōciō tāṇa tōsa saṁjaṇaō । aha pattanivāsē visajjiūṇaṁ jaṇaṁ sēsaṁ ।।5679 ।।
niyapariyaṇapurisēhiṁ saṁjuttō kēttiēhiṁ vi taō sō । dēvālayamajjhaṭhiyassa pūyamāṇassa jiṇapaḍimaṁ ।। 5680 ।।
rannō pāsamma gaō bhattīē paṇamaē taō paḍimaṁ । thuṇaiya jaha sattīē nivō vipūyaṁ karēūṇa ।। 5681 ।।
dēvē vaṁdēūṇaṁ kumarēṇaṁ samaṁtaō viṇikkhimi । gaṁtuṁ bhōyaṇasālāē bhōyaṇaṁ kuṇai saha tēṇa ।। 5682 ।।
parivārēṇa ya sēsēṇa saṁjaō vihiya bhōyaṇō tattō । siliyāvasaraṁ kāuṁ visajjaē kumarapamuhajaṇaṁ ॥ 5683 ||
diṇasēsaṁ gamiūṇaṁ saṁjjhā samayammi dēi āēsaṁ । niya sēvayapurisāṇaṁ jahā pabhāyammi tubbhēhiṁ ।। 5684 ।।
kārēyavvā pūyā iha nayaragaēsu cēiyaharēsu । ēvaṁ kāūṇa taō āgaṁtuṁ majjha kahiyavvaṁ ॥ 5685 ।।
tēhi vi tahēva kāuṁ āgaṁtuṁ naravarassa vinnattaṁ । rāyā vi kumarasahiō pāsai pūyaṁ jiṇaharēsu ||5686 ।।
annamma sōhaṇādiṇē juvarāyapayammi ṭhāvaē kumaraṁ । aigaruyavibhūīē kamāgayaṁ dēva dēsa ca ।। 5687।।
dēsamma nirūvēuṁ kumarō maimaṁdiraṁ sacivaputtaṁ । ciṭṭhai tatthēva sayaṁ nivaī viṇaēṇa sēvatō ।। 5688 ।।
vaccai nicca pi jiṇidamaṁdirē pūyaē ya paḍimāō । vaṁdai bhattīē taō guruṇō ya samāgaē tattha ।। 5689 ।।
suṇai khaṇaṁ vakkhāṇaṁ jāō ēvaṁ kamēṇa aikusalō । jiṇavayaṇē sirivammō karēi kaiyā vi buhagōṭṭhi ।। 5690॥
vāha yā vi āsē karēi kīlaṁ kayā vi hatthīhiṁ । āruhai kayā vi rahaṁ dhāvai kaiyā vi pāēhi ।। 5691 ।।
kaiyā vikhaggakhēḍayahatthō kaiyā vi kaliyakōyaṁḍō । kuṇai kalāṇabbhāsaṁ kāsi pi kayā vi sō kumarō ।। 5692 ।।
niya pāsāyammi ṭhiō samaṁ vayaṁsēhi kuṇai kaiyā vi । parihāsasuṁdarakahaṁ iyaṁ vaccaṁtēsu diyahēsu ।। 5693 ।।
vammahakēlikulaharaṁ kamēṇa navajōvvaṇaṁ samaṇupattō । suvibhattasavvadēhaṁ vitthariyavilāsalāyannaṁ ।। 5694।।
jaha jaha sarīrasōhā pasarai taha taha guṇā vi savisēsaṁ । pasaraṁti tassa bhuvaṇē jāyā marisavvaaṇudiyahaṁ । । 5695 ।।
pasaratāṇaṁ tēsi ca dāumavayāsamahilasaṁtēhi । dujjaṇayaṇavayaṇēhiṁ saṁkuiyaṁ jhatti savvattha ।। 5696 ।।
tassa sasiṇō vva guṇakiraṇapasaraṇā sattu-mitta - nivanivahā । kamala - kumuyāyarā iva saṁkuiyā viyasiyā taha ya
jō kō vi sēvayajaṇō naridasāmaṁtamaṁḍaliyapamuhō । narapuṁgavassa rannō pavisai dārammi sō savvō ।।5698 ।।
sēsōya jaṇō na kayāi jāi jō rāyasannihāṇammi । sō vi viṇā vihu kajjēṇa tassa kumarassa pāsammi । । 5699 ।।
daṁsaṇaālāvatthī vaccai niccaṁ pi na ya cirāō vi । tattō niggaṁtuṁ kō vi vaṁchaē tayaṇunāō vi ।।5700 ।।
mahayā kicchēṇa gaō vi niyagihē kumaraguṇakahāniraō । ciṭṭhai ciraṁ pi kajjaṁtarēsu na payaṭṭaē kaha vi ॥ 5701 ।।
ujjāṇāisu vaccai jayā kayāi vi pahāṇaturayammi । ārūḍhō ahava mayaṁdhasiṁdhurakkhaṁdhadēsammi ।। 5702 ।।
taiyā nayarassa jaṇō itthī bālāiō samaggō vi । katthāgacchai kumarō aikaṁtō kēṇava pahēṇa || 5703 ||
iccāi vāharaṁtō dhāvai paṭṭhīē kō vi kō vi puṇō । niya maṁdiraggasiharē ārōhai kō vi pāyārē ।। 5704 ।।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tasya dāhiṇabhuya daṁḍasannihāṇammi jāva uvaviṭṭhō । nivamuhanividiṭṭhī ciṭṭhai sirivammavarakumarō ।। 5707 ।।
tāva paṇivāyapubvaṁ āgaṁtuṁ jhatti dāravālēṇa । vinnattō naranāhō jōḍiyaniyapāṇijuyalēṇa ||5708 ।।
jaha dēva! dāradēsē ciṭṭhati samāgayā narā dō vi । duvvaladēhāmaliṇiyadaṁḍīkhaṁḍēhi ṭhaiya-taṇū ।।5709।।
baddhavaṇapaṭṭyā bāhu jaṁghamūlēsu dēva ! pāyāṇaṁ । icchaṁti daṁsaṇaṁ tē tēsi kō dēva ! āēsī ।। 5710 ।।
tō jhatti pavēsēhi tti jaṁpiē naravarēṇa paḍihārō । tēsi pavēsaṇatthaṁ niyattiūṇaṁ vayaṛa dārē ।। 5711 ।।
rāyā vi kalusiyamaṇō citai jaha kēvi kiṁ imē varayā । kēhiṁ vi cōrēhi pahammi pamusiyā āyā ya tahā
garuō ēsa māō maṁḍalaārakkhi ēhitō vihiō । jaṁ ēvamuddavakāraō jaṇō viyarai jahicchaṁ ।। 513 ।।
aha tē vi parōpparamēvajujjhiyā kāraṇēṇa kēṇā vi । taha vi hu niōgiyāṇaṁ pamāyaparivilasiyaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 5714 ।।
kimēmēhiṁ viyappēhiṁ ahavā ēē sayaṁ muhēṇē va । inhiciya jahavattaṁ sarūvamamhaṁ kahissaṁti ।। 5715 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattā paḍihārapavēsiyā narā dō vi । puvvakahiyassa rūvā namiūṇa nivaṁ samuvavidvā ।। 5716 ।।
bhūsannāē puṭṭhā nivēṇa tē jōḍiūṇa karajuyalaṁ । annōnnaṁ vayaṇāī palōiūṇaṁ taō ēkkō ।। 5717।।
iyarēṇa aṇunnāō vinnavai nivaṁ ihatthi bharahammi । vāsavauraṁ ti nayaraṁ vāsavadattō tahi rāyā ॥। 5718।।
vāsavasirī ya bhajjā tassa nariṁdassa tāṇa saṁjāyā । nāmēṇa vasaṁtasirī dhūyā aisayapavararūvā ।।5719।।
jīsē pāsammi ṭhiyā mayaradvayasuṁdarī vidāsi vva । paḍihāsai sēsāṇaṁ nārīṇaṁ kahaṁ pi kō kuṇa ।। 5720।।
sā gahiya samuciyakalā kamēṇa aha jōvvaṇaṁ samaṇupattā । dēvāṇa viharai maṇaṁ maṇuyāṇa na kā vi puṇa gaṇaṇā । 5721 ।
samahigayasatthaparamatthasāhaṇē bhārai vva paccakkhā । juttijuyaṁ jaṁpatī sakkhaṁ mutti vva suraguruṇō ।। 5722।।
ujjāṇasaṁṭhiyā sā paḍimaṁ kāmassa pūyaē niccaṁ । aṭṭhāhiyaṁ ca kārai vasaṁtasamayammi pavarisaṁ ।। 5723 ||
ētō daṁtaurapurē asthi naridō mahābalō nāma । tassa ya sudaṁsaṇō nāma naṁdaṇō atthi guṇakaliō ।। 5724 ।।
tasya samīvasēvayanarēṇa ēkkēṇa kajjajōēṇa । tatyāgaēṇa diṭṭhā sā aṭṭāhiyasamayamajjhē ।। 5725 ।।
tēṇa kayasakajjēṇaṁ gaṁtūṇa taō purammi daṁdaurē । kahiyā kumarassa sudaṁsaṇassa puraō vasaṁtasirī ।। 5726 ।।
rūvāiguṇasamēyā taṁ sōūṇaṁ sudaṁsaṇō jāō । mayaṇasarapaharaviharō araisamuhamma nibuḍḍō || 5727।।
tassa vayaṁsēhiṁ imō aṭṭhō nāuṁ mahābalanivassa । kahiyō tēṇa vi dūyaṁ paṭṭaviḍaṁ vāsavauramma || 5728।।
vāsavadattō rāyā dhūyaṁ maggāviō vasaṁtasiriṁ । niyasuyasudaṁsaṇakaē tēṇa vi kayamuttaraṁ ēvaṁ ।। 5729 ।।
jaha phira sayaṁvarāmaṁḍavō maē ciṭṭhaē samāraddhō । dhūyāē vasaṁtasirī nāmāē vivāhakajjammi || 5730।।
tattha mahābalarāyā kumarō ya sudaṁsaṇō tahā annē । rāyāṇō rāyasuyā ya subahuṇō āgamissaṁti ।। 5731 ।।
jō kō face diṭṭhō paḍihāsissai niyassa cittassa । tassa khivissai ēsā varamālaṁ ka ṭhēdēsammi ।। 5732।।
vāsavadattassa imaṁ paḍivayaṇaṁ tēṇa dūyapurisēṇa । gaṁtr̥̄ṇa mahābalapatthivassa kahiyaṁ imēṇāvi ॥ 5733।।
jayāṇāviyaṁ sudaṁsaṇakumarassa imō vi tīē aṇurāyaṁ । niyahiyayāō na muyai bāhi jāṇāvaē na uṇō ।।5734।।
tōya. vasaṁtasirī jattā samayammi mayaṇapaḍimāē । dēsaṁtarāgayāṇaṁ baṁdijaṇāṇaṁ ca vaṇiyāṇaṁ ।। 5735 ।।
vayaṇēhiṁ kumarasirivammaguṇagaṇugabbhiṇēhiṁ daḍhaṁ । savanappattēhiṁ hayā mayaṇasarēhiṁ va hiyayammi ।। 5736।।

aha tīē vaṇasarī piyavayaṁsiyā niyamēvasavaṇammi । hōuṁ bhaṇiyā jaha jattakaraṇaō ajja mē bhayavaṁ ||37||
mayaraddhaō pasannō tīē bhaṇiyaṁ kahaṁ vasaṁtasirī । āha taō jai na kuṇasi rahassa bhēyaṁ imaṁ majjha ।।5738 ।।
tō sāhēma asēsaṁ tujjha purō niyamaṇōgayaṁ bhāvaṁ । tō vaṇasarī payaṁpai kumari kimēvaṁ samullavasi ।।5739 ।।
ki kaiyā vi maē tuha rahassaō purā vi atthi kaō । tō vayai vasaṁtasirī mā rūsasu piyasahi tumaṁ mē ।। 5740 ।
parihāsō ēsa kaō ēmēva maē taē saha vayaṁsi । hidumaṇāē jaṁ kira siddhaṁ vasamī hiyaṁ mannē ।। 5741 ।।
jēṇa iha savvakālaṁ kuō vidēsaṁtarāu kē vinarā ēṁti tahā vannaṁti ya niyaniya dēsāhivakumārē ।। 5742 ।।
majjha maṇaṁ na maṇagaṁpi hu aṇurāyaṁ tēsu baṁdhai kayā vi । caṁdaurisāmiṇō puṇa narapuṁgavamēiṇīvaiṇō ।।5743 ।।
taṇayassa nāmamēttē gahiē sirivammavarakumārassa । sahasa tti garuyapariō sapūriyaṁ mē maṇaṁ jāyaṁ ॥। 5744 ।।
ciṭṭhatu tāva dūrē saraī dukarujjalāguṇā tassa । tadaṁsaṇūsuyattaṁ jaṇēi tannāmamēttaṁ pi ।। 5745।।
tā ēsa pabhāvō vammahassa savvō vi bhagavaō tassa | saṁkamiūṇa maha maṇē jēṇa kaō ērisō bhāvō ।। 5746 ।।
aha vaṇasarī payaṁpai vasaṁtasiri pēsiūṇa niyapūrisaṁ । abhitarayaṁ kaṁci vi caṁdaurīē varapurīē ||5747 ||
rūvāiguṇā savvē vi tassa sirivammavarakumārassa । jāṇijjaṁtu taō puṇa aṇurāō tammi tuha juttō ।। 5748 ।।
tō vayai vasaṁtasirī piyasahi ! kō saṁsaō imō tujjha । jaṁ kira tassa guṇāṇaṁ īhēsi parikkhaṇaṁ kāuṁ ।।5749।।
vammahadēvēṇaṁ ciya tassa kayā ciṭṭhaē guṇaparikkhā । taṁ ahigicca kaō mē jēṇēvaṁ gāḍhamaṇurāō ||5750 ।।
tō bhai vaṇasarī jaha sāmiṇi kiṁ dūsaṇaṁ havai ēttha । jai niyapurisō ēgō pēsijjai tassa pāsamma ||
jō taṁ palōiūṇaṁ vīsaidiṇē puṇō vi iha ēi । tīē uvarōhēṇaṁ mannai ēyaṁ vasaṁtasirī ।।4752 ।।
abhitarayaṁ purisaṁ dina duijjaṁ nirūvaē tattō | caṁdaurī gamaṇatthaṁ tō jaṁpai vaṇasirī ēvaṁ ।।5753॥
ēkkō cittayarajuvā pēsijjau saha imēhiṁ tattha jahā । sirivammakumararūvaṁ sō lihiūṇaṁ ihāṇēi ।। 5754 । ।
ēyaṁ pi kayaṁtīē paṭṭhaviō sō vi tēhi saha tattha । tē tinni vigaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ caṁdaurīē taō tattō ।। 5755 ।।
viṇiyattā kayakajjā vīsaha divasēhiṁ vāsavaurammi । pattā puṇō vi miliyā vāsavadattassa dhūyāē ।।5756 ।।
tattha vasaṁtasirīē puraō phalayammi daṁsiyaṁ lihiyaṁ । sirivammakumarakhvaṁ cittayarasuēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ca ।। 5757 ।।
jaṁ tassa maē rūvaṁ diṭṭhataṁ savvamēvapaḍipunnaṁ । lihiuṁ na sakkiyaṁ kiṁtu kiṁ pi uddēsamittamiṇaṁ ।। 5758 ।।
lihiūṇa āṇiyaṁ iha iya sōūṇaṁ taō vasaṁtasirī । saṁjāyā kasaṇamuhī sā puṭṭhā vaṇasirīē taō ।।5759।।
harisadvāṇē vi tumaṁ sāmiṇi jāyāsi kīsa kasaṇamuhī । tō vayai vasaṁtasirī sahi ! tuha pacchā kahissāmi । 5760 ।
pucchāmi tāva saṁpaṛa ēvaṁ purisaṁ samāgayaṁ tattō । sēsaṁ sirivammakumārasaṁtiyaṁ varaguṇakalāvaṁ ॥ 5761।।
aha tīē pucchiō sō purisō sāhēi tassa kumarassa । sōhaggavayaṇavinnāsavāyapamuhō guṇasamūhō ।। 5762।।
lēsēṇa vi vannē sakkijjai nē ya tiyasaguruṇā vi । amhārisa ya maṇuō appamaī kē risō tattha ||5763।।
dāūṇa vasaṁtasirī pasāyamēē visajjaē tattō । cittaphalayaṁ samīcē appēuṁ vaṇasirīē taō ।।5764 ||
ēgaṁtē hōūṇaṁ niyamahakasaṇattakāraṇaṁ kahai । tīsē puraō piyasahi ēyaṁ pi hu cittaphalayammi ।। 5765 ।।
jaṁ atthilihiyarūvaṁ dīsaṁtaṁ taṁ pi vimhayaṁ jaṇai । jaṁ puṇa tassa sarīrē ciṭṭhai sāhāviyaṁ rūvaṁ ।।5766।।
taṁ kiṁ pi aṇannasamaṁ lakkhaguṇēṇaṁ pahāṇayaṁ hōhī । ēya mahaṁ citaṁtī bhīyā jāyā vivinnamuhī ।। 5767 ।।
kōjāi tassāhaṁ paḍihāsissāmi kinna diṭṭhā vi । aha vaṇasirī payaṁpai saccaṁ sāmiṇi taē bhaṇiyaṁ ।। 5768 ।।
kiṁtu paraṁ savvē ṇa ya vammahadēvō samīhiyavarassa । jai tuha dāyā hōhī tumaṁ pi ruccasi taō tassa । ।5769।।

।
sirivammakumāracariya
tā tujjha pattayālaṁ karaṇijjaṁ saṁpayaṁ kimēttha taō । jaṁpēi vasaṁtasirī sayaṁvarāhaṁ gamissāmi ।। 5770 ।।
tāyaṁ vinnaviūṇaṁ ṭhāṇaṭiyassēva tassa kumarassa । tō vaṇasirīē bhaṇiyaṁ jai tattha gayā tumaṁ kaha vi ।। 5771।।
tassa na ruccasi cittē bhavissaē tō aīva lahuyattaṁ । tō niyarūvaṁ lihiūṇa tassa pēsijjaē inhi ||5772।।
tō jai sō daṭṭhaṇaṁ tuha rūvaṁ hōi sāhilāsamaṇō | tō iha sayaṁ pi ēhī ahavā vaccasi jai tumaṁ pi ।। 5773 ।।
tattha tahā vihu laṭhṭhē tō ēvaṁ jaṁpaē vasaṁtasirī । ēvaṁ tayā hu kīrai hōi jayā saṁsaō majjha ।। 5774 ||
jāva puṇa niccha ō mē ēsō cciya iha bhavammi maha bhattā । tāvana kō vi viyappō kīraṁtō suṁdarī hōi ।। 5775 ।।
kiṁ ca sirivammakumarō garuō dakkhinnasaṁjūō dūraṁ । maṁ tattha sayaṁ pi gayaṁ nūṇaṁ ciya nō pariccaya ।। 5776 ।।
tā vaṇasiri gaṁtūṇa vaiyaramēyaṁ tumaṁ mamaṁbāē । vāsavasirīē puraō sāhēhi jahā imā tāyaṁ ।।5777।।
vinnaviūṇaṁ kārai saṁvāhaṁ maha sayaṁvarāgamaṇē । tīē taha caiva kayaṁ iyarāē vi sāhiyaṁ rannō ।। 5778 ।।
[[ hakkāriūṇa rannā dhūyā bhaṇiyā taō vasaṁtasirī । putti ! sayaṁvaramaṁḍavamihēva kārēmi tuha hēu ।। 5779 ।।
hakkārēmi samaggē naravaiṇō nivainaṁdaṇē taha ya । vasuhāvalayapasiddhē varēhi sēcchāē tēsu varaṁ ।। 5780 ।।
tō āha vasaṁtasirī tāya ! ajuttaṁ na tumha vayaṇamiṇaṁ । jai hōi majjha cittē varavisaē saṁsaō kōvi ।। 5781 ।।
kīrai ēvaṁ pitaō jāva puṇō vi gayasaṁsayaṁ cēva । majjha maṇō aṇurattaṁ kumarē sirivammanāmammi || 5782 ।
tāva kahaṁ kārijjaṁti sēsabhusāmiṇō kumārāya । maggāgamaṇaparissa mamaṇatthamatthakkhaō tumha ||5783।।
aha tīsē nibbaṁdhaṁ vāsavadattō nivō muṇēūṇa । saṁvāhiūṇa ēvaṁ kaivayakari turaya-rahasahiyaṁ ॥ 5784 ।।
bahupurisasahāyajuyaṁ bahuvatthāharaṇadaviṇasaṁjuttaṁ । caṁdaurī nayarīē āgamaṇatthaṁ visajjēi ।। 5785 ।।
sā jāva vasaṁtasirī ajja vi niyanayaraō na nīharai | sāmaggīē kayāē saṁcidui paguṇiyā jāyā ।। 5786 ।।
tāva imaṁ nāūṇaṁ sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ mahābalasuṇa । sikkhavaṇaṁ dāūṇaṁ tīsē pāsammi niyapurisā ।। 5787 ।।
abhitarayā dakkhā sujattijuyavayaṇakōsalasamēyā । paṭṭaviyā saṁpattā tē narē vāsavaurasmi || 5788 ।।
mayaṇapaḍimāgihē tēhiṁ kā vi puṭṭhā vasaṁtasiridāsī । jaha tumha sāmiṇīē vayaṁsiyā kā rahassa payaṁ ।। 5789 ।।
uvalābhiyāya tīē taṁbōlāīhiṁ pavaravatthūhiṁ । kahiyā dhaṇasiri nāmā puṇō vi sā patthiyā tēhi ।। 5790 ।।
amhuvarōhēṇa tumaṁ tīē saha daṁsaṇaṁ karāvēhi । paḍivajjiūṇa tīē karāviyaṁ jhatti taṁ tēsi ।। 5791।।
uvayariūṇaṁ taṁbōlamāiṇā tēhi sāhiyaṁ tīsē । jaha amhē paṭṭaviyā sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ nivasuē ।। 5792 ।।
tuha sāmiṇīē pāsē vinnattī tēṇa kāriyā tīsē । amha samīvāu imā jahā ahaṁ mayaṇacaraḍēṇa ।। 5793 ।।
dūraṁ dūmijjatō ciṭṭhāmi asaraṇō aṇāhō ya । tō kēraṁ kāūṇaṁ appaṇiyaṁ rakkha maṁ tattō ।। 5794 ।।
ginhēūṇa karaṁ maha tumaṁ sahatthēṇa appaṇī dāsaṁ । kāūṇa maṁ vi maṁcaha jēṇa suhī hōmi sayakālaṁ ॥ 5794।।
tō vaṇasirīē bhaṇiyaṁ tumhēhiṁ ihāgaēhiṁ vi kimēyaṁ । nō vinnāyaṁ jamimā kayasaṁvāhā vasaṁtasirī ।। 5796।।
caliyā caṁdaurīē sirivammakumārabaddha aṇurāyā । tēhi taō saṁlaviyaṁ amhēhi ya amha pahuṇāya ।। 5797।।
daṁtaurē vinnāyaṁ puṇō vi tō vaṇasirīē tē bhaṇiyā । jai nāyaṁ ciya ēyaṁ tō kaha tubbhē imaṁ vayaha ।। 5798 ।।
tēhi taō sā bhaṇiyā āēsagarēhiṁ sāmiṇō vayaṇaṁ । karaṇijjaṁ ciya bhaddē ! tattha viyārō na kāyavvō ।।5799 ।।
tā amhāṇaṁ uvari mahāpasāyaṁ tumaṁ karēūṇa । niyasāmiṇīē puraō kahēhi vinnattiyaṁ ēyaṁ ।।5800 ।।
tō vaṇasirīē ēvaṁ viyakkiyaṁ niyamaṇammi jaha ēyaṁ । sāhijjau tīē purō ubhayaṁ pi jahākayaṁ hōi ||4801 ||

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
181
ēkkaṁ mahāṇubhāvā ēē paḍivajjiyā maē hōṁti । annaṁ ca tīē cittaṁ jāṇijjau kērisaṁ hōī ||5802 ||
gāḍhāṇurāgamaiyaṁ patthaṇayaṁ ērisaṁ suṇēūṇa । kiṁ rajjai tīē maṇaṁ sudaṁsaṇē aha na thēvaṁ pi ॥। 5803।
iyacitiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tēsi sammuhamimaṁ varṇasirīē । tumhāṇuvarōhēṇaṁ kahēmi gaṁtūṇa kumarīē || 5804।
i bhaṇiūṇaṁ tī kahiyammi imammi rāyadhyāē । bhaṇiyaṁ tīē vaṇasiri maē suyaṁ tuha kahatīē ।। 5805 ।।
ērisamaṇivayaṇaṁ annō jai kahai tō ahaṁ kannē ! ṭhaviḍaṁ ciṭṭhāmi va uṭṭiuṁ va annatthavaccāmi ॥। 5801 ||
tō vaṇasarīē bhaṇiyaṁ sāmiṇi ! jāṇāmi ērisamahaṁ pi । jaṁ sirivammakumārē aṇurattamaṇāē tuha dhaṇiyaṁ ॥
annapurisassa gahiyaṁ nāmaṁ pi na kannasōkkhasaṁjaṇayaṁ । kiṁtu sudaṁsaṇapurisēhi majjha dinnā bahū savahā ||5808।।
tuha saṁtiyā maē tō tēsi savahāṇa bhaṁgabhīyāē । tuha kahiyamiṇaṁ annaha aṇabhimayaṁ tujjha kaha bēmi ।।5809 ।।
tā kāū pasāyaṁ kahi jaṁ kiṁpi uttaraṁ tēsi । dēmi taō bēi imā jaṁ kiṁci vi ruccaē tujjha ।। 5810 ।।
aha āgaṁtuṁ tīē tēsi purisāṇa sāhiyaṁ ēvaṁ । kahiyammi tumha vayaṇē maē purō rāyadhūyāē । । 5811 ।।
tī maha pāsāō bhaṇāviyā ērisaṁ taō tumbhē । jaha maha vayaṇaṁ gaṁtu sudaṁsaṇassēyamakkhēha ||5812 ।।
juttaṁ tāva imaṁ ciya abbhatyaṁtō tumaṁ sayaṁ cēva । jaṁ kirapaḍivajjijjasi aṇurāō jassa tuha ēsō ॥5813।।
sirivammō puṇa kumarō adiṭṭhapuvvō tahēva sō majjha । nāmaṁ pi nō viyāṇai sayaṁgayā tattha tassa ahaṁ ॥ 5814।।
kiṁ ruccissāmi na vā ēyaṁ pi na tāva jāṇaē kō vi । gahagahiyaṁ hōi jahā taha jāyaṁ taha vi mē hiyayaṁ । 5815 ।
sirivammamēva kumaraṁ ciṭṭhai jhāyaṁtamēyamaṇavarayaṁ । kayasāmaggī vi ahaṁ gaṁtumaṇā jai vi ciṭṭhāmi ।। 5816॥
taha vihu niyajaṇaṇīē tatthēva ya kaivayāī diyahāī । ciṭṭhāmi vilaṁba kāriyā taō tēttiya diṇāṇa ।।5817 ।।
majjhammi niyaṁ cittaṁ saṁbōhēuṁ niyattaissāmi । sirivammakumārāō tō tujjha kahāvaissāmi ।। 5818 ।।
ēyaṁ kumarīvayaṇaṁ tumhē gaṁtūna kahaha niya pahuṇō । tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ ihēva ya tēttiyadihāī ciṭṭhāmō ॥ 5819 ।।
tō vaṇasirīē bhaṇiyā tē ēvaṁ jaha ihaṭṭiyā tubbhē । kiṁ va karissaha kajjēṇa virahiyā ēttiyadiṇāṇi । । 5820 ।।
jai amha sāmiṇīē maṇaṁ bhavissai sudaṁsaṇassuvari । tō pēkkhissaha taṁ sigdhamāgayaṁ daṁtauranayarē ॥ 5821 ।।
aha annahā tayā puṇa caṁdaurīē purīē saṁpattaṁ । taṁ nisuṇissaha tatthēva saṁṭhiyā bahuyā bahuyalōyāō ।।5822
aha tēhi sudaṁsaṇapē siēhi purisiēhi vaṇasirī bhaṇiyā । saṁpajjissai jai maṇasamīhiyaṁ sāmiṇō amha । 5823|
tō niyamā adaliddaṁ tujjha kuḍuṁba pi kāraissāmō । hasiūṇa varṇasirīē taō ya tē ērisaṁ bhaṇiyā ॥ 5824 ।।
inhiciya adaliddaṁ amha samaggaṁ pi ciṭṭhai kuḍubaṁ । siddhē imammi kajjē hōjjaha adaliyā tumbhē ॥ 5825 ।।
iya vaṇasirīē bhaṇiyā tē vihu hasiūṇa niggayā tattō । mōttūṇa tattha purisaṁ sikkhaṁ dāūṇa kannammi ।।5827 ।
daṁtaurapurābhimuhaṁ sayaṁ tu vaccaṁti maṁdamaṁdagaī । patthuyakajjaasiddhivi ṇicchiūṇaṁ nirāṇaṁdā ।। 5827।।
ēttō ya vasaṁtasirī vāsavadattassa nivaiṇō dhūyā । taiyammi diṇē caliyā caṁdauri purīē maggammi ।। 52828 ।।
paṇihipurisēṇa gaṁtu paṭṭīē sudaṁsaṇassa purisāṇaṁ । pavisaṁtāṇaṁ daṁtaurapuravarē sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ ॥ 5829।।
tēhi tu kahiyamēyaṁ gaṁtūṇa sudaṁsaṇassa kumarassa । sōūṇa sō vi ēvaṁ cauraṁgabalēṇa viulēṇa || 5830 ।।
saṁvahiuṁ sigghaṁ ciya daṁtaurāō puriō nīhariō । vaṭṭābaṁdhassa kaē rāgaṁdhō dhāviō tīsē ।।5831 ।।
sā ya vasaṁtasirī puṇa piuṇō dēsa vi laṁghiuṁ savvaṁ । dēsatarammi pattā naravaṇō sūrapālassa ।।5832 ।।
ētyaṁtarēsu daṁsaṇakumarō vi vilaṁghiūṇa niyadēsaṁ । sīmāē saṁpattō ciṭṭhai gahiūṇa āvāsaṁ ॥ 5833||

=== vardhamanaoutput-182-to-182.json ==========================
182
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
sāya puṇa vasaṁtasirī gulakhēḍapurassa gāuyadugēṇa । vajjāuhadēvīē purassa pāyārabāhimmi । ।5834।।
gahiyā vāsā ciṭṭhai jāva taō tīē jaṇapavāyāō । jōyaṇadugaṁtarālē sudaṁsaṇō saṁṭhiō niō ।।5835 ।।
tō tīē bhīyāē vaḍḍhamagussēhi saha kaō maṁtō । puramajjhē pavisēuṁ āvāsa gihiūṇa ṭhiyā ।।5836।।
hēriyapurisā ya sudaṁsaṇassa kaḍayammi pēsiyā dōnni । nāūṇa tēhi suddhī kahiyā tīsē samāgaṁtu ॥5837।।
jaha kira sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ kumarēṇaṁ pēsiūṇa niyapurisē । gulakhēḍapuraniōī bhaṇāviō dūsalō ēvaṁ ।। 5838।।
nāmēṇa vasaṁtasirī niyadhyā majjha paḍhamaō dāuṁ । vāsavadattanivēṇaṁ pavināsāya puṇa inhi ।।5839 ।।
niyaicchāē caliyā sirivammakumārabaddha aṇurāyā | caṁdaurīē purīē sayaṁvaratēṇa saṁvahiuṁ || 5840 ।।
sā saṁpayaṁ paviṭṭhā ciṭṭhai dēsammi tumha dēvīē । vajjāunāmāē purassa bāhiṁ kayā vāsā ॥। 5841 ।।
ēyaṁ ṇa vi taō ahaṁ gahissāmi ēttha tumhahiṁ । amhuvari na rūsiyavvaṁ na ya tīsē kiṁ pisā hējjaṁ ।। 5842 ।।
kāyavvaṁ annaha puṇa siṇēha nāsō ta kaō hōhī । saha sūrapālarannā amhāṇaṁ nippalaṁ cēva ।। 5843।।
tō dūsalēṇa tēsi purisāṇaṁ uttaraṁ imaṁ dinaṁ । niya paṁcaulēṇa samaṁ ālōēūṇa tō tumha ।। 5844 ।।
paccuttaraṁ karissaṁ laggēyavvaṁ na tāva tumhēhiṁ । tīsē jāva na kahiyaṁ paḍivayaṇaṁ tumha amhēhi ।। 5845 ।।
ēttiyamēttaṁ nisuyaṁ amhēhi gaēhiṁ tassa kaḍayammi । jaṁ dāhī paḍivayaṇaṁ sō tassa tayaṁ na yāṇāmō || 5846 ।।
ēyaṁ sōūṇa taō vahumaṇussēhi saha puṇō ēsā । maṁtēi tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ vāsavadattassa naravaṇō ।।5847 ।।
ēyaṁ sōūṇa taō va maṇussēhi saha puṇō ēsā । maṁtēi tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ vāsavadattassa naravaiṇō ।। 5847 ।।
jāṇāvijjai ēyaṁ sigdhaṁ ciya pēsiūṇa niyapurisē । jaha sō saṁvāhaṁ pēsiūṇa taṁ nēi niyapāsē ।।5848 ।।
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ puṇaravi valiūṇa ahaṁ na jāmi piugēhē । jaiyā tajhyā vi maē gaṁtavvamiō purō cēva ।। 5849 ।।
vattāmēttaṁ pi niyaṁ ērisayaṁ tassa nō kahāvēmi । uttinnā jēṇa ahaṁ inhi jaṇayassa sattāē ।। 5850 ।।
mōyāviūṇa jamhā jaṇayāṇa samīvaō maē appā | āyattō sirivammassa kāriō nivakumārassa ।। 5851 ।।
tō vaḍumaṇussēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ jai ēsa nicchaō tujjha । dēvī taō gulakhēḍē nayarē dūsalasamīvammi ।।5852 ।।
pēsēuṁ niya purisaṁ sakāraṇaṁ appaṇō ihāgamaṇaṁ । sāhijjau tassa purō sudaṁsaṇassa ya taha sarūvaṁ ।। 5853 ।।
laddhammi taya tassuttarammi jaṁ kipi saṁgayaṁ hōhī । paribhāvēūṇa tayaṁ samayaṇurūvaṁ karissāma ।। 5854 ।।
iya maṁtiūṇa purisō paṭṭaviō tattha sō vi gaṁtūṇa । saṁdiṭṭha kahiūṇaṁ suṇiūṇaṁ uttaraṁ tassa ।। 5855 ।।
āgaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ sāhai vasaṁtasirināmiyāē kumarīē । puraō vahumaṇussāṇaṁ ca jahā dūsalēṇa imō ।। 5856 ।।
kumarō sudaṁsaṇō māṇusāu niyayāu bhāṇiō ēvaṁ । jaha na vasaṁtasirīē laggēyavvaṁ taē kahavi ।। 5857 ।।
jā sūrapālarannō āēsō nē ya āṇiō amha । ēvaṁ sōūṇa taō sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । 5848 ||
tumhāṇa vayaṇamēyaṁ ahaṁ karissāmi jai vasaṁtasirī । ēttō niggaṁtuṇaṁ annattha gamissaē nē ya
tō dūsalēṇa vi imaṁ paḍivannaṁ tassa jaṁpiyaṁ taha ya । tumhē vibhāṇiyāī mama pāsāō imaṁ vayaṇaṁ
jaha tumhēhiṁ na katthaigaṁtavvaṁ kēttiyāī vi diṇāī | annaha sudaṁsaṇō tumha laggihī niggamaṁtāṇa || 586 ।।
āyanniūṇa ēvaṁ vaḍḍamaṇussā tahā vasaṁtasirī । jāyāiṁ satthahiyayāī maṁtiyaṁ tēhi tō ēvaṁ ।। 5862 ।।
kālavilaṁba laddhō jā ciṭṭai kēttigō vi tāvaiō । pēsēuṁ niyapurisē narapuṁgavarāyapāsamma ।। 5863 ||
jāṇāvijjai ēvaṁ jaha sō pēsēi kaṁpi saṁvāhaṁ । amha iha saṁṭhiyāṇaṁ tō gammai tēṇa saha tattha ।।5864 ।।
caṁdaurīē nivvigdhamēva iya maṁtanicchyaṁ kāuṁ । amhēhiṁ samaṁ sāmalanāmō sikkhaṁ ca lēhaṁ ca ।। 5865 ।।

183
dāu mahāgamaṇaka āṇattō niggaō ya saṁvahiuṁ । dēvī purāu tattō jāva bahi tāva pēkkha ॥। 5866।।
takkhaṇamēva samāgamēkaṁ parivāraparigayaṁ purisaṁ । rukkhacchāyāē ṭhiyaṁ ārūḍhaṁ pavaraturayammi ।। 5867 ||
tō sāmalēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ amhāṇaṁ sammuhaṁ jahā ēsō । kō vi navallō dīsai ṭakkuraō āgaō ēttha ।।5868।।
tō pucchēuṁ najjai kō vi imō tayaṇu bhaṇiyama mhēhi । dūratarucchāyāē hōuṁ tubbhē paḍikkhēha || 5869 ।।
amhē gaṁtaṇa jahā pucchēūṇaṁ imaṁ viyāṇēmō । tō tēṇa kayammi tahā puṭṭhō amhēhiṁ sō gaṁtu ॥ 5870 ।।
pāiksma samīvē ēkkassa na jāva bēi sō kiṁpi । ṭhakkurasamīvapurisēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ tāva ēkkēṇa ।। 5871 ।।
māhavarāō ēsō kumarassa sudaṁsaṇassa kaḍayāō । vajjāuhadēvīē daṁsaṇahēu ihāyāō ।। 5872 ।।
amhē vitē puṭṭā tumbhē kē iha purammi vatthavvā । kēi vi kiṁvā annē anna tō āgayā ēttha ।। 5873।।
amhēhi ta bhaṇiyaṁ amhē annayaranayaravatthavvā । kajjēṇa ihāyāyā inhi puraō gamissāma ।। 5874 ।।
iya bhaṇiuṁ saṁcaliyā tattō ṭhāṇāō takkhaṇē cēva । amhē sāmalapāsammi āgayā tassa kahiūṇa ।।5875 ।।
māhavarāyasarūvaṁ saṁcaliyā āraō pahē laggā । āsammi vi laggō ēi sāmalō sēsayāu puṇō ।।5876 ।।
pāyacarāsattanarā amhēhi samaṁ tayāu diṇapaharō । ēkkō cciya kiṁ cūṇō pacchimaō ciṭṭhaē tattō ॥ 5877 ।।
jōyaṇatigamāgaṁtu gāmē ēgammi saṁjhasamayammi । phuriyatimirammi pattā jāva mhē tāva tinni jaṇā ॥। 5878 ।।
āuhasahiyā annē vi āgayā tattha dēsiyakuḍīē । amhēhi samaṁ vutthā rayaṇīē ēgaṭhāṇammi ।। 5879 ।।
saṁjāyammi pāē puṇō vi aṭṭha visamuṭṭiuṁ amhē । laggā maggē ēmō jāva taō tē vi tinni jaṇā ।। 5880 ।।
uṭṭhēuṁ paṭṭhīē laggā amhāṇa ēṁti thēvēṇa । amilatā tō ēkkō amha narō maṁdamaṁdagaī ।। 5881 ॥
ētō pacchā paḍiō ēsa taō tēhiṁ kāriūṇa kahaṁ । puṭṭhō gamaṇapaōyaṇamakkhēi jahaṭṭiyaṁ tēsiṁ । ।। 5882 ।।
pacchā āgaṁtūgaṁ miliō amhāṇa ēsa amhēhiṁ । chajjōyaṇāī āgaṁtumēgagāmammi tō bhuttaṁ ।। 5883 ||
tē puṇa tinni vipurisā kahiṁ pi pagayā taō khaṇaṁ amhē । vīsamiūṇaṁ tattō kiṁcūṇē taiyajāmammi || 5884 | |
caliyā āgacchāmō tāva puṇō tēsi tinha purisāṇaṁ । majjhāō dōnni jaṇā purō ṭhiyā pēkkhiyā jaṁtā ।। 5885 ।
tē pacchāiyavayaṇā pacchāhuttaṁ khaṇē khaṇē diṭṭhi । ditā vayaṁti puraō tō tē amhēccaya narēṇa ।। 5886 ।।
sannāyā jaha ēē pabhāyapurisāṇa tinha majjhāō | dō vi jaṇā jēhiṁ kayā maē samaṁ subahuvattāō ||5887 ।।
kēṇa vikajjēṇa paraṁ ṭhayaṁti ēē niyāī vayaṇāī | saṁkiyamaṇa vva tamhā na sōhaṇā nicchiyaṁ ēē ॥। 5888 ।।
ēvaṁ jaṁpaṁtāṇaṁ amha uvēṁtāṇa saṁkiyamaṇāṇa । puṇaravi agōyarattaṁ tē pattā amha diṭṭhīē ॥ 5889 ॥
ētthaṁtarammi pattō sahassakiraṇō vi atyagirisiharaṁ । lōō vi saṁcaraṁtō na dīsaē tārisōṁ kō vi ।। 5890 ।।
tō dōnajaṇā diṭṭhā puraō ēṁtā samasuyagaīē । tē puṭṭhā amhēhiṁ kēttiyadūrē purō gāmō || 5891 ॥ _
tēhi taō saṁlaviyaṁ dōnhaṁ gāmāṇa majjhabhāyammi । pattā ciṭṭhaha tubbhē gavvayadugaṁ havai ēttō ।। 5892 ।।
aggimagāmō taha pacchimō ya dīsaṁti jē purō rukkhā । allā vi bharāḍīē dēvaulaṁ ciṭṭhaē tēsu ||5893 ।।
ētō paraō ēgammi gāuē ciṭṭhaē purōgāmī । iyatavbhaṇiyaṁ sōuṁ sigghayaraṁ āraō caliyā ।। 5894 । ।
amhē pattā ya lahaṁ jāē tamasammi tammi vaē saṁḍē । jatthacchai dēvīē bhavaṇaṁ allā vi nāmāē । । 5894 ।।
sāhāviyaṁ ca timiraṁ ēkkaṁ annaṁ ca aighaṇā taruṇō । niya hatthō vi na sujjhai tattha taō tammi samayammi । 5896 ।
ubhaō pakkhāu narā bahavē haṇa haṇa haṇatti pabhaṇaṁtā । sara- varisaṁ muṁcaṁtā samuṭṭhiyā duṭṭapariṇāmā ।। 5897 ।।
tammi tamasaṁdhayārē ahiṇavaghaṇamaṁḍalassa sāricchē। vijjulaya vva jhalakkaṁti ujjalā tāṇa karavālā ॥। 5895 ।।

mōttūṇa tō turaṁgaṁ hakkaṁtō sāmalō vi khaggakarō । tēhi saha appachaṭṭhō abbhiṭṭō jujjhiuṁ bāḍhaṁ ।।5899।।
tinni jaṇā tēsi pi hu viṇāsiyā tēṇa ghāiyā bahavē । pacchā sayaṁ pi pattō sapariyaṇō sāmalō niṇaṁ ।। 5900 ।।
amhē puṇa tammi khaṇē jalapāṇanimitta māsidūragayā । kūvassa sannihāṇē ṭhiyā taō kalayalaṁ sōuṁ ॥ 5901॥
jā vaccāmō puraō pēcchāmō tāva sāmalaṁ tēhi । parivēḍhiyaṁ samaṁtā jujjhataṁ taha ya hammaṁtaṁ । 5902।।
amhēhiṁ citiyaṁtō puraō jujjhati sāmalāīyā | paḍiruddhā niggaṁtu alahaṁtā maraṇakayamaṇō ॥ 5903।।
amhēhi tāva ēē tīraṁti na rakkhiuṁ imēhiṁtō । jujjhatēhi vitō kiṁ jamassa vasaha muhā jāmō ।। 5904।।
tamhā rakkhēūṇaṁ appāṇaṁ āvaīē ēyāē । niyasāmiṇīē kajjaṁ sāhēmō aggaō gaṁtu ।। 5905 ।।
iya citiūṇa amhē pacchāhuttaṁ ca ōsarēmāṇā । diṭṭhā tēhi taō tē pahāviyā kēttiyā vi jaṇā ।। 5906 ।।
mukkāō bhallīō palāyamāṇāṇa tēhiṁ amhāṇa | jaṁdhāsu ya bāhāsu ya laggā hi tāhiṁ vihuraṁgā ॥। 5907।।
gaḍḍāē pavisēuṁ ṭhiyā nilukkā taō tamaṁdhammi । amhē apāsamāṇā viṇiyattēuṁ gayā tē vi ।। 5908 ।।
pacchā amhēhi imē ēvaṁ āyanniyā payaṁpaṁtā । annōnnaṁ jaha bhō bhō lēhaṁ ginhaha gavēsēuṁ ॥ 5909।।
ēsi ciya majjhāō kahiyaṁ ēkkēṇa vijjaē amha । jaha āsavārapāsē ciṭṭhai vinnattiyā hō ।। 5910 ।।
ēēṇaṁ lēhēṇaṁ nēūṇaṁ daṁsiēṇa tō sāmī । mantrites amhāṇaṁ laṭṭhē kāūṇa niyacittē ।।5911॥
ēttiyamēttaṁ nisuyaṁ amhēhi phuḍaṁ payaṁpiyaṁ tēsiṁ । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ tu vēyaṇavihurēhiṁ na yāṇiyaṁ kiṁ pi ।। 5992 ।।
ēgamuhuttaṁtē puṇa saṁpāviyacēyaṇēhiṁ amhēhiṁ । jāva viinnō kannō nisuṇēmō tāva nō kipi ।। 5913 ।।
tēsi parapurisāṇaṁ samarasamāraṁbhamāyaraṁtāṇa | hakkāīyaṁ nēva ya satthāvatthāṇa ālāvaṁ । । 5914।।
nāūṇa nijjhatō saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ taō vi ṇīriḍaṁ । jāvāgayā paēsē jujjhassa na tāva pēkkhāmō ।। 5915।।
ēkkaṁpi tattha purisaṁ jō jaṁpara kō vi saṁcalai ahavā । tē cciya ciṭṭhēti paraṁ jē nihyā mahiyalē paḍiyā ||
tō gaṁtaṇaṁ amhē dēvīē maṁdirassa majjhami । allāvi nāmiyāē jāva niēmō sayaṇaṭhāṇaṁ ।। 5917।।
pāēsu tāva laggō pāṇiyabhariō ghaḍō ya karagō ya । tassalilēṇaṁ ghāē dhōūṇaṁ phāliūṇa tahā ।। 5918 ।।
niyamuttarīyakhaṁḍaṁ vaṇēsu tō paṭṭyā daḍhaṁ baddhā । tisiēhi tahā pīyaṁ pāṇīyaṁ siciyaṁ dēhaṁ

annē
185
sō caṁdaurapurīē āgāmī bhāḍaēṇa tō tassa । vasahēsu samārūḍhā dasamadi ēttha saṁpattā ।। 5931 ।।
bhōbhāmaṭṭē amhēhi tassa niyayavatthāī | dinnāī caliṭṭhāī gahiyāī imāī jinnāī ।। 5932।।
dēva ! vasaṁtasirīē vāsavadattassa mēīṇīvaiṇō । dhūyāē tumha pāyāṇa kāriyā ēsa vinnattī ।।5933।।
vittā amhēhi saṁpai dēvō pamāṇamiha aṭṭē । jai na karissaha tubbhē sigdhaṁ ciya tappaḍīyāraṁ ।। 5934 ।।
tō nisuṇissaha turiyaṁ tīsē paralōyamaggapattāē । vattaṁ nīsaṁdēhaṁ jaṁ juttaṁ kuṇaha taṁ inhi ॥। 5935।।
jaṁ sāmalassa maraṇaṁ jāyaṁ maggammi nūṇa taṁ tēṇa । māhavarāēṇaṁ ciya kāraviyaṁ iya vikkēmō ।। 5936।।
narapuṁgavēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁciya ēyamiha na saṁdēhō । tumhē puramajjhāō nītā pēkkhiyā tēga ।। 5937।।
tumhēhi taō gaṁtu puvvaṁ tassēva pucchiyaṁ nāmaṁ । appāṇaṁ tu na kahiyaṁ ēmēva ya nigmayā tubhē ।। 5938।।
tassa sa parivārassa vi tō jāyā tumha saṁtiyā saṁkā । paṭṭiē tinni jaṇā paṭṭaviyā hē । tattō ।। 5939 ।।
puṇa bahujaṇā pacchannā tēṇa pēsiyā kahavi । tō tēhi tihiṁ jaṇēhiṁ tumhēccaya / pāsāō || 5940 ॥
nāūṇa mūlasuddhi jaha ēē vāharaṁ caḍāvēuṁ । vaccati gahiyalēhā narapuṁgava (pāsamma ।।5941।।
tumhēccaēṇa kēi purisēṇa na nāyamērisaṁ jamimē । duṭṭahiyaya tti ki puṇa pahiyā kēcitti vināyaṁ ॥। 5942।।
tavvēlaṁ ciya ēē tumha na laggā imēṇa kajjēṇa । diyahō vaha ya maggō āsannaṁ taha ya gulakhēḍaṁ ।।5943।।
ēēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ dūrē gaṁtūṇa rukkhagahaṇammi । rattīē aṁdhayārē laggā tumhāṇa viyaṇammi ।। 5944 । ।
tō jārisaṁ ciya imaṁ tumhēhi viyakkiyaṁ tahēva tayaṁ । dūēhi tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi tti ।। 5945 ।।
jaṁ puṇa amhē chuṭṭā taṁ kēvalamēva dēva! tēēṇa । taha ya vasaṁtasirīē mahayā punnappagarisēṇa ।। 5946 ।।
tāṇa kahaṁtāṇa imaṁ rāyasahāsanniviṭṭhalōyassa । savvassa vi saṁjāō aigaruō vimhaō hiyaē ।। 5947 ।।
sirivammakumārōvari tīsē pēmmaṁ maṇē vi bhāvaṁtō । jāṇai rāyajaṇō jai saṁvāhē gammaē tīsē ।।5948।।
kiṁtu paraṁ narapuṁgavanaravaiṇō muhaviṇiggayaṁ vayaṇaṁ । paḍivālitō ciṭṭhai na kiṁpi jaṁpēi nivabhaō ।। 5949।।
vinnaviūṇaṁ dōsu vi tēsu ṭhiēsu nivō paḍihāraṁ । āisai jahā ēē kārēu majjaṇaṁ tattō ।। 5950 ।।
parihāvēḍaṁ suṁdaravatthāī bhōyaṇaṁ ca kārēuṁ । āvāsē vīsāmaha hakkārissāmi tō pacchā ।।5951।।
tēvi hu dūyā bhaṇiyā narapuṁgavapatthivēṇa jaha tumbhē । uṭṭhēha tāva inhi savvaṁ laṭṭha karissāmi ।। 5952 ।।
iya āiṭṭhā rannā uṭṭhēuṁ paṇamiūṇa rāyāṇaṁ । tē dō vi hu nōhariyā yā tattō samaṁtēhi ॥5953 ।।
niyapurisō paḍihārēṇa pēsiō rāyadinnamāēsaṁ । tēsi saṁpāḍēuṁ tō rāyā saṁdhi - viggahiyaṁ ।। 5954 ।।
pucchēi bhaṭṭaputtō kōvi hu tuha saṁtiō samāyāō । dēsāu sūrapālassa jāṇaē jō imaṁ suddhi ।। 5955 ।।
tēṇa taō vinnattaṁ sapaṇāmaṁ jōḍiūṇa pāṇijuyaṁ । dēva ! samaō iyāṇi ciṭṭhai kassa vi ya āgamaṇē ।। 5956।।
aha rannā paḍibhaṇiyaṁ saṁdhīraṇa saṁdhi-viggahaniuttē । ēēhi vinnattaṁ parihāsai kērisaṁ tumha ।।5957 ।।
saccaṁ uyāhu mōsaṁtō jaṁpai saṁdhiviggahī ēvaṁ । paḍihāi dēva! saccaṁ va savvamēēhi vinnattaṁ ॥। 5958।।
jamhā sujatti juttaṁ ēyaṁ savvaṁpi na uṇa aghaḍataṁ । iha akkharaṁ pi ēkkaṁ saṁbhāvijjai niyamaṇammi ।। 5959 ।।
tō rannānikkhi viyādiṭṭhī annēsu maṁti pamuhēsu । aha tē vi jōḍiyakarā sappaṇivāyā vayaṁtēvaṁ ।। 5960॥
jaṁ caiva dēva ! saṁdhīraṇēṇa dēvassa pāyaparamāṇaṁ । vinnattaṁ amhāṇa vi taṁ cēva maṇammi vipphurai ।।5961 ।।
tō patthavēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ amhāṇa vi ēsa cēva abhipāō । jō tumhēhiṁ pavr̥ttō jāva imaṁ jaṁpaē rāyā ॥5962 ।।
tāva puṇō paḍihārō vinnavai narēsaraṁ kayapaṇāmō । vāmaṇasāmipahāṇēṇa saha gayā āsi jē purisā ।। 5963 ।।

186
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tēsi majjhāō dōnni āgayā saṁti dāradēsammi । kō āēsō tēsi vayai nivō lahu pavēsēhi ||5964।।
rāyāēsāṇaṁtaramēva taō tē pavēsiyā tēṇa । namiūṇa nivaṁ uciyāsaṇēsu taha sanniviṭṭhāya ।। 5965 ।।
ukkhivi bhūvibhāṇa pucchiyā tē nivēṇa jaṁpaṁti । dēvāsēṇa iō vāmaṇasāmī ya amhē ya ।। 5966॥
nivasūrapālapāsē gayā purō tassa kahiyamamhahiṁ । dēvāiṭṭhē kajjaṁ tēṇa vi sammāṇiyā amhē ।। 5967।।
tatthaṭhiyā bahudihē annammi dinē ihā gamaṇahēuṁ । aṇujāṇāvaṇakajjēṇa appaṇō tassa, naravaṇō ।। 5968।।
pāsamma gayā amhē atthāṇagayassa uciyapaḍivatti । kāūṇaṁ uvaviṭṭhā khaṇaṁ ca saṁbhāriyā rannā ।।5969 ।।
tō dūsalassa purisā niōiṇō sūrapālarāyassa । saṁpattā paḍihārēṇa sūiyā takkhaṇē tattha ।। 5970 ।।
kāūṇa paṇāmaṁ naravaissa pāyāṇa aggaō tēhi । mukkā dūsalapēsiyavinnattī bhujjaparilihiyā ॥। 5971 ।।
rāyāsēṇa ya lēhaṇa gahiūṇa vāiyā ēsā । tattha ya lihiō aṭṭhō nisuō amhēhi ērisaō ।।5972 ।।
nāmēṇa vasaṁtasirī vāsavadattassa nivaiṇō dhūyā । narapuṁgavanivanaṁdaṇasirivammakumāramaṇurattā ।। 5973।।
caliyā sayaṁvarā sā samāgayā tumha dēsamajjhammi । vajjāuhadēvīē purammi āvāsiyā asthi ।। 5974 ।।
tīsē ya gahaṇahēuṁ haḍhēṇa puttō mahābalanivassa । cauraṁgaviulasēntrēṇa saṁjaō tumha sassa ।। 5975 ।।
sīmāē saṁpattō nāmēṇa sudaṁsaṇō kayāvāsō । tassa vasaṁtasirīē jōyaṇadugamaṁtaraṁ asthi ।। 5976 ।।
sōya maē paḍisiddhō sudaṁsaṇō ciṭṭhaē diṇē kai vi । iha atthē āēsō sigdhaṁ dēvēṇa dāyavvō ।। 5977 ।।
vinnattīē aṭṭha ēvaṁ suṇiūṇa jāva sō rāyā । paccattaraṁ karissai tāva puṇō dāravālēṇa । । 5978 ।।
āgaṁtu vinnattō kāū matthayammi nihatthē । jaha dēva! sudaṁsaṇakumarasaṁtiō dārasamma ।। 5979 ।।
pattō ciṭṭha dūō icchai dēvassa pēcchiuṁ pāē । tō jhati pavēsēhi tti jaṁpiē sūrapālēṇa ॥। 5980 ।।
parihārēṇa aṇumaō pavisēuṁ sō vi paṇamiuṁ nivaī । vinnattīē lēhaṁ muca puraō nivapayāṇaṁ ।। 5981 ।।
taha caiva vāiyammi tammi vi lēhē samāgaō lihiō । ēsō aṭṭhō jaṁ kira vāsavadattēṇa naravaḍaṇā ।। 5982 ।।
parivannā niyadhyā dāyavvā amha jā vasaṁtasirī । nāmēṇa sā sayaṁ puṇa narapuṁ gavarāyaputtammi ।। 5983 ।।
aṇuratā sirivammē kumarammi taō sayaṁvarā caliyā । piuṇō asammaēṇaṁ saṁpattā tumha dēsamma ।। 5984 ।।
vajjāu dēvīē purammi āvāsiyā imā asthi । ēyamahaṁ ginhissaṁ tumhēhi na rūsiyavvaṁ mē ।। 5985 ।।
tumhē maha niyapiṇō mahābalāō vi pūyaṇijjayarā । tēṇāhaṁ tumha purō kahaṁ kahāvēmi ērisayaṁ ॥ 5986 ।।
as go annassa nivassa maṁḍalē hōi kahamavi paviṭṭhā। ēsā tayā na kassa vi ērisayamahaṁ kahāvēmi ।। 5987 ।।
gahiyā hōi maē lahu akahiyavattēṇa ēttiyadiṇēhi । ēsā vasaṁtasiriyā tā ēvaṁ citiuṁ tubbhē ।। 5988 ।।
kāūṇa majjha uvari garuyapasāyaṁ niyassa taṇayassa । pēsaha āēsaṁ dūsalassa jaha sō maē saddhi ।।5989।।
tumhāṇa virōhaṁ nē ya āṇaē jāyaē ya majjhatthō । sōūṇa ēyamaṭṭha aha jaṁpa sūrapālaniva ।। 5990 ।।
juttaṁ vinnattaṁ savvamēva ēyaṁ sudaṁsaṇēṇamha । kiṁtu visaṁvāō kēttiō vi iha asthi hammi ।। 5991 ॥
ēyaṁ sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ kahāviyaṁ āsi amha parivannā । vāsavadattēṇa imā niya dhūyā mē vasaṁtasirī ।। 5992 ।।
dūsalalēhammi puṇō ēvaṁ na samāgayaṁ taō ēyaṁ । paribhāviūṇa sammaṁ viyarissaṁ uttaraṁ tumha ।। 5993 ।।
saṁpai puṇa āvāsē vaccaha tumbhē taō samuṭṭēuṁ । ēē gayā niuttō nivēṇa purisō samaṁtēhi ।। 5994 ।।
jō āvāsapayāṇā igōravaṁ kāravēi savvaṁ pi । tēsi tō ēkkēṇa sahāniviṭṭhēṇa purisēṇaṁ ।। 5995 ।।
vinnattō naranāhō dēva ! imaṁ kiṁpi suvvai auvvaṁ । jaṁ kira sudaṁsaṇō vihu saviṣayamēvaṁ payaṁpēi ।। 5996 ।।

aha ratnā paḍibhaṇiyaṁ ciṭṭhēti imammi jaṁpiyavvammi । tassa agāī kāraṇāī annaha puṇō ēvaṁ ।।5997।।
niggacchaṁti na vayaṇāī tassa vayaṇāraviṁda kuharāō । jaṁ ciya tubbhē jāṇaha tassa sakhvaṁ tayaṁ cēva ।। 5998 ।।
sayamavi bahuē balēṇa saṁjuyā ciṭṭhaē vasaṁtasirī । ēkkaṁ kāraṇamēyaṁ bōyaṁ pāyāramajjha gayā । । 5999 ।।
taiyaṁ tu kāraṇamiṇaṁ gāuyadugaaṁtarammi ciṭṭhēi । amhāṇaṁ daṁḍavaī dūsalanāmō mahābalavaṁ ।। 6000।।
turiyaṁ puṇa parabhūmī paṁcamayaṁ saha maē virōhāō । pacchā vi bhayaṁ garuyaṁ iya bahuō kāraṇakalāvō ।। 6001 ॥
iya vōttaṇaṁ rāyā samuṭṭhiō āsaṇāō sahasa tti । paḍihārēṇa u savvō visajjiō niyagihē lōō । । 6002।।
vāmaṇasāmī amhē āvāsē āgayā taō savvē । bhaṇiyaṁ ca amha samuhaṁ tō vāmaṇasāmiṇā ēvaṁ ||6003।।
ajjāvasarō na tahā saṁjāō kō vi amha vinnavaṇē । naravaiṇō kajjaṁtaravakkhittamaṇassa jāyassa ।। 6004 ।।
kiṁtu paraṁ gurulāhō anna amhāṇa ajjasaṁjāō । jaṁ khu vasaṁtasirīē vinnāō vaiyarō ēsō ||6005 ||
jaṁ amha sāmiṇō naṁdaṇammi aṇurāiṇī sayaṁvaraṇē । caliyā ciṭṭhai ēsā paḍivakkhēṇaṁ pakkhiliyā ||6006।।
tā inhiciya tu vaccaha narapuṁgavassa naravaiṇō । gaṁtaṇaṁ jāṇāvaha sarūvamēyaṁ jahā nisuyaṁ ।। 6007।।
paḍivannaṁ amhēhiṁ taṁ vā maṇasāmiṇō taō vayaṇaṁ । kira saṁvahiuṁ laggā bhuccā cauhaṭṭayammi gayā ।।6008।।
viṭṭhā ciṭṭhāmō vaṇiṇō ēgassa jāva haṭṭammi । tō tayaṇulaggavaṇihasaṁṭhiyā kē vi dōnninarā ।।6009।।
jaṁpaṁti parōpparamērisaṁ jahā ki pi kiṁ taē nisuyaṁ । ajja na vāiyabhaṇiē ēkkēṇa taō bhai vīō ।। 6010।।
na ya kiṁ pi tārisaṁ jai tumaṁ tu jāṇēsi tō kahaha amhaṁ । iyarō sāhēi taō payāṇayaṁ nivakumārassa || 6011 ।।
bīō puccha katthava kēṇava kajjēṇa tō kahai iyarō | gulakhēḍammi gamissai kajjaṁ tu imaṁ jaṇapayaḍaṁ ॥। 6012।।
tattha vasaṁtasirīē gaṁtūṇa karissaē sahāyattaṁ । iyarō pucchai kāraṇamannaṁ pi kimatthi iha kiṁ pi ।। 6013।।
sō bēṛa atthi iyarō jaṁpara ki taṁ kahēhi sō bhaṇai | sāhēmi tujjha taṁ kiṁtu jai tumaṁ nēya sāhēsi ।। 6014।।
annassa purō kassai sō bēi sayaṁ pi tāva ērisayaṁ । na kahēmi ahaṁ kassai kiṁ puṇa viṇivāriō tuma ।। 6015 ।।
tō iyarēṇa disāō palōiyāō na kō vi āsannō । āsī tattha duijjē hē amhē paḍaṁtariyā ।।6016 ।।
āsannāvina diṭṭhā javaṇiyachiḍḍēṇa sōu amhēhi । diṭṭhō disāsu diṭṭhi dētō nisuō ya sātō ||6017 ।।
ērisayaṁ tassa purō jaṁ kira sā asamakhvasaṁpannā । ciṭṭhēi vasaṁtasirī taṁ vaṁchai sayamimō gahiraṁ ।।6018 ।।
sirisūrapālarāyassa naṁdaṇō vīrapālanāmō tti । jaṇaō vi na jāṇai tassa ērisaṁ maṇagayaṁ bhāvaṁ ।। 6019 ।।
sayamēva ya vinnaviḍaṁ rāyāṇaṁ dūsalassa sāhējjē । appā āṇaviō bīrapālanāmēṇa kumarēṇa ।। 6020।।
sō pucchara ērisa kaha rahassaṁ taē parinnāyaṁ । kahai iyarō jahā mē bālavayaṁsī risī nāma ।। 6021।।
atthēttha sō u saṁpai āsannō vīrapāla kumarassa । tēṇa maha kahiyamēyaṁ kēṇai niyakāraṇavasēṇa || 6022।।
ēyaṁ sōūṇa taō jhatti amhēhiṁ niyasamāvāsē । āgaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ kahiyaṁ vāmaṇasāmissa savvaṁ pi ।। 6023।।
tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jahamhaṁ sudaṁsaṇāō bhayaṁ tahā natthi । jaha vīrapāla kumarassa saṁtiyā vaṭṭaē saṁkā ।। 6024 ।।
niyamaṁḍalassa majjhē kāuṁ savvaṁ pi sakkaē ēsō । tā tumbhē inhiciya ēttō niggacchaha javēṇa ।।6025 ।।
rati diyāya vahiuṁ caṁdaurīē purīē gaṁtuṇaṁ । niyasāmiṇō kamāṇaṁ puraō sāhēha savvamimaṁ ।। 6026 । ।
tō takkhaṇāu caliyā amhē paṁcamadiṇimma iha pattā । vittaṁ dēvassa vi ētō dēvō pamāṇaṁti ।। 6027 ।।
aha sūrapālanayarāu āgaē dō vi tē visajjēuṁ । buddhinihāṇō maṁtī narapuṁgavarāiṇā bhaṇiō ।। 6028।।
jaṁ cēva vasaṁtasirī dūēhiṁ paḍhamamēva vinnattaṁ । amhēccaya purisēhi vi taṁ cēva nivēiyaṁ inhi ।। 6029 ।।
