188
sirivammakumāracariya
tā saṁvāō jāō ubhayāṇa vi jaṁpiēsu dūyāṇaṁ । tamhā saṁdēhō iha vatthummina kō vikāyacō ।। 6030 ।।
jai vi vasaṁtasirīē aṁgōkārō na kō vi amhēhiṁ । vihiō ciṭṭhai ajja vi tahā vi tīē sayaṁ variō ।। 6031 ।।
sirivammakumārī tassa aṁtiē āgama kuṇaṁtīē । jāyaṁ ca bahunivāṇaṁ rajjēsu pasiddhamēyaṁ pi ।। 6032 ॥
puvvaṁ vāsavadattō mahābalō tayaṇu sūrapālō ya । puriō ya ahaṁ ēē caurō vi nivā muti dhuvaṁ ॥। 6033।।
annēsi pi nivāṇaṁ rajjēsu diṇē diṇē imō aṭṭhō । pasaratō mannijjai ēhi ēṁta jaṁtēhi || 6034 ।।
tō jai sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ ahavā vi hu vīrapālakumarēṇa । kēṇa vi ghēppai sā taha vi hōi guruparibhavō am || 6035 ।।
tā inhiciya kī uvakkamō ēttha aha bhaṇai maṁtī । nimisaddhaṁ pi na kīrai dēva! vilaṁbō ihadrummi ||6036 ||
ṭhāṇāō uṭṭijjai ēttō vihiē uvakkamē garu | bēi nivō dōni nivē aṁgīkāūṇa gaṁtavvaṁ ॥। 6037।।
tō daṁḍāvitami pēsiē tatya hōi na hu siddhī । tamhā sayamēva maē gaṁtavvaṁ ēttha niyamēṇa || 6038।।
maṁtī bhai ihaṭṭē tumhēhiṁ ciya gaēhiṁ hōi paraṁ । ēsō na kō viniyamō paḍibiṁbaṁ kō vi jō tumha ।। 6039।।
tēṇa vi gaēṇa sijjhai jamhā puraō vi rāyakumarāṇa । suvvai samāgamō na uṇa patthivā kē vi tattha gayā ।।6040 ।।
aha sirivammakumarō jōḍiyahatthō narēsaraṁ namiuṁ । vinnavai jahā ēyaṁ amha pasāyaṁ kuṇau dēvō ||6041 ।।
ciṭṭhatu dēvapāyā pavittayaṁtā ihēva caṁdari । niyadaṁsaṇēṇa tō uppāyaṁtā purajaṇassa ।। 6042 ।।
jā patthivō na jaṁpai ki pitaō uṭṭiūṇa pāēsu । piuṇō nikkhiviṇaṁ niyasīsaṁ vayai sirivammō ॥। 6043।।
jai mai ciṭṭhatammi vi dēvō vijayaṁ karissaē kaḍaē । tō dēvēṇa sayaṁ ciya kāurimattaṁ mamaṭṭaviyaṁ ।। 6044।।
tā jattāgamaṇamimaṁ āisau mamēva saṁpayaṁ dēvō । iya nibaṁdhaṁ nāuṁ kumarassa taō naravarēṇa ॥। 6045।।
dinō tassāēsō nirūviyaṁ savvamēva niyasēnnaṁ । tēṇa saha pahāṇayaraṁ taō viinnaṁ nivēṇa sayaṁ ।। 6046 ।।
bīḍayamimō gahēḍaṁ sirivammō niggaō taō jhatti । patthāṇē ṭhāūṇaṁ bhuttō nayarīē bāhimmi ।। 6047 ||
hakkāriūṇa tō dōnniniyana rē samuciē samāisai । jaha sūrapālarannō sē gulakhēḍanayarassa ।। 6048।।
āsannaṭṭhiyavajjāuha dēvīē purassa majjhammi । gahiyāvāsā ciṭṭha nivavāsavadatta aṁgaruhā ।।6049 ।।
nāmēṇa vasaṁtasirī tīsē pāsammi tāva puvvaṁ pi । gaṁtūṇaṁ tubhēhi avilaṁbagaīē dōhiṁ pi ।। 6050 ।।
kahiyavvaṁ tappuraō ērisayaṁ jō taē niō purisō । sāmanāmō narapuṁgavassa ranō samamma || 6051 ।।
sattahiṁ jaṇēhiṁ sahiō paṭṭaviō āsisō pahē jaṁtā । kumarasudaṁsaṇapurisēhi māriō paṁcajaṇasahiō ।। 6052 ॥
sēsēhiṁ puṇō dōhiṁ u ghāiyadēhēhi tattha gaṁtūṇa । savvaṁ nivassa puraō kahiyaṁ tēṇa vi nivakumārō ||6053 ।।
sirivammō āiṭṭhō saṁvāhē tumha āgamaṇahēuṁ । ēṁtō ciṭṭhai maggē na kā vi adhiī ō tuma ||6054।।
kāyavvā niyacittē imassa aṭṭhassa tujjha kahaṇatthaṁ । sirivammēṇaṁ amhē paṭṭaviyā aggaō hōuṁ ।। 6055।।
iya tīsē kahiūṇaṁ tattō jōyaṇadugaṁtaraṭhiyassa । pāsammi sudaṁsaṇanāmayassa kumarassa gaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ ।। 6056 ।।
paḍhamaṁ ciya narapuṁ garvānavavayaṇēṇaṁ imaṁ imaṁ tassa । kahiyavvaṁ tumhēhiṁ tō jai mannai na sō ēvaṁ ।। 6057।।
dubuddhiharō tō niravēkkhaṁ majjhavayaṇaō pacchā । ēvaṁ ēvaṁ ēsō bhaṇiyavva nivviyappēhiṁ ।। 6058 ।
bhaṇiūṇa sudaṁsaṇakumaramērisaṁ tō niyattiuṁ tattō । vajjāuhadēvīē purammi ējjaha puṇō tubhē ।। 6059 ।।
iya sikkhaṁ dāūṇaṁ visajjiūṇaṁ ca tē duvē vi jaṇē । sāmaṁtamahāsāhaṇiyamaṁḍalāhivaiṇō tattō ॥ 6060॥
hakkāriūṇa savvē narapūṁ gavarāyanaṁdaṇō bhagai । jē kē vi tumha sēnē ghaḍiyāē jōyaṇaṁ jaṁti ।।6061।।
turayā karahāya tahā jiyasmādīha maggagamaṇammi । ārōhayā ya tēsi nivvāḍēūṇa tē savvē ।। 6062।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-189-to-189.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvaya jiṇidacariyaṁ
189
paṁcanhaṁ diyahaṇaṁ pajjattaṁ saṁbalaṁ gahēūṇa | majjha samappaha inhi jaha tēhiṁ samaṁ ahaṁ ēttō ।। 6063 ।।
saṁjhāē nōharijaṁ vahiuṁ rāō diyā ya paramadiṇē । pannāsajōyaṇaṁ tē vajjāu dēvi purabāhi ||6064।।
āvāsaṁ gahiūṇaṁ karēmi tō bhōyaṇaṁ va sayaṇaṁ vā । tumhē puṇa sibirajuyā pacchā saniyaṁ pi ējjāha || 6065।।
sirivammakumārē jaṁpiūṇa ēvaṁ ṭhiyammi mōṇēṇaṁ । maṁḍaliyāīhi taō vinnattō savinayaṁ ēsō ।। 6066 ।।
jō tumha samāsō sō kīrai inhimēva avilaṁba । kiṁtu paraṁ tubbhēhi saha amhē āgamissāma ||6067।।
sayamēva siviramajjhē mōttaṇaṁ kaṁ pi appaṇō purisaṁ । paḍivannaṁ kumarēṇaṁ vi tahēva tēhiṁ vi kathaṁ jhati ।। 6068।।
aha sirivammakumārō paṁcahi saha mattakārivarasaēhiṁ । taha jaccaturaṁgāṇaṁ pannāsāē sahassēhiṁ ।। 6069।।
paṁcahi rahasahasēhiṁ tīsa sahassēhi pavarakarahāṇa | saṁkhittēṇa balēṇaṁ ēttiyamēttēṇa saṁcaliō ||6070 ||
tihi nakkhattamuttaṁ gaṇāviyaṁ kiṁ pi nēya gaṇayāō । na ya sauṇō na nimittaṁ avēkkhiyaṁ kiṁ pi tēṇa tayā । । 6071 ।।
naya parabalabahuvattaṁ na ya thēvattaṁ niyassa sēnnassa । ēmēva sīhapōō vva paṭṭiō mayakulassuvari ।। 6072।।
ēttō ya sāmalaṁ māriūṇa allā vi dēvibhavaṇāō । purisēsuṁ āgaēsuṁmāhavarāō taō caliō ।। 6073।।
vajjāu dēvīē purāu kaḍaē sudaṁsaṇassa gaō । sāhai tassa purō jaha tumbhēhiṁ kumāra ahamēttō || 6074 ।।
āsi vasaṁtatirīē saruvapariyāṇaṇadr̥māiṭṭhō । jā tattha gaō tā takkhaṇē vi dēvīpurāhitō || 6075।।
ēkkō turayaviggō viṇiggaō pavarapōrisā purisō । satahiṁsāuhapurisēhi saṁjuō pāyacārīhi ||6076।।
iccēvamāisavvaṁ vittharaō sāhiyaṁ purō tassa । tā jāva tēṇa pēsiyapurisēhiṁ sāmalō nihaō ||6077।।
appacchaṭṭō pacchā tēsi gahiyaṁ jamāsi hayapamuhaṁ । lēhēṇa saṁjayaṁ taṁ savvaṁ pi daṁsiyaṁ tassa ।। 6078।।
sō vi sudaṁsaṇakumarō vāēuṁ lēhamavagayatayatthō । tuṭṭhō māhavarāyaṁ pasaṁsaē jaṁpaē ya tahā || 6079।।
anna vi tumaṁ puralē pacchannē kē vikamyarakhvē । tattha nirūvēhi jahā puṇō vi tē māṇasaṁ kiṁpi ।। 6080 ।।
vajjāuhadēvīē puramajjhāō vasaṁtasiritaṇayaṁ । narapuṁgavavāsavadattapatthivāṇaṁ samīvammi || 6081 ।।
gacchaṁtaṁ nāūṇaṁ karhati lahu tujjha tō tumaṁ purisē । pēsē tassa karēsi niggahaṁ jēṇa kai vi diṇē ।। 6082 ।।
dōnhaṁ pi naridāṇaṁ ēēsi bāharāē kō vi jaṇō । nāgacchai jā sijjhai amhāṇaṁ kajjamēyaṁti ॥ 6083 ||
māhavarāēṇa sudaṁsaṇassa vayaṇaṁ taha tti taṁ jhatti । paḍivajjiūṇa vihiyaṁ imamēvaṁ vaṭṭaē tāva ।। 6084 ।।
ēttōya vīrapālē gulakhēḍābhimuvihiyapatthāṇē । tēhi sudaṁsaṇaēhiṁ sūrapālō nivō puṇa vi ||6085 ।।
vinattō paccattaramēēsi dēva jaha maē sikkhaṁ iha aṭṭhē dāūṇaṁ paṭṭaviō ciṭṭhaē inhi ।।6086।।
niyakumaravīrapālō galakhēḍapurammi tēṇa saha tubbhē । vaccaha tattha gaō sō nāūṇa karissaē laṭṭhaṁ ।। 6087 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tē sūrapālarannā visajjiya। jhatti । nāūṇa tassa vayaṇaṁ aṇāyaraṁ niggayā tattō ।। 6088 ।।
miliya। na vīrapālassa tē sudaṁsaṇakumārakaḍayammi । jhatti gayā tassa purō jahaṭṭhiyaṁ savvamaktrati ।। 6089।।
tēṇa vi tō sōūṇaṁ vīmaṁsiyamattaṇō maṇē ēvaṁ jai vi samīhiyakajjaṁ saṁbhāvijjai na sijjhaṁ taṁ ।। 6090 ॥
taha vinamē inhiciya ēttō ṭhāṇāō jujjaē gaṁtuṁ । annaha jaṇō bhaṇissai bhīyamaṇō vīrapālāō ।। 6091।।
naṭṭhō aṇāgayaṁ ciya sudaṁsaṇō tō samāgaē saṁtē । kumarammi vīrapālē gulakhēḍapurammi tayaṇaahaṁ ।। 6092 ।।
ṭhāūṇa kaivayadi ihēva niyamaṁḍalassa majjhammi । taha ya vasaṁtasirīē nāūṇa viṇiggamaṁ ēttō ।। 6093 ।।
niyaṭhāṇammi gamissaṁ iya vitēja ṭhimmi tammi taō । bīyammi dinē pattō gulakhēḍē vīrapālō vi ।। 6094 ।।
sirisūrapālarannō aṁgaruhō viunasēnnaparikaliō । pavarakari turaya-raha- jō saṁjuō guruvibhūīē ।।6095 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-190-to-190.json ==========================
190
sirivammakumāracariya
tēṇa niyābhippāō vasaṁtasirikannayāē visayammi । kahiō dūsaladaṁḍāhivassa puraō samaggō vi ।। 6096।।
tēṇa vi bhaṇiyaṁ saraṇāgayassa ḍhukkijjaē jamēyaṁ pi । tāva na laṭṭha kiṁ puṇa naravaiṇō sūrapālassa ।। 6097।।
puraō annaṁ paḍivajjiū ētthāgaō kuṇasi annaṁ । ēyaṁ tu aiviruddhaṁ tumhēṁ amhaṁ ca pariṇāmē ।। 6098 ।।
iyasalē ēsō paḍisiddhō sūrapālanivataṇaō । jhatti vasaṁtasirīē pariṇayaṇamaī niyattēi ।। 6099 ।।
tō vīrapāla kumarō dūsaladaṁḍāhivaṁ bhaṇai ēvaṁ । ēīē uvari maē niyattiō niyaabhippāō ।।6100 ।।
paramēīē rūyaṁ aisayabhūyaṁ nisammai jaṇāō । tā ki kēṇai gaṁtr̥̄ṇa tujjha purisēṇa taṁ diṭṭha ।। 6101 ।।
vinavas dūsalō taṁ amha narō kō vi aṁtiē tīē । na gaō tīsē purisā paōyaṇēṇaṁ maha samī ।। 6102 ।।
ēṁti asaī kahēṁti ya puṭṭhā tē tīē rūvamabbhahiyaṁ । tō bhagai vīrapālō pēsēūṇaṁ niē purisē ।।6103 ||
tīsē pāsammi taō pēkkhāvijjai jahāvihaṁ khvaṁ । tō bhaṇai dūsalō kiṁ niratyayaṁ pēkkhiṇimiṇā ।। 6104॥-
jammi na gaṁtavvaṁ ciya gāmē maggō vi saṁtiō tassa । ki pucchijjai ēmēva niṣphalō vibahalōē ।। 6105।।
tō bhai vīrapālō taha vihu sirisurapālanaravaiṇā । amhē paṭṭaviyā iha tīsē sāhējja karaṇatthaṁ ॥6106 ॥
ēvaṁ jāṇāvijjai paḍivannaṁ dusalēṇa vi taō taṁ । dōhi vi pahāṇapurisō ēkkēkō sikkhavēūṇaṁ ।।6107 ।।
paṭṭaviō tattha taō gaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ tēhi dōhi vi jaṇēhi । kahiyaṁ tīsē puraō jaha rannā sūrapālē ।। 6108 ।।
niyakumaravīrapālō sāhējjē tumha pēsiō ēttha । gulakhēḍapurē pattō sō ciṭṭhai bhāṇiyatēṇa ।। 6109 ।।
tumhāṇa sammahamiṇaṁ bhaṇasi tumaṁ jattha katthaī tattha | nēuṁ saṁpāvēmō vāsavadattassa vā pāsē ।।6110 ।।
sirivammakumārassa va tīē bhaṇiyaṁ jahā sadēsassa | sīmaṁ laṁghāvēḍaṁ narapuṁgava dēsamajjhami ।। 6111 ॥
nēūṇaṁ maṁ muṁha diyahāṇaṁ dōnha- tinha vā aṁtē । amhēccaya lōō kō vi katthaī saṁpayaṁ pagaō ।।6112 ।।
jamhā ciṭṭhai tatō jāva imō milai ēgaṭhāṇammi । saṁvahai ya tāva ahaṁ tumhāṇa kahāvaissāmi ।। 6113 ।।
aha tumbhē lahu ējjaha tō dūsalavīrapālapurisēhiṁ । dōhi vi taṁ paḍivannaṁ aha tīē tāṇa saṁmāṇaṁ ॥। 6114 ।।
varavatthāīhi kayaṁ visajjiyā tē vi uṭṭhiūṇa gayā । sārhēti vīrapālassa tārisaṁ dūsalajuyassa ।। 6115 ।।
tō vīrapālakumarō vasaṁtasiriaṁgacaṁgimaguṇassa । panhaṁ karēi niyapurisaaṁtiē kahai sō tassa ।। 6116 । ।
ēkkāē jīhāē vasaṁtasirinā miyāē kannāē । rūvaṁ na vannimahaṁ sakkēmi kumāra thēvaṁ pi ।। 6117 ।।
jai hōi paḍicchaṁdō vasaṁtasirirūyasaṁtiō diṭṭhō । katthai maē taō haṁ kumāra sāhēmi tuha puraō ।। 6118 ।।
vajjā uhadēvīē paḍimā kira ēttha abbhahiyaruvā । sā vi vasaṁtasirīē pāyaṁguṭṭēṇa vi na tullā ।।6119।।
sō ēvaṁ japatō nivāriō dūsalēṇa hā ēyaṁ । mā bhaṇasu puṇō ēsā jaṁ saccō vāiyā dēvī ॥। 6120 ।।
sō jaṁpai tēṇaṁ ciya ahaṁ pi saccaṁ bhaṇāmi nō aliyaṁ । aliyavayaṇēṇa jamhā ēsā vi pakuppaē dēvī ॥। 6121 ॥
tō vayai vīrapālō jai ēvaṁ tō sayaṁ pi amhāṇaṁ । sā daduvvā ciṭui tō jaṁpaḍa dūsalō ēvaṁ ।। 6122 ।।
sā tāva vasaṁtasirī hakkārēu na jujjaē ēttha । tumhē vi tattha gaṁtuṁ jahā tahā nē ya sakkēha ।।6123 ।।
kaha daṁsaṇaṁ bhavissai tīē saha tumha patthitrakumāra । sō vayai maē laddhō ciṭṭhai ēkkō iha uvāō ।। 6124 ।।
sō kērisō tti pucchara daṁḍāhivadūsalō kahai kumarō । vajjāuhadēvīē daṁsaṇahēuṁ gamissāmi ।।6125 ।।
tō dēvi pūēuṁ pūyādaṁsaṇakaē vasaṁtasiriṁ । hkkāriḍaṁ karissaṁ tīē saha daṁsaṇaṁ tattha ।। 6126।।
tō dūsalō papai jaṁ kiṁci vi saṁgayaṁ kumārassa । paḍihāsai niya cittē taṁ kuṇau kimamha bhaṇiēṇa ॥। 6127।।
tō vīrapāla kumarō daṁḍāhivadūsalaṁ pisaha nēi । dēvī bhavaṇammi taō sō citai dūsalō ēvaṁ ।। 6128 । ।

=== vardhamanaoutput-191-to-191.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
191
kumarassa maṇē bhāvō na suṁdarī ērisaṁ kuṇaṁtassa । kāhi kaṁpi aṇatthaṁ taddaṁsaṇamōhiō ēsō ॥। 6129 ।।
tā vajjā uhanāmē dēvi tumaṁ taha karēsu jaha ēsō । nē ya vasaṁtasirīē dēhāvayavaṁ pi pēkkhēi ।। 6130 ।।
tujjha ahaṁ aṭṭhadiṇē jattaṁ aivittharēṇa kārissaṁ । iya citatō pattō kumarēṇa samaṁ imō tattha ।। 6131 ॥
kayapūō dēvīē kumarō hakkāraē vasaṁtasiri । kayamuttaraṁ imīē diṭṭhīē atthi maha bāhā ।।6132 ।।
kumarō bhaṇāvas taō tamahaṁ paḍijāgarēmi āgaṁtuṁ । tīē bhaṇāviyaṁtō paḍijāgaraṇaṁ kayaṁ cēva ।। 6133 ।।
tumhahiṁ amha vattaṁ pucchaṁtēhi ihaṭṭhiēhi pi । tā na khaḍapphaḍiyadhvaṁ muhāē garuyā jaō tumbhē ।। 3134॥
tō dūsalēṇa bhaṇiō kumarō jaṁ kiṁci samuciyaṁ tumha । taṁ kayaminhi tu iō gammai gulakhēḍanayarammi ।। 6135 ।।
tō vīrapāla kumarō taha cēva karēi uṭṭiuṁ tattō । vaccai gulakhēḍapurē ēttō muṇiyassaṁ rūvēṇa ।। 6136 । ।
māhavarāēṇa sudaṁsaṇassa gaṁtr̥̄ṇa sāhiyaṁ ēvaṁ । jaha dōnhaṁ tinhaṁ vā diṇāṇa majjhē vasaṁtasiriṁ ।। 6137 ।।
vōlāviūṇa nivasūrapālaputtō niyassa dēsassa | sīmaṁ chaḍḍāvēuṁ narapuṁgava dēsa sīmāē ।। 6138 ।।
nēūṇa niyattissai taō sayaṁ vīrapālavarakumarō । iya tavvayaṇaṁ sōuṁ sudaṁsaṇō niyamaṇē tuṭṭhō ।। 6139।।
citaiya jaha niyatē tattō kumarammi vīrapālammi । sajjhā majjha bhavissai vasaṁtasirikannayā nūṇaṁ ।।6140 ।।
tō tō jammi diṇammi vīrapālēṇa saha vasaṁtasirī । vaccissai tammi diṇē rayaṇīē payāṇayaṁ dāuṁ ।। 6141 ।।
niyamaṁḍalamajjhēṇaṁ gaṁtuṇaṁ gōviēṇa sēntrēṇa । pavisēuṁ nara puṁgavamaṁḍalamajjhē vasaṁtasiriṁ ।। 6142 ।।
ēgāgiṇi gahissaṁ iya citē taō visajjēi । māhavarāyaṁ ēsō ēttō sirivammakumarēṇa ।। 6143 ।।
jē āsi dōna purisā paṭṭaviyā tē samāgayā tatthā । tēhi vasaṁtasirīē kahiyaṁ sirivammasaṁdiṭṭhaṁ ।। 6144 ।।
sirivammēṇaṁ amhē tujjha samīvammi pēsiyā ēvaṁ । tēsi vayaṇaṁ sōuṁ paḍhamaṁ jāyā vasaṁtasirī ।। 6145 ।।
ucchaliya bahalapulayā paharisapagalaṁtanayaṇajalanivahā । ahiṇavaviyasiyasayavattavi ulavimalāṇaṇacchāyā6 । 146 ।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ tu sāmalamaraṇē nisuyammi jāyasōyā vi । nayaṇēsu jalapavāhaṁ tahaṭṭhiyaṁ cēva uvvaha ।। 6147।।
navaraṁ visarisamēyaṁ dēhē sayalō vi mauliō pulaō । saṁkuiyaṁ jhatti muhaṁ tīsē jāyaṁ ca alimaliṇaṁ ।। 6148 ।।
sirivammō tumha samīvamēi ēyaṁ nisāmiuṁ tattō । ullasiyagaruyaharisā puvvasarūvā puṇō jāyā ।। 6149 ।।
iya baddhāmarisēhi mallēhi va takkhaṇē vi annōnnaṁ । tīsē maṇammi raṁgē vva harisa - sōēhi vipphuriyaṁ ॥6150 ।।
majjaṇabhōyaṇa-taṁbōla-vatthamāīhiṁ garuyasammāṇaṁ । tēsi dōnhaṁ pihū kāravēi ahasā vasaṁtasirī ।। 6151 ।।
aha aṇujāṇāvēuṁ vasaṁtasirikannayaṁ taō caliyā । dūyā dō vi sudaṁsaṇakumārakaḍayammi gaṁtumaṇā ।। 6152 ।।
saṁjhāē saṁpattō tattha taō puñvakahiyantrēṇa । saṁjuttō sirivammō purabāhi lēi āvāsaṁ ।। 6153।।
nāūṇa vasaṁtasirī sirivammaṁ ku maramāgamaṁ tattha । ullasiyagaruyaharisā na māi dēhē na vā gēhē ।।6154 ।।
aha sikkhavaṇaṁ dāuṁ sā pēsai piyavayaṁsiyaṁ niyayaṁ । vaṇasirināmaṁ sirivammakumarapāyāṇa pāsammi ।।6155 ।।
vatthāharaṇa- vilēvaṇataṁ bōlāī payatthasaṁjuttaṁ । gaṁtaṇa tattha sā ḍhōiūṇa taṁ tassa savvaṁ pi ।। 6156 ॥
jaṁpara jōḍiyahatthā taṁ ēvaṁ amha sāmiṇīkumara । vinnavai vasaṁtasirī tumha payāṇaṁ jaha maṇēmē ।।6157 ।।
tuha saṁgamāhilāsa tuha guṇasavaṇēṇa paḍhamamaṁkuriō । cittābhilihiyakhvāvalōyaṇē tayaṇu pallaviō ।। 6158 ।।
jaṇayāṇunnāē ēttiyammi dūrē samāgamēṇa puṇō । sāhapasāhāvittha ramaṇupattō gamaṇavikkhaṁbhē ।। 6159 ।।
duvvāiō maṇaṁ pi hu puṇō vi tuha dūyakahiyasaṁdēsē । laddhasuvāō jāō tumhāgamaṇēṇa puṇa inhi ।। 6160॥

=== vardhamanaoutput-192-to-192.json ==========================
192
I
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
saṁpattakusumasōhō saṁjāō saṁpayaṁ puṇa jahā sō । phalai mahāyasa! taha kuṇasu jhatti pasiūṇa amhuvari ।। 6161।।
aha sirivammō ūsuhiyaō vi tamāhavaṇasiriṁ ēvaṁ । tuha sāmiṇidūēhiṁ caṁdaurigaēhiṁ jammi khaṇē ।। 6162 ।।
narapuṁgava nivapuraō kahijjamāṇaṁ imaṁ maē nisuyaṁ । jaha sirivammakumārē kayāṇurāyā vasaṁtasirī ।। 6163॥
ēṁtī pahē niruddhā sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ mahābalasuṇa । tappabhii maē nāyaṁ jai kaha vi vihaṁgamō hōuṁ ।। 6164।।
uppaiuṁ nahamaggē gaṁtu pariṇēmi taṁ vasaṁtasiriṁ । aha dinnāē sōhaṁ jaṇaēṇaṁ jhatti iha pattō ।। 6165 ।।
tāyanirūviyannassa majjha sō thēvamēva gahiūṇa । sāraṁ sēnaṁ sēsaṁ sibirēṇa samaṁ kayaṁ ētaṁ ।। 6166 ।।
tō haṁ imammi kajjē sayamēva samūsuō aisaēṇa । kiṁtu jaṇayāṇa paḍhamō puttō haṁ paḍhamapariṇayaṇaṁ ।। 6167॥
majjha imaṁ tēsi asamakkhaṁ kaha ṇu jujjhaē kāuṁ । tā bhaṇaha taṁ jahā sā vi sahai jā jāmi caṁdauri ।। 6168।।
tō bhai vaṇasarī sirivammakumāraṁ jahā tumaṁ suhiō । na muṇasi parassa pīḍaṁ tō ēvaṁ vayasi līlāē । 6169।।
jā amha sāmiṇī puṇa tuha guṇasavaṇubbhavāṇurāēṇa । pakuviyamayaṇamahābhaḍasarēhiṁ tāḍijjaē niccaṁ ।।6170।।
sā pīḍaṁ ataraṁtī sahiuṁ mannai khaṇaṁ pi vāsasamaṁ । tēṇa sayaṁ pi payaṭṭā kumāra ! tuha pavisiuṁ saraṇē ।। 6171।।
jaṁ puṇa pabhaṇasi ēvaṁ niyapiyarāṇaṁ karēmi na parōkkhē । pariṇayaṇaṁ pi na juttaṁ vōttu tuha taṁ pi nivataṇaya ! ।। 6172।।
jamhā tuha piyarēhiṁ vāsavadattāu patthiuṁ ēsā । na hu āṇīyā tō kaha sayaṁ vivāhē vi tuha dōsō ।। 6173 ।।
kiṁ ci sayaṁ pariṇayaṇē tuha dūsaṇamiṇamahaṁ harissāmi । apariṇayaṇammi dōsaṁ dēvvaṁ pi na tujjha avaharihī । । 6174।।
sirivammō āha kahaṁ tō pabhaṇai vaṇasirī jahā kumara । na vihī vi taṁ vi vannaṁ jīvāvissai vasaṁtasiriṁ । । 6175 ।।
sōūṇa vaṇasirīē vayaṇamiṇaṁ niyamaṇammi sirivammō | citai accāvatthā mayaṇēṇa kayā vasaṁtasirī । । 6176 ।।
nūṇaṁ tēṇa sa kōvaṁ sōvālaṁbhaṁ ca piyasahī tīsē । ēsā ēvaṁ jaṁpaṛa sadukkhahiyayā niruvayāraṁ ।। 6177।।
tājai patthaṇabhaṁgē summi sā jīviyaṁ niyaṁ cayai । tō hōi guru aṇatthō ēsō vihiō maē cēva ।। 6178 ।।
jāvajjīvaṁ pi taō pacchāyāvō na phiṭṭai mamēsō । havai ya jayammi sayalē ayasō guruyaṇapakōvō ya ।। 6179 ।।
tā pattayālaminhi ēyaṁ ciya nūṇa majjha karaṇijjaṁ । jaṁ pariṇijjai ēsā avilaṁba citiuṁ ēvaṁ ।।6180 ।।
sō āha va siri jaha jhatti tumaṁ saṁpayaṁ pi gaṁtūṇa । pavaṇaṁ vivāhajōggaṁ kārēhi ahaṁ jahāṁ ēmi ॥। 6181 ।।
dhruvalaggammi karissaṁ pariṇayaṇaṁ tujjha sāmiṇīē ahaṁ । iya sā laddhā ēsā kumārapāsāu uṭṭhēuṁ ।। 6182 ।।
gaṁtūṇa vasaṁtasirīē sāha ēsā vi vaḍḍapurisāṇaṁ । kahiūṇaṁ kārāvara paḍaṇaṁ savvaṁ vivāhakaē ।। 6183 ।।
sirivammō vi kumārō bhaṇiē samayasmi tattha gaṁtūṇa । saṁkhēvēṇaṁ pariṇēi rāyadhyaṁ vasaṁtasiriṁ ।। 6184।।
rahamaṇuhaviūṇaṁ niddhaṁ kāūṇa rayaṇiviramammi । kayapābhāiyakiccō uvaviṭṭhō jāva ciṭṭhēi ।।6185।।
tāva sudaṁsaṇakaḍyāu dūyapurisā samāgayā dō vi । taṁ paṇamiūṇa sāhati aggaō tassa tē ēvaṁ ।। 6186 ।।
amhē kumāra tumhā sēṇaṁ paḍhamamēttha āgaṁtu । kahiūṇa vasaṁtasirīē aggaō tumha āēsaṁ ।। 6187॥
taṁ aṇujāṇāvēḍaṁ gayā sudaṁsaṇakumārakaḍayammi । kāūṇa tēṇa saha daṁsaṇaṁ taō bhaṇiyama mhēhi ।। 6188।।
jaha amhē paṭṭaviyā narapu ṁgavanivaiṇā tuha samīvē । tēṇa bhaṇāviyamēvaṁ jaha amha mahābalō rāyā ।। 6189 ।।
mittaṁ tassaṁgahō tumaṁ tu sirivammakumaraṭhāṇammi । amhēhiṁ jahā ēsō sivakhaviyavvō taha tumaṁ pi ।।6190 ।।
jaha sirivammavibhūīē hōi amhaṁ maṇammi pariōsō । taha tujjha vi vibhavēṇaṁ jāyai amhāṇamāṇaṁdō ।। 6191 ।।
tō jai niyapīīē paḍivajjai kaha vi taṁ vasaṁtasiriṁ । tō pariṇēhi tumamimaṁ asaṁgayaṁ kiṁ pi nō ēyaṁ ।। 6192॥
haḍhavittīē vi imaṁ tuha ginhaṁtassa kiṁ pi na bhaṇāmō । ēvaṁ pi kaha vi ēsā tuha bhajjā hōi tō hōu ।।6193।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇadacariyaṁ
1
193
paramēyaṁ na bhavissai varamēsā cayai savvahā jīyaṁ । sirivammāō annaṁ taha vi na mannai imā daiyaṁ ।। 6194 ॥
tīsē jīyaccāē puṇa jāē tujjha avajasō hōhī । tā mōttumasaggahamēyamappaṇō jāhi ṭhāṇammi ।। 6195 ।।
mā iha paralōgāṇaṁ dōnhaṁ pi hu kuha appaṇō nāsaṁ । iccāi vaiyarē sāhiyammi sayalagmi tassa purō ।। 6196।।
kayabhiuḍībhaṁgēṇaṁ tēṇa taō jaṁpiyaṁ jahā ēyaṁ । sikkhaṁ tassē va niyassa dēu sirivammakumarassa ।। 6197 ।।
sō narapuṁgavarāyā amhaṁ tu mahābalō mahārāō । ciṭṭhai sikkhādāyā tassēvagiraṁ karissāmā ।।6198 ।।
jai ruccissai cittassa majjha annaha na taṁ pi parkārissaṁ । amhēhi taō bhaṇiyaṁ jaṁ ruccai taṁ tumaṁ kuṇasu ।। 6199 ।।
kiṁtu sirivammavayaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ inhi tumaṁ nisāmēhi । sō āha vayaha amhēhiṁ jaṁpiyaṁ tēṇa saṁdiṭṭha ।। 6200।।
iya tuha jaha narapuṁgavarāyā ai ujjuō suyaṇapagaī। appaṁ va pēcchai paraṁ na uṇa viyāṇai khalasakhvaṁ ।। 6201 ।।
tā vayaṇamimassa taē mapi kannammi nēya karaṇijjaṁ । ēsa vasaṁtasirīē ahaṁ karissāmi pariṇayaṇaṁ ।। 6202 । ।
tatthāgaṁtūṇaṁ tuha pēcchaṁ tassa vi bhaṇijja mā ēvaṁ । jaṁ na maē vinnāyaṁ jai sakkahi tō nivārēhi ।। 6203 ||
ēvaṁ sōamhāṇaṁ vayaṇaṁ suṇiuṁ sudaṁsaṇō kumarō । kō vāyaṁbiravayaṇō bēi jahā ēu sirivammō | 6204 ।।
sigdhaṁ ciya pāhunaṁ karēmi jaha tassa jōggayaṁ kiṁ pi । iya bhaṇiuṁ tēṇamhē visajjiyā āgayā ēttha ॥6205 ।।
iya vinnaviūṇa ṭhiyā dōnni vi sirivammavarakumārēṇa । uvavūhiya sammāṇiyavisajjiuṁ jāva pāradvā ॥ 6206।।
ētthaṁtarammi purisā paṭṭaviyā dōnni vīrapālēṇa । pattā sirivammakumāraaṁtiē vihiyapaḍivattī || 6207।।
jaṁpaṁti jaha bhaṇāvai tubbhēiya vīrapālavarakumarō । niya dēsāō tumhē samāgayā amha sammi || 7208।।
amhēhiṁ dāyavvaṁ pāhunnayabhōyaṇaṁ taō tumha । tumhēhi vi dāyavvaṁ vivāhavihibhōyaṇaṁ amha ।। 6209॥
tō paḍhamaṁ pi karissaha ki tumhē kiṁ gihammi amhāṇaṁ । bhujissaha aha amhē bhujāvissaha niyāvāsē ।। 6210।।
tō jaṁpai sirivammō dōnhaṁ ēkkaṁ pi saṁpayaṁ nēya । sakkā amhē kāuṁ kajjaṁtaramatthi jaṁ jāyaṁ ॥। 6211।।
tē vīrapālapurisā bēṁti taō ki tayaṁ ti āha taō । sirivammō jaha paḍhamaṁ sudaṁsaṇō amha pāhunaṁ ।। 6212 ।।
kāhī ciṭṭhēti jaō nimaṁtayā pēsiyā imē tēṇa । amhāṇamiyabhaṇēuṁ tē purisā daṁsiyā tēsiṁ ।। 6213 ।।
tō vīrapālapurisēhiṁ pucchiyā tē kahēṁti puvvr̥ttaṁ । tēhi taō sirivammō puṭṭhō kiṁ vīrapālassa ।। 6214।।
amhē gaṁtu kahimō sō āha jahāsuyaṁ imēhitō । iya bhaṇiuṁ taṁbōlaṁ dāuṁ tē tēṇa paṭṭaviyā ॥। 6215।।
gaṁtūṇa tēhi kahiyaṁ taṁ savvaṁ vīrapāla kumarassa । tēṇa vi tē sikkhaviḍaṁ puṇō vi saṁpēsiyā tattha ।। 6216।।
sirivammakumarapāsē sāhēṁti jahā bhaṇāvaē tumbhē । iya vīrapālakumarō sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ samaṁ amhē ।। 6217 ।।
savvaṁ pi bhaṇissāmō tumhēhi ajja amha hōyavvaṁ । pāhuṇaēhiṁ sihaṁ amhuvari pakuvvamāṇēhiṁ ।। 6218 ।।
ētthaṁtarē vaṇasirī vasaṁtasiri pēsiyā samāgaṁtu । hōūṇa kannamūlē vinnavai kumārasirivammaṁ ।। 6219॥
jaha amha sāmiṇīē saṁjāē ēttha gamaṇavigdhammi । tuha daṁsaṇadulahattaṁ citaṁtīē niyamaṇammi ।। 6220।।
vajjāuhadēvīē pūyaṁ kāū icchiyaṁ ēvaṁ । ōyāiyaṁ jahā mē kayammi sirivammakumarēṇa ॥। 6221।।
pāṇiggahaṇē nhavaṇaṁ vilēvaṇaṁ pūyavatthasakkāraṁ । kāūṇaṁ tuha puraō pēcchaṇayaṁ kāraissāmi ।। 6222 ।।
savvaṁ pi ahōrattaṁ mahasavaṁ tujjha maṁdirē kāhaṁ । sō inhi dēvīē maṇōrahō puriō majjha ।। 6223।।
tō majjhē hōūṇaṁ tumhē kāraha savvamavi ēyaṁ । paḍivajjiūṇa ēvaṁ kumarēṇa visajjiya। ēsā ।। 6224।।
tō vīrapālapēsiyadūyāṇaṁ uttaraṁ kuṇai ēyaṁ । jaha tāva sudaṁsaṇakumaravaiyarē kā vi nō vattā ।। 6225 ।।

194
hu
sirivamma kumāracariyaṁ
tumhahiṁ kāyavvā annaha ēsō bhaṇissaē pacchā । jīvaṁtō tirivammō majjña na chuṭṭaṁtaō āsi ।। 6226।।
jai vīrapālakumarō kuṇaṁtaō tassa nēya sāhējjaṁ । bhōyaṇavisayammi puṇō asaṁgayaṁ kiṁ pi nō asthi ।। 6227 ।।
kiṁtu paraṁ ajja ahaṁ akkhaṇiō kēṇaī sakajjēṇa । tō jāyammi pabhāē jaṁpissai ki pi jaṁ kumarō ।। 6228।।
taṁ tavvaṁ pi karissaṁ ajjapuṇō kiṁ pinō bhaṇēyavvaṁ । iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ dōnni vi tē sirivammō visajjēuṁ ।। 6229।।
vajjāu dēvīē gaṁtu kārēs havaṇamāīyaṁ । ai vittharēṇa tattō taiē jāmammi āgaṁtuṁ ||6230।।
tatthēkkēṇa narēṇaṁ kannē hōūṇa vaṇasirī bhaṇiyā । gaṁtūṇavasaṁtasirīē nihuyamēyaṁ nivēhi ||6231 ||
jō tumhēhi niuttōkaḍayammi sudaṁsaṇassa āsi purā । sō gaṁtūṇaṁ tattō samūsuō suddhikahaṇatthaṁ ।। 6232।।
iha saṁpattō ciṭṭa ahasā gaṁtuṁ imaṁ kahai tīsē । ēsā vi vaṇasiriṁ pēsiūṇa sirivammakumarassa ||6233॥
jāṇāvara imama sō vi hu hakkāriūṇa taṁ purisaṁ । kayapaṇivāyaṁ pucchai sō vi savatthaṁ niyaṁ hatthaṁ ॥। 6234।।
dāu niyamahadārē hōi kumārassa kannamūlammi । kumarō vi tassa vayaṇāyannaṇaviṇihittaniyacittō ।। 6235 ।।
pēcchaṇaya jaṇē cakkhuṁ savvattō nikkhivēi supasannō । iyarō vi paṇihipurisō vinnavai imassa vīsatthō ।। 6236।।
sāmi vasaṁtasirī āṇāē sudaṁsaṇassa kaḍayammi । ēttō gaōmhi bhaiṇīvaidhaṇaduyasannihāṇammi ।। 6237।।
sō daviṇavayaniuttō nicca pi sudaṁsaṇassa sannihiō । gūḍhāṇa vi purisāṇaṁ saṁbalayapasāyadāyārō ।। 6238।।
sō majjhavi pāsāō tēsi dāvē saṁbalāīyaṁ । pāēṇa tēṇa jāṇēmi gūḍhakajjaṁ pi tassāhaṁ । 6239 ।।
tumha ccaya dūēhiṁ gaṁtr̥̄ṇa sudaṁsaṇassa pāsammi । jammi khaṇē paḍhamaṁ ciya narapuṁgavarāyasaṁdiṭṭha ।। 6240 ।।
mahurakkharamakkhēḍaṁ tuha vayaṇaṁ niṭhuraṁ taō kahiyaṁ । tammi khaṇē tēsu visajjiē kōvāruṇamuhēṇa || 6241 ।।
māhavarāō hakkāriūṇa nibbhacchiō imēṇēvaṁ । jaha tujjha pamāēṇaṁ vasaṁtasiripēsiyanarēhiṁ ।। 6242 ।।
jāṇāviyaṁ sarūvaṁ ēyaṁ narapuṁgavassa naravaiṇō । ēvamuvālaṁbhēuṁ tēṇēsa visajjiō jhatti ।। 6243।।
aha pāsavattipurisēhiṁ jaṁpiyaṁ jaha kumāra ēttāhē । ciṭṭhatāṇa na juttaṁ iha gammau saṭhāṇē ।। 6244 ।।
sō āha imaṁ cittē majjha vi saṁvasai saṁpayaṁ kiṁtu । sirivammadūyavayaṇēhiṁ dūmiōhaṁ maṇē bāḍhaṁ ।। 6245 ।।
tattō maē vi tēsiṁ puraō utagakhyakōvēṇa । sāhaṁkāraṁ vayaṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ uvahāsagabbhaṁ ca ।। 6246।।
tēṇinhi tassa samāgayassa kaḍayammi kaṁpi kāuṇa । saccavaṇaṁ tō pacchā saṭhāṇamēttō gamissāmi ।। 6247।।
iya bhaṇiūṇa sudaṁsaṇakumarē virayammi pāsavattīhi । vinnattaṁ jaṁ juttaṁ parihāsai tumha taṁ kuha ||6248।।
ēyamaīyaaṇaṁtaradiṇapacchima addhajāmasamayammi । saṁjāyaṁ ajja puṇō paḍhamē diṇasaḍḍhapaharammi ।। 6249 ।।
māhavarāēṇa viyāṇiūṇa niyapaṇihipurisapāsāō । gaṁtūṇa sudaṁsaṇakumaraaggaō ēvamakkhāyaṁ ।। 6250 ।।
jaha sirivammakumārō vajjāuhadēvi maṁdirē ajja । pūyaṁ kārāvēṁtō saṁcidr̥i tattha uvaviṭṭhō ।। 6251 ।।
pēcchaṁtō pēcchaṇayaṁ acchissai tattha cēva sayaladiṇaṁ । bhōyaṇakaē khaṇaṁ jai jāi taō taṁ na yāṇāmi ।। 6252 ।।
rayaṇīē paharatigaṁ paḍhamaṁ kārissa ēya jāgarayaṁ । ēyaṁ kumāra ciṭṭhai sirivammasarūvamajjadi ।। 6253 ।।
iya kahiē ēsa sudaṁsaṇēṇa uvavūhiūṇa puṇa bhaṇiō । annaṁ pi niya nirūviyanarāṇa pāsāu nāūṇa ।। 6254।।
majjha visēsasarūvaṁ taē kahēyavvamiha samāgaṁtuṁ । iya bhaṇiuṁ tēṇēsō visajjiō vihiyasammāṇō ||6255 ।।
aha niyasēṇāhivaī narasīhō nāmatēṇa āhūō । tumha ccayaṁ sarūvaṁ puvvr̥ttaṁ tassa kahiūṇa ।। 6256।।
iya sō āiṭṭhō jaha vajjāuhadēvimaṁdirāu jayā । nīhariḍaṁ sirivammō gaṁtūṇaṁ suyai niyaṭhāṇē ।। 6257 ।।

165
tammi samayammi ēttō gaṁtūṇaṁ sēnnasaṁjuēṇa taē । tattha khiviūṇa dhāḍi niyattiyavvaṁ lahuṁ cēva ।। 6258।।
paḍivajjiuṁ sudaṁsaṇavayaṇaṁ ēyaṁ taō samuṭṭhēuṁ । narasīhadaṁḍanāhō hayasāhasāmiyāīyaṁ ।। 6259।।
hakkārāvēūṇaṁ kannē channaṁ ca sikkhavēūṇaṁ । jaṁ jaṁ visajjai taō sō sō gaṁtuṁ niyāvāsē ।। 6260 ।।
nivvāḍēuṁ laggō turagē ai suṁdarē tahā suhaḍē । ēvaṁ daṭṭhūṇa ahaṁ ihāgaō jhatti kahaṇatthaṁ ।। 6261॥
taṁ sirivammō pucchai tuha kiṁ nāmaṁ ti sō taō kahai । vāukumārō tti puṇō pucchai kumarō tumaṁ bhuttō ॥ 6262॥
sō āha takkhaṇē cciya bhōttūṇaṁ niggaō ahaṁ tattō । tō sirivammō taṁ uvavūhēuṁ subahudāūṇa ||6263॥
taṁbōlaṁ ghaṇasārēṇa saṁjaya taha ya sikkhavēūṇa । taṁ pēsēi sudaṁsaṇakaḍaē puṇa suddhikaraṇatthaṁ ॥6264॥
tammi gaē sirivammō niyasēṇāhiva imāi sai kannē । ēvaṁ ēvaṁ ca taē gaṁtūṇa iō karēyavaṁ ।।6265।।
āēsō tti bhaṇittā viṇiggaō sō taō aha kumārō । sirivammō pēcchaṇayaṁ pēcchai taha cēva tattha ṭhiō । 66 ।
aha sō vāukumārō nisīhasamaē samāgaō tattha । kannē hōuṁ sāhai ēvaṁ sirivammakuma rassa ।। 6267॥
jaha tumbhēhiṁ iōhaṁ visajjiō diyaha taiyajāmammi । pattō kaḍayammi sudaṁsaṇassa diṇapacchimamuhuttē ।। 6268।।
tammi khaṇē narasīhēṇa daṁḍavaḍaṇā sudaṁsaṇakumārō । vinnattō jaha sāraṁ nivvāḍēūṇa bhāgatiyaṁ ।। 6269 ।।
sēnnassa karīhiṁ viṇā paguṇaṁ kāūṇa ciṭṭhaē mukkaṁ । jammi samayammi tumbhē āisaha ahaṁ khaṇē tammi ।। 6270 ।।
jhatti iō tammi paōyaṇammi vaccāmi aha kumārēṇa । bhaṇiyaṁ sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ visēsavattaṁ nisāmēhi ||6271।।
tāva maē jānisuyā inhi ciya ciṭṭhaē paṇihipāsē । sō āha kahau kumarō iyarō sāhēi tudrumaṇō ।। 6272 ।।
laṇa vasaṁtasiriṁ pamōyapamhuiyara kāvvō । sirivammō vajjāuhadēvībhavaṇē pamattamaṇō ||6273।।
jaṁ ciṭṭaē sayaṁ taṁ gaṇai cciya nēya kō vi inhi tu annō tassa pamāō jaṁ mr̥ṇai niyaṁ pi nō sēnnaṁ ।। 6274 ।।
sō katthai vaccataṁ sēcchāē jēṇa pacchimē paharē । diyahassa tassa kaḍayāu niggaō kō vi kattha viya ॥
niya niya kajjēṇa jaṇō jahēva ujjāṇiyāē vaccati । ēmēva kē vi taha tē vi niggayāvattamakahaṁtā ।। 6276 ॥
sirivammassa bhaṇittā ēvaṁ jaha sūraudayasamayammi । amhē sigdhaṁ pi puṇō kaḍayammi samāgamissāma ।। 6277 ।।
tō sēṇāvinarasīha jāsi samayammi jammi tattha tumaṁ । tammi vi khaṇē khamō taṁsi kumarasirivammakaḍayammi ||
kāuṁ uvahavaṁ lhūsiuṁca ṭhiyasēsa hayagayāīyaṁ । kiṁtu paraṁ sirivammō gahiyavvō ciṭṭhaē hatthē ।। 6279 ।।
ēēṇa kāraṇaṁ vilaṁbiyavvaṁ ca tāva jā ēsō । vajjāuhadēvī maṁdirāu vaccai niyāvāsē ||6280 ।।
tō rayaṇipaḍhamakiṁcūṇajāmasamayamminīharāhi tumaṁ । taha kaha vi hu jattēṇaṁ jaha na muṇai parajaṇō kō vi । 6281।
iya sō sudaṁsaṇāō laḍhāēsō taō samuṭṭhēuṁ । narasīhadaṁḍanāhō āvāsē attaṇō vayai ।। 6282 ।।
tattō abbhitarayaṁ niyapurisaṁ pēsiūṇa kaṁpitaō । sahagāmi suhaḍanāyagalōgaṁ ēvaṁ bhaṇāvēi ||6283।।
jaha rayaṇipaḍhamaghaḍiyā paṇagaṁ tubbhē bhaēha nisuhaṁ । uḍnuṁ savvaṁ pi nisaṁ bhavissaē tumha jāgaraō ।। 6284 ।।
iya gaṁtūṇaṁ bhaṇiē tēṇa taō tēhi taṁ tahā vihiyaṁ । narasīhō vi cauddi sikaḍayassa bahiṁ pavarasuhaḍē ।। 6285 ।।
bāṇanivāyadugaṁtē nirūviuṁ parapavēsarakkhaṭṭā । niyasannihiyaṁ purisaṁ taha ēvaṁ sikkhavēḍaṁ ca ॥ 6286॥
kumarasudaṁsaṇaguḍḍaradārē ghaḍiyāharē jayā ghaḍiyā । vajjaṁti paṁcataiyā ahaṁ pattō tara jhati ।। 6287।।
bōvō ti taō suttō jāyammi bhaṇiyasamayammi । tēṇa niuttanarēṇaṁ pabōhiō jhatti narasīhō ।। 6288 ।।
saṁvāhēuṁ sēnaṁ pubvattaṁ savvamēva gahiūṇaṁ । nīhariuṁ kaḍayāu purō niuttēhi purisēhi ||6289 ।।
uvarimapurisapayāraṁ rakkhatēhi niyassa dēsassa | sīmāē saṁpattō ētō gāuya duguddē ।। 6290 ।।

।
1
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tattha taō pakkhariyā turayā suhaḍā ya gahiyasannāhā । saṁjāyā sabvē vihu taō purō tumha kaḍayassa ।। 6291 ।।
suddhī jāṇaṇaṭṭā paṭṭaviyā tīsapaṇihiṇō purisā । bhamiḍaṁ kaḍayarbāhi tēhi tassa gaṁtuṁ kahiyamēyaṁ ॥ 6292 ।।
sirivammakaḍayacaupakkhaō viṭhāṇaṁtarāī ciṭṭhati । tēṇa puraō na gaṁtuṁ sakkijjai kamajjhammi ।। 6293।।
paramēvaṁ jāṇijjai dūraṭṭiēhi vi jahā na majjhammi । kaḍayassa tassa lōō bahuō asthi tti jaṁ tatthaṁ ॥। 6294।।
anīsa suvvai tahāvihō kōi nēya āyaṁsō । ainibbharō pasuttō kaḍayajaṇō tattha savvō vi ।। 6295 ।।
taha vi hu pāhariyāṇaṁ jāgaraṇakaē parōpparaṁ sadā । suvvaṁti jāmiṇīē ēttha puṇō suvvai na taṁ pi ।। 6296 ।।
tō narasīhō citai kēttiyamēttō vi ciṭṭhaē lōō । sirivammassa samīvē vajjā uhadēvibhavaṇammi ।। 6297 ।।
kē vi puṇō kaḍayāō niggaṁtaṇaṁ gayā sakajjēsu । tē uṇa pabhāyasamaē samāgamissaṁti kayakajjā ।। 6298 ।।
ēēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ thēvamaṇusattaṇēṇa majjhammi । pāhariyā nō makkā bāhi ṭhāṇaṁtarē ṭhaviyā ।। 6299 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi māhavarāyassa narēhiṁ dōhi āgaṁtuṁ narasīhassa nivēiyamēvaṁ jaha āgayā amhē ||6300||
vajjā uhadēvīē purassa pāyārabāhirapaēsā । savvāsu vi baḍhāī tattha paōlīsu dārāī ॥ 6301 ॥
bāhiraṭhiēhiṁ nisuō nibbharagaṁdhavva-naṭṭanigghōsō । amhēhiṁ tēṇa najjai ajjavi tatthatthi sirivammō ।। 6302 ।।
narasīhadaṁḍavaiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ inhi nisāē dō jāmā । jāyā ēkkō jāmō annō vi paḍikkhiyanvō mē ।। 6303 ।।
uḍḍhaṁ jai sirivammō dēvībhavaṇāu nīharēūṇa । ēi na ēi va kaḍaē niyammi taha vi hu ahaṁ dhāḍi ।। 6304 ।।
dāūṇa tatthaṁ taṁ lhūsiuṁ ca savvaṁ taō niyattissaṁ । tammi bhaṇatammi imaṁ jhaḍa tti kēṇā vi tōcchīyaṁ ।।6305 ।।
sōūṇa chīyasaddaṁ narasīhō niyamaṇē maṇāgapi । jāō khaṇaṁ sakhaṇusō ta bhaṇāvēi muharakkhē ||6306।।
sēnnassa niyassa purō nirūviē dōhi kaṁḍavāēhi । jaha parapurisapavēsō rakkhēvvō payatēṇa ॥। 6307।।
aha jēhiṁ iō gaṁtuṁ tumha sarūvaṁ nivēiyaṁ tassa । tē tēṇa samāiṭṭhā jaha ēgamuhuttapajjaṁtaṁ ।। 6308 ।।
tumhahiṁ puṇō vajjāuhadēvipurassa bahipaēsammi । gaṁtuṁ paḍikkhiyavvaṁ jā taiō hōi nisijāmō ॥। 6309 ॥
pacchā āgaṁtūṇaṁ sirivammasarūvamaggaō amha । kahiyavvaṁ jhatti jahā viṇiggaō sō taō nō vā ।। 6310 ।।
ēyaṁ ca maē mūlāu tēṇa saddhi samāgaēṇa sayaṁ । āyanniyaṁ ca diṭṭha taō ahaṁ takkhaṇā cēva ।। 6311 ।।
niyabuddhipavacēṇaṁ tē savvē vaṁciūṇa kaḍayajaṇē । nīhariūṇaṁ tattō tumha samīvammi iha pattō ||6312।।
aha ēyaṁ sōūṇaṁ vāukumārassa jaṁpiyaṁ savvaṁ । sirivammakumārēṇaṁ ēsō ēvaṁ samāiṭṭhī ।।6313 ।।
ētthēvayapuramajjhē dhaṇavaṇihaṭṭammi kuṇa tumaṁ niddaṁ । ciṭṭhāmi jāva pēcchaṇayadaṁsaṇē vāvaḍamaṇōhaṁ ॥। 6314।।
pacchā kammi vikajjē jāē hakkāriūṇa āēsaṁ । tujjha payacchissamahaṁ iya bhaṇiō sō taha karēi ।। 6315 ।।
sirivammakumārō puṇa palōyamāṇō tahēva pēcchaṇayaṁ । citai maṇammi pacchimasibirassa sarūvamāgatuṁ ।। 6316 ।।
ajja va kōvina sāhai majjha purō taṁ samāgayaṁ nō vā । jai hōi āgayaṁ tō kīrai suttaṁ tayaṇuruvaṁ ।। 6317।।
aha nāgayaṁ tayā puṇa ihēva jāgaramisēṇa gamayāmō । caraṇaṁ pi rayaṇijāmaṁ narasīhō jāva āgaṁtuṁ ।। 6318 ।।
amha kayammi sunnē dhāḍi dāu niyattaē pacchā । paṭṭhīē gaṁtūṇaṁ jahōciyaṁ tassamō ||6319।।
iya karyācitāṇaṁtaramēvayasirivammakumarapāsammi । jhatti raṇasīhasēṇāvaipurisō suṁdarō nāma ।। 6320 ।।
saṁpattō vinnattaṁ tēṇa imaṁ tassa jaha kumāra iō । gahiūṇa tuhāēsaṁ gaēṇa kaḍayassa majjhammi ।। 6321 ।।
raṇasīhadaṁḍavaṇā sikkhaviūṇaṁ ahaṁ sibirasamuhō । paṭṭhaviō dasaha juō pavarahayārōhapurisēhi ||6322 ।।
vaccatassa taō mē pahammi ēgassa jōyaṇassaṁ tē । sibiraṁ saṁmuhamētaṁ miliyaṁ diṇapacchimamuhuttē ।। 6223 ।।
।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
197
taṁ kira tahēva vahiuṁ rayaṇīē vasissaē ihāgaṁtuṁ । tō sibiramajjhamukkō pahāṇapurisō maē bhaṇiō ।। 6324।।
kannammi jōgarāō kumarēṇa tuhēvamēvamāiṭṭhē । tō tēṇa takkhaṇē cciya vahamāṇaṁ vāriu sibiraṁ । । 6325।।
tatthēva ya āvāsō gahiō aha rayaṇipaḍhamapaharaṁtē । vīsamiyasavvakaḍaē sēnnaṁ jaṁ kipi jujjhakhamaṁ ।। 6326 ।।
taṁ savvaṁ hi saṁvāhiūṇa sannāhaāuhāīyaṁ । ārōvēuṁ karahēsu tēṇa saha āraō caliō ।।6327।।
sayamēsō sēsaṁ puṇa sibiraṁ savvaṁ pi akkhamaṁ jujjhē । tatthēva ya āvāsē mukkaṁ saha sōharāēṇa ।। 6328।।
aha ēsa jōgarāō maggē ēṁtō puṇō maē bhaṇiō । jaha rāyasuyāēsō ēsō mē ciṭṭhai puṇō vi ।। 6329 ।।
jaṁ jōgarāyamēṁtaṁ maggē mōttr̥ṇa puṇa tumaṁ ējjā । tō haṁ purō gamissaṁ kumārapāsē tumaṁ tu gaō || 6330।।
apahē ṭṭhāējjā jāva puṇō ēmi tujjha pāsammi । iya taṁ bhaṇiuṁ tattō tuha pāyaṁtiya mahaṁ pattō ।। 6331||
iya sōūṇaṁ suṁdaravinnattaṁ jjhatti kumarasirivammō । sikkhaviūṇaṁ pēsai puṇō vi taṁ tassa pāsammi ।। 6332 ||
gaṁtr̥̄ṇa tēṇa kahiyaṁ sēnnaniuttassa jōgarāyassa । gāuyadugapajjatē ṭhiyassa sēntrēṇa sahiyassa || 6333॥
tuha sirivammakumārō ēvaṁ āisai jaha samaggaṁ pi । sēnnaṁ sannāhēuṁ dōhiṁ vibhāgēhi kāūṇaṁ ।।6334।।
ēkkō sēnnavibhāgō niyabaṁdhavakhēmarāyasaṁjuttō । parasēnnāgamaṇamuhē amha ccaya kaḍayabāhimmi ।।6335 ।।
niyaḍō abbhitaraō ṭhāṇaṁtaramukkaniyayasuhaḍāṇa । pēsēuṁ dhariyavvō bīyaṁ puṇa sēnapavibhāgaṁ ।।6336।।
gāhiyaṁ sayamēvatumaṁ dhāḍipayāṇujjayārisēnnassa । paraō pakkhē dūrē ṭhāējja parēhiṁ annāō ।।6337।।
muhamukkapaṇihipurisō taō jayā parabalaṁ saṭhāṇāō । amha kaḍayassa samuhaṁ saṁcalai tayā tayaṇumaggē ।। 6338।।
laggō tumaṁ sasēnnō ējjasu saṇiyaṁ taō khaṇē jattha । parabalamamhabalēṇaṁ sakaḍayaniyaḍaṭṭhiēṇa samaṁ ||6339।।
abhidr̥i tammi khaṇē jaha sattīē pahārasīlēṇa । tumaē āgaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ parassa sēnnamma hōyavvaṁ ॥।।6340।।
vajjāuhadēvīē bhavaṇāō tayā ahaṁ pi nīhariḍaṁ । karisēntrēṇa karissāmi khēmarāyassa sāhējjaṁ ।। 6341 ।।
tō tuma nēyavvā savvē vi hu attaṇā samaṁ kariṇō । ēkkaṁ pi khēmarāyassa kuṁjaraṁ mā hu appējjā ।। 6342 ॥
iya suṁdarēṇa kahiē kumārasirivammasaṁtiyā ēsē । nihuyaṁ takkhaṇamēvayatahākayaṁ jōgarāēṇaṁ ॥ 6343।।
aha taṁ aṇunnavēuṁ āgaṁtuṁ suṁdarō kahai savvaṁ । sirivammassa imō vi hu pēcchaṇayaṁ saṁvarāvē ।। 6344।।
takkhaṇamēvayavajjā uhadēvipurāō piyayamā sahiō । sapariyarō niggaṁtuṁ gaṁtūṇa niyammi āvāsē || 6345।।
sattaṭṭhajaṇē dakkhē viyaṇē dāūṇa nihuyasikkhavaṇaṁ । pēsēūṇaṁ sannaddhasattu sēnnassa saṁmuhaē || 6346 ।।
kajjagayasēsaturayā savvē kariṇō ya kaḍayamajjhāō । sannāhāisamēyā ōsārēūṇa jē dūrē ।। 6347।।
āmi ṭhaviyā samīvē gulakhēḍapurassa tē samāṇēuṁ । pakkhariūṇaṁ guḍiūṇa suhaḍasamahiṭṭhiē kāuṁ ।। 6348।।
ārahiūṇa gaiṁdē sayaṁ pi kaya sudaḍha dēhasannāhō । raṇatūrāī pavaṇīkāūṇaṁ divīyadharē ya ।। 6349 ।।
vārēūṇaṁ saddaṁ baṁdiyaṇāṇaṁ tahēva tūrāṇaṁ । sanniya nihiyavanhīṇa dōviyāṇaṁ caujjōyaṁ ।। 6350 ।।
kaḍayanivēsāu bahiṁ nīharijaṁ khēmarāyasēnnassa | majjhammi ṭṭiō gaṁtuṁ nihuō sirivammavarakumarō ।। 6351।।
paṁcavisaē gaiṁdāṇa dāṇasaṁsittamēiṇīvīḍhē | paṁtīē ṭhavai kamasō niyammi sēnnamma savvattha ।। 6352 ।।
tō sattaṭṭajaṇāē sikkhaviḍaṁ purā kumārēṇa । paṭṭaviyā parasēnē tē jjhatti nirāuhā hōuṁ ।। 6353 ।।
kaya gāmēllayavēsā nīhariūṇaṁ niyāu kaḍayāō । puraō niyadvāṇaṁtaranarāṇa kajjaṁ kahēūṇa || 6354।।
puraō caliyā parasēnnasaṁmuhā garuyagaruyasaddēṇa । annōnnaṁ kuvvaṁtā kahāu gāmīṇagōha vva
parasēnnasaṁtiēhi aha tē muharakkhaēhiṁ gahiūṇa । puṭṭhā ēvaṁ jaha ēttiyāē rayaṇīē kē tubbhē
॥ 6355 ।।
।।6356 ॥ |

=== vardhamanaoutput-198-to-198.json ==========================
198
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
uttara samma ihō kayasaṁkēēhi tēhi puvvaṁpi । jjhatti uttaṁ amhē kālavalīgāmavatthavvā ।। 6357।।
kōḍuṁbiyā nasaṇahēuṁ vajjāuhāē dēvīē । āsi gayā tattha taō diṭṭhō sirivammavarakumarō ।। 6358।।
pēcchaṇayaṁ kārēṁtō ṭhiyā taō tattha cēva sayaladiṇaṁ । raryāṇi ca ēttiyaṁ ikkhamāṇayā kōuyavasēṇa ।। 6359 ।।
saṁpai puṇa ugghaḍiyaṁ pēcchaṇayaṁ niggaō jaṇō savvō । dēvīpurāu tattō sirivammō rāyakumarō ya ।। 6360।।
niyayāvāsē pattō caliyā amhē vi niyagihābhimuhā । muṁha kuṇaha pasāyaṁ jaha vaccāmō niyaggāmē ।। 6361।।
muharakkha ēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kaha muṁcāmō mahaṁtarayaṇīē । kō jāṇai kē vi tumē cōrā jārā va baṁdī vā ॥ 6362।।
gāmēllaēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tumhāṇaṁ pacchimēhi purisēhi । ṭhāṇaṁtaraṭṭhiēhi mukkā amhē kahiyavattā ।।6363।।
tumhē kaha nō muṁha ēgassa vi ṭhakkarassa paḍibaddhā । sēvagapurisā hōuṁ narasīhanarēhi tō bhaṇiyaṁ ।। 6364 ॥
kō sō ēgō cciya amha ṭhakkurō tō bhāṁti gāmēllā । sirivammō varakumarō tumha na kiṁ ṭhakkurō ēsō ।। 6365 ।।
narasīhanarēhiṁ taō paḍivannaṁ dhuttimāē tavvayaṇaṁ । sō cciya amha vi sāmī kiṁ tu vibhinnammi ṭhāṇammi || 6366 ||
tē vimukkā amhē ciṭṭhāmō tō na jāva vinnāyaṁ । sammaṁ amhēhi sayaṁ tāva kahaṁ uvarimē purisē ।।6367।।
pattē gururayaṇīē ēmēva visajjimō taō tumhē । ciṭṭhaha muhattamēgaṁ tō sāhēḍaṁ vimum̐cāmō ॥6368॥
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ ēgō purisō narasīhadaṁḍavaipāsē । gaṁtūṇa tavvaiyaraṁ sāhai sō bēi jaha tēsi ।। 6369।।
pacchāhuttaṁ gaṁtuṁ dāyavvaṁ nēya na viya niyapāsē । dhārēyavvā suiraṁ ēē annaha kuṇēmāṇā || 6370।।
vaḍḍēṇaṁ saddēṇaṁ kōlāhalamiyarabhūrilōyassa । jāṇāvissaṁti taō na kajjasiddhī havai amha ।।6371।।
puraō vōlāvēuṁ pēsaha sigdhaṁ pi jā na jāṇaṁti । amha sarūvaṁ kiṁci vi ēē gāmēllayā purisā ॥। 6372।
aha narasīhāṇāēsō purisō sigdhamēva āgaṁtuṁ । tē gāmēllē savvē taha caiva visajjaē nihuē || 6373।।
ēttō jē narasīhēṇa daṁḍanāhēṇa āsi viṇiuttā । puvvaṁ purisā sirivammasuddhipariyāṇaṇanimittaṁ ॥ 6374||
tēsi khaṇaṁ paḍikkhaṇakaē nivannāṇa viyaṇadvāṇammi । niddā samāgayā jaggiyaṁ taō tēhi savilaṁba ।। 6375 ।।
aha tē sigghaṁ pi gayā vajjā uhadēvi purabahiṁ jāva । tāva na pēcchaṇayajjhaṇi sugaṁti na jaṇōhanigvōsaṁ ।। 6376।।
tō tē paōlidārē kavāḍapihiyammi niyaḍayā hōuṁ । pucchaṁti dāravālaṁ dārabbhaṁtaraṭhiyaṁ ēvaṁ ।। 6377।।
jaha sirivammakumārō majjhāō niggaō taō tēṇa । kahiyaṁ sō nīharijaṁ iō gaō ēttiyakhaṇēṇa ।। 6378।।
niyaṭhāṇammi vipattō saṁbhāvijjai tahā pattō ya । iya sōuṁ jjhatti niyattiūṇa tē pacchaō gaṁtuṁ ।। 6379 ।।
narasīhadaṁḍavaiṇō tammagganihālaṇaṁ kuṇaṁtassa । sārhēti jahādiṭṭha nisuyaṁ ca paōlipurisāu || 6380।।
taṁ sōuṁ narasīhō caliō sirivammasaṁmuhō jjhati । gāmēllayā vi purisā mukkā narasīhapurisēhi ||6381 ।।
sigdhaṁ ciya gaṁtūṇaṁ sannaddhabalassa jōgarāyassa । puraō sārhēti jahā sirivammakumāra sikkhāē ।।6382 ।।
ēvaṁ ēva amhē samāgayā ēttha tumha pāsammi । iha tēṇa tuhāiṭṭha jaha sēnnaṁ khēmarāyassa ।। 6383 ।।
āgaṁtūṇa maē sayamahiṭṭiyaṁ ciṭṭhaē karibalēṇa । jammi khaṇē taṁ pāsasi amha balē dīviujjōyaṁ ।। 6384 ॥
suṇasi raṇatūrasaddaṁ garuyaṁ baṁdiyaṇapaḍhaṇanigghōsaṁ । tammi khaṇē jāṇējjā jaha jujjhaṁ ciṭṭhaē hōṁta ।। 6385 ।।
tō suṁdarēṇa kahiyaṁ amhā ēvaṁ tumaṁ karējjāsi । ēvaṁ kahiūṇa ṭhiyā ciṭṭhēti imē khaṇaṁ jāva ।। 6386 ।।
tā takkhaṇē purā jōga rāyapaṭṭhaviyahēriyana rēhiṁ । āgaṁtūṇaṁ kahiyaṁ narasīhabalaṁ purō caliyaṁ ।। 6387 ।।
tō tayaṇumaggalaggō niyasēnnasamanniō saucchāhō । saṁcalai jōgarāō pattō narasīhasēnnamma ।। 6388 ||

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
sirivammakaḍayasaṁtiyaṭhāṇaṁtarapurisapēlaṇaṁ kāuṁ । puraō pattē narapuṁgavaṁ garuhasēnnapurisēhiṁ ।। 6389।।
vihiō dīvajjōō pahaō saṁgāmatūrasaṁghāō । sirivammakumaraguṇagāmakittaṇaṁ kuvvamāṇēhiṁ ॥ 6390।।
vēyāliyavaṁdēhi pāraddhō garuyakalayalārāvī । taṁ daṭṭha narasīhō savimhaō citai maṇammi || 1391।।
kaha amhē vinnāyā imēhiṁ kahavāvi ēttiyaṁ sēnnaṁ । aviyakkiyapi miliyaṁ riūṇa sannaddhagayaturayaṁ ॥6392।।
ahavā na ēsa samaō citāē kiṁtu paharaṇāvasarō । iya citiūṇa suhaḍā sayaṁ samucchāhiyā jujjhē ।। 6393 ।।
tē jujjhatā parabalaaggāṇīēṇa takkhaṇē bhaggā । tē bhajjaṁtē daṭhṭhē sayaṁ samuṭṭhēi narasīhō ।। 6394।।
paharaṁtēṇa imēṇaṁ parasēnnamuhaṁ paraṁmuhaṁ nīyaṁ । taṁ ōsaraṁtamavalōiūṇa rōsāruṇacchimuhō ।।6395 ।।
uṭhēi khēmarāō duvvisahō muttimaṁ va jamarāō । pahaṇatō paḍivakkhaṁ paraṁmuhaṁ takkhaṇē nētō ।। 6396 ॥
ahaṁ taṁ aruddhapasaraṁ parasēnnaṁ saṁmuhaṁ tahā ētaṁ । pēkkhēuṁ saṁbhaṁtō narasīhō citaē ēvaṁ ॥6397॥
jaha parasēnnaṁ ēyaṁ sasāmi samahiṭṭhiyaṁ payai sūraṁ । sannaddhaṁ siṁdhurasaṁjuyaṁ ca thēvaṁpi tō dujjayaṁ ॥।6398।।
tāki kajjēṇa viṇā niya sannaparikkhayaṁ karāvēmi । iya citiuṁ niyattai jāva imō samaramajjhāō ॥ 6399 ॥
tō pacchā saṁpattō ujjōyāīhi kahiyacadhēhiṁ । nāūṇa jujjhasamayaṁ daṁḍavaī jōgarāō vi ।। 6400।।
tō narasīhassa purō kahiyaṁ niyasēnnasaṁtiyanarēhiṁ । jaha pacchā vi na labbhai gaṁtuṁ parabalasamīvāō ।।6401 ।।
jaṁ jōgarāyasuhaḍō hayagaya - sāhaṇasamanniō pacchā । paharaṁtō saṁpattō sirivammakumārasaṁbaddhō ||6402||
taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ narasīhō citaē puṇō ēvaṁ । tāva cciya rakkhijjai appā jā phurai taduvāō ||6403।।
iha tu samāvaḍiyaṁ maraṇaṁ niyamēṇa saṁkaḍagayāṇa । amhāṇaṁtā juttaṁ parasēnē pahariuṁ cēva 6404।।
bhaṇiyaṁ tahā ya kēṇai bhaiyavvaṁ tāva caiva ya bhayāu । jā nēi bhayaṁ pattē bhayammi ṭhāējja tayabhihō ||6405 ||
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tēṇa niyaṁ paṭṭisaṁṭhiyaṁ sēnnaṁ । jaṛa nāsissaha tubbhē tahā vi bhē āgaō maccū ||6406||
tamhā nīsaṁkēhi hōūṇaṁ saṁmuhēhiṁ tumhēhi । pacchāgayariusē niyasattīē pahariyavvaṁ ॥ 6407।।
aggimasēnnammi puṇō sirivammāhiṭṭhiē sasattīē । paharissamahaṁ sēntrēṇa saṁjuō kēttiṇā vi ॥ 6408।।
iya narasīhēṇa samaṁ kayamaṁtaviṇicchayaṁ sarōsacchaṁ । kumarasudaṁsaṇasaṁpēsiyaṁ balaṁ maraṇadinamaṇaṁ । ||6409।।
dō pakkhasaṁṭhiēṇa vi sirivammabalēṇa saha samāraddhaṁ । jujjhēuṁ samujjiūṇa niyajīyaniravēkkhaṁ ||6410।।
iya vaṭṭatē aighōrasaṁgarēṇēga suhaḍasaṁjuttō । sēṇāvai narasīhō niṇaṁ pattō khaṇadvēṇa ।।6411।।
paṁcattagayaṁ nāuṁ narasīhaṁ daṁḍanāyagaṁ tattō । jāyaṁ jjhatti visannaṁ sēsaṁ sēnnaṁ asēsa pi ।। 6312
saṁbuddhaṁ bhayavēviragattaṁ turiyaṁ palāyaṇapavattaṁ । gaṁtuṁ ca apāvaṁtaṁ sannāhāuhahaē caiuṁ ।।6413।।
dīṇāī payaṁpataṁ giṇhēṁ aṁgulī udatēhi । mukkaṁ sadaṁsaṇabalaṁ sirivammakumārasēṇa ||6414।।
jāyaṁ taō pabhāyaṁ sūrēṇa hayammi nahayalē timirē । sirivammēṇavasamarājirammi dappaṭṭhariusē ।6415।।
sirivammakumārōgayavarāō ōyarai mukkasannāhō । sēsaṁpi savvasēnaṁ sannāhaṁ āuhaṁ muyai ।।6416।।
guḍapakkharāu ōyāriūṇa kariṇō turaṁgamā taha ya । ālāṇakkhaṁbhēsuṁ vallīsu ya saṁjamijjati ।। 6417 ||
sōhijjai raṇabhūmī uppāḍijjati dhāiyāsuhaḍā । saparabalasaniyāṇavi vaṇakammaṁ kīraē tēsi ।।6418
aha sirivammakumārī hakkārēūṇa kēlayaṁ nāma । paṇihi naraṁ ēgaṁtē tassa purō sāhai asēsaṁ ।।6419।।
jaha jāō saṁgāmō rayaṇīē pacchimammi jāmammi । jaha nijjiyaṁ parabalaṁ jaha niō sattusēnnaī || 6420 ।।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
jaha parasēnnaturaṁgā sannāhā āuhāṇi gahiyāṇi । taṁ savvaṁ kahiūṇaṁ sigdhaṁ ciya pēsaē ēyaṁ । । 6421 । ।
raṇasīhadaṁḍavaiṇō pāsē savvassa tassa kahaṇatthaṁ । takkāluciyaṁ taha jōgarāyapamuhassa niyayassa ।। 6422||
parivārassa samaggassa vi dāūṇaṁ puḍhō puḍhō sikkhaṁ । sirivammō niddāsuhamaṇuhavai sayaṁ nivakumārō || 6423॥
parabalaturaṁgamā uhasannāhāīṇa savvavatthūṇa । kārēi jōgarāō saṁkhaṁ paṁcaulapāsāō ||6424।।
ghāiyaturaṁgamāṇa vikārai vaṇapaṭṭabaṁdhaṇāīyaṁ । annaṁ pi samuciyaṁ jaṁ karēi kārēi taṁ savvaṁ ।। 6425।।
ahavīrapāla kumarō nāūṇaṁ rayaṇisamarasaṁraṁbhaṁ । pēsēi niē purisē sirivammakumārapāsammi ||6426॥
aha sannihiyanarēhiṁ kumāra sirivammasaṁtiēhi taō । uciyāsaṇapaḍivatti kāuṁ uvavēsiyā ēē ॥। 6427॥
kahiyaṁ ca tāṇa puraō aha jāyaṁ ajja sayalarayaṇīē । jāgaraṇaṁ sirivammassa tēṇa inhi imō suttō ।।6429 ॥
ciṭṭhai khaṇaṁtarēṇaṁ uṭṭhissai ihēva uvavidvā । tubbhē paḍikkhahakkhaṇaṁ tēhi taō jaṁpiyaṁ ēyaṁ ॥ 6429 ॥
rayaṇīē jahā jāō saṁgāmō taha sarūvamakkhēha । tumhē vi amha puraō paccakkhaṁ taṁ jaō tumha || 6430 ||
sirivammanarēhiṁ taō hakkārēūṇa tattha āṇīō nāmēṇa jōgarāō pahāṇapurisō kumārassa ||6431।।
sō vīrapālapurisēhiṁ pucchiō sāhaē raṇasarūvaṁ । kahiūṇa tammi mōṇēṇa saṁṭhiē jaggiyaṁ jhatti ॥ 5332 ॥
sirivammakumārēṇa vi sannihiyanarēhiṁ sāhiyaṁ tassa । jaha vīrapālakumarēṇa pēsiyā saṁti niyapurisā ।। 6433।।
tumha samīvammi paōyaṇēṇa ciṭṭhēti dāriuvavidvā । aha sō kayasiṁgārō āgaṁtuṁ tattha uvaviṭṭhō ||6434||
tō vīrapālapurisā namiūṇaṁ vinnavaṁti taṁ ēvaṁ । amhē nisivr̥ttaṁtaṁ pucchē pēsiyā ēttha || 6435॥
kumarēṇa vīrapālēṇa taṁ puṇō jōgarāyapāsāō । amhēhi parinnāyaṁ inhi āisaha jaha gaṁtuṁ ॥6436।।
sāhēmō niyapaṇō sirivammēṇa vi visajjiyā ēē | taṁbōla payāṇāī kāūṇaṁ garuyasammāṇaṁ ।। 6437 ||
gaṁtaṇa vīrapālassa sāhiē tēhi tammi vr̥ttaṁtē । sikkhaviūṇaṁ dūsaladaṁḍavaī tēṇa paṭṭaviō
sirivammassa samīvē saṁpattō vihiyauciyapaḍivattī । uvaviṭṭhō sō jaṁpara jaha amhē vīrapālē
kumarēṇa tumha pāsē dāumuvālaṁbhamētthapaṭṭaviyā । iya tēṇa bhāṇiyaṁ jaha amhē nivasūrapālē
tumhāṇaṁ sāhējjē pēsaviyā tō na kīsa tumhēhiṁ । amhāṇa vi parikahiyaṁ kuṇamāṇēhiṁ raṇaṁ ēvaṁ
aha sirivammakumārō taṁ jaṁpai jaha na ucchahēūṇa । amhēhi raṇaṁ gahiyaṁ kiṁ tu nividvāṇa āvāsē ।। 6442 ।।
amhāṇuvara sēnnaṁ tēṇēva sudaṁsaṇēṇa paṭṭaviyaṁ । tammi samayammi tumhaṁ kahiuṁ kaha tīraē vattā ||6443 ||
ētthaṁtarammi pattō purisō raṇasīhapēsiō tattha । namiūṇa tēṇa kahiyaṁ ēvaṁ sirivammakumarassa ।। 6444 ।।
baṁdhēuṁ saṁgahiō hatthēṇa sudaṁsaṇō nivakumārō । raṇasīhadaṁḍavaiṇā iha ēṁtō ciṭṭhaē inhi ।। 6445 ।।
aha sirivammakumārō apayāsiyasavvapaharisaviyārō । pubvapayaiṭṭhiō cēva pucchaē tassa pāsammi || 6446 ||
amhēhiṁ pēsiō jō kēluyaō nāma daṁḍanāhassa । raṇasīhassa samīvē sō pattō tattha kiṁ nēya ।। 6447।।
aha raṇasīhassa narō paṇamēuṁ sāhaē kumārassa । jammi samaē kumārō sudaṁsaṇō baṁdhiuṁ gahiō ।।6448 ।।
tammi samayammi pattō sō tattha nivēiyaṁ ca tēṇa taō । raṇasīhadaṁḍavaiṇō tumhāiṭṭhaṁ samaggaṁ pi ।। 6449 ।।
paccakkhaṁ tassa sudaṁsaṇassa jaha jaha suṇēi sō ēvaṁ maliṇaṁ maliṇayaraṁ vayaṇamappaṇō taha taha karēi ।।6450 ।।
taṁ sōūṇaṁ dūsaladaṁḍavaī vimhiō niyamaṇammi । citai sirivammakumārasaṁtiyaṁ vikkamamauvvaṁ ।। 6451 ।।
taṁ buddhiguṇaṁ niuṇaṁ jassāraṁbhī phalēṇa nivvaḍai । savvaṁ pi ahōrattaṁ vajjāu dēvibhavaṇammi || 6452।।
kallafmma ṭhiō ēsō acitiyaṁ siddhamajja taṁ kajjaṁ । jaṁ annassa na sijjhai varisēṇa vicitamāṇassa । । 6453 ।।

201
tā savvā vipannā pōrisapunnāṇa pagarisō ēsō । gaṁbhīrayā vi ēyassa asarisī kā visā bhuvaṇē ||6454।।
annassa jā na dīsai riugahaṇakahāē kannapattāē । namaṇaṁ pi vimhaō paharisō ya paridaṁsiō imiṇā ।। 6455 ।।
puṇa
sirivammō pucchai kēttiya yaṁ karituraṁgamāīyaṁ । gahiyaṁ raṇasīhēṇaṁ tattha sudaṁsaṇakumārassa ।। 6456।।
sō kahai tāva gahiyaṁ rahakarituragāiyaṁ samaggaṁ pi । ēvaṁ ciya jāṇēhaṁ sammaṁ na muṇēmi puṇa saṁkhaṁ || 6457।।
paracakkaṁ nāūṇaṁ naṭṭhō jē kē vi māṇavā tattha । tēhi vi na kiṁpi nīyaṁ annaṁ aṁgēṇau palāṇā || 6458।।
aha dūsaladaṁḍavaī sirivammaṁ kumaramērisaṁ bhaṇai । puvvamuvālaṁbhō vīrapālakumarēṇa tumhāṇaṁ ।। 6459 ॥
akkhāviō taō puṇa nimaṁtaṇaṁ savva sēnnasahiyāṇa । kārāviyaṁ samīvāu majjha tō mannau kumārō ।। 6460 ।।
paḍivannaṁ sirivammēṇa tassa sēṇāhivassa taṁ vayaṇaṁ । dāvēūṇaṁ ghaṇasārasaṁjuyaṁ pavarataṁbōlaṁ ॥ 6461 ||
।
jāva kumārō ēvaṁ visajjaē tāva jjhatti saṁpattō । raṇasīhadaṁḍanāhō tō sirivammēṇa kumarēṇa ॥6462॥
dūsaladaṁḍā hivaī puṇō vibhaṇiō jahā paḍikkhēha । khaṇamiha sēṇāhivaī raṇasīhaṁ amha pēkkhēha ||6463॥
aha uṭṭhi kāmō vi ēsō jō kō tumha āēsō । saṁjāyai sō kīrai iya jaṁpatō tahēva ṭhiō ||6464||
uvaviṭṭhō dūsaladaṁḍaṇāyagō niyamaṇē vi citēi । kaha gaṁbhīraṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kumarēṇa ahō imaṁ vayaṇaṁ ।। 6465 ।।
jaha raṇasīhaṁ pēkkhaha sudaṁsaṇaṁ pāsaha tti nō bhaṇiyaṁ | jamhā sagavvamēyaṁ pasihāi bhaṇijjamāṇaṁ pi ।।6466 ।।
raṇasīhadaṁsaṇē puṇa bhaṇijjamāṇammi hōi suyaṇattaṁ । cittammi icchiō puṇa sudaṁsaṇō daṁsiumimassa ।। 6467॥
annaha parivārē iha annē vi imassa saṁti varapurisā । raṇasīhēṇa saricchā tē savvē kiṁ na daṁsēi ||6468।।
tā sōcci bhāvō ēyassa maṇammi jō maē nāō । ēttō raṇasīhēṇaṁ ōyārēuṁ rahavarāō ।।6469।।
baddhaṁ sudaṁsaṇaṁ daṁsiūṇa sirivammanivakumārassa । bhaṇiyaṁ sudaṁsaṇō ēsa tumha sēvaṁ samāyarai ।।6470।।
aha sirivammēṇa imō bhaṇiō jaha baṁdhaṇāu mōēuṁ । ēyaṁ sudaṁsaṇaṁ gurusuhēṇa jattēṇa ya dharēha || 6471 ।।
aha sirivammāēsāṇaṁtaramēṇa taha kayaṁ jjhati । sayamāgaṁtūṇa taō paṇaō sirivammacaraṇēsu ।। 6472॥
gāḍhaṁ tēṇa vi avagūhiūṇa mukkō imō samuṭṭhēuṁ । dinnāsaṇammi jā phira uvavisiuṁ vaṁchaē tāva ।। 6473॥
bhaṇiyaṁ sirivammēṇaṁ jaha ēsō sūrapālarāyassa | ciṭṭha sēṇāhivaī nāṇaṁ dūsalō pattō ।। 6474॥
tō raṇasīhō diṭṭhi dūsaladaṁḍāhivammi pēsēuṁ । tassābhi hō caliō samuṭṭhiō sammuhō sō vi ।। 6475।।
dō vita annanaṁ gāḍhaṁ avagr̥haṇaṁ karēūṇa । jōḍiyahatthā pucchaṁti kusalavattaṁ sarīrassa ।।6476।।
niyaniyaṭhāṇammi taō uvaviṭṭhā dūsalēṇa tō bhaṇiō । raṇasīhō jaha tumaē saccaviyaṁ niyayamabhihāṇaṁ ||
kira jāṇiūṇa dinnaṁ amma piyarēhiṁ tumha iya nāmaṁ । raṇasīhō taṁ jaṁpai ēsa payāvō kumārassa ।।6478।।
annaha puṇa kā sattī ēvaṁvihakajjasāhaṇē amha । tō dūsalō payaṁpai ēvaṁciya taṁ jaha taē bhaṇiyaṁ ॥ 6479।।
kitu payāvō vi paraṁ pattavisēsaṁ samīhaē nūṇaṁ । raviṇō tēō jaha dappaṇammi paviyaṁbhaē ahiyaṁ ।। 6480।।
mamiliṇammi vi taha khapparammi ki ēsa lahai māhappaṁ । tā amhuvari pasāō aigaruō ēsa nimmaviō । 81 ।
sirivammakumārēṇaṁ taē samaṁ daṁsaṇaṁ kathaṁ ajja । jaṁ amhāṇaṁ iccāi jaṁpiūṇaṁ ṭhiō mōṇaṁ ||6482॥
aha sirivammakumārō imaṁ visajjai imō vi gaṁtūṇa । niyayā vāsē sāhai taṁ savvaṁ vīrapālassa || 6483॥
sō vi muttaṁ sirivammakumāraguṇakahaṁ kāuṁ । saha dūsalēṇa pacchā sakajjasāhaṇaparō hōi ||6484।।
sirivammakumārō vihu avasaralōyaṁ visajjaē savvaṁ । raṇasīhaṁ puṇa āisai jaha tumaṁ gaṁtumāvāsaṁ ॥ 6485।।
ējjaha puṇō vi sigdhaṁ samāgaō sō vi taha vihēūṇa । tō sirivammakumārō viyaṇē hōūṇa raṇasīhaṁ ॥। 6486॥

1
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
pucchai savvasarūvaṁ vinnavai imō vi mūlaō pabhiī । jaha vajjāuha dēvī bhavaṇaniviṭṭhēhiṁ tumhēhiṁ ।। 6487।।
aigayadiṇassa taiē jāmammi ahaṁ imaṁ samāiṭṭhō । amha pamāyaṁ jaha kira sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ vigappēuṁ ॥ 6488।।
amhuvari kayā pauṇā ciṭṭai dhāḍī nisāē viramammi । tō appabalō hōhī ēmō pacchā taē gaṁtuṁ । । 6489।।
chantrēṇaṁ sēnnēṇaṁ jīvaṁtō cēva ēsa gahiyavvō । tō takkhaṇaṁ ciya maē tumha samīvāu āgaṁtuṁ ।।6490 ।।
paḍhamaṁ pi tumha sikkhaṁ kannē kahiūṇa pēsiō samuhō । saha dasahi āsavārēhiṁ suṁdarī ētasibirassa ।। 6491।।
tō maṁḍaliyāibhaḍā sikkhaviyā jaha muhēṇa tumhahiṁ । bhaṇiyavvaṁ ērisayaṁ jaha sāmī amha pēcchaṇaē ।। 6492 ।।
vajjāu dēvīē āsattō ciṭṭhaē samaggapi । raryāṇi tattha gamissara tō amhē ajja nīsaṁkā || 6493 ||
niya niya kajjāī sāhiūṇa annanna niyaḍanayarēsu । puṇa ēsāmō sigdhaṁ sūruggamaṇasamayammi ।। 6494 ।।
iya kā paghōsaṁ niya niya vidēṇa thōva thōtrēṇa । āuhasahiyā sannāhavirahiyā turayamārūḍhā ।। 6495।।
nīhariumiō tumbhē paḍhamaṁ annannanayaragaggē । sūratthamaṇāu āraō vi savvē vi gacchējjā ।।6496 ।।
pacchā rayaṇīē muhē pasaratē bahalatimi niuraṁbē । jō jattō sō tattō niyattiuṁ nihuyaṁ nihuyapayaṁ ।। 6497 ।।
nivasurapālamaṁḍalamajjha gavaṇavalligāmaparabhāgē । vāsavapuramaggabhiē avitthinammi varṇasaṁḍē ||6498 ।।
miliyavvaṁ savvēhi vi tumhahi taō jayā parō kō vi । pucchējja taḥtha tumbhē tō ēvaṁ tassa sāhējjā ।। 6499।।
vāsavadattanivēṇaṁ vasaṁtasirināmiyāē dhūyāē । saha paṭṭaviyaṁ sēnaṁ jaṁ āsitayaṁ niyattamiṇaṁ ।। 6500 ॥
pariṇīyāē tīē visajjiyaṁ savvamēva iṇhi tu । vāsavapurammi vaccai iya sikkhaviyā taha gayā tō ।। 6501 ।।
gahapālō vi hu ēvaṁ sikkhaviuṁ paḍhamamēvavaṇasaṁḍē । tammi maē paṭṭaviō balēṇa saha kēttiēṇā vi ॥ 6502 ।।
aha tēsuṁ niggaēsuṁ aviralaturaṁgamāṇusaṁ jāyaṁ । savvaṁ pi amha kaḍayaṁ kaliyaṁ kēvalakaribalēṇa ।। 6503 ||
pacchā niggayasēsa pāyala sēnnaṁ jamāsi kiṁ pi ṭhiyaṁ । taṁ majjhāō nīhāriūṇa kaḍayassa bāhimmi ||6504 ||
savvattō kaṁḍanivāyajuyalapajjaṁtabhūpaēsammi । ṭhāṇaṁtarēsu ṭhaviyaṁ niraṁtaraṁ tō maē savvaṁ ।। 6505 ॥
kiṁtu paraṁparasēnnāgamaṇamuhē taṁ maē pabhūyayaraṁ । mukkaṁ iyaraṭhāṇēsu ṭhāviyaṁ thēva thēvaṁtu ॥6506 ।।
taha tē ṭhāṇaṁtariyā iya bhaṇiyā jaha kamēṇa jaggaṁtā । tubbhē rakkhējjaha savvarayaṇimihaparanarapavēsaṁ ।।6507।।
parasēnnāgamamuhaṭhāviyā narāiyavisēsaō bhaṇiyā । jaiyā parabaladhāḍi ēṁti pāsaha tayā tubhē ।। 6508||
tattōpalāiūṇaṁ āgaṁtuṁ jjhatti kaḍayamajjhammi । yi purisāṇaṁ pakahējja jaha taō tē vi nāsēuṁ ।। 6509।।
duiēṇaṁ pakkhēṇaṁ nīhariūṇaṁ purammi guḍakhēḍē । vaccati tēhi saddhi tumhē vi vaējja tayabhimuhā ||6410।।
iya tē bhaṇiuṁ pacchā sōhēuṁ kaḍayamajjhamainiuṇaṁ । nīhāriyaṁ uvarimaṁ lahu tatō māṇusa sēsaṁ । 6511।।
ētthaṁtarammi taraṇī atthagiridaggasiharamārūḍhō । tō kajjapēsiyāṇaṁ hayāṇa suhaḍāṇa ya nimittaṁ ।। 6512।।
pakkharasannāhāī ārōhēūṇa, karaha-rahauvari । pavaṇīkāūṇamaē mukkaṁ jā hōi ghaṇatimiraṁ ।। 6513 ।।
hakkāriuṁ maē tō pīluvaī tumha vayaṇaō bhaṇiō । jaha addharattasamaē gahiuṁ gayasāsaṇaṁ savvaṁ ।। 6514 । ।
nihuyaṁ ghaṁṭāhiṁ viṇā payanigaḍayavajjiyaṁ tumaṁ ēttō । kaḍayāu nīhariḍaṁ dūrē gulakhēḍapurapāsē ।।6515।।
gaṁtūṇaṁ ṭhāējjā guḍhēṁcaramāiyaṁ pi jāṇēsu । ārōvēḍaṁ saha attaṇā taē tattha nēyavvaṁ ।। 5616 । ।
taha āvāsēsu ṭhiyā jē kē vi turaṁgamā tayārōhā । savvē bhaṇiyā jaha karibalēṇa saha nīharaṁtēṇa ।। 6517 ।।
tumhahiṁ vi gaṁtavvaṁ āruhiuṁ niya nisu turaēsu । pakkharasannāhāī saha nēyavvaṁ rahārūḍhaṁ ।। 6518॥

taha tumha daviṇakaṁcaṇakappaḍakōsāhigāriṇō savvē | iya bhaṇiyā jammi khaṇē pīluvaī gayabalaṁ gahiuṁ ।। 6519।।
naharii iō tajhyā tumhēhi viniyaniyaṁ gahēūṇa । bhaṁḍāgāraṁ saha tēṇa kaḍayamajjhāō gaṁtavvaṁ ।। 6520 ।।
annē vi maē bhaṇiyā niyakaḍayanivāsiṇō jaṇā ēvaṁ । jaṁ ki pi sārabhūyaṁ tumhatthi tayaṁ samaggaṁ pi ।। 6521।।
gahiūṇaṁ tubbhēhi kumārakōsāhigārilōēṇa । saha ētō kaḍayāō gaṁtavvaṁ nīharēūṇa ||6522।।
kiṁ bahuṇā āvāsē ēkkēkkaṁ rakkhagaṁ vi mōttūṇa | sēsaṁ dupayaṁ caupayamapayaṁ va na kiṁpi dhariyavvaṁ ।। 6523 ।।
āvāsarakkhagā vihu ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa tē vi mōttavvā । ṭhāṇaṁtariyā purisā jammi khaṇē tumha āgaṁtuṁ ।। 6524।।
sāhēti āvaḍata parabaladhāḍi tayā muhaṁ tīsē । pariharijaṁ tumhēhiṁ annayaradisāē kaḍayāō ।। 5525 ।।
nōharijaṁ gaṁtavvaṁ āvāsē ujjhiūṇa sigdhaṁ pi । iya tēsiṁ dāūṇaṁ sikkhamahaṁ uvaraō jāva ।। 6526।।
tā jāmiṇīē jāō samaō paḍhamassa addhajāmassa । abbhullasaṁtabahalaṁdhayāraduppēcchanihatthō ||6527 ।।
aha sannāhappamuhaṁ pavaṇīkayamāsi jaṁ maē puvvaṁ । taṁ gahiūṇa gaō haṁ vaṇavallīgāmavaṇasaṁḍē ।। 6528 ।।
tammi samayammi pattaṁ sēnnaṁ sēsaṁpi tattha āgaṁtuṁ । jaṁ diṇacautthajāmē kaḍayāō niggayaṁ āsi ।। 6529 ॥
jāō nisīhasamaō khaṇaṁtarē tattha kōvi pahiyajaṇō । cakamai nē ya kattha vi maggē kaha vihu vihivasēṇa ।।
saṁvāhēūṇa taō sēnnaṁ savvaṁ pi tēṇa sahiōhaṁ । saṁpaṭṭiō mahābalanivamaṁḍalasamuhaṁ tattō ॥6531॥
majjhami tassa gaṁtuṁ daṁtaurapurassa maggamaṇusariḍaṁ । tattō sudaṁsaṇakumārakaḍayamaggassa saṁmuhayaṁ ॥6532 ॥
valiō saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ samāgaō tāva jāva taṁ kaḍyaṁ । hōi sudaṁsaṇataṇayaṁ vavahāṇē jōyaṇēkkassa ।।6533||
tattō appaduijjō kāliyaō pēsiō maē puraō । sikkhaviūṇa sudaṁsaṇakaḍaē gaṁtūṇa sō tattha ।।6534।।
kassai kahai mahābalaparāēṇa sudaṁsaṇassa saṁvāhē । dujjōhaṇadaṁḍavaī paṭṭhaviō ciṭṭhaē tō ॥6535।।
kannaparaṁparaēṇaṁ kumarēṇa sudaṁsaṇēṇa iya nisuyaṁ । kēṇa kayā ēsa kahā iya sōhēuṁ imō gahiō ।। 6536।।
nīō pāsammi sudaṁsaṇassa puṭṭhō kahēi taṁ caiva । pucchēi sēnnasaṁkhaṁ sudaṁsaṇō kāliō kahai ।।6537।।
āsārōhasahassā pannāsaṁ paṁcarahasahassā ya । uddēsēṇaṁ ciṭṭhai iya saṁkhā tassa sēnnassa ||6538 ||
annaṁ pi subahusēnnaṁ ētaṁ suvvai puṇō vi paṭṭhīē । aha pamuiō payaṁpai sudaṁsaṇō appaṇō purisaṁ ।। 6539 ।।
pāsaṭhiyaṁ jaha ।
sāramapēccha kahaṁ amha jāyamaṇukūlaṁ । laddha ṇavasaṁtasiri sirivammō tāva mūḍhappā ।। 6540 ।।
tīē pāsaṭṭiyāē pēcchaṇayā lōyaṇammi āsatō | ciṭṭhai na maṁ avēkkhai usīsayasaṁṭhiyaṁ ēttha ||6541 ।।
na muṇai
niya sēnaṁ pihū disōdisi appachaṁdayaṁ jaṁtaṁ । bhajjāē vihu sēnnaṁ nīhariyaṁ jāi niyaṭhāṇē ।। 6542 ॥
vaṇavalliṁgāmapaē sē vaccataṁ taṁ pi kēṇaī diṭṭhaṁ । iya kēṇai maha siddhaṁ amha ccaya kaḍayapurisēṇa ।। 6543 ।।
tō sāramēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ bharavasaō tassa ciṭṭaē । hiyaē । dūsaladaṁḍāhivavīrapāla kumarāṇa saṁbaddhō ||6544 ।।
aha jaṁpēi sudaṁsaṇakumarō jaha dōvi tassa tē vattaṁ । jāṇissaṁti mayassa va baṁdhē ahava gahiyassa ।। 6545 ।।
tō kāliō vicitai ēmēva mahattayaṁ paḍikkhēha । tō muṇihisi kō bajjhai kō vā marai ti niyamēṇa ||6546 ।
tō sāramēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kumāra tumbhē mahābalanivassa । cittassa aparihāsaṁ taē ṇa ēyammi kajjammi ।।6547।।
paḍhamaṁ ciya nōhariyā tattō tumhē kahūṁ niyasarūvaṁ । akkhāyēuṁ sakkaha sayamēva mahābalanivassa ||6548।।
taha vihu jaṁ saṁvāha paviō tēṇa tumha sayamēva । taṁ mannē vinnāyaṁ āgamaṇaṁ vīrapālassa ।। 6549।।
sirivammakumārassa ya tēṇa duijjō puṇō vi saṁvāhō । paṭṭīē paṭṭaviō saṁbhāvijjai niyamaīē || 6550।।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tō kāliēṇa ēyaṁ vicitiyaṁ māṇasammi niyayammi । jaha ēē maha vayaṇē jāyā kaya paccayā dō vi ।। 6551 ।।
tamhā vīsāsakaē kahēmi annaṁpi kiṁ pi ētēsiṁ । iya ciṁtiūṇa jaṁpai dujjōhaṇadaṁḍanāhassa ।। 6552 ।।
kō vi kahaṁtō nisuō dūragaēṇaṁ maē imaṁ vayaṇaṁ । jaha dhāḍī paṭṭaviyā kiṁ tu na sammaṁ maē nāyaṁ ।। 6553 ।।
ki sirivammassuvari tumhēhi pēsiyā uyā hu puṇō । sirivammēṇaṁ kumarēṇa pēsiyā sāmi tumhuvari ।। 6554 ।।
dujjōhaṇēṇa tattō sikkhaviraṁ pēsiō ahaṁ ēvaṁ । jaha gaṁtūṇa sudaṁsaṇakaḍayammi tumaṁ kuha suddhi ।। 6555 ।।
pakkhariūṇaṁ turaē amhē hōūṇa gahiyasannāhā । tuha paṭṭhīē ēmō iya sikkhaṁ tassa gahiūṇa ।। 6556।।
jāva ahaṁ iha pattō kaḍaē pēcchammi tāva savvaṁpi । sutthaṁ cēva taō hūṁ vimhayapattō vicitēmi ।।6557 ।।
tumhāṇaṁ ciya dhāḍī sirivammuvariṁ bhavissaē pagayā । tō dujjōhaṇasamuhaṁ gaṁtūṇaṁ taṁ nivārēmi ।। 6558 । ।
pakkharai jaha na turaē sannāhaṁ gāhaē na viya suhaḍē । pattō sudaṁsaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ gaṁtuṁ kuṇaha ēvaṁ ।। 6559 ।।
tō sāramēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kayasannāhō vi ēusō ēttha । jaha sāmaggī dīsai taha sō pēsijjai purō vi । 6560 ।
narasīhadaṁḍavaiṇō saṁvāhē mā kayā vi (vi) ṇittō । sō vīrapālakumarēṇa jāṇiuṁ hōjja paḍiruddhō ।। 6561।।
tattō nivāriō sō kumarēṇa sudaṁsaṇēṇa vaccatō । dujjōhaṇassa samūhō vinnattō tēṇa tō kumarō ।। 6562 ।।
taha vihu vaccāmi ahaṁ gaṁtuṁ dujjōhaṇassa sāhēmi । tumha kaḍayassa sutthaṁ jaha sō thiramāṇasō ēi ।।6563 ।।
tō aṇunāō ēsō kumarēṇa sudaṁsaṇēṇa maha pāsē । āgaṁtūṇaṁ sāha uttarapaccuttaraṁ savvaṁ ॥ 6564।।
taṁ caiva purō kāuṁ samāgaō haṁ sudaṁsaṇāvāsē । tammi samayammi jāō pahāviyā sō didissa ।।6565।।
sujjhai muhaṁ mahēṇaṁ sirikkasannāha chāiyaṁ kiṁtu । sēnnaṁ tēhiṁ na nāyaṁ appaṇayaṁ kiṁ parassēyaṁ ।। 6566।।
puvvaṁ pi maē savvaṁ saṁkēyaṁ gāhiūṇa niyannaṁ । mukkaṁ jaha amugakhaṇē amugaṁ agaṁ karēyavvaṁ ।। 6567।।
aha gaḍḍadāragaō ōyariūṇaṁ ahaṁ turaṁgāō । majjhē jayā paviṭṭhō annē vi tayā bahū suhaḍā ।। 6568।।
paḍihāravāriyā vihu jhatti paviṭṭhā paṇōlliuṁ ēyaṁ । puraō kayappaṇāmassa majjha āliṁgaṇanimittaṁ ।। 6569 ।।
bāhū sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ pasāriyā dō vi tō maē gahiō । gāḍhaṁ hiyaēṇa samaṁ sēsā sēsēhiṁ paḍiruddhā ||6570 ।।
kēhi vikariṇō ruddhā kēhiṁ vi turayā rahā ya annēhiṁ । ugghuṭṭhaṁ garuyasaraṁ ēvaṁ kaḍayassa majjhammi ।। 6571||
jaha sirivammakumārō kumarassa sudaṁsaṇassa āruṭṭhō । sōūṇa imaṁ saddaṁ bhīō lōō palāṇō ya ॥ 6572 ।।
ahiṁ jaṇēhiṁ saddhi baddhō kumarō sudaṁsaṇō jhatti । khittō rahammi annē anēsu rahēsu pakkhittā ।।6573 ||
ētthaṁtarammi pattā purisā narasīhakaḍayamajjhāō। bhīyā palāyamāṇā tē gahiyā amha purisēhiṁ ।। 6574 ।।
āṇīyā maha pāsē pucchissaṁ jāva tē ahaṁ kiṁ pi । tā kēluyaō pattō tumhahiṁ pēsiō tattha ।। 6575।।
savvaṁ pi tēṇa kahiyaṁ tumha samāiṭṭhamaggaō majjha । tē vi maē tō puṭṭhā narasīhanarā taha kahiṁsu ।। 6576 ।।
baddhō rahammi pacchā sudaṁsaṇō daṁsiō maē tēsiṁ । bhaṇiyā ya tē jahēyaṁ jōhāraha appaṇō sāmi ।।6577 ।।
tēhi vikāūṇa tahā mukkō nayaṇēsu aṁsujalanivahō । pacchā maē vi mukkā bhaṇiyā vaccai jahēcchaṁ || 6578।।
tō tumha payasamīvē purisō saṁpēsiō maē annō । gahiya sudaṁsaṇakumarassa saṁtiyaṁ vattamavakhēuṁ ॥ 6579 ॥
pahaviyaraṇaparisaṁtō dhariō tatthēva kēluō u maē । kumarasudaṁsaṇakaḍayassa saṁtiyā tayaṇu āvāsā ।। 6580 ।।
uppāḍāvēūṇaṁ savvē tassēva karahamāīsu । ārōhāvēūṇa ya maē samāṇāviyā ēttha ॥ 6581 ॥
guḍapakkharasannāhāuhapamuhaṁ savvamēvavakkharayaṁ
। tassēva vāhaṇēsuṁ
ārōvēūṇa
āṇīyaṁ ||6582 ।।

aḍḍhāijjasahassā āṇīyā pavarahatthirūvāṇaṁ । tīsaturaṁgasahassā vīsasahassā rahāṇaṁ tu ।।6583 । ।
tēsi cēva sudaṁsaṇapurisāṇa samīvaō maē nisuō । tatthāgaō hayāṇaṁ vīsasahassāhiō lakkhō । । 6584 ।।
aṭṭhārahāṇa sahassā kariṇō puṇa jēttiyā maē nisuyā । savvē vi tēttiyā cēva amha itthammi ārūḍhā ||
rahaturayā puṇa narasīhadaṁḍavaiṇō sahā gayā ēttha । kē bihu tēsi saṁkhaṁ jāṇissaha kaṁ pi jai tumhē ।। 6586 ।।
aha sirivammakumārēṇa jōgarāyassa pēsiyaṁ jhatti | hakkārayaṁ khaṇēṇaṁ saṁpattō sō vi tattha taō ।। 6587 ।।
puṭṭhō sāhai saṁkhaṁ turaṁgamāṇaṁ sahassa paṇasīī । paṁcarahāṇa sahassā saṁpattā appaṇī hatthē ।। 6588 ।।
tō kumarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ rahasaṁkhā tāva pujjaē sayalā । turayāṇa paṇa (paṁca ? ) sahassā pujjaṁti na tē puṇa palāṇā ।।
kē vibhavissaṁti mayā kēvi palāṇā sahāsavārēhiṁ । iccāi kahaṁ kāuṁ visajjiyā dō vi tē jhatti ।। 6590 ।।
raṇasīhajōgarāyā sējjāē saṁṭhiō sayaṁ kumarō । sirivammō ēgāgī ēvaṁ citai niyamammi ।। 6591 ।।
niruvamakalattalāhō saṁjāō majjha sattuvijaō ya । paharisalēsaṁ pi paraṁ dōnni vina imē maha kuṇaṁti ।। 6592 ।।
jaha ēyassa sudaṁsaṇakumarassa parāhavō samppannō । citijjaṁtō jaṇayai paramavisāyaṁ maṇē majjha ।। 6593 ।।
dhī dhī bhavassarūvaṁ jattha kilissaṁti jaṁtuō ēvaṁ । visaēsu pasattamaṇā aṇavēkkhiyakajjapariṇāmā ।। 6594 ।।
nīiē saṁpannā jē visayā pubvapunnajōēṇa । tē vi nisēvijjaṁtā bhayajaṇayā hōṁti paralōē ।। 6595 ।।
jē uṇa nīiviruddhā citijjaṁtā vi tē ihabhavē vi । araiṁ jaṇēṁti garuyaṁ ayasaṁ paraparibhavaṁ taha ya ।। 6596 । ।
iccāi ciṁtayaṁtassa tassa hakkārayaṁ samāyāyaṁ । kumarēṇa vīrapālēṇa pēsiyaṁ bhōyaṇanimittaṁ ।। 6597 ।।
aha sirimmakumārō saṁvahiuṁ pariyaṇēṇa thēvēṇa । raṇasīhajōgarāyaiēhi purisēhi ya samēō
turayāruḍhō pattō gulakhēḍapurammi tattha ēgammi | cēiyaharammi gaṁtuṁ pūēuṁ vaṁdiuṁ dēvē
hayamāruḍhō pagaō pāsāē vīrapālakumarassa । kayasamuciyapaḍivattīē parōpparaṁ dō vi tē kumarā
jā maṇimayāsaṇēsuṁ khaṇaṁ nisannā kuṇaṁta ālāvaṁ । tā vīrapālakumarō vinnattō dūsalēṇēvaṁ ॥ 6601 ॥
bhōyaṇajāyaṁ paguṇaṁ saṁjāyaṁ ciṭṭhaē samaggaṁ pi । kiṁtu paraṁ thēvō cciya parivārō ēttha āṇiō ।। 6602 ।।
sirivammakumārēṇaṁ tō taṁ pabhaṇēi sūrapālasuō । sēsaṁ pi hu parivāraṁ āṇāvaha appaṇō tubbhē ।। 6603 ।।
aha sirivammō pabhaṇai amhēhiṁ samaṁ sayā vi jāvaiō । bhuṁjai parivārō ēsa tēttiō āgaō asthi ।।
jō uṇa ginhai niccaṁ kaṇabhattaṁ sō na āṇiō ēttha । tō bhaṇai vīrapālō dūsaladaṁḍāhivaṁ ēvaṁ ।। 6605 ।।
jaha pucchēūṇa tumaṁ paṁcaulamissa rāyataṇayassa । kaṇahattayagāhīṇaṁ savvēsi dēhi kaṇahattaṁ ॥ 6606।
āēsōtti bhaṇittā kumaraṁ vinnavai vīrapālaṁ sō । jaha tumha bhāujāyā āṇīyā nēya kumarēṇa ।। 6607।।
tō bhaṇai vīrapālō jaṁ ciya kajjaṁ tamēva nāṇīyaṁ । amhāṇa bhāuēṇaṁ jassa kaē ēttiō vihiō ।। 6608।।
aigaruō saṁraṁbhō dēsaṁtaralaṁghaṇāiō ēsō । tō jāhi dūsala tumaṁ pacchēu bhāuyaṁ amha ।।6609।।
āṇēha vasaṁtasiriṁ māyā amhāṇa jāṇaē ēvaṁ । jai pēkkhissai annō ēyaṁ tō lagggihī cakkhū ।।6610 ।।
tō hasiūṇaṁ jaṁpai sirivammō jaha maē imā bhaṇiyā । aiāyarēṇa taha vihu na manniyaṁ tīē āgamaṇaṁ ।।
tō āha vīrapālō sirivammaṁ kuṇai bhōyaṇaṁ tubbhē । bhuṁjissāmi ahaṁ puṇa ihāgayāē dhuēṁ tīē ॥। 6612।।
tō pabhaṇai sirivavammō raṇasīhaṁ daṁḍaṇāyagaṁ ēvaṁ | jaha dūsalēṇa saddhi gaṁtūṇa tumaṁ vasaṁtasiriṁ ।। 6613॥
majjha vayaṇēṇa ēvaṁ pabhaṇaha jaha vīrapāla pāsāō । nīhariu miō amhē na lahissāmō cirēṇāvi ।। 6614 । ।
।।6599 ।।
॥ 6600 ॥

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
bhōṇaṁ na vihitaṁ puṇa amhē tayā lahissāmō। tumamāgamissasi jayā sudīhakālēṇa vi ya ēttha ।। 6615।।
aha raṇasīhō dūsalasēṇāvaisaṁjaō tayā gaṁtuṁ । vinnaes vasaṁtasiri āvāsē sā vi tavvayaṇaṁ ।। 6616 ।।
sōūṇaṁ sigghaṁ ci saṁpattā vīrapālapāsāē । tēṇa vi paṇayā ēsā sasaṁbhramēṇaṁ sabahumāṇaṁ ।। 6617।।
puraō hōūṇa sayaṁ hakkārēūṇa appaṇō bhajjaṁ । vīramaīnā mēṇaṁ tēṇa taō ēvamāiṭṭhā ।।6618 ।।
jēṭṭāṇiyā tuha imā samāgayā ciṭṭhaē taō ēvaṁ । paṇamaha pāēsu tumaṁ bhuṁjāvaha gōkhēṇa tahā ।।6619 । ।
sammāṇaha bahuvatthālaṁkārāihiṁ aimahagdhēhi । annaṁ pi hu karaṇijjaṁ savvaṁ pi karēha ēīē || 6620 ।।
tīē sasaṁbhamāē paḍivajjēūṇa tassa taṁ vayaṇaṁ । pāēsu paṇamiūṇaṁ nīyā sagihē vasaṁtasirī ।। 6621 ।।
tattō niyattiūṇaṁ sasaṁbhamaṁ vīrapālavarakumarō । sirivammakumarasahiō bhōyaṇasālā saṁpattō ।।6622 ।।
samuciyapaḍivattīē uvaviṭṭhā dō vi bhōyaṇanimittaṁ । aha sirivammakumārō raṇasīhaṁ ēvamāisai ।। 6623 ।।
kaha tē sudaṁsaṇāī ciṭṭhēti taē kayā ima āha । baṁdhāō mōēuṁ savvē niyalēsu pakkhittā ।। 6624 ।।
rakkhaṇahē gahapālasāhaṇāhivaiṇō samīvammi । uggaṇiyā tē ciṭṭhēti dhāriyā tēṇa pavibhattā ।।6625 ।।
ēkkō ēkkasa muhaṁ na pēkkhaē nēya suṇai saddapi । puṇa sirivammō taṁ bhaṇai jaha tumaṁ bhōyaṇaṁ tēsiṁ ।। 6626 ।।
jōgaṁ gahiūṇaṁ kaṁ pi māṇusaṁ paṭṭavēha ēttō vi । aha raṇasīhō kumaraṁ sirivammaṁ vinnavai ēvaṁ ।। 6627।।
jai tē ēvaṁ jaṁpaṁti kaha vi amhē jahā niyalakhittā । nō bhōyaṇaṁ karēmō tatthaṭṭē kiṁ vivvaṁ ।। 6628 ।।
āha taō sivimmō saṁbōhēūṇa taha ṭhiyā cēva । taha vihu tē kārijjaha bhōyaṇamaha jai na mannati ।। 6629 ।।
ōsāriṇa niyalāī taha vi tē bhōyaṇaṁ karāvēha । kiṁtu payattēṇa paraṁ tēsiṁ rakkhā karēyavvā ।। 6630 ।।
āēsō ta bhaṇittā tahēva paṭṭavai bhōyaṇaṁ tēsiṁ । raṇasīhō daṁḍavaī sayaṁ tu tatthēva bhuṁjēi ।।6631।।
sirivammavīrapālēhiṁ rāyakumarēhiṁ saha asaṁbhaṁtō । gaṁdharasa ( vaṇṇa ? ) phāsēhi saṁjayaṁ rasavaī paramaṁ ।।6632 ।।
kumarō sudaṁsaṇō puṇa gahiō māṇasiya dukkhanivahēṇa । jjhāṇapavannō jōi va ciṭṭhaē kiṁ picitatō ॥ 6633॥
pēcchaha jaha pariṇāmō kammāṇama citaṇijjamāhappō । annaha kaō uvāō nivvaḍiō annahā kaha vi ।। 6634 ||
jaṁ sirivammakumārē kāumaṇiṭṭaṁ maē samāraddhaṁ । taha cēva taṁ samaggaṁ amhaṁ ciya nivaḍiyaṁ aṁgē ।। 6635 ।।
lōyammi jaṁ nisammai taṁ saccaṁ caiva nūṇamakkhāṇaṁ । jaṁ citijjai asuhaṁ parammi taṁ ēi sagharammi ।।6636।।
jārisaō cciya paḍhamaṁ maimōhō uṭṭhiō maha maṇammi । pajjatē vi hu sō ēsa tārisa cēva nivvaḍiō। 6637।
annāṇurāiṇīē vasaṁtasirikannayāē uvari jō । baddhō maē gurāō paḍhamō tāvēsa maimōhō || 6638।।
bīō puṇajaṁ sēnaṁ baṁdhaṇahē mamēva āvaḍiyaṁ । taṁ cēva mūḍhamaiṇā hiyabuddhīē maē gahiyaṁ ।।6639।।
kūḍaṁ kayaṁ maē jaṁ taṁ sirivammēṇa savvamavi nāyaṁ । jaṁ puṇa tēṇa kayaṁ taṁ thēvaṁ pi maē na vinnāyaṁ ।। 6640 ।।
tā savvā vi ēsō pannāpunnēhiṁ samahiō majjha । ēēṇa saha virōhō yēvō vi na kāumuciō mē ।। 6641 ।।
tā ēttiyammi vi gaē muccau ēēṇa saha virōhamatī । aṁdhō vi hu viṇiyattai kuḍḍē laggāē ṭhēppāē ।। 6642 ।।
hu
iccāicitayaṁtaṁ raṇasīhāēsaō sayaṁ gaṁtuṁ । gahapālō sāhaṇiō sudaṁsaṇaṁ bhaṇai tō ēvaṁ ।। 6643 ॥
sirivammakumārēṇa tumha kaē rasavaī gēhaūṇa । paṭṭhaviyā amhē iha tā tumbhē bhōyaṇaṁ kuṇaha ।। 6644 ।।
aha tēṇa bhaṇiyamēyaṁ pāēsu ṭhiyammi cēya niyalammi । bhōttavvaṁ amhēhi kiṁ vā ōsāriē tammi ? ।। 6645 ।।

tō gahapālō jaṁpara sirivammō tāva jāṇaē ēvaṁ jaha tumhāṇa paēsuṁ khittāiṁ saṁti niyalāī ।। 6646 ।।
lēṇa paraṁ tavvisaē āēsō kō vi nēya maha dinnō । bhōyaṇamēva gahēuṁ tumha kaē pēsiō mi ahaṁ ।। 6647।।
tā ēvaṁ ciya tubbhē bhuṁjaha mā kaṁ pi kuha (hā ? ) maṇa ( ? ) khēyaṁ । tō āha taṁ sudaṁsaṇakumarō khēō maha na kōvi
ēmēva maē puṭṭhē tumha samīvē sarūvamēvēyaṁ । avayāriṇō vi maha tēṇa bhōyaṇaṁ pēsiyaṁ jamimaṁ ।। 6649 ।।
taṁ pi ahaṁ bahamanē annaṁ pucchāmi jaṁ puṇō kiṁ ci । taṁ daṭṭhaṇaṁ tassēva hiyayagaruyattaṇaṁ viulaṁ ॥। 6650।।
āha taō gahapālō kumāra ! jaha jaṁpiyaṁ taē ēvaṁ । taṁ taha cēva na thēvaṁ pi annahā tassa garuyattaṁ ।। 6651 ।।
saccāi jaṁpiūṇaṁ parivēsēūṇa tassa gahapālō । gaṁtr̥̄ṇa sāramāī bhōyaṇahēḍaṁ taō bhai ।। 6652 ।।
tē vi sudaṁsaṇakumaraṁ bhuttaṁ saṁpucchiūṇa bhuṁjaṁti || bhujaṁtē kāuṁ sayaṁ gaō jhatti gahapālō ।। 6653।।
gulakhēḍē nayarammi pāsāē vīrapālakumarassa । sirivammakumārāisu bhōttr̥ṇaṁ uṭṭamāṇēsu ।। 6654 । ।
bhuṭṭiyassa puraō kahiyaṁ raṇasīha daṁḍaṇāhassa | gahapālēṇa sudaṁsaṇakumarō jaha muvaka ahimāṇaṁ ॥ 6655।।
kayaniyapacchāyāvaṁ sirivammakumāraguṇagahaṇapuvvaṁ । vayaṇaṁ payaṁpiūṇa niyalagaō cēva ya pabhuttō ।।6656 ।।
iya sēṇāvai raṇasīhakanna laggō kahaṁ taō diṭṭhō । gahapālō sirivammēṇa pucchiō kiṁ kahēsi ॥ 57 ॥
jōḍiyakarēṇa tattō raṇasīhēṇaṁ nivēiyaṁ tassa । jaha kahiyamimēṇēyaṁ sudaṁsaṇō jēmiō kumarō ।। 6658।।
tēṇēva sarūvēṇaṁ ṭhiō taō vīrapālavarakumarō । āisai dūsalaṁ gahapālaṁ bhuṁjāvaha imaṁ ti ।। 6659।।
nēūṇa tēṇa ēsō gahapālō gōravēṇa garuēṇa । bhuṁjāviō taō sō bhōttūṇa samāgaō tattha ।। 6660।।
kappūrāgurumayanāhimīsavaracaṁdaṇēṇa nimmaviyaṁ । saṁcariyaṁ tayaṇu vilēvaṇaṁ ca kamasō samaggāṇa ।। 6661।।
ghaṇasāracaṁdaṇēhi surahīkaya pavarapūgaphalīhi । navasarasanāyavallīdalāṇa taha bīḍaēhiṁ ca ॥। 6662।।
tatō kamēṇa dinnaṁ taṁbōlaṁ saghaṇasāramaipauraṁ । ēlālavaṁgakavakōlajāiphlapamuhavatthujuyaṁ ।। 6663॥
aha vīrapāla kumarō sirivammēṇa saṇakumārēṇa । kāūṇa ciraṁ kālaṁ pīikahāō bahuvihāō ।। 6664 ।।
vatthālaṁkārēhiṁ pavaraturaṁgēhi karivarēhiṁ ca । taṁ sammāṇēūṇaṁ jahajōggaṁ saparivāraṁ pi ।। 6665 ।।
hatthē jōḍēūṇaṁ visajjiuṁ taha vasaṁtasiridēvi । tassa piyā vīramaī aṇugaṁtūṇa ya niyattēi ।।6666 ॥
sirivammō vi kumārō sabhāriō saparivārasaṁjuttō । tattō niggaṁtr̥̄ṇaṁ niyayāvāsamma saṁpattō ।।6667 ।।
citai jaha siddhapaōyaṇō vi ciṭṭhāmi kēttiē vi di । ētthēva jāva ghāiyapurisā turayā ya hōṁti khamā ।। 6668।।
jaṁ ca vasaṁtasirīē saha vōlāvayamuvāgayaṁ sēnnaṁ । tēttiyadiṇāiṁ taṁ pi hu ciṭṭhau ētthēva gōṭṭhīē ।। 6669 ।।

aha kumaravīrapālō dūsaladaṁḍāhivēṇa saha gōṭṭhi । kuṇamāṇō rayaṇīē pamuiyacittō vayai ēvaṁ ।। 6670।।
cāru taē kayamēyaṁ jamēttha hakkāriyā vasaṁtasirī । taddaṁsaṇēṇa jamhā nayaṇaphalaṁ gahiyamamhēhi ||6671 ||
lōō jaṁ vannaṁtō tīsē rūvaṁ tamappayaṁ cēva । jaṁ diṭṭaṁ amhēhi taṁ tattō lakkhaguṇiyaṁ tu ॥ 6672 ।।
iccāi jaṁpiūṇaṁ suttō pavarammi vāsabhavaṇasmi । uṭṭhēūṇa pabhāē baccai pāsammi niyapiuṇō ।। 6673 ।।
dūsalasēṇāhivaī taṁ aṇagaṁtr̥̄ṇa tēṇa sikkhaviḍaṁ । viṇiyattiō saṭāṇē pattō sirivammakumarassa ।। 6674।
pēsēuṁ niyapurisaṁ kahāvai jahajja vīrapālēṇa । piupāsē vaccatēṇa majjha sikkhā imā dinnā ।। 6675 ।।
jāva sirivammakumarō iha ciṭṭhai tāva tassa pāsammi । gaṁtavvaṁ nicca taē kāyavvaṁ taha tayāiṭṭhaṁ ॥ 6676।।
tā inhipi samīvē tumhāṇa uvēṁtaō ahaṁ kiṁtu । tassēva ya kajjēṇaṁ akkhapiō ki pi ciṭṭhāmi ।। 6677 ।।

carimē jāmē u sayaṁ pitumha pāsē hamāgamissāmi । inhi tu iha ṭhiyassa vi kajjaṁ mē kahaha jaṛa asthi ।। 6678।।
tō sirivammakumārō taṁ jaṁpai saṁpayaṁ imaṁ kajjaṁ । amhē gulakhēḍapurē savvēsu vi cēharēsu ।। 6679 ।।
nhavaṇa- vilēvaṇa- pūyaṇa- parihāvaṇa- pēcchaṇāiyaṁ savvaṁ । kārissāmō taha jaha samappaē aṭṭhahiṁ diṇēhiṁ ।। 6680 ।।
tamhā mālāyārā kusumāṇaṁ vikkayaṁ kuṇēmāṇā । annattha vāriyavvā icchiya jiṇamaṁdirēsu jahā ।। 6681 ।।
pajjattā saṁpajjai pūyā taha sāvayā samaggā vi । mēlēuṁ bhāṇiyavvā nhavaṇāikaē jahā savvaṁ ॥। 6682 ।।
pauṇaṁ kuṇaṁti amhē inhi ciya tattha āgamissāmō । iya bhaṇiumappiūṇaṁ davvaṁ kusumāimullakaē ।। 6683॥
niyapurisaṁ sāhāraṇanāmaṁ saha tēṇa dūsalanarēṇa । pēsai hakkārēuṁ iya bhaṇai taō vasaṁtasiriṁ ।। 6684 । ।
jaha amhāṇaṁ dēvō arihaṁtō cēva iyaradēvāṇa । daṁsaṇamēttaṁ pi na hōi saṁgayaṁ kuvvamāṇāṇaṁ ॥ 6685॥
pūyāpēcchaṇayāīkāravaṇaṁ puṇa samaggamavi garē । ciṭṭhau kiṁtu paraṁ tuha uvarōhēṇaṁ maē vihiyaṁ ।। 6686 ।।
inhi tu ta kiṁci vibhaṇiyavvaṁ nēya sammuhaṁ majjha । ērisamiyarasurāṇaṁ pūyāīkaraṇavisayammi ।। 6687 ॥
tujjha vi juttaṁ ēvaṁ karaṇijjaṁ saṁpayaṁ jahā mōttuṁ । annē sabvē dēvē paḍivajjijjai jiṇō dēvō ।। 6688 ।।
jai pāvijjai rāyā mittaṁ tō tassa sēvayajaṇēṇa । bahuēṇa vi kiṁ kīrau iya labbhaṁtē jiṇē dēvē ।। 6689 ।।
fi sēsadēvayāhi tassēva ya kiṁkarāhi kāyavvaṁ । jāṇasi tumaṁ pi ēyaṁ savvaṁ pi maṇē viyāraṁtī ।। 6690 ।।
gihajiṇapaḍimā pūyaṁ majjha tikālaṁ pakuvvamāṇassa । sannihiyā hōūṇaṁ tumaṁ pi niccaṁ palōējjā ।। 6691 ।।
jhatti vasaṁtasirīē vayaṇē paḍivajjiyammi ēyammi । tō sirivammakumārō tīē saha saṁvahēūṇa ।। 6692।।
niyasāmaggīsahiō caliō gulakhēḍanayaramaggammi । dūsalasēṇāhivaī niyapurisāō nisāmē ।। 6693॥
sirivammassāēsaṁ tahēva kārēi sāvahitō । cēiyaharāṇa saṁkhā jāvaiyā tammi nayarammi ।। 6694 ।।
kāūṇa vibhāēhiṁ aṭṭhahiṁ savvā visā taō tēhiṁ । ēkkēkkammi vibhāē ēkkēkkadiṇammi pariṭhaviyaṁ ।।6695 ।।
nhavaṇāī kāyavvaṁ jāvaiyaṁ tēhi maggiyaṁ daviṇaṁ । sāhāraṇassa pāsē tāvaiyaṁ appiyaṁ tēṇa ।।6696।।
tammi diyahē ciraṁtaṇacēiyabhavaṇammi bhuvaṇavikkhāē । ēkkammi sayalasaṁgha mēlēūṇaṁ taō tēhi ।। 6697॥
dūsalasēṇāvaiṇō kahāviyaṁ tēṇa pēsiuṁ purisō । sirivammassa kahēuṁ sō miliō tassa ahē ।। 6698।।
ētassa sammuha cciya dūsalavayaṇaṁ kahēi savvaṁ pi । sō vi parituṭṭhahiyaō dayāvaē tassa taṁbōlaṁ ।। 6699 ।।
puvvakahiyammi pattō cēiyabhavaṇammi kumarasirivammō | paṁcavihābhigamēṇaṁ pavisēuṁ tattha bhattī || 6700।।
vihipuvvaṁ pūēḍaṁ jiṇidabiṁbāī tattha savvāī | vaṁdēūṇa ya harisulla saṁtasavvaṁgarōmaṁcō
jahajōggaṁ kāūṇaṁ paḍivatti tayaṇu sayalasaṁghassa । uciyapa sē uciyāsaṇammi tattō nisīēi || 6702।।
kumarāṇumaggalaggā savvaṁ pi karēi taha vasaṁtasirī । dūsalasēṇāhivaī vi tattha pattō kumarapāsē ।। 6703 ||
ṇhavaṇasamayammi paḍhamaṁ sirivammō ginhaē sayaṁ kalasaṁ । sēsā gahiyā sēsēhi sāvaēhi pahāṇēhi ||6704 ||
tattha nhavaṇammi vittē tattō icchiyajiṇidabhavaṇēsu । gaṁtūṇa kēi saḍḍhā kuṇaṁti nhavaṇāraṁ savvammi ।।6705।।
tayaṇu vilēvaṇa - pūyaṇa - parihāvaṇamāiyammi savvammi । siddhammi paḍhamacēiyaharāu niggaṁtukāmēṇa ।। 6706 ।।
sirivammakumārēṇaṁ dūsalasēṇāvaī imaṁ bhaṇiō । kaivayaciibhavaṇēsuṁ annēsu vi jāva gaṁtavvaṁ ।। 6707।।
tāva bhavissai dūraṁ ussūraṁ tā ihēva dhavalaharē । tumhaccayanaravaiṇō bhōyaṇamamhē karissāma ||6708।।
tō caramē diṇajāmē āṇāvēūṇa kaḍayamajjhāō । niyamāvāsamihēva ya gulakhēḍē dāvaissāmā || 6709 ।।
tattō iyaradiṇēsuṁ niccaṁ niyayammi cēva āvāsē । bhuṁjissāmō pūyā jāva samappai jiṇaharēsu ।। 6710॥
।।6701 ॥

gulakhēḍa saṁṭhiēsuṁ savvēsu vi dūsalō taō bhaṇai । bhōyaṇasayaṇanimittaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ tumhāṇa iṇamēva ॥। 6711 ।।
cii amha naridassa maṁdiraṁ jai puṇō samaggaṁ pi । kaḍayaṁ āṇāvaha tō tēṇa samaṁ ēu āvāsō ।। 6712 ।।
aha sirivammō pabhaṇai kaḍyaṁ savvaṁ pi ajja vi na ēttha । āṇāvissāmi ahaṁ jamhā ciṭṭhati samarahyā ।। 6713 ।।
tattha bahū naraturayā cālijjatāṇa tāṇa inhi pi । jaṁ jāyai bahupīḍā tēsi kajjēṇa kaḍayaṁ pi ।। 6714 । ।
ṭhāissai tatthēva ya kaivayadihāī jāva rujjhati । tēsi aṁgē ghāyā tō pabhaṇai dūsalō ēvaṁ ।। 6715 ।।
jai ēvaṁ tō ciṭṭa tatthēva kumāra tumha āvāsō । jaṁ vajjāuhadēvī bhavaṇammi ahaṁ pi aṭṭha diṇē
pūyaṁ kārāvissaṁ jamhā amhāṇa vaṁchiyamimīē । dinnaṁ sigdhaṁ pi taō dēmō ōyāiyaṁ tīsē
inhi tumhēhi paraṁ pāraddhā ciṭṭhaē jiṇaharēsu । pūyā kāuṁ tattō thēvē vi diṇē vilaṁbissaṁ
pacchā tumhē vi nirākulē ahaṁ nēmi dēvibhavaṇammi । āha taō sirivammō taṁ juttaṁ jaṁ vilaṁbēsi ।। 6719 ।।
pūyākaraṇaṁ dēvīē maṁdirē ērisaṁ puṇa na juttaṁ । dēvīpūyaṁ amhāṇa daṁsiuṁ jaṁ samīhēsi ।। 6720 ।।
jaṁ jēṭṭhasukkapaḍivayadiyahō ajjēsa sattahiṁ diṇēhiṁ । annēhi taō hōhī jaṇaharapūyāparisamattī ।। 6721।।
navamīdiṇammi ēttō amhē pacchā suhaṁ gamissāmō । jai puṇa annē vi diṇē ciṭṭhāmō aṭṭha ētthēva ।।6722 ।।
tō hōi samāsannō samaō mēhāgamassa tattha jalaṁ । jai paḍai taō gamaṇaṁ jāyai dukkhēṇa kaḍayassa ।। 6723 ।।
tō dūsalēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tammi dinē tumha saṁgayaṁ kiṁ pi । jaṁ paḍihāsai taṁ ciya karējja tumhē iyāṇi tu ।। 6724 । ।
ciṭṭhai iha dhavalaharē ciṭṭhau tatthēva tumha āvāsō । iya dūsalassa vayaṇaṁ paḍivajjēūṇa sirivammō ।। 6725 ।।
āisai niē purisē tatthēva ya rasavaīē karaṇatthaṁ । jāi taō niggaṁtuṁ sēsēsu sayaṁ jiṇaharēsu ।।6726।।
tēsu jiṇabiṁbamaṁḍaṇapūyaṇaparihāvaṇaṁ balivihāṇaṁ । ārattiyaṁ ca daṭṭha vaṁdēūṇaṁ taō dēvē ।। 6727||
nivabhavaṇagamaṇasamaē viṇayaṇaō muṇijaṇaṁ nimaṁtē । paḍilābhaṇānimittaṁ āhārēṇaṁ cauviṇa ।। 6728।।
tē bēṁti vaṭṭamāṇō jōgō tō sāvaē nimaṁtēi । pabhaṇaṁti tē vi ēvaṁ ēyaṁ ciya bhōyaṇaṁ dinaṁ ।। 6729 ।।
laṭhṭhē amha taējjaṁ kumāra ! vāvāriyā sahāyattē । amhē jiṇapaḍimāṇaṁ nhavaṇāivihimmi suhajaṇaē ।। 6730 ।।
iccāi uttarāī kuṇamāṇē bhīḍiūṇa tē saḍḍhē । bhōyaṇahēuṁ mannāviuṁ sayaṁ kumarasirivammō ॥ 6731 ||
pattō nivadhavalaharē vasaṁta sirisaṁjuō muṇī saḍḍhā । niyaniyaṭhāṇammi gayā aha siddhaṁ rasavaī nāuṁ ।। 6732 ||
sirivammō dūsalamāṇavēi muṇisāvayāhavaṇahēuṁ । aha dūsalēṇa paṭṭāviyammi hakkāraē tēsiṁ ॥। 6733।।
pattō khaṇaṁtarēṇaṁ saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ khaṇēṇa muṇivaggō । kumarēṇa vasaṁtasirī hakkārēūṇa tō bhaṇiyā ।। 6734।।
tuha puṇṇudaēṇa imē samaṇā samaṇī ya āgayā ēttha । āhāradāṇamēsi tō dēhi tumaṁ jahicchāē ।। 6735 ।।
kumarāēsēṇa taō uṭṭhēūṇaṁ imā taha karēi । bahuyaṁ dētīē vi hu tīē gahiyaṁ muṇijaṇēṇa ।।6736 ।।
thēvaṁ ciya kiṁ pi tavō āyaṁbilanivvigaiya juyamuṇiṇō । kahiūṇaṁ paḍisē hiyamiyaraṁ laṭṭha pi savvaṁ pi ।। 6737।।
tattō sāvayavaggaṁ sagōravaṁ bhōiūṇa nīsēsaṁ । kāuṁ taṁbōlāī sammāṇaṁ bēi tō kumarō ।।6738।।
tō jōḍiyakarajuyalō annē vi ya sattavāsarē ēvaṁ । tumhahiṁ vihēyavvō amhāṇamaṇuggahō ēsō ।।6739 ।।
iya paḍivannē vayaṇē visajjiuṁ sāvaē taha vihēuṁ । bhuttābhuttasapariyaṇasudaṁsaṇāīṇa tanti ca
anivāriyasattāiṁ paryāṭṭaūṇaṁ purassa dārēsu । gihapaḍimā pūēḍaṁ bhuṁjai saha salāīhiṁ ।। 6741 ।।
diṇasēsaṁ gamiūṇaṁ jiṇapaḍimaṁ pūiūṇa saṁjhāē । rayaṇīē sayaṇagaō pucchai bhajjaṁ vasaṁtasiriṁ ।। 6742 ।।
ajja jiṇamaṁdirēsuṁ taē piē ! pēkkhiyaṁ ṇhavaṇamāī । dinaṁ muṇīṇa dāṇaṁ taṁ bhagra tuha kērisaṁbhāi ।। 6743 ।।

210
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tō bhai vasaṁtasirī ānaṁdamayaṁ diṇaṁ samaggaṁ pi । ajja gayaṁ mama piyayama ! buḍḍāē amayakuṁḍē vva ।।6744।।
jaṁ niyajammappabhi maē na diṭṭhē suyaṁ va aṇuhūyaṁ । taṁ pāṇanāha ! jugavaṁ pi ajja mē savvamavi jāyaṁ ।। 6745 ।।
uppajjamāṇanavanavapaharisapūrijjamāṇahiyaēhiṁ । hōijjai taṁ sumaraṁtaēhiṁ tīrai na uṇa vōtuṁ ।। 6746 ।।
kiṁ jiṇapaḍimākhvaṁ kiṁ nhavaṇavihī kimaccaṇavihāṇaṁ । kiṁ sāvayasamavāō bēmi kimēkkēkkamiccāī | 6747 ।
kiṁ vā jaīṇa paricattasavvasaṁgāṇa guṇamahagghāṇa । vannijjara māhappaṁ accaṁtanirīhacittā ।। 6748 ।।
uyaratthē vina lōhō jēsi tavasusiyaaṁguvaṁgāṇa । parihariyavihasāṇaṁ niravēkkhāṇaṁ sajīē vi ।। 6749 ।।
jai hōṁti amha pēiyaguruṇō iha kahavi āgayā ēvaṁ । tō tē savvassē vi hu dinē na lahaṁti pariōsaṁ ।। 6750 ।।
tē citayaṁti ēvaṁ jai jajamāṇaṁ pi vikkiuṁ kahavi । pārasaulāiṭhāṇē ativiulō dhippaē atthō || 6751 ।।
tā inhi majjha maṇē ēsō cciya pariṇaō dhuvaṁ dhammō । dēvō ya imō ēē ya suguruṇō tumha jēbhiyā ।। 6752।।
jō nāha ! paharisō mē jāō tara pāṇavallahē laddhē । sō jiṇadhammē laddhē saṁjāō samahiō ajja ।। 6753 ।।
tō jaṁpai sirivammō majjha vi jō tujjha pāṇigahaṇammi । jāō harisō sō ajja duguṇiō ērisē jāē । 6754।
iya jaṁpiūṇa gurudēvadhammaguṇavannaṇaṁ visēsēṇa । kuṇai vasaṁtasirīē puraō suiraṁ imō hiṭṭhō ।। 6755 ।।
jaha pāsiyammi vatthē nibiḍō hōūṇa laggaē raṁgō । taha bhāviyāē tīsē dhammuvaēsō vi sō laggō ।।6756 ।।
kāūṇa dhammagōṭṭhi ēvaṁ saha piyayamāē khaṇamēgaṁ । sirivammō nivakumarō niddāhamaṇahavēūṇa ।। 6757।।
uṭṭhēuṁ nisiviramē kiccaṁ pābhāiyaṁ vihēūṇa । gihipaḍimāē pūyaṁ aṭṭhapayāraṁ karēūṇa ।।6758 ।।
jiṇamaṁdirēsu jā kira gamissaē tāva dāravālēṇa । āgaṁtuṁ vittō ēvaṁ sirivammavarakumarō ।। 6759 ।।
vāsavaurāu vāsavadattēṇa narēsarēṇa paṭṭaviō । ciṭṭhai pahāṇapurisō dārē nāmēṇa varadattō ।। 6760 ।।
kumarēṇa samāiṭṭhō paḍihārō jhatti taṁ pavēsēi । sō vi kayappaṇivāō kumarēṇāliṁgiō tattō ।। 6761 ।।
tassa gurusaṁbhramēṇaṁ dāviyamuciyāsaṇaṁ imō tammi । uvaviṭṭhō paripuṭṭhō kumarēṇaṁ kahiumāḍhattō ।। 6762 ।।
jaha gulakhēḍapurāō gaēhiṁ vaṇiēhi vāsavaurammi । rannō vāsavadattassa sāhiyaṁ jaha vasaṁta sirī ।। 6763 ।।
vajjāuhadēvīē purammi pattā mahābalanivassa । aṁgarahēṇa sudaṁsaṇanāmēṇa taō samāgaṁtuṁ ।। 6764।।
paḍikhaliyā vaccaṁtī caṁdaurīē purīē tō ēvaṁ । nāūṇa sūrapālēṇa patthivēṇaṁ niyaṁgaruhō ।।6765।।
nāmēṇa vīrapālō pabhūyabalasaṁjuō sahāyattē । dūsalasēṇāvaiṇō duijjaō pēsiō tattha ।। 6766।।
jēṇa sudaṁsaṇakumaraṁ vasaṁtasirikannayāē laggataṁ । dō vi nivārēṁti imē taha caṁdaurīē nayarīē ।। 6767 ।।
sirivammakumārō vihu vajjāuhadēvipurarbāhi pattō । kari turiya-jōhaparaṁ sēnaṁ ghēttūṇa saṁjñāē ।। 6768।।
amhē vitami samaē kayasaṁvāhā taō viṇikkhatā । satthavasēṇaṁ maggē būḍhā rayaṇi asē pi ।। 6769 ।।
pacchā ya tattha jāyaṁ kiṁ pi na taṁ jāṇimō taō ēvaṁ । sōuṁ vāsavadattēṇa rāiṇā citiyaṁ ēvaṁ ।। 6770 ।।
ciṭṭhēti maē purisā vasaṁtasirikannayāē saha bahuyā । paṭṭaviyā ēkkō vi hu tēsu na tīē mama samīvē ।। 6771 ।।
ēvaṁvivattāē kahaṇatthaṁ pēsiō taō ēyaṁ । saccaṁ uyāhu mōsaṁ sammaṁ jāṇijjaē nēya ।। 6772 ||
iya citiūṇa diyahaṁ taṁ cēva vilaṁbiūṇa rayaṇīē । hakkārēūṇa ahaṁ iya bhaṇiuṁ ēttha paṭṭaviō | 6773 ||
jai vaṇiyāṇa imāṇaṁ vayaṇaṁ saccaṁ kahaṁci tō tumaē । bhaṇiyavvō sirivammō jahā imō iha samāgaṁtuṁ ॥। 6774।।
amha samīvē pariṇai vasaṁtasirikannayaṁ aha kahaṁci । tatthēva ya pariṇīyā tēṇa imā hōi taha vi taē ।। 6775 ।।
