sirivammavasaṁtasirījuyalaṁ ambhasthiraṁ mama girāē । ēttha samāṇēyavvaṁ pāhuṇayaṁ majjha kavi di
sirivammō āha taō vāsavadattēṇa bhāṇiyaṁ juttaṁ । amha vi kāuṁ uciyaṁ imaṁ paraṁ asamaō ēsō
tatthāgamaṇē amhāṇa saṁpayaṁ pāusō jaō niyaḍō । maggē vaccaṁtāṇaṁ jai vina vuṭṭhi kuṇai mēhō ||6778 ।।
taha vihu tattha gayāṇaṁ nivaḍai niyamēṇa pāṇiyaṁ tattō । viṇiyattiuṁna sakkaṁ jāva na jāō sarayasamaō ।। 6779 ।।
tō jaṁpara varadattō kumāra ! kiṁ dūsaṇaṁ taō hōhī । jai ṭhāissaha tubbhē kaivayamāsē kaha vi tattha ।। 6780 ।।
tō pabhaṇai sirivammō ēyaṁ ciya dūsaṇaṁ havai garuyaṁ । jaṁ narapuṁgavarannō āṇāē viṇā ciraṁ amhē ।। 6789 ।।
dēsaṁtarammi gaṁtuṁ ciṭṭhāmō tō bhaṇēi varadattō । vāsavaurammi tubbhē vaccaha vaccāmi ahamihi ||6782।।
ēttō caṁdaurīē narapuṁgava patthivassa jahavattaṁ । sāhēuṁ rūsaṁtaṁ tamuvari tumhāṇaṁ rakkhēmi ।। 6783 ||
puṇa pabhaṇai sirivammō ēyaṁ na hu hōi saṁgayaṁ kaha vi । jaṁ muṁḍiūṇa sīsaṁ pucchijjai tayaṇu nakkhattaṁ ।। 6784 ।।
cēiyaharēsu inhi ahaṁ gamissāmi taṁ vasaṁtasiriṁ । gaṁtuṁ pāsaha pacchā tumaṁ pi ējjaha jiṇagi ।।6785 ।।
taṁ iya bhaṇiūṇa taō hakkārēūṇa vaṇasiri bhaṇai । jaha maha vayaṇēṇa tumaṁ gaṁtumimaṁ bhaṇa vasaṁtasiriṁ ।। 6786 ।।
tuha piuṇā varadattō pahāṇapurisō ihatthi paṭṭaviō । taṁ ālaviūṇa tumaṁ tēṇa samaṁ jiṇaharē ējja || 6787।।
iya vaṇasiriṁ bhaṇēuṁ taṁbōlaṁ dāviūṇa varadattaṁ । paṭṭhāvai tīē saha vasaṁtasiriaṁtiē kumarō ||6788 ।।
aha sāvayapaṭṭaviyaṁ pattaṁ hakkārayaṁ jiṇagihāō । kumarassa taha kahiyaṁ kēṇai pallāṇiyā kariṇī ।। 6789 ।।
tō uṭṭiūṇa kumarō āsaṇaō vayai ōvarayamajjhē । varavatthāharaṇēhiṁ kāūṇaṁ tattha siṁgāraṁ ।। 6790 ।।
jāniggaō karēṇuṁ āru hiumaṇō taō vaṇasirīē । sō vinnattō jaha pahu ! sāmiṇipāsē khaṇaṁ ēha ।। 6791 । ।
aha vaṇasirivayaṇēṇaṁ gaō kumārō vasaṁtasiripāsē । uṭṭhēuṁ varadattō tattō bāhimmi uvaviṭṭhō ||6792 ।।
kumarassa
vasaṁtasirī dāūṇaṁ āsaṇaṁ sahatthēṇa । vinnavai mauliyakarā jaha varadattēṇa maha puraō ।। 6793 ।।
kahiyaṁ niyamāgamaṇappaōyaṇaṁ taha ya tassa tumhahiṁ । jaṁ dinnamuttaraṁ taṁ pi sāhiyaṁ tēṇa tō inhi ।। 6794।।
kāuṁ garuyapasāyaṁ majjhuvari kumāra ! niyayavinnatti । ērisayaṁ paṭṭāvaha tumbhē narapuṁgavanivassa || 6795।।
vāsavadattanivēṇaṁ hakkārayamatthi amha paṭṭaviyaṁ । vāsavapuragamaṇatthaṁ tatthuciyaṁ kiccamā saha ||6796।।
ajja diṇēṇa saha jaō satta diṇāī bhavissaē ēttha । tumhāṇamavatthāṇaṁ tēttiyadiyahi purisō vi ।। 6797।।
tumhaccaō gahēuṁ narapuṁgavanivaiṇō samāēsaṁ । ētthāgamissara taō tassāiṭṭha karijjāsi ।।6798।।
tīsē udarōhēṇaṁ kumarēṇaṁ takkhaṇē vilaṁbēuṁ । vinnattī paṭṭaviyā piuṇō narapuṁgavanivassa ॥6799॥
āruhiṇa karēṇuṁ taō gaō jiṇaharammi sirivammō । tayaṇu vasaṁtasirīē saha varadattō vi tattha gaō || 6800 ।।
jaha paḍhamadiṇaṁ annē vi paṁca diyahā tahēvavaikkaṁtā । sirivammassa kumārassa jiṇaharāsatahiyayassa ।। 6801।।
aha sattamammi diyahē narapuṁgavanivaiṇō samīvāō । paḍilēhaṁ gahiūṇaṁ pēsiyapurisō samāyāō ।। 6802 ।।
gōsaggē piḍimā pūyaṁ kāūṇa uṭṭiyassa taō । sirivammassa samappai taṁ lēhaṁ sō paṇamiūṇa ।। 6803 ।।
kumarō vi chōḍiūṇaṁ taṁ vāyai jāva tāva tattha lahuṁ । tassa narapuṁgavēṇaṁ vāsavapuragamaṇamaṇunāyaṁ ।।6805
hakkāriḍaṁ vaṇasiri taṁ appāvara vasaṁtasirihatthē । lēhaṁ sayaṁ tu pucchara vattaṁ lēhārayasamīvē ॥ 6806॥
sō kahai iō caliō caṁdaurīē ahaṁ diṇē taiē । paḍhamē paharē pattō atthāṇagaē naravarammi ।। 6807 ||
taṁ paṇamiūṇa tappāyaaggaō ṭhāviō maē lēhō । sō āsanna nisannēṇa viyaḍiuṁ appiō hatthē ।। 6808 ||
narapuṁgavassa ranō paṭṭhicittēṇa tēṇa savvaṁ pi । hatthaṁ avagamiūṇa vimhiṇaṁ ahaṁ puṭṭhō ।। 6809 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-212-to-212.json ==========================
212
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
lēhammi ēttiyaṁ ciya lihiyaṁ ētyāgayaṁ vasaṁtasirī । amhēhiṁ pariṇīyā vāsavadattō piyā tīsē ।। 6810 ।।
vāsavapuramma amhē hakkāraṁtō ya ciṭṭhaē iṇhi । sēsaṁ tu sudaṁsaṇavaiyarāiyaṁ kiṁpi nō lihiyaṁ । । 6811 । ।
tāki pi jāṇasi tumaṁ kaha hūō sō sudaṁsaṇō kumarō । tō jahavattaṁ savvaṁ tassa maē sāhiyaṁ sammaṁ ।। 6812 ।।
sōūṇa taō rāyā sapariyaṇō harisaparavasō jāō । jaṁpara jahā kumārō nirahaṁkārō ahō dūraṁ ।।6813 ॥
iya jaṁpiūṇa rannā lihāviō ēsa takkhaṇē lēhō । jēmāviyassa hatthē sasaṁbalō appiō majjha ।। 6814 । ।
dinā ya imā sikkhā jaha sirivammō taē mahagirāē । iya bhaṇiyavvō mā taṁ kassa vi gacchējja vīsaṁbhaṁ ।।6815
taha garuyapayattēṇaṁ rakkhijjaha attaṇō sayā dēhaṁ । iya nivasikkhē gahiraṁ ṭhāṇāō taō ahaṁ caliō ।। 6816 ।।
ajja ihaṁ saṁpattō aha taṁ sammāṇiuṁ visajjēi । kumarō sayaṁ tu gaṁtuṁ vasaṁtasirimēvamullavai ।। 6817।।
pasaṁtō jaha pēiyaharagamaṇukkaṁṭhiyāē jō tumaē । suyaṇu ! vihiō uvāō tahēva sō tujjha lahu phaliō ।। 6818 ।।
tō āha vasaṁtasirī piyayama ! parihāsaō vi mā ēvaṁ । puṇa pabhaṇissaha tubbhē na maē piugharagamaṇahēḍaṁ ॥। 6819।।
iya vittā tubhē kiṁtu jahā tumha tattha pagayāṇa । ruvāiguṇē daṭhṭhē piyarāī majjha tūsaṁti ॥। 6820।।
hakkāriyā vi tēhi vaccaha tubbhē na tattha jaṁtēṇa । niṭhurayāē dōsō tumhāṇa vi mā imō hōu ।।6821।।
iya ālāvaṁ kāuṁ khaṇaṁ pi kumarō samaṁ piyayamāē । saṁvahiūṇaṁ vaccai sayaṁ jiṇidāṇa bhavaṇēsu ।।6822।।
tayaṇu vasaṁtasirī vi hu hakkārēūṇa tattha varadattaṁ । vāsavaurē gamissai sirivammō tassa ii kahiuṁ । । 6823 ।।
saṁvahiūṇaṁ vaccai tēṇēva samanniyā jiṇaharēsu । nhavaṇāi pēkkhiūṇaṁ kumarō tīē saha niyattō ।।6824 ||
nivapāsāyammi gaō nivvattiyabhōyaṇāiniya kiccō । sējjāē gaō ciṭṭhai jāva khaṇaṁ tāva saṁpattō ।। 6825 ।।
dūsalasēṇāhivaī lēhaṁ gahiūṇa purisasahiyaṁ taṁ । sirivammassa samappai hatthē jaṁpai ya taha ēvaṁ ।। 6826 ।।
jaha ēsō mama lēhō paṭṭhaviō sūrapālanaravaiṇā । tumhaṁ āhavaṇatthaṁ hatthammi imassa purisassa ।। 6827।।
avahāriūṇa lēhaṁ taṁ kayamuttarāmimaṁ kumārēṇa । piuṇī āṇā amhaṁ iṇhi vāsavaurē gaṁtuṁ ||6828।।
tattō viṇiyatō puṇa karissamēyaṁ pi kiṁ pi na ajuttaṁ । iya vōttūṇaṁ ēyaṁ visajjaē vihiyasammāṇaṁ ।। 6829।।
tattō khaṇaṁtarēṇaṁ vinnattō puṇa vi dāravālēṇa । rannā mahābalēṇaṁ paṭṭaviō ciṭṭhaē purisō ||6830।।
aha kumarāēsēṇaṁ pavēsiō tēṇa sō samāgaṁtuṁ । appēuṁ kumarakarē lēhaṁ tō taṁ namasēi ।।6831।।
kumarō vi karaṁ dāuṁ paṭṭhīē tassa taṁ nimaṁtēi । uciyāsaṇēṇa sō vi hu uvavisiuṁ paṁjalīhōi ।। 6832।।
kumarō vi viḍiūṇaṁ lēhaṁ pēkkhēti tattha lihiyamiṇaṁ । amhēhiṁ tumha pāsē paṭṭhaviō ciṭṭhaē purisō ।। 6833 ।।
nāmēṇaṁ siriharisō pamāṇabhūō ya amha rāyaulē । tattō jaṁ kiṁpi imō jaṁpai tubbhēhi taṁ savvaṁ ।। 6834।।
sōuṁ aṇuṭṭiyanvaṁ tattha viyappō na kōi kāyavvō । iya lēhatthaṁ avahāriūṇa taṁ pucchaē kumarō ।। 6835।।
tumhaṁ siriharisō iya nāmaṁ ? āmaṁ ti jaṁpaē ēsō । taṁ āha puṇō kumarō saṁdēsaṁ kahaha niyapahuṇō ।।6836 ।।
tō jaṁpa siriharisō kahēmi tumhē suṇēha uvauttā । rannā mahābalēṇaṁ tumhāṇa kahāviyaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 6837 ।।
amha sudaṁsaṇakumarō puttō ēkkō ya vallahō taha ya। kiṁtu paraṁ āṇāē na vaṭṭaē ēsa kahayā vi ।।6838 ।।
maṁtīṇa mahāpurisāṇa pāsaō ēsa gavāraṁ pi । sikkhāviō na sikkhai tahāvi viyarai jahicchāē ।। 6839 ।।
nāūṇa tō sahāvaṁ uttārēūṇa niyayacittāō । mukkō dēsaccāyaṁ na kāriō maṁtivayaṇēṇa ।। 6840 ।।
ēsō aiduddatō damiō tumhēhiṁ suirakālāō । tō amhē parituṭṭhā tumhāṇamimēṇa kajjēṇa ।। 6841 ।।
dāhāmō niyadhūyaṁ pariṇayaṇatthaṁ aṇannasamarūvaṁ । piyadaṁsaṇa tti nāmaṁ sudaṁsaṇassēva lahubhaiṇi ।। 6842 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
1
213
ēyāō varisāō taiya (ē) saṁvaccharammi aikaṁtē । āsi maē nēmittī puṭṭhō ēkkō tayā ēvaṁ ।। 6843 । ।
jaha kira savvaguṇāṇaṁ kulaharabhūyāē amha dhūyāē । ēīē kō bhattā hōhī bhuvaṇammi aṇurūvō ? ।। 66844।।
tēṇa gahiūṇa panhaṁ sammaṁ vīmaṁsiūṇa iya bhaṇiyaṁ । jai tubbhē nō rūsaha kahēmi dhūyāvaraṁ tō haṁ ।। 6845 ।।
tō āha mahābalīvaī kimiha rūsiyavvaṁ ? ti । jai kira nimittadiṭṭha aduṭubhāvō tumaṁ kahasi ।। 6846॥
kahas taō nēmittī sudaṁsaṇaṁ tujjha naṁdaṇaṁ kō vi । jō baṁdhiūṇa khivihī niyaguttīē naridasuō ।। 6847 ।।
tuha dhūyāē bhattā sō hōhī nicchaēṇa aṇurūvō । iya nēmittiyavayaṇaṁ miliyaṁ inhi suṇēūṇa ||6848।।
tumhāhavaṇakaē iha paṭṭhaviō haṁ mahābalanivēṇa । dhūyāpāṇiggahaṇaṁ kārissai tattha tuha ēsō ।। 6849 ।।
jai kāraṇēṇa kēṇai tumhāṇaṁ tattha hōti nāgamaṇaṁ । tō saṁvāhēūṇaṁ piyadaṁsaṇanāmayaṁ dhūyaṁ ।।6850 ।।
pēsai mahābalanivō caṁdauripurī tumha pāsammi । tatthēva ya pariṇayaṇaṁ tīsē tumhēhiṁ kāyavvaṁ ।। 6851 ।।
tō pabhaṇai sirivammō vāsavadattēṇa nivaiṇā paḍhamaṁ । paṭṭhaviyaṁ hakkārayamaṇaṁtaraṁ sūrapālē ।।6852 ।।
taiyaṁ mahābalēṇaṁ inhi tattha'mha niyayatāyassa । āēsō āyāō gamaṇatthaṁ vāsavaurammi ।। 6853 ||
paḍhamaṁ ciya tattha taō bhavissaē tāva amha gaṁtavvaṁ । tattō viṇiyattāṇaṁ naravaiṇō sūrapālassa ।। 6854 ।।
nayarammi sārivaddē kamēṇa amhāṇa hōi gaṁtavvaṁ । taha vi hu na gamissāmō tattha'mhē kiṁtu daṁtaurē ।।6855 ।।
pāsammi mahābalanaravaissa nūṇaṁ samāgamissāmō । jōḍiyahatthō tattō sapaṇāmaṁ vayai siriharisō ।। 6856 ।।
kaiyā kumāramaggaṁ tumhāgamaṇassa mahabalanariṁdō । avalōyau daṁtaurē sō āha jayā visajjēhī ।। 6857 ।।
vāsavadattanaridō niyanayarāō mamaṁtayā niyau । maggaṁ mahābalō mē daṁtaurē āvayaṁtassa ।। 6858 ।।
iya sirivammakumārēṇa jaṁpiē juttijuttavayaṇammi । tā pabhaṇai siriharisō ēyaṁ ciya saṁgayaṁ hōi ।। 6859 ॥
tubhē taō visajjaha maṁ inhi saha maē niyaṁ purisaṁ । paṭṭhavaha kaṁ pi jaha sō amha pahū lahai pariōsa ।। 6860 ।।
tō jaṁpai sirivammō jai kaha vi sudaṁsaṇēṇa kumarēṇa । saha daṁsaṇaṁ karissasi tō taṁ kāuṁ tuma hōhi ॥। 6861 ।।
nivvayamaṇō iyāṇi jēṇa taē saha iō niyaṁ purisaṁ । kaṁ pi nirūvēūṇa tumaṁ visajjēmi sigghaṁ pi ।। 6862।
tō pabhaṇai siriharisō āēsō natthi tassa milaṇatthaṁ । dinnō mahābalēṇaṁ majjha taō kaha milēma ahaṁ । । 6863 ।।
tō sirivammō dāu taṁbōlaṁ taṁ visajjaē tassa । dāvēi ya āvāsaṁ dūsalapurisaṁ bhaṇēūṇa ।।6864 ।।
tō hakkārēūṇaṁ raṇasīhaṁ bhaṇai lahu tumaṁ gaṁtuṁ । appaṭṭamaṁ sudaṁsaṇakumaraṁ niyalāō mōēu |।6865।।
nhaviyavittiṁ kayakusumasēharaṁ pavaraparihiyadugullaṁ । kāuṁ maṁ jāṇāvaha taha tti vōttuṁ taō ēsō ॥।6866।।
lōhārāhavaṇatthaṁ pēsēuṁ māṇasaṁ payaṁ pattō । kumarasudaṁsaṇapāsē niyapahubhaṇiyaṁ kahai tassa ।। 6867।।
sō kāraṇaṁ papucchai raṇasīhō bhai majjha akkhāyaṁ । kiṁ pi na sirivammēṇaṁ kiṁtu maē avarapurisāō || 6868।।
nāyaṁ jahā mahābalarannā piyadaṁsaṇaṁ niyaṁ dhūyaṁ । dāu siriharisō nāma pēsiō niyamahāpurisō ।।6869 ।।
sirivammassa samīvē tēṇa taō ēyamēvayamullaviyaṁ । taṁ sōūṇa sudaṁsaṇakumarō jaṁpai ghaḍai ēvaṁ ॥। 6870 ।।
nēmittiyassa vayaṇaṁ majjha vi tatthaṭṭiyassa kannagayaṁ । sirivammēṇa saṁyaṁ ciya tā ēsa kaō pasāō mē ।। 6871 ।।
aha lōhārē pattē sudaṁsaṇāīṇa niyalabhaṁgāī । pahubhaṇiyaṁ kārēuṁ taō sayaṁ gaṁtu raṇasīhō ||6872।।
sirivammassa sarūvaṁ vinnavai imō vi avasaraniviṭṭhō । savvēsuvaviṭṭhēsuṁ saparēsu vi sēvayajaṇēsu ।। 6873 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-214-to-214.json ==========================
214
।
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
raṇasīhaṁ bhaṇiūṇaṁ hakkārāvara sudaṁsaṇaṁ tattha । appaṭumō vi ēsō āgaṁtuṁ namai sirivammaṁ ।। 6874 ||
ukkhiviyabāhujuyalō sirivammō niyaḍamāgayaṁ ēyaṁ । āliṁgai aigāḍhaṁ dāviya uciyāsaṇaṁ tattō ॥ 6875 ।।
uvavēsai āsannaṁ dēi sahatthēṇa tassa taṁbōlaṁ । varakappūrasaṇāhaṁ sō ginhai dōhi hatthēhi ||6876 ||
aha ēyaṁ sirivammō saṁbhāsai saṁbhamēṇa garuēṇa । jaha kira mahābalēṇaṁ rannā iha amha pāsammi ।।6877 ||
kajjaṁtarēṇa kēṇai paṭṭaviō āṇaō imō ajja । vahumaṇussō siriharisanāmaō sō u amhēhiṁ ।। 6878 ।।
ajjēva siddhakajjō kaō gamassai puṇō vi daṁtaurē । ēēṇa tumha visaē jai vihu nāmaṁ pi nō gahiyaṁ ।। 6879 ।।
tahavihu amhēhiṁ tumaṁ mukkō si jaō mahābalanivēṇa । amha jaṇaēṇa saddhi sājanaṁ kāumāra ।।6880 ।।
amhēhi vi tassa taō kāyavvaṁ pīivaddhaṇaṁ kiṁ pi । taṁ puṇa imammi samaē tuha mōyaṇaō havai pavaraṁ ।। 6881 ।।
jaṁpai sudaṁsaṇō tō jaṛa piuṇō amha pīimicchēha । kāuṁ tubbhē tōhaṁ dhariyavvō hōmi guttīē ।।6882 । ।
jaṁ cittē dhāritā jaṁpatā taha ya ciṭṭhaha muhēṇa । taṁ na kuṇaha kitu imaṁ vivarīyaṁ āyaraha tumbhē ।। 6883 ||
tō pabhaṇai sirivammō dubviṇayaṁ tassa tujjha saṁjamaṇaṁ । icchai mahābalanivō na uṇō tuha dēhamēttassa ।। 6884 ।।
taṁ puṇa duvviṇayattaṁ visamāvaḍiyaṁ tumaṁ vimōttūṇa । naṭṭha kahaṁ pi saṁpai tō taṁ jāōsi niddōsō ।। 6885 ।।
jai tumhaṁ paḍihāsai tō inhi vayaha sapiuṇō pāsē । jaṁpai taō sudaṁsaṇakumarō viṇaōṇaō ēvaṁ ।। 6886 ।।
savvō vi jō ciṭṭhai tattha guṇō jattha attaṇō hōi । savvaguṇēṇaṁ pavarō purisassa guṇō puṇō ēsō ।। 6887 ।।
jaṁ gurujaṇassa vayaṇē bahumāṇō hōi sō u maha jāō। tumha samīvāō taō tumaṁ na icchāmi tō tumahaṁ ।। 6888 ।।
sōūṇa taō ēvaṁ sudaṁsaṇaṁ savinayaṁ payaṁpataṁ । vihiyamaṇō vicitai siriharisō ērisaṁ cittē ।। 6889 ।।
annaṁ kiṁ pi sarūvaṁ kumarassa, sudaṁsaṇassa saṁjāyaṁ । saṁpai jamimō suvvai jaṁpatō avaravāṇī ||6890 ।।
paraparibhavadōsō vi hu imassa tā pariṇaō guṇattēṇa । jaccassa suvannassa va huyavahatāvō visuddhikaē ।। 6891।।
tō paṇa sirivammō kimajuttaṁ kira ihēva ciṭṭha tumaṁ । jāmi jayā daṁtaurē ahaṁ tayā taṁ pi vaccējjā ।। 6892 ।।
kira ciṭṭhasi ēttha tumaṁ majjha samīvē mahābalanivēṇa । hakkāriō niuttō sudaṁsaṇō tō vayai ēvaṁ ।।6873।।
nēyaṁ mannāmi ahaṁ jaō mahābalanivassa laṁghēuṁ । āṇaṁ ihāgaō tō hōmi kahaṁ tēṇa viṇiuttō ॥ 6894॥
hasiūṇaṁ sirivammō mōṇaṁ kāuṁ khaṇaṁ taō bhaṇai । raṇasīhadaṁḍaṇāyaga ! taē sudaṁsaṇakumārassa ।। 6895 ।।
cattārisahassāiṁ dāvēyavvāiṁ pavaraturayāṇaṁ । ēgō karahasahassō majjhāṇāē pasāēṇa ।।6896।।
ēyassa saṁtiō taha appēyavvō samaggaāvāsō । kārēthavvā vittī bhiccasahassāṇa paṁcanhaṁ ।। 6897।।
aha sirivammassāṇaṁ taha tti paḍivajjiūṇa raṇasīhō । kāūṇa aṁjali matthayammi ārōvaē tattō ।।6898 ।।
aha citaṁti sudaṁsaṇa siriharisā dō vi niyamaṇammi imaṁ । sirivammassa kamēyassa vannimō guṇamikkē kkaṁ ।।
kiṁ suyaṇattaṁ kiṁ vā gamyattaṁ kimuya samuciyannuttaṁ । kiṁ va kayaṇṇuttaṁ kiṁ va ajjavaṁ kiṁ va dakkhinaṁ ।। 6900।।
baṁdhēūṇaṁ gahiō jassa suō saha samaggavihavēṇa । tassa piyā piyavayaṇāī jaṁpaē jai vi bahuyāī ।।6901 ।।
taha vi kaha tēsu jujjai vibuhassa taha tti paccaō kāuṁ । kayapaccaō u ēsō ajjavamēyassa tō ēyaṁ । । 6902 ।।
puvvaṁ kalattagahaṇē jīviyavihavāṇa tayaṇu avaharaṇē । jō hōi ajjhavasiō baṁdhēuṁ tammi gahiyammi ।। 6903॥
aṭṭhadiṇāṇaṁ majjhē kaha mōkkhō tassa kīraē jhatti । mōkkhē vi kaē kaha vā suhāyamāṇaṁ vayaṇamēvakaṁ । । 6904 ।।

215
jaṁpaṁtassa pasāō kīrai jugavaṁ pi ēttiō sō vi । tā savvahā vi ēsō kēvalaguṇapuṁjanimmaviō ॥। 6905 ।।
jō vihiyavippiyāṇa vi ēvaṁ suyaṇattaṇaṁ payāsēi । sō aṇavarāhalōē uvayārī cēva sayakālaṁ ।।6906।।
jō ēyassa maṇammi vi asuṁdaraṁ kō vicitaē mūḍhō । niyaaṁgē cciya nivaḍai taṁ tassa na ēttha saṁdēhō ।। 6907।।
tē ēvaṁ ciṁtaṁtā visajjiē avasarammi sirivammaṁ । namiūṇa uṭṭiyā daṁsiyammi pagayā niyāvāsē ।। 6908 ।।
uṭṭhēumavasarāō sirivammō titthanāhapaḍimāē । bhattīē kāūṇaṁ pūyaṁ taha vaṁdaṇaṁ tattō ॥ 6909 ॥
gōṭṭhīē gamiūṇaṁ raryāṇi thēvaṁ pi saha suhijaṇēhiṁ । vāsaharē sējjāē sayaṇaṁ kāuṁ pabhāyammi ।। 6910 ।।
kayaāvasyakiccō pūēuṁ vaṁdiuṁ ca jiṇapaḍimaṁ । kayasiṁgārōvasarē uvavisiuṁ takkhaṇē cēva ।। 6911 ।।
kumarasudaṁsaṇajōggaṁ pēsai pallāṇiyaṁ pavarakariṇi । tatthāruhiuṁ ēsō pattō sirivammapāsamma ||6912 ॥
sirivammō tō pucchai raṇasīhaṁ jō maē tuhāēsō । saṁjjhāē āsi dinnō taē kaō sō kimajja vinō ।।6913॥
tō raṇasīhō jaṁpa kō vi kaō kō vi kīraē laggō । kiṁtu sayaṁ tumhēhi diṭṭhā turayā bhavissaṁti ॥ 6914।।
appēyavvā ēyassa jaṁpaē tō kumārasirivammō । jiṇamaṁdirēsu gaṁtuṁ samāgayā iya karissāmō ।। 6995 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattō sirihariyō tattha sō vi kumarēṇa । sirivammēṇaṁ puṭṭhō gaṁtūṇa sudaṁsaṇassa tumaṁ ॥ 6916।।
āvāsē vihu miliō ki na taō jaṁpaē sirīharisō । āvāsagamaṇavajjaṁ pi siddhamēmēva mē kajjaṁ ।।6917।।
ēyassa samīvāō palāiuṁ jō jaṇō gaō tattha । daṁtaurē nivapāsē kahaṁtaō sō maē nisuō ।।6918 ।।
savvamimassa sarūvaṁ ēēṇa vi mama sarūvamavabuddhaṁ । jēṇāgaōmhi kajjēṇa ēttha taṁ iyaralōyāō ।।6919।।
daṁsaṇakajjaṁ tu parōpparaṁ pi ēyassa mama ya saṁsiddhaṁ । ētthēva tuha sabhīvāgayassa kallē ya ajja tahā ।। 6920 ।।
tavvayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ sirivammō citaē ahō dūraṁ । cittaṁ sudaṁsaṇāō mahābalanivassa uttinaṁ ।।6921।।
tēṇēsa sirīharisō ahigicca sudaṁsaṇaṁ vayai ēvaṁ । ainiravēkkhaṁ jamhā jāṇai niyasāmiṇō cittaṁ ।। 6922 ।।
kavaḍaṁ ti na uṇa ēvaṁ saṁbhāvijjai sudaṁsaṇō jēṇa । dussīlattēṇa jaē vikkhāō āsi puvvaṁ pi ।।6923 ॥
jaha saṁpayaṁ payaṁpai sudaṁsaṇō taha purā vi nivvaḍihī । jai ēsō tō hōhī jaṇaō ēyammi pīyamaṇō ।। 6924।।
siriharisō āha taō maē samaṁ jō gamissai duijjō । daṁtaurammi nirūvaha taṁ kaṁ pi niyaṁ mahāpurisaṁ ।। 6925 ।।
pabhaṇai tō sirivambhō ahaṁ gamissāmi vāsavaurammi । jaiyā taiyā tubbhē daṁtaurē paṭṭhavissāmi ।। 6926 ।।
ki hōsi ūsuyamaṇō iṇhi ciya tāva tō sirīharisō । sapaṇāmaṁ bēi jahā tumhāsō pamāṇaṁ mē ।। 6927 ।।
tō sirivammō tattō uṭṭhēūṇaṁ karēṇumāruhiuṁ । baccai tēhi samaṁ ciya savvēsu jiṇidabhavaṇēsu ।।6928।।
nivvattiyaṇhavaṇāī āgaṁtūṇaṁ taō niyāvāsē । sēsaṁ visajjiūṇaṁ raṇasīhaṁ dhāraē ēkkaṁ ॥ 6929।।
jē pagahiyā sudaṁsaṇakaḍayāō tē turaṁgamē savvē । tattha samāṇāvēuṁ palōiūṇaṁ sayaṁ niuṇaṁ ।।6930 ।।
ēkkēkkēṇaṁ tattō caurō nivvāḍaē hayasahassē । raṇasīhō tēsu taō nivvāḍēuṁ hayasahassaṁ ॥ 6931।।
sirivammassa samīvē āgaṁtuṁ vinnavē jaha ēsō । turayasahassō taruṇō rayayaṁ balavaṁ gurupamāṇō ।।6932।।
tō ēē dhariūṇaṁ annē dijjaṁti ēsi ṭhāṇammi । sirivammō bēi taō lakkhaṇahīṇā imē turayā ।। 6933॥
āvattavannasattacchāyāgaṁdhō gaī ya sarō ।।6934 ।।
lakkhaṇamaṭṭhapayāraṁ satthēsu kahijjaē turaṁgāṇaṁ ।
aṭṭamayaṁ sārīraṁ tatthāvattō havē aṭṭhavihō । āvattō taha suttīsaṁghāō mugulamavalīḍhaṁ ।। 6935।।
sayavāipāuyaddhaṁ aṭṭhamiyā gāuyā viṇiddiṭṭhā । āvattāṇaṁ saṁkhā tēvīsahiyaṁ sayaṁ hōti ॥ 6936॥

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tēsu dhuvā āvattā dasa huṁti turaṁgamāṇa niyamēṇa । tērasahiyaṁ sayaṁ puṇa sēsaṁ āgaṁtuāvattā ।। 6937।।
tēsu vi sattattīsaṁ āvattā suṁdarā muṇēyavvā । chāvattariāvattā sēsā puṇa niṁdiyā nēyā ।।6938 ।।
āvattāṇa dasaṇhaṁ dhruvāṇa ṭhāṇāī hōṁti cha ccēva । urasiraraṁdhuvaraṁdhā causu vi dō dō ya āvattā ।।6939।।
ēkkō niḍāladēsē hōi duijjō pavāṇadēsammi | ṭhāṇēsu chasu vi ēēsa hōṁti ēvaṁ dasāvattā ।।6940 ||
ēē saṭṭārṭhiyā payakkhiṇā suppahā pasatthā ya । ēēhiṁ viṇā turaō thēvāū alakkhaṇō asuhō । । 6941 ।।
iha tu pavakkhāmō vīsaṁ ṭhāṇāī suppasatthāī । jāyaṁti jēsu suhayā āvattā sattatīsaṁ tu ।।6942 ।।
sikkē dōnni ṭhāṇā āvattā tēsu hōṁti dōnnēva । hōṁti niḍālē caurō āvattā tēsu bārasa u ।।6943।।
vacchammi tinni ṭhāṇā āvattā tēsu ti cau paṁcēva । kēsaṁtakannabāhakhadhā dō dō bhavē ṭhāṇā ॥। 6944 ।।
kaṁṭhē tahā nigālē raṁdhē ēēsu ṭhāṇamēkkēkkaṁ । ēvaṁ ṭāṇāvattā supasatthā pabhaṇiyā savva ।।6945 ।।
ēēsu
kō vikici vi karēṛa turaya । hivassa pavaraphalaṁ । dhaṇa-bhūmi- rajja-mittāi lāhamarijayamarōgāī ।। 6946 ।।
saṁkhaṁ mannā nāsā khaṁdhō jāṇū tigaṁ galō kauhaṁ । kucchihaṇu- kakkhapāsā bhūmajjhaṁ pucchamūlaṁ ca ।। 6947।।
ōṭṭhō ṇāhī - āsaṇa-jaṁghā - sīvaṇi avāṇamāīṇi । chāvattariṭhāṇāī ēkkēkkō tēsu āvattō ॥ 6948।।
ēē savvē asahā ēēsi kō vi kiṁpi pakarēi । hayasāmiṇō virūvaṁ maraṇabhayābaṁdhaṇāīyaṁ ॥। 6949 ।।
ēvaṁ vannāīyā sarapajjaṁtā vi lakkhaṇā nēyā । asuhā suhā hayāṇaṁ hayapahr̥ṇō tavvihaphalā ya ।। 6950 ।।
sārīrayaṁ iyāṇi turayāṇaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ pavakkhāmi । jīhā kaṁṭhanibaddhā tīē uvari tu tālu bhavē ।। 6951।।
hēṭṭhā
sūṇā pīṇō haṇunibaddhāu hōṁti dāḍhāō । dāhiṇavāmā aharuttarā ya tāō cau vi bhēyā । 6952 ।।
śāsi majjhē daṁtā aharuttarayā vi bārasa havaṁti । ētēsu vaṁjaṇēhiṁ nēyaṁ turayāṇa vayamāṇaṁ ॥। 6953 ।।
daṁtāṇaṁ uvari puṇa vibuhēhi uttarā viṇiddiṭṭhā | daṁtāvaraṇā ōṭṭhā tēsi saṁdhīu sikkiṇiō ।। 6954 ।।
aharōṭṭhassa ya hēṭṭhā ciuyaṁ uvariṁ tu uttarōṭṭhassa । hōti pavāṇaṁ tassa ya uḍḍhaṁ pōtthō tti niddaṭṭhō ।। 6955 ।।
pāsēsu tassa nāsāuḍajuyalaṁ pōtthalōyaṇaṁtaraē । ghōṇā tīsē pāsēsu kittiyā gaṁḍavāsāō ।।6956 ।।
majjhammi assuvāyā tēsiṁ uvariṁ ca assuvāyāṇaṁ । nayaṇāī tāṇa acchāyaṇāī vammāī nēyāī ।। 6957 ।।
nayaṇāṇaṁ majjhammi u kasiṇaṁ taha sukkilaṁ ca nāyavvaṁ । vammuvarigayā lōyaṇakūḍā bhumayāu nēyāō ।। 6958 ।।
nayaṇāṇaṁ pēraṁtā avaṁganāmā u hōṁti nāyavvā । acchīṇa majjhabhāē kaṇīṇiyā hōi bōdhavvā ।। 6959 ।।
bhumayāthuvāṇa majjhē hōi niḍālaṁ tu uvari tassa dhuvaṁ । kannaṁtarammiya siraṁ matthayamēyassa aṇulaggaṁ ॥। 6960।।
tasya ubhaō bhāē kannā majjhammi saṁkhakannāṇaṁ । nāyavvā hōṁti kaḍā avaṁgakaḍapāsaō saṁkhā ।।6961 ।।
saṁkhakaḍāṇaṁ uvari ghāḍā bāhimmi taha kavōlāṇaṁ । hōi haṇu jattu taṁ ciya haṇugalanāḍīṇasaṁdhīē ॥। 6962 ॥
hōi nigālō kannāṇa pāsaō piṭṭhaō ya vidujuyalaṁ । anē u kaṁṭhanāḍīpāsēsu vidū payapaṁti ।। 6963।।
aṁsāṇa sirassa ya aṁtarammi gīvā ya taduvari kkhaṁdhō । khaṁdhuvari kēsarāī kēsaṁtā kēsapāsaṭhiyā ।। 6964 । ।
jattu purō hōi bāhā majjhē vahakākasāṇa jattu bhavē । jattu kauhāṇa majjhē vibuhēhi kākasā kahiyā ।। 6965 । ।
kauhaṁ tu kākasāē majjhē taha āsaṇassa niddiṭṭha । kauhāṇaṁtaramāsaṇamakkhāyaṁ lakkhaṇaṇṇūhi ।। 6966 । ।
aha piṭṭhē tavvaṁsō aṁsā kauhassa hōṁti saṁbaddhā । ēma juyamaṁsamūlāṇugayaṁ turayāṇa hōi galō ।। 6967।।
kaṁṭhassa nigālassa ya majjhē galavacchamajjhaō kaṁṭhō । kaṁṭhassa ahē vacchaṁ kōḍō hiyavacchamajjhami ।।6968 ।।
kōsssa ahē bāhū bāhūṇa ahē havaṁti jāṇūṇi । jāṇūṇabbhaṁtaraō kiṇā ahē hōṁti jaṁghāō ।। 6969 ।।

puraō pacchā ya taha । kali tti ēē vi hōṁti vantrēṇa । uvari khurīē jaṁghāē hēṭṭaō hōi valihatthō ।। 6970 ।।
valivatthasanīvatthā kuccā tammajjhaō puṇō vi kiṇā । kuccāṇaṁ puṇa hēṭṭhā khurasaṁdhī kuṭṭiyā bhaṇiyā ।। 6971 ।।
tattō khurā maha sihā khurapacchā panhi sīsapanhīō । ēvaṁ ciya pāyatalaṁ pāyalaṭṭhā ya maṁḍukkī ।।6972 ।।
kakkhā u bāhupacchā kōḍōyaramajjhaō bhavē hiyayaṁ । nāhihiyayāṇa majjhē uyaraṁ tattō parā nāhī ।। 6973 ।।
pāsāī kakkhāṇaṁ pacchā tattō havaṁti kucchīō । kucchīṇuvari kukuṁḍuratigamajjhē hōṁti kuppāō ।। 6974।।
gattāṇa tiha saṁdhī hōi tigaṁ tayaṇu sāhiyaṁ jahaṇaṁ । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ ca kahiō pucchuvari jahaṇanīrōhō ।।6975 ।।
tassubhayaō vi kahiyāō bhāsalāō hayassa vibuhēhi । kahiyā rōhiṇisaṁdhītigassa pāsēsu dōsu vi ya । । 6976 ।
jahaṇassa ahē pucchaṁ nīrōhaṁ taṁ tu vattiyā tattō । hōi savālā pucchēṇa chāiyaṁ puṇa guyaṁ hōi ।। 6977 ।।
guyabhāsalāga hēṭṭhā phiupiṁḍā vaṭṭayā ya tadubhayaō । hōti avāṇassa ahē āsāṇaṁ sīvaṇī nāma ।। 6978 ।।
satthīṇa aṁtarālē vasaṇā tēsi ca aggaō sisiṇaṁ । raṁdhā taha uvaraṁdhā ūrūṇaṁ aṁtarē hōṁti ।। 6979 ।।
satthī u paṁḍumūlē ūrūṇa ahē ya vattasatthīṇi । hēṭṭhā ya vattasatthīṇa jāṇiyavvāō thūrāō ।। 6980 ।।
thūrāṇaṁ puṇa hēṭṭhā nāyavvā hōṁti maṁdirāō tti । tāsi pi puṇō hēṭṭhā tappuvvāō ya nēyāō ।। 6981 ।।
turayasarīrāvayavābhihāṇa kahaṇaṁ kayaṁ samaggaṁ pi । ēēsa lakkhaṇāī hōṁti suhāī ca asuhāī
raṇasīha ! tō imaṁ jaṁ turayasahassaṁ tumaṁ kahasi majjha । kēṇai kēṇai avalakkhaṇēṇa taṁ dusiyaṁ savvaṁ
ēyassa saṁtiyā jaṁ ēē turayā aō imassēva । appēmi imē annaha ērisaē dēmi nēva ahaṁ ।। 6984 ।।
sēṇāvairaṇasīhūṁ iyaṁ bōhēūṇa tassa pāsāō। turaē paṭṭāvēuṁ sudaṁsaṇaka sayaṁ tattō ।।6985 ।।
kāūṇa majjaṇāī gihapaḍimaṁ pūiūṇa muṇivaggē । paḍilābhiyammi bhuttē sāvayavaggē samaggē ya ।। 6986।।
bhōya samayammi taō hakkārēuṁ sudaṁsaṇaṁ kumaraṁ । siriharisaṁ varadattaṁ an vi ya dūsalāīē ||6987।।
tēhi samaṁ bhōttūṇaṁ dāvēūṇaṁ sudaṁsaṇāīṇaṁ । taṁbōlaṁ gahiūṇaṁ sayaṁ ca ghaṇasārasaṁjuttaṁ ॥ 6988॥
khaṇa mēgaṁ gamiūṇaṁ kahāhi āisai dūsalaṁ tattō । rahajattaṁ kārissaṁ pabhāyapa bhaī dinē tinni ।।6989 ।।।
tēṇa taē mōttavvā gōttī savvā vi tinni vi diṇāī । kārēyavvamamā rīghōsaṇayaṁ sayalanayarammi ।। 6990 ।
ēvaṁviha āēsē sasaṁbhamaṁ dūsalēṇa paḍivannē । sēsaṁ visajjai jaṇaṁ sakajjaniraō sayaṁ hōti ।। 6991॥
navamadiṇāō pabhiī rahajattaṁ kāriūṇa bhūīē । saṁghaṁ vatthāīhiṁ sammāṇēūṇa nīsēsaṁ ।। 6992।।
khāmēuṁ aṇujāṇāviuṁ ca vāsavapurammi gamaṇatthaṁ । patthāṇē ṭhāi sayaṁ jattā aṇukūladiyahammi ।।6993।।
sammāṇiuṁ visajjai siriharisaṁ tēṇa saha nirūvēuṁ । niyapurisaṁ kēlapasāyanāmayaṁ sikkhavēūṇa ।। 6994।।
ēgaṁ suvannalakkhaṁ dāūṇa sudaṁsaṇassa kumarassa । tattō dēi payāṇaṁ puraō vāsavapurābhimuhaṁ ।। 6995 ।।
gahiyāvāsammi taō sahappaṇā bhōyaṇaṁ karāyēuṁ । dūsaṇasēṇāhivaī sammāṇēuṁ visajjēi ।। 6996।।
vaccai sayaṁ tu puraō sirivammāgamaṇasāhaṇanimittaṁ । vāsavadattasamīvē varadattō pēsaē purisaṁ ॥6997।।
tattō purisāō nisāmiūṇa sirivammakumarapariṇīyaṁ । niyadhūyaṁ taha sēntrēṇa tassa līlāē baṁdhēuṁ । 6998 ।।
gahiyaṁ sudaṁsaṇaṁ paharisēṇa pūrijjamāṇasavvaṁgō । vāsavadattanariṁdō tassa bahuṁ kuṇai sammāṇaṁ ।। 6999 ।।
ētō kajjavasēṇaṁ kēṇai tatyāgayāē tammi khaṇē । vāsavasiridēvīsaṁtiyāē dāsīē taṁ nisuyaṁ ॥ 7000 ||
tattō tīē rahasūsuyāē rāyā na kiṁ pi niyakajjaṁ । vinnattō vinnattaṁ taṁ puṇa gaṁtūṇa dēvīē || 7001 ।।
jātīē samaṁ dēvī ciṭṭhai paharisakahāō kuvvatī । vāsavadattanariṁdō tāva sayaṁ cēva ōrōhē ||7002 |

||7010 ।।
gaṁtūṇa imaṁ jaṁpara puraō vāsavasirīē dēvīē । dhūyāpariṇayaṇēṇaṁ vaddhāvijjasi tumaṁ dēvi ||7003 ||
dēvī paḍibhaṇai taō dhūyā jāmāuyāṇa āgamaṇē । vaddhāvijjaha tumbhē vi dēva ! tō vimhiō rāyā ||7004 ।।
dēvi pucchara tuma kaha vinnāyaṁ imaṁ taō dēvī । jaṁpai jaha kaha vi taē taha caiva maē vi naranāha ! ।।7005 ।।
tō bhaṇai nivō niuṇō dēvi ! imō tujjha paṇihivāvārō। sā bēi imaṁ nāuṁ ūṇaṁ kammaṁ karijjāsi ।।7006 ।।
iya kāūṇaṁ gōṭṭhi khaṇaṁ pi dēvīē saha taō rāyā । niggaṁtu taṁ purisaṁ pēsai varadattapāsammi ।।7007 ।।
iya sikkhaṁ dāūṇaṁ jaha varadattō tara bhaṇēyavvō । āsanē sirivammē saṁpattē taṁ aṇunnaviuṁ
jaha sō puraō hōuṁ āgaṁtu milai majjha aha ēsō । gaṁtūṇaṁ varadattassa ērisaṁ kahai nivavayaṇaṁ
paccāsannammi gaē kumarē vāsavaurassa sirivammē । taṁ aṇujāṇāvēuṁ tattha sayaṁ jāi varadattō
vāsavadattassa purō sirivammaṁ āgayaṁ nivēēi । tavvisa karaṇijjaṁ maṁtai rāyā vi tēṇa samaṁ । । 7011 । ।
aha vāsavadattaniva saha varadattēṇa bīyadiyahammi । tassa niyavibhūtīē paccōṇīē vi ṇīharai ।। 7012 ।।
vāsavaurasīmāē gaṁtūṇa sayaṁ vilaṁbaē rāyā । pēsai varadattaṁ puṇa samuhaṁ sirivammakumarassa ।। 7013।।
tēṇa sahāgaṁtaṇaṁ vāsavadattaṁ kumārasirivammō । kariṇigaō vi paṇamai paṁjaliyāē nihiyasīsō || 7014 ||
vāsavadattō vi sa sāgaō samāliṁgiūṇa sirivammaṁ । saṁbhāsiūṇa kiṁci vi pavēsaē nayaramajjhami ।।7015 ।।
ūsiyabaṁyatōraṇapunnakalasakaya maṁgalōvayārammi । dēvaula-haṭṭa-ghara-taru-pāyāraṭṭiyapurajaṇammi ॥7016।।
aigaruyapamōēṇaṁ taṁ uttārai niyammi pāsāē । paḍhamaṁ pi vasaṁtasirī vi tattha āgaṁtu paṇamēi ।। 7017 ।।
piuṇō pāēsu piyā vi taṁ samāliṁgiuṁ ṇiucchaṁgē । uvavēsiūṇa cubai sirammi taha dēi āsīsaṁ ||7018।।
aha rayaṇamaē paṭṭē kōmalavaratūliyāsaṇāhammi | ṭhavai vasaṁtasirīē samanniyaṁ kumarasirivammaṁ ।। 7019।।
vāsavasiripamuhāō hakkārēūṇa savvadēvīō । bahumaṁgalāī kārai tēsi dōnhaṁ pi tāhi tō ।। 7020।।
sirivammō uṭṭhēuṁ kamēṇa tāsi samaggadēvīṇaṁ । kuṇai paṇāmaṁ tāō āsīsaṁ dēti tassa imaṁ ।। 7021।।
hōsu ajarāmarō taṁ uṭṭhēūṇaṁ taō vasaṁtasirī । avagūhiūṇa dēvīu tāōṁ atinibbharasiṇēhā ।।7022।।
paṇamai pasu tāsi tīsē iya dēti tāō āsīsaṁ । sayakālaṁ pi tumaṁ putti ! avihavā sūhavā havasu ।।7023 ।।
sirivammakumāraṁ pēkkhiūṇa rāyā sahāvarōhēṇa । paharisapūriyahiyaō savimhaō iti vicitēi || 7024।।
kayamaṇurūvaṁ vihiṇā vasaṁtasirikannayaṁ vihēūṇa । jaṁ sirivammēṇa samaṁ ēīē saṁgamō vihiō ।। 7025 ।।
amhāṇa vasaṁtasirī aṇurūvavarōvalaṁbhavisayammi । aigaruyayarī ciṁtā āsi maṇē sā gayā inhi ॥ 7026।।
daṭṭhūṇaṁ sirivammaṁ niyakhvaviṇijjiyāmarasirīyaṁ । savvaguṇāṇa nihāṇaṁ bhattāramimīē saṁpattaṁ ।। 7027।।
iccā citiūṇaṁ visajjiō tēṇa patthivēṇēsō । antammi cittayammōvasōhiē pavarapāsāē ॥7028 ।।
vāsavasiridēvīē dhariyā tatthēva puṇa vasaṁtasirī । sirivammassa nimittaṁ paṭṭaviyaṁ majjaṇāīyaṁ । । 7029 ।।
kayamajjaṇāikammō kayasiṁgārō jiṇidabhavaṇēsu । gaṁtūṇaṁ dēvē vaṁdiūṇa pattōṁ niyāvāsē ।।7030 ।।
vāsavadattassa suō suridadattōtti niyayadēsāō । tammi diyahammi pattō āēsēṇaṁ sajaṇayassa ।। 7031 ॥
hakkāriūṇa bhōyaṇasamaē nivamaṁdirē samāṇīyaṁ । sō sirivammakumāraṁ paṇamai aigaruyaviṇaēṇa ||7032||
taṁ sirivammassa kahēi naravarō ēsa salāō tumha । hōi vasaṁtasirīē sahōyarō jēhaō bhāyā ।।7033।।
tō bāhudaṁḍajuyalaṁ pasāriūṇaṁ kumārasirivammō । gāḍhaṁ āliṁgai taṁ suridadattaṁ siṇēhēṇa ||7034 ||
vāsavadatta bhōyaṇaka nisannaṁ kumārasirivammaṁ । pucchai sudaṁsaṇō kaha na dīsaē āgaō ēttha
।। 7035 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
219
tō sirimpō bhai nayarapavēsē vi tēṇa vinnattaṁ । ēvaṁ majjhē jahā haṁ alakkhiō āgamissāmi ।। 7036।।
vāsavadattassa purō appāṇaṁ na payaḍaṁ karissāmi । lajjāvasēṇa tamhā na majjha khūṇaṁ taē gijjhaṁ ॥7037।।
bhuṁjatē sirivammē vāsavadattēṇa kannamūlammi । sikkhaviḍaṁ paṭṭaviō varadattō tassa pāsamma ।। 7038।।
gaṁtr̥̄ṇa tēṇa bhaṇiō sudaṁsaṇō jaha tuhāhavaṇaṁhēuṁ । vāsavadattanivēṇaṁ paṭṭhaviō haṁ taō tubbhē ।। 7039।।
āgacchaha sigvaṁ ciya bhōyaṇasālāē ciṭṭhai niviṭṭhō । sirivammō nivakumarō tubbhē ēṁtē paḍikkhatō ।। 7040 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ sirivammaṁ kumaramahamaṇunnaviḍaṁ । ciṭṭhāmi ṭhiō iha sīsavēyaṇābāhiō bāḍhaṁ ।। 7041 ।।
nayara vēsē vi ahaṁ na paviṭṭō tēṇa saha aō cēva । tamhā bhuṁjau kumarō kumarassa na khūṇamiha kiṁ pi ।। 7042 ।।
varadattō bhai taō karissaē tumha jaṁpiyaṁ kumarō । sirivammō bhuṁjissai paraṁ na bhuṁjissaē rāyā ।। 7043 ।।
vāsavadattō jāva na taē kayaṁ tattha bhōyaṇaṁ gaṁtuṁ । bhaṇiyaṁ sudaṁsaṇēṇaṁ taō jahā majjha vinnatti । । 7044।।
tuma suṇāviūṇaṁ vāsavadattō nivō parūsaṁtō । rakkhēyavvō tattō varadattō jaṁpaē ēvaṁ ।। 7045 ।।
kiṁ pi niyamāṇasaṁ pēsiūṇa tumbhē imaṁ bhaṇāvēha । pēsai sudaṁsaṇō aha tēṇa samaṁ sāramaṁ tattha ।। 7046 ।।
vinnattaṁ tēṇa taō vāsavadattō sudaṁsaṇāvāsē । paḍipuna pēsai siddharasavaī sāramēṇa samaṁ ।। 7047 ।।
cattāri pavaraturaē vatthāharaṇāī taha gahēūṇa । varadattaṁ pi nirūvai sudaṁsaṇatthaṁ mahīnāhō ॥ 7048 ।।
vāsavadattuvarōhēṇa taṁ samaggaṁ sudaṁsaṇō gahiuṁ । sammāṇēūṇa taō puṇō visajjēi varadattaṁ ॥ 7049॥
jē yā vasaṁtasirīē samaṁ gayā āsi kēi gurupurisā । vāsavadattassa purō vinnattaṁ ērisaṁ tēhi ||7050।
jaṁ sirivammanimittaṁ sasurāīṇaṁ kaē ya jaṁnīyaṁ । rahakarituraṁgamāī vatthāharaṇāī amhēhi ।। 7051 ॥
taṁ kassa vinō dinaṁ ciṭṭhai savvaṁ pi iha samāṇīyaṁ । jēṇaddhapahē jāō saṁkhēvēṇaṁ ciya vivāhō । । 7052।
paraō ya na saṁjāyaṁ gamaṇaṁ amhē ihēva āyāyā । vāsavadattēṇa taō tēsi pāsāō taṁ savvaṁ ।। 7053 ।।
āṇāvēuṁ kayabhōyaṇassa sirivammavarakumārassa । vihiyavilēvaṇataṁ bōlakusumadāmōvayārassa ।। 7054।।
parivārasya jahajōggayāē dāūṇa taṁ visajjēi । aha vāsavadattanivō vāsavasiripamuhadēvīṇaṁ ।। 7055 ।।
sāha jaha kārissaṁ vivāhavaddhāvaṇaṁ diṇē caurō । pauraparivāralōyaṁ kamēṇa bhuṁjāvaissāmi || 7056।।
tā tubbhē sayamēvaya aṁtēuracārinārivaggāō । baddhāvayāgayāṇaṁ puranārīṇaṁ
baddhāvayāgayāṇaṁ puranārīṇaṁ mahiḍḍhīṇaṁ ॥ 7057।।
kārijjaha uvayāraṁ pīppalitaṁbōlakusumadāṇāī । taṁ nivavayaṇaṁ savvāhiṁ tāhi taha cēva pavinnaṁ ॥ 7058।
kamalasirīpamuhāṇaṁ aṭṭhanhaṁ kannagāṇa māūhiṁ । vinnattō naranāhō jaha paḍhamamuvāgaē ēttha ।।7059।।।
sirivammamma kumārē maṁgalakaraṇujjayāhi amhēhiṁ । saddhi samāgayāhiṁ kamalasirīpamuhakannāhiṁ ॥ 7060
jappabhi ciya diṭṭhō sō tāhi siṇiddhadiṭṭijuyalēhi । tappabhiī ciya īsāiēṇa vāṇaṁgasuhaḍēṇa ।। 7061।।
hiyayammi tāḍiyāō nivvarabāṇēhi niyamaṇēṇa । tāō viyaṇattāō ajja vi giṇhaṁti nāhāraṁ ।।7062।।
tō kārissaha tubbhē uvayāraṁ kaṁpi tāṇa kannāṇa । taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ vāsavadattō taō rāyā ।।7063 ।।
tattha vasaṁtasirīē muhaṁ palōēi sā vi paṇayasirā । jaṁpara jaha amha sahāiṇīō kīraṁtu ēyāō ।।7064 ||
tō rāyā sirivammaṁ bhaṇāvaē pēsiūṇa varadattaṁ । pariṇayaṇatthaṁ kannāṇa tāṇa aṭṭhanha vi niyāṇa || 7065 ।।
tō sirivammō jaṁpai vāsavadattēṇa puhaināhēṇa । garuō amha pasāō kaō jamēvaṁ samāiṭṭha ॥7066।।
kiṁtu paraṁ ēkkēṇa vi jassa kalattēṇa nivvaī hōi । kaha sō bahuyakalattāiṁ pariṇaē niṣphalaṁ cēva ।।7067।।
amha vasaṁtasirī ēkkāē vi nivvuī maṇē jāyā । tēṇiyarakannagāṇaṁ pariṇayaṇaṁ nēya icchāmō ।। 7068 ।।

2.20.
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
gaṁtaṇaṁ varadattēṇa sāhiē ērisē kumaravayaṇē । vāsavadattēṇaṁ tattha pēsiyā tō vasaṁtasirī ॥7069।।
tīsē uvarōhēṇaṁ sirivammēṇaṁ imammi paḍivanē । rāyā gaṇaē hakkāriūṇa laggaṁ gaṇāvēḍaṁ ||7070।।
sirivammasamīvāō pariṇāvara aṭṭagaṁ pi kannāṇaṁ । gōdhūliyavēlāē aigaruyāē vibhūīē ।। 7071 ।।
annē vitini diyahē gamai vivāhasavēṇa naranāhō । aha sirivammakumārō gulakhēḍapurē vva tattha purē ।।7072 ।।
ēkkārasahiṁ dihi savvēsu vi jiṇaharēsu nhavaṇāī । rahajattāī nivvattiūṇa nivvuyamaṇō jāō ।। 7073 ।।
navahiṁ kalattēhiṁ samaṁ paṁcapayārē vi māṇusē bhōē । bhuṁjatō saṁciṭṭhai sudaṁsaṇāīhiṁ kayasēvō ।। 7074 ।।
aha annadiṇē vāsavadattanaridaṁ nisannamatthāṇē । vinnavai jōḍiyakarō paḍihārō dēva ! dārammi ।।7075 ।।
nāmēṇa āsarāō turaṁgadamagō samāgaō atthi । kō tassa samāēsō bhaṇai nivō lahu pavēsēhi ||7076 ॥
parihārēṇa vimukkō pavisēuṁ sō vi paṇamiūṇa nivaṁ । jōḍiyakarō niviṭṭhō uciṭṭhāṇē nivaisamuhō ।।7077।।
tō āha taṁ nariṁdō samappiō āsarāya ! tuha jaiyā । paḍhamaṁ maē turaṁgō sāraṁgō nāma sāraṁgī ।।7078 ।।
tujjha tayā āēsō āsī kira ērisō bhaē dinnō । vāhaṇavihinippannaṁ kāūṇa turaṁgamaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 7079 ।।
bahuhiṁ vidiyahēhi maē samaṁ daṁsaṇaṁ tumaṁ kujjā । tā ki taē taha cciya taṁ vihiyaṁ ajja vina kiṁ vā ॥
tō āha āsarāō dēvāēsaṁ kimannahā kō vi । kuṇai narō kallāṇaṁ jō ihaī attaṇō bhuvaṇē ॥7081 ॥
aha vāsavadattaniva puṇō vi taṁ pabhaṇaē maē tujjha । ahuṇā kattiyamāsē samappiō ajja vi turaṁgō ।। 7082 ॥
tā avi māsē kaha sikkhaṁ gāhiō taē ēsō । tō sirivammakumārō naridadāhiṇadisinisannō ।।7083 ॥
vinnavai nivaṁ jaha dēva ! ghaḍai ēvaṁ pi ubhayasaṁjōgē । jai bhavvajāi turaō varasikkhāvagakarē caḍai ।। 7084 ।।
uttamajāī turaō payaīē cēva hōi suviṇīō । tassāsadamagapurisō nimittamēttaṁ paraṁ hōi ।। 7085 ।।
jamhā muṇiūṇa maṇaṁ āsārōhassa sō payaṭṭēi । sikkhāē sigghaṁ ciya hōi taō tassa na payāsō || 7086 ।।
āsadamaō vi maimaṁ turayasarūvaṁ viyāṇiūṇa taō । taha taha gāhai sikkhaṁ jaha ginhai taṁ imō sigghaṁ ।। 7087 ।।
tā ēttha vakālattaṇēṇa mā kuṇaha vimhayaṁ kiṁ pi । tubbhē pāsaha turayaṁ vāhijjataṁ imēṇēva ||7088 ।।
paccakkhammi payatthē pucchijjatō karēi kiṁ sakkhī । pāṇimmi nibaddhē kaṁkaṇammi kuṇai va kimāyaṁsō ? ।। 7089 ।।
vāsavadattanariṁdō sirivammakumārajaṁpiyaṁ ēyaṁ । sōuṁ sāhippāyaṁ uṭṭhai sīhā saṇāhitō ।।7090 ।।
sirivammaṁ pi kumāraṁ hakkārai appaṇā samaṁ tattō । āisai āsarāyaṁ hayadamagaṁ jaha imō gaṁtuṁ ।। 7091 ।।
pallāṇāvēūṇaṁ sāraṁgaturaṁgamaṁ taō tammi । sayamāruhiūṇa tumaṁ ējjaha hayavāhiyālīē ।।7092॥
iya taṁ bhaṇiūṇa taō ēgāē karēṇugāē āruhiuṁ । saha sirivammēṇa sayaṁ vaccai nayarassa vāhimmi ।। 7093 ।।
hayavāhiyālithaḍaē gaṁtūṇaṁ tattha uttarai tattō । sahayārāsōyasa māṇasāhisāhākaya cchāē
sīhāsaṇē nisīyai niyadāhiṇabāhudaṁḍaāsannē । sirivammaṁ uvavēsai vibhinna dinnāsaṇē pavarē
tattha kumārēṇa samaṁ kahāu pariōsavuḍhijaṇaṇīō । vāsavadattanariṁdō khaṇamēgaṁ kāumāḍhattō
aha sō vi āsarāō laddhāēsō nariṁdapāsāō । pallāṇiyaṁ turaṁgaṁ sāraṁgaṁ āruhēūṇa
vikhāē vikhāē ( ? ) pattō hayavāhiyāli dēsammi । ōinnō diṭṭhipahē vāsavadattassa naravaiṇō ।।7098 ।।
taṁ daṭṭhūṇaṁ rannā sirivammō rāyanaṁdaṇō bhaṇiō । pēkkhaha kumāra ! ētō sāraṁgaturaṁgamaṁ ētaṁ ।। 7099 ।।
ārūḍhaāsadamagaṁ aha kumarō tattha nikkhivai diṭṭhi । tattō puṇō vi rāyā kumāramēvaṁ payaṁpēi ।। 7100 ।।
kērisaō tumha imō turaṁgamō māṇasammi paḍihāi | kērisaō vā ēsō āsārōhō hayārūḍhō ? ।। 7101 ।।
॥

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ

iya jaṁpaṁtammi narēsarammi sō āsarāyahayadamagō । āsannayarō pattō hiṁḍāvētō tayaṁ turayaṁ ॥।7102।।
tō savisēsaṁ kumarō saāsavāraṁ nirikkhiuṁ turayaṁ । vinnavai nivassa purō puvvaṁ tajjāirūvaguṇē ।। 7103।।
dēva ! tivihā hayāṇaṁ uttima majjhā'hamā havai jātī । tatthuttamā tibhēyā tāiyatukkhārakhatulāṇā ।। 7104 ।।
tāiyajātippabhavō turaṁgamō ēsa uttamō tēṇa । saṁṭhāṇaṁ pi maṇunnaṁ imassa jaṇanayaṇamaṇaharaṇaṁ ।। 7105 ।।
jaṁ kannavasaṇamēhaṇamaṇibaṁdhā āsaṇaṁ ca paṁcamayaṁ । vannijjaṁti hayāṇaṁ lahūṇi hayalakkhaṇannūhi ।। 7106 ।।
mōttuṁ mēhaṇamiyarē ṭhāṇā caurō vi nayaṇapaccakkhā । lahuṇō tayaṇussārēṇa najjaē mēhaṇaṁ pi lahu ।। 7107।।
taha sakēsarāṇi ya rāmāṇi taṇucchavī aimiūṇi । jāṇujahaṇāṇaṇāraṁ nimmaṁsāī imassa tahā ।। 7108।।
gīvā ya ūsiyaggā khurā ya aikakkhaḍā akhaṁḍā ya । kaḍipaṭṭikhaṁdhabhālaṁ vacchaṁ acchīṇi pihulāī ।।7109 ।।
diṭṭhī dasaṇā hēsāravō ya tinni vi hayassa niddhāī । vannijjaṁti imassa udīsai diṭṭhī siddhiyarā । । 7110 ।।
sāravadasaṇā vihu asuyaadiṭṭhā vi suṁdarā cēva । sēsaṁgacaṁgimāē saṁbhāvijjaṁti ēyassa ।। 7111 ॥
ārambha khuraggāō ussēhō hōi kākasaṁ jāva । uttimamajjhimaahamō hayāṇa aṁgulapamāṇēṇaṁ ।। 7112 ।।
saya mēga maṁgulāṇaṁ aḍasīi asīiaṁgulāī tahā । tivihō vi ussaō iya kamēṇa turayāṇa nāyavvō ।। 7113 ।।
paḍhamō cciya ussēhō saṁbhāvijjai hayassa ēyassa । jamhā mahappamāṇō parihāsai ēsa dīsaṁtō ।।7114।।
āyāmō vi hayāṇaṁ tivihō jēṭhō ya majjhima kaṇiṭṭhō । saṭṭhī - pannā - cattāsahiyaṁ aṁgulasayaṁ kamasō ।। 7115 ।।
ussēhasamō nēō pariṇāhō uttimāiō kamasō । pariṇāhāyā mā vi hu paḍhamā ēyassa ṇāyavtrā ।। 7116 ।।
avaraṁ pi dēva ! ēvaṁ sannāvattāiyaṁ hayasarūvaṁ । atthi iha taṁ ca najjai kālāsannāibhāvēṇa ।। 7117॥
iya hayasarūvanāṇē pagabbhayaṁ appaṇō payāsēuṁ । turayārōhasarūvaṁ pabhāsaē kiṁ pi nivataṇaō ।। 7118 ।।
dēva ! imō hayadamaō maṇunnamuttī juvā baliṭṭhō yē । suthirāsaṇō thirōru thirajāṇū suthirapaṭhṭhī ya ।।7119।।
calajaṁghapāyajuyalō unnayakhaṁdhō nayaṁsatigabhāgō । uyarammi nivviyārō ujjukiō pāsajummammi ।।7120 ।।
unnayavacchō bāhūsu saṁvuḍō nēyanēyaviyaḍō ya । gaṁbhīrabhīsaṇasarō mōrō vva avaṁciyasi ya ।। 7121।।
hayachāyākannanihittadiṭṭisēsō imassa guṇanivahō । hayahiyayanāṇamādī jō uciō āsadamagāṇaṁ ।। 7122 ।।
taṁ payaḍissai ēsō āsō cciya saṁpayaṁ purō tumha । vāhijjatō taha taha ēēṇaṁ vāhaṇavihīē ।। 7123 ।।
iya sirivammakumārēṇa jaṁpiē juttisaṁgaē vayaṇē । rāyā harisiyahiyaō turayammi nivēsaē diṭṭhi ।। 7124।।
sirivammō vi kumārō uvasaṁhariūṇa vayaṇavitthāraṁ । thiradiṭṭhī avalōyai caṁkammaṁtaṁ tayaṁ turayaṁ ।।7125 ।।
aha āsarāyanāmō turaṁgadamagō jahā turaṁga taṁ । vāhaṇavihiṇā vāhai aṇukkamēṇaṁ tahā bhaṇimō ।।7126।।
daḍha cittavibhāṇaṁ duvihaṁ hayavāhaṇaṁ buhā bēṁti । saṁgāmuvaōgi daḍhaṁ jaṇavimhayakārayaṁ cittaṁ ।। 7127।।
hōti daḍhaṁ caubhēyaṁ ujusāraṇavāmadāhiṇavihīhi । cittavihīṇaṁ nēyaṁ ujusavvaṁ aggaō gamaṇaṁ ।। 7128॥
vivarīēhiṁ parahiṁ pacchāhuttaṁ hayassa jaṁ saraṇaṁ । taṁ sāraṇaṁ pi havai hu maṁḍalaē dāhiṇaṁ vāmaṁ ।। 7129 ।।
iha nēyāō dhārāō paṁca hayavāhaṇaṣṇupurisēhi । dhārāṇaṁ bahibhūyaṁ sahāvagamaṇaṁ tu hōti gaī ।। 7130।।
tattō pulāē gamaṇaṁ hayassa jaṁ sā u paḍhamiyā dhārā । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ tu duiyā dhārā javasammayā nāma ।। 7131।।
tattō vi paraṁ tayā dhārā javamajjhima tti nāmēṇa । tayaṇu cautthī dhārā javuttamā nāmanāyavvā
dhārāṇa cauṇhaṁ pi hu abbhahiyā hōi paṁcamī dhārā । accuttamajavanāmā paḍisiddhaṁ vāhaṇamimīē
hu
paḍhamāsu cēva dhārāsu causu turayāṇa vāhaṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । suṣasatyaṁ kusalēhi savvēhi vi savvakammē
।। 7132 ।।
।।7133 ।।
।। 7134 ।।

222
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
।।7149 ।।
।।
7150 ।।
paṁcamadhārāṇugaē turaē kusalō vivāhagō jamhā । kammakaraṇammi akhamō hōi mahāvēgavihuraṁgī ।। 7135 ।।
hōṁti navamaṁḍalāī aṭṭhārasadhaṇuhaparimiyaṁ paḍhamaṁ । dō dō dhaṇuha vi hīṇāī hōṁti sēsāī aṇukamasō ।। 7136 ।।
dō dhaṇuhaparīmāṇaṁ saṁjāyai jāva maṁḍalaṁ navamaṁ । kamasō imēsu turaō vāyavvō subuddhīhi ।। 7137 ।।
sāhēyavvā dhārā paḍhamaṁ ciya paḍhamamaṁḍalē paḍhamā । tīē siddhāē aha sēsāō tinni dhārāō ।।7138 ।।
sāhēyavvāu hayassa maṁḍalē tammi cēva tattō ya । duiyāimaṁḍalēsu vi caurō caurō ya dhārāō ।। 7139 ।।
sāhēyavvāu kamēṇimiṇā jā hōi maṁḍalaṁ navamaṁ । navabhēyamaṁḍalē iya cau cau dhārā juē siddhē ।। 7140 ।।
dijjai muhammi kaviyaṁ turayassa tahēba maṁḍaladvēṇa । gōmuttīnāma bhavē dhārā ēsā vi savvattha || 7141 ।।
sāhēyavvā paimaṁḍalaṁ pi ēkkēkkapuvvadhārāē । aṭṭhamanavamē parivajjiūṇa dō cēva maṁḍalagē ||7142।।
ujjubhiīṇa bhaṇiō ēsō pāēṇa sāhaṇammi kamō । kammāvēkkhāē vaikkamō vi katthai karēyavvō ।। 7143 ।।
naṭṭāyāraṁ vittaṁ turayāṇaṁ rūvadāyagaṁ hōi । tē ya pamāṇajuyā vi na turayā rēhaṁti jēṇa viṇā ।। 7144 । ।
taṁ puṇa vittaṁ tivihaṁ jhaṁpākaraṇaṁ ca kūḍanāmaṁ ca । samapāyāiyabhēyā puṇō bhavē taṁ duvālasahā ।। 7145 ।।
uḍḍhaṁ vaggāgahaṇē rāgāihaō ya hōi jaṁ turaō । samamuppaḍaṁtapāō sā jhaṁpā taiyadhārāē ।। 7146।।
karaṇaṁ duijjadhārāṇugayaṁ samapāyapabhiibhēēhiṁ । bhaṇiyaṁ paṁcapayāraṁ taṁ hayavāhaṇavihinnūhi ॥ 7147।।
paḍhamaṁ samapāyaṁ taha duijjayaṁ vattadāhiṇaṁ hōti । taiyaṁ tu vattavāmaṁ cautthayaṁ hariyadāhiṇayaṁ । । 7148 । ।
paṁcamayaṁ hiyavāmaṁ kūḍaṁ puṇa hōti paḍhamadhārāē । taṁ calathirabhēēṇaṁ duvihaṁ vibahēhi niṭṭhi
tattha calaṁ caṁkamamāṇapāyamēgattha saṁṭhiyaṁ ca thiraṁ । tattha calaṁ puṇa tivihaṁ tatthēgaṁ dissa dāhiṇayaṁ
duiyaṁ tu dissavāmaṁ vikkhittapayaṁ tu taiyayaṁ hōti । tivihaṁ thiraṁ pi nēyaṁ aggaṭṭiyadāhiṇaṁ ēvaṁ
duiyaṁ pāyasvāmaṁ taiyaṁ samapāyamēva nāyavvaṁ । bharahuttaṁ jaha naṭṭaṁ taṁḍavalāsēhi duvibhēyaṁ
kūḍaṁ pi tahā nēyaṁ taṁḍavanāēṁ ca lāsanāmaṁ ca । iya vanniyassarūvaṁ daḍhaṁ pi cittaṁ pitaṁ turayaṁ ।। 7153 ।।
kārēūṇaṁ sō āsarāyanāmō turaṁgadamagavarō । turiyāē dhārāē uṭṭāvē nivābhimuhaṁ ।। 7154 ।।
thaḍayassa niyaḍadēsē āṇēuṁ khaṁcaējhaḍa tti taō । khacaṇasamakālaṁ citra uḍḍha sō saṁṭhiō turaō ।। 7155 ।।
rēhāē cēva taō parituṭṭamaṇō nivō payaṁpēi । pēkkha kumāra ! kahēsō imēṇa sikkhāviō turaō || 7156 ।।
kumarō u nirikkhēuṁ taṁ turayaṁ kannadiṭṭhipamuhēsu । dēhāvayavēsu tahēva ciṭṭhaē jaṁpaṛa na kiṁpi ।। 7157।।
tō rāyā taṁ kumaraṁ puṇō vi pucchai tahēva savisēsaṁ । kumarō vi jōḍiyakarō hōuṁ ciṭṭhai kayapaṇāmō ।। 7158 ।।
na uṇō jaṁpai kiṁci vi taō nariṁdō puṇō vi jaṁpēi । kiṁ kumara ! taṁ na jaṁpasi kiṁci vi turayassa guṇadōsaṁ । । 7159 ।।
tō sirivammakumārō jaṁpai tubbhēhi dēva ! paccakkhē । diṭṭhē turayasarūvē ki amhē ēttha jaṁpāmō ।। 7160 ।।
aha vāsavadattaniva kumāravayaṇaṁ imaṁ sagabbhaṁ ti । nāūṇa saṁkiyamaṇō puṇō vi kumaraṁ bhaṇai ēvaṁ ।। 7161।।
diṭṭha ciya paccakkhaṁ turayasarūvaṁ maē kumāra ! paraṁ । pucchāmi abhippāyaṁ tujjha ahaṁ vimhayapavannō ।। 7162।।
atthāṇaniviṭṭhēṇaṁ maē jayā āsarāyahayadamagō । puṭṭhō turayasarūvaṁ tayā sayaṁ niyamaīē taē ।। 7163 । ।
vīmaṁsiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ samatthiyaṁ tēṇa āsarāyassa । vayaṇaṁ majjha purō jaṁ tahēva taṁ jāyamaviyappaṁ ।। 7164 ।।
! inhi niyadiṭṭhīē daṭṭhaṇa vi turayacēṭṭhiyaṁ sakkhaṁ । puṭṭhō vi maē na tumaṁ jaṁpasi kiṁci tti mē saṁkā ।। 7165 ।।
aha mauliyakarakamalō sapaṇāmaṁ bhaṇai kumarasirivammō । bēmi ahaṁ niyabhāvaṁ jai dēvō dēi acchaliyaṁ । । 7166 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
223
tō vāsavadattanivō jaṁpara ēvaṁ kumārasirivammaṁ । acchaliyaṁ ciya tuha savvakālamaviruddha vāissa ।। 7167 ।।
kumarō vinnavas nivaṁ hakkāraha dēva ! āsarāyaṁ pi । ēttha niyasannihāṇē tassa samakkhaṁ jahā bēmi ।।7168 ।।
uttariuṁ turayāō rāyā ēsēṇa āsarāō vi । hayadamagō āgaṁtuṁ tatthuvaviṭṭhō uciyaṭhāṇē ॥7169।।
vinnavai taō nivaī sirivammō dēva ! āsarāēṇa । ēsa turaṁgō bāhimmi vāhiō na uṇa majjhammi ।।7170 ॥
tō jaṁpai naranāhō kumāra! tuha jaṁpiyassa bhāvatthō । ajja vi na muṇijjai kō vi tā tumaṁ kahasu paḍatthaṁ । । 7171।
puvvaṁ pi amha turayā savvē bāhimmi cēva nayarassa । ēēṇa āsarāēṇa vāhiyā suṁdarā jāyā ।। 7172 ।।
majjhassa bāhirassa ya amhēhiṁ na kiṁ pi aṁtaraṁ nāyaṁ । ēttiyadiṇāṇi tā kahasu kumara ! kō ēttha paramatthō ।। 7173।।
tō sirivammakumārō pabhaṇai majjha va bāhiraṁ vā vi । nayarassa na nāyavvaṁ ki puṇa nēyaṁ hayassēva ।।7174।।
dēhaṁ hayassa bajjhaṁ cittaṁ tassēva hōi majjhaṁ tu । vāhiyamimassa dēhaṁ na u cittaṁ āsarāēṇa ।। 7175 ।।
jamhā hayassa cittaṁ vaṭṭai sakasāyamajjavi imassa । chaḍḍāvēūṇa kasāyamēsa nō vāhiō imiṇā ।। 7176 ।।
mēttīē āṇēuṁ daḍhaṁ ca cittaṁ ca duvihamavi sikkhaṁ । turaō gahāviō ēsa tēṇa na suvāhiō dēva ! ॥7177।।
hasiūṇa taō rāyā sirivammaṁ kumaramēvamāisai । kiṁ tumha ghāriyāhiṁ payōyaṇaṁ kiṁ va kāṇēhiṁ ? ।। 7178 ।।
jaha jaha āsārōhō kārai taha taha karēi jai turaō । ruṭṭhēṇa va tuṭṭhēṇa va tō tassamaṇēṇa kiṁ kajjaṁ ? ।।7179 ।।
tō pabhaṇai sirivammō dēva ! jahā tumha kō vi sāmaṁtō । dappiṭṭhō tuṭṭamaṇō suviula sammāṇadāṇēhiṁ ।। 7180 ।।
daṁsē subahuviṇayaṁ bāhimmi viṇā vi gavvavigamēṇa । tassa jayā vi na jāyaṁ sammāṇaṁ kiṁ pi dāṇaṁ vā ।। 7181 ।।
sō payaḍai jhatti tayā vi attaṇō cittaduṭṭimaṁ gūḍhaṁ । taha kālē imassa vi hayassa dōsō phuḍō hōi ।। 7182।।
āha nivō kaha kaliyaṁ kumara ! taē turayacittaduṭṭhattaṁ । kahai kumārō kannāṇa thaḍḍhamāē maē nāyaṁ ।। 7183 ।।
lōyaṇajuyalēṇa tahā ubhaō pāsāvalōyaṇaparēṇa । iya kumaravayaṇamāyanniūṇa vimhiyamaṇō rāyā ॥ 7184 ।।
hayadamagaāsarāyassa sammuhaṁ pēsaē niyaṁ diṭṭi । aha sō mauliyapāṇī paṇayasirō vinnavēi nivaṁ ।। 7185 ।।
jaha sirivammakumārō vinnavai tahēva dēva ! savvamimaṁ । ēttīē cēva maē turaṁgamō vāhiō ēsō ।। 7186 ।।
jamhā uttamatēō tāmasabhāvāhiō imō turaō । daṁḍēṇa vasīkāuṁ nēya maē pāriō tēṇa
tō āsarāyavayaṇēṇa kumaravayaṇē sapaccaō jāō । rāyā vimhayapūriyahiyaō sīsaṁ niyaṁ dhuṇai
āruhiūṇa karēṇuṁ aha sō kumarēṇa saha gaō sagihaṁ । hayadamagō vi nivāsēṇārūḍhō tayaṁ turayaṁ ॥ 7189।।
aha nicca naravaiṇā ahigāhigagōravēṇa dīsaṁtō । gamai sirivammakumarō samayaṁ gimhassa tatthēva ।। 7190 ।।
jattha ya gimhē virahaggitaviyapahiyaṁgaṇāvimukkēhiṁ । nīsāsēhiṁ va niccaṁ uṇhunhayarā diṇā hōṁti ।। 7191 ।।
gimhasamayassa āṇaṁ payāsamāṇa vva savvabhuvaṇammi । viyaraṁti jahicchāē jaṇāṇa saṁtāvayā vāyā ।। 7192 ।।
tammi samayammi jāō saṁtāvayarō jaṇassa mittō vi । suyaṇō vi dujjaṇattaṁ payaḍai diyahāṇubhāvēṇa ।।7193।।
vaḍḍhaṁtapayāvē diṇayarammi diyahā vi hōṁti vaḍḍhatā । jō hōi jassa taṇaō tassa sirīē sirī tassa ।। 7194 ।।
hēmaṁtē jēṇa himēṇa hayappayāvō ravī kaō āsi । inhi tivvapayāvaṁ taraṇi daṭṭhūṇa taṁ naṭṭha ।। 7195।।
taraṇī va vētō himaṁ na pāvēi jāva kattha vi ya । sōsēi tāva tappakkhasaṁgayāī jalāī pi ।। 7196 ।।
accataṁ saṁtaviyaṁ daṇa mahiṁ mahīruhā tattō । tada ukkhēṇa va jāyā payaṇucchāyā paidiṇaṁ pi ॥7197॥
savvaṁsahā vi kakkasaravipāyayā vi dāhiṇī jāyā । puhaī ainimmihiyā vamai sihi caṁdaṇalayā vi । 7198 ।
majjhanhē pāṇahiyā rahiyā pahiyā mahīē ḍajjhatā । dāuṁ ca uvālaṁbhaṁ dhāvaṁti mahīruhābhimuhaṁ ।। 7199।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-224-to-224.json ==========================
224
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
daṭṭhaṇa pāḍalacchō gimhō bhuvaṇaṁ samaggamavi taviyaṁ । viyaillaphulladasaṇō hasai va niyavīriyasa gavvō ।। 7200 ।।
iha pāēṇa maṇussā viyaraṁti divā vaṇaṁtarālēsu । thēvassa vi ravitēyassa nēya dinnappavēsēsu ॥7201 ।।
sariyāsu saravarēsu ya pukkharaṇīsu ya jalassa avagāhaṁ । suiraṁ virayati tahā pavisaṁti niguṁjajhuṁpēsuṁ ।। 7202 ।।
jalajaṁtasaliladhārā sittēsu cauddisiṁ bahi aṁtō । lipati tanuṁ caṁdaṇarasēṇa ghaṇasāramīsēṇa ।। 7203 ||
acchāī samhāī lahūṇi parihati taha dugullāī । kappūrāgurukaṁduruturukkadhūvēṇa surahīṇi ॥ 7204।।
vāyāmāyavamaṁbilakaḍulavaṇarasē ya nēya sēvaṁti । na karēṁti majjapāṇaṁ piyaṁti sīyalajalaṁ viulaṁ ।।7205 ।।
navamima (mma) yabhāyaṇasaṁṭhiyāṇi surahīṇi sīyalāī ca । mahurāī pāṇagāī piyaṁti bahusakkarajuyāī । । 7206 ।।
annaṁ pisāu sīyaṁ davaṁ ghayaṁ sālikhīradakkhāō । nāliyaravārisakkaramanilammi u tāliyaṁṭāṇa ||7207॥
hāraṁ mālaṁ kamaṇuppalēhi kaliyaṁ muṇālavalayaṁ ca । caṁdaṇavilittadēhaṁ juvaī ca imāī sēvaṁti ।। 72078 ।।
dhārāgisu diyahē suyaṁti rayaṇīē aṁbaratalammi । sayaṇammi surahiviyasiyakusumasa nū hēhi atthariē ।। 7209 ।।
gahiē vasaṁtarajjē gimhēṇa taōbhisaṁkiyamaṇa vva । mayaṇaṁ vasaṁtamittaṁ thēvaṁ sēvaṁti taruṇā vi ।। 7210 ।।
ivanniēṇa vihiṇā sirivammēṇa vi naridataṇaēṇa । gamiyammi gimhasamaē vāsāratō samaṇupattō ।।7211 ।।
jattha gayaṇāḍavīē mēhamahāmahiharēsu maliṇēsu । dāvānalajālāō va vijjulayāō jhalakkaṁti ।।7212 ।।
gajjāravō visadr̥i saddō vva phuḍaṁtavaṁsanivahāṇa । khajjōya gaṇujjōyā vāuyā sihikaṇa vvaṁ । 7213 ।।
ruddhō ravikarapasarō jalaharanivahēhiṁ nahayalē sayalē । tēṇa kayaṁ jalasōsa sumaratēhi va kuviēhi ।। 7214।।
gimhasamaēṇa bhuvaṇaṁ savvaṁ saṁtāviyaṁ niēūṇa | kālanivēṇa niuttō pāusasuhaḍō taduvarimmi ।। 7215 ।।
tēṇa sahasa tti gayaṇē gajjatī gayaghaḍa vva ghaṇamālā । sajjīkayā jharaṁtī mayappavāhaṁ va jalanivahaṁ ।।7216 । ।
gimhasamayassa umhā bhuvaṇaṁ avabhiūṇa āsiṭṭiō । jō tassa nāsaṇakaē visajjiyaṁ tēṇa jalasēnnaṁ ।। 7217।।
āvaḍiyamēttamēva ya jalasēnnaṁ tēṇa umhasuhaḍēṇa । taha gasiyaṁ savvaṁ pi hu jaha na ṭhiō vattakahagō vi ।।7218 ।।
tattō savisēsaṁ ciya viyaṁbhiō umhasuhaḍasaṁghāō । savvammivi bhuvaṇayalē niyasāmatthēṇa parituṭṭhō ।। 7219।।
taha taṁ viyaṁbhamāṇaṁ daṭṭha niyapakkhaparibhavaṁ ca taō । ruṭṭhē ghaṇēhi tuṭṭha va vāridhārāsarasaēhi ।। 7220।।
ninnāsiūṇa umhaṁ sayalaṁ pi mahīyalammi laddhapayaṁ । jāyaṁ jalaṁ vivakkhē hayammi savvō lahai lacchi ।। 7221।।
uccapaēsēsu jalaṁ aladdhaṭhāṇaṁ ahōṭhiyaṁ gaṁtuṁ । unnaipattō annuvari dēi hōu na iyarassa ।। 7222।।
atisayarasukkaḍāō aṁtōkalusattaṇaṁ vahaṁtīō । asatīu vva naīō ummaggēṇaṁ payaṭṭāō ।।7223 ।।
jatthāsi na jalabiṁdu vi tē vi jāyā jalāsayā viulā । jō hōi jayā uiō tassa tayā pasaraē pakkhō । । 7224 ।।
navaniggayahariyaṁkuraniyarā savvattha vasumatī sahai । ghaṇavārisisiramāruya saṁgēṇuddha siyarōma vva ।। 7225 ।।
puvvamaṇāvaraṇāē pakīliyaṁ saha ghaṇēhiṁ puhaīē । aha hitthāē va navataṇapaḍēṇa pacchāiō appā ।। 7226 ।।
cirakālamiliyajalaharasuhisaṁgamapamuiyaṁ sihikuḍuṁbaṁ । kēyāravēhiṁ gāyai naccai vipkāriyasihaṁḍaṁ ॥ 7227।।
uddāmadappakaliyaṁ dadda rakulamahiṇavaṁ samubbhūyaṁ । uccayarakayavirāvaṁ thuṇai va jalavāhamāhappaṁ ।। 7228 ||
ṭhāṇaṭhāṇēsu ṭhiyā sahati iha iṁdagōvasaṁghāyā । ghaṇagahiyajalahijala sahiya mukkadaliyappavāla vva ।।7229 ।।
parapurisamabhisaraṁtaṁ ghaṇatimirabalēṇa paṁsulīvaggaṁ । savvaṁgaṁ pi dhuṇaṁtī taḍillayā kira nivārēi ।। 7230 ।।
jalabharabhinnaṁ vasuhaṁ suhēṇa phālēṁti pāmarā purisā । līlāē paribhavijjai parēhiṁ jaḍasaṁgaō savvō ।।7231 ।।
savvaṁsahā visayayaṁ dinnanivāsā vi sayalarayaṇāṇa । lōhasaēhi khōṇī khaṇijjaē naṁgalaggēhi ।।7232 ।।

pāēṇa iha maṇussā purāṇagōhūmasālijavabhattaṁ । bhuṁjaṁti piyaṁti tahā kūvasamutthaṁ jalaṁ lahuyaṁ ॥।7233।।
parisukkaṁ lahuniddhaṁ unhaṁ lavaṇaṁbilaṁ ca sēvaṁti । jēṇa na kuppai pavaṇō na pīṇasōtaṁ va iyaraṁ pi ।। 7234।।
ciṭṭhati adūrāsannamukkaaṁgārasagaḍiē bhavaṇē ghaṁsaṇauvvaṭṭaṇanhāṇadhūmagaṁdhāgurupiyā ya ।। 7235॥
ārūḍhā jaṁti karēṇuyāsu varavatthakusumakayasōhā । vāyāmamakkakiraṇē payagamaṇaṁ diyahasayaṇaṁ ca ।।7236।।
naijalapāṇaṁ aimēhuṇaṁ ca vajjaṁti atidavāhāraṁ । iya atikaṁtē pāusakālammi samāgaō saraō ।। 7237 ।।
mēhāvaraṇavimukkaṁ jāyaṁ sayalaṁ pi nahayalaṁ vimalaṁ । parimukkapaṁkapaḍalā jāyā maggā vi pāēṇa ।। 7238 । ।
kālavasā jai vi ravī mēhēhiṁ kaō tirōhiyapayāvō । kavi diṇāī taha vihu puṇō vi jāō duguṇatēō ।। 7239।।
savisēsaṁ (saṁ) pattō junhā vimalattaṇaṁ mayaṁkō vi । kusumiyakāsapayāsiyamuhīu jāyā disivahūō ।। 7240 ।।
bahusalilapāṇavasaō uṭṭhiyasāsaṁ vasuṁdharaṁ daṭhṭhē । unhuhēhiṁ karēhiṁ phāsaha nicca sahassakarō ।।7241 ॥
saṁpannataṁdulāī diyaṁtapasaraṁtaparimalaguṇāī । sālivaṇāī kīrā saraṁti pāyaḍiyamuharāyā ।। 7242॥
abbhavahariūṇaṁ paidiṇaṁ ti sussāu ahiṇavaṁkūraṁ । uvacayasaṁpattapayaṁ jāyaṁ gōmaṁḍalaṁ sayalaṁ ।। 7243 ।।
cattakalattaṇāī aṁtō vimalattaṇaṁ pavannāī । sēvaṁti rāyahaṁsā jalāsayāī pi nīsaṁkaṁ || 7244।।
ummaggaparibbhamaṇaṁ puvvillaṁ attaṇō sarēūṇa । lajjāē va naīō parisaṁkuiyāō jāyāō ।।7245 ।।
iha kubvaṁti maṇussā virēyaṁ (gaṁya ? ) ruhirakaḍḍhaṇaṁ pāyaṁ । abbhavaharanti sīyaṁ lahuyaṁ annaṁ ca pāṇaṁ ca ।।7246।।
gōhamasālisaṭṭhiyajavamuggē sakkaraṁ mahupaḍōlaṁ । dakkhaṁ sāu kasāē tittē ya rasē nisēvaṁti ॥ 7247।।
'ravikaratattaṁ diyahē nisāē palhāiyaṁ sasikarēhi । salilaṁ piyaṁti nivvisamagatthiudaēṇa nimmaviyaṁ ॥। 8248 ।।
sisirōsī ravilittā palahuyavimalaṁbarā sakusumā ya । sēvaṁti caṁdajuṇha uhaharaṁ jāmiṇimuhammi ।। 7249।।
titti dahiyavakhāratēllavasasammuhānilaṁ majjaṁ । diyahē niddākaraṇaṁ vajjati tu sārasaṁgaṁ ca ।। 7250 ।।
ēvaṁ payaṭṭamāṇē samaē sarayassa kumarasirivammōṁ । daṁtaurē gaṁtumaṇō laddhāvasarō nivaṁ jāva || 7251 ।।
kira vinavissai taō hayasāhaṇiēṇa tattha āgaṁtuṁ । vinnattaṁ dēva ! jahā sāraṁgaturaṁgamō ihi ||7252 ।।
aisayaduṭṭhō jāō daṁtēhiṁ purōṭhiyaṁ naraṁ ḍasai । pacchāgayaṁ tu nihaṇai pacchimapāēhi samatālaṁ ।। 7253।।
vallīē tēṇa imaṁ chōḍēuṁ kō vi sakkaē nēya । dūraṭṭiēhi ullāliūṇa nikkhippara ghāsō ।। 7254 ।।
tassa purō pāṇīyaṁ nikkhippara garuyakaṭṭajōēṇa । aḍhōijjai khāṇaṁ puṇa na kō vi baṁdhai diṇaṁ taiya ।। 7255 ।।
puraō puṇa bajjhataṁ kahakaha vi hu āsi jāva duṭṭhattaṁ । thēvaṁ ciya paḍatō inhi māṇāhiō jāō ।। 7256 ।।
iya sāhaṇiēṇaṁ vinnattē naravaī kumarabhaṇiyaṁ । puvvattaṁ sariūṇaṁ vimhayapūrijjamāṇamaṇō ।। 7257 ।।
sirivammakumārēṇa saha gaṁtuṁ maṁdurāē taṁ turayaṁ । kahiyasarūvaṁ daṭṭu taṁ kumaraṁ ēvamāisai ।।7258 ।।
jaha cēva ta kahiyaṁ purā sarūvaṁ imassa turayassa । taha cēva ya taṁ jāyaṁ tā sikkhāvēhi tumamēyaṁ ।। 7259 ।।
rannō uvarōhēṇaṁ taṁ taha paḍivajjiūṇa kumarēṇa । vinnataṁ dēva ! jahā vittē saraē iya karissaṁ ॥ 7260।।
jamhā gimhāīyaṁ uuttigaṁ savvasatthayārēhiṁ । hayavāhaṇē nisiddha hēmaṁtāitiyamaṇunāyaṁ ।। 7261 ।।
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ inhi sarayassa tibhāgamēva avasēsaṁ । tammi gayammi turaṁgō vāhēyavvō taē ēsō ।। 7262 ।।
kiṁtu paraṁ iha ēyaṁ na kō vi sakkihai khāṇapāṇēhiṁ । paripālēḍaṁ tamhā niyayāvāsammi nēhi tumaṁ ।। 7263 ।।
aha rannō vayaṇānaṁtaraṁ pi kumarēṇa niyanarā taruṇā । battīsaṁ āhūyā malla vvaṁ mahābaliṭṭhayarā ।।7264 ।।
cattāri khāirāō dīhayarāō daḍhāō valiyāō । āṇāvēuṁ tattō ēkkēkkā appiyā valiyā ।। 7265।।

siriyammakumāracariyaṁ
aṭṭhanhaṁ aṭṭhanhaṁ tēsi purisāṇa hatthajuyalēsu । caurō caurō purisā laggā ēkkēkkavaliyaṁtē ।।7266।।
causu vidisāsu tattō pavisēuṁ maṁdurāē jugavaṁ pi । bhīḍaṁti taṁ turaṁgaṁ causu vi gattē aigāḍhaṁ । 7267।।
aṭṭhauḍakappaḍēṇaṁ vāmaṁ pāṇi pavēḍhiūṇa taō । gahiūṇa dāhiṇēṇaṁ karēṇa kumarō khairakīlaṁ ।। 7268 ।।
gaṁtūṇa sayaṁ turayaṁ mahakuharē ginhaē talavibhāē । vāmakarēṇaṁ dāhiṇakarēṇa kīlaṁ khivai vayaṇē ।। 7269 ।।
tiriyaṁ karajuyalēṇaṁ tattō taṁ gihiuṁ ubhayabhāē । acchī tassa paṭṭaṁ baṁdhāvara caupuḍaṁ tattō ।।7270 ।।
atithūlakakkhaḍēhiṁ vālāgaraḍēhiṁ dōhiṁ dōrēhiṁ । baṁdhāvēūṇa muhaṁ dharāvaē dōsu pakkhēsu
ēkkēṇa dāvaṇēṇaṁ aggimapacchimapayāiṁ dāhiṇaō । baṁdhāvai duiēṇaṁ aggimapacchimapaē vāmē
phēḍāvas valiyāō tattō caurō vi turayapāsāō । chōḍāvara vallīē sāraṁgaturaṁgamaṁ tattō
niyaāvāsē nēyāviūṇa muharajjubaddhapaṭṭēhiṁ । dōhiṁ u cammamaēhiṁ baṁdhāvara dōsu pakkhēsu
ūruṭṭiyavallīē taha kaha vi jahā suhēṇa cālēi । gīvaṁ ubhaō pāsēsu dēhakaṁḍūyānimittaṁ
vālāgaraḍē dōrē chōḍāvara dō vi vayaṇabaṁdhāō । ōsārāvai taha diṭṭibaddhayaṁ paṭṭayaṁ tassa
khaddhaṁ khaddhaṁ ghāsaṁ khivāvaē tassa aggaō uciyaṁ । dūraṭṭiyapurisāṇaṁ pāsāō aipayattēṇa
cammamayakuṁḍiyāē cammamayāī karēvi kaḍayāī । salilassa taṁ bharēuṁ khiviuṁ kaḍaēsa daḍhavaṁsaṁ ।। 7278।।
dōsu vibhāsu duvē samatthapurisā tamukkhivēūṇa । tassa turayassa puraō saṇiyaṁ nēūṇa ṭhāvēṁti ।। 7279।।
khāṇaṁ pi salilanāēṇa paidiṇaṁ tassa dijjai hayassa । iya sāraṁga turayaṁ kumarō pālai ahannadiṇē ।। 7280 ।।
āruhiumiyaraturayaṁ bāhi nayarassa paribhamēūṇa । hayavāhaṇassa uciyaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ avalōyai vivittaṁ ।। 7281 ।।
jattha vihārō nayaraṁ ārāmō dēulaṁ maḍhō vaḍavā । rāyapahō pāhāṇā kaṁṭayavammī ya gaḍḍāō ।।7282 ।।
ūsaraṁ viya sarisēlō hatthippamuhaṁ ca turayatāsayaraṁ । ēēsi majjhāō niyaḍaṁ kiṁci vi na jatthatthi ।।7283 ।।
aṁtō kaḍhaṇā uppi paṁsuyapayarēṇapēlavā puhaī । na ya unnayā na ninnā vivajjiyā khāṇurukkhēhiṁ ।। 7284 । ।
taṁ ṭhāṇaṁ daṭṭhaṇaṁ vinnaviūṇaṁ narēsaraṁ tattō । dhaṇuhasayatiyapamāṇē samacauraṁsammi bhūbhāē ॥ 7285।।
kārāvai parivēḍhaṁ navarayaṇipamāṇavēṇuvāḍīhiṁ । phērāvai javaṇīō bāhi jaha kō vina hu annō
abbhitarammi pāsai kīrataṁ kipi taha tayāsannaṁ । guḍḍaramaṁḍaviyāī niyaāvāsaṁ dayāvē
tīsē ya kāriyāē ahiṇavayaravāhavāhiyālīē । puvvadisivaṁkadāraṁ satōraṇaṁ kāraē ēgaṁ
annadiyahammi saraē vittē hēmaṁtauusamāraṁbhē । pāyakayadāmaṇaṁ viya sāraṁgaturaṁgamaṁ kumarō
dāvēuṁ avilāṇaṁ vayaṇē caupāsaṭhaviyapurisēhiṁ । hatthatalagahiya dīharaatiniṭṭharacammalaṭṭhīhiṁ ।। 7290।।
parivēḍhiyamubhaō pāsadhariyaavilāṇarassi hatthēhi । cālijjataṁ dōhiṁ u taruṇanarēhiṁ samatthēhi ।। 7291 ।।
mattaṁ va vaṇagaiṁdaṁ sududdharaṁ niyaliyaṁ caupaēsu । kuḍilāē diṭṭhīē pāsaṁtaṁ pāsaṭhiyalōyaṁ ॥ 7292।।
saṇiyaṁ āṇēūṇaṁ puvvaduvārēṇa vāhiyālīē । aṁtō parisēūṇaṁ atidudvāṇaṁ turaṁgāṇaṁ ।। 7293 ।।
sattha bhaṇiēṇa sikkhāvaṇavihiṇā taha niyābhipāēṇa । dāūṇa vāladōriya jaṁtaṁ puraō ya pacchā ya ।। 7294 ।।
chōḍāvēuṁ payadāvaṇāī pāraṁbhiō pulāvēuṁ । daṁsēi duṭṭimaṁ jammi jammi aṁgammi sō turaō ।। 7295 ।।
hamma tahi tarhi ciya kasābhighāēhiṁ pāsapurisēhiṁ । jaṁtani jaṁtaṇayāē bāḍhaṁ chijjai ya dēhammi ।। 7296 ।।
ēēṇa paōgēṇaṁ ēgaṁtaravāsarammi puvvahē । khēḍijjai tē (sō) turaō pōsijjatō payattēṇa ॥ 7297।।
navavihiyavāhiyālī majjhammi na atthi kassa vi pavēsō । mōttūṇa appanavamaṁ taṁ kumaraṁ taṁ ca navaturayaṁ ।। 7298 ।।

vāhaṇadiya pugvappaōgaō āṇiūṇa taṁ turayaṁ । hayavāhiyālimajjhē jaṁtavihī kīraē tassa ।। 7299 ।।
vāhaṇavihimmi vihiē dāmēūṇaṁ pasu sō turaō । chōḍiyajaṁtō kāuṁ nijjai bāhimmi niyaṭhāṇē ।।7300।।
hayavāhiyāliniyaḍē dinnāvāsē niyammi kumarō vi । sirivammō gaṁtūṇaṁ bhōyaṇasayaṇāiyaṁ kuṇai || 7301 ।।
niyaguḍḍaraniyaḍāē kuḍīē baṁdhāvaē turaṁgaṁ pi । taṁ sāraṁga taha tassa kāraē uciyapaḍiyāraṁ ॥ 7302।।
jammi dinē vāhijjai na turaṁgō tammi ubhayakālē vi । vāhaṇadiṇē u kumarō avaraṇhē jāi niyapāsē ।।7303।।
i kahiyavāṇaṁ vāhijjatō turaṁgamō ēsō । kai vi diyahāī kōvaṁ kāūṇaṁ ahigamahigayaraṁ ।। 7304 ||
pacchādūmijjatō dēhē jaṁtēhi kasanivāēhi । saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ laggō chaḍḍēu aṁtarakasāyaṁ ।।7305 ।।
kumarō vi adūrāsannadēsa parisaṁṭhiō muṇēūṇa । turayasarūvaṁ tō dēi vāhagāṇaṁ uciyasikkhaṁ ।। 7306।।
tatō kamēṇa tura thēvakasāē havaṁtaē tammi । kumarō hayapāsaṭṭhiyanarāṇa pāsāō ēkkēkkaṁ ।।7307।।
hatthaṁ hayapaṭṭhīē dāvēi kamēṇa tammi sahiyammi । kaivayadiṇapajjaṁtē thaḍiyaṁ baṁdhāvaē tattha ||7308 ||
tī vihu sahiyāē gaēsu kaivayadiṇēsu pallāṇaṁ । ārōhāvai piṭṭhē tammi vi sahiē iyarapurisaṁ । । 7309॥
tattōya duhayadamaṇasamuciēhiṁ viṇā vi jaṁtēhiṁ । kēvalapallāṇajuyaṁ ārūḍha narassa pāsāō || 7310 ।।
khēḍāvai taṁ turayaṁ taha vi na daṁsai viyāralēsaṁ pi । sō jāva taō kumarō taṁ nāūṇaṁ vigayadappaṁ ।।7311 ।।
sikkha suhatihīē diṇayaracaṁdāṇa annayaravārē । hatthōttarasavaṇassiṇimajjhē ēgayararikkhammi ।।7312।।
paṭṭhinivēsiya suṁdarapallāṇē vayaṇadinna avilāṇē । puvvābhimuhaṁ ṭhaviē sāraṁgē varaturaṁgammi ।।7313 ||
vāmakaragahiyavaggō dāhiṇakaratāḍiyāsaṇapaēsō । cāḍuvayaṇaṁ bhaṇatō jahaṇaṁ jaṁghāē phāsatō ॥7314॥
ārūḍhō jhatti aṇēyabaṁdividēhiṁ saṁthuṇijjaṁtō । niggaṁtūṇaṁ niyayāvāsāō vāhiyālīē ।।7315।।
pattō duvāradēsē sēsajaṇaṁ bāhimēva dhārēu । aṭṭhahiṁ jaṇēhiṁ saddhi pavisēuṁ majjhabhāyammi ।।7316।।
satyabhaṇiṇa vihiṇā vāhai ēvaṁ kamēṇa diyahēhi । aikatēhi kēhi vi taṁ turayaṁ savvamavi sikkhaṁ ।।7317 ।।
daḍhacittavibhāēhiṁ sikkhāvēuṁ karēi nivajōggaṁ । daṁsai purāṇahayavāhiyālipattassa tassa purō || 7318।।
rannā sapariyaṇēṇaṁ pasaṁsiō saturaō vi sō kumarō । tastuvari bhāmiyāiṁ nium̐chaṇāī bahujaṇēhiṁ ॥ 7319 ।।
hayadamagamōsarāyaṁ tō pucchai patthivō hayasarūvaṁ । sō vayai saṁpayamimō kumarēṇa suvāhiō vihiō ।।7320 ।।
savvaṁgēsu vi najjai mukkakasāyattaṇaṁ imassa jaō । jāvajjīvaṁ pi taō daṁsissai ēsa na viyāraṁ ।।7321 ।।
aha rāyā hakkārai kumaraṁ sirivammamappaṇī pāsē । āliṁgai atigāḍhaṁ uvavēsai sannihāṇammi ।।7322 ।।
savvaṁgaṁ āharaṇaṁ vatthāī dēvasasarisāī । āṇāvēuṁ rāyā payacchaē jhatti kumarassa ।।7323||
taha vatthāharaṇātī kiṁpi nivō dēi āsarāyassa । aha sirivammakumārō rāyāṇaṁ vinnavai ēvaṁ ।। 7324 । ।
dēvēṇa jayā dinō āēsō turayavāhaṇē majjha । taiyā haṁ daṁtaurē gaṁtumaṇō vinnavaṇahēu ।।7325 ।।
dēvapayāṇaṁ pāsē samāgaō āsi tayaṇu dēvēṇa । dinnāēsē ēyammi nō maē kiṁ pi vinnattaṁ ।।7326 ।।
tā inhi maṁ dēvō aṇujāṇau jēṇa jāmi daṁtaurē । puvvaṁ piniyāvāsō maē bahiṁ dāviō atthi ।।7327 ।।
navavāhiyālivaṁsē javaṇīō saṁvarāvaū dēvō । tō rannā pañcadiṇē tattha vilaṁbāviō kumarō ॥7328||
aha rāyā suhadiyahē sāraṁgaturaṁgamaṁ samāruhiuṁ । hiṁḍā (va) i sō vi maṇaṁ nivassa nāuṁ tahā calai ।।7329 ।।
tō rāyā muiyamaṇō ubhaō kālaṁ pi tammi turayammi । ārūḍhō paidiṇamēva hiṁḍaē tattha tattha vi ya ।।7330 ।।

228
sirivamma kumāracariyaṁ
ujjāṇakāṇaṇāisu vasaṁtasamaō ya vaṭṭaē taiyā । annadiṇē avaraṇhē rāyā dhārāgirimmi gaō ।।7331।।
kīlānadīē majjhē pavēsaē taṁ turaṁgamaṁ tattō । sō na visai naitīrā pacchāhuttaṁ niyattēi || 7332 ॥
iya dō tinivi vārē kayammi rāyā kumārasirivammaṁ । pacchā ēṁtaṁ hakkāriūṇa āpucchaē ēvaṁ ।।7333।।
kīsa kumāra ! na turaō pavisai kīlānaīē majjhammi । kumarō jaṁpai dēvassa ēsa daṁsai niyaṁ vijayaṁ । । 7334 ||
rāyā papaī kahaṁ kahai kumārō palaṁbamēyassa । pucchaṁ taṁ timmijjai jai pavisai ēsa nadimajjhē || 7335 ।।
taṁ tīmiyaṁ calaṁtaṁ tīmai dēvassa dēhavatthāī । tāiṁ viṇassaṁti taō pucchaṁ pagatīē puṇa payalaṁ ॥।7336।।
tā dēva! saṁjamijjau imassa pucchaṁ jahā imō jhatti । pavisai naīē majjhē nivēṇa taha kāriyammi taō ।।7337।।
pavisēuṁ uttinnō turaō kīlānatīē paratīrē । rāyāijaṇō tattō savvō vihu vihiyaṁ pattō ॥ 7338।।
bhaṇai nivō kumara ! maē ēvaṁ vinnāyamāṁsi niyacittē । jaṁ kira imō turaṁgō thavaṁ pi na ginhaē sikkhaṁ ।।7339 ।।
tujjha paraṁ kiṁ pi imaṁ kusalattaṁ turayavāhaṇakalāē । kumara ! aubvaṁ jamiyaranarāṇa na maṇē vi vipphurai ।।7340 ।।
vinnavai nivaṁ kumarō dēvāṇārāhaṇāē phalamēyaṁ । amhārisāṇa aṇṇaha kimērisī jāyaē sattī ।। 7341 ।।
uttamajātī ēsō dēva ! turaṁgō paraṁ kusaṁgēṇa । jāō duṭṭhasahāvō na uṇō niyajāidōsēṇa || 7342।।
jātīē duṭṭasīlā jē turayā tāṇa majjhayārammi । bālattaṇāō ārambha ēsa mukkēraē cinnō ।। 7343 ||
kavi hu tattō navabhāyaṇēsu jō laggaē ya sakkārō । sō baṁbhēṇa vi sakkō kahaṁ ci nō annahā kāuṁ ।। 7344 ।।
tā dēvapayāvēṇaṁ saṁjāō ēsa dōsaparimukkō । amhārisassa na guṇō iha kō vi viyaṁbhai maṇaṁ pi ।।7345 ।।
aha vāsavadattanivō sirivammaṁ bhaṇai kiṁ pi patthēhi । patthēi attaṇō tō visajjaṇābīḍayaṁ ēsō || 7346 ॥
rāyā vi tayabhipāyaṁ nāūṇamakāmaō vi sakalattaṁ । saṁvāhiūṇa sammāṇiūṇa taṁ lahu visajjēi
sō vi akhaṁḍēhi payāṇaēhiṁ daṁtauranayaramaṇupattō । rannā mahābalēṇaṁ pavēsiō guruvibhūtīē
uttāriō maṇunnē pāsā gōravēṇa garuēṇa | majjaṇabhōyaṇamāī karāviō saparivārō vi
jōisiēṇaṁ kahiē tassēva diṇassa saṁjhasamayammi । pāṇiggahaṇaṁ kārai tēṇa samaṁ niyayadhūyāē || 7350।।
piyadaṁsaṇanāmāē dhūyākaramōyaṇammi naranāhō । sirivammassa payacchai kariturayarahāiyaṁ pavaraṁ । । 7351 । ।
tammi khaṇammi kumārō sudaṁsaṇō saha mahābalanivēṇa । lajjaṁ bhaṁjāvēuṁ karāviō daṁsaṇaṁ tēṇa ।।7352 ।।
uhi diyahēhi tattō pāṇiggahaṇū savāmma vattammi । aṭṭhahiṁ diṇēhiṁ kārai tammi purē jiṇavaragihēsu ।।7353 ।।
savvēsu vi havaṇātī rahajattāī ya guruvibhūīē । jaha gulakhēḍammi purē tahēva aha nivbuō hōuṁ ।।7354।।
rannā mahābalēṇaṁ niccaṁ gurugōravēṇa dīsaṁtō । tatthēva gamai diyahē kaivi taō annadiyahammi
saṁtarāō kō vihu vāṇijjayarō samāgaō tattha । vikkayahēuṁ bahuvihamaṇirayaṇāī gahēūṇa
maṇibhaṁḍāyāraniuttarāyapaṁcaulapēsiyanarēṇa । sō hakkārēūṇaṁ nīō paṁcaulapāsamma ।।7357 ।।
tēṇa vi hakkārēuṁ maṇirayaṇaviyārajāṇaē vaṇiē । mullaṁ kārāvēuṁ bahumaṇirayaṇāī gahiyāī ।। 7358।।
vairaphalahāī kāī vi kayamullāī tahēva gahiyāiṁ । varavatthavēḍhiyaṁ ēkkamēva vairaṁ taō tēṇa
chōḍēūṇaṁ vaṇijāraēṇa tēsi parikkhaganarāṇa । puraō payaṁsiyaṁ tēhiṁ karayalē gihiūṇa kamā
savvēhiṁ vi uvvattēūṇaṁ bahusō nirikkhiyaṁ suiraṁ । dhārātalakōṇavisuddhalakkhaṇaṁ ujjalaṁ viulaṁ
kāgapaya-biṁdurēhā tāsāivivajjiyaṁ taō nāuṁ । taṁ paṁcaulassa karē savimhayaṁ appiyaṁ tēhi ॥ 7362 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
229
paṁcaulēṇa vi vihiyamaṇēṇa kamasō karammi ghēttūṇa । pariyattiūṇa taṁ savvaō vi suiraṁ nirikkhēuṁ ।।7363।।
bhaṇiyaṁ jaha ērisa amhēhi kayāi kattha vi na diṭṭhaṁ । sumahallaṁ tēillaṁ tāsāivivajjiyaṁ varaṁ ।।7364 । ।
tā bhaṇaha mullamēyassa kērisaṁ tō parikkhagā purisā । jaṁpati jahā amhē na muṇēmō mullamēyassa ॥ 7365।।
jamhā adiṭṭhapuvaṁ ērisamamhāṇa tō na amhēhiṁ । ēvaṁvihassa mullaṁ sayaṁ kayaṁ nēva annēhi ||7366 |
kīrataṁ pi hu diṭṭhē tō paṁcaulēṇa tassa vairassa । sāmī vāṇijjayarō puṭṭhō sō vi hu bhaṇai ēvaṁ ।।7367।।
jassa imē vina mullaṁ muṇaṁti maṇirayaṇa muṇiyaparamatthā । tassa viyāṇāmi kahaṁ mullamahaṁ kappaḍiyapāō । । 7368 ।।
tō paṇa paṁcaulaṁ taē kahaṁ gahiyamappaṇā ēyaṁ । tō bhaṇai vaṇijjayarō maē khaṇatēṇa dharaṇiyalaṁ ।।7369 ।।
laddhaṁ katthai ēyaṁ ahavā annāṇaō maē dinaṁ । mullē suvannalakkhaṁ imassa tō ki pamāṇamiṇaṁ ।।7370 ।।
diṭṭhassa vatthuṇō jaṁ tumhaṁ pasihāi samuciyaṁ mōllaṁ । taṁ dēha kimantrēṇaṁ kavōlavāēṇa bahuēṇaṁ । । 7371 । ।
aha tattha muddahatthō taṁ varaṁ niyakarē gahēūṇa । ēgāgī uṭṭhēuṁ taō gaō nivasamīvammi ।।7372 ||
hatthammi samappēuṁ taṁ varaṁ tassa kannamūlammi । hōūṇa taō sāhai parikkhagātīhi jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ||7373 ||
aha rāyā taṁ varaṁ niyakarayalasaṁṭhiyaṁ palōēḍaṁ । vimhayapavannahiyaō jaṁpai taṁ muddahatthamimaṁ ।।7374 ||
tumhaṁ parikkhagāṇa ya ālōyaṁtāṇa kiṁ pi jaṁ uciyaṁ । mullaṁ paḍihāsai taṁ karēha vaṇijārayamaēṇa ॥ 7375।।
ēyaṁ rāyāēsaṁ gahiūṇaṁ taṁ ca vairavararayaṇaṁ । sō jhatti muddahatthō maṇibhaṁḍāyāramaṇupattō ॥ 7376 ।।
paṁcaulaparikkhagavaṇijārayasamudāyasammaēṇa taō । pannāsasuvannasayāī tassa mullaṁ pariṭṭhaviraṁ ।।7377 ।।
tēṇēva ya samudāēṇa saha gaō naravaissa pāsammi | sāhēi vairamōllaṁ sō vi ya vaṇijāraō vairaṁ ।।7378 ।।
taṁ ṭhaviṇaṁ nivapāyaaṁtiē vinnavēi dēva ! imaṁ । vairaṁ suvannalakkhaṁ lahau kavaḍē ahava kāṇaṁ || 7379 ।।
taha vi maē mullēṇaṁ viṇā vi dēvassa pāyapūyāē । dinnamiṇaṁ bhattīē giṇhāmi na mullanāmēṇa ।। 7380 ।।
ēkkaṁ kavaḍi pi hu dēvassa samīvaō ahaṁ tamhā । jaṁ dēi pasāēṇaṁ dēvō taṁ ciya ahaṁ ginhē ||7381।।
aha rāyā taṁ pabhaṇai na kiṁ pi mullaṁ imassa vairassa । ēmēva taē dinaṁ niyabhattīē imaṁ majjha ।।7382 ॥ |
paṁcasahassā kaṇayassa puṇa imē tuha maē pasāēṇa । dinnā tā ginha tumaṁ aha sō vaṇijāraō hatthē ।।7383।।
sīsammi nivēsēuṁ mahāpasāō tti nayasirō bhaṇai । rāyāēsēṇa taō sō paṁcaulēṇa saha jāi ।।7384 ।।
rāyā pāyatalāō taṁ vairaṁ karayalammi gahiūṇa । jā ciṭṭhai pēcchantō samāgaō tāva sirivammō || 7385 ।।
rāyāṇaṁ paṇamēuṁ pavarē dinnāsaṇammi uvaviṭṭhē । taṁ bhaṇai nivō ēyaṁ kumāra ! vairaṁ palōēsu ।।7386।।
rannā appijjaṁtaṁ kumarō dōhiṁ vi karēhiṁ gahiūṇa । taṁ vairaṁ avalōyai vihiyacittō pattēṇa ।।7387 ।।
kiṁpi auvvaṁ vatyuṁ kahiṁ pi dēvēṇa pattayanti । pabhaṇatō paricita tāva imaṁ savvadōsēhiṁ ॥7388।।
parimukkaṁ juttaṁ taha guṇēhiṁ savvēhiṁ kiṁtu ēyassa । gaṁdhō phāsō ya tahā ki civi kiṁ ci vi visaṁvayai ||8789 ।।
tō ghasiūṇa karēhiṁ agghāyai taṁ puṇō puṇō jāva । tōlai ya karayalēṇaṁ tō nāō tēṇa paramatthō ।।7390।।
jaha ēyaṁ jāillaṁ na hōi vairaṁ vijāiyaṁ nūṇaṁ । iya nicchiūṇa jāō īsi mauliyama hō jāō ।।7391।।
tō pucchai rāyāṇaṁ saṁpannaṁ dēva ! kaha imaṁ tumha ? । rāyā vi tassa puraō jahaṭṭiyaṁ kahai savvaṁ pi ।।7392।।
tō mōṇēṇa ṭhiu cciya sō appara taṁ nivassa hatthammi । rāyā saṁkiyacittō tō pucchai kumarasirivammaṁ । । 7393।।
sāhasu kumāra ! dōsaṁ guṇaṁ va kaṁci vi imassa vairassa । tō jaṁpai sirivammō dēva ! sirē muṁḍiē saṁtē ।। 7394।।
nakkhattaṁ pucchijjai jati tō dēvō vi dinnamullassa । vairassa imassa guṇaṁ pucchau dōsaṁ va mama pāsē ।। 7395 ।।
1. muhacchāō pā.

=== vardhamanaoutput-230-to-230.json ==========================
230
sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
।।
7411 ।।
tō āha nivō kumaraṁ naṭṭha ciṭṭhai na kiṁ pi ajja viya। jai tumha imaṁ vairaṁ pavaraṁ paḍihāi nō kaha vi ।।7396 ।।
tō mullaṁ vārijjai dijjaṁtaṁ tassa vairavaṇiyassa । tō jaṁpai sirivammō na hōi juttaṁ imaṁ majjha ॥।7397।।
dēvassa visēsēṇaṁ na juttamēyaṁ tu chuhiyaraṁkassa । kavalō muhappaviṭṭhō jaṁ kaḍhijjai puṇō bāhi ।। 7398 ।।
tō naranāhō ciṁtaṛa juttamiṇaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ kumārēṇa । kiṁca maē mukkammi vi imammi vairammi nō labbhaṁ ।। 7399 ।।
kiṁci vi tassa samīvē mullaṁ vaṇijārayassa jaṁ tēṇa । niyadhuttimāē chaliē ahaṁ bhaṇatēṇa iya vayaṇaṁ ।। 7400 ।।
savvasahāpaccakkhaṁ jaṁ kira vairaṁ maē imaṁ dinaṁ । dēvassa sabhattīē tā mullamahaṁ na ginhissaṁ ॥ 7401 ।।
jai dēi pasāēṇaṁ dēvō giṇhāmi tō ahaṁ kaṇayaṁ । iya paḍivajjaṁtēṇaṁ maē vi iha hāriyaṁ cēva ||7402 ||
tā kumara jaṁpiyaṁ ciya pamāṇamiha kī ramāṇamuciyaṁ mē । iya citiūṇa jaṁpai rāyā kumaraṁ taō ēvaṁ ।। 7403 ।।
jai vina pavaraṁ hōhī vairamimaṁ taha vi tassa pāsāō । vaṇijārayassa mullaṁ ahaṁ na uddālaissāmi ।। 7404 ||
tā kahasu nivvisaṁkaṁ kumāra ! dōsaṁ imassa vairassa । iya jaṁpiyammi rannā jahaṭṭhiyaṁ kahai sirivammō || 7405।।
jaha lōhasaṁbhavamimaṁ vairāgāraṁ dharēi paḍipunnaṁ । na uṇō jaccaṁ vairaṁ ēvaṁ vairāgarappabhavaṁ ॥ 7406 ।।
bhaṇai nivō atigaruyaṁ kassa vi vinnāṇamēya mērisayaṁ । lōhēṇa jēṇa ghaḍiyaṁ vairaṁ bahulōyadullakkhaṁ ।। 7407 ।।
tō sirivammakumārō jaṁpai lōhēṇa na ghaḍiyaṁ ēyaṁ । dēva ! sayaṁ niṣpannaṁ vihivasaō lōhadhāummi ।। 7408 ।।
āha nivō iha aṭṭhē kumāra! kō paccaō taō kumarō । vinnavai nivaṁ jaha paccayaṁ pi dēvassa daṁsissaṁ । । 7409 ।।
vaṇijārayaṁ samī kāūṇa jahā viyāṇaē sō vi । aha rāyāē sēṇaṁ pattō vaṇijāraō vi tahiṁ ॥ 7410 ।।
puṭṭhō nivēṇa ēsō gahiyaṁ kaṇayaṁ taē ? imō āha । dēvapasāō sō maṁgalaṁ ti gahiō maē sigdhaṁ
tō rannā niyahiyaē hasiyaṁ ēēṇa tassa vayaṇēṇa । jaha ēsa saṁkiyamaṇō karēi iya attaṇō rakkhaṁ ।। 7412 ।।
iya citiūṇa rannā payaḍaṁ ciya sō taō imaṁ bhaṇiō। tuha vairassa parikkhaṁ karissaē saṁpayaṁ kumarō ।। 7413 ।।
sō āha dēvasaṁtiyamēyaṁ vairaṁ na hōti maha taṇayaṁ । tā haṁ na pucchiyavvō iha dēvō kuṇau niyaruiyaṁ । । 7414 । ।
aha rāyāēsēṇaṁ tēllaṁ navalōṇabhariyabhaṁḍaṁ ca । kumarō āṇāvēuṁ taṁ varaṁ karayalē gahiuṁ
savvasahāpaccakkhaṁ bhaṇai jahā lōhasaṁbhavaṁ ēyaṁ । vairaṁ na hōi jaccaṁ imā parikkhā imassa taō
tēllēṇa makkhiūṇaṁ ēyaṁ khiviūṇa lōṇamajjhammi । dhariūṇa ahōrattaṁ kaḍḍhēyavvaṁ diṇē bīē
laggissai jai kaṭṭō ēttha taō nūṇa lōhamēvēyaṁ । aha na vi laggōṁ kaṭṭō tō jaccaṁ ciya imaṁ vairaṁ
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tēllēṇa makkhiraṁ taṁ khivēi lōṇammi । vatthēṇa lōṇabhaṁḍassa baṁdhaē tō muhapaēsaṁ ।। 7419 ।।
dāvēi gaṁṭhi muddaṁ vaṇijārayapāsaō taō tattha । taduvarijaladdamaṭṭiyapiṁḍē dāvai nivaimuddē ।। 7420 ।।
atthāṇasamīvaṭṭiyadhavalaharōvarayamajjhabhāyammi । taṁ bhaṁḍaṁ ṭhaviūṇaṁ dāvai muddē kavāḍē । 7421 ।।
bāhimmi jāmaillē ṭhāvati naranāhasaṁtiē tattō । uṭṭhai saha naravaiṇā kumarō vaccai niyāvāsē ||7422।।
bīyadi avarahē atthāṇagaē mahābalanivammi । ōvarayadāramuddaṁ vihaḍāvēūṇa majjhāō ।। 7423 ।।
bāhi kaḍḍhāvēuṁ bhaṁḍaṁ lōṇassa tassa muhamuddē । phēḍāvēūṇa taō taṁ vairaṁ kaḍḍhiuṁ tattō ।।7424।।
daṭhṭhē vilaggakaṭṭē kumarō vaṇijārayassa daṁsēu । appara nivassa hatthē sō appara savvasambhāṇaṁ ।। 7425 ।।
aha sō rāyāijaṇō taṁ taha daṭhūṇa avitahaṁ jāyaṁ । kumarēṇa bhaṇiyavayaṇaṁ vimhaiō dhuṇai sīsāī ।। 7426 ।।
bhaṇai ya ahō auvvaṁ rayaṇaparikkhāsu ki pi kusalattaṁ । sirivammassa kumārassa jaṁ na dīsai kahi pi jaē । । 7427 ।
iya jaṁpatammi sahāyaṇammi vaṇijāraō vilakkhamu hō । vinnavai nivaṁ maha dēva ! jō kaō kō vi tumhēhiṁ ।। 7428।।

231
kaṁcaṇadāṇapasāō sō ḍhōiya vairamaṇusarēūṇa । taṁ ca parikkhāē jāyamannahā saṁpayaṁ cēva ।। 7429॥
tō taṁ pasāyakaṇayaṁ dēvassa ahaṁ samappaissāmi । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ bhujjō vi ērisaṁ mā tumaṁ bhaṇasu ।। 7430 ।।
jaṁ dinaṁ tujha maē dinaṁ ciya taṁ suvannamavisaṁkō । bhuṁjāhi tumaṁ mākuṇasu kassaī tattha abhisaṁkaṁ ।।7431।।
kiṁtu paraṁ kahasu tumaṁ mūluppatti imassa vairassa । acchaliyaṁ iha aṭṭhē tuha tō nō bhāiyavvaṁ ti ।। 7432 ॥
iya suṇiūṇaṁ rannō vayaṇaṁ vaṇijāraō pasannamuhō । kahai jahā dēva! ahaṁ kēṇai kajjēṇa āsi gaō || 7443 ।।
lōhāgarappa sē tattha niviṭṭhassa majjha pāsaṭhiyā । kammayarā lōhadalaṁ ghaṇēhiṁ ciṭṭhati phōḍaṁtā ।। 7434।।
lōhadalassa ya majjhē jagajjagaṁtāī lōha khaṁḍāī । piṭṭiyaruppasamāī dīsaṁti bahuī tāī ca ।।7435।।
kāī vighaṇāhayāī ukkhuḍiūṇaṁ paḍaṁti dūrammi । majjha vi samīvadēsē paḍiyāiṁ tāiṁ bahuyāī ।। 7436 ।।
annammi khaṇē ēgaṁ khaṁḍa lōhassa upphiḍēūṇa । paḍiyaṁ mahaucchaṁgē taṁ ca ahaṁ jāva pēcchāmi ।।7437।।
ucchaṁgasaṁṭhiyaṁ ciya tāva maē vairasannihaṁ diṭṭhaṁ । chakkōṇaṁ aṭṭhatalaṁ taō maē gōviuṁ dhariyaṁ ।। 7438 ।।
tō haṁ tassa bhamēṇa annāiṁ vi tattha lōha khaṁḍāī । paḍiyāiṁ palōēṁtō ciraṁ ṭhiō niuṇadiṭṭhīē ॥ 7439।।
diṭṭhē paraṁ na kiṁci vi maē duijjaṁ tahāvihaṁ tattha । patthuyakajjammi taō siddhē tattō samuṭṭhēuṁ ।।7440 ।।
niyaṭhāṇē pattō haṁ taō jayā puvvagahiyarayaṇāī । iha āṇīyāī maē ēyaṁ pi tayā samāṇīyaṁ ।।7441।।
sōūṇa tassa vayaṇaṁ ēyaṁ rāyā visēsaō tuṭṭhō । kahai purō sambhāṇaṁ jaha sirivammēṇa kumarēṇa ॥ 7442॥
ēyaṁ pi āsi kahiyaṁ majjha purō jamimamaghaḍiyaṁ lōhaṁ । sayamēva ya nippannaṁ taṁ pi hu jāyaṁ taha ccēva ।। 7443 ||
taṁ sōuṁ savisēsaṁ rāyajaṇō taṁ pasaṁsaē kumaraṁ । bhaṇai ya mullaṁ savvassa atthi na kumāra buddhīē ||7443 ||
rāyā mahābalō aha sirivammakumāra ēvamāisati । jassu cciyaṁ nō dāuṁ sakkijjai tassa savvassaṁ । । 7445 ।।
dētō hōi adōsō purisō tā tuha guṇōciyaṁ dēyaṁ । natthi maha kiṁtu ēyaṁ rajjaṁ giṇhāhi savvaṁ pi ॥7446॥
kumarēṇa juttipuvvaṁ bahuhā paḍisēhiē vi jāva nivō । nibbaṁdhaṁ kuvvaṁtō nō viramai tāva paḍibhaṇiyaṁ ।। 7447 ।।
gahiyaṁ kira rajjamiṇaṁ maē paraṁ sālayassa niyayassa । dinaṁ kumarassa sudaṁsaṇassa tā ṭhavaha juvarajjē ।। 7448 ।।
ēyaṁ tubhē tattō paḍisēhaṁtaṁ pi taṁ nivaṁ kumarō । sirivammō mannāvai jāva taō taṁ bhaṇai rāyā ॥ 7449।।
bhēhi samaṁ kici vimaṁtēyavvaṁ ihatthi tammi kaē । jaṁ ki pi bhaṇasi juttaṁ tattō tamahaṁ karissāmi ॥750 ।।
aha ēgaṁtē hōuṁ mahābalō bhaṇai kumarasirivammaṁ । ciṭṭhai kaṇiṭṭabhāyā sudaṁsaṇassēva sōyaraō । 7451 ।।
nāmēṇa harisadēvō sō vi sagō tujjha sālaō hōi । tumha vayaṇēṇa ēyaṁ ṭhāvēmi ahaṁ niyapayammi ।। 7452 ।।
sō ya sudaṁsaṇakumarē kārāgārē taē nihittammi । siriharisammi maē tuha pāsē paṭṭhāviē jāō ।। 7453 ।।
nivalakkhaṇasaṁjuttō rajjuciō sāhiō ya gaṇaēhiṁ । dubviṇayavasiō jēṭṭaō u tumhaṁ pi paccakkhō || 7454।।
iya bhaṇiūṇa mahābalarāyammi ṭhiyammi mōṇabhāvēṇa । tō sirivammakumārō aṇūsuō paṁjalī bhai ।।7455 ।।
dēvēṇa samāiṭṭha jōggō rajjassa jaṁ kira kaṇiṭṭhō । nivalakkhaṇāiṁ guṇaō taṁ paḍivannaṁ taha ccēva ।। 7456 ।।
jaṁ puṇa dubviṇayāō jēṭṭhammi ajōggayā pariṭṭhaviyā । dēvēṇa dēvapuraō vinnappai tattha atthammi || 7457।।
sāmannavihaviṇō vihu hōṁti avaccāiṁ aviṇayaparāī । taruṇattaṇammi kiṁ puṇa taha hōṁti na rāyajāyāī । । 7458 ।।
cattaṁ dubviṇayattaṁ pitēṇa saṁpai tahā jahā annō । kō vi na sakkai caiuṁ rajjassa taō imō jōggō । । 7459 ।।
ciṭṭhatē vi hu jēṭṭhē jōggē rajjassa kaha kaṇiṭṭhammi । dēva ! ṭhavijjai rajjaṁ kamalaṁghaṇamāyarēūṇa ।। 7460॥
ēyaṁ pi āsi jai tumha abhimayaṁ tō kahaṁ paḍhamamēva । tumhahiṁ ēsa ṭhaviō savvēsi māṇaṇijjapaē ॥ 7461 ।।

tayaṇu mahābalarāyā jaṁpai paḍhamaṁ pi amha sacivēṇa । āsi nisiddhaṁ ēyaṁ paraṁ maē ērisaṁ vihiyaṁ । । 7462 ||
iha tu tassa dōsē diṭṭhē sacivēṇa ahamuvāladdhō । tō tēṇa samaṁ suviyāramaṁtiṇā jaṁpa kumārō || 7463।।
tō
tuha
jassa ya jaṁ hōi sammayaṁ taṁ ahaṁ aṇuṭṭhēmi । ah ēyaṁ nivavayaṇaṁ paḍivajjai kumarasirivammō || 7464।।
aha rāyā suviyāraṁ maṁti hakkariḍaṁ bhaṇai ēvaṁ । kumarasudaṁsaṇavisaē saddhi sirivammakumarēṇa || 7465 ||
tumhēhi maṁtiūṇaṁ jaṁ kiṁci vi ubhayasammayaṁ hōi । taṁ amha kahēyavvaṁ iya bhaṇiuṁ uṭṭhiyaṁ tattō ।। 7466 ।।
javaṇiyapihiē sayaṇē gaṁtūṇa nivajjaē tayāsannē । maṁtikumarāṇa vayaṇaṁ jaṁpijjaṁtaṁ nisāmē
citai ya amha maṁtrī niyabuddhīē guruṁ pi tiyasāṇa । mannai jaḍaṁ va iṇhi nāyavvamimassa sāmatthaṁ
mainijjiyasuraguruṇā kumarēṇa samaṁ paryāpamāṇassa । kumarēṇa maṁtiṇā saha kāūṇaṁ kaṁ pi ālāvaṁ
takkāluciyaṁ annaṁ patthuyavatthammi tō payaṁpēi । saciva ! sudaṁsaṇavisaē kō tumhaṁ phurai abhipāō ?
jōggō rajjassa imō ahava na jōggō ? taō bhaṇati maṁtī । kumara! jayā hōsi tumaṁ tayā na annassa avayāsō
kajjaviṇicchyakaraṇē iya bhaṇiē maṁtiṇā bhaṇai kumarō । dhaṇiyaṁ pi sumaiṇō jai amhē taha vihu sisuppāyā
tumhē pariṇayamaiṇō thērā bahudiṭṭakajjapariṇāmā । jaṁ jāṇaha taṁ amhē kahamavi nō jāṇiuṁ sakkā ।।7473।।
tō maṁtī bhai jahā valipaliyāī na ki pi jāṇaṁti । kajjaviṇicchayajaṇaṇī pannā sā tumha aivimalā । 7474 ।
thērēhiṁ vi amhēhiṁ vairaparikkhā na sakkiyā kāuṁ । tumhēhiṁ diṭṭhamēttammi tammi nivvāḍiyaṁ tattaṁ ।। 7475 ।।
tō jaṁpai sirivammō puṇaruttaṇaṁ kimēttha bhaṇiēṇa । ēyammi rāyavaṁsē kamēṇa tumhāṇa maṁtipayaṁ ॥।7476।।
tā iha kajjaṁ annaṁ pisaha taē hōi maṁtiuṁ uciyaṁ । kaha puṇa rajjārihapurisamaṁtaṇaṁ hōti tuha bajjhaṁ || 7477 ||
jamhā suhamasuhaṁ vā ihaccayaṁ tumha savvamāruhai । āgaṁtuyā u amhē viṇāsiuṁ caiva vaccāmō || 7478 ।।
na uṇa ṇaṭṭē kajjē amhāṇaṁ kiṁci ēi majjhammi । tumhāṇaṁ ciya ciṁtā saṁjāyai tattha savvā vi ।। 7479 ।।
kiṁca mahābalaranō tumhāṇamaēṇa savvamavi kajjaṁ । kāyavvaṁ paḍihāsai na annahā nicchaō ēsō ॥ 480 ।।
tō suviyārō pabhaṇai rannā saha kō vi nicchaō taha vi । tumhēhi atthi vihiō iha kajjē amha vi parōkkhē ||
kumarō jaṁpai kāuṁ icchāmō nicchyaṁ bahu amhē । kiṁtu mahābalarāyā tumhēhiṁ viṇā na taṁ kuṇai ।। 7482 ।।
pabhaṇai puṇō vi maṁtī rannā saha tumha kōvi saṁlābō । jō jāō iha kajjē taṁ sāhaha tāva paḍhamaṁ pi ।। 7483 ।।
tō kumarō taṁ sāhai savvaṁ pi hu tassa maṁtiṇō puraō । tā jāva tattha rannā maṁtī hakkāriḍaṁ vr̥ttō
aha pabhaṇai sō maṁtī āyannasu kumarā kāraṇaṁ jamiha । kumarasudaṁsaṇavisara paḍisēhē majjha kāyavvē
daṁtaurāō dāhiṇadisāē caukōsaaṁtarē asthi । khīmbajadēvīē puraṁ jaṇasaṁkinnaṁ sapāyāraṁ
tīsē dēvīē bhōpyassa āēsakāraō ēkkō । tassa ya dhyā sā bālavihaviyā dulahiyā nāma
sā ya sahāvēṇaṁ ciya rūvēṇa maṇōharā visēsēṇa । jōvvaṇamārōhaṁtī taō piyā sē vicitē ।। 7488 ।।
jaha dēmi kassai imaṁ gharagaraṇēṇāṇuruvapurisassa । nāūṇa tassa bhāvaṁ bhōppēṇa taō nisiddhō sō ।। 7489।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca jahā ēvaṁ ahaṁ sahatthēṇa kassai narassa । dāhāmi taē ciṁtā kāyavvā kā vi na imīē ।। 7490 ।।
bhōppa bhaēṇa aha sā tīsē jaṇaēṇa kassa vi na dinnā । jamhā ludvamaṇō sō tīsē sayamēva saṁjāō ।। 7491 ।।
dhūyattāē saṁbhāṇi samuhēṇa taṁsi suttammi । jōvvaṇapattaṁ pitaō na sēvaē lōyalajjāē ।। 7492 ।।
ēmēva diṭṭichuhaṁ dharēi sayalaṁ pi sō ahōrataṁ । āēsadāṇamisaō taha cēva gamēi diyahāī ॥।। 7493 ।।
vatthāīyaṁ pi na dēi suṁdaraṁ bhōppaō taō tīsē । jamimā kayasiṁgārā lōēṇa viṇāsiyavvati ।। 7494।।

dēvīpurassa tas ya adūradēsamma asthi vaṇasaṁḍaṁ । āranna chāṇayāī āuṁ jāi sā tattha ।। 7495 ।।
tīsē tattha gayāē annamma dinē mahābalanivō vi । tatthagaō āhēsyakajjēṇa taō jaṇaṁ sēsaṁ ।। 7496 ।।
tēṇa ṭhaviūṇa dūrē dhaṇuvāṇakarēṇa aggaō gaṁtuṁ । jālīē pavisēuṁ hariṇāṇa tirōhiō appā ।। 7497।।
tattha ṭhiō sō rāyā taṁ pāsai dulahiyaṁ jahicchāē । chāṇayagahaṇanimittaṁ hiḍaṁtī aḍaiyaniyaṁgaṁ ।। 7498।।
tō hariṇahaṇaṇahēḍaṁ jō tattha gaō kirāsi naranāhō । sō ciya sayaṁ viṇihaō mayaṇēṇa sutikkhavāṇēhiṁ ||
tō jālīniyayichāṇaya gahaṇatthamāgayaṁ bālaṁ । taṁ kāmāurahiyaō sayaṁ pavēsēi tattha nivō ।।7500 ।।
niyamuhakhittaṁ kappū rakhaṁḍamaddhaṁ karēṇa gahiūṇa । tīsē muhammi khiviḍaṁ taṁ ramai nivō jahicchāē ।।7501 ।।
surayapasaṁgē vittē taṁ pucchai bāliyaṁ nivō tattō । kāsi tumaṁ sasivayaṇē ! kiṁ tē nāmaṁ ca ? iccāī || 7502 ।।
aha sā nivassa puraō puvvr̥ttaṁ niyasakhvamakkhēuṁ । savvaṁ pi taō sigdhaṁ sajalāī karēḍa nayaṇāī ।। 7503।।
tō rāyā taṁ pucchaṛa kīsa tumaṁ dulahiē ! sajalanayaṇā । sā kahai nivassa taō maṁ paribhattaṁ viyāṇēuṁ ।। 7504 ।।
bhōppō daḍhaṁ haṇissai rannā bhaṇiyaṁ mahābalō nāma । nivaī ahaṁ kahijjasu taō tumaṁ puraō maṁ ॥ 7505 ।।
nāmammi majjha gahiē na bhaṇissai ki pi sammūhaṁ tuha sō । sā bhaṇai ēttha vayaṇē kaha hōhī paccaō tassa । । 7506 ।।
tō rannā nāmaṁkiya niyamuddārayaṇamappiyaṁ tīsē । bhaṇiyaṁ ca imaṁ daṭhṭhē bhavissaē paccaō tassa ।। 7507 ।।
ahasā pasannavayaṇā muddārayaṇaṁ nivāō gahiūṇa । niyaparihaṇagaṁṭhīē gōvēḍaṁ jālimajjhāō ।।7508 ।।
nōhariūṇaṁ chāṇayapiḍayaṁ ārōviūṇa sīsammi । pattā bhōppayabhavaṇē ēgaṁtē ēḍaē piḍayaṁ ।।7509 ।।
daṭṭhūṇa bhōppaō taṁ hakkārai jāva appaṇī pāsē । tāva nivaaṁgasaṁbhōgasaṁbhavō parimalō suhaō ।। 7510 ।।
tīsē dēhāō bhōppaēṇa agghāiō taō tēṇa । ghaḍiyā bhiuḍī bhīmā bhaṇiyā ya imā jahā duṭṭē ! ।। 7511 ।।
pāviṭṭhē ! nillajjē ! kimajja ēyaṁ taē samāyariyaṁ । bāhimmi niggayāē jamēsa gaṁdhō tuha uvēu ।। 7512 ।।
tīē bhīyāē taō jahaṭṭiyaṁ savvamēva akkhāyaṁ । paccayahē muddārayaṇaṁ ca payaṁsiyaṁ tassa ॥।7513।।
ētthaṁtarammi kēṇai kassa vi kahiyaṁ jahā nivō ajja । dēvīvaṇasaṁḍē āgaō'tthi āhēḍayanimittaṁ ।। 7514 ।।
taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ muddārayaṇaṁ ca taṁ niēūṇa । sō jāyapaccaō cattasavvakōvō duyaṁ jāō
aha tīsē pāsāō gahiraṁ taṁ rāyamuṭṭiyārayaṇaṁ । ēgaṁtē gōvēḍaṁ dhārai sō atipayattēṇa
taha dulahiyaṁ pi rāgaṁ samujjhiuṁ ujjuēṇa cittēṇa । dhūyaṁ va niyaṁ pāsai sagōravaṁ kārai na kammaṁ
rāyā puṇō visāraṁ ēīē karissaē iya matīē । āhāravatthamāi pi tīsē sō dēi sārayaraṁ
dulahī viu riuṇhāyā āsi diṇē tammi jammi paribhuttā । rannā sā vaṇasaṁḍē saṁbhūō tēṇa
pāubbhūyaṁ gabbhaṁ nāūṇaṁ bhōppaēṇa tō puṭṭā । kassēsō tuha gabbhō tō kahai jahaṭṭhiyaṁ ēsā || 7520 ।।
vaccatēsu diṇēsa dāhiṇakucchīē ḍōlēṇaṁ ca । nāō ganbhē puttō nivassa jāṇāviō tēṇa ।। 7521 ।।
rannā vi sapaccayavayaṇasavaṇasaṁbhariyaniyayacariēṇa । puttarahiēṇa dulahī tattō āṇāviyā ēttha ।। 7522 ।।
pūriyaḍōhalāē tīsē paḍipunnamāsadiyahēsu । jāō sudaṁsaṇō kāriō ya kālē kalaggahaṇaṁ ॥ 7523।।
ēsō thēvaṁ payaḍiyadubviṇaō taha vi vallahatēṇa । majjha nivāraṁtassa vi juvarāyapaē kaō rannā ।। 7524।।
kalagahaṇaṁ kuvvatē imammi piyadaṁsaṇā samuppannā। kārāē taē khittē uppannō harisadēvō vi ।।7525 ।।
ēsa sudaṁsaṇakumarō diṇē diṇē daṁsaē ya duvviṇayaṁ । jai sikkhavai nariṁdō tahā vi sikkhaṁ na ya karēṛa ।। 7526।।
tattō ya vasaṁtasirīgahaṇanimittaṁ jayā imō caliō । taiyā nivēṇa khittō dēsō ēyarasa kōṭṭāē ।। 7527।।
