tatthagayassa u jaṁ kiṁ pi jāyamēyassa taṁ samaggaṁ pi । jāṇaṁta cciya ciṭṭhaha tubbhē vi taō na bhaṇiyavvaṁ ।।7528 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ sacivammi uvaraē bhaṇai kumarasirivammō | vittharabhaṇiyassa imassa maṁti ! kō ēttha paramatthō
maṁtī pabhaṇai kumarō sudaṁsaṇō duvviṇīyabhāvēṇa । bāhiṭṭiyāē māūē gabbhasaṁbhūiō taha ya ।। 7530 ।।
rajjassa ajōggō cciya lahū u na tahā taō u sō jōggō । bhaṇati taō sirivammō ēyaṁ ciya tumha vattavvaṁ ? ।।
āmaṁ ti maṁtibhaṇiē sirivammō bhaṇai tattha paḍivayaṇaṁ । tumhēhiṁ dūsaṇadugaṁ sudaṁsaṇē jaṁ samullaviyaṁ ।। 7532 ।।
tatthēgaṁtēṇa sayaṁ paricattaṁ dūsaṇaṁ aviṇayassa । duiyaṁ tu dūsaṇaṁ pi huna hōi niuṇaṁ muṇaṁtāṇa ।। 7533।।
jaṇaṇī jaṇaō ya jaō dōnhaṁ piha bhāuyāṇa ēgāī । majjhēṇa bāhirēṇa ya na visēsō kīraē tēsi ।। 7533 ।।
tattōya bhai maṁtī asthi visēsō kumāra ! atigaruō । bāhiṁ jāē gabbhē saṁkaṭṭhāṇaṁ vahai lōō ।। 7535।।
aha pabhaṇai sirivammō kamaparihārē akīramāṇammi । saṁkā na kā vi jāyai kīraṁtē tammi puṇa saṁkā ||
uppāijjai tumhēhi cēva lōē avijjamāṇā vi । jaha jēṭṭhē jōggammi vi saṁtē lahuō kaō rajjē ।।7537 ।।
kiṁ kāraṇamiha ēvaṁ viyakkamāṇō jaṇō sayaṁ cēva । taṁ saṁbharēi kahai va tassa purō ēvamannō vi ।। 7538 ।।
jassāsi saṁsaō sō vi nicchayaṁ kuṇai ēttha vatthummi । kamalaṁghaṇē u akaē vayaṇavayāsō na kassa viya ।।
puṇa paṇa suviyārō kumāra ! lōō na jaṁpaē jai vi । jāṇai tahā vi ēvaṁ amuṇaṁtō kō vi iha natthi । । 7540 ।।
sirivammō bhai taō saciva ! sarīrammi jāī aṁgāī । muttapurīsavisajjaṇaṭāṇāī lajjaṇijjāī ।। 7541 ।।
tāī viyāṇai lōō parōpparaṁ tāva taha vi gōvēi । vatthāīhiṁ na payaḍīkāūṇa sayaṁ pi daṁsēi ।।7542 ।।
tamhā tumha vi ēvaṁ jāṇijjaṁtaṁ pi niyayavayaṇijjaṁ । gōvijjaṁtaṁ ciya pavaramiyarahā hōti dōsayaraṁ ।। 7543 ।।
lōiyadiṭṭhatēṇaṁ ēvaṁ paḍibōhiō mahāmaṁtī । bhaṇai suviyāraṁ ēyaṁ nāmaṁ ciya kēvalaṁ majjha ।। 7544 । ।
atthō ēyassa puṇō kumāra ! gahiō taē cciya samaggō । tā jaṁ cciya vayasi tumaṁ taṁ ciya kiccaṁ iha na iyaraṁ ॥
tō pabhaṇai sirivammō jai tumha vi sammayaṁ saciva ! ēyaṁ । tō vinnaviūṇa nivaṁ kārēha imaṁ sayaṁ cēva ।।7546 ॥
rāyā vijavaṇiyaṁtagaraō kumārassa juttivayaṇāī । sōūṇa samaggāī savimhaō dhuṇai niyasīsaṁ ।।7547 ।।
aha uṭṭhiūṇa maṁtī vinnaviūṇaṁ mahābalaṁ nivaī । juvarāyapaē ṭhāvai sudaṁsaṇaṁ takkhaṇē cēva ।। 7548।।
baṁdhēuṁ ghiṣpaṁtē sudaṁsaṇē tassa saṁtiyaṁ kiṁpi । jaṁ āsi purā gahiyaṁ raha kari-haya-karahamātīyaṁ ।। 7549 ।।
tammajjhāō bahuyaṁ samappiyaṁ vāliūṇa tassēva । sirivammakumārēṇaṁ niyaṁ ca vatthāiyaṁ dinaṁ ।। 7550 ।।
nayarammi sārivadē gaṁtuṁ mōyāviō taō appā । rannā mahābalāō tēṇa vi raha - kari-hayātīhi ।। 7551 ।।
sammāūṇa visajjiō gaō sārivahnayarammi । sirivammō rāyasuō tattha vi puvvaṁ va bhaṇiyavvaṁ ।। 7552 ।।
savvaṁ pi vibhūtīē nayarapavēsō vivāhakaraṇaṁ ca । savvēsu jiṇaharēsuṁ aṭṭhahi diyahēhiṁ ṇhavaṇāī || 7553 ।।
pyāpēcchaṇayāī rahajattā cauvihassa saṁghassa । paḍilāhaṇaṁ ca navaraṁ rayaṇavaīē karaggahaṇaṁ ।। 7554 । ।
aha sūrapālarāyā sahānisannō diṇammi annammi । dāhiṇapāsammiṭhiyaṁ saṁbhāsai kumarasirivammaṁ ।। 7555 ।।
daṁtaūrapuraṭhiyāṇaṁ tumhāṇa maē suvannalakkhēṇa । maragayarayaṇaṁ garuyaṁ gahiyaṁ dēsaṁtaranarāō ।।7556 ।।
taṁ dēvayāahiṭṭiyamaccijjai kēvalaṁ ciya sayā vi । na uṇō āhaṇāisu uvagarai kahi pi garuyattā ।। 7557 ।।
tammi nihālijjatē phuraṁghaṇavimalakiraṇajālammi । parihāsaē caubbhuyalacchīpaḍimāē āgārō ।। 7558।।
daṁsissaē iyāṇi āṇāvēūṇa tumha puraō taṁ । tō jaṁpai sirivammō taṁ bahumullēṇa gahiyaṁ ti ।। 7559 ।।
tō amha daṁsaṇijjaṁ jamhā saṁbhavai pavararayaṇāṇa | mullaṁ ēttiyamēttaṁ pi kiṁtu jaṁ dēvayāmuttī ।। 7560 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
।
235
paḍibibiya va dīsai tattha taō amha vimhaō garaō । vaṭṭai maṇammi tēṇēva daṁsaṇaṁ tassa icchāmi ।। 7561 ।।
aha dēvaharāvasarāō sūrapālēṇa mēiṇīvaiṇā । āṇāviūṇa maragayarayaṇaṁ taṁ daṁsiyaṁ tassa ।। 7562 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tumha ēyaṁ daṁsijjai kāraṇēṇa ēēṇa । jaṁ tubbhē rayaṇāṇaṁ savvēsi muha paramatthaṁ ।। 7563।।
jaṁ daṁtaurammi mahābalassa vairaṁ palōiuṁ tumaē । kahiyaṁ lōhamayaṁ ti ya jaṇiō taha paccaō tattha ।। 7564 ।।
taṁ tattō ēttha samāēhiṁ bahuēhi sāhiyaṁ amha । ēvaṁ nivēṇa bhaṇiē sirivammō taṁ nirikkhēuṁ ।। 7565 ।।
bhai jahā ēyaṁ pahu tahēva jai hōi kārimaṁ tō kiṁ ? । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ hāsō uyāha saccaṁ imaṁ vayaṇaṁ ।।
jaṁpai taō kumārō tumhēhiṁ vi jaṇayanivvisēsēṁhi । saha kō iha parihāsō tō rāyā bhaṇai jai ēvaṁ ।। 7567 ।।
tō sāhah paramatthaṁ aha kumarō bhaṇai maragayaṁ ēyaṁ । jaccaṁ na hōi kiṁ puṇa kāyaṁ parikammaṇaguṇēṇaṁ ।। 7568।।
maragayamaṇi vva najjai pēkkhijjataṁ viyakkhaṇēhiṁ pi । jaṁ puṇa aṁtō dīsai paḍimā paḍibiṁbamēyaṁ tu ।। 7569 ।।
paḍima cciya phalihamatī aṁtō ēyarasa ciṭṭhai nihittā । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ saṁdhī iha katthai daṁsaē nēya ।। 7570 ।।
tō kaha aṁtō paḍimā khittā ēyassa tō kahai kumarō । tēllammi bōliūṇaṁ kanḍēḍaṁ muṁcaē tāva ।। 7571 ।।
ēgaṁ mahattamēttaṁ payaḍō saṁjjāyaē taō saṁdhī । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ pi kumara ! kāūṇa daṁsēhi ।। 7572 ।।
tō vinnattaṁ kumarēṇa dēva ! ēmēva suṁdaraṁ ēyaṁ । dīsaṁtaṁ pasihāsai viṇāsiēṇaṁ kiēṇa ? ।। 7573 ।।
tō bhai puṇō rāyā imassa ki kārimāē sōhāē ? । taha kuṇasu jaha viṇassai ēyaṁ maha kōuyaṁ ēttha ।।
tattō siśvimmēṇaṁ kayammi puvvōvavanniyavihimmi । payaḍīhūē saṁdhimmi kaḍiyā majjhabhāyāō ।। 7574।
jaha bhaṇiyā siripaḍimā diṭṭhā rāyāisavvōlōēṇa । sīsāiṁ dhuṇaṁtēṇa ya pasaṁsiō kumaramativihavō ।। 7576
tō bhai nivō kumaraṁ sirivammaṁ jaha taē kaē ēvaṁ । harisēṇa visāēṇa ya amhē dōhiṁ pi parigahiyā ।।7577 ।।
rayaṇaparikkhā kusalattaṇēṇa tuha amha vaḍiō harisō । annēsu vi niyarayaṇēsu jāyasaṁkassa u visāō ।। 7578।।
tā kumara ! rayaṇabhaṁḍāyāraṁ savvaṁ pi mē nirikkhēhi । nāūṇa kārimaṁ jaha rayaṇaṁ annaṁ pichaḍḍēmi ।। 7579।।
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ mā dēvō kuṇau ēttiyaṁ saṁkaṁ । ēgammi kahavi rayaṇē jai jāyā ērisā juttī ।। 7580 ।।
tā kiṁ savvattha vi tē parikkhagā muḍhamāṇasā jāyā ! ēttiyamēttēṇaṁ ci ahaṁ puṇō jāṇaō jāō ।।7581।। ।
ēsa ghuṇakkharanāō hōti cciya dēva ! kassai kayāvi । tā gayasaṁkō hōuṁ iha dēvō muṁcau visāyaṁ ।। 7582 |
rāyā bhaṇai dhuṇakkharanāō ēsō na tīraē vōttuṁ । jaṁ vairaparikkhāē vi tuha matī kumara ! nivvaḍiyā ।। 7583।।
ēvaṁ pi hōu ahavā taha vi dhīī majjha jāyaē taiyā । dēi jayā niyadiṭṭhi kumarō maha rayaṇakōsammi ।। 7584 । ।
saravammō bhai taō viulō taha dēva ! rayaṇabhaṁḍārō । nō varisēṇa vi tīrai nirakkhiuṁ thēvamēttō vi ।। 758 ।।
tō jāī ahiṇavāī bahuṇā mullēṇa saṁti gahiyāī । tāī ciya thēvāī dēvō daṁsau kimannēhiṁ ।। 7587।।।
tō rannā kayamēvaṁ kumarēṇa vi pēkkhiūṇa rayaṇāī । kahiyāī tāī rannō savvāī vi vigayadōsāī ।। 7587।।
tō rāyā sacvasahāsamakkhamēvaṁ pasaṁsaē kumaraṁ । jaha narapuṁgavarāyā ēkkō cciya mahiyalē dhannō ।। 7588 ।।
jassa sirivammakumarō putō nīsēsaguṇagaṇāvāsō । ēgē ciṭṭēti suyā jāyā annēhi nivaīhi ।। 7589 ।।
namuti bōrabiṭa jē taha vi bhamaṁti uddharakhadhā । sirivammō iva annē savvaṁ pi murṇatayā nihuyā । 7590 /
rē vīrapāla ! vaṁchasi tumaṁ pi jai attaṇō guṇē hōṁtē । tō kammayarō sirivammasaṁtiō hōsu kaṛa vidiṇē ।
aha vīrapālakumarō rannā jaṇaēṇa jaṁpiō ēvaṁ । īsi hasiūṇa pabhaṇai mauliyapāṇī paṇayasīsō ।।7592 ।।
jaṇaēṇa jassa pāyā havaṁti pakkhāliyā sahatthēhiṁ । putō kaha tassa na hōi kiṁkarō dēva ! sayakālaṁ ।। 7593।।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
amhē sirivammakumārakiṁkarā cēva dēva ! ciṭṭhāmō । uṭṭha tagguṇasaṁkamaṇavaiyarē nicchaō natthi ।। 7594 ।।
sirivammō puṇa niyaguṇakahāsamāyannaṇēṇa savvaṁgaṁ । saṁkuyai ahōdiṭṭhī ravikarasaṁgēṇa kumuyaṁ va ।। 7595।।
iya paidiṇaṁ pi parivaḍḍhamāṇaāṇaṁdanibbharamaṇēṇa । sammāṇijjaṁtō naravarēṇa sirivammavarakumarō ।। 7596।।
tatthēva kavi diya gamēi aha annavāsarē tattha । siriuravaiṇō dhūyā caṁdasirī nāma saṁpattā ।। 7597 ।।
tīsē imā pannā rāhāvēhaṁ karēi jō kō vi। sō maṁ pariṇai annaha nō pariṇāvēmi appāṇaṁ । । 7598 ।।
ēvaṁ ca tīē pēsiyapurisēhiṁ sūrapālarāyassa । puraō āgaṁtuṇaṁ sahānisannassa vinnattaṁ ॥ 7599।।
tēṇa vi tēsiṁ vayaṇaṁ aṇumannēuṁ visajjiyā lahu tē । aha sūrapālarāyā visajjaē sayalamatthāṇaṁ । । 7600
tattō uṭṭhēūṇaṁ ēgaṁtē vīrapāla maṁgaruhaṁ । hakkāriūṇa pucchai rāhāvēhammi sāmatthaṁ । । 7601 ||
sō na kahai nicchayaō niyasatti tattha tō vayai rāyā । ēvaṁ rāhāvēhē na jujjaē tujjhā āraṁbhō ।।7602 ।।
majjhavi na juttamēyaṁ sattijayassa vi jaō duvē dōsā । maha kannālōhō tuha rāhāvēhē akusalattaṁ ।।7603 ।।
kannā vi apariṇīyā jai vaccai taha vi dūsaṇaṁ garuyaṁ । tamhā sirivammāō rāhāvēhaṁ karāvēuṁ ॥ 7604।।
ēsā pariṇāvijjai samāgayā dūradēsaō kannā । tō bhaṇaṛa vīrapālō ēvaṁ ciya jujjaē inhi ।।7605 ।।
aha takkhaṇē vi rannā bhaṇiō hakkāriūṇa sirivambhō । sabbhāvakahaṇapuvvaṁ tēṇa vi uciyaṁ ti paḍivannaṁ । 7606।
aha annasōhaṇadiṇē sā rāhāvēhapuvvayaṁ tēṇa । pariṇīyā caṁdasirī aṇurūvā guruvibhūtīē ।।7607 ।।
aha narapuṁgavarannā sirivammakumāramāgayaṁ nāuṁ । nayarammi sārivadē paṭṭaviyā niyamahāpurisā ।।7608 ।।
tassāhavaṇanimittaṁ āgaṁtuṁ tēhi sūrapālassa । rannō taṁ vinnattaṁ tēṇa vi sammāṇi sigdhaṁ ॥ 7609।।
saha savvakalattēhi visajjiō sō akhaṁḍiyapayāṇō । caṁdaurīē purīē pattō sirivammavarakumarō ।।7610 ।।
nayarīē āsannaṁ samāgayaṁ jāṇiūṇa sirivammaṁ । narapuṁgavō vi rāyā paccōṇīē vi ṇīhariō ।।7611 ।
gāmanagarāgarāṇaṁ lōō vi samāgaō bahū tattha । nayarīpavēsadiyahaṁ sōuṁ sirivammakumarassa ।।7612 ।।
maṁcāimaṁcakaliyā caṁdaurī amaralōyanayari vva । kumarāgamaṇammi kayā aṇāgayaṁ nivaniōgēṇa ।।7613 ।।
sirivammō vi kumārō diṭṭhigaē sajaṇaē gayavarāō । ōyariūṇa paṇamai mahīyalē miliyapaṁcaṁgō ।।7614 ।।
yā vikaridāō ōruhiuṁ kayapaṇāmamaṁgaruhaṁ । uṭṭhaviḍaṁ avagūhai aigāḍhaṁ muttamiva nēhaṁ ॥ 7615 ।।
niyayasarīrassaṁtō tassa sarīraṁ pavēsayaṁtō vva । aha sīsē cuṁbēuṁ visajjiē tammi naranāhaṁ ॥ 7616 ।।
kariṇīhitō hēṭṭhā ōyariūṇaṁ kumāraṁbhajjāō । paṇamaṁti uttarīyāvariyamuhīō mahiyalammi ।।7617 । ।
jāṇusirakarayalāī mēlēūṇaṁ taō kumārēṇa । saha jē samāgayā tē maṁḍaliyātī namaṁti nivaṁ । । । 7618।।
rannā sahāgaō aha jaṇō samajjaṁ pi namai sirivammaṁ । sēsāṇa vi āgaṁtuyavatthavvajaṇāṇa annōnnaṁ ।।7619 ।।
uciyavihī saṁjāō taō nivō niyagaiṁdamāruḍhō । niyaniyavāhaṇajāṇaṁ kumarāijaṇō vi ārūḍhō ।।7620 ।।
pavisai purīē majjhē nivēṇa saha ṇēgayarapaōlīhi । bhīḍijjatō gāḍhaṁ parōpparaṁ atighaṇattaṇaō ।।7621 ।।
iyarajaṇō pāyārē varaṁḍaē maṁdirē ya uvaulē । haṭṭē rukkhē ya tahā annamma vi uccaṭhāṇammi ।।7622 ।।
kumarapavēsālōyaṇakuūhlāuliyamāṇasō caḍiō | sēsō aladvāṇō iō taō viyarai mahīē । 7626।।
mattāṇa vi hatthīṇaṁ durddatāṇa vi hayāṇa majjhēṇaṁ । rahasaṁkaḍē vi pavisai suhaḍōvvaraṇē jayahilāsī ।।7624 ।।
puraō rāyā pacchā sirivammō tayaṇu tassa bhajjāō । puraō ubhaō pāsē pacchā ya payāisēsa jaṇō ।।7625 ।।
I

237
cirapariciō vidēsaṁtarēsu niyavikkamaṁ paryāḍiūṇa । jaṁ pariṇiūṇa bhajjāō āgaō ajjiyajasōhō ||
tē sirivammakumarō patthavvassa vi jaṇassa saṁjaṇai । ājammamadiṭṭhō iva avalōyaṇakōuyaṁ garuyaṁ ।।7627 ।।
sirivammakumārassa vi caṁdaurī pariciyā vi cirakālaṁ । sāṇaṁdajaṇaviṇimmiyasōhāisayā samatēṇa ।।7628 ।
ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇammi nibaddhagēyanaṭṭāimaṇaharāyārā । savisēsadaṁsaṇijjā jāyā puvtraṁ adiṭṭha vva ।।7629 ।।
nayariṁ nijjhāyaṁtō pēcchijjatō ya nayarilōēṇa । thuimaṁgalavayaṇāī nisuṇatō pēcchayajaṇassa ।।7630 ।।
rāyāṇumaggalaggō sahara visaṁtō purīē sirivammō । amarāvainayariē sakkēṇa samaṁ jayaṁtō vva ॥।7631।।
pattō nivadhavalaharē paḍhamaṁ pi nivēṇa saha taō tēṇa । aṇunāō gaṁtūṇaṁ niyajarṇāṇi namai punnasiri ॥ 7632 ।।
sā vi harisaṁsupūriyanayaṇā avagūhaē daḍhaṁ taṇayaṁ । sīsammi cuṁbiūṇaṁ āsīsaṁ dēi tō tassa । ।7633।।
jaṇaṇīē tō ēsō kusalakahāpasiṇapuvvamālāvaṁ । kiṁpi karēūṇa khaṇaṁ visajjiō cullamāūṇaṁ । । 7634 ।।
kaṁcuivayaṇēṇa samāgayāṇa tatthēva kuṇai paṇivāyaṁ । tāō vi diti āsīsamuttarīyaṁ aṁcalaṁ bhamiuṁ । । 7635 ।।
tāhi vi samamālāvaṁ kāūṇaṁ kipi jāi nivapāsē । taṁ namiūṇaṁ tēṇa vi visajjiō vayai niyabhavaṇaṁ ।।7636 ।।
tayaṇu vasaṁtasirīpabhiiyāō savvāō tassa bhajjāō । punnasirīpamuhāṇaṁ namati savvāṇa sāsūnaṁ ।।7637।।
namiuṭṭiyāu tāō kamēṇa āliṁgiyāō sāmūhiṁ । āliṁgaṇāvasāṇē pasu tāsi puṇa paḍaṁti ॥ 7638।।
lāsīsāu taō tāō dinnāsaṇēsūvavisaṁti । jō puttadaṁsaṇēṇaṁ jāō dēvīṇa pariōsō || 7639 ।।
sō aṇuruvavahūṇaṁ daṁsaṇaō bahuguṇō samppannō । ta
 ē khvavimhiyāō dēvīō jāva ciṭṭhati ॥ 7640 ।।
pāsaṁtīō aṇimisadiṭṭhīhiṁ vayaṇassa vayaṇāī । tāviha khaṇē vahūṇaṁ vaḍumahēlīhi āṇēuṁ । । 7641 ।।
nāṇāvihavatthāṇaṁ āharaṇāṇaṁ ca ṇēgaṭhāṇāī । punnasirīē puraō mōttuṁ ugbāḍiūṇaṁ ca ।।7642 ।।
savvāī dasiyāī ēkkēkkīē vahuē abhihāṇaṁ । aṇukamasō gahiūṇaṁ ēvaṁ amugīē amugīē ।।7643 ।।
vatthāharaṇātīyaṁ āṇīyaṁ dēvi ! savvadēvīṇaṁ । jōggaṁ dēvassa imaṁ ēyaṁ ca pahāṇapurisāṇaṁ । ।7644।।
vinnattaṁ ēvaṁ khajjagasukkaphalaullaphalabhariyā । ciṭṭhati bahu sagaḍā samāgayā dāradēsammi || 7645 ।।
appā vaha thālāī khiviūṇaṁ tēsu khajjagātīyaṁ । ēttha jahā āṇijjai dēvīē pāyamūlammi ।।7646 ||
aha tīē kaṁcugiṇaṁ pēsēumimaṁ kahāviyaṁ rannō । sō vihu paḍihārāōṁ appāvēūṇa thālāī ।।7647 ।।
āgaṁtuṁ ōrōhē uvaviṭṭhō savvamappaṇī biiyaṁ । appāas dēvīṇaṁ vatthālaṁkāramātīyaṁ । 7648 ।।
jaṁpai ya nivō dēvīṇa sammuhaṁ jaha puṇō vi niyaputtaṁ । pariṇāvaha dhūyāō annēsi mahānaridāṇa ।।7649 ।।
jaha vatthāharaṇāṇaṁ lāhō puṇa ēttiō havai tumha | bēṁti taō dēvīō amhaṁ tumha pasāēṇa ।।7650 ।।
vatthāharaṇātīhiṁ na ki pi khūṇaṁ purā vi savisēsō । ajja vi annō lāhō dēvāō havai ṇē niccaṁ । । 7651 ।।
aha rāyā nāūṇaṁ dēvīvayaṇassa tassa bhāvatthaṁ । payaḍaṁ pi īsihasiō dēvīṇa muhāī pāsaṁtō ।।7652।।
sēsaṁ jaṁ nivajōggaṁ pahāṇapurisāṇa jōggayaṁ jaṁ ca । taṁ rannā bhaṁḍārē niyaē appāviyaṁ savvaṁ ।।7653 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi khajjagasukkōllapha lāṇabhariyathālāī । taha vaṁsasuṁḍayāī kammarēhiṁ ca dāsīhi ॥ 7654 ।।
āṇēuṁ mukkāī tattha taō tāhi vaḍḍamahilāhi । rannō nivēiyāī aha daṭhṭhē tāī bhaṇai niyō ।।7655।।
kīyaṁ pi hōti annaṁ dakkhākhajjūrakhārakātīyaṁ । sajjōkkaṁ pakkannaṁ inhi ciya kaha imaṁ jāyaṁ ॥ 7656 ।।
tāhi ta paḍiṇiyaṁ hijjō diyahāvasāṇasamayammi । ēttō kō dugaṁtē gahiō kumarēṇa āvāsō ।।7657।।
jammi khaṇē takkālē tattōṁ amhēhi pēsiyā purisā । iha tēhi khajjagāvaṇavaṇiyā bhaṇiyā dhaṇaṁ dāum̐ । । 7658 ।।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tē akariṁsu samaggaṁ pakkannamimaṁ nisāra majjhammi । sēsaṁ tu jahā bhaṇiyaṁ tumhēhi tahēva saṁpanna || 7659।।
tō jaṁpai naranāhōṁ jaha sāsūō na ki pi jaṁpati । taha paḍhamaṁ pi vahūhiṁ galaggahō tāsimēsa kaō ।।7660।।
tō punnasiri mōtuṁ bhāṁti sēsāō savvadēvīō | dēva ! taē cēva kaō galaggahō amha suhahēū ।।7661 ।।
ēyāō bahūō puṇa galaggahaṁ āyaraṁtu niyapaiṇō | tō kaiavakaya bhiuḍī bhūmivatī bhaṇai dēvīō ।।7662।।
ēvaṁ jaṁpatīō kahaṁ na lajjaha tumē bahūṇaṁ pi । dēvīō bēṁti taō ki tubhē dēva ! kuppēha ||7663।।
jaṁ dēvēgaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ laviyaṁ taṁ cētra ēyamamhēhiṁ । tō punnasirī jaṁpai kiṁ kubbaha dēva ! parihāsaṁ || 7664।।
āisaha jamiha kiccaṁ tō rāyā bhaṇai tumha ḍhōyaṇiyaṁ । ēyaṁ vahūhiṁ vihiyaṁ tā kuṇaha sayaṁ pi jaṁ ruiyaṁ । । 7665।।
iya bhaṇiuṁ nīhariō rāyā tattō payāi niyaṭhāṇaṁ । rannā purā vi nāuṁ suyapariṇayaṇaṁ bahubahūṇa ।।7666 ।।
sōlasavarabhavaṇāī vahūṇa hēuṁ kumārabhavaṇassa । niyaḍāī kāriyāī bāhiravāsā ya tāvaiyā ।।7667 ।।
aha punnasirī dēvī taṁ khajjagapabhiiyaṁ jahā hōi । kāyavvaṁ taha kāuṁ visajjaē sēsakammarē || 7668।।
kaivayadāsīsahiyaṁ vahūyaṇaṁ tattha cēva dhārēu । majjiyabhuttapasāhiyamasēsadēvījuyā kāuṁ ॥।7669।।
vatthāharaṇāīhiṁ navēhiṁ kārēi pavarasiṁgāra । niyamāṇusāu rannō jāṇāvara ērisaṁ tattō ।।7670 ।।
vatthālaṁkārādī pavaraṁ pēsa nivō vahūjōggaṁ । sāsūvayaṇēṇa taō diṇāvasāṇammi savvāō ||7671।।
vaccati vahūō niyanivāsabhavaṇēsu ahiṇavakaēsu । tāsi parivārō puṇa bāhiravāsēsu gaṁtu ṭhiō ।।7672 ।।
kumarō vi niyāvāsē vittharakaya majjaṇō sasiṁgārō । jiṇaharavaṁdiyadēvō piuṇā saha bhōyaṇaṁ kāuṁ ।।7673 ।।
tatthēva khaṇaṁ ṭhāuṁ tayaṇunnāōṁ niyammi āvāsē । gaṁtuṁ vīsamai muhuttagaṁ tu rāyā vi vīsa miuṁ || 7674।।
khaṇamēgaṁ sējjāē cautthajāmammi gaṁtumatthāṇē । uvavisai taō nāuṁ ēvaṁ sirivammakumarō'vi ।।7675 ।।
sagihāō gaṁtūṇaṁ nivaī namiūṇa tassa dāhiṇaō । dinnāsaṇē nisīyaṛa aha āgaṁtūṇa paḍihārō || 7676।।
vinnavai nivaṁ jaha dēva ! dāri ciṭṭhaṛa mahāyaṇaṁ sayalaṁ । maṁgaliyakaraṇahēuṁ samāgayaṁ gahiya ḍhōyaṇayaṁ ।।7677।।
pariṇēūṇa. kumārō sirivammō āgaō tti kāraṇaō । vaddhāvēḍaṁ pamayāulāī taha saṁti pattāī || 7678।।
aha taṁ nivavayaṇaṁ pavēsa ubhayamāsu paḍihārō । rāyā mahāyaṇāō sasaṁbhramaṁ ḍhōyaṇaṁ gahiraṁ ।।7679।।
taṁ sammāṇai āsaṇataṁbōlālāvakaraṇamātīhi । pēcchaṇayaṁ kārēu tahēva pamayāulāī pi ।।7680 ।।
tō bhai niyamaṇussē pariṇīyāgaya kumāraṁ sirivammaṁ । ahimicca pabhāyappabhii ūsavaṁ kāraissāmi || 7681 ।।
tō tumbhēhi pabhāē mahāyaṇappa muhanayaramahayarayā । sāmaṁtamaṁḍalāhivasāhaṇava taṁtavālā ya ।।7682।।
savvē nimaṁtiyavvā kārēḍaṁ bhōyaṇaṁ jahā ēē । sammāṇijjaṁti jahōciēṇa vatthāidāṇēṇa || 7683 ||
aha tēhi nivāsē paṇaya sirēhi taha tti paḍivanē । rāyā atthāṇajaṇaṁ visajjiuṁ jāi niyaṭhāṇē ।।7684 ।।
atthamaṇagaē sūrē niyabhavaṇagaē vahūyaṇē savē । gaṁtūṇa sayaṁ rāyā niyāvarōhassa sāhēi ॥ 7685 ।।
taṁ taṇayavivāhsavakāravaṇāraṁbhamāisati taha tō । nayaramahiḍḍhiyanārījaṇassa vaddhāvaṇanimittaṁ ॥ 7686।।
āyāssa sayaṁ ciya tumbhē kārējja pavarasammāṇaṁ । iccāi jaṁpiūṇaṁ iyaraṁ niyakiccamāyarai ।।7687 ।।
ārambhapabhāyāōṁ kārēi mahasavaṁ jahā bhaṇiyaṁ । maṁgaliyāī giṇhai jaṇō u sammāṇaē taha taṁ ॥ 7688।।
baṁdiyaṇakalalēhi naḍanaṭṭātīhi pēcchaṇēhiṁ ca | āṇaṁdaguṁdalēṇaṁ gamēi sattaṭṭhadiyahāī || 7689।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ kumārō vinnaviūṇaṁ nivaṁ jiṇaharēsu । aṭṭhahi diṇēhiṁ kāraḍa savvēsu vi ūsavaṁ garuyaṁ । 7690।।
kārēi ya rahajattaṁ cāragamuyaṇaṁ amārighōsaṇayaṁ । asaṇāiēhi vatthāiēhi savvaṁ pi sirisaṁgha । । 7691।।

paḍilābhai sakkārai sammāṇai gasyabhattirāēṇa । ēkkārasadiyahāī gamēi iya paramatō sē
iya ūsavammi vittē bahigāmāgarasamāgaē lōē । sayalē visajjiyammi vāsārattammi saṁpattē ।।7693।।
jiṇasāsaṇappabhāvaṇaparāyaṇō jaṇayaviṇayasaṁpannō । raṁjatō savvajaṇaṁ gamai diṇē kumarasirivammō ।।7694 । ।
jō payatīṇa payāṇa ya nivammi narapuṁgavammi aṇuō । sō sirivammakumārē duguṇayarō vaṭṭaē niccaṁ । । 7695 ।।
narapuṁgava vi rāyā sirivammakumāraguṇagaṇaṁ daṭhṭhē । taṁ rajjē ṭhaviūṇaṁ parabhavahiyamicchaē kāuṁ । । 7696।।

lāyannarūvajōvvaṇavinnāṇaguṇēhiṁ lōyamaṇaharaṇā । avasaragayassa rannō sā parihārēṇa vinnattā ।।7698।।
tayannāēṇa pavēsiyā ya kāūṇa uciyapaḍivatti । uvaviṭṭhā nivapuṭṭhā sāhai savvaṁ niyasakhvaṁ ॥ 7699।।
jaha kaṁcīnayarīē vatthavvā hē aṇaṁgasēṇāē । varagaṇiyāē dhyā nāmēṇaṁ kāmasēṇa tti ।।7700।।
ahiṇavasikkhiyanaṭṭā laddhapasā nivāilōyāō । tayaṇunnāyā tattō nirgatūṇaṁ sasamudāyā ।7701 ।।
āujjiyavēṇuvīṇāvāyagasahiyā bhamāmi dēsēsu । appuvvaṁ pāsaṁtī niyanaṭṭaguṇaṁ payāsaṁtī ॥7702 ।।
tattō tumha pasiddhi sirivammakumāraguṇapasiddhi ca । sōuṁ ukkaṁṭhāē samāgayā haṁ iha iyāṇi । । 7703।।
diṭṭhā ya dēvapāyā diṭṭha sirivammakumaramuhakamalaṁ । āisaha jai iyāṇi tō naṭṭavihiṁ payaṁsēmi ।। 7704 ।।
iya tīē vinnattē rāyā pāsai muhaṁ kumārassa । kumarō vi mauliyakarō vinnavai nivaṁ jahā ihi ||7705 ।।
ativēlā saṁjāyā kalladiṇē uggamaṁtasūrē vi । ēu imā saṁvahiuṁ jaha dīsai kōuyamimīē ॥ 7706॥
iya kumarēṇa bhaṇiē visajjiyā naṭṭiyā naridēṇa । pagayā niyammi ṭhāṇē samāgayā puṇa pabhāyāmma ।। 7707।।
niyasamudāēṇa samaṁ saṁvahiūṇaṁ nivō vi atthāṇē | kumarēṇa saha nisannō naṭṭa vihiṇṇūhi ya narēhiṁ ॥ 7708।।
rāyāsēṇa taō kuṁkumacaṁdaṇarasēhiṁ sittammi । raṁgammi kāmasēṇā pavisai kayacārusiṁgārā ।। 7709 ।।
kacchiyacaraṇagapaya ḍiyaaṇaṁgabhavaṇaṁta ūrukhaṁbhajuyā । aisacchakaṁcuyayaṁta radīsaṁtapaōharābhōyā
saṁcaraṇaraṇiramaṇinēurēhiṁ caraṇēhi sāvahāṇamaṇaṁ । nīsēsaṁ pi kuṇaṁtī rāyasahāsanniviṭṭhajaṇaṁ ॥ 7711 ।।
āujjē vajjaṁtē vaṁsē ubbhijja māṇakalasaddē । mahuraravagāyaṇēhiṁ gijjētē gahiyatālammi ।।7712।।
kannasiranayaṇabhumayāgīvākaracaraṇacārusaṁcāraṁ । taha mahicārīkaraṇaṁgahāravalaṇēhiṁ maṇaharaṇaṁ ।। 7713 ।।
satthōvaiṭṭhavihiṇā taṁtīsaratālagīyaravamīsaṁ । vimhayamuppāyaṁtī paṇacciyā kāmasēṇā sā
tattha ya rāyasahāē ēgō saṁtarāgaō vaṁṭhō । narapuṁvanivasēvaṁ paḍivannō ciṭṭhai niviṭṭhō ।7715 ।।
sō ya taruṇō surūvō cāī kusalō kalāsu sayalāsu । uciyannū savisēsaṁ viyāṇaō gēyanaṭṭē ||7716।।
tēṇa paṇaccaṁtīē tīsē niyaaṁgaō navōjjhagaō । uttāriūṇa dinnō gahiō tīē karajuēṇa ॥।7717।।
ārōviūṇa sīsē mahāpasāō tti jaṁpamāṇīē । taṁ daddūṇa naridō ruṭṭhō vaṁḍhamma iya hēuṁ ॥ 7718।।
jaha kira paṇaccamāṇī puraō amhāṇa ciṭṭhaē ēsā । paḍipunnaṁ naṭṭavihina daṁsaē tāva ajja viya ।। 7719।।
amhē vi payacchāmō na cāyamajja vi imīē tō kamhā । paḍhamaṁ pi ēsa vaṁṭhō hōūṇaṁ dēi niyacāyaṁ ।।7720 ।।

nikkhivai kaṇayadōraṁ taddaṁsaṇaō nivō siḍhilakōvō | vaṁṭhammi jhatti jāō savimhaō kumaracariyammi ।। 7722

I
sirivamma kumāracariyaṁ
sō naravaiṇō cāō aruṭupuṭṭhāē kāmasēṇāē । gahiō taō naridō ēgaṁtē pucchai kumāraṁ ।। 7726।।
jai naṭṭiyāē cāō dinnō vaṁṭhēṇa asamaē vi taō । kīsa kumāra ! pasāō taē kaō takkhaṇē tassa ? ॥7727।।
āha taō sirivammō tassa pasāō maē tayaṇurūvō । na kaō tumha bhaēṇaṁ saṁbhāvaṇamēttamēva kayaṁ ।।7728।।
jaha sēsajaṇī jāṇai na kaō vaṁṭhēṇa aṇuciō cāō । annaha kaha sirivammōṁ karēi ēyassa sammāṇaṁ ? ।। 7729।।
-rāyā jaṁpai kaha puṇa nāciyaṁ tassa mannasē cāyaṁ । tō vinnavai kumārō kayāvahāṇō suṇau
dēvō ।।7730।।
naccatīē dāhiṇapaōharē kāmasēṇagaṇiyāē । uha pāṇiruhapaē dīsaṁtē kaṁcuyaṁtariē || 7731।।
āgamma samallīṇā dūmaṁtī macchiyā payamuhēhiṁ । gōkuraṇaṁ kāūṇaṁ sigdhaṁ uḍḍāviyā tīē ॥।7732।।
pāraddhanadvāṇagavādhāōṁ rakkhiō tayā hōtō । ēyaṁ guruvinnāṇaṁ saccaviyaṁ tīē daṭṭaṇaṁ ।। 7733 ।।
parituṭṭaṇaṁ dvēṇa rahasavasaō niyaṁgaō jjhagaō । uttāriūṇa dinōṁ tīsē sēṭṭhavirahammi ।। 7734 ||
ēyaṁ tassāṇuciyaṁ namanniyavvaṁ tu uciyamēvēyaṁ । jaṁ rahasavasē dāṇaṁ ghāō rōsamma viṣphuriē |।7735।।
dēvassa vi parisāē annāṇadāṁsō hamēṇa avaṇīō । saccaviyaṭhāṇa' tōsaṁ jāṇāvaṁtēṇa vaṁṭhēṇa ।। 7736 ।।
jē naṭṭaviū purisā dēvēṇiha daṁsaṇatthamāṇīyā । puṭṭē hi vinaya tēhi siddha gōphuraṇavinnāṇaṁ ।। 7737 ।।
sāmannēṇaṁ dōsā guṇā ya naṭṭassa sāhiyā tumha । ēīē nacciyassa u nihōsattaṁ ca akkhāyaṁ ॥ 7738 ||
sahiyaya hiyaya camakkārakāraō jō guṇō puṇa imīē । sō kaha vi na sakkō tēhi jāṇiuṁ payaḍadiṭṭhē vi ।। 7739
tā niuṇamatī ēsō guṇāṇurāgī ya cāyasīlō ya । tō arihai dēvāō sammāṇapayaṁ imō garuyaṁ ।।7740 ।।
iya sirivammakumārassa jaṁpiyaṁ nisuṇiūṇa naranāhō । uvvahamāṇō hiyayammi vimyaṁ citaē ēvaṁ ।। 37741 ।।
jai iha samaē kumarō sirivammō kavi nāgaō hōṁtō । vāsavadattātīṇaṁ nivaīṇaṁ maṁḍalahitō
tō avivēēṇa ahaṁ garuyamakajjaṁ kuṇataō iṇhi । puvvajjiyaṁ asēsaṁ pi niyajasaṁ lahu phusaṁtō ya
nikkāraṇakāṁvēṇaṁ vaṁṭhaṁ saguṇaṁ pi niggahiumēyaṁ । vitthāraṁtō sayalammi maṁḍalē niyamakiti ca
tā ēmma samathē guṇanilaē naṁdaṇammi ciṭṭhatē । ēyāvēkkhāē nimguṇassa ssa maha ihiṁ
na khaṇaṁ vi khamaṁ kāuṁ rajjaṁ sasiṇō utāva pahapasarō । jāva na uēi sūrō tammi ṭhiē sō na ki pi bhavē ।। 7746 । ।
iya citiūṇa pucchara puṇō vi rāyā kumārasirivammaṁ । dinnō vaṁḍhēṇa niyaṁgalaggajhagaō vi ēīē ।। 7747 ।।
gahiō jaṁpatīē mahāpasāō tti siraṭhiyakarāē । jaṁ puṇa maē viinnaṁ vatthāharaṇāi bahu tīsē ।। 7748 ||
tamaṇāyarēṇa gahiyaṁ tīē dūrē pasāyabhaṇaṇaṁ tu । kahasu kumāra ! nimittaṁ kimiha mahāsaṁsaō majjha ।। 7749 ।।
aha vinnava kumārō dēva ! imaṁ najjaē payaḍamēva । saguṇō jaṇō guṇannuttaṇēṇa tūsai parassa paraṁ ।।7750।।
thēvaṁ bahu va dinnaṁ avēkkhaē nēya tēṇa vaṁṭhassa । guṇajāṇagattaṇēṇaṁ tuṭṭāē tīē taṁ vihiyaṁ ॥ 7751 ।।
niyavihavāvēkkhāē cāō vi bahū visajjiō tēṇa । parihāṇappāvaraṇōirittasavvassa dāṇēṇa ।। 7752 ।।
dēvēṇa puṇō tīsē vinnāṇaguṇaṁ ajāṇiuṁ cāō । dinnō sō vi na viulō niyavihavassāṇusārēṇa || 7753।।
tō ēvaṁ muṇiūṇaṁ dēvēṇa na rūsiyavva mēēsi । dōnhaṁ pi naṭṭiyāē vaṁṭhassa ya dōsarahiyattā ॥ 7754।।
ēvaṁ kumāravayaṇaṁ sattiyaṁ nisuṇiūṇa naranāhō । gayasaṁsaō sa suṭṭō kumāramēvaṁ taō bhai ॥ 7755 ।।
dēha puṇa naṭṭiyāē pasāyamihi pi samahiyaṁ annaṁ । bēi kumārō iṇhi pi tumha dāu puṇō'ṇuciyaṁ ॥ 7756।।
ahamēva niyāvāsē nēūṇaṁ saṁpayaṁ pi ētīē । dēvakayapasāyasamaṁ kaṁci vi cāyaṁ payacchassaṁ ॥।7757 ।।

।।7770।।

7773 ।।
gāmāi jīvalōō karaṇijjō kō vi dēva ! vaṁṭhassa । iṇhi majjhanhē vā tō rāyā bhaṇai sirivammaṁ ।। 7758 ।।
tumbhēhiṁ samaṁ kiṁci vimajjhahē ha (atthi ? ) majjha vattavvaṁ । tammi kaē vattavvē vittiṁ vaṁṭhassa kārissaṁ । । 7759 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ rāyā atthāṇajaṇaṁ visajjaē savvaṁ । kumarō vi nivāṇumaō niyaāvāsammi gaṁtūṇaṁ ।। 7760 ।।
kayaicchiyasammāṇaṁ visajjaē kāmasēṇavaragaṇiyaṁ । bhōyaṇakaraṇāṇantaramēgaṁtē kumarasirivammō ।। 7761 ।।
nā bhaṇiō ēvaṁ āsi maē bhaṇiyamatthi vattavvaṁ । kiṁci taē saha taṁ puṇa ēyaṁ nihuōṁ nisāmēhi ।।7762 ।।
gaṇiyāguṇatuṇaṁ vaṁṭhēṇaṁ tīē sajhagaō dinnō । vaṁṭhaguṇaraṁjiēṇaṁ tassa taē puṇa kaṇayadōrō ।। 7763।।
tujjha vi guṇēṇa tuṭṭhō ahaṁ aō dēmi tujjha niyarajjaṁ । āha nivaṁ aha kumarō tubbhē dāūṇa maha rajjaṁ ।। 7764।।
ki appaṇā karissaha ? bhaṇai nivō dikkhiō bhavissāmi । jammaṁtarē vi kammiṁ vi hōmi jahā dukkhaō na ahaṁ
tō bēi nivaṁ kumarōjai bhavanivvēyaō vayaggahaṇaṁ । tubbhē kaha tō haṁ vāghāyaṁ tumha na karēmi ।। 7766 ।।
jāṇatō visarūvaṁ bhavassa savvaṁ pi savvaduhajaṇayaṁ । iha aṭṭa paḍikūlaṁ jaṁ ki pi ahaṁ payaṁpēmi ।।7767 ।।
sō hōi maha na viṇaō na vivēō nēya hiyagarattaṁ pi । tamhā tumhāēsō paḍivannō cciya maē ēsō ।। 7768 ।।
kiṁtu paraṁ jammi dinē tumhē ginhaha vayaṁ tayā majjha । ēgadiṇēṇaṁ puvvaṁ rajjabharō appiyavvō ti ।।7769।।
tō bēi nivō tuha ihimēva īhēmi appiuṁ rajjaṁ । vayagahaṇaṁ puṇa sūrimmi āgaē kammi vikarissaṁ
tō jaṁpai sirivammō dēva ! imaṁ nēya saṁgayaṁ hōti । dēvassa vi āēsaṁ paḍivajjissāmi nō ēyaṁ
nāūṇa kumaranicchayamēyaṁ paḍivajjaē taha ccēva । taṁ tavvayaṇaṁ rāyā tattō uvavisai atthāṇē
vaṁṭhassa varaggāmaṁ dēi pasāēṇa pavaraturayaṁ ca । vatthāharaṇāṇi ya āyavattasahiyāṇi naranāhō ।।
suvidiyasu gaēsu tattha caunāṇasaṁjuō sūrī । āṇaṁdaṇābhihāṇō samōsaḍhō puvvaujjāṇē ॥7774।।
taṁ nāūṇa nariṁdō paōsasamaē pamōyapaḍahacchō । hakkāriūṇa kumaraṁ nīsēsa rāyalōyaṁ ca ।। 7775 ।।
sūrīṇa samāgamaṇaṁ vayagahaṇammi ya niyaṁ abhippāyaṁ । tēsi puraō kahiuṁ samaṇunnāō taō tēhi ।। ।।7776।।
atigaruyavibhūīē paḍhamē paharē nisāē sirivammaṁ । ahisiṁcai niyarajjē payaipayāṇaṁ pamōēṇa ।।7777।।
rāyāisavvalōēṇa paṇamiō sō mahānivō jāō । taṁ narapuṁgavarāyā aṇujāṇāvai vayanimittaṁ ||7778 ।।
sirivammamahārāō taha tti paḍivajjiūṇa piuvayaṇaṁ । āisati takkhaṇē cciya sibiyānimmāvaṇammi narē
kē vi pabhāē jiṇavarapūyācāragavi mōyaṇāīsu । nayarī mahasavāraṁ bhaṇatthamavarēnirūvēī ।।7780।।
tattō visajjiūṇaṁ sēsajaṇaṁ niddamaṇuhavēūṇa । nisiviramē uṭṭhēuṁ ruppa suvannāikalasēhi ।। 7781 ।।
garuyayaravibhūtīē majjāvēūṇa sajaṇayaṁ tattō । divvēhiṁ dūsēhiṁ ābharaṇēhiṁ maharihahiṁ ॥ 7782 ।।
hāraddhahārakēūrakaḍayamaṇimauḍakuṁḍalātīhi । kārēuṁ sigāraṁ ārūḍhaṁ pavarasibiyāē । 7783 ।।
dhariyadhavalāyavattaṁ ḍhalaṁtasa sivimalacāmaruppīlaṁ । puraō paḍhaṁta baṁdiyaṇavaṁdauddāmakayasaḥ
apphāliya bahutūraṁ cauraṁgabalēṇa vihiyaparivēḍhaṁ । accijjataṁ nayarīnaranārīnayaṇanaliṇēhiṁ
sammāṇiyasuhisaṇaṁ dīṇāṇāhāiyāṇa dinnadhaṇaṁ । maggaṭhiyajiṇaharāṇaṁ paṇamaṁtaṁ siranihittakaraṁ ।। 7786 ।।
viraiya varasiṁgārō ārūḍhō karivarammi mattammi । aṇugacchaṁtō rāyā sirivammōṁ jāti ujjāṇē ।। 7787 ।।
daṭṭhūṇa taō puraō silāyalē phāsūyammi uvaviṭṭhē | āṇaṁdaṇaṁ muṇidaṁ bahusamaṇasamūhapariyariyaṁ ।। 7788 ।।
punimanisāmayaṁka va nahayalē tārayāṇa majjhagayaṁ । ōyariūṇaṁ jāṇāōṁ vāhaṇāō ya pitiputtā ।।7789 ।।

íct
sirivammakumāracariya
dōnni vitiuṇapayāhiṇapuvvaṁ namiūṇa saviṇayaṁ puraō । uḍḍhā havaṁti mauliyakarakamalā vinnavēi taō ।। 7790 ।।
narapuṁgavō nariṁdō bhayavaṁ ! bhīyaṁ bhavāu maṁ rakkha । niyadikkhā dāṇēṇaṁ tuha saraṇagaō ahaṁ inhi ।।7791 ।।
āha gurū narapuṁgava ! juttamiṇaṁ tujjha na uṇa paḍibaṁdhō। ahamavi niyanāṇēṇaṁ nāuṁ tuha dikkhavihisamayaṁ ।। 7792।।
iha saṁpattō inhi aha tassa uvadviyassa vihipuvvaṁ । narapuṁgavassa dikkhaṁ dēi muṇidō dayājalahī ।। 7793 ।।
sikkhavai ya jai kiriyaṁ iriyābhāsāiyaṁ samaggaṁ pi । sirivammanaridāisu tō jahaṭhāṇaṁ niviṭṭhēsu ।।7794 ।।
navajalaharanigghōsō āṇaṁdaṇa muṇivarō kahai dhammaṁ । bhō bhō ēgaggamaṇā hōuṁ bhavvā ! nisāmēha ।। 7795 ।।
ēttha aṇāimi bhavē caugaigahaṇammi saṁsaratāṇa | jīvāṇaṁ natthi suhaṁ suhāhimāṇaṁ tu matimōhōṁ ।।7796 ।।
jaṁ narayatiriyanarasurabhēyā caurō gatīō saṁsārē । tattha narayammi dukkhaṁ tāva pasiddhaṁ ciya jaṇammi ।। 7797 ।।
jaṇasuiparaṁparāē gurumuhanisuyāō āgamāōṁ vā । kassa vi ya visaṁvāō na vijjaē nārayaduhammi ।।7798 ।।
jamhā guruduhapaḍiyaṁ jīvaṁ daṭṭhūṇa iha jaṇō bhaṇai । ēsa barāō dukkhaṁ narayassa va aṇuhavai tivvaṁ ॥ 7799।।
tiriyaduhaṁ sakkhaṁ ciya sīyāyava - khuhapivāsa rōyabhavaṁ । paṭṭhīē khaṁdhēṇa ya gurubhāruvvahaṇajaṇiyaṁ ca ।। 7800 ।।
galabaṁdhavayaṇakaviyāikhivaṇagalapucchakannakappaṇayaṁ । dahaṇaṁkaṇaṁkusa kasākaṁdhāārāighāyakayaṁ ।। 7801 ॥
maṇuyattaṇē va paccakkhamēva dukkhaṁ sutikkhamiha savvaṁ । dālidubbhagattaṇadāsattaṇarōgasōgabhavaṁ ।। 7802 ।।
dhaṇiṇaṁ pi lōbhavasaō' bahuvibhavajjaṇa kilē sasaṁbhūyaṁ । dinnammi alabdhaṁtē davvē riṇiēhi saha hōti ।। 7803 ।।
kalahō ghōrō saṁtāvakāraō jīviyaṁtajaṇaō ya । cōrāiviluttadhaṇē vaṇiuttaviṇāsiē da0 ।। 7804 ।।
vaṇijammi jāyachēē āēṇa viṇā vayammi jāyaṁtē । samavihvajaṇavirōhē rannā vihiē'vamāṇammi ||7805 ||
kamma vi garuē dōsē khalēhi ubbhāviē asambhuē। pāradvakajjavigdhē iṭṭhaviyammi saṁpattē ॥ 7806 ||
āṇāvatē dupariyaṇē dummuhē kalattē ya । bhāummi sōyarē davvaphēḍaē vaṁcagē mittē ।। 7807 ।।
dulahē daiē mahilāyaṇammi laddhē vi aṇaṇurattammi । aṇurattammi vi jaha taha puṇō rūsamāṇammi || 7808 ।।
parapurisakayaṇurāē paraparibhuttē gaē parēṇa samaṁ । ahavā kēṇai nivavallahāiṇā haḍhapariggahiē ।। 7809 ।।
puttē ajāyamāṇē jāē vi aṇēgaṇatthasaṁjaṇaē । dhūyāvahūyaṇāisu dussīlayamāyatē ॥ 7810 ।।
iccāikāraṇēhi tēsi jaṁ hōi māṇasaṁ dukkhaṁ । taṁ jāṇai savvannū vōttuṁ puṇa sō vi na samatyō ।। 7811 ॥
sārīraṁ puṇa dukkhaṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya tāva gabbhamajjhammi । niraōvamē dugaṁdhē muttapurīsāṇu littammi ।। 7812।।
paramatamasaṁdhayārē maṁsavasāruhiranivahabhariyammi । nivasaṁtassa ahōmuhakō iyaaṁguvaṁgassa || 7813 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca -- sūtīhi aggivannāhiṁ saṁbhinnassa niraṁtaraṁ । jāvaiyaṁ jāyaē dukkhaṁ gabhē aṭṭaguṇaṁ ta ।। 7814।।
jammasamaē vi dukkhaṁ jōṇījatāu nipphiḍaṁtassa । gabbhāō aṇēgaguṇaṁ saṁjāyai ārasaṁtassa ।। 7815 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca -- jāyamāṇassa jaṁ dukkhaṁ maramāṇassa jaṁtuṇō । tēṇa dukkhēṇa saṁtattō na sarai jāimappaṇō ||7816 ।।
jāyassa vi jaṁpi makkhamassa āhāramahilasaṁtassa । rōyaṁtassa duhaṁ ciya dēhammi vidūmiyaṁtassa ।। 7817 ।।
rikhaṇakhamassa kiṁci vi anāṇaō jaliyajalaṇamātīsu । hatthāipakkhivaṁtassa hōi dāhāi gurudukkhaṁ ।।7818 ।।
cakamaṇakhamassa u uccanīyaṭhāṇēsu caḍaṇapaḍaṇēhiṁ । karacaraṇabhaṁgasiraphuḍaṇamātiyaṁ hōti duhamasamaṁ ।। 7819 ।।
jara-khāsa-siṁbhasīsacchikanna - pōṭṭāisūlaviyaṇāhiṁ । atisāra arisakaṁḍūpittānilakhō mātīhi ॥7820।।
vuḍḍhattaṇēṇa kamasō rūvavilāsaṁ samaggaaṁgāṇa | sāmarthāmidiyāṇa ya sōyāīṇaṁ haraṁtēṇa ।।7821॥
nīsāsūsāsavasē sacēṭṭhiyaṁ kāyamāyaraṁtēṇa । jaṁ uppajjai dukkhaṁ narāṇa taṁ savvapaccakkhaṁ ।। 7822 ।।

sirimuni subvayajiṇidacariyaṁ

dēvabhavamma vihīṇē uppannāṇaṁ mahāduhaṁ hōi । paraāṇākaraṇēṇaṁ parididaṁsaṇaasaṇēṇa ॥।7823।।
jēvi mahiḍḍiyadēvā tē vi hu nāūṇa appaṇī cavaṇaṁ । vatthōvarāgalōyaṇanimēsa mātīhi āsannaṁ ।।7824।।
uvabhujjamā anyadēviḍḍhiviōgamannajammē u । suṇiyāē rāsahīē ahavā ḍuṁbīē gabbhammi ।।7825।।
upapatti jāṇaṁtassa kā vi sā jāyaē mahāaratī । hiyayammi jaṁ viyāṇai savvannū cēva na hu annō ।।7826 ।।
uvi gatī ēvaṁ suhassa lēsō vi natthi saṁsārē । annāṇajaṇiyamabhimāṇamēva mōttūṇa kēvalayaṁ ।। 7827 ।।
iccāi aṇaṁtarakahiyasayalabhavaduhavivajjiō mōkkhō । sō hōi kammakhayaō kammakhaō uṇa carittāō ।। 7828 ।।
cāritaṁ maṇuyattē taṁ diṭṭhatēhi cullagāīhiṁ । dasahiṁ kahiyaṁ jiṇēhiṁ dulahaṁ rayaṇaṁ va jalahigayaṁ ।। 7829 ॥
micchattayavivēyā jamhā jīvā nibaddhaghaṇakammā । kālamaṇataṁ pi bhavē puṇarāvattaṁ paribhamaṁtā ।। 7830 ।।
taṁ kiṁ pi na kammaṁ ajjinaṁti pāvaṁti jēṇa maṇuyattaṁ । ēēṇa kāraṇaṁ ēvaṁ aidullahaṁ hōti ।। 7831 ।।
tammi viddhē āriyakhēttaṁ jātī kulaṁ balaṁ rūvaṁ । ārōggamāu - buddhī - samaṇōggaha-savaṇasaddahaṇaṁ ॥ 7832 ||
ēkkēkamuttarōttarabhēyaṁ atidullahaṁ narataṁ va । laddhūṇa taṁ pi savvaṁ kēi vi jīvā pamāyaparā ।।7833 ।।
kāmatthamūḍhahiyayā muhāē hārēṁti aha taō bhaṭṭhā। puṇaravi anaṁtakālaṁ nirayāiduhaṁ aṇuhavaṁti ॥ 7834 ||
tā bhō kahaṁci laddhaṁ ēvaṁ maṇuyattaṇāisāmaggi । mā nēha muhā bhujjō puvvaṁ va aṇaṁtavārāō ।। 7835 ।।
jiṇabhaṇiyacarittārāhaṇēṇa taṁ kuṇaha saphalayaṁ iṇhi । sigdhaṁ pi jahā muccaha dussaha bhavaduha-pavaṁcāō।। 7836।।
iya sūriṇā paṇiē savittharē jaigihatthabhēēṇa । duvihammi vi parikahiē dhammē rāyāṇugayalōō ।। 7837 ।।
nayaranivāsī ya jō paḍibuddhōṁ kō vi girahaē dikkhaṁ । kō vihu gihr̥tthadhammaṁ paḍivajjai kō vi sammattaṁ ।। 7838।।
aha sirivammō rāyā pucchai sūri kayāvi mama bhayavaṁ ! । saṁpajjissai dikkhā āha gurū pacchimavayammi ।। 7839 ।।
bhai nivō maha vaṁchā inhi pi hu asthi dikkhagahaṇammi । kiṁtu paraṁ rajjakhamō na sahāō atthi mē kō vi ।। 7840 ।।
āha gurū ēttō cciya kālavilaṁbō maē tuhakkhāō । jamiyaradēvīṇa suyā hōhiti ajōggayā rajjē ।। 7841 ।।
jō ya vasaṁtasirīē paḍhamō puttō bhavēssaē jōggō । hōūṇa sō vi pōḍhō lōyaṁtarapaṭṭiō hōhī ।। 7842 ।।
tayaṇu vasaṁtasirīē puṇō bhavissai duijjaō puttō । nāmēṇa kittivammō taṁ niyarajjē tuma ṭhaviuṁ ॥ 7843।।
paḍivajjasi pavvajjaṁ tō pucchai muṇivaraṁ taō rāyā। ārāhagō bhavissaṁ gahiyavaō haṁ na vā aṁtē ? ।। 7844 ।।
diṇṇuvaōgō nāṇē savisēsaṁ bhāsaē taō sūrī । titthayaranāmagōyaṁ baṁdhēuṁ tumamiha bhavammi ।। 7845 ।।
āukakhayammi pāṇayakappē vimalappabhē vimāṇammi । uppajjihasi mahiḍḍhiyadēvōṁ dēviṁdasamavivō ||7846 ||
vīsaayarōvamāū tattō āukkhaēṇa caviūṇa । iha bhārahammi vāsē hō hisi vīsaimatitthayarō ।। 7847 ।।
muṇisuvvau ti nāma ēvaṁ sōūṇa paramaharisēṇa । pūrijjamāṇahiyaō jāō sirivammanaranāhō ||7848 ।।
siranihiya mauliyakarō sapaṇāmaṁ pabhaṇaē muṇippavaraṁ । taṁ natthi kiṁ pi sēyaṁ tumha pasāēṇa hōi na jaṁ ।। 7849 ।।
puvvaṁ pi āsi sirivammapatthivē tagguṇāṇurāēṇa bahumāṇō savvassa vi muṇivara vayaṇēṇa puṇa muṇiuṁ ॥ 7850 ।।
puraō titthayarattaṁ tassa bhavissaṁ taō visēsēṇa । samaṇagaṇāṇa vi bahumāṇaṭhāṇamasamaṁ imō jāō ।। 7851 ।।
aha sirivammō rāyā sūri namiūṇa saparivāraṁ pi । vaccai niyammi ṭhāṇē gaṁtuṁ vaṁdai puṇa pabhāē ।। 7852 ।।
sūrī va kavi diyahē namijjamāṇō nivāilōēṇa । ṭhāūṇa tattha viharai annattha ta saparivārō ।। 7853 ||
sirivammasya ratnō paccaṁtanivēhiṁ maṁḍalīēhi । sāmaṁtāihi ēya maṁgalīyakaraṇatthamāṇēuṁ ।। 7854 ।।
rahakariturayātīyaṁ vatthāharaṇāi viulamuvaṇīyaṁ । tēṇa vi tē jahājōggaṁ visajjiyā vihiyasammāṇā ।।7855 ।

sirivammakumāracariyaṁ
tēṇa nayavikkamēhiṁ pasāhiyaṁ suviulaṁ mahīvalayaṁ । uṭṭāviyā ya ṭhaviyā tattha aṇēgē mahīvaiṇō ।। 7856 ।।
daṁtēhi naridēhi dhūyāō tassa pariṇayaṇahēuṁ । jāyāiṁ paṁcamahilāsayāī suraramaṇisarisāī ।। 7857 ॥
gāmē vā nagarē vā purāṇacēiyaharāī sayalāī । tēṇuddhariyāī kāriyāī taha ahiṇavāī ca ।। 7858 ।।
rahajattāōṁ aṭṭhāhiyāōṁ kārēi sayaladēsammi | sāhammiyavacchallaṁ kuṇai muṇīṇaṁ ca viṇayāī ।। 7859 ।।
āṇaṁdaṇō vi sūrī narapuṁgavasāhuṇā samaṁ tattha । āgacchai bahuvāraṁ ' rāyāijaṇōvayārakaē ।। 7860 ।।
sirivammanivaikittī sayalajaē saṁkhakuṁdadaladhavalā । diyahē diyahē pasarai siyapakkhamayaṁkajuṇha vva ॥ 7861।।
ēvaṁ purisatthatiyaṁ nisēvamāṇassa tassa bahukālē । vaccatē jaha bhaṇiyaṁ muṇiṇā taha cēva saṁjāyaṁ ॥ 7862॥
puttaviyammi savvaṁ aha jāē kittivammakumarammi । gahiyakalē rajjakhamē sō ciṭṭhai dikkhagahaṇamaṇō ।। 7863 ।।
narapuṁgava u sāhū niyaguruṇā saha bahiṁ viharamāṇō । pāliya nimmalasīlō gaō samāhīē suralōyaṁ ।।7864।।
āṇaṁdaṇōvi sūrī ṭhaviuṁ naṁdaṇamuṇi niyapayammi । paḍivannauttimaṭṭhō aṁtagaḍō kēvalī siddhō ।। 7865 ।।
aha naṁdaṇē muṇidō bahusīsasamanniō viharamāṇō । caṁdaurīē pattō pubvajjāṇē samōsariō ।। 7866 ।
nāūṇa taṁ samāgayamāṇaṁdasunibbharō taō rāyā । rajjammi attaṇō kittivammamabhisiciuṁ taṇayaṁ ।। 7867 ।।
jaha narapuṁgavarāyā mahāvibhūtīē gaṁtumujjāṇē । sirivammanivō dikkhaṁ ginhai naṁdaṇagurusamīvē ॥ 7868।।
annē vi tayaṇurāēṇa maṁtiṇō maṁḍali ( lī ) ya sāmaṁtā । āsannasēvayātī giṇhaṁti vayaṁ samaṁ tēṇa ।। 7869 ।।
savvō vi rāyalōō caṁdaurinivāsināyarajaṇō ya। sirivammēṇa vimukkō mannaṛa sunnaṁ va appāṇaṁ ।। 7870 ।।
sēsē vi sayaladēsē gāmāgaranagarapaṭṭaṇamaḍaṁbē । jēṇa suyaṁ tassa vayaṁ tēṇa parunnaṁ garuyasaddaṁ ।। 7871 ।।
mannaṁtēṇa aṇāhaṁ appāṇaṁ kativayāī diyahāī । bhattaṁ pi na bhutaṁ āyarēṇa gurukhēyabhariēṇa ॥7872।।
dēvī vi vasaṁtasirī kaivayadēvīhiṁ aṇugayāhiṁ samaṁ । givhai vayaṁ samīvē pavittiṇīē viṇīyāē ॥7873।।
gahiūṇa duvihasikkha sō ahiṇavasāhusāhuṇīvaggō । niyaguruguruṇīpāsē jahōciyaṁ āgamaṁ paḍhai || 7874 ।।
sirikittavammarāyā sayaṁ tahā sēsajaṇuvarōhēṇa । vinnaviūṇaṁ sūri dhārai tatthēva māsadugaṁ ॥ 7875।।
rāyā jaṇaṇīhiṁ samaṁ sapariyaṇēṇaṁ ca nāyarajaṇēṇa । gaṁtūṇaṁ ujjāṇē namiuṁ sūri saparivāra || 7876।।
sirivammarāyarisiṇō ēgaṁtē āgamaṁ paḍhaṁtassa । gaṁtūṇa sannihāṇē niccaṁ uvavisai bhattīē || 7877 ।।
sirivammō puṇa sāhū paḍhamaṁ ciya tāṇa paṇivayaṁtāṇa । dāūṇa dhammalābhaṁ ēgaggamaṇō puṇō paḍha
dūrē ālāvakahā diṭṭhakkhēvaṁ pi tēsu na karēi । sō nimmamō mahappā ēgaṁtēṇaṁ bhavavirattō
aha māsadugē vattē sirivammamuṇi taō samaṁ guruṇā । bāhi vihariukāmaṁ rāyāijaṇō samaggō vi ।। 7880 ।।
aṇugacchiūṇa dūrē puṇa paccāgamaṇahēuvinnatti । kāūṇa paḍiniyattō muyamāṇō bāhajalapavahē ||78881 ॥
sirivammō vi mahappā mahāmuṇī khaṁtiviṇayasaṁpannō । guruṇā saha viharantō paḍhiuṁ ēkkārasaṁgāī ।। 7882 ।।
citēi pacchimavaē maē gihīyaṁ vayaṁ taō iṇhi । jāva'jja vi mama sattī kā vi sarīrē paripphurai ।। 7883 ||
tāva tavōkammammivēyāvaccē ya ujjamēmi ahaṁ । iya citiūṇa sūrī tēṇa tayaṭṭhammi vinnattō ॥ 7884 ।।
sō vi suē uvauttō nāūṇaṁ tassa thēvamēvāuṁ । taṁ bhaṇai jahā juttaṁ tuha saṁpai ērisaṁ kāuṁ ॥
jamhā thēvaṁ āuṁ sirivammō pucchara katipamāṇaṁ ? । sūrī sāhai saṁvaccharāī paṁcaiva tō tassa ॥
aha sirivammō sāhū vinnava guruṁ kathaṁjalī sīsē । bhayavaṁ mahāpasāyaṁ kāūṇa abhiggahaṁ majjha ॥ 7887 ||

dasamaduvālasamātī tava vihāṇammi mama puṇa jahicchā । bālagilāṇādīṇaṁ vēyāvaccaṁ ca kāyavvaṁ ॥ 7889 ।।
āha gurū niyaḍāgaya pāusakālaṁ imaṁ tumaṁ gaṁtuṁ । caṁdaurīē purīē kāuṁ kaivaya muṇisahāyaō ।। 7890 ।।
tō tattō āgaṁtuṁ nivvigdhaṁ niyasa mīhiyaṁ kuṇaha । jaṁ kittivammapabhitīhi patthaṇā atthi tē vihiyā ।।7891।।
annaha puṇa avihiyadaṁsaṇassa tuha parabhavammi patthāṇaṁ । nāūṇa tāṇa khēō maṇammi bhāvī aimahaṁtō ।। 7892 ।।
iya guruvayaṇaṁ sōuṁ sirivammamuṇī vicitaē ēvaṁ । kiṁ sayaṇēhiṁ mama kammanijjarāhāṇijaṇaēhiṁ ।। 7893 । ।
kiṁtu maē guruvayaṇaṁ na laṁghaṇijjaṁ tattha gaṁtavvaṁ । iya citiūṇa guruṇō vayaṇaṁ taṁ taha aṇuṭṭhēi ।।7894 ||
gaṁtuṁ caṁdaurīē ṭhāuṁ caumāsagaṁ nivāīṇa । uppāiūṇa paramaṁ saṁtōsaṁ tē aṇunnaviḍaṁ ॥।7895।।
dāuṁ micchā dukkaḍamāgaṁtaṇaṁ puṇō gurusamīvē । gahiūṇa puvvabhaṇiyaṁ abhiggahaṁ pāliuṁ sammaṁ ।। 7896 ।।
arahaṁtāī vacchallayāi ṭhāṇāī sēviūṇa taō । titthayaranāmagōyaṁ baṁdhēuṁ vihiyasaṁlēhō ।।7897 ।।
ālōyaṇaṁ ca dāuṁ mahavvayāiṁ ca uccarāvēuṁ । kāūṇa khamiyakhāmiyamaṇunāō tō niyagurūhiṁ ।। 7898 ।।
paḍivajjiḍaṁ asaṇaṁ silāyalē phāsuē giritaḍammi । sirinilayanayaraniyaḍē pāōvagamēṇa ṭhāūṇa ।। 7899 ।।
saṁciṭṭhai dō māsē suhajhāṇaparāyaṇō paikhaṇaṁ pi । savvāuyammi khīṇē samāhiṇā pāṇaē kappē ।। 7900।।
sirivammakumāradēvabhavō --
vimalapapahē vimāṇē jōyaṇalakkhāī taṁ aṇēgāī । vikkhabhāyā mēṇaṁ caurassaṁ savvarayaṇamayaṁ । 7901 ||
āgāsapaiṭṭhāṇaṁ dagarayakuṁdidudhavala mēssa । puḍhavīē bāhallaṁ tēvīsaṁ jōyaṇasayāī ॥ 7902 ।।
pāyārēṇaṁ kaṇayāmaēṇa taṁ savvaō vi parikhittaṁ । sō pāyārō uccattaṇammi jōyaṇasayā tinni ।। 7903 ।।
pāyārassa ya mūlē vikkhaṁbhō tassa jōyaṇāṇa sayaṁ । majjhē pannāsaṁ jōyaṇāī uppi tu paṇuvīsaṁ । । 7904 ।।
kavisī sagāī tattha ya nāṇāmaṇimayadasaddhavannāī । jōyaṇamāyā mēṇaṁ vikkhaṁbhēṇaṁ tu tassaddhaṁ ।।7905॥
uḍḍhaṁ uccattē puṇa dēsūṇaṁ jōyaṇaṁ havai tēsi । tassa vimāṇassa puṇō bāhāē ēgamēgāē ॥7906॥
maṇikaṇaganimmiyāiṁ sahassasaṁkhāī hōṁti dārāī । paṁcasayāyāmāhaṁ vikkhaṁbhēṇaṁ tayaddhāī ।।7907 ॥
tāvaiyaṁ ca pavēsē tē maṇimaya bhiyāgugā dārā । īhāmiyausabhaturaṁgamagaravālagavihaṁgāṇaṁ ।। 7908।।
kinnaranararuru-kuṁjara-vaṇalaya umalayasarabhacamarāṇaṁ । bhattīhi bahuvicittā khaṁbhuggayavairavēīyā ॥ 7909।।
vijjāharajamalagajuyalajaṁtajuttā pabhāsamāṇā ya । rūvagasa hastaka liyā accisahassēhiṁ sōhaṁtā ॥ 7910 ॥
nayaṇamaṇāṇaṁdayarā suhaphāsā sassirī ya rūvā ya । tēsiṁ dārāṇaṁ ēttha vanna taha bhaṇēyavvō ।। 7911॥
jaha rāyapasēṇaiē khaṁbhakavāḍidakīlaparihāṇa | ullōyabhittigōmāṇasīṇa taha kaṇagakūḍāṇa ।।7912 ।।
maṇirayaṇavālarūvagalīlaṭṭhiyasālahaṁjiyātīṇa | taha nāgadaṁtalaṁ biyaṁdhūvaghaḍī sikkayāīṇa ।।7913।।
paḍidāramubhayabhāgē caṁdaṇakalasāṇa ṭhāviyāṇaṁ ca । sōlasasōlasasaṁkhāṇa savvarayaṇāmayāṇaṁ ca ।। 7914 ।।
surahivara paripūriyāṇa āvārividdhakaṁṭhamālāṇa । kamalapaṭṭhāṇāṇaṁ pauppalakayapihāṇāṇa ।। 7915 ।।
taha jālakaḍagaghaṁṭātōraṇavaṇamālachattamātīṇa । vatthūṇa vittharēṇaṁ aimahayā vannaō bhaṇiō ||7916।।
tassa vimāṇassa cauddisi pi cattāri saṁti vaṇasaṁḍā । ēēsi āyāmō vimāṇaāyāmaō ahiō ।।7917।।
vikkhaṁbhē puṇa jōyaṇasayāī tē hōṁti paṁca paṁcēva । puvvēṇa asōgavaṇaṁ dāhiṇaō sattivannavaṇaṁ ।।7918 ।।
paccatthimēṇa caṁpagavaṇamuttaraō ya hōti cūyavaṇaṁ । tē vaṇasaṁḍā savvē pāgārēṇaṁ parikkhittā ।। 7919 ।।
kihā ki hōbhāsā iccāī hōti vannaō tēsi । vaṇasaṁḍāṇaṁ aṁtō bahusamaramaṇijjabhūbhāgā ॥ 7920 ।।

āyaṁsa talasamāṇā uvasōhaṁtā maṇīhiṁ ya taṇēhiṁ । nāṇāvihavanēhi uhi mahāsugaṁdhēhi ॥ 7921।।
tēsi maṇīṇa taṇāṇa ya puvvāvaradāhiṇuttaramuhēhi । anilēhi calaṁtāṇaṁ suisuhaō uṭṭhaē sahō ।।7922 ।।
kinnaramihuṇappāraddhanaṭṭavihijō ggagīyaravamahurō । tēsi vaṇasaṁḍāṇaṁ dēsē dēsē ya bahuyāō || 7923 ।।
vāvīō khuḍḍākhuḍḍiyāō pukkhariṇidīhiyāō ya । guṁjāliyāō sarapaṁtiyāō bilapaṁtiyāō ya ।।7924।।
acchāō sanhāō tavaṇijjatalāō rayayakūḍāō । vairāmayapāsāṇāō rayayamayavāluyāō ya ।।7925।।
suhaōyāruttārāō savvaō viviharayaṇabaddhāō । caukōṇāō sīyalanimmalasalilōhapunnāō ।।7926 ।।
āsavarasāō kāō vi khīrarasāō ya hōṁti kāō vi । ikkhurasāō kāō vi udagarasāō ya kāō vi ।।
uppalasōgaṁdhiyapuṁḍarīya mahapuṁḍarīyana lihiṁ । channāō muṇālē ha
muṇālēhi sayavattasahasvattēha ||7928||
chapparyārachō lilihijjamāṇatāmarasaparimalāō ya । cāuddisi pi tāsi vāvīṇaṁ hōṁti pattēyaṁ ॥।7929।।
cattāri tisōpāṇagapaḍirūvā, vannaō ya ētēsi । sakkavimāṇamarū tisōpāṇagapaḍirūvāṇa jaha nēō ।।7930 ।।
vāvīpamuhāsu tāsu jāva bilapaṁtiyāvasāṇāsu । tattha ya tattha ya dēsē dēsē ya tahiṁ tahiṁ cēva ॥।7931 ।।
uppāyapavvayātī aṇēgarūvā ya pavvayā hōṁti । tē suyahaṁsāsaṇamātiyāī vivihāsaṇāī ca ।।7932।।
savvarayaṇāmayāī acchāī jāva daṁsaṇijjāī । tēsu ya vaṇasaṁḍēsuṁ tahiṁ tahi tattha tatthēva ।।7933 ।।
āligharagāṇō bahuvihā ya ciṭṭhati maṇimayā gharagā । tēsu ya vivihāī āsaṇāī haṁsāsaṇātīṇi ।। 7934।।
tēsu ya vaṇasaṁḍēsuṁ tahiṁ tahi tattha tattha dēsēsu । bahavē maṁḍavagā jāimalliyā maṁḍavātīyā ।। 7935 ।।
tēsu ya maṁḍavasuṁ puḍhavisilāvaṭṭagā ya atibahuyā । ciṭṭhēti ghaṭṭamaṭṭhā haṁsāsaṇasaṁṭhiyātīyā ।। 7936।।
navaṇīyatūlakō malaphāsā rayaṇāmayā ya acchā ya । tēsu ya vēmāṇiyadēvadēvisaṁghā sayākālaṁ ।। 7937 ।।
nisiyaṁti saṁyaṁti ya āsayaṁti ciṭṭhati taha tuyaṭṭaṁti । kīlaṁti ramaṁti hasaṁti icchiyaṁ uvalabhaṁti tahā ।। 7938 ।।
tēsiṁ vaṇasaṁḍāṇaṁ cauha bahumajjhadēsabhāyammi । pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ pāsāyavaḍēṁsayā ramē ।।7939 ।।
uccattēṇaṁ. jōyaṇasayāī navanavatayaddhavitthinnā । savvarayaṇāmayāvannaō ya tēsi bhaṇēyavvō ।।7940 ॥
tēsu ya pāsā suṁ niyaniyaparivārasaṁjyā caurō । vaṇasaṁḍasarisanāmā vasaṁti dēvā mahiḍhīyā ।। 7941 ।।
tassa vimāṇasaṁtō bahusamaramaṇijjamatthi bhūbhāyaṁ । vaṇasaṁḍaviṇō ēttha vannāō sēsaō nēō ।। 7942 ।।
tassa bahumajjhasē ōvāriyalayaṇamatthi ēgayaraṁ । ēvaṁ jōyaṇalakkhaṁ vikkhaṁbhāyāmaō taṁ ca ।।7943।।
paumasaravēiyāē ēgāē savva parikkhittaṁ । gāuyadugauccāē paṇadhaṇusayavitthaḍāē ya ।।7944।।
paiṭhāṇakhaṁbhapaṭṭīphalagāisamatthamēttha nimmaviyaṁ । vairēhiṁ vivihi ya vēruliyātīhi rayaṇēhiṁ ॥। 7945 ।।
ēsā ya ēgamēgēṇa hēmajālēṇa kaṇayajālēṇa । ēvaṁ ghaṁṭāmuttāgavakkhakhikhiṇimaṇīṇaṁ ca ।। 7946॥
jālēṇēgēṇaṁ ca paumajālēṇa rayaṇajālēṇa । savvattō parikhittā tē vi ya dāmā samaggā vi ।। 7947 ।।
tavaṇijjāmaya laṁbūsagā ya ēmāivannaṇijjāō । paumavaravēiyāē tahi tahi tattha tatthēva ।। 7948 ।।
hayasaṁghāḍā bahavē bhaṇiyavvā jāva usabhasaṁghāḍā । sabhvarayaṇāmayā tē acchā taha jāva paḍikhvā ।। 7949 ।।
dēsūṇajōyaṇadugaṁ vitthiṣṇēṇaṁ samaṁtaō ēsā । vaṇasaṁḍēgēṇaṁ parikhittā vannaṇijjēṇa ।।7950 ।।
tassōvāriyalayaṇassa caudisi vannaēṇa saṁjuttā । cattāri tissōmāṇagapaḍivā hōṁti nāyaśvā ।। 7951 ।।
laya missa bahumajjhadēsabhāyammi atthi rayaṇamaō । ēgō pāsāyavaḍēṁsagō mahātuṅgasiharaggō ।।7952 ।।
nava cēva jōyaṇasayā uccattēṇaṁ tayaddhavitthiṣṇō । anēhi cauhi ēsō pāsāyavaḍiṁgavarēhiṁ ।।7953 ।।

cāuddisi pi parisaṁṭhiēhi uccattavittharēhiṁ tu । mūlappāsāyāō addhapamāṇēhi parikhittī ।।7954 ।।
ēē ciya pāsāyā pattēhiṁ cauhiṁ cauhiṁ annēhiṁ । pāsa ēhi tayaddhappamāṇajuttēhi parikhittā ।। 7955 ।।
ēvaṁ sōlasa ēē pattēyaṁ cauhiṁ cauhiṁ annēhiṁ । pāsāyavaḍēṁsēhiṁ tayaddhamāṇēhiṁ parikhittā ।।7956 ।।
ēvaṁ causaṭṭhi imē pāsāyā uṛhaḍamussaō ēsi । bārasahiyaṁ sayaṁ jōyaṇāṇa gāuyadugabbhahiyaṁ ।। 7957 ।।
chappannajōyaṇāī vikkhaṁbhō ēgagāuyanbhahiō । ēvaṁ miliyā savvē paṇasītī hōṁti pāsāyā । । 7958 ।।
pāsāsu imēsuṁ sabvēsu vi vannaō bhaṇēyavvō । ullōyā taha sīhāsaṇāī parivārasahiyāī ।। 7959 ।।
pāsāyāṇaṁ savvēsimuvari aṭṭhaṭṭha hōṁti maṁgalagā । chattāicchattajhayāivannaō tēsu nāyavvō ।।7960 ।।
mūlappāsāyassa u uttarapōratthimē disībhāē । ciṭṭhai sahā suhammā nāmaṁ jōyaṇasayāyāmā ।। 7961 ।।
vikkhaṁbhammi sayaddhaṁ bāvantari jōyaṇāī ussēhē । khaṁbhasaēhi agēhiṁ sannividvē hiṁ sōhaṁtī ।।7962 ।।
vairavaravēiyātōraṇāivarasālahaṁ jiyātīō । vinēyō iha savvō vi vannaō jāva paḍirūvā ।।7963 ।।
puvyuttaradāhiṇaō tīsē dārāī tinni nēyāī । uccattē sōlasa jōyaṇāī vikkhaṁbhaō aṭṭha ।।7964 ।।
tāvaiyaṁ ca pavēsē sēyāī kamala bhiyāgāī | ēmāī bhaṇiyavvaṁ vaṇamālāvannaō jāva ।।7965।।
ētēsiṁ dārāṇaṁ uvarimabhāgammi hōṁti nāyavvā । aṭṭhaṭṭha ya maṁgalagā jhayā ya chattāi chattā ya ।।7966।।
tēsiṁ dārāṇa purō nēō muhamaṁḍavō ya ēgēgō । jōyaṇasayamāyāmē vikkhaṁbhē jōyaṇasayaddhaṁ ।।7967।।
sōlasa ya jōyaṇāiṁ uccattē hōṁti sāirēgāī । tēsi suhammasahāē jaha nēō vannaō savvō || 7968।।
puvvuttaradāhiṇaō tēsi muhamaṁḍavāṇa dārāī । vikkhaṁbhāyāmapavēsamāṇa mēsi pi taṁ cēva ।। 7969 ।।
pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ tēsi muhamaṁḍavāṇa puraō u । pēcchāgharamaṁḍavayā muhamaṁḍavasarisavattavvā ।। 7970 ।।
pēcchādharāṇa tēsi majjhē akkhāḍagō ya ēkkēkkō । savvavairāmayā tē tēsi bahumajjhabhāyammi ।। 7971 ।।
maṇipēḍhī ēkkēkkā vikkhaṁbhāyāmaō ya ēyāō । aṭṭaṭṭhajōyaṇāī cattāri u hōṁti uccattē ||7972 ।।
tāsi maṇipēḍhīṇa uvari sīhāsaṇāī pattēyaṁ । tēsi ca saparivārāṇa vannaō ēttha bhaṇiyavvō ।।7973 ॥
tēsi pēcchāgharamaṁḍavāṇa puraō ya hōṁti pattēyaṁ । maṇipēḍhiyāō jōyaṇa sōlasa āyāmavikkhaṁbhē ।।7974 ।।
uccattē aṭṭha ya jōyaṇāī tāsi ca uvari pattēyaṁ । ēkkēkkō thūbhō jōyaṇāī sōlasa ya āyāmē ।।7975 ।।
taha vikkhaṁbhē uccattaṇē u tāī pisāirēgāī । savvarayaṇāmayā tē thūbhā kuṁdidusamavannā ॥7976॥
acchā jā paḍirūvā tēsiṁ thūbhāṇa uvaribhāyammi । aṭṭhaṭṭha ya maṁgalagā jhayā ya chattāi chattā ya ।।7977।।
tēsiṁ thūbhāṇaṁ caudisi pi maṇipēḍhiyāō pattēyaṁ । aṭṭhē va jōyaṇāī vikkhaṁbhāyāmaō hōṁti ।।7978।।
tāṇuvari pēḍhiyāṇa jiṇapaḍimāō havaṁti cattāri । saṁpaliyaṁka nisannāō jiṇavarussēhamāṇāō ।।7979 ।।
thūbhāṇa abhimuhīō imēhiṁ nāmēhiṁ hōṁti nēyāō। usabhāya ( i ? ) vaḍhḍamāṇā caṁdāṇaṇavārisēṇā ya । । 7980 ।
thūbhāṇa tēsi puraō maṇipēḍhīō havaṁti pattēyaṁ । sōlasa ya jōyaṇāī vikkhaṁbhē taha ya āyāmē ।। 7981 ।।
aṭṭa ēva jōyaṇāī uccattēṇaṁ tu hōṁti nēyāō । tāsi ca pēḍhiyāṇaṁ cēiyarukkhā havaṁtuvari ।।7982 ॥
uccattēṇaṭṭha u jōyaṇāī dō gāuyāī ubvēhō । dō jōyaṇāī khaṁdhō vikkhaṁbhō jōyaṇassaddhaṁ ।। 7983 ।।
chajjōyaṇāḍaṁ viḍimā tassa ya bahumajjhadēsa bhāgammi । aṭṭhē va jōyaṇāī vikkhaṁbhāyāmaō hōṁti । । 7984 ।।
savvamēṇaṁ puṇa jōyaṇāī aṭṭava sāirēgāī । tēsi cēyarukkhāṇaṁ ( ca ? ) vannaō ēsa vinēō ।। 7985 ।।
vairāmayā ya mulā kaṁdāriṭṭhāmayā ya ativiulā । vēruliyamayā khaṁdhā viḍimā puṇa hōṁti rayayamayā ।। 7986 ।।

sirivammakumāradēvabhavō
paḍhamāō visālāō sālāō jāyarūvamaiyāō । nāṇārayaṇamayāō sāhapasāhāu vivihāō ।।7987।।
vēruliyamayā pattā tavaṇijjamayāī pattabēṁṭāī । jaṁbūṇaya miupallavasukumālapavālakayasōhā ।। 7988 ।।
pavaraṁkuraggasiharā vicittamaṇirayaṇasurahikusumabharā । kusumabharanamiyasālā ahiyaṁ maṇanayaṇasuhajaṇayā ।। 89 ।।
amayarasasamarasaphalā sacchāyā sappabhā suhasirīyā । ujjōyaṁtā pāsāiyā ya tē jāva paḍirūvā ॥ । 7990 ।।
tēsi cēiyarukkhāṇamuvari ciṭṭhati sōtthiyāīyā । adr̥ṭṭha ya maṁgalagā jhayā ya chaṁtāichattā ya ।। 7991 ।।
tēsi puraō cēiyarukkhāṇaṁ maṇimayāō pēḍhīō । aṭṭhaṭṭhajōyaṇāī vikkhaṁbhāyāmaō hōṁti ।।7992 ।।
uccattēṇaṁ caujōyaṇāī acchāu daṁsaṇijjāō । pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ tāsi uvari mahiṁdajhaō ।। 7993 ।।
saṭṭhi ca jōyaṇāī udaḍaṁ uccattaṇammi nāyavvō । uvvēhē vikkhaṁbhē ēgēgaṁ jōyaṇaṁ hōti ॥।7994।।
varāmayā ya laṭṭhīvaṭṭāsu siliṭṭhamaṭṭapaḍighaṭṭā । varapaṁcavannakuḍabhīsahassaparimaṁḍiyabhirāmā ॥।7995 ।।
chattāichattakaliyā vāuyavijaya vē jayaṁtīyā । gayaṇatalamaṇulihaṁtī pāsātīyā ya abhirūvā ।। 7996 ।।
aṭṭamaṁgala juyā sajhayā chattāichattajuttā ya । tēsi mahiṁdajhayāṇaṁ puraō pattēya pattēyaṁ ।। 7997 ।।
naṁdā pukkharaṇīō ēṁgaṁ jōyaṇasayaṁ tu āyāmē । vikkhaṁbhē pannāsaṁ ubvēhē jōyaṇā dasa u ।। 7998।।
udagarasēṇaṁ amaōvamēṇa punnāō tāō pattēyaṁ । paumavaravēiyāē vaṇasaṁḍēṇa ya parigayāō ।। 7999॥
tāsiṁ pukkharaṇīṇaṁ naṁdāṇaṁ tidisitōraṇāijuyā । ciṭṭhati tisōmāṇagapaḍirūvā vannaṇijjāō ||8000 ||
majjhammi suhammāē sabhāē maṇipēḍhiyāsamā ruirā । sōlasa ya jōyaṇāī vikkhaṁbhāyāmaō hōti ॥। 8001 ।।
uccattē aṭṭha ya jōyaṇāī tīsē ya uvaribhāyammi । cēiyakhaṁbhō māṇavaganāmaō savvarayaṇamaō ॥ 8002 ॥
uccattaṁ sadvi jōyaṇāī ēgaṁ tu jōyaṇaṁ tassa । āyāmō vikkhaṁbhō aḍayālīsaṁ ca aṁsīō ||8003 ||
aḍayālīsaṁ kōḍīō taha ya aḍayāla hōṁti viggahiē । sēsaṁ jahā mahidajjhayassa taha nēyamēyassa || 8004 ||
bārasa bārasa uvari hēṭṭhā ya vimōtta jōyaṇāī taō । majjhē chattīsa i jōyaṇēsu ciṭṭhati bahuphalagā || 8005 ।।
rūppasuvannamayā tēsu nāgadaṁtā ya santi vairamayā । tēsuṁ ca laṁbamāṇā rayayamayā sikkagā bahavē ||8006 ||
tēsuṁ ca sikkaēsuṁ vairāmayavaṭṭagōlagasamuggā । tēsuya nikkhittāō ciṭṭhati jiṇāṇa sakahāō || 8007।।
tāō vimalappabhavaravimāṇasaṁvāsi dēvanivahāṇa | subahūṇa accaṇijjāō vaṁdaṇijjāō sayakālaṁ ॥। 8008 ||
tassa ya cēiyakhaṁbhassa uvari aṭṭhaṭṭha hōṁti maṁgalagā । jhayachattāīchattā puratthimēṇaṁ tu khaṁbhassa || 8009।।
tassa maṇipēḍhiyājōyaṇāī aṭṭhē va hōi āyāmō । tāvaiyaṁ vikkhaṁbhē uccattē jōyaṇā caurō ॥8010 ॥
tīsē uvari sīhāsaṇaṁ ca parivāravaṇṇayasamēyaṁ । khaṁbhassa pacchimēṇaṁ maṇipēḍhī puvvaparimāṇā ।।8011 ।।
tīsē ya uvari ēgaṁ savittharaṁ asthi dēvasayaṇijjaṁ । tassa ya nāṇāmaṇimayapaḍipāyā hōṁti nāyavvā ।।8012 ।।
sōvanniyāya pāyā nāṇāmaṇighaḍiyapāyasī sāī । jaṁbūṇayāmayāī gattāī hōṁti nēyāī ||8013।।
nāṇāmaṇimayaviccā rayayamatī tūliyā muṇēyavvā । tavaṇijjamayā gaṁḍōvahāṇiyā tattha vinēyā ॥ 8014।।
taha bibbōyaṇamihalō hiyakkharayaṇēṇa hōti nimmaviyaṁ । taṁ sayaṇijjaṁ ubhaō samunnayaṁ avaṇayaṁ majjhē ।। 8015 ।।
sāligaṇavaṭṭīyaṁ surasaripuliṇāvadālasālisayaṁ । ōyaviyakhōmadōgullapaṭṭanimmiyapaḍicchayaṇaṁ ।। 8016 ।।
suiraiyarayattāṇaṁ rattaṁsuyasaṁvayaṁ surammaṁ ca syanavaṇīyāīṇagakō malayaraliphāsaṁ ca ॥8017 ।।
tassuttarapōratthimadisīē maṇipēḍhiyā maṇabhirāmā । vikkhaṁbhāyāmē aḍajōyaṇauccattaṇē caurō ।।8018 ।।
tīsē ya uvari saṭṭhi jōyaṇa uccattaṇami unhē । vikkhabhammiya jōyēṇamēgaṁ khuḍḍō mahiṁdajhaō ||8019 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-249-to-249.json ==========================
sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
249
vairāmayā ya laṭṭhī susiliṭṭhā vaṭṭasaṁṭhiyā laṭṭhā। aṭṭhaṭṭha maṁgalā uvari sajhayachattāichattā ya ।।8020।।
tassa ya khuḍḍama hiṁdajjhayassa paccatthimēṇa cōppālō । nāmaṁ paharaṇakōsō vimāṇavaiṇō suridassa ।। 8021 ।।
savvavairāmaō sō acchattappabhiivannayasamēō । tattha ya nikkhittāiṁ paharaṇarayaṇāī ciṭṭhati ॥8022 ।।
phaliharayaṇāiyāī khaggagayādhaṇuhapabhiiyāī ca। subahūṇi ujjalāī sutikkhadhārāiṁ nisiyāī ||8023 ||
uvari ca suhammāē sahāē aṭṭhaṭṭha saṁti maṁgalagā। taha chāttāicchattā tīsē uttarapuratthimaō ।। 8024 ।।
ēvaṁ siddhāyayaṇaṁ āyāmē jōyaṇāṇa saya ēgaṁ । vikkhaṁbhē ya tayaddhaṁ bāvantari jōyaṇā uccaṁ ।।8025 ।।
sōhammasahāsarisō savvō ih vannaō muṇēyavvō । tassa bahumajjhabhāē ēgā maṇipēḍhiyā rammā ||8026।।
sōlasajōyamāṇā uvaritalē dēvachaṁdaō tīsē । sōlasa ya jōyaṇāī vikkhabhāyāmaō hōti ||8027 ।।
uḍḍhaṁ uccattēṇaṁ havaṁti tāī pisāirēgāī । savvarayaṇāmaō acchaō ya sō jāva paḍivō ||8028 ।।
tattha jiṇussēhapamāṇamatthi jiṇanāhapaḍimaaṭṭhasayaṁ । tāsi jiṇapaḍimāṇaṁ vinēō bannaō ēvaṁ ||8029 ।।
tavaṇijjanimmiyāiṁ karacaraṇatalāī aṁkamayanakkhā । tē nakkhā aṁtōlō hiyakkhapaḍisēgajuttā ya ॥8030 ।।
jaṁghā - jāṇū-ūrū- sarīra laṭṭhī ya kaṇayamayamēyaṁ । tavaṇijjamatī nāhī riṭṭhamatī rōmarātī ya ।।8031।।
tavaṇijjamayā cuccaya sirivacchā silupavālamaya uṭṭhā। phalimayāō ( uṇa ? ) daṁtā tavaṇijjaya tāṇujīhā ya
varakaṇayamatī nāsā sā aṁtō lōhiyakkhapaḍisēgā । aṁkamayaṁ acchijuyaṁ aṁtō puvvuttapaḍisēgī ||8033||
riṭṭhamaīō tārāō hōṁti pulagāmatīu diṭṭhīō । riṭṭhāmatīu taha acchipattabhamuhāō nēyāō ।। 8034 ||
kaṇagāmayā ya savaṇā kaṇagamatīō niḍālavaṭṭīō । vairamaī sīsaghaḍī taha tavaṇijjāmatī nēyā ।।8035 ।।
kēsaṁtakēsabhūmī riṭṭhamayā uvari muddhayā nēyā । pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ tāhi jiṇanāhapaḍimāṇaṁ ||8036 ।।
ciṭṭhati piṭṭabhāē uḍāō chattahārapaḍimāō । dhāraṁtīō dhavalāī āyavattāī vimalāī ।।8037।।
taha ubhaō pāsēsuṁ pattēyaṁ camaradhārapaḍimāō । ciṭṭhati dharatīō nāṇāmaṇiḍaṁḍasiyacamarē ।।8038।।
puraō tahēva dō dō paḍimāō nāgabhūyajakkhāṇaṁ । taha kuṁḍadhārapaḍimāō maṇimaīō ya acchāō ।। 8039 ।।
tāsi jirpaḍimāṇaṁ puraō bhiṁgārakalasa ghaṁṭāṇaṁ । thālīṇaṁ pātīṇaṁ āyaṁsāṇaṁ ca aṭṭhasayaṁ ॥। 8040 ।।
pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ rayaṇakaraṁḍāṇa vāyakaragāṇa । hayakaṁṭhāṇaṁ gayakaṁṭhāṇaṁ jāvasa bhakaṁṭhāṇaṁ ।। 8041 ॥
taha pupphalōmahatthagacaṁgērīṇaṁ ca puppha-paḍalāṇa । jālō mahatthapaḍalāṇa hōti pattēyamaṭṭhayaṁ ॥ 8042।।
taha tēlasamuggāṇaṁ jāva ya aṁjaṇasamuggagāṇaṁ ca । taha dhūvakaḍacchūṇaṁ pattēyaṁ hōti aṭṭhasayaṁ || 8043।।
tassa ya siddhāyayaṇassa uvari aṭṭhaṭṭha hōṁti maṁgalagā । chattāicchattā viya jhayā ya rayaṇāmayā ruirā ।। 8044 ।।
uvavāyasahā siddhāyayaṇassuttarapuratthimē asthi । sōhammāē sahāē gamēṇa iha vannaō nēō ।।8045।।
jāvaṭṭajōyaṇāī maṇipēḍhī tantha dēvasaya ṇijjaṁ । taha tassa vannaō aṭṭha aṭṭhamaṁgalajhayātī ya ।।8046।।
tīsē uvavāyasahāē asthi uttarapuratthimē bhāē । haraō ēvaṁ jōyaṇasayamāyāmēṇa vitthinnō || 8047 ।।
pannāsajōyaṇāī ucvēhēṇaṁ tu jōyaṇā dasa u । harayassa tassa uttarapuratthi mē atthi disibhāē ॥। 8048 ।।
mahatī ahisēyasahā jahā suhammā sahā tahā nēyā । maṇipēḍhī sīhāsaṇamihadāmā jāva ciṭṭhati ।। 8049 ।।
tattha ya vimāṇapaṇō ahisēōvagaraṇaṁ bahu atthi । aṭṭhaṭṭhamaṁgalāī jhaō ya chattāichattā ya ||8050।।
tasē ahisēyasahā asthi uttarapuratthimē bhāē । viulālaṁkārasahā jahā suhammā tahā nēyā ।।8051 ।।
maṇipēḍhī aṭṭha ya jōyaṇāī sīhāsaṇaṁ saparivāraṁ । tattha ya vimāṇapahuṇō ciṭṭhati bahū alaṁkārā ||8052 ।।

sirivammakumāradēvabhavō
tīsē'laṁkārasahāē atthi uttarapuratthi mē bhāē । vavasāyasahā mahatī uvavāyasahāsa masaruvā || 8053।।
ēttha ya pōtthayarayaṇaṁ vinnēō tassa vannaō ēvaṁ । rayaṇāmayapattāī riṭṭhāmayakaṁṭhiyāō ya ।। 8054 ।।
tavaṇijjamaō dōrō nāṇāmaṇinimmiō havai gaṁṭhī । vēruliyamaya livāsaṇa riṭṭhamayaṁ chaṁdaṇaṁ hōti ।। 8055 ।।
tavaṇijjamatī taha saṁkalā ya riṭṭhāmatī masī tattha । vairāmayalēhaṇi akkharāī riṭṭhāmayāī tu ॥ 8056 ।।
satyaṁ ca dhammiyaṁ iha vavasāyasahāē tīē disibhāē । uttarapōratthimaē naṁdā nāmatthi pukkhariṇī ।।8057।।
harayasamāṇasarūvā tīsē uttarapuratthi mē bhāē । atthi mahaṁtaṁ ēvaṁ balipīḍhaṁ savvarayaṇamayaṁ ॥। 8058 ।।
tammi vimāṇē paḍhamaṁ uvavāyasahāē jammaṭhāṇammi । dēvattēṇuvavannō sirivammamahānariṁdarisī ।। 8059 ।।
pajjattō savvāhiṁ vi pajjatīhi muhuttamajjhammi । taruṇapurisō vva jāō sapamāṇasamanniyasarīrē ॥ 8060 ।।
tasya dēhapamāṇaṁ rayaṇīō tinni dōhi jattāō । ēkkārasabhāēhi vīsaha airōvamā āuṁ ।।8061।।
aha sō citai ēvaṁ puvvi pacchā va ki maē kiccaṁ । kiṁ va kayaṁ mē sēyaṁ purā bhavissai hiyaṭṭhāē ||8062 ।।
ēyaṁ sirivammasurassa citiyaṁ jāṇiūṇa tammi khaṇē । sāmāṇiyatiyasagaṇā tassa samīvammi saṁpattā 18063 |
mauliyakamalāyāraṁ ārōvēraṁ sirammi karajuyalaṁ । jayavijaēṇaṁ vaddhāviūṇa ēvaṁ vayaṁti taō ।। 8064।।
dēvāpiyā ! vimalappabhē vimāṇammi ēttha asthi varaṁ । siddhāyayaṇaṁ ēvaṁ parimāṇaṁ tattha aṭṭhasayaṁ ॥। 8065 ॥
jiṇasaṁtiyāṇa ciṭṭai jiṇadēhussēhasamapamāṇāṇaṁ । taha ya suhammasahāē māṇavara cēiyakkhaṁbhē ||8066।।
vairāmaēsa gōlaya vaṭṭasa muggēsu sannikhittāō । ciṭṭhati subahayāō jiṇidacaṁdāṇa sakahāō ||8067।।
tāō dēvāṇupiyā ! tumhāṇa tahā vimāṇavāsīṇaṁ । anēsi pi bahūṇaṁ tiyasāṇaṁ pūya ṇijjāō ।। 8068।।
tō dēvāṇupiyāṇaṁ ēvaṁ ciya paḍhamamēva karaṇijjaṁ । puvvi pacchā vi ya ēyamēva sēyaṁ hiyadvā ।। 8069।।
aha sō sirivammasurō tēsi sāmāṇiyāṇa vayaṇamiṇaṁ । sōccā pahiṭṭhahiyaō sayaṇijjāō samuṭṭhēi ।। 8070 ।।
tō uvavāyasahāē dārēṇa puratthimēṇa nīhariuṁ । harayammi puratthimatōraṇēṇa pavisēḍa līlāē ||8071 ।।
aha puṇvatisōmāṇagapaḍivagaṇa tattha ōyarai । jalamavagāhēūṇaṁ karēi jalamajjaṇaṁ tattō ||8072 ||
jalakiḍḍuṁ ca karēttā jalāhisēyaṁ karēḍa āyaṁtō । cōkkhō tō suiō harayāō bahi samuttarai ॥। 8073।।
tattō ahisēyasabhaṁ uvagaccha taṁ payāhiṇēmāṇō । puvēṇaṁ dārēṇaṁ aṇupavisēūṇa tō tattha ||8074 ।।
puvvābhimuhōsīhāsaṇammi maṇinimmiyammi uvavisai । harisabharaninbharēhiṁ dēvasamūhēhiṁ pariyariō ।। 8075 ।।
tō sāmāṇiyadēvā sāvittābhiōgiē dēvē । ēvaṁ vayaṁti bhō bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! duyaṁ tubhē ।।8076।।
sirivammasurassa uvaṭṭavēha iṁdāhisēyamaiviulaṁ । sumahagdhaṁ sumahatthaṁ aha tē abhiōgiyā dēvā ||8077 ||
sāmāṇiyadēvēhi ēvaṁ vr̥ttā pamōyapahr̥cchā । tavvayaṇaṁ viṇaēṇaṁ siranihiyakarā paḍiṇittā ||8078 ।।
uttarapuratthimaṁ disimavakkamittā taō samugdhāyaṁ । vēubviyaṁ karitā suvannakalasāṇa aṭṭhasayaṁ ॥। 8079।।
ēvaṁ rūppamayāṇaṁ asayaṁ jāva bhōmakalasāṇaṁ । ēvaṁ bhigārāṇaṁ āyaṁsāṇaṁ ca thālāṇaṁ ॥। 8080 ।।
pāī suiṭṭhāṇa taha ya cittāṇa maṇikaraṁḍāṇa । taha pupphalōmahatthagacaṁgērīpaḍalagāṇaṁ ca ॥ 8081 ॥
chattāṇaṁ cāmarāṇaṁ tēllasamuggāṇa ēvamannēsi | aṁjaṇasamuggagāṇaṁ jā dhūvakaḍacchuyāṇaṁ ca ॥ 8082 ॥
pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ ahiṁ ahiyaṁ sayaṁ viuvvaṁti । tō sāhāviyavēḍavviē ya kalasāiē gahiuṁ 18083 ॥
tē ābhiōgiyasurā gaṁtuṁ khīrōyahimmi giṇhati । salilaṁ sayavattasahasvattanīluppala tīṇi ॥8084 ॥
ēvaṁ ca pukkharōē savvēsu dahēsu savvatitthēsu । savvamahāsariyāsu ya aṁtarasariyāsu savvāsu || 8085 ।।

rattārattavaīsu ya gaṁgāsiṁdhūsu ginhiuṁ salilaṁ । uppalasyavattasahasvattamātīṇi givhaṁti ||8086 | |
vāsaharanagavarēsuṁ vakkhāragirīsu nāgadaṁtēsu । maṁdaragirīsu vēyaḍḍhanagēsu ya dōhavaṭṭēsu ||8087||
tah bhaddasālapabhiisu savvēsu vaṇēsu savvapupphāī | savvāī vi mallāī savvē gaṁdhē ya tuyarē ya ॥8088।।
savvē siddhatyē vi ya savvāō ōsahōō givhaṁti । bharahēravaēsu ya cakkavaṭṭivijaēsu sarvvasu ॥ 8089 ।।
māgahavaradāmappamuhasavvatitthāṇa maṭṭiyaṁ taha ya । gaṁgāisa maggamahānaīṇa ubhaōtasamutthaṁ ॥ 8090।।

aha maharihaṁ mahatthaṁ viulaṁ iṁdāhisēyamēyassa । tē abhiōgiyadēvā uvaṭṭhavaiti ya pahiṭṭamaṇā ।।8093 ।।

kamalapaiṭṭāṇēhiṁ caṁdaṇarasaraiyacārucaccēhi । paumapihiyāṇaṇēhiṁ āviddhaguṇēhiṁ kaṁṭhēsu ।।8096 ।।
sukumālakarayala pariggahiēhi aṭṭhasamahiyasaēṇa । sōvanniyakalasēhi iya jā bhōmējjakalasēhi ॥ 8097 ।।

jā savvāsahisiddhattha hi savvāē surasamiddhīē । ahisicaṁti pahiṭṭhā mahayā iṁdāhisēēṇa

vimalapapahē vimāṇē rayarēṇuviṇāsaṇaṁ viralaphusiyaṁ । vāsaṁti kēi dēvā surahiṁ gaṁdhōdayaṁ vāsaṁ 8101 ।।
iccāi jahā jiṇajammamajjaṇē kaṇaya sēlasiharammi । cauvihadēvanikāyā paharisacēṭṭhē aṇuṭṭhēti ।।8102 ।।
taha sirivammasurasa vikīrantē majjaṇē harisacēṭṭaṁ । kuvvaṁti u vimalappabhavimāṇavatthavvayā dēvā ॥ 8103 ।।
nivvattiēhisē sāmāṇiyapa muhasavvasuranivahā । niyasīsa nihiyahatthā viṇaēṇa taō vayaṁti imaṁ ॥। 8104 ।।
jaya jaya naṁdā jaya jaya bhaddā bhaddaṁ sayā vi tē bhavau । ajiyaṁ jiṇāhi pālēhi taha jiyaṁ vasasu jiyamajjhē । । 8105 ।।
iṁdō viva dēvāṇaṁ caṁdō viva tārayāṇa asurāṇaṁ । camarō iva dharaṇa iva nāgāṇa narāṇa bharahō vva ।। 8106 ।।
bahusāgarōvamāī sāmāṇiyadēvaca sahassāṇaṁ । jāvāyarakkha dēvāṇa sōlasanhaṁ sahassāṇaṁ ॥ 8107 ।।
annēsi ca bahūṇaṁ vimalapahavimāṇavāsidēvāṇaṁ । āhēvaccaṁ jāva ya pālēmāṇō ya viharāhi ||8108||
ēvaṁ pauttajayajayasō sāmāṇiyāidēvēhi । sō sirivammasuravarō ahisēyasahāē purimēṇa ।। 8109 ।।
dārēṇa nīharittā tattō ṇu payāhiṇīkarēmāṇō । visai alaṁkārasabhaṁ purathimillēṇa dārēṇa ॥ 8110 ॥
gaṁtūṇa taō puraō maṇimayasīhāsaṇammi uvavisai । tattha nisannassa taō nēuṁ sāmāṇiyā dēvā । । 8111
ālaṁkāriyabhaṁḍa savvaṁ pi uvaṭuvēṁti tassa purō । aha sō sirivammasurō pamhalasukumārasurahīē ॥।8112 ।।
gaṁvakasāīra niyaṁ lūhēūgaṁ samamgamavi agaṁ । gōsīsaṁ caṁdaṇēṇaṁ sarasēṇāṇulipaē tattō ||8113॥
arraciyaṁ bhāyaṁ dhavalaṁ āgāsaphalihavimalapabhaṁ । hayalīlāē airēgapēlavaṁ nayaṇamaṇaharaṇaṁ ।।8114 ।।
taṇusuhayamauyaphāsaṁ niyaṁsaē dēvadūsavarajuyalaṁ । hāraddhahāramēgāvaliṁ ca tattō piṇidhēi ॥। 8115 ।।
muttāvali ca rayaṇāvali ca taha aṁgayāī kēūra । kaḍayāī tuḍiyāī kaḍisuttaṁ muddiyāō ya ।।8116 ।।

gaṭhimavēḍhimapūrimasaṁghāimaēhiṁ kapparukkha ca । appāṇamalaṁkiyabhūsiyaṁ karēūṇa tattō ya ।। 8118 ।।
daddamalayasugaṁdhiyagaṁdhēhiṁ bhukuṁḍaē samaggataṇuṁ । divvaṁ ca sumaṇadāmaṁ piṇidhaē tayaṇu sō dēvō ।।8119 ।।
varakēsamallavatthāharaṇālaṁkārabhēyabhintrēṇa । cauvihalaṁkārēṇaṁ alaṁkiō bhūsiō saṁtō ।।8120 ।।
ālaṁkāriyabhavaṇāō puvvadārēṇa nikkhamēūṇa । āyāhiṇīkarēṁtō vavasāyasahaṁ vayai tattō ॥ 8121 ।।
tattha puramilladārēṇa visai sīhāsaṇammi uvavisai । tō sāmāṇiyadēvā tassāṇēuṁ samaprpati ॥8122।।
pōtthayarayaṇaṁ sō taṁ ginhai ugghāḍiūṇa vāēi । dhammiyamiha vavasāyaṁ avahārēūṇa cittammi ||8123 ||
pōtthayarayaṇaṁ paḍinikkhivēḍa sīhāsaṇāu uṭṭhēi । vavasāyasahāē puratthimēṇa dārēṇa nīharai ॥।8124।।
naṁdāpukkhariṇīē puvvēṇaṁ tōraṇēṇa pavisēuṁ । puvvillatisōmāṇagapaḍirūvēṇaṁ samōyara ।।8125 ।।
pakkhālai karacaraṇē cōkkhō hōūṇa paramasuibhūō । sēyaṁ mahaṁtamēgaṁ rayayamayaṁ vimalajalapunnaṁ ॥ 8126॥
mattagaya mahāraha muhasamāgiraṁ ginhiūṇa bhigāraṁ । uppalasyavattasahasvattamāīṇi giṇhēi ।।8127।।
naṁdāpukkhariṇīō nīharai taō samaggadēvēhiṁ । sāmāṇiyapamuhēhi kēhi vi karakaliyakala sēhiṁ ॥। 8128 ।।
jā varadhūyakaḍacchrayakarēhiṁ kēhiṁ vi pahiduhiyaēhiṁ । pacchā aṇugammaṁtō dēviḍḍhīē samaggāē ।। 8129 । ।
mahayāhayatalatantī-tāla-muiṁgappavāiyaravēṇa । siddhāyayaṇē vaccas pavisai puvvilladārēṇa ॥ 8130।।
gaṁtūṇa purō dēvacchaṁdaṭhiyāṇaṁ jiṇidapaḍimāṇaṁ । ālōyammi paṇāmaṁ karē āṇaṁdapaḍipunnō ।।8131 ।।
gahiūṇa lōmahatthaṁ jiṇapaḍimāō pamajjaē tattō । gaṁdhōdaēṇa nhāvēi surahiṇā caṁdaṇarasēṇa ॥ 8132।।
gōsīsēṇaṁ lipai jiṇapaḍimāṇaṁ samaggagāyāiṁ । tayaṇu niyaṁsāvara dēvadūsajuyalāī ahayāī ||8133||
varapupphamallagaṁdhāṇacunnavatthāṇa kuṇai āruhaṇaṁ । āharaṇārahaṇaṁ taha karēi paḍimāsu savvāsu ।। 8134।।
varasurahikusumamālākalāvakaliyaṁ karēi taṁ ṭhāṇaṁ । karagahiyavimukkadasaddhavannakusumōvayāraṁ ca ॥। 8135।।
acchahi sanhahiṁ sayalēhiṁ taṁdulēhiṁ sēēhiṁ । rayayāmaēhi aṭṭamaṁgalē ālihai puraō ।।8136।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ ca caṁdappaharayaṇavisuddha vē ruliyaḍaṁḍaṁ । kaṁcaṇamaṇirayaṇavicittabhattikaliyaṁ vimalachāyaṁ ॥ 8137।।
ḍajjhataṁ pavarakālāgurusurahiturukkakuṁdurukkaṁ ca । gaṁdhuttamāṇuviddhaṁ sugaṁdharvāṭṭa viṇimuyaṁtaṁ ॥ 8138।।
vēruliyamayaṁ gahiuṁ kaḍacchayaṁ jiṇavaraṇa pattēyaṁ । dāvēūṇaṁ dhūyaṁ saṁthuṇai taō jiṇavaridaṁ ।।8139 ।।
aṭṭhasaṇaṁ vittāṇa apuṇaruttāṇa atthajuttāṇa । thuṇiuṁ paccōsakkai sattaṭṭhapayāī tattō ya ।। 8140।।
aṁcai vāmaṁ jāṇūṁ bhūmīē dāhiṇaṁ nivēsēi । tikkhuttō muddhāṇaṁ dharaṇiyalē tō nivāḍē ||8141 ।।
īsi paccannamiuṁ karaya lajuyalaṁ sirammi ṭhaviūṇa । payaō vayai namōtthuṇamiccāī savva sakkathayaṁ । । 8142।।
vaṁdai namasai taō siddhāyayaṇassa majjhabahubhāē । gaṁtūṇa taṁ pamajjai karapagahiyalōmahatthēṇa ॥।8143।।
divvōdagadhārāē abbhukkhēūṇa caṁdaṇarasēṇa । paṁcagulitalamālihara maṁḍalaṁ vitthaḍaṁ tattha ।। 8144 ।।
payaraṁ kāūṇa dasaddhavannakusumēhiṁ dāvaē dhūyaṁ । siddhāyayaṇassa taō vaccai dārammi dāhiṇaē
tō tattha dāravēḍḍāē vālarūvē ya sālahaṁjīō । lōmagahatthēṇa pamajjiūṇa divvōdagassa taō
dhārāē abbhukkhas caccai gōsīsacaṁdaṇarasēṇa । pupphāruhaṇaṁ jāvābharaṇāruhaṇaṁ samāyarai

uggāhai varadhūvaṁ tattō muhamaṁḍavassa tassēva । paccatthimammi dārē aha uttarakhaṁbhapaṁtīē 8151 ॥
tōpuvvillēdārē tattō vi ya dāhiṇammi dārammi । tō dāhiṇillapēcchāgharamaṁḍavamajjhabahubhāgē ।। 8152।।
akkhāḍayamaṇipēḍhī sīhāsaṇagēsu pacchimē dārē । tō pubvillē dārē tō dāhiṇacēiyatthūbhē ||8153॥
tō tassa pacchimuttarapubbulla yadāhiṇāsu paḍimāsu । tō dāhiṇacēidumē aha dāhiṇaē mahiṁdajhaē ।। 8154।।
tō dāhiṇillanaṁdāpukkhariṇītōraṇattisōmāṇē । tattō siddhāyayaṇaṁ aṇuppayāhiṇīkuṇēmāṇō ।। 8155 ।।
uttaranaṁdāpōkkhariṇitōraṇē vayai taha tisōmāṇē । tattō ya uttarillē payāi ēsō mahiṁdajhaē ।। 8156 ।।
tō uttaracēidumē tattō uttaragacēiyatthūbhē । tō pacchimāicaudisiṭhiyāsu titthayarapaḍimā ॥। 8157।।
tō uttarapēcchādhara maṁḍava bahumajjhadē sabhāyammi । tō pubvillē dārē tattō uttaraduvārammi ॥। 8158।।
aha sō sirivammasurō vaccai dāhiṇagakhaṁbhapaṁtīē । tattō uttaramuhamaṁḍavassa bahumajjhabhāyammi ।। 8159 ।।
tō paccatthimadārē tattō ( uṇa ? ) uttarilladārammi । tattō ya dāhiṇillāē baccaē khaṁbhapaṁtīē ॥ 8160 ॥
aha siddhāyayaṇassa puratthimadārammi vaccaē ēsō । tattō ya puvvamuhamaṁḍavassa bahumajjhabhāyammi ।। 8161 ॥
tatō dāhiṇadārē tattō pacchimagakhaṁbhapaṁtīē । tō uttarilladārē tattō puvvilladārammi ||8162 ||
tattōpuvvillamma vi pēcchāgharamaṁḍavē tahā savvaṁ । ēvaṁ thūbhē ya jiṇapaḍimāsu ya cēiyadumēsu ॥ 8163 ।।
tattō ya mahiṁdajhaē naṁdāpukkhariṇi tōraṇē tattōṁ । taha tīē tisōmāṇagapaḍirūvē accaṇaṁ kuṇai ।। 8164।।
iya bhaṇiyakamēṇa imō puvvuttasamatthavatthusaṁghāyaṁ । lōmagahatthēṇa pamajjiūṇa puvvaṁ tacchā ||8165 ।।
gaṁdhōdayadhārāē dhōūṇaṁ pūyaē supupphēhi । uggāhaē ya dhūyaṁ kālāgurukuṁduruppabhavaṁ ॥ 8166॥
jō kō viiha visēsō sō bhannai savvadāradēsēsu । saha sālahaṁjiyāhi taha cēva ya vālarūvēhi ॥। 8167 ।।
mēyāu dāravēḍḍāō khaṁbhapaṁtīsu hōṁti na imāō । ciṭṭhēti kēvalaṁ sālahaṁjiyā vālarūvā ya
muhamaṁḍavapēcchāgharamaṁḍavagāṇaṁ tu majjhabahubhāē । paṁcaṁgulitala maṁḍalayā lihaṇaṁ caṁdaṇarasēṇa
kiṁ bahuṇā ? jaha caiva ya siddhāyayaṇassa majjhabahubhāē । dārē ya atthi bhaṇiyaṁ taha sēsē majjhadārē ya
jaha siddhāyayaṇajiṇapa ḍimāṇaṁ taha ya thūbhapaḍimāṇaṁ । ālōē cciya paṇamaṇapamuhaṁ kāūṇa pajjatē
aṭṭhōttaravittasayatthuikaraṇānaṁtaraṁ tu sakkathayaṁ । saṁpannaṁ bhaṇiūṇa vaṁdēi tahā nama̭sē
tō puvvillayanaṁdāpukkhariṇītōraṇē tisōmāṇē । parimajjaṇāi kāuṁ dhūvaṁ uggāhaē tattō
pubvilladuvārēṇaṁ pavisēūṇaṁ puṇō suhammasahaṁ । gaṁtūṇaṁ māṇavarga cēiyakhaṁbhammi irama
gōlagavaṭṭasamuggē lōmagahatthēṇa saṁpamajjēuṁ । ugghāḍiuṁ ca tattō jiṇasakahāō pamajjēi
gaṁdhōdaēṇa dhōi accē sugaṁdhapavaramallēhiṁ । dāvēi pavaradhūvaṁ jiṇasakahāō puṇō vi taō ।।8176 ।।
gōlagavaṭṭasamuggēsu nikkhivēūṇa muyai taha cēva । māṇavacēiyakhaṁbhaṁ pamajjaē lōmahatthēṇa ।। 8177 ।।
divvōdagēṇa dhōyai caccai gōsīsacaṁdaṇarasēṇa । pupphāruhaṇātīyaṁ kāūṇaṁ dāvaē dhūyaṁ ||8178 ।।
tō māṇavacēiyakhaṁbhaputravaō maṇimayāē pēḍhīē । sīhāsaṇaṁ pamajjai lōmagahatthēṇa tattō u ।।8179 ।।
divvōdaēṇa dhōi iccāī jāva dāvaē dhūvaṁ । khaṁbhassa pacchimē maṇipēḍhīē dēvasayaṇijjē ||8180 ।।
kāuṁ pamajjaṇātī dhūvapayāṇāvasāṇamaccaṇiyaṁ । tattō sayaṇijjuttarapuvvē khuḍḍāmahiṁdajhaē ॥। 8181 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tahēva pamajjaṇāiyaṁ savvamāyaraḍa tattō । tassēva mahiṁdajhayassa pacchimē jāi disibhāē ॥। 8182 ॥ !

sirivambhakumāradēvasmabhavō
tattha ya paharaṇakōsaṁ cōppālaṁ nāma pūyai tahēva । tayaṇu suhammasahāē nīharai payāi sammuhaō ।।8183 ।।
uvavāyarasa sahāē tīsē gaṁtūṇa dāhiṇē dārē । tattha suhammasahāē gamēṇa pūyaṁ kuṇai savvaṁ ॥ 8184 ।।
tattōṁ puritthimillaṁ naṁdāpukkhariṇimēi tīsa vi । tōraṇagatisōmāṇagapaḍivē pūyai tahēva ।। 8185 ।।
hara vi kui ēvaṁ ahisēyasahāē baccaē tattō । maṇipēḍhīsīhāsaṇapamuhaṁ tattha vi taha'ccēi ||8186 ।।
tattō purathimillaṁ naṁdāpukkhariṇimaccai tava । tayaṇu alaṁkārasahaṁ ahisēyasahāvihāṇēṇa ॥ 8187।।
tō vavasāyasahāē uvēi tattha vi ya lōmahatthēṇa । pōtthayarayaṇaṁ parimajjiūṇa divvaṁbudhārāē ।।8188 ।।
dhōyai pavarēhiṁ taō pūyai kusumēhiṁ surahigaṁdhēhiṁ । uggāi ya dhūvaṁ kālāgurukaṁ duruppabhavaṁ ॥ 8189 ।।
maṇipēḍhiyaṁ ca sīhāsaṇaṁ ca tattō pamajjaṇāpuvvaṁ । dhūvuggāhaṇapajjaṁtamaccaē vaccaē taya ।।8190 ।।
puvvillāē naṁdāpukkhariṇīē tamēva tattha vi ya । kāuṁ balipēḍhīē gaṁtūṇa bali visajjēi ।।8191 ।।
aha sō sirivammasurō saddāvittābhiōgiē dēvē । āisai jahā bhō bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! lahuṁ tubbhē ॥। 8192 ।।
vimalappabhē vimāṇē imammi savvattha tiyacaukkēsu । sivāḍagēsu caccaracaummuhēsuṁ mahapahēsuṁ । 8193।।
pāgārēsuṁ aṭṭālaēsu cariyāsu gōpurēsuṁ ca । ujjāṇēsu vaṇēsu ya vaṇarāīsu ya kuṇaha pūyaṁ ।। 8194 ।।
iya tēṇa tē bhaṇiyā āṇaṁdasunibbharā taō gaṁtuṁ । savvaṁ pitahā kāuṁ āgaṁtuṁ tassa sāhēti ।। 8195 ।।
aha sō pukkhariṇīē gaṁtuṁ kāūṇa karacaraṇasōyaṁ । tattō niggaṁtūṇaṁ ēi sahāē suhammāē ।। 8196।।
sāmāṇiyā (i) suraniyaraparigaō tūramaṁgalaravēṇa । puvvilladuvārēṇaṁ pavisēūṇaṁ summasahaṁ ॥ 8197।।
sīhāsaṇē nisīyai puvvadisāabhimūhō taō tassa । avaruttarēṇa taha uttarēṇa uttarapuratthimaō ।। 9198 ।।
caurō sāhassīō sāmāṇiyasuravarāṇa causuṁ pi । rayaṇamayāṇaṁ sīhāsaṇāṇa sahasēsūvavisaṁti ।। 8999 ॥
dāhiṇapuratthi mēṇaṁ abbhitaraparisā saṁbhava surāṇa । uvavisa divaḍḍhasayaṁ maṇimaya sīhāsaṇēsu taō ||8200 ।।
aḍḍhāijjasayāī dāhiṇadisi majjhaparisadēvāṇaṁ । paccatthimadāhiṇaō bāhiraparisāē dēvāṇaṁ ।। 8201 ||
cattāri sāī maṇimaēsa sīhāsaṇēsuvavisaṁti । paccatthimēṇa satta u aṇīyavaiṇō nisīyaṁti ||8202 ||
causu vidisāsu tattō pattēyaṁ āyarakkhadēvāṇaṁ । caurō caurō sahasā sōlasa miliyā u savvēsi ||8203 ||
ciṭṭhati sayā sannaddhabaddhakavayā piṇaddhagēvējjā । āviddhavimalavaracidhapaṭṭayā āuhakaraggā ।। 8204 ।।
tiṇayāī saṁdhiyāī dhaṇi varavaraghaḍiyakōḍīṇi । karakaliyāī vahatā kaṁṭhakalāvaṁ ca nisiyamuhaṁ ॥। 8205 ।।
vammakara khaggakarā pāsakarā kēi gayidaṁḍakarā । rakkhōvagayā guttā viṇaṇaṁ kiṁkarasamāṇā ।। 8206॥
ēvaṁ iṁdō vva imō sahāniviṭṭhō surēhiṁ pariyariō । vattīsapattabaddhaṁ pēcchai nāḍayavihiṁ vivihiṁ ॥। 8207 ।।
tassa parivāradēvā maṇimaya mauḍēhiṁ dippamāṇasirā । cūḍāmaṇimaṁḍiyamatthayā ya vitthariyakaṁ tillā ॥। 8208 ।।
kannaṁtaruiramaṇimaya kuṁḍala viṇi hijja māṇagaṁḍayalā । kaṁṭhaṭṭhiyavaṇamālā vacchatthalaluliyahāralayā ||8209 ||
nāṇāmaṇikaṁkaṇa kaḍya- tuḍiya kēūrathaṁbhiyabhuyaggā । pajalaṁtamuddiyājālakaliyasayalaṁgulīnivahā ||8210 ।।
rayaṇaka ḍimuttayāsattamalladāmā niyatthavaravatthā । gōsīsacaṁdaṇakayāṇulēvaṇā surahinīsāsā ।। 8211 ।।
ājammaṁ rōyajarā malasēyavivajjiyā vimaladēhā । thiratārunnā aṇimisanayaṇā maṇasāhiyatthā ya ।।8212 ॥
vāmakaraṁ gulirahanamuhēsu paṁcasu vi paṁca suragiriṇō । līlāē cciya ārōvayaṁti sayavattapattaṁ va ॥। 8213।।
ucchāti samuddē bhārmēti ya bhūmimaṁḍala gayaṇē । iccā aṇēyapayārasattiṇō kāmakhvā ya ।। 8214 ।।

hōṁti mahaṁtā aṇuṇō guruṇī lahuṇō adissadissā ya । ērisasurapariyariō karēi kī lāsaharasāī ॥। 8215 ।।
sacchaṁdaṁ viyarai kāṇaṇēsu ujjāṇadīhiyāisu ya । vaccai kayāi jiṇajammamajjaṇāisu sahidēṇa ।।8216।।

iya sirimuṇisuvvayajiṇidacariē sirisiricaṁdasūri varaiē sattamaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ ca bhavaggahaṇaṁ samattaṁ । । cha । ।

atthi iha bharahavāsē nāṇāvihasāsa saṁpayāsuhaō । dēsō vacchānāmō gōmahisāīhi abhirāma ।।8219॥
tatyatthi suvitthinnā chappayarichōlisacchahajalōhā | jamuṇānāmēṇa naī gōvajaṇāṇaṁdasaṁjaṇaṇī ॥8220 ।।
uttamaaṇēyarayaṇappasūisaṁpattaparamasōhāē । masilēha vva mahīē cakkhubhaēṇaṁ kayā vihiṇā ॥। 8221।।
jalapaṇā'hilāsēṇaṁ ubhayataḍōinnadhavalagōvaggā । niccaṁ pijā virāyai navaghaṇarāi vva sabalāyā ।। 8222 ।।
majjaṁtanayara nārī sarīrasaṁkaṁta hariṇanāhirasō । parimalaguṇēṇa najjai jattha gaēṇaṁ jaṇēṇa lahuṁ । ||8223 ||
tīsē nadīē tīrē kōsaṁbī nāma atthi varanayarī । uttuṁgapavarapāyāraparigayā saparihā rammā || 8224 ||
nīsēsanayarasōhāguṇō hakaliyā kayā payāvaṛaṇā । amarapurīpaḍichaṁdayadaṁsaṇahēḍaṁ va maṇuyāṇa ।। 8225 ।।
maṇipāsāyapaṇāsiyatamasāē sayā vi jattha rayaṇīō । kumuyasa rōyavaṇāṇaṁ viyāsaniddāhi najjaṁti ।। 8226 ।।
jattha ya pāusasamaē tuṁgayaranikēyaṇaggasiharēhi । kayachiḍa vva jalaharā kiraṁti ghaṇavāridhārāōṁ ।। 8227 ।।

nivasatā nāyarayā nidāhasa maōvayāramaṇurattā । diyahēsu havaṁti vibhukkakuṁkumubvadr̥ṇātīyā ॥। 8229।।
sasikaṁtamaya gihēsu nisāsu caṁdaṁsusaṁgasajalēsu । gimhē vi jattha pāusasiri va maṇyā aṇuhavaṁti ||8230 ।।
taṁ parivālai nayara rāyā rāyannavaṁsa saṁbhūō । sumuhō nāmēṇa cchaṇa mayaṁka maṁḍala samāṇamuhō ।।8231।।
jō surasa payāvaṁ sasiṇō sōmattaṇaṁ maī guruṇō । rūvaṁ puraṁdarāō। parakkamaṁ paṁcavayaṇāōṁ ||8232 ।।
gaṁbhīrattaṁ varasāgarāō falihōbalāō vimalattaṁ । tēyaṁ maṇīṇa gahiūṇa nūṇa vihiṇā viṇimmaviō ॥। 8233 ।।
jō baharahiyāṇa balaṁ saraṇamasaraṇāṇa nidvaṇāṇa dhaṇaṁ । dēi suhaṁ duhiyāṇaṁ hōī subaṁdhū abaṁdhūṇa ।।8234 ।।
gurubāla vuḍhḍanārījatijaṇaparivālaṇaṁ payatēṇa । jō kuṇai niō jaṇaō va raṁjaṇaṁ taha payāṇaṁ ca ।। 8235 ।।
nayavikkamaparikaliyaṁ iya rajjaṁ tassa pālayaṁtassa । samaikkatō kālō kō vi hu raisuhanimaggassa ।।8236 ।।
aha annayā kayāī atthāṇagayassa tassa naravaiṇō । paḍihārēṇāgaṁtuṁ vinnattaṁ mauliyakaraṇa ।।8237 ।।
ujjāṇavālapurisō dēva ! bahi ciṭṭhaē duvārassa । aha rannō vayaṇēṇaṁ pavēsiō tēṇa tō jhatti ||8238 ||
sō vi namiūṇa nivaī vinnavaē dēva ! jaha tuhujjāṇē । āgaṁtūṇaṁ dinō mahalacchīē samāvāsō || 8239 ।।
tathā hi--dinna sahayārasāhā maṁjariparibhōyapauravittīyaṁ । kalayaṁṭhikulaṁ kalakiēhiṁ kahai vva lōyassa ।। 8240 ।
kālapariṇāmarannā viinnarajjā jayammi mahalacchī । iṇhi tā ēīē savvō vi jaṇōṁ kuṇau sēvaṁ ।। 8242 ।।
hariūṇa haḍhēṇa piyaṁgulōddapamuhāṇa kāṇaṇatarūṇa । kusumasamiddhī aṁkullamalliyāīsu saṁṭhaviyā ||8242 ।।

nihiūṇaṁ sisirēṇa phēḍiyā āsi jāō naliṇīō । tāsi puṇō vidinnā sirīvilāsā mahusirīē ।। 8244 ॥
ullasiralaharisarisaravarēsu kāūṇa majjaṇavihāṇaṁ । surahitarukusumasaṁgamasaṁjaṇiyamaṇunnasōrabhā ।। 8245 ।।
dāhiṇadisāpavāyā tīē sahāyā vi akhaliyappasarā । viyaraṁti bhuvaṇavalaē sēvijjaṁtā vilāsīhiṁ ॥। 8246 ।।

tassa saraniyara nivaḍaṇa vihuriyahiyaēhiṁ bhīruvaggēhi । māṇaṁ mōttūṇa gayaṁ saraṇammi abhīyavaggassa ।। 8249 ।।
sō vi mayaṇassa vasagaṁ nāūṇaṁ hiyayavēhavisayammi । tēsi hiyayaṁ niyaṁhiyayapaṁjarakkhittamuvvahai ।। 8250 ।।।
vammahabhaḍassa mahusirisāhējjasamubbhassa āṇāē । bhīyamaṇō mihuṇagaṇō atighaṇanēhō vi annōnaṁ ।।8251 ।

tē puṇa annēhi suvannasiṁgiyā muhavimukkasalilēhiṁ । sicijjaṁti puṇō puṇa cēyaṇasaṁpāyanatthaṁ va ।। 8254 । ।

bāhi vaccatō caccarīsu mahulacchirajjalaṁbhammi । kuṇai va vaddhāvaṇayaṁ pēcchayajaṇakayamaṇānaṁdaṁ ।।8256 ।।
iya vinnaviūṇaṁ uvarayammi ujjāṇavālaē tammi । vihiyapasāyammi visajjiyammi rāyā sayaṁ tattō ॥
saṁcalai savvaniyapariyaṇēṇa parivēḍhiō samaṁtēṇa । puraō apphāliyavivihatara ravajaṇiyasa vaṇasuhō ।। 8258 ।।
ārūḍhō mattamahāgayammi siradhariyadhavalavarachattō । vāravilāsiṇika rakamalacaliyasiyacāmaruppīlō ||

vīijjatō taha uttarīya pēraṁta pallavasaēhi । niya ucchaṁgagayāṇaṁ bālāṇaṁ pucchamāṇāṇaṁ ॥ 8261 ॥
daṁsijjatō māyāpiyarēhiṁ kahaṁtaēhiṁ ahināṇaṁ । niyaaṁgulīsihāhi jā vaccai kēttiyaṁ pipahaṁ ॥। 8263 ।।
tā niyamaṁdirasiharārūḍhā ghariṇī kuvidavīrassa । nāmēṇaṁ vaṇamālā diṭṭhipahē tassa ōinnā ।। 8263 ।।
rūvēṇa jōvvaṇēṇa ya sōhaggēṇa ya suraṁgaṇāṇaṁ pi । dappaṁ nilayaṁtī taō savimhayarasō rāyā ।। 8264 ।।
taṁ savisēsaṁ laggō palōiuṁ pāyamūlaō pabhiī । dīharasiddhipamhalalōyaṇanālēhiṁ va pitō ।। 8265।।
kummunnaēhiṁ sōṇiyatalēhiṁ viyasaṁtanahamaūhēhiṁ । calaṇēhiṁ maṇunnāhi jaṁghāhi ya piṁjarapahāhi ||8266 ।।
varakaya liganbhasukumāraēṇa vaṭṭēṇa ūrujuyalēṇa । amarataraṁgiṇipuliṇōvamēṇa vitthiṇṇajahaṇēṇa ।। 8267 ।।
surasariāvattasamāṇanā hivalaēṇa tivalikaliēṇa । khāmēṇaṁ majjhēṇaṁ ḍibhagamuṭṭhīē gijjhēṇaṁ ॥। 8268।।
utuṁgathōrathaṇa maṁḍalāvaruddhēṇa uravibhāēṇa । tiṇisalayakōmalēṇaṁ bāhulayājuyalaēṇaṁ ca ॥। 8269।।
hatthēhi asōya mahīruhaggapallavasa māṇasa hēhiṁ । rēhātiyaṁ kiyāē gīvāē kaṁbusarisāē ||8270 ।।
saṁpunnasa yasa simaṁḍalassa sōhaṁ viḍaṁbayaṁtēṇaṁ । vayaṇēṇaṁ nayaṇēhiṁ ya iṁdīvaradalavisālēhiṁ ।।8271 ।।
sasimaṁḍaladdha sarisēṇa bhālavaṭṭaṇa cirabhārēṇa । aliulakajjala sāmalavantrēṇa taraṁgiēṇaṁ ca ॥। 8272।।
i aṁgōvayavēṇaṁ ēkkēkkēṇa vi imā maṇaṁ harai । kiṁ puṇa savvāvayavāṇa samudaō tīē dīsaṁtō ।। 8273 ।।
avi ya-- tammi samayammi ēsā vāmakaraṇaṁ niyaṁsaṇaṁ lhasiyaṁ । iyarēṇa saṁṭhavaṁtī payaḍiyathaṇamuttarīyaṁ ca ॥
diṭṭhā sumuhanivēṇaṁ aha sō laggō viyappiḍaṁ ēvaṁ kiṁ ēsā vaṇalacchī ? ki va raī vammahaviuttā ? ।। 8275 ।।
accabhuyaruvāṇaṁ juvatīṇaṁ maccalōyasārāṇaṁ । nimmavaṇatthaṁ vihiṇā kiṁ paḍichaṁdō kaō ēsō ? ।। 8276 ।।
fi kattha vi avahē garuyammi puraṁdarēṇa ruṭṭaṇa । accharasā kā vi imā pavāsiyā saggalōyāō ? ।। 8277 ।।
avi ya - kalahaṁsīṇaṁ jaha rāyahaṁsiyā kumuiṇīṇa naliṇi vva । kappalaya vva layāṇaṁ tārāṇa va rōhiṇī pavarā ॥

।।8289 ।।
jaha accharāṇa majjhē tilōttamā iyaratarūparūḍhāṇa । jaha maṁjarīṇa majjhammi maṁjarīpāriyāyassa ।।8279 ।।
iyarāṇa uusirīṇaṁ majjhaṁ jaha rēhaē vasaṁtasirī । savvajuvatīṇa majjhē virāyaē taha imā bālā ।। 8280 ।।
aṁgōvaṁgapaiṭṭiyasuhalakkhaṇapunnasuṁdarasarīrā । dōlāvara hiyayāī ēsā diṭṭhā muṇīṇaṁ pi ॥। 8281 ।।
sā vi aṇavarayapēsiyalōyaṇabāṇēhiṁ sumuhanaranāhaṁ । vidhaṁtī nōvaramai viyasiyasyavattasamavayaṇā ।। 8282 ।।
sumuhō vi takkhaṇaṁ ciya vammahaparimukkabāṇapasarēṇa । salliyasavvasarīrō । vaṇamālāmayamaṇō jāō ।।
puraō gaṁtumasakkō tatthēva gayāgayāī kārēi । kariṇaṁ avasaṁ va kuvidamaṁdirāsattamaggammi | ।। 8284 । ।
maisāgaranāmēṇaṁ sacivēṇa taō maṇōgayaṁ bhāvaṁ । nāūṇaṁ vinnattō sumuhamahāmahivatī ēvaṁ ।। 8285 ।।
jaha dēva ! sēvayajaṇō miliō savvō vi ciṭṭhaē inhi । kimiha muhāē vilaṁbō kīraha gammau purō sigdhaṁ ॥
sōūṇa maṁtivayaṇaṁ kiṁ pi taō jāyacēyaṇō rāyā । cōēūṇa gaiṁdaṁ maṁda maṁdaṁ gaō puraō ||8287 ॥
saṁpattō ujjāṇaṁ phalakusumana maṁtasāhisiharēhi । paṇamaṁtaṁ va nivaiṇō jamuṇāvattaṁ ti nāmēṇa ।। 8288 ।।
pavaṇapakaṁ pirasumaṇa samūhapaviyaṁbhamāṇamayaraṁdaṁ । mayaraṁdamattamahuyaravirāvakayakāmiṇiviyāraṁ
kāmiṇiviyāradaṁsaṇasaṁjaṇiyajuvāṇaparamapariōsaṁ । pariōsavasaviyaṁbhiyakāmuyakalagīyakayasōhaṁ ।। 8290 ।।
iya tattha jaṇiyasōhē ujjāṇavarammi naravarō sumuhō । kīlāgihammi pavisai nisuṇatō parahuyaruyāī ॥। 8291 ।।
tattha vi taṁ vaṇamālaṁ maṇammi aṇavaraya muvvahaṁtassa । tassa na khaṇaṁ pi sōkkhaṁ saṁjāya sunnahiyayassa ।। 8292 ।।
āyāriṁgiyakusalō maṁtī matisāgarō muṇēūṇa । naravaiṇō maṇabhāvaṁ citai ēvaṁ niyamammi ||8293।।
jaha ēsa tāva rāyā vaṇamālādēhadaṁsaṇabhavēṇa । vammahamahābhuyaṁgēṇa uggagaralēṇa niḍḍusiō ।। 8294 ।।
kēṇāvi uvāēṇaṁ pucchēūṇaṁ imaṁ mahīnāhaṁ । payaḍāvēmi taō haṁ maṇōgayaṁ savvasambhāvaṁ ।। 8295।।
iya citiūṇa maṁtī pucchara sumuhaṁ nivaṁ jahā dēva ! । jō dīsai maṇamōhō tumhāṇa imō samubbhūō ।। 8296 ।।
tassa kira kāraṇāī ēyāī phuraṁti māṇasē majjha । sattusamutthaṁ va bhayaṁ payaipakōvō va aigaruō ।।8297।।
aha vallahadēvīē havējja mannū kaō atimahaṁtō । tattha tuha tāva tibvappayāvadaliyārivaggassa ॥। 8298 ।।
sattasamutthaṁ na bhayaṁ saṁbhāvijjai maṇammi sumiṇē vi। sammāṇadāṇamuiyā payaī vi na kuppaē tumha ॥। 8299 ।।
savvassa vi aṇukūlaṁ kāumaṇāṇaṁ sayā vi tumhāṇa । parabhāvajāṇayāṇaṁ dēvī vi na tumha rūsēi ।। 8300 ।।
ēyāṇa kāraṇāṇaṁ vairittaṁ jamiha kāraṇaṁ kiṁ pi । dēvēṇa cēva kahiyaṁ tamahamiyāṇi viyāṇissaṁ ||8301 ||
jai kaha vi gōvaṇijjaṁ na hōi ēyaṁ kahēu tō dēvō । tō īsi vihasiūṇaṁ pabhaṇai matisāgaraṁ rāyā ||8202 |
taṁ amha bālamittaṁ vīsaṁbhaṭṭhāṇamativiṇīō ya । suviyakkhaṇō sahāō hiēkkaniraō si sayakālaṁ ।।8303 ।।
tā tujjha gōvaṇijjaṁ kiṁ pi rahassaṁ kayā vi mē natthi । pucchaṁtassa visēsēṇa saṁpayaṁ viyaṇa ṭhāṇammi ||8304 ||
sō kō vi amha kuviō matirayaṇa nihāṇa ! ciṭṭhaē inhi । jassa na paḍimallō ēttha kō vi annō tihuyaṇē vi । ।
sō karō ? iya puṭṭhē sacivēṇa narēsarō taō bhaṇai । khaṁdamahi dāīyā kuṇaṁti dāsattaṇaṁ jassa ।।8306 ।।
sō dēvō nāmēṇaṁ avarāhaṁ kaṁ pi saṁpayaṁ majjha । daṭṭhūṇapakuviō tō akāsi ēya mama avatthaṁ ।।8307 ।।
sō avarāhō ēsō gihāō vaṇalacchipēcchaṇanimittaṁ । iha āgacchaṁtēṇaṁ kā vi maē bāliyā diṭṭhā ||8308 ।।
sā savvaṁgaṁ pitaō palōiyā sāhilāsadiṭṭhīē । jāva bhaē tā kuviō dēvō sahasa tti majjhuvari ।।8309 ।।
uttamakulappasūō ēsa payāpālaṇē maē ṭhaviō । annō vi anīiparō nivāriyavvō taō imiṇā ।।8310 ।।
sayamēva kahaṁ ēsō samuha nīḍaṁ vilaṁghaē tattō । iya citiūṇa nūṇaṁ vihiṇā kuviēṇa paḍhamaṁ pi ॥। 8311 ।।
