sigdhaṁ pavēsiyā sā tikkhā asidhēṇuya vva maha hiyaē । vayaṇamuppāyaṁtī savvasarīrammi vaṇamālā ।। 8312 ।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ pi mayaṇō nirūviō tēṇa pahariuṁ majjha । tēṇa vi niyabāṇēhiṁ ēyāvatthaṁ ahaṁ nīō । 8313 ।।
aha maṁtī bhaṇai nivaṁ dēva ! viyāṇāmi taṁ ahaṁ bālaṁ । vīrayakuvikāriṇīṁ sayā vi nāmēṇa vaṇamālaṁ ॥। 8314 ।।
mā. kuṇau kaṁpi khayaṁ dēvō ēyammi vaiyarē tamhā । taha kaha vi karissamahaṁ jaha sā dēvassa vasamēi ।। 8315 ।।
tō āha sumuhanivaī mā mā jaṁpēha ērisaṁ saciva ! । tuha pucchaṁtassa maē jahaṭṭhiō sāhiō ēsō ॥8316 ।।
niyacittassa vigappō kāuṁ icchāmi na uṇa kāraṇa । jamhā maṇammi vi imaṁ acitaṇijjaṁ kulē amha।। 8317।।
jai vihu divvavasēṇa maṇōviyārō imō samuppanō । taha vi na kulē kalaṁkaṁ niyammi āṇēmi sasivimalē । 83181
jai vi kuviō vihī mē harissaē taha vi jīviyaṁ cēva । iha paralōyaviruddhaṁ maṁ kārēu na sō sakkō ।।8319।।
vinnavas taō maṁtī dēvō jāṇēi nīisatthāī । savvapurisatthamūlaṁ tattha vi rakkhāviō appā ||8320॥
āha taō sumuhanivō sēyaṁ maraṇaṁ pi vimalasīlassa । mailiyasīlassa puṇō na suhaṁ cirajīviyavvaṁ pi ।।
jai tā tumaṁ mama hiō tō mā maha dēsu ēyamuvaēsaṁ । ajjēūṇaṁ pāvaṁ jēṇa ahaṁ duggaī jāmi ॥। 8322।।
maisāgarō payaṁpaṛa na bhāyaṇaṁ tamiha jassa na pihāṇaṁ । pāvaṁ pi taṁ na bhuvaṇē pāyacchittaṁ na jassatthi ।। 8323॥
tā attāṇamiyāṇi kamavi visamāuhāu rakkhējaṁ । pāvassa tassa pacchā pāyacchittaṁ carējjāsi ।।8324 ।।
āha taō naranāhō pāyacchittēṇa pāvakammassa । hōjja viṇāsō ayasassa majjaṇaṁ kaha vihēyavvaṁ ।।8325 ।।
matisāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ tahā karissāmi dēva ! jaha annō । kō vi na yāṇai ēyaṁ tujjha rahassaṁ nayaramajjhē ।।8326।।
kiṁ ca niravaccayāṇaṁ jai tumha havējja kaha vi paralōē । gamaṇamiyāṇi ēēṇa vaiyarēṇaṁ taō dēva ! ।।8327 ।।
rajjaṁ raṭṭha ca payāu dhammaṭhāṇāraṁ puvvapurisāṇaṁ । ēgasamaēṇa savvaṁ pāvējja viṇāsamaviyappa || 8328 ||
iya jaṁpiyammi rāyā na payacchai jāva kiṁ pi paḍivayaṇaṁ । tō maṁtiṇā pabhaṇiyaṁ gammau sigdhaṁ pi dēva ! iō। 8329 ।
nayarī majjhammi niyammi maṁdirē tāva saṁpayaṁ tattō । kālōciyaṁ bhavissai jaṁ kiṁ pi tayaṁ karissāmi ||8330||
sibiyaṁ āruhiūṇaṁ ujjāṇavaṇāō aha narāhivaī । niyaparivārasamēō pavisai kōsaṁbinayarīē ।। 8331 ।।
gaṁtūṇaṁ pāsāē visajjiūṇaṁ ca savvaparivāraṁ । vāsaharē pavisēuṁ sayaṇijjē ṭhāi taṁ bālaṁ ॥। 8332 ।।
aṇavarayaṁ jhāyaṁtō ēgaggamaṇō sudīhanīsāsē । unhē vimutō maṇaṁ niyattēumataraṁtō ||8333 ||
matisāgarasacivēṇaṁ ēsa paghōsī payāsiō bāhi । jaha naravaiṇō sīsaṁ bāhai ciracakkhu dōsēṇa ।।8334।।
sayamāgaṁtūṇa gihē hakkārāvēi purisapāsāō । attēiyāhihāṇaṁ parivāyagaligiṇi niuṇaṁ ॥। 8335।।
pēsēi taōṁ ēyaṁ vaṇamālāē vasīkaraṇahēuṁ । gaṁtūṇa taggihē sā tīē saha daṁsaṇaṁ kuṇai || 8336।।
kayasamuciyapaḍivattī jaṁpai āsaṇapariggahaṁ kāuṁ । putti ! ahaṁ tuha gēhē nicca pi uvēmi pāēṇa ॥। 8337।।
kiṁtu viyasaṁtavayaṇā dīsaṁtī annayā sayā vi tumaṁ । ajja puṇa mauliyamuhī kaha dīsasi sunnahiyayā ya ।।
annaṁ ca savvakālaṁ niyasuha- dukkhaṁ tumaṁ purō majjha । āsi purā sāhēṁtī tā suyaṇu ! kahēsu inhi pi ॥ 8339।।
jaṁ ki pitujjha bāhai majjhē dēhassa tayaṇu vaṇamālā | jaṁpai ajjē ! bālā kā vi jahā maṁḍalaṁ sasiṇō ।।
gayaṇaṁgaṇāō gahiuṁ icchai jaha vā kharī varaturaṁgaṁ । sīhakisōraṁ va sivā kalahaṁsaṁ vāyasavahu vva ।। 8341 ।।
mayaṇattā paribhōttuṁ vaṁchēi ahaṁ pi ajja taha mūḍhā । dullahajaṇasaṁjōyaṁ dēvvōvahayā ahilasāmi ||8342 ।।
ajja vipuvvattāṇaṁ saṁjōō hōi kaha vi divvavasā । jaṁ puṇa patthēmi ahaṁ sumiṇē vi hu dullahō majjha ।।
tēṇa samaṁ saṁjōgō tēṇahaṁ mayaṇadāhajaragahiyā । na lahāmi khaṇaṁ pi raī ciṭṭhāmi vimukkajīyāsā || 8344।।

attēiyā payaṁpai taō jahā maṁta-ōsahāīṇaṁ । vijjāṇa saunāṇa ya kipi asajyaṁ na bhuvaṇē vi ।। 8345।।
tākahasu nivviyappaṁ khāmōyari ! mā khaṇaṁ cirāvēsu । jēṇa samīhiyamaṭṭha sigdhaṁ ciya tujjha sāhēmi ॥। 8346 ।।
vaṇamālā bhaṇai taō ajjē ! ajjēva karivarārūḍhō । ujjāṇavaṇābhimuhaṁ vaccatō sumuhanaranāhō || 8337।।
sagihāsannō diṭṭhō jayā maē sāhilāsa diṭṭhīē । ārambha taō samayāō saṁgamaṁ tassa jhāyaṁtī ||8348 ||
imarisaṁ avatthaṁ pattā haṁ jārisaṁ tumaṁ niyasi । attēiyā payaṁpai sagavvamēyaṁ taō vayaṇaṁ ।। 8349 ।।
caṁdō sūrō sakkō īsāṇō vā havējja jai kō vi । āṇēmi taṁ pi gayaṇaṁgaṇāō maṁtēhi tuha pāsē ।। 8350।।
maṇuyāhivamēttassa u kā vattā ēgapuranivāsissa । ajjēva paōsē jai ghaḍēmi na taē samaṁ ēyaṁ ॥ 8351 ।।
tō haṁ pajjalihuyāsaṇammi nūṇaṁ khivēmi appāṇaṁ । iya kāūṇa pannaṁ attēī niggayā tattō ।।8352 ।।
vaṇamālābhavaṇāō gaṁtuṁ matisāgarassa sacivassa । savvaṁ kahēi viyaṇē hiṭṭō sō hōi hiyayammi ।। 8353 ।।
sammāṇiūṇa attēiyaṁ taō kiṁ pi sikkhavai kannē । pacchā visajjiūṇaṁ taṁ sacivō citai sakajjaṁ ॥। 8354 ॥
aha pattammi paōsē pasamiyanīsēsajaṁtusaṁtāvē । suddhamayaṁkamaūhē vilāsimaṇuyāṇa suhajaṇaē ॥। 8355।।
attēī gaṁtūṇaṁ vīrakuviṁdassa maṁdirē turiyaṁ । vaṇamālāē sāhai putti ! maē tui samīvāō ॥। 8356 ॥
ētō gaṁtūṇa niyammi āsaē jāvaēttiyaṁ vēlaṁ । taha kahavi maṁtajāvō ēgaggamaṇāē parivihiō ।। 8357 ।।
jaha sō sumuharnāradō savvaṁgaṁ visamabāṇasaraviddhō । ciṭṭhai maṇammi taṁ ciya jhāyaṁtō paramajōi vva ।। 8358 ।।
ēyaṁ maha vijjāē kahiyaṁ kannammi tō maē jāvō । saṁvariō jhatti ihāgayā ahaṁ tujjha pāsammi ।। 8359 ।।
tā sigghaṁ ciya inhi ēhi tumaṁ nēmi jaha nivasamīvē । jāva'jjavi ya kuviṁdō na vīraō maṁdiraṁ ēi ।। 8360 ॥
attēiyāē vayaṇē ēyammi gayammi kannakuharammi । vaṇamālā saṁjāyā maya vva ujjīviyā jhatti ।।8361 ॥
ḍaḍhḍā sisirēṇa jahā hōi vasaṁtē puṇō vi sacchāyā । naliṇī taha vaṇamālā tabvayaṇāyannaṇē jāyā ।।8362 ।।
aha sigdhaṁ tīē samaṁ viṇiggayā niyagihāō vaṇamālā। pattā nariṁdabhavaṇē sigdhaṁ sacivassa sariūṇa ।। 6363 ।।
attēiyā amaccaṁ bhaṇai jahā amha sīsiṇī ēsā । nivavallahēṇa kēṇai paribhūyā āgayā ēttha ।।8364 ।।
tō rannā saha ēīē daṁsaṇaṁ kāravēha sigdhaṁ pi । sacivēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ majjha imaṁ vaiyaraṁ kahaha || 8365 ।।
attēī bhai taō paḍiyāraṁ kāumakkhamā tumbhē । ēyammi vaiyarē tō kaha tumha kahijjaē ēyaṁ ॥ 8366 ।।
tō bhaṇiyaṁ sacivēṇaṁ aṇavasarō saṁpayaṁ naridassa । pāsē gaṁtuṁ annassa tō ahaṁ jāmi sayamēva ॥। 8367।।
iya bhaṇiuṁ uṭṭhē uṁ gaṁtuṁ sacivēṇa sāhiyaṁ rannō । jaha vaṇamālā tumhaṁ kiṁca pi vinnaviukāmā ।।8368 ||
ciṭṭhai duvāradēsē pattā kō dēva! tīē āēsō । tō citai naranāhō ēsō sō khalu mahāṇatthō ।। 8369 ।।
samuṭṭhiō puṇō vi huahavā sacivassa cēṭṭhiyaṁ kiṁ pi । iya citiūṇa bhaṇiō rannā maisāgarō ēvaṁ ॥। 8370 ।।
taṁ ciya tavvayaṇamamacca ! nisuṇiuṁ uttaraṁ sayaṁ dēhi । vinnavai taō nivaī sacivō jaha dēva ! sayamēva ।।
bhaṇiyā bahuhā
vi maē ēsā ēvaṁ na mantraē kiṁtu । iya jaṁpēi cirēṇa vi ēttō nāha gamissāmi ||8372 ॥
jāva na sayaṁ muhēṇaṁ vinnattō naravaī maē sumuhō। tō jai āēsō dēvasaṁtiō hōi tā ēvaṁ || 8373 ॥
kaḍhḍāvēūṇa khurēhiṁ aṁgarakkhāṇa pāsaō bāhi । nēyāvēmi khaṇēṇa vi tō rāyā āisai maṁti ।। 8374 । ।
jai ēsōcci tīē viṇicchaō nimmiō niyamaṇammi । tō kārijjau ēsā maē samaṁ daṁsaṇaṁ varaī ।।8375 ।।
bhaviyanvayāvasēṇaṁ maṁtī ēvaṁ nivēṇa āiṭṭhō । hiṭṭhō hiyaē gaṁtūṇa āṇaē tattha vaṇamālaṁ ॥। 8376।।

harivasavaṇṇaṇaṁ
sā vi saviyāralōyaṇamavalōyaṁtī niraṁtaraṁ bālā । diṭṭhā nivēṇa pamhuṭusavvaniyamaṇavivēṇa ॥7377 ||
tāvacciya vihāṇa va maṇammi nimmalavivēyadīvassa । vipphuraṇaṁ saṁjāyai jhaḍappaē ajja vi na jāva।। 8378 ।।
taṁ taruṇilōlalōyaṇavikkhēvasudīharaṁcalasamīrō । aha nāuṁ sacivō nivadiṭṭhībhāvaṁ avakkatō ||8379 ।।
nāūṇa sāgurāyaṁ rāyā taṁ kāriūṇa uvayāraṁ । addhāsaṇē nivēsai ramaṇamaīē vigayasaṁkō ।।8380 ।।
ēttō cciya vārijjai garuyapayattēṇa savvasatthēsu । māyāē bhaiṇīē duhiyāē vā sagaṁtō ॥। 8381 ।।
jamhā iṁdiyagāmō sududdharō hōi mattahatthi vva । bhajatō sīlavaṇaṁ gurūvaēsaṁkusaabhīō ||8382 ।।
samarē sutikkhakhaggābhighāyasaṁghāyamavi mahāsuhaḍā । visati sulīlāē na muyaṁti maṇaṁ pi dhīrataṁ ॥। 8383 ।।
savilāsajuvailīlākaḍakkhavikkhēvatikkhabāṇāṇaṁ । puṇa vāō vi vilaggō tēsi dhīrataṇaṁ harai ।। 8384।।
aha niya pāsanisannaṁ sajjhasapaviyaṁbhamāṇaukkaṁpaṁ । kaliūṇaṁ taṁ bālaṁ sajjhasaparivajjiō rāyā ॥। 8385 ।।
varamajjapāṇavihiṇā hariūṇaṁ sajjhasaṁ niravasēsaṁ । ramai avagūhiuṇaṁ sikkārukkaṁ pirathaṇōru || 8386।।
paribhuttaraisuhaṁ pihu visajjiraṁ taṁ na icchaē bālaṁ । sumuhanivō taddaṁsaṇapaisamayapa vaḍḍhiyāṇaṁgō ।। 8387।।
avarōhē cciya dhārai tīē saha nibiḍanēhanirayāē । ēgantaraipasattō gayaṁ pi kālaṁ na yāṇēi ||8388 ||
aha vīraō kuvidō āgacchai jāva maṁdirē niyaē । tāva na pēcchai bhajjaṁ vaṇamālaṁ tattha lalamāṇaṁ ।।8389 ।।
annēsiuṁ payattō tattō saṁbhaṁtamāṇasō ēsō । aṁtōgihassa gaṁtuṁ uvari ca bahiṁ ca saddantō ।।8390 ।।
aṇamālē ! vaṇamālē ! kattha gayā ? kiṁ karōsi parihāsaṁ ? । cakkaṁ va bhamai rayaṇīē virahiō cakkavāō vva
ēttiyadiṇāṇi daiē ! kayāvi kōvō taē kaō nēya । majjhuvari caṁdavayaṇē ! sayā vi aṇurattacittassa ।। 8392 ।।
sumarāmi ahaṁ muddhē ! na kiṁ pi tuha vippiyaṁ kayaṁ inhi । jai puṇa tumaṁ viyāṇasi tō khamasu mamēkkamavarāhaṁ । । 8393 ।
jai vi tumaṁ aikuviyā na dēsi dīṇassa daṁsaṇaṁ majjha । karuṇaṁ kāūṇaṁ tahā vi saddamēkka suṇāvē ॥ 8394 ।।
hiyayaṁ phuḍiūṇa jahā na jāi mama jīviyaṁ hyāsassa । iccāi palavamāṇō jāō ummattaō sahasā ।।8395।।
savihavasāraṁ pi gharaṁ caiūṇa viṇiggaō nayarimajjhē । tiyacaccarēsu viyarai gharamaḍhadēvaulavāvīsu ॥। 8396 ।।
ārāmēsu pavāsu ya sahāsu sarisaravarēsu rāyapahē । savvaṁgamalavilittō kharaṁṭiō khēlamāīhiṁ ।।8397।।
vilulaṁtamalajaḍīkayakēsakalāvō galatanayaṇajuō । phuḍiyakaracaraṇajuyalō dīharasaṁjāyanaharōmō ।।8398।।
jaracīvarakhaṁḍaniyaṁsaṇō ya ghaṇarēṇuguṁḍiyasarīrō । karakaliyakapparō bhikkhamaggirō viyarai jahicchaṁ ।।8399।।
kayaparivēḍhō ḍibhagasaēhiṁ kalayalaravaṁ kuṇatēhi । kīlāē vēlavatēhi ēhi daṁsēmi vaṇamālaṁ ।।8400 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ nēūṇa kahiyaṭhāṇammi taṁ bhāṁti taō । amhēhiṁ āsi diṭṭhā ēttha paēsammi khaṇamēkkaṁ ।। 8401 ||
inhi tu gayā kattha vina yāṇimō jaṁpaē taō annō । ēkkēṇa majjha kahiyā sā ciṭṭhai amugaṭhāṇammi ||8402 ।।
tayabhihō tō dhāvai tattha vi taṁ jāva pēcchaē nēya । tō palavai vaṇamālāguṇē saraṁtō bahupayāraṁ ।। 8403 ।।
pucchaṁtō paigēhaṁ vaṇamālā atthi ētthaṁ kattha vi ya ? । sapattā maha ruṭṭhā jaha diṭṭhā kaha vi tā kahaha || 8404 ॥
taṁ sipiē! jaṁpatī daiya! tumaṁ pāṇavallahō majjha । tā kiṁ na dēsi daṁsaṇamihi maha vilavamāṇassa ||8405 ।।
jai āsi ahaṁ daiē! pāṇēhiṁtō vi vallahō tujjha । nikkāraṇaṁ pi tā ki inhimaunnō taē cattō ||8406 ॥
ahavā vi vallahō cciya tujjha ahaṁ tēṇa maha maṇaṁ tumaē । nīyaṁ saha'ppaṇa cciya niyamaṇasāhāraṇa nimitaṁ । । 8407 ।
ahavā na majjha ruṭṭhā taṁ si piē! kiṁtu rūvaluddhēṇaṁ । dēvēṇa dāṇavēṇa va khayarēṇa va avahaḍā nūṇaṁ ॥। 8408 ।।

ayasō cciya tēṇa paraṁ gahiō mūḍhēṇa taṁ haraṁtēṇa । maha virahammi tumaṁ puṇa jīvasi na khaṇaṁ pi paivaiē ! ।। 8409 ।।
tuha virahē jaṁ dukkhaṁ majjha ahaṁ taṁ sahēmi maha virahē । jaṁ tujjha duhaṁ taṁ puṇa daiē ! sahiuṁ na sakkēmi ।। 8410।।
hā vaṇamālē ! hā kamalalōyaṇē! hā chaṇidusamavayaṇē! । hā pīṇaghaṇatthaṇi ! kattha taṁ puṇō dīsasē suyaṇu ! ।।8411 ।।
taṁ tuha hasiyaṁ taṁ tujjha jaṁpiyaṁ taṁ palōiyaṁ tujjha । taṁ tuha ramiyaṁ ca piē! katthagaō hūṁ lahissāmi ||8412।।
iya taṁ daṭṭhūṇa jaṇō gharagharadārammi jaṁpiraṁ dīṇaṁ । sō natthi nayarimajjhē na parunnaṁ jēṇa dhāhāhiṁ ॥। 8413 ||
ēvaṁ ca sō varāō pēmmapisāēṇa vinaḍiō saṁtō । tattha aṇēyaṁ kālaṁ paḍipaḍiō dukkhasaṁtattō ॥ 8414 ॥
annamma dinē ḍiṁbhagasahassaparivāriō kalayalēṇa । kīraṁtēṇaṁ pattō uvaṁgaṇaṁ rāyabhavaṇassa ।। 8415 ।।
miliō nariṁdalōō sayalō kōūhalēṇa tattha taō । tēṇa kayatālasaddō mōhēṇa parṇācciō tattō ॥8416 ॥
sōūṇa garuyakalayalasaddaṁ taṁ sumuhnaravariṁdō vi । vaṇamālāē saha piyayamāē kiṁ kiṁ kimayaṁ ? ti ।। 8417 । ।
jaṁpatō saṁpattō tattha paēsamma jāva pēkkhēi । taṁ vīrayaṁ kuvidaṁ atibībhacchaṁ paṇaccataṁ ॥8418।।
mayaṇamaṇamōhiyamaṇaṁ jaraḍaṁḍīkhaṁḍanivasaṇaṁ dīṇaṁ । phuḍiuddharukkhakēsaṁ sukkaṁ kīlaṁ va davadaḍḍhaṁ ।।8419।।
urakayasarāvamālaṁ muttāsuipaṁkagōvvaravittiṁ । vaṇamālē ! vaṇamālē! tti jaṁpiraṁ dukkhaparikaliyaṁ ॥। 8420 ।।
puṇapuṇaniyanāmaggahaṇasavaṇaō jāyagaruyasaṁkāē । saṁgōvaṁgaṁ pi tayaṁ niuṇaṁ avalōyamāṇīē ॥ 8421 ॥
vaṇamālāē uvalakkhiūṇa sō daṁsiō naridassa । jaha ēsō sō naravara ! maha bhattā vīrayakuvindō ||8422 ।।
majjha viōē jāō ērisaō ēsa pēmmagagahiō । ummattaō varāō aha taṁ sōūṇa sumuhanivō ||8423 ।।
vaṇamālā samaṁ ciya dōnni vi gahiyāiṁ garuyasōēṇa । takkhaṇamēva parōpparamēvaṁ ca payaṁpamāṇāī ||8424 ।।
ēsēsa sō varāō vīrayanāmō kuvidakulajāō । amhāṇa cēṭṭhiēṇaṁ ēyamavatthaṁtaraṁ pattō ॥ 8325।।
hā nigghiṇaṁ kayamiṇaṁ kammaṁ amhēhi niyamaṇēhi । dhi ddhī ēvaṁ amhāṇa cēṭṭhiyaṁ vigayasīlāṇa ॥ 8426।।
kiṁ ēttō vi pāvaṁ mahāmahaṁta havējja tijaē vi । visayapasattēhiṁ kayaṁ jaṁ ēyaṁ kaha vi amhēhiṁ ॥। 8427 ।।
ihaparalōyaviruddha dhammasuīniṁdiyaṁ mahāpāvaṁ । hā hā mōhavasā kayamēyaṁ amhēhiṁ ahamēhi
tē dhannā sappurisā visayapasaṁgaṁ samaggamujjhēuṁ । ihaparalōē ya hiyaṁ kuṇaṁti jē dhammamaṇavarayaṁ । 8429।।
kattō amhāṇa puṇō dhammassa lavō vi galiyasīlāṇa । pāvapasattāṇaṁ kēvalaṁ pi pāvaṁ kuṇaṁtāṇa ॥। 8430 ||
puvvapurisāṇa maggō amhēhi kalaṁkiō visuddhō vi । ēyaṁ mahāmahaṁtaṁ pāvadvāṇaṁ kuṇatēhi ||8431 ।।
tā ēttha vadaṇijjā tē cciya purisā jayammi sayalammi । jē mukkavisayasaṁgā kuṇaṁti uggaṁ tavaccaraṇaṁ ।। 8432 ।।
iya ēvamāigāḍhaṁ aṇutappaṁtāī tāī hiyayammi । vijjūē gayaṇāō paḍiūṇaṁ dō vi daḍḍhāī || 8433 ||
anōnnaṁ nēhēṇa ya pariṇāmēṇa ya suhēṇa dōṇhaṁ pi । mariūṇaṁ uppattī jāyā harivāsakhēttammi ||8434।।
mērussa dāhiṇēṇaṁ nisaḍhō nāmēṇa atthi kulasēlō । taha ya mahāhimavaṁtō tēsi dōnhaṁ pi majjhammi ||8435 ||
taṁ harivāsaṁ khēttaṁ vasaivisālaṁ vasuṁdharā jassa । maṇikuṭṭimaṁ va vimalā vicittaujjāṇaramaṇijjā | 8436॥
raya paṁkakaṭayātīhi virahiyā savvaō samā rammā । taha daṁsamasaga maṁkuṇajūyāivivajjiyā niccaṁ ॥। 8437।।
na ya caṁdasūriyāṇaṁ uvarāō tattha jāyai kayā vi । na ya tivvāyavavāyā sīyanivāyā va jāyaṁti ।। 8438 ।।
jāyaṁti tattha maṇuyā jugavaṁ naranārijuyaladhammēṇa । sayalapurisitthilakkhaṇakaliyā paibhajjabhāvēṇa । । 8439 ।।
kīlati jahicchāē ahamidā amara mihuṇasāricchā । rōyajarāparimukkā akālamaccūpariccattā ॥। 8440 ॥ !

payaṇukasāyā payaīē bhaddayā suppasaṁtacittā ya । apicchā mucchāvajjiyā ya maṇimōttiyāīsu ||8441 ||
karikarahaturaṁgāisu saṁtēsu vi caupaēsu jīvēsu । tapparibhōgavimukkā aṇūsuyā kāmacārī ya ॥। 8442 ।।
parivijiyapavaṇavēgā maccharavērāṇubaṁdhaparimukkā । dōpaliōvamaāū dōkōsasamūsiyasarīrā ||8443 ||
aṭṭhāvīsa hiyasayaṁ piṭṭikaraṁḍāṇa jāyaē tēsi । chaṭṭhassa ya pajjaṁtē āhāramimē samīhaṁti ॥ 8444 ||
āhāramāi savvaṁ tēsi saṁpajjaē samīvāō । kappadharaṇīruhāṇaṁ tē hōṁti puṇō dasapayārā ।।8445 ।।
mattaṁ gayā ya bhiṁgā tuḍiyaṁgā nāma hōṁti taiyā u । dīvasihā jōisihā cittaṁgā nāma cittarasā ||8446 ॥
maṇiyaṁgā aṭṭamayā gēhāgārā ya aṇigiṇā dasamā । ēyāī nāmāī guṇā ya ēsi imē hōṁti ॥ 8447 ॥
mattaṁgaēsu sussāumairarasapunnakōsagāgārā । bhigēsu thālakaccōlamāibahubhāyaṇāyārā ||8448 ॥
tuḍiyaṁgēsu cauvvihaāujjāgāraphalavisēsāu । tayavitayaṁ ghaṇasusiraṁ tē uṇa bhēyā imē caurō ॥। 8449 ।।
vīṇāpamuhaṁ ca tayaṁ vitayaṁ puṇa hōti paḍahamāīyaṁ । nālāīyaṁ tu ghaṇaṁ susiraṁ puṇa kāhalāīyaṁ ॥। 8450 ।।
dīvasihā uṇa taruṇō ujjōyagarā hasaṁti dīva vva । jōisihā uṇa ravimaṁḍalaṁ va ubbhāsayā hōṁti ।। 8451 ।।
cittaṁgaēsu kusumā havaṁti varasurahipaṁcavannā ya। cittarasēsu vicittā havaṁti sussāuāhārā ॥। 8452 ।।
maṇiyaṁgēsu bahuvihā nēurakēūrahāramāīyā । bhūsaṇabhēyā jāyaṁti bhāsurā sōhasaṁjaṇayā ॥ 8453 ।।
gēhāgārēsu puṇō pāyārēhiṁ samaṁtaō guttā । sōvāṇapaṁtikaliyā vicittasālābhiramaṇijjā ।। 8454 ।।
raiharagavakkhapacchannapayaḍaōvarayakuṭṭimayalēhiṁ । nāṇāvihēhiṁ kaliyā hōṁti nivāsā ativisālā ॥। 8455 ।।
aisanharuirasukumāla phāsatē illavatthasaṁvāyā। jāyaṁti aṇigiṇēsuṁ sāricchā dēvadūsāṇaṁ ॥। 8456 ।।
iya dasavihakappaṭṭa masaṁpāiyapavarabhōgauvabhōgā । saggē sura vva maṇuyā na muṇaṁti gayaṁ pi tē kālaṁ || 8457।।
jai visaya muggayāī sarasāiṁ tattha sālimāīṇi । dhannāī saṁti taha vi hu tāiṁ na bhuṁjaṁti naratiriyā । । 8458 ।।
kiṁtu mahimaṭṭiyāsāhikusumapattāiyā vi sāurasā । huti aṇatagaṇēṇaṁ sakkaradakkhārasāō vi ।। 8459 ।।
tēsi ciṁya paribhōgaṁ kuṇaṁti tē taha parōpparaṁ tiriyā । sīhabhuyaṁgāīyā akūrabhāvā na khāyaṁti ॥ 8460 ॥
āummi thōvasēsē mihuṇaṁ jaṇiūṇa tē narā tattō । kālaṁ kāūṇa surā havaṁti sōhammakappammi ॥ 8461 ।।
thēvakasāyattaṇaō tiriyāṇa vi tattha āuyakhayammi । uppattī saṁjāyai kappē sōhammanāmammi ||8462 ||
mihuṇattēṇuvavannāī tāī dōnni vi imammi khēttammi । harināmēṇaṁ sumuhō hariṇīnāmēṇa vaṇamālā ||8463 ।।
divvajuidivvadēhaṁ divvāharaṇaṁ ca divvavaravatthaṁ । divvavilēvaṇalittaṁ vihūsiyaṁ divvakusumahi ||8464 ||
susuyaṁdhigaṁdhamaṇuvamasirījuyaṁ mihuṇayaṁ imaṁ tattha । puvvōvavanniyaguṇē uvabhuṁjai uttamē bhaē | ||8465 ||
ēttō yasō kuviṁdō ummattō vīragō'bhihāṇēṇa । vijjunivāraṇa haē sumuhanivē savaṇamālami ||8466।।
bālatavaṁ kāūṇaṁ dīharanaharōmakēsamalaviṭṭhō । parivāliūṇa āuṁ mariuṁ sōhammakappammi ||8467 ||
kivvisiyadēvāṇaṁ majjhē dēvattaṇēṇa uppannō । daṭṭhūṇa dēvariddhi pauṁjaē jāba sō avahiṁ ॥ 8468।।
pēkkhēi tāva niyayaṁ puvvillamaṇussabhavagayaṁ dēhaṁ । taṁ harihariṇījuyalaṁ tattō dārāvahārakayaṁ ॥ 8469 ।।
sariūṇa puvvavēraṁ mahughayasittō vva huyavahō jāō। rattacchō duppēcchō pajjaliō garuyakōvaṇa ।। 8470 ।।

phuruphuruphuraṁta aharō mārēuṁ jāva vaṁchaē tāī । niruvakkamāuyataṁ mayāṇa suralōyagāmittaṁ

nāūṇa tāva tasi bahudukkhuppāyaṇaṁ taō kāuṁ । duggaigamaṇōvāyaṁ citēūṇaṁ niyamaṇammi || 8473 ||
aidīharaṁ pi dēhaṁ uvasaṁhariūṇa dēvasattīē । kāūṇa bharahamaṇuyāṇusāra dhaṇusayapamāṇaṁ ॥। 8474।।
saha kappapāyavēhiṁ sō dēvō tāī dōnni vi imammi | āṇēi bharahavāsē dēsē aṁgābhihāṇammi || 8475 ।।
caṁpāē nayarīē tattha ya ikkhāguvaṁsa saṁbhūō । nāmēṇa caṁdakittī rāyā paṁcattamaṇupattō ॥ 8476॥
sō ya auttō tattō tē savvē sāmivajjiyā jāyā । sāmaṁtamaṁtisahiyā nāyarayā sāmiyaṁ annaṁ ।।8477।।
nivalakkhaṇaguṇajuttaṁ annēsaṁtā bhamaṁti nayarīē । aha sō uvasōhaṁtō dēvō divvāē riddhī ||8478 ।।
tēsiṁ puraō ṭhaviḍaṁ taṁ mihuṇaṁ kappapāyavēhi samaṁ । pabhaṇai bhō bhō tubbhē amaccapaurā ! sasāmaṁtā ! ।।8479 ।।
majjha nisāmēha giraṁ tumhāṇa narīsarō vihivasēṇa । ēsa auttō pattō paṁcattaṁ saṁpayaṁ tattō ॥ 8480 ||
tubhē gavēsayaṁtā cihna annaṁ narāhivaṁ kaṁpi । tēṇa maē tumha kaē harivāsāō samāṇīō ॥। 8481||
ēsō asēsanaravailakkhaṇasamalaṁkiō guṇanivāsō । harināmō ēsō uṇa hariṇīnāmā imassa piyā ॥। 8482 ।।
nīsēsa guṇagaṇajuyā āṇīyā ēttha caṁpanayarīē । tā vajjapaumasatthiyacakkaṁkusabhūsiō ēsō ||8483 ||
sirivacchaṁkiyavacchatthalō ya tumhāṇa sāmiō hōu । nayavikkamasaṁpannō puhaīē pālaṇasamatthō || 8484।।
savvōuyā va ēē kappamahāpāyavā phalasamiddhā । mihaṇassa imassa maē ahāratthaṁ ihāṇīyā ।। 4485 ।।
ēsi ca pāyavāṇaṁ phalāī gahiūṇa maṁsarasaēṇaṁ । sāvayavihagādīṇaṁ saṁjōēūṇa tumhēhiṁ ॥ 8486 ॥
ēēsi dōnhaṁ pi hu āhārō paṛadiṇaṁ pi dāyavvō । bhakkhēhiṁ ya pāṇēhiṁ ya auvva uvvēhiṁ paurēhiṁ ॥। 8487 ।।
uvayariyabvāī imāī tayaṇu suyalāvayāimaṁsēhi । maṁsarasāīhi ya kēvalēhi bhuṁjāviyavvāi || 8488 ।।
ēsēva ya āhārō ēēsi dēhabalakarō hōhī । iṁdiyapalhāyaṇaō vīriyasaṁvaddhaṇō taha ya ।। 8489 ।।
dēvassa imaṁ vayaṇaṁ taha tti paḍivajjiūṇa paramēṇa । viṇaēṇa sīsaviṇihiyakaraṁjalī kayapaṇāmā ya ।। 8490 ।।
tē savvē vihu sāmaṁtamaṁtinaranāhanāyarappamuhā । ārōhēūṇaṁ rahavarammi harisēṇa taṁ mihuṇaṁ ।। 8491॥
dhārijjatēṇaṁ uvari dhavalachattēṇa chaṇasasisa mēṇa । nīhārahāranimmalaḍhalaṁtavaracāmarēhiṁ ca ॥। 8492 ।।
puraō apphāliyabahupayāratarōhagahīraghōsēhiṁ । paḍisaddiyasayaladiyantarālamuhalīkayanahēhiṁ ॥। 8493।।
uddāmasaddabaṁdiyaṇavaṁdaugghuṭṭhajayajayaravēṇa 1 pēcchaṇayagīya vāiyanaṭṭēhi ya kīramāṇēhiṁ ।।8494 ॥
nayarīē pavēsēuṁ nēūṇa nariṁdamaṁdirē tattha । hariṇō vicchaḍḍēṇaṁ kuṇaṁti rajjammi ahisēyaṁ ॥ 8495 ।।
titthammi vaṭṭamāṇē sīyalanāhassa caṁpanayarīē । ṭhaviḍaṁ hari naridaṁ suralōē sō surō pattō ॥ 8496 ॥
dēvōvaiṭumaṁsāhārāipaōgaō paidiṇaṁ pi । taṁ uvayaraṁti puvvuttamaṁtisāmaṁtamāīyā ।।8497 ।
aha sō harī nariṁdō paramaparakkamanaēhiṁ mahivalayaṁ । tijalahi mēhala mēraṁ pasāhaē paṇayasāmaṁtaṁ ॥। 8498 ।।
rayaṇāī jāī kāī vivērinariṁdāṇa āsi rajjēsu । kannāhi samaṁ gahiyāī tāī ēēṇa savvāī ।।8499 ।।
sāipavittīē surasattīē ya tassa mihuṇassa । apavattiūṇa āussa tō ṭhitī palahuyā jāyā ।। 8500 ।।
paṁcapayārē bhōē ēsō bahuyāī vāsalakkhāī । bhuṁjatō hariṇīē jaṇayai puttaṁ pavarakiti ॥ 8501 ।।
puhaīvaiti nāmaṁ jāō ēsō kamēṇa gahiyakalō । sūrō saralō cāī dakkhinnaparō khamāvatō ||8402।।
harinaravaī vi saha piyayamāē hariṇīē vihiya bahupāvō । mariūṇa gaō narayaṁ tivvamahāvēyaṇaṁ ghōraṁ ॥। 8503 ।।
harivāsāō hariō harināmō naravaī imō jēṇa । ēyassa tēṇa vaṁsō harivaṁsō nāma saṁjāō || 8504 ॥

aha puravaī rajjē ahisittō savvarāyalōēṇa । akhaliyapayāvapasa jāō jasabhariyabhuvaṇayalō ।। 8505 ।।
sāgarasīmā vasumaīē sāmī mahānivō jāō । kālēṇa samuppannō mahāgirī nāma tassa suō ।।8506 ।।
ahisiciūṇa rajjē ēyaṁ aha puhaivaī mahārāō । ginhēūṇaṁ dikkhaṁ kāūṇa tavaṁ divaṁ pattō ।। 8507 ॥
kāūṇa ēgachattaṁ rajjaṁ pasaratanimmalajasōhō । rāyā mahāgirī vi hu himagirināmammi puttammi ||8508 ||
rajjaṁ nivēsiūṇa dikkhaṁ gahiūṇa kammasaṁghāyaṁ । savvaṁ pi khavēūṇaṁ akkhayasōkkhaṁ gaō mōkkhaṁ ।। 8509 ।।
rāyā va himagirī himagiri va dhavalaṁ jasaṁ mahiyalammi | vitthāriūṇa savvattha vasugiriṁ niyasuyaṁ tattō ।। 8510 ।
ṭhaviūṇaṁ niyarajjē vimalaṁ paḍivajjiūṇa pavvajjaṁ । niṭṭaviūṇaṁ kammaṁ samaggamavi sivapayaṁ pattō ।।8511 ।।
nayavikkamasaṁpannaṁ rajjaṁ parivāliuṁ vasugirī vi । girināmayammi puttē ārōvēūṇa rajjabharaṁ ।।8512 ।।
gahiūṇa vayaṁ khaviūṇa kammanicayaṁ gaō payaṁ paramaṁ । girinaravaī vi puttaṁ mittagiri ṭhāviuṁ rajjē ।।8513 ।।
jiṇavaimayappabhāvaṇamaṇahaṁ kāūṇa kayatavavisēsō । āukkhaē mahiḍḍhiyadēvō vēmāṇiō jāō ।।8514।।
ēēṇa'ṇukkamēṇaṁ harivaṁsē savvajaya siddhammi । kālēṇa asaṁkhējjā saṁjāyā vasumatīvaiṇō ।।8515 । । ।
nayavikkamacāyāīhiṁ nimmalē hi guṇēhiṁ parikaliyā । niyaniyaputtēsu nivēsiūṇa rajjassa pabbhāraṁ ।। 8516।।
dikkhaṁ gahiūṇa jiṇidadēsiyaṁ kē vi khaviyakammaṁsā | mōkkhammi gayā kēi vi jāyā vēmāṇiyā dēvā ।। 8517।।
ēvaṁ samaikkatēsu ēttha purisaṁtarēsu bahuē । magahābhihāṇadēsē kusagganāmammi varanayarē
ōrōhacariyarēhaṁtagaruyapāyāravihiyaparivēḍhē । sunibiḍakavāḍa puḍadupavēsapaōlidārammi
suvisivaṭṭasaṁṭhiyaka visīsayasēṇisōhamāṇammi । viulaṭṭālayamālāmaṁḍiyapāyārasiharammi
cakka musaṁḍhigayā hiṁsayagdhivagdhīhiṁ parabhayakarammi । chēyāyariyaviṇimmiyadaḍhaphali (ha) mahiṁdakīlammi ।। 8521 । ।
uvviddhaviulagaṁbhīrakhāyavalaēṇa savvaō kaliē । ārāmujjāṇāgaḍatalāyavappiṇaguṇāṇugaē ॥। 8522 ।।
halasayasahassa saṁkaṭṭhalaṭṭhapannattasēusīmammi । ucchujavasālikaliē gōmahisagavēlagappaurē ।।8523 ।।
paracakkāgamasaṁbhavabhayaparimukkammi riddhisusamiddhē । sighāḍagatigacaccaracaukkaparibhattisuhayammi ।। 8524 । ।
pamuijaṇajāṇavaē aṇēgamāṇavagaṇēhi sakinē । varaturayamattakuṁjararahapahagararēhirapahammi
pāyāragūḍhagōuratōraṇarāyaṁtabhavaṇadēvaulē | dēvaulasiharadhuvvaṁtadhavaladhayasuhayagayaṇayalē
paṇakāmiṇipāḍayasaṁcaraṁtakāmiyaṇaraiyavaragēē । muṭṭhiganaḍanaṭṭagajallamallavēlaṁbagāṇugaē
āikkhagalāsagalaṁkhamaṁkhatūṇaila kahagapavagēhiṁ । tālāyarēhiṁ taha tuṁbavīṇiēhiṁ ca saṁkinnē ॥। 8528।।
ukkōḍiyagāyāgaṁṭhibhēyabhaḍatakkarēhiṁ parimukkē । taha khaṁḍarakkharahiē khēmē niruvaddavasubhikkhē ।। 8529।।
vī satthasuhāvāsē aṇēgakōḍīkuṭuṁbiyāinē । niccūsavasayakaliē parōpparaṁ kalahaparimukkē ।। 8530 ।।
jattha phalihujjalaìvalaviṇimmiyāī jiṇidabhavaṇāī । siharaṭṭhiyakaṁcaṇakala sakaṁ tisaṁkamaṇakavilāī ।8531।।
kīlāsēlanimittaṁ naravaiṇō pēsiyāī suravaḍaṇā । siharāī sumērussa va ṭhāṇaṭṭhāṇēsu rēhati yugmaṁ ।। 8532।।
jiṇahara siharēsu raṇaṁta kiṁkiṇī mahaladhayavaḍaggāī । uḍdulasiyāī kati va jiṇabhattāṇa uḍḍhagaī ।।8533 ।।
ahavā ki uvarigayaṁ ciṭṭhasi ōyarahi hēṭuō jhatti । jaha aṭṭha vi disibhālā tumhaṁ suranaravarapurāṇa ।। 8534।।
dōnhaṁ pi suṁdarāsuṁdarattaṇaṁ suniuṇaṁ viyārati । ēvaṁ sagganivāsīṇa puravaraṁ akkhivaṁti vva ।।8535 ।।

kaiyā vi bāhiramuhaṁ uddhayamāṇāī māruyavasēṇa । ōsaraha dūradūraṁ sigdhaṁ saṁvaraha gajjiravaṁ ।। 8538 ।।
annaha iha nayaranariṁdakuṁjarā bhaṁjiūṇa ālāṇaṁ । payalōhasaṁkalaṁ tōḍiūṇa sudaḍhaṁ pi kōvēṇa ।। 8539 ।।
parasidhuragaṁdhassa vi asahaṁtā jhatti sammuhaṁ tumha । dhāvissaṁti tti duyaṁ disikariṇō vārayaṁ tivvaṁ ।। 8540 ।।
aṭṭhahiṁ gāhāhiṁ kulayaṁ-
navajōvvaṇalacchīmaṇaharāṇa suraramaṇisarisaruvāṇa । mayaṇakarikuṁbhavibbhamapaōharakkaṁtahiyayāṇa ।।8541 ।।
aliulakajjalasāmalavēṇīḍaṁḍēhi atipalaṁbēhi । gamaṇavasēṇuppaiuṁ puṇō puṇō nivayamāṇēhiṁ ॥। 8542।।
girikasyavisālaniyaṁbabiṁbabhārēṇa maṁtharagaittaṁ । ālōiūṇa vikkayavēlāvaikamaṇasaṁkāē ।।8543 । । ।
sigghayaragatinimittaṁ pēllatēhi va virāmamāṇīṇaṁ । ālāvāyannaṇajaṇiyatanhamatthittarahiyaṁ pi ।। 8544 । ।
khīrāimullapucchaṇaparāyaṇaṁ nayarataruṇanaravaggaṁ । kamaladaladīharēhiṁ nayaṇēhiṁ nirikkhiūṇa khaṇaṁ ।। 8545 ।।
avagayatabbhāvāṇaṁ tappaḍivayaṇaṁ abhāsamāṇāṇaṁ । gamiūṇa avannāē vaccaṁtīṇaṁ purō maggē ।। 8546 ।।
gōvajuvaīṇa matthayavinnatthēsuṁ mahaṁtakuṁbhēsu । aṁtō viṇihittāī khīrāṇi dahīṇi ya ghayāṇi ।।8546 ।।
samuvēṁtāī cau (ha) ṭṭaēsu niccaṁ pi jattha najjati । sōūṇa lavaṇajalahiṁ pīyaṁ ēkkēṇa culuēṇa ।।8548 ।।
hēlā cciya muṇiṇā agatthināmēṇa niyamaṇē bhīyā । jō khāraṁ pi samuddaṁ ēvaṁ āviśya savvaṁ pi ।। 8549 ।।
niddhē mahurē ya kahaṁ sō amhē chaḍḍahī aparipīē । iya citiūṇa niyaniyajalamāṇusiyāṇa sīsēsu ।। 8550 ।।
ārōviyakalasēsuṁ appāṇaṁ gōviūṇa ainihyaṁ । khīradahighayasamuddā pavisaṁtā saraṇahēuṁ ca ।। 8551 ।।
ēkkārasahiṁ gāhāhiṁ kulayaṁ.
kannāḍalāḍamē vāḍagauḍakarahāḍacōḍadaviḍāṇa siṁhalakaliṁgamālavatilaṁgabaṁgaṁgamagahāṇa ।। 8552 ।।
kuṁkaṇa kacchasuraṭṭhāmarahaṭṭayasidhuaṁdhadēsāṇa । gujjaragajjaṇayāīṇa jaṇavayāṇaṁ jaṇō jattha
।।8553।।
nivasatō najjai kira kaivayakālāgamissa saṁhāraṁ । āsaṁkiūṇa vihiṇā tayaṇaṁtaramaṇuyasaggakaē ।। 8554 ।।
nīsēsadēsasaṁbhavanāṇāvihamaṇuyajāibīyāṇaṁ । niruvaddavaṁ ti nāuṁ āgēuṁ saṁgahō vva kaō ।। 8555 ।।
cauhi gāhāhiṁ kulayaṁ-
jattha ya pukkhariṇīō phalihujjalasāusalilanivahēṇa । kuṁbhubbhavamuṇipāṇāsaṁkiyacittēhi tiyasēhi ।। 5856 । ।
nīrāyaramajjhāō āyaḍhḍēūṇa rakkhaṇanimittaṁ । khittēṇaṁ amaēṇa va paḍipunnāō samaṁtēṇa ॥। 8557।।
taḍaniyaḍarūḍhanavanibiḍaviḍavipaṁtīhi pattachāyāō । acca bhuyabhūisamanniyassa tassēva nayarassa ।।।। 8558 ।।
daṁsaṇahēuṁ vasuhāvahūē āṇaṁdabāhabhariyāō । unnāmiyabhumayāō pasāriyāu vva diṭṭīō ॥। 8559 ।।
jatthaya sarōvarēsuṁ purataruṇīhiṁ jalassa bhariūṇa । dōhiṁ vi karēhi gahiuṁ ukkhittā niyasirassuvaraṁ ।। 8560 ।।
ārōhaṇakajjēṇaṁ kuṁbhā sōhaṁti hiyayadēsatthā । thaṇakalasasamāṇattaṇajāṇaṇahēuṁ va saṁṭhaviyā ||8561 ।।
jattha ya purajuvaīṇaṁ sīsē jalabhariyaṭhaviyakuṁbhāṇaṁ । saratīraniggayāṇaṁ samīvasaṁcariyadaiyāṇaṁ ।।8562 ।।
cēlaṁcalamāruyasaṁgadīviyāṇaṁgaagaṇidāhēṇa । savaṁgavihariyāṇaṁ nivaḍaṁti ghaḍā sirōhitō ।।8563।।
sīyattakāraṇēhi amhēhi sirammi saṁṭhiēhi pi । kaha tappati imāō varaīō iya visanna vva ।।8564।।
tihi gāhāhiṁ kulayaṁ-
jattha vahumuhasōhāāṇayaṇatthaṁ va attaṇō bibē । vises saṁghaḍēi ya kalāō caṁdō paidiṇaṁ pi ।।8565 ।।

jassa sasisaṁkhadhavalā jaṇayaṁti guṇā na kassa acchariyaṁ । jē ēgasarūvā vi hu aṇēgavihakajjasaṁjaṇayā ।। 8578 ।।
mittāṇa ujjalāī muhāī maliṇāraṁ puṇa amittāṇa । sēvayajaṇahiyayāiṁ rattāiṁ kuṇaṁti jaṁ ēē ॥8579 ।।
bāvattarikalanilaō avihaṁḍiyamaṁḍalō sayākālaṁ । mayasaṁgavippamukkō cattō dōsāyarattēṇa ॥। 8580 ।।
savisēsapahāpasarō saṁpajjai mittasaṁgamē pattē । kamalāvabhāsaō jōyaauvvarāyattaṇaṁ vahai ।। 8581 ॥ yugmam
jassa guṇē gijjaṁtē sōuṁ kayamaccharēṇa vi maṇammi । takkōvāsaṁkiyamāṇasēṇa sāvaṁ adēṁtēṇa ।।8582 ।।
bāhi daṁsiyagurupaharisēṇa hasiūṇa tiyasanāhēṇa । taṁ ciya sēvaha maha lahuyabaṁdhavaṁ tattha gaṁtūṇaṁ ॥ 8583।।
iya āṇattā saggaṁ caiuṁ kira āgayāō dēvīō । najjati vāranārīō sīhadārē visaṁtīō ।।8584 ।।
sihipicchakuccaēhi samullasaṁtēhi uvaribhāyammi । siharuggayaahiṇavavaṇarāīhiṁ virāyamāṇēhiṁ ।। 8585।।
suviyaḍakuṁbhayaḍavibhāyaghaḍiyasiṁdūrarēṇuniyarēhiṁ । ugghāḍiyanavagēruyakhāṇīhiṁ va sōhamāṇēhiṁ ।। 8586 ।।
gurugaṁḍamaṁḍalā bhōyagaliyaghaṇadāṇavārinivahēhiṁ । nijjharajharaṁtasalilappavāhauvasōhiēhi va
।।8587 ।।
dō pāsēsu palaṁbirasavittharattharaṇarēhamāṇēhiṁ । puṇaravi parūḍhasuviyaḍapakkhauḍasamanniēhi ca ॥ 8588 ॥
bhujjō vi puraṁdaravajjadhāyabhīrūhi saraṇapattēhi । kulasēlēhiṁ va rēhai karīhiṁ bhavaṇaṁgaṇaṁ jassa ।। 8589 ।।
paṁcahi gāhāhi kulayaṁ -
tassanayavikkamēhiṁ pālaṁtassa ya kamāgayaṁ rajjaṁ । paumāvaitti nāmaṁ āsi piyā savvaguṇakaliyā ।। 8590 ।।
savvaṁtē urapavarā viyasiyasyavattapattasamanayaṇā । sukumālapāṇipāyā ahīṇapaṁcidiyasarīrā ॥ 8591 ।।
sayalasupasatthaitthīlakkhaṇavajaṇa maṇunnasavvaṁgī । amayakara sōmakaṁtāyārā piyadaṁsaṇasakhvā ।।8592 ।।
sisu muṭṭhigijjhamajjhā kō muirayaṇiyaravimalasōmamuhī । varakaṇaya kuṁḍalulliyagaṁḍayala maṁḍalābhōyā
rayaṇāharaṇavihūsiyasavvaṁgī cāruvihiyasiṁgārā । sirakayakusumāmēlā paccakkhā amararamaṇi vva
।। 8593 ।।

aha annayā kayāi vi ēsā paumāvaī mahādēvī । amaravimāṇasa māṇammi vāsabhavaṇammi niyayammi ।। 8595 ।।
nivvaṇamahagghasuṁdaradāruviṇimmavi (ya) ubbhiya (ē) kkhaṁbhē । khaṁbhuggaya suvibhattaṁguvaṁgavarasālahaṁjīē ।। 8596 । ।
varavatthukammakusalēṇa vissakammōvamēṇa vaḍhḍaiṇā । nipphāiyammi nīsēsabhavaṇapaḍichaṁdayatthaṁ va ॥। 8597।।
varasālahaṁjiyāsuṁ ujjalavarabahupayāravannēhiṁ । kaṇayarasēṇa ya ṭhāṇuciya lihiyasuicittakammammi ।। 8598।।
maṇikaṇaya rayaṇa bhiyaviḍaṁgajāladḍacaṁdanijjūḍhē । suvibhattacaṁdasālākaliyammi vilāsanilayammi ।। 8599 ।।

nāṇāvihajāidasaddhavannamaṇibaddhakuṭṭimatalammi । paumalayapupphajātīpaḍimuvaritalāliyicitē ॥ 8602 ।।
navacaṁdaṇarasacacciya maṁgalakalasēhiṁ kaṁcaṇamaēhiṁ । sapauma muhēhiṁ kusumacciēhiṁ sōhaṁtadārammi ||8603 ||
laṁbiyamaṇimuttākaṇayadāmasaṁjaṇiyadāra sōhammi । kayakusumapayarapamhalamiusaṇasaṇāhamajjhami ॥ 8604।।
caṁdaṇakālāgurukuṁdurukkakappūravaraturūkkāṇa । ujjhatadhūvaaimaghamadhaṁtagaṁdhābhirāmammi
।।8605 ।।
।।8609।।
।।8610॥
gaṁdhavaragaṁdhiē savvaō vi varagaṁdhavaṭṭibhūyammi । maṇikiraṇaniyaranāsiyanīsēsata maṁdhayārammi || 8606 ||
tammajjhagaē sayaṇē sāliṁgaṇavaṭṭiē ubhayaō vi । bibbōyaṇasaṁjuttē samunnaē dō aṁtē ॥8607 ||
amarasaripuliṇavāluyauddālayasālisē visālammi । ōyaviyakhōmadōgullapaṭṭapacchāiyatalammi || 8608।।
paccutthuyammi attharayamalayanavatayakusattalibēhiṁ । suviraiyarayattāṇē rattaṁsuyasaṁvuē rammē
āīṇarūvanavaṇīyabūraravitūlatullaphāsammi । majjhimarattammi pasuttajaggirī ciṭṭhaē jāva
tāva sirivammadēvō tināṇasahiō gahēsu bahusu । uccadvāṇagahēsuṁ sāvaṇasiyapanarasitihīē ॥ 8611।।

aha sakkō āsaṇakaṁpanāyajiṇagabbhasaṁbhavō jhatti । āṇaṁdapulaiyataṇū upphulliyanayaṇakamalavaṇō ।।8613॥
saṁbhamavasacaliya kirīḍakaḍayamaṇikuṁḍalāiāharaṇō । rayaṇamayāō sīhāsaṇāō uṭṭhē i parituṭṭhō ॥8614।।
ōruhai pāyavīḍhāō ōmuyai rayaṇapāuyāō ya । ēgāē sāḍiyāē kāūṇaṁ uttarāsaṁgaṁ ।।8615।।
.bhālatalaghaḍiyakarakamalasaṁpuḍō sammuhaṁ jiṇavarassa । sattaṭṭhē va payāī aṇugacchai tayaṇu niyajāṇuṁ ॥। 8616।।
vāmaṁ aṁcittā dāhiṇaṁ tu dharaṇīyalē nivēsittā । tikkhuttō muddhāṇaṁ saṁghaṭṭai mēiṇīvī || 8617 ।।
kāūṇa aṁjali matthayammi sakkatthayaṁ taō bhaṇai । tattō iha āgaṁtuṁ kusagganayarammi vāsaharē ।।8618 ।।
suhasayaṇijjanivannaṁ dēvi paumāvaī paṇamiūṇa । saṁthaṇa paṁjaliuḍō sōhammavaī pahimaṇō ||8619॥
vaṁdāmi dēvi ! pāyapaṁkayāī sulakkhaṇavarāī । jīē taē niyauyarē tilōyabaṁdhū jiṇō dhariō ।।8620 ।।
kassa na salāha ṇijjā tijayammi vi ēttha havasi dēvi ! tumaṁ । jīē tuha kucchikuharē uppannō tijayakappatarū ।।
tujjha tisaṁjhaṁ pi namō sāmiṇi ! sugihīyanāmadhējjāē । tihuyaṇabhavaṇapaīvaṁ uyarammi jiṇaṁ vahatīē ।।8622 ।।
saṁpāiyaṁ taē cciya tijaē itthittaṇassa māhappaṁ । tihuyaṇaciṁtāmaṇiṇō jiṇassa jāya'si jaṁ jaṇaṇī ।।8623 ।।
iya thuṇiuṁ jiṇaṁjaṇaṇi tīsē kahiūṇa jiṇavarupapatti। bhariḍaṁ rayaṇēhi gihaṁ vaccai tiyasālayaṁ sakkō ।।8624 । ।
aha niyauyarammi jiṇē avayaramāṇammi tammi sumiṇā । gayavasahamāiyāī pāsaipaumāvaī dēvī ॥। 8625 ।।
taṁ jahā-caṁdujjalacaudaṁtaṁ gaṁḍatthalagaliyamayajalapavāhaṁ । ullasirathōrahatthaṁ giridaruṁda siyagaiṁdaṁ || 8626।।

sasisaṁkhasuddhavannaṁ ḍhikkiyasaddēṇa dinakannasuhaṁ । tikkhavaliyaggasiṁgaṁ niggayasaṁdhaṁ mahāvasa
saraiṁdukuṁdadhavalaṁ līlāē viśrabhamāṇamhakuharaṁ । paṁcāṇaṇaṁ sutarugaṁ unnāmiyadīhanaṁgūlaṁ
viyasaṁta sēyatāmarasasaṁṭhiyaṁ dēvayaṁ mahālacchi । kīraṁta'hisēyaṁ ubhayapāsa gayavaṇagaīdēhi
pasaraṁtabahalaparimalalubbhaṁtabhamaṁtabhūribhamaraulaṁ । viyasaṁtapavara bahukusumadāmajuyalaṁ atipalaṁbaṁ
junhājalapakkhāliyatamapaṁkappasaramasarisasirīyaṁ । sarayanisānāhamakhaṁḍamaṁḍalābhōyamakalaṁkaṁ
nāsiyanīsēsanisaṁdhayāraniyaraṁ phuraṁtakarapasaraṁ । niddaliyakamalaṇidaṁ diṇamaṇiṇō maṁḍalaṁ dittaṁ ।।8632 ।।
jaccatavaṇijjanimmiyanimmaladaḍhadīhadaṁḍasaṁja miyaṁ । dhavaladhayamullasaṁtaṁ raṇaṁtamaṇikiṁkiṇījālaṁ ।।8633 ।।
gōsīsasarasacaṁ daṇakayatilayaṁ vimalavāripasipunnaṁ । viyasiyapaumapihāṇaṁ kuṁbhaṁ laṁbiyasumaṇamālaṁ ॥। 8634॥

maṇikhaṁbhabhittikaliyaṁ kaṇatakalakiṁkiṇīhi kayasōhaṁ । dhuvvaṁtadhavaladhayavaḍavirāyamāṇaṁ varavimāṇaṁ ।। 8137 ।।
nāṇāvannamaṇīṇaṁ phuraṁtakiraṇēhiṁ raiyacittaṁ va । sayaladisibhittibhāēsu bhāsamāṇaṁ rayaṇarāsiṁ ॥। 8638 ||
niddhūmadhagadhagataṁ kēsuyajāsuyaṇa - kusumasaṁkāsaṁ । vaḍhtakavilajālākalāvamanalaṁ mahādittaṁ ।।8639॥
cōṭsa ēyāī mahāsumiṇāī kamēṇa niyamuhaṁburuhē । pavisaṁtāī sā pā ( si ) ūṇa paḍibujjhaē dēvī ||8640 ।।
aha pasibuddhā ēsā pīimaṇā paramapattasōmaṇasā । āṇadiyacittā harisavasavisappaṁtahiyayā ya ।।8641 ।।
ūsaviyarōmakūvā ghaṇadhārāhayakayaṁbakusumaṁ va । sumiṇāī tāī ōginhiūṇa uṭṭhē i sayaṇāō ।।8642 ।।
paccōruhai ya maṇipāyavīḍhaō acavalaṁ asaṁbhaṁtaṁ । aturiyamavilaṁbiyayaṁ haṁsavahasula liyagatīē ||8643 ||
vaccai sumittanaranāhaaṁtiē taṁ piyāhi kaṁtāhi । iṭṭhāhiṁ maṇannāhiṁ ya ōrālāhi maṇāmāhiṁ ॥। 8644।।
kallāṇāhiṁ sivāhi maṁgallāhiṁ ca sassirīyāhi । hiyayappalhāyaṇakāraṇīhi hiyayaṁgamāhiṁ ca || 8645 ।।
gaṁbhīraribhimamahurakkharāhi vaggr̥hi saṁlavēmāṇī । saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ paḍibōhiūṇa aha tēṇa aṇunāyā ।।8646 ।।
sīhāsamma nāṇāmaṇikaṁcanarayaṇa matticittammi । uvavisati taō vīsatyaviggahā aṁjali kāuṁ ।।8647 ।।
niyamatthayammi ārōviūṇa viṇaēṇa naravaī ēvaṁ । vinnavai jahā inhi dēva ! maē sumiṇayā diṭṭhā ।।8648।।
ēē gavasahāī caudasa niyayāṇaṇammi pavisaṁtā । tā sāhēha bhavissai kō ēēsi phalavisēsō ? ॥। 8649 ।।
aha naravaī sumittō ēyaṁ paumāvaīē dēvīē । āyanniūṇa vayaṇaṁ samuvvahaṁtō paramaharisaṁ ||8650 ।।
ōginhiūṇa sumiṇē sāhāviyavimalabuddhivihavēṇa । vīmaṁsiūṇa sāhai tēsi sumiṇāṇa phalamēyaṁ ।।8651 ।।
dēvāpiē ! diṭṭhā kallāṇaphalā taē imē sumiṇā । pugvabhavajjiyabahupunnapagarisassāṇubhāvēṇa ||8642 ।।
ētō saṁpajjisai tuha suhalābhō ya atthalābhō ya । bhōgōvabhōgalābhō suyalābhō iḍilābhō ya ॥ 8653।।
ārōggatuṭṭhidīhāuyattakallāṇamaṁgalavivaḍhḍī । avi ya navanhaṁ māsāṇa taha ya addhaṭṭhamadiṇāṇa ॥। 8654 ।।

kulajasakaraṁ ca kulanaṁdikārayaṁ kulavivaddhaṇaṁ ēvaṁ । kulapāyavaṁ ca kulapavvayaṁ ca sukumālakaracaraṇaṁ । । 8656 ।।

sūrō vīrō vikkhāyavikkamō kittibhariyabhuvaṇayalō । vitthinnaviulabalavāhaṇō ya hōhī mahārāyā । । 8658 ।।

ēvaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ ciya sumiṇāṇuvavahaṇaṁ kuṇaṁtammi । naranāhammi sumittē tattō paumāvatī dēvī ।।8660 ।।
atituhiyayā pāṇijyaṁ jōḍiūṇa taṁ ēvaṁ । jaṁpai dēvāṇupiyā ! ēmēva imaṁ jahā vaha || 8661॥
iya jaṁpatī dēvī rannō vayaṇaṁ paḍicchaē sammaṁ । aha sā sumittarannā abbhaṇunāyā samuṭṭha uṁ ।।8662 ।।
bhaddāsaṇāō vaccai niyasayaṇijjaṁ nisīyaē tattha । citai ya jahā ēē kallāṇā sumiṇayā majjha ।।8663 ।
niddāpamāiṇīē mā paḍihammaṁtu pāvasumiṇēhiṁ | tō dēvayagurupaḍibuddhiyāhiṁ suhāhiṁ jāgara ॥। 8664।।
aha sō sumittarāyā jāē paccūsakālasamayammi । iya kōḍuṁbiyapurisē sahāvē samāisai ||8665 ।।
jaha bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! ajja visēsēṇa kuṇaha khippaṁ pi । bāhiriyamuvadvāṇassa sālamaiparamaramaṇijjaṁ ॥। 8666।।
gaṁdhōdagacchāhiṁ sitaṁ sammajjiyaṁ ca uvalittaṁ । kusumēhi paṁcavannēhiṁ surahisarasēhiṁ kayapayaraṁ ॥। 8667 ।।
ḍajjhatapavarakālāgurudhūvaturukkakuṁdurukkē hi । atimaghamaghētagaṁdhaṁ sugaṁdhavaragaṁdhavaṭṭi va
।।8668।।
ēvaṁ kāūṇa sayaṁ kārēūṇa ya parēhiṁ sigghaṁ pi । tō tubhē majjha purō āgaṁtūṇaṁ nivēha ||8669।।
iya tē sumittarannā āṇattāgurupa mōyapa hatthā । gaṁtūṇaṁ taṁ taha savvamēva nivvattiūṇa taō ।।8670 ।।
āgaṁtr̥̄ṇa sumittassa nivaiṇō aggaō nivēti । aha sō sumittarāyā pāupabhāyāē rayaṇīē । । 8671।।
ummīlatē paṁkayavaṇammi aha paṁḍarē pabhāyammi । rattāsōyapagāsē kiṁsuyasuya muhasamāṇammi ।।7672 ||
guṁjaddhabaṁdhujīvagapārāvayapāyalōyaṇacchāē । jāsuyaṇakusumapajjaliyajalaṇatavaṇijjakalasanibhē ।।8673।।
lakkhārasahiṁguluyāirēgaaruṇappahēdiṇayarammi । uiyammi pahāpasarēṇa pavasiē aṁdhayārammi ।।8674 ।।
pasaraṁtanayaṇavisayappagāsaviyasaṁtadaṁsiē lōē । uṭṭhai sayaṇijjāō nikkhamijaṁ vāsabhavaṇāō ।।8675 ।।
aṭṭaṇasālābhimuhaṁ āgacchai tattha pavisiūṇa taō । vāyāmajōggavaggaṇavāmaddaṇamallajujjhāī ||8676॥
kāūṇa parissaṁtō sayapāgasahassapāgatēllēhiṁ । pasaratasurahigaṁdhēhi savvaō pīṇaṇijjēhi ।।8677 ।।
mayaṇijjadīvaṇijjēhiṁ dappaṇijjēhi bihaṇijjēhi । savvidiyapalhāyaṇajaṇaēhiṁ viraiyabbhaṁgō ||8678 ।।
punnasukumālakōmalatalapāṇipaēhiṁ taruṇapurisēhiṁ । chēēhiṁ dakkhēhiṁ mēhāvīhiṁ ca kusalēhi || 8679।।
paṭṭē hi niuṇasippōvagaēhi jiyastamēhiṁ niruēhi | abhaṁgamaddaṇuvvalaṇakaraṇanimmāyagattēhi ।।8680।।
ṭhāvēūṇaṁ navaṇīyamauyaphāsammi tēllacammammi । maṁsadvirōmasuhakāraēhi saṁvāhaṇavihīhi ||8681 ॥
avagayanīsēsaparissamō kaō aha sumittanaranāhō । aṭṭaṇasālāō nikkhamēi majjaṇaharē visai ।।8682 ।।
jālakaḍayābhirāmē vicittamaṇirayaṇakuṭṭimayalammi । varanhāṇamaṁḍavē savvaō vi suhaparamarama ṇijjē ।।8683 ।।
tattha varanāṇavīḍhē nāṇāmaṇirayaṇabhatticittammi । puvvābhimuhanisannō gaṁdhōdayapupphaudaēhiṁ ॥। 8684 ।।
saṁvāhiō samāṇō puṇō puṇō suddhasalilakalasēhiṁ । kallāṇapavaramajjaṇavihiṇā bahukōuyasaēhiṁ ॥। 8685 ।।
nivvattiyammi majjaṇakammammi sugaṁdhavarakasāīē । pamhalasukumālāē lūhiyagattō samaṁtēṇa ॥ 8686।।
aha ya sumahagghadūsāī parihiō cārucaṁdaṇarasēṇa । aṇulittasavvagattō suivannamaṁḍaṇāṇugaō ||8687 ।।
pasaraṁtabahalaparimalamālākaya sēharābhirāmasi । āviddhamaṇisuvannō kappiyahāradḍahārō ya ।।8688।।
tisarayapālaṁbalaṁbamāṇakaḍisuttakayamahāsōhō । gēvējjaaṁgulijjagakēūrābharaṇabhāsuriō ।।8689।।
maṇikaḍayatuḍiyathaṁbhiyabhuyajuyalō ahiyaruyasassiriō । varakaṇaya kuṁḍalujjōiyāṇaṇō mauḍadittasirō । 8690।
hārōtthayapivatthō muddiyamālāhi piṁgalaṁguliō । pālaṁbalaṁbamāṇayapaḍēṇa kayauttarāsaṁgō ।।8691।।
maṇikaṇaya rayaṇarēhirasuviulaāviddhavīravaravalaō । ki bahuṇā suyalaṁkiyavisiō kapparukkhō vva ।8692 ।

chattēṇa dharijjaṁtēṇa nihiya kōriṁṭamalladāmēṇa । vāravilāsiṇikarakamala caliyasiyacāmaruppīlō ।।8693 ।।
ālōyavihiya maṁgalajayajayasaddōṁ jaṇēhiṁ pariyariō । rāīsaratalavaraḍaṁḍaṇāyagēhi agēhi ।।8694 ।।
māṭuṁbiya kōṭuṁbiya maṁtimahā maṁtipīḍhamaddēhiṁ । dōvāriyagaṇagaamaccacē ḍasatthōhaputtēhi
।।8695 ।।
sēṭṭhīhi saṁparivuḍō sēṇāva saṁdhivāladūēhi । dhavalamahāmēhaviṇiggaō vva sōmō sayalamuttī ॥8696 ॥
gaharikkhatārayāṇaṁ majjhagaō sōmadaṁsaṇāyārō । sōhaṁtō naranāhō majjaṇabhavaṇāō nīharai ||8697 ।।
bāhiragayaṁ uvaṭṭhāṇasālamāgacchaē taō tattha । puvvābhimūhō nisīyai maṇimayasīhāsaṇē pavarē ।।8698 ।।
aha sō sumittarāyā adūradēsamma appaṇō tattha । uttarapuratthimāē disāē saviyāsaṭhāṇammi ।।8699 ।।
siyavatthēhiṁ paccatthuyāī parivihiyasaṁtikammāī | siddhatthāiaṇēyappayāra maṁgaliyavatthūhi ||8700 ॥
bhāsaṇāī aṭṭha uṭhavāvaē tayaṇu paṁcavannēhiṁ | maṇirayaṇēhi maṁḍiyamahiyayaraṁ daṁsaṇijjasiri ||8701 ।।
varapaṭṭaṇasaṁbhūyaṁ sumahagghaṁ vivihabhattisayacittaṁ । īhāmiyau sahaturaṁgamagaranara vihagavālāṇa ||8702।।
kinnararurukuṁjarasarabhacamaravaṇalayasa rōruhalayāṇaṁ । bhattīhi vicittaṁ kaṇagakhaciyapēraṁtapavibhāgaṁ ।।8703।।
javaṇiyamabhitariyaṁ aṁchāvai tayaṇu tīē majjhammi । attharagamiumasūragautthaiyaṁ dhavalavatthēṇa || 8704 ||
paccatthuyaṁ visiddha sarīrasuhajaṇaya phāsaṁsaṁjuttaṁ । paumāvaidēvīē bhaddāsaṇagaṁ uvāvēi ॥8605 ॥
aha kōḍuṁbiyapurisē saddāvittā samāisati rāyā। jaha bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! aṭṭha gamahānimittassa । । 8706 ।।
suttatthaviū bahusatthajāṇaē sumiṇapāḍhaē purisē । sigdhaṁ ciya saddāvaha sumittarannāiyapavr̥ttā ||8707 ||
tē kōḍuṁbiyapurisā pamōyapūrijjamāṇasavvaṁgā । sīsaraiyaṁjaliuḍā dēvāsa karēmō ti ॥ 8708।
jaṁpatā nivavayaṇaṁ abbhuvagacchaṁti paramaviṇaēṇa । tattō sumittanivaissa aṁtiyāō viṇikkhami ।।8709 ।।
majjhamajjhēṇa kusagganāmanayarassa sumiṇapāḍhagāṇa | gēhēsu uvāgaṁtuṁ kahēṁti tēsi nivāēsaṁ ॥। 8710 ।।
taṁ sōūṇaṁ tē sumiṇapāḍhayā harisaullasiyahiyayā । nhāyā kayabalikammā kayamaṁgalakōugāiyā ।।8711 ।।
parihiyapavaradugullā appavarāharaṇalaṁkiyasarīrā । muddhanivēsiyaduvvā siddhatthā niyagihēhitō ।।8712 । ।
nikkhamiūṇaṁ khippaṁ kusagganayarassa majjhamajjhēṇaṁ । vaccaṁti sumittanariṁdamaṁdiraddāra sammi ॥। 8713।।
ēttha milēūṇaṁ savvē pavisaṁti rāyabhavaṇammi । atthāṇamaṁḍavagayaṁ taō sumittaṁ narāhivaī ||8714 ||
vaddhāvēti ēṇaṁ vijaēṇa ya tayaṇu tēṇa naravaiṇā । acciya vaṁdiya pūiya sakkāriyasukayasammāṇā ।।8715 ।।
pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ puvvanihittēsu āsaṇavarēsu । viṇisīyaṁti taō sō sumittarāyā mahādēvi ॥। 8716 ।।
paumāvaī nivēsai bhahāsaṇagammi javaṇiyaṁtariē। tō pupphaphalasupūriyahatthē tē sumiṇasatthaṇṇū ||8717 ।।
paramēṇaṁ viṇaēṇaṁ jaṁpai jaha ajja rayaṇiviramammi । paumāvaidēvīē gayavasahāī mahāsumiṇā ।। 8718 ।।
caudasa diṭṭhā tēsi sumiṇāṇaṁ kērisaṁ phalaṁ hōhī ? । ēvaṁ dēvāṇupiyā ! paribhāvēḍaṁ mama kahēha ॥। 8719 ।।
iya tē sumittarannā bhaṇiyā āṇaṁdapūriyappāṇō । sumiṇē sammaṁ ōginhiūṇa īhaṁ aṇuvisaṁti ||8720 ।।
tattō parōparēṇa vīmaṁsēūṇa tēsi sumiṇāṇaṁ । ahigayaparamatthā patthivassa ēvaṁ nivēti ||8721।।
jaha amha sumiṇasatthē sumiṇā bāvarttāraṁ viṇihidvā । sāmannēṇaṁ tēsi apasatthā sāhiyā tīsaṁ ।।8722 ।।
bāyālī sapasatyā tēsu vi tīsaṁ havaṁti atipavarā । ētēsi tīsāē uttamasumiṇāṇa majjhāō ।।8723।।
ēē gavasahāī caudasa sumiṇē jiṇidajaṇaṇīō । pāsaṁti jiṇidammī gabbhē uppajjamāṇammi ॥। 8724।।
ahavā vi gabbhavāsē avayaramāṇammiṁ cakkavaṭṭimmi । pāsaṁti imāiṁ mahāsumiṇāī cakkijaṇaṇīō ।।8725।।

ēēsi ciya caudasasumiṇāṇaṁ kē vi satta annayarē । pāsaṁti mahāsumiṇē jaṇaṇīō vāsudēvāṇaṁ ।। 8726 ।।
baladēvamāyarō puṇa caurō sumiṇāī tēsu pāsaṁti । maṁḍaliyacaramadēhāṇa māyarō dōnni ēkkaṁ vā ।।8727।।
tā sāmi ! imē sumiṇā diṭṭhā paumāvaīē dēvīē । jē tāṇa phalaṁ mannē uppajjissai suō tīsē ॥। 8728 ।।
tijayapahū titthayarō battīsasuridayapaṇayapayakamalō | ahavā vi cakkavaṭṭī battīsasahassa nivanamiō ॥। 8729।।
tāsāmi ! imē suhayā dēvīē palōiyā mahāsumiṇā । kallāṇariddhiārōggabhōgasuhasiddhisaṁjaṇayā ।। 8730 ।।
ēēsi ēkkō vihu sumiṇō dīsai pabhayapunnēhi । kiṁ puṇa jugavaṁ caudasa ēē ēvaṁvihā sumiṇā || 8731 ।।
ēvaṁ bhujjō bhujjō tē savvē sumiṇapāḍhagā purisā । paumāvai dēvīē diṭṭhē sumiṇē pasaṁsaṁti ॥ 8732।।
aha sō sumittarāyā imamaṭṭha sumiṇapāḍharōhitō । sōccā pahiṭṭhahiyaō kayaṁjalī jaṁpaē ēvaṁ
ēmēva imaṁ bhō bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! jahā vayaha tubbhē । taṁ taha cēva tti puṇō puṇō tamaṭṭha paḍicchē
tō sumiṇapāḍhaē tē āhārēṇaṁ cauvvihēṇaṁ pi । varavatthagaṁdhamallālaṁkārēṇa ca
sakkārai sammāṇai viulaṁ taha jīviyārihaṁ tēsiṁ । pīīdāṇaṁ dalayai taō imē paḍivisajjēi
uṭṭhēi taō sīhāsaṇāu rāyā payāi pāsammi । paumāvaidēvīē jahanisuyaṁ sāhaē tīsē ||8737 ||
tattō sā paumāvaidēvī sōccā sumittanaravaiṇō । pāsammi ēyamaṭṭha pahiṭṭhahiyayā viyasiyacchī || 8738 ॥
taṁ sumiṇa sammaṁ paḍicchaē savinayaṁ aviṇayaṁgī । ētthaṁtarammi gayaṇaṁgaṇāu cāraṇamuṇī ēkkō ।।8739 ।।
avainnō sō rannā dinnammi varāsaṇē suhanisannō । saha piyayamāē paṇaō puṭṭhō ya phalaṁ sumiṇayāṇa || 8740 ।।
aha sō dinnuvaōgō nāṇammi viyāṇiūṇa paramatthaṁ । cāraṇasamaṇō sāhai puraō ranō sumittassa ।। 8741 ।।
jaha naravariṁda ! ētē sumiṇā aiuttamā jiṇamayammi । parikahiyā taha bahuhā savvē puvvapi diṭṭhaphalā ॥। 8742।।
tō ēsi sumiṇāṇaṁ pabhāvaō sayalabhuvaṇanamaṇijjō । puttō tumha bhavissai arahā harivaṁsakulatilaō ।।873 ।।
muṇisuvvaōtti nāmaṁ vīsaimō titthanāyagō ēttha । tisamuddamēhalāē mahimahilāē paī hōuṁ ॥। 8744।।
samayammi cattarajjō dikkhaṁ gahiūṇa ghāikammakhaē । uppannavimalanāṇō titthassa pavattaṇaṁ kāhī ।। 8745 ।।
iya kahiuṁ sō sāhū tamāladala sāmalammi gayaṇayalē । uppaiō sūrō iva tavatēēṇaṁ pabhāsaṁtō ।।8746 ।।
iya muṇivayaṇaṁ sōuṁ rāyā paumāvaī tahā dēvī । dōnni vi jāyāiṁ visēsapaharisūsa siyahiyayāī ॥। 8747 ।।
taha ṭhāūṇa muddattaṁ tattō paumāvaī mahādēvī । rannā samaṇunnāyā vāsaharē vaccai niyammi || 8748 ||
vhāyā kayabalikammā bhuṁjatī viulabhōgabhōgāī । taṁ acca bhuyabhūyaṁ gabbhaṁ uvvahai sā dēvī || 8749।।
jē puvvaṁ uppannā rōgaīyā uvahavā kē vi । dēsammi tammi āsī tē titthayarāṇubhāvēṇa ॥। 8750 ।।
savvē visavasaṁtā riddhisamiddhā vasuṁdharā jāyā । paṇayā paccatiyapatthivā vi savvē samatthā vi ।। 8751 ।।
rahakarituraṁgamaṇikaṇagarayaṇavatthāivatthudāṇēṇa । pūēṁti tē sumitaṁ naranāhaṁ jiṇapabhāvēṇa ।।8752 ।।
paumāvaī vi dēvī gabbhapabhāvēṇa dōhalē jāē । jiṇavayaṇāmayapāṇaṁ karēi kannaṁjalīhiṁ sayā ||8753 ।।
pūyai jirṇābiṁbāī bhattīē vaṁdaē jatijaṇaṁ ca । vihiṇā paḍilāī cauvvihāhārapabhiīhi ||8724 ।।
jiṇapavayaṇappabhāvaṇaparāyaṇā sā visēsaō kālaṁ । gamai parivālayaṁtī suddhā sāvayavayāī || 8755।।
vaḍatō sō ganbhō payass paumāvaīē dēvīē । saha dēhōvacaēṇaṁ sōhaggavisēsalāyannaṁ ।।8756॥
taṁ gabhamuvvahaṁtī dēvī paumāvaī virāēi | aṁtōnihittasūrā vimalā sarayabbhamāla vva ॥ 8757 ।।

punnammi māsanavagē gaēsu aṭṭamē diyasu । jēkasiṇa mīē rayaṇīē aḍarattammi ।।8758।।
aisa haṇammi laggē suhē mahattammi uttamē jōē । laggē suhagahadiṭṭhē hōrāē uḍavaṇāē ||8759।।
bahuēsuṁ ca gahēsuṁ uccadvāṭṭhiēsa suhasu । ēkkārasammi ṭhāṇē ṭhiēsu pāvaggahēsuṁ ca || 8760।।
savaṇataiyaṁsapattē caṁdē uiē ya jaṇamaṇāṇaṁdē । mayarē rāsimmi suhē suhaṁ pattē jaṇē sayalē ।।8761।।
vēruliyariṭṭhamaragayavaridvavannaṁ aṇannasamarūvaṁ । puttaṁ abbhuyabhūyaṁ pasavai paumāvaī dēvī ||8762।।
tammi jiṇajammasamaē savvē saṁsāravāsiṇō jīvā । kiṁ pi auvvaṁ suhamaṇuhavaṁti niraē vi nēraiyā । 8763।।
savvē sauṇā jaiṇō jāyā vāyā payāhiṇāvattā । nipphannasavvasāsaṁ saṁjāyaṁ mēiṇīvalayaṁ ||8764 ||
pupphaphalēhiṁ samiddhā saṁjāyā pāyavā samaggā vi । viyasiyakamalavaṇāī jāyāī sarōvarāī pi ।। 8765।।
tammi khaṇē ahalōē vatthavvā aṭṭha disikumārīō । bhōgaṁkara bhōgavatī subhōga taha bhōgamāliṇiyā ॥। 8766 ।।
tōyadharā ya vicittā ya pupphamālā aṇidiyā taha ya niyaniyakūḍēsu mahāpāsāyavaḍēṁsaēsuṁ ca ।।8767।।
pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ cauhiṁ sāmāṇiyāṇa sahasēhiṁ । cauhi mayahariyāhi niyaniyaparivārasahiyāī ।।8768 ।।
sarttāha aṇiēhiṁ tahā aṇiyāhivatīhi sattahi tahēva । sōlasahiṁ āyarakkhagasāhassīhi taha nahiṁ ॥। 8769।।
bahuēhi dēvēhi dēvīhi ya vāṇamantarīhi samaṁ । pavarāhi gīyavāiyanaṭṭāī palōyamāṇīō ।।8770।
caliyāī āsaṇāī daṭṭhūṇa pauttaōhināṇēṇa । jāṇaṁti jaṁbudīvaṁ jāyaṁ bharahammi titthayaraṁ ॥। 8771 ।।
uṭṭhēūṇaṁ rayaṇāsaṇāu sahasa tti paṁjaliuḍāō । tikkhuttō muddhāṇaṁ dharaṇīē nihaṭu paṇamaṁti ।। 8772 ।।
aha tāō annamannaṁ saddāvittā milati ēgattha । jaṁpaṁti parōppara mērisaṁ ca jaha jaṁbudīvammi ||8773 ।।
bharahammi samuppannō vīsaimō titthanāyagō tattō । tīyapaḍuppannāṇāgayāṇa ahalōyavāsīgaṁ ॥। 8774।।
aṭṭhaṇha disikumārīṇa jīyamēyaṁ jiṇassa jammamahaṁ । kāuṁ tā gacchāmō amhē vi hu bhagavaō tassa ।।8775 ।।
gaṁtuṁ nivvattēmō jammaṇamahimaṁ ti nicchiūṇa taō । niyaōbhiōgiyasurē saddāvittā vayaṁtēvaṁ ॥ 8776।।
jaha bhō dēvāpiyā ! khippaṁ pi aṇēgakhaṁbhasayakaliyaṁ । caugāuyappamāṇaṁ pavaravimāṇaṁ viuvvittā ।।8777।।
jhatti, samāgatūṇaṁ amha nivēēha ēvamāṇattā । tē tuhiyā taṁ taha kiṁccā nitrēti ॥ 8778 ।।
aha aṭṭha vi ēyāō disākumārīō haṭṭahiyayāō । niyaniyaparivārasamanniyāō tēsuṁ vimāṇēsu ।। 8779 ।।
āruhi savvāē iḍḍhīē juīē gīyanaṭṭēṇaṁ । tāē ukkiṭṭhāē gatīē caṁḍāē cavalāē ॥। 8780 ।।
jēṇēva ya jiṇajammaṇabhavaṇaṁ tēṇēva āvayaṁti taō । tēsu vimāṇēsu ṭhiyā taha cēva kuṇati tikkhuttō ॥ 8781 ।।
āyāhiṇappayāhiṇamaha tē uttarapuratthimadisīē । divvē jāṇavimāṇē ṭhavēṁti īsi mahiyalammi ||8782 ।।
cauraṁgulamappattē tattō paccōruhaṁti tēhitō । divvavimāṇēhiṁtō niyaniyaparivārasahiyāō ।। 8783 ।।
savvāē iḍḍhī savvāē juīē gīyanaṭṭēṇaṁ । jēṇēva jiṇō bhayavaṁ jaṇaṇī jēṇēva ya jiṇassa ।।8784 ।।
tēṇēva uvāgaṁtuṁ titthayaraṁ jaṇaṇisaṁjayaṁ cēva । tikkhuttō āyāhiṇapayāhiṇīkicca paṇamaṁti ||8785 ।।
kāūṇa kamalamugulāyāraṁ karasaṁpuḍhaṁ sirē tattō । titthayaramāyaraṁ saṁthuṇaṁti ēvaṁ namō tujjha ।। 8786 ।।
niyakucchirdhāriyarayaṇē ! dinnapaīvē ! samaggatijayassa । jaṁ hōsi jagappahr̥ṇō jaga maṁgalakulanivāsassa ।।8787।।
jagacakkhuṇō ya jagavacchalassa taha jagahiēkkakārissa । jagamaggadēsayassa ya jagasaraṇassa ya tumaṁ jaṇaṇī ।। 8788 ।।
tā dhannāsi tumaṁ ciya kayannā taṁ si taṁ si sukayatthā । amhē dēvāṇupiē! vatthavvāō ahōlōē ।। 8789 ।।
aṭṭa disikumārīō tattō iha āgayāō niyakiccē । titthaya rassa bhagavaō jammaṇa mahimaṁ karissāmō । । 8790 ।।

।।8800।।
tumbhāhiṁ bhāiyavvaṁ na taō iya jaṁpiuṁ viuvvaṁti । pavaṇaṁ savvōuyasurahikusumagaṁdhēṇa aṇuviddhaṁ ॥ 8791 ।।
tiriyaṁ pavāyamāṇaṁ maṁda atimauyakāsasuhajaṇayaṁ । tēṇa taō jaṁ kici vi asuiyōkkhaṁ durabhigaṁdhaṁ ॥ 8792।।
kaṭṭaṁ vā pattaṁ vā taṇaṁ va ḍagalaṁ va kayavaraṁ vā vi । taṁ savvaṁ jiṇajammaṇabhavaṇassa cauddisivibhāē ॥। 8793 ।।
āhuṇiyaṁ āhuṇiuṁ jōyaṇaparimaṁḍalāu khēttāō । bāhimmi ēgadēsē ēḍēṁti taō jiṇavarassa ।।8794 ।।
jiṇajaṇaṇīē ya tahā nāsanē nāidūradēsammi । āgaṁtūṇaṁ ciṭṭhēti jiṇaguṇē gāyamāṇīō ।।8795 ।।
aha uḍḍhalōyavatthavvayāu aṭṭhēva disikumārīō । puvvōvavanniēṇaṁ ēṁti sarūvēṇa hiṭṭhāō ।।8796 ।।
mēhakarā mēhavaī sumēha taha mēhamāliṇi suvacchā । taha vacchamittanāmā balāhagā vārisēṇā ya ।। 8797 ।।
āyāhiṇāipugvappaōgaō savvamēva kāūṇa । jiṇanāhēṇa samaṁ ciya jiṇajaṇaṇīē paṇamiūṇa ।।8798 ।।
appāṇaṁ ca kahittā taō viuvvaṁti abbhavaddalayaṁ । kāūṇa salilavāsaṁ pasamēti rayaṁ asēsaṁ pi ।। 8799 ।।
tattō viyasaṁtadasaddhavannagaṁdhaḍḍha sarasakusumāī | vāsittā kālāguruturukkavarakaṁdurukkāṇaṁ
ujjhatapavaradhūvēṇa savvaō suravarābhigamajōggaṁ । kāūṇaṁ ciṭṭhati ya tahēva parigāyamāṇīō ।।8801 ||
taha aṭṭhēva puratthimaruyagāō ēṁti disikumārīō । puvvattasamiddhīē ēēhiṁ nāmadhējjēhiṁ ॥ 8802 ||
naṁduttarā ya naṁdā āṇaṁdā naṁdivarddhaṇā cēva । vijayā ya vējayaṁtī jayaṁti avarāiyā taha ya ||8803 ।।
sēsaṁ savvaṁ pitahēva jāva jiṇajaṇaṇipuvvadisibhāē । āyaṁsagahatthāōṁ gāyaṁtīō parivasaṁti ॥। 8804 ।।
aha dāhiṇaruyagāō aṭṭhēva uviti disikumārīō । puvvōvavanniyāē dēviḍḍhīē maṇaharāē ।। 8805।।
nāmēṇa samāhārā ya suppadinā ya suppabuddhā ya । lacchimaī sēsavaī jasōharā cittaguttā ya ।। 8806 ।।
aṭṭamiyā nāmēṇaṁ vasuṁdharā savvamēva taṁ sēsaṁ । navaraṁ jiṇajaṇaṇīē gaṁtūṇaṁ dāhiṇadisāē ॥। 8807 ।।
varasurahivimalajalanivahapūriē kusumadāmakaya sōhē । bhiṁgārē gahiūṇaṁ parigāyaṁtīu ciṭṭhati ।।8808 ।।
paccatthimaruyaganivāsiṇīō taha aṭṭa disikumārīō । tīē cciya dēviḍḍhīē ēṁti ēēhi nāmēhiṁ ।। 8809 ।।
iladēvi surādēvī puhavī paumā va ēganāsā ya । navamiyanāmā bhaddā sīyā taha hōi aṭṭhamiyā ||8810 ।।
jiṇajaṇaṇīē jiṇassa ya gaṁtūṇaṁ pacchimē disābhāē । karakaliyatāliyaṁṭāō mahurasaddēṇa gāyati ॥ 8811 ।।
ah uttarillaruyagāō ēṁti aṭṭhēva disikumārīō । divvāē niyasavviḍḍhīē ētēhi nāmēhi ||8812 ।।
hōi alaṁbusā taha missakēsi taha puṁḍarīka vāruṇiyā । hāsā savvapahā taha hirī sirī aṭṭamī cēva ।।8813 ॥
tēṇēva vihāṇēṇaṁ vaṁdittā jiṇavarassa jaṇaṇīē । ṭhāūṇa uttarēṇaṁ cāmarahatthāu gāyaṁti ॥ 8814 । ।
taha vidisiruyagavatthavvayāu cattāri disikumārīō । cittā ya cittagaṇagā satērā sōyāmaṇī nāma ।।8815 ।।
niyasavvasuriḍḍhīē āgacchittā tahēva vaṁdittā । jiṇajaṇaṇīē jiṇassa ya causu vi vidisāsu ṭhāūṇa ।।8816 ।।
pajalaṁtavimalavaradīviyāō gahiūṇa pāṇikamalēhi । ciṭṭhati jiṇassa guṇē gāyaṁtīō kalaravēṇa ।। 8817।।
aha majjhimaruyaganivāsiṇīō cattāri disikumārīō। ēṁti ruyā ya ruyaṁsā nāmēṇa sukhya ruyagavatī ।।8818 ।।
divvavimāṇēhitō ōyariūṇaṁ jiṇaṁ ca jaṇaṇi ca । taha cēva ya paṇamittā pagāsaittā ya appāṇaṁ ॥। 8819।।
cauraṁgulavajjaṁ jiṇavarassa kappēṁti tāō tō nālaṁ । khaṇiūṇa vivarayaṁ nikkhivaṁti taṁ tassa majjhammi ||8820 ||
nāṇāviharayaṇēhiṁ vairēhiṁ ya pūriūṇa taṁ tattō । uvari hariyālapēḍhaṁ tassa nibaṁdhaṁti aha tidisi ॥8821 ॥
jiṇajammaṇabhavaṇāō pavarē kayalīharē viuvvaṁti । tēsiṁ kayaliharāṇaṁ bahumajjhasabhāyammi ||8822॥

sirimunisuvvayajinajammavaṇṇaṇaṁ
tinni ya causālāī pavarāī viuvvayaṁti bhavaṇāī । tēsi majjhē sīhāsaṇāraṁ maṇirayaṇacittāī ||8823 ||
navaṇīyatūlakō malaphāsēhiṁ masūraēhiṁ sahiyāhiṁ । varapaṭṭasūyapaccatthuyāī saha pāyavīḍhēhiṁ ॥। 8824 ।।
tinni viuvvaṁti taō niyakarayalasaṁpuḍēṇa titthayaraṁ । titthayaramāyaraṁ puṇa saṁginhēūṇa bāhāhi ||8825 ।।
dāhiṇakayalīharacāu sālasīhāsaṇammi nēūṇa । bhayavaṁtaṁ titthayaraṁ samāyaraṁ sannivēsittā ||8826 ।।
abbhaṁgittā sayapāga - sahassapāgēhiṁ surahi- tēllēhiṁ । uvvaṭṭittā ya mahāsugaṁdhiṇā gaṁdhavaṭṭēṇa ||8827 ॥
nēti taō pōratthimakayalīharacāusālamajjhammi । tattha vi nisiyāvittā maṇimayasīhāsaṇē pavarē ॥। 8828 ।।
majjā vittā gaṁdhōdaēṇa pupphōdaēṇa udaēṇa । savvālaṁkāravibhūsiyaṁ ca kiccā tahēva taō ।। 8829 ।।
uttarakayalīharacāusālasīhāsaṇammi nēūṇa । nisiyāvittā titthēsaraṁ samaṁ niyayamāūē ||8830 ||
tattō tāō sahāvēūṇaṁ ābhiōgiē dēvē । ēvaṁ vayaṁti jaha bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! iō tumbhē ॥। 8831 ।।
khippāmēva ya gaṁtūṇa cullahimavaṁtapavvayavaṇāō । gōsīsasarasacaṁdaṇatarūṇakaṭṭāī āṇēha ||8832 ||
aha tē ēvaṁ majjhimaruyagāgayadisikumāri dēvīhiṁ । āṇattā hidumaṇā tahēva āṇaṁti kaṭṭhāī ।। 8833||
aha tāō dēvīō araṇi saragēṇa nimmahēūṇa । appāittā agaṇi saṁdhukkittā taō tattha ।। 8834 ।।
pakkhiviūṇaṁ gōsīsasarasacaṁdaṇatarūṇakaṭṭhāī । pajjāliūṇa samihākaṭṭhēhiṁ kuṇaṁti tō hōmaṁ ।। 8835 ।।
kāūṇa bhūikammaṁ baṁdhēūṇaṁ ca rakkhapōṭṭaliyaṁ । nāṇārayaṇavicittē tattō dō vaṭṭapāhāṇē ।। 8836 ।।
ghēttūṇa lōganāhassa kannamūlammi ṭiṭṭiyāvēṁti । pabhaṇaṁti ya vāratiyaṁ bhavau bhavaṁ ! pavvayāu ti ॥। 8837 ।।
tattō titthayaraṁ karayalēhi gahiūṇa tassa jarṇāṇi tu । bāhāhiṁ ginhiūṇaṁ jammaṇabhavaṇammi āuṁ ।।8838 ।।
sayaṇijjē sōvēuṁ tīsē pāsē ṭhavēṁti titthayaraṁ । tattō pāsaṭhiyāō parigāyaṁtīō ciṭṭhati ।।8839 ॥
ētthaṁtarammi sakkō sahasakkhō pāgasāsaṇō maghavaṁ । sōhammakappasāmī puraṁdarō vajjapāṇī ya ||8840 ॥
dāhiṇa lōgaḍḍhapahū ērāvaṇavāhaṇō suriṁdō ya । battīsavimāṇāvāsalakkharakkhāpasattō ya ।। 8841 ॥
varakaṁcaṇamayacaṁcalakuṁḍalavilihijja māṇagaṁḍayalō । ālaiyamālamauḍō arayaṁvaravatthadhārī ya ।।8842।।
bhāsuravarabōṁdidharō pālaṁbalaṁbamāṇavaṇamālō । pavariḍḍhī pavarajuī pavarabalō pavarakittī ya ।। 8843 ||
kappē sōhammammi sōhammavaḍisa vimāṇammi | sōhammāē sahāē sīhāsaṇagaṁsi sakkaṁsi ||8844 ||
culasīē sāmāṇiyasahasāṇa cauṇha lōgapālāṇa । niyaparivārajuyāṇaṁ aṭṭhanhaṁ aggamahisīṇaṁ ।। 8845 ।।
tinhaṁ parisāṇa tahā tēttīsāē (ya) tāyatīsāṇaṁ । sattaṇhaṁ aṇiyāṇaṁ sattaṇhaṁ aṇiyahivaīṇaṁ ||8846 ||
culasī tisahassāṇaṁ caugguṇāṇāyarakkhadēvāṇaṁ । annēsi pi bahūṇaṁ sōhammagakappavāsīṇaṁ ।। 8847।।
vēmāṇiyadēvāṇaṁ dēvīṇa ya ābhiōgiyāṇaṁ ca । sāmittaṁ bhaṭṭittaṁ āhēvaccaṁ karēmāṇō ।। 8848 ।।
varanaṭṭagīyavāi (ya) taṁtītalatālaghaṇamuiṁgaravaṁ । pēcchaṇayaṁ pēcchaṁtō divvāī bhōgabhōgāī ॥। 8849 ।।
bhuṁjatō jā ciṭṭhai tā tassa surēsarassa sahasa tti । nāṇāmaṇirayaṇēhiṁ ruciraṁ sīhāsaṇaṁ calai ।। 8850 ।।
taṁ caliyē pāsittā sakkō ōhi pauṁjaē jhatti | bhagavaṁtaṁ titthayaraṁ ābhōgati ōhiṇā tattō ।।8851 ।।
parituṭṭhahiduhiyaō ānaṁdiyaparamapīisōmaṇasō । ūsaviyarōmakūvō dhārāhayanīvakusumaṁ va ॥। 8852 ।।
saṁbhamavasaō saṭṭhāṇacaliyamauḍāisavvalaṁkārō | abbhuṭṭhittā sīhāsaṇāu ōruhai pāyavīḍhō ||8853 ।।
maṇirayaṇamaṁḍiyāō vēruliyavariṭṭhariṭṭhaghaḍiyāō । ōmuyaipāuyāō bhāmaṁḍalabhāsamāṇīō ॥। 8854 ।।
ēgāē sāḍiyāē kāūṇaṁ tayaṇu uttarāsaṁgaṁ । aṁjalimauliyahatthē matthayadēsamma nēūṇa ||8855 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
275
aṇugacchai titthayarābhimuhaṁ sattaṭṭha cēva ya payāī । aṁcai vāmaṁ jāṇaṁ dāhiṇayaṁ nivēsai dharaṇīē ॥ 8856 ॥
tikkhuttō muddhāṇaṁ tō saṁghaṭṭai vasuṁdharāvīḍhē । aha īsi unnāmēuṁ kayaṁjalī bhaṇai sakkathayaṁ ।। 8857 ।।
paḍiputraṁ pi namōtthuṇamiccāipayāu pabhii jāva payaṁ । saṁpattāṇaṁ ti taō namōtthu muṇisuvvaya jiṇassa ॥। 8858 ।।
arahaṁtassa bhagavaō āigarassēvamāi tā bhaṇai । jāva payaṁ saṁpāviukāmassēyaṁ bhavai aṁtē ॥। 8859 ।।
tattō jaṁpai ēvaṁ vaṁdāmi ahaṁ ihaṭṭiō cēva । bhagavaṁtaṁ titthayaraṁ tattha ṭhiyaṁ sō vi bhuvaṇapahū ।। 8860॥
tatthēva ṭhiō pāsau maṁ ēttha ṭhiyaṁ ti bhāsiuṁ bhujjō । vaṁdai namasai jiṇaṁ puvvābhimuhō taō hōuṁ ॥ 8861 ।।
sīhāsaṇē nisīyai saṁpēhai ēvamappaṇō cittē । uppannō khalu bhagavaṁ titthayarō jaṁbudī mi ||8862 ||
tā ēyaṁ sakkāṇaṁ tī paḍupannaṇāgayāṇaṁ pi । jīyaṁ jaṁ kira kīrai jammaṇamahimā jiṇissa ||8863 ।।
gacchāmi ahaṁ pi taō jammaṇamahimaṁ karēmi jagaguruṇō । ēvaṁ saṁpēhittā sahāvai takkhaṇē tattō ।। 8864 ।।
hariṇēgamēsināmaṁ pāittāṇī ahivaraṁ dēvaṁ । iya āṇavēi jaha bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! tumaṁ khippaṁ ।। 8865 ।।
sōhammasahaṁ gaṁtuṁ mēghōgharasiyagabhīrayarasaḥ । ghaṁṭaṁ sughōsanāmaṁ jōyaṇaparimaṁḍalaṁ susaraṁ ॥ 8866॥
tikkhuttō ullālēmāṇō ēvaṁ vayāhi gurusaddaṁ । bhō āṇavēi sakkō dēviṁdō dēvagaṇarāyā ।। 8867 ।।
gacchai bhō bhō sakkō dēviṁdō jaṁbudīvabharahammi । titthayarassa bhagavaō jammaṇamahimāē karaṇatthaṁ ।। 8868 ।।
tā tubbhēvi ya ṇaṁ bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! samaggaiḍḍhīē । savvabalēṇaṁ savvāyarēṇa savvajuīē ya ।। 8869॥
savvāē vibhūīē savvēṇaṁ samudayappagarisēṇa । savvēhiṁ nāḍaēhiṁ ōrōhēhiṁ ca savvēhiṁ ॥। 8870 ।।
suipupphagaṁdhamallālaṁkāravihasaṇāhi savvāhi 1 savvavaratuḍiyataṁtī muiṁgatalatālasaddēṇa ।।8871।।
niyaparivārasamēyā niyajāṇavimāṇavāhaṇārūḍhā । pāubbhavaha samīvē sakkassa akālaparihīṇaṁ ॥ 8872 ॥
hariṇēgamēsidēvō aha sō sakkēṇa dēvarāēṇa । iya pabhaṇiō samāṇō ānaṁdasamullasaṁtamaṇō ।। 8873॥
sakkassa aṁtiyāō paḍinikkhamiūṇa gacchaē tattō । sōhammāē sahāē tattha sughōsaṁ mahāghaṁṭaṁ ॥। 8874 ।।
tikkhuttō ullālai aha tīē mēhagahirasaddāē । ullālēmāṇīē sōhammē tammi kappammi ।। 8875 ।।
ēgūṇē savvēsu vi battīsavimāṇasayasahassēsu । takkhaṇamēgūṇāī ghaṁṭālakkhāī battīsaṁ ॥। 8876 ॥
jugavaṁ pi payaṭṭāī kāuṁ kaṇakaṇaravaṁ samaggāī । tō sōhammō kappō pāsāyavimāṇamālāsu ।। 8877 ॥
nikkuḍanivaḍiyaghaṁṭāsaddasamuṭṭhatapaḍinināyāṇaṁ । lakkhēhiṁ aṇēgēhiṁ niraṁtaraṁ saṁkulō jāō ॥8878 ।।
tattō tēsi sōhammakappavatthavvayāṇa bahuyāṇa । vēmāṇiyadēvāṇaṁ dēvīṇa pamattacittāṇa ।।8879 ।।
visayasuhamucchiyāṇaṁ ēgaṁtēṇēva raipasattāṇa । pasariyaghaṁṭāghōsāyannaṇapaḍibuddhicittāṇa ॥ 8880 ॥
ugghōsaṇakō ūhalaviinnakannāṇa avahiyamaṇāṇa । sō pāyattāṇīyāhivai hariṇēgamēsisurō ॥ 8881 ॥
ghaṁṭāravammi saṁtē tahiṁ tahiṁ tattha tattha dēsammi । mahayā mahayā saddēṇa ēvamugghōsaṇaṁ kuṇai ||8882||
haṁda sugaṁtu bhavaṁtō savvē sōhammakappavāsisurā | sōhammakappavaiṇō iṇamō vayaṇaṁ hiyasuhatthaṁ ॥। 8883॥
bhō āṇavēi sakkō iccāi tāva jāva pajjatē । pāubbhavaha samīvē sakkassa akālaparihīṇaṁ ॥। 8884 ।।
tattō tē vēmāṇiyadēvā dēvīgaṇā ya imamaṭṭhē । sōūṇa haṭṭatuṭṭhā jāva visappaṁtahiyayā ya ॥। 8885 ।।
appēgaiyā vaṁdaṇapūyaṇasakkāravattiyaṁ annē | daṁsaṇakō ūhallēṇa kēi sakkāṇuvittīē ॥ 8886 ।।
anōnaṁ aṇuvitti kuṇamāṇā kēi kēi jīyaṁ ti । ēmāi kaṭṭu savvē niyaniyaiḍḍhī savvāē ।। 8887 ।।
pāunbhavaṁti sakkasa aṁtiē dēvadēvisaṁghāyā । kālaparihāṇivajjaṁ aha tē daṭṭhūṇa dēviṁdō ॥। 8888
।

sirimunisuvvayajina jammavaṇṇaṇaṁ
saṁpannaparamaharisō saddāvittābhiōgiyaṁ dēvaṁ । pālayanāmaṁ tattō tassēyaṁ dēi āēsaṁ ।।8889 ॥
bhō bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! aṇēgakhaṁbhasayasannivēsavaraṁ । līlaṭṭhiyabahuvihasālabhaṁjiyājālaparikaliyaṁ ॥। 8890 ।।
īhāmiya usa bhaturaṁga magaranaravihagavālapaḍirūvaṁ । kinnararurukuṁjarasarabhavaṇalayābhattisuvibhattaṁ
khaṁbhuggayavairāmayavicittavaravēiyābhirāmayaraṁ । vijjāharajamalagajuyalajaṁtasaṁjōyaramaṇijjaṁ
rūvagasahassakaliyaṁ accisahassēhi acciyasurūvaṁ । nayaṇamaṇāṇaṁdayaraṁ suhaphāsaṁ sassirīyaṁ ca ।। 8893 ।।
subhakaṁtadarisa ṇijjaṁ ghaṁṭāva livaliyamaṇaharavirāvaṁ । atimisimisēṁtamaṇirayaṇaghaṁṭiyājālaparikhittaṁ ।। 8894 ।।
jōyalakkhāyāmaṁ uvviddhaṁ paṁcajōyaṇasayāī । sigdhaṁ jaiṇaṁ divvaṁ jāṇavimāṇaṁ viuvvāhi ।।8895 ।।
paccappiṇāhi khippāmēva ya āṇattiyaṁ imaṁ majjha । aha sō pālagadēvō sakkēṇaṁ ēvamāṇattō ।।8896 ।।
haṭṭhaparituṭṭhahiyaō harisasamūsasiyarōmakūvō ya । karayalapariggahīyaṁ kāūṇaṁ aṁjali sīsē ।।8897 ।।
paḍisuṇai sakkavayaṇaṁ ēvaṁ dēvō taha tti viṇaēṇa । tattō uttarapōratthimaṁ avakkamai disibhāyaṁ ।। 8898 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tattha tattō viraiya vēubviyaṁ samugdhāyaṁ । nisirai ḍaṁḍamasaṁkhējjajōyaṇāī ta jhatti ॥ 8899 ।।
rayaṇāṇaṁ vairāṇaṁ vēruliyāṇaṁ ca lōhiyakkhāṇa । aṁkāṇa pulāgāṇaṁ phalihāṇa masāragallāṇa ।।8900 ।।
riṭṭhāṇamaṁjaṇāṇaṁ rayaṇāṇa tahēva jāyarūvāṇa । jōirasāṇaṁ sōgaṁdhiyāṇa aṁjaṇapulāgāṇa ।। 8901 ।।
parisāḍaṇaṁ ahābāyarāṇa kāūṇa divvasattīē । āyāṇamahāsuhumāṇa pōggalāṇaṁ taō kuṇai ।। 8903 ।।
dōccaṁ pi tahēva taō kiccā vēuvviyaṁ samugdhāyaṁ । divvaṁ jāṇavimāṇaṁ jaha bhaṇiyaṁ aha viuvvēi ||8903 ।।
tassa vimāṇassa taō puratthimēṇaṁ ca dāhiṇēṇaṁ ca । taha uttarēṇa tini u kuṇai tisōmāṇapaḍirūvē |8904 ।।
tēsu tisōmāṇagapaḍirūvēsuṁ asthi vairamayamissā | riṭṭhamayaṁ paiṭhāṇaṁ vēruliyamayā puṇō khaṁbhā ।। 8905 ।।
ruppasuvannamayāī phalagāī lōhiyakkhamaiyāō । sūīō savvāō va rāmaiyāō saṁdhīō ।।8906 ।।
bāhāhiṁ juyā avalaṁbaṇāu nāṇāmaṇīhiṁ nimmaviyā । pāsāiyadaṁsaṇiyā savvē vi ya jāvapaḍirūvā ।।8907 ।।
tayaṇu tisōmāṇagapaḍirūvapurō satōraṇē viuvvēi । tē tōraṇā unāṇāmaṇinimmaviēsa khaṁbhē ॥ 8908।।
uvavisanniviṭṭhēhiṁ tārarūvēhi bahupayārēhiṁ । uvavēyā īhāmiyausabhaturaṁgamavihaṁgāṇa ।। 8909 ।।
kinnaranararurukuṁjaravālagama garāivaṇalayāīṇa । paumalayāīṇa ya maṇaharāṇa bhattīhiṁ suvicittā ॥ 8990 ॥
khaṁbhuggayavairāmaya vicittavaravēiyābhirāmā ya । vijjāharajamalagajuyalajaṁtasaṁjōyaramaṇijjā ॥8911 ॥
accisahassā gayā rūvagasahassēhi bhāsamāṇā ya । nayaṇamaṇāṇaṁdayarā suhaphāsā sassirīyā ya ॥। 8912॥
pāsāīyā jāva ya paḍirūvā tēsi tōraṇāṇaṁ tu । uppi maṁgalagā aṭṭha aṭṭha saṁṭhāviyā ēē ॥। 8913 । ।
sōtthiyasirivacchā vaddhamāṇakalasā ya naṁdiyāvattā । bhaddāsaṇadappaṇamacchayā ya ramaṇijjasaṁṭhāṇā ।।8914 ।।
tēsi ca tōraṇāṇaṁ uppi kiṇhā ya nīla pīyā ya । rattā sukkilayā cāmarajjhayā saṁṭhiyā bahavē ।।8915 ।।
tē vairāmayaḍaṁḍā sacchā saṇhā ya ruppavaṭṭā ya । jalayāmalagaṁdhīyā sukammiyā jāva paḍirūvā ।। 8996 ।।
taha tōraṇāṇa uppi ghaṁṭājuyalā paḍāgaipaḍāgā । chattāī chattā hatthayā ya sōgaṁdhiyāīṇa ।। 8917 ।।
taha puṁḍarīya mahapuṁḍarīyasyavattasahasavattāṇa । kumuduppalanaliṇāṇa ya pasatthayā hr̥tthayā bahavē ।। 8918 ।।
savvarayaṇāmayā tē acchā sanhā ya jāva paḍikhvā । tassa vimāṇassa taō viuvvaē majjha bhūbhāyaṁ ।। 8919 ।।
bahusamaramaṇijjayaraṁ mayalaṁchaṇamaṁḍalassa sāricchaṁ । māyaṁḍamaṁḍalassa va āyaṁsagamaṁḍalassahavā ॥। 8920 ।।
saratalapāṇitalassa va āliṁgaṇapukkha rassa va samāṇaṁ । vihagavagghavarāhōrabbhasīhacammāṇa sarisaṁ vā ।। 8921 ।।

karayalapariggihīyaṁ kāūṇaṁ aṁjali niyasirammi । nivvattiyaṁ viuvviya jāṇavimāṇaṁ nivaēi ।। 8988 ।।

parighaṭṭamaṭṭhasusiliṭṭhalaṭṭhasuvisiṭṭhasaṁṭhiyavaīē । vairāmayalaṭṭhīē laddhapaṭṭhō aipagiṭṭha ।। 9001 ।।
kuḍabhīṇa sahassēhi dasaddhavannēhiṁ savvaō kaliō । vāuyavijayapaḍāgachattaaichattacicaiō ||9002 ।।
jōyaṇasahassamāṇō āyāmēṇaṁ mahaggamaṇulaggō । saṁpaṭṭiō puratthā aṇupuvvīē mahiṁdajhaō ।। 9003।।
kayaubbhaḍasiṁgārā bhaḍacaḍagarapahagarēṇa atimahyā । paṁca aṇīyā paṁca ya aṇīyavaiṇō purō caliyā ।। 9004 ।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ tu bahavē abhiōgiyadēvadēvisaṁghāyā । rūvēhiṁ niyaniēhiṁ niyanihiṁ visēsēhiṁ ॥। 9005 ।।
niyaniyavihīhiṁ niyaniyanijjōēhiṁ ca taha niyaniyēhiṁ । nēvacchēhi uvasō hamāṇayā paharisaturaṁtā ।।9006 ।।
sakkassa dēvarāyassa aggaō maggaō ya pāsēsu । parivēḍhaṁ kuṇamāṇā saṁcaliyā āṇupuvvīē । । 9007।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ ca savvē sōhamma nivāsidēvadēvīō । niyaniyadēviḍīē dēvajuīē ya sōhaṁtā ॥9008 ।।
sakkassa dēvarannō puraō pacchā ya ubhayapāsēsu । saṁpaṭṭiyā pahiṭṭā ujjōyantā gayaṇamaggaṁ ।। 9009 ।।
aha sō dēvāhivaī sakkō sōhammakappamajjhēṇaṁ । taṁ divvaṁ dēviḍiṁ uvadaṁsaṁtō samaṇupattō ॥ 9010 ॥
kappassa uttarillaṁ nijjāṇapahaṁ taō pagiṭṭhāē | caṁḍāē javaṇīē ōvayamāṇō suragatī ।। 9011 । ।
tiriyamasaṁkhējjāṇaṁ majjhaṁ majjhēṇa dīvajalahīṇaṁ । naṁdīsaravaradīvē dāhiṇapōratthimammi nagē ।। 9012 । ।
raikaranāmammi samāgaṁtūṇa taō kamēṇa dēvidiḍaṁ । taṁ divvaṁ dēvajuī divvaṁ dēvāṇubhāvaṁ ca ।। 9013।।
divvaṁ jāṇavimāṇaṁ paḍisāharamāṇaō khaṇēṇēva । jēṇēva jaṁbudīvō jēṇēva ya bhārahaṁ vāsaṁ ।। 9014।।
jēṇēva jammanayaraṁ jiṇassa jēṇēva jammabhavaṇaṁ ca । tēṇēva uvāgaṁtuṁ jāṇavimāṇaṭṭhiō cēva ।। 9015 ।।
mahayāhaya talataṁtāla muiṁgappavāiyaravēṇa । tikkhuttō āyāhiṇapayāhiṇaṁ tassa kāūṇa
।। 9016 ।।
tō taṁ jāṇavimāṇaṁ uttarapōratthi mē disībhāē । cauraṁgulēṇa bhūmī apphusamāṇaṁ ṭhavēūṇa ॥9017।।
aggamahisīhiṁ saddhi aṭṭhahiṁ dōhiṁ tahā aṇīēhiṁ । gaṁdhavvāṇīēṇaṁ naṭṭāṇīēṇa ya samēō ।। 9018 ।।
puvvēṇa tisōvāṇagapaḍirūvēṇaṁ taō vimāṇāō । paccōruhai suriṁdō tattō sāmāṇiyasurāṇaṁ ।। 9019 ।।
culasī sahassāiṁ tassa vimāṇassa uttarillēṇa । paccavarōhaṁti tisōvāṇagapaḍirūvagēṇaṁ tu ॥ 9020 ।।

sirimuni suvvayajinajammavaṇṇaṇaṁ
avasēsā savvē viha dēvā dēvī ya dāhiṇillēṇa । paccavarōhaṁti tisōvāṇagapaḍirūvagēṇēva ॥9021 ॥
aha sakkō dēviṁdō sāmaṇiyasurasahassaculasīē । sēsēṇa ya savvēṇaṁ suraparivārēṇa pariyariō ।। 9022 ।।
savvidaḍīē jāva yaduṁduhinigghōsanāiyaravēṇa । jēṇēva ya titthayarō bhayavaṁ titthayarajaṇaṇī ya ।। 9023 ।।
tēṇēva uvāgaṁtuṁ ālōē cēva jhatti paṇamēi । paṇa mattā āyāhiṇapayāhiṇaṁ kuṇai tikkhuttō ।। 9024 ।।
karayalapariggihīyaṁ tattō kāūṇa aṁjali sīsē । ēvaṁ vayai jahā tē namōtthu kucchīdhariyarayaṇē ! ।। 9025 ।
iccāi disikumārīgamēṇa saṁthaṇai tāva jiṇajaṇaṇīṁ । pajjatē havai imaṁ jāva payaṁ taṁ si sukayatthā ॥। 9026।।
tō payass appāṇaṁ dēvāṇupiē ! tilōyanamaṇijjē ! । sakkō nāmēṇa ahaṁ dēviṁdō dēvagaṇarāyā ।। 9027 ।।
titthayarassa bhagavaō jammaṇamahimaṁ pasāhaissāmi । tattō mahāṇubhāvē tubbhāhiṁ na bhāiyavvaṁ ti ॥ 9028 ।।
bhaṇiuṁ jiṇajaṇaṇīē dāuṁ avasōyaṇi viuvvēuṁ । titthayarappaḍirūvaṁ tīsē pāsammi ṭhāvē ।। 9029 ।।
paṁca viuvvai sakkē ēkkō sakkō taō u āyaṁtō । cōkkhō paramapavittō hōūṇa vilittakarajuyalō ।। 9030
gōsīsacaṁdaṇēṇaṁ sarasēṇa sugaṁdhiṇā kayapaṇāmō । aṇujāṇai mē bhayavaṁ ! ti kaṭṭu bhagavaṁtamarihaṁtaṁ । । 9031।।
karayalauḍēhiṁ giṇhai sasaṁbhamō saharisō tayaṇu ēkkō । sakkō aṇumaggagaō chaṇidumaṁḍalasamasirīyaṁ ।। 9032
dharai dhavalāyavattaṁ uvari jiṇidassa dōnni sakkā u । pāsēsu cāmarē ukkhivaṁti sasikuṁdadaladhavalē ।। 9033।।
ēkkō sakkō puraō karayalakaliēṇa kulisaḍaṁḍēṇa । aṇukaḍai iya ēvaṁ sakkō annēhiṁ vi bahūhiṁ ।। 9034 ||
bhavaṇavaivāṇamaṁtarajōisavēmāṇiēhiṁ dēvēhiṁ । dēvīhi ya pariyariō jāva mahāduṁduhiravēṇa ।। 9035 ।।
tāē ukkiṭṭhāē dēvagatīē ya caṁḍacavalāē । jēṇēva maṁdaragirī paṁḍagavaṇamaṁḍiyasiraggō ।। 9036 ॥
jēṇēva hisēyasilāē atthi sīhāsaṇaṁ rayaṇaruiraṁ । tēṇēva uvāgaṁtuṁ puvvābhimuhō nisīēi ।। 9037 ।।
aha īsāṇē kappē sūlaharō vasahavāhaṇō iṁdō । uttaralō gaḍhḍapahu arayaṁbaravatthadhārī ya
iccāi zahā sakkō taha iṁdā sēsayā vibhaṇiyavvā । jāva'ccuyakappidō nēyamiṇaṁ navara nāṇattaṁ ।। 9039 ।।
battīsasṭṭhāvīsā bārasa taha aṭṭha causayasahassā । pannā catta cha sahasā saya cau ti kamā vimāṇāṇaṁ ।। 9040 ।।
culasī asīi bāvattari sattari sadviya pana cattālā । tīsā vīsa dasēṇa ya kamēṇa sāmāṇiyasahassā ।। 9041 ।।
pālaya pupphaya (ti) sōmāṇasā ya sirivacchanaṁdiyāvattā । kāmagamē pīigamē maṇōramē vimalanāmē ya ।। 9042 ।।
taha hōi savvaō bhaddanāmaō sakkamāiyāṇa imē । kappidāṇa dasanha vi vimāṇanimmāvagā nēyā ।। 9043 ।।
āimataīyapaṁcamasattamanavamāṇa kappaiṁdāṇa । hariṇēgamēsināmā pāyattāṇīyaahivaiṇō ।। 9044।।
ghaṁṭā sughōsanāmā nijjāṇapahō havējja uttaraō । dāhiṇapuratthimillō raikaragō pavvaō hōi ।। 9045 ।।
dōccaca utthacchaṭṭhamadasamāṇaṁ tu kappaiṁdāṇa | pāyattāṇīyavaī nāmēṇaṁ lahu parakkamaō ।। 9046।।
ghaṁṭā ya mahāghōsā nijjāṇapahō havējja dakkhiṇaō । uttarapuratthimillō raikaragō pavvaō nēō ।। 9047 ।।
īsāṇidāīṇaṁ accuyakappā hivāvasāṇāṇaṁ । āsaṇakaṁpāīyaṁ sakkassa va savvamiha nēyaṁ
savvidaḍīē gaṁtūṇa maṁdarē jāva pajjuvāsaṁti । navaraṁ jiṇidajammaṇagharagamaṇāī na bhaṇiyavvaṁ ।। 9049 ।।
aha camarō asuriṁdō sarāyahāṇīē camaracaṁcāē । sōhammāē sahāē camarē sīhāsaṇammi ṭhiō ।। 9050 ।।
causaṭṭhīē sāmāṇiyāṇa sahasēhi tāyatīsēhiṁ । tēttīsāra dēvēhiṁ cauhiṁ taha lōgapālēhiṁ ।। 9051 ।।
aggamahisīhi paṁcahi parivārajuyāhi tihi u parisāhiṁ । sattahiṁ u aṇīēhi aṇīya hivaīhiṁ sattahiṁ u । 52 ।
annēhiṁ ya pariyariō jahēva sakkō imaṁ tu nāṇattaṁ । pāyattāṇīyavatī dumō ya ghaṁṭā ya ōghasarā ।। 9053 ||

281
ubviyaṁ vimāṇaṁ imassa pannāsajōyaṇasahassā । jōyaṇasayāī paṁca u nāyavvō puṇa mahiṁdajhaō ।। 9054 ।।
abhiōgiō u dēvō vimāṇanimmāvagī muṇēyavvō । sēsaṁ taṁ ciya jā maṁdarammi gaṁtuṁ samōsarai ।। 9055 ।।
ēvaṁ ciya asuridō balī vi navaraṁ tu sadvisahassāiṁ । sāmāṇiyadēvāṇaṁ caugguṇā āyarakkhā u ।। 9056।।
pāyattāṇīyassa u mahādumō nāma ahivatī nēō । mahaōghasarā ghaṁṭā sēsaṁ taṁ cēva vinēyaṁ ।। 9057।।
aha nāgakumārāṇaṁ iṁdō dharaṇō tti sō vi taha cēva । navaraṁ nāṇattamiṇaṁ chassāmāṇiyasahassā u ।। 9058।।
mēhassarā ya ghaṁṭā pāyattāṇīyaahivaī nēō । nāmēṇa ruhasēō paṇuvīsaṁ jōyaṇasahassā ।।9059।।
hōi vimāṇaṁ aḍḍāijjāī sayāī puṇa mahiṁdajhaō । sēsāṇa vi ēvaṁ ciya iṁdāṇaṁ bhavaṇavāsīṇaṁ ।। 9060।।
asuridavajjiyāgaṁ navaraṁ asurāṇa ōghasaraghaṁṭā । nāgāṇaṁ mēghasarā hōi suvannāṇa haṁsasarā ।। 9061 । ।
vijjūṇaṁ kōṁcasarā ghaṁṭā aggīṇa hōi maṁjusarā । ghaṁṭā ya maṁjughōsā disākumārāṇa vinēyā ।। 9062।।
sūraghaṁṭā udahīṇa hōi dīvāṇa maharasaraghaṁṭā । vāūṇaṁ disarā thaṇiyāṇaṁ ṇaṁdighōsā u ।। 9063।।
usī sī va khalu cha cca sahassā u asuravajjāṇaṁ । sāmāṇiyā ya ēē caugguṇā āyarakkhā u ।।9064।।
pāyattāṇīyāṇaṁ ahivaiṇō sēṇanāmāṇō । jammāṇa suīṇāṇaṁ havaṁti nāmēṇa naṁdakkhā ।। 9065।।
dharaṇē ya vēṇudēvē harikaṁtē'ggisihapunnajalakaṁtā | amiyagatī vēlaṁbē ghōsē nava dāhiṇadisidā ॥ 9066।।
bhūyāṇaṁdō taha vēṇudālināmō harissahō taiō । taha aggimāṇakō tayaṇu paṁcamō havai hu vasiṭṭhī ।। 9067 ।।
jalapahamiyavāhaṇayā pahaṁjaṇō navamaō mahāghōsō | nāgāinikāyāṇaṁ ēē nava uttaradisidā । । 9068।।
camarabalippamuhāṇaṁ savvēsi bhavaṇavāsiiṁdāṇa । abhiōgiyā ya dēvā vimāṇaniṣphāyagā nēyā ।। 9069 ।।
vaṁtarajōisiyā vihu nēyavvā ēvamēva navaraṁ tu । causāmāṇiyasahasā caurō puṇa aggamahisīō ।। 9070 ।।
sōlasasahasā taṇurakkhayāṇa jōyaṇasahassaparimāṇaṁ । hōi vimāṇaṁ jōyaṇapaṇuvīsasayaṁ mahiṁdajhaō ।। 9071।।
vaṁtarapisāyabhūyā jakkhā taha rakkhasā ya nāyavvā । kinnara kiṁpurisamahōragā ya gaṁdhavva aṭṭhamayā । । 9072।।
kālasurūvā taha punnabhaddabhīmā ya kinnarō taha ya । sappurisō aikāō gīyaraī cēva aṭṭamaō ।। 9073 ।।
ēēsi aṭṭaha vi dāhiṇadisivāṇamaṁtaridāṇa । maṁjusarāō nāmēṇa hōṁti ghaṁṭāō nēyāō ।। 9074 ।।
mahakālō paḍivō hōṁti tahā māṇibhaṭṭa mahabhīmā । kiṁpurisamahāpurisā mahakāō taha ya gīyajasō ।। 9075 ।।
ēēsi aṭṭhaṇha vi uttaradisivāṇamaṁtariṁdāṇa | ghaṁṭāō nēyāō nāmē maṁjughōsāō ।।9076।।
pāyattāṇīyāṇa ahivaiṇō taha vimāṇakārī ya । jammāṇa uīṇāṇa ya havaṁti abhiōgiyā dēvā ।। 9077 ।।
jōisiyasuridāṇaṁ ghaṁṭāō hōṁti sussaranighōsā । sēsaṁ taṁ ciya jā maṁdirē jiṇaṁ pajjuvāsaṁti ।। 9078 ।।
aha accuyadēvidō sāvittābhiōgiē dēvē । iya āisai jahā bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! duyaṁ tubhē ।। 9079 ।।
sumahagghamatimahatthaṁ supasatthaṁ savvajayakayāṇaṁdaṁ । nityaya'bhisēyam vaṭuvēha viulaṁ maharihaṁ ca ।। 9080 ।।
niyapahu laddhā sā taō imē harisaūsa siyahiyayā । siranihiya mauliyakarā āṇaṁ viṇaēṇa paḍiṇiuṁ । 9081 ।
uttarapuratthimaṁ taha disibhāgamavakkamitta vēuviyaṁ । kāūṇa samugdhāyaṁ kalasāṇaṁ kaṁcaṇamayāṇaṁ ।। 9082 ।।
aṭṭhattaraṁ sahassaṁ taha ruppamayāṇa maṇimayāṇaṁ ca । ruppamuvannamayāṇaṁ taha kaṁcaṇamaṇimayāṇaṁ ca ।। 9083।।
taha ruppamaṇimayāṇaṁ tahēva maṇiruṣpakaṁ caṇamayāṇaṁ । bhōmējjāṇaṁ ca tahā kalasāṇa sahassamadr̥hiyaṁ ।। 9084 ।।
taha caṁdaṇakalasāṇaṁ bhiṁgārāṇaṁ tahēva thālāṇaṁ । supaṭṭāṇaṁ āyaṁsagāṇa pāīṇa taha cēva ।। 9085 ।।
cittāṇaṁ rathaṇakaraṁḍagāṇa jā savvapuṣpa paḍalāṇaṁ । sīhāsaṇāṇa chattāṇa cāmarāṇaṁ ca taha cēva ।। 9086।।

tēllasamuggāṇaṁ sarisavayasamuggāṇa tāliyaṁṭāṇa । pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ aṭṭhasahassaṁ kaḍacchūṇaṁ
vēubviyaṁ ca sābhāviyaṁ ca taṁ ginhiūṇa savvaṁ pi । khīrasamuddē gaṁtaṇa khīrasalilaṁ paginhaṁti
paumāī uppalāī jāva ya sayavattasahasavattāiṁ । giṇhaṁti ēvamēva ya pukkharavarasāgarāō vi
bhara hēravayāīṇa vimāgahamāīṇa savvatitthāṇa | gaṁgāimahāsariyāṇa gihiuṁ maṭṭiyaṁ udayaṁ
culla himavaṁta pabhiiyasamaggavāsaharapavvaēhiṁtō । sabvē pupphē gaṁdhē mallē savvāsahīō ya
siddhatthaē ya gahiuṁ paumaddahapabhii savvaharayāṇa । saliluppalamaṭṭiyamāiyaṁ ca savvaṁ gaūṇa
ēvaṁ ca savvakulasēlavaṭṭavēyaḍhḍa cakkivijasu । vakkhārapavvasuṁ aṁtarasariyāsu savvāsu
uttarakurumaṁdarabhaddasālanaṁdaṇavaṇāiēsuṁ ca । giṇhaṁti jāva siddhatthaē ya sarasaṁ ca gōsīsaṁ

aha accuyadēviṁdō sāmāṇiyapama hasavvasurasahiō । sāhāviyavēubviyakalasēhi tēhi savvēhiṁ ।। 9096।।
varapaumapihāṇēhiṁ sugaṁdhivaravāripuriēhiṁ ca । caṁdaṇakayacaccēhiṁ tāē savvāē iḍīē ॥ 9097 ।।
savvāujjāṇamahānināyanivahēṇa savvajattēṇa । ahisicāi titthayaraṁ mahayā mahayā'hisēēṇa ।। 9098 ।।
aha tammi aimahatthē jiṇāhisēyammi vaṭṭamāṇammi | iṁdāīyā dēvā varacāmarachattakayahatthā ।। 9099 ।।
dhūvakaḍacchuyavarakalasapupphagaṁdhāidhāriyakaraggā | haṭṭhapaṭṭhā karakaliyakulisasūlāiṇō puraō ।।9100 ।।
ciṭṭhati paṁjaliuḍā āsiyasammajjiōvalittaṁ ca । pakarēṁti kēi dēvā jāva ya varagaṁdhavaṭṭisamaṁ ।। 9001 ॥
vāsaṁti kēi dēvā hirannavāsaṁ suvannavāsaṁ ca । āharaṇarayaṇavāsaṁ taha phalapupphāivāsaṁ ca
varagaṁdhamallavāsaṁ kēi vi vāsaṁti cunnavāsaṁ ca । vāyaṁti kēi cauvihamāujjaṁ ghaṇatayaṁ vitayaṁ
susiraṁ ca tahā kēi vi dēvā gāyaṁti cauvihaṁ gēyaṁ । ukkhittaṁ ca payattaṁ maṁdaṁ rōidiyaṁ cēva
naccati kēi dēvā cauvvihaṁ naṭṭamaṁciyaṁ cayaṁ । ārabhaḍaṁ ca bhasōlaṁ cauvvihaṁ abhiṇayaṁ kē vi ।। 9105 ।।
abhiti tiyasanivahādiṭṭhatiya pāḍiyaṁ tiyaṁ cēva । sāmaṁtōvāiyayaṁ ca lōgamajjhāvasāṇiyayaṁ । । 9106 । ।
battīsavihaṁ divvaṁ naṭṭavihi kē vi daṁsayaṁti sura । । uppayanivayapavattaṁ saṁkuiyapasa riyaṁ nāma ।।9107 ।।
saṁbhataṁ nāma tahā naṭṭavihiṁ divvamamarasaṁghāyā । uvadaṁsayaṁti kēi vikēṛa vi pīti tiyasagaṇā ।। 9108।।
ēvaṁ bukkārēṁti ya lāsēṁti ya taṁḍavaṁti vaggaṁti । apphōḍēṁti ya kēi vi sīhnināyaṁ ca kuvvaṁti ।। 9109 ।।
savvāī vi kē vi kuṇaṁti kē vi hayahēsiyāī kubvaṁti । kēi vi mayamattagaya vva gulugulāyaṁti suranivahā ।।9110।।
rahaghaṇaghaṇāiyaṁ kē vi suragaṇā kēvi tinni vi kuṇati । ucchālēṁti ya kēi vi pacchōlēṁti ya surā kē vi । । 9111 । ।
acchidaṁti ya tivaī kēi vi taha pāyadaddaraṁ dēti । bhūmicavēḍaṁ dalayaṁti kē vi rāvēṁti gurusaddaṁ ।। 9112 । ।
ēvaṁ saṁjōgā vi hu bhaṇiyavvā kē vi taha surasamūhā । hakkārēṁti ya pōkkārēṁti ya taha ōvayaṁtēgē ।। 9113 ।।
taha uppayaṁti ēgē ēgē ya parippavaṁti ya jalaṁti । kēi vi tavaṁti kēi vi gajjaṁti ya vijjuyāyaṁti ।।9114 । ।
vāsaṁti kē vi dēvā dēvakkaliyaṁ karēti taha kē vi । dēvakahakkahamēgē taha dēva hattuhaṁ kē vi ।। 9115 ।।
khvāiṁ vivvittā vi giyāiṁ kē vi taha paṇaccati । ēmāi vibhāsējjā jahēva vijayassa dēvassa ।। 9116 ।।
jā savvaō samaṁtā āhāvēṁti ya tahā pahāvēṁti । ēvaṁ accuyaiṁdōṁ parivārasamaniō sāmi ।।9117 ।।
abhisiṁcittā karayalapariggihīyaṁ sirammi kāūṇa | aṁjalibaddhaṁ vaddhāvēi jaēṇaṁ ca vijaē । । 9118 ।।
iṭṭā kaṁtāhiṁya tāhi maṇunnāhiṁ taha maṇāmāhiṁ । vaggūhiṁ jāva jayajayasaddaṁ haṭṭhē pajēi ।। 9119 ।।

pamhalasukumālāē gaṁdhakasāīē jāva surabhīē । luhai gāyāiṁ jiṇassa jāva taṁ kapparuvakhaṁ va ।। 9120 ।।

yat tvāṁ dhyāyati nityamapyavicalaṁ cētastadēvōjjvalam,
tvannāmākṣaramālikāṁ vadati yā śravyadhvaniḥ saiva vāk ।
yē tvadrūpavilōkanaika niratē tē ēva śasyē dr̥śau,
।
sirimunisuvvaya jinajammavaṇṇaṇaṁ
yastē nātha ! padapraṇāmarasikō mūrdhā sa ēvōttamaḥ ॥
śārdūlavikrīḍitaṁ nāmachandaḥ ॥
iccāi thuṇēūṇaṁ naccāsannamma nāidūrammi । jōḍiyahatthō accayasurēsarō pajjuvāsēi ।। 9138 ।।
ēvaṁ jaha accuīdō tahēva vēmāṇiyā'marappahuṇō । sēsā vi bhāṇiyavvā īsāṇidāvasāṇā u ।। 9139 ।।
bhavaṇavaivāṇamaṁtarajōisiyā caṁdasūrapajjaṁtā । pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ niyaniyaparivārasaṁjuttā ।। 9140 ।।
ahisicaṁti jiṇidaṁ tahēva taṁ jāva pajjuvāsaṁti । aha īsāṇasūriṁdō kāūṇaṁ paṁca rūvāī ॥। 9141 ।।
jahasakkō taha cēva ya ginhai karayalauḍēṇa titthayaraṁ । sīhāsaṇē puratthābhimahō hōuṁ nisīēi ।। 9142 ।।
sēsaṁ taṁ ciya navaraṁ puraō karakamalakaliyavarasūlō । sussūsaṁtō ciṭṭhai aha sakkō dēvagaṇarāyā ।। 9143।।
titthayarassa bhagavaō causuṁ pi disā muhēsu cattāri । dhavalavasahē viubvai dahighaṇagōkhīrasaṁkhanibhē ।। 9144 ।।
abhirūvē paḍivē pāsāīē ya daṁsaṇijjē ya । tēsi caunhaṁ pitaō dhavalāṇaṁ pavaravasabhāṇaṁ ।।9145 ।।
aṭṭhahiṁ siṁgēhitō vimalāō aṭṭha vāridhārāō । niggacchaṁti taē ṇaṁ tāō uḍhḍaṁ nahayalammi ।।9146 । ।
uppaiūṇaṁ dūrē savvāu vi ēgaō milēūṇa । titthayarassa bhagavaō uddhapaēsamma nivayaṁti ॥ 9147 ।।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ tu sakkō tahēva sāmāṇiyāisurasahiō । ahisēyāi vihēuṁ thuṇai jiṇaṁ accuiṁdō vva ।। 9148 ।।
tattō viuvviūṇaṁ rūvāī paṁca putravanāēṇaṁ । gahiūṇaṁ titthayaraṁ samaggasuravidapariyariō ।। 9149 ।।
jammaṇabhavaṇē nēuṁ māūē aṁtiyammi ṭhāvēi । jiṇapaḍivaṁ ōsōryāṇi ca avaṇēiṁ tō jhatti ।। 9150 ।।
ēgaṁ ca khōmajuyalaṁ kuṁḍalajuyalaṁ ca maharihaṁ divvaṁ । titthaya rassa bhagavaō ṭhavēi ūsīgammi taō ।। 9151 ।।
tavaṇijjāmayalaṁbūsagaṁ suvannaṇa maṁḍiyaṁ divvaṁ । nāṇāmaṇirayaṇēhiṁ vicittahārahārēhiṁ ॥ 9152 ।।
uvasōhēmāṇaṁ savvaō vi sirigaṁḍadāmagaṁ ēgaṁ । titthayarassa bhagavaō ullōyatalammi laṁbēi ।।9153 ।।
jaha bhagavaṁ titthayarō aṇimisadiṭṭhīē taṁ palōyaṁtō । aṇusamayaṁ ciya ciṭṭhai suhaṁsuhēṇābhiramamāṇō ।।9154 ।।
aha sakkō vēsamaṇaṁ ēvaṁ āisai jaha tumaṁ khippaṁ । bhō bhō dēvāpiyā ! jammaṇabhavaṇē jigiṁdassa ।। 9155 ।।
kōḍīu hirannassa u battīsaṁ taha suvannakōḍīō । battīsaṁ naṁdāī battōsaṁ taha ya bhaṭṭāī
sōhaggaruvajōvvaṇalāyannagaṇē ya sāharāhi taō । paccaṣpiṇāhi ēvaṁ āṇattiyamēvamāiṭṭō
sakkēṇaṁ vēsamaṇō sahāvēūṇa jaṁbhaē dēvē । tēsi sakkāēsaṁ sāhai sōūṇa taṁ tē vi
nipphāiūṇa sigdhaṁ gaṁtuṁ paṁjaliuḍā kayapaṇāmā । vēsamaṇassa nitrēti sō vi sakkassa vinnavai ।। 9159 ।।
aha kō dēviṁdō sāvittābhiō gaē dēvē । ēvaṁ vayas jahā bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! duyaṁ tubbhē ।।9160 ।।
uvagaṁtr̥̄ṇa bhagavaō jammaṇanayarammi savvaṭāṇēsu । siṁghāḍagatigacaccaracakka caumuhamahapahēsu ।। 9161 ।।
mahayā mayā saddēṇugghōsēmāṇayā imaṁ vayaha । haṁda suṇaṁtu bhavaṁtō bahavē dēvā ya dēvīō ।।9162।।
bhavaṇavaivāṇamaṁtarajōisavēmāṇiyā ! jiṇavarassa । jiṇajaṇaṇīē ya tahā jō kō vi asōhaṇaṁ cittaṁ ।। 9163 । ।
kāhī tarasajjagamaṁjari vva phuṭṭihi sattahā sīsaṁ । iya abhiōgiyadēvā tē sakkēṇaṁ samāṇattā ।। 9164 ।।
haṭṭaparituhiyayā tahēva niṣphāiūṇa tassāṇaṁ । sigghaṁ pi samāgaṁtuṁ sakkassa purō nivēti ॥ 9165 ।।

tattō tē bahavē bhavaṇavāsijōisiyavāṇamaṁtariyā । vēmāṇiyā ya dēvā vayaṁti naṁdīsarē dīvē ॥ 9166 ।।
tattō purathimillē aṁjaṇagamahānagammi gaṁtūṇa । sōhammavaī iṁdō karēi aṭṭhāhiyāmahimaṁ ।। 9167।।
tassēva lōgapālā cattāri vi causu dahimuhanagēsu । īsāṇidō puṇa uttarillaaṁjaṇanagē tuṁ ।। 9168 ।।
dāhiṇadisiaṁjaṇapavvayammi gaṁtūṇa camaraasuriṁdō । baliasuridō puṇa pacchimammi aṁjaṇanagē gaṁtuṁ ।। 9169 ।।
sāsayajiṇabhavaṇēsuṁ karēṁti aṭṭhāhiyāmahāmahimaṁ । ēēsi lōgapālā caurō caurō ya tihaṁ pi । । 9970 ।।
kuvvaṁti ya aṭṭhāhiyamahimaṁ caucausu dahimuhanagēsu । aṭṭhāhiyaṁ karitā savvē vi gayā saṭhāṇēsu ।। 9171 ।।
tattō cavvihamma vidēvanikāyammi bhuvaṇanāhassa । nivvattiūṇa majjaṇamahaṁ gaē niyaniyadvāṇaṁ ।। 9172 ।।
accabbhuya jiṇajammaṇamajjaṇaya mahasavaṁ palōyaṁtī | saṁjāyajāgarā jāmiṇī vi nihaṁ va kāumaṇā । । 9173 ।।
vajjirapābhāuyatūranivahanigghōsabhīyahiyaya vva । avakaṁtā paumāvaidēvī puṇa jhati paḍibuddhā ।। 9174।।
pajalaṁtasunimmalamaṇipa īvapasaraṁtakiraṇajālēhi । ninnāsiyatamasēhiṁ payāsiē sūibhavaṇammi ।।9175।।
pāsai puttaṁ maragayavannaṁ gōsīsacaṁdaṇavilittaṁ । niyapāsanivannaṁ punnamidujunhāsi va nahaṁ ॥ 9176 ।।
navapāriyāyamaṁdāramālaīpamuhavivihakusumēhiṁ । pasarataparimalēhi milataalivalaya muhalē hi ।। 9177 ।।
jiṇa muhanīhariya nisaggasu rahinī sāsaladdhagaṁdhēhiṁ । thuṇamāṇēhiṁ va taṁ savvaō vi ōmāliyasarīraṁ ।। 9178 ।।
baddhamaṇimauḍagēvējjakaḍayakēūrakiraṇarēhaṁtaṁ । sāmaladēhaṁ mēhaṁ va ahiṇavaṁ suradhaṇucchuriyaṁ । । 9179 ।।
ēgaṁ kuṁḍalajuyalaṁ divvaṁ taha dēvadūsajuyalaṁ ca । ūsisagammi ṭhaviyaṁ jiṇassa pēcchai taō ēsā ।। 9180 ।।
ullōyalaṁbiyaṁ taha tavaṇijjāmayapalaṁbalaṁbūsa । sirigaṁḍadāmamēgaṁ diṭṭipahē ṭhāviyaṁ pahuṇō ।। 9181 ।।
pāubbhūyaṁ gabbhāu jiṇavaraṁ jāṇiūṇa harisēṇa । ciravirahukkaṁṭāē ōyaramāṇaṁ va saggasiriṁ ।। 9182 ।।
daṭṭhūṇa taō dēvī niyamai vihavēṇa jāṇiūṇēvaṁ । jaha kira sakkēṇa kaō sakkārō jiṇavarassa imō ॥ 9183 ॥
tō savisēsaṁ pariōsaparavasā māṇasammi saṁjāyā । sā paumāvaidēvī na māi dēhē na vā gēhē ।।9184 ।।
vajjaṁtajāmiṇīviramatūrasaṁghāyaghōsajaṇiēhiṁ । paḍisaddēhi jiṇidassa jammabhavaṇaṁ kahēi vva ॥ 9185 ।।
jiṇajammaṇaṁ jagāṇaṁ puraō pariōsa muvvahēmāṇaṁ । suttaviddhavihaṁgamaravēhi taruṇō vi annōnnaṁ ।। 9186।।
kuvvaṁti saṁkahaṁ piva jiṇidajammassa paharisavasēṇa । paḍibuddhō paumāvaidāsīvaggō vi ēttāhē ।। 9187 ।।
tāō muṇiuṁ niyasāmiṇīē jāyaṁ jiṇēsaraṁ puttaṁ । kāō vi kaṁ pi kuvvaṁti tattha maṁgalla muvayāraṁ ।। 9188।।
jūvamusalāṇa ubbhaḍamāyasarakkhaṁ duvāradēsammi | caṁdaṇakalasāṇa nivēsaṇaṁ ca ēmāi annaṁ ca ।।9189 ।।
aha suvayaṇābhihāṇā pahāviyā cēḍiyā aituraṁtī । vinnavai sumittaṁ naravaridamēvaṁ jahā dēva ! ।।9190 ।।
vaddhāvijjai tubbhē jaṇa vijaēṇa sukayalabbhēṇa । bhuvaṇabbhuda ēkkanibaṁdhaṇēṇa puttassa jammēṇa । । 9191 ।।
(tō) taṁ vayaṇaṁ amayamayakkharaṁ va tīsē nisāmiūṇa taō । jāō sumittarāyā suhajalahinimaggamutti vva । । 9192।।
āsattamavēṇidaliddabhāvaniddalaṇapaccalaṁ tattō । tīsē dēi pasāēṇa atthajāyaṁ bahuṁ rāyā ।।9193 ।।
dhōyāvēūṇa tahā sīsaṁ dāsittaṇāu mōēi । taṁ suvayaṇābhihāṇaṁ suvayaṇasēṇīnihāṇaṁ va ।। 9194।।
āsattamavaṇidaliddabhāvaniddalaṇapaccala tattō । tīsa daha pasāēṇa atyajāyaṁ bahuṭha rāyā ।। 9195 ।।
dhōyāvēūṇa tahā sīsa dāttiṇāu mōēi । ta suvayaṇābhihāṇa suvayaṇasēṇīnihāṇa va ।। 9996 ॥
ōrōhacarō lōō jō jō kō vi hu kahēi āgaṁtuṁ । tassa purō suyajammaṁ taṁ taṁ sō kuṇai adaliddaṁ ।। 9197 ।।
nayarārakkha hakkāriūṇa tō ēvamāisai rāyā । bhō bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! kusagganayarē samaggē'vi ।। 9198 ।।

cāraganiruddhamaṇuyāṇa mōyaṇaṁ māṇavaḍḍhaṇaṁ taha ya khippāmēva karāvēha nayaramēyaṁ ca nīsēsaṁ । । 9199 ।।
