maṁcāimaṁcakaliyaṁ ūsaviyacalaṁtadhayavaḍāḍōvaṁ । gōsīsarattacaṁdaṇaviinnapaṁcaṁgulitalaṁ ca
uvaciyacaṁdaṇakalasaṁ caṁdaṇaghaḍasukayatōraṇaduvāraṁ । vagghāriyasuviulavaṭṭamallamālākalāvaṁ ca
navasarasasugaṁdhidasaddhavaṇṇakusumōvayārakayasōhaṁ । kālāgurupavaraturukkadhūvagaṁdhuddhayabhirāmaṁ
muṭṭhiganaḍanaṭṭagajalla mallavēlaṁbagāiramaṇijjaṁ । āikkhagalāsagakahagapavagamaṁkhēhiṁ saṁkinna
।। 9201 ।।
।। 9202 ।।
।।9203 ।।
।। 9204 ।।
taha laṁkhatuṁbavīṇiyaaṇēgatālāyarāṇugayamaggaṁ । ūsaviyajūvasahasaṁ karēha kārēha ya lahu pi ।। 9205।।
i sō sumittarannā āiṭṭhō nayararakkhagō purisō । parituṭṭhahaṭṭhahiyaō tavvayaṇaṁ paramaviṇaēṇa ।। 9206।।
vinnasiūṇaṁ paṁkaya mugulāyāraṁ karaṁjali sīsē । jha tti paḍissuṇiūṇaṁ tayaṁtiyāō viṇīharai ।।9207।।
ētyaṁtarammi aruṇōdaēṇa kuṁkumakayaṁgarāya vva । jāyā puvvadisivahū jiṇajammavivaḍḍhiyāṇaṁdā ।। 9208 ।।
sēsāō vi disāō jāyāō viyāsanimmalamuhīō । ārūḍhō udayācalasiharaggaṁ sahasakiraṇō vi ।। 9209 ।।
daṁsaṇakuūhalēṇa va kusagganayarammi kīramāṇassa | jiṇapuṁgavajammamahūsavassa acchariyabhūyassa ।। 9210 ।।
tattō niyapurisaparaṁparāhi ugghōsapubvayaṁ ēvaṁ | kārēu sayalapurē nayarārakkhō kahai ranō ।। 9211।।
rāyā vi majjaṇavihi kāūṇaṁ puvvavanniyavihīē । viraiyavarasiṁgārō mahāvibhūīē āgaṁtuṁ ।। 9212 ।।
atthāṇamaṁḍavē maṇimayammi sīhāsaṇē nisīēi । savviḍḍhīē savvajjuīē savvēṇa vi balēṇa ।। 9213।।
savvasirīē savvāyarēṇa savvēṇa samudaēṇaṁ ca । savvēṇa saṁbhramēṇaṁ taha savvā vibhūsā ।। 9214 ||
ōrōhēṇaṁ savvēṇa savvapagaīhi savvanahiṁ । samakālapavāiyavivihatūrasaṁghāya ghōsēṇa
।।9215।।
amilāyamalladāmaṁ pamuiyapakkīliyaṁ aḍaṁḍaṁ ca । abhaḍapavēsaṁ karasuṁkamukka madharimamadējjaṁ ।। 9216।।
pāraddhakōuyasayaṁ gaṇiyāvaranāḍaijjaparikaliyaṁ । sapurajaṇaṁ jāṇavayaṁ dahadiyahāī karāvēi ।। 9217 ।।
iyarammi jaṇē jāē dēsē nayarē gihē va gāmē vā । uppajjai saṁtōsō jiṇidajammē u tijaē vi ।। 9218 ।।
pajjaliyammi paīvē bhavaṇē ēgammi cēva ujjōō । saṁjāyai sahasakarammi uggaē sayalabhuvaṇē vi ।। 9219 ।।
paccatiyarāyāṇō sāmaṁtā maṁtiṇō ya maṁḍaliyā । pōrajaṇā jāṇavayā savvē vihu harisapa hatthā ।। 9220 ।।
niyavihavassagurūvaṁ gahiūṇaṁ maṁgalīyamaiviulaṁ । ēṁti niraṁtaramannōnnamaggapaḍiruddhasaṁcārā ।। 9221 ।।
saiē sāhassiyaē sayasāhasiē ya ginhaī dāē । dēi ya tahēva tuṭṭhō rāyā aha tassa taṇayassa ।। 9222 ॥
paḍhamammi vāsarammī ammāpiyarō karēṁti ṭhiivaḍiyaṁ । kārēṁti taiyadiyahē daṁsaṇiyaṁ caṁdasūrāṇaṁ ।। 9223 ।।
chuṭṭammi vāsarē kāravēṁti savvaṁ nisi pi jāgariyaṁ । ēkkārasamē diyahē nivvattiyajāyakammammi ।। 9224।।
pattē bārasamaṇēi uvakkhaḍāvēṁti viulamāhāraṁ । cauvihamasaṇāīyaṁ taō nimaṁtaṁti savvaṁ pi ।। 9225 ।।
mittaniya nāisaṁbaṁdhipariyaṇaṁ sayaṇavaggamavi savvaṁ । harivaṁsakhattiē taha kārēu majjaṇāīyaṁ ।। 9226 ।।
bhōyaṇavēlāē maṁḍavammi saha tēhi bhōyaṇaṁ kiccā । bhuttuttarammi cōkkhē āyaṁtē paramasuibhūē ।। 9227 ।।
tē vatthagaṁdhamallālaṁkārēṇaṁ jahōciyaṁ savvēṁ । sakkāriūṇa sammāṇiūṇa tēsi purō ēvaṁ ।। 9228 ।।
vayai sumittō rāyā gabbhavannamma dāraē ēttha । muṇivaṁdaṇadāṇarayā suvvayakaraṇujjamaparā ya ।। 9229।।
saṁjāyā paumāvaidēvī taha gabbhapaḍhamadiyahammi । muṇiṇā vi cāraṇēṇaṁ sumiṇaphalaṁ sāhamāṇēṇa ।। 9230 ।।
ēyaṁ ciya vāgariyaṁ tamhā ēyassa hōu imamēva । muṇisuvvaō tti nāmaṁ iya bhaṇiē tēhi aṇunāō ।। 9231 ।।

ṭhāvēi nivō nāmaṁ jiṇassa taṁ caiva puvvamuvaiṭṭhē । jāyai jayā tisā vā chuhā va taiyā jiṇō niyayaṁ ॥ 9232 ।।
hatthaṁguliṁ niyamuhē pakkhivai surā ya pariṇamāvēṁti । tattha samaggarasāī bhakkhāī aṇēgarūvāī ।। 9233 ।।
savvēsi pi jiṇāṇaṁ bālattē hōi ēsa āhārō । dhāvaṁti na tē thannaṁ puvvajjiyasukayapabbhārā ।। 9234 ।।
tayaṇu mahaṁtībhūyā abbhavahārēti rasavaī siddhaṁ । usabhassa u gihavāsē dēvakaō āsi āhārō ।। 9235 ।।
kiṁca jiṇamāyarō hōṁti līṇagabbhāō tāṇa ya jiṇēsu । jararuhirakalamalāīṇi jāya māṇēsu na havaṁti ।। 9236 ।।
aha vaḍḍhai sō bhayavaṁ suralōyacuō aṇōvamasirīō । dāsīdāsaparivuḍō parikinnō pīḍhamaddēhiṁ ।। 9237 ।।
naranāhamaṁtisāmaṁtasēṭṭimaṁḍalavaīṇa taṇaēhiṁ | । sarisavaēhi sēvijjamāṇacaraṇāravidajuō ।।9238 ।।
kārai tassa nimittaṁ sumittarāyā aṇēgarūvāī | khēlaṇayāiṁ nāṇāmaṇirayaṇasuvannamaiyāī ।। 9239 ।।
suṁdaradārumayāī kāī vi vara lihiyacittakammāī । rahakarituraṁgavasahāgiīṇi maṇanayaṇaharaṇāī ।। 9240 ।।
bhayavaṁ tināṇasahiō avagayasaṁsārasavvaparamatthō । bālō vi sarīrēṇaṁ abālacariō sahāvēṇa ।। 9241 ।।
kōuyarahiō visayaṁ samāṇavayasēvayāṇurōhēṇa । kīlai tēhi jahicchaṁ tēsi maṇaraṁjaṇaṭṭāē ।। 92342।।
ḍhōiyakhēlaṇayāṇaṁ uciyaṁ jaṁ kiṁci hōi na duijjaṁ । taṁ āṇiūṇa tiyasā ḍhōyaṁti sayaṁ pi jayapahuṇō ।। 9243 ||
paidiyahaṁ pi pavaḍḍhai taṇulaṭṭhī tassa vijayanāhassa । pūraṁtī kaṁtibharaṁ siyapakkhamayaṁkalēha vva ।। 9244।।
puvvabhavajjiyajiṇanāhapunnapa bhārajaṇiyakhōhēhiṁ । cauvihadēvēhi niraṁtaraṁ pi ēṁtēhi jaṁtēhi ।। 9245 ।।
jiṇarūvadaṁsaṇukkaṁṭhiēhiṁ jiṇapāyapaṇailuddhēhiṁ । saggapuraṁ va virāyai kusagganayaraṁ tayākālē ।। 9246 ।।
jāyammi tijayanāhē aḍasaṁvaccharapamāṇavayajuttē । suyanēhamōhiyamaṇō citēi sumittanaranāhō । । 9247 ।।
jaha saṁpayaṁ kumārō vayammi baṭṭai kalāgahaṇajaggē । appēmi kalāyariyassa tā imaṁ sōhaṇē diya ।। 9248 ||
ēyaṁ jaṇayavippaṁ jāṇai jiṇapuṁgavō sanāṇēṇa । taha vi hu na ki pi jaṁpai ciṭṭhai ēmēva garimāē ।। 9249 ।।
annamma diṇē rāyā sahāvēūṇa niyasamīvammi । lēhāyariyaṁ uvavēsiūṇa jā ki pi japēhī ।। 9250 ।।
tā tammi khaṇē muṇisuvvaō vi piuṇō paṇāmakaraṇatthaṁ । pattō tattha taō sō kayapaṇivāō naridēṇa ।। 9251 ।।
āliṁgiūṇa gāḍhaṁ cuṁbēūṇaṁ sirammi ucchaṁgē। saṁṭhaviō ujjhāyaṁ pucchara naranāhapāsammi ।। 9252 ।।
kō ēsa auvvō tāya ! aṁtiē tumha ciṭṭhai nisannō ? । rāyā kaha jahasō lēhāikalāṇuvajjhāō ।। 9253 ।।
tō muṇisuvvayanāhō piuṇō maivibbhamāvaṇayaṇatthaṁ । jaṁ jaṁ visamaṭṭhāṇakalāṇa jāṇai na ujjhāō ।। 9254 ।।
taṁ taṁ pucchara tassaṁtiyammi niyanāṇanāyaparamatthō । ujjhāō puṇa savvattha uttaraṁ kuṇai na muṇēmi ।। 9255 ।।
aha muṇisuvvayanāhō pucchiyaṭhāṇāī kahai tassa sayaṁ । vivarēuṁ sō vi taha tti paṁjalī paḍisuṇai savvaṁ ॥। 9256।।
aha bālassa vi muṇisuvvayassa vayaṇāī aipagabbhāī । panhēsu uttarēsu ya sōūṇaṁ sayalanivalōō ।। 9257।।
pamuiyamaṇō vicitai na vimhaō kō vi ēttha vatthummi । jaṁ ēsa jiṇō jāṇai jaṇasāmannaṁ kalā tattaṁ ।। 9258।।
iṁdiagōyaraṁ pi hu avahinnāṇēṇa jō muṇai vatyuṁ । rāyā vi raṁjiō lajjiō ya suyaguṇasabuddhīhiṁ ।। 9259 ।।
citai vimūḍhamaiṇā kahaṁ maē aṇuciyaṁ samāraddhaṁ ? । nāganihī vi jiṇō jaṁ iṭṭhōṁ sikkhaviumiyarāō । 9260॥
vēsamaṇō rōrāō adaliddīkāumīhiō nūṇaṁ । pūrēuṁ pāraddhō jalahī ōsāyasalilēhi ||9261 ।।
nigguṇasakkāraguṇāhiyāvamāṇubbhavaṁ mahāpāvaṁ । avivēyajaṇiyamayasaṁ avaṇīyaṁ majjha taṇaṇa ।। 9262 ।
tā gōviḍaṁ jahaṭṭiyamaṭṭhē kāūṇa uttaraṁ avaraṁ । ujjhāyamimaṁ sagihē visajjimō citiuṁ ēvaṁ ।। 9263।।
jaṁpara hāyariyaṁ maē tumaṁ ēttha kāraṇēṇimiṇā । saddāviō jahā tujjha saṁsayaṁ chiṁdai kumārō || 9264।।

sirimunisuvvayajinavaṇṇaṇaṁ
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ sammāṇiūṇa taṁ niyagihē visajjēi । rāyā kumaraṁ muṇisuvvayaṁ tu āliṁgiḍaṁ gāḍhaṁ ।। 9265 ।।
kāūṇa kaṁpi samuciyamālāvaṁ tagguṇāgurāyassa । harisariyamiō taō visajjēi muhuttatē ।। 9266।।
savvattha vi vitthariō ēsa paghōsō jahā kalāyariō । muṇisuvvayakumarēṇaṁ kalāsu gayasaṁsaō vihiō । । 9267 ।।
taṇibhiraṁ munisuvvayassa kumarassa paṭṭhimaṇulaggō । kalagahaṇatyī paribhamai subahalōō visēsēṇa ।। 9268 ।।
muṇisuvvaō vi sēvayajaṇāṇurōhēṇa dēi uvaēsaṁ । visaē savvakalāṇaṁ annattha vi saṁsayaṁ harai ।। 9269 ।।
karituraēhi rahēhi ya kayāi kīlēi kāṇaṇāīsu । puvvattasavva sēvayajaṇēhiṁ parivāriō saṁtō ।। 9270 ।।
pāunbhūō kamasō tassa sarīrammi jōvvaṇubbhēō । pūraṁtō savisēsaṁ lāyannarasēṇa aṁgāī ।। 9271 ।।
tassa muhē sāmalaē navaggayā sahai maṁsurōmālī | aṁjaṇachāyānīluppalammi līṇālimāla vva ।। 9272 ।।
navaghaṇatamālasāmalamaruṇāharacaraṇakarayalanahēhi । saṁjhabbhapāḍalaṁ nahathalaṁ va paḍihāṛa tassaṁgaṁ ।। 9273 ।।
ahavā kaha uvamijjai tassa sarīraṁ na jassa tijaē vi । pāvijjai uvamāṇaṁ nijjiya sura maṇuyarūvassa ।। 9274 ।।
caṁkamiyapalōiyajaṁpiyāināṇāvilāsacēṭṭhāhiṁ । tiyasāṇa vi harai maṇaṁ diṭṭhōṁ muṇisuvvayakumārō ।। 9275।।
accanbhūyajiṇarūvālōyaṇakō ūhalēṇa kēi jaṇā । kēi vi tavvinnāṇāisayāyannaṇakaukkaṁṭhā ॥ 9276 ।।
kē vi bahupunnakāraṇataddaṁsaṇasaṁbhavāhilāsēṇa । iya kē vi ki pi kāraṇa mahigicca vi dūradēsāō ।। 9277।।
ēṁti kusaggē nayarē aṇavarayamaṇēyalōyasaṁghāyā । tēhi auvvamauvvaṁ sōhaṁtaṁ vaha nicca pi ।। 9278 ।।
sōūṇa suragaṇēhiṁ sayā vi sēvijjamāṇapayajuyalaṁ । puttaṁ sumittarannō bhīyamaṇā kē vi duniyā ।। 9279।।
jiṇapunnapagari sunbhūyaviulabalavāhaṇaṁ niēūṇa । kē vi nariṁdā jiṇajaṇayabhāvaō jāyabahumāṇā ।। 9280 ।।
rahakarituraṁga divvaṁsuya divvāharaṇarayaṇapamuhāī । pēsaṁti pāhuḍāī paṇamaṁti sayaṁ pi āgaṁtuṁ ।। 9281।।
ki jaṁpiēṇa bahuṇā tajhyā bharaddhacakkavaṭṭivva । jāō sumittarāyā tavvāsinaridanamaṇijjō ॥। 9282 ।।
muṇisuvvaō vi bhayavaṁ supasatthasamatthalakkhaṇēhi juō । vaṭṭatō bhōgakhamē vayammi saṁpanna ।। 9283।।
punnimasasisamavayaṇō visadr̥kaṁdōdīhavaranayaṇō । kuṁdakaliōhadasaṇō sugaṁdhinīsāsaruhasasaṇō ।। 9284 ।।
puraparihadīhabāhū surakuṁjarakarasaricchasayalōrū । caṁdaddhabhālaphalaō maragaya silaviyaḍavacchayalō ।। 9285 ।।
pariṇāviō sumittēṇa patthivēṇaṁ aṇēyanivaīṇa । kannāō aṇannasamāṇakhvapariṇijjiyaraīō ।। 9286 ।।
tāhi samaṁ saddāīvisayasuhaṁ sō'ṇuhavai paṁcavihaṁ । niruvamamamaragaṇāṇa vi salāhaṇijjaṁ paidiṇaṁ pi ।। 9287 ।।
vajjatavēṇuvīṇāvilāsiṇīgayasaddamaṇaharaṇaṁ । pēcchaṇayanāyavihiṁ pāsaṁtō gamai diyahāī ॥। 9288 ।।
vijjāharamihuṇāṇaṁ kinnaramihuṇāṇa vā vi annōnaṁ । jāyammi visaṁvāē gēyaviyārē va naṭṭammi ।। 9289 ।।
pāsē samāgayāṇaṁ saṁsayamavaharai tē vi bhattīē । nāṇāvihanaṭṭavihiṁ daṁsittā jaṁti saṭṭā ।। 9290 ।।
tailōssa vi vimhayajaṇaṇaṁ ēvaṁ vilāsasuhamasamaṁ । aṇuhavamāṇassa pabhāvaiti bhajjā jiṇidassa ।। 9291 ।।
pasavai suvvayanāmaṁ puttaṁ sukumālapāṇipāyajuyaṁ । kamaladaladīhanayaṇaṁ punnimasasibiṁbasamavayaṇaṁ ।। 9292 ।।
aha muṇisuvvayanāhaṁ vāsasahassāiṁ sattasaḍḍhāī । pāliyakumāravāsaṁ rajjē ahisiṁcai saṭhāṇē ।। 9293 ।।
aigaruya vibhūīē sumittarāyā surā vi niyata । tattha kuṇaṁti muṇaṁtā tīē sukayatthamappāṇaṁ ।। 9294 ।।
ṭhaviūṇa jiṇē rajjaṁ rāyā paumāvaīē dēvīē । sahiō ginhai dikkhaṁ pāsē kēsi pi sūrīṇaṁ ।। 9295।।
parivāliūṇa vimalaṁ pavvajjaṁ pāviūṇa pajjatē । paramaṁ samāhimaraṇaṁ dōnni va māhidakappammi ।। 9296 ।।
uppannā dēvattaṇēṇa muṇisuvvaō vi jayanāhō । nīīē parivālai puhaī tisamuddamajjāyaṁ ।। 9297 ।।

vāsāṇa sahassāiṁ panarasa aha annayā sarayakālē । saṁpattē muṇisuvvayarāyā vilayāhi pariyariō ।। 9298 ॥
kulagirisiharutuṁgē pāsāyavaḍisayammi ārūḍhō । pāsai sarayassa siri savvattō dinnadiṭṭhīē ।। 9299।।
kāsēhiṁ naīkacchā kēyārā sālimaṁḍalēhiṁ ca । kamalēhiṁ sarā giriṇō ghaṇavaṇasaṁḍēhi saṁchannā ।। 93000 ।।

haragalatamālakajjalakō ilagavalāiirēyasāmalayā । aṁdhārīkayanīsēsadisivahūvayaṇatāmarasā
dēviṁdacāvakaliyā samarammi mahābhaḍa vva gajjatā । utthariyā varisēuṁ jaladhārāsarasamūhēhiṁ ।। 9307।।
vijjulayāō payaḍīhavaṁti ālōyakō uēṇaṁ va । tahiyaṁ khaṇē khaṇē cciya bhīya vva puṇō nilukkaṁti । 9308।।
taṁjāva vimhamaṇō muṇisuvvayajiṇavarō palōēi । tāva sahasa tti uṭṭhiyapayaṁupavaṇēṇa kattō vi ।। 9309॥
vikkhittaṁ disidisi mēhamaṁḍalaṁ sasuracāvavijjulayaṁ । jāyaṁ vimalaṁ gayaṇaṁgaṇaṁ pi puvvaṁ va saviyāsaṁ ।। 9310।।
taṁ daṭṭhūṇa vicitai jiṇēsarō jaha imammi saṁsārē । savvē ciya saṁjōyā sulahaviōyā khaṇēṇēva ।। 9314 ।
mōttūṇa muttiṭhāṇaṁ na kiṁpi thiramiyaramatthi suhajaṇayaṁ । tā tammi cēva saṁpai juttō maha ujjamō kāuṁ ।। 9312।।
iya savva viraigahaṇābhi muhē jāyammi tammi jiṇanā | sōhammakappapahuṇō caliyaṁ sīhāsaṇaṁ jhatti ।। 9313॥
aha sō uttaōhī muṇai jiṇidaṁ vayābhimuhacittaṁ । tō uṭṭhaūṇa sīhāsaṇāu sattaṭṭha ya payāī ।। 9314 । । ।
gaṁtūṇa sammuhaṁ jiṇavarassa harisēṇa pulaiyasarīrō । tikkhuttō muddhāṇaṁ dharaṇiyalē sannivēsēuṁ ।।9315।।
īsi paccunnamiuṁ aṁcittā vāmamattaṇō jāṇuṁ । namiūṇa dāhiṇaṁ mahiyalammi raiyaṁjalī tattō ।। 9316॥
kāūṇa saṁthavaṁ puṇa maṇimayasīhā saṇammi ṭhāūṇa | citēi jīyamēyaṁ jaṁ arahaṁtāṇa savvēsi ।। 9317॥
nikkhamamāṇāṇa imaṁ atthapayāṇaṁ karēṁti kira sakkā । tinnēva ya kōḍisayā aṭṭhāsīiṁ ca kōḍīō ।। 9318।।
asiī ya sayasahassā kaṇayassa samāvasāṇa dāṇaṭṭhā | ēvaṁ saṁpēhittā vēsamaṇaṁ jhatti āisai ।। 9319।।
jaha bhī dēvāṇupiyā ! muṇisuvvayajiṇavarō vayaggahaṇaṁ । kāumaṇō vacchariyaṁ dāṇaṁ dāu ahilasēi ।। 9320।।
inhi tā tassa gharē gaṁtūṇaṁ sāharāhi ēvaiyaṁ । cāmīyaraṁ ti ēyaṁ vēsamaṇō sakkaāē ।।9.321।।
sirasā paḍicchiūṇaṁ pahiduhiyaō kayatthamappāṇaṁ । manatō dēi tayaṁ jaṁbhagadēvāṇa āēsaṁ । । 9322 ।।
tē vi ḍissuṇiūṇaṁ taha tti tavvayaṇamarahaō bhavaṇē । gaṁtūṇa kaṇayarāsi tāvaiyaṁ jhatti vāsaṁti ॥। 9323।।
gaṁtūṇa taō ēē vēsamaṇassērisa nivēyaṁti। sō vi pahiṭṭhō gaṁtuṁ ēvaṁ sakkssa vinnavai ।। 9324।।
tō bhayavaṁ tiyacaccaracaukkaca umuhamahāpahapahēsu । annēsu vi ṭhāṇēsuṁ kusagganayarammi savvē ।। 9325।।
paidiyahaṁ pahiyāṇaṁ kappaḍiyāṇaṁ karōḍiyāṇaṁ ca । vāhiyarōrasaṇāhā'ṇāhāṇa riṇēṇa ghatthāṇa ।।9326 ।।
daviṇāhilātiyāṇaṁ annēsi pi hu pabhāyaō pabhiraṁ । jā diyahaddhaṁ dāvai varavariyāghōsaṇāpuvvaṁ ।।9327।।
kaṁcaṇadāṇamachinnaṁ ēgēgadiṇammi dijjaē ēgā। kōḍī kaṇayassa tahā aṭṭhēva aṇūṁṇagā lakkhā ।। 9328 । ।
annaṁ pi tattha maṇirayaṇavatthakariturayaatthamāīyaṁ । jaṁ jō maggai taṁ sō lahēi nīsaṁsayaṁ cēva ।। 9329।।
taha tattha kusaggapurē aṁtō bāhimmi ṭhāṇaṭhāṇē ya । kārāvēi mahāṇasasālāō jiṇō visālāō ।।9330॥

।।9331।।
tattha ya bahupurisēhiṁ vinnaruibhattavētaṇēhiṁ ca । viulaṁ cauvvihaṁ pi hu āhāra muvakkhaḍāvē
tō jōēi sāhō kō vi aṇāhō va rōrakappaḍiō । pāsaṁḍī va gityō tassa suhāsaṇavaragayassa ।।9332।।
vīsatthassa jahicchiyamāhāraṁ dāvaē cauvihaṁ pi । tō tattha kusaggapurē parōpparaṁ ēvamālāvō ।।9333।।
vaṭṭai savvattha vi tiyacaukkacaccaramahāpahapahēsu । jaha muṇisuvvaya jiṇapuṁgavassa nikkhamiukāmassa ।। 9334 ।।
bhavaṇē bhōyaṇajāyaṁ labbhai savvāhilāsa saṁpanna | ahavā kēttiyamēyaṁ imassa sivasōkkhadāissa ।। 9335 ।।
iya dijjatē dāṇē samaggadēsēsu pasariyā kittī । tēsu jaṇō annōnnaṁ ēvaṁ saṁlavai jaha bhō bhō ।। 9336 ।।
ēha vayaṁsā ! sigdhaṁ jahā kusaggē purammi gaṁtūṇa । pēcchāmō bhayavaṁtaṁ acitaciṁtāmaṇisaricchaṁ ।। 9337 ।।
jēṇihabhavammi suhiṇō hōmō amhē suvannalābhēṇa । paralōē tadaṁsaṇasaṁbhūya bhūyaputrēṇa ॥। 9338।।
।
annabhavajjiyabahupāvapabhavadukkhō hadūmiyāṇa'mha । ēsō cciya bhuvaṇattayasāmī saraṇaṁ na annō tti ।। 9339॥
iya bhāvēṇaṁ kēsu vidēsaṁtaraō jaṇēsu ēṁtēsu । kēsu vi saṁpattasamīhiēsa jaṁtēsu saṭṭāṇaṁ ।। 9340 ।।
taha vatthavvajaṇammi vi saṁcaramāṇammi tassa nayarassa । bāhimmi vimajjhammi va jāyā maggā dusaṁcārā ।। 9341 ।।
maggaṇajaṇāṇa ēvaṁ pūrijjaṁtēsu icchiyatthēsu । saṁvaccharappamāṇō kālō taiyā kusaggapurē ।। 9342 ।।
।
saṁjāō lōyāṇaṁ kappad madinnavaṁchiyatthaphalō । pamuiyanīsēsajaṇō sūsamakālāvayārō vva ।। 9343।।
vijjulayācavalēṇa vi vihatrēṇa na jō parassa jaṇai suhaṁ । sō kaha giridaruṁda saṁjamabhara muvvahēhi tti ।। 9344 ।।
jāṇāvaṇahēuṁ piva jaṇassa dinaṁ visēsaō pahuṇā । saṁvaccharappamāṇaṁ dāṇaṁ tahayā jahicchāē । । 9345 ।।
saha vivammi sayā vi hu dīṇāṇāhāiyāṇa dāyavvaṁ । dāṇaṁ sappurisēṇaṁ visēsaō dikkhakālammi ।। 9346 ||
dhaṇamucchāparicāō karuṇā duhiēsa pavayaṇapasaṁsā । tajjaṇiō suhabaṁdhōṁ dāṇēṇa guṇā imē hōṁti ।। 9347।।
alamētya vittharēṇaṁ aṇavarayadhaṇappayāṇadhārāhi । navajalaharō vva maṇuyāṇa samiyadāliddaduhadāhō ।। 9348 ।।
bhayavaṁ harikulatilaō citēi maṇammi nikkhamāmi tti । aha baṁbhalōyakappē riṭṭhammi vimāṇapatthaḍaē । । 9349 ।।
lōgaṁtiyatiyasavarā niyaniyamaṇimaya mahāvimāṇēsu । niyaniyapāsāyavaḍēṁsasu pattē pattēyaṁ । । 9350।।
sāmāṇiyāmarāṇaṁ cauhi sahassēhiṁ tihi u parisāhi । sattahiṁ aṇiēhi tahā satahiṁ aṇiyāhivēhiṁ ca । । 9351 । ।
aṭṭhahi u sahassēhiṁ duguṇēhiṁ āyarakkhadēvāṇaṁ । taha baṁbhalōyavatthavvaēhiṁ annēhiṁ vi bahūhiṁ ।। 9352 ।।
dēvēhi saṁparivuḍā nāḍayavihigīyavāiyaravēhiṁ । bhōgāī bhuṁjamāṇā viharaṁti imēhiṁ nāmēhiṁ ।। 9353 ।।
sārassaya māiccā vanhī varuṇā ya gaddatōyā ya । tusiyā avvābāhā aggiccā cēva riṭṭhā ya ।। 9354 ।।
tō tēsi dēvāṇaṁ pattēyaṁ āsaṇāī kaṁpaṁti । aha tē dēvā avahi pauṁjiūṇaṁ viyāṇaṁti ।। 9355 ।।
jaha muṇisuvvayasāmī inhi tijaēkkahiyaraō bhayavaṁ । cittammi saṁpahārai nikkhamaṇamahaṁ karēmi tti ।। 9356 ॥
tā jīyamiṇaṁ lōgaṁtiyāṇa dēvāṇa jaṁ jiṇidāṇaṁ । nikkhamaṇamaṇāṇaṁ tē karēṁti saṁbōhaṇaṁ gaṁtuṁ ।। 9357 ।।
tā gacchāmō amhē vi sāmisaṁbōhaṇaṁ karēmō tti । saṁpēhēuṁ uttarapuratthimammi disivibhāē । । 9358 ।।
avakamiūṇaṁ tattō kāuṁ vēubviyaṁ samugdhāyaṁ । iccāi jāva paramēsarassa pāsammi gaṁtūṇa ।। 9359 ।।
gayaṇagaṇadviya cciya sakhikhiṇīēhi paṁcavannēhiṁ । vatthēhi niyatthēhi aīvauvasō hamāgaṁgā ॥ 9360 ॥
iṭṭāhi kaṁtāhi maṇapalhāyaṇakarīhi vaggūhiṁ । aṭṭhasaiyāhiṁ tāhi puṇaruttavivajjiyāhiṁ ca ।। 9361।।
abhinaṁdamāṇayā abhithuṇamāṇā taha ya ēvamāhaṁsu । jaya jaya naṁdā jaya jaya bhaddā jaya naṁda bhaddaṁ tē ।। 9362।।

।।
jaya jaya muṇivaravasabhā ! bhayavaṁ ! bujjhāhiṁ lōgatiyanāhā । hiyasuhanissēsakaraṁ dhammaṁ titthaṁ pavattēhi ।। 9363 ।।
jayajayasaddaṁ iccēvamāibhattīē tē pauṁjēuṁ । vaṁdati namasaṁti ya jahāgayaṁ jaṁti bhujjō vi ।। 9364।।
iya lōyaṁtiyadēvēhiṁ bōhiō bhuvaṇabaṁdhavō bhayavaṁ । muṇisuvvaō mahappā suvvayanāmaṁ niyaṁ puttaṁ ।। 9365 ।।
mahayāvicchaḍḍēṇaṁ ahisiṁcāi niyasamiddharajjammi । aha sō rāyā jāō namiō sāmaṁtamaṁtīhiṁ ।। 9366 ।।
āpucchiō bhagavayā nikkhamaṇatthaṁ taō niyamaṇussē । saddāviūṇa āisai ērisaṁ gurupattēṇa ।। 9367 ।।
jaha bhō dēvāpiyā ! khippāmēva ya suvannakalasāṇa । aṭṭhōttaraṁ sahassaṁ jāva ya bhōmējjakalasāṇaṁ ।। 9368।।
annaṁ ca mahatthaṁ maharihaṁ ca jaṁ kici savvamēva tayaṁ । tihuyaṇapahuṇō samavaṭṭhavēha ahisēyapāuggaṁ ।। 9369।।
ahaṁ tē suvvayarāyāēsāṇaṁtaramasēsamavi ēyaṁ । khippaṁ uvaṭṭhavittā tassa nivēti gaṁtūṇa ॥ 9370।।
ētthantarammi sīhāsaṇassa kaṁpēṇa dinnauvaōgō । sōhammakappanāhō jāṇai muṇisuvvayajiṇassa ।। 9371 ।।
nikkhamaṇābhippāyaṁ tō jaha jammāhisēsasamayammi । tava cēvuttaravēuvviyajāṇavimāṇamāruḍhō ।।9372 ॥
savvaggamahisiparisāsāmāṇiyaāyarakkhadēvēhiṁ । sattahi u aṇīēhi sattahiṁ ya aṇīyanāhēhiṁ ।। 9373 ।।
annēhi vi bahuēhiṁ sōhammagadēva dēvinivahēhiṁ । pariyariō vajjaharō samāgaō sāmipāsamma ।। 9374 ।।
tēṇēva ya divvēṇaṁ jāṇavimāṇēṇa saṁjuō sakkō । āyāhiṇīkarēuṁ bhayavaṁtaṁ tinni vārāō 9375 ।।
uttaraputthimāē disāē cauraṁgulēṇa dharaṇiyalē । ṭaviūṇamasaṁpattaṁ jāṇavimāṇaṁ tayaṁ divvaṁ 9376 ।।
tō divvāō tattō jāṇavimāṇāō tiyasagaṇasahiō । puvvuttarajammēhiṁ dārēhiṁ ōruhēūṇa || 9377।।
suraniyara phāliyatūranivahanigghōsapūriyadiyaṁtō । tikkhuttō āyāhiṇapayāhiṇīkuṇai jiṇanāhaṁ ॥ 9378 ।।
vaṁdai namasai taō adūraniyaḍammi pajjuvāsēi । sōhammavaī ēvaṁ nēyā sēsā vi kappidā ।।9379 ।।
bhavaṇavaivāṇamaṁtarajōisiyā vi hu sasāmiṇō savvē । taha cēva samāgaṁttuṁ bhagavaṁtaṁ pajjuvāsaṁti ।। 9380 ।।
aha accuyadēvidō sāvittābhiōgiē dēvē । ēvaṁ vayai jahā bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! duyaṁ cēva ।। 9381 ।।
muṇisuvvayassa tubbhē tilōyanāhassa maharihamahatthaṁ । nikkhamaṇahisēyamuṭuvēha viulaṁ mahiḍīyaṁ ॥ 9382 ।।
aha tē tassāēsaṁ taha tti paḍivajjiūṇa haṭṭhamaṇā । ahisēyaṁ jhatti uvadvavēṁti jammāhisēyasamaṁ । । 9383 ।।
aha tē divvā kalasā savvē vi ya tēsu caiva kalasēsu । naranāhasaṁtiēsuṁ surasattīē aṇupaviṭṭhā ॥। 9384 ।।
aha sō suvvayarāyā sāmi sīhāsaṇammi rayaṇamaē । puvvābhimuhaṁ saṁṭhāviūṇa nhāvēi bhūīē ।। 9385 ।।
kaṇayakalahōyamaṇimāiyāṇa kalasāṇa jāva bhōmāṇa । pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ aṭṭhōttaraēṇa sahasēṇa ।। 9386 ।।
savvōdaēhiṁ savvōsahīhi savvāhiṁ maṭṭiyāhiṁ ca । samakālapavāiyasayalatūranigghōsanivahēṇa ॥। 9387 ।।
ahisiṁcai aha tammi u ahisēyamahimmi vaṭṭamāṇammi । muṇisuvvayassa pahuṇō kē vi surindā gahiyachattā |88 |
kēvi karakaliyasasaharakaranimmalacārucāmaruppīlā । vimalajalapunnamaṁgalakalasakarā kē vi dēvidā ।। 9389 ।।
dhruvakaḍacchuyahatthā kē vihu varapupphagaṁdhamallakarā । ciṭṭhati paṁjaliuḍā puraō kēi vi pahidumaṇā ।। 9390 ।।
anē vi dēvadēvī nivahā bahavē vi hatthagayakalasā । bhiṁgārathālapāīāyaṁ sagavāyakaragakarā ।।9391।।
supaiṭṭhavicittakaraṁḍapupphacaṁgēripupphapaḍalakarā । sīhāsaṇē tēllasa muggachattasiyacāmarakaraggā ।। 9392 ।।
dhūvakaḍacchuyahatthā puraō ciṭṭhati paṁjaliuḍā ya । appēgaiyā dēvā kusagganayaraṁ samaggaṁ pi ।। 9393 ।।
kuvvaṁti mahapahāisu sittaṁ sammajjivalittaṁ ca । vijayasurassa va majjaṇamahammi dhāvaṁti vaggati ।। 9394 ॥

।। 9407 ।।
tō sō dōcca pi nivō sīhāsaṇamuttarāmuhaṁ ṭhaviḍaṁ । ahisiṁcāi tattha jiṇaṁ sēyāpīēhi kalasēhiṁ । । 9395 ।।
tō'laṁkārasabhāē puvvābhimuhāsa nisannassa । sāmissa purō iṁdā uvaṇēnti bahū alaṁkārē ।। 9396 ।।

gōsīsēṇa'ṇulapati savvagāyāī bhagavaō tattō । nāsānīsāsamīravōjjhayaṁ cakkhaharaṇaṁ ca ।। 9398 ।।
suhavannapharisajuttaṁ hayalālāpēlavāirēgaṁ ca । dhavalaṁ suvannakhaciyaṁtakammamāgāsaphalihapaha ।।9399॥
ahayaṁ divvaṁ varadēvadūsajuyalaṁ niyaṁsayāvēti । kaḍisutayaṁ piṇidhaṁti tayaṇu jiṇakaṁṭhadēsammi ।। 9400 ।।
nimmalasujāya nittalam ttāmaṇinimmiyaṁ aṇēgasaraṁ । supamāṇaguṇaṁ ramaṇijjapiṭṭiyāgōcchapallaviyaṁ । । 9401 ॥
dhavalamahāpannaganāhasannihaṁ uranahadḍahariṇakaṁ । sasikarasisiraṁ navakuṁdakusumaairēgagōrapahaṁ । । 9402 ।।
āharaṇapaḍīhāraṁ hāra avalaṁbayaṁti hiyayaharaṁ । tayaṇu maṇirayaṇajālōvagūḍhasaṁkhēṇa ruirēṇa । । 9403 ।।
sōhaṁtamajjhabhāyaṁ nāṇāmaṇirayaṇabhattisuvicittaṁ । pālaṁbaṁ ca piṇidhaṁti appaṇī suppamāṇēṇa ।। 9404 ।।
tō tavaṇijjamayāiṁ calaṁtasōdāmaṇippagāsāī । vimalāī misimisitāī rayaṇaparimaṁḍiyāī ca 9405 ।।
gaṁḍaparipuṁcchagāī mailacchīdī vagāī ruirāī । kannēsu kuṁḍalāī taō piṇidhaṁti tē pahuṇō ।। 9406॥
suhavannagaṁdhaphāsaṁ amaṁgalā saṁtirōga dōsaharaṁ । duddharisaṁ varalakkhaṇaguṇōvavēyaṁ pavittaṁ ca
bhūrayaṇasavvasāraṁ dēviṁdarnāradamuddhakayanilayaṁ । cūḍāmaṇi aṇagdhaṁ taō tiṇidhaṁti tē haṭṭā ||9408 ||
tayaṇaṁtaramairuggayasahassakaramaṁḍalaṁ va dippataṁ । vimalavarajaccasuvi ulajaṁbūṇayadalaviṇimmaviyaṁ । । 9409 ।।
maṁgallaṁ sassiriyaṁ sōlasavararayaṇakaliyapavibhāgaṁ । mōttiyapayaragalaṁbaṁ tadāmakaliyaṁ misimitaṁ । । 9410 ॥
aipēcchaṇijjarūvaṁ aisayama ivihava niuṇa nimmaviyaṁ । pacalaṁtamahuramaṇirayaṇaghaṁṭiyā jālasaddālaṁ ।। 9411 । ।
vilasaṁtakiraṇajālaṁ ābharaṇavaḍēṁsayaṁ pabhāsataṁ । sīsamma nivēti ya pahuṇō rayaṇa kkaḍaṁ mauḍaṁ । । 9412 ।।
hāraṁ ca aṛahāra kēūrāī ca aṁgayāī ca । tuḍiyāī palaṁbāī tahēva pāyāvalaṁbāī ।।9413।।
kaṇagāvattāvalirayaṇāvali - muravikaṁṭha muravīō । ēkkāvalipamuhāī ca bhūsaṇāī piṇidhaṁti ॥9414।।
divvaṁ ca sumaṇadāmaṁ savvōuyapaṁcavannakusumakayaṁ । tattō daddayasugaṁdhimalayagaṁdhē piṇidhati
nāṇāmaṇikaṇagavicittarayaṇaraiē mahārihē vimalē । tēlōkkavīravalaē taō visi piṇidhaṁti ॥ 9416।।
gaṭhimavēḍhimapurimasaṁghāimaēṇa cauviṇaṁ pi । mallēṇa kapparukkhaṁ va bhūsiyaṁ tayaṇu kubvaṁti । । 9417 ॥
tattō ya sugaṁdhāī gaṁdhāī pakkhivaṁti dēhammi । ēvaṁ ciya vāsāī khivaṁti jā surahicunnāī ।। 9418 ।।
pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ sirammi kāūṇa aṁjali tattō । iṭṭhāhi kaṁtāhi ōrālāhi maṇunnāhi ॥ 9419।।
kallāṇāhi sivāhi dhannāhi maṁgalāhi vaggūhi । abhithuṇamāṇā abhinaṁdamāṇayā ēvamāhaṁsu ।। 9420 ।
jaya jaya naṁdā jaya jaya bhaddā jaya vijaya naṁda bhaddaṁ tē । jaya khattivaravasabhā ! kasāyaiṁdiyamahāsēnaṁ ।। 9421 ॥
ajiyaṁ jiṇāhi iṁdiyasēnnaṁ paripālayāhi vijiyaṁ ca । susamaṇadhammaṁ suhayaṁ jiyassa majjhē vasāhitti ।। 9422 । ।
bahudiṇapakkhē māsē uu ayaṇē vaccharē aparibhīō । savvaparīsahavaggassa havau dhammē avigdhaṁ tē
ēvaṁ jayajayasaddaṁ pauṁjiḍaṁ daṁsayati tē naṭṭaṁ । tattō suvvayarāyā saddāvittā niyamaṇūsē
ēvaṁ āisai jahā khippāmēva ya uvaṭṭhavaha tumbhē । bhō bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! aparājiyanāmiyaṁ sīyaṁ
bahukhaṁbhasayaniviṭṭha līlaṭṭhiyasālahaṁ jiyākaliyaṁ । īhāmiyausabhaturaṁgamagaravihagāṇa vālāṇa
rurusarabhacamarakinnaranarakuṁjaravaṇalayāṇabhattīhiṁ । suvibhattaṁ mahurassaraghaṁṭāvali muhaliyadiyaṁta
।। 9415 ।।

subhakaṁtadarisaṇijjaṁ raṇaṁtamaṇighaṁṭiyāparikkhittaṁ । abbhuggayavarataravairavēḍyāparigayaṁ suhayaṁ ।। 9428 ॥
vijjāharajamalagajaṁtajuttamaccīsahassa cēṁcaiyaṁ । khvagasahassakaliyaṁ bhisimīsīṇaṁ bhi ( bbhi) simiṇaṁ ca ।। 29 ।।
cakkhullōyaṇalēsaṁ suhaphāsaṁ sassirīyarūvaṁ ca । sigdhaṁ turiyaṁ cavalaṁ purisasahassēṇa vahaṇijjaṁ ॥9430 ।।
dhaṇupannāsāyāmaṁ paṇuvīsadhapūṇi taha ya vitthinnaṁ । chattīsadhaṇuvviddhaṁ iya tē rannā samāiṭṭhā ।। 9431 ।।
haṭṭhā gaṁtūṇa taō uṭṭhavittā tahēva taṁ sīyaṁ । sāhēti puṇāgaṁtuṁ kathaṁjaliuḍā purō tassa
।।9432।।
aha accuyadēvidō saddāvittābhiōgiē dēvē । ēvaṁ vayai jahā bhō dēvāṇupiyā ! duyaṁ tubhē ।। 9433 ।।
samuṭṭhavēha sīyaṁ aparājiyanāmiyaṁ iyaṁ pamāṇaṁ । jāṇavimāṇassa va navaraṁ vannaō ēttha nāyavvō । । 9434 ।।
aha tē'bhiōgiyasurā accuyaiṁdēṇa ēvamāṇattā । taha cēva ya taṁ sīyaṁ uvaṭṭavēttā nivēyaṁti
nivēyaṁti ।। 9435॥
aha sā suriṁdasīyā taṁ cēva naridakāriyaṁ sīyaṁ । surasattīē paviṭṭhā aha sō muṇisuvvayajiṇidō ।।9436 ।।
sīhāsaṇāō abbhuṭṭiūṇa gaṁtūṇa sīyamāruhai । aparājiyābhihāṇaṁ tattha puratthābhimuhamuttī ॥। 9437 ||
sīhāsaṇē nisannō kulamayahariyā taō jiṇidassa । nhāyā kayabalikammā niyatthamaṁgallasuivatthā ।। 9438 ।।
appēhiṁ mahagghēhiṁ āharaṇēhiṁ vihūsiyasarīrā । gahiūṇa haṁsalakkhaṇamēgaṁ paḍasāḍayaṁ pavaraṁ ।।9439 ।।
āruhiūṇaṁ sīyaṁ dāhiṇapāsammi bhuvaṇanāhassa । bhaṭṭāsaṇē nisīyai taha uvagaraṇaṁ gahēūṇa ॥ 9440 ।।
sāmissa aṁbadhāī vāmē pāsammi sannisīēi । tayaṇu puṇa piṭṭabhāē ēgā navajōvvaṇā juvaī ।। 9441 ।।
chaṇasa sisamāṇavayaṇā ghaṇapīṇunnayapaōharābhōgā । vivihavilāsa nivāsā accabbhaḍaraiyasiṁgārā ।। 9442 ।।
saraiṁdukuṁda himarayaya haṁsa kōriṭamallavaradāmaṁ । dhavalaṁbarāyavattaṁ dhārēti ciṭṭhai salīlaṁ
।। 944.3 ।।
।। 9448।।
।।9449।।
tattō ubhaō pāsē pahussa dō cēva pavarataruṇīō । ciṭṭhati cāmarē caṁdasuṁdarē dōni gahiūṇa ।। 9444 ।।
uttarapuratthimēṇaṁ ēgā taruṇī jalassa paḍiputraṁ । mattagaiṁdamuhāgiibhigāraṁ ciṭṭhai gahēuṁ ।।9445॥
dāhiṇapuratthimēṇaṁ ēgā taruṇī sucārusiṁgārā । gahiūṇa tālaviṭaṁ ciṭṭhai varakaṇagamayaḍaṁḍaṁ । । 9446॥
kēī bhāṁti ēvaṁ savvaṁ kuvvaṁti dēvadēvīō । tattō sakkāīyā dēviṁdā sāmiṇō pucchā ।। 9447।।
saraiṁdukuṁdahimarayapahāḍaṁ vēruliyavimalaḍaṁḍāī | jaṁbūṇaya viraiyakannigāī varavarasaṁdhīṇi
savvarayaṇāmayāiṁ caṁdāgārōvamāī vimalāī । aṭṭhōttaravarakaṁcaṇaghaḍiyasalāgāsahassāī
bhattīhi vicittāī kōriṁṭayamalladāmakaliyāī । ciṭṭhati dharēmāṇā līlādhavalāyavattāī ।।9450।।
tattō accharasāō ubhaō pāsēsu titthanāhassa | maṇirayaṇakha ciyakaṁcaṇanimmiyaḍaṁḍābhirāmāō ।। 9451।।
savvarayaṇāmaīō dagarayakuṁdidusannigāsāō । acchāō cāmarāō vīēmāṇīō ciṭṭhati ।। 9452 ।।

varataruṇapurisasahasaṁ sarisavayaṁ sarisaraiyavaravēsaṁ । sarisābharaṇavihūsiyadēha saddāvaha mamatē । । 9454 prā
sahāviyaṁ samāṇaṁ tēhi taō taṁ samāgayaṁ jhatti । vinnavai suvvayanivaṁ dēva ! samāisaha jaṁ kajjaṁ ।। 9455 । ।
aha sō suvvayarāyā taṁ purisasa hastamēvamāisai । jaha avarāiyasīyaṁ jiṇassa tumbhē parivahēha ॥ 9456 ॥
tō tē suvayarannā iṇamāṇattā vahati taṁ sīyaṁ । aha tīsē sīyāē uvarillaṁ dāhiṇaṁ bāhaṁ ॥। 9457
ginhai sōhammavaī īsāṇidō u ginhaē bāhaṁ । uvarillamuttarillaṁ camarō uṇa asuragaṇarāyā ।। 9458
hēṭṭhillaṁ dāhiṇiyaṁ bāhaṁ ginhai balī u asuriṁdō । hēṭṭhillamuttarillaṁ sīyāē ginhaē bāhaṁ । 9459 ।।
avasēsā bhavaṇavaīvaṁtaravēmāṇiyā ya jōisiyā । taṁ avarāiyasīyaṁ ginhaṁti jahārihaṁ dēvā ।। 9460 ।।

sibiyārūḍhassa jiṇassa paḍhamaō aṭṭa aṭṭha maṁgalagā। ēē puraō saṁpaṭṭiyā jahā āṇuputrīē ।। 9461 । ।
sirivacchamacchadappaṇabhahāsaṇakalasanaṁdiyāvattā । taha vaddhamāṇasōtthiyanāmāṇō savvarayaṇamayā ।। 9462 ।।
gayaṇayalamaṇulihaṁtī samūsiyā vijayavējayaṁtī ya । vāuyābhirāmā puraō saṁpaṭṭiyā kamasō ।। 9463॥
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ ca caliyaṁ vēruliyābhisaṁtavimalavaraḍaṁḍaṁ । kōriṁṭamalladāmōva sōhiyaṁ caṁdabiṁbanibhaṁ ॥9464॥
vimalaṁ siyāyavattaṁ samūsiyaṁ tayaṇu rayaṇanimmaviyaṁ । sīhāsaṇaṁ maharihaṁ sapāuyājōyapayavīḍhaṁ । । 9465 ।।

viyaḍuddhurabaṁdhurakaṁdharāṇa calacavalacaṁcalagaīṇa | muhadinnajaccakaṁcaṇakaviyāṇa maṇunnavaggāṇa ।।9467 ।।
laṁghaṇavaggaṇadhāvaṇakhamāṇa kayapavarabhūsaṇāṇaṁ ca । saṁpaggahiyāṇaṁ kiṁkarēhiṁ varataruṇapurisēhiṁ

tayaṇu sachattapaḍāgā tōraṇaghaṁṭāṇa naṁdighōsāṇa । sakaṇagatēṇisadārūṇalōhasaṁjamiyanēmīṇa ।। 9470।

kaṁcaṇagavakkhajālagakhikhiṇighaṁṭāvalīparigayāṇa । battīsatōṇaparimaṁḍiyāṇa kaṁkaḍagajuttāṇa

tayaṇaṁtaraṁ ca sannaddhabaddhakavayāṇa gahiyacāvāṇa । uppīliyatūṇāṇaṁ piṇaddhavaravimalaciṁdhāṇa
saṁpaṭṭiyamaṭṭhasayaṁ puraō varataruṇajōhapurisāṇa । tayaṇu turaṁgāṇīyaṁ gaccha tattō gayāṇīyaṁ
tattō ya rahāṇīyaṁ payattāṇīyamaṇuvayai tattō । tattō vairāmayavaṭṭasaṁṭhiukkiṭṭhalaṭṭhiṭhiō ।।9476।।
varapaṁca vannakuḍabhī sahassaparimaṁḍiyābhirāmō ya । chattāichattakaliō aṁbaratalamaṇulihaṁtasihō । । 9477।।
jōyaṇasahassamēgaṁ samūsiō paṭṭiō mahiṁdajhaō । puraō tattō asilaṭṭhigāhiṇō kuṁtagāhā ya ।। 9478 ।।
cāvaggāā taha pāsagāhiṇō cāmaraggahā kē vi । pōtthayagāhā phalagaggāhā taha pīḍhayaggāhā ॥ 9479॥

kēi vi sihaṁḍiṇō pichiṇō ya saṁpaṭṭiyā purō bahavē । hāsakarā ḍamarakarā khēḍḍukarā cāḍuyakarā ya ।। 9481।।
davakāragā ya kaippiyā ya kukkuiyagā ya gāyaṁtā । vāēṁtā naccaṁtā taha ya hasaṁtā ramaṁtā ya
hāsāvēṁtā ya ramāvēṁtā bhāsēṁtagā ya sāsēṁtā । sāvēṁtā rakkhatā taha ālōyaṁ karēṁtā ya
jayajayasaddaṁ ca pauṁjamāṇayā paṭṭiyā purō bahavē । tattō uggābhōgā rāyannā khattiyā cēva
taha satthavāhapamuhā nhāyā parivihiya saṁtibalikammā । suniyatthavimalavatthā appamahagghāharaṇadhārī
kē vi pāyavihārēṇa kē vi turagēhi taralaturagēhi । kēi vi pavararahēhiṁ kēi vi jaṁpāṇa jāṇēhiṁ ।। 9486 ।।

asamāṇaṁ māṇavarāyatēyalacchīē dippamāṇataṇū । diṭṭhē vi adiṭṭhō jaha jaṇayaṁtō daṁsaṇukkaṁṭhaṁ ।। 9514 ।।
aivikkatō vīrō sūrō purisōttamō purisasīhō । purisavarapuṁḍarīō vasiūṇaṁ gēhavāsamma ।। 9515 ।।
vāsāṇa sahassāiṁ bāvīsaṁ paṁca sayasamahiyāī । dikkhāsamayaṁ nāuṁ rajjē ṭhaviūṇa niyaputtaṁ ।। 9516 ।।
jīyaṁ tikaṭṭhē lōgaṁtiēhiṁ dēvēhiṁ vihiyapaḍibōhō । vimalōhināṇadaṁsaṇasaṁpaṇṇō visayasuhavimuhō । । 9517।।
cēccā dhaṇaṁ ca dhannaṁ rajjaṁ raṭṭha puraṁ jaṇavayaṁ ca । kōsaṁ kōṭṭhāgāraṁ cēccā maṇirayaṇakaṇayaṁ ca ।। 9518 ।।
mōttiya saṁkhapavālappamuhaṁ nīsēsavihavavicchaḍḍuṁ । chaḍḍēuṁ dāūṇa ya saṁvacchariyaṁ mahādāṇaṁ
phagguṇavisuddhabārasidiṇammi aparājiyāē sīyāē । sanarāmaraparisāē aṇugammatō thutī ।।9530 ।।
saṁkhiyacakkiya maṁgaliyapūsamāṇēhiṁ vaddhamāṇāhi । taha ghaṁṭiyanivahēhiṁ iṭṭhāhiṁ tāhi vaggūhi
abhinaṁdijjatō abhithuvvaṁtō savvaidiḍanivahēṇa । savvēṇa samudaēṇaṁ savvēṇaṁ saṁbhramēṇaṁ ca
samakālapavāiyasayalatūrasaṁghāya garuyaghōsēṇa । pūriyanahēṇa majjhamajjhēṇa kusagganayarassa
jēṇēva ya nīlaguhābhihāṇa mujjāṇamatthi ramaṇijjaṁ । sō tijayapahū pāhārētthā tēṇēva gamaṇāē
aha pahuṇō tassa tahā nīharamāṇassa kē vi suranivahā । sabbhitarabāhirayaṁ kusugganayaraṁ samaṁtēṇa ।। 9525 ।।

sammajjivalittaṁ jahāhisēē tahēva kuvvaṁti । nivayaṁti uppayaṁti ya jāva pahāvēṁti vaggati ।। 9526 ।।
siṁghāḍagatigacaccaracaukkacaumuhamahāpahapahēsu । atthatthiyā ya kāmatthiyā ya lābhatthiyā cēva ।। 9527।।
i annē viya bahavē naranāridēvadēvisaṁghāyā । iṭṭhāhiṁ vaggūhi abhitthuṇaṁtā iya vayāsī ।। 9528 ।।
jaya jaya naṁdā jaya jaya bhaddā jayavijaya naṁda bhaddaṁ tē । jaya khattiyavaravasabhā ! bhagavaṁ bujjhāhi lōgapat ।। 9529 ।।
savvajagajjīvāṇaṁ hiyasuhanissēsakārayaṁ pavaraṁ । nikkāraṇakaruṇāpara ! pavattahā dhammatitthaṁ ti ।। 9530 ।।
jaya jaya naṁda tavēṇaṁ jaya jaya jiṇa ! naṁda saṁjamēṇaṁ ca । daṁsaṇanāṇacarittēhi uttamēhiṁ abhaggēhiṁ ।। 9531 ।।
ajiyāī iṁdiyāī jiṇāhi pālaha jiyaṁ samaṇadhammaṁ । siyavigdhō sayakālaṁ vasā hi taṁ siddhimajjhammi । 9532 ।।
nihaṇāhi vijiyatijaē rāgaddō sē mahābalē mallē । dhiidhaṇiyabaddhakacchō tatrēṇa maddāhi kammariuṁ ।। 9533 ।।
jhāṇēṇa uttamēṇaṁ sukkēṇa payāyasattuparicattō । tēlōkkaraṁgamajjñē harāhi ārāhaṇapaṛāgaṁ ।। 9534 ।।
vitimiramaṇuttaraṁ khippamēva pāuṇaha kēvalaṁ nāṇaṁ । gacchaha ya payaṁ paramaṁ jiṇadiṭṭhēṇujjumaggēṇa ।। 9535।।
sēnaṁ parīsahāṇaṁ nihaṇittā abhibhavittu uvasaggē । havau avigdhaṁ dhammē tuha tti abhinaṁdiya thuṇaṁti ।। 9536 ।।
piḍīhavaṁta tēlōkkalacchinīsēsasamudaō ēvaṁ । bhayavaṁ abhithuvvaṁtō u vayaṇamālāsahassēhiṁ ।। 9537।।
pēcchijjatō phullaṁtanayaṇamālāṇa sayasahassēhi । naṁdijjatō ullasiya hiyayamālāsahassēhiṁ ।। 9538 ।।
chiptō ya maṇōrahamālāṇa aṇēgasaya sahassēhi । patthijjatō varasvakaṁtiguṇanivahasahasēhi ।। 9539।।
hatthēṇa dāhiṇēṇaṁ bahūṇa naranāridēvadēvīṇa । sayayaṁ paḍicchamāṇō aṁjalimālāsahassāī ।। 9540 ।।.
samaicchatō uttuṁgabhavaṇapaṁtīṇa bahusahassāī । uppāyaṁtō paramaṁ pamōyamavalōyamāṇāṇa ।। 9541 ।।
gēyajjhaṇimmi mahurē taṁtītalatālatuḍiyaravabahalē । jayajayasadda gghōsēṇa maṁjuṇā māsalijjatē ।। 9542 ।।
yahēsiyamadēhi hatthīṇaṁ gulugulāiyaravēhi । rahaghaṇaghaṇāiēhiṁ jaṇassa gurukalakalaravēhi ।। 9543 ॥
savvattō pasaratē nikkhamaṇamahūsavaṁ jiṇavarassa । kahiuṁ va savvabhuvaṇōyarammi acchariya saṁjaṇayaṁ । । 9544 ।।
girikaṁdaradarivivarēsu bhavaṇapāsāyadēvanilaēsu । siṁghāḍagatigacaccaracaukkacaumuhamahapahēsu ।। 9545 ।।
ārāmujjāṇasabhākāṇaṇapamuhēsu subahr̥ṭhāṇēsu । uṭṭiyapaḍisadda sahassasaṁkulē nahayalē hōtē ।। 9546 ॥
kavilammiṁ jāyamāṇē gayaṇayalē surahigaṁdhacannēhiṁ । ujjhatavarāgurukaṁdurukkadhvassa dhūmēhiṁ ।। 9547 ।।
vāsijjatē sayalammi jīvalōē niraṁtarālammi । dhāvaṁtē paurajaṇē iō taō bōlabahalammi ।। 9548 ||
jāva kusaggaṁ nayaraṁ jāva surāṇaṁ vimāṇabhavaṇāī । tāva suradēviniyarē niraṁtaraṁ saṁcaraṁtammi ।। 9549 ।।
majjhamajjhēṇa ciya kusagganāmassa tassa nayarassa । jēṇēva ya nīlaguhā jēṇēva asōyavarasāhī ।। 9550 ।।
tēṇēva uvāgacchai āgacchittā asōyataruhēṭṭā । sīyaṁ dhārēḍa taō paccōruhiūṇa sīyāē ।। 9551 ।।
sayamēva alaṁkārē savvē ōmuyaḍa āṇupuvvīē । tassa ya kulamahayariyā ōruhiuṁ tayaṇu sōyāē । । 9552।।
varahaṁ salakkhaṇaṁ miuṇā paḍasāḍaēṇa taṁ savvaṁ । mallābharaṇālaṁkāramāiyaṁ sā paṛicchēṛa ।। 9553॥
chinnaguṇahāravigalaṁtavimalamuttāhalappagāsāī । aṁsūṇi viṇimayaṁtī kaṁdaṁtī taha ya vilavaṁtī ।। 9554 ।।
bhagavaṁtaṁ muṇisuvvayasāmi ēvaṁ pabhāsaē payayā । tailōyasuppasiddhē harivaṁsakulē visālammi ।। 9555 ।।
jāō si tumaṁ jāyā! gōyamagōttō tuma si khalu jāyā! । uṛaōiyakulanaravaisumittaputtō si taṁ jāyā ! ।। 9556 ।।
suvisuddha jaccakhattiyagōttasamubbhūyakhattiyāṇīē । paumāvaidēvīē dēhuppannō si taṁ jāyā ! ।। 955

bahupurisajjiyasuijasaharivaṁsavaḍēṁsaō si taṁ jāyā ! । jaccō si khattiō taṁ jāyā ! taṁ gabbhasukumālō । । 9558 ।।
appaḍimarūvajōvvaṇalāyannaguṇālaō si taṁ jāyā ! । jāyā! tumaṁ si ahiyaṁ sassiriō pīhaṇijjō ya ।। 9559।।
ahiyaṁ tumaṁ si jāyā ! palōyaṇijjō ya patthaṇijjō ya । dēvidanariṁdēsuṁ pasariyakittī sitaṁ jāyā ! !
tikkhaṁ caṁkamiyavvaṁ garuyaṁ ālaṁbiyavvamiha jāyā ! । asidhāra vva mahavvayamaṇucariyavvaṁ taē jāyā ! ।। 9561 ।।
taṁ ghaḍiyavvaṁ jāyā! parakkamēyavvamiha taō jāyā ! । assi ca taē aṭṭhē pamāiyabvaṁ na hu khaṇaṁ pi ।। 9562।।
aha tavvayaṇāṇaṁtaramāha pahū ēvamēva ēyaṁ ti । sayamēva paṁcamuṭṭhiyalōyaṁ tō kuṇai sō sāmī ।। 9563।।
aha kō dēvidō rāyā tiyasāṇa īsi namiyaṁgō। sāmissa haṁsalakkhaṇapaḍēṇa kēsē paḍicchēi ।। 9564 ।।
suraasurasiddhagaṁdhavvana yarāgayaṇamaggamō gāḍhā । jayajayaravamuhalamuhā muyaṁti vāsē surahigaṁdhē ।। 9565।।
tattō aṇujāṇau mē bhayavaṁ ti pabhāsiūṇa dēvidō । jiṇakēsē nēūṇaṁ khīrasamuddammi pakkhivai ।। 9566।।
tō munisuvvayasāmī namō tthu siddhāṇamii bhaṇēūṇa । sāmāiyaṁ caritaṁ paḍivajjai suddhapariṇāmō ।। 9567 ।।
paḍivajjaṁtē caraṇaṁ jiṇammi suramanuyataranigdhōsō | khippāmēva nilukkō vayaṇēṇaṁ sakkataṇaēṇa ।। 9568 ।।
sāmāiyaṁ karēmī sāvajjaṁ savvamēva vāvāraṁ । paccakkhāmī jāvajjīvaṁ tivihaṁ pi tivihēṇa । 9569 ।।
iccāī uccārai jāva payaṁ hōi vōsirāmi tti । navaraṁ bhaṁtē! tti payaṁ bhayavaṁ nō bhaṇai jīyaṁ ti ।।9570 ।।
chaṭṭhaṇaṁ bhattēṇaṁ sāmī sāmāiyaṁ samārūḍhō । avaranhē tappabhiḍaṁ maṇussadhammāu uttinnō ।। 9579 ।।
saṁpattō maṇapajjavanāmaṁ nāṇaṁ taō tiyasanāhō । sāmissa aṁsadēsē nivēsaē dēvadūsavaraṁ । । 9572 ।।
jammi samayammisāmī niyabhavaṇāō viṇiggaō paḍhamaṁ । nikkhamiumaṇō sīyaṁ āruhiuṁ vihiyasiṁgārō ।। 9573 । ।
annaṁ pitammi samaē uttamakhattiyakulēsu jāyāṇa | rāyasuyāṇa sahassaṁ puḍhō puḍhō sīyamārūḍhaṁ ।। 9574।।
kaya uttamasiṁgāraṁ pattaṁ caupāsaṭhaviyaparivāraṁ । sāmissa sannihāṇē āgaṁtuṁ taṁ pi nīlaguhaṁ ।। 9575 ।।
jagaguruṇō pavvajjāgahaṇavihāṇāṇusāraō jhatti । kāūṇa paṁcamuṭṭhiyalōyaṁ niyamatthaē taō ।। 9576।।
jaṁ ēsa pahū kāhī taṁ ci amhē vi nūṇa kāhāmō । ēyapainnāpuvvaṁ jiṇapavvajjaṁ pavajjēi ( jjēti ? ) । । 9577।।
sahasaṁ pi rāya uttā pasaṁsiyā tō asēsatiyasēhi । bhō sāhu sāhu bhūvālanaṁdaṇā ! jēhiṁ tumbhēhi ।। 9578 ।।
pahumaggō aṇusariō amhē uṇa bhattimaṁtacittā vi । dēvabhavattaṇaō iya ēvaṁ kāuṁ ajōga ti ।। 9579 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tēsi pi tē taō nikkhivaṁti varavāsē । bhagavaṁ tu kāusaggē tatthēva ya ṭhāi sēlō vva ।। 9580 ।।
nikkaṁpacittabhāvō dhammajjhāṇaṁ jhiyāiuṁ laggō । tattō sakkāīyā savvē vi surā jiṇaṁ namiuṁ ।। 9581 ।।
naṁdīsaravaradīvē vaccati kuṇati tattha tō mahimaṁ । bāvannāē jiṇamaṁdirēsu titthayarabiṁbāṇa ।। 9582 ।।
pacchā niyaniyaṭhāṇēsu jaṁti suvvaya nivāilōō vi । namiūṇa tijayanāhaṁ rāyasuyāṇaṁ sahassaṁ ca ।। 9583।।
paḍivannasāmisēvaṁ pasaṁsiṇaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ ēvaṁ । bhō bhō dhannā bhuvaṇē tubbhē cciya dukkarakarā ya ।। 9584 ।।
sēvayadhammapannaṁ pālayamāṇēhiṁ jēhiṁ tumbhēhi । dikkhāgaṇē sāmī vimukkavihavō vi na vi mukkō ।। 9585 ।।
tattō vihiya hiyaō jiṇassa taṁ sayaladēva nimmaviyaṁ । nikkhamaṇamahāmahimaṁ sumaraṁtō jāi saṭṭāṇē । । 9586 ।।
aha diyahammi duijjē harivaṁsakulubbhavō bhuvaṇanāhō । niyavēlāē pavisai bhikkhaṭṭā rāyagihanayarē ।। 9587 ।।
tassēva kusaggapurassa atthi duiyaṁ pi rāyagināmaṁ । khiivaṇausabhakusaggaṁ rāyagihaṁ ēyavayaṇāō ।। 9588 ।।
jugamēttaniyidiṭṭhī uvauttōṁ aṇupayaṁ visōtō । aduō avilaṁbiyaō saṁbhamarahiō agiddhamaṇō ।। 9589।।
tammi nayarammi nivasai dhaṇadhannasuvannarayaṇasusamiddhō । nāmēṇa baṁbhadattō supasiddha gavaī ēgō । । 9590 ।।

payaīē dāṇasaddhāaddhāsiyamāṇasō dayārasiō । payaiviṇīō dakkhinnasaṁjuō paruvayārī ya ।। 9591 ।।
tassa gihē tammi diṇē jāmāū āgaō sanayarāō । bahuparivārasamēō pāhuṇaō tēṇa savisēsaṁ ।। 9592।।
bhōyaṇajāya maṇēyappayāramuvasāhiyaṁ saparamannaṁ । bhōyaṇahēuṁ uvavēsiō ya sō tattha jāmāū ।। 9593 ।।
tattō parivēsēuṁ pāraddhaṁ tassa jāva tāva pahū । saṁpattō tattha taō tamējjamāṇaṁ palō ittā ।। 9594।।
pariyāṇēttā ya jahā sō ēsō tijayapaṇayapayakamalō । junnataṇaṁ va paḍaggē laggaṁ jēṇujjhiyaṁ rajjaṁ ।। 9595।।
aikaṁtaaṇaṁtaravāsarammi aṁgīkayaṁ mahāghōraṁ । nissaṁgattaṇamēyaṁ dukkaramiyarāṇa maṇasā vi ।। 9596 ।।
uṭṭhēi baṁbhadattō pahiṭṭhahiyaō imaṁ vicitatō । dhannō ahaṁ ciya jaē phaliyaṁ majjhēva punnēhiṁ ।। 9597 ।।
puvvabhavasaṁciēhiṁ jassa gihaṁgaṇamimēṇa jagaguruṇā । niyapayapaḍibibēhi paṁkayapayaraṁkiyaṁ va kayaṁ ।। 9598 ।।
ēvaṁ vicitiūṇaṁ saghayamahaṁ pāyasaṁ gahēūṇa । paḍilābhai bhuvaṇaguruṁ paharisapulaiyasamaggataṇū ।। 9599 ।।
bhayavaṁ pi kappaṇijjaṁ nāūṇaṁ dēsakālaparisuddhaṁ । pajjattaṁ paḍigāhaṛa dōṇṇi vi pāṇī pasārēuṁ ।। 9600 ।।
bhuṁjai arattaduṭṭhō adissamāṇō u maṁsacakbūhi । ētthaṁtarammi jiṇavarapāraṇagapaṭṭhihiyaēhi । 9601 ।।
dēvēhiṁ nahaṁgaṇasaṁṭhiēhi ugghōsiyaṁ ahō dāṇaṁ । ullasirabahalaparimalagaṁdhōdagavāsasaṁjuttā ।। 9602।।
vihiyā viyasaṁtadasaddhavannavarasurahikusumavuṭṭhī ya । addha (tē) rasakōḍīsaṁkhā khittā ya vasuhārā ।। 9603॥
nahavivaraṁ pūraṁtō navajalaharasaha gahiranigghōsō | vitthāriō samaṁtā suisuhaō duṁduhinināō ।। 9604 ।।
iya sōūṇaṁ suvvayanaranāhō tattha āgaō jhatti । taṁ baṁbhadattanāmaṁ sammāṇai gahavaī hiṭṭhō ।। 9605 ।।
miliō ya pauralōō sayalō tēṇa vi pasaṁsiō ēsō । taha salahiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ supattadāṇassa māhappaṁ ।। 9606 ।।
kayapāraṇagāṇaṁtaramavakaṁtō bhuvaṇabaṁdhavō tattō । suvvayanarāhivāī jaṇō vi niyaṭhāṇamaṇupattō ।। 9607 ।।
bhayavaṁ rāyagihāō niggaṁtūṇaṁ bahi jaṇavayammi | paṁcasamiō tiguttō viharai chajjīvahiyariō ।। 9608।।
tat iva apasihayagaī nirālaṁbaṇō ya gayaṇaṁ va । anilō vva nirāsayaō saṁkhō vva niraṁjaṇō taha ya ।। 9609 ॥
caṁdō vva sōmalēsō taha tēyaṁsī sahassakiraṇō vva । sāgara iva gaṁbhīrō vihagō iva vippakkō ya ।। 9610 ।।
surasēlō vva akaṁpō bhāruṁḍavihaṁgamō vva apamattō । khaggavisāṇamivēgō sārayasalilaṁ va suddhamaṇō ।। 9611 ।।
vasahō vva jāyathāmō mattaṁmahākuṁjarō vva sōṁḍīrō । sīhō iva duddharisō puḍhavī iva savvaphāsasahō ।। 9612 ।।
suhaō yāsaṇō iva tavatēēṇaṁ aīvapajalaṁtō । savvatthaapaḍibaddhō viharai gāmāgarāīsu ॥9613॥
jiyakō hamāṇamāyālōbhō vijiiṁdiō jiyapamāō । appāṇaṁ bhāvēṁtō tavēṇa taha saṁjamēṇaṁ ca ।। 9614।।
iya vihariūṇa bāhi āgaṁtuṇaṁ puṇō vi rāyagihē । nīlaguhāvaṇasaṁḍē ṭhāi ahē cammaskkhassa ।। 9615 ।।
tattha ṭhiyassa bhagavaō āyāvēṁtassa chaṭṭabhattēṇa । pāṇagarahiē visujjhamāṇalēsassa savisēsaṁ ।। 9616॥
ēkkārasamāsēsuṁ samaikkaṁtēsu pakkhasahiē । phagguṇabahuladuvāla sidiṇammi puvvanhasamayami ।। 9617 ।।
savaṇēṇaṁ saṁjōgaṁ nakkhattēṇaṁ gaē mayaṁkammi । sukkajjhāṇassa duijjabhēyamēgaṁtapaviyakkaṁ ।। 9618 ।।
samaikkaṁtassa taō apāvamāṇassa suhamamaṇiyaṭṭi । nāṇāvaraṇappamuhē ghāicaukkammi khīṇammi ।। 9619 ।।
nivvāghāyamaṇuttaramaṇatamappasihayaṁ nirāvaraṇaṁ । appaḍivāisamaggaṁ kēvalanāṇaṁ samuppannaṁ ।। 9620 ।।
aha sō bhayavaṁ arahā savvaṇṇū kēvalī jiṇō jāō । muttāṇa amuttāṇa ya savvēsiṁ cēva davvāṇaṁ ।। 9621 ।।
tī paḍuppannāṇā ē vi savvē guṇē ya pajjāē | jāṇai pāsai ya tahā lōyālōyammi sayalē vi ।। 9622 ।।
tō āsaṇakaṁpēṇaṁ sirimunisuvvayajiṇassa uppannaṁ । kēvalanāṇaṁ nāūṇa suragaṇā iṁda bhiīyā ।। 9623॥

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
299
jammāhisēyasamaē jaha taha cēva ya uvāgayā savvē । savviḍḍhīē savvajjuīē savvēṇa ya balēṇa ।। 9624 ।।
kēvalanāṇuṣpattī mahimaṁ kuvvaṁti jinavariṁdassa । tattha samōsaraṇaṁ jaha virayaṁti surā tahā bhaṇimō ।। 9625 ।।
।
saṁvaṭṭagapavaṇēṇaṁ jōyaṇaparimaṁḍalāō khēttāō । asui acōkkhaṁ savvaṁ taṇaḍagalāī khivaṁti bahiṁ ।। 9626 ।।
tattō jalavaddalayaṁ viubviuṁ pasamayaṁti rayaniyaraṁ । maṇikaṇagarayaṇacittaṁ kuṇaṁti tō tattha bhūbhāgaṁ ।। 9627 ।।
jalathalasaṁbhūyadasaddhavannavarasurahikusumasaṁghāyaṁ । payaraṁti tammi khēttē jōyaṇamēttē vi savvattō ।।9628।।
abhitarapāyāraṁ savvaṁ rayaṇāmayaṁ viuvvaṁti । kavisīsāī maṇīhi dasaddhavannahiṁ kuvvaṁti ।। 9629 ।।
majjhimayaṁ pāyāraṁ kaṇagamayaṁ rayaṇaraiyakavisīsaṁ । bāhirayaṁ rayayamayaṁ jaṁbūṇayahēmakavisīsaṁ ।। 9630 ।।
ēkkēkkē pāyārē caurō caurō havaṁti dārāī । savvarayaṇāmayāiṁ rayaṇāmayatōraṇāī ca ।। 9631 ।।
tāiṁ ca tōraṇāī maṇikaṇayavicittayāiṁ jāyaṁti । magara muhasāla haṁjiyachattapaḍāgābhirāmāī ।। 9632।।
tattō ya samaṁtēṇaṁ kālāgurukaṁdurukka mīsaṇaṁ । gaṁdhēṇa maṇaharēṇaṁ dhūvaghaḍīō viuvvaṁti ॥9633॥
abbhitarapāyārassa majjhabhāē asōyavararukkhaṁ । jiṇadēhuccattāō duvālasaguṇaṁ viuvvaṁti ।। 9634 । ।
tas ya hēṭṭhā pēḍhaṁ rayaṇamayaṁ bhāsuraṁ viuvvaṁti । tassuvari dēvachaṁdagamēyassa ya majjhayārammi ।। 9635 ।।
nāṇāmaṇirayaṇamayaṁ raēṁti sīhāsaṇaṁ sapayavīḍhaṁ । paumapaiṭṭhiyamujjalarayaṇamayaṁ dhammacakkaṁ ca ॥9636॥
sīhāsaṇassa uvari chaṇamayalaṁchaṇasa māṇakaṁtīṇi । chattāiṁ tinni uvaruvarisaṁṭhiyāī viuvvaṁti ।। 9637॥
ubhaō bhāē dō cāmarāō varajakkhahatthagahiyāō । ēttha ya jaṁ jē dēvā kuṇaṁti vōcchāmi taṁ inhi ।। 9638 । ।
abhitarapāyāraṁ kuvvaṁti vimāṇavāsiṇō dēvā । majjhimayaṁ jōṛasiyā bāhirayaṁ bhavaṇavāsī ya ।। 9639 ।।
vē iyadumapē ḍhacchaṁdagaāsaṇachattaṁ ca cāmarāō ya । jaṁ cannaṁ karaṇijjaṁ karēṁti taṁ vāṇamaṁtariyā ।। 9640 ।।
ēsō ya vihī savvō nēō sāhāraṇē samōsaraṇē । jattha puṇa iḍḍhimaṁtō uvēi dēvō jiṇasamīvaṁ ।। 9641 ||
ēgō vi tattha savvaṁ puvvattaṁ sō karēi iyarēsi । karaṇammi tattha bhayaṇā iha bhāvatthō imō nēō ।। 9642 ।।
jainō uvaṁti iṁdā tō bhavaṇanivāsipabhiṛaṇō dēvā । kuvvaṁti na kuvvaṁti va bhuvaṇappahr̥ṇō samōsaraṇaṁ ।। 9643 ।।
tattha ya puṇō paēsē na hōi puvvaṁ kayaṁ samōsaraṇaṁ । taṁ hō tattha niyamā dēvē ya mahiḍdiē pattē ।। 9644 ।।
iya raiyasamōsaraṇē puvvahārēṇa pavisai jiṇidō । dēvakayakaṇayakamalēsu dōsu pāē nivēsaṁtō ।। 9645 ।।
annāiṁ satta kamalāī aggaō tassa ēṁti aṇukamasō । puvvanhē sūrudaē avaran hē caramajāmahē ।। 9646॥
cēyamassa kāuṁ payāhiṇaṁ puvvadisimuha hō । sīhāsaṇē nisīyai sēsāsu puṇō tisu disāsu ।। 9647 ।।
sīhāsaṇacāmaradhammacakkachattattayāikaliyāī । jiṇavarapaḍirūvāī havaṁti dēvēhi vihiyāī ।। 9648 ||
tēsi pi hōi rūvaṁ jiṇāṇubhāvēṇa jiṇavarasamāṇaṁ । jaha sēsajaṇī jāṇai amha vi sāmī abhimuha tti ।। 9649।।
titthayarapāya mūlaṁ ēgēṇaṁ gaṇaharēṇa avirahiyaṁ । jēṭhṭhēṇa va iyarēṇa va pāēṇaṁ hōi jēṭṭhagaṇī ।। 9650 ।।
jēṭṭhō gaṇī bhaṇijjaititthaṁ ti imō u pugvadārēṇa । pavisittā titthayaraṁ tiguṇaṁ ca payāhiṇīkāuṁ ।। 9651।।
vaṁdēūṇa ya dāhiṇapuratthimō uvavisēi disibhāē । sēvā vi gaṇaharā ēvamēva kāūṇa titthassa ।।9652।।
pāsēsu maggaō uvavisaṁti tō pavisiūṇa kēvaliṇā । puvvaddārēṇa jiṇaṁ payāhiṇaṁ kaṭṭu tikkhuttōṁ ॥। 9653 ।।
bhaṇiūṇa namō titthassēvaṁ titthassa gaṇaharāṇaṁ ca । piṭṭammi nisīyaṁti ya sēsā aisēsiyā sāhū ।। 9654 ।।
maṇapajjavō hināṇī cōhasadasapuvviṇō ya navapuvvī । khēlōsahijallō sahipattā saṁbhinnasōyāī ।। 9655 ।।
puvvēṇaṁ dārēṇaṁ pavisittu jiṇaṁ payāhiṇaṁ kiccā । vaṁdittā bēṁti namō titthassa namō ya kē liṇaṁ ।। 9656।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-300-to-300.json ==========================
300
।
sirimunisuvvaya jina vaṇṇaṇaṁ
tō kēvalīṇa pacchā hōūṇaṁ uvavisaṁti aha sēsā । aisayarahiyā sāhū puvvēṇaṁ cēva dārēṇaṁ ।। 9657।।
pavisittā titthayaraṁ tikkhuttō taha payāhiṇaṁ kiccā । vaṁdittā tayaṇu namō titthassa namō'tisēsīṇaṁ ।। 9658 । ।
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa taau aisē siyapiṭuō nisīyaṁti । vēmāṇiyadēvīō pavisittā puvvaṁdārēṇa ॥ 9659 ।।
tikkhuttō titthayaraṁ kāūṇa payāhiṇaṁ ca vaṁdittā । tattō bhaṇiūṇa namō titthassa namō ya sāhūṇa ।। 9660।।
piṭṭhammi niraisēsiyamuṇīṇa ṭhāyaṁti nō nisīyaṁti । samaṇīō pavisēuṁ puvvēṇaṁ cēva dārēṇaṁ ॥ 9661 ।।
titthayaraṁ tikkhuttō bhattīē payāhiṇaṁ karēūṇa । vaṁdēūṇaṁ ca namō titthassa namō'tisīṇa ।। 9662।।
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa taō vēmāṇiyadēvipiṭṭaō ṭhaṁti । nō ya nisīyaṁti taō dēvīō bhavaṇavāsīṇaṁ ।। 9663 ।।
jōisiṇīō vaṁtaradēvīō dāhiṇēṇa dārēṇa । pavisittā titthayaraṁ payāhiṇīkaṭṭa tikkhuttō ।। 9664 ।।
dāhiṇapaccatthimaō ṭhāyaṁti jahōvaiṭukamamēva । bhavaṇavaījōisiyā dēvā taha vāṇamaṁtariyā ।। 9665।।
avarēṇa dārēṇaṁ pavisittā punvabhaṇiyamēva vihi । kāuṁ uttarapaccatthimēṇa ṭhāyaṁti aṇukamasō ॥ 9666॥
māṇiyāya dēvānarāya nārīgaṇā ya dārēṇa । pavisittu uttarēṇaṁ taṁ cēva vihiṁ paraṁjittā ।।9667॥
uttarapuratthi mēṇaṁ jahakkamaṁ piṭuō ya ṭhāyaṁti । jō kō vi jassa nissāē āgaō tattha parivārō ।।9668।।
sō tassēva samīvē nisīyaī katthaī na annattha । ēkkēkkāē disāē tigaṁ tigaṁ saṁṭhiyaṁ hōi ।। 9669 ।।
puvvaṁ pi samōsaraṇē havaṁti appiḍhiyā jaṛa nisannā । tō tē āgacchaṁtaṁ paṇamaṁti mahiḍdiyaṁ niyamā ।। 9670 ।।
paḍhamaṁ mahiḍiō aha hōi niviṭṭhō taō tayaṁ iyarē । appiḍhiyā namaṁtā vaccati purō saṭhāṇēsu । । 9671॥
titthayarapabhāvēṇa parōpparaṁ maccharō bhayaṁ vigahā । na ya hōi samōsaraṇē tiriyāṇa vi sannividvāṇa ।। 9672 ॥
abbhaṁtarapāyārassa majjhayārē havaṁti dēvanarā । duiyaṁtarammi tiriyā taiyammiu aṁtarē jāṇā । । 9673।।
savvaṁ va dēsaviraī sama (mmaṁ) ghēcchai va hōi parikahaṇā । iharā amūḍhalakkhō na kahēi bhavissai na taṁ ca । । 9674 ।।
maṇuē caumannayaraṁ tiriēsu dugaṁ tigaṁ va paḍivajjē । jainatthi niyamasō cciya surēsu sammattapaḍivattī ।। 9675 ॥
titthapaṇāmaṁ kāuṁ kahēi sāhāraṇēṇa saddēṇaṁ । savvēsi sannīṇaṁ jōyaṇanīhāriṇā bhayavaṁ ।। 9676॥
tappubviyā arayā pūiyapūyā ya viṣayakammaṁ ca । kayakiccō vi jaha kahaṁ kahēi namaē tahā titthaṁ ॥। 9677 ।।
jattha apuvvōsaraṇaṁ na diṭṭhapubvaṁ va jēṇa samaṇēṇa । bārasahiṁ jōyaṇēhiṁ sōēi aṇāgaē lahuyā ।। 9678।।
savvasurā jai rūvaṁ aṁguṭṭapamāṇayaṁ viuvvijjā । jiṇapāyaṁguṭṭhē para na sōhaē taṁ jahiṁgālō ।। 9679 ।।
jiṇarūvāō gaṇahararūvaṁ bhāgē anaṁtaē hōi । tattō rūvaṁ āhāragassa bhāgē atammi ।। 9680।।
āhāragāō rūvaṁ anaṁtabhāgē aṇuttarasurāṇa । tattō gēvējjāṇaṁ tattō vi ya accayasurāṇa ।। 9681।।
tattō āraṇapabhiī jā sōhammō taō bhavaṇavāsī । jōisiyā vaṁtariyā cakkaharā vāsubaladēvā ।। 9682 ॥
maṁḍalavaiṇō ēē jahōttaraṁ puvvapuvvapāsāō । hōṁti anaṁtaguṇēṇaṁ rūvēṇaṁ hīṇahīṇayarā ।। 9683 ।
sēsā savvē vi parōpparēṇa chaṭṭāṇanivaḍiyā hōṁti । ēvaṁ svakkarisō arahaṁtāṇaṁ muṇēyavvō ।। 9684 ।।
saṁghayaṇaṁ saṁṭhāṇaṁ kaṁtī gaisattasāraussāsā । savvamaṇuttaramēyaṁ pi hōi arahaṁtanāhāṇa ।। 9685 ।।
saṁkhāīyāṇavi saṁsaīṇa jugavaṁ pi saṁsayacchēyaṁ । ēgā vi bhāraī bhagavaō u sigdhaṁ karēi ti ।। 9686 ।।
annahakamēṇa saṁsayaharaṇē kēi vi sasaṁsayā cēva । uṭṭhēti taō tēsi jaṇanāṇā paccaō hōi ।। 9687 ।।
saṁsayaharaṇāiphalaṁ na hōi diṭṭhē vi jiṇavariṁdammi । ēgayarāṇa akahaṇē rāgaddōsābhisakā ya ।। 9688 ।।
ēgasarūvassa
ēgaears vi jaha mēhavimuvakassa hōṁti salilassa । vannarasāivisēsā bhūmivisēsassa jōē ।। 9689।।

sirimunisuvyajidicariya
*
101
savvaṇṇuṇō vi vāṇī taha sōyārāṇa pariṇamai hiyaē । samakālajāyaniyaniyasaṁjayavōcchēyagattēṇa ॥। 9690 ।।
sāhāraṇattaṇēṇaṁ aṇannasarisattaṇēṇa ya guṇēṇa । atthagamagattaṇēṇa ya uvaōgō cēva jiṇavayaṇē ।। 9691 ।।
aisayasuisuhajaṇagattaṇēṇa vayaṇaṁ jiṇassa nisuṇaṁtō । nivvijjai na ya sōyā thērī dāsi vva vaṇiyassa । । 9692 ।।
dāsī vaṇiṇa ēgassa āsi thērī gayā ya sā gōsē । kaṭṭhāṇamāgayā chuitanhabhibhūyā ya majjhanhē ॥ 9693॥
aithēva cciya kaṭṭhā āṇīyā tīē tēṇa piṭṭittā । kaṭṭhāṇaṁ paṭṭaviyā puṇō visā bhukkhiyā tisiyā ।। 9694।।
gahiūṇa kaṭṭabhāraṁ garuyaṁ sā taiyapaharapajjatē । viṇiyattā āgacchai kālē jēṭussa mūlammi ।। 9695।।
aha kaṭṭabhārayāō ēvaṁ kaṭṭha mahīyalē paḍiyaṁ । tō tīē ōṇamittā kahaṁci taṁ jāva saṁgahiyaṁ ।। 9696॥
tā tammi cēva samaē arahā dhammaṁ kahēumāḍhattō । amayaṁ va suyaṁtēṇaṁ ājōyaṇapasariyasarēṇa ।। 9697।।
śrērī u taṁ suṇaṁtī taha cēva ya ōṇayā ṭhiyā tattha । chuhatisa unhaparissamaduhaṁ na sā ki pi vēēi ।। 9698।।
sūratthamaṇāvasarē dhammaṁ kahiūṇa uṭṭhiō arahā । thērī vi gayā sagihaṁ iya jiṇavāṇīē sōhaggaṁ ।। 9699 ।।
savvāuyaṁ pi sōyā gamējja sayayaṁ jiṇō jai kahēi । sīunha khuhapivāsāparissamaduhāī amr̥tō ।। 9700 ।।
gāmanagarāgarāisu viharai ṭhāṇēsu jēsu jiṇanāhō । tattō ṭhāṇēhitō kahēti gaṁtūṇa jē vattaṁ । । 9701 ॥
tēsiṁ narāṇa vittīē dēi cakkī suvannalakkhāī । bārasapannāsasahassasa mahiyāī varisamajjhē ।। 9702॥
tatthēva ya titthayaraṁ samāgayaṁ kahai kō vi jai tattō । ēgassa vi tassa niuttagassa iyarassa vā cakkī ।। 9703 ।।
addhattērasakōḍīō dēi kaṇayassa paramapīīē । ēvaiyaṁ ciya rayayaṁ tu vāsudēvā payacchati । । 9704 ।।
maṁḍaliyā uṇa rayayassa dēti sahasāī addhatērasa u । vittīē pīīē tāvaiyāī tu lakkhāī ।। 9705 ।।
dēvāyattabhattī yā thirakaraṇasattaaṇukaṁpā । sāōdaya - dāṇaguṇā pabhāvaṇā cēva titthassa ।। 9706।।
jattha samōsarai jiṇō nayarāisu tattha naravaī ahahvā । tassa amaccō tammi vi avijjamāṇē purajaṇāī । । 9707।।
dubbaliyakaṁḍiyāṇaṁ valavaṁtīē tahēva chaḍiyāṇaṁ । kalamāṇa taṁdulāṇaṁ paṭṭhaviyāṇaṁ paragihēsu । । 9708।।
tēhi vi phalagēsu pasāriūṇa ēkkēkkaēṇa gahiyāṇa । tattō puṇāṇiyāṇaṁ akkhaṁḍāṇaṁ aphuḍiyāṇa || 9709 ॥
punaṁ āḍhagamēgaṁ kārēi bali ta ya siddhammi । tatthēva ya dēvā pakkhivaṁti varasurahigaṁdhāī ।। 9710 ।।
tattō sō rāyāī gahiūṇaṁ taṁ bali suragaṇēhi । pariyariō nāṇāvihatūranināēṇa aimahayā ।। 9711।।
āgamma samōsaraṇē pugvaddārēṇa pavisai taō ya । abbhitarapāgāraṁtaraṁ paviṭṭhē balimmi jiṇō ।। 9712 ।।
dhammakahaṇāu viramai aha sō rāyāiyāṇa annayarō । balihatthagaō dēvēhi parivuḍō cēva titthayaraṁ ।। 9713 ।।
tikkhuttō kāūṇaṁ payāhiṇaṁ tassa pāyamūlammi । nisirēi taṁ bali tō tassaddhaṁ avaḍiyaṁ dēvā ।। 9714 ।।
ginhaṁti taō sēsaddhassa vi ginhēi ahivaī addhaṁ । sēsaṁ cautthabhāgaṁ ginhaṛa pāgayajaṇō savvaṁ । । 9715 । ।
tīsē bīē sitthaṁ dijjati kassa vi ya matthaē jassa । tassa sahasatti puvvuppannō vāhī paṇassēi ।। 9716।।
annō u aṇuppannō uppajjai nēya jāva chammāsā । ēsō u balī pavisai pajjaṁtē paḍhamapaharassa ।।9717।।
pakkhittāē balīē tattō ṭhāṇāō uṭṭiūṇa jiṇō । abbhitarapāgārassa uttarēṇaṁ duvārēṇa । । 9798 ।।
niggaṁtūṇa disāē puvvāē dēvachaṁdaē gaṁtuṁ । ṭhāyai samamāhīē tattō paharassa uvarimmi || 9719।।
sāmimmi uṭṭiyammī jēṭṭhō annayaraō va gaṇahārī । rāōvaṇīyasīhāsaṇē ṭhiō pāyavīḍhē vā ।। 9720 ।।
bīyāē pōrisīē dhammaṁ parikahai savvaparisāē । pahuṇō khēyaviṇōō sīsaguṇuddīvaṇā taha ya ।। 9721 ।।
ha tittharō kaha kahai tahā gaṇaharō vi nibbhataṁ । pavvaiyāṇa gihīṇa ya ērisaō paccaō hōi ।। 9722 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-302-to-302.json ==========================
302
samōsaraṇavaṇṇarṇa
āyariyāsuṇiūṇa jōggasīsēṇa takkahiyaaṭṭhō । annēsiṁ kahiyanvō sīsāyariyakkamō ēvaṁ ।। 9723।।
jamhā ēmāiguṇā kahamāṇē gaṇaharammi jāyaṁti । tamhā taṁ aṇujāṇai jiṇanāhō dhammakahaṇammi ।। 9724 ॥
saṁkhāīē vibhavē sāhai jaṁ vā parō u pucchējjā । na ya ṇaṁ aṇāisēsī viyāṇaī ēsa chaumatthōṁ ।। 9725 ।।
ēsa. samōsaraṇavihī jiṇāṇa sāmannaō maē kahiō । tayaṇugayaṁ sēsaṁ pi hu samāsaō sāhiyaṁ ēttha ।।9726।।
inhi tu patthuyatthaṁ bhaṇāmi amarēhiṁ kayasa mōsaraṇē । puvvabhaṇiēṇa vihiṇā pavisai muṇi suvvaya jiṇidō । । 9727॥
।
rukkhapāṇipubvaṁ sīhāsaṇammi uvavisai । puvvadisāē'bhimuhō titthassa namō tti bhaṇamāṇō । । 9728 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi suvvayarāyā nāūṇa kēvaluppatti । titthayarassa bhagavaō samāgaō savvaiḍḍhīē ।।9729 ।।
aṁtēurēṇa saha purajaṇēṇa ānaṁdajaṇiyarōmaṁcō | paṁcavihābhigamēṇaṁ pavisiya tipayā hiṇāpuvaṁ ।। 9730।।
dharaṇīyala mīliyajāṇukarayalō paṇamiūṇa titthayaraṁ । matthayanihittahatthō ēvaṁ thōḍaṁ samāḍhattō ॥ 9731 ॥
surasuhavimuha ! samujjhiya pāṇayakappāmarindasirisaṁgaṁ । bhavapaṁkanimaggasamaggajaṁtuuddharaṇabaddhamaṇō ।।9732।।
taṁ munisuvvayasāmiya! kayāvayārō si maṇuyalōyammi । parakajjasajjamaiṇō garuyā niyakajjaniravēkkhā । 9733।
tai gabbhagaē paumāvaidēvī paṇamiyā suriṁdēṇa । garuyāṇa saṁgamē kō na hōi savvassa namaṇijjō ।। 9734 ।।
tuha jammakhaṇē jiṇavara ! nēraiēhi vi suhaṁ samaṇubhūyaṁ । kassa ṇa mahāṇubhāvāṇa sabhavō hōi suhahēū ।।9735 ।
viulā vi rāyalacchī taṇaṁ va cattā taē vijayanāha ! jaṁ tēṇa vivēīṇaṁ avamāṇapayaṁ imā jāyā ।। 9736 ।।
kayadikkhārakkhēṇa tumaē tavatikkha khaggaḍaṁḍēṇa । kāūṇa khaṁḍasō ghāikammabhuyagaṁ mahābhōgaṁ ॥9737॥
nihaṇaṁ nēūṇa taō tappaddhiṁ aṇāikālāō । rayaṇanihikalasakappaṁ kēvalamuppāḍiyaṁ nāṇaṁ ।। 9738 ।।
karayalakaliyaṁ muttāhalaṁ va sayalaṁ pi tēṇa tēlōkkaṁ । avalōyaṁtō sāmiya ! kassa na saṁsayatamaṁ harasi ||9739।।
nāha ! taē parigahiō naralōō nūṇa saggalōyāō । ramaṇijjayarō jāō tēṇa surā sayayamiha ēṁti ।। 9740 ।।
taha kaha vi kuṇati surā pāyāratiyāiyaṁ tuha vibhūiṁ । jaha taṁ pēcchaṁtāṇaṁ tāṇaṁ pihu vimhaō hōi । । 9741 ।।
nāha ! tui vibhūīē guṇanivahāṇa ya tahā aṇatāṇa । kō vi lavaṁpi na sakkai vannēuṁ suragurusamō vi ।। 9742 ।।
jai vi tumaṁ savvaṣṇū jai vi sayaṁciya parassa duhaharaṇē । baddhapainnō si tumaṁ taha vi ahaṁ vinnavissāmi । । 9743 ।।
thēvakkharēhiṁ kiṁci vi jamhā bhavaduhadavaggisaṁtattō । khaṇamavi na khamō ṭhāuṁ mōṇēṇa muṇiṁda ! tai diṭṭhē ।। 9744 । ।
bhayavaṁ ! ainivvinnō haṁ jammajarāmaraṇarōyasōyāṇa । taha kuṇasu jahā tēsi bhujjō vi na bhāyaṇaṁ hōmi । । 9745 ।।
iya thuṇiūṇa jiṇidaṁ suvvayarāyā sutivvasaṁvēō । namiūṇa saparivārō uciyapa sē samāsīṇō ।। 9746 ।।
aha suranaravijjāharapāraddhamahaṁtanaṭṭagēyaravē । paviyaṁbhiyagurupaharisakalayalaghōsē ya uvasaṁtē । । 9746 | a |
sāniviṭṭhāē sadēvamaṇuyāsurāē parisāē । vāgarai jiṇō dhammaṁ savvajagajjīvahiyajaṇagaṁ । 9747।।
bhō bhavvā ! ēsa bhavō aṇāimaṁ iha aṇāiṇō jīvā । tēsi sāmanēṇaṁ nāṇāvaraṇāikammāṇaṁ ।। 9747 ।।a।
saṁjōgō ya aṇāī apajjavasiō ya sō abhavvāṇa । bhavvāṇa pajjavasiō visēsaō puṇa samaggāṇa ।। 9748 ।।
jīvāṇaṁ micchattā viraipamāēhiṁ taha kasāēhiṁ । jōgēhi kammāṇaṁ baṁdhō hōi tti sāīō ।। 9749 ।।
ēsō akāmanijjarabālatavōkammanāṇamāīhiṁ । niyamēṇa viess taō savvēsi cēva jīvāṇaṁ ।। 9750 ।।
jāyai sapajjavasiō tēṇa ya kammāṇasaṁgamavasēṇa । paḍhamaṁ pi tāva jīvā savvē vi aṇāikālāō ।। 9751 ।।
suhumaaṇāivaṇassaikāyanigōē piṁḍiyā saṁtā । nivasaṁti pōggalāṇaṁ pariyaṭṭē'ṇataṇatē u ।। 9752 ।।
jīvāṇamaṇaṁtāṇaṁ ēvaṁ ciya hōi jaṁ kira sarīraṁ । bhannai nigōyanāmaṁ taṁ tēsimasaṁkhyāṇaṁ tu । । 9753 ।।

sirimunisubvayajaṇidacariyaṁ
303
samudāō jō sō gōlaō tti tatthaṭṭiyā nigōyammi । samakālamaṇaṁtāū saṁsaṁti taha nīsasaṁti samaṁ ।। 9754 ।।
samagaṁ āhārēṁti ya pariṇāmēṁti ya tahēva tē samagaṁ । samagaṁ uppajjaṁti ya samagaṁ ciya taha vivajjaṁti । 9755 ।।
thīṇaddhi mahāniddānāṇāvaraṇāitivvaudaēṇa । vēyaṁti na appāṇaṁ na muṇaṁti paraṁ pi taha cēva । 9756।।
nisuṇaṁti nēya saddaṁ nēva ya pēcchati kiṁ pi tē rūvaṁ । agghāyaṁti na gaṁdhaṁ na rasaṁ vidaṁti na ya phāsaṁ ।।9757 ।।
na saraṁti kayaṁ akayaṁ nō maipuvvaṁ calati phaṁdaṁti । na ya aṇusaraṁti sīyaṁ nāyavadēsaṁ ca gacchati ।। 9758 ।।
tibvavisavēyaṇāghāriyassa ghaṇamajjapāṇamattassa । āgayamucchassa va māṇavastra dhārēti cēyannaṁ । । 9759।।
tēsu jahuttaṁ kālaṁ vasiuṁ bhaviyavvayāniōgēṇa । tattō niggaṁtūṇaṁ kēttiyamēttā vi tē jīvā ।। 9760।।
sāhāraṇāṇa majjhē vavahāravaṇassaīṇa jāyaṁti । allayasūraṇagajjarapiṁḍāluyakaṁdamāīsu ।।9761 ।।
chijjēti tattha nāṇāvihēhi satthēhi tikkhadhārēhiṁ । cunnijjaṁti silāsu ya pīsijjaṁti ya gharaṭṭēsu ।। 9762।।
mīsijjati ya davvaṁtarēhiṁ kaḍuēhi tikkhakhārēhiṁ । paccaṁti huyavahēhiṁ ya ujjhati davaggiṇā taha ya ।। 9763।।
rasagiddhēhiṁ bhujjaṁti tē taō kiṁ pi khaviyakammaṁsā | puḍhavīkāsu samubbhavaṁti tō āukāsu । । 9764॥
tō agaṇikāiēsuṁ tattō vi ya vāukāiyajiēsu । tattō pattēyavaṇassaittaṇaṁ kaha vi pāvēṁti ।। 9765।।
ēttha ya puḍhavīsu gayā tē phōḍijjati mōggarāīhi । bhittīsu vi ṇijjaṁti ya kōddālēhi khaṇijjaṁti । । 9766 ।।
calaṇāīhi malijjati sīyavāyāyavāisatthēhiṁ । uvahammati jalēsu ya gōmaṇuyāīhi pijjati । । 9767।।
tāvijjati ya jalaṇē ghōlijjaṁti ya payaṁḍapavaṇēṇa । sōsijjati ya māyaṁḍacaṁḍa kiraṇāisatthēhiṁ ।। 9768 ||
uvahammati ya taha khārakhattatikkhāisatyanivahēhiṁ । agaṇīsu samuppannā tē khōrijjati kaṭṭhēhiṁ । । 9769।।
khōṭṭajjati ulummugamāīhi taha ya vijjhavijjati । salilāranāladhūlīpa muhēhiṁ vivihasatthēhiṁ ।। 9770।।
annapaḍipunnathālībudhappabhiīhi akkamijjati । anilēsu samubbhūyā uṇiānilavīyaṇāīhiṁ । । 9771 ।।
nihaṇaṁ nijjaṁti taō pattēyavaṇassaittaṇaṁ pattā । chijjaṁti parasumāīhiṁ āyavēṇaṁ ca sussaṁti ।।9772 ।।
giha chāyaṇatōraṇamāiē kajjēsu kēhi vi narēhiṁ । mōḍijjati a saṁdhīsu kuṁjarāīhi bhajjaṁti || 9773 ।।
khaṁḍijjati ya musalukkhalāiṇā muggajunnalāīyā | pīsijjati gharaṭṭāiṇā malijjati calaṇēhiṁ ।। 9774 ।।
ullūrijjaṁti ya ōsahāikajjammi vējjamāīhiṁ । ummūlijjaṁti tahā payaṁḍapavaṇāiṇā kē vi ।। 9775।।
gō-mahisaturayakarikaraharāsahāīhiṁ kē vi khajjati । ujjhati davaggīhiṁ dumijjati ya himāīhiṁ ।। 97766 ।।
puḍhavāiēsa ēvaṁ saṁsariūṇaṁ puṇō puṇō duhiyā । kālamasaṁkhōsappiṇi ussappiṇiparimīyaṁ jīvā ।। 9777 ।।
tattō uvvaṭṭittā biti cauridiyasarūvavigalēsu । uvavajjaṁti tattha vi juttājuttaṁ na jāṇaṁti ।। 9778 ।।
sunaṁ ēmēva iō taō bhamaṁti ya rasaṁti avvattaṁ । asuīmāīsu lōlaṁti luḍhaṁti nīunnaēsuṁ ca । 9779 ।।
cēṭṭhati amaipubvaṁ jalaṁtajalaṇāiēsu pavisaṁti । majjati tēllamāisu hiyaṁ pi taha pariharaṁti niyaṁ । । 9780 ।।
ahiyaṁ pi āyaraṁtī sīyāyavavāyakhāracunnēhiṁ । salilaggisilōvalalēṭṭhakaṭṭhamāīhiṁ hammati ।। 9781 ॥
ēvaṁ ēēsa khuhāidukkhiyā ciṭṭhiūṇa saṁkhējjaṁ । kālaṁ tayaṇu asannisu paṇidisuṁ pi ēmēva ।। 9782 ।।
abhavaggahaṇāī vasiūṇa niraṁtarāī ukkōsaṁ । ēgiṁdiyāisu puṇō bhamiūṇaṁ puvvanāēṇa ।। 9783 ।।
tattō paṁcidiyasannitiriyajōṇīsu tē samuppannā । vidhēuṁ nāsāē bajjhati ya rajjulajjūhiṁ । । 9784।
pārvati vasaṇapucchāichēyaṇaṁ phālaṇaṁ ca savaṇāṇa । vāhijjati halēsu ya saṁjōijjati gaṁtīsu ॥9785 ।।
paṭṭhīē khippaṁti ya jalabhariyāī mahātaḍāgāī । paṭṭhīē khaṁdhēṇa ya annaṁ pivati gurubhāraṁ । । 9786 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-304-to-304.json ==========================
304
sirimunisuvvayasāmidēsaṇā
uppāḍijjati sutikkhadīhaārāhi vēṇulaṭṭhīhiṁ । tāḍijjati kasāīhiṁ lēṭṭhalauḍēhi hammati ।। 9787।।
gurubhārakkaṁtāṇaṁ paṭṭhīkhaṁdhāiēsa maṁsāī । payaḍijjati pati ya kimijālāī taō tēsu ॥ 9788 ||
annē bhārakkatā kēi vituti majjhabhāyāō । tō nivaḍati mahīē khurēhiṁ paḍiyā kharavalati ।। 9789 ।।
ḍaṁbhijjaṁti ya annē dēhammi taō rasaṁti virasāī । visahaṁti daḍhamaṇāikkhaṇīyaviyaṇāsamugdhāyaṁ ॥। 9790 ।।
avarē ya hariṇasūyarasasayasautāiṇō ya macchāī । nāṇāviḍaṁbaṇāīhiṁ viḍaṁbiūṇaṁ haṇijjati ।। 9791 ।।
vasamaṁsaluddhapāraddhiēhiṁ bajjhati dhīvarēhiṁ parē । kāūṇa bhaḍittaṁ jīvamāṇayā kēi bhujjati ।। 9792 ।।
anē kēi vitiriyā khajjaṁti parōpparaṁ taḍaphaḍatā । pīḍijjati chuhāē bāhijjaṁti ya pivāsāē ।। 9793 ।।
kaṭṭhē va vigayacēṭṭhā mahāhimēṇaṁ havaṁti hēmaṁtē । gimhammi āyavēṇaṁ tivvēṇaṁ saṁtavijjati ।। 9794 ।।
vāsāsu niraṁtaravuṭṭhipaḍiyapāṇīyasuḍhiyasavvaṁgā । kēi vivajjati parē vujjhaṁti jalappavāhēhiṁ ।। 9795 ।।
cittayavayavagdhabhuyagasīha mīṇāiṇō mahākūrā । nihaṇaṁti bhūyanivahaṁ asaṁti tēsi ca maṁsāī ।। 9796 ।।
āūriyarōddajjhāṇamāṇasā saṁciūṇa ghaṇakammaṁ । nivati mahāniraē tikkhaniraṁtaramahādukkha ॥। 9797 ।।
tattha ghaḍiyālayāō vilavaṁtā kaḍḍhiūṇa bāhimmi । paramāhammiyadēvēh niēhi paṭṭhēihi ।। 9798।।
apphālijjaṁti daḍhaṁ taō mahāvajjakaṁṭayasilāsu । khippaṁti ciyāsu jalaṁtajalaṇajālākarālāsu ।। 9799 ।।
āliṁgāvijjati ya sakaṭayaṁ vajrjāsivalīrukkhaṁ । karavattēhiṁ karakaraphālijjati ya sutikkhēhiṁ ॥। 9800 ॥
chijjati asīhiṁ mahākuṁggēhi siēhiṁ bhijjati । vijjhati ya sūlēhiṁ vippati mahaṁtasūlāsu ।। 9801 ||
tattēsu talijjati ya tēllakavillēsu ukkalaṁtēsu । khāvijjaṁti ya ukkattiūṇa niyadēhamasāī ।। 9802 ।।
pāijjati ya taha tattatauyataṁbāī tattatēllaṁ ca । asipattavaṇaṁ tō pēcchiūṇa dhāvaṁti tayabhimuhaṁ ।। 9803 ||
gayamētta cciya chijjaṁti tattha asisattisēlla kuṁtēhi । vēyaraṇinaiṁ tō pēcchiūṇa gacchati tayabhimuhaṁ ।। 9804 ।।
tattha ya khuppati mahājalaṇunhakayaṁbavāluyāniyarē । phuṭṭaṁti taō caṇaya vva ārasaṁtā ciraṁ kālaṁ ।। 9805 ।।
tattajautullavasa maṁsaruhiracikkhallaairauddāē । vēyaraṇīē pattā jhatti vilijjati tē varayā ।। 9806 ।।
ārōvijjati taō tattāē tuṁgalōhanāvāē । annē ya parōpparamēva kēi hammati kayakōvā ।। 9807 ।।
iha māhamāsapacchimanisāhimāō anaṁtaguṇasīyaṁ । taha tattabhāḍadāhāō tattha dāhaṁ anaṁtaguṇaṁ ।। 9808 ।।
sahiūṇa ēvamāī nirayamahā vēyaṇāduhaṁ ghōraṁ । paliōvamāī taha sāyarōvamāī ca bahuyāī ।। 9809 ।।
uvvaṇi tattō paṁcidiyatiriyajōgiēsu puṇō । uppajjaṁti taō vi hu naraēsu taō vi uvvaṭṭā । 9810 ।।
macchāisu naraēsu ya puṇa macchāisu puṇō vi naraēsu । puṇa macchāīsu taō ēgidiyamāiēsa puṇō ।। 9811 ।।
puvvapaōgēṇaṁ ciya bhamiūṇamaṇaṁtakālamaṇu tattō । paṁcidiyatiriyattaṁ laddhūṇa vayaṁti naraēsu || 9812 ||
tattō puṇa macchāisu puṇō vi naraēsu macchayāīsu । puṇa ēgidiyamāisu tēṇēva kamēṇa bhamiūṇa ।।9713।।
jaṁti niraēsa ēvaṁ ēgidiyamāi narayapajjaṁttaṁ । ghāṇayajuttō vasō vva'ṇaṁtakhuttō paribhamaṁti ।। 9814 ।
nalati maṇuyajammaṁ tattō kahamavi anaṁtakālāō । khēttē aṇāriē saṁbhavaṁti maṇuitthiganbhammi ।। 9815।।
tattō appasipunnā galiūṇa bhamaṁti nirayamāīsu । bhujjō anaṁtakālaṁ na uṇō pāvaṁti maṇuyattaṁ ।। 9816 ।।
ēvamaṇaṁtamaṇataṁ kālaṁ bhamiūṇa nirayatiriēsu । pāvaṁti narataṁ aṁtaraṁtarā'ṇāriē khēttē ॥ 9817 ।।
ēvaṁ anaṁtakhuttō maṇuyattamaṇāriēsa pāvaṁti । na uṇō lahaṁti āriyamaṇuyattaṇasammuhaṁ ṭhāuṁ ।। 9818 ।।
tattha aṇāriyamaṇuyattaṇammi kattha vi galaṁti gabhāō । kattha vi jōṇījaṁtāō nipphiḍaṁtā vivajrjjati । । 9819 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-305-to-305.json ==========================

।
. 305
kattha vi niggayamēttā sayaṇijjanivannayā ya kattha vi ya । kattha vi jaṇaṇīaṁgammi saṁṭhiyā maccumuhamēṁti । । 9820 ।।
kattha vicakamaṇakhamā kattha vi avvattajaṁpirā saṁtā । kattha vi bālēhi samaṁ kīlaṇajōggā vivajjati । 9821 ॥
kattha vi jōvvaṇabhimuhā aṇēgarōgēhiṁ gahiyasavvaṁgā । akkaṁdiūṇa bahuvilaviūṇa saduhā viṇassaṁti ।। 9822 ।।
katthai jōvvaṇapattā pāṇavahāī agammagamaṇāī । kāūṇa akiccāī ciyabahupāvā vivajjati ।। 9823 ।।
ēvamaṇāriyamaṇuyattalābhaō āraō vi hu gaēsu । pōggalapariyaṭṭēsuṁ aṇataṇatēsu kaha vi ō ।। 9824 ||
āriyakhēttē aṁtayakulēsu maṇuyattaṇāi taha cēva । lahiuṁ lahiuṁ aṁtaraaṁtaraō narayatiriē ।। 9825 ।।
kālamaṇaṁtaṁ puṇa pariyaḍaṁti sukulēsu maṇuyajammassa । sammuhamavi nō ṭhāuṁ lati gurukammayāvasaō ।। 9826।।
iya puvvattaṁ kālaṁ bhamiūṇa kahaṁ ci sōhaṇakulēsu । uppajjaṁti ya bahusō bhamaṁti taha cēva ṇaṁtabhavaṁ ।। 1827 ।।
navaraṁ gālijjati ya ganbhāō ōsahēhi asaīhi । kattha vi ya jāyamēttā chaḍijjaṁti ya kuracchāsu ।। 9828 ।।
tattha chuhāē sīyāyavēhi pāvaṁti jīviyaviṇāsaṁ । majjāramāiēhiṁ khajjaṁti va jīvamāṇā vi ।। 9829 ।।
jaha sukulappattīē sujāilābhē vi taha bhavamaṇataṁ । jīvā bhamaṁti ēvaṁ svabalāīṇa lābhē vi ।। 9830 ।।
majjhaṁ majjhēṇa anaṁtakālabhavabhamaṇapuvvayaṁ hōi । jā āuarōgattaṇavinnāṇasamanniyā hōṁti ।।9831 ।।
tō ērisā vi hōuṁ katthai phāsiṁdiyassa dōsēṇa । katthai rasagiddhīē katthai gaṁdhappiyattēṇa ||9832 ।।
kattha vi ya pavararūvālōyaṇalōlattaṇēṇa kattha vi ya । suṁdarasaddāyannaṇatanhā parataṁtabhāvēṇa ।। 9833 ।।
katthai kōhaggasā katthai māṇaddiddhayāē ya । kattha vi ya kuḍilaniyaḍīvaṁsikuḍaṁgīgahaṇayāē । । 9834 । ।
katthai lōhamahōyahi nimajjaṇēṇaṁ ca kattha vi piyassa । virahaviharattaṇēṇaṁ kattha vi pēmaggahagahēṇa ॥ 9835 ।।
katthai dhaṇatanhāē katthai dāliduhanidāhēṇa । katthai kivaṇattaṇaō katthai kalahāulattēṇa ।। 9836 ।।
are far dubviṇīyassa niyakuḍuṁbassa saṁṭhavaṇayāē । kattha vi tibvayaramahāmicchattōdayaviḍaṁbaṇaō ।। 9837 ।।
savvaṁ gamiūṇa muhā bhamanti narayāiyaṁ puṇō vi bhavaṁ । kālamaṇataṁ tattō kayāi dēvēsu uppannā ||9838।।
kārijjati mahiḍḍhiyadēvēhiṁ sayā vi tē niyaṁ āṇaṁ । dūmijjaṁti ya dēvattaṇēṇa hīṇēṇa niyaē ।। 9839 ।।
iyarasurāṇaṁ iḍḍhi ahiyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa niyayahiyayammi । īsāṇalēṇa ujjhati taha ya ghēppati araīē ।। 9845 ।
appiḍhiyattaṇēṇaṁ parassa rayaṇāī taha kalattāiṁ । hariūṇa jaṁti tattō hammati sirammi vajjēṇa ।। 9841 ।।
tē aṇuhavaṁti tattō aigaruyaṁ vēyaṇāsamugdhāyaṁ । nivaḍaṁti aṭṭajhāṇē jhīṇē āummi mariūṇa ।। 9842 ।।
ēgidiēsu bhujjō uppajjēūṇa puvvanāēṇa । saṁsāramaṇataṁ paribhamaṁti dukkhānalujjaliyā ।। 9843 ।।
ēvamaṇatē pōggalapariyaṭṭasahassakō ḍilakkhē u । micchattaṁdhā jīvā ciyavaṇakammā bhamaṁti bhavē ।। 9844 । ।
taṁtthi kipi ṭhāṇaṁ lōē vālaggakōḍimēttaṁ pi । jammi na jāyā na mayā anaṁtasō jaṁtusaṁghāyā ।। 9845 ।।
taṁ natthi visayasōkkhaṁ duhaṁ pi taṁ natthi kiṁ pitajjaṇiyaṁ । jīvēhiṁ jaṁ na pattaṁ anaṁtasō kammavasahi ।। 9846॥
ēkkō cciya jiṇadhammō tēhi na pattō kayāi jassa vasā । puvvuttabhavaduhāṇaṁ jalaṁjali dēṁti tē jhatti ।। 9847 ॥
kammammi mōhaṇijē kōḍākōḍīō hōṁti ayarāṇaṁ । sattari ukkōsaṭiī taha tīsaṁ kōḍikōḍīō ।। 9848 ।।
kammāṇa caunhaṁ vēyaṇīyaāvaraṇaaṁtarāyāṇaṁ । nāmassa ya gōyassa ya kōḍākōḍīō puṇa vīsaṁ ।। 9849 ।।
sattanha vi ēyāṇaṁ kammāṇa ahāpavattakaraṇēṇa । khaviūṇaṁ sēsaṭhi savvaṁ dhariūṇa ēkkaṁ tu ।। 9850 ।।
ayarāṇa kōḍakōḍiṁ kiṁcūṇaṁ ēttha aṁtarē jīvā । ghaṇarāgadōsapariṇairūvaṁ pāvaṁti tō gaṁṭhi ।। 8951 ।।
ēyaṁ ca pattapuvvā savvē vi imē anaṁtasō jīvā । kiṁtu na bhinnō gaṁṭhī imēhi sō jammi bhinnammi ।। 9852 ।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-306-to-306.json ==========================
306
sirimunisuvvayasāmidēsaṇā
jiṇadhammamūlamēē lahaṁti sammattamuttamasuhāṇa । savvēsi avigalakāraṇaṁ bhavē dukkhanilaē vi ।। 9853 ॥
gaṭhipaēsāō taō niyattiūṇaṁ puṇō vi baddhāī । kammāī aighaṇāī ciṭṭhēti bhavaṭṭiyā jēhi ।। 9854 ।।
puraō vi ēvamēva ya abhavvajīvā sayā karissaṁti । jamhā tēhi kayā vi na chuṭṭayavvaṁ bhavaduhāō ।। 9755।।
bhavvā kēvi tahāvihabhavvattavivāgaō apūvvēṇa । karaṇēṇaṁ vajjēṇa va giri va bhidaṁti taṁ gaṁṭhi ।। 9856 ।।
tayaṇu aṇiyaṭṭikaraṇaṁ visuddhamaṁtō muhuttamaṇuhaviḍaṁ | mōkkhavarakappapāyavamūlaṁ pāvaṁti sammattaṁ । 9857 ।।
jaṇayabhaṇaṁtasuhōhassa nāsaṇaṁ savvaduhasamūhassa । uttamarayaṇanihāṇaṁ va rōrapurisā sukayapunnā ।। 9858 ।।
jō rāgadōsa mōhēhiṁ vajjiō sō rihaṁ mamaṁ dēvō । paṁcamahavvayadvārā muṇiṇō guruṇī khamāhārā ।। 8959 ॥
savvaṇṇuṇā paṇīō siddhatō savvahā maha pamāṇaṁ । jō ēsa suhō bhāvō taṁ sammattaṁ jiṇā bēṁti ।।8960 ।।
jaha aimahagghamullā kō vi rayaṇāṇa kōḍimavi laddha । jūyapamattō hārai muhāē tō dukkhiō hōi ।। 9861 ।।
taha kē visayagiddhā laddhaṁ pi jiyā vamaṁti sammattaṁ । tattō micchattamahātamaṁdhayārammi nivaḍati ।। 9862।।
tēṇa paṇaṭṭhavivēyā na muṇaṁti avatthavatthupavibhāyaṁ । mannati adēva pi hu mūḍhā dēvattabuddhī ।। 9863 ।।
aguruṁ pi muṇaṁti guruṁ dhammasahāvaṁ garṇēti pāvaṁ pi । tēṇa ghaṇabaddha kammā bhamaṁti bhujjō bhavamaṇataṁ ।। 9864।।
tō jāṇiūṇa ēvaṁ bhō bhavvā ! cayaha jhatti micchattaṁ । paḍivajjaha sammattaṁ taṁ paḍivannāmi mā kuṇaha ।। 9865 ।।
visasuddē paḍivadhaṁ paḍhamamuhē cciya maṇaṁ pi suhajaṇaē । pacchā kaḍuyavivāgē anaṁtabhavadukkhadāimmi ।। 9866॥
mā mujjhaha jāṇaṁtā sammaṁ citēha vatthuparamatthaṁ । maṇuyāṇa kāmabhōgā accatamasārayā ēē । । 9867 ।।
jamhā sōṇiyasukkāṇa saṁgamē itthiganbhamajjhammi । muttapurīsāīpūriyammi asuimmi nirayasamē || 9868॥
uppajjai maṇuyataṇū sōṇiyacammaṭṭimaṁsapaḍipunnā । aṁtō muttapurīsāisaṁgayā paramaduggaṁdhā ।। 9869 ।।
purisāṇa sarīraṁ savas navahiṁ sōttēhi dubbhigaṁdhamalaṁ । ēkkārasahi nārīṇa savvarōgāṇa kulabhavaṇaṁ ।। 9870 ।।
jaha kō vi ghaḍō majjhē amējjhaparipūriō ṭhaiyadārō । bāhi pakkhālijjai jalēṇa viulēṇa jai kaha vi । 9871 ।
kuṁkumakappūrāguru katthūriyapa muhasurahidavvēhiṁ । uvalipijjai taha vi hu khaṇaṁtarē sō taha ccēva ।। 9872 ।।
duggaṁdhamēva uvvamai avirayaṁ jēṇa asuirasa viddhaṁ । savvaṁ pi ghaḍakavālaṁ taṁ ciṭṭhai tēṇa surahi pi ।। 9873 ।।
davvaṁ tattha vilaggaṁ khaṇaddhamēttēṇa hōi duggaṁdhaṁ । taha ruhiramaṁsacammaṭṭivasamaē narasarīrē vi ।। 9874 ।।
tā bhō maṇayasarīrē asuimmi suittaṇaṁ asataṁ pi । niyabuddhivigappēhi ārōvēūṇa mā ramaha ।। 9875 ।।
sibhagihaṁ jamiha muhaṁ chaṇamayalaṁchaṇasariccha mēyaṁ tu । viyasiyana liganihāī dūsiyaṭhāṇāī nayaṇāī ।। 9876।।
aṭṭhīṇa khaṁḍarāī dasaṇē dippaṁtahīrayasaricchē | ghaṇuvaciyapisiyapiḍē paōharē kaṇayakalasē vva ।। 9877।।
muttapurīsa gihāī jahaṇa niyaṁbāī kaṁcaṇasila vva । maṁsadviruhirabaddha ūrujuyaṁ kayalikhabhaṁ va ॥। 9878 ।।
cammaṭṭhanhārunaddhē asōyapallavasa mēṁ ya karacaraṇē । ēvaṁ vigappiūṇaṁ mā baṁdhaha tēsu aṇurāyaṁ ।। 9879 ।।
jamaṇaṁta dukkhajaṇaē visaē sēvēha sōkkhabuddhīē । taṁ piyaha kālakūḍaṁ tubbhē amayaṁ ti citēraṁ ।। 9880 ।।
mā puttakalattāisa sayaṇēsu ya kuṇaha pēmapaḍibaṁdhaṁ । jaṁ tē na hōṁti tāṇaṁ naragāiduhaṁ sahaṁtāṇaṁ ।। 9881 ।।
iya lōgammi vi ēē tāva cciya hōṁti kiṁ pi sasiṇēhā । tēsiṁ ciya jāva samīhiyāī kīraṁti aṇavarayaṁ ।। 9882 ।।
ēkkaṁ pi jayā na kathaṁ tēsi kajjaṁ kahaṁ ci taiyā vi । tē hōṁti lukkhahiyayā dōsaggāhā vivakkha vva ।। 9883।।
vivammi vipaḍibaṁdha mā tumbhē kuṇaha jē tayatthammi | subahu pi kilissaṁtāṇa jāyaē nēya thēvaṁ pi ।। 9884 ।।
jāō vipayatēṇaṁ rakkhijjatō vi bahu uvāēhi । akayaṇṇuō vva purisō jhaḍa tti vihaḍai adakkhinnō ।। 9885 ।।

sirimunisubbayajiṇidacariyaṁ

307
jūyajalajalaṇasajjhō dāiyabaṁdiyataridacōrāṇaṁ । pāsāu mahāṇatthaṁ uppāyara jīyanāsaṁ ca ॥9886 ।।
iya nāuṁ bhō bhavvā ! caiūṇaṁ visayasayaṇadhaṇamucchaṁ । sāsaya suhasaṁjaṇaē jiṇadhammē ujjamaṁ kuha || 98887 ।।
ēttha paḍivajjiyavvaṁ samaggasāvajjajōgavēramaṇaṁ । caiyavvō savvō vihu sabāhirabbhitarō saṁgō ।। 9888 ।।
bāhimmi dupayaṁ caupayaṁdhaṇadhanna suvanna ruppa kuppāī । aṁtō uṇa jiyatijaō kōhāikasāyasamavāō ।। 9889 ।।
ukkhaṇiyavvā kēsā mulāō cciya sirammi jājīvaṁ । anhāṇa vaṁbhacēraṁ kāyavvaṁ bhūmisayaṇaṁ ca ।। 9890 ।।
bhikkhā paribhamaṇaṁ kulēsu niṇṇunnaēsa karaṇijjaṁ । laddhammi aladdhammi ya harisavisāō na kāyavvō ।। 9891 ।।
iṭṭhō va aṇiṭṭhō vā laddhāhārō arattaduṭṭhēhiṁ । vaṇipiṁḍirahakkhōvaṁganāyāō cēva bhōttavvō ।।9892।।
sattū ya mittēsu ya hōyavvaṁ khalu samāṇacitēhi । nidaṁtammi thuṇatē rōsō tōsō na kāyavvō ।। 9893 ।।
saddāisu visasu manōharēsu vi maṇaṁ pi aṇurāō । nō kāyavvō na ya nidiēsu dōsō vihēyavvō ।। 9894 । ।
cakamiyanvaṁ jugamēttanihiyadiṭṭhīhi taggayamaṇēhi । buddhīē vigappēuṁ jaṁpēyavvaṁ ca niravajjaṁ ।। 9895 ।।
dumijjai jēṇa parō suēṇa lōē ya pāvaē dōsaṁ । taṁ jīviyavvanāsē vi bhāsiyavvaṁ na sāhūhi ।। 9896 ।।
gahiyavvō āhārō uggamauppāyanēsaṇāsuddhō । vasahī vatthaṁ kaṁbalapattagaphalagāiyaṁ pitahā ।। 9897।।
taha uvagaraṇaṁ savvaṁ paḍilēhēuṁ pamajjiūṇaṁ ca । gahiyavvaṁ kajjavasā mōttavvaṁ taha saṭhāṇammi || 9898 ।।
uccāraṁ pāsavaṇaṁ khēlaṁ siṁghāṇajallamāīyaṁ । suvivēiyammi ṭhāṇē jattēṇa parivēyavvaṁ ।। 9899 ।।
jattēṇa rakkhiyavvō vivēyatikkhakusēṇa khaṁcēuṁ । sīlavaṇāō bāhinīharamāṇō maṇōhatthī ।। 9900 ।।
ēvaṁ ciyē guttī vayakāyāṇa vi savvayā vi kāyavvā । chaṭṭhaṭṭamāi jasatti sēviyavvaṁ tavōkammaṁ ।। 9901 ।।
viṇaō vēyāvacca gurupabhiīṇaṁ sayā vi kāyavvaṁ । kajjē niṭṭūravayaṇēhiṁ tālaṇaṁ tēsi sahiyavvaṁ ॥। 9902।।
gacchassa appaṇō vi ya kiccāṇaṁ aṁtarammi sajjhāē । savvappaṇā pasattī kāyavvā na uṇa vigahāsu ।। 9903 ।।
dēsē nayarē gāmē kulē ya uvahimmi niyasarīrē vā । katthai mamattabuddhī kāyavvā nēya thōvā vi ।। 9904 । ।
sahiyavvāō chuhatisasīyāyavavāyavēyaṇāō ya । sammamahiyāsiyavvā tiriyāikaōvasaggā ya ।। 9905 ।।
niccamaṇiccattaṇamasaraṇattamē gattamēvamāīyā । bārasa vi bhāvaṇāō bhāvēyavvāō jattēṇa ।। 9906 ॥
iya nicca kuṇaṁtāṇaṁ bhavvāṇaṁ mōkkhasōkkhakakhīṇaṁ । jāyai pugvabhavajjiyakammāṇa khaō subahuyāṇa ।। 9907 ।।
tō lahukammattaṇaō pakkhiṇapaviyaṁbhamāṇasuhabhāvā । āruhiūṇaṁ tē khavagasēḍhimairēṇa mōhakhayaṁ । । 9908।।
kāūṇa nāṇadaṁsaṇaāvaraṇē aṁtarāyamavi khaviḍaṁ । lōyālōyapayāsaṁ pāvaṁti ya kēvalaṁ nāṇaṁ ।। 9909 ॥
tō kēvalipajjāyaṁ kālaṁ aṁtōmuhuttamahavā vi । dēsūṇapuvvakōḍiṁ pālēūṇaṁ taō aṁtē ।। 9910 ।।
jugavaṁ khaviūṇa bhavōvagāhi kammāī jhatti caurō vi । samaēṇēkkēṇa aviggahēṇa gaṁtūṇa uḍḍhadisi ।। 9911 ॥ ।
siddhikakhēttē vimalē jammajarāmaraṇarōganimmukkō । lōyaggagaō sijjhai sāgāruvaōgasaṁjuttō ॥ 9912 ।।
sāiyamaṇaṁtamaṇuvamamavvābāhasuhamuttamaṁ pattō 1 kālamaṇataṁ ciṭṭhai varadaṁsaṇanāṇasaṁpannō ।। 9913।।
suragaṇasuhaṁ samaggaṁ savvaddhāpiṁḍiyaṁ anaṁtaguṇaṁ । na ya pāvai muttisuhaṁ ṇaṁtāhi vi vaggavaggūhi ।। 9914 । ।
saṁghayaṇakālavī riyabalaāusamāhiannayararahiō । kō vi tahāvikammakkhayaṁ akāuṇa chaumatthō ।। 9915 ।।
jai kālaṁ kuṇai taō sōhammāīṇa dēvalōgāṇaṁ । savvaṭṭasiddhacaramāṇa dēvalōgammi annarē ।। 9996॥
sō uppajjai dēvō mahidiō tattha surasuhaṁ pavaraṁ । suiraṁ aṇuhaviūṇaṁ ṭhiikkhaēṇaṁ taō caviraṁ ।। 9917 ।।
pavaramaṇusa jāyai bhuvaṇayalakkhāya nimmalakulēsu । sōhaggarūvakaliō samagganaralakkhaṇasamēō ।। 9918 ।।

āṇā īsariyajuō vēsamaṇasamāṇavihavasaṁpannō । rāyāimāṇaṇijjō parivaṇijjō na kassa vi ya ।। 9919 ।।
tattha suhaṁ aṇuhaviḍaṁ suira aṇurūvamattavihavassa । dikkhaṁ gahiūṇa taō sijjhai puvvuttanāēṇa ।। 9920 ।।
iya sirimunisuvvaya jiṇanāhēṇa payāsiyammi vittharaō । sayalē bhavassarūvē taha sivasuhasāhaṇōvāē ।। 9921 । ।
vihaḍatanibiḍatarakammanigaḍabaṁdhō narēsaraṁgaruhō । sahasa tti mallināmō samuṭṭhiō dikkhagahaṇatthaṁ । । 9922॥
tīsē sadēvamaṇuyāsurāē parisāē majjhayārāō । uṭṭaṁtabahalapulaō siraggasaṁṭhaviyakarakamalō ।। 9923 ।।
vayai jiṇaṁ jaha bhayavaṁ ! jahēva tumbhēhi ēyamakkhāyaṁ । saṁsārassa sarūvaṁ tahēva taṁ annā nēya ।। 9924 ॥
tā rakkha rakkha paha ! maṁ imāō aitikkhadukkha nilayāō । saṁsārasamuddāō kasāyajalayararauddāō ।। 9925 ।।
dāūṇa sahatthēṇaṁ dikkhaṁ saṁsārajalahivōhitthaṁ । vanniyasarūvaminhi niyavayaṇēṇēva tumhēhi ।। 9926
tō munisuvvayasāmī dēi sahatthēṇa tassa jiṇadikkhaṁ । tassa'ṇumaggēṇa taō harivaṁsakulāisaṁbhūyā ।। 9927 ।।
annē vi pabhūyā rāyanaṁdaṇā sēṭṭhisatthavāhasuyā । dikkhatthamuṭṭhiyā dikkhiyā ya sayamarahayā tē vi । । 9928 ।।
nivadhūyāpupphavaī pamuhāō vimalakulapasūyāō । ginhaṁti taō dikkhaṁ nārīō sāmipāsammi ।। 9929 ।।
mallī u pugvabhavabaddhagaṇaharatō jiṇāu sōūṇa | upāya iyattayamullasiyavisuddha vihavō ।। 9930 ।।
bārasasāisayāī aṁtamuhattēṇa rayai kālēṇa āyārāīṇaṁgāī diṭṭivāyāvasāṇāī ।। 9931 ।।
raiyammi āgamē aha bhayavaṁ muṇisuvvaō samuṭṭē | aṇuō gāṇunnāē dāṇatthaṁ malliṇō tassa ।। 9932 ।।
tō sōhammāhivaī pavarāṇaṁ surabhigaṁdhavāsāṇaṁ । paḍiputraṁ rayaṇamayaṁ thālaṁ gahiūṇa pāsammi ।।9933 ।।
titthaṁkarassa ṭhāyai tō bhayavaṁ tinni vāsamuṭṭhīō । gahiūṇa sayaṁ mallissa sāhuṇō khivai sīsammi ।। 9934 । ।
savvēhiṁ davvēhiṁ savvēhiṁ pajjavēhiṁ ya naēhiṁ । aṇunāyaṁ aṇunāyaṁ titthaṁ tuha ēyamamhēhi ॥ 9935 ।।
ēvaṁ pabhāsamāṇō vārāō tinni niyayavayaṇēṇa । iṁdāiyā ya dēvā khivaṁti vāsē sirē tassa ।। 9936 ।।
aha tassa gaṇaharapaē ṭhaviyassa muṇīsarassa mallissa । navadikkhiyaṁ samappai savvaṁ muṇisāhuṇīvaggaṁ ।। 9937 ।।
aha suvvaō nariṁdō siraggasaṁghaḍiyapāṇikamalajuō। sirimuṇisuvvaya nāhaṁ vinnavai jahā ahaṁ sāmi ! ।।9938 ।।
ajja vi imammi samaē asamatyō savvaviraigahaṇammi । tā gihavāsassuciyaṁ dhammaṁ pahu ! majjha āisaha । । 9939 ।।
tō āha jiṇavariṁdō jē jaidhammassa akkhamā huti । tēsi gihatthadhammō duijjaō jujjaē kāuṁ ।। 9940 ॥
tattha paḍhamaṁ agārī tivihaṁ tivihēṇa cayai micchattaṁ । sammattaṁ paḍivajjai jaha ajjappabhii nō majjha ।। 9941 ।।
kappaṛa paratitthīṇaṁ paratitthiyadēvayāṇa taha cēva । paratitthiyagahiyāṇaṁ titthaṁkaranāhapaḍimāṇaṁ ।। 9942 ।।
vaṁdaṇanamaṁsaṇāī kāuṁ taha tēhi puvvamālāvē । akayammi tēhi saddhi ālāvāī vina karēmi ।। 9943 ।।
nayatēsi asaṇaṁ vā pāṇaṁ vā khāimaṁ va sāimagaṁ । dāuṁ aṇuppayāḍaṁ va kappaē majjha ētāhē । । 9944।।
ēttha ya viyāṇiyavvā aiyārā paṁca na uṇa kāyavvā । saṁkā kaṁkhavigichāparatitthiyasaṁthavapasaṁsā ।। 9945 ।।
āraṁbhāō saṁkappaō ya duvihō ya hōi pāṇavahō । tatthāraṁbhakayāō thūlagapāṇāivāyāō ।।9946॥
na kuṇai paccakhāṇaṁ saṁkappakayāō viramaē tattōṁ । ēttha vi paṁcaiyārē viyāṇiūṇaṁ pariharējjā ।। 9947 ।।
baṁdhavahaṁ chavichēyaṁ aibhāraṁ bhattapāṇavōcchēyaṁ । kōhāidūsiyamaṇō gōmaṇuyāīṇa nō kujjā ॥9948।।
kannā gō bhūmāliya nāsavahāraṁ ca kūḍasakkhējjaṁ । paṁcavihaṁ pi alīyaṁ thūlaṁ ēyaṁ pariharējjā ॥9949॥
sahasā abbhakkhāṇaṁ rahassā ya sadāramaṁtabhēyaṁ ca । mōsōvaēsayaṁ kūḍalēhakaraṇaṁ iha na kujjā ॥9950॥
thūlamadattādāṇaṁ saccittācittavatyuvisayaṁ pi । paccakkhāi gityō tattha iyārē cayai ēē ॥। 9951 ।।

tēnāhaḍaṁ ca takkarajōgaṁ ca viruddharajjagamaṇaṁ ca । kūḍatulakūḍamāṇaṁ tappatirūvaṁ ca vavahāraṁ 9952 ।।
paccakkhai paradāraṁ paḍivajjai vā sadārasaṁtōsaṁ । sē paradārē duvihē ōrālaviubvibhēēṇa ।।9953 ।।
hōṁtiha paṁcaiyārā sadāramaṁtōsiṇō maṇussassa । ittariyapariggahiyāgamaṇaṁ apariggahiyagamaṇaṁ ।।9954।।
kīlaṇamaṇaṁgavisayaṁ kāravaṇaṁ taha ya paravivāhāṇaṁ । kāmēsu ya bhōgēsu ya aisayativvāhilāsō ya ।। 9955 ।।
ēē viyāṇiūṇaṁ parihariyavvā taō payattēṇaṁ । paṁccakkhāi pariggahamaparimiyaṁ parimiyaṁ kuṇai ।। 9956।।
duvihaṁ pi sacittācittabhēyaō tattha hōṁti aiyārā । paṁcēva jāṇiyavvā ēē na hu āyarēyavvā ।। 9957 ।।
1 khēttē vatthummi tahā ruppasuvannē dhaṇē ya dhannē ya । dupayacauppayavisaē kuppē ya pamāṇaaṛakamaṇaṁ ।। 99588 ।।
jōyaṇavayāṇabaṁdhaṇakāraṇabhāvēhiṁ nāyarēyavvaṁ । tivihaṁ disivvayaṁ puṇa uḍḍhaṁ tiriyaṁ ahē cēva ।। 9959 ।।
ēttha vi paṁcaiyārā jāṇēyavvā na āyarēyavvā । uḍḍhaṁ tiriyaṁ hēṭṭhā disiparimāṇassa aikamaṇaṁ
khēttaparivadikaraṇaṁ aṁtaddhāṇaṁ tahāsaīē ya । uvabhōgaparī bhōgavvayaṁ duhā bhōyaṇē kammē
bhōyaṇaō aiyārē paṁca imē jāṇiuṁ pariharējjā । saccittē āhārē sacittapaḍibaddhaē cēva
appauliya duppauliyatucchōsa hibhakkhaṇaṁ ca paṁcamayaṁ । kammayaō puṇa panarasakammādāṇāī nēyāī
iṁgālakammavaṇakammasāgaḍīkamabhāḍayaṁ cēva । phōḍīkammaṁ daṁtavaṇijjaṁ lakkhāvaṇijjaṁ ca
rasakēsa visavaṇijjaṁ pīlaṇakammaṁ tahēva jaṁtassa । nillaṁchaṇadavadāṇē sarāisōsaṁ asaipōsaṁ ।। 9965 ।।
taiyaṁ guṇavvayaṁ puṇa aṇatthadaṁḍō cauvvihō sō u । paḍhamaṁ ca avajjhāṇaṁ bīyaṁ ca pamāyaāyariyaṁ ।। 99966।।
taiyaṁ hiṁsayāṇaṁ parassa pāōvaēsaṇaṁ turiyaṁ । ēyassa viramagammi vi paṁca iyārē vivajjējjā ।। 9967 ।।
kaṁdappaṁ kukkuiyaṁ mōhariyaṁ saṁjuyāhigaraṇaṁ ca । uvabhōgaparī bhōgāi rēgayaṁ muṇaha paṁcamayaṁ । । 9968 ।।
sāvajjajōgaparivajjaṇaṁ ca niravajjajōgasēvaṇayaṁ । sāmāiyaṁ ti bhannai iha aiyārā imē paṁca ।। 9969 ।।
maṇaduppaṇihāṇaṁ vaduppaṇihāṇaṁ tahēva kāyassa । duppaṇihāṇaṁ sāmāiyassa saha akaraṇaṁ turiyaṁ
sāmāiyassa aṇaviṭṭhiyassa karaṇaṁ tu hōṛa paṁcamayaṁ । ēē viyāṇiūṇaṁ vivajjiyavvā payattēṇa
disivayagahiyassa disāparimāṇassa u diṇē diṇē māṇaṁ । jaṁkīrai taṁ dēsāvagāsiyaṁ nāma vinnēyaṁ
āṇāyaṇapēsa iha saddaṇuvāyaṁ ca rūvaaṇavāyaṁ । bahiyāpōggalakhēvaṁ paṁcamayaṁ jāṇijaṁ vajjē । 9973 ।।
pōsahauvavāsavayaṁ cauhā āhāradēhasakkārē । taiyaṁ ca baṁbhacērē avvābārē cautthaṁ ca
sējjāsaṁthārāṇaṁ appaḍilēhaṇayaṁ dupaḍilēhaṇayaṁ । taha tēsimappamajjaṇadupamajjaṇayaṁ ca vinēyaṁ
pāsavaṇuccāramahī appaḍilēhaṇayadupaḍilē haṇayaṁ । tīsē ya appamajjaṇadupamajjaṇayaṁ ca nāyavvaṁ
pōsaha uvavāsassa u taha samma aṇaṇupālaṇā cēva । ēē aiyārē paṁca jāṇiuṁ pōsahē vajjē
taha atihisaṁvibhāgō davvāṇaṁ annapāṇamāīṇaṁ । nāēṇa āgayāṇaṁ taha cēva ya kappaṇijjāṇa ।। 9978 ।।
saddhāsakkārēhi parisuddhaṁ taha ya dēsakālēhiṁ । paramāē bhattīē āyāṇuggahamaīē ya ।। 9979 ।।
saṁjayajaṇassa dāṇaṁ paṁcajhyārē caējja iha nāuṁ । saccittē nikkhivaṇaṁ saccittēṇaṁ pihāṇaṁ ca ।। 9980 ।।
kālāikkamadāṇaṁ paravavaēsaṁ ca macchariyayaṁ ca । ēvaṁ gihatthadhammaṁ sammattajuyaṁ duvālasahā ।। 9981 ।।
paḍivajjiūṇa maṇyā jē kē vi ya savvayaḥ niraiyāraṁ । parivālayaṁti tē vi hu narasurasōkkhāī aṇuhavi ॥82॥
pāvaṁti asaṁdēhaṁ aṭṭhabhavabbhaṁtarammi sivasōkkhaṁ । tā naravara ! tumaminhi ēyaṁ ginhāhi aviyapyaṁ ।। 9983 ।।
bhagavayā bhaṇiē saha suvvayanaravarēṇa bahuēhi । annēhiṁ pi paḍivannō gihidhammō bhagavaō pāsē ।। 9984 ।।
