rannō avarōhēṇaṁ saha iyarāhiṁ vi bahūhiṁ nārīhi । ēsō agāridhammō pavitra vimalasammattō ।। 9985 ।।
kēhi vi puṇa maṇuēhiṁ nārīnivahēhi kēvalaṁ cēva । sammattaṁ saṁpattaṁ munisuvvayasāmipāsammi ।। 9986 ।।
vipuṇa
ēvaṁ cauvihasaṁghō saṁjāō bhagavaō samōsaraṇē । paḍhamammi ēttha saṁkhā sāhūṇaṁ sōlasasayāī ।। 9987 ।।
tinnēva sāhuṇīṇaṁ sahasā sattēva sāvayāṇaṁ tu । ēkkārasa sahasāī jāyāī sāviyāṇaṁ ca ।। 9988 ।।
dēvēha ya dēvīhi ya bahūhiṁ sammattarayaṇamaṇupattaṁ । sammattaṁ ciya kēhi vi tiriēhi dēsaviraī vi ।। 9989 ।।
bhaviyajaṇappaḍibōhaṁ ēvaṁ paidiyahamāyaraṁtassa । muṇisuvvayassa pahuṇō tatthāgaṁtūṇa sammiliyaṁ । । 9990।।
taṁ rāyasuyasahassaṁ paḍhamadiṇē jēṇa bhagavayā saddhi । gahiyā dikkhā tēṇa vi bhujjō muṇi suvvayasamīvē ॥। 9991 ।।
tattō rāyagihāō sirimuṇisuvvayajiṇēsarō vāhi । viharai surakayakaṁcaṇakamalēsu kamē nivēsaṁtō ।। 9992।।
āgāsatalagaēṇaṁ maṇimayasīhāsaṇēṇa divvēṇa । taha cēva cāmarāhi khīrōyahilaharisarisāhiṁ ।। 9993 ||
chaṇamayalaṁchaṇa maṁḍalasamāṇachāēṇa chattatiyagēṇa । gayaṇapahagāmiṇā taha rayaṇamahiṁdajjhaēṇaṁ ca ।। 9994 ।।
puraō vaccaṁtēṇaṁ rayaṇāmayapavaradhammacakkēṇa । dēhāṇumaggalaggēṇa vimalabhāmaṁḍalēṇaṁ ca
sīsagaṇasaṁparivuḍō tiyasagaṇāṇaṁ caubvihāṇaṁ pi । kōḍīhi agāhi thuvvaṁtaaṇaṁtaguṇanivahō
gāmāṇugāmamēvaṁ viharaṁtō bhaviyakamalasaṁḍāṇa । uppāyatō paḍibōhamāgaō hatthiṇāgapurē
sahasaṁbavaṇujjāṇē aṇēyavarapāyavō hasōhaṁtē । phāsūyabhūmipaēsē āgaṁtūṇaṁ samōsariō
cauvihadēvanikāēṇa tattha puvvōvavanniyasarūvaṁ । samavasaraṇaṁ viṇimmiyamuppāyaṁtaṁ jaṇāṇaṁ daṁ ।। 9999 ।।
tattha bhayavaṁ nisannō sadēvamaṇuyāsurāē parisāē । puraō kahēi dhammaṁ jōyaṇanīhārisaddēṇa ॥। 10000 ||
aha tattha hatthiṇaurē vatthavvō gaṁgadattanāmēṇa । atthi dhaṇaḍḍhō saḍḍhō sāmī sattanha kōḍīṇaṁ ॥ 10001 ||
dhaṇadhannadupayaca upayarahavāhaṇajāṇavittharasamēō । nāūṇa jiṇāgamaṇaṁ pamōyapūrijjamāṇamaṇō ।। 10002 ।।
nhāō kayabalikammō niyatthamaṁgallasuddhavaravatthō । appamahagghālaṁkārabhūsiyaṁgō rahārūḍhō || 10003 ।।
iya garayavibhūīē aṇēganaravaggurāparikkhittō । caliō niyabhavaṇāō vaṁdaṇahēuṁ jiṇidassa ||10004।।
sahasaṁbavaṇē pattō ōyariuṁ rahavarāō bhagavaṁtaṁ । tipayāhiṇikarēuṁ paṇamai mahinihiyapaṁcagō ।। 10005।।
sēsaṁ pi sāhuvaggaṁ jahakkamaṁ vaṁdiūṇa savvaṁ pi । uvavisaha uciyadēsē jōḍiyahatthō suṇai dhammaṁ ।। 10006।।
bhayavaṁ pi payapariggahāsavahārasaṁbhavaṁ dukkhaṁ । ihaparabhaviyaṁ jaha hōi vittharēṇa tahā kahai ॥। 10007।।
iha saṁsārē caugaidārē jīvāṇaṁ saṁsaratāṇa । jaṁ ki pi hōi dukkhaṁ taṁ savvaṁ asuhakammē hi ।। 10008।।
tāī ca puṇō kammāī jaṁtuṇō saṁciṇaṁti aṇavarayaṁ । kōhāīhiṁ kasāēhiṁ cauhi ghatthārauddēhi ।। 10009।
tēsi pi kasāyāṇaṁ majjhē suhaḍō vva ubbhaḍō lōbhō । jassa vasā thēvaṁ pihu lahaṁti na duhaṁtaraṁ jīvā । । 10010॥
jaṁ lōbhagayā jīvā bahuvivōvajjaṇē kayapasaṁgā । sō natthi payārō kō vi ēttha bhavaṇammi sayalē vi ।। 10011 ।।
appāṇaṁ jēṇa imē gamyakilēsēsu nēya pāḍēṁti । khaṁdhēṇa matthaēṇa ya vēhaṁti aiduvvahaṁ bhāraṁ ।। 10012 ।।
taha lēhahārayā hōṁti kē vi tē saṁtayaṁ pahē cēva । ciṭṭhati vahaṁtā na vi gaṇaṁti sīunhajalavāyaṁ ।। 10013 ।।
sēvaṁti kē vi sāmi kariturayarahāṅavāhaṇagayassa । tassa puraō ṭhiyā tē turiyaṁ pahāvaṁti ॥ 10014 ।।
sāsāūriyahiyayā saṁtā taṁtā ajāyanibvēyā । tayaṇunnāyā sagihē gaṁtr̥̄ṇa paḍaṁti sikkaḍaē || 10015 ।।

kēṇa vi tucchēṇa paōyaṇēṇa tō jhatti tē samuṭu uṁ । tattō chuhiyā tisiyā saṁsaṁbhamā jati tappāsē ।। 10017 |

tō taṁ namiuṁ saviṇaya mēvaṁ jaṁpaṁti jōḍiyakaraggā । pasiūṇa sāmi ! āisaha ki pi jaṁ sāhimō inhi ।। 10018।।
aha tēṇa samāiṭṭhā laddhanihāṇa vva tē pahidumaṇā । turiyaṁ tattha payaṭṭaṁti agaṇiyāsēsadēhaduhā ।। 10019 ।।
agaṇiyakiccākiccā jahā samāiṭṭhakajjakaraṇāō । amhē cciya jaṛa pahuṇō kaci aivallahā hōmō । 10020 ।
iya citiūṇa hiyaē mittassa vi dōhamāyaraṁti imē । ghāyaṁti baṁdhavaṁ pi hu musaṁti sayaṇaṁ pi sōyarayaṁ ।। 10021 ।।
lōyāu lahaṁti taō haṇahaṇakāraṁ akittimayasaṁ ca । avayariyaṁ jassa taō tēṇa'havā tassa sayaṇēṇa ।। 10022 ।।
āgaṁtu tē hammati bahuvihaṁ pāviyaṁti vā bāhaṁ । jai vi haṇaṇaṁmi bāhā tēsi na havaṁti divvavasā ।। 10023 ।।
taha viniyasāmiṇō vi hu jaṇāvavāyābhisaṁkiyamaṇassa । hōṁti adaṭṭavvamuhā sakajjasiddhīē suhiyassa । 10024 ।
asargakaraggā kēi vi karakaliyabāṇakōyaṁḍā । nāṇāvihaāuhavaggapāṇiṇō kavahayasarīrā ।। 10025 ।।
nivaḍatanisiyasa ra sēllakuṁtēsu ghōrasamarēsu । niyajīviyaniravēkkhā pavisaṁti vivakkhajayakakhī ॥। 10026 ।।
vajiyammi parabalē jaha gasyapasāyaṁ pahū kuṇai amha । iya dhaṇagiddhā muddhā kē vi viṇassaṁti tatthēva ।। 10027।।
kē vidhaṇapivāsāē kēṇa vi balavaṁtaēṇa saha rannā । pavisaṁti annadēsē dhaṇavai gihalhū sikaraṇatthaṁ ।। 10028 ।।
tē tattha gayā tattō parōpparaṁ daviṇagahaṇalōbhēṇa । kōvubbhaḍā bhiḍaṁtā jhaḍa tti jamapāhuṇē jaṁti ||10029 ।।
kē vi kuṇati vaṇijjaṁ kaḍḍhēūṇaṁ kalaṁtarēṇatthaṁ । ēkkāē vi niyayāē kavaḍḍiyāē asaṁtīē ।। 10030 ।।
mūlassa vi hōi taō hāṇī kēsi pi kammadōsēṇa । ājammaṁ pi taō tē riṇadāsā hōṁti annēsiṁ ॥। 10031 ।।
kīlaṁti kē jūēṇa vihavasa muvajjaṇujjayā purisā । lillammi vi gaṁṭṭhimmi hāriē chōhiyātō tē ।। 10032 ।।
uti duguṇatiguṇaṁ hāriyaatthassa vālaṇa nimittaṁ । taha vi na jiṇaṁti ēē hāraṁti ya ahiṁga ahigayaraṁ । 10033।
davvaṁ dāumasakkā aha tē sahiyassa jāvajīvaṁ pi । jāyaṁti dāsapēsā kayatthiyā vā viṇassaṁti ||10034 ||
karakaliyakappasatthā atthakaē kē vi dutthiyā saṁtā । khōṇīyalaṁ khaṇatā bhamaṁti na lahaṁti kiṁ pi ।। 10035 ।।
kēi puṇa dhāuvāimiliyā dhāuṁ dhamaṁti kaṇayakaē। taha vina baṁchiyasiddhī chārō cciya kēvalō hōi ।। 10036 ।।
pavisaṁti pavaṇēhiṁ kē vi rauddē mahāsamuṭṭē vi । tē bhaggajāṇavattā tatthēva taō vivajjati ।। 10037।।
ēgē khati khattaṁ baṁda ginhaṁti vaṭṭa pāḍaṁti । paḍikuṁciyāē dāraṁ ughāḍēḍaṁ musaṁti paraṁ ॥ 10038 ।।
kē viparappāṇāṇa vi cukkaṁti vayaṁti bahualīyāī । iya lōbhahayā purisā kimakiccaṁ jaṁ na kuvvaṁti ।। 10039
atthassēva nimittaṁ kēi vi sikkhati vivihasippāī । sikkhāvayāṇa hatthē pāē ya malaṁti rayaṇidiṇaṁ 110040 ।
anbhassaṁti kalāō lēhāīyāō kē vi vivihāō । āujjamaṇēgavihaṁ naṭṭaṁ gēyaṁ ca bahubhēyaṁ ।। 10041 ।।
jujjhāī bāhujujjhāiyāī taha nāḍayāiṁ vivihāraṁ । vasaggavarattārōhaṇāi kōūhalāī ca ।। 10042 ।।
taha usī mahilāguṇēya sikkhati vēsavilayāō । maṇamōhuppāyagarē purisāṇa viyakkhaṇāṇaṁ pi ।। 10043।।
kēsi pi kaha vi atthō jai hōi tahā vi kiviṇayāē imē । dhammē vayaṁti na kavaḍḍiyaṁ pi na ya niyasarīrē vi ।।
sayamēva atthakkhaṇaparāyaṇā duhiyamaṇā । savvattha avīsatthā puttē mittē kalattē ya ।। 10045 ।।
labbhadhaṇaṁ maggaṁtā riṇiyajaṇā ōsahaṁti na khaṇaṁ pi । ēkkakavaḍḍīē kaē kalahaṁ kuvvaṁti aigaruyaṁ ।। 10046 ।।
kē vipariggahavitthara mēlaṇaō kaha vi nēya viramaṁti । jaṁ jaṁ ki pi palōyaṁti suṁdaraṁ taṁ pi ginhaṁti ।। 10047 ॥
karikarahaturayavēsararāsahagōmahisachagalamidāī । suṇaha varāha kuraṁgamacittayavayavagghamāīyaṁ ॥ 10048 ।।
kukkuḍasuyasāriyamōrapurisaitthīpabhūyaparivāraṁ । sibiyā saṁdaṇāpavahaṇasayaṇāsaṇabhavaṇapabhiīyaṁ ॥ 10049 ।।

।। 10050।।
mōttiyapavālavē ruliyavajjamaragayasuvannaruppāī । taha sippisaṁkhadaṁtappamuhaṁ bahuvatthusaṁdōha
gōhūmasālisaṭṭhiyatilatuyarimauṭṭhamuggamāsāī । saṇapajjuvasāṇamaṇēyabhēyabhinnaṁ tahā dhannaṁ ।। 10051।।
nāṇādēsasamubbhavacīṇaṁsuyamāivi vihavatthāī । kuṁkumakappūrāgurucaṁdaṇakatthūriyāīṇi ।। 10052।।
kēūrakaḍayakaṁkaṇaka ḍisuttayakuṁḍalaṁgulīyāī । hāraḍḍhahāramauḍappa muhē vivihē alaṁkārē ।। 10053।।

iya tittimapāvaṁtā pariggahr̥ppāyanē pasattamaṇā । mariūṇa jaṁti niraē bhamaṁti tattō bhavamataṁ ।। 10059 ।।
dēvā vi lōhanaḍiyā rayaṇamaēsuṁ mahāvimāṇēsu । bhavaṇēsu ya nagarēsu ya ciṭṭhatā dippamāṇēsu ||10060।।
nāṇāviharayaṇāṇaṁ aṇēgarāsīhiṁ girisamāṇēhiṁ । tēēṇa jalatēhi saṁtēhi vi jaṁti nō titti ॥ 10061।।
annēsi tiyasāṇaṁ haraṁti rayaṇāī lōhamūḍhamaī । taha tiriyalōyamajjhē dīvasa muddē disāō ya ।। 10062 ॥
asaṇasaṁḍāṇi ya giriṇō nagarāgarāṇi gāmāṇi । pāsāyamaṁdirāṇi ya maṇuyāṇa tahā nihāṇāī ।। 10063 ।
mēṇivihittāī lōbhagvatthā surā mamāyaṁti । iya cauvihā dēvā na lati pariggahē titti ।। 10064।।
iya nagarabhavaṇavaṇasaṁḍavāvirayaṇēsu accharagaṇēsu । kayamucchā mariūṇaṁ dēvā ēgidiyā hōṁti ।। 10065 ।।
tattō apārasaṁsārasāgarē garuyakammalaharīhi । pālijjatā ēttō tattō visarhati dukhāī ।। 10066।।
tiriyā vibhuyagamūsagapa muhā kuvvaṁti paradhaṇē mucchaṁ । mariūṇa puṇō vi taō bhamaṁti bhavasāyaraṁ ghōraṁ ।। 10067।।
ēsō u mahāṇatthō pariggahō hōi savvajīvāṇaṁ । na ha ērisaō pāsō annō iha atthi bhaviyāṇaṁ ।। 10068 ।।
tabhī dēvāpiyā ! ēvaṁ nāūṇa dāruṇavivāgaṁ । mā hōha pariggahasaṁgahē rayā viramaha imāō ।। 10069 ।।
iya bhagavaōvaiṭṭha
 ṁ dhammaṁ sōūṇa gaṁgadattō u । hidumaṇō namiūṇaṁ muṇisuvvayasāmiṇaṁ tattō
vinnavai jōḍiyakarō nīsēsa sahahāmi ṇaṁ bhantē ! | niggaṁthaṁ pāvayaṇaṁ rōēmi ya ṇaṁ imaṁ bhaṁtē ।। 10071 ।।
jaha cēva vayaha tubbhē taha cēva imaṁ na annahā ki pi । tā jāva jēṭṭhaputtaṁ ṭhāvēmi ahaṁ niyadvā ।। 10072 ।।
tāvāgaṁtūṇa tilōyanāha ! tuha pāyapaṁkayasamīvē । dikkhaṁ ginhāmi ahaṁ bhavadukkhavimōkkhasaṁjaṇaṇi ।। 10073।।
tō āha bhuvanāhō ēvaṁ lahu kuha mā hu paḍibaṁdha । iya bhagavayā pabhaṇiōṁ ēsō guruharisa ḍihatthō ।। 10074 ।।
uṭṭhē uṁ namiūṇa ya jiṇēsaraṁ jāi appaṇō bhavaṇē । ṭhaviūṇa jēṭṭaputtaṁ sāmi sakuḍuṁbamajjhami । । 10075 ।।
āruhiūṇa sayaṁ puṇa sibiyaṁ māṇusa sahassavahaṇijjaṁ । savvaniyanāisuhisayaṇaparivuḍōṁ guru vibhūīē ।। 10076 ।
aṇugammamāṇamaggō jēṭṭaṇa suēṇa saparivārēṇa । majjha majjhēṇaṁ hatthiṇāganayarassa nīhariuṁ ।। 10077 ।।
jēṇēva jiṇō bhayavaṁ tēṇēva uvēi tayaṇunāō sō । kayapaṁcamuṭṭhilōō sayaṁ pi pavvāiō pahuṇā ।। 10078।।
annē vi tattha isarasēṇāvaisēṭṭhisatthavāhāi । siḍhiliyagihapaḍibaṁdhā puvvaṁ pi jiṇidavayaṇēṇa ।। 10079 ।।
daṭṭhūṇaṁ gaṁgadattaṁ pavvayamāṇaṁ visēsaō ēē । tuṭṭagihapēmapāsā pavvaiyā tayaṇumaggēṇa || 10080 ।।
tē sikkhiyajakiriyā paḍhaṁti thērāṇa sannihāṇammi । āyārāīgaṁgāī viharamāṇā saha jiṇēṇa ॥ 10081 ।।
bhayatraṁ pi viharamāṇō kamēṇa gāmāṇugāmanagarēsu । sāvatthīē pattō nayarīē bāhirūjjāṇē ||10082 ॥

immisamōsaraṇē dēvanikāēṇa cauvihēṇāvi । tattha nisannō sīhāsaṇammi dhammaṁ parikahē ||10083 ।।
nāūṇa jiṇāgamaṇaṁ sāvatthīnayarināyagō nivai । jipasattūnāmēṇaṁ sāmaggīē samaggāē || 10084।।
gaṁtūṇa samōsaraṇē paṁcavihābhigamapuvvayaṁ tattō । tipayāhiṇīkarēūṁ namasiuṁ vaṁdiuṁ ca jiṇaṁ ।। 10085 ।।
uvavisaha uciyadē sē kahijjamāṇaṁ jiṇēṇa nisuṇēi । saṁsārassa sarūvaṁ taha sivasuhasāhaṇō vāyaṁ ।। 10086 ।।
tattha jiyasatturanō taṇaō nāmēṇa khaṁdagakumārō । dēvīē dhāraṇīnāmiyāē kucchīē saṁbhūō ।। 10087 ।।
dhammōpaḍibuddhō sahi paṁcahi samaṁ nivasuyāṇa । paḍivajjai pavajjaṁ muṇisuvvayasāmipāsammi।। 10088 ।।
jaikiriyaṁ sikkhēuṁ ahijjaē āgamaṁ payattēṇa । muṇisuvvaō vi sāmī tattō annattha viharēi ||10089।।
viharatō ya kamēṇaṁ kuvvatō bhaviyalōyapaḍibōhaṁ । saṁpattō rāyagihē nayarammi jayappasiddhammi ।। 10090 ।।
tasa bahi samasariō nīlaguhānāmayammi ujjāṇē । vinnāyajiṇāgamaṇō suvvarāyā taō jhatti ।। 10091 ।।
garuyapariōsapūriyahiyaō saha savvaniyavibhūīē । rāyagihāō nayarāō nīharēūṇa bāhimmi ।। 10092 ।।
saṁpattō ujjāṇē ōyariūṇaṁ gaiṁdakhaṁdhāō । pavisē samōsaraṇē paṁcavihēṇaṁ abhigamēṇaṁ ।। 10093 ।।
dāūṇaṁ tini payāhiṇāō namiūṇa vaṁdiūṇaṁ ca । titthayara mēgadēsē uvavisai taō saparivārō ।। 10094 । ।
muṇisuvvaō vi bhayavaṁ jōyaṇavitthāriṇā pasatthēṇa । saṇa kahai dhammaṁ sadēvamaṇuyāsurasahāē ।। 10095 ।।
bajjhati jahājīvā micchattāihiṁ ṇēgahēūhi । nāṇāikāraṇēhiṁ u mucvaṁti jahā bhavāhitō ।। 10096 ।।
aha sō suvvayarāyā sōūṇaṁ dhammadēsaṇaṁ pahuṇō । paḍibuddhō namiūṇaṁ jōṛiyahatthō bhāi sāmi ॥। 10097।।
jaha cēva dukkharūvō kahiō tumhēhi ēsa saṁsārō । taha cēva majjhahiyaē paḍihāsai sāmi ! nibbhataṁ ।। 10098 । ।
tā jāva niyaṁ puttaṁ dakkhaṁ nāmēṇa appaṇō ṭhāṇē । ṭhāvēmi rajjabhāruvvahaṇakaē tāva āgaṁtuṁ ।। 10099।।
ginhāmi tumha pāsē dikkhaṁ nīsēsadukkha niṭṭavaṇaṁ । tō āha bhuvaṇanāhō kiccamiṇaṁ ciya vivēīṇa ।। 10100॥
aha sō suvvayarāyā namiūṇa jiṇaṁ taō samuṭu uṁ । āgacchai niyabhavaṇē hakkārai niyasuyaṁ dakkhaṁ ।। 10101 ।।
akkhēuṁ tassa purō niyabhāvaṁ taṁ ṭhavēi rajjammi । saṁvahiūṇa sayaṁ puṇa āruhiṇaṁ pavarasibiyaṁ ।। 10102 ।।
dakkhēṇa nariṁdēṇaṁ ārūḍhēṇaṁ gaiṁdabaṁdhammi । aṇugammamāṇamaggō gaṁtūṇa jiṇidapāsamma ।। 10103 ।।
paṁcahi nariṁdanaṁdaṇasaēhiṁ saha ginhaē taō dikkhaṁ । sikkhaṛa jaīṇa kiriyaṁ thērasamīvē paḍhai suttaṁ ।। 10104 ।।
bhayavaṁ pi tattha ṭhāuṁ kai vi diṇē bhaviyalōyavōhavā । tattō kuṇai vihāraṁ annēsuṁ gāmanagarēsu ।।10105 ।।
aha khaṁdagaaṇagārō kamēṇa ahigayasamaggasuttatthō । gīyatthō saṁjāō sūripaē sāmiṇā ṭhavaō ।। 10106।।
tēṇa saha dikkhiyāī sayāī paṁca vi naridaputtāṇa । tassēva ya parivārē samappiyāī jagappahr̥ṇā ।। 10107 ।।
bhaṇiō ya sō jiṇēṇaṁ jahāsamāhīē gāmanayarēsu । kuṇamāṇōpaḍibōhaṁ bhaviyāṇa tumaṁ pavitrāhi ।। 10108 ।।
aha sō khaṁdagasūrī aṇujāṇāvara jiṇidamappāṇaṁ । gamaṇatthaṁ kuṁbhakārakaḍanāmaē tattha ।। 10109 ।।
ciṭṭhai tassa puraṁdarajasābhihāṇā sahōyarā bhaiṇī । ḍaṁḍaiṇā naravaiṇā pariṇīya patthaṇāpuvvaṁ ।। 10110॥
tīsē parivārassa ya paḍibōhr̥ppayaṇaṁ samīhaṁtō । tattō siri muṇisuvvayasāmī taṁ ēvamāhaṁsu ।। 10111 । ।
jaha tattha tumha khaṁdaga! uvasaggō māraṇaṁtiō atthi । sō vinnavai jiṇidaṁ bhayavaṁ ! ārāhagā amhē ।। 10112।।
tattha bhavissāmō kina ? ērisaṁ kahaha amha pasiūṇa | sāhēi taō bhayavaṁ tumamēkkaṁ khaṁdaga ! vimōttuṁ । । 10113 ॥
paṁca visayā muṇīṇaṁ anē ārāhagā bhavissaṁti । tō khaṁdagēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ēttimēttāṇa sāhūṇaṁ ॥ 10114।।

314
khaṁdagasūrikā
ārāhaṇā bhavissai jai tatthagayāṇa ki na mē laddhaṁ ? । iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tō kuṁbhakārakaḍapaṭṭaṇābhimuhā ।।10115 ।।
caliō khaṁdagasūrī niyaparivārēṇa saha samaggēṇa । bhayavaṁ pi bhavivaggaṁ paḍibōhai tattha paidiyahaṁ ।। 10116 ।।
annamma vāsarē aha puraṁdarajasā samaṁ pariyaṇēṇa । niyanayarāō pattā nahamaggēṇaṁ jiṇasamīvē ॥। 10117 ।।
sādikhiyā bhagavayā tō gaṇaharamalliṇā jiṇō puṭṭhē । kaha bhūmigōyarī viha puraṁdarajasā imā ēttha । 10118 ।
nahamaggēṇāyāyā aha bhayavaṁ tassa sāhai sakhvaṁ । puraō savimhayāē sadēvamaṇuyāsurasahāē || 10119 ।।
sāvatthīē purīē jiyasattu nāma atthi naranāhō । sō paramasammadiṭṭhī jiṇadhammaviyāraaikusalō ।। 10120॥
tassannayā tahāvivibuhajaṇēhi samaṁ kuṇaṁtassa | jiṇadhammassa viyāraṁ samāgaō vālagō nāma ।। 10121 ।।
ḍaṁḍaṇā naravaṇā paṭṭaviō kuṁbhakārakaḍapaṇā । paḍihārēṇēsa taō kahiō jiyasattanaravaiṇō || 10122 । ।
tēṇa virannā jāmāuyassa purisōtti gōravassuciō । bhaṇiūṇa dāravālāu jhatti mōyāviō ēsō ।। 10123 ।।
sō kauciyapaḍivattī rannā saṁbhāsiō khaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ । tēṇa vi sasāmisaṁdiṭṭhamaggaō tassa parikahiyaṁ ।। 10124 । ।
jiyasattuṇā virannā paḍivayaṇaṁ tassa taduciyaṁ dinaṁ । puṇapatthuō viyārō dhammassa nivēṇa pāraddhō ।। 10125 ।।
sō vālagō puṇa mahāmicchadiṭṭī jiṇidadhammassa । nāhiyavāittēṇaṁ paḍisēhaṁ kāumārī ।। 10126 ।।
rannā vēkkhiō sō na kiṁ pi paccuttaraṁ kayamimassa । gōraviō jāmāuyapurisō ēsō tti citēuṁ ।। 10127 ।।
ēmēva visajjēuṁ pāraddhō kāriūṇa sammāṇaṁ । ētthaṁtarammi khaṁdagakumarō nivasannihinisanna ||10128 ।।
accatasammadiṭṭī jīvāipayatthaladdhaparamatthō । bhāviyacittō accatamarahaō āgamagirāhi ।। 10129 ।।
jiṇadhammapakkhavāyaṁ vahamāṇō tassa nidamasahaṁtō । ēkkēkkēṇa vālagavayaṇāī aṇēgajuttīhi ||10130 ।।
ūhiṁ yadi tāgaēhiṁ dūsaē tahā kaha vi । jaha sō vālagamaruō paṇaṭṭapaccuttarō jāō ।। 10131 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pāsaṭṭiēhiṁ ugghumēri jhatti । bahuvārāō jaha jayai sāsaṇaṁ jiṇavarassa jaē ।। 10132।।
aha sō vālagamaruō vilakkhahiyaō vivannamuhavannō । pagalaṁtasēyasalilō vilajjiō niggaō tattō । 10133 ।
gururōsa muvvahaṁtō rāyasuē khaṁdagammi kumarammi । pattō niyapahr̥pāsē sāhai jiyasattupaḍivayaṇaṁ ।। 10934 ।।
khaṁdagakumarēṇa taō paḍivannā majjha aṁtiē dikkhā । sō umaē sūripaē saṁpai saṁṭhāviō saṁtō ।। 10935 ।।
ētō ṭhāṇāhitō vaccatō kuṁbhakārakaḍanayarē । muddhōvālagamarugassa puvvarōsaṁ vahaṁtassa ।। 10136 ।।
tō tēṇa sāhasamuciyabhūmipaēsēsu nayarabāhimmi । savvattō viṇihittā āuhanivahā adīsaṁtā ।। 10937 ।।
khaṁdagasūrī vitaō saṁpattō tattha bāhirūjjāṇē । nāūṇa ḍaṁḍainivō sakalattō vaṁdaṇanimittaṁ ॥ 10138 । ।
asarafabhūīē viṇiggaō vaṁdiūṇa viṇaṇa । taṁ sūri sapariyaṇaṁ uvaviṭṭhō uciyadēsammi ।। 10939 ।।
khaṁdagamuṇīsarēṇa vi pāraddhā dhammadēsaṇā kāuṁ । naduvivēyā jīvā suhābhikaṁkhāē taṁ kiṁ pi ।। 10140 ।।
kammaṁ samāyatī iṁdiyavasavattiṇō visayagiddhā । aniruddhakasāyagaṇā agaṇiyaparapāṇapīḍā ya ।।10141 ।।
jēṇuvaciṇakammā naragāisu vēyaṇāsamugdhāyaṁ । visahaṁtā savvattō kālamaṇataṁ bhamaṁti bhavē ।। 10142 ।।
tō laddhavivēēhiṁ purisēhi garuttavantē hi । savvēhiṁ payārēhiṁ dhammō cciya hōi kāyavvō ।। 10143 ।।
paramatthaō u sō uṇa dhammō parapāṇapīḍapariharaṇaṁ । iccāi sūrikahiyaṁ dhammaṁ sōūṇa savvō vi । । 10144 । ।
rāyāīō lōō raṁjiyacittō aīva saṁjāō । tō paṇamiūṇa sūri samuṭṭhiō niyagihammi gaō ।। 10145 ।।
rāyā. vi pasaṁsaṁtō sūriguṇē āgaō niyāvāsē । tō vālagamarugēṇaṁ ēgaṁtaṁ maggiūṇa nivō । 10146 ।

vīsaṁbhagayaṁ saṁtaṁ mārēūṇaṁ tumaṁ taō rajjaṁ । tujjha gahissai niyamā jamhā ēyassa pāsammi ।। 10150।।

ruṇa taō sō cciya āiṭṭhō vālagō naridēṇa । jaṁ ki pi uciyamēsi taṁ kuṇaha tumaṁ sayaṁ cēva ।। 10158।।

āgaṁtūṇaṁ taṁ kuṁbhakārakaḍanayara maggiṇā savvaṁ । sajaṇavayaṁ sanaravaī sabālagaṁ cēva niḍḍahai ॥। 10212 ।।
sō tēttiō vidēsō daḍḍhō saṁtō surēṇa savvō vi । jāō jaṇammi ḍaṁḍayaarannamiya nāmadhēēṇa ॥। 10213।।
i kahiyami bhagavayā saṁdēvamaṇuyāsurā vi sā parisā । khaṁdagasīsāṇa khamāguṇēṇa vimhiyamaṇā saṁtī ।। 10214 ।।
niyasīsāiṁ dhuṇaṁtī mauliyapāṇī karēi paṇivāyaṁ । tēsi muṇivasabhāṇaṁ tahā vi sāhiyasakajjāṇaṁ ।। 10215 ।।

tattha bahuyāvi maṇuyā paribhāvēṁtā tahāvihasarūvaṁ । saṁsārassa virattā dikkhaṁ ginhati jiṇapāsē ।। 10217।।
hs fretthā viṭhiyā niyamaṁ ginhaṁti kōvakaraṇassa । vērāṇubaṁdhapariṇāmasaṁkiyā kaṁpamāṇamaṇā ।। 10218।।
aha muṇisuvvayasāmī tattō annēsu gāmanayarēsu । kuṇai kamēṇa vihāraṁ paḍibōhaṁtō bhaviyavaggaṁ ॥। 10219 ।।

ujjāṇavālaēṇaṁ gaṁtuṁ vaddhāviō ō jhatti । titthayarāgamaṇanivēyaṇēṇa dakkhō mahārāyā ।। 10221 ।।

gaṁtūṇa tattha hatthikkhadhāō ōyarēi dūrāō । pavisēi samōsaraṇē paṁcaviṇaṁ abhigamēṇaṁ ॥। 10224।।

taṁ sōūṇaṁ bahavē saṁbuddhā pāṇiṇōṁ vayaṁ kē vi । dēsavirahaṁ ca kēvi sammattaṁ kē vi paḍivannā ।। 10227।।

kattiyasēṭṭhi kahā --
sō māsaṁ māsēṇaṁ khaviūṇa sayā vi pāraṇaṁ kuṇai । tō tassa nayaralōō āuṭṭō kuṇai bahubhatti ।। 10233।।
pavisai pāraṇahēuṁ jammi dinē ēsa nayaramajjhammi । taiyā niyaniyaṭhāṇāō uṭṭhiūṇaṁ nayaralōō ।। 10234 ।।
gurusaṁbhamēṇa paṇamai taṁ caraṇōvari nihittaniyasīsō। bhamaṛa ya paṭṭivilaggō tavēṇa raṁjiyamaṇō tassa । । 10235 ।।
tattha tthitayā sēṭṭhī kattiyanāmō pabhūyavihavapahū । nāṇāmaṇirayaṇahirannamāipaḍipunnabhaṁḍārō ॥। 10236।।
abhuddhārō dīṇāṇāhāi jaṇāṇa suddhavavahārō | rāyāimāṇaṇijjō samagganēgamaṇapahāṇī ॥। 10237।।
aiparamasammadiṭṭhī jiṇindasāsaṇaviyāraviulamaī । jāṇiyajīvājīvō suviṇicchiyapunnapāvō ya । । 10238।।
āsavasaṁvaranijjaracaurō kusalō ya baṁdhamōkkhēsu । taha aṭṭhimijapē mmāṇurāyarattō jiṇamayammi ।। 10239।।
jaha sō sasuriṁdēhiṁ vi dēvēhiṁ jiṇidabhaṇiyadhammāō । cālēuṁ nō tīrai mēru vva mahāsamīrēhiṁ ॥। 10240 ।।
vārasabhēyami visāvayassa dhammammi paikhaṇaṁ cēva । cittammi appamattō dūrapariccattamicchatō ॥। 10241 ।।
ēsōniyahadr̥ṭhiō purō vi taṁ pāsiūṇa vaccataṁ । parivāyagaṁ na bhumayāmēttaṁ pi hu nāmaē tassa ।। 10242।।
annattha khivai diṭṭhi na pēkkhaē sammuhaṁ pi ēyassa । tassuvari taō ēsō kōvaṁ parivāyagō vahai ।। 10243।।
annamma dinē rāyā jiyasattū tassa pāraṇadiṇammi । parivāyagassa pāsē vaccai paṇamai ya viṇaṇa ।। 10244॥

niyamaṁdirammi bhōyaṇakaraṇatthaṁ patthaē payattēṇa । rāyā taṁ parivāyagamēsō vi na mannaē kaha vi ।। 10245 ।।
aigaruē nibbaṁdhē kayammi rannā pabhāsaē ēsō । niva! tuha nayarapahāṇō jai sēṭṭhī kattiō nāma ।। 10246 ।।
parivēsai majjha taō karēmi tuha maṁdirammi ! pāraṇayaṁ । tō rāyā niyahiyaē citai jaha dugghaḍaṁ ēyaṁ ।। 10247।।
jaṁ ki kattiya sēṭṭhī mattūṇa jiṇidadaṁsaṇaṁ ēkkaṁ । annassa kuṇai kiṁci vitā paḍisēhēmi ēyamahaṁ ।। 10248 ।।
iya citiūṇa rannā bhaṇiyaṁ kiṁ tuha imēṇa vaṇiēṇa ? | sāmaṁtamaṁḍalīyāiṇō samīvāō annassa ।। 10249 ।।
kassa vi garuyassa ahaṁ parivēsāvēmi tujjha ahaṁ ēsō । nō mannai taṁ vayaṇaṁ tō rāyā bhaṇai taṁ bhujjō ।। 10250 ।।
parivēsēmi sayaṁ ciya tujjha ahaṁ muyaha imamasaggāhaṁ । parivāyagēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kiṁ naravara ! vayasi puṇaruttaṁ ।। 10251 ।।
ēsā majjha pannā jai sēṭṭhī kattiō sahatthēṇa । parivēsai majjha taō bhuṁjāmi gihē tuha'nnaha nō ।। 10252 ।।
tō rāyā nibbaṁdhaṁ tassa parivvāyagassa nāūṇa । micchattamōhiyamaī paḍivajjai taṁ pi tavvayaṇaṁ ।। 10253 ।।
taṁ paṇamiūṇa tattō kattiyasēṭṭhissa vaccai gihammi । sō daṭṭhaṇa naridaṁ ētaṁ abbhuṭṭiō samūhō ॥। 10254 ।।
aigaruyasaṁbhamēṇaṁ namiuṁ taṁ āsaṇē maṇunnammi । uvavēsai pariyaṇamavi jahuciyapaḍivattikaraṇēṇa ॥। 10255 ।।
sayamuvavisiuṁ tattō jōḍiyapāṇī purō naridassa । vinnavai kimajja kaō dēvēṇa mahāpasāō mē ।। 10256 ।।
niryākaṁkarassa uvariṁ jaṁ āgaṁtūṇa sapayapaumēhiṁ । mahamaṁdiraṁ pharasiyaṁ tō rāyā bhaṇai supasannō ।। 10257 ।।
mā vayaha sēṭṭhi ! ēvaṁ na kikarō taṁ si kiṁtu maha nayarē । sabuttamō si savvassa māṇaṇijjō maha duijjō ॥ 58
aibaliya bhattijuyajaṇagihammi kaiyā vi garuyapīivasā । sāmī sayamēva uvēi vimhaō kō vi iha natthi ॥59
iya jaṁpiyafmma rannā kattiyasēṭṭhī samagganiyavihavaṁ । āūṇaṁ ḍhōyai puraō jiyasattunō rannō ।। 10260 ॥
faras jōḍiyakarō jaha dēvō garuya'ṇuggahaṁ kāuṁ । ginhau samaggamēyaṁ jamhā amhēccayaṁ savvaṁ ॥। 10261 ।।
jīviya kuṭuṁbavihavappamuhaṁ dēvassa cēva paṁḍibaddhaṁ । tō kō vi iha vigappō hōi na dēvēṇa kāvvō ।। 10262 ।।
tō jaṁpaṛa naranāhō sēṭṭhi ! tumaṁ jārisa samullavasi । taṁ tārisa ciya dhuvaṁ thēvaṁ pi na annahā ēttha ।। 10263 ।।
kiṁtu jayā uppajjai kaci vi kajjaṁ tahāvihaṁ tajhyā । bhaṁḍāriyāu davvaṁ niyayāu vi ginhaē sāmī ।। 10264
kajjēṇa viṇā vi puṇō vattaṁ pi na tassa pucchai kayā vi । taha maha paḍibaddhō cciya saṁtō ēsō samaggō vi । 10265 ।
vivō sēṭṭhi iyāṇi saṁciṭṭhau tujjha cēva pāsammi । tuha saṁtiēṇa amhē āṇākārittaṇēṇēva ।। 10266।।
saṁtuṭṭā ciṭṭhāmō sayāvitā saṁpayaṁ na kipi taē । bhaṇiyavvaṁ iha aṭṭha majjha cciya saṁtiyāṇā tē ।। 10267।।
tō vinnavai naridaṁ kattiyasēṭṭhī siraṭṭhiyakaraggō । saṁbhāvau maṁ dēvō āṇādāṇēṇa kēṇā vi ।। 10268।।
tō āha taṁ nariṁdō majjhāṇā jai taē kayā hōī । paḍhamā sēṭṭhi ! taō haṁ dēmi duijjaṁ pi tē āṇaṁ ।। 10269॥
iya jaṁpiyammi rannā sēṭṭhī savvaṁ pi taṁ vihavasāraṁ । ūsārāvēūṇaṁ tattō ṭhāvai niyaṭṭhāṇē ॥। 10270 ।।
rāyā payaṁpai taō sēṭṭhi ! kahijjau sakajjaminhi tē । sēṭṭhī jaṁpai sigdhaṁ dēvō sapasāyamāisau ।। 10271।।
tō bēi taṁ nariṁdō sayamāgamaṇē iha mha kajjamiṇaṁ । inhiciya sēṭṭhi ! jaō nimaṁtiō ciṭṭhaē sagihē ||10272 ।।
ajja maē parivāyaga khavagavarō bhōyaṇassa karaṇatthaṁ । tō mē gihamāgaṁtuṁ parivēsijjā tumaṁ tassa ।। 10273 ।।
iya sōūṇa sēṭṭī sajjō vajjēṇa tāḍiyasirō vva । jāō na kiṁ pi jaṁpai niyacittē citaē ēvaṁ ।। 10274 । ।
paralōyaviruddhamiṇaṁ rannā jiyasattuṇā samāiṭṭha । tō majjha kāumuciyaṁ saṁjāyai nō imaṁ kaha vi ।। 10275 ।।
ihalōyapabhū rāyā ruṭṭhō mē vihavajīviyaṁ harai । sammattamailaṇē puṇa paṇassaē majjha paralōō ।। 10276।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariya
316
tā iha lōganimittaṁ hārai vibuhō na kō vi paralōyaṁ । kiṁtu maē nivabhāvaṁ maṇōgayaṁ amuṇiūṇa taō । 10277।
sayamēva ucchahēuṁ āēsō patthiō naridāō । tā niyavayaṇavirōhō inhi pi na kāumuciō mē ।। 10278।।
saṁpāḍijjau saṁpai tā ēvaṁ jaṁpiyaṁ naridassa । pacchā vi jamuciyaṁ mē iha aṭṭha ē taṁ karissāmi ।। 10279 ।।
iya citiūṇa bhai sēṭṭī jaha dēva ! ēttha visayammi । jāvajjīvaṁ pi maē abhiggahō ciṭṭhaē gahiō । 10280 ।
jaha jiṇasāsaṇabajjhāṇa iyaratitthīṇa paṇamaṇāīō । viṇaō na kō vikajjō sō bhajjai saṁpayaṁ majjha । 10281 ।
parivāyagassa parivēsaṇēṇa paramēttha dēvaāēsō । majjha avilaṁdha ṇijjō karaṇijjō cēva sō tamhā ।। 10282 ।।
tō āha taṁ naridō ciṭṭhāmi ahaṁ pi ērisaṁ aṭṭha । sēṭṭi ! sayaṁ pi muṇaṁtō jaṁ kira tuha dukkaraṁ ēyaṁ ।। 10283।।
kiṁtu paraṁ dhammatthittaṇēṇa kāūṇa tujjha āsaṁgha । paḍivannō kaha vi asaggahō vi ēsō bhaē tassa ।। 10284।।
pāyacchittamiha tumaṁ karijjāsi kiṁ pitā uciyaṁ । tō sēṭṭhiṇā pabhaṇiyaṁ jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi ti ।। 10285 ।।
sēṭṭhi aṇunnavēuṁ aha tattō uṭṭhiūṇa jiyasattū । naranāhō niyabhavaṇē saṁpattō tattha samayammi || 10286।।
jāē bhōya hē hakkārēūṇa tammi nīyammi । parivāyagammi pacchā rāyāsēṇa sēṭṭhī vi ।। 10287।।
tattha gaō parivēsai bhattaṁ parivāyagassa sō u puṇō । tajjēi aṁgulīē abhikkhaṇaṁ sēṭṭhimahi ।। 10288 ।।
kira ēsa tassa bhāvō cittē parivāyagassa jaha puvvaṁ । āsi tumaṁ aithaḍḍhō samuhaṁ pi na mē palōyaṁtō ।। 10289 ।।
inhi puṇa parivēsasi tumaṁ si tā laṭṭhaō maē damiō । sēṭṭhī vi tassa bhāvaṁ imaṁ muṇaṁtō vi nō bēi ।। 10290।।
citai imaṁ sacittē ki cōjjaṁ jamihagiddhacittāṇa । bhōgēsu vivāgasudāruṇēsu jīvāṇa mūḍhāṇa ।। 10291 ।।
gēhammi vasaṁtāṇaṁ ēvaṁvihaparibhavō samubbhavai । sammattamailaṇāē jaṇaō māṇasiyaduhahēū ।। 10292 ।।
tādhiddhī gahavāsē saṁvasaṇaṁ laddhavaravivēyāṇa । sō cēva gaṁgadattō pasaṁsaṇijjō paraṁ bhuvaṇē ।। 10293 ।।
jō caiūṇa kalattaṁ puttaṁ mittaṁ samaggagharasāraṁ । taiyā sirimuṇisuvvayasāmisamīvammi pavvaiō ।। 10294।।
jai ēvamahaṁ pi tayā kaha vi kuṇatō taōna ēyassa । ēvaṁvihassa paraparibhavassa iha bhāyaṇaṁ hōtō ।। 10295 ।।
iya citatō bhuṁjāviūṇa parivāyagaṁ tayaṁ tattō । niggaṁtūṇa gaō jiyasattunaridassa pāsammi ।। 10296 ।।
pavvajjāgahaṇatthaṁ aṇujāṇāvara imaṁ taō rāyā । kattiyasēṭṭhi pabhaṇai pavajjaṁ vajjiūṇēkkaṁ ।। 10297।।
annaṁ vinnavasu tumaṁ jaṁ ki pi maṇassa tujjha paḍihāi । bhuvaṇammi vijjamāṇaṁ tu dulahaṁ pitahā tayaṁ jhatti ।। 10298 ।।
saṁpāḍēmi ahaṁ tu vinavai puṇō vi taṁ nivaṁ sēṭṭhī । pavvajjaṁ mōttūṇaṁ paḍihāi na kipi maha annaṁ ॥। 10299।।
tō bhai taṁ nariṁdō maē vi paḍisēhiyā imā paḍhamaṁ । āha nivaṁ puṇa sēṭṭhī niyapaḍivannaṁ pi kaha dēvō ।। 10300
nō saṁpāss inhi paḍisēhai jāva iya payattēṇa । tō āha nivō sēṭṭhi ki paḍivannaṁ maē kahasu ।। 10301 ||
tō vinavē sēṭṭī gaēṇa maha maṁdirammi dēvēṇa । parivāyagaparivēsaṇavisaē dētēṇa āēsaṁ ॥। 10302 ।।
pāyacchittanisēvaṇamaṇunāyaṁ majjha niyamuhēṇēva । tō āha nivō sēṭṭhi cara pāyacchittamicchāē । 10303 ।।
tattha na paḍisēhamahaṁ thēvaṁ pi karēmi tujjha varasēṭṭhi ! । aha sēṭṭhī āha nivaṁ imassa mē niyamabhaṁgassa ।। 10304 ।।
pavvajjā cēva bhavē pāyacchittaṁ na kiṁ pi annayaraṁ । tō rāyā nibbaṁdhaṁ nāūṇa imaṁ visajjē ||10305 |
aha rannānnāō kattiyasēṭṭhī samuṭṭhi tattō । hiṭṭhamaṇō namiūṇaṁ nivadaṁ niyamaṁdirē vayas ।। 10306 |
āpucchai sakuḍu baṁ tayaṇunnāō taō kuṛa bammi | ṭhāvēi jēṭṭhaputtaṁ kārai jiṇamaṁdirēsu taō || 10307॥
savvēsu pavarapūyaṁ dīṇāṇāhāiyāṇa dāṇāī | dāvēi jahicchāē pabhāvaṇaṁ kuṇai jiṇadhammē ||10308।।
sammāṇai suhisaṇaṁ āhārēṇaṁ cauvviṇāvi । vatthēhi ya paḍilābhai bhattijuō sayalasaṁgha pi ।। 10309 ।।

320
kattiyasēṭṭhikahā
iccāidhammakiccē tēṇa viṇimmāviyammi savvammi । muṇisuvvaō vi arahā samōsaḍhō tattha āgaṁtuṁ । 10310।
nāūṇa jiṇāgamaṇaṁ kattiyasēṭṭhī pamōyapaḍahacchō । niggacchai nayarāō niyayāē savvaiḍḍhīē ।। 10311 ।।
gaṁtūṇa samōsaraṇē pavisēuṁ paṁcavihaabhigamēṇa । tipayāhiṇīkarēuṁ namiūṇa jiṇaṁ saparivāraṁ ।। 10312 ।।
uciyadvāṇaniviṭṭha dhammuvaēsaṁ taō nisāmēuṁ । nēgamasahassasahiō paḍibuddhō ginhaē dikkhaṁ ।। 10313/
sirimuṇisuvvayapahr̥ṇō pāsē kiriyaṁ jaīṇa sikkhēuṁ । thērāṇa aṁtiē paḍhai āgamaṁ paramaviṇaṇa ।। 10314 ।।
kavaivayadiṇapajjatē hatthiṇauranayaraō tijayanāhō । bahiyā jaṇavayamajjhē viharai bhaviē vibōhaṁtō ।। 10315 ।
aha gaṁgadattasāhū paḍhiḍaṁ ēkkārasēva aṁgāī । māsaṁ vihiyāṇasaṇī samāhisahiō marēūṇa ॥। 10316 ।।
sukkammi dēvalōē jāō dēvō mahiḍḍisaṁpanna । kattiyasāhū saha jiṇavarēṇa dēsēsu viharatō ।। 10317 ।
aṁgāī samaggā vi ahijjiūṇaṁ viyāṇiyatayatthō । saṁjāō gīyatthō aha bārasavāsapariyāō ।।10318 ।।
kayavivihatavōkammō saṁlihiyappā taō kayāṇasaṇō । kālaṁ kāūṇa samāhisaṁjuō paḍhamakappammi ।। 10319 ।।
kappā hivaī jāō battīsavimāṇasayasahassa pahū । dō sāgarōvamāū kulisakarō tiyasagaṇapaṇaō ।। 10320 ।।
jēṇa parivāyagēṇaṁ nivaī bhaṇiūṇa kattiō sēṭṭhī । bhattaparivēsaṇaṁ kāriō balā appaṇī puvvi ।। 10321 ।।
āvajjiyābhiōgiyakammō mariūṇa sō samppannō | abhiōgiyadēvēsuṁ tassēva ya vāhaṇattāē ॥। 10322 ।।
līlāē vilasaṁtō iṁdaniōgiyasurēhiṁ sō bhaṇiō । bhō ērāvaṇa ! pavaraṁ kariṇō rūvaṁ viubvēhi ।। 10323 ।।
jaha āruhai suridō tāhē nāūṇa sō vibhaṁgēṇa । nāṇēṇa dēvarāyaṁ taṁ kattiyasēṭṭiṇō jīvaṁ ।। 10324 ।।
faras karirūvaṁ haḍhēṇa bhaṇiō taō viubvē । dō kuṁjararūvāī taō suridō viyāṇēuṁ ।। 10325 ।।
ē rāvaṇamanabhāvaṁ sayaṁ pi kāūṇa dōnni ruvāī | dōsu vi kuṁjararūvēsu tēsu āruhai sigdhaṁ pi ।। 10326॥
ēvaṁ jāvaiyāiṁ kuṁjararūvāī sō viubvē । sakkō vi tēttiyāī niyarūvāī viuvvēuṁ ।। 10327।।
ārōha savvēsu vi tēsu taō tassa aisayappasaraṁ । daṭṭhūṇa kiṁci ruṭṭhō tāḍai vajjēṇa taṁ sīsē ।। 10328।।
tagghāyavēyaṇāē bhīō pacchā samujjhiyaviyārō । sāhāviyakhvēṇaṁ ṭhiō parinnāyaparamatthō ।। 10329।।
bhayavaṁ piṁ viharamāṇō kamēṇa pattō purammi bharuyacchē । rēvānaitīraṭhiē tassa ya nayarassa bāhimmi ।। 10330 ।।
puvvuttaradisibhāē surēhiṁ nimmāviē samōsaraṇē । majjhammi tattha ṭhaviē maṇimaya sīhāsaṇē ruirē ।। 10331 ।।
uvaviṭṭhō bhuvaṇagurū dhammaṁ vāgarai maharavāṇīē । suranaratiriyāṇaṁ jugavamēva mōhaṁ haraṁtīē ।। 10332 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi pattō rāyā jāṇiyajiṇēsarāgamaṇō । tattha jiyasattunāmō savvāē niyavibhūīē || 10333।।
sō uciyavihāṇēṇaṁ namiūṇa jiṇēsaraṁ purō tassa । uvavisai jōḍiyakarō uvauttō suṇai tavvayaṇaṁ ।। 10334।।
aha jēṭhō gaṇahārī mallīnāmēṇa avasaraṁ lahiuṁ । āpucchai titthayaraṁ jaha bhayavaṁ iha samōsaraṇē ।। 10335।।
suranaratiriyagaṇāṇaṁ aṇēgakōḍīsaēhiṁ paḍipunnē । sammattamabbhuvagayaṁ kiṁ parimāṇēhiṁ jīvēhiṁ ।। 10336 ।।
saṁsāramahājalahīsaṁkhittō kēhi attaṇō vihiō । kēhiṁ va bhāyaṇamappā jahuttarāṇaṁ suhāṇa kaō ।। 10337।।
tō āha bhuvaṇanāhō' tahāvihēṇaṁ auvvajīvēṇa । nō kēṇai ēgaṁ ciya mōttuṁ jiyasattunivaturayaṁ ।। 10338।।
tō jiyasattū rāyā jaṁpai jaha bhuvaṇanāha! acchariyaṁ । pucchēyavvaṁ ciṭṭhai tumha samīvē maē ēyaṁ ।। 10339
āsarayaṇē vilaggō nīhariūṇaṁ ahaṁ niyagihāō । ētō mahiḍḍhikaliyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa purō samōsaraṇaṁ ।। 10340 ॥
ōruhiuṁ turayāō payacārēṇaṁ payaṭṭaō ēttha । āgaṁtuṁ jāva taō sayalajaṇāṇaṁdasaṁjaṇaṇi ॥ 10341 ।।
mahuraṁ phuḍakkharatthaṁ sajalamahāmē gajjiraravasarisaṁ । nisuṇatō tumha giraṁ sō amha turaṁgamō jhatti ।। 10342।।

ānaṁdapūriyamaṇō jāō ūsaviyarōmakūvataṇū । dhārāhayaṁ va kusumaṁ kayaṁbaviḍavissa vāsāsu ।। 10343।।
paharisapagalaṁtajalappavāhanayaṇō nimīliyacchijuō । nikkaṁpakaṁnnajuyalō kaṁci vi kālaṁ ṭhiō turaō ।। 10344 ।।
tattō dhammāyannaṇadiṇṇuvaōgō samāgaō saṇiyaṁ । samavasaraṇassa tōraṇasamīvadēsammi tattha taō ॥। 10345 ।।
aṇuvamāṇa kaṁci vi navavimhayarasavisēsamaṇusamayaṁ । gaṁbhīrēṇa mahurassarēṇa hēsārakhaṁ kāuṁ ।। 10346 ॥
aggimajaṁghājuyalaṁ nivēsiūṇaṁ vasudharāvīḍhē । taha saha sirōharāē dhariūṇa siraṁ mahiyaladdhē ॥। 10347 ।।
tattō kayappaṇāmō tahaṭṭiō cēva ēsa acchēu । āḍhattō sāhaṁtō vva bhāvaṁ mannaggayaṁ niyayaṁ ।। 10348 । ।
taṁ tārisassarūvaṁ tāhē amhē palōiuṁ mahayā । kōūhalēṇa pūriyahiyayā iha āgayā jhatti ।। 10349॥
tumha payajuyalapāsē sāhau bhayavaṁ taō kimēyaṁ ? ti । tō bhagavayā pabhaṇiyaṁ sōma ! samāyannasu sacitta ।। 10350 ।।
sāgaradattasēṭṭhi kahā --
ētthēva bharahavāsē pōmiṇisaṁḍaṁ ti atthi varanayaraṁ । tattha jiṇadhammanāmō saḍḍhō parivasai vihavaḍḍhō । । 10351 ।।
tassa ya mittō sāgaradattō nāmēṇa tassa nayarassa । savvassa pahāṇayarō savihavajiyavēsamaṇasāmī ।। 10352 ।।
saralō parōvayārī dīṇāṇāhāivacchalō niccaṁ । jiṇadhammasāvaēṇaṁ saha jāi jiṇālaē ēsō ।। 10353।।
tattha samuvāgaē sāhuṇō ya bhattīē pajjuvāsēṛa । dhammaṁ āyannai annayā ya nisuṇai imaṁ gāhaṁ ।। 10354 ।।
jō kāravēi paḍimaṁ jiṇāṇa jiyarāgadōsamōhāṇa । sō pāvai annabhavē bhavamahaṇaṁ dhammavararayaṇaṁ ।। 10355 ।।
ēyaṁ gāhaṁ savaṇaṁtarālasaṁpattamēttamēvēō । niyahiyaē saṁṭhāvai ginhai paramatthabuddhīē ॥। 10356।।
akkhēvēṇa taō sō kārai kaṁcaṇamayaṁ jiṇappaḍimaṁ । nivvattēi paṭṭāvaṇaṁ ca tīsē vibhūīē ।। 10357 ।।
tēṇa ya bāhiṁ nayarassa tassa puvvaṁ pi kāriyaṁ atthi । ruddāyayaṇaṁ ēgaṁ tattha pavittāruhaṇadiyahē ।। 10358 ।।
pavva ēhiṁ puvvaṁ pi saṁciyā ghayaghaḍā maḍhāhiṁtō । kaḍḍhēuṁ āḍhattā pūraṇakajjēṇa liṁgassa ॥। 10359।।
tēsu ya ghaḍēsu ghayatisu ciṭṭhēti hēṭṭhaō laggā । piṁḍībhūyā uddēhiyā bahū tāō tēhitō ।। 10360।।
nivaḍaṁti mēiṇitalē tattō paḍiyāō tāō maggammi । caṁpaṁti saṁcaraṁtā tē pavvaiyā sapāēhi ।। 10361 ।
nihaṇaṁ nēti ya tattō sāgaradattō dayārasiyacittō । vatthaṁcalēṇa maggāō dūramōsāriḍaṁ nēi ॥। 10362।।
tō ēgō jaḍahārī taṁ taha uddēhiyāō rakkhataṁ । pēkkhēūṇaṁ rōsāruṇāṇaṇō karaṇaghāēhi ।। 10363 ।।
uddēhiyāṇa puṁjaṁ ēgaṁ daliūṇa jaṁpaē ēvaṁ । inhi sēyavaḍō iva dayāvarō taṁ si saṁvr̥ttō ॥ 10364 ॥
tāhē sō vāṇiyagō sāgaradattō vilakkhaō jāō । paramāyariyassa mahābhimuhaṁ pēkkhēumāḍhatō ।। 10365।।
tēṇa vi taṁ tavvayaṇaṁ suṇamāṇēṇa vi na kiṁ pi sō bhaṇiō। ēmēva avannāē gamiūṇaṁ saṁṭhiō mōṇaṁ ॥। 10366॥
sāgaradattēṇa taō vicitiyaṁ natthi nūṇamēēsi । jīvadayāpariṇāmō na sōhaṇaṁ dhamma'ṇudvāṇaṁ ।। 10367 ।।
tappa bhai tassa tēsi pavvaiyāṇuvari savvahābhattī । uttinnā kiṁtu paraṁ ciraparicayajāyadakkhinnō ।। 10368 ।।
ēmēvuvarōhēṇaṁ dāṇapaṇāmāiyammi vavahārē । tēsi paṭṭai imō sāgaradattō pavaravaṇiō ।। 10359 ।।
sammattamapattō vi hu payaīē dāṇasīlayākaliō । aigaruyāraṁbhapariggahēsu sayayaṁ pasattamaṇō || 10370।।
niyagharasārapavitthara suhisayaṇakalattaputtamittēsu । paḍibaddhamāṇasō aisaēṇa mucchāparavasappā ||10371॥
kaiyā vaccai satthō ki bhaṁḍaṁ kattha kēttiyā bhūmī । kō kayavikkayakālō nivvisaī kiṁ kahiṁ kēṇa ।। 10372 ।।
iccāiasuhaajjhavasāyaparō āuyakkhaē marijaṁ । turayattēṇuvavannō tuha vāhaṇamēsa saṁjāō ।। 10373॥
tumaē sahāgaō iha sōūṇaṁ dhammadēsaṇaṁ majjha । ēyassa mōhagaṁṭhī galiō sammattamuppannaṁ ॥। 10374।।
paccakkhāṇaṁ thūlagapāṇavahāīṇa vihiyamēēṇa । jāvajjīvaṁ pi sacittavatthuniyamō tahā gahiō ।। 10375।।

322
āsāvabōhatitthavarṇa
appā jattarāṇaṁ kallāṇaparaṁparāṇamēēṇa । vihiō bhāyaṇamahuṇā vimōiō dukkhalakkhāṇa ।। 10376।।
ēyassa cēva paḍibōhaṇatthamahamāgaō iha purammi । naravara ! turayasarūvaṁ jamāsi puṭṭhē taē tamimaṁ ।। 10377 ।।
ēsa paēsō hōhī nīsēsāṇaṁ pi bhaviyalōyāṇaṁ । āsāvabōhatitthattaṇēṇa bhuvaṇammi vikkhāō ।। 10378 ।।
iha saṁvaliyāvihārō nāmēṇa bhavissaē jiṇāyayaṇaṁ । āgāmiyammi kālē sudaṁsaṇāvihiyasannijjhaṁ ॥। 10379 ।।
iyaka (hi) yammi bhagavayā sadēvamaṇuyāsurāē parisāē । dhannō tti kayatthō tti ya salāhiō sō bahu āsō ।
avalōiō ya vimyaparavvasāē siṇiddhadiṭṭhīē । rannā bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavaṁ! ēsō cciya sukayamālāhi ।। 10381 ॥
āligiō samaggāhi saṁpayaṁ jaṁ sayaṁ samāgaṁtuṁ । ēyassuvari pasāō sāmi ! taē ēttiō vihiō ।। 10382 ।।
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ rannā inhi sāimmiō mamēsō tti । citēuṁ turayāō tattō pallāṇakaviyāī ।। 10383 ।।
ūsārāvēūṇaṁ niyāvarāhē khamāviūṇaṁ ca । puvvillē savvē vihu baṁdhaṇaārōhaṇāīē || 10384 ।।
sēcchāē viyaraṁtō mukkō ghōsāviyaṁ ca nayarammi । jaha ēsa dēsaviraō turaō accittabhōī ya ॥ 10385 ।।
tā paḍisēhēyavvō na ēsa kēṇāvi sagihamaṇupattō । ḍhōēyavvaṁ puraō ēyassa visēsaō cēva ।। 10386 ।।
phāsuyajalataṇapamuhaṁ tassa taō nayaravāsisavvajaṇō। turayassa āsi bhattō puvvaṁ pi jiṇidavayaṇāō ।। 10387 ।।
naravaiṇō āṇāēm̐ savisēsaṁ cēva taṁ tahā kuṇai । sō vi turaṁgō tanhāchuhābhibhūō jayā havai । । 10388 ।।
āhārakaē taiyā pavisai bhavaṇēsu nāyarajaṇassa । sō vi jaṇō tassa niyaṁ ḍhōyai puraō jalataṇāī ।। 10389 ।।
ēvaṁ jiyasattu nivassa saṁtiō sō turaṁgamō gamai । niyajammaṁ jiṇadhammaṁ sammaṁ pālataō tattha ।। 10390 ।।
annamma diṇē tatthadviyassa muṇisuvvayassa jayapahr̥ṇō । mēiṇikaṁpō jāō bhīō rāyāiō lōō ।। 10391 ।।
tō taiyapaharaaṁtē saṁjāē caramajāmasamayammi । dhammaṁ vāgaramāṇē jiṇēsarō rāiṇā puṭṭhō ।। 10392 ॥
niyapāsāyaṭhiyāṇaṁ taiē jāmammi ajja amhāṇaṁ । dōlāiyā vasumaī kamhā jayanāha ! sāhēsu ।। 10393 ।।
tō āha bhuvaṇanāhī ēgaggamaṇō nariṁda! nisuṇēsu । puhaīkaṁpassa maē kāraṇamakkhāyamāṇaṁ ti ।। 10394 ।।
viṇḍukumāramunikahā --
aṇuōgamaṇunnaviḍaṁ sūripaē suvvaō niyaviṇēō । ṭhaviūṇaṁ nayarāō rāyagihāō maē jaiyā | 10395 ।।
bāhi visajjiō bhaviyalōyapaḍibōhaṇatthamēsa tathā । viharaṁtō saṁpattō kamēṇa ujjēṇinayarīē ।। 10396 । ।
nāūṇa bhaviyalōō tamāgayaṁ tattha vaṁdaṇanimittaṁ । nayarīē nīharaṁtō niyaniya' vidēṇa hidumaṇō ।। 10397 ।।
diṭṭhō ujjēṇipurīpahuṇā sirivammanāmanaravaiṇā । tō tēṇa namuimaṁtī puṭṭhō pāsaṭṭhiō ēvaṁ ।। 10398 ।।
kattha imō jāi jaṇa akālajattāē niggaō ēttō। tō āha namuimaṁtī dēva! maē vāhiyālīē ||10399 ॥
bāhiṁ gaēṇa nisuyaṁ gōsaggē jaṇamuhāō ērisayaṁ । jaha kē vi imē samaṇā samāgayā ēttha ciṭṭhati । 10400 ।।
tāhē rannā bhaṇiyaṁ jāmō tēsi samīvamamhē vi । tō bhaṇai namuimaṁtī kiṁ tattha payaṇaṁ tumha || 10401 ।।
jai dhammasavaṇakajjaṁ tumhāṇa ahaṁ pi taṁ kahissāmi । vēēsu jahā bhaṇiyaṁ susammayaṁ savvalōyāṇa ।। 10402 ।।
tō jaṁpai naranāhō atthi imaṁ maṁti! kahasi mē dhammaṁ । vēyabhaṇiyaṁ tumaṁ pi hu kiṁtu paraṁ tē vi varasamaṇā । । 10403 ।।
daṭṭu jōggā amhāṇa saṁti taha kērisa parūvēṁti । tē niyadhammaṁ ēvaṁ amhēhi viyāṇiyavvaṁ ti ।। 10404 । ।
tō āha namaimaṁtī jai ēvaṁ tō payāu tēsi pi
hōyavvaṁ majjhatthēṇa jaṁpiyavvaṁ na kiṁ pi suhamasuhaṁ
।
pāsē dēvō kiṁ puṇa dēvēṇa gaēṇa tattha sayaṁ ॥। 10405 ।।
।
pavvaiyagaṁ tahā taṁ dhammaviyārammi pucchēu ।। 10406।।
kāuṁ niruttaraṁ tumha aggaō pāyaḍēmi tannāṇaṁ । tō maṁtivayaṇamēyaṁ paḍivajjēūṇa naranāhō ।। 10407 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
323
tēṇa samaṁ tattha gaō suvvayasūrīṇa sannihāṇammi । diṭṭhā ya sūraṇō tēṇa paḍhamasaṁpattalōyāṇa ।। 10408 ।।
dhammaṁ vāgaramāṇā aha sō nimiūṇa ēgadēsammi । uvaviṭṭhō siridhammō narēsarō namuiṇā sahiō ।। 10409 ।।
tō jhatti namumaṁtī suvvayasūri pabhāsaē ēvaṁ । bhō bhō samaṇaga ! sammaṁ jā paribhāvēmi tā tumbhē ।। 10410 ।।
aviyāṇiyaparamatthā asamikkhiyamēva kuvvaha samaggaṁ । jahā sakkhaṁ aṇuhūyamāṇaāṇaṁdasaṁdōhaṁ ।। 10411।
visayasuhaṁ caiūṇaṁ asēsapāsaṁḍidūsiō ēsō । jiṇadhammō paḍivannō visilōēṇa paricattō ।। 10412 ।।
niyaviva mujjhiūṇaṁ bhikkhā paḍigāhiyā tahā ēyaṁ । kēttiyamēttaṁ ajja vi tumhaṁ malamaliṇadēhāṇaṁ ।। 10413 ।।
asuittēṇa pisāyāgiīṇa muṁḍiyasatuṁḍamuṁḍāṇaṁ । jattha na tipurisapūyā na ya haṇaṇaṁ havvavāhassa ।। 10414 ।
na ya diyavarāṇa dāṇaṁ tattha vimūḍhā kahaṁ havai dhammō ? । iya tavvayaṇaṁ sōuṁ sūrī cintēi sō ēvaṁ ।। 10415 ।।
jaha ēsō mūḍhappā asamikkhiyabhāsaō saḍhō bāḍhaṁ । tō imiṇā saha mōṇaṁ mōttuṁ vōttuṁ na juttaṁ mē ।। 10416॥
uttaṁ ca buhō ujjū abhigammō bahasaḍhē ya apamāō । aṇukaṁpō abuhujjū abuhasaḍhō savvā hēō ।। 10417 ।।
iya citiūṇa sūrī mōṇēṇa ṭhiō taō namuimaṁtī | ciṁtēi ēsa muṁḍō saṁjāō pasihayappaḍibhō ।। 10418 ।।
sakkēi kiṁ pi dāu na uttaraṁ iya maṇē vicitēuṁ । tassuttēyaṇa hēuṁ puṇō puṇō bhaṇai taṁ cēva ।। 10419 ।।
citēi ta sūrī ēsō avahīriūṇa mukkō vi । nōvasamai khalapagaī jāva na bhaggō imassa maō ।। 10420 ।।
siṁbhō vva dujjaṇajaṇō mahurēhi pakuppaē aisaēṇa । tikkhēhiṁ ya kaḍuēhiṁ ya uvēi sō uvasamaṁ jhatti ।। 10421 ।।
iya citiūṇa sūrīhiṁ pabhaṇiō sō imaṁ namumaṁtī । ki bhō puṇō puṇō vi ya taṁ ciya palavasi asaṁbaddhaṁ ।। 10422 ।।
jai atthi vayaṇa sattī tuha kā vi taō samīhiyaṁ pakkhaṁ । kiṁ pi gahiūṇa hēuṁ tattha sadiṭṭhata mullavaha। । 19423।।
ētthaṁtarammi sūrī kēṇa vi namiūṇa niyaviṇēēṇa । saviṇayamiya vinnattō bhayavaṁ ! mā kuṇaha saṁraṁbhaṁ ॥। 10424।।
ēttiyamēttaṁ ēyassa uvari tumbhē sayaṁ jaō ēsō । mūḍhō jaḍō durappā adisaddhammaparamatthō ।। 10425 ।।
mattakarikaraḍapāḍaṇakharanaharasihō kahiṁ pi kiṁ sīhō । sajjēi niyakamaṁ niyaḍamāgaē jaṁbuyasisummi ।। 10426 ।।
tā ēttha majjha dijjau āēsō jhatti jēṇa ēyassa । nāsēmi dappasappaṁ durappaṇō daliyasattissa ।। 10427 ।।
tō guruṇāṇunnāō āḍhattō namuimaṁtiṇaṁ bhaṇiuṁ । sō ēvaṁ jaha tumaē visayāsēvā suhasarūvā ।। 10428।।
jaṁ bhaṇiyā taṁ vayaṇaṁ tujjha asaṁbaddhamēva savvaṁ pi jamhā kēsi pi samullasaṁtauttamavivēyāṇa ।। 10429।।
visayasuhaṁ visakaṁdalisarisaṁ paḍihāsaē niyamaṇammi । rōgubbhavattaṇēṇaṁ jēṇa imaṁ dāruṇavivāgaṁ ॥। 10430 ।।
ēkkkēṇa vi visayā sēvijjaṁtā haṇaṁti pāṇigaṇaṁ । tassa kaha hōi kusalaṁ jō paṁca vi sēvaē jugavaṁ ।।10431।।
uktaṁ ca kēnāpi --
।
ēkaikaśō'pi nighnanti viṣayā viṣasannibhāḥ । kṣēmī tu sa kathaṁ nu syād yaḥ samaṁ pañca sēvatē ।। 10432||
jō vihu rāgaṁdhāṇaṁ visaēsa havējja sōkkhaābhāsō । sō vi taḍiddaṁḍavilāsasālisō na cirakālaṭhiī । । 10433 ।।
uktaṁ ca-
viṣayasukhaṁ khalamaitrī sandhyārāgaḥ surēndrakōdaṇḍaṁ । kalikālayauvanaṁ jīvitaṁ ca sarvāṇyanityāni ।। 10434 ।।
hōūṇa jaṁ paṇassai suhassarūvaṁ suhaṁ na taṁ vibuhā । mannati kiṁtu bahuduhahēuttaṇaō duhaṁ cēva ।। 10435।।
uktaṁ ca--sukhāsvādalavō yō'pi saṁsārē satsamāgamāt । sa viyōgāvasānatvādāpadāṁ dhuri badhyatē ॥। 10436।।
suhamēva taṁ na bhannai suhaṁ vivēīhiṁ jamavasāṇammi । uppāyai pauraduhaṁ ti mīṇavaḍisāmisasuhaṁ va ।। 10437।।

=== vardhamanaoutput-324-to-324.json ==========================
324
viṇḍukumāramunikā
ēyaṁ pi visayasōkkhaṁ rāgāvidvattaṇēṇa taha cēva । dēi duhamihēva bhavē bhavaṁtarēsu ya niravasāṇaṁ ।। 10438 ।।
jaṁ ca taē iya bhaṇiyaṁ samaggapāsaṁḍidūsiō ēsō । jiṇadhammō tti imaṁ pi hu accatamasaṁgayaṁ cēva ।। 10439 ।।
jamhā pāsaṁḍīṇaṁ sayalāṇa vi pāṇarakkhaṇāīō । dhammō susammaō cciya ēttha na kassa vi visaṁvāō ।। 10440 ।।
uktaṁ ca--pañcaitāni pavitrāṇi sarvēṣāṁ dharmacāriṇām । ahiṁsā satyamastēyaṁ tyāgō maithunavarjanam ॥ 10441 ।।
jaṁ piya jaṁpiyamēvaṁ taē visiṭṭhēhiṁ ēsa paricattō । ēyaṁ pi savvahā vi ya arannarunnaṁ va tuha vihalaṁ ॥। 10442 ।।
jaṁ jīvadayāmaiō dhammō tēsi pi abhimaō cēva । sā jīvadayā sammaṁ jiṇadhammē cēva nannattha ।। 10443 ।।
jīvāṇaṁ paramatyō sammaṁ ētthēva najjaē jamhā । tā ēsō cciya tēsi aīvaiṭṭhō visidvāṇaṁ ।। 10444 ।।
uktaṁ ca--śrūyatāṁ dharmasarvasvaṁ śrutvā caivāvadhāryatām । ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni parēṣāṁ na samācarēt ।। 10445 ।।
jaṁ ca savihavaṁ caiūṇiccāi payaṁpiyaṁ taē taṁ tu । nō hōi dūsaṇaṁ ciya jamhā sayalāṇa vijaīṇa || 10446 ।।
lacchīcāō bhikkhābhamaṇaṁ ubhayaṁ pi sammayaṁ cēva । bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ lacchī mūlamaṇatthāṇa savvāṇa ।। 10447 ।।
jaṁ lacchijuō purisō gavvuddharakaṁdharō gurujaṇaṁ pi । pāsaṭṭhiyaṁ na pāsai na bēi na suṇēi paravayaṇaṁ ।। 10448 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca -- suivāidiṭṭiharaṇē narāṇa lacchīē kō visaṁvāō । janna jaṇai garalasahōyarā vi maraṇaṁ tamacchariyaṁ
nikkhinnā ya imā vaccai cirapariciyaṁ pi caiūṇa । rakkhijjaṁtī vikhaṇaṁ pi ciṭṭaē nēya nillajjā ।। 10450 ।।
lacchīsaṁgōvaṇaguttamāṇasō māṇusō na kassa vi ya। vissaṁbhai puttassa vi savvattha aṇivvuō bhamai ।। 10451 ।।
bhikkhāparibhramaṇaṁ pihū vimukkasaṁgāṇa saṁgayaṁ cēva । ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇammi pasaṁsiyaṁ imaṁ tumha vi mayammi ।। 10452 ॥
tathā cōktam-avadhūtāṁ ca pūtāṁ ca mūrkhādyaiḥ parininditām । carēnmādhukarīvr̥tti sarvapāpapraṇāśanīm ।। 10453 ।।
ēkānnaṁ naiva bhuñjīta br̥haspatisamādapi । carēnmādhukarīmēva vr̥tti mlēcchakulādapi ।। 10454 । ।
maliṇattadūsaṇaṁ pi hu tumaē uttaṁ ajuttamēvēyaṁ । dhammāṇudvāṇaparāyaṇāṇa taṁ bhūsaṇaṁ jamhā ॥। 10455 ।।
tathōktam - snānaṁ madadarpakaraṁ kāmāṅgaṁ prathamaṁ smr̥tam । tasmāt kāmaṁ parityajya na snāntīha damē ratāḥ । 10456।
aha pabhaṇasi surasaripabhiiyāsu sariyāsu majjaṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । pāvapamajjaṇamēyaṁ pi dūsiyaṁ kassaī vayaṇaṁ ।। 10457 ।।
yata uktam - - ātmā nadī saṁyamatōyapūrṇā, satyāvahā śīlataṭā dayōmiḥ ।
tatrābhiṣēkaṁ kuru rājaputra !, na vāriṇā śuddhayati cāntarātmā ॥। 10458 ।।
tumha maē vinisiddhaṁ asuittaṁ baṁbhacērajuttāṇa । ēēṇaṁ vayaṇēṇaṁ sayāsuī baṁbhayāriti ।। 10459 ।।
siratuṁḍamuṁḍaṇaṁ pihu virūvakāri tti jaṁ taē hasiyaṁ । taṁ bālavilasiyaṁ piva thēvaṁ pi hu khamai na viyāraṁ ।। 10450 ।।
jaṁ nhāṇavirahiyāṇaṁ jaīṇa sīsammi laṁbakēsammi । jūyāō hōṁti taō kaṁḍūyaṇaō viṇassaṁti ।। 10461 ।
jai vi sahijjai jūyā parīsahō kīraē na kaṁḍuyaṇaṁ । jaggaṁtēhiṁ tahā vi hu nihāvasagāṇa taṁ hōi ।। 10462 ।
ēvaṁ ca hōi na kayā jīvadayā kiṁca kēsadharaṇēṇa । hōi vibhūsā jamhā cauhā bhaṇiō alaṁkārō ।। 10463।।
kēsāṇa alaṁkārō paḍhamō bīō ya vatthalaṁkārō । mallāṇaṁ sō taiō āharaṇāṇaṁ cautthō ya ।। 10464 |
sāya vihasā juttā na hōi paricattakāmabhōgāṇa । sa vihasammi maṇussē kāmittaṁ saṁkaē lōō ।। 10465 ॥
uktaṁ ca- niḥspr̥hō nādhikārī syānnākāmī maṇḍanapriyaḥ । nāvidagdhaḥ priyaṁ brūyāt sphuṭavaktā na vañcakaḥ । 66 ।
jaṁ purisatiyaṁ tumhāṇa abhimayaṁ pūyamarihai na taṁ tu । rāgāidōsasaṁgittaṇēṇa iyarō jahā purisō ||10467॥
rāgō ya aṁgaṇāsaṁgamēṇa dōsō upaharaṇagahēṇa । mōhō u akkhamālāḍhālaṇaō najjaē tassa ।। 10468 ।।
aggahuṇaṇaṁ pi pāṇāivāyauttaṇēṇa kīrataṁ । na hu hōi dhammajaṇagaṁ tamhā ēyaṁ na karaṇijjaṁ ॥। 10469॥

aha bhasi vēyavihiyaṁ ēyaṁ jīvōvaghāyajaṇayaṁpi । sagganimittaṁ jāyai kīraṁtaṁ taṁ na jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ।। 10470 ।।
kaṇḍanī pīṣaṇī cullī udakumbhaḥ pramārjanī । pañca sūnā gr̥hasthasya tēna svargaṁ na yātyasau ।। 10471 ।।
yūpaṁ chitvā paśūn hatvā kr̥tvā rudhirakardamaṁ । yadyēvaṁ gamyatē svargē narakē kēna gamyatē ? ।। 10472 ।।
jaṁ ca taē jiṇadhammē diyadāṇābhāvadūsaṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । taṁ pi hu ummattagajaṁpiyaṁ va dūraṁ asārayaraṁ ।। 10473।।
jaṁ mōkkhakaē dāṇaṁ dēyaṁ nāūṇa saguṇapattammi । na uṇō jahā tahā vi ya taṁ puṇa nēyaṁ bhavasuhāō ॥। 10474 ।।
ēgaṁtēṇa virattaṁ vittakalattāisaṁgaparicattaṁ । samasattamittabhāvaṁ mukkamamattaṁ sadēhē vi ।। 10475 ।।
ēvaṁvihaṁ ciya jaō pattaṁ bhavasāyarē paḍatāṇa | jīvāṇa rakkhaṇakhamaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca jaō parēpi pi ॥। 10476 ।।
viṣayī viṣayāsaktaṁ sadhanaḥ sadhanaṁ gr̥hī gr̥hiṇamēva । sārambhaḥ sārambhaṁ na tulyadōṣastu tārayati ।। 10477।।
viṣayī viṣayaviraktaṁ sadhanō'stadhanaṁ gr̥hī gr̥havimuktam । sārambhō nārambhaṁ saṁśritya bhavārṇavaṁ tarati ।। 10478।।
ēē dujāiṇō visayavisāvēsanadvacēyannā । mannijjaṁti sayannēhiṁ kaha taō pattabuddhīē ।। 10479 ।।
iya juttijuttavayaṇēhiṁ na muimaṁtī niruttarō tēṇa । vihiō vilakkhahiyaō jāō ullasiya sēyajalō ।। 10480 ।।
paccakkhaṁ naravaiṇō nāyaralōyāṇagaliyamāhappō । sappō vva maṁtamaulaṁtalōyaṇō jhattisaṁvr̥ttō ॥ 10481 ॥
tuṭṭhō visilōō savvō jō āsi tattha uvaviṭṭhō । rāyā vi uṭṭhiō paṇamiūṇa sūri saparivārō ।। 10482 ।।
naī vimuṇīvara garuya paōsaṁ maṇammi vahamāṇō । uṭṭhēūṇa nariṁdēṇa saha gaō niyayamāvāsaṁ ।। 10483 ।।
sāhūṇa māraṇakaē vivihōvāē maṇē vimarisaṁtō । citai pavvaiyāṇaṁ jai tēsi māraṇanimittaṁ ।। 10484 । ।
annaṁ kaṁpi nirūvēmi kajjēsiddhī na hōi tō majjha । jaṁ tē muṇivahapāvā'bhisaṁkiō kō vi na haṇējjā ।। 10485 ।
kō vipaṭṭijja na ēttha nivaparinnāṇasaṁkiyattēṇa । kō vi payaṭṭaṁtō vihu na hōjja nihuō taō annō ।। 10486 ।।
nāūṇa kahējja narēsarassa puraō vivakkhabhūō ṇē । iccāikāraṇēhi na payaḍiyavvaṁ parassēyaṁ ।। 10487 ।।
sayamēva maē tamhā nisīha samayammi aṁgamēttēṇa । gaṁtūṇa tattha savvē tē haṇiyavvā durappāṇō ।। 10488 ।।
ēvaṁ ci majjha maṇē sahattha haṇaṇēṇa hōi parituṭṭhī । iya citiūṇa diyahaṁ sē kaha kahavi sōgamai ।। 10489 ।।
aha rayaṇīē citiyasamayammi samuṭṭhiūṇa sagihāō । namuīkhaggakaraggō viṇiggaō sō mahā pāvō ।। 10490।।
agaṇiya paralōyabhaō lajjaviṇō vimukkamajjāō । narayapuramaggapahiō nicchayaō attaṇō ahiō ।91 |
gaṁtūṇa muṇisamīvē karavālaṁ kaḍḍhiūṇa'ikarālaṁ । uppāḍai haṇaṇatthaṁ jāva taō jhatti dēvīē ।। 10492 ।।
jiṇasāsaṇabhattāē taha ṭhiō cēva thaṁbhiō ēsō । kaṭṭa ghaḍiō vva ciṭṭhai niccēṭṭhō jāva gōsaggō ।। 10493 ।।
diṭṭhō tahaṭṭiō tō sō tattha jaṇēṇa saṁcaraṁtēṇa । vimhiyamaṇēṇa tattō kahiō annē annassa ।। 10494 ।।
miliō nāyaralōō kuūhalēṇaṁ nivāilōō ya । daṭṭhūṇa tēṇa taha sō ṭhiyaō dhikkāriō dhaṇiyaṁ ।। 10495 ।
aha taṁtahā vittaṁ kāūṇa samaggalōya majjhammi । utthaṁbhiūṇa sāsaṇadēvī muṁbai namuiti ।। 10496॥
ēsō vilajjiō chaḍḍaūṇa nayariṁ viṇiggaō tattō । annanivadēsa samūhō saṁcaliō garuyakhēṇa ॥। 10497 ।।
pattō ya hatthiṇaurē nayarē paumuttarō ti asthi nivō। tassa ya jālānāmēṇa bhāriyā atthiguṇakaliyā । । 10498।।
tīsē jēṭṭhō puttō kēsarisumiṇēṇa sūiō jāō । vindukumārō nāmēṇa savvakalāpārasaṁpattō ।। 10499 ।।
duiō ya mahāpaumō caudasa sumiṇēhi sūiō jāō । sō vi kalāpāragaō tārunnaṁ maṇaharaṁ pattō ।। 10500 ।।
jēṭhō visayapivāsā vivajjiō rajjalacchivimuhō ya । sajigīsō ya kaṇiṭṭhō ṭhaviō jaṇaēṇa juvarajjē
namuī āgaṁtu mahāpaumakumārassa sēvaō tassa । saṁjāō tēṇa imō maṁtipayaṭhāviō niyaē ।। 10502।।

faugkumāramunikā
tassa mahāpaumassa ya sīhabalō nāma duṭṭusāmaṁtō । duggabalēṇaṁ dēsaṁ uvahavaṁtō na viramēi ।। 10503 ।।
puṭṭhō ya mahāpaumēṇa annayā ērisaṁ namuimaṁtī । jaha taṁ jāṇasi kaṁ ci vi uvāyamiha sīhabalagahaṇē ॥। 10504 ।।
sō jaṁpai suṭṭha ahaṁ jāṇāmi taō mahāpaumakumarō । taṁ tassuvari nirūvai pabhūyasētrēṇa saṁjuttaṁ ।। 10505 ।।
namuī vi akhaṁḍēhi gaṁtūna payāṇaēhi taddēsē । niuṇēhi uvāēhi taṁ duggaṁ saṁgahēūṇa । । 10506 ।।
saṁbhaggadappapasaraṁ sīhabalaṁ gihiūṇa hatthēṇa । ēi mahāpaumasamīvamēsa sa tuṭṭhō payaṁpēi ।। 10507 ।।
maggēhi varaṁ kiṁci vi sō bēi kumāra appaṇī pāsē । dhariūṇa tāva ēvaṁ majjha varaṁ saṁpayaṁ muyaha ।। 10508।।
kajjammi samupapannē patthēmi jayā tayā payacchējjā । kumarō vi mahāpaumō ēvaṁ hōu tti paḍivannō ।। 10509 ।।
aha annayā jiṇarahō jālāē kāriō duijjō ya । baṁbharahō lacchīē karāviō tāhiṁ dōhiṁ pi ।। 10510।।
vihiyā imā pannā jai majjha rahō na nīharai paḍhamaṁ tō । bhattapariccāyaṁ karēmi jā jīvamaviyappaṁ । । 10511 ।।
paumuttarēṇa rannā ēvaṁ nāūṇa dōnha vi jaṇīṇa । tammi samayammi nayarē paḍisiddhaṁ rahaparibbhamaṇaṁ ।। 10
ēyaṁ ca mahāpaumō nāūṇaṁ vaiyaraṁ sajaṇaṇīē । uhāvaṇa tti kāuṁ akahaṁtō cēva jaṇayassa ।। 10513 ।।
ēgāgī nayarāō nīhariūṇaṁ mahāḍavi pattō । tattha ṭhiō tāvasaāsamammi dihāī kāī pi ।। 10514 ।।
tattha ya jaṇamējayanaravaissa dhūyā samāgayā atthi । tīsē paḍhamilluyadaṁsaṇē vi jāyāṇurāyā ।। 10515 ।।
uvarimmi tassa jāō aṇurāō māṇasammi aigaruō । sā piuṇō kālanarēsarēṇa saha jāya jujjhammi ।। 10516 ।
aṁtēurāilōē palāyamāṇē disō disi vi vasē । bhīyā palāiūṇaṁ samāgayā āsamē tammi ।। 10517।।
aha kumaramahāpaumō visajjiō tāvasāṇa ahivaiṇā । tattō viṇiggaō sidhunaṁdaṇē puravarē pattō ।। 10518 ।।
tattha tayā ujjāṇiyaviṇiggayaṁ nayarasuṁdarī vaggaṁ । kīlaṁtaṁ muiyamaṇaṁ mattēṇa mahāmaidēṇa ॥। 10519 ।।
gahiuṁ pāraddhaṁ pāsiūṇa mōyāvaē gaiṁdāō । taṁ ca gaiṁdaṁ nēuṁ niyamai ālāṇakhaṁbhammi ॥। 10520 ।।
tattō tannayaranivēṇa vaiyaraṁ jāṇiūṇa taṁ savvaṁ । pariṇāviō niyaṁ kannagā sayaṁ sō pahiṭṭhēṇa ।। 10521 ।।
tāhi saha mahāpaumō visayasuhaṁ ciṭṭhaē aṇuhavaṁtō । taha vi na hiṭṭhō mayaṇāvali maṇē ēsa sumaraṁtō ।।10522 ।।
aha annayā nisāē suttōṁ sayaṇammi khayaravahūē । vēgavaī nāmāē avahariō nahayalē jaṁtō ||10523।।
paribuddhō tassa taō kahiyaṁ avahārakāraṇaṁ tīē । nēuṁ vēyaḍḍhanagē nayarē sūrudayanāmammi ।। 10524 ।।
vijjāharāhivaiṇō samappiō iṁdadhaṇubhihāṇassa । jayakaṁtaṁ niyadhūyaṁ tēṇa vi pariṇāviō ēsō ।। 10525 ।।
tī saha visayasuhaṁ aṇuhavamāṇō vi taṁ na pamhusai । mayaṇāvali khaṇaṁ pi hu taggayacittō gamai diyahē ।। 10526॥
ciṭṭhatēṇa kamēṇaṁ tēṇa taō tattha sāhiuṁ sabvē । khayaridē sēḍhīdugaāhēvaccaṁ sayaṁ gahiyaṁ ॥ 10527॥
mayaṇāvalī virahiō tahāvi na raī khaṇaṁ pi sō lahai । tō tāvasāsamē tammi ēsa pattō sayaṁ cēva ।। 10528 ।।
kaivayavijjāharavaggaparigaō tāvasēhiṁ tō tattha । phalapupphāihiṁ kayaṁ aigaruyaṁ tassa sammāṇaṁ ।। 10529 ।।
sayadhaṇusuēṇa jaṇamējaēṇa tatthēva āgaēṇa sayaṁ । sā mayaṇāvali kannā dinnā paumuttarasūyassa ||10530 ।।
ēsā ya itthirayaṇaṁ taṁ pariṇēuṁ mahāpaumakumarō । gurusāmaggīsahiō nayarē hatthiṇaurē pattō ।। 10531।।
tattha jahōciyapaḍivattikaraṇaō jaṇai jaṇaṇijaṇayāṇa । vimhu ( hu ) kumārassa ya jēṭṭabhāuṇō gasya saṁtōsaṁ
aha sō suvvayasūrīkamēṇa puhaīlammi viharaṁtō । muṇijaṇasahiō pattō hatthiṇaurabāhirujjāṇē ।। 10533।।
ujjāṇapālaēṇaṁ nivēiē sūriṇō samāgamaṇē । paumuttarō nariṁdō viṇhumahāpaumasuyasahiō ।। 10534।।

niggacchai nayarāō savvavibhūīē savvabalakaliō । vaṁdaṇahēḍaṁ sūrissa tassa bahu guṇanihāṇassa ।। 10535 ।।
tattha gaō naranāhō ōyariūṇaṁ karidakhadhāō । sapariyaṇō taṁ sūri paṇamai tipayāhiṇā - puvvaṁ ।। 10536।।
uvavisai jōḍiyakarō uciyapaēsamma sāvahāṇamaṇō । sūrī vi kahai dhammaṁ tīsē rāyāi - parisāē ।। 10537।।
bhō bhō bhavvā bhīmō bhavōyahī ēsa pāraparihīṇō । jamma- jarāmaraṇa -pabhii bhūri duhavāri - paḍahacchō । । 10538।।
pajalaṁtakōhavaḍavānalō ya vilasaṁtamāṇagarusēlō । māyāvēgabhamaṁtāvattamahābhīsaṇāyārō ॥10539॥
lōhalaharī karālō nāṇāvihavāhijalayararauddō । uṭṭaṁtaparōpparakalaha saddajāyaṁtagajjiravō ॥ 10540 ।।
tā iha gayāṇa tumhaṁ thēvaṁ pi duhassa aṁtaraṁ natthi । ghōlijjatāṇa iō taō ya niyakammalaharīhiṁ ।। 10541 ।।
cārittajāṇavattaṁ sammadaṁsaṇaguṇēhi daḍhabaddhaṁ । nāṇavarakannadhāraṁ saṁvarakillēṇa hayachiḍuṁ ।। 10542।।
vimalatavō-kammasamīrasaṁgasaṁjaṇiya - jaiṇataravēgaṁ । āruhaha taō tumbhē sigdhaṁ jaha laṁghiūṇēyaṁ ।। 10543।।
pāvaha nivvāṇapuraṁ laddhaṇa anaṁtasuhadhaṇasamiddhi । iyarassa na kassai jattha vatthuṇō patthaṇaṁ kuṇaha ॥ 10544 ।।
iya dhammadēsaṇaṁ tassa sūriṇō nisuṇiūṇa saṁviggō । vinnavai viṇayapaṇayammi matthaē ṭhaviya niyahatthō । । 10545 ।।
paumuttarō nariṁdō sūri pahu jāva appaṇō ṭhāṇē । rajjami vinhukumaraṁ ṭhavēmi tā iha samāgaṁtuṁ । । 20546 ।।
tumhāsa maṇuṭṭhēmi jaṁpaē patthavaṁ taō sūrī। juttaṁ niva ! tumha imaṁ kāuṁna khaṇaṁ pi paḍibaṁdhō ॥। 10547 ।।
aha paṇamiūṇa sūriṁ narēsarō niyagihammi gaṁtūṇa । hakkārai maṁtiyaṇaṁ samaṁ pahāṇēhiṁ purisēhiṁ ।। 10548 ।।
taha viṇḍukumārēṇa tēsi puraō taō papēi । tumhēhiṁ vi taṁ nisuyaṁ jaṁ suvvayasūriṇā kahiyē ।। 10549 ।।
ajjabhavassa sarūvaṁ ēyammi tahā mahāduhanihimmi । kaha jujjai saṁvasiuṁ laddhavivēyāṇa jīvāṇa ।। 10550 ।।
tā tubhē aṇumannaha maṁ inhi dikkhagahaṇavitayammi । viṇhukumārammi jahā ārōvēūṇa rajjabharaṁ ।। 10551 ।।
sāhēminiyasamīhiyamaha tē savvē vivinnavēti nivaṁ । dēvaṁ paralōyahiyaṁ kuṇamāṇaṁ kaha nimō ॥। 10552 ।।
tō bhai nivō viṇṇuṁ vaccha tumaṁ ginha rajjabharaminhi । ahaṁ viṇhu vayai nivaṁ dēvassa na vallahō kimahaṁ । । 10553 ।।
jaṁ rajjammi asārē narayaphalē bahukilē sanilayammi । maṁ nikkhivaha sayaṁ puṇa mōkkhaphalaṁ kuṇaha jiṇadikkhaṁ । । 54 ।।
tā ahamavi visayāṇaṁ muhamahurāṇaṁ vivāgakaḍuyāṇa । ainivviṇṇō tumhēhi sahavayaṁ ginhaissāmi ।। 10555 ।।
rajjahavimuhacittaṁ aha vinhuṁ naravarō muṇēūṇa । hakkārēūṇa mahāpaumakumāraṁ samāisai ।। 10556॥
rajjagahaṇamma tattō ēsō vinnavai vinhukumarammi । ārōvaha rajjabharaṁ tassa jahā aṇucarō hōmi ।। 10557 ।।
aha tassa kahai rāyā vindukumārō maē samaṁ caiva । ginhissai jiṇadikkhaṁ tēṇa maē taṁ si āiṭṭhō ।। 10558।
tō āha mahāpaumō jai ēvaṁ tō jamāisai dēvō । taṁ ciya majjha pamāṇaṁ iya bhaṇiē tēṇa naranāhō ॥। 10559 ।।
taṁ rajjē ahisicai sayaṁ tu cāragavimōyaṇā puvvaṁ । dīṇāṇāhāīṇaṁ dāvēūṇaṁ ca dāṇāī ।। 10560 ।।
jiṇamaṁdirēsu pūyaṁ kārāvēūṇa savvasaṁgha ca । sammāṇiūṇa tattō sa vindukumarō vibhūīē || 10561 ।।
aṇugammatō ya mahāpaumanariṁdēṇa vaccai samīvē । suvvayasūrissa taō sō vivihāṇēṇa dōnhaṁ pi ।। 10562 ।।
tēsi pi puttāṇaṁ dikkhaṁ dāūṇa dēsaṇaṁ kuṇai । jaha paramaṁgacaukkaṁ jīvāṇa imaṁ bhavē dulahaṁ ॥10563॥
paḍhamaṁ ciya maṇuyataṁ sudhammasavaṇaṁ duijjayaṁ aṁgaṁ । tassaddahaṇaṁ taiyaṁ saṁjamaviriyaṁ cautthaṁ tu ।। 10564।।
iccāidēsaṇaṁ viraiūṇa sūrimmi uvaraē saṁtē । rāyāi jaṇō savvō sūri namiuṁ saparivāraṁ ।। 10565 ।।
niya niya ṭhāṇammi gaō ēvaṁ rāyāi savvalōēṇa । vaṁdijjatō nicca kai vi diṇē tattha ṭhāūṇa ।। 10566।।

328
faugkumāramunikā
nivas aṇunnavēuṁ bahiyā annattha vaccai vihārē । ahiṇavamuṇiṇō u duhā sikkhaṁ gahiūṇa gurupāsē ।। 10567।।
vihiyāṇudvāṇaparā vijayarayā āgamaṁ ahijjatā । viharati gurūhiṁ samaṁ gāmāisu paramasaṁviggā ।। 10568।।
pannāē ujjamēṇa ya jāō thēvēhiṁ cēva diyahēhi । gīyatyō paumuttaramuṇī pavaḍḍhaṁtasuhabhāvō ।। 10569॥
sukkajjhāṇārūḍhō kamēṇa caurō vighāikammāī । khaviūṇaṁ uppāḍai lōyālōyappayāsayaraṁ ।। 10570 ।।
savvēsu vi davvēsuṁ khēttē savvammi savvakālēsu । savvēsu vi bhāvēsuṁ appasihayamaparivaḍiyaṁ ca ।। 10571 ॥
vimalamaṇaṁtaṁ nāṇaṁ tahā mahāpauma mēiṇīvaiṇō । āuhasālāē cakkarayaṇamuppannamaipavaraṁ ॥। 10572।।
taṁ pūiūṇa vihiṇā tēṇēva ya daṁsiēṇa maggēṇa । gaṁtūṇa sayalabharahaṁ sāhēuṁ kuṇai appavasaṁ ।। 10573 ।।
tō ēi hatthiṇaurē paumuttararāyavāriyāṇa purā । jiṇarahabaṁbharahāṇaṁ majjhāō jiṇarahaṁ ēsō ॥। 10574 ।।
bhāmēi tammi nayarē sayalammi taō mahāvibhūīē । jaṇaṇī maṇōrahēṇaṁ saha vuḍhi nēi jiṇadhammaṁ ।। 10575 ।।
tattō bahuō vi jaṇō taṁ paḍivajjai jiṇidavaradhammaṁ । cakkī vikārai mahiṁ savvaṁ jiṇabhavaṇaramaṇijjaṁ ।
paumuttarō vi sāhū kālaṁ kēvaiyamēva pālēuṁ । kēvaliṇō pariyāyaṁ bhavōvagāhīṇi kammāī ।। 10577 ।।
cattāri vi jugavaṁ ciya khaviūṇēgēṇa caiva samaēṇa । sivamayalamarūvamaṇaṁta makkhayaṁ vaccaē ṭhāṇaṁ ।। 10578 ।।
viṣkumārō u muṇī nāūṇa asāsayaṁ balaṁ jīyaṁ । aṇujāṇāvēi guruṁ uggatavō kammakaraṇatthaṁ ।। 10579।।
suvvayaguruṇā vi imō hōhī ārāhagō tti nāūṇa । aṇunnāō kuṇai tavaṁ aṁgā maṁdaranagē gaṁtuṁ ।। 10580 ।।
jē kē vitavisēsā viṇimmiyā tēṇa vinhaṇā taiyā । tēsi majjhāō kaivayāṇa nāmāī vōcchāmi ।। 10581 ।।
kaṇagāvali rayaṇāvali muttāvali sīha kīliyaṁ duvihaṁ । bhaddā ya mahābhaddā paḍimā bha uttarā taha ya ।। 10582 ॥
nēō āyaṁbilavaḍḍhamāṇanāmō tahā tavavisēsō | guṇarayaṇasaddapuvvō saṁvaccharanāmadhējjō ya ।। 10583॥
bārasabhikkhupaḍimā iṁdiyavijaō kasāyamahaṇō ya । taha aṭṭhakammasūḍaṇa pamuhā nēyā tavavisēsā ॥। 10584 ।।
kaṇagāvalināmassa u tavō visēsassa bhannai sarūvaṁ । kāūṇa cautthatavaṁ pārijjai tayaṇuchaṭṭatavaṁ ।। 10585 ॥
tattōya aṭṭhamatavaṁ ēvaṁ ēgā ya hōi kāhaliyā । chaṭṭāī aṭṭhatattō ēēhi hōi dāḍimagaṁ ।। 10586 ।।
dāḍimagassa uṭṭhā paḍhamalayā hōi sā ya ēvaṁ tu । kīrai cautthachaṭṭaṁ aṭṭamayaṁ dasamabārasamaṁ ।। 10587 ।।
ēvaṁ ēgēgadiṇassa tāva vuḍḍhī imammi nēyavvā । sōlasauvavāsā jāva hōṁti aṁtē niraṁtariyā ।। 10588 ।।
ēsā layā imīē hēṭṭhāpayagaṁ imammi jāyaṁti । chaṭṭāī cauttīsaṁ taō duijjā layā hōi ।। 10589 ।।
ēsā paḍhamalayāē vivarīyā sōlasāi hāyaṁtā । ēgēgēṇuvavāsā nēyā jāvēga uvavāsō ।। 10590 ।।
ēīē uvari tavō aṭṭhahiṁ chaṭṭhēhiṁ hōi dāḍimagaṁ । dāḍimagassa u uvari kāhaliyā sā puṇō ēvaṁ ।। 10591 ।।
kāyavvamaṭṭamaṁ tayaṇu chaṭṭhamaṁtē tavaṁ cautthaṁ tu । ēvaṁ dō kāhaliyā dō dāḍimagāī dōnni layā ।। 10592।।
majjhammi payagamēgaṁ ēvaṁ kaṇagāvalī imā hōi । ēīē tavasaṁkhā pattēyaṁ bhannaē inhi ।। 10593 । ।
cattāri cautthāī caupannaṁ hōti taha ya chuṭṭāī । cattāri aṭṭamāī dō dasamē dō duvālasamē ॥। 10594।।
dō caudasamē dō dō sōlasamāīṇi hōṁti nēyāī । jāva cautīsamāī pajjaṁtē hōṁti dōnnēva ।। 10595 ।।
tavadiha savvasaṁkhā tinni sayāiṁ diṇāṇa culasīī । aṭṭhāsīī pāraṇagadiṇāī ubhayammi miliyammi । । 10596 ॥
ēgaṁ ca hōi vāsaṁ tini u māsādiṇāī bāvīsaṁ । kaṇagāvalī ya ēsā cauhā pāraṇagabhēēṇa ।। 10597 ।।
paḍhamāē pāraṇagaṁ saṁjāyai savvavigaisaṁjuttaṁ । bīyāē nivvigaiyaṁ taiyāē alēvadavvajuyaṁ ।। 10598 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariya
326
hōi cautthīē puṇō kēvalamāyaṁbilēṇa pāraṇayaṁ । iya hōṁti paṁcamāsā dumāsa aḍavīsa dihāī ।। 10599 ।।
kaṇagāvali vva rayaṇāvalī vi navaraṁ imaṁ tu nāṇattaṁ । dāḍimagadugē payagē nēyāī aṭṭhamāī tu ।। 10600।।
muttāvalitti nāma hōi tavō tassa bhannai sarūvaṁ । paḍhamaṁ pi cautthabhavaṁ tattō chaṭṭaṁ puṇa cautthaṁ ।। 10601।।
tō aṭṭamaṁ cautthaṁ dasama utthaṁ duvāla ēvaṁ । ēguttaravuḍḍhīē tavaṁ cautthēṇa aṁtariyaṁ ।। 10602।।
tā nēyaṁ jā sōlasa uvavāsā paḍhamamaddhamii jāyaṁ । duiyaṁ pi addhamēvaṁ navaraṁ paḍilōmanāēṇa ।। 10603।।
sōlasa uvavāsātō cautthamaha hōṁti panara suvavāsā । tayagu cautthaṁ caudasa uvavāsā iya cautthēṇa ।। 10604 । ।
aṁtariyaṁ tāva tavō nēyaṁ ēguttarāē hāṇīē । dō uvavāsē kāuṁ jāva cautthaṁ kuṇai aṁtē ।। 10605 ।।
iha tava diṇāṇa saṁkhā tinni saē pāraṇāṇa saṭṭhi diṇā । ubhayaṁ vāsamimā vihu pāraṇabhēyā bhavē cauhā ।। 10606॥
inhi tu sīhakīliyatavō duhā khuḍḍuō mahallō ya । pujjēhi tammi aṭṭhē kayāō gāhāō bhannaṁti ।। 10607 ।।
ēkkō dō ēkkō vi ya uvavāsā tinni dōnni caurō ya । tinniya paṁca ya caurō cha paṁca sattēva uvavāsā ।। 10608 ।।
chaccēva aṭṭhasatta ya nava uvavāsēhiṁ hōi paḍhamalayā । aṭṭha nava satta aṭṭha ya cha satta paṇa chacca caurō ya ।। 10609।।
paṇa tinni caura dōnni ya tinēgō dōnni ēga uvavāsā । paḍhamalayā vivarīyā aṭṭhahiyā hōi bīyalayā ।। 10610।।
caupannasayaṁ ca tavōdiṇāṇa iha pāraṇāī tēttīsaṁ । chahiṁ māsēhiṁ sattahiṁ diṇēhiṁ vaccai samaggamiṇaṁ ।। 10611 ।।
ēsō khuḍḍāgō sīhakīliō sāhiō tavavisēsō । inhi tu mahallayaraṁ ēyaṁ ciya saṁpavakkhāmi ।।10612।।
ēkkō dō ēkkō vitanni duvē cauratinni paṇa caurō । chaccēva paṁca satta ya cha aṭṭha sattēva nava aṭṭha ।। 10613।।
dasa nava ēkkārasa dasa duvālasēkkārasēva tērasa ya । bārasa caudasa tērasa panarasa caudasa ya sōlasagaṁ ।। 10614 ।
iya paḍhamalayaṁ kāuṁ tattō panarasa kuṇai uvavāsē । paḍhamalayaṁ ciya tattō vivarīyaṁ sōlasāīyaṁ ।। 10615 ।।
pajjētē uvavāsa karēṁti iya hōṁti piṁḍiyāiṁ ihaṁ । cattāri tava diṇāṇaṁ sayāī saganauya ahiyāī ।। 10616 ॥
igasaṭṭhi pāraṇayā savvēgattēṇa varisamēgaṁ ca । chammāsa । aṭṭhārasadiṇāī duvihaṁ pi tavamēyaṁ ।। 10617 ।।
khuḍḍalayaṁ pi mallaṁ pattēyaṁ hōi cauhiṁ bhēēhi । punnaparuviyapāraṇa cauvhittēṇa vinēyaṁ ।। 10618।।
atha bhadratapaḥ
ēkka duga tinni caurō paṁcuvavāsēhi hōi paḍhamalayā । tinni cau paṁca ēkkō uvavāsadugēṇa bīyāō ।। 10619 ।।
paṇa ēkka dōnni tini ya uvavāsa caukkaēṇa taiyalayā । dō tinni caura paṁca ya ēkuvavāsō cautthalayā
paṁcamalayāē caurō paṇa ēkkaga dōnni tinni uvavāsā । paṇasattari uvavāsā savvē paṇavīsapāraṇayā ॥। 10621 ।।
atha mahābhadratapaḥ
ēkkaga duga tiga caurō paṁca cha sattōvavāsa paḍhamalayā । caupaṁca cha sattēgō dō tiṣṇuvavāsa bīyāō ॥10622 ।।
sattēga dōnni tinni ya caupaṇachaha cēva hōi taiyalayā । tiga caura paṁca chaccaya sattēga duvē cautthīō।। 10623।।
chaccēva satta ēkkō durgātiga caupaṁcagēhiṁ paṁcamiyā | durgātiga caupaṇa chacca ya sattēkkagaēhiṁ chaṭṭhīō।। 10624।।
paṇachacca satta ēkkaga durgātaga caurōvavāsa sattamiyā । channauyasayaṁ iha tava diṇāṇa agupannapāraṇayā ।। 10625।।
atha bhadrōttaratapaḥ
paṁcaga cha satta aṭṭha ya navōvavāsēhiṁ hōi paḍhamalayā । aṭṭhanava paṁca chaccaya sattuvavāsēhiṁ bīyāō ।। 106256।।
chaccēva satta aṭṭha ya nava paṁcahi cēva hōi taiyalayā । nava paṁca cha sattaṭṭhahiṁ uvavāsēhiṁ cautthīō ।।10627 ।।

frog kumāramunikā
paṁcamalayāē satta ya uvavāsā aṭṭha nava ya paṇa chakkaṁ । tava divasā paṇa sattarasayamiha paṇavīsa pāraṇayā ।। 10628॥
bhaddā ya mahābhaddā taiyā bhaddōttarā ya tinniviya । tiri uḍḍhaṁ kōṇēsu ya samasaṁkhā savvaō bhaddā ॥ 10629 ।।
savvarasavigaivajjiyaalēvaāyaṁbilēhi pāraṇayaṁ । caubhēyaṁ tēṇa imā ēkkēkkā hōi caubhēyā ॥ 10630||
inhi āyaṁbilavaddhamāṇanāmassa tavavisēsassa । bhannai sarūvamēttha ya paḍhamaṁ āyaṁbilaṁ kāuṁ ।। 10631।।
kīrai tavaṁ cautthaṁ tattō āyaṁbilāī dōnnēva । tayaṇu puṇō vi cautthaṁ tattō āyaṁbilatiyaṁ tu ।। 10632 ।।
iya ēkkēkka cautthaṁtariyā ēkuttarāē vuḍḍhīē kīraṁti aṁbilā tāva jāva aṁtē sayaṁ ēkkaṁ ।। 10633।
kāūṇaṁ aṁbilāṇaṁ kuṇai cautthaṁ tavaṁ taō ēvaṁ ēsa samappai savvō sayaṁ cautthāna iha hōi ।। 10634।।
pannāsasamahiyāī taha āyaṁbilasayāī pannāsaṁ । savvēgattē vāsā caudasa diṇavīsamāsatiyaṁ ॥ 10635।।
inhi tu kahissāmi guṇarayaṇasaṁvaccharaṁ tavōkammaṁ । kāyavvamaṇikkhittaṁ cautthatavamiha paḍhamamāsē ||10636।।
dōccē māsē chaṭṭhaṁ taha taccē aṭṭamaṁ cautthammi । māsē dasamaṁ kīrai paṁcamamāsē duvālasamaṁ ।। 10637।।
iya uttaruttarammī māsē ēkkkka diyaha vuḍḍhīē । kāyavvamaṇikkhittaṁ tavakammaṁ jāva sōlasamē ||10638।।
māsē cautīsaimaṁ kāyavvaṁ iya samappaē ēyaṁ । annaṁ pi bhikkhupaḍimā pabhii tavaṁ kuṇai bahubhēyaṁ । । 10639 ।।
ēvaṁviha uggatakō vihāṇanirayassa vinhavaramuṇiṇō । laddhīō jāō jāyāō tāō kāō vi vōcchāmi ॥ 40 ॥
āmōsahi vippōsahi khēlōsahi jallaōsahī cēva । saṁbhinnasōyaladdhī savvōsahiladdhi taha cēva ।। 10641 ।।
cāraṇaladdhī āsīvisaladdhi viuvviladdhiṇō cēva । akkhīṇamahāṇasiyā pamuhāō aṇēgalaḍīō ।। 10642।।
tatthāmōsahīlī jō hōi jaī sarōgaviharaṁgaṁ । appāṇaṁ ca paraṁ vā jaṁ kici vi rōgaharaṇassa ।। 15643 ।।
abhipāēṇaṁ phāsai taṁ takkhaṇamēva kuṇai nīrōgaṁ । sā hōi ēgadēsē dēhassa u savvadēhē vā ॥ 10644।।
vippu bhaṇijjai viṭṭhā ōsa hisāmatthajuttayāē imā । vippōsahi tti bhannai tīē laddhīē jō juttō ।। 10645 ।।
viṭṭhāē kassa vilipijjai jassa rōgiṇō dēhaṁ । appassa parassa vasō vi hōi savvāmayavimukkā ।। 10646 ।।
khēlaṁ bhannaī niṭṭhīvaṇaṁ ti jallaṁ malō sarīrassa । khēlōsahī vi jallōsahī vi puvvaṁ va nāyavvō ।। 10647।।
saṁbhinnasōyaladdhī ēgayarēṇa vi sarīradēsēṇa । uvalahai iṁdiyatthē savvē vi pariṣphuḍē cēva ।। 10648 ।।
savvāsahīō bhannai āmōsahimāiyāō savvāō । jassuppannāō ōsahīō ēgassa jīvassa ।। 10649 ।।
ahavā savvasarīrēṇa tassa savvēhiṁ vā avayavēhiṁ । khēlōsahimāīhiṁ jō ōsahisattisaṁjuttō ।। 10650 ।।
ahavā bahurūvāṇa vivāhīṇaṁ hōi jō samaggāṇa । niggahaṇammi samatyō sō vi hu savvōsahī nāma ।। 10651 ।।
cāraṇaladdhī duvihā jaṁghāē hōi taha ya vijjāē । jaṁghācāraṇaladdhī lūyāpuḍagassa taṁtuṁ pi ।। 10652 ।।
nīsāē kāūṇaṁ uḍḍhaṁ uppayai gayaṇamaggammi । vijjācāraṇaladdhī vijjā sāmatthaō vayai ।। 10653 ।।
āsīvisaladdhī puṇa sō bhannai jō pareeraat | dēhaviṇivāyakaraṇē hōi samatyō parajaṇassa || 10654 ।।
vēubviyaladdhī puṇa nāṇāviharūvakaraṇasattijuō | lahugurupayaṇumahallaṁ dissamadissaṁ kuṇai ruvaṁ ।। 10655 ।।
akkhīṇamahāṇasiyā ēgassa vi appaṇī pamāṇammi । āṇīō āhārō dijjatō sayasahassāṇa ॥। 10656 ।।
annasa tō niṭṭai jāva na bhuttō sayaṁ tamāhāraṁ । sō laddhimaṁtasāhū āṇīō jēṇa āhārō ॥। 10647 ।।
ēvaṁ viviggatavō kammasamuppannavivihaladdhī sō । khavai purāṇaṁ kammaṁ aṁgāmaṁdiranagammi ṭhiō ।। 10658 ।।

331
ētō suvvayasūrī niyamaṇivaggēṇa saha samaggēṇa । gāmanagarāgarāisu viharaṁtō māsakappēṇa ॥। 10659 ।।
hatthiṇaurammi pattō samōsaḍhō bāhirammi ujjāṇē । nāūṇa mahāpaumō cakkī taṁ āgayaṁ tattha ||10660।।
aigaruyavibhūīē vaccai tavvaṁdaṇattha maihiṭṭhō । viṇaēṇa vaṁdiūṇaṁ uvavisai jahōciē ṭhāṇē ।। 10661।।
sūrī vi kahai dhammaṁ tīsē rāyāiyāē parisāē । jaha kaha vi mahāmicchattamōhiyā baddhaghaṇakammā ।। 10662।।
caugaigahaṇammi bhavē bhamaṁti jaha laddhavimalasammattā । cariūṇa cārucaraṇaṁ kammaṁ khaviūṇa sijjhati ।। 10663 ।।
sōūṇa sūrivayaṇaṁ ēvaṁ giṇhaṁti kē vi pavvajjaṁ । kēi vihu dēsavira kē vi saṁmattamēttaṁ tu ।। 10664।।
namuī puṇa sōmaṁtī sūri daṭṭhūṇa saparivāraṁ pi । ujjēṇīē jāyaṁ niyavattaṁtaṁ sumariūṇa ।।10665।।
kōvēṇaṁ pajjaliō maṇammi chiḍḍāī maggaē tēsi । nicca pi na lahai paraṁ tō kaivaya diyahapajjatē ।। 10666।।
pattō vāsārattō sūrī tatthēva kuṇai caumāsaṁ । namuī vi mahāpaumassa cakkiṇī sannihāṇammi ।। 10667।।
siṁhabaladuṭṭhasāmaṁtagahaṇatuṭṭhēṇa tēṇa jō dinnō । āsi purā taṁ maggai varaṁ tayā gurupattēṇa ॥ 10668।।
cakkī va taṁ payaṁpas jaṁ ki pi samīhiyaṁ tuha iyāṇi । taṁ maggasu nīsaṁkō aha namuī cakkiṇaṁ bhaṇai ।। 10669 ।।
jaha dēva karissamahaṁ vihiṇā vēōiēṇa jannavihiṁ । tō jāva sō samappai tāva niyaṁ dēhi mē rajjaṁ ।। 10670।।
dāūṇa cakkavaṭṭī taṁ tassa sayaṁ tu ciṭṭhaē gaṁtuṁ । aṁtēurassa majjhē ahāsuhaṁ pāliyapannō ।। 10671 ।।
aha taṁ rajjaniviṭṭhē namuī nāūṇa sēsapāsaṁḍā । vaddhāvaṇayaṁti kuṇaṁti daṁsaṇaṁ tēṇa saha gaṁtuṁ ।। 10672 ।।
suvvayasūrī ēkkō samāgaō nēva saparivārō vi । namuinivassa samīvē taṁ ciya tō dūsaṇaṁ tēsi ।। 10673 ।।
abbhāviūṇa ēē hakkārāvēi namuinaranāhō । jaṁ para jaha tumbhē mahadēsaṁ chaḍḍēha sigdhaṁ pi ।। 10674।।
aṭṭavvā tumbhē samaggajaṇasammayaṁ pi vavahāraṁ । jaṁ lōiyaṁ samuciyaṁ laṁghaha nillajjasēharayā ।। 10675।।
tumhaṁ āyārō sayalanīisatthēsu ēsa paḍisiddhō । tēsu vi jamhā ēvaṁ kahijjaē ṭhāṇaṭhāṇammi ।। 106756॥
jai vihu niuṇō jōī pāsai sayalaṁ pi mahīyalaṁ chiḍḍuṁ । lōiyamāyāraṁ taha vi nēva laṁghējja maṇasā vi । । 10677 ।।
uktaṁ ca--
|
yadyapi nipuṇō yōgī chidrāṁ paśyati mēdinīm । tathāpi laukikācāraṁ manasā'pi na laṁghayēt ।। 10678।।
na ya daṁsaṇiṇaṁ annēsi pāsaō ki pi suṁdarā tubbhē । savvēhiṁ vi tēhi ahaṁ ahiṇavasaṁpatta rajjasirī ।। 10679 ।।
āgaṁtuṇaṁ vaddhāviō hi tubbhēu dappiyā thaddhā । lōyavavahārabajjhā samāgayā nēya maha pāsē ।। 10680 ।।
tō āha taṁ muṇidō ahaṁ naranāha natthi thēvō vi । dappassa lavō cittē nirahaṁkārāṇa sāhūṇa ।। 10681 ।।
kintu paraṁ paricattō puttakalattāisaṁgamō jēhiṁ । tāṇa na kappai ēvaṁ tēṇamhē āgayā nēha ।। 10682।।
uktaṁ ca bhavadāgamē --
tithi parvōtsavāḥ sarvē tyaktā yēna mahātmanā । atithi taṁ vijānīyācchēṣamabhyāgataṁ viduḥ 10683॥
lōhābāhā vi kā vi amhēhiṁ na vihiyā inhi । rāyaviruddhāīyaṁ jamhā nāsēviyaṁ kiṁci ।। 10684 ।।
jaṁ taē bhaṇiyamiṇaṁ dēsaṁ amhāṇa muyaha sigdhaṁ pi । taṁ pihr̥ dūramattaṁ satthēsu jaō bhaṇiyamēvaṁ ॥ 10685 ।।
vratinō jaṁgamaṁ tīrthaṁ sadācāraparāyaṇāḥ । na santi yēṣu dēśēṣu kutastēṣāṁ pavitratā ॥ 10686॥
yamupārjayanti dharma kāyaklēśaṁ vidhāya munayō'mī । sādhayati tamavalēśēna narapatiḥ pālanāttēṣām ।। 10687॥ḥ
kiṁ ca aṇāriyajaṇaparibhavijjamāṇāṇa iha tavassīṇaṁ । sabvēsi pi hu saraṇaṁ saṁjāyai patthitrō cēva ।। 10688 ।।

tathā ca smr̥tivākyam-
viugkumāramuni kahā
durbalānāmanāthānāṁ bālavr̥ddhatapasvinām । anāyēṁ : paribhūtānāṁ sarvēṣāṁ pārthivō gatiḥ ।। 10689 ।।
kiṁ ca manunāpi sāmānyēnaivaitaduktam--
prajānāṁ dharmaṣaḍbhāgō rājñō bhavati rakṣataḥ । adharmādapi ṣaḍbhāgō bhavēttāsāmarakṣaṇāt ।। 10690।
tō ki akayavarāhē vi sāhūṇō niva tumaṁ sadēsāō । nīhārasi ahavā tuha ēmēva imē niyamaṇammi ।। 10691 ।।
nō pasihāsaṁti tahā vikhamasu tā jāva pāusō kālō। ēsa aikkamai taō ṭhāṇāu iō gamissāmō । 10692 ।
iya sūriṇā paṇiē namuinivō kōvakalusiō vayai । bhō bhō ki bahu jaṁpaha ēmēva niratthayaṁ tubbhē ॥। 10693 ।।
sattadiṇāṇaṁ majjhē dēsa chaḍḍēha mēṁ samaggaṁ pi । taduvari jai pēkkhissaṁ pavvaigamēttha ēkkaṁ pi ।। 10694 ।
tumhāṇaṁ majjhāō tō taṁ niyabaṁdhusannipi ahaṁ । niyamēṇa niggahissaṁtō sūrī bhaṇai taṁ ēvaṁ ।। 10695 ।।
ālōcēuṁ saha niyamaṇīhiṁ tumhaṁ kahissaē kallē । tō niyaṭhāṇē gaṁtuṁ muṇīhi saha kuṇai maṁtaṇayaṁ ।। 10696 ।
bhō bhō jaṁpa tubbhē niya niyamabhipāyamēttha samayammi । ki amha kāumuciyaṁ ujjēṇīē tayāsī ।। 10697।।
vāyē ahiṭṭiō jaṁ uttaradāṇēṇa paḍihayappasarō । vihiō savvasamakkhaṁ tēṇa paōsaṁ gaō bāḍham ।। 10698 ।।
khaliyārēu amhē pāraddhō avihiyāvirāhē vi । ēkkēṇa taō muṇiṇā vinnattō ērisaṁ sūrī ॥। 10699 ।।
jaha vindukumāramahāmuṇiṇō vayaṇēṇa ēsa uvasāmaṁ । ginhaṁtō mannijjai tō sō āṇijjaē ēttha ।। 10700।।
tō sūriṇā pabhaṇiyaṁ aṁgāmaṁdaranagammi sō inhi । ciṭṭhā vindukumārō tēttiya dūrammi tō gaṁtuṁ ।। 10701 ।
sō cēva sakkai muṇī vijjāē vā tavēṇa vā jassa । āgāsagamaṇasattī uppannā hōi kassa viya ॥ 10702 ।।
tō ēgō bhai muṇī mamatthi āgāsagamaṇasāmatthaṁ । kiṁtu paraṁ āgaṁtuṁ puṇō vi tattō na sakkēmi ॥। 10703 ।।
tō taṁ paṇa sūrī jai ēvaṁ tō tumaṁ vayasu tattha । sōcciya vindukumārō tumamāṇissai taō ēttha ॥ 10704।।
iya guruṇā bhaṇiō sō tamāladalasāmalaṁ gayaṇamaggaṁ । uppaiō sigdhaṁ ciya vindusamīvammi saṁpattō ।। 10705 ।
taṁ ētaṁ daṇaṁ vinhumuṇī citaē niyamaṇammi । kiṁ pi gurusaṁghakajjaṁ vāsāratē vi tēṇa imō ।। 10706 ।।
saṁpattī iha ēvaṁ citō tēṇa sāhuṇā vinhu । paṇaō kahiyaṁ ca purō tassa niyaṁ āgamaṇakajjaṁ ॥। 10707।।
vinhu muṇī vi muṇēuṁ gurukajjaṁ jha tti taṁ muṇi gahiuṁ । bīyadiṇē āgāsēṇa āgaō gurusamīvammi ।। 10708 ।।
taṁ namiūṇa saviyaṁ aṇunnavēūṇa bīya muṇisahiō । namuisamīvammi gaō namuippamuhēhiṁ savvēhiṁ ॥ 10709 ॥
sō'bhuṭṭiōsaviṇayaṁ mahānaridāiēhi tattha taō । uciyāsaṇē nisannō dhammakā puvvayaṁ bhaṇai ।। 10710।।
taṁ namuinivaṁ ēvaṁ vāsārattō imō aikkamai । jāva muṇīṇaṁ tāviha tubbhē ṭhāuṁ payacchēha ।। 10711 ।।
uḍḍhaṁ tu jaṁ bhaṇissaha taṁ pi karissaṁti sāhuṇō ēē । taṁ vayaṇaṁ gurumaccharapūriyahiyayassa namuissa ।। 10712।।
savayaṁ salilaṁ piva sūlasamuppāyagaṁ duyaṁ jāyaṁ । tō taṁ aṇuṇayamāṇō namuī vinhaṁ bhaṇai ēvaṁ ॥। 10713।।
tumhē u mahāpaumassa sāmiṇō kiṁ puṇō mamaṁ tattō । tubbhē na bhaṇāmi ahaṁ annē purṇa nicchaēṇa maē ।। 10714 ।।
nivvisayā kāyavvā samaṇā aha taṁ bhaṇāi viṇhu muṇī । pāṇibahulā vasumaī imammi samaē jai jaṇassa ॥ 1071 ॥
tō gamaṇamaviruddhaṁ apavisamāṇā purammi jai ēē । ujjāṇē ṭhāūṇaṁ vāsārataṁ tuhāṇāē ।। 10716 ।।
vaccati annadēsē taha vi taē hōi mama kayaṁ vayaṇaṁ । tō namuī bhaṇai maē jē ghāyavvā mamujjāṇē ॥। 10717 ।।
tē kaha sihaṁti taō vindu muṇī pabhaṇaē namuimēvaṁ । bharahappabhiīhiṁ imē savvēhiṁ vi bhūmivālēhi ।। 10718 ।।

sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariyaṁ
333
parivāliyā visēsēṇa pūīyā taṁ puṇō na pūēsi । jai sāhuṇō tayaṭṭhē na kiṁpi amhē tumaṁ vēma ।।10719।।
jaṁ puṇa pabhaṇasi ēē ghāēyavva tti taṁ na niva-cariyaṁ । dassūṇaṁ pi na dīsai ēyaṁ tamhā aikkaṁtē ।।10720।।
vāsāsamaē ēē annēsuṁ patthivāṇa dēsēsuṁ । viharissaṁti taō sō namuī vinduṁ bhaṇai ēvaṁ ॥। 10721।।
jaṁ bhaṇasi tumaṁ ēyaṁ na rāyacariyaṁ ti puvvapurisāō । āsi muṇīṇaṁ paripūyagatti taṁ jō nivai puttō ।। 10722।।
jaṇaya piyā maha papiyā - mahakka mēṇāgayaṁ nariṁdasiriṁ । aṇuhavai tassa ēsā muṇivara dhammiṭṭayā hōī ॥। 10723।।
paḍhamō cēva ahaṁ niyavaṁsē rāyā taō kimannassa । cariēṇa mama na kajjaṁ samaṇēhi sattarattuvari ॥ 10724।।
pāsāmi jaṁ bhamaṁtaṁ samaṇaṁ iha tassa jīviyaṁ natthi । aigacchaha tō tubbhē ahaṁ na bhē kiṁcivi bhaṇāmi ।। 10725 । ।
tō cita vinhumaṇī ahō durappā imō dhruvaṁ namuī । sāhū vahēumicchai tō mē na uvēkkhiuṁ juttaṁ ॥ 10726।।
sāhūṇaṁ pīḍā saṁbhavammi tō pabhaṇaē imō namuī । jai vi tumaṁ sivavasiō kāumimaṁ taha vi mama ēkkaṁ ।। 10727॥
vayaṇaṁ karēsu ēyaṁ vivittadēsammi vikkamē tini । majjha payacchasu jaha tattha saṁṭhiyā sāhuṇō ēē ॥ 10728।।
kuvvaṁti pāṇacāyaṁ imammi kālē na kappaē jamhā । ēēsi viharēuṁ bhūmipa sē iya pamāṇē ।। 10729 ।।
dinnammi taē vayaṇaṁ majjhakayaṁ hōi tuha pannā ya । pariōsaviyasiyacchō tō namuī bhaṇaī jai saccaṁ । । 19730।।
ēvaṁ bhaṇiya paēsaō kōvi bāhiṁ na nīharai tēsi। tō dēmi vikkamatiyaṁ sāmarisēṇaṁ taō tēṇa ।। 10731 ।।
vindu kumārēṇa taha tti tassa paḍivannamērisaṁ vayaṇaṁ । niggacchai nayarabahiṁ namuī ēvaṁ ca jaṁpēi ।। 10732।।
vikkamatiyaṁ viinnaṁ maē miṇēsu tti bhaṇai tō vinhū । gahiyaṁ timiṇaō kāmō kōvēṇa vivaḍḍhiuṁ laggō । 10733 ।
vēuvviyadēhēṇaṁ tō namuī bhayapakaṁpirasarīrō । tassa caraṇē vilaggō bhayavaṁ mē khamaha avarāhaṁ ।। 10734।।
asaī pi iya bhaṇatō muṇiṇā kaṁpāviyammi niyapāē । paḍiō sō dharaṇiyalē tō vindu muṇīkhaṇēṇēva ।। 10735।।
nimmaviya divvarūvō saṁjāō lakkhajōyaṇapamāṇō । maṇimauḍakuṁḍalaṁgayakaṁkaṇakēūrahārēhiṁ । ।10736।।
dippaṁtasayaladēhō adivvaṁ taō mahābōṁdi । taṁ pāsaṁtā kiṁ nara kiṁ purisamahōragāīyā ॥ 10737।।
vēvaṁtasavvagattā galiyābharaṇaccharāgaṇasahāyā । bhīyā uttatthamaṇā vilōlanayaṇāmihō bēṁti ।। 10738 ।।
kōṇu imō ki kāuṁ uvaṭṭhiō kattha patthiō vāvi । saṁcārimōcca maṁdaragirirāō ēsa paḍihāi ॥ 10739।।
naralōyasaggalōyāṇa aṁtarālassa kēttiyaṁ māṇaṁ । ēvaṁ nāuṁ vaimō kō vi mahappā vivaḍḍhēi ।। 10740।।
ēsā vasuṁdharā tēṇa pāyadaddarayamāyaraṁtēṇa । kaṁpāviyā sasēlā sakāṇaṇā sanayaraggāmā ।।10741॥
vasuhā kaṁpēṇaṁ jalahiṇō ya ucchāliyā gurutaraṁgā । savvāō vi naīō paḍipahagamaṇāō jāyāhō ।। 10742।।
jōisacakkaṁ bhayavivasamāṇa saṁvihaḍiyaṁ samaggaṁ pi । bhavaṇavaivāṇamaṁtaradēvagaṇā dūramuttatthā ||10743 ॥
ētthaṁtarammi caliyāsaṇammi sakkō pauṁjaē ōhi । pāsai ya tahārūvaṁ taṁ vindukumāramaṇagāraṁ ॥ 10744 ॥
gaṁdhavvāṇīyassa ya naṭṭāṇīyassa tayaṇu ahivaiṇō । saddāviūṇa ēvaṁ surēsarō tē samāisai ।। 10745 ।।
bhō bhō ni suha tumbhē ēsō bhayavaṁ mahāmuṇī vindu । kayaghōratavaccaraṇō namuiaṇāyāraparikuviō ।। 10746।।
tēlōkkaṁ pi samatthō ḍhālēḍaṁ tā tayaṁtiē gaṁtuṁ । sāṇuṇayagīyanaṭṭō vahāraō sigghamuvasamaha ।। 10747।।
iya sakkē ṇāṇattā tilōttamā uvvasī ya raṁbhā ya । sāmā ya cakkhu visaē paṇacciyā tassa varamuṇiṇō ।। 10748।।
āujjāṇiya apphāliyāṇi kannāṇa taha ya āsannaṁ । tuṁburunārayahāhā hūhū vissā vasūhiṁ ca ।। 10749।।
suisuhajaṇayaṁ gīyaṁ thuṇamāṇēhiṁ pagabbhavayaṇēhiṁ । khaṁtiguṇavannaṇāhi ya jiṇanāmaggahaṇapuvvaṁ ca ।। 10750।।

।।
viogkumāramunikā
uvasama bhayavaṁ uvasama bhayavaṁ ti abhikkhaṇaṁ bhaṇatēhi । vēyaḍḍhasirisēḍhī nivāsiṇō jē mahiḍḍīyā ।। 10751 ।।
vijjāharā samaggā samāgayā tēvi taha surasamūhā । suravaisahiyā muṇiṇō vinhassa pasāyaṇanimittaṁ । । 10752 ।।
jiṇapavayaṇāṇurūvāṇi sāyaraṁ gīyagāṇi gāyaṁtā । payamukkhittaṁ tārāmarasasappahaṁ mahuyaragaṇa vva ॥ 10753 ।।
alliyaṁtā parisaṁthuṇaṁti tō nāraēṇa tuṁburuṇā । dōhiṁ vi payaṁpiyaṁ pamuiēhi acchariyamacchariyaṁ ।। 10754।।
jaṁ nāma maṇyamētēṇa vi hōūṇaṁ imēṇa maharisiṇā । āṇīyā niyapayaaṁtiyammi dēvā sadā vi ॥। 10755 ।।
vijjāharā ya bhaṇiyā gaṁdhāraggāmamucchaṇāṇugayaṁ । sattasarataṁtinissiyamēyaṁ naralōyaaidulahaṁ ॥ 10756 ।।
vinhamuṇikōvabaddhaṁ gēyaṁ uvagijjamāṇamaisaiyaṁ । avahāraha jaha tumhēṁ paramaraī hōi gaṁdhavvē ।। 10757 ।।
iya bhaṇiuṁ tuṁburunāraēhi gīyaṁ imammi aṭṭhammi । uvasamasu muṇivariṭṭhayajiṇēhiṁ kōhō paḍikkuṭṭō ।। 10758 ।।
kōhō nāma narāṇaṁ niyadēhāō samubbhavai sattū । jaṁ imō mittavirōhaṁ kārai chaḍḍāvara dhammaṁ ।। 10759 ।।
saparōbhayasaṁtavaō kōvō taha sucariyassa niṭṭhavaō । duggai gamasuhapaṁthō palimaṁthō sayalasōkkhāṇa ।। 10760।।
titthayarā annē vidru maharisiṇō atulavikkamajuyā vi । visati nihīṇāṇa vi savvaṁ paralōyabhīrumaṇā । 10761 ।
gōsīsacaṁdaṇaṁ kavi vilaṁpijja savvagāyāiṁ । tikkhāē vāsīē kō vi hu tacchējja tāī pi ।। 10762 ।।
ja sāhūṇaṁ hē tā va tē muṇiya kammaparamatthā । nāi tūsaṁti na rūsaṁti kassaī hōṁti samacittā ॥ 10763।।
bhattīē namiūṇaṁ ēgō sāhūṇa bhattavatthāī । dējjā annō haṇiuṁ nīhārai tē niyagihāō ।। 10764 ।।
ēgō miuvayaṇēhiṁ savaṇamaṇāṇaṁdaṇēhi saṁthuṇai । annō duvvayaṇāī vayai maṇō dukkhajaṇagāī ।। 10765।।
jāṇiya bhavassakhvā susāhuṇō hōṁti taha vi majjhatthā । dōsuṁ pi tēsu dūraṁ rāgaddōsaṁ samujjhēuṁ ।। 10766॥
sūṇa puvvakōḍīē ajjiyaṁ jaṁ havējja cāritaṁ । taṁ pi khaṇaṁ sakasāō hōuṁ nāsējja nīsēsaṁ ॥। 10767 ।।
jaha nēraiyatiricchāiēsu iyarēsu viṣphurai kōvō । taha jai guṇagaruēsu vi tā kiṁnu vivēyasāmatthaṁ ।। 10768।।
tā uvasamasu muṇīsara sumarasu jiṇabhāsiyāī vayaṇā । karuṇāē dēsu cittaṁ kuṇasu pasāyaṁ tihuyaṇassa || 10769।।
iya tisagāyaṇāṇaṁ gīyaṁ avahāriūṇa khayarēhiṁ । bhaṇiyaṁ aṇuggahō ṇē tubbhēhi kaō imō paramō ॥ 10770 ।।
iya bhaṇiuṁ tē khērrapavarā vitamēva surakayaṁ gēyaṁ । gāyaṁti vindumuṇiṇō suiniyaḍē kōvapasamakaē || 10771 ।।
ēttō ya hatthaṇaurē jaṇēṇa pūyā kayā jiṇaharēsu । kāussaggammi ṭhiō cauvvihaṁ samaṇasaṁghō vi ।। 10772 ।।
rāyā vi mahāpaumō vinhumuṇi namui dunnayavasēṇa । kuviyaṁ viubviya mahādēhaniruddhaṁbarābhōyaṁ ॥ 10773।।
sōūṇa jhatti bhayabharapakaṁpirō niggaō sagēhāō । sō rōhō sapurajaṇō gaṁtūṇaṁ samaṇasaṁghassa । ।10774।।
paya mūlammi bhagavaō kaṁṭapa sāgaēhi pāṇēhi । bhaṇai bhayagaggirasarō saṁghassa ahaṁ gaō saraṇaṁ ।। 10775 ।।
sirisuvvayassa guruṇō aṇagāravarassa saṁpayaṁ sīsō । paritāyaha paritāyaha karuṇaṁ kāūṇa maṁ tamhā ।। 10776 ।।
saṁghēṇa mahāpaumō rāyā ēvaṁ taō uvāladdhō । mūḍha apattaṁ rajjē ṭhavēsi na ca vahasi vr̥ttaṁtaṁ ॥ 107776।।
niyatyaramāgayāṇa vi sāhūṇaṁ ērisō pamattō si । kiṁtu mahappā saṁghō vimalasahāvō dayājalahī ॥ 10778 ।
tā tujjha khamiyamēyaṁ avamāṇaṁ jaṁ taē kayaṁ amha । visayapamattēṇa sayaṁ aṇavēkkhaṁtēṇa niyavisayaṁ ।। 10779 ।।
tēllōkkaṁ pi samaggaṁ tahā imaṁ saṁsayammi pakkhittaṁ । ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa mahāpaumanivaṁ tō samaṇasaṁghō ।। 10780 ।।

viṣṇuṁ bhaṇē mahāpaumanaridassa samaṇasaṁghēṇa । khamiyaṁ tā tumaminhi uvasama sāharaya kayarūvaṁ ।।10781।।
mā cālēha sacalaṇaṁ tavatēyapabhāvaō jaō sayalaṁ । saṁcalai puhaivalayaṁ pavisai va rasāyalaṁ ghōraṁ ॥। 10782 ।।
ciṭṭha puraṭṭiō tuha calaṇanbhāsamma ēsa sayalō vi । bhō ! vindu samaṇasaṁghō abhikkhaṇaṁ ērisaṁ vayaṇaṁ । 10783।
sāhūhi bhaṇijjaṁtaṁ jāhē nisuṇē nēya vinmuṇī । tāhē payaṁpiyaṁ mahayarēhiṁ ēvaṁ suyaharēhiṁ ।। 10784 ।।
na sui sa nūṇaṁ duvālasanhaṁ pi jōyaṇāṇa ṭhiyaṁ । paraō katthai gayaṇaṁtarammi sōiṁdiyamimassa ।। 10785 ।।
suvisayamaikkataṁ ukkōsaviuvvaṇā sayasahassaṁ । jaṁ jōyaṇāṇa jāyai tēttiyadraṁ gaō tamhā ॥। 10786।।
svaviyammi vaṭṭai tō apphālēha pāyamēyassa । iya kīratē ēsō avalōissara dhuvaṁ hēṭṭhā 10787 ।।
daṭūṇa samaṇasaṁgha kuṇamāṇaṁ pajjuvāsaṇaṁ tattō । uvasamamuvāgamissai vindukumārō muṇī ēsō ।। 10788 ।।
jamagasamagaṁ pi tattō calaṇō apphāliō muṇijaṇēhiṁ । tō tēṇa vinhamuṇiṇā phāsidiyaladdhasanēṇa ।। 10789 ।।
avalōiyamavaṇiyalaṁ diṭṭhō ēēṇa tō mahāpaumō । naranāhō sō rōhō sapariyaṇō saraṇamāvannō ।। 10790 ।।
saṁghassa bhagavaō taha kayaṁjaliuḍā ya sāhuṇō diṭṭhā | vāharamāṇā ēvaṁ uvasama vinhū uvasamati ।। 10791 ।।
tō ṇa citiyamiṇaṁ muṇiṇō navaṇīyamiva miusahāvā । caṁdaṇamiva sīyalayā tēṇa mahāpaumanarava iṇō । 10792 ।
sapariyaṇassa vi pīḍaṁ pariharamāṇēhiṁ khamiya mē ēhiṁ । nīsaṁsayamēva taō na jujjaē majjha vaikamiuṁ ।। 10793।।
sirisaṁgha bhayavaṁtaṁ iya citēuṁ tahā surāṇaṁ ca । vayaṇēhi puvvaṁ ciya mauī kayamāṇasō vinhū ।। 10794।।
taṁ vēubviyarūvaṁ uvasaṁhariūṇa niyasarūvēṇa । sāhāviēṇa sārayasasi vva suhr̥daṁsaṇō hōuṁ ।। 10795 ।।
puhaīē ṭṭi tattō sakhērrā dēvadāṇavā tassa । vinhussa mahāmuṇiṇō paṇayā pāēsa pīīē ।। 10796।।
kāūṇaṁ kusumāṇaṁ dasaddhavannāṇa surahigaṁdhāṇa । vāsaṁ gaṁdhudayassa ya ṭhāṇēsu gayā niyanisu || 10797।।
aha vindukumārēṇa rāyā nibbhacchiō mahāpaumō । arihasi na rajjalacchi visayasuhē mucchiō si tumaṁ ॥
aha jhatti mahāpaumō mahīvaī lajjiō sa-cariēṇa | vinducalaṇēsu khiviḍaṁ niyasīsaṁ khāmaē ēyaṁ ।। 10799।।
annēhiṁ vi sāhūhiṁ vinhumaṇī vāriō kharaṁṭēṁtō । cakkaharamahāpaumaṁ jaha imiṇā khāmiō saṁghō ।। 10800 ।।
ciṭṭhai niyaduccariyaṁ subahuṁ puvvaṁ pitā puṇō vi tumaṁ । mā lajjāvaha ēyaṁ tō nivapaṭṭīē niyahatthaṁ ।। 10801 ।।
dētēṇa vindumuṇiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ saṁghēṇa bhagavayā khamiē । khamiyaṁ ciya amhēhiṁ kiṁtu puṇō mā iya karijjā ।। 10802 ।।
i bhaṇi mōṇē vindukumārē ṭhiyammi aṇagārē । āisa mahāpaumō rāyā kuviō niyamaṇussē ॥। 10803 ।।
pāvāṇa vi pāvayaraṁ agijjha - nāmaṁ adaṁsaṇijja muhaṁ । namuiṁ bāhi nēuṁ sudukkhamārēṇa māraha || 10804 ।।
karuṇā - rasiēhi taō sāhūhiṁ nivāriō mahāpaumō । mā mārāvēha imaṁ namuī jīvaṁtayaṁ muyaha ।। 10805 ।।
nivvisaō kāūṇaṁ rannā nivvāsiō taō ēsō । vindukumārō vi muṇī pāyacchittaṁ guru samīvē ॥। 10806।।
anucariūṇa visuddha niviūṇaṁ samaggamavi kammaṁ । ēēṇēva bhavēṇaṁ pāvissai akkhayaṁ sōkkhaṁ ।। 10807।।
jaṁ āsita puṭṭha ṁ naravarabhūkaṁpakāraṇaṁ inhi । taṁ ēyaṁ tuha kahiyaṁ iya jiṇavayaṇaṁ suṇēūṇa ॥। 10808 ।।
jāyā samaggaparisā sā vimhayarasaparavvasā jhatti । paṇayā ya vindumuṇiṇō siraggasaṁghaḍiyakarajuyalā | 10809।
kaivayadiṇapajjaṁtē bharuyacchāō purāō nīhariuṁ । bahiyā jaṇavayamajjhē viharai munisuvvayajiṇidō । 10810 ।
iya vihariūṇa suiraṁ bahuyaṁ paḍibōhiūṇa bhaviyajaṇaṁ । aṭṭamā sahassā vāsāṇaṁ savvapariyāyaṁ ।। 10811 ।।
taṁ ciya ēkkārasahi māsēhiṁ virahiyaṁ sapakkhēhiṁ । kēvaliṇō pariyāyaṁ aṇupālēūṇa ki cūṇaṁ ॥। 10812 ।।
niyaāuyapajjaṁtaṁ nāūṇaṁ niyaḍamāgayaṁ tattō । sammēyasēlasamuha caliō tēlōkkanayacalaṇō ।। 10813॥

kēvalanāṇuppattīppabhiī jē kēvi bhagavayā maṇuyā । paḍibōhiūṇa dhammē ṭhaviyā tēsi imā saṁkhā ।। 10814 ।।
aṭṭhārasau gaṇaharā tīsasahassāī pavarasāhūṇaṁ । pannāsasahassā sāhuṇīṇa nēyā aṇūṇāō ।। 10815 ।।

sāhūṇaṁ majjhāō visēsavaṁtāṇa bhannaē saṁkhā । caudasapuvvadharāṇaṁ paṁcēva sayāī nēyāī ।। 10817 ।।

nakkhattēṇaṁ savaṇattēṇaṁ sahagaē jōgamamayakiraṇasmi । puvvāē rayaṇīē nivvāṇamaṇuttaraṁ pattō ।। 10822 ।।
