tō uṭṭhē uṁ sīhāsaṇāō sattaṭṭha sammuhapayāī । gaṁtuṁ mahinihiyasirō paṇamai jīyaṁ ca sumarēi ।। 10824 ।।

vimaṇōvi gayāṇaṁdō aṁ sujalapphunnanayaṇatāmarasō । tikkhuttō āyāhiṇapayāhiṇī kuṇai titthayaraṁ ।। 10826 ।।
tattō naccāsanē na yāi dūrammi pajjuvāsēi । iya savvē vi suriṁdā nēyā jā accuyāhivaī || 10827॥
ēvaṁ bhavaṇavaṇa vi iṁdā jōisiyavaṁtarāṇaṁ ca । nēyā jāva cauvvihadēvāṇa nivāsaṭhāṇāī ।। 10828||
jāva ya sammēyanagō tāva ya dēvēhiṁ dēvinivahēhiṁ । sōyabharapūriēhiṁ avirahiyaṁ saṁcaraṁtēhi ॥10829॥
iya iṁdāisurēhi tahā samaggēṇa samaṇasaṁghēṇa । sēvijjamāṇacaraṇāraviṁdajuyalō jiṇō siddhō ॥। 10830 ।।

ēvaṁ āisai jahā bhō ! khippāmēva naṁdaṇavaṇāō । gōsīsasarasacaṁdaṇakaṭū iṁ ēttha āṇēuṁ ।। 10832।।

taṁ sā harivaṁsakulubbhavāṇa sāhūṇa sēsayāṇa puṇō । aṇagārāṇa nimittaṁ cauraṁsā aha paḍicchittā || 10834।।
tē vi tahēva karitā savvaṁ ciya taṁ kahēṁti sakkassa । sō ābhiōgiyasurē sahāvē imaṁ vayai ।। 10835 ।।
bhō tumbhē khippaṁ ciya khīrasamuddāō salilamāṇēha । tē taṁ āṇēṁti tahā tō sakkō uṭṭhaūṇa sayaṁ ।। 10836।।
titthayarassa sarīraṁ pakkhālai khīravāriṇā savvē । sarasēṇa pavaragōsīsacaṁdaṇēṇaṁ ca lipēi ।। 10837 ।।

gōsīsapavaracaṁdaṇarasēṇa tayaṇaṁtaraṁ vilipaṁti । tayaṇu niyaṁsāvēṁti ya jyalāī dēvadasāṇaṁ ।। 10840 ।।

sēsa muṇisarīrāī gahiuṁ ārōvayaṁti sibiyāsu । nēūṇaṁ jāva nivēśayaṁti ciyagāsu tē tāī ॥। 10847 ।।
aggikumārē dēvē saddāvittā taō kulisapāṇī । ēvaṁ vayai jahā bhō dēvāṇupiyā duyaṁ tubbhē ।। 10848 ।।
cirgāsu agaṇikāyaṁ viuvvahā tē taō nirāṇaṁdā | aggikumārā dēvā vimaṇā nayaṇaṁsudhōyamuhā ।। 10849 ।।
muhakuharāō aggi nisirēṁti jahā jiṇassa paḍhamassa । aggimuhā vai dēvā tappabhii imā suī jāyā ।। 10850 ।।
sakkāēsēṇa taō vāukumārā surā nirāṇaṁdā । vimaṇā viūvviūṇaṁ vāyaṁ jāliti ciyagāō ।। 10851 ।।
sakkō āṇavai taō vēmāṇiyabhavaṇavāsipabhiisurē । bhō bhō dēvāṇupiyā ēyāsu tisu viciyagāsu । 10852 ।
khippāmēva ya tubhē agaruturukkaṁ ghayaṁ mahuṁ cēva । bhāraggasōyakuṁbhaggasō ya pakkhivaha āgēuṁ ।। 10853 ।।
tē vi tahacciya ēyaṁ sakkassāṇattiyaṁ pasārhēti । tō maṁsasōṇiē jhāmiyammi khīrōdahijalēṇa ।। 10854 ।।
mēhakumārā dēvā tinni vi ciyagāō nivvavaṁti lahuṁ । tāhē sakkō ginhai uvarillaṁ dāhiṇaṁ sakahaṁ ।। 10855 ।।
pahuṇō īsāṇidō puṇa ginhai vāmamuvarimaṁ sakahaṁ । pariginhai camariṁdō hēṭṭhillaṁ dāhiṇaṁ sakahaṁ ॥। 10855 ।।
hēṭṭhillaṁ ciya sakahaṁ vāmaṁ ginhai balī asurarāyā । sēsā vēmāṇiyabhavaṇavāsivaṁtariyajōisiyā ।। 10857।।
savvē dēvanikāyā jahārihaṁ sēsayāī aṁgāī । ginhaṁti uvaṁgāṇi ya jayapahuṇō paramabhattīē ।। 10858।।
aha vēmāṇiyapamuhē dēvē āisai ērisaṁ sakkō । jaha bhō dēvāṇupiyā tinni u thūbhē kuṇaha tubhē ।। 10859 ।।
tatthēgaṁ jagaguruṇō ēgaṁ harivaṁsakulapasūyāṇa । ēgaṁ tu sēsagāṇaṁ aṇagārāṇaṁ samaggāṇa ।।10860।।
aha tēhi tava kaē tiyasa nikāyā cauvvihā vi taō । titthayarassa bhagavaō karēṁti nivvāṇavaramahimaṁ । 861 |
tō naṁdīsaradīvē gaṁtuṁ aṭṭhāhiyā mahāmahimaṁ । nivvatayaṁti tattō vaccati nisu ṭhāṇēsu ।। 10862।।
niya niya sōhammasahāsu tattha māṇavagacēiyakkhaṁbhē । vairāmaēsa gōlagavaṭṭasamuggēsu nēūṇa ॥। 10863।।
jiṇapuṁgavasakahāō khivaṁti tō amaralōyavisayasuhaṁ । aṇuhavamāṇā kālaṁ gamati līlāpamuiyamaṇā ।। 10864।।
pacchā lōgō ciyagā chāraṁ viṇiūṇa ḍuṁgarē kuṇai । paḍhamajiṇē vipattē taiyā vi jaṇēṇa kayamēvaṁ ।। 10865 ।।
tappabhiijaṇō inhi pi ḍuṁgarē kuṇai mayagachārēṇa । chārēṇa tēṇa kēhi vi kayaṁ samālabhaṇamaṁgammi ।। 10866।।
bhattīkō vi puṇō tēṇa vi chārēṇa kuṇai puṁḍāī | tiṇhaṁ pi hu ciyagāṇaṁ aggī gahiūṇa saḍḍhēhi ।। 10867।।
nīō niyammi gēhē tappa bhaī āhiyaggiṇō jāyā । sāmī ciyagāē aggī dō vi annēsu saṁkamai ।। 10858 ।।
ikkhāgakulabhavāṇaṁ taṇaō saṁkamai pāvagō iyaraṁ । iyarāṇa saṁtiō puṇa katthai saṁkamai nannattha ।। 10869 ।।
iya sirimunisuvvayajiṇidacariē sirisiricaṁdasūri viraiē navamaṁ bhavaggahaṇaṁ samattaṁ
muṇisuvvayanāhāō ēgahiṁ chaha vāsasayasa hassēhiṁ । namināhō uppannō paṁcahi lakkhēhiṁ tō nēmī ।। 10870 ।।
nēmijiṇāō pāsō uppannō aigaēhi vāsāṇaṁ । tēsīē sahassēhi saēhi aṭṭamēhiṁ ca ।। 10871 ।।
aḍḍhāijjasaēhiṁ gaēhiṁ vāsāṇa pāsanāhāō । uppannō vīrajiṇō jassēyaṁ vaṭṭaē titthaṁ ।। 10872 ।।
tasya apacchimatitthāhivassa titthē pavaḍḍhamāṇammi । siripanhavāhaṇakulē gacchē harisaurapabhavammi ||73 |
sirijayasiṁha sūrī sayaṁbharī maṁḍalammi supasiddhō । paṁcavihāyārasamāyaraṇaraō guṇanihī jāō । 10874।
tāṇa viṇēō guṇarayaṇasāyarō abhayadēvasūri tti । uvasamapahāṇayāē jēṇa surāṇa vi maṇōhariyaṁ ।। 10875 ।।
suragurusarisamaī vihu jassa samaggē vi guṇagaṇē gahiuṁ । nēya samatthō kiṁ puṇa tē vōttamahaṁ khamō jimhō ||76 ||
asarisaguṇāṇurāēṇa paravasīya māṇasō taha vi । tēsi guṇamāhappaṁ maṇaṁ pi kittēmi sattīē ॥। 10877 ।।

338
gaṁthapasatthi
.
garuyaguṇē aṇusaraṇaṁ kuṇamāṇē pāsiūṇa va pavanaṁ । tuṁgattaṇaṁ sarīrēṇa jassa accabhūyaṁ bhuvaṇē || 10878 ।।
rūvēṇa nijjiō lajjiō vva mayaraddhaō mahāsuhaḍō । niyaḍō na kayāi vi jassa saṁṭhiō viṭṭimavimukkō |
nivvāṇa atyagirisiratirōhiē diṇayarammi va jiṇidē । puvvamuṇimayaṁkamahē lōgaṁtarapaṭṭiē saṁtē ।। 10880 ।।
kalikālanisāpasariyapamāyabahalaṁdhayā rapaḍalēṇa । saṁjamamaggē pacchāiyammi pāēṇa iha bharahē ।। 10881 ॥
jēṇa tavaniyamasaṁjamasamujjaēṇaṁ mahānirīhēṇa । viṣphuriyaṁ vimalamaṇippaīvakappēṇa savvattō ।। 10882 ।।
taha kaha vi aṇuṭṭhāṇaṁ mukkakasāyaṁ aṇuṭṭhiyaṁ jēṇa । parapakkha sapakkhēsu vimaṇaṁ pi jaha hōi na virōhō । । 10883 ।।
ēgō ya cōlapaṭṭō taha pacchāyaṇapaḍī vi ēkkā ya। niyaparibhōgē jassā''si savvayā ainirīhassa ।। 10884 । ।
dēhē vatsu sayā vi jassa malanivaha muvvahaṁtassa | abhitara kammamalō tabbhayabhīō vva nīharai ।। 10885 ।।
ghayavigaī mōttr̥ṇaṁ paccakkhāyāō sēsavigaīō । savvāō jēṇa jāvajjīvaṁ rasagiddhirahiē ।। 10886 ।।
nijjaraṇakaē kammāṇa jēṇa diṇataiya jāmasamayammi । gimhē bhikkhā bhamiyā paḍhamaguṇaṭṭhāṇiyagihēsu । 10887।
bhikkhāviṇiggayaṁ jaṁ sōūṇaṁ sāvayā niyanisu । hōṁti gihēsu vauttā bhikkhādāṇā hilāsēṇa || 10888।।
jaṁ niyahiniyaḍāgayabbhatthēuṁ mahiḍḍiyā vi narā । āmaṇasēṭṭippamuhā paḍilārbhēti ya sahatthēṇa ॥। 10889 ।।
gāmē vā nayarē vā sō katthai jattha saṁṭhiō jāva । tāva tamavaṁdiūṇaṁ na tattha pāyaṁ jaṇō bhuttō ।। 10890 ।।
sirivīra ēva taṇaō ṭhakkurasirijajjaō jayapasiddhō । gāuya paṁcagamajjhē avaṁdiuṁ jaṁ na bhuṁjatō ।। 10891 ।।
aṇahillavāḍayapurē jāya visēsūsavē jiṇāyayaṇē । hakkāriūṇa nīē ēkkammivi jammi tattha taō ।। 10892 ।।
garu garuyayarō vihu sēsō sāvayajaṇō sayaṁ caiva । jāi aṇāhūō vihu jassa namasaṇakayapainnō ।। 10893 ।।
muttī va jassa sayalā amayarasēṇēva nimmiyā vihiṇā । taddaṁsaṇē vi nāsai jaṇassa jamhā kasāyavisaṁ ॥। 894 । ।
paratitthīṇa vidiṭṭha hiyayaṁ palhāyaē sadaṁsaṇaō । jō tēhi vi mannijjai niyaniyadēvāvayārō vva ।। 10895 ।।
taṁ ciya sayā vi vayaṇaṁ muhukuharāō viṇiggayaṁ jassa । jammi nisuē jaṇāṇaṁ paramā maṇanivvuī hōi ।। 10896 ।।
annōnnagōṭṭhikalahē jēhiṁ kaō sāvaēhi rōsavasā । jiṇabhavaṇagamaṇaniyamō uvasaṁtā tē vi jassa girā ।। 897 ।।
kaha vi kasāyavasēṇaṁ sahōyarā bhāuṇō vi vaṭṭaṁtā । annōnnamaṇālāvē vigayakasāyā kayā jēṇa ।। 10898 ।।
laddhanariṁdapasāyā thaddhā jē dēvayāṇa vi paṇāmaṁ । kicchēṇa kuṇatā taha guruṇī ēgassa niyagacchē ।। 10899 ।।
rāyāmaccappamuhā niōgiṇō tē vi jassa vayaṇēṇa । sāmannassa vi muṇiṇō mukkamayā kamanayā jāyā ।। 900 ।।
gōvagirisiharasaṁṭhiyacaramajiṇāyayaṇadāramavaruddhaṁ । puvvanavadinnasā saṇasaṁsādhaṇiēhi cirakālaṁ ।। 10901 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tattha bhaṇiūṇa bhuvaṇapālābhihāṇabhūvālaṁ । aigaruyapayattēṇaṁ mukkalayaṁ kāriyaṁ jēṇa ॥। 10902 ।।
varaṇāgasuyaṁ saṁtu ya sacivaṁ bhaṇiūṇa jēṇa bharuyacchē। sirisaṁvaliyā vihārē hēmamayā rōviyā kalasā ॥ 903 ॥
jēṇa jayasiṁhadēvō rāyā bhaṇiūṇa sayalasamma । kārāviō amāri pajjōsavaṇāisu tihīsu ।। 10904 ।।
puhaīrāēṇa sayaṁbharī nariṁdēṇa jassa lēhēṇa । raṇakhaṁbhēurajiṇaharē caḍāviyā kaṇayamayakalasā ।। 10905 ।।
jēṇa kuṇaṁtēṇa tavaṁ cauttha chaṭṭha ṁ ca ubhayakālē vi । saddhammadēsaṇā bhaviyaṇassa na kayā viparicattā ॥ 10906।।
sāvayalōō kallāṇaēsu aṭṭhāhiyāsu savisēsaṁ । gāmēsu ya nayarēsu ya bahū payaṭṭāviō jēṇa ॥। 10907 ।।
niya nāṇēṇaṁ kēṇai taha vēmāṇiyasurōvaēsēṇa । paralōyagamaṇasamayaṁ niyayaṁ nāūṇa āsannaṁ ।। 10908।।
nīrōgammi vidēhē kamēṇa kāūṇa kavalaparihāraṁ । khaviūṇa khuhaṁ sayalaṁ jēṇa pavannō abhattaṭṭhī ।। 10909।।

jassuttimadr̥gaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ garuyakhēyabhariyamaṇā । paratitthiyā vi paidiṇamurvēti pāsē sajalanayaṇā । 19010।।
gujjaranaridanayarē sō kōvi na na atthi rāyapabhiijaṇō । aṇasaṇaṭhiyāṇa jō tēsimāgaō nēyapāsammi । 10911 ।
sirisālibhaddasūrippa muhēhi garuyarūpasūrīhiṁ । jassa samīvē gaṁtūṇa kūriyaṁ bahu sasōēhiṁ ॥। 10912॥
māsamma ya bhaddava vaṭṭatē tērasamma uvavāsē । sōhiyavasāyavarabhavaṇamajjhaō nīharēūṇa ॥। 19013।।
pāyayalēhi līlāē ḍaṁḍahatthēhi akkhaliyagaīhiṁ । kassa vi annassa karē avilaggaṁttēhi sayamēva ।। 10914 । ।
naranāhamāṇaṇijjō nivanaya ranivāsinēgamagaṇāṇa । savvēsi pi pahāṇō sagihaṭṭhiō sīyaō sēṭṭhī । । 10915 ।
jassa paya umadaṁsaṇakayāhilāsō samāhimalahaṁtō । dakkhinnamahōyahiṇā parōvayārēkkarasiēṇa ।। 10916 ।।
gaṁtaṇa jēṇa vaṁdāviyaṇa vihiō samāhisaṁpannō । dhammavara dammāṇa karāviō vīsasahassāī ॥। 10917 ।।
gujjaradēsamma samaggagāmanagarāivāsi saḍḍhajaṇō । jassuttimaṭṭhasavaṇē pāēṇa samāgaō tattha ॥। 10918 ।।
aha saga cālīsa diṇāī pālēūṇaṁ samāhiṇāṇasaṇaṁ । dhammajjhāṇaparāyaṇacittō jō parabhavaṁ pattō ।। 10919 ।।
bahubhūmi bahukalasaṁ aṇēgasiyadhayavaḍēhiṁ ramaṇijjaṁ । varasirikhaṁḍaviṇimmiyavimāṇamārōhiūṇa taō || 20 ||
nīhāriyaṁ sarīraṁ jassa bahiṁ sayalamiliyasaṁghēṇa । ēkkēkkaṁ giharakkhagamaṇuyaṁ mōttūṇa sēsajaṇī || 20।।10921।।
nīsēsō nivanayaree niggaō jassa daṁsaṇanimittaṁ । bhattīē kōugēṇa yamaggēsu aladdhasaṁcārō ॥। 14922 ।।
savvapamayāulēhiṁ savvāujjēhiṁ baṁdividēhi । savvēhi viyaṁbhiyasaddavahiriē aṁbarābhōē ॥10923॥
pāyārapacchimaṭṭālaē ṭhiō pariyaṇēṇa saharāyā । jayasiṁhō pēkkhaṁtō jassiḍḍhi nīharaṁtassa ।। 10924।।
taṁ acchariyaṁ daṭhṭhē naridapurisā parōpparaṁ bēṁti । maraṇamaṇiṭṭaṁ pi hu iṭṭhamamha ēvaṁ vibhūīē ।। 10925 ।
raviudayāō ārambha niggayaṁ taṁ vimāṇamavaran । pattaṁ sakkārapaē samaṇupayaṁ lōyakayapūyaṁ ।। 10926 ।।
pūijjatē jammi u paṭṭasūyapamuhapavaravatthāṇaṁ । miliyāī kōḍiyāṇaṁ tayā sayāī aṇēgāī ॥। 10927 ।।
sirikhaṁḍavimāṇēṇaṁ ( taṇēva ) samaṁ sarīrasakkārō । jassa kaō lōēṇaṁ taha uvari puṇō vi khittāī ॥। 10928 ।।
kaṭṭhāī agara sirikhaṁḍasaṁtiyāī ghaṇō ya ghaṇasārō । nivvāṇāē ciyāē jaṇēṇa gahiyā taō rakkhā || 10929।।
rakkhāē vi abhāvē gahiyā taṭṭhāṇamaṭṭiyā tattō । tā jāva tattha jāyā jāṇupamāṇāviyaḍakhaḍḍā ।। 10930 ।।
tīsē rakkhāē maṭṭiyāē aṇubhāvaō sirōbāhā । vēlājaraēgaṁtarajarāirōgā paṇassaṁtā ।। 10931 ।।
bhattivasēṇaṁ na mayē maṇaṁ pi iha bhāsiyaṁ musā kiṁpi । jaṁ paccakkhaṁ diṭṭhē tassa vi lēsō imō bhaṇiō ।। 10932।।
niyatēya visēsēṇaṁ purisōttimahiyayaraṁ jaṇō jāō । kōtthuhamaṇi vva tattō sūri sirihēmacaṁdō tti ।। 10933।।
jugavaḍḍhamāṇapavayaṇapāragaō vayaṇasattisaṁpannō । niyanāmaṁ va bhagavaī jīhaggagayā kayā jēṇa ।। 10934।।
mūlaggaṁthavisēsāvassayalakkhaṇapamāṇapamuhāṇa । sēsāṇa vi gaṁthāṇaṁ paḍhiyaṁ jēṇaddhalakkhaṁ ca ॥10935।।
rāyāmaccāīṇa vi mahiḍḍhiyāṇaṁ jaṇāṇa āyējjō । jiṇasāsaṇappabhāvaṇaparāyaṇō paramakāruṇiō ।। 10936 ।।
navajalaharagahirasarē dhammuvaēsaṁ ca ditaē jammi । jiṇabhavaṇāu bahimmi vi ṭhiō jaṇō suṇai phuḍasaddaṁ ॥ 937॥
vakkhāṇaladdhijuttē jammi kuṇaṁtammi satyavakkhāṇaṁ । pāēṇa jaḍamaīṇa vi jaṇāṇa bōhō sappannō ।। 10938 ।।
uvamiyabhavappapaṁcā vēraggakarī kahā kayā āsi । vakkhāṇiyasiddhēṇaṁ jā puvvaṁ sā kaḍhōrati ॥ 10939 ।।
vakkhāṇiyā sahāē pāēṇa na kēṇaī ciraṁ kālaṁ । jassa muhaniggayatthā muddhāṇa vi sā taha kahaṁ ci ।। 10940।।
jāyā hiyayagayatthā abbhatthēūṇa tēhi jaha ēsā । uvaruvari tinni varisē nisuyā tassēva ya muhāō ।। 10941 ।।
।

jerefor
taṇibhipayārō jāō pāēṇa tīē savvattha । jē tēṇa sayaṁ raiyā gaṁthā tē saṁpai kahēmi ॥। 10942 ।।
suttamuvaēsamālābhavabhāvaṇapagaraṇāṇa kāūṇa । gaṁthasahassā caudasa tērasa vittī kayā jēṇa ।। 10943 ।
aṇuōgaddārāṇaṁ jīvasamāsassa taha ya sayagassa । jēṇaṁ cha sattacaurō gaṁthasahassā kayā vittī ।। 10944।।
mūlāvayavittīē uvari raiyaṁ ca ṭippaṇaṁ jēṇa । paṁcasahassapamāṇaṁ visamadvāṇāvabōharaṁ ।। 10945 ।।
jēṇa visāvassayasuttassuvari savittharā vittī । raiyā pariphuḍatthā aḍavīsa sahassa parimāṇā ।। 10946।।
vakkhāṇaguṇa siddhi sōūṇaṁ jassa gujjaranaridō । jayasiṁha dēvanāmō kayaguṇijaṇamaṇacamakkārō ।। 10937 ।।
āgaṁtaṇaṁ jiṇamaṁdirammi sayamēva suṇai dhammakahaṁ । jassa uvauttacittō suiraṁ parivārasaṁjuttō ।। 10948 ।।
kaiyā vi jassa daṁsaṇaukkaṁṭhiyamāṇasō sayaṁ cēva । āgacchai vasahīē cirakālaṁ kuṇaṛa saṁlāvaṁ ।। 10949 ।।
annamma dinē abbhatthiūṇa nēuṁ niyammi dhavalaharē । sammuhamuṭṭhēūṇaṁ jayasiṁhanivēṇa jassa sayaṁ ।। 10950 ।।
uḍḍhaṭṭhiyassa ullasiyabahalapulaēṇa kaṁcaṇamaēṇa । viulēṇa bhāyaṇēṇaṁ duvvāphalakusumajalamaiō ।। 10951 ।।
agghō bhamāḍiūṇaṁ cirēṇa ārattiyaṁ ca vāratiyaṁ । pakkhittō payapuraō kaō paṇāmō ya paṁcagō ।। 10952 ।।
thālaparivēsiyāō āhārāō taō sahatthēṇa । dinnō niyaicchāē cauvvihō tēṇa āhārō ।। 10953 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca jōḍiūṇaṁ karajuyamajjēva khalu kayatthō haṁ । jāō ajjēva tahā kallāṇaparaṁparā ṭhāṇaṁ ।। 10954।।
jassa maha ajjabhavaṇaṁ tubbhēhi pharisiyaṁ sacaraṇēhiṁ । tō ajja vīranāhō ajjasayaṁ āgaō vva gihē ।। 10955 ।
jēṇa jayasiṁharāyaṁ bhaṇiūṇaṁ tassa maṁḍalē sayalē । jiṇamaṁdirēsu kalasā caḍāviyā ruirakaṇayamayā ।। 10956 ।।
dhaṁdhukkayasaccaurappabhii ṭhāṇēsu annatitthīhi । jiṇasāsaṇassa pīḍā kīratī rakkhiyā jēṇa ।। 10957।।
kārāviyaṁ ca taha tēsu cēva ṭhāṇēsu rahaparibbhamaṇaṁ । nivvigdhaṁ jayasiṁhaṁ bhaṇāviūṇaṁ puhai- nāhaṁ ।। 10958 ।।
kuniōiēhi taha jiṇaharēsu bhajjaṁtadēvadāyāṇaṁ । kārāviyā nivārā jayasiṁhnaridapāsāō ।। 10959 ।।
bhaṁḍārapaciṭṭhē pi hu kēsu vi ṭhāṇēsu dēvadāyassa । davvaṁ jiṇabhavaṇēsuṁ puṇō vi appāviyaṁ jēṇa ।। 10960।।
ki bahuṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ jiṇasāsaṇaparibhavammi jāyatē । savvappaṇāvi tuliyaṁ jēṇa uvāyaṁtarasaēhiṁ ॥। 10961।।
jiṇasāsaṇakajjāī tāiṁ vi saṁsāhiyāī iha jēṇa । annassa maṇammi vi vipphurati na hu jāī kaiyā vi ।। 10962 । ।
liṁgāvasēsamittē vija jiṇē paribhavijjamāṇammi । niyasattīē tattī jēṇa kayā savvakālaṁ pi ।। 10963 ।।
aṇahilavāḍayanayarāō titthajattāē caliyasaṁghēṇa । abbhatthiūṇa nīō sahappaṇā jō mahāmahimō ॥। 10964 ।।
sējjāvālayalaṁgaḍipamuhāṇaṁ jattha sagaḍarūvāṇaṁ । ēkkārasa u sayāī saṁcaliyāī samaḍhiyāī ॥। 10965।।
hyakarahavasahavāhaṇapāyacarāṇaṁ tu najjai na saṁkhā । vāmaṇathali nayarīē dinnā vāsammi saṁghēṇa ।। 10966 ।।
vāḍīvimāṇaēhiṁ guḍḍaracaukhaṁḍaēhiṁ guliṇīhi । viyaḍē virāyamāṇē nivakhaṁdhāvārasāricchē ।। 10967।।
kayakuṁkumaṁgarāyaṁ niyatthapaṭṭasuyāivaravatthaṁ । kaṁcaṇarayaṇāharaṇēhiṁ bhūmiyaṁ aṁguvaṁgēsu ।। 10968।।
daṭṭhūṇa sāvayajaṇaṁ jiṇaharaparihāvaṇaṁ pakubvaṁtaṁ । khaṁgārassa suraṭṭhāpahuṇō jāyaṁ maṇaṁ duṭṭhaṁ ।। 10969।।
annēhiṁ visō bhaṇiō sayamaṇahilavāḍayassa nayarassa । ciṭṭhai lacchī savvā ihāgayā tujjha punnēhiṁ ।। 10970 ।।
tā ginha tumaṁ ēvaṁ bhaṁḍārō hōi tuha jahā pōḍhō । saṁbhāvijjai ṭhāṇaṁ ēkkāē davvakōḍīē ।। 10971 ।।
lōbhēṇa sō vi savvaṁ taṁ gahiuṁ vaṁchaē puṇō vi paraṁ । savayaṇamajjāyālōvaayasabhīō niyattē ।। 10972।।
i anicchaō sō gahaṇē mōkkhē ya saṁsaiyacittō । kiṁcūrṇa diṇamāsaṁ saṁgha dhārēi tatthēva ।। 10973 ।।

bhāṇijjatō vi diṇē diṇē vi sō saṁghasaṁti ya jaṇassa । nō dēi daṁsaṇaṁ annayā ya sayaṇō maō tassa ।। 10974 |
tō dēkkhaṇayamisēṇaṁ jēṇa muṇidēṇa tattha gaṁtūṇa । paḍibōhiūṇa ēyaṁ saṁghō mōyāviō savvō ।। 10975 ।।
tō ujjayaṁtasattuṁjaēsu titthēsu dōsu vi jiṇidā । sirinēmi usanāhē vaṁdai saṁghō vibhūīē ॥। 10976 ।।
tatthujjayaṁtatitthē pārutthayaaddhalakkhamuppannaṁ । sattuṁjayammi titthē tīsasahassā samuppannā ।। 10977।।
jēṇa paḍibōhiūṇaṁ bhaviyajaṇō ṭhāviō bahudhammē । jiṇabhaṇiē sammattē dēsē savvē ya viraīē ॥। 10978 ।।
pajjaṁtē tēsi pi hu ṭhāṇaṁtarasaṁkamāiyā nēyā । ārāhaṇā gurūṇa va sattadiṇē aṇasaṇaṁ navaraṁ ।। 10979 ।।
nīhāraṇā mahimā dēhassa tahēva jāva sakkārō । kiṁtu sayamēva rāyā samāgaō kēttiyaṁ pi pahaṁ ॥। 10980 ।।
tēsi sīsō sirivijayasiṁhasūrīguṇāyarō jāō । tahaya duijjō sūrī siri siricaṁdō tti nāmēṇa ।। 10981 ।।
dēsēsu viharamāṇō kamēṇa dhavalakkayammi varanayarē । saṁpattō tattha taō bharuyacchaya nāma jiṇabhavaṇē ।। 10982 ।।
uttuṁgammi visālē rūvagaramaṇijjamaṁḍavasaṇāhē । sirimuṇisuvvaya jiṇavarapaḍimā mahiṭṭhiē rammē
saḍḍhō atthi guṇaḍḍhō dhavalō nāmēṇa pōruvāḍakulē । tēṇa jiṇacaṁdasūrippamuhō saṁghō samaggō vi
mēlēu vinnattō sirimuṇisuvvayajiṇidacariyassa । karaṇatthaṁ saṁghēṇa vi siricaṁdō pabhaṇiō sūrī ।। 10985 ।।
sō taṁ saṁghāēsaṁ paḍivajjēuṁ viṇiggaō tattō । āsāvallipurīē āgaṁtūṇaṁ ṭhiō gēhē ।। 10986।।
sirimālakulasamubbhavavarasāvaya sēṭṭhināgilasuyāṇa । aṁbaharibhaṁḍasāliyasaraṇayapamuhāṇa saguṇāṇa ।। 10987।।
tattha ṭṭhiēṇa siricaṁdasūriṇā viraiyaṁ imaṁ cariyaṁ । siri muṇisuvvayatitthaṁkarassa samayānusārēṇa ।। 10988 ।।
jaṁ kiṁpi iha ajuttaṁ uttaṁ maimōhaō maē atthi । taṁ suyaharā kaya kivā majjha visōhēṁtu savvaṁ pi ।। 10989 ।।
paṭṭiyapōtthiya lihaṇē gaṇiṇā kayamēttha pāsadēvēṇa । bahusāhējjaṁ ujjamaparēṇa varamainihāṇēṇa ॥। 10990।।
aṁbaharisaraṇayāṇaṁ kaṇiṭṭabhāyā tahēva jasarāō । sāhijjakarō ucchāhagō ya jāō visēsēṇa ॥। 10991 ।।
vikkamakālāō gaē vāsasahassē saē satēṇa uē । tayaṇaṁtaradīvūsavadiṇammi ēyaṁ parisamattaṁ ॥ 10992।।
ēttha ya paḍhamaṁ putthayamabhilihiyaṁ dēvarāyanāmēṇa । diyavarakē savataṇaēṇa lēhaēṇaṁ viṇīēṇa ॥। 10993।।
gāhāṇaṁ saṁkhā sahassa dasa hōṁti navasayāiṁ ca । cauṇaui samahiyāiṁ nēyāiṁ ēttha gaṁthamma ।। 93।।10994।।
vāsē jāviha bhārahammi vimalaṁ savvaṇṇuṇō sāsaṇaṁ,
kujjā bhavvajaṇōhamōhatimirukkērassa ninnāsaṇaṁ ।।
tāvēyaṁ muṇisuvvayassa cariyaṁ sāṇuggahā sāhuṇō,
vakkhāṇaṁ tu suṇaṁtu bhavvanivahā ēgaggacittāsayā ।। 94 ।। 10995 ।।
śrī muṇisuvvayasāmicaritaṁ samāptam ।। graṁthāgraṁ.
saṁvat 1998 aśvina vadi 1 gurau । adyēha śrīmadaṇahillapāṭakē samasta rājāvalīsamalaṁkr̥tamahārājā-
dhirājatribhuvanagaṁḍasiddhacakravatti śrīmajjayasiṁhadēvakalyāṇavijayarājyē । tasmin kālē pravarttamānē śrī śrī
caṁdrācāryāṇāmādēśēna ūmatā grāmāvasthō ....
'śrī munisuvratasvāmicaritaṁ pustakamalēkhi || cha ||
